text: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ , the son of David , the son of Abraham .
text2: Apəlaham lʋlʋɣʋ tʋ ntɛ ́ Tafiiti , Tafiiti lʋlʋɣʋ tʋ Yesu Kilisiti lʋlʋɣʋ looŋa ntɛ ́ cənɛ .

text: Abraham begat Isaac ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren ;
text2: Apəlaham lʋla Ɩsaaka , na Ɩsaaka náá lʋlɩ Yakɔpʋ , na Yakɔpʋ náá lʋlɩ Yuta na ɩ newaa .

text: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar ; and Phares begat Esrom ; and Esrom begat Aram ;
text2: Yuta ná lʋla Falɛsɩ na Sela . Pɛlɛ pa too kɛlɛ Tamaa . Falɛsɩ ná lʋla Hɛsəlɔŋ , na Hɛsəlɔŋ náá lʋlɩ Alam ,

text: And Aram begat Aminadab ; and Aminadab begat Naasson ; and Naasson begat Salmon ;
text2: na Alam náá lʋlɩ Aminatapɩ , na Aminatapɩ náá lʋlɩ Naasɔŋ , na Naasɔŋ náá lʋlɩ Saləma .

text: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab ; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth ; and Obed begat Jesse ;
text2: Saləma ná lʋla Poosi , Poosi too kɛlɛ Lahapɩ . Poosi ná lʋla Opɛtɩ , Opɛtɩ too kɛlɛ Luuti . Opɛtɩ ná lʋla Sesee ,

text: And Jesse begat David the king ; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias ;
text2: na Sesee ná lʋləna wulaʋ sɔsɔ Tafiiti . Tafiiti ná lʋla Salʋmɔŋ , Salʋmɔŋ too kɛlɛ Yulii alʋ .

text: And Solomon begat Roboam ; and Roboam begat Abia ; and Abia begat Asa ;
text2: Salʋmɔŋ ná lʋla Lʋpʋwam , na Lʋpʋwam náá lʋlɩ Apiya , na Apiya náá lʋlɩ Asafɩ ,

text: And Asa begat Josaphat ; and Josaphat begat Joram ; and Joram begat Ozias ;
text2: na Asafɩ náá lʋlɩ Yosafatɩ , na Yosafatɩ náá lʋlɩ Yolam , na Yolam náá lʋlɩ Osiyasɩ .

text: And Ozias begat Joatham ; and Joatham begat Achaz ; and Achaz begat Ezekias ;
text2: Osiyasɩ ná lʋla Yowatam , na Yowatam náá lʋlɩ Akasɩ , na Akasɩ náá lʋlɩ Ɩsekiyasɩ ,

text: And Ezekias begat Manasses ; and Manasses begat Amon ; and Amon begat Josias ;
text2: na Ɩsekiyasɩ náá lʋlɩ Manasee , na Manasee náá lʋlɩ Amoŋ , na Amoŋ náá lʋlɩ Yosiyasɩ .

text: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren , about the time they were carried away to Babylon :
text2: Yosiyasɩ ná lʋləna Cekoniyasɩ na ɩ newaa kɛ waatʋ wei pa kuu Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma na pá pona Papiloni tɔ .

text: And after they were brought to Babylon , Jechonias begat Salathiel ; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel ;
text2: Pa pona Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma kɛ Papiloni təna , ɩlɛna Cekoniyasɩ náá lʋlɩ Selatəyɛlɩ , na Selatəyɛlɩ náá lʋlɩ Solopapɛɛlɩ ,

text: And Zorobabel begat Abiud ; and Abiud begat Eliakim ; and Eliakim begat Azor ;
text2: na Solopapɛɛlɩ náá lʋlɩ Apiyuti , na Apiyuti náá lʋlɩ Ɩliyakim , na Ɩliyakim náá lʋlɩ Asɔɔ .

text: And Azor begat Sadoc ; and Sadoc begat Achim ; and Achim begat Eliud ;
text2: Asɔɔ ná lʋla Satɔkɩ , na Satɔkɩ náá lʋlɩ Akim , na Akim náá lʋlɩ Ɩliyuti ,

text: And Eliud begat Eleazar ; and Eleazar begat Matthan ; and Matthan begat Jacob ;
text2: na Ɩliyuti náá lʋlɩ Ɩlasaa , na Ɩlasaa náá lʋlɩ Mataŋ , na Mataŋ náá lʋlɩ Yakɔpʋ .

text: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary , of whom was born Jesus , who is called Christ .
text2: Yakɔpʋ ná lʋla Yosɛɛfʋ wei ɩ kɛ ́ Malɩ paalʋ tɔ , na Malɩ ɩnɩ ɩ lʋləna Yesu wei pa yaa sɩ Mesii tɔ .

text: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations ; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations ; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations .
text2: Ye mpʋ , ɩsɩɩ pa kɛɛsʋɣʋ sɩ ɩnɛ ɩ lʋla ɩnɛ na ɩnɛ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ lʋlɩ ɩnɛ tɔ , pə kpaɣaʋ hatoo Apəlaham haləna pə ́ tala Tafiiti tɔ , lʋlʋɣʋ loosi kpɛnta naanʋwa na liɣiti . Na pə kpaɣaʋ Tafiiti haləna pə ́ tala waatʋ wei pa kuu Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma na pa pona Papiloni tɔ , lʋlʋɣʋ loosi wɛ naanʋwa na liɣiti tɔtɔ . Na lʋlʋɣʋ loosi naanʋwa na liɣiti tɔtɔɣɔ pə kpaɣaʋ hatoo pa ponaʋ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma kɛ Papiloni tɔ , haləna pə ́ sɩɩna Mesii lʋlʋɣʋ .

text: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise : When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph , before they came together , she was found with child of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ɩsəna pa lʋla Yesu Kilisiti tɔɣɔlɔ . Ɩ too Malɩ wei ɩ kɛ ́ Yosɛɛfʋ amʋsaɣa tɔ , ɩ haɣa hɔɣɔ na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toma na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ saa .

text: Then Joseph her husband , being a just man , and not willing to make her a publick example , was minded to put her away privily .
text2: Ɩ paalʋ Yosɛɛfʋ ka kɛ ́ yʋlʋ kʋpaŋ kɛ ́ , ɩlɛ ɩ taa tisiɣi sɩ ɩ ́ kuli Malɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ yəlaa samaa taa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ hʋʋ sɩ ɩ ká kisi - ɩ mukaɣa tɛɛ .

text: But while he thought on these things , behold , the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream , saying , Joseph , thou son of David , fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife : for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ɩ hʋʋkaɣa ɩ taa kɛ ́ mpʋ , ɩlɛna Tacaa ɩsɔtaa tillu kɔɔ ɩ kiŋ kɛ toosee taa , na ɩ ́ heeli - ɩ sɩ : Tafiiti lʋlʋɣʋ tʋ Yosɛɛfʋ , taa nyana nyá amʋsaɣa Malɩ kpaɣaʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , hɔɣɔ ŋka ɩ haɣaa tɔ , Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kiŋ kɛ ka lɩɩnaa .

text: And she shall bring forth a son , and thou shalt call his name JESUS : for he shall save his people from their sins .
text2: Ɩ ká lʋlɩ apalʋ pəyaɣa , na ń yaa - kɛ sɩ Yesu . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pəyaɣa ŋkɛ kaa waasəna ka yəlaa kɛ pa ɩsaɣatʋ taa .

text: Now all this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə lapa na pə ́ cɔ ́ tɔm nti Tacaa ka yɔɣɔtəna Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ nɔɣɔ tɔ tə ́ lá tampana sɩ :

text: Behold , a virgin shall be with child , and shall bring forth a son , and they shall call his name Emmanuel , which being interpreted is , God with us .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyənɩ , pɛɛlɔ wei ɩ ta nyənta apalʋ tɔ ɩ ká haɣa hɔɣɔ , na ɩ ́ lʋlɩ apalʋ pəyaɣa , na paa yaa - kɛ sɩ Ɩmaniyɛlɩ . ( Hətɛ tənɛ tə yɔɣɔtəɣɩ sɩ Ɩsɔ wɛ tá kiŋ . )

text: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him , and took unto him his wife :
text2: Yosɛɛfʋ fema , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lá nti Tacaa ɩsɔtaa tillu ka heela - ɩ tɔ . Ɩ kpaɣa ɩ amʋsaɣa Malɩ .

text: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son : and he called his name JESUS .
text2: Ama ɩ ta nyəmɩ - ɩ haləna ɩ ́ tɛ pəyaɣa lʋlʋɣʋ . Na Yosɛɛfʋ yaa - kɛ sɩ Yesu .

text: Now when Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judaea in the days of Herod the king , behold , there came wise men from the east to Jerusalem ,
text2: Pa lʋla Yesu kɛ ́ Yuta Pɛtəlɛhɛm taa kɛ ́ wulaʋ sɔsɔ Helɔtɩ pɔɔlɛ taa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩsɔtʋlʋŋasɩ tɔm nyəntaa napəlɩ pa lɩɩna ilim təlɩɩlɛ na pá tala Yosalɛm .

text: Saying , Where is he that is born King of the Jews ? for we have seen his star in the east , and are come to worship him .
text2: Na pá pɔɔsɩ sɩ : Leɣe pəyaɣa ŋka pa lʋla nɔɔnɔɔ na káá la Yuta nyə ́ ma wulaʋ sɔsɔ tɔ ka wɛɛ ? Tə na ka ɩsɔtʋlʋŋa lɩɩ ilim təlɩɩlɛ kɛ ́ na tə ́ kɔɔ sɩ tə sɛɛ - kɛ .

text: When Herod the king had heard these things , he was troubled , and all Jerusalem with him .
text2: Wulaʋ Helɔtɩ nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pə ́ pɛkəlɩ - ɩ sɔsɔm . Pə pɛkəla Yosalɛm nyə ́ ma tənaɣa mpʋ tɔtɔ .

text: And when he had gathered all the chief priests and scribes of the people together , he demanded of them where Christ should be born .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ koti kɔtəlaa sɔsaa təna , na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛɣɛ timpi pə wɛɛ sɩ paa lʋlɩ Mesii tɔ .

text: And they said unto him , In Bethlehem of Judaea : for thus it is written by the prophet ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa cɔ - ɩ sɩ , Yuta Pɛtəlɛhɛm kɛ ́ . Mpi tɔ , Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa ŋmaawa sɩ :

text: And thou Bethlehem , in the land of Juda , art not the least among the princes of Juda : for out of thee shall come a Governor , that shall rule my people Israel .
text2: Yuta taa Pɛtəlɛhɛm nyá , tampana n ta kɛ Yuta acalɛɛ sɔsɔɔna taa səkpete paa pəcɔ . Mpi tɔ , nyá taa kɛ ́ wulaʋ ká lɩɩna , wei ɩ ká tɔkɩ ma Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma kɛ teu tɔ .

text: Then Herod , when he had privily called the wise men , inquired of them diligently what time the star appeared .
text2: Tənaɣa Helɔtɩ yaa nyəntaa mpɛɣɛ kpeeŋa na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛɣɛ pə təna sɩ ɩ nyəŋ waatʋ wei maɣamaɣa ɩsɔtʋlʋŋa lɩɩwa tɔ .

text: And he sent them to Bethlehem , and said , Go and search diligently for the young child ; and when ye have found him , bring me word again , that I may come and worship him also .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ hʋla - wɛɣɛ Pɛtəlɛhɛm mpaaʋ na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ pɛɛkɩ pəyaɣa ŋkɛɣɛ teu . Waatʋ wei ɩ ́ na - kɛ ɩ ́ heeli - m na ma maɣamaɣa má polo na má sɛɛ - kɛ .

text: When they had heard the king , they departed ; and , lo , the star , which they saw in the east , went before them , till it came and stood over where the young child was .
text2: Nyəntaa tɛma wulaʋ tɔm ntəɣɩ nɩɩʋ ɩlɛna pá tɛɛ . Na ɩsɔtʋlʋŋa ŋka kaa lɩɩwa ilim təlɩɩlɛ na pá na - kɛɣɛ mpʋ tɔ ka tɔŋaɣa pa nɔɣɔ tɔɔ , haləna ká tala timpi pəyaɣa ŋkɛ ka wɛɛ tɔ , ɩlɛna ká səŋ .

text: When they saw the star , they rejoiced with exceeding great joy .
text2: Nyəntaa loosa ɩsɔtʋlʋŋa ŋkɛ , ɩlɛna pa laŋa hʋlʋmɩ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: And when they were come into the house , they saw the young child with Mary his mother , and fell down , and worshipped him : and when they had opened their treasures , they presented unto him gifts ; gold , and frankincense , and myrrh .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa sʋʋ təyaɣa taa na pá ná pəyaɣa na ka too Malɩ . Ɩlɛna pá həntɩ atɛ na pá sɛɛ - kɛ . Na pá hɛtɩ pa wontu na pá ha - kɛɣɛ wʋla na tulaalʋ kʋfəɣətʋ na tulaalʋ miili .

text: And being warned of God in a dream that they should not return to Herod , they departed into their own country another way .
text2: Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ heela nyəntaa mpɛɣɛ toosee taa sɩ pá taa məlɩ Helɔtɩ cɔlɔ . Ɩlɛna pá cɔlɔ mpaaʋ na pá kpe .

text: And when they were departed , behold , the angel of the Lord appeareth to Joseph in a dream , saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and flee into Egypt , and be thou there until I bring thee word : for Herod will seek the young child to destroy him .
text2: Nyəntaa tɛɛwa ɩlɛna Tacaa ɩsɔtaa tillu nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ kɔɔ Yosɛɛfʋ kiŋ kɛ toosee taa na ɩ ́ heeli - ɩ sɩ : Kʋlɩ na ń kpaɣa pəyaɣa na ka too , na ń se na ń polo Icipiti , na ń caɣa təna . Haləna waatʋ wei maa heeli - ŋ sɩ ń məlɩ tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Helɔtɩ ká pɛɛkɩ pəyaɣa ŋkɛ sɩ ɩ kʋɣʋ - kɛ .

text: When he arose , he took the young child and his mother by night , and departed into Egypt :
text2: Tənaɣa Yosɛɛfʋ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa pəyaɣa na ka too , na pá tɛɛ Icipiti kɛ ahoo anɩ .

text: And was there until the death of Herod : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying , Out of Egypt have I called my son .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ caɣa təna haləna Helɔtɩ sɩ . Ɩlɛna pə ́ la nti Tacaa ka yɔɣɔtəna Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ nɔɣɔ tɔ sɩ : Ma ləsa ma pəyaɣa kɛ Icipiti .

text: Then Herod , when he saw that he was mocked of the wise men , was exceeding wroth , and sent forth , and slew all the children that were in Bethlehem , and in all the coasts thereof , from two years old and under , according to the time which he had diligently inquired of the wise men .
text2: Helɔtɩ nawa sɩ nyəntaa puɣusa - ɩ , ɩlɛna pə ́ salɩ - ɩ sɔsɔm . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ tilaa sɩ pá kʋ Pɛtəlɛhɛm ɩcatɛ na acalɛɛ nna a cɔɔna - tɛ tɔ pə apalʋpiya təna . Haləna nsi sɩ pɩɩsɩ tala naalɛ naalɛ tɔ , na ɩ ́ kɛɛsəna saa wei nyəntaa heela - ɩ sɩ ɩsɔtʋlʋŋa lɩɩwa tɔ .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Selemii ka kpaalaa tɔ sɩ :

text: In Rama was there a voice heard , lamentation , and weeping , and great mourning , Rachel weeping for her children , and would not be comforted , because they are not .
text2: Pa nɩɩwa kapuka kɛ Lama . Wula na laŋwakəllɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ mɔla . Lasɛɛlɩ wiina ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ piya . Ɩ ta tisi sɩ pá puɣusi - ɩ kɛ ́ sɩ fɛɩ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: But when Herod was dead , behold , an angel of the Lord appeareth in a dream to Joseph in Egypt ,
text2: Helɔtɩ səm waalɩ Tacaa ɩsɔtaa tillu nɔɣɔlʋ kɔma Yosɛɛfʋ kiŋ kɛ toosee taa kɛ Icipiti ,

text: Saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and go into the land of Israel : for they are dead which sought the young child ' s life .
text2: na ɩ ́ heeli - ɩ sɩ : Kʋlɩ na ń kpaɣa pəyaɣa ŋkɛ na ka too na ɩ ́ məlɩ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ tɛtʋ taa . Mpa pa pɛɛkaɣa sɩ pá kʋ pəyaɣa ŋkɛ tɔ pa səpa .

text: And he arose , and took the young child and his mother , and came into the land of Israel .
text2: Tənaɣa Yosɛɛfʋ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa pəyaɣa na ka too na pá məlɩ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ tɛtʋ taa .

text: But when he heard that Archelaus did reign in Judaea in the room of his father Herod , he was afraid to go thither : notwithstanding , being warned of God in a dream , he turned aside into the parts of Galilee :
text2: Ama Yosɛɛfʋ nɩɩwa sɩ Aaselayusi tɔɣɔ kawulaɣa kɛ Yuta kɛ ɩ caa Helɔtɩ lonte . Ɩlɛna sɔɣɔntʋ kpa - ɩ na tɛtʋ ntɩ tə taa pote . Ɩsɔ tasa - ɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ hʋlʋɣʋ kɛ ɩ toosee taa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lɔɣɔ ɩ təɣɩ Kalilee tɛtʋ taa ,

text: And he came and dwelt in a city called Nazareth : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophets , He shall be called a Nazarene .
text2: na ɩ ́ caɣa ɩcatɛ nte pa yaa sɩ Nasalɛtɩ tɔ tə taa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa ka yɔɣɔtaa tɔ sɩ : Paa yaa - ɩ sɩ Nasalɛtɩ tʋ .

text: In those days came John the Baptist , preaching in the wilderness of Judaea ,
text2: Pə kɔma na pə ́ kɛɛsɩ ɩlɛ , Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ kɔma Yuta wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa kɛlɛ na ɩ ́ niki waasʋ lapʋ .

text: And saying , Repent ye : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Na ɩ ́ tɔŋ sɩ : Ɩ ́ laɣasɩ tɔntɛ , ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa wʋsa kɔntɛ kɛ ́ .

text: For this is he that was spoken of by the prophet Esaias , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Yohaanɩ tɔm kɛ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Ɩsayii ka yɔɣɔtaɣa saa wei ɩ yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Nɔɣɔlʋ yɔɣɔtəɣəna nɔɣɔ sɔsɔɣa kɛ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa sɩ : Ɩ ́ taɣanɩ Tacaa mpaaʋ . Ɩ ́ hɛɛ - ɩ - kʋ na kʋ siɣisi .

text: And the same John had his raiment of camel ' s hair , and a leathern girdle about his loins ; and his meat was locusts and wild honey .
text2: Yohaanɩ taka yooyoonaa hʋntʋ kunti , na ɩ ́ ləla tɔnʋɣʋ tampala kɛ ɩ tənaɣa taa . Ɩ tɔɣɔnaɣa ntɛ ́ cələŋ na taalɛ tɩɩŋ nim .

text: Then went out to him Jerusalem , and all Judaea , and all the region round about Jordan ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yosalɛm nyə ́ ma na Yuta tɛtʋ təna nyə ́ ma na Yaatanɩ nɔɣɔ tɛtʋ təna nyə ́ ma sʋʋ pote kɛ ɩ kiŋ .

text: And were baptized of him in Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Na pá kuliɣi pa ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ yəlaa taa , na Yohaanɩ sɔɔkɩ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm kɛ Yaatanɩ pɔɣɔ taa .

text: But when he saw many of the Pharisees and Sadducees come to his baptism , he said unto them , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Yohaanɩ nawa Falisanaa paɣalɛ na Satusee nyə ́ ma paɣalɛ na pá puki ɩ cɔlɔ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Akala piya mɛ , awe kpaala - mɛ na ɩ ́ seeki Ɩsɔ pááná nna a kɔŋ tɔ ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits meet for repentance :
text2: Ɩ ́ la mpa pa yela ɩsaɣatʋ tɔ pa kʋlapəlɛ .

text: And think not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , that God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa tɛləsəɣɩ lɔlɔ sɩ mə caa kɛlɛ Apəlaham . Ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ye pəlɛ pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ , Ɩsɔ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lá na pɛɛ anɛ á pəsɩ Apəlaham piya .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : therefore every tree which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Pa tɛma laalɛ tʋɣʋ kɛ tɩɩŋ sɩ pa huɣu - ɩ na ɩ tɛɛ kɛ ́ te . Tʋɣʋ ŋku kɩɩ lʋləɣɩ pee kʋpana tɔ , paa hu - kʋ na pá tʋ kɔkɔ .

text: I indeed baptize you with water unto repentance : but he that cometh after me is mightier than I , whose shoes I am not worthy to bear : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost , and with fire :
text2: Ma ɩlɛ , lʋm kɛ ma sɔɔna - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ laɣasa tɔntɛ . Ama ma waalɩ wei ɩ kɔŋ tɔ , pʋntʋ kəla - m toŋ təcaɣacaɣa . Ma ta tala má hɩɩsɩ ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ taa ntaŋkpala mʋsʋɣʋ maɣamaɣa . Ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ká sɔ - mɛ na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ na kɔkɔ .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and gather his wheat into the garner ; but he will burn up the chaff with unquenchable fire .
text2: Ɩ tɔka ɩ kʋfalʋɣʋ kɛ ɩ niŋ taa . Ɩ ká fala pə təna təcaɣacaɣa , na ɩ ́ suu pee kɛ ɩ kpou taa . Ama ɩ ká tʋ lɔɔtʋ kɛ kɔkɔ ŋka kaa teŋ tɔ ka taa .

text: Then cometh Jesus from Galilee to Jordan unto John , to be baptized of him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu lɩɩna Kalilee na ɩ ́ kɔɔ Yaatanɩ kɛ Yohaanɩ cɔlɔ sɩ Yohaanɩ ɩ ́ sɔ - ɩ Ɩsɔ lʋm .

text: But John forbad him , saying , I have need to be baptized of thee , and comest thou to me ?
text2: Ama Yohaanɩ ta tisi . Haləna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Pə nəɣəsəna ɩsɩɩ náá sɔna má , na ń məlɩ na ń kɔŋ ma kiŋ na ?

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Suffer it to be so now : for thus it becometh us to fulfil all righteousness . Then he suffered him .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ Yohaanɩ sɩ : Yele na pə ́ lá mpʋ . Pə wɛɛ sɩ tə yoosi pə təna mpi Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔtaa sɩ tə ́ la tɔɣɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yohaanɩ tisaa .

text: And Jesus , when he was baptized , went up straightway out of the water : and , lo , the heavens were opened unto him , and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove , and lighting upon him :
text2: Pa tɛma Yesu kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔʋ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lɩɩ lʋm taa . Tənaɣa ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ hɛta kpakpaa , na Yesu ná Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu ɩsɩɩ alukuku na kʋ tiiki ɩ tɔɔ .

text: And lo a voice from heaven , saying , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá nɩɩ pə yɔɣɔtəna ɩsɔtaa sɩ : Ɩnɛɣɛlɛ ma luɣu tɛɛ Pəyaɣa , ma laŋlɛ hɛɛna - ɩ sɔsɔm .

text: Then was Jesus led up of the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil .
text2: Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Feesuɣu pona Yesu kɛ ́ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa sɩ Ɩlɔɣɔʋ ɩ ́ maɣasɩ - ɩ .

text: And when he had fasted forty days and forty nights , he was afterward an hungred .
text2: Yesu tɛma nɔɣɔ hɔkʋɣʋ kɛ ilim na ahoo kɛ kʋyɛɛŋ nɩɩlɛ . Ɩlɛna nyɔɣɔsɩ kpa - ɩ .

text: And when the tempter came to him , he said , If thou be the Son of God , command that these stones be made bread .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩlɔɣɔʋ kpəntəna - ɩ na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ye n kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa yɔɣɔtɩ na pɛɛ anɛ á pəsɩ tɔɣɔnaɣa .

text: But he answered and said , It is written , Man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God .
text2: Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ pə taɣa tɔɣɔnaɣa tike kɛ yʋlʋ ká hikina weesuɣu . Ama tɔm təna nti tə lɩɩkəna Ɩsɔ nɔɣɔ taa tɔ tə kiŋ tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: Then the devil taketh him up into the holy city , and setteth him on a pinnacle of the temple ,
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ , Ɩlɔɣɔʋ pona Yesu kɛ ́ ɩcatɛ naŋŋ nyəntɛ taa na ɩ ́ kpaasɩ - ɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ comcom nɔɣɔ taa ,

text: And saith unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down : for it is written , He shall give his angels charge concerning thee : and in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ye n kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa , lɩɩ cənɛ na ń ŋmaa atɛ . Pə taɣa polo , pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Ɩsɔ ká heeli ɩ ɩsɔtaa tillaa kɛ nyá tɔm sɩ pá paasəna - ŋ teu . Na paa teeli - ŋ pa niŋ taa sɩ pə ́ taa kɔɔ na pəlɛ natəlɩ tə co - ŋ .

text: Jesus said unto him , It is written again , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Ama Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔtɔ sɩ , n kaa maɣasɩ nyá Caa Ɩsɔ sɩ n naa ɩ waalɩ .

text: Again , the devil taketh him up into an exceeding high mountain , and sheweth him all the kingdoms of the world , and the glory of them ;
text2: Ɩlɛna Ɩlɔɣɔʋ tasa Yesu kɛ ́ ponaʋ kɛ pʋɣʋ ŋku kʋ kʋla sɔsɔm tɔ kʋ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ hʋlɩ - ɩ antulinya kawulasɩ təna na sɩ teeli ,

text: And saith unto him , All these things will I give thee , if thou wilt fall down and worship me .
text2: na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ye n ka həntɩ - m atɛ na ń sɛɛ - m , maa ha - ŋ mpʋ ɩnɩ pə təna .

text: Then saith Jesus unto him , Get thee hence , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Satanɩ , tɛɛ . Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ , n ká sɛɛ nyá Caa Ɩsɔ , na ɩ tike ɩ təmlɛ kɛ n ká la .

text: Then the devil leaveth him , and , behold , angels came and ministered unto him .
text2: Tənaɣa Ɩlɔɣɔʋ yela Yesu . Ɩlɛna ɩsɔtaa tillaa kɔɔ na pá paasəna - ɩ .

text: Now when Jesus had heard that John was cast into prison , he departed into Galilee ;
text2: Yesu nɩɩwa sɩ pa tʋ Yohaanɩ kɛ saləka , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɛɛna Kalilee .

text: And leaving Nazareth , he came and dwelt in Capernaum , which is upon the sea coast , in the borders of Zabulon and Nephthalim :
text2: Ɩ yela Nasalɛtɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ caɣa Kapənahum . Ɩcatɛ nte tə wɛ Kalilee lʋm nɔɣɔ kɛ Sapulɔŋ na Nɛfətali pa tɛtʋ taa tɔ .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Ɩsayii ka yɔɣɔtaa tɔ sɩ :

text: The land of Zabulon , and the land of Nephthalim , by the way of the sea , beyond Jordan , Galilee of the Gentiles ;
text2: Sapulɔŋ tɛtʋ na Nɛfətali tɛtʋ , na teŋku tɔɔ tɔɔ , na Yaatanɩ waalɩ , na mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ pa Kalilee .

text: The people which sat in darkness saw great light ; and to them which sat in the region and shadow of death light is sprung up .
text2: Pə yəlaa mpa pa caɣa səkpɛtʋɣʋ taa tɔ , pɩɩ na - wɛ tənyaɩɩ ɩsɩɩ kɔkɔ . Na mpa pa caɣa səm səkpɛtʋɣʋ ɩcatɛ taa tɔ , pɩɩ ná pa tɔɔ tənyaɩɩ .

text: From that time Jesus began to preach , and to say , Repent : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Pə kpaɣaʋ waatʋ ɩnɩ tɔ Yesu sʋʋ waasʋ lapʋ na ɩ ́ tɔŋ sɩ : Ɩ ́ laɣasɩ tɔntɛ , ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa wʋsa kɔntɛ .

text: And Jesus , walking by the sea of Galilee , saw two brethren , Simon called Peter , and Andrew his brother , casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Yesu tɔŋaɣa Kalilee teŋku nɔɣɔ nɔɣɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ná tiina kpalaa kɛ naalɛ . Simɔŋ wei pa yaa sɩ Piyɛɛ tɔ na ɩ neu Antəlɩɩ , na pá tʋɣɩ puluɣu kɛ teŋku taa .

text: And he saith unto them , Follow me , and I will make you fishers of men .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ kɔɔ na má la - mɛ na ɩ ́ puuki yəlaa ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ puukuɣu tiina tɔ .

text: And they straightway left their nets , and followed him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɛlɛ pa yela pa puluŋ na pá təŋɩ - ɩ kpakpaa .

text: And going on from thence , he saw other two brethren , James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , in a ship with Zebedee their father , mending their nets ; and he called them .
text2: Ɩ tasa pote kɛ pəcɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ná Sepetee pəyalʋ Saakɩ na ɩ neu Yohaanɩ na pa caa Sepetee pa wɛ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa na pá taɣanəɣɩ pa puluŋ . Tənaɣa Yesu yaa - wɛ ,

text: And they immediately left the ship and their father , and followed him .
text2: na pá yele pa caa na kpɩɩlʋɣʋ na pá təŋɩ - ɩ kpakpaa .

text: And Jesus went about all Galilee , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing all manner of sickness and all manner of disease among the people .
text2: Yesu cɔɔwa Kalilee tɛtʋ təna na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsɩ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa taa , na ɩ ́ kpaalɩ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ . Na ɩ ́ waasəɣɩ yəlaa taa kʋtɔntʋnaa na acamaa təna .

text: And his fame went throughout all Syria : and they brought unto him all sick people that were taken with divers diseases and torments , and those which were possessed with devils , and those which were lunatick , and those that had the palsy ; and he healed them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yəlaa nɩɩ Yesu taŋ kɛ Silii tɛtʋ təna taa . Na pá kɔna - ɩ yəlaa təna mpa kʋtɔməŋ na wʋsasɩ paɣalɛ tɔŋna kʋnyɔŋ tʋɣʋ tɔ . Alɔɣɔhilaa na timle nyə ́ ma na kʋtɔŋ kʋtʋʋlʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma , na ɩ ́ waasɩ - wɛ .

text: And there followed him great multitudes of people from Galilee , and from Decapolis , and from Jerusalem , and from Judaea , and from beyond Jordan .
text2: Samaa sɔsɔ təŋaɣa - ɩ kɛ ́ . Pa lɩɩna Kalilee na Acalɛɛ Naanʋwa tɛtʋ , na Yosalɛm na Yuta na acalɛɛ nna a wɛ Yaatanɩ waalɩ tɔ .

text: And seeing the multitudes , he went up into a mountain : and when he was set , his disciples came unto him :
text2: Yesu nawa samaa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpa pʋɣʋ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ caɣa . Tənaɣa ɩ ɩfalaa kpətəna - ɩ .

text: And he opened his mouth , and taught them , saying ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ sʋʋ - wɛɣɛ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ sɩ :

text: Blessed are the poor in spirit : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Mpa pa fɛɩna kalampaanɩ tɔ pa nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ . Mpi tɔ , mpɛ pa tənna ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa .

text: Blessed are they that mourn : for they shall be comforted .
text2: Mpa pa wɛ laŋwakəllɛ taa tɔ pa nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ . Mpi tɔ , Ɩsɔ ká hɛɛsɩ pa laŋa .

text: Blessed are the meek : for they shall inherit the earth .
text2: Mpa pa wɛna yʋlʋtʋ tɔ pa nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ . Mpi tɔ , mpɛ paa tɔɣɔna tɛtʋ təna , ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ ka heeluɣu - wɛ tɔ .

text: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness : for they shall be filled .
text2: Mpa pa nyɩɩləɣɩ sɔsɔm sɩ pá tɔŋ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ caa tɔ pa nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ . Mpi tɔ , Ɩsɔ ká səna - wɛɣɛ teu na pá tɔ mpʋ .

text: Blessed are the merciful : for they shall obtain mercy .
text2: Mpa pa wɛna lɛlaa pətɔɔtəlɛ tɔ pa nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ . Mpi tɔ , Ɩsɔ ká nyənɩ mpɛ pa pətɔɔtəlɛ .

text: Blessed are the pure in heart : for they shall see God .
text2: Mpa pa lotu taa hʋwɛɛ tewa tɔ pa nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ . Mpi tɔ , paa na Ɩsɔ .

text: Blessed are the peacemakers : for they shall be called the children of God .
text2: Mpa pa tɔɣɔnəɣɩ yoou kɛ lɛlaa hɛkʋ tɔ pa nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ . Mpi tɔ , Ɩsɔ ká yaa - wɛɣɛ ɩ piya .

text: Blessed are they which are persecuted for righteousness ' sake : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Mpa pa lakɩ Ɩsɔ kʋcacaam na pá naasəɣɩ - wɛɣɛ pə tɔɔ tɔ pa nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ . Mpi tɔ , mpɛ pa tənna ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall revile you , and persecute you , and shall say all manner of evil against you falsely , for my sake .
text2: Paa yəlaa ka tʋʋkɩ - mɛ , yaa pa naasəɣɩ - mɛ , yaa paa looli ɩsaɣatʋ na pá suu - mɛ , sɩ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ ma ɩfalaa tɔ pə tɔɔ . Ɩ ́ nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ .

text: Rejoice , and be exceeding glad : for great is your reward in heaven : for so persecuted they the prophets which were before you .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnɩ mə laŋa ɩ ́ hɛɛ sɔsɔm , ɩ ́ nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mə kasəyaɣa ká tɔɔ sɔsɔm kɛ ɩsɔtaa kɛ ́ . Mpʋ ɩnɩ pə maɣamaɣa kɛ paa naasa Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa kʋpəma .

text: Ye are the salt of the earth : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be salted ? it is thenceforth good for nothing , but to be cast out , and to be trodden under foot of men .
text2: Mɛɣɛlɛ antulinya tɔm . Ama ye tɔm mpɩ pə lɔŋ kɔma na ɩ ́ sɩ ́ , pepeɣe paa la na pə ́ cɔ ́ pə tasa lɔŋ lapʋ ? Pə kaa waasɩ pʋlʋ tɔtɔ ye pə taɣa lɔʋ na yəlaa fɛlɩ nɔɔhɛɛ .

text: Ye are the light of the world . A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid .
text2: Mɛɣɛlɛ antulinya kɔkɔ . Ɩcatɛ nte pa ŋmawa pʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔ tə fɛɩ ŋmɛsʋɣʋ .

text: Neither do men light a candle , and put it under a bushel , but on a candlestick ; and it giveth light unto all that are in the house .
text2: Paa mʋsəɣɩ fətəla na pá pamɩ - ɩ tɔkʋ tɛɛ . Ama pa pusiɣi - ɩ timpi taa ɩ ́ wɛɛ pɩɩ naa yəlaa tənaɣa təyaɣa taa tɔɣɔ .

text: Let your light so shine before men , that they may see your good works , and glorify your Father which is in heaven .
text2: Mpʋ ɩnəɣɩ mə kɔkɔ ká naakɩ teu kɛ yəlaa na pə ́ cɔ ́ pá ná mə təma kʋpana , na pá sá mə Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ .

text: Think not that I am come to destroy the law , or the prophets : I am not come to destroy , but to fulfil .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa hʋʋ sɩ ma kɔma sɩ ma kʋɣɩ Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa takəlasɩ . Ma ta kɔɔ kʋɣʋ . Ama ma kɔma pə tampana hʋlʋɣʋ kɛ ́ .

text: For verily I say unto you , Till heaven and earth pass , one jot or one tittle shall in no wise pass from the law , till all be fulfilled .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , ye ɩsɔtaa na atɛ pə wɛɛ , kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa pəle kʋlʋmtəlɛ titiliya yaa tə suka wɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə kaa saalɩ . Haləna pə təna pə ́ kɔɔ na pə ́ yoosi na pə ́ cɔ ́ .

text: Whosoever therefore shall break one of these least commandments , and shall teach men so , he shall be called the least in the kingdom of heaven : but whosoever shall do and teach them , the same shall be called great in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ wei ɩ ́ ta tɔkɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa səkpetu na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsɩ lɛlaa sɩ pɛlɛ pá taa tɔkɩ - tɩ tɔ , paa yaa - ɩ ɩsɔtaa kawulaɣa taa səkpelu . Ama ye wei ɩ ́ tɔka tə təna na ɩ ́ heeliɣi lɛlaa sɩ pá la mpʋ , pʋntʋ ntɛ ́ sɔsɔ kɛ ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa taa .

text: For I say unto you , That except your righteousness shall exceed the righteousness of the scribes and Pharisees , ye shall in no case enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ye ɩ ta təŋ ɩsəna Ɩsɔ caa tɔ na pə ́ kəlɩ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na Falisanaa pa təŋʋɣʋ tɔ , ɩ ́ kaa sʋʋ ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa taa .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not kill ; and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment :
text2: Ɩ ́ nɩɩwa nti pa heela mə lɔŋtaa nyə ́ ma tɔ sɩ : N kaa kʋ yʋlʋ . Ye wei ɩ ́ kʋwa , paa pona - ɩ hʋʋlɛ .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever is angry with his brother without a cause shall be in danger of the judgment : and whosoever shall say to his brother , Raca , shall be in danger of the council : but whosoever shall say , Thou fool , shall be in danger of hell fire .
text2: Ama ma , ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ , wei ɩ ́ tɔka ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ na ɩ taa , paa pona - ɩ hʋʋlɛ . Na ye wei ɩ ́ tʋʋwa ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ sɩ : Kʋmɛlɛŋ , paa pona - ɩ Kotuɣu sɔsɔɔʋ taa . Na ye wei ɩ ́ tɔma ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ sɩ : Pə lakɩ - ŋ kɛ ́ . Ɩ nəɣəsəna kɔkɔ ŋka ka wɛ tənaasəlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa tɔ ka taa sʋʋʋ .

text: Therefore if thou bring thy gift to the altar , and there rememberest that thy brother hath ought against thee ;
text2: Ye n pona nyá kʋhaham kɛ kɔtaɣa təlatɛ , na ń tɔɔsɩ sɩ nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ wɛna - ŋ natəlɩ ,

text: Leave there thy gift before the altar , and go thy way ; first be reconciled to thy brother , and then come and offer thy gift .
text2: sɩɩ nyá kʋhaham kɛ təkɔtəlɛ tənɛ , na ń polo na nyá na nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ ɩ ́ taɣanɩ - tɩ . Ɩlɛna ń məlɩ na ń ha nyá kʋhaham mpɩ .

text: Agree with thine adversary quickly , whiles thou art in the way with him ; lest at any time the adversary deliver thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and thou be cast into prison .
text2: Ye n wakəla nɔɣɔlʋ na ɩ ́ yaa - ŋ nɔnɔɣɔ , la kookalɩ na nyá na - ɩ ɩ ́ taɣanɩ mə tɔm kɛ mpaaʋ taa na ɩ ́ ta tata hʋʋlʋ kiŋ . Pə ́ taa kɔɔ na hʋʋlʋ náá tʋ - ŋ toŋtʋnaa niŋ taa na pɛlɛ pá təkɩ - ŋ .

text: Verily I say unto thee , Thou shalt by no means come out thence , till thou hast paid the uttermost farthing .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , n ka tɛm pə təna mpi pa pɛla - ŋ tɔɣɔ fɛlʋɣʋ paasi n ka lɩɩʋ təna .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not commit adultery :
text2: Ɩ ́ nɩɩwa ɩsəna pa yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : N kaa la wasaŋkalətʋ tɔ .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever looketh on a woman to lust after her hath committed adultery with her already in his heart .
text2: Ama má heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ tampana sɩ , ye wei ɩ ́ nyəna lɛlʋ alʋ na ɩ ́ nyɩɩlɩ - ɩ , ɩ tɛma wasaŋkalətʋ lapʋ kɛ ɩ nyamlɛ taa kɛ ́ .

text: And if thy right eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: Ye nyá ntɔɣɔŋ ɩsəlɛ ká hu - ŋ , ləsɩ - tɛ na ń lɔ - tɛɣɛ pooluŋ . Sana ń laŋ nyá tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pʋlʋ kʋlʋməm na mpi paa pɛtɩ nyá tɔnʋɣʋ tənaɣa tənaasəlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa tɔ .

text: And if thy right hand offend thee , cut if off , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: Ye nyá niŋ ntɔɣɔŋ ká hu - ŋ , sɛtɩ - ɩ na ń lɔ pooluŋ . Sana ń laŋ nyá tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pʋlʋ kʋlʋməm na mpi paa pɛtɩ nyá tɔnʋɣʋ tənaɣa tənaasəlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa tɔ .

text: It hath been said , Whosoever shall put away his wife , let him give her a writing of divorcement :
text2: Pa tɩɩ yɔɣɔta mpʋ tɔtɔ sɩ : Ye yʋlʋ tɔɣɔnəɣɩ ɩ alʋ , ɩ ́ ŋmaa - ɩ kisuɣu takəlaɣa .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever shall put away his wife , saving for the cause of fornication , causeth her to commit adultery : and whosoever shall marry her that is divorced committeth adultery .
text2: Ama má kpaaləɣɩ - mɛ sɩ , ye yʋlʋ tɔɣɔna ɩ alʋ na pə ta kɛ ́ wasaŋkalətʋ tɔɔ , ɩ pona alʋ ɩnəɣɩ wasaŋkalətʋ taa kɛ ́ . Ye ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ tasa saaʋ . Na ye pa kisa alʋ na nɔɣɔlʋ náá təŋ na ɩ ́ kpaɣa - ɩ , pʋntʋ lapa wasaŋkalətʋ kɛ ́ .

text: Again , ye have heard that it hath been said by them of old time , Thou shalt not forswear thyself , but shalt perform unto the Lord thine oaths :
text2: Ɩ ́ nɩɩ ɩsəna pa yɔɣɔta ta caanaa caanaa tɔ sɩ : Ń tuuwa sɩ n ká la mpi , n kaa yele - wɩ . Ama n ka la pə təna mpi n yɔɣɔtəna tuunaʋ kɛ Tacaa ɩsɛntaa tɔɣɔ .

text: But I say unto you , Swear not at all ; neither by heaven ; for it is God ' s throne :
text2: Ama má heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ , ɩ ́ taa tɩɩ tuuna pʋlʋɣʋ paa pəcɔ . Paa ɩsɔtaa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ kumte ntɛ ́ .

text: Nor by the earth ; for it is his footstool : neither by Jerusalem ; for it is the city of the great King .
text2: Paa atɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ təsɩɩlɛ ntɛ ́ . Paa Yosalɛm , pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Wulaʋ sɔsɔ ɩcatɛ kɛ ́ .

text: Neither shalt thou swear by thy head , because thou canst not make one hair white or black .
text2: Taa tɩɩ tuuna nyá nyʋɣʋ tɔtɔ . Mpi tɔ , n kaa pəsɩ na ń la na nyá nyʋɣʋ taa nyɔɔlaɣa kʋlʋmaɣa hʋlʋmɩ yaa ká pili .

text: But let your communication be , Yea , yea ; Nay , nay : for whatsoever is more than these cometh of evil .
text2: Ye n ká tisi sɩ nn , n tisi sɩ nn . Ye aaɩ kɛ ́ , n tisi sɩ aaɩ . Nti yʋlʋ sɔɔsəɣɩ tə tɔɔ tɔ tə lɩɩkəna Ɩlɔɣɔʋ kiŋ kɛ ́ .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , An eye for an eye , and a tooth for a tooth :
text2: Ɩ ́ nɩɩwa ɩsəna paa yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Ye wei ɩ ́ yɔka lɛlʋ ɩsəlɛ , paa yɔkɩ ɩ nyəntɛ , na wei ɩ ́ hola lɛlʋ kete , paa holi ɩ nyəntɛ tɔ .

text: But I say unto you , That ye resist not evil : but whosoever shall smite thee on thy right cheek , turn to him the other also .
text2: Ama ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ , ɩ ́ taa fɛlɩ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ ɩsaɣatʋ . Ye nɔɣɔlʋ mapa nyá ntɔɣɔŋ ləkpaɣasaɣa , kɛɛsɩ - ɩ lɛŋka .

text: And if any man will sue thee at the law , and take away thy coat , let him have thy cloke also .
text2: Ye nɔɣɔlʋ pona - ŋ tɔm hʋʋʋ sɩ ɩ lɛɛkəɣɩ nyá capa , tɛɛsɩ - ɩ nyá kpaɩ kɛ cɛlʋɣʋ .

text: And whosoever shall compel thee to go a mile , go with him twain .
text2: Ye toŋ tʋ sʋka - ŋ səɣəla na təlasɩ sɩ ń tɔ ɩsɩɩ kilomɛɛtəlɩ kʋlʋm , ɩlɛ n tɔ kilomɛɛtələnaa naalɛ .

text: Give to him that asketh thee , and from him that would borrow of thee turn not thou away .
text2: Ha wei ɩ sələməɣɩ - ŋ tɔ . Taa pɛ wei ɩ caa ń kəntɩ - ɩ tɔ .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , Thou shalt love thy neighbour , and hate thine enemy .
text2: Ɩ ́ nɩɩwa ɩsəna paa yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : N ká sɔɔlɩ nyá taapalʋ na nyá taa kpana nyá kolontu tɔ .

text: But I say unto you , Love your enemies , bless them that curse you , do good to them that hate you , and pray for them which despitefully use you , and persecute you ;
text2: Ama ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔɔlɩ mə kolontunaa na ɩ ́ sələmɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ mpa pa tʋɣɩ - mɛɣɛ kʋnyɔŋ tɔ pa tɔɔ .

text: That ye may be the children of your Father which is in heaven : for he maketh his sun to rise on the evil and on the good , and sendeth rain on the just and on the unjust .
text2: Ɩlɛ ɩ ́ kpaɣa mə Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩ wɛɛtʋ ntɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ lakəna na ilim lɩɩkɩ asaɣaa na kʋpama pa təna pa tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ kpɛntəɣɩ mpa pa kɛɛsaa na mpa pa ta kɛɛsɩ tɔ na ɩ ́ haakɩ tɛʋ .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what reward have ye ? do not even the publicans the same ?
text2: Ye ɩ ́ sɔɔla mpa pa sɔɔla - mɛ tɔ pa tike , pepeɣelɛ mə tɛɛwa ɩlɛ ? Lampuu mʋlaa maɣamaɣa ɩɩ lakɩ mpʋ ?

text: And if ye salute your brethren only , what do ye more than others ? do not even the publicans so ?
text2: Ye ɩ ́ sɛɛkɩ mə taapalaa tike , ɩlɛ ɩ ́ tɛɛ lɛlaa kɛ we ? Ma ta nyɩ ɩsɔnaa maɣamaɣa ɩɩ lakɩ mpʋ ?

text: Be ye therefore perfect , even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect .
text2: Ɩ ́ té təkpataa ɩlɛ , ɩsɩɩ mə ɩsɔtaa Caa teu təkpataa tɔ .

text: Take heed that ye do not your alms before men , to be seen of them : otherwise ye have no reward of your Father which is in heaven .
text2: Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ , ɩ ́ taa lakɩ yəlaa ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ mə Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ kʋlapʋtʋ sɩ pá na na pá sa - mɛ . Ye ɩ ́ lakɩ mpʋ sɩ yəlaa ɩ ́ na , mə Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩ kaa tasa - mɛɣɛ haʋ .

text: Therefore when thou doest thine alms , do not sound a trumpet before thee , as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets , that they may have glory of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ waatʋ wei n haakɩ liɣitee kɛ kʋnyɔntʋnaa tɔ n kaa kpaalɩ sɩ yəlaa ɩ ́ kena - ŋ . Pə maɣamaɣa kɛ cɛsəlaa lakɩ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa taa na hapɛɛ tɔɔ sɩ pá sa - wɛ . Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ . Pa kasəyaɣa kɛ pa hikiɣi ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kpakpaa .

text: But when thou doest alms , let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth :
text2: Ama nyá , ye n haakɩ kʋnyɔntʋnaa kɛ liɣitee , taa yele na nyá taapalʋ wei ɩ wɛ nyá kɔŋkɔŋ taa maɣamaɣa tɔ ɩ ́ ná .

text: That thine alms may be in secret : and thy Father which seeth in secret himself shall reward thee openly .
text2: Saa ɩnɩ nyá kʋcɔɔʋ kaa wɛɛ mpi yəlaa təna nawa tɔ , na nyá Caa wei ɩ naakɩ mukaɣa tɛɛ tɔ ɩ ká fɛlɩ - ŋ .

text: And when thou prayest , thou shalt not be as the hypocrites are : for they love to pray standing in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets , that they may be seen of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: Waatʋ wei ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ tɔ , ɩ ́ taa la ɩsɩɩ cɛsəlaa mpa pa sɔɔla ɩsɔ səŋʋɣʋ kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa taa na hapɛɛ nɔɔsɩ na pá sələməɣɩ sɩ yəlaa təna ɩ ́ na - wɛ tɔ . Ma heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ tampana sɩ pa kasəyaɣa kɛ pa hikiɣi ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kpakpaa .

text: But thou , when thou prayest , enter into thy closet , and when thou hast shut thy door , pray to thy Father which is in secret ; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly .
text2: Ama nyá , ye n caa Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ , sʋʋ nyá naŋ taa na ń təkɩ nyá tɔɔ , na ń sələmɩ nyá Caa wei ɩ wɛ tənaɣa ɩŋmɛlaʋ tɔ . Na nyá Caa wei ɩnɩ ɩ naakɩ mpi n lakɩ ɩŋmɛlaʋ tɔ ɩ ká ha - ŋ nyá kasəyaɣa .

text: But when ye pray , use not vain repetitions , as the heathen do : for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking .
text2: Ye ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ , ɩ ́ taa lʋləsəɣɩ tɔm paɣalɛ kɛ yem ɩsɩɩ ma ta nyɩ ɩsɔnaa lakʋɣʋ tɔ . Pa hʋʋ sɩ pa tɔm taɣaləŋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ paa hiki .

text: Be not ye therefore like unto them : for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of , before ye ask him .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa kɛɛna - wɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mə Caa tɛma nyəm kɛ mpi pə tɔm caala - mɛ tɔ na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ .

text: After this manner therefore pray ye : Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name .
text2: Ɩsəna ɩ ́ ká sələmɩ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Ta Caa wei nyá n wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ , nyá hətɛ ɩ ́ wɛɛ katɛ .

text: Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done in earth , as it is in heaven .
text2: Tɔɣɔ nyá Kawulaɣa . Yele na nyá luɣu nyəntʋ la atɛ cənɛ ɩsɩɩ tə lapʋ ɩsɔtaa tɔ .

text: Give us this day our daily bread .
text2: Haa - tʋɣʋ saŋa tɔɣɔnaɣa .

text: And forgive us our debts , as we forgive our debtors .
text2: Hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - tʋɣʋ suulu kɛ timpi tə pəntəna - ŋ tɔ . Ɩsɩɩ ta hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ mpa pa pəntəɣəna - tʋ tɔɣɔ suulu tɔ .

text: And lead us not into temptation , but deliver us from evil : For thine is the kingdom , and the power , and the glory , for ever . Amen .
text2: Taa yele na tə ́ sʋʋ maɣasʋɣʋ ɩsaɣaʋ taa . Ama ləsɩ - tʋɣʋ Ɩsaɣaʋ niŋ taa . Mpi tɔ , nyaɣalɛ kawulaɣa tɔɣɔlʋ , na pəsʋlʋ na teeli tʋ kɛ tam tɔɔ . Ami .

text: For if ye forgive men their trespasses , your heavenly Father will also forgive you :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ , ye mə tɔɣɔntəlɛnaa wakələna - mɛ na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - wɛɣɛ suulu , mə Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩ ká hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ suulu tɔtɔ .

text: But if ye forgive not men their trespasses , neither will your Father forgive your trespasses .
text2: Ama ye ɩɩ hʋləɣɩ mə tɔɣɔntəlɛnaa kɛ suulu kɛ timpi timpi pa wakələɣəna - mɛ tɔ , mə Caa kaa hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ suulu tɔtɔ .

text: Moreover when ye fast , be not , as the hypocrites , of a sad countenance : for they disfigure their faces , that they may appear unto men to fast . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: Ye ɩ ́ hɔka nɔɔsɩ , ɩ ́ taa wakəlɩ mə ɩsɛntaa ɩsɩɩ cɛsəlaa lakʋɣʋ tɔ . Pa sɔŋəɣɩ pa ɩsɛntaa sɩ yəlaa təna ɩ ́ ná sɩ pa hɔka nɔɔsɩ . Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ maa cɛsəɣɩ . Pa kasəyaɣa kɛ pa hikiɣi ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kpakpaa .

text: But thou , when thou fastest , anoint thine head , and wash thy face ;
text2: Ama nyá , ye n hɔka nɔɣɔ , saŋ nyá ɩsɛ təcɛɩcɛɩ , na ń sɛɣɛlɩ nyá nyɔɔsɩ .

text: That thou appear not unto men to fast , but unto thy Father which is in secret : and thy Father , which seeth in secret , shall reward thee openly .
text2: Yəlaa ɩ ́ taa nyɩ sɩ n hɔka nɔɣɔ . Ama nyá Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩŋmɛlaʋ tɔ ɩ tike ɩ ka nyəna . Nyá Caa wei ɩ naa mpi n lakɩ ɩŋmɛlaʋ tɔ ɩ ká ha - ŋ nyá kasəyaɣa .

text: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth , where moth and rust doth corrupt , and where thieves break through and steal :
text2: Ɩ ́ taa kaakɩ mə wɛnaʋ kɛ atɛ cənɛ timpi pukasɩ na kɔkɔtaɣa wakələɣɩ na ŋmɩɩlaa ká wakəlɩ nɔnɔɔsɩ na pá ŋmɩɩlɩ tɔ .

text: But lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven , where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt , and where thieves do not break through nor steal :
text2: Ama ɩ ́ kaakɩ mə wɛnaʋ kɛ ɩsɔtaa timpi pukasɩ na kɔkɔtaɣa fɛɩ sɩ pə ́ wakəlɩ pʋlʋ , na ŋmɩɩlaa kaa tʋlɩ na pá ŋmɩɩlɩ tɔ .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , kpaŋtʋ ləmaɣasɛɛ ɩ ́ wɛ timpi , tənaɣa ɩ akalʋɣʋ wɛɛ .

text: The light of the body is the eye : if therefore thine eye be single , thy whole body shall be full of light .
text2: Yʋlʋ tɔnʋɣʋ pilimile fətəla kɛlɛ ɩsɛ . Ye nyá ɩsɛ ɩ ́ naakɩ teu , pə waasəɣɩ nyá tɔnʋɣʋ tənaɣa .

text: But if thine eye be evil , thy whole body shall be full of darkness . If therefore the light that is in thee be darkness , how great is that darkness !
text2: Ama ye nyá ɩsɛ ɩ ́ yʋlʋmaa , nyá tɔnʋɣʋ pilimile təna wɛ səkpɛtʋɣʋ tɛɛ kɛ ́ . Ye ɩsəna n naakɩ mpʋ tɔ pə pəsa səkpɛtʋɣʋ ɩlɛ , pʋwɛ , nyá səkpɛtʋɣʋ tɔm fɛɩ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ tɔtɔɣɔlɛ .

text: No man can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: Yʋlʋ kʋlʋm kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ kpɩ yəlaa naalɛ na ɩ ́ lakɩ pa təma . Ye ɩ kpəpa mpʋ , ɩ ləmaɣasɛɛ kɔŋ a wɛɛ lɛlʋ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ yele lɛlʋ . Yaa ntanyɩ , ɩ paasəna lɛlʋ na ɩ ́ kisi lɛlʋ . Mɛ ɩ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ kpɩ Ɩsɔ na liɣitee na ɩ ́ təŋ mpʋ .

text: Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink ; nor yet for your body , what ye shall put on . Is not the life more than meat , and the body than raiment ?
text2: Ɩ ́ tá ná mpi pə tɔɔ ma heela - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ taa nəɣəsəɣɩ mə tɔɣɔnaɣa na mə kʋnyɔnyɔɔm mpi pə wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ́ ká tɔkɩ na ɩ ́ nyɔɔkɩ na ɩ ́ hiki weesiŋ na mə tɔnəŋ tɔɔ kʋtakəm tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ ́ ta na taa sɩ weesuɣu kəla tɔɣɔnaɣa na yʋlʋ tɔnʋɣʋ kəla wontu kʋsusuutu .

text: Behold the fowls of the air : for they sow not , neither do they reap , nor gather into barns ; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them . Are ye not much better than they ?
text2: Ɩ ́ nyənna sumasɩ na ɩ ́ na . Sɩɩ haləɣɩ , pəyele sɩɩ kʋŋ . Sɩɩ nyəkəɣɩ tɔɣɔnaɣa kɛ kpeeŋ taa . Paa na mpʋ mə Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ caləɣəna - sɩ . Na mə tá kəlɩ sumasɩ kɛ tɔm napəlɛ ?

text: Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature ?
text2: Paa mə taa yʋlʋ ká kʋ ɩ təɣɩ ɩsəna pʋntʋ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ tuusi ɩ təɣɩ wʋlɛ kʋlʋmtəlɛ maɣamaɣa ?

text: And why take ye thought for raiment ? Consider the lilies of the field , how they grow ; they toil not , neither do they spin :
text2: Na pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ nəɣəsəɣɩ mə tɔɔ kʋtakəm ? Ɩ ́ nyənna tawa nyɩɩtʋ tʋkʋɣʋ hɛtʋ nti tɔ na ɩ ́ ná . Nyɩɩtʋ ntɩ tɩɩ lakɩ təmlɛ təlɩ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ tɩɩ lʋʋkɩ pɔɔŋ .

text: And yet I say unto you , That even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: Paa na mpʋ ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ wulaʋ Salʋmɔŋ na ɩ toŋ təna ɩ ta suu wontu na ɩ ́ tala paa tə taa kʋlʋmʋɣʋ kɛ kacɔka .

text: Wherefore , if God so clothe the grass of the field , which to day is , and to morrow is cast into the oven , shall he not much more clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Ye Ɩsɔ lakɩ kacɔka kɛ tawa taa nyɩɩtʋ nti tə wɛ saŋa na cele ɩsəntɔ pa tika - tɩ tɔ , ɩ kaa la - mɛɣɛ kacɔka na pə ́ kəlɩ mpʋ ? Ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ tɛɛ , ɩɩ tɛŋ Ɩsɔ na mə taa təcaɣacaɣa tɔ se .

text: Therefore take no thought , saying , What shall we eat ? or , What shall we drink ? or , Wherewithal shall we be clothed ?
text2: Ɩlɛ ɩ ́ taa pɛkəlɩ mə tɩ sɩ : Tɩɩ tɔɣɔ - we ? Yaa , tɩɩ nyɔɔ - we ? Yaa , tɩɩ takɩ - we ?

text: ( For after all these things do the Gentiles seek : ) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things .
text2: Ma ta nyɩ ɩsɔnaa pɛɛkəɣəna təlɛɣɛ tam . Mə Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩ nyəmá mpi ɩ ́ nyɩɩləɣɩ tɔ .

text: But seek ye first the kingdom of God , and his righteousness ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɔ nyʋɣʋ na Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa na tɔntɛ nte Ɩsɔ caa tɔ tə pɛɛkʋɣʋ , na Ɩsɔ ká ha - mɛ tɔtɔɣɔ pə təna mpi pə kaasaa tɔ .

text: Take therefore no thought for the morrow : for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself . Sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof .
text2: Ɩlɛ ɩ ́ taa nəɣəsəɣɩ cele nyəntʋ . Cele nyəntʋ təlɛɣɛ cele kɛ ́ . Nti tə maɣana - ŋ saŋa tɔ , paasəna təlɛ tə tike .

text: Judge not , that ye be not judged .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa footi lɛlaa , pə ́ taa kɔɔ na Ɩsɔ hʋʋna - mɛ .

text: For with what judgment ye judge , ye shall be judged : and with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩsəna ɩ ́ footiɣi mə tɔɣɔntəlɛnaa tɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ ká hʋʋna - mɛ . Na ɩsəna ɩ ́ maɣasəɣɩ mə tɔɣɔntəlɛnaa tɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ ká maɣasɩ - mɛ .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: Ɩsənaɣa pə lapa na ń naakɩ nyɩɩliim wei ɩ wɛ nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ ɩsəpəle taa tɔ , na ń kaa na kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ŋku kʋ wɛ nyá nyəntɛ taa tɔ ?

text: Or how wilt thou say to thy brother , Let me pull out the mote out of thine eye ; and , behold , a beam is in thine own eye ?
text2: Na ɩsənaɣa nyá pəsəɣɩ na ń tɔ nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ sɩ : Səŋ təkpi na má ləsɩ nyá ɩsəlɛ taa nyɩɩliim , na pəyele kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kaɣa nyá nyəntɛ taa ?

text: Thou hypocrite , first cast out the beam out of thine own eye ; and then shalt thou see clearly to cast out the mote out of thy brother ' s eye .
text2: Cɛsʋlʋ nyá , ləsɩ kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ŋku kʋ wɛ nyá maɣamaɣa nyá ɩsəpəle taa tɔ , ɩlɛna pə ́ cɔ ́ ń ná teu təcɛɩcɛɩ na ń ləsɩ nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ ɩsəlɛ taa nyɩɩliim ɩnɩ .

text: Give not that which is holy unto the dogs , neither cast ye your pearls before swine , lest they trample them under their feet , and turn again and rend you .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa kpaɣa mpi pə kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ nyəm tɔ na ɩ ́ pɛtɩ hasɩ , sɩ ́ taa kɔɔ na sɩ ́ kʋlɩ mə tɔɔ na sɩ ́ cəlɩ - mɛ . Ɩ ́ taa pɛtɩ mpi pə tewa tɔɣɔ afanaa kiŋ , paa fɛlɩ .

text: Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you :
text2: Ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ , paa ha - mɛɣɛ . Ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ , ɩ ́ hikiɣi kɛ ́ . Ɩ ́ makɩ , pa tʋləɣɩ - mɛɣɛ .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Sələmʋlʋ kɛ pa haakɩ . Pɛɛkəlʋ hikiɣina . Matʋ kɛ pa tʋləɣɩ .

text: Or what man is there of you , whom if his son ask bread , will he give him a stone ?
text2: Wulee mə taa awe pəyaɣa sələma - ɩ kakalaɣa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa pəlɛ na ɩ ́ cɛlɛ - kɛ ?

text: Or if he ask a fish , will he give him a serpent ?
text2: Yaa wulee mə taa awe pəyaɣa sələma - ɩ tinte na pʋntʋ cɛlɛ - kɛɣɛ cimte ye ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children , how much more shall your Father which is in heaven give good things to them that ask him ?
text2: Ye asaɣaa mɛ mɩɩ pəsa mə piya kɛ kʋpantʋ lapʋ , mə Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩ kaa la kʋpantʋ kɛ mpa pa sələməɣɩ - ɩ tɔ ?

text: Therefore all things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you , do ye even so to them : for this is the law and the prophets .
text2: Ɩsəna mə caakɩ sɩ lɛlaa ɩ ́ la - mɛ tɔ , mɩɩ la - wɛɣɛ mpʋ tɔtɔ . Ye ɩ ́ lapa mpʋ , ɩ ́ təŋa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təna na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa tɔm təna ntɛ ́ .

text: Enter ye in at the strait gate : for wide is the gate , and broad is the way , that leadeth to destruction , and many there be which go in thereat :
text2: Ɩ ́ sʋʋna nɔnɔɣɔ ŋka ka wɛ təfəkɩɩ tɔ . Asaala tete nɔnɔɣɔ walaa kɛ ́ , na pə mpaaʋ kɛ paɣalɛ təŋəɣɩ .

text: Because strait is the gate , and narrow is the way , which leadeth unto life , and few there be that find it .
text2: Ama nɔnɔɣɔ ŋka ka wɛ təfəkɩɩ tɔ ka wɛ wahala kɛ ́ , pə ́ cɔ ́ weesuɣu nyəŋka ntɛ ́ . Yəlaa pəcɔ tike təŋəɣəna pə mpaaʋ .

text: Beware of false prophets , which come to you in sheep ' s clothing , but inwardly they are ravening wolves .
text2: Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa pɔpɔtʋnaa . Pa kɔŋ mə kiŋ na pá cɛsəɣɩ ɩsɩɩ pa kɛ ́ heeŋ , sɛsɛ ɩlɛ sʋnsʋməŋ kpitikpitinaa ntɛ ́ .

text: Ye shall know them by their fruits . Do men gather grapes of thorns , or figs of thistles ?
text2: Pa kʋlapʋtʋnaa kiŋ kɛ ɩ ́ ká nyəna - wɛ . Yʋlʋ kaa kooli tʋɣʋ ŋku pa yaa sɩ lɛsɛŋ tɔ kʋ pee kɛ sɔsɔʋ tɔɔ se . Pə ́ cɔ ́ paa kooliɣi tʋɣʋ ŋku pa yaa sɩ fiki tɔ kʋ pee kɛ kɔlɔŋ tɔɔ .

text: Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit ; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit .
text2: Tʋɣʋ kʋpaŋkʋ lʋləɣɩ pee kʋpana kɛ ́ , na tʋɣʋ ɩsaɣaʋ náá lʋlɩ pee asaɣɛɛ .

text: A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit , neither can a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: Tʋɣʋ kʋpaŋkʋ ɩɩ lʋləɣɩ kpaɩ pəle se . Pə ́ cɔ ́ kpaɩ tʋɣʋ naa lʋləɣɩ pəle kʋpantɛ tɔtɔ .

text: Every tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Tʋɣʋ ŋku kɩɩ lʋləɣɩ pee kʋpana tɔ , pa sɛtəɣɩ - kʋɣʋ na pá tʋ kɔkɔ .

text: Wherefore by their fruits ye shall know them .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ ká nyɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa kʋcɛsaa mpɛ na pa kʋlapʋtʋnaa kiŋ .

text: Not every one that saith unto me , Lord , Lord , shall enter into the kingdom of heaven ; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Pə taɣa pa təna mpa pa yaa - m Tacaa Tacaa tɔ pa təna paa sʋʋna ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa taa . Ama mpa pa lakɩ ma Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩ luɣu nyəntʋ tɔ pa tike paa sʋʋna .

text: Many will say to me in that day , Lord , Lord , have we not prophesied in thy name ? and in thy name have cast out devils ? and in thy name done many wonderful works ?
text2: Kʋyakʋ ŋkʋ kʋ wule paɣalɛ ká tɔ - m sɩ : Tacaa Tacaa , nyá toŋ taa kɛ ́ tə kpaaləna Ɩsɔ kʋheelitu . Nyá toŋ taa kɛ ́ tə tɔɣɔnna alɔɣaa . Na nyá toŋ kɛ tə lapəna piti təma paɣalɛ .

text: And then will I profess unto them , I never knew you : depart from me , ye that work iniquity .
text2: Tənaɣa maa cɔ - wɛ təfoo sɩ : Ma ta nyɩ - mɛɣɛ paa pəcɔ . Ɩ ́ tɛɛ ɩ ́ fɛɛ - m , ɩsaɣalataa mɛ .

text: Therefore whosoever heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them , I will liken him unto a wise man , which built his house upon a rock :
text2: Wei ɩ nɩɩkɩ tɔm nti ma yɔɣɔta ɩsəntɔ na ɩ ́ tɔkəɣɩ - tɩ tɔ , pʋntʋ nəɣəsəna laɣatʋ wei ɩ ŋma ɩ kutuluɣu kɛ pətolaɣa taa tɔ .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell not : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɛʋ nɩɩna heelim sɔsɔɔm na pə ́ casəɣɩ kutuluɣu ŋkʋ , na pusi su na sɩ lɩɩ . Kutuluɣu ta hoti . Mpi tɔ , pa sɩɩ kʋ kite kɛ pətolaɣa taa kɛ ́ .

text: And every one that heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them not , shall be likened unto a foolish man , which built his house upon the sand :
text2: Ama wei ɩ nɩɩkɩ tɔm nti ma yɔɣɔta ɩsəntɔ na ɩɩ tɔkəɣɩ - tɩ tɔ , pʋntʋ nəɣəsəna ɩsɩɩ kʋmɛlɛŋ ŋku kʋ ŋma kutuluɣu kɛ kanyəŋa taa tɔɣɔ .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell : and great was the fall of it .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɛʋ nɩɩna heelim sɔsɔɔm na pə casəɣɩ kutuluɣu , na pusi su na sɩ lɩɩ . Tənaɣa kutuluɣu hotaa na pə təna pə pəsɩ ncaalɛ təkpataa .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had ended these sayings , the people were astonished at his doctrine :
text2: Yesu tɛma sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna pə ́ cɛ samaa laŋa kɛ teu .

text: For he taught them as one having authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Mpi tɔ , ɩ sɛɣɛsaɣa - wɛɣɛ na toŋ ɩ ta nyá . Ɩ fɛɩ ɩsɩɩ pa Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa lɛlaa .

text: When he was come down from the mountain , great multitudes followed him .
text2: Yesu lɩɩna pʋɣʋ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ tii , ɩlɛna samaa sɔsɔ tʋ ɩ waalɩ .

text: And , behold , there came a leper and worshipped him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Tənaɣa tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ asilima kʋtɔŋ tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kpətəna - ɩ na ɩ ́ sopi ɩ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , ye n ka tisaɣa n taa waasɩ - m ?

text: And Jesus put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will ; be thou clean . And immediately his leprosy was cleansed .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu kʋsa niŋ na ɩ ́ tokina asilima kʋtɔŋ tʋ ɩnɩ na ɩ ́ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Teu ma tisaa , alaafəya ɩ ́ la . Tənɛ ɩnəɣɩ pə waa apalʋ ɩnəɣɩ kpakpaa .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , See thou tell no man ; but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer the gift that Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu kpaalɩ - ɩ teu sɩ : Taa heeli nɔɣɔlʋ . Ama tɛɛ kpakpaa na kɔtʋlʋ na - ŋ . Ɩlɛna ń yiɣisi ɩsɩɩ Moisi ka kɛɛsʋɣʋ tɔ na pá ná sɩ pə waa - ŋ .

text: And when Jesus was entered into Capernaum , there came unto him a centurion , beseeching him ,
text2: Yesu sʋʋkaɣa Kapənahum , ɩlɛna Lom yoolaa nyʋɣʋ tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ kpətəna - ɩ na ɩ ́ wiina - ɩ

text: And saying , Lord , my servant lieth at home sick of the palsy , grievously tormented .
text2: sɩ : Tacaa , ma yom nɔɣɔlʋ hənta təyaɣa . Kʋtɔŋ kʋtʋʋlʋɣʋ tɔkəna - ɩ na ɩ ́ saləməɣɩ teu .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , I will come and heal him .
text2: Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Maa polo na má waasɩ - ɩ .

text: The centurion answered and said , Lord , I am not worthy that thou shouldest come under my roof : but speak the word only , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Tənaɣa yoolaa nyʋɣʋ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ pəsənaa sɩ : Tacaa , ma ta tala sɩ ń sʋʋ ma təyaɣa . Ama yɔɣɔtɩ kʋyɔɣɔtʋ kɛ tɔm kʋlʋm na ma yom hiki alaafəya .

text: For I am a man under authority , having soldiers under me : and I say to this man , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Má ɩsəntɔ ma see ma sɔsaa kɛ ́ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ ma wɛna ma səkpema na pɛlɛ pá lakɩ ma luɣu nyəntʋ . Má heela pa taa wei sɩ ɩ ́ polo cənɛ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ puki kɛ ́ . Má heela wei sɩ ɩ ́ kɔɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kɔɔ tɔtɔ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ ye ma heela ma yom sɩ ɩ ́ la pənɛ , ɩ lakɩ kɛ ́ .

text: When Jesus heard it , he marvelled , and said to them that followed , Verily I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Yesu nɩɩ tɔm tənɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pəsəna mpa pa təŋaɣa - ɩ tɔ pa tɔɔ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ . Ma ta nata yʋlʋ kɛ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma taa na ɩ ́ tɛma ɩ taa na Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩsəntɔ .

text: And I say unto you , That many shall come from the east and west , and shall sit down with Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛ tɔtɔ sɩ , paɣalɛ ká lɩɩna ilim təlɩɩlɛ na ilim tətʋlɛ , na pá na Apəlaham na Ɩsaaka na Yakɔpʋ paa caɣa tɔɣɔʋ kɛ ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa taa .

text: But the children of the kingdom shall be cast out into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Ama mpa paa kɛ ́ Kawulaɣa nyə ́ ma tɔ paa lɔ - wɛɣɛ awalɩ kɛ ́ səkpɛtʋɣʋ taa , timpi paa casəɣɩ kapusi na pá nyasəɣɩ pa təɣɩ kela tɔ .

text: And Jesus said unto the centurion , Go thy way ; and as thou hast believed , so be it done unto thee . And his servant was healed in the selfsame hour .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu heela yoolaa nyʋɣʋ tʋ sɩ : Kpe , ɩsəna mpi n tɛma nyá taa na Ɩsɔ tɔ pɩɩ la ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ teitei . Waatʋ ɩnɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa kɛ pə waa yoolaa nyʋɣʋ tʋ yom .

text: And when Jesus was come into Peter ' s house , he saw his wife ' s mother laid , and sick of a fever .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pola Piyɛɛ təyaɣa , na ɩ ́ maɣana watʋ wɛna Piyɛɛ yɔsɔ na ɩ ́ həntaa .

text: And he touched her hand , and the fever left her : and she arose , and ministered unto them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tokina kʋtɔntʋ niŋ na ɩ watʋ ya kpakpaa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ caləsɩ - wɛ .

text: When the even was come , they brought unto him many that were possessed with devils : and he cast out the spirits with his word , and healed all that were sick :
text2: Taanaɣa taanaa ɩlɛna pá kɔna Yesu kɛ alɔɣɔhilaa paɣalɛ . Na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ kʋyɔɣɔtʋ na alɔɣaa se , na ɩ ́ waa kʋtɔntʋnaa təna tɔtɔ .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying , Himself took our infirmities , and bare our sicknesses .
text2: Ɩ lapa mpʋ sɩ pə ́ la nti Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Ɩsayii ka yɔɣɔtaa tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ləsa tá ɩcantʋ na ɩ ́ lɔ , na ɩ ́ mʋ ta kʋtɔməŋ .

text: Now when Jesus saw great multitudes about him , he gave commandment to depart unto the other side .
text2: Yesu ná samaa kotina - ɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ pá tɛsɩ teŋku na waalɩ .

text: And a certain scribe came , and said unto him , Master , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kpətəna Yesu na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tacaa , maa təŋəɣɩ - ŋ nyá təpote təna taa .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , The foxes have holes , and the birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Yesu cɔ Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlʋ ɩnɩ sɩ : Sɔɔŋ wɛna ɩ lona na sumasɩ wɛna sɩ tana . Ama Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má , ma fɛɩna nyʋɣʋ tətʋlɛ maɣamaɣa .

text: And another of his disciples said unto him , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu ɩfalaa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ná tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa yele na má polo na má pi ma caa na pə ́ cɔ ́ .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Follow me ; and let the dead bury their dead .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Təŋɩ - m na ń yele na sətaa pi pa sətaa .

text: And when he was entered into a ship , his disciples followed him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa sʋʋ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa .

text: And , behold , there arose a great tempest in the sea , insomuch that the ship was covered with the waves : but he was asleep .
text2: Tənaɣa heelim sɔsɔɔm kʋla teŋku tɔɔ na lʋm hola waasəɣɩ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ . Ama pə pamna Yesu tooki .

text: And his disciples came to him , and awoke him , saying , Lord , save us : we perish .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ɩfalaa polaa na pá feesi - ɩ na pá tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , ya - tʋ , tə lepaɣa .

text: And he saith unto them , Why are ye fearful , O ye of little faith ? Then he arose , and rebuked the winds and the sea ; and there was a great calm .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ sɔɣɔntʋ kpaa - mɛ ? Ɩ ́ tá tɛ Ɩsɔ na mə taa na pə tɔɔ suwe ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ kaləna heelim na lʋm , na pə təna pə hɛɛ təli .

text: But the men marvelled , saying , What manner of man is this , that even the winds and the sea obey him !
text2: Ɩlɛna piti kpa pa təna na pá pɔɔsəɣɩ sɩ : Aweɣe ɩnɛ ɩnɩ na pə ́ kpɛŋna heelim na teŋku lʋm na pə ́ nɩɩkəna - ɩ ?

text: And when he was come to the other side into the country of the Gergesenes , there met him two possessed with devils , coming out of the tombs , exceeding fierce , so that no man might pass by that way .
text2: Yesu tɛsa teŋku kʋteŋ lɛŋkʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Katalee nyə ́ ma tɛtʋ taa . Ɩlɛna apalaa naalɛ lɩɩna pəlaaŋ taa na pá səŋəɣɩ - ɩ . Apalaa mpɛ paa hii alɔɣaa kɛ ́ , na pa nyaŋ wɛ sɔɣɔntʋ . Yəlaa cɔlaɣa pa mpaaʋ ŋkʋɣʋ .

text: And , behold , they cried out , saying , What have we to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God ? art thou come hither to torment us before the time ?
text2: Tənaɣa pa sʋʋ kiisuɣu sɩ : Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ , ta na - ŋ suwe ? N kɔma sɩ n tʋɣɩ - tʋɣʋ wahala na pə waatʋ maɣamaɣa ta tata ?

text: And there was a good way off from them an herd of many swine feeding .
text2: Pə pamna afanaa kaləkʋ sɔsɔɔʋ nakʋlɩ kɩɩ wɛ pə cɔlɔ təna na kʋ tuliɣi .

text: So the devils besought him , saying , If thou cast us out , suffer us to go away into the herd of swine .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alɔɣaa wiina Yesu sɩ : Ye n ká tɔɣɔnɩ - tʋ , yele na tə ́ sʋʋ afanaa kaləkʋ kʋnɛ kʋ taa .

text: And he said unto them , Go . And when they were come out , they went into the herd of swine : and , behold , the whole herd of swine ran violently down a steep place into the sea , and perished in the waters .
text2: Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ polo . Ɩlɛna pá se apalaa naalɛ ɩnɩ ɩ waalɩ na pá tɛɛna afanaa taa . Ɩlɛna afanaa tʋ casəlɛ kɛ yem kɛ kpakpaa , na pá tii kalakala na pá tʋ lʋm na pá sɩ .

text: And they that kept them fled , and went their ways into the city , and told every thing , and what was befallen to the possessed of the devils .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ afanaa tiikilaa ná loma kpakpaa na pá polo ɩcatɛ taa , na pá kɛɛsɩ pə təna mpi pə lapa tɔ , na ɩsəna alɔɣaa mpɛ pa tɔm lapa tɔ .

text: And , behold , the whole city came out to meet Jesus : and when they saw him , they besought him that he would depart out of their coasts .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩcatɛ nyə ́ ma təna lɩɩwa sɩ pa səŋəɣɩ Yesu . Pa na - ɩ , ɩlɛna pá tɛɛkɩ - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ lɩɩ pa tɛtʋ taa .

text: And he entered into a ship , and passed over , and came into his own city .
text2: Yesu sʋʋ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ tɛsɩ teŋku na ɩ ́ polo ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ɩcatɛ taa .

text: And , behold , they brought to him a man sick of the palsy , lying on a bed : and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy ; Son , be of good cheer ; thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kɔna - ɩ kʋtɔŋ kʋtʋʋlʋɣʋ tʋ na ɩ ́ hənta ɩ kpatəlɛ tɔɔ . Yesu nawa apalaa mpɛ pa naani , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ heeli kʋtɔntʋ sɩ : Ma pəyalʋ , tɔkɩ nyá tɩ , nyá ɩsaɣatʋ hɩɩsaa .

text: And , behold , certain of the scribes said within themselves , This man blasphemeth .
text2: Tənaɣa Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa napəlɩ pa hʋʋ pa taa sɩ : Apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ kpakəɣɩ ɩ tɩ na ɩ ́ kɛɛsəɣəna Ɩsɔ .

text: And Jesus knowing their thoughts said , Wherefore think ye evil in your hearts ?
text2: Yesu nyəmá nti pa hʋʋkɩ tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ hʋʋkɩ hʋwɛɛ asaɣɛɛ kɛ mpʋ ?

text: For whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and walk ?
text2: Na nti tə yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ kəla təlɛʋ : Nyá ɩsaɣatʋ hɩɩsaa , yaa kʋlɩ na ń tɔ ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( then saith he to the sick of the palsy , ) Arise , take up thy bed , and go unto thine house .
text2: Tɔʋ , maa hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛ sɩ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má , ma pəsəɣɩ na má hɩɩsɩ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ atɛ cənɛ . Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma kʋtɔntʋ sɩ : Kʋlɩ na ń kpaɣa nyá kpatəlɛ na ń kpe .

text: And he arose , and departed to his house .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ kpe .

text: But when the multitudes saw it , they marvelled , and glorified God , which had given such power unto men .
text2: Samaa ná mpʋ , ɩlɛna sɔɣɔntʋ kpa - wɛ . Na pá saŋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ mpi pə tɔɔ ɩ ha yəlaa kɛ pəsʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ taka kɛ mpʋ tɔ .

text: And as Jesus passed forth from thence , he saw a man , named Matthew , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he saith unto him , Follow me . And he arose , and followed him .
text2: Yesu lɩɩ təna na ɩ ́ tɛɛkɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ na apalʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Matiyee tɔ , na ɩ ́ caɣa lampuu təmʋlɛ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yaa - ɩ sɩ : Kʋlɩ na ń təŋɩ - m . Tənaɣa Matiyee kʋlaa na ɩ ́ hu Yesu waalɩ .

text: And it came to pass , as Jesus sat at meat in the house , behold , many publicans and sinners came and sat down with him and his disciples .
text2: Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa na lampuu mʋlaa na asaɣaa paɣalɛ pa kpɛnta Matiyee tɛ na pá tɔkɩ .

text: And when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto his disciples , Why eateth your Master with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Falisanaa na mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá pɔɔsɩ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ mə caa na lampuu mʋlaa na yəlaa asaɣaa pa kpɛntəɣɩ na pá tɔkɩ ?

text: But when Jesus heard that , he said unto them , They that be whole need not a physician , but they that are sick .
text2: Yesu nɩɩ pa kʋpɔɔsʋtʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ cɔ sɩ : Pə taɣa alaafəya nyə ́ ma nyɩɩləɣəna fɛtaa . Ama kʋtɔntʋnaa kɛ ́ .

text: But go ye and learn what that meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice : for I am not come to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Pa ŋmaawa sɩ : Kʋpantʋ kɛ ma sɔɔlaa , pə taɣa kɔtasɩ . Ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ pɛɛkɩ ŋmaatʋ tɔm tənɛ tə hʋwɛɛ . Mpi tɔ , ma kɔmaɣa sɩ ma yaakɩ asaɣaa , pə taɣa kʋpama .

text: Then came to him the disciples of John , saying , Why do we and the Pharisees fast oft , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ ɩfalaa kpətəna Yesu na pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ta na Falisanaa tə hɔkəɣɩ nɔɔsɩ na nyá ɩfalaa ɩɩ lakɩ mpʋ ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber mourn , as long as the bridegroom is with them ? but the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken from them , and then shall they fast .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ ká pəsɩ na ɩ ́ la na akpaɣalʋ taapalaa wɛɛ laŋwakəllɛ taa na ɩ ́ na - wɛ pá wɛɛ ? Aaɩ , pəlɛ pə fɛɩ lapʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ . Pɩɩ kɔɔ na pə ́ kɛɛsɩ kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ , ɩlɛna pá ləsɩ - ɩ pa hɛkʋ . Pəlɛɣɛ paa hɔkɔ nɔɔsɩ .

text: No man putteth a piece of new cloth unto an old garment , for that which is put in to fill it up taketh from the garment , and the rent is made worse .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ fɛɩ wei ɩ ka tɔ ɩ wontuɣu kʋpənʋɣʋ na saaliya kʋfalaɣa tɔ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , saaliya ŋkɛ kaa hɔ - kʋ na pʋ ́ ʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kəlɩ ɩsɩɩ kɩɩ wɛɛ tɔ .

text: Neither do men put new wine into old bottles : else the bottles break , and the wine runneth out , and the bottles perish : but they put new wine into new bottles , and both are preserved .
text2: Pə ́ cɔ ́ nɔɣɔlʋ kaa suu sʋlʋm kʋfam kɛ sʋlʋm huluŋ kʋpəŋ taa , tɔfɔ huluŋ ká ya na sʋlʋm ti na huluŋ náá wakəlɩ yem . Ama huluŋ kʋfaŋ taa kɛ ́ pa suuki sʋlʋm kʋfam , ɩlɛna pə təna pə caɣa teu .

text: While he spake these things unto them , behold , there came a certain ruler , and worshipped him , saying , My daughter is even now dead : but come and lay thy hand upon her , and she shall live .
text2: Yesu tɔŋna - wɛɣɛ tɔm tənɛɣɛ heeluɣu , ɩlɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma sɔsɔ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kɔmaɣalɛ , na ɩ ́ hoti Yesu nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ na ɩ tɔ sɩ : Ma pɛɛlɔ hɛɛ nɔɔnɔɔ , kɔɔ na ń tənɩ nyá niŋ kɛ ɩ tɔɔ , ɩ ká hiki weesuɣu .

text: And Jesus arose , and followed him , and so did his disciples .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa kʋlaa na pá təŋɩ - ɩ .

text: And , behold , a woman , which was diseased with an issue of blood twelve years , came behind him , and touched the hem of his garment :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alʋ nɔɣɔlʋ , wei hatoo pɩɩsɩ naanʋwa na naalɛ taa ɩ tɔŋna tɔɣɔlʋɣʋ na pə ́ wɛ - ɩ toŋ tɔ , ɩ kpətəna Yesu na ɩ waalɩ tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ tokina ɩ capa ntompəle .

text: For she said within herself , If I may but touch his garment , I shall be whole .
text2: Mpi tɔ , alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ka tʋ ɩ taa kɛ ́ sɩ : Ye ma pəsaa na má tokina paa Yesu capa maɣamaɣa pɩɩ waa - m .

text: But Jesus turned him about , and when he saw her , he said , Daughter , be of good comfort ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And the woman was made whole from that hour .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pəsa ɩ waalɩ na ɩ ́ na - ɩ na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Taa nyá , n tɛma Ɩsɔ na nyá taa tɔɣɔ pə waasa - ŋ ma pu . Tənaɣa pə waa - ɩ kpakpaa kɛ tənɛ ɩnɩ .

text: And when Jesus came into the ruler ' s house , and saw the minstrels and the people making a noise ,
text2: Yesu tala Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ təyaɣa taa na ɩ ́ maɣana həsɩ hʋllaa na samaa kɔkɔtɛ .

text: He said unto them , Give place : for the maid is not dead , but sleepeth . And they laughed him to scorn .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ tɔma sɩ : Ɩ ́ lɩɩ cənɛ , pɛɛliya ta sɩ . Ama ka too kʋtoo kɛ ́ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa woŋa - ɩ .

text: But when the people were put forth , he went in , and took her by the hand , and the maid arose .
text2: Pa tɛma samaa kɛ ləsʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna Yesu sʋʋ naŋ taa , na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ pɛɛliya niŋ taa na ká kʋlɩ .

text: And the fame hereof went abroad into all that land .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə tɔm yawa pa tɛtʋ təna taa .

text: And when Jesus departed thence , two blind men followed him , crying , and saying , Thou Son of David , have mercy on us .
text2: Yesu lɩɩ təna na ɩ ́ tɛɛkɩ na ɩ ́ tala tiili , ɩlɛna yʋlʋmaa napələɣɩ naalɛ tʋ ɩ waalɩ na pá kiisiɣi sɩ : Tafiiti Pəyaɣa nyənɩ tá pətɔɔtəlɛ .

text: And when he was come into the house , the blind men came to him : and Jesus saith unto them , Believe ye that I am able to do this ? They said unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Yesu tala təyaɣa taa , ɩlɛna yʋlʋmaa mpɛ pá kpətəna - ɩ . Tənaɣa ɩ pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ tɛma - m na mə taa sɩ ma pəsəɣɩ na má la mpʋ ? Ɩlɛna pá cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ɛɛ , Tacaa .

text: Then touched he their eyes , saying , According to your faith be it unto you .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tokina pa ɩsɛ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Pə ́ la ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ tɛma mə taa tɔ .

text: And their eyes were opened ; and Jesus straitly charged them , saying , See that no man know it .
text2: Ɩlɛna pa ɩsɛ kuli . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu kpaala - wɛ na toŋ sɩ : Tɔʋ , ɩ ́ taa yele na nɔɣɔlʋ nɩɩ yoo .

text: But they , when they were departed , spread abroad his fame in all that country .
text2: Ama pa lɩɩwa na pá yasɩ Yesu tɔm kɛ tɛtʋ təna taa .

text: As they went out , behold , they brought to him a dumb man possessed with a devil .
text2: Pɛlɛ pa lɩɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kpakpaa , ɩlɛna pá kɔna Yesu kɛ ɩlɔɣɔhilu kamumuka .

text: And when the devil was cast out , the dumb spake : and the multitudes marvelled , saying , It was never so seen in Israel .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ tɔɣɔna ɩlɔɣɔʋ , na kamumuka sʋʋ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ kɛ kpakpaa . Piti kpa samaa na pá tɔŋ sɩ : Tə ta keesita ɩsəntɔɣɔ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ tɛtʋ taa .

text: But the Pharisees said , He casteth out devils through the prince of the devils .
text2: Ama Falisanaa ná tɔma sɩ : Alɔɣaa wulaʋ toŋ kɛ ɩ tɔɣɔnəɣəna alɔɣaa lɛlaa .

text: And Jesus went about all the cities and villages , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing every sickness and every disease among the people .
text2: Yesu cɔɔkaɣa acalɛɛ na acalisi təna na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa taa . Na ɩ ́ lakɩ waasʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔm . Ɩ waakaɣa kʋtɔməŋ təna na acamaa təna .

text: But when he saw the multitudes , he was moved with compassion on them , because they fainted , and were scattered abroad , as sheep having no shepherd .
text2: Yesu nyənaɣa samaa na pətɔɔtəlɛ kpaa - ɩ . Mpi tɔ , yəlaa panɛ pa kawaɣa , pa fɛɩna apalʋtʋ . Pa nəɣəsəna heeŋ wei ɩ fɛɩna tiikilu tɔ .

text: Then saith he unto his disciples , The harvest truly is plenteous , but the labourers are few ;
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ heela ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Kʋmtʋ tɔɔwa sɔsɔm . Ama kʋntaa fɛɩ paɣalɛ .

text: Pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he will send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Ɩlɛ ɩ ́ wiina kʋmtʋ tʋ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔɔsɩ kʋntaa kɛ ɩ kʋmtʋ taa .

text: And when he had called unto him his twelve disciples , he gave them power against unclean spirits , to cast them out , and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu yaa ɩ ɩfalaa naanʋwa na naalɛ kɛ ɩ ́ kiŋ , na ɩ ́ ha - wɛɣɛ pəsʋɣʋ sɩ pá tɔɣɔnɩ alɔɣaa na pá waa kʋtɔməŋ təna na acamaa təna .

text: Now the names of the twelve apostles are these ; The first , Simon , who is called Peter , and Andrew his brother ; James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother ;
text2: Tillaa mpɛ pa naanʋwa na naalɛ həla ntɔ . Kancaalaɣa nyəŋ ntɛ ́ Simɔŋ wei pa yaa sɩ Piyɛɛ tɔ , na ɩ neu Antəlɩɩ , na Sepetee pəyalʋ Saakɩ na ɩ neu Yohaanɩ ,

text: Philip , and Bartholomew ; Thomas , and Matthew the publican ; James the son of Alphaeus , and Lebbaeus , whose surname was Thaddaeus ;
text2: na Filipʋ na Paatelemii , na Tomaa na lampuu mʋlʋ Matiyee , na Aləfe pəyalʋ Saakɩ na Tatee ,

text: Simon the Canaanite , and Judas Iscariot , who also betrayed him .
text2: na Selotɩ tʋ Simɔŋ , na Yutaasɩ Ɩsəkaleeu wei ɩ tʋ Yesu kɛ ɩ kolontunaa niŋ taa tɔ .

text: These twelve Jesus sent forth , and commanded them , saying , Go not into the way of the Gentiles , and into any city of the Samaritans enter ye not :
text2: Yesu tila yəlaa naanʋwa na naalɛ ɩnɩ na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ taa polo tɛtʋ nti tə ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma nyəntʋ tɔ tə taa , ɩ ́ taa sʋʋ Samalii acalɛɛ taa .

text: But go rather to the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Ama ɩ ́ polo Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma mpa pa lepa ɩsɩɩ heeŋ tɔ pa cɔlɔ .

text: And as ye go , preach , saying , The kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Ɩ ́ ká lakɩ waasʋ na ɩ ́ heeliɣi mə mpaaʋ taa sɩ : Ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa wʋsa kɔntɛ .

text: Heal the sick , cleanse the lepers , raise the dead , cast out devils : freely ye have received , freely give .
text2: Ɩ ́ waa kʋtɔntʋnaa , na ɩ ́ feesi sətaa , na ɩ ́ waasɩ asilima kʋtɔŋ nyə ́ ma , na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔnɩ alɔɣaa . Mə hika faalaa kɛ ́ , ɩ ha tɔtɔɣɔ faalaa .

text: Provide neither gold , nor silver , nor brass in your purses ,
text2: Ɩ ́ taa tʋ mə sipanaa taa kɛ ́ liɣitee , paa nna .

text: Nor scrip for your journey , neither two coats , neither shoes , nor yet staves : for the workman is worthy of his meat .
text2: Ɩ ́ yele mə mpaaʋ huluŋ . Ɩ ́ taa tənɩ tokonaa , ɩ ́ taa lɛɛ ntaŋkpala , ɩ ́ taa tɔkɩ kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ . Mpi tɔ , təmlɛ latʋ na ɩ caləsʋɣʋ kɛ ́ .

text: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter , inquire who in it is worthy ; and there abide till ye go thence .
text2: Ye ɩ ́ sʋʋ ɩcatɛ yaa ɩcaliya nakəlɩ ka taa , ɩ ́ pɛɛkɩ wei ɩ luɣu wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ká mʋ - mɛ tɔ , na ɩ ́ caɣa təna haləna mə tɛɛʋ .

text: And when ye come into an house , salute it .
text2: Ye ɩ ́ sʋʋ təyaɣa nakəlɩ ka taa ɩlɛ ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ ha - mɛɣɛ alaafəya .

text: And if the house be worthy , let your peace come upon it : but if it be not worthy , let your peace return to you .
text2: Ye təyaɣa ŋkɛ ka nyə ́ ma ɩ ́ mʋ - mɛ , pɩɩ la - wɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ kooluɣu tɔ . Ama ye pa kisa - mɛ , mə koolee ɩ ́ məlɩ mə tɔɔ .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear your words , when ye depart out of that house or city , shake off the dust of your feet .
text2: Ye pa kisa - mɛɣɛ mʋɣʋ yaa mə tɔm nɩɩʋ kɛ təyaɣa nakəlɩ yaa ɩcatɛ natəlɩ tə taa , ɩ ́ lɩɩ na ɩ ́ kpiisi - wɛɣɛ mə nɔɔhɛɛ mʋsʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ .

text: Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , Sɔtɔm na Kɔmɔɔ tɛtʋ kaa na wahala kɛ Hʋʋlɛ wule na pə ́ kəlɩ ɩcatɛ ńtɛ ́ .

text: Behold , I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves : be ye therefore wise as serpents , and harmless as doves .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyənɩ , ma tiliɣi - mɛ ɩsɩɩ heeŋ kɛ sʋnsʋməŋ hɛkʋ . Ɩ ́ la laɣatʋ ɩsɩɩ tomaa , na təpamm ɩsɩɩ alukukunaa .

text: But beware of men : for they will deliver you up to the councils , and they will scourge you in their synagogues ;
text2: Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ , yəlaa ká yaa - mɛɣɛ puloonaa taa . Paa ma - mɛɣɛ akpatɛɛ kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa taa .

text: And ye shall be brought before governors and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them and the Gentiles .
text2: Paa yaa - mɛɣɛ nɔnɔɔsɩ kɛ tɛtʋ tɔkəlaa na awulaa sɔsaa pa kiŋnaa kɛ ma tɔɔ . Ɩlɛna pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ ma tɔm tampana kɛ pa na mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ pa ɩsɛntaa .

text: But when they deliver you up , take no thought how or what ye shall speak : for it shall be given you in that same hour what ye shall speak .
text2: Waatʋ wei paa pona - mɛɣɛ puloonaa taa kɛ ́ mpʋ tɔ , ɩ ́ taa nəɣəsɩ nti ɩ ́ ká yɔɣɔtɩ na ɩsəna ɩ ́ ká yɔɣɔtɩ - tɩ tɔ . Pə waatʋ ɩ ́ talaa , pɩɩ tʋ mə luuŋ tɛɛ kɛ ́ kpakpaa kɛ nti ɩ ́ ká yɔɣɔtɩ tɔ .

text: For it is not ye that speak , but the Spirit of your Father which speaketh in you .
text2: Mpi tɔ , pə taɣa mə kiŋ kɛ mə kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ ka lɩɩna . Ama mə Caa Feesuɣu ká yɔɣɔtəna na mə nɔɔsɩ .

text: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death , and the father the child : and the children shall rise up against their parents , and cause them to be put to death .
text2: Yəlaa ká kʋlɩ na pá hʋ ́ lɩ ́ pa taalʋnaa yaa pa newaa sɩ pá kʋ - wɛ . Cɛcɛnaa ká la pa piya kɛ mpʋ tɔtɔ . Piya səlɛ sɩɩ kʋlɩ sɩ nyə ́ ma tɔɔ sɩ pá kʋ - wɛ .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that endureth to the end shall be saved .
text2: Yəlaa təna taa ká kpana - mɛɣɛ ma tɔɔ . Ama wei ɩ ́ nyaɣa apalʋtʋ na ɩ ́ tala tənaɣa , pʋntʋ nyʋɣʋ kɛ pɩɩ ya .

text: But when they persecute you in this city , flee ye into another : for verily I say unto you , Ye shall not have gone over the cities of Israel , till the Son of man be come .
text2: Ye pə kɔma na pá tʋ - mɛɣɛ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ ɩcatɛ natəlɩ tə taa , ɩ ́ se na ɩ ́ polo lɛntɛ taa . Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , ɩ ́ kaa tɛ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ acalɛɛ kɛ cɔɔʋ na pə ́ cɔ ́ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma kɔɔ .

text: The disciple is not above his master , nor the servant above his lord .
text2: Təmlɛ kpɛləməlʋ ta kəlɩ ɩ hʋllʋ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩfalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ fɛɩ wei ɩ kəla ɩ caa tɔ .

text: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master , and the servant as his lord . If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub , how much more shall they call them of his household ?
text2: Ye pə lapa təmlɛ kpɛləməlʋ ɩsɩɩ wei ɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ tɔ , pə maɣanaa kɛ ́ . Na ye pə lapa ɩfalʋ ɩsɩɩ ɩ caa pə maɣanaa tɔtɔɣɔ . Pa ta kisi təyaɣa Caa kɛ tʋʋʋ sɩ Pesepule , kacaŋfana təyaɣa nyə ́ ma na ?

text: Fear them not therefore : for there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; and hid , that shall not be known .
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩlɛ , ɩ ́ taa nyana yəlaa . Pə təna mpi pə ŋmɛlaa tɔ , ɩsɩɩ pə tɛma na pə ́ kuli pə tɔɔ . Pə təna mpi pə lapa mukaɣa tɛɛ tɔ , ɩsɩɩ pa tɛma na pá nyɩ - wɩ .

text: What I tell you in darkness , that speak ye in light : and what ye hear in the ear , that preach ye upon the housetops .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɔm nti ma ŋmɛsəɣɩ na má heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ ahoo tɔ , ɩ ́ kpaalɩ - təɣɩ ilim taa . Na nti pa wɛləta mə ŋkpaŋŋ taa tɔ , ɩ ́ kpaalɩ - tɩ na nɔɣɔ sɔsɔɣa .

text: And fear not them which kill the body , but are not able to kill the soul : but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa nyana mpa pa pəsəɣɩ na pá ləsɩ yʋlʋ weesuɣu tike , na pə waalɩ paa pəsəɣɩ pʋlʋ tɔ . Ama ɩ ́ se Ɩsɔ , ɩnɩ ɩ pəsəɣəna na ɩ ́ kʋ yʋlʋ . Pəyele ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ tʋ - ɩ tənaaasəlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa .

text: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing ? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father .
text2: Pə taɣa sumpɩʋpɩʋnaa naalɛɣɛ pa pɛɛtəɣɩ santii kʋlʋm taa ? Pəyele kʋlʋm nyʋɣʋ ɩɩ leki na pə ́ tá lɩɩna mə Caa kiŋ .

text: But the very hairs of your head are all numbered .
text2: Mpʋ ɩnɩ tɔtɔɣɔ na mə nyʋɣʋ taa nyɔɔɔsɩ , Ɩsɔ nyəmá sɩ təna sɩ nyʋɣʋ kɛ ́ .

text: Fear ye not therefore , ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩ ́ taa nəɣəsɩ . Ɩ ́ kəla sumpɩʋpɩʋnaa təcaɣacaɣa .

text: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men , him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Ye yʋlʋ ta ŋmɛsɩ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ ma nyəŋ , ma maɣamaɣa maa tisi ma Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩ ɩsɛntaa sɩ pʋntʋ kɛ ́ ma nyəŋ tɔtɔ .

text: But whosoever shall deny me before men , him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven .
