text2: Ama wei ɩ ́ kpɛɛsa yəlaa ɩsɛntaa sɩ ɩ ta nyɩ - m , ma maɣamaɣa maa tɔ ma Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩ ɩsɛntaa sɩ ma ta nyəmɩ - ɩ tɔtɔ .

text: Think not that I am come to send peace on earth : I came not to send peace , but a sword .
text2: Ɩ ́ hʋʋ sɩ hɛɛsʋɣʋ kɛ ma kɔna antulinya taa ? Aaɩ , yoou kɛ ma kɔnaa .

text: For I am come to set a man at variance against his father , and the daughter against her mother , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Ma kɔmaɣa sɩ ma yoosiɣi cɛcɛ na ɩ pəyaɣa , na pɛɛlɔ na ɩ too , na poolu na paŋ alʋ nyəŋ .

text: And a man ' s foes shall be they of his own household .
text2: Yʋlʋ təyaɣa nyə ́ ma maɣamaɣa ká pəsəna ɩ kolontunaa .

text: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me : and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me .
text2: Ye wei ɩ sɔɔləɣɩ ɩ caa yaa ɩ too na pə ́ kəlɩ ma , ɩ ta tala ɩ ́ la ma ɩfalʋ . Na ye wei ɩ sɔɔləɣɩ ɩ pəyalʋ yaa ɩ pɛɛlɔ na pə ́ kəlɩ ma , ɩ ta tala ɩ ́ la ma ɩfalʋ .

text: And he that taketh not his cross , and followeth after me , is not worthy of me .
text2: Ye wei ɩ ta səɣəlɩ ɩ səm tesika na ɩ ́ təŋɩ - m , pʋntʋ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ la ma ɩfalʋ .

text: He that findeth his life shall lose it : and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Wei ɩ ́ nyəna ɩ weesuɣu təcututu , ɩ tɛŋna səpʋ . Ama wei ɩ ́ lapa ɩ təɣɩ awusa kɛ ma tɔɔ , pʋntʋ ká hikina weesuɣu .

text: He that receiveth you receiveth me , and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Ye wei ɩ ́ mʋ - mɛ , maɣa ɩ mʋwa . Na ye wei ɩ mʋ - ma , pʋntʋ mʋ wei ɩ tila - m tɔɣɔ .

text: He that receiveth a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet ' s reward ; and he that receiveth a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man ' s reward .
text2: Ye wei ɩ mʋ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ nyəŋ tɔ pə tɔɔ , pʋntʋ ká hiki kasəyaɣa ŋka Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ ká mʋ tɔ . Na ye wei ɩ ́ mʋ yʋlʋ wei Ɩsɔ nyənəɣɩ kʋpaŋ tɔ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ kʋpaŋ tɔ pə tɔɔ , pʋntʋ ká hiki kasəyaɣa ŋka paa ha yʋlʋ kʋpaŋ tɔ .

text: And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple , verily I say unto you , he shall in no wise lose his reward .
text2: Tampana kɛ má , ma heeliɣi - mɛ , wei ɩ ́ ha lʋm sasala anɛ a maɣamaɣa kɛ piya sənɛ sɩ taa nakəlɩ kɛ ka kɛ ́ ma ɩfalʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ , pʋntʋ kaa laŋ pə kasəyaɣa .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples , he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities .
text2: Yesu tɛma ɩ ɩfalaa naanʋwa na naalɛ kɛ pə tənaɣa kɛɛsʋɣʋ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ təna na ɩ ́ tɛɛ sɩ ɩ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ waasʋ kɛ acalɛɛ taa .

text: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Lʋm Sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ wɛ saləka taa na ɩ ́ nɩɩ pa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ nti nti Kilisiti lakɩ tɔ pə tɔm . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tili ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ɩfalaa taa napəlɩ ,

text: And said unto him , Art thou he that should come , or do we look for another ?
text2: sɩ pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Nyaɣalɛ wei ɩ tɔm paa tɔma sɩ ɩ ká kɔɔ tɔ , yaa nɔɣɔlʋ wɛɛ ɩ kɔŋ tə taŋ ɩlɛ ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Go and shew John again those things which ye do hear and see :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ Yohaanɩ kɛ nti ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ na nti ɩ ́ naakɩ tɔ sɩ ,

text: The blind receive their sight , and the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , and the deaf hear , the dead are raised up , and the poor have the gospel preached to them .
text2: yʋlʋmaa naakɩ , kaakalasɩ tɔŋ , na tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ asilima kʋtɔŋ nyə ́ ma naakɩ nyʋɣʋ , ntamaa nɩɩkɩ , sətaa ná feŋ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ kʋnyɔntʋnaa ná tɔŋna Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ nɩɩʋ .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Wei ɩ naani kaa lɩɩ ma tɔɔ tɔ pʋntʋ nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ .

text: And as they departed , Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Yohaanɩ ɩfalaa mpɛ pa kɔma na pá kpe , ɩlɛna Yesu sʋʋ samaa kɛ Yohaanɩ tɔm pɔɔsʋɣʋ sɩ : Pepeɣe ɩ ́ ka pola wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa kɛ ́ naʋ ye ? Heelim makɩ na pə ́ ciɣitiɣi səsəncaŋa ŋka tɔ ? Anɩ pə taɣa təlɛ .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? behold , they that wear soft clothing are in kings ' houses .
text2: Ɩlɛ pepe naʋ kɛ ɩ ́ polaa ? Yaa yʋlʋ wei ɩ suu kacɔka wontu tɔ ? Tɔʋ mpa pa suuki kacɔka wontu tɔ awulaa tɛɛsɩ taa kɛ ́ pɛlɛ pa wɛɛ .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? yea , I say unto you , and more than a prophet .
text2: Ɩlɛ pepe maɣamaɣa kɛ ɩ ́ ka tɩɩ pola naʋ ? Yaa Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ? Tampam , Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ kɛ ́ . Halɩ ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ɩ tɩɩ kəla mpʋ .

text: For this is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Ɩ tɔm kɛ pa tɩɩ ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Nyənɩ , ma tillu ntɔ ma tɛləsəɣɩ nyá nɔɣɔ tɔɔ , sɩ ɩ ́ taɣanɩ nyá mpaaʋ na ń kɔŋ .

text: Verily I say unto you , Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist : notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ tampana sɩ , yʋlʋpiya təna taa nɔɣɔlʋ fɛɩ wei ɩ kəla Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ tɔ . Ɩlɛ paa na mpʋ ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa taa səkpelu maɣamaɣa tɛɛ - ɩ .

text: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence , and the violent take it by force .
text2: Hatoo pə kpaɣaʋ waatʋ wei Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ lakaɣa waasʋ na pə tana saŋa tɔ , ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa hikuɣu kɛ ́ ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ tɔm kɛ ́ . Na mpa pa sɛɛsa ɩsɛ tɔ mpɛ pa hikiɣina - kɛ .

text: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John .
text2: Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa təna na Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kpaala Kawulaɣa ŋkɛ ka tɔm , haləna pə ́ tala Yohaanɩ kɔntɛ .

text: And if ye will receive it , this is Elias , which was for to come .
text2: Ɩɩ caa ma tɔm mʋɣʋ tɔɣɔ , tɔfɔ ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ Yohaanɩ ɩnəɣəlɛ Ilii wei paa tɔma sɩ ɩ ká məlɩ tɔ .

text: He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Ye ɩ ́ kɛ ́ nɩɩlaa ɩ ́ nɩɩ .

text: But whereunto shall I liken this generation ? It is like unto children sitting in the markets , and calling unto their fellows ,
text2: Pepeɣe maa kɛɛsəna kʋfalaŋ yəlaa panɛ ? Pa nəɣəsəna kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ piya cakʋɣʋ kataasɩ taa na sɩ tɔŋ təma sɩ :

text: And saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned unto you , and ye have not lamented .
text2: Anɩ tə mapa - mɛɣɛ soo sɩ ɩ ́ paa , na ɩ ́ kisi . Pə ́ cɔ ́ tə wii səm wula , pə ta cɛ mə laŋa na ɩ ́ wii .

text: For John came neither eating nor drinking , and they say , He hath a devil .
text2: Tɔʋ , Yohaanɩ ná kɔma , ɩɩ tɔkɩ , ɩɩ nyɔɔkɩ sʋlʋm , na pá yɔɣɔtəɣɩ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ ɩlɔɣɔhilu .

text: The Son of man came eating and drinking , and they say , Behold a man gluttonous , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners . But wisdom is justified of her children .
text2: Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má , ma kɔma na má tɔkɩ na má nyɔɔkɩ , ɩlɛna pá taɣanəɣɩ maɣa tɔm tɔtɔ sɩ ma kɛ ́ hilitu na sʋlʋnyɔɔlʋ . Aaɩyee sɩ lampuu mʋlaa na asaɣaa pa ceu kɛ ́ . Ama Ɩsɔ laɣatʋ hʋla pə teu .

text: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done , because they repented not :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu sʋʋ acalɛɛ nna a taa ɩ wiisa piti təma paɣalɛ lapʋ tɔ a nyə ́ ma kɛ kalənaʋ na toŋ . Mpi tɔ , pa ta laɣasɩ tɔntɛ . Ɩ tɔma - wɛɣɛ sɩ :

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works , which were done in you , had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: Haɩ , Colasɛŋ nyə ́ ma mɛ , mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo . Haɩ Pɛtɛsaita nyə ́ ma mɛ , mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo kɛ ́ . Piti təma nna pa lapa - yɛɣɛ mə hɛkʋ taa tɔ , ye ɩsɩɩ ɩsəntɔ Tiii na Sitɔŋ pa acalɛɛ taa kɛ paa lapa - yɛ , ɩsəntɔ paa tɛma suuu kɛ ləyaɣa wontu ɩsɩɩ fɔlətɔnaa taka na pá pəlɩ pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɔlʋma sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ pa caa pa laɣasɩ tɔntɛ .

text: But I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the day of judgment , than for you .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ paa hʋ ́ lɩ ́ suulu kɛ Tiii na Sitɔŋ acalɛɛ nyə ́ ma kɛ Hʋʋlɛ kʋyakʋ wule na pə ́ kəlɩ - mɛ .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted unto heaven , shalt be brought down to hell : for if the mighty works , which have been done in thee , had been done in Sodom , it would have remained until this day .
text2: Pə kaasʋɣʋ Kapənahum nyá tɔ , n hʋʋ sɩ n ká pɩɩ na ń kaləsəna hatoo ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ na ? Ama paa tisi - ŋ kɛ ́ təfɛ kɛ tuu tənaasəlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ piti təma nna pa lapa nyá taa tɔ . Ye Sɔtɔm kɛ paa lapa - yɛ , ɩsəntɔ ɩ ka tapəna saŋa .

text: But I say unto you , That it shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment , than for thee .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ paa hʋ ́ lɩ ́ Sɔtɔm kɛ suulu kɛ Hʋʋlɛ wule na pə ́ kəlɩ - mɛ .

text: At that time Jesus answered and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnəɣɩ Yesu yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Haɩ , ma Caa , ɩsɔtaa na atɛ pə tʋ , ma sɛɛ - ŋ . N ŋmɛsa tɔm tənɛɣɛ laɣatʋnaa , ɩlɛna ń kuli - təɣɩ piya .

text: Even so , Father : for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Ma Caa , pɔpɔtʋ fɛɩ ma sɛɛ - ŋ . Nyá ɩnɩ nyá luɣu tɩɩ lapəna mpʋ .

text: All things are delivered unto me of my Father : and no man knoweth the Son , but the Father ; neither knoweth any man the Father , save the Son , and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him .
text2: Ama ma Caa cɛla - m pə tənaɣa . Ye pə taɣa ma Caa tike nɔɣɔlʋ ta nyɩ Pəyalʋ . Na pə ́ taɣa Pəyalʋ tike , nɔɣɔlʋ ta nyɩ Cɛcɛ tɔtɔ . Aŋha , ye Pəyalʋ nɔkəna sɩ ɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ wei pə paasi .

text: Come unto me , all ye that labour and are heavy laden , and I will give you rest .
text2: Mɛ mpa ɩ kawa na mə səɣəla nɩɩ - mɛ tɔ , mə təna ɩ ́ kɔɔ ma cɔlɔ na má yele na ɩ ́ hɛɛsɩ .

text: Take my yoke upon you , and learn of me ; for I am meek and lowly in heart : and ye shall find rest unto your souls .
text2: Ɩ ́ yele na má tɔkɩ - mɛɣɛ teu na má sɛɣɛsɩ - mɛɣɛ ma laɣatʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ma wɛna suulu na má wɛ təpamm , na mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ ká hɛɛsɩ .

text: For my yoke is easy , and my burden is light .
text2: Mpi pə tɔɔ tɔ , ye ma tɔka - mɛ ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ , na səɣəla nna maa sʋkɩ - mɛ tɔ a fɛɩ yuŋ .

text: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn ; and his disciples were an hungred , and began to pluck the ears of corn , and to eat .
text2: Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Yesu tɛɛkaɣana tɔɣɔnaɣa pee taalɛ natəlɩ tə kiŋ kɛ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ nakʋlɩ kʋ wule . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ nyɔɣɔsɩ kpa ɩ ɩfalaa , ɩlɛna pá sʋʋ tɔɣɔnaɣa pee pɛlʋɣʋ na pá tɔkɩ .

text: But when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto him , Behold , thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day .
text2: Falisanaa ná mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá yɔɣɔtɩ - ɩ sɩ : Nyənɩ , nyá ɩfalaa lakʋɣʋ mpi pə fɛɩ lapʋ kɛ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule tɔ yee ?

text: But he said unto them , Have ye not read what David did , when he was an hungred , and they that were with him ;
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ye mpʋ ɩ ́ tá kala mpi Tafiiti lapa waatʋ wei nyɔɣɔsɩ pɩɩ ɩ ́ na mpa paa wɛ ɩ cɔlɔ tɔ ?

text: How he entered into the house of God , and did eat the shewbread , which was not lawful for him to eat , neither for them which were with him , but only for the priests ?
text2: Ɩ sʋʋ Ɩsɔ təyaɣa taa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa potopotonaa mpa paa sɩɩ Ɩsɔ tɔ na ɩ ́ na ɩ yəlaa pá tɔɣɔ . Pəyele potopotonaa ɩsɩɩ mpʋ tá kɛ ́ mpa yəlaa təna ka tɔɣɔ tɔ . Ama kɔtəlaa tike ka wɛnna mpaa sɩ pá tɔɣɔ - wɛ .

text: Or have ye not read in the law , how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath , and are blameless ?
text2: Yaa ɩ ́ ta kala Moisi Kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa sɩ kɔtəlaa ta nyɩ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ kɛ waatʋ wei pa tɔŋna təmlɛ lapʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa tɔ . Pəyele nɔɣɔlʋ ɩɩ nyənəɣɩ - wɛ ɩsɩɩ pa wakələɣɩ - kʋ .

text: But I say unto you , That in this place is one greater than the temple .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ pʋlʋpʋ wɛ cənɛ na pə ́ kəla Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ .

text: But if ye had known what this meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice , ye would not have condemned the guiltless .
text2: Pa yɔɣɔta Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Kʋpantʋ kɛ ma sɔɔlaa , pə taɣa kɔtasɩ . Ye ɩ ́ ka cɛkəna tɔm tənɛ tə hʋwɛɛ ɩ ́ taa tʋ yəlaa panɛɣɛ kʋpəntʋɣʋ kɛ yem kɛ ́ mpʋ .

text: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day .
text2: Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa maɣalɛ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ Sɔsɔ .

text: And when he was departed thence , he went into their synagogue :
text2: Yesu lɩɩ təna , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sʋʋ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile natəlɩ tə taa .

text: And , behold , there was a man which had his hand withered . And they asked him , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days ? that they might accuse him .
text2: Pə pamna ŋkpaləkpɛkaɣa tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛ təna . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mpa paa wɛ təna tɔ pa caakaɣa pa hiki timpi paa waana Yesu tɔ . Ɩlɛna pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ta mpaaʋ taa , paa waasɩ yʋlʋ kɛ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule yaa ɩsəna ?

text: And he said unto them , What man shall there be among you , that shall have one sheep , and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day , will he not lay hold on it , and lift it out ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Mə taa awe wɛna heu kʋlʋm təkoŋ na heu ɩnɩ ɩ ́ hoti pʋ ́ ʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɔsɔɔʋ nakʋlɩ kʋ taa kɛ ́ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule , na ɩ ́ yele - ɩ ləsʋɣʋ sɩ pə kɛ ́ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ ?

text: How much then is a man better than a sheep ? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days .
text2: Na yʋlʋ na heu kɛ we ? Tɔʋ , ye mpʋ pa pəsəɣɩ na pá waasɩ yʋlʋ kɛ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule mɛɛ .

text: Then saith he to the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it forth ; and it was restored whole , like as the other .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu tɔ ŋkpaləkpɛkaɣa tʋ ɩnɩ sɩ : Tɔʋ , loosi nyá niŋ . Nkpaləkpɛkaɣa tʋ loosa ɩ niŋ , ɩlɛna ɩ niŋ məlɩ teu təmammam ɩsɩɩ lɛləŋ .

text: Then the Pharisees went out , and held a council against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Tənaɣa Falisanaa polaa na pá caɣa na pá maɣasɩ ɩsəna paa la na pá kʋ Yesu tɔ .

text: But when Jesus knew it , he withdrew himself from thence : and great multitudes followed him , and he healed them all ;
text2: Yesu nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ se təna na yəlaa paɣalɛ təŋɩ - ɩ . Ntɛna ɩ ́ la na pa təna mpa paa kɛ ́ kʋtɔntʋnaa tɔ pá hiki alaafəya .

text: And charged them that they should not make him known :
text2: Ama ɩ kpaala - wɛɣɛ teu sɩ : Ɩ ́ taa yele na pá nyɩ ma tɔɔ .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Pə lapa mpʋ sɩ pə ́ la nti Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Ɩsayii ka yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ tɔ sɩ :

text: Behold my servant , whom I have chosen ; my beloved , in whom my soul is well pleased : I will put my spirit upon him , and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles .
text2: Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔtaa sɩ , ma təmlɛ tʋ wei ma ləsaa tɔɣɔlɔ . Wei ma sɔɔlaa na ma laŋlɛ hɛɛna sɔsɔm tɔ . Maa tʋ ma Feesuɣu kɛ ɩ taa . Ɩ ka heeli hʋʋnaʋ tɔm kɛ piitimnaa .

text: He shall not strive , nor cry ; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets .
text2: Ɩ ́ na nɔɣɔlʋ pa kaa yoo . Pəyele pa kaa nɩɩ ɩ taŋ . Pa kaa na - ɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ faaci kɛ samaa taa kɛ ɩcatɛ patəma taa .

text: A bruised reed shall he not break , and smoking flax shall he not quench , till he send forth judgment unto victory .
text2: Ɩ kaa tɛɛsɩ ɩsəkpʋlʋɣʋ tʋ ɩsəlɛ kɛ naŋtʋɣʋ . Ɩ kaa tɛɛsɩ teesuɣu kɛ fətəla wei ɩ kɔkɔ tɔŋna fiɣinuɣu tɔ . Haləna ɩ ́ tɛ siɣisuɣu tɔm nyʋɣʋ kɛ kʋsʋɣʋ .

text: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Kateŋa təna yəlaa ká tekiɣi - ɩ .

text: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil , blind , and dumb : and he healed him , insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kɔna Yesu kɛ ɩlɔɣɔhilu wei ɩɩ naakɩ pəyele ɩɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔ . Ɩlɛna Yesu la na ɩ ́ sʋʋ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ na naʋ .

text: And all the people were amazed , and said , Is not this the son of David ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ piti kpa yəlaa təna na pá tɔ sɩ : Yaa Tafiiti Pəyalʋ ɩnəɣəlɛ ?

text: But when the Pharisees heard it , they said , This fellow doth not cast out devils , but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils .
text2: Ama Falisanaa ná kɔma na pá nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá tɔ sɩ : Alɔɣaa sɔsɔ wei pa yaa sɩ Pesepule tɔ ɩ toŋ kɛ apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ tɔɣɔnəɣəna alɔɣaa lɛmpa .

text: And Jesus knew their thoughts , and said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand :
text2: Yesu ná cɛkəna pa taa hʋwɛɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ye kawulaɣa ɩ ́ wɛɛ na ka taa yəlaa fɛɩ nɔɣɔ kʋlʋmaɣa , nɔɔnɔɔ ka yawaɣa . Na ɩcatɛ ɩ ́ wɛɛ na tə taa yəlaa yaa ye təyaɣa wɛnna na ka taa nyə ́ ma fɛɩ nɔɣɔ kʋlʋmaɣa , nɔɔnɔɔ ka yawa .

text: And if Satan cast out Satan , he is divided against himself ; how shall then his kingdom stand ?
text2: Ye Satanɩ tɔɣɔnəɣɩ ɩ tɩ , ɩlɛ pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩ kawulaɣa nyə ́ ma yooki pa taa pa tike ntɛ ́ . Na saa ɩnɩ ɩ kawulaɣa nyʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ ka ɩsəna ?

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your children cast them out ? therefore they shall be your judges .
text2: Ye ɩlɔɣɔʋ Pesepule toŋ kɛ ma lookina alɔɣaa ɩsɩɩ mə hʋʋkʋɣʋ tɔ , ɩlɛ awe toŋ kɛ mə pəyalaa ná lookina pa nyə ́ ma ? Tənaɣa mə pəyalaa mpɛ pa maɣamaɣa paa kʋna mə tɔm .

text: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God , then the kingdom of God is come unto you .
text2: Ama ye Ɩsɔ toŋ taa kɛ ́ ma lookina alɔɣaa , ɩlɛ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa wɛ mə tɛɛ mə tɛɛ kɛ ́ .

text: Or else how can one enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he first bind the strong man ? and then he will spoil his house .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ sʋʋ yʋlʋ toŋtʋ təyaɣa sɩ ɩ kuuki ɩ wontu na ɩ ́ ta tɛmɩ - ɩ ŋmɩɩsɩ kɛ hɔkʋɣʋ . Ama ɩ kpaa - ɩ kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ hɔkɔ təkeŋkeŋ na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ sʋʋ wontu kuuu kɛ təyaɣa taa .

text: He that is not with me is against me ; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad .
text2: Wei ɩ fɛɩ ma tɔɔ tɔ , pʋntʋ kɛ ́ ma kolontu kɛ ́ . Na wei ɩɩ səŋna - m tɔɔsʋɣʋ tɔ ɩ yaasəɣɩ kɛ ́ .

text: Wherefore I say unto you , All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men : but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma heeliɣi - mɛ təfoo sɩ paa yəlaa kʋwakələm ka tɔɔ ɩsəna , yaa paa yɔɣɔtɩ ɩsaɣatʋ ɩsɩɩ we , Ɩsɔ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - wɛɣɛ suulu . Ama wei ɩ ka yɔɣɔtɩ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ tɔɔ tɔ , pa kaa hʋ ́ lɩ ́ pʋntʋ kɛ suulu .

text: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost , it shall not be forgiven him , neither in this world , neither in the world to come .
text2: Ye wei ɩ yɔɣɔta Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má , ma tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩsaɣatʋ , paa hʋ ́ lɩ ́ pʋntʋ kɛ suulu . Ama wei ɩ ́ yɔɣɔta Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩsaɣatʋ , pʋntʋ kaa na suulu , paa saŋa , paa cele .

text: Either make the tree good , and his fruit good ; or else make the tree corrupt , and his fruit corrupt : for the tree is known by his fruit .
text2: Tʋɣʋ ɩ ́ lʋləɣɩ pee kʋpana kɛ pa tɔŋ sɩ kʋ kɛ ́ tʋɣʋ kʋpaŋkʋ . Na tʋɣʋ ɩ ́ lʋləɣɩ pee asaɣɛɛ kɛ pa tɔŋ sɩ kʋ kɛ tʋɣʋ ɩsaɣaʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tʋɣʋ lʋlʋɣʋ kiŋ kɛ pa nyəŋna - kʋ .

text: O generation of vipers , how can ye , being evil , speak good things ? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh .
text2: Akala piya mɛ , ɩsənaɣa mɛ mpa ɩ ́ kɛ ́ asaɣaa tɔ ɩ ́ ká pəsɩ na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ tɔm kʋpantʋ ? Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩsəna yʋlʋ lotu taa tɔɔwa tɔ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ yɔɣɔtaɣa hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things : and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things .
text2: Yʋlʋpaŋ kʋpantʋ lɩɩkəna tuu ɩ lotu taa kʋpantʋ kiŋ kɛ ́ . Ɩlɛna ɩsaɣaʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ lɩɩna tuu ɩ lotu taa ɩsaɣatʋ kiŋ .

text: But I say unto you , That every idle word that men shall speak , they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ Hʋʋlɛ wule paa pɔɔsɩ yəlaa na paa heelina pa maɣamaɣa pa nɔɔsɩ kɛ paa tɔmaɣa kpaɩ nyəŋka ŋka pa yɔɣɔta yem tɔ .

text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified , and by thy words thou shalt be condemned .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , nyá yɔɣɔtaɣa taa kɛ ́ paa nyəna sɩ nyá tɔm tewa yaa tə səpa .

text: Then certain of the scribes and of the Pharisees answered , saying , Master , we would see a sign from thee .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa napəlɩ na Falisanaa napəlɩ pa tɔma Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , tə caa sɩ ń la - tʋɣʋ piti təmlɛ natəlɩ na tə ́ ná .

text: But he answered and said unto them , An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given to it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas :
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Kʋfalaŋ yəlaa asaɣaa mpa paa tɛŋ Ɩsɔ na pa taa tɔ pa caa pá ná piti təmlɛ natəlɩ . Ɩlɛ pa kaa na natəlɩ , ye pə taɣa Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Yonaasɩ nyəntɛ .

text: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale ' s belly ; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩsɩɩ Yonaasɩ caɣaʋ tinte sɔsɔɔlɛ lotu taa kɛ ́ kʋyɛɛŋ tooso kɛ ́ ilim na ahoo tɔ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má maa caɣa tɛtʋ tɛɛ kɛ ́ kʋyɛɛŋ tooso kɛ ilim na ahoo .

text: The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : because they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Ye pə tala Hʋʋlɛ wule Ninifi nyə ́ ma ká kʋ kʋfalaŋ yəlaa panɛ pa tɔm . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , kʋyaŋku pɛlɛ pa nɩɩ Yonaasɩ waasʋ tɔ pa yela pa ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ kpakpaa kɛ ́ . Pəyele pʋlʋpʋ wɛ cənɛ na pə ́ tɛɛ Yonaasɩ ɩnɩ .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Na ye pə tala Hʋʋlɛ wule tɔtɔ , ilim mpətəŋ tɔɔ wulaʋ alʋ nyəŋ ká kʋ kʋfalaŋ yəlaa panɛ pa tɔm kɛ mpi pə tɔɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ka lɩɩna tuu tɛtʋ pooluŋ taa na ɩ ́ kɔɔ sɩ ɩ nɩɩkɩ ɩsəna Salʋmɔŋ yɔɣɔtaɣana nyəm tɔ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ pʋlʋpʋ wɛ cənɛ na pə ́ tɛɛ Salʋmɔŋ təcaɣacaɣa .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest , and findeth none .
text2: Waatʋ wei pá loowa ɩlɔɣɔʋ , wʋlaɣa taa kɛ ́ ɩ cɔɔkɩ sɩ ɩ ́ hɛɛsɩ . Ɩ laŋəɣɩ

text: Then he saith , I will return into my house from whence I came out ; and when he is come , he findeth it empty , swept , and garnished .
text2: ɩlɛna ɩ ́ taɣanɩ ɩ taa sɩ : Maa məlɩ təyaɣa ŋka ka taa ma lɩɩwa tɔɣɔ . Ɩ takɩ kɛlɛ ka taa , ɩlɛ ɩ ká maɣana pa hasa - kɛ na pá taɣanɩ pə tənaɣa teu , na nɔɣɔlʋ fɛɩ ka taa .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself , and they enter in and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first . Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation .
text2: Pəlɛ tɔ ɩ puki kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ caa alɔɣaa lɛlaa mpa pa kəla ɩnəɣɩ ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɣɔ tɔm naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa , na pá kɔɔ na pá caɣa təyaɣa ŋkɛ ka taa . Ɩlɛna lɔŋ nyəntʋ náá məlɩ na tə ́ lá sana na nɔɔnɔɔ nyəntʋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ na kʋfalaŋ yəlaa asaɣaa panɛ .

text: While he yet talked to the people , behold , his mother and his brethren stood without , desiring to speak with him .
text2: Yesu tɔŋna samaa kɛ yɔɣɔtənaʋ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛ ɩ too na ɩ newaa apalaa nyə ́ ma pa talaa kɛlɛ , na pá səŋa awalɩ na pá caa pa yɔɣɔtəna - ɩ .

text: Then one said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to speak with thee .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ nɔɣɔlʋ tɛləsa Yesu sɩ : Nyá too na nyá newaa pa səŋna ntɛɣɛ awalɩ na pá caa pa yɔɣɔtəna - ŋ .

text: But he answered and said unto him that told him , Who is my mother ? and who are my brethren ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu nɔɣɔ təkpaʋ sɩ : Aweɣe ma too , na mpaɣa ma newaa ye ?

text: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu hʋ ́ lɩ ́ ɩ ɩfalaa kɛ niŋ na ɩ tɔ sɩ : Ɩɩ naa ma too na ma newaa ntɔ .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven , the same is my brother , and sister , and mother .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mpa pa lakɩ mpi ma Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩ caakɩ tɔ , mpɛɣɛlɛ ma newaa na ma toonaa .

text: The same day went Jesus out of the house , and sat by the sea side .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋyakʋ ŋkʋ Yesu kʋla təyaɣa na ɩ ́ polo lʋm nɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ caɣa na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ .

text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him , so that he went into a ship , and sat ; and the whole multitude stood on the shore .
text2: Tənaɣa yəlaa kota ɩ kiŋ kɛ sɔsɔm pə fɛɩ kɛɛsʋɣʋ . Haləna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ kpa kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa na ɩ ́ caɣa . Na yəlaa náá səŋa lʋm nɔɣɔ .

text: And he spake many things unto them in parables , saying , Behold , a sower went forth to sow ;
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ la - wɛɣɛ faaci kɛ teu na ɩ ́ sɛɛkɩ - wɛɣɛ ɩsɔnaa sɩ pá cɛkəna . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tuulu poləna tuutu .

text: And when he sowed , some seeds fell by the way side , and the fowls came and devoured them up :
text2: Ɩ tuukaɣa ɩ mətutuuna ɩlɛna , lɛnna hoti mpaaʋ nɔɣɔ nɔɣɔ na sumasɩ tii na sɩ tɔɔsɩ - yɛ .

text: Some fell upon stony places , where they had not much earth : and forthwith they sprung up , because they had no deepness of earth :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ lɛnna hota kʋwaʋ tɔɔ timpi tɛtʋ ta lim tɔ . Ɩlɛna a təŋna nyɔʋ kɛ tɛtʋ wɛ tətaɣasam tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: And when the sun was up , they were scorched ; and because they had no root , they withered away .
text2: Ilim kɔma na pə ́ haŋ na pə ́ nyaɣa məhoo , ɩlɛna a wʋlɩ , kɛ a ta hiki tɛtʋ sɩ a ka hoosi kʋpaŋsɩ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprung up , and choked them :
text2: Pee lɛnna náá hoti sɔwa taa na alɛ a nyɔ ɩsɩɩ a ka kʋlɩ teu , ɩlɛna sɔwa fɛtɛ - yɛ na a kpisi lʋlʋɣʋ .

text: But other fell into good ground , and brought forth fruit , some an hundredfold , some sixtyfold , some thirtyfold .
text2: Ama pee lɛnna ná hota tɛtʋ mʋsʋŋ nyəntʋ taa na alɛ á lá teu , lɛnna náá lʋlɩ sɔsɔm sɔsɔm , lɛnna kɛ maɣana , lɛnna kɛ pəcɔ .

text: Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Yesu tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ cuɣusi sɩ : Ye ɩ ́ kɛ ́ tɔm nɩɩlaa ɩ ́ nɩɩ .

text: And the disciples came , and said unto him , Why speakest thou unto them in parables ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu ɩfalaa pola ɩ kiŋ na pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ n tukiɣi - wɛɣɛ atuwa kɛ kʋtuku ?

text: He answered and said unto them , Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven , but to them it is not given .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Mɛ pə ha - mɛɣɛ sɩ ɩ ́ nyɩ ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa tɔm kʋŋmɛsətʋ . Ama pə kaasa lɛlaa tɔ , pɛlɛ pa ta hiki tə nyəm .

text: For whosoever hath , to him shall be given , and he shall have more abundance : but whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken away even that he hath .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , wei ɩ wɛna tɔ paa sɔɔsɩ - ɩ na pə ́ tɔləna - ɩ təhɔ . Ama wei ɩ fɛɩna tɔ paa lɛɛkɩ pəciimaɣa wei ɩ wɛna tɔ .

text: Therefore speak I to them in parables : because they seeing see not ; and hearing they hear not , neither do they understand .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma tukiɣi - wɛɣɛ atuwa kɛ kʋtuku . Mpi tɔ , pa nyənəɣɩ paa naa , pa keŋ ŋkpaŋŋ pəyele paa nɩɩkɩ , paa cɛkəɣəna .

text: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias , which saith , By hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and shall not perceive :
text2: Tə maɣamaɣa kɛ Ɩsayii ka ná lɔŋ na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ : Ɩ ́ ka nɩɩ teu yaa , ama ɩ ́ kaa cɛkəna . Ɩ ́ ká nyənɩ teu yaa , ama ɩ ́ kaa na .

text: For this people ' s heart is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes they have closed ; lest at any time they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and should understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , yəlaa panɛ pa ləmaɣasɛɛ səpa . Pa təka pa ŋkpaŋŋ , pa wiisa pa ɩsɛ sɩ pa ɩsɛ ɩ ́ taa na , pa ŋkpaŋŋ ɩ ́ taa nɩɩ . Sɩ pá taa cɛkəna pə yaasi . Pə ́ taa kɔɔ pá pəsəna ma tɔɔ . Na má lá na pə ́ waa - wɛ . Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔtəna mpʋ yoo .

text: But blessed are your eyes , for they see : and your ears , for they hear .
text2: Ye mɛ ɩlɛ , mə nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mə ɩsɛ naakɩ na mə ŋkpaŋŋ nɩɩkɩ .

text: For verily I say unto you , That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ tampana təfoo sɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa paɣalɛ na Ɩsɔ yəlaa taa paɣalɛ nyɩɩla teu sɩ pá ná mpi ɩ ́ naakɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , pa ta na . Pa nyɩɩlaa sɩ pá nɩɩ nti ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , pa ta nɩɩ .

text: Hear ye therefore the parable of the sower .
text2: Tɔʋ , pənɛntɛ ɩ ́ yele na má kilisi - mɛɣɛ ɩsɔ wei ma sɛɛ - mɛɣɛ mpʋ tɔ ɩ hʋwɛɛ ɩlɛ .

text: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom , and understandeth it not , then cometh the wicked one , and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart . This is he which received seed by the way side .
text2: Mpa pa nɩɩkɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm na pá ta cɛkəna - tɩ tɔ pa wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ mpaaʋ kpeeŋa tɛtʋ nti tə tɔɔ mətutuuna hotaa tɔ . Ɩsaɣatʋ tʋ təŋəɣɩ kpakpaa kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ ləsɩ tɔm nti pa nɩɩ mpʋ tɔɣɔ pa taa .

text: But he that received the seed into stony places , the same is he that heareth the word , and anon with joy receiveth it ;
text2: Lɛlaa ná wɛ ɩsɩɩ kʋwaʋ tɔɔ timpi pee lɛnna hotaa tɔ . Pɛlɛɣɛlɛ mpa pa nɩɩkɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm na pá mʋ - təɣɩ kpakpaa na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ .

text: Yet hath he not root in himself , but dureth for a while : for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word , by and by he is offended .
text2: Paa yeki sɩ tə ́ sʋʋna - wɛɣɛ teu . Pa tɔkəɣɩ - təɣɩ tətantaa . Saa wei wahala nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ká tala , yaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm tɔɔ kʋnyɔŋ tʋɣʋ ka kɔɔ , ɩlɛna pá lɩɩ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ taa kɛ ́ kpakpaa .

text: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word ; and the care of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , choke the word , and he becometh unfruitful .
text2: Lɛlaa ná nəɣəsəna wena a hota sɔwa taa tɔ . Mpi tɔ , pa tɛŋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm nɩɩʋ ɩlɛna atɛ cənɛ kʋlapʋtʋ nəɣəsɛɛ na wɛnaʋ kʋnyɩɩlʋɣʋ puɣusi - wɛ na pə ́ kʋ tɔm ntəɣɩ pa taa , na tə ́ caŋ tə ́ kpisi lʋlʋɣʋ .

text: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word , and understandeth it ; which also beareth fruit , and bringeth forth , some an hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty .
text2: Pə kaasa pee lɛnna ná hota tɛtʋ mʋsʋŋ nyəntʋ taa . Aŋhaa , alɛ a wɛnna ntɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ yəlaa mpa pa nɩɩkɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm na pá cɛkəna - təɣɩ teu na pá lʋləɣɩ pee tɔ . Lɛlaa kɛ sɔsɔm sɔsɔm , lɛlaa kɛ maɣana , na lɛlaa kɛ pəcɔ .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ tɔtɔ sɩ : Ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa nəɣəsəna ɩsəna tɔɣɔlɔ . Apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ tuuna ɩ haləm na ɩ ́ tɛɛ .

text: But while men slept , his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat , and went his way .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kolontu kɛɛsa ahoo hɛka kɛ waatʋ wei yəlaa təna tookaɣa tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tuu nyɩɩtʋ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ kʋtɔɣɔʋ hɛkʋ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ .

text: But when the blade was sprung up , and brought forth fruit , then appeared the tares also .
text2: Pə kɔma na kʋtɔɣɔʋ kʋlɩ na kʋ pɩɩ , ɩlɛna pá tuti nyɩɩtʋ ɩsaɣatʋ təlɛ tɔtɔ .

text: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him , Sir , didst not thou sow good seed in thy field ? from whence then hath it tares ?
text2: Tənaɣa taalɛ ńtɛ ́ tə tʋ pəyalaa pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa pə taɣa kʋtɔɣɔʋ kɛ n ka tuu nyá taalɛ taa ? Pə lapa ɩsəna na nyɩɩtʋ ɩsaɣatʋ siti pə hɛkʋ taa ?

text: He said unto them , An enemy hath done this . The servants said unto him , Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up ?
text2: Tənaɣa pa caa cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma kolontu nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ lapəna mpʋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ pəyalaa mpɛ pa pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Tə ́ polo na tə ́ kpɛsɩ nyɩɩtʋ ɩsaɣatʋ ntɩ ?

text: But he said , Nay ; lest while ye gather up the tares , ye root up also the wheat with them .
text2: Ɩlɛna apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Aaɩ , ɩ ́ taa kpɛsɩ . Ye ɩ ́ tɔma sɩ ɩ ́ kpɛsəɣɩ - tɩ , ntanyɩ pɩɩ kpɛŋna kʋtɔɣɔʋ na pə ́ kpɛsɩ .

text: Let both grow together until the harvest : and in the time of harvest I will say to the reapers , Gather ye together first the tares , and bind them in bundles to burn them : but gather the wheat into my barn .
text2: Ɩ ́ yele na pə təna pə ́ kpɛntɩ pɩɩʋ kɛ mpʋ , haləna pə tala kʋm . Pə ́ tala kʋm ɩlɛ maa heeli kʋntaa sɩ pá caaləna nyɩɩtʋ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ sɛtʋɣʋ na pá hɔkɔ - tɩ təcapɩ təcapɩ , na pá tʋ kɔkɔ . Ɩlɛna pə ́ cɔ ́ paa kpaɣa kʋtɔɣɔʋ na pá tʋ ma kpou taa .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is like to a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and sowed in his field :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ kɛɛsʋɣʋ sɩ : Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ tuukuɣu sɔɔɣa pile kɛ ɩ haləm taa tɔ .

text: Which indeed is the least of all seeds : but when it is grown , it is the greatest among herbs , and becometh a tree , so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof .
text2: Wontu pee təna taa ńtɛ ́ tə kələna wɛɛʋ təminimini . Ama tə tɛŋ nyɔʋ tɔ tə pɩɩkɩ tʋɣʋ kɛ ́ na tə ́ kəlɩ tuusi lɛnsɩ . Haləna sumasɩ kɔŋ na sɩ ́ tʋɣɩ tana kɛ kʋ piliŋasɩ tɔɔ .

text: Another parable spake he unto them ; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven , which a woman took , and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ heeluɣu sɩ : Ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa nəɣəsəna kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ alʋ maɣasʋɣʋ mʋlʋm kɛ cɛmsɛ təpam , na ɩ ́ kpaɣa kʋkʋsʋm kɛ pəcɔ na ɩ ́ tʋ na ɩ ́ huɣuti , na pə təna pə ́ kpa təfʋʋ tɔɣɔ .

text: All these things spake Jesus unto the multitude in parables ; and without a parable spake he not unto them :
text2: Tɔmnaa panɛ , Yesu yɔɣɔtaɣa - wɛɣɛ samaa taa tɔ na atuwa kɛ ́ . Ɩ ta sɛɣɛsɩ - wɛɣɛ natələɣɩ yem na ɩ ́ ta kɛɛsəna pʋlʋ .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying , I will open my mouth in parables ; I will utter things which have been kept secret from the foundation of the world .
text2: Ɩ lakaɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pə ́ la nti Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ ka yɔɣɔtaa tɔ sɩ : Atuwa kɛ maa yɔɣɔtəna - wɛ . Maa heeli - wɛɣɛ tɔmnaa mpa paa wɛ ɩŋmɛsaʋ kɛ hatoo antulinya lapʋ waatʋ tɔ .

text: Then Jesus sent the multitude away , and went into the house : and his disciples came unto him , saying , Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu yela samaa na ɩnɩ ɩ ́ polo təyaɣa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa polo ɩ kiŋ na pá tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Kilisi - tʋɣʋ haləm taa nyɩɩtʋ ɩsaɣatʋ ntɩ tə tɔm na tə ́ nɩɩ .

text: He answered and said unto them , He that soweth the good seed is the Son of man ;
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Kʋtɔɣɔʋ tuulu ntɛ ́ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa ma .

text: The field is the world ; the good seed are the children of the kingdom ; but the tares are the children of the wicked one ;
text2: Na antulinya ɩnɛɣɛlɛ taalɛ ńtɛ ́ . Na mpi pa tuuwa tɔɣɔlɛ mpa pa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa nyə ́ ma tɔ . Nyɩɩtʋ ɩsaɣatʋ ntɛ ́ mpa pa kɛ ́ Ɩsaɣatʋ tʋ nyə ́ ma tɔ .

text: The enemy that sowed them is the devil ; the harvest is the end of the world ; and the reapers are the angels .
text2: Kolontu wei ɩ tuu nyɩɩtʋ ntɩ tɔɣɔlɛ Ɩlɔɣɔʋ . Na kʋmtʋ waatʋ kɛlɛ antulinya tɛm . Ɩsɔtaa tillaa ntɛ ́ kʋntaa .

text: As therefore the tares are gathered and burned in the fire ; so shall it be in the end of this world .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ pa tɔɔsʋɣʋ nyɩɩtʋ na pá tʋ kɔkɔ tɔ , ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɩɩ la antulinya tɛm waatʋ .

text: The Son of man shall send forth his angels , and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend , and them which do iniquity ;
text2: Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má maa tili ma ɩsɔtaa tillaa , na paa ləsɩ ma Kawulaɣa taa kɛ ́ mpa pa tusiɣi lɛlaa kɛ ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ taa na mpɛ pa maɣamaɣa pa lakɩ mpi pə fɛɩ teu tɔ .

text: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Na pá tʋ - wɛɣɛ kɔkɔ sɔsɔɔŋka taa timpi paa casəɣɩ kapusi na pá nyasəɣɩ pa təɣɩ kela tɔ .

text: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father . Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Na saa ɩnɩ mpa pa nɩɩkəna Ɩsɔ tɔ , pɛlɛ paa tee kɔkɔ kɛ pa Caa Kawulaɣa taa ɩsɩɩ ilim . Ye ɩ ́ kɛ ́ nɩɩlaa ɩ ́ nɩɩ .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field ; the which when a man hath found , he hideth , and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath , and buyeth that field .
text2: Ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ pa ŋmɛsʋɣʋʋ liɣitihutaɣa pʋlʋɣʋ tɛtʋ tɛɛ , na nɔɣɔlʋ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ hii - wɩ , na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ - wəɣɩ ŋmɛsʋɣʋ kɛ teu . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɛɛna laŋhʋlʋmlɛ na ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ pɛɛtɩ pə təna mpi ɩ wɛna tɔ na ɩ ́ kɔɔ ɩ ́ yana tɛtʋ ntɩ tɔ .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man , seeking goodly pearls :
text2: Ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ paɣatʋlʋ wei ɩ pɛɛkəɣɩ lɩɩtʋ kʋpantʋ tɔ .

text: Who , when he had found one pearl of great price , went and sold all that he had , and bought it .
text2: Waatʋ wei ɩ suliɣina nakʋlɩ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɛɛtɩ pə təna mpi ɩ wɛna tɔ na ɩ ́ yana - kʋ .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net , that was cast into the sea , and gathered of every kind :
text2: Ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ pa pɛtʋɣʋ tiina puluɣu kɛ lɩɩlɛ taa na pə ́ kpa tiina kɛ yem yem tɔ .

text: Which , when it was full , they drew to shore , and sat down , and gathered the good into vessels , but cast the bad away .
text2: Puluɣu suɣi ɩlɛna tiina kpalaa hɔ - kʋ na pá lɩɩna kpeeŋa , na pá caɣa na pá tɔɔsɩ mpi mpi pə wɛ teu tɔ na pá tʋ tɔkʋ taa . Pə kaasəɣɩ mpi pə fɛɩ teu tɔ , ɩlɛna pá mələna na pá pɛtɩ lʋm taa .

text: So shall it be at the end of the world : the angels shall come forth , and sever the wicked from among the just ,
text2: Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ pɩɩ la antulinya tɛm wule . Ɩsɔtaa tillaa ka kɔɔ na pá tɔɔsɩ kʋpama .

text: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Pə kaasəɣɩ asaɣaa ɩlɛna pá tʋ kɔkɔ sɔsɔɔŋka taa . Tənaɣa paa casəɣɩ kapusi na pá nyasəɣɩ pa təɣɩ kela .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Have ye understood all these things ? They say unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ cɛkəna tɔm ntɩ tə təna na ? Ɩlɛna pɛlɛ pa cɔ sɩ : Ɛɛ , tə cɛkənaa .

text: Then said he unto them , Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ye Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ pəsa ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa taa ɩfalʋ , ɩ wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ təyaɣa tʋ kʋpaŋ wei ɩ ləsəɣɩ ɩ wontu təsɩɩlɛ kɛ kʋfatʋ na nti tə taaŋaa tɔɣɔ waatʋ waatʋ tɔɣɔ .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these parables , he departed thence .
text2: Yesu tɛma - wɛɣɛ ɩsɔnaa panɛɣɛ sɛɛʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ təna

text: And when he was come into his own country , he taught them in their synagogue , insomuch that they were astonished , and said , Whence hath this man this wisdom , and these mighty works ?
text2: na ɩ ́ polo ɩcatɛ nte tə taa ɩ ka pɩɩwa tɔ , na ɩ ́ sʋʋ təna Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile taa na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ . Tənaɣa ɩ nyəm lapa mpa paa wɛ təna tɔɣɔ piti , na pá tɔŋ sɩ : Leɣe ɩnɛ ɩ hika nyəm pənɛ ɩnɩ pə taka ? Leɣe ɩ hikina piti təma lapʋ toma ?

text: Is not this the carpenter ' s son ? is not his mother called Mary ? and his brethren , James , and Joses , and Simon , and Judas ?
text2: Pə taɣa kaafənta pəyalʋ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ taa ? Pə taɣa Malɩ lʋləna - ɩ ? Pə taɣa ɩ newaa ntɛ ́ Saakɩ na Yosɛɛfʋ na Simɔŋ na Yuti ?

text: And his sisters , are they not all with us ? Whence then hath this man all these things ?
text2: Pəyele ta na ɩ newaa alaa nyə ́ ma tə wɛnna . Leɣe ɩ hikina toma anɛ ɩnɩ ?

text: And they were offended in him . But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , save in his own country , and in his own house .
text2: Pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə lapa pa laŋa kɛ kpɩɩsəŋ , na pá kpisi Yesu tɔm mʋɣʋ . Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ ta laŋ sam kɛ tiili ye pə taɣa ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ɩcatɛ taa , na ɩ təyaɣa nyə ́ ma hɛkʋ .

text: And he did not many mighty works there because of their unbelief .
text2: Yesu tá pəsɩ na ɩ ́ lá piti təma kɛ mawaa nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ tənaɣa pa ta tʋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ naani tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus ,
text2: Waatʋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa kɛ ́ Kalilee kʋfənɛɛ Helɔtɩ nɩɩ Yesu taŋ .

text: And said unto his servants , This is John the Baptist ; he is risen from the dead ; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ ɩ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma kiŋ sɩ : Lʋm Sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ taɣanna fem . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ piti təma .

text: For Herod had laid hold on John , and bound him , and put him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife .
text2: Kʋpam Helɔtɩ ɩnɩ ɩ ka tɔmna sɩ pá kpa Yohaanɩ na pá hɔkɔ - ɩ na pá tʋ - ɩ saləka taa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Helɔtɩ lapa mpʋ , ɩ ka kpaɣa ɩ taalʋ Filipʋ alʋ Helɔtiyatɩ kɛ ́ ,

text: For John said unto him , It is not lawful for thee to have her .
text2: na Yohaanɩ yɔɣɔtɩ - ɩ sɩ : Pə ta mʋna sɩ ń la Helɔtiyatɩ kɛ alʋ .

text: And when he would have put him to death , he feared the multitude , because they counted him as a prophet .
text2: Tənaɣa Helɔtɩ nyɩɩlaa sɩ ɩ kʋɣɩ Yohaanɩ . Ama ɩ nyaŋaɣana Yuta nyə ́ ma . Mpi tɔ , pɛlɛ pa maɣamaɣa pa nyənaɣa - ɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ kɛ ́ .

text: But when Herod ' s birthday was kept , the daughter of Herodias danced before them , and pleased Herod .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Helɔtɩ lʋlʋɣʋ acima wule Helɔtiyatɩ pɛɛlɔ polaa na ɩ ́ paakɩ mpa pa yaa tɔɣɔʋ tɔ pa ɩsɛntaa . Tənaɣa pə lapa Helɔtɩ kɛ leleŋ .

text: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask .
text2: Haləna ɩ ́ yɔtɔtɩ na ɩ ́ tuu sɩ : Paa mpiɣi n sələma - m maa ha - ŋ - wɩ .

text: And she , being before instructed of her mother , said , Give me here John Baptist ' s head in a charger .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ too sɛɣɛsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Polo sɩ ɩ ́ ha - ŋ Lʋm Sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ nyʋɣʋ kɛ nyənaɣa taa .

text: And the king was sorry : nevertheless for the oath ' s sake , and them which sat with him at meat , he commanded it to be given her .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ wulaʋ laŋlɛ wakəlaa . Ama ɩsɩɩ ɩ ka tɛma tuunaʋ kɛ ɩ mʋʋlaa ɩsɛntaa ɩlɛ , pə fɛɩ sɩ ɩ ká kisi .

text: And he sent , and beheaded John in the prison .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ kʋsa yʋlʋ na ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ sɛtɩ Lʋm Sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ nyʋɣʋ kɛ saləka taa .

text: And his head was brought in a charger , and given to the damsel : and she brought it to her mother .
text2: Na pá tʋ - kʋɣʋ nyənaɣa taa na pá cɛla pɛɛliya ŋkɛ , na ká polo ká cɛla ka too .

text: And his disciples came , and took up the body , and buried it , and went and told Jesus .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yohaanɩ ɩfalaa kɔma na pá kpaɣa - ɩ na pá polo pa pi . Ɩlɛna pá polo pá kɛɛsɩ Yesu kɛ ́ ɩsəna pə lapa tɔ .

text: When Jesus heard of it , he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart : and when the people had heard thereof , they followed him on foot out of the cities .
text2: Yesu nɩɩ tɔm tənɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sʋʋ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ ɩ tike kɛ kpeeŋa . Samaa nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá lɩɩna acalɛɛ taa na pá maləɣɩ lʋm na pá təŋəɣɩ Yesu waalɩ .

text: And Jesus went forth , and saw a great multitude , and was moved with compassion toward them , and he healed their sick .
text2: Yesu lɩɩna kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa na ɩ ́ ná yəlaa kɛ sɔsɔm kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pa tɔm lapɩ - ɩ pətɔɔtəlɛ na ɩ ́ waa pa kʋtɔntʋnaa .

text: And when it was evening , his disciples came to him , saying , This is a desert place , and the time is now past ; send the multitude away , that they may go into the villages , and buy themselves victuals .
text2: Pə kɔma taanaɣa , ɩlɛna Yesu ɩfalaa polo na pá tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Cənɛ kɛ ́ nyɩɩtʋ taa kɛ ́ na ilim tɛma . Tɔɣɔnɩ yəlaa panɛ na pá polo acalɛɛ taa na pá ya kʋtɔɣɔʋ na pá tɔɣɔ .

text: But Jesus said unto them , They need not depart ; give ye them to eat .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔwa ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Yəlaa ɩ ́ taa nɔkɩ tɛɛʋ , mɩɩ hana - wɛɣɛ tɔɣɔnaɣa kɛ mə maɣamaɣa .

text: And they say unto him , We have here but five loaves , and two fishes .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu ɩfalaa cɔwa sɩ : Ntɔŋ potopotonaa kakpasɩ na tiina naalɛɣɛ tə wɛna yaa .

text: He said , Bring them hither to me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma ɩfalaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ kɔna potopotonaa kakpasɩ na tiina naalɛ ɩnɩ .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the grass , and took the five loaves , and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed , and brake , and gave the loaves to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu heeli yəlaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ caɣa atɛɣɛ nyɩɩtʋ tɔɔ . Tənaɣa ɩ kpaɣa potopotonaa kakpasɩ na tiina naalɛ ɩnɩ , na ɩ ́ teki ɩsɛ na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ faɣa - wɛ na ɩ ́ cɛla ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ pá tala samaa ɩnɩ .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa təna pa tɔɣaa na pá haɣa na pə ́ kpisi hɔɣɔlasɩ , haləna ɩ ɩfalaa koti - sɩ na sɩ su tɔkʋŋ naanʋwa na naalɛ .

text: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Pəyele mpa pa tɔɣɔ mpʋ tɔ pa nyɔɔŋ tala ɩsɩɩ iyisi kakpasɩ . Alaa na piya pa paasi .

text: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship , and to go before him unto the other side , while he sent the multitudes away .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma ɩ ɩfalaa kɛ pə waalɩ kɛ ́ kpakpaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ sʋʋ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ - m nɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ tɛsɩ kʋteŋ lɛŋkʋ . Ɩlɛna ɩnɩ ɩ ́ saalɩ təna na ɩ ́ paasəna samaa yasʋɣʋ .

text: And when he had sent the multitudes away , he went up into a mountain apart to pray : and when the evening was come , he was there alone .
text2: Yesu tɛma samaa kɛ yasʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpa pʋɣʋ nakʋlɩ kʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ tike sɩ ɩ sələməɣɩ , haləna ahoo caŋ na a yu - ɩ tənaɣa ɩ tike .

text: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea , tossed with waves : for the wind was contrary .
text2: Saa ɩnəɣɩ mpʋ tɔ na kpɩɩlʋɣʋ náá tɛma pote kɛ pooluŋ kɛ lʋm hɛkʋ taa na lʋm hola taŋ - kʋ . Mpi tɔ , heelim makɩ tuluŋa kɛ ́ na pə ́ mələɣəna - wɛ na waalɩ waalɩ .

text: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them , walking on the sea .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma lʋm tɔɔ na ɩ ́ puki ɩ ɩfalaa kiŋ . Waatʋ ɩnɩ tɔ pə wʋsəna kampaaŋ koou kɛ mpʋ .

text: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea , they were troubled , saying , It is a spirit ; and they cried out for fear .
text2: Pa ná ɩ tɔŋ lʋm tɔɔ , ɩlɛna sɔɣɔntʋ kpa - wɛɣɛ sɔsɔm sɩ asənaalɩɩ kɛ ́ , na pá sʋʋ kapusi mapʋ .

text: But straightway Jesus spake unto them , saying , Be of good cheer ; it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Ama ɩ tɔma - wɛɣɛ kpakpaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ tɔkɩ tɔnəŋ , maɣa , ɩ ́ taa nyá .

text: And Peter answered him and said , Lord , if it be thou , bid me come unto thee on the water .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ tɔma Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , ye nyaɣa tampana , tɔ sɩ má tɔ lʋm tɔɔ na má kɔɔ nyá kiŋ .

text: And he said , Come . And when Peter was come down out of the ship , he walked on the water , to go to Jesus .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Ɛɛ , kɔɔ . Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ lɩɩ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa na ɩ ́ sʋʋ lʋm tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɔntɛ na ɩ ́ puki Yesu kiŋ .

text: But when he saw the wind boisterous , he was afraid ; and beginning to sink , he cried , saying , Lord , save me .
text2: Ama Piyɛɛ kɔma na ɩ ləmaɣasɛɛ polo heelim kiŋ , ɩlɛna sɔɣɔntʋ kpa - ɩ . Tənaɣa pə sʋʋ - ɩ tisuɣu kɛ lʋm tɛɛ na ɩ ́ kiisi sɩ : Haɩ , Tacaa , ya - m .

text: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand , and caught him , and said unto him , O thou of little faith , wherefore didst thou doubt ?
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu siisi kpakpaa na ɩ ́ kpa ɩ niŋ taa na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ n lapa sika . Ama n ta tɛ nyá taa na Ɩsɔ na pə ́ tɔɔ yoo .

text: And when they were come into the ship , the wind ceased .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa naalɛ pa kpa kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa , ɩlɛna heelim hɛɛ təli .

text: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him , saying , Of a truth thou art the Son of God .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu ɩfalaa mpa paa wɛ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa tɔ pa luŋa akula kɛ ɩ tɛɛ na pá tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tampana n kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa .

text: And when they were gone over , they came into the land of Gennesaret .
text2: Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa tɛɛsa tɛsʋɣʋ kɛ lʋm , ɩlɛna pá tala Kenesalɛtɩ tɛtʋ taa .

text: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him , they sent out into all that country round about , and brought unto him all that were diseased ;
text2: Təna nyə ́ ma nyəmá sɩ Yesu , ɩlɛna pá heeli na pə tɛləsɩ təmaɣa pa tɛtʋ təna taa sɩ Yesu kɔma . Ɩlɛna pá kɔna - ɩ kʋtɔntʋnaa mpɛ pa təna .

text: And besought him that they might only touch the hem of his garment : and as many as touched were made perfectly whole .
text2: Na pa wiikaɣana - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ yele na pá tokina ɩ kpaɩ ntʋmpee maɣamaɣa . Na pa təna mpa pa tokina ɩ kpaɩ ɩnɩ tɔ pə waa - wɛ .

text: Then came to Jesus scribes and Pharisees , which were of Jerusalem , saying ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa lɩɩna Yosalɛm na pá kɔɔ pá maɣana Yesu , na pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ :

text: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders ? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread .
text2: Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ nyá ɩfalaa naa təŋəɣɩ ɩsəna ta caanaa sɩɩwa sɩ pá lakɩ tɔ ? Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , paa saŋəɣɩ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ sɛɛtʋ taa pə wɛɛ sɩ yʋlʋ ká la na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ tɔ .

text: But he answered and said unto them , Why do ye also transgress the commandment of God by your tradition ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ná pɔɔsa - wɛ tɔtɔ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ mɛ mə yeki Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ kɛ təŋʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ mə maɣamaɣa mə kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ ?

text: For God commanded , saying , Honour thy father and mother : and , He that curseth father or mother , let him die the death .
text2: Ɩsɔ ka yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Se nyá caa na nyá too , na tɔtɔ sɩ : Ye wei ɩ tʋʋ ɩ caa yaa ɩ too , ɩsɩɩ pa kʋ - ɩ .

text: But ye say , Whosoever shall say to his father or his mother , It is a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ;
text2: Ama mɛ mə sɛɣɛsəɣɩ sɩ yʋlʋ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ heeli ɩ caa yaa ɩ too sɩ : Mpi ma ləsa ma wɛnaʋ taa na má tena - mɛ tɔ pə pəsa kʋhaham mpi pə kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ nyəm tɔ .

text: And honour not his father or his mother , he shall be free . Thus have ye made the commandment of God of none effect by your tradition .
text2: Saa ɩnɩ pə fɛɩ sɩ ɩ teŋ ɩ caa tɔtɔ . Ɩ ́ tá ná timpi ɩ ́ wakələɣɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ mə maɣamaɣa mə kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ tɔ .

text: Ye hypocrites , well did Esaias prophesy of you , saying ,
text2: Cɛsəlaa mɛ , Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Ɩsayii ka nawa mə tɔm kɛ ́ təkelekele na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ ŋmaa - təɣɩ ɩ takəlaɣa taa sɩ :

text: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth , and honoureth me with their lips ; but their heart is far from me .
text2: Nɔɣɔ taa kɛ ́ yəlaa panɛ pa saŋɩ - m yem . Paa caa - m paa pəcɔɣɔ hatoo pa taa . Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔtəna mpʋ .

text: But in vain they do worship me , teaching for doctrines the commandments of men .
text2: Pa sɛɛkɩ - m yem kɛ ́ . Pa kpaɣa yəlaa kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ na pá sɛɣɛsəɣɩ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ nyəntʋ .

text: And he called the multitude , and said unto them , Hear , and understand :
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ Yesu yaa samaa na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ nɩɩ tɔm tənɛ na ɩ ́ nyɩ sɩ

text: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man ; but that which cometh out of the mouth , this defileth a man .
text2: mpi pə sʋʋkɩ yʋlʋ nɔɣɔ taa tɔ pɩɩ lakɩ - ɩ ɩsaɣaʋ . Ama mpi pə lɩɩkəna yʋlʋ nɔɣɔ tɔ mpɩ pə lakəna - ɩ ɩsaɣaʋ .

text: Then came his disciples , and said unto him , Knowest thou that the Pharisees were offended , after they heard this saying ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ɩfalaa pola ɩ kiŋ na pá tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ntɔŋ n yɔɣɔta mpʋ tɔ n nawa sɩ pə ta la teu kɛ Falisanaa ?

text: But he answered and said , Every plant , which my heavenly Father hath not planted , shall be rooted up .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ ye ɩ ta sɔ tʋɣʋ ŋku , paa kpɛsɩ - kʋɣʋ na pá pɛtɩ .

text: Let them alone : they be blind leaders of the blind . And if the blind lead the blind , both shall fall into the ditch .
text2: Ɩ ́ yele pɛlɛ , pa kɛ ́ mpa pa hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ lɛlaa kɛ mpaaʋ na pə ́ cɔ ́ mpɛ pa maɣamaɣa pa ɩsɛ ɩɩ naa tɔɣɔ . Ye yʋlʋm hɔŋ yʋlʋm lɛlʋ , pa təna paa kpɛntɩ na pá hoti pʋ ́ ʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ taa kɛ ́ .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Declare unto us this parable .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ tɔma Yesu sɩ : Kilisi - tʋɣʋ ɩtuule tənɛ tə hʋwɛɛ .

text: And Jesus said , Are ye also yet without understanding ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma sɩ : Pə kpɛŋna - mɛ mə ta cɛkəna - təɣəlɛ ?

text: Do not ye yet understand , that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly , and is cast out into the draught ?
text2: Ɩ ́ ta nyɩ sɩ pə təna mpi pə sʋʋkɩ yʋlʋ nɔɣɔ taa tɔ , pə tiiki ɩ hiluɣu taa na pə tɛ tɔ pə lɩɩkəna ɩ tapʋɣʋ ?

text: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart ; and they defile the man .
text2: Ama mpi yʋlʋ nɔɣɔ ná yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔ hatoo ɩ lotu taa kɛ ́ pə lɩɩkəna , na mpʋ pə lakəna yʋlʋ kɛ ɩsaɣaʋ .

text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts , murders , adulteries , fornications , thefts , false witness , blasphemies :
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , yʋlʋ lotu taa kɛ ́ ɩsaɣatʋ hʋwɛɛ caaləɣɩ na a pukina - ɩ yʋlʋkʋlɛ na wasaŋkalətʋ na asilima lapʋ taa , na ŋmɩɩləm na kaloolaɣa na yəlaa caɣanaʋ taa .

text: These are the things which defile a man : but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man .
text2: Mpi pə lakɩ yʋlʋ kɛ ɩsaɣaʋ tɔɣɔlɛ . Ama sɩ ń tɔɣɔ na ń tá saŋ nyá niŋ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ ká la Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ taa na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ tɔ , pəlɛ pɩɩ lakɩ yʋlʋ kɛ ɩsaɣaʋ .

text: Then Jesus went thence , and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon .
text2: Yesu lɩɩ təna , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo tɛtʋ nti tə wɛ Tiii na Sitɔŋ pə cɔlɔ tɔ tə taa .

text: And , behold , a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts , and cried unto him , saying , Have mercy on me , O Lord , thou Son of David ; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil .
text2: Pə pamna Kanaaŋ alʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛ tɛtʋ ntɩ tə taa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kɔma Yesu kiŋ na ɩ ́ wiina - ɩ na nɔɣɔ sɔsɔɣa sɩ : Tafiiti Pəyalʋ Tacaa , nyənɩ ma pətɔɔtəlɛ . Ma pɛɛlɔ hiina alɔɣaa na pə tɔka - ɩ teu .

text: But he answered her not a word . And his disciples came and besought him , saying , Send her away ; for she crieth after us .
text2: Ama Yesu ta cɔ alʋ ɩnɩ sɩ pʋlʋ . Tənaɣa Yesu ɩfalaa polaa na pá tɔ Yesu sɩ : Tɔɣɔnɩ - ɩ , ɩ kələɣɩ ta ŋkpaŋŋ təkʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ - tʋ .

text: But he answered and said , I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu heela - ɩ sɩ : Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ yəlaa mpa pa lepa ɩsɩɩ heeŋ tɔ pa waalɩ kɛ ́ ma kɔma .

text: Then came she and worshipped him , saying , Lord , help me .
text2: Ama alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ kɔɔ ɩ ́ sopi Yesu tɛɛ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Haɩ , Tacaa , waasɩ - m .

text: But he answered and said , It is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it to dogs .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu náa cɔ alʋ ɩnɩ sɩ : Pə ta mʋna sɩ pá kpaɣa piya tɔɣɔnaɣa na pá tʋ hasɩ .

text: And she said , Truth , Lord : yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters ' table .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔma sɩ : Haɩ , ma cɛ , paa na mpʋ hasɩ təŋəɣɩ na sɩ tɔɔsəɣɩ mpi sɩ nyə ́ ma tɔkɩ na pə ́ pʋtətəɣɩ atɛ tɔ mɛɛ .

text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her , O woman , great is thy faith : be it unto thee even as thou wilt . And her daughter was made whole from that very hour .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Pʋwɛ , alʋ nyá , nyá naani tɔɔwa yoo . Mpi n caa tɔ n ka na - wɩ . Tənaɣa ɩ pəyaɣa hika alaafəya kɛ kpakpaa .

text: And Jesus departed from thence , and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee ; and went up into a mountain , and sat down there .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu kʋla təna na ɩ ́ polo Kalilee teŋku nɔɣɔ , na ɩ ́ kpa pʋɣʋ nakʋlɩ kʋ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ caɣa .

text: And great multitudes came unto him , having with them those that were lame , blind , dumb , maimed , and many others , and cast them down at Jesus ' feet ; and he healed them :
text2: Na yəlaa samaa samaa kɔɔ ɩ kiŋ na pá kpɛŋna kʋtɔntʋnaa kɛ paɣalɛ mpa pa tɔŋ tala tɔ na yʋlʋmaa na acamaa na kamumusi na kʋtɔməŋ lɛləŋ nyə ́ ma tɔtɔ . Pa pona kʋtɔntʋnaa mpɛ na pá sɩɩ - wɛɣɛ Yesu kiŋ , ɩlɛna Yesu la na pá hiki alaafəya .

text: Insomuch that the multitude wondered , when they saw the dumb to speak , the maimed to be whole , the lame to walk , and the blind to see : and they glorified the God of Israel .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa yəlaa kɛ piti kɛ ́ ɩsəna kamumusi sʋʋ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ na acamaa hiki toma na tala tɔntaa náá tɔŋ teu na yʋlʋmaa náá sʋʋ naʋ tɔ . Tənaɣa pa sʋʋ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sam .

text: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him , and said , I have compassion on the multitude , because they continue with me now three days , and have nothing to eat : and I will not send them away fasting , lest they faint in the way .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu yaa ɩ ɩfalaa na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Yəlaa panɛ pa tɔm wɛ - m pətɔɔtəlɛ . Ɩ ́ nyənɩ , kʋyɛɛŋ tooso kɔlɔ pa wɛ ma kiŋ cənɛ na pa kʋtɔɣɔʋ tɛma . Pəyele ma luɣu fɛɩ sɩ má yele na pá kpena nyɔɣɔsɩ , pá taa kɔɔ na pá kpisi tɔnəŋ kɛ mpaaʋ taa .

text: And his disciples say unto him , Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness , as to fill so great a multitude ?
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ ɩfalaa pɔɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Nyɩɩtʋ taa cənɛ , leɣe tɩɩ hiki tɔɣɔnaɣa na tə ́ cɛla samaa ɩnɛ ɩ taka ?

text: And Jesus saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven , and a few little fishes .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Potopotonaa ɩsənaɣa ɩ ́ wɛna ? Ɩlɛna pɛlɛ sɩ : Potopotonaa naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa na tiinisi kɛ pəcɔ .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu heela samaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ caɣa atɛ .

text: And he took the seven loaves and the fishes , and gave thanks , and brake them , and gave to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu kpaɣa potopotonaa naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa ɩnɩ na tiina anɩ , na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ na ɩ ́ cəlɩ , na ɩ ́ cɛla ɩ ɩfalaa na pɛlɛ pá tala samaa .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets full .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa təna pa tɔɣaa na pá haɣa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa koti hɔɣɔlasɩ nsi sɩ kpisaa tɔ na pə su tɔkʋŋ naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa .

text: And they that did eat were four thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Pəyele mpa pa tɔɣaa tɔ pa wɛ yəlaa iyisi liɣiti ( 4000 ) kɛ ́ , alaa na piya pa paasi .

text: And he sent away the multitude , and took ship , and came into the coasts of Magdala ,
text2: Yesu tɛma samaa ɩnəɣɩ yasʋɣʋ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpa kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa na ɩ ́ tɛɛ Makataŋ tɛtʋ taa .

text: The Pharisees also with the Sadducees came , and tempting desired him that he would shew them a sign from heaven .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa na Satusee nyə ́ ma pa kɔma Yesu kiŋ na pá tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : La piti təmlɛ natəlɩ na pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ nyá toŋ lɩɩna Ɩsɔ kiŋ . Pa kuukaɣa Yesu nɔɣɔ kɛ kʋkuu kɛ ́ .

text: He answered and said unto them , When it is evening , ye say , It will be fair weather : for the sky is red .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ilim ɩ ́ kɔma tʋɣʋ na ɩsɔtʋlʋŋasɩ sɛɛwa , ɩ ́ tɔŋ sɩ : Cele ɩsɔtaa ká cɛ tənaŋŋ .

text: And in the morning , It will be foul weather to day : for the sky is red and lowring . O ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky ; but can ye not discern the signs of the times ?
text2: Na ye tanaŋ təhulu kɛ ́ pə sɛɛwa na pə ́ wɛ təsutii , ɩ ́ tɔŋ sɩ Tɛʋ ká kɔɔ saŋa . Mpi tɔ , ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ sɛɛwa na pə ́ wɛ səkpɛtʋɣʋ . Pə lapa ɩsəna na ɩ ́ nyəŋ mpi mpi pə lakɩ ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ taa tɔ , na ɩɩ nyəŋ mpi pə lakɩ kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɛ ɩ taa tɔ .

text: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given unto it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas . And he left them , and departed .
text2: Kʋfalaŋ yəlaa asaɣaa mpa paa tɛŋ Ɩsɔ na pa taa tɔ pa pɛɛkəɣɩ sɩ pá la - wɛɣɛ piti təmlɛ . Ama pa kaa na piti təmlɛ natəlɩ se . Ye pə taɣa Yonaasɩ nyəntɛ . Ɩ yɔɣɔta mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yele - wɛ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ .

text: And when his disciples were come to the other side , they had forgotten to take bread .
text2: Yesu ɩfalaa kɔma na pá tɛsɩ lʋm kʋteŋ lɛŋkʋ tɔɔ , ɩlɛna pá sɔɔ potopotonaa kpaɣaʋ .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na Falisanaa na Satusee nyə ́ ma pa kʋkʋsʋm .

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have taken no bread .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu ɩfalaa sʋʋ təmaɣa tɔm sɩ : Tə ta kpaɣa potopotonaa tɔɣɔ ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ .

text: Which when Jesus perceived , he said unto them , O ye of little faith , why reason ye among yourselves , because ye have brought no bread ?
text2: Yesu nɩɩ nti pa tɔŋna yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ kɛ mpʋ tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ tɔŋ sɩ ɩ ́ fɛɩna potopotonaa tɔ pə tɔɔ ? Ama ɩ ́ ta tɛ Ɩsɔ na mə taa na pə tɔɔ yoo .

text: Do ye not yet understand , neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Haləna saŋa ɩ ́ tá cɛkəna kɛlɛ ? Ɩ ́ tá tɔɔsɩ potopotonaa kakpasɩ wei ma faɣaa na apalʋnyɔɔŋ iyisi kakpasɩ tɔɣɔ tɔ ɩ tɔɔ ? Na tɔkʋŋ ɩsəna pə kpisaa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa tɔ , ɩ ́ sɔɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ nyʋɣʋ na ?

text: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Na ɩ ́ ta tɔɔsɩ tɔtɔɣɔ potopotonaa naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa wei ma faɣaa na apalʋnyɔɔŋ iyisi liɣiti ( 4000 ) tɔɣɔ tɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ tɔɔ ? Na tɔkʋŋ ɩsəna pə kpisaa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa tɔ , ɩ ́ sɔɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ nyʋɣʋ na ?

text: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread , that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees ?
text2: Ɩsənaɣa pə lapa na ɩ ́ ta cɛkəna sɩ pə taɣa potopotonaa tɔm kɛ ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ ? Ɩ ́ taa yele na Falisanaa na Satusee nyə ́ ma kʋkʋsʋm sʋʋ - mɛ .

text: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread , but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnəɣɩ Yesu ɩfalaa cɛkənaa sɩ pə taɣa kʋkʋsʋm maɣamaɣa tɔm kɛ Yesu yɔɣɔtaɣa . Ama Falisanaa na Satusee nyə ́ ma pa kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ kɛ ɩ tɔŋ .

text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi , he asked his disciples , saying , Whom do men say that I the Son of man am ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pola Sesalee Filipʋ tɛtʋ taa kɛ ́ tiili . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Yəlaa tɔŋ sɩ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma kɛ ́ awe ?

text: And they said , Some say that thou art John the Baptist : some , Elias ; and others , Jeremias , or one of the prophets .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɛlɛ sɩ : Pa tɔŋ sɩ n kɛ ́ Lʋm Sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ . Lɛlaa sɩ Ilii kɛ ́ , na lɛlaa sɩ n kɛ ́ Selemii yaa Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa taa nɔɣɔlʋ .

text: He saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Na mɛ se , mə hʋʋkɩ sɩ ma kɛ ́ awe ?

text: And Simon Peter answered and said , Thou art the Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Simɔŋ nɔɣɔ təkpaʋ sɩ : N kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ weesuɣu tʋ Pəyalʋ Mesii .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Blessed art thou , Simon Barjona : for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee , but my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Yohaanɩ pəyaɣa Simɔŋ , n nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ . Mpi tɔ , pə taɣa yʋlʋ cəpəna - ŋ tampana anɛ . Ama ma Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔɣɔ .

text: And I say also unto thee , That thou art Peter , and upon this rock I will build my church ; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it .
text2: Na má , má heeliɣi - ŋ təfoo sɩ nyá hətɛ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ sɩ , Pəlɛ , na pəlɛ nyá nyá tɔɔ kɛ ́ maa sɩɩ ma yəlaa kpekəle . Na səm kaa pəsɩ na pə la - wɛɣɛ pʋlʋ cəcəka .

text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Maa cɛlɛ - ŋ ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa saafʋnaa . Na mpi n kaa ha mpaaʋ kɛ atɛ cənɛ tɔ , pə kaa na mpaaʋ kɛ ɩsɔtaa . Na mpi n ká ha mpaaʋ kɛ atɛ cənɛ tɔ , pɩɩ hiki mpaaʋ kɛ ɩsɔtaa .

text: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu kpaalɩ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ taa heeli nɔɣɔlʋ sɩ ma kɛ ́ Mesii .

text: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples , how that he must go unto Jerusalem , and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be killed , and be raised again the third day .
text2: Pə kpaɣaʋ waatʋ ɩnɩ tɔɣɔ Yesu sʋʋ ɩ ɩfalaa kɛ heeluɣu təfoo sɩ : Pə wɛɛ sɩ má polo Yosalɛm na nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma na kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa pá tʋ - m kʋnyɔŋ kɛ tənaɣa sɔsɔm . Paa kʋ - m , na maa fe pə kʋyɛɛŋ tooso wule .

text: Then Peter took him , and began to rebuke him , saying , Be it far from thee , Lord : this shall not be unto thee .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ yaa Yesu na ɩ ́ lɩɩna kpeeŋa na ɩ ́ təkɩ - ɩ - tɩ , sɩ : Aaɩ Tacaa , Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ taa yele na təlɛ tə ́ kɔɔ .

text: But he turned , and said unto Peter , Get thee behind me , Satan : thou art an offence unto me : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but those that be of men .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pəsaa təkpɛʋ na ɩ ́ tɔ Piyɛɛ sɩ : Satanɩ tɛɛ ma tɔɔ . Ɩsaɣatʋ taa kɛ ́ n caa n tusi - m . Nyá hʋwɛɛ ta kɛ Ɩsɔ nyəna , yəlaa nyəna kɛ ́ .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ , ɩlɛna Yesu pəsəna ɩ ɩfalaa tɔɔ sɩ : Ye wei ɩ caa sɩ ɩ ́ təŋɩ - m pʋntʋ ɩ ́ la ɩ təɣɩ awusa na ɩ ́ səɣəlɩ ɩ səm tesika na ɩ ́ təŋəɣəna - m .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye wei ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ ɩ weesuɣu təcututu ɩ tɛŋna səpʋ . Ama wei ɩ ́ lapa ɩ təɣɩ awusa kɛ ma tɔɔ , pʋntʋ ká hikina weesuɣu .

text: For what is a man profited , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Ye yʋlʋ pəsaa na ɩ ́ hiki antulinya nyəm təna ɩlɛna ɩnɩ ɩ sɩ , ɩ kawaaɣa ntɛ ́ we ? Pʋlʋpʋ wɛɛ mpi yʋlʋ ká kpaɣa na ɩ ́ laɣasəna ɩ weesuɣu tɔ ?

text: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels ; and then he shall reward every man according to his works .
text2: Mpi tɔ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má , maa kpaɣa ma Caa teeli na má na ma ɩsɔtaa tillaa tə kɔɔ na má fɛlɩ paa wei kɛ ́ ɩsəna ɩ kʋlapʋtʋ wɛɛ tɔ .

text: Verily I say unto you , There be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , mpa pa wɛ cənɛ tɔ pa taa lɛlaa ká ná Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má na má kɔŋ ɩsɩɩ wulaʋ sɔsɔ na pə ́ cɔ ́ pá sɩ .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter , James , and John his brother , and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart ,
text2: Kʋyɛɛŋ naatoso tɛɛwa , ɩlɛna Yesu kpaɣa Piyɛɛ na Saakɩ na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ neu Yohaanɩ na pá polo pʋɣʋ kʋkʋlʋɣʋ nakʋlɩ kʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa tike .

text: And was transfigured before them : and his face did shine as the sun , and his raiment was white as the light .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ laɣasa pa ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ kpakpaa , na ɩ ɩsɛntaa tee kɔkɔ .

text: And , behold , there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ɩfalaa tooso ɩnɩ ɩ na Moisi na Ilii , na pá na Yesu pá yɔɣɔtəɣɩ .

text: Then answered Peter , and said unto Jesus , Lord , it is good for us to be here : if thou wilt , let us make here three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ tɔma Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , ɩsɩɩ tə wɛʋ cənɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ pə wɛ teu napələɣɩ te . Ɩlɛ ye n caakɩ maa siki coka tooso . Nyaɣa lɛntɛ , Moisi kɛ lɛntɛ , na Ilii kɛ lɛntɛ .

text: While he yet spake , behold , a bright cloud overshadowed them : and behold a voice out of the cloud , which said , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased ; hear ye him .
text2: Piyɛɛ tɔŋna ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ ɩlɛ ɩsɔŋmʋntʋɣʋ kʋhʋlʋmʋɣʋ laɩlaɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kɔmaɣalɛ na ɩ ́ takɩ - wɛ . Na pá nɩɩ pə yɔɣɔtəɣɩ ŋmʋntʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ tɛɛ sɩ : Ma luɣu tɛɛ Pəyaɣa ŋka ma laŋlɛ hʋlʋməna sɔsɔm tɔɣɔlɔ . Ɩ ́ nɩɩna - kɛ .

text: And when the disciples heard it , they fell on their face , and were sore afraid .
text2: Yesu ɩfalaa nɩɩ tɔm tənɛ , ɩlɛna sɔɣɔntʋ kpa - wɛɣɛ sɔsɔm na pá hoti pa nɔɔsɩ tɔɔ .

text: And Jesus came and touched them , and said , Arise , and be not afraid .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu polaa na ɩ ́ tokina - wɛ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ kʋlɩ , ɩ ́ taa nyá .

text: And when they had lifted up their eyes , they saw no man , save Jesus only .
text2: Tənaɣa pa kʋsa ɩsɛ na pá nyənɩ , ɩlɛna pá maɣana Yesu tike təkoŋ .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , Jesus charged them , saying , Tell the vision to no man , until the Son of man be risen again from the dead .
text2: Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa tiikaɣana pʋɣʋ tɔɔ ɩlɛna Yesu kpaalɩ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ taa heeli nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ mpi ɩ ́ nawa mpʋ tɔ . Haləna kʋyaŋku Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má maa sɩ na má fe tɔ .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ɩfalaa pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa ná tɔŋ sɩ Ilii ká caaləna kɔntɛ ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Elias truly shall first come , and restore all things .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Tampana pə wɛɛ sɩ Ilii ká kɔɔ na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ pə tənaɣa teitei na pə ́ cɔ ́ .

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is come already , and they knew him not , but have done unto him whatsoever they listed . Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them .
text2: Ama ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ Ilii tɛma kɔntɛ . Ama yəlaa ta nyəmɩ - ɩ , ɩlɛna pá lana - ɩ ɩsɩɩ pa sɔɔlaa tɔ . Na mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ paa la Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma maɣamaɣa kɛ nyaŋ .

text: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ ɩfalaa nyəmá kpakpaa sɩ Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ tɔm kɛ ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ .

text: And when they were come to the multitude , there came to him a certain man , kneeling down to him , and saying ,
text2: Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa tala timpi samaa ka kotaa tɔ , ɩlɛna apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ polo ɩ luŋ Yesu tɛɛ ,

text: Lord , have mercy on my son : for he is lunatick , and sore vexed : for ofttimes he falleth into the fire , and oft into the water .
text2: na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Haɩ , Tacaa , nyənɩ ma pəyaɣa pətɔɔtəlɛ . Timle wɛnna - kɛ . Tɔm paɣalɛ pə pɛtəɣɩ - kɛɣɛ kɔkɔsɩ taa na lʋm taa .

text: And I brought him to thy disciples , and they could not cure him .
text2: Ma kɔna - kɛɣɛ nyá ɩfalaa ntɔ , na pá kpisi ka waasʋɣʋ .

text: Then Jesus answered and said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him hither to me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ɩɩ tɛŋ Ɩsɔ na mə taa , pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ kʋtakɛɛsəŋ kɛ ́ . Wɛɛ ɩsənaɣa má na - mɛ tɩɩ caɣa na má tɔkɩ mə kʋnyɔŋ ? Ɩ ́ kɔna - m pəyaɣa ŋkɛɣɛ cənɛ .

text: And Jesus rebuked the devil ; and he departed out of him : and the child was cured from that very hour .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu kaləna ɩlɔɣɔʋ wei ɩ ka wɛ pəyaɣa ŋkɛ ka waalɩ tɔ na toŋ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔnɩ - ɩ . Ɩlɛna pəyaɣa hiki alaafəya kɛ kpakpaa kɛ tənɛ ɩnɩ .

text: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart , and said , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ɩfalaa pɔɔsa - ɩ pa tike sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə ta pəsɩ na tə loo ɩlɔɣɔʋ ɩnɩ ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Because of your unbelief : for verily I say unto you , If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye shall say unto this mountain , Remove hence to yonder place ; and it shall remove ; and nothing shall be impossible unto you .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔwa ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ ta tɛ ́ Ɩsɔ na mə taa na pə tɔɔ tɔɣɔ . Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ . Ye mə taa tɛmnaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ ka tɩɩ tala ɩsɩɩ sɔɔɣa pile kɛ yasəlaɣa , ɩ ́ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ tɔ pulaɣa kanɛ sɩ ká kpɛsɩ na ká laɣasɩ , kaa kpɛsɩ kɛ ́ . Pʋlʋ kaa wɛɛ mpi ɩ ́ ká kpisi tɔ .

text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Ɩlɔɣɔʋ ɩsɩɩ mpʋ , ye pə taɣa Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ na Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ , na nɔhɔkʋtʋ na nɔhɔkʋtʋ , pʋlʋ ɩɩ tɔɣɔnəɣɩ - ɩ .

text: And while they abode in Galilee , Jesus said unto them , The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ pə pamna Yesu ɩfalaa kota təntəmlɛ kɛ Kalilee tɛtʋ taa . Tənaɣa Yesu heela - wɛ sɩ : Paa tʋ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa maɣa yəlaa niŋ taa ,

text: And they shall kill him , and the third day he shall be raised again . And they were exceeding sorry .
text2: na pɛlɛ pá kʋ - m . Ama wɛɛ tooso wule maa fe . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɔm tənɛ tə wakəla ɩ ɩfalaa laŋa kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: And when they were come to Capernaum , they that received tribute money came to Peter , and said , Doth not your master pay tribute ?
text2: Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa tala Kapənahum , ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ lampuu mʋlaa polo pa pɔɔsɩ Piyɛɛ sɩ : Mə Caa naa fɛləɣɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ lampuu yɛɛ ?

text: He saith , Yes . And when he was come into the house , Jesus prevented him , saying , What thinkest thou , Simon ? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute ? of their own children , or of strangers ?
text2: Ɩlɛna Piyɛɛ sɩ : Ɩ fɛləɣɩ . Saa wei Piyɛɛ sʋʋkaɣa təyaɣa ɩlɛna Yesu caalɩ - ɩ pɔɔsʋɣʋ sɩ : Simɔŋ , n hʋʋ suwe ? Le nyə ́ ma fɛləɣəna antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ awulaa kɛ lampuunaa na patantənaa ye ? Tɛtʋ piya yaa mʋʋlaa ?

text: Peter saith unto him , Of strangers . Jesus saith unto him , Then are the children free .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ cɔwa sɩ : Mʋʋlaa fɛləɣəna . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Tampana kɛ te , pə fɛɩ sɩ tɛtʋ piya ɩ ́ fɛlɩ lampuu se .

text: Notwithstanding , lest we should offend them , go thou to the sea , and cast an hook , and take up the fish that first cometh up ; and when thou hast opened his mouth , thou shalt find a piece of money : that take , and give unto them for me and thee .
text2: Paa na mpʋ tɩɩ caa sɩ pə la yəlaa panɛ pa taa kɛ ́ pʋlʋ , ɩlɛ polo pɔɣɔ taa na ń tʋ kulaɣa . Kancaalaɣa tinte nte n ká kpa tɔ , wiili tə nɔɣɔ taa , n ká maɣana liɣitee nyəɣəlʋɣʋ . Ləsɩ - kʋ na ń kɔɔ na ń fɛlɩ ma na - ŋ tá lampuu .

text: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus , saying , Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven ?
text2: Waatʋ ɩnəɣɩ Yesu ɩfalaa pola ɩ kiŋ na pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Aweɣelɛ sɔsɔ kɛ ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa taa ?

text: And Jesus called a little child unto him , and set him in the midst of them ,
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu yaa peiya na ɩ ́ sɩɩ - kɛɣɛ pa ɩsɛntaa ,

text: And said , Verily I say unto you , Except ye be converted , and become as little children , ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , ye ɩ ́ tá laɣasɩ na ɩ ́ pəsɩ ɩsɩɩ peisi , ɩ ́ kaa sʋʋ ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa .

text: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child , the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Wei ɩ pasəɣɩ ɩ tɩ na ɩ ́ pəsɩ ɩsɩɩ peiya kanɛ tɔ , ɩnəɣəlɛ ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa taa sɔsɔ .

text: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me .
text2: Na wei ɩ ká mʋ peiya ɩsɩɩ kanɛɣɛ ma nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔ , maɣa pʋntʋ mʋwa .

text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me , it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea .
text2: Ye wei ɩ ́ lapa na piya nsi sɩ mʋ ma tɔm kɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ sɩ taa nakəlɩ pəntɩ , pə nəɣəsəna pá tʋ pʋntʋ luɣu tɛɛ kɛ ́ namlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ na pá tʋsɩ - ɩ teŋku taa .

text: Woe unto the world because of offences ! for it must needs be that offences come ; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh !
text2: Ama antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ tɔm wɛ waɩyo kɛ ́ . Mpi tɔ , mpi pɩɩ la na yəlaa hoti ɩsaɣatʋ taa tɔ pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ . Mpi pɩɩ tusi yəlaa kɛ ɩsaɣatʋ taa tɔ pə kaa laŋ . Ama wei ɩ ́ lapa na ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ la ɩsaɣatʋ , pʋntʋ ká ná .

text: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee , cut them off , and cast them from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed , rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire .
text2: Ye nyá niŋ yaa nyá nɔɔhəlɛ tusiɣina - ŋ ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ taa , sɛtɩ - tɛ na ń lɔ pooluŋ . Sana kɛlɛ sɩ ń sʋʋ weesuɣu kʋpaŋkʋ taa na niŋ kʋlʋməŋ yaa nɔɔhəlɛ kʋlʋmtəlɛ , na mpi n ká wɛɛna nyá niŋ naalɛ yaa nɔɔhɛɛ naalɛ na pá pɛtɩ - ŋ kɔkɔ tam nyəŋka taa tɔ .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye , rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire .
text2: Ye nyá ɩsəlɛ tusiɣina - ŋ ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ taa , hɔɣɔsɩ - tɛ na ń lɔ pooluŋ . Sana ń hiki weesuɣu kʋpaŋkʋ na ɩsəlɛ kʋlʋmtəlɛ , na mpi n ká wɛɛna ɩsɛ naalɛ na pá pɛtɩ - ŋ kɔkɔ ŋka ka wɛ tənaasəlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa tɔ .

text: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones ; for I say unto you , That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na piya sənɛ sɩ taa nakələɣɩ nyənʋɣʋ kɛ yem . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ tampana tɔɔ sɩ ɩsɔtaa tillaa səŋa tam kɛ ́ ma Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩ ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ .

text: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost .
text2: Mpi pə lepa tɔ pə maɣamaɣa pə nyʋɣʋ yapʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma kɔma .

text: How think ye ? if a man have an hundred sheep , and one of them be gone astray , doth he not leave the ninety and nine , and goeth into the mountains , and seeketh that which is gone astray ?
text2: Awe wɛna heeŋ nɩɩnʋwa ( 100 ) na ɩ taa kʋlʋm le , na ɩ ́ kaa yele pɔɣɔlaɣafɛi nɩɩnʋwa ɩnɛɣɛ pulaɣa tɔɔ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ sʋʋ kʋlepu ɩnɛɣɛ pɛɛkʋɣʋ ?

text: And if so be that he find it , verily I say unto you , he rejoiceth more of that sheep , than of the ninety and nine which went not astray .
text2: Ye ɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ hii - ɩ , pɔpɔtʋ fɛɩ , ɩ laŋlɛ hʋlʋməɣəna - ɩ kɛ ́ na pə ́ kəlɩ pɔɣɔlaɣafɛi nɩɩnʋwa wei ɩ ta le tɔ .

text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven , that one of these little ones should perish .
text2: Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ mə Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩɩ caa sɩ piya sənɛ sɩ taa nakəlɩ ɩ ́ le .

text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee , go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone : if he shall hear thee , thou hast gained thy brother .
text2: Ye nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ pəntəna - ŋ , polo na ń yaa - ɩ mə naalɛ na ń hʋlɩ - ɩ timpi ɩ pəntəna - ŋ tɔ . Ye ɩ nɩɩna - ŋ , pə lapa n waasa - ɩ kɛlɛ .

text: But if he will not hear thee , then take with thee one or two more , that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established .
text2: Ama ye ɩ kisaa , n yaa nɔɣɔlʋ yaa napələɣɩ naalɛ na ɩ ́ na - ɩ na pə ́ cɔ ́ pə ́ lá ɩsɩɩ pa ŋmaaʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ sɩ : Paa tɔm nti tɩɩ wɛɛna seliya nyə ́ ma kɛ naalɛ yaa tooso .

text: And if he shall neglect to hear them , tell it unto the church : but if he neglect to hear the church , let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican .
text2: Ye saa ɩnɩ ɩ tasa kisuɣu , ɩlɛ n heeli Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle . Na ɩ ́ kisa Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle kɛ nɩɩnaʋ tɔtɔ , ɩlɛ n nyənɩ - ɩ ɩsɩɩ ma ta nyɩ Ɩsɔ yaa ɩsɩɩ lampuu mʋlʋ .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , pə təna mpi ɩ ́ kaa ha mpaa kɛ atɛ cənɛ tɔ , pə kaa na mpaa kɛ ɩsɔtaa . Na pə təna mpi ɩ ́ ká ha mpaaʋ kɛ atɛ cənɛ tɔ , pɩɩ ná mpaaʋ kɛ ɩsɔtaa .

text: Again I say unto you , That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask , it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Ma tasəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ heeluɣu sɩ : Ye mə taa naalɛ lapa nɔɣɔ kʋlʋmaɣa na pá sələmɩ pʋlʋ , ma Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩ ká ha - wɛɣɛ - wɩ .
