text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name , there am I in the midst of them .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , yəlaa naalɛ yaa tooso ɩ ́ kota timpiɣi ma pʋlʋ lapʋ tɔɔ , ma wɛ pa hɛkʋ kɛ ́ .

text: Then came Peter to him , and said , Lord , how oft shall my brother sin against me , and I forgive him ? till seven times ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ pola Yesu kiŋ na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , ye ma tɔɣɔntəlɛ pəntəɣəna - m tam na má suma , tɔm ɩsənaɣa pə ́ talaa ma kaa su ? Tɔm naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa na ?

text: Jesus saith unto him , I say not unto thee , Until seven times : but , Until seventy times seven .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ma heeliɣi - ŋ sɩ pə taɣa tɔm naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa se . Ama tɔm nɩɩtoso na naanʋwa naanʋwa kɛ tɔm naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa kɛ ́ .

text: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king , which would take account of his servants .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa nəɣəsəna ɩsɩɩ wulaʋ sɔsɔ nɔɣɔlʋ wei ɩ caakaɣa sɩ ɩ ́ mʋ ɩ kəma kɛ ɩ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma kiŋ tɔ .

text: And when he had begun to reckon , one was brought unto him , which owed him ten thousand talents .
text2: Ɩ caɣaa na ɩ ́ tɔŋna ɩ kəma kɛ mapʋ , ɩlɛna pá kɔna - ɩ apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ . Apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩlɛ ɩ wɛna - ɩ kəmlɛ kɛ liɣitee nyəɣətʋ iyisi iyisi .

text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay , his lord commanded him to be sold , and his wife , and children , and all that he had , and payment to be made .
text2: Ɩ ta nyɩ ɩsəna ɩ ká la na ɩ ́ hiki liɣitee anɩ na ɩ ́ fɛlɩ tɔ . Ɩlɛna wulaʋ tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ kpa kəmlɛ tʋ ɩnɩ na ɩ alʋ na ɩ piya na ɩ wontu təna na ɩ ́ pɛɛtɩ , na má hiki ma liɣitee .

text: The servant therefore fell down , and worshipped him , saying , Lord , have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Tənaɣa apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ hota wulaʋ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ wiina - ɩ sɩ : Haɩ , tacaa , la - m suulu , ye ma hikaa maa fɛlɩ - ŋ pə təna təcɩʋcɩʋ .

text: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion , and loosed him , and forgave him the debt .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ wulaʋ ɩnɩ ɩ nyəna təmlɛ tʋ pətɔɔtəlɛ na ɩ ́ cɛpɩ - ɩ , na ɩ ́ yele - ɩ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ .

text: But the same servant went out , and found one of his fellowservants , which owed him an hundred pence : and he laid hands on him , and took him by the throat , saying , Pay me that thou owest .
text2: Təmlɛ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɛɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sulina ɩ təmlɛ taa taapalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ka wɛna ɩnəɣɩ kəmlɛ kɛ liɣitee nyəɣətʋ ŋmʋnʋɣʋ ( 200 ) . Tənaɣa təmlɛ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ ləla ɩ taapalʋ luɣu tɛɛ təkem , sɩ ɩ ́ fɛlɩ - ɩ ɩ kəmlɛ kɛ ɩ ́ fɛlɩ - ɩ .

text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet , and besought him , saying , Have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ taapalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ hota ɩnɩ ɩ tɛɛ na ɩ wiina - ɩ sɩ : Haɩ , la - m suulu , ye ma hikaa maa fɛlɩ - ŋ .

text: And he would not : but went and cast him into prison , till he should pay the debt .
text2: Ama təmlɛ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kisaa na ɩ ́ kpa ɩ taapalʋ ɩnɩ na ɩ ́ pona na ɩ ́ təkɩ saləka taa , sɩ ɩ ́ fɛlɩ ɩnəɣɩ ɩ kəmlɛ .

text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done , they were very sorry , and came and told unto their lord all that was done .
text2: Wulaʋ sɔsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma lɛlaa ná mpʋ , ɩlɛna pa laŋa wakəlɩ sɔsɔm , haləna pá polo pá heeli - təɣɩ pa caa .

text: Then his lord , after that he had called him , said unto him , O thou wicked servant , I forgave thee all that debt , because thou desiredst me :
text2: Tənaɣa pa caa ɩnɩ ɩ yaa təmlɛ tʋ ɩnɩ na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Təmlɛ tʋ ɩsaɣaʋ nyá , nyá wiina - m na má cɛ - ŋ təkpatakpata .

text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant , even as I had pity on thee ?
text2: Pə nəɣəsəna ɩsɩɩ nyá tɔtɔ nyaa nyənɩ nyá taapalʋ pətɔɔtəlɛ ɩsɩɩ má nyənʋɣʋ nyá nyəntɛ tɔ .

text: And his lord was wroth , and delivered him to the tormentors , till he should pay all that was due unto him .
text2: Tənaɣa pááná kpa pa caa ɩnəɣɩ sɔsɔm na ɩ ́ kpa təmlɛ tʋ ɩnɩ na ɩ ́ tʋ - ɩ naasəlaa niŋ taa sɩ ɩ ́ fɛlɩ ɩ kəmlɛ təna təcɩʋcɩʋ na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ lɩɩ .

text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you , if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ma Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩ ká la - mɛ . Ye ɩɩ hʋləɣɩ mə tɔɣɔntəlɛnaa kɛ suulu na lotu kʋlʋmtʋ .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these sayings , he departed from Galilee , and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan ;
text2: Waatʋ wei Yesu tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ Kalilee tɛtʋ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ Yuta tɛtʋ nti tə wɛ Yaatanɩ waalɩ tɔ tə taa .

text: And great multitudes followed him ; and he healed them there .
text2: Tənaɣa samaa kɛ sɔsɔm təŋa - ɩ na ɩ ́ waa pa kʋtɔməŋ .

text: The Pharisees also came unto him , tempting him , and saying unto him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa napəlɩ pa polaa sɩ pa kuuki Yesu nɔɣɔ , ɩlɛna pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tá mpaaʋ taa yʋlʋ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔnɩ ɩ alʋ kɛ natəlɩ tə tɔɔ ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , Have ye not read , that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female ,
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ ta kala nti pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ ? Pa ŋmaawaɣa sɩ : Hatoo kancaalaɣa , antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ latʋ lapa - wɛɣɛ apalʋ na alʋ kɛ ́ .

text: And said , For this cause shall a man leave father and mother , and shall cleave to his wife : and they twain shall be one flesh ?
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Mpʋ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ apalʋ ká yele ɩ caa na ɩ too na ɩ ́ na ɩ alʋ pá caɣa na pa naalɛ pá pəsɩ yʋlʋ kʋlʋm .

text: Wherefore they are no more twain , but one flesh . What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Saa ɩnɩ apalʋ na alʋ pa ta kɛ yəlaa naalɛ tɔtɔ . Ama pa pəsa yʋlʋ kʋlʋm kɛ ́ təkoŋ . Ye mpʋ ɩlɛ , yʋlʋ ɩ ́ taa yasɩ mpi Ɩsɔ kpɛntaa tɔ .

text: They say unto him , Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement , and to put her away ?
text2: Ḿpɣʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ Moisi naa ha mpaa sɩ apalʋ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ la ɩ alʋ kɛ kisuɣu takəlaɣa na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔnɩ - ɩ ?

text: He saith unto them , Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives : but from the beginning it was not so .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Mə laŋkpɩɩsəŋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Moisi ka ha - mɛɣɛ mpaaʋ sɩ ɩ ́ tɔɣɔnɩ mə alaa . Ama hatoo kancaalaɣa pə taa wɛɛ mpʋ .

text: And I say unto you , Whosoever shall put away his wife , except it be for fornication , and shall marry another , committeth adultery : and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛ təfoo sɩ , ye yʋlʋ tɔɣɔna ɩ alʋ na pə ́ tá kɛ ́ sɩ alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ lapa wasaŋkalətʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ , ɩlɛna apalʋ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ kpaɣa alʋ lɛlʋ , pʋntʋ lapa wasaŋkalətʋ kɛ ́ .

text: His disciples say unto him , If the case of the man be so with his wife , it is not good to marry .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu ɩfalaa tɔma sɩ : Ye ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛ apalʋ na alʋ pa hɛkʋ , ɩlɛ pə kəla teu sɩ yʋlʋ ɩ ́ caɣa ɩtantɛ ɩlɛ .

text: But he said unto them , All men cannot receive this saying , save they to whom it is given .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Yəlaa təna ɩɩ pəsəɣɩ na pá mʋ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ kʋnɛ . Ama mpa Ɩsɔ ná ha pə toma tɔ pɛlɛ pa pəsəɣɩ .

text: For there are some eunuchs , which were so born from their mother ' s womb : and there are some eunuchs , which were made eunuchs of men : and there be eunuchs , which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven ' s sake . He that is able to receive it , let him receive it .
text2: Mpi pə kaɣatəɣɩ yəlaa kɛ alaa kpaɣaʋ tɔ pə wɛ ŋkaŋka kɛ ́ . Lɛlaa kiŋ ɩlɛ , pa lʋləɣɩ - wɛɣɛ mpʋ na pá fɛɩna pa tɩ . Lɛlaa ɩlɛ , yəlaa lapəna - wɛɣɛ kataasɩ . Pə kaasɩ lɛlaa ná kisa alaa kpaɣaʋ kɛ kʋkisu kɛ ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa tɔɔ . Ye wei ɩ ká pəsɩ na ɩ ́ mʋ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ kʋnɛ , ɩ ́ mʋ - kʋ .

text: Then were there brought unto him little children , that he should put his hands on them , and pray : and the disciples rebuked them .
text2: Yəlaa pukaɣana piya kɛ ́ sɩ Yesu ɩ ́ tənɩ sɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ niŋ na ɩ ́ sələməna - səɣɩ Ɩsɔ . Tənaɣa ɩ ɩfalaa kaləna sɩ kɔntaa .

text: But Jesus said , Suffer little children , and forbid them not , to come unto me : for of such is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu tɔ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ yele na piya kɔɔ ma kiŋ , ɩ ́ taa kaɣatɩ - sɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mpa pa wɛ ɩsɩɩ piya tɔ mpɛ pa tənna ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa .

text: And he laid his hands on them , and departed thence .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ təna niŋ kɛ sɩ tɔɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ təna na ɩ ́ tɛɛ .

text: And , behold , one came and said unto him , Good Master , what good thing shall I do , that I may have eternal life ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ pola Yesu kiŋ na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , kʋpantʋ ntiɣi pə wɛɛ sɩ maa la na má hiki weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ ?

text: And he said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God : but if thou wilt enter into life , keep the commandments .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ n pɔɔsəɣɩ - m kʋpantʋ tɔɔ ? Yʋlʋ kʋlʋm təkoŋ kɛna kʋpaŋ . Ye n caa sɩ ń hiki weesuɣu , təŋ mpi pa kɛɛsa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa tɔ .

text: He saith unto him , Which ? Jesus said , Thou shalt do no murder , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness ,
text2: Tənaɣalɛ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ pɔɔsa Yesu sɩ : Kasɩ ntiɣi pa kɛɛsaa ye ? Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ apalʋ ɩnɩ sɩ : Taa kʋ yʋlʋ , taa la wasaŋkalətʋ , taa ŋmɩɩlɩ , taa suu lɛlʋ kɛ tɔm .

text: Honour thy father and thy mother : and , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Se nyá caa na nyá too . Sɔɔlɩ nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ ɩsɩɩ nyá tɩ .

text: The young man saith unto him , All these things have I kept from my youth up : what lack I yet ?
text2: Tənaɣa ɩfepu ɩnɩ ɩ tɔma sɩ : Ma tɔka kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɩ tə tənaɣa . Ɩlɛ pepeɣe pə kaasa má la tɔtɔ ?

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou wilt be perfect , go and sell that thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come and follow me .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Ye n caa n te təkpataa , polo na ń pɛɛtɩ pə təna mpi n wɛna tɔ na ń tala kʋnyɔntʋnaa kɛ pə liɣitee , na cele ń sʋʋ toŋ kɛ ɩsɔtaa . Ń tɛma mpʋ pə lapʋ ɩlɛ n kɔɔ na ń təŋɩ - m .

text: But when the young man heard that saying , he went away sorrowful : for he had great possessions .
text2: Ama ɩfepu ɩnɩ ɩ nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ laŋlɛ wakəlɩ tətɔɣɔtɔɣɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ ka wɛna kɛ ́ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , Verily I say unto you , That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , liɣitee tʋ ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa sʋʋʋ wɛ katɛ kɛ ́ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: And again I say unto you , It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Ma tasəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ heeluɣu sɩ : Ɩsəna mpi pə wɛ yooyoo kɛ ́ katɛ sɩ ɩ ́ sʋʋna pənyalaɣa pʋ ́ ʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ na ɩ ́ lɩɩ tɔ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ pə wɛ liɣitee tʋ kɛ katɛ sɩ ɩ ́ sʋʋ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa taa , halɩ pə tɩɩ tɛɛ mpʋ .

text: When his disciples heard it , they were exceedingly amazed , saying , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Ɩ ɩfalaa nɩɩ tɔm ntɩ ɩlɛna pə ́ la - wɛɣɛ piti na pá tɔ sɩ : Ɩlɛ awe ka tʋləna ntɛɣɛ - tɩ ɩlɛ ?

text: But Jesus beheld them , and said unto them , With men this is impossible ; but with God all things are possible .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu nyəna - wɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Yəlaa kiŋ kɛ pə fɛɩ pəsʋɣʋ . Ama Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ , pə təna təlɛʋ kɛ ́ .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Behold , we have forsaken all , and followed thee ; what shall we have therefore ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ nɔɣɔ təkpaʋ sɩ : Pepeɣe taa hiki ɩlɛ ?

text: And Jesus said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That ye which have followed me , in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory , ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones , judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , waatʋ wei Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa ma maa caɣa ma teeli kumte tɔɔ kɛ ́ aləsanna taa tɔ , mɛ mpa ɩ ́ təŋa - m mə naanʋwa na naalɛ tɔ , ɩ ́ ká caɣa mə kumlee tɔɔ tɔtɔ , na ɩ ́ hʋʋna Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ kpeka naanʋwa na naalɛɣɛ tɔm .

text: And every one that hath forsaken houses , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my name ' s sake , shall receive an hundredfold , and shall inherit everlasting life .
text2: Na pa təna mpa paa yele pa tɛɛsɩ , yaa pa taalʋnaa , na pa kɔɣɔnaa , na pa newaa , yaa pa caanaa , yaa pa toonaa , yaa pa piya , yaa pa tawa kɛ ma tɔɔ tɔ , paa hiki mpi mpi pa yela mpʋ tɔ pə tɔm nɩɩnʋwa ( 100 ) . Pəyele paa hiki pa paa nyəm kɛ weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ kʋ taa .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last shall be first .
text2: Mpa pa wɛ lɔlɔ kɛ ́ kaɣana tɔ pa taa paɣalɛ ká məlɩ waalɩ . Na waalɩ nyə ́ ma taa paɣalɛ náá məlɩ lɔlɔ .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard .
text2: Ɩɩ naa ɩsəna ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa nəɣəsənaa tɔɣɔlɔ . Sɔsɔ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kʋləna tanaŋ ahula tɛɛ təpam sɩ ɩ caa apaa nyə ́ ma na ɩ ́ tʋ ɩ lɛsɛŋ taalɛ taa .

text: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day , he sent them into his vineyard .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ tisaa sɩ : Ilim ɩ ́ tɛma maa fɛlɩ - mɛɣɛ liɣitee nyəɣəlʋɣʋ kʋlʋmʋɣʋ kʋlʋmʋɣʋ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ luŋ ma taalɛ taa .

text: And he went out about the third hour , and saw others standing idle in the marketplace ,
text2: Ilim kɔma na pə ́ kpa pəcɔ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tasa lɩɩʋ na ɩ ́ maɣana napəlɩ , pɛlɛ pa caɣa yem kɛ ́ nɔnɔɣɔ tɛɛ .

text: And said unto them ; Go ye also into the vineyard , and whatsoever is right I will give you . And they went their way .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ heela pɛlɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ tɛɛ ma lɛsɛŋ taa , maa fɛlɩ - mɛɣɛ ɩsəna pə nəɣəsənaa tɔ .

text: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour , and did likewise .
text2: Ɩlɛna pɛlɛ pá tɛɛ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɔsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ tasa lɩɩʋ kɛ ilim sikuɣu na ɩ ́ hiki napələɣɩ mpʋ tɔtɔ . Pə kɔma na pə ́ tala ilim hʋʋʋ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tasa lɛlaa kɛ hikuɣu na ɩ ́ pona ɩ taalɛ taa tɔtɔ .

text: And about the eleventh hour he went out , and found others standing idle , and saith unto them , Why stand ye here all the day idle ?
text2: Pə kɔma taanaɣa ilim ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lɩɩ na ɩ ́ maɣana napəlɩ , pɛlɛ pa caɣa nɔnɔɣɔ tɛɛ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ caɣa yem kɛ mpʋ ?

text: They say unto him , Because no man hath hired us . He saith unto them , Go ye also into the vineyard ; and whatsoever is right , that shall ye receive .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɛlɛ pa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tə ta hiki wei ɩ ká kpaɣa - tʋɣʋ təmlɛ tɔɣɔ . Tənaɣa ɩ tɔma sɩ : Ye mpʋ , ɩ ́ polo ma lɛsɛŋ taalɛ taa yaa .

text: So when even was come , the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward , Call the labourers , and give them their hire , beginning from the last unto the first .
text2: Ilim kɔma na pə ́ tɛ ɩlɛna sɔsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ yaa ɩ təmlɛ tɔɔ nyənllʋ na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tɔʋ , yaa apaa nyə ́ ma mpɛ na ń fɛlɩ - wɛɣɛ pa liɣitee . Caaləna mpa pa təkəna kpaɣaʋ tɔ na ń tɛɛsəna mpa pa caala kpaɣaʋ tɔ .

text: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour , they received every man a penny .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mpa ɩ ka hika taanaɣa ilim tɔ pɛlɛ pa kɔma na pá hiki liɣitee nyəɣəlʋɣʋ nyəɣəlʋɣʋ .

text: But when the first came , they supposed that they should have received more ; and they likewise received every man a penny .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mpa pa caala təmlɛ taa kɛ ́ sʋʋʋ tɔ pa hʋʋwa sɩ mpɛ pa nyəna ká kəlɩ panɛ pa nyəna . Ama liɣitee nyəɣəlʋɣʋ nyəɣəlʋɣʋ kɛ ́ pa cɛla - wɛ .

text: And when they had received it , they murmured against the goodman of the house ,
text2: Sɔsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ fɛlʋɣʋ - wɛɣɛ mpʋ tɔ pə ta maɣa - wɛ .

text: Saying , These last have wrought but one hour , and thou hast made them equal unto us , which have borne the burden and heat of the day .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá tɔ sɩ : Mpa pa kɔma nɔɔnɔɔ tɔ kalifu kʋlʋm kɛ pɛlɛ pa lapa təmlɛ , ɩlɛna ń məlɩ na ń kpɛntɩ - tʋɣʋ kʋfɛlʋɣʋ kʋlʋmʋɣʋ na ? Pəyele tá kana na ilim nyaɣa - tʋɣʋ hatoo tanaŋ tɛɛ .

text: But he answered one of them , and said , Friend , I do thee no wrong : didst not thou agree with me for a penny ?
text2: Tənaɣa sɔsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ cɔ pa taa lɛlʋ sɩ : Ma taapalʋ , ma ta muɣuli - ŋ se . Ma na - ŋ tɩɩ sɩɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ ń lapa ilim na pə tɛm maa fɛlɩ - ŋ liɣitee nyəɣəlʋɣʋ , yaa pə taɣa mpʋ ?

text: Take that thine is , and go thy way : I will give unto this last , even as unto thee .
text2: Mʋ nyá liɣitee na ń tɛɛ ń fɛɛ - m . Má nɔkəna sɩ má cɛla wei pə təkənaa tɔtɔɣɔ teitei ɩsɩɩ ma cɛla nyá tɔ .

text: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own ? Is thine eye evil , because I am good ?
text2: Ma fɛɩna mpaaʋ sɩ má lana ma liɣitee kɛ ɩsəna ma sɔɔlaa tɔ ? Ma lapa kʋpantʋ tɔɣɔ pə wɩɩkɩ - ŋ yaa ?

text: So the last shall be first , and the first last : for many be called , but few chosen .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tasaa sɩ : Waalɩ nyə ́ ma ká məlɩ lɔlɔ , na lɔlɔ nyə ́ ma náá məlɩ waalɩ .

text: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way , and said unto them ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pukaɣa Yosalɛm , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yaa ɩ ɩfalaa kɛ kpeeŋa kɛ waatʋ wei pa wɛ mpaaʋ taa tɔ na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ :

text: Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes , and they shall condemn him to death ,
text2: Tɔʋ , tə kpaa Yosalɛm ɩsəntɔ tɔ , paa kpaɣa Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má na pá tʋ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa pa niŋ taa . Paa tɔ sɩ pá kʋ - m .

text: And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock , and to scourge , and to crucify him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Paa tʋ - m ma ta nyɩ ɩsɔnaa niŋ taa , na pɛlɛ pá paana - m na pá casa - m akpatɛɛ na pá ka - m səm tesika tɔɔ . Na kʋyɛɛŋ tooso wule maa fe .

text: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee ' s children with her sons , worshipping him , and desiring a certain thing of him .
text2: Tənaɣa Sepetee pəyalaa na pa too pa pola Yesu kiŋ , ɩlɛna pa too luŋ Yesu tɛɛ na ɩ ́ wiina - ɩ sɩ : La - m kʋpantʋ natəlɩ .

text: And he said unto her , What wilt thou ? She saith unto him , Grant that these my two sons may sit , the one on thy right hand , and the other on the left , in thy kingdom .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Pepeɣe n caa má la - ŋ ? Ɩlɛna alʋ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ma caa sɩ ń tɔ sɩ ma pəyalaa panɛ pa naalɛ paa caɣa nyá kiŋ kɛ waatʋ wei n ká tɔɣɔ nyá Kawulaɣa tɔ . Lɛlʋ kɛ nyá ntɔɣɔŋ tɔɔ , lɛlʋ kɛ nyá mpətəŋ tɔɔ .

text: But Jesus answered and said , Ye know not what ye ask . Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of , and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ? They say unto him , We are able .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ tá nyɩ mpi ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ tɔ yɛɛ ? Ɩ ́ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ wahala sɔsɔ wei maa tɔɣɔ tɔ ? Tənaɣa pa tɔma sɩ : Tɩɩ pəsɩ .

text: And he saith unto them , Ye shall drink indeed of my cup , and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with : but to sit on my right hand , and on my left , is not mine to give , but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Tampana ɩ ́ ká tɔɣɔ wahala sɔsɔ wei maa tɔɣɔ tɔ . Ama pə taɣa má ləsəɣəna mpa paa caɣa ma ntɔɣɔŋ tɔɔ , na mpa paa caɣa ma mpətəŋ tɔɔ tɔ . Mpa pa tɔɔ ma Caa taɣana lona anɩ tɔ pɛlɛ pa kɛna a nyə ́ ma .

text: And when the ten heard it , they were moved with indignation against the two brethren .
text2: Yesu ɩfalaa naanʋwa wei pə kaasaa tɔ pɛlɛ pa ná mpʋ , ɩlɛna pa taa wɩɩna Sepetee pəyalaa mpɛ pa naalɛ .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them , and they that are great exercise authority upon them .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu yaa pa təna na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ nyəmá sɩ mpa pa kɛ ́ yəlaa awulaa tɔ , pɛlɛ pa tɔkɩ kawulaɣa kɛ lɛlaa tɔɔ . Na mpa pɛlɛ pa kɛ ́ kʋfeelaa tɔ , pɛlɛ pa ŋmakələɣɩ səkpema .

text: But it shall not be so among you : but whosoever will be great among you , let him be your minister ;
text2: Ama pə fɛɩ sɩ pɩɩ wɛɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mə kiŋ . Nti tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ , ye mə taa wei ɩ ́ caa ɩ la sɔsɔ kɛ mə hɛkʋ , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ pəsɩ mə pəyalʋ .

text: And whosoever will be chief among you , let him be your servant :
text2: Na ye mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ caa ɩ la mə nɔɣɔ tʋ , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ pəsɩ mə yom .

text: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má , ma ta kɔɔ sɩ má tɔɣɔ cɛcɛɛlɛ . Ama ma kɔmaɣa sɩ má pəsɩ yəlaa təna təmlɛ tʋ , na má ha ma weesuɣu na pə cɛ yəlaa paɣalɛ kɛ pa yomle taa .

text: And as they departed from Jericho , a great multitude followed him .
text2: Waatʋ wei Yesu lɩɩna Yeliko ɩcatɛ taa tɔ samaa tuutuuma təŋa ɩ waalɩ .

text: And , behold , two blind men sitting by the way side , when they heard that Jesus passed by , cried out , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Pə pamna yʋlʋmaa naalɛ ka caɣa mpaaʋ nɔɣɔ . Pa nɩɩwa sɩ Yesu tɛɛna ntɛ ́ , ɩlɛna pá sʋʋ koou sɩ : Tafiiti Pəyalʋ , Tacaa , nyənɩ tá pətɔɔtəlɛ .

text: And the multitude rebuked them , because they should hold their peace : but they cried the more , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Tənaɣa samaa kaləna - wɛ na pá heeli - wɛ sɩ pa su . Ama pɛlɛ pa sɔɔsa koou kɛ sɔsɔm sɩ : Tafiiti Pəyalʋ , Tacaa , nyənɩ tá pətɔɔtəlɛ .

text: And Jesus stood still , and called them , and said , What will ye that I shall do unto you ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu səŋaa na ɩ ́ yaa - wɛ na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ caa ma la - mɛɣɛ - we ?

text: They say unto him , Lord , that our eyes may be opened .
text2: Ɩlɛna pɛlɛ pa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , tə caa kɛ ́ sɩ ń kuli tá ɩsɛ .

text: So Jesus had compassion on them , and touched their eyes : and immediately their eyes received sight , and they followed him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa tɔm lapa Yesu kɛ ́ pətɔɔtəlɛ na ɩ ́ takɩ pa ɩsɛ na pá sʋʋ naʋ kɛ tənɛ ɩnəɣɩ kpakpaa na pá təŋ ɩ waalɩ .

text: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem , and were come to Bethphage , unto the mount of Olives , then sent Jesus two disciples ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa tala Petafasɩ kɛ Olifinaa pʋɣʋ tɔɔ . Waatʋ ɩnɩ tɔ pa fɛɩ pooluŋ na Yosalɛm . Tənaɣa Yesu tila ɩ ɩfalaa naalɛ sɩ :

text: Saying unto them , Go into the village over against you , and straightway ye shall find an ass tied , and a colt with her : loose them , and bring them unto me .
text2: Ɩ ́ polo ɩcatɛ nte tə wɛ mə nɔɣɔ tɔɔ tɔ tə taa . Ye ɩ ́ tala tə taa kɛ ́ kpakpaa ɩ ́ ká ná pa tʋ kpaŋaɣa toto nɔɣɔlʋ na ɩ pile kɛ ɩ kiŋ , ɩ ́ hɛtɩ - sɩ na ɩ ́ kɔna - m .

text: And if any man say ought unto you , ye shall say , The Lord hath need of them ; and straightway he will send them .
text2: Ye nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ pɔɔsa - mɛ sɩ pʋlʋ , ɩ ́ cɔ pʋntʋ sɩ Tacaa caakəna . Ye ɩ ́ cɔ mpʋ paa yele - mɛ na ɩ ́ tɛɛna .

text: All this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Pə lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pə ́ la nti Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ ka yɔɣɔtaa tɔ sɩ :

text: Tell ye the daughter of Sion , Behold , thy King cometh unto thee , meek , and sitting upon an ass , and a colt the foal of an ass .
text2: Ɩ ́ heeli Siyɔŋ ɩcatɛ nyə ́ ma sɩ , ɩ ́ nyənɩ , mə wulaʋ kɔŋ mə kiŋ , na ɩ ́ caɣa kpaŋaɣa toto tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ wɛ təpamm . Nn na ɩ ́ caɣa kpaŋaɣa pəyaɣa tɔɔ .

text: And the disciples went , and did as Jesus commanded them ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ɩfalaa mpa ɩ tilaa tɔ pa tɛɛwa na pá lá ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ kɛɛsa - wɛ tɔ .

text: And brought the ass , and the colt , and put on them their clothes , and they set him thereon .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kɔna kpaŋaɣa toto ɩnɩ na ɩ pile , na pá kpaɣa pa wontu na pá pɔ sɩ tɔɔ , na Yesu kpa na ɩ ́ caɣa pə tɔɔ .

text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way ; others cut down branches from the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Na yəlaa paɣalɛ kɛ sɔsɔm náá pɔ pa wontu kɛ mpaaʋ taa . Lɛlaa náá cɛ akɔɔ na pá pɔ mpaaʋ taa .

text: And the multitudes that went before , and that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna to the Son of David : Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord ; Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Samaa wei ɩ ka wɛ Yesu nɔɣɔ tɔɔ na wei ɩ ka wɛ Yesu waalɩ tɔ pɛlɛ pa tɔŋna yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ na nɔɔsɩ sɔsɔɔnsɩ sɩ : Paa wei ɩ ́ tʋ Tafiiti Pəyalʋ kɛ teeli . Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ wɛɛ wei ɩ kɔŋna Tacaa toŋ tɔ ɩ waalɩ . Paa wei ɩ ́ tʋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teeli kɛ ɩsɔtaa .

text: And when he was come into Jerusalem , all the city was moved , saying , Who is this ?
text2: Yesu kɔma na ɩ ́ sʋʋ Yosalɛm taa , ɩlɛna ɩcatɛ la yuŋ təkɛmm , na yəlaa pɔɔsəɣɩ sɩ : Aweɣe ye ?

text: And the multitude said , This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee .
text2: Ɩlɛna samaa cɔ sɩ : Kalilee Nasalɛtɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Yesu kɛ ́ .

text: And Jesus went into the temple of God , and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu sʋʋ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔnɩ pa təna mpa pa pɛɛtaɣaa na mpa pa yakaɣa tɔ . Na ɩ ́ pəsɩ liɣitee yɔkəlaa taapələnaa kɛ alele na alukukunaa pɛɛtəlaa kpelasɩ tɔtɔ .

text: And said unto them , It is written , My house shall be called the house of prayer ; but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ sɩ : Paa yaa ma təyaɣa sɩ Ɩsɔ təsələməlɛ . Ama mə pəsəna - kɛɣɛ ŋmɩɩlaa təyaɣa .

text: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple ; and he healed them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yʋlʋmaa na sɛkəllaa pa pola Yesu kiŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa na ɩ ́ lá na pá hiki alaafəya .

text: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did , and the children crying in the temple , and saying , Hosanna to the Son of David ; they were sore displeased ,
text2: Ɩsɩɩ Yesu lapa piti təma kɛ mpʋ , na pə kaasɩ na piya náá yɔɣɔtəɣəna nɔɔsɩ sɔsɔɔnsɩ kɛ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa sɩ : Paa wei ɩ ́ tʋ Tafiiti Pəyalʋ kɛ ́ teeli tɔ , pə ta maɣa kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa ntɛ ́ .

text: And said unto him , Hearest thou what these say ? And Jesus saith unto them , Yea ; have ye never read , Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise ?
text2: Tənaɣa pa pɔɔsa Yesu sɩ : N nɩɩkɩ nti pa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔ ? Ɩlɛna Yesu náá cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɛɛ , ma nɩɩkɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ́ pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ ta kaləta Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ timpi pa ŋmaawa sɩ : Piya səkpesi na ahʋlʋmnaa nɔɔsɩ taa kɛ ́ n yelaa na nyá sam lɩɩna tɔ yɛɛ ?

text: And he left them , and went out of the city into Bethany ; and he lodged there .
text2: Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ ɩ yela - wɛ na ɩ ́ lɩɩ na ɩ ́ se pa ɩcatɛ , na ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ sʋʋ kʋyaŋkuɣu Petanii .

text: Now in the morning as he returned into the city , he hungered .
text2: Kʋ fema ɩlɛna Yesu kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ mələɣɩ ɩcatɛ taa , ɩlɛna nyɔɣɔsɩ kpa - ɩ mpaaʋ .

text: And when he saw a fig tree in the way , he came to it , and found nothing thereon , but leaves only , and said unto it , Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever . And presently the fig tree withered away .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ loosa fiki tʋɣʋ kɛ mpaaʋ nɔɣɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ maɣana hatʋ tike . Tənaɣa ɩ tɔma fiki tʋɣʋ sɩ : N kaa tasa pile lʋlʋɣʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ . Ɩlɛna tʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ wʋlɩ tənaɣa kpakpaa təwoŋwoŋ .

text: And when the disciples saw it , they marvelled , saying , How soon is the fig tree withered away !
text2: Yesu ɩfalaa ná mpʋ , ɩlɛna pə la - wɛɣɛ sɔɣɔntʋ kɛ sɔsɔm . Ɩlɛna pá pɔɔsɩ Yesu sɩ : Ɩsənaɣa pə lapa na fiki tʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ wʋlɩ kpakpaa kɛ mpʋ ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Verily I say unto you , If ye have faith , and doubt not , ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree , but also if ye shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; it shall be done .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔwa sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , ye ɩ ́ tʋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ naani na ɩ ́ tá lá sika , pə taɣa mpi ma lapa fiki tʋɣʋ kʋnɛ tɔ pə tike kɛ ́ ɩ ́ ká la . Ɩ ́ pəsəɣɩ na paa pulaɣa kanɛ ɩ ́ tɔ - kɛ sɩ ká kpɛsɩ na ká hoti teŋku taa , pə lakɩ kɛ ́ .

text: And all things , whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer , believing , ye shall receive .
text2: Ye ɩ ́ wɛna naani pə təna mpi ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ sɩ Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ la - mɛ tɔ , ɩ lakɩ - mɛɣɛ - wəɣɩ .

text: And when he was come into the temple , the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching , and said , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu sʋʋ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa na ɩ ́ niki sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ . Ɩlɛna kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Yuta nyə ́ ma taa sɔsaa polo na pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Kaŋkantɛ nteɣe n makɩ nyá taa na ń lakɩ ɩsəntɔ ? Yaa awe tɩɩ ha - ŋ pə mpaaʋ ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I also will ask you one thing , which if ye tell me , I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔwa Yuta sɔsaa mpɛ sɩ : Tɔʋ , ma maɣamaɣa maa pɔɔsɩ - mɛɣɛ tɔm kʋlʋmtʋ təkoŋ . Ye ɩ ́ cɔ - m ɩlɛ , maa heeli - mɛɣɛ kaŋkantɛ nte ma makɩ ma taa na má lakɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ .

text: The baptism of John , whence was it ? from heaven , or of men ? And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say unto us , Why did ye not then believe him ?
text2: Ɩsɔ yaa yəlaa tilina Yohaanɩ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔɔkɩ yəlaa kɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa maɣasa - təɣɩ pa taa pa tike . Ɩlɛna Yuta sɔsaa mpɛ pá tɔ sɩ : Ye tə tɔma sɩ Ɩsɔ tilina - ɩ , ɩ ká pɔɔsɩ - tʋ sɩ na pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə ta mʋ ɩ tɔm ɩlɛ ?

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; we fear the people ; for all hold John as a prophet .
text2: Pəyele ye tə tɔma sɩ yʋlʋ tilina - ɩ kɔlɔ , tə wɛna samaa sɔɣɔntʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pa təna pa nyəmá sɩ Yohaanɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ kɛ ́ .

text: And they answered Jesus , and said , We cannot tell . And he said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yuta sɔsaa mpɛ pa pəsəna Yesu sɩ : Tə ta nyɩ . Tənaɣa Yesu ná cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Aŋhaa , má kaa heeli - mɛɣɛ kaŋkantɛ nte ma makɩ na má lakɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ .

text: But what think ye ? A certain man had two sons ; and he came to the first , and said , Son , go work to day in my vineyard .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa Yuta sɔsaa mpɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ na - weɣe tənɛ tə taa ? Apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ka wɛnna pəyalaa kɛ naalɛ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ heeli lɛlʋ sɩ : Akele polo na ń hala ma lɛsɛŋ taalɛ taa kɛ ́ saŋa .

text: He answered and said , I will not : but afterward he repented , and went .
text2: Tənaɣa pəyalʋ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ma kaa polo . Pəlɛ pə waalɩ ɩlɛna pəyalʋ kɔɔ ɩ ́ laɣasɩ hʋwɛɛ na ɩ ́ polo .

text: And he came to the second , and said likewise . And he answered and said , I go , sir : and went not .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa caa ɩnɩ ɩ polaa na ɩ ́ heeli lɛlʋ kɛ mpʋ tɔtɔ . Ɩ ́ lɛ ́ sɩ : Tɔʋ yaa , paapa . Ama ɩ ta polo .

text: Whether of them twain did the will of his father ? They say unto him , The first . Jesus saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you .
text2: Pa naalɛ pa taa awe lapəna ntɛɣɛ ɩ caa luɣu tɛɛ nyəntʋ ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yuta sɔsaa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Kancaalaɣa nyəŋ . Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , lampuu mʋlaa na wasaŋkalənaa ká tɛɛ - mɛɣɛ nɔɣɔ kɛ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa taa .

text: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness , and ye believed him not : but the publicans and the harlots believed him : and ye , when ye had seen it , repented not afterward , that ye might believe him .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Yohaanɩ ná kɔma sɩ ɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ mpaaʋ kʋpaŋkʋ na ɩ ́ kisi ɩ tɔm mʋɣʋ . Ama lampuu mʋlaa na wasaŋkalənaa ná mʋ ɩ tɔm . Paa na mə kɔma na ɩ ́ ná ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ waalɩ waalɩ tɔ , ɩ ́ tá tɔ sɩ ɩ ́ laɣasəɣɩ mə taa hʋwɛɛ na ɩ ́ mʋ ɩ tɔm .

text: Hear another parable : There was a certain householder , which planted a vineyard , and hedged it round about , and digged a winepress in it , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa Yuta sɔsaa mpɛɣɛ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ : Ɩ ́ nɩɩ , ma sɛɛkɩ - mɛɣɛ ɩsɔ lɛlʋ . Sɔsɔ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka sɔna lɛsɛŋ kɛ taalɛ təcu na ɩ ́ ŋma koluŋa na ɩ ́ cɔɔna . Na ɩ ́ lá timpi ɩ ká nyaasəɣɩ pə lʋm tɔ . Na ɩ ́ ŋma akele taŋkaʋ wei ɩ tɔɔ pa səŋəɣɩ na pá feŋiɣi tɔ . Ɩ tɛma mpʋ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ caa yəlaa na ɩ ́ sɩɩ tə taa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɛɛ yɛla .

text: And when the time of the fruit drew near , he sent his servants to the husbandmen , that they might receive the fruits of it .
text2: Pə kɔma na pə ́ tala tɩɩŋ ɩnɩ ɩ kooluɣu waatʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋsɩ ɩ tillaa napəlɩ sɩ : Ɩ ́ polo ma təmlɛ nyə ́ ma kiŋ na pá cɛlɛ - m ma tete .

text: And the husbandmen took his servants , and beat one , and killed another , and stoned another .
text2: Tənaɣa təmlɛ nyə ́ ma mpɛ pa kpa ɩ tillaa mpɛ na pá má lɛlʋ kɛ teu , na pá kʋ lɛlʋ , na pá yoo lɛlʋ kɛ pɛɛ .

text: Again , he sent other servants more than the first : and they did unto them likewise .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɔsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ taɣana tillaa lɛlaa kɛ kʋsʋɣʋ kɛ paɣalɛ na pə ́ kəlɩ kancaalaɣa nyə ́ ma . Ɩlɛna təmlɛ nyə ́ ma tasa pɛlɛɣɛ lapʋ kɛ teitei ɩsɩɩ paa lapʋ kancaalaɣa nyə ́ ma tɔ .

text: But last of all he sent unto them his son , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ tɛɛsa ɩ pəyalʋ kɛ tiluɣu , na ɩ ́ hʋʋkɩ sɩ paa nyá ɩ pəyalʋ ɩsəlɛ .

text: But when the husbandmen saw the son , they said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and let us seize on his inheritance .
text2: Ama təmlɛ nyə ́ ma ná kɔma na pá loosi ɩ pəyalʋ , ɩlɛna pá heeli təma sɩ : Ɩɩ loosiɣi kpancoou tʋ kɔŋna ntɛ ? Ɩ ́ kɔɔ na tə ́ kʋ - ɩ na ɩ taalɛ pəsɩ tá nyəntɛ .

text: And they caught him , and cast him out of the vineyard , and slew him .
text2: Tənaɣa pá kpa - ɩ , na pá ləsɩ - ɩ taalɛ na waalɩ na pá kʋ - ɩ .

text: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh , what will he do unto those husbandmen ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pɔɔsa Yuta sɔsaa mpɛ sɩ : Taalɛ tʋ ɩ ́ kɔma na ɩ ́ kɔɔ , ɩsənaɣa ɩ ká la təmlɛ nyə ́ ma panɛ ?

text: They say unto him , He will miserably destroy those wicked men , and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen , which shall render him the fruits in their seasons .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yuta sɔsaa cɔ Yesu sɩ : Ɩ kaa nyənɩ yəlaa asaɣaa panɛ pa pətɔɔtəlɛ . Ama ɩ kʋɣɩ - wɛɣɛ , na ɩ ́ kpaɣa taalɛ na ɩ ́ cɛla lɛlaa mpa pə ́ tala pə waatʋ paa cɛlɛ - ɩ ɩ tete tɔ .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Did ye never read in the scriptures , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner : this is the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pɔɔsa Yuta sɔsaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ tá kaləta nti pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ yɛɛ ? Pa ŋmaawaɣa sɩ : Pəlɛ nte tɛtʋ ŋmalaa ŋmaakaɣa na pá lɔ tɔ , ńtɛ ́ tə tɔɔ kɔlɔ ŋmatʋ təna məlaa na tə ́ səŋ . Mpi Tacaa lapa na tə ́ nyənəɣɩ na pə ́ wɛ - tʋɣʋ piti tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: Therefore say I unto you , The kingdom of God shall be taken from you , and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa - wɛ sɩ : Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ paa lɛɛkɩ - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa na pá cɛla - kɛɣɛ yəlaa mpa pa mʋna ka təmlɛ tɔ .

text: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken : but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Ye pə cəpa wei na ɩ ́ hoti pəlɛ ntɛ ́ tə tɔɔ , tə pʋtətəɣɩ - ɩ kɛ ́ , ɩ kaa wɛɛ hiiu . Yaa pə cəpa yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ na pəlɛ ńtɛ ́ tə nyəkɩ - ɩ , tə taaləɣɩ - ɩ na atɛɣɛ .

text: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables , they perceived that he spake of them .
text2: Kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Falisanaa pa nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá nyɩ sɩ mpɛɣɛ Yesu sɛɛna ɩsɔ ɩnɩ .

text: But when they sought to lay hands on him , they feared the multitude , because they took him for a prophet .
text2: Tənaɣa pa sʋʋ mpaaʋ pɛɛkʋɣʋ sɩ pá kpa - ɩ . Ama pa nyamna samaa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pɛlɛ pá nyənaɣa Yesu kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ kɛ ́ .

text: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables , and said ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa ɩsɔnaa sɛɛʋ kɛ mpa pa nɩɩkaɣa ɩ tɔm tɔ sɩ :

text: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king , which made a marriage for his son ,
text2: Ɩɩ naa ɩsəna ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa nəɣəsənaa tɔɣɔlɔ . Wulaʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ lapəna tɔɣɔnaɣa kɛ ɩ pəyalʋ alʋ kpaɣaʋ tɔɔ .

text: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding : and they would not come .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ tila ɩ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma sɩ : Ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ yaa mpa ma lapa tɔɣɔnaɣa tɔ . Tənaɣa pɛlɛ pa kisa kɔntɛ .

text: Again , he sent forth other servants , saying , Tell them which are bidden , Behold , I have prepared my dinner : my oxen and my fatlings are killed , and all things are ready : come unto the marriage .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ taɣanɩ kʋfama kɛ tiluɣu sɩ pá heeli mpa ɩ yaa tɔɣɔʋ tɔ sɩ : Ma kʋ naaŋ kataasɩ na wontu nim nyəntʋ , na pə təna pə tɛma pɩɩʋ na pə ́ caɣaa . Pá kɔɔ na pá tɔɣɔ ma akpaɣalɛ tɔɣɔnaɣa .

text: But they made light of it , and went their ways , one to his farm , another to his merchandise :
text2: Ama mpa pa yaa mpʋ tɔ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ta ke . Paa wei ɩ tɛɛ ɩ nyəŋkʋ kɛ ́ . Ɩnɛɣɛ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ taalɛ , ɩnɛɣɛ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kʋyakʋ .

text: And the remnant took his servants , and entreated them spitefully , and slew them .
text2: Pə ́ kaasɩ lɛlaa na pɛlɛ pá kpa tillaa mpɛ na pá hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - wɛɣɛ kaŋkaŋsi na pá kʋ - wɛ .

text: But when the king heard thereof , he was wroth : and he sent forth his armies , and destroyed those murderers , and burned up their city .
text2: Tənaɣa pə lapa wulaʋ kɛ pááná na ɩ ́ tili ɩ yoolaa sɩ pá kʋ yʋlʋkʋlaa mpɛ , na ɩ ́ sɔ pa ɩcatɛ .

text: Then saith he to his servants , The wedding is ready , but they which were bidden were not worthy .
text2: Ɩ tɛma mpʋ ɩlɛna , ɩ ́ heeli ɩ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma sɩ : Tɔʋ , akpaɣalɛ tɔɣɔnaɣa pɩɩwa . Pəyele mpa ma yaawa tɔ pa laŋaa .

text: Go ye therefore into the highways , and as many as ye shall find , bid to the marriage .
text2: Mpʋ tɔ ɩ ́ polo nɔnɔɔsɩ sɔsɔɔnsɩ tɛɛ na pa təna mpa ɩ ká ná tɔ ɩ ́ yaa - wɛ sɩ pá kɔɔ na pá tɔɣɔ .

text: So those servants went out into the highways , and gathered together all as many as they found , both bad and good : and the wedding was furnished with guests .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɛlɛ pa tɛɛwa nɔnɔɔsɩ tɛɛ na pá koti pa təna mpa pa nawa tɔ , asaɣaa na pə kʋpama kɛ mpʋ , na yəlaa su acima kutuluɣu .

text: And when the king came in to see the guests , he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ wulaʋ sʋʋwa sɩ ɩ naa mpa pa pola tɔɣɔʋ tɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ maɣana nɔɣɔlʋ , ɩ ta suu akpaɣalɛ wontu .

text: And he saith unto him , Friend , how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment ? And he was speechless .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ma taapalʋ , ɩsənaɣa ń sʋʋ cənɛ na ń tá suu akpaɣalɛ wontu ? Apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ta cɔ sɩ pʋlʋ .

text: Then said the king to the servants , Bind him hand and foot , and take him away , and cast him into outer darkness ; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Tənaɣa wulaʋ heela ɩ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma sɩ : Ɩ ́ hɔkɔ ɩ niŋ na ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ na ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ pɛtɩ - ɩ səkpɛtʋɣʋ taa . Tənaɣa ɩ ká casa kapusi na ɩ ́ nyasəɣɩ ɩ təɣɩ kela .

text: For many are called , but few are chosen .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu tɔ sɩ : Pa yaa paɣalɛ , ama pəcɔɣɔ pa ləsaa .

text: Then went the Pharisees , and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa caɣaa na pá sɛɣɛsɩ ɩsəna paa nyɩ Yesu kɛ ́ katɔka na tɔm kʋpɔɔsʋtʋ na pá hiki - ɩ tɔ .

text: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians , saying , Master , we know that thou art true , and teachest the way of God in truth , neither carest thou for any man : for thou regardest not the person of men .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa tila pa ɩfalaa taa napəlɩ na Helɔtɩ kpekəle nyə ́ ma napəlɩ tɔtɔ sɩ pá polo na pá tɔ Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , tə nawa sɩ tampana kɛ n yɔɣɔtəɣɩ na ń sɛɣɛsəɣɩ teu , na ɩsəna mpi pə maɣamaɣa Ɩsɔ caa sɩ yəlaa ɩ ́ la tɔ pə tampana kɛ n heeliɣi . Nn nyaŋna nti yəlaa hʋʋ tɔ , na nn paasəɣəna tɔɔ , pə ́ cɔ ́ nn faɣasəɣɩ yəlaa .

text: Tell us therefore , What thinkest thou ? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar , or not ?
text2: Pə wɛ mpʋ tɔ , ta mpaaʋ taa pə mʋna pá fɛlɩ lampuu kɛ Lom wulaʋ sɔsɔ na ? Heeli - tʋɣʋ nti n hʋʋkɩ tɔ .

text: But Jesus perceived their wickedness , and said , Why tempt ye me , ye hypocrites ?
text2: Ama Yesu ná tɛma nyəm kɛ pa hʋwɛɛ asaɣɛɛ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Cɛsəlaa mɛ , pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ nyəkɩ - m katɔka .

text: Shew me the tribute money . And they brought unto him a penny .
text2: Ɩ ́ hʋlɩ - m liɣitee wena ɩ ́ fɛləɣɩ lampuu tɔ na má ná . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa ləsa liɣitee nyəɣəlʋɣʋ na pá cɛlɛ - ɩ .

text: And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ?
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Awe nyʋɣʋ fotoo na ɩ hətɛ kɛ pa ŋmaa pə tɔɔ cənɛ ?

text: They say unto him , Caesar ' s . Then saith he unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which are Caesar ' s ; and unto God the things that are God ' s .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Lom wulaʋ sɔsɔ kɛ ́ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ná cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ye mpʋ ɩ ́ cɛla Lom wulaʋ sɔsɔ kɛ mpi ɩ tɩ tɔ , na ɩ ́ cɛla Ɩsɔ ɩlɛɣɛ mpi ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ tɩ tɔ .

text: When they had heard these words , they marvelled , and left him , and went their way .
text2: Pa nɩɩ tɔm tənɛ ɩlɛna pə la - wɛɣɛ piti kɛ sɔsɔm . Na pá yele - ɩ na pá tɛɛ .

text: The same day came to him the Sadducees , which say that there is no resurrection , and asked him ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋyakʋ ŋkʋ kʋ maɣamaɣa Satusee nyə ́ ma napəlɩ pa kɔma Yesu kiŋ . Satusee nyə ́ ma mpɛ pa tɔŋaɣana sɩ paa pə la ɩsəna sətaa kaa tɛ na pá fe . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa pɔɔsa Yesu

text: Saying , Master , Moses said , If a man die , having no children , his brother shall marry his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: sɩ : Tacaa , Moisi ka tɔma sɩ ye yʋlʋ ɩ ́ səpa na ɩ ́ fɛɩna pəyaɣa , ɩ neu hɔŋ ɩ alʋ kɛ leelu na ɩ ́ hikina ɩ taalʋ sɔlʋ kɛ piya .

text: Now there were with us seven brethren : and the first , when he had married a wife , deceased , and , having no issue , left his wife unto his brother :
text2: Tɔʋ , yəlaa naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa ka wɛ tá hɛkʋ , yʋlʋ na ɩ newaa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ taalʋ kpaɣa alʋ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sɩ , ɩ fɛɩna pəyaɣa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ neu hɔ leelu .

text: Likewise the second also , and the third , unto the seventh .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ naalɛ nyəŋ səpa , pəyaɣa fɛɩ , na tooso nyəŋ tɔtɔɣɔ mpʋ . Haləna pə ́ polo pə siɣili pa naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa ŋkɛ ka tənaɣa mpʋ təpaɩ , nɔɣɔlʋ ta hikina - ɩ pəyaɣa .

text: And last of all the woman died also .
text2: Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ tɛɛsa səpʋ .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven ? for they all had her .
text2: Tɔʋ , sətaa fem wule pa taa aweɣelɛ alʋ tʋ ? Mpi tɔ , pa naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa ɩnɩ pa təna pa kpaɣana - ɩ alʋ .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Ye do err , not knowing the scriptures , nor the power of God .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ Satusee nyə ́ ma mpɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ ta nyɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm na ɩ toŋ tɔɣɔ pə liɣitiɣi - mɛ .

text: For in the resurrection they neither marry , nor are given in marriage , but are as the angels of God in heaven .
text2: Mpi tɔ , waatʋ wei sətaa ká fe tɔ , akpaɣalɛ tɔm kaa wɛɛ . Ama apalaa na alaa paa wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ɩsɔtaa tillaa wɛʋ tɔ .

text: But as touching the resurrection of the dead , have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God , saying ,
text2: Ye sətaa fem tɔm ɩlɛ , ɩ ́ ta kala nti Ɩsɔ heela - mɛ tɔ yɛɛ ? Ɩ tɔmaɣa sɩ :

text: I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ? God is not the God of the dead , but of the living .
text2: Ma kɛ ́ Apəlaham na Ɩsaaka na Yakɔpʋ pa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ . Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ weesuɣu nyə ́ ma nyəŋ kɛ ́ , ɩ ta kɛ sətaa Ɩsɔ .

text: And when the multitude heard this , they were astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Yəlaa samaa wei ɩ nɩɩ Yesu sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ ŋkʋ tɔ , pə lapa - wɛɣɛ piti .

text: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence , they were gathered together .
text2: Waatʋ wei Falisanaa nɩɩwa sɩ Yesu lapa na Satusee nyə ́ ma ta hiki kʋcɔcɔtʋ ɩlɛna pá koti .

text: Then one of them , which was a lawyer , asked him a question , tempting him , and saying ,
text2: Ɩlɛna pa taa Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ kɔɔ sɩ ɩ ́ kuuki Yesu nɔɣɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ Yesu sɩ :

text: Master , which is the great commandment in the law ?
text2: Tacaa , Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa tɔm ntiɣilɛ sɔsɔɔntʋ ?

text: Jesus said unto him , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : N ká sɔɔlɩ Tacaa nyá Ɩsɔ na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ na nyá ləsaɣa sʋʋ - ɩ təmammam .

text: This is the first and great commandment .
text2: Kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa sɔsɔɔntʋ ntɛ ́ , na ntɩ tə kələna tə təna .

text: And the second is like unto it , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Na kʋkələtʋ lɛntɩ tɔtɔɣɔlɛ , sɩ n ká sɔɔlɩ nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ kɛ ɩsɩɩ nyá tɩ .

text: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets .
text2: Tɔm naalɛ ɩnɛ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təna na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa tɔm təna səŋaa .

text: While the Pharisees were gathered together , Jesus asked them ,
text2: Falisanaa kota mpʋ , ɩlɛna Yesu pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ :

text: Saying , What think ye of Christ ? whose son is he ? They say unto him , The Son of David .
text2: Ɩ ́ hʋʋ suweɣe Mesii tɔɔ ? Awe lʋlʋɣʋ tʋ kɛ - ɩ ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɛlɛ pa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tafiiti lʋlʋɣʋ tʋ kɛ ́ .

text: He saith unto them , How then doth David in spirit call him Lord , saying ,
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Ye pə wɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣa pə lapa na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ náá lá na Tafiiti yaa - ɩ sɩ Tacaa ? Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Tafiiti yɔɣɔtaa sɩ :

text: The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: Tacaa Ɩsɔ heela ma Sɔsɔ sɩ , caɣa ma kɔŋkɔŋ taa , haləna má kɔna nyá kolontunaa kɛ nyá nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ .

text: If David then call him Lord , how is he his son ?
text2: Ye Tafiiti ná yaa - ɩ ɩ Sɔsɔ , ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣa Mesii ná məlaa na ɩ ́ kɛ ́ Tafiiti lʋlʋɣʋ tʋ tɔtɔ ?

text: And no man was able to answer him a word , neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions .
text2: Pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ta pəsɩ na ɩ ́ cɔ . Pə kpaɣaʋ kʋyakʋ ŋkʋ tɔ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩɩ nyɩɩləɣɩ sɩ ɩ pɔɔsəɣɩ - ɩ tɔm .

text: Then spake Jesus to the multitude , and to his disciples ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu heela samaa na ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ :

text: Saying , The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses ' seat :
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na Falisanaa təmlɛ ntɛ ́ sɩ pá kɛ ́ ɛ ́ sɩ ́ yəlaa kɛ Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ .

text: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe , that observe and do ; but do not ye after their works : for they say , and do not .
text2: Ɩ ́ ká nɩɩna - wɛɣɛ teu na ɩ ́ la pə təna mpi pa heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ la tɔ . Ama ɩ ́ taa la ɩsɩɩ mpɛ pa maɣamaɣa pa lakɩ tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , nti pa sɛɣɛsəɣɩ tɔ , pə taɣa ntəɣɩ pa lakɩ .

text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne , and lay them on men ' s shoulders ; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers .
text2: Pa kpakəɣɩ səɣəla yuŋ nyəna na pá sʋkəɣɩ lɛlaa . Pəyele mpɛ paa caa sɩ pá tɩɩ taa - wɛɣɛ taaʋ maɣamaɣa .

text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men : they make broad their phylacteries , and enlarge the borders of their garments ,
text2: Pa lakɩ pə tənaɣa sɩ yəlaa ɩ ́ na - wɛ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa ŋmaakɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm loosi na pá tʋɣɩ , na pá kɔɔkɩ pa kpaɩnaa təcɛŋcɛŋ .

text: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts , and the chief seats in the synagogues ,
text2: Acima taa sɔsaa sɔsaa təcaɣalɛ kɛ pa pɛɛkəɣɩ na pá cakɩ . Na Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa taa teeli teeli təcaɣalɛ kɛ pa pɛɛkəɣɩ .

text: And greetings in the markets , and to be called of men , Rabbi , Rabbi .
text2: Pa sɔɔla pá sɛɛkɩ - wɛɣɛ samaa taa kɛ ́ na pá luŋiɣi na pá yaakɩ - wɛ sɩ ta caa ta caa .

text: But be not ye called Rabbi : for one is your Master , even Christ ; and all ye are brethren .
text2: Ama mɛ , ɩ ́ taa yele na pá yaa - mɛ sɩ ta caa ta caa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mə təna ɩ ́ wɛ teitei kɛ ́ , na mə Sɔsɔ ntɛ ́ kʋlʋm .

text: And call no man your father upon the earth : for one is your Father , which is in heaven .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa yaa atɛ cənɛɣɛ nɔɣɔlʋ sɩ mə caa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mə Caa wɛ kʋlʋm kɛ ́ təkoŋ , na ɩnəɣəlɛ wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ .

text: Neither be ye called masters : for one is your Master , even Christ .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa yele sɩ pá yaa - mɛɣɛ sɔsɔ sɔsɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mə Sɔsɔ wɛ kʋlʋm kɛ təkoŋ , ɩnəɣəlɛ Mesii .

text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant .
text2: Mə taa sɔsɔ ɩ ́ pəsɩ mə təmlɛ tʋ .

text: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased ; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted .
text2: Wei ɩ ́ kpaasa ɩ tɩ paa tisi - ɩ , na wei ɩ tisiɣi ɩ tɩ paa kʋsɩ ɩ nyʋɣʋ .

text: But woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men : for ye neither go in yourselves , neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in .
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na Falisanaa , cɛsəlaa mɛ , mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo . Ɩ ́ təkəɣɩ yəlaa kɛ ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa . Mə maɣamaɣa ɩɩ sʋʋkɩ , pəyele ɩɩ yeki sɩ mpa pɛlɛ pa luɣu wɛɛ tɔ pá sʋʋ .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na Falisanaa , cɛsəlaa mɛ , mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo . Ɩ ́ lɛɛkəɣɩ leelaa kɛ pə təna mpi pa wɛna tɔ , na ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ na pə ́ taɣaləɣɩ sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ mɛɣɛ kʋpama . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ ká tɛ na ɩ ́ ná katatəlaɣa naʋ napələɣɩ teu .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte , and when he is made , ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves .
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na Falisanaa , cɛsəlaa mɛ , mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo . Ɩ ́ cɔɔkɩ kateŋa təna , na pə ́ kpɛŋna teŋku tɔɔ sɩ ɩ ́ hiki Ɩsɔ sɛɛlʋ kʋlʋm maɣamaɣa təkoŋ . Na ɩ ́ tɩɩ hika - ɩ kɔlɔ , ɩ ́ lapɩ - ɩ ɩsaɣaʋ . Haləna ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ nəɣəsəna tənaasəlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa sʋʋʋ na pə kəlɩ ɩsɩɩ mɛɣɛ tɔm naalɛ .

text: Woe unto you , ye blind guides , which say , Whosoever shall swear by the temple , it is nothing ; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple , he is a debtor !
text2: Mpa mɛ ɩ ́ hɔŋ lɛlaa pəyele mə ɩsɛ naa naa tɔ , mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo . Ɩ ́ tɔŋ sɩ ye yʋlʋ tuuna Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩ ta tuu kɛlɛ . Ama ye ɩ tuuna Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa wʋla ɩlɛ ɩ tuuwaɣalɛ .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gold , or the temple that sanctifieth the gold ?
text2: Ama mə kʋmɛlɛntʋ na mə yʋlʋmlɛ tɔɔwa yoo . Pepe kəlaa ? Wʋla yaa Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ nte tə lapa wʋla ɩnəɣɩ katɛ pʋlʋ tɔ ?

text: And , Whosoever shall swear by the altar , it is nothing ; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it , he is guilty .
text2: Ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔtɔ sɩ ye yʋlʋ ɩ ́ tuuna kɔtaɣa təlatɛ pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩ ta tuuna kɛlɛ . Ama ye ɩ tuuna mpi pə maɣamaɣa pa lapa kɔtaɣa na pə wɛ kɔtaɣa təlatɛ ɩlɛ ɩ tuunaa kɛlɛ .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gift , or the altar that sanctifieth the gift ?
text2: Yʋlʋmaa mɛ , pepe kəlaa ? Kɔtaɣa təlatɛ yaa kɔtaɣa nyəm mpi kɔtaɣa təlatɛ lakɩ na pə ́ pəsɩ katɛ pʋlʋ tɔ ?

text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar , sweareth by it , and by all things thereon .
text2: Ye yʋlʋ tuuna kɔtaɣa təlatɛ , ɩ kpɛŋna pə təna mpi pə wɛ kɔtaɣa təlatɛ taa tɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ tuuna .

text: And whoso shall swear by the temple , sweareth by it , and by him that dwelleth therein .
text2: Yʋlʋ ɩ ́ tuuna Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ , ɩ kpɛŋna Ɩsɔ wei ɩ cakɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ ntɛ tə taa tɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ tuuna .

text: And he that shall swear by heaven , sweareth by the throne of God , and by him that sitteth thereon .
text2: Yʋlʋ ɩ ́ tuuna ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ , ɩ kpɛŋna Ɩsɔ kumte na Ɩsɔ wei ɩ caɣa tə tɔɔ tɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ tuuna .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin , and have omitted the weightier matters of the law , judgment , mercy , and faith : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na Falisanaa , cɛsəlaa mɛ , mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo . Ye ɩ hika nyɩɩtʋ nti pa yaa sɩ mantɩ na fenuwili na kumɛŋ , ɩ ́ ləsəɣɩ pə hɔɣɔləŋ naanʋwa taa kʋlʋm na ɩ ́ cɛləɣɩ Ɩsɔ . Pə kaasɩ na ɩ ́ lɔɔkəna mə lumasɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa sɔsɔɔntʋ . Təlɛɣɛlɛ siɣisuɣu na kʋpantʋ na tampana təŋʋɣʋ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ təlɛɣɛ pə mʋna ɩ ́ sɛɛsəna ɩsəlɛ . Ɩlɛ ɩ ́ taa sɔɔ hɔɣɔləŋ naanʋwa taa kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .
text2: Mpa mɛ ɩ ́ hɔŋ lɛlaa , pəyele mə ɩsɛ naa naa tɔ , ye ɩ na mə lʋm taa kɛ ́ kacɔka ɩ ́ ləsəɣɩ kɛ ́ . Ama ye yooyoo ɩlɛ , ɩ ́ kpɛntəna na ɩ ́ li .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter , but within they are full of extortion and excess .
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na Falisanaa , cɛsəlaa mɛ , mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo . Iyisi na nyənasɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ nyaaləɣɩ təlailai , na sɩ taa suna mə kʋŋmɩɩləm na mə ɩsaɣatʋ hʋwɛɛ .

text: Thou blind Pharisee , cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter , that the outside of them may be clean also .
text2: Falisanaa yʋlʋmaa mɛ , pə wɛɛ sɩ iyaɣa taa kɛ ́ ɩ ́ ká nyaalɩ na ɩ ́ kpɛnna waalɩ , na pə təna pə ́ la tənaŋŋ .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres , which indeed appear beautiful outward , but are within full of dead men ' s bones , and of all uncleanness .
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na Falisanaa , cɛsəlaa mɛ , mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo . Ɩ ́ wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ pəlaaŋ wei pa hʋləsaa na ɩ nyənʋɣʋ wɛ teu , na ɩ taa suna mʋwa na kʋsɔɣɔtʋ ntɩ tə təna tɔ .

text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men , but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity .
text2: Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ ɩ ́ wɛɛ , yʋlʋ ɩ ́ nyəna - mɛɣɛ ɩsɛntɔɔ , ɩ tɔŋ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ kʋpama . Ama mə taa ɩlɛ , cɛsʋɣʋ na ɩsaɣatʋ pə maɣaləna .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! because ye build the tombs of the prophets , and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous ,
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na Falisanaa , cɛsəlaa mɛ , mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo . Ɩ ́ taɣanəɣɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa pəlaaŋ kɛ teu təmammam , na ɩ ́ lakɩ kacɔka kɛ mpa pa təŋa tampana tɔ pa pəlaaŋ .

text: And say , If we had been in the days of our fathers , we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets .
text2: Na ɩ ́ tɔŋ sɩ : Ye tɩɩ wɛ waatʋ wei ta caanaa kʋkaɣa Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa mpɛ tɔ , tə taa təŋ - wɛ na tə ́ kʋ - wɛ .

text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves , that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets .
text2: Na ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ́ hʋləɣəna sɩ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ mpa paa kʋwa Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa mpɛ tɔ pa piya .

text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers .
text2: Mpʋ tɔ , pa akpaa kɛ ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ , na mpi pɛlɛ paa caalaa na pá sɩɩ tɔ mpəɣɩ ɩ ́ tɛɛsəɣɩ .

text: Ye serpents , ye generation of vipers , how can ye escape the damnation of hell ?
text2: Tʋmaa piya mɛ , akalanaa mɛ . Ɩ ́ tɔŋ tɔ , ɩ ́ tá kɛ ́ tənaasəlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa sʋʋlaa ntɛ ?

text: Wherefore , behold , I send unto you prophets , and wise men , and scribes : and some of them ye shall kill and crucify ; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues , and persecute them from city to city :
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ nɩɩ yoo . Maa tili Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa na laɣatʋnaa na ɩsɛkullaa kɛ mə kiŋ . Ɩ ́ ká kʋ lɛlaa kɛ kʋkʋɣʋ , na ɩ ́ ká lɛlaa kɛ səm tesikasɩ tɔɔ . Ɩ ́ ká ma lɛlaa kɛ akpatɛɛ kɛ mə təkotilenaa taa na ɩ ́ təŋ na ɩ ́ pɛɛkɩ - wɛɣɛ acalɛɛ taa .

text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth , from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias , whom ye slew between the temple and the altar .
text2: Mpa paa kʋwa yem kɛ tulum tɔ , mə nyɔɔŋ taa kɛ ́ pa kʋlaa ɩsaɣatʋ ká məlɩ . Pə kpaɣaʋ yʋlʋpaŋ Apɛɛlɩ kʋɣʋ na pə ́ polo Palasii pəyalʋ Sakalɩ wei ɩ ́ kʋ katɛ taa katɛ na kɔtaɣa təlatɛ pə hɛkʋ tɔ ɩ nyəm tɔ .

text: Verily I say unto you , All these things shall come upon this generation .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , kaɣana nyə ́ ma nyɔɔŋ taa kɛ ́ pɩɩ tɛna .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , thou that killest the prophets , and stonest them which are sent unto thee , how often would I have gathered thy children together , even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: Hei Yosalɛm , Yosalɛm , nyá taa kɛ ́ pa kʋɣɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa , na nyá taa tɔtɔɣɔ pa yooki Ɩsɔ tillaa kɛ pɛɛ na pá kʋɣɩ . Tɔm paɣalɛ kɛ ma sɔɔlaa sɩ ma kpeɣeliɣi nyá taa yəlaa təna təkotokoto ɩsɩɩ kantuɣu papʋɣʋ kʋ piya tɔɔ tɔ . Ama pa kisaa .

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate .
text2: Tɔʋ , mə təyaɣa ká təkɩ kaaʋ təkpataa , nɔɣɔlʋ kaa paasəna - kɛ .

text: For I say unto you , Ye shall not see me henceforth , till ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma heeliɣi - mɛ təfoo sɩ , pə kpaɣaʋ saŋa tɔ ɩ ́ kaa tasa - m keesuɣu . Haləna pə tala wʋlɛ nte ɩ ́ ká tɔ sɩ : Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ səna Tacaa tillu tɔ .

text: And Jesus went out , and departed from the temple : and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple .
text2: Yesu lɩɩna Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa na ɩ ́ tɔŋna tɛɛʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa kpətəna - ɩ na pá hʋlɩ - ɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ ŋmatʋ .

text: And Jesus said unto them , See ye not all these things ? verily I say unto you , There shall not be left here one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ntɔŋ ɩ ́ nawa pə təna ɩsəntɔ ? Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , pə kaa kaasɩ pəlɛ lɛntɛ na tə ́ təna lɛntɛ tɔɔ , paa tusi pə təna .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives , the disciples came unto him privately , saying , Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign of thy coming , and of the end of the world ?
text2: Yesu kɔma na ɩ ́ caɣa Olifinaa pʋɣʋ tɔɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa faɣasɩ na pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Heeli - tʋɣʋ kʋyaŋku mpʋ ɩnɩ pɩɩ la tɔ . Nmaatəlɛ nteɣe pɩɩ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ na tə nyəna nyá kɔntɛ na antulinya tɛm .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Take heed that no man deceive you .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ , ɩ ́ taa yele na nɔɣɔlʋ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ tolisi - mɛ .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Mpi tɔ , paɣalɛ ká kɔɔ na pá ha pa təɣɩ ma hətɛ sɩ mpɛɣɛlɛ Mesii . Halɩ paa tolisi paɣalɛ .

text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars : see that ye be not troubled : for all these things must come to pass , but the end is not yet .
text2: Ɩ ́ ká nɩɩ yooŋ taŋ kɛ mə cɔlɔ mə cɔlɔ . Paa heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ pooluŋ yooŋ tɔmnaa . Ama ɩ ́ taa yele na mpʋ ɩnɩ pə ́ cɛ mə laŋa . Pə wɛɛ sɩ mpʋ ɩnɩ pəlɛ pɩɩ la kɛ ́ . Ama waalɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ antulinya náá kɔɔ na ɩ ́ tɛŋ .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be famines , and pestilences , and earthquakes , in divers places .
text2: Tɛtʋ kateŋa lɛŋka ká yoona lɛŋka nyə ́ ma , kawulaɣa lɛŋka ká kʋlɩ lɛŋka tɔɔ . Nyɔɣɔsɩ ká la tiiliwɛ tiiliwɛ , tɛtʋ ka sele tiiliwɛ tiiliwɛ tɔtɔ .

text: All these are the beginning of sorrows .
text2: Pənɛ ɩnɩ pə təna pə wɛna ɩsɩɩ alʋ lʋlʋɣʋ na pə caalɩ - ɩ wɩɩʋ kɛ səŋŋsəŋŋ tɔ .

text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted , and shall kill you : and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name ' s sake .
text2: Yəlaa ká kʋlɩ na pá hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ pá tʋ - mɛɣɛ kʋnyɔŋ , na paa kʋ - mɛ . Kateŋa təna yəlaa taa ká kpana - mɛɣɛ ma tɔɔ .

text: And then shall many be offended , and shall betray one another , and shall hate one another .
text2: Yəlaa paɣalɛ ká lɔ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ tɔm kɛ waatʋ ɩnɩ , na paa lɩɩ təma waalɩ , na pa taa kpana təma .

text: And many false prophets shall rise , and shall deceive many .
text2: Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa pɔpɔtʋnaa ká lɩɩ paɣalɛ na pá tolisi yəlaa kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: And because iniquity shall abound , the love of many shall wax cold .
text2: Ɩsaɣatʋ ká tɔɔ sɔsɔm sɔsɔm , haləna yəlaa paɣalɛ sɔɔlʋɣʋ ká pasa .

text: But he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Ama ye wei ɩ nyaɣa apalʋtʋ na ɩ ́ tala tənaɣa , pʋntʋ nyʋɣʋ kɛ pɩɩ ya .

text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations ; and then shall the end come .
text2: Pə wɛɛ sɩ paa kpaalɩ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ antulinya təna taa kɛ ́ na paa piitim mpi pə ́ nɩɩ . Ye pə tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ lapʋ kɛ antulinya ka tɛ .

text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , stand in the holy place , ( whoso readeth , let him understand : )
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ ɩ ́ ká kɔɔ na ɩ ́ ná acaalətʋ taa acaalətʋ nti tə tɔm Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Taniyɛɛlɩ ka yɔɣɔtaa tɔɣɔ katɛ taa . Wei ɩ kaləɣɩ tɔ ɩ ́ cɛkəna - təɣɩ teu .

text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains :
text2: Mpʋ ɩnɩ tɔ , mpa paa wɛ Yuta tɔ pá se na pá kpa pɔ ́ ɔ ́ ŋ .

text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Ye pə maɣana wei na ɩ ́ wɛ kutuluɣu tɔɔ na ɩ ́ tiiwa , ɩ taa tɔ sɩ ɩ sʋʋkɩ təyaɣa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa ɩ pʋlʋ .

text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes .
text2: Na wei pɩɩ maɣana ɩ wɛ taalɛ tɔ ɩ ́ taa tɔ sɩ ɩ kpeŋ ɩ tɛ na ɩ ́ kɛlɩ ɩ kpaɩ .

text: And woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Ahusitonaa na asɔŋ tɔm ká la waɩyo kɛ ́ waatʋ ɩnɩ .

text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter , neither on the sabbath day :
text2: Ɩ ́ sələmɩ Ɩsɔ na mə kʋseu kʋnɛ kʋ taa pamsəna watʋ waatʋ yaa kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule .

text: For then shall be great tribulation , such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time , no , nor ever shall be .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , waatʋ ɩnɩ wahala ká la sɔɣɔntʋ kɛ sɔsɔm pə tɩɩ fɛɩ . Pa ta nata wahala ɩnɩ ɩ taka kɛ hatoo antulinya kancaalaɣa na pə ́ kɔɔ saŋa , na pa kaa tasa ɩ taka kɛ ́ naʋ .

text: And except those days should be shortened , there should no flesh be saved : but for the elect ' s sake those days shall be shortened .
text2: Na ye pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ hʋʋwa sɩ ɩ ká pasa kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɩ tɔɔ , nɔɣɔlʋ kaa tʋlɩ - tɩ . Ama ɩ pasa pə kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnəɣɩ yəlaa mpa ɩ ləsaa tɔ pa tɔɔ .

text: Then if any man shall say unto you , Lo , here is Christ , or there ; believe it not .
text2: Na ye yʋlʋ tɔma - mɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ nyənɩ , Mesii wɛ cənɛ yaa cənɛ , ɩ ́ taa nɩɩ .

text: For there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders ; insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Mesiinaa na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛlɛsəlaa pɔpɔtʋnaa ká lɩɩ na pá lá kɔkɔlɔ nyəmnaa na piti təma . Halɩ ye paa pəsaɣa pa puɣusiɣi mpa pa maɣamaɣa Ɩsɔ ləsaa tɔɣɔ .

text: Behold , I have told you before .
text2: Tɔʋ , ma laalaa na má kpaalɩ - mɛɣɛlɛ .

text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you , Behold , he is in the desert ; go not forth : behold , he is in the secret chambers ; believe it not .
text2: Mpʋ tɔ ye pa kɔma na pá heeli - mɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ nyənɩ , ɩ wɛnna ntɛɣɛ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa , ɩ ́ taa polo . Yaa sɩ , ɩnɩ ɩ ŋmɛləna ntɛɣɛ cənɛ , ɩ ́ taa nɩɩ .

text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east , and shineth even unto the west ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa ma ma kɔntɛ ká la kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ tɛʋ nyəɣəsʋɣʋ hatoo tɛʋ kite tɛɛ na pə ́ kaləsəna kʋ nɔɣɔ tɔ .

text: For wheresoever the carcase is , there will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Timpi pʋlʋ səpa na pə ́ həntaa tɔ tənaɣa yepelekunaa kotiɣi .

text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light , and the stars shall fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken :
text2: Wahala kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɛɛkɩ kpakpaa tɔ , ilim ká sɩ təkpitii , ɩsɔtʋ kaa tasa hʋlʋmʋɣʋ . Ɩsɔtʋlʋŋasɩ ká lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa na sɩ hoti . Pɩɩ ciɣiti ɩsɔtaa kɔkɔlɔnaa .

text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven : and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn , and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnəɣɩ paa nɩɩ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma taŋ kɛ ɩsɔtɔntʋɣʋ taa . Kateŋa təna taa yəlaa ká kpa pa laŋa na pá wii sɔsɔm . Paa na Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma səŋa ɩsɔŋmʋntʋɣʋ tɔɔ na má tiiki na ma toma kɛ sɔsɔm na ma teeli .

text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet , and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from one end of heaven to the other .
text2: Akantəlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ ká wii , ɩlɛna má tili ma ɩsɔtaa tillaa kɛ antulinya hɔɣɔləŋ təna taa . Pə kpaɣaʋ ilim təlɩɩlɛ na pə tətʋlɛ tɔ , na pə ́ polo pə ntɔɣɔŋ na pə mpətəŋ tɔɔ , sɩ pá cɔɔ pá koti mpa ma ləsaa tɔɣɔ antulinya təna taa .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When his branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is nigh :
text2: Ɩ ́ nyənna fiki tʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ cɛkəna . Saa wei kʋ nɛɣɛtəɣɩ na kʋ hatʋ yɛɣɛləɣɩ tɔ , ɩ ́ nyəmá kpakpaa sɩ hɛɛsʋɣʋ talaa kɛlɛ .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall see all these things , know that it is near , even at the doors .
text2: Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ waatʋ wei ɩ ́ ká ná pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə lakɩ tɔ , ɩ ́ nyɩ sɩ pə wʋsaa kɛlɛ , pə caa lapʋ ntɛ ́ .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass , till all these things be fulfilled .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , yəlaa mpa pa wɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ pa kaa sɩ pa təna na pə ́ cɔ ́ pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə ́ la .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ na atɛ ká mʋkɩ yem . Ama ma kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ kaa saalɩ paa pəcɔ .

text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels of heaven , but my Father only .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ fɛɩ wei ɩ nyəmá pə waatʋ yaa pə wʋlɛ tɔ , paa ɩsɔtaa tillaa na Pəyaɣa má ma maɣamaɣa . Ama Tacaa tike təkoŋ nyəmna .

text: But as the days of Noe were , so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Ɩsəna pɩɩ lapa Nowee pɔɔlɛ taa tɔ , mpʋ ɩnɩ pə maɣamaɣa pɩɩ lana kʋyaŋku Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má maa kɔɔ tɔ .

text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking , marrying and giving in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark ,
text2: Kʋpam , kʋyɛɛŋ wei ɩ taa lʋm taa waasəta tɛtʋ tɔɔ tɔ , pə tɔkaɣa kɛ ́ na pə ́ nyɔɔkɩ , na pə ́ haa təmaɣa alaa , na pə ́ kpakəɣɩ mpʋ yoo , haləna kʋyaŋku Nowee sʋʋ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa tɔ .

text: And knew not until the flood came , and took them all away ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Pa caɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yem kɛ ́ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ , pa ta hʋʋ pʋlʋ tɔɔ . Haləna lʋm sɔsɔɔm kɔɔ na pə ́ tɔɣɔ pa təna təpaɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɩɩ la kʋyaŋku Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má maa kɔɔ tɔ .

text: Then shall two be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Pɩɩ pana apalaa naalɛ ká wɛɛ taalɛ . Pɩɩ kpaɣa lɛlʋ na pə ́ yele lɛlʋ .

text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Pɩɩ pana alaa naalɛ wɛ nama tɔɔ na pá naŋəɣɩ . Pɩɩ kpaɣa lɛlʋ na pə ́ yele lɛlʋ .

text: Watch therefore : for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come .
text2: Ɩ ́ feŋ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ ́ ta nyɩ kʋyaŋku mə Sɔsɔ ka kɔɔ tɔ .

text: But know this , that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come , he would have watched , and would not have suffered his house to be broken up .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyɩ teu sɩ ye nyəm ka nyəŋaɣa na təyaɣa caa nyɩ waatʋ wei ŋmɩɩlʋ ká kɔɔ ahoo tɔ , ɩ ka caɣana ɩ ɩsɛ kɛ ́ . Ɩ kaa yele - ɩ na ɩ ́ sʋʋ ɩ təyaɣa .

text: Therefore be ye also ready : for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ mɛ tɔtɔ mɩɩ taɣanɩ mə təɣɩ mpʋ . Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma kɔŋ kɔntɛ kɛ waatʋ wei ɩ ́ kaa hʋʋ tɔɣɔ .

text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant , whom his lord hath made ruler over his household , to give them meat in due season ?
text2: Aweɣe təmlɛ tʋ kʋpaŋ na laɣatʋ ? Ye pə taɣa wei ɩ caa yelina - ɩ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma lɛlaa sɩ ɩ ́ nyənəɣɩ - wɛ , na pə ́ talaa ɩ cɛlɛ - wɛɣɛ pa kʋtɔɣɔʋ tɔ ?

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Cɛcɛ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ kɔma na ɩ ́ məlɩ na ɩ ́ maɣana təmlɛ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ɩsəlɛ sɛɛna təmlɛ ńtɛ ́ tə lapʋ , ɩ nyʋɣʋ lapa leleŋ kɛ ́ .

text: Verily I say unto you , That he shall make him ruler over all his goods .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , təyaɣa caa ka tʋ təmlɛ tʋ ɩnəɣɩ ɩ kʋpam təna tɔɔ feŋuɣu kɛ ́ .

text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ;
text2: Ama pə ́ cəpa təmlɛ tʋ ɩnɩ na ɩ ́ tʋ ɩ taa sɩ : Ma caa kaa kɔɔ lɔŋ se .

text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants , and to eat and drink with the drunken ;
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sʋʋ ɩ taapalaa kɛ mapʋ , na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ , na ɩ ́ na sʋlʋnyɔɔlaa lɛlaa pá sʋʋ sʋlʋm nyɔɔʋ na pə ́ kʋɣɩ - wɛ .

text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him , and in an hour that he is not aware of ,
text2: Pɩɩ kɔɔ na kʋyakʋ ŋku na ɩsəma waatʋ ɩ taa tʋ ɩ taa sɩ təyaɣa tʋ ka tala tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ká sʋʋ təkpʋʋʋ .

text: And shall cut him asunder , and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Na ɩ ́ la təmlɛ tʋ ɩnɩ təkaŋkaŋ , na ɩ ́ mələna - ɩ na ɩ ́ pɛtɩ - ɩ cɛsəlaa tɔɔ . Tənaɣa ɩ ka casəɣɩ kapusi na ɩ ́ nyasəɣɩ ɩ təɣɩ kela .

text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins , which took their lamps , and went forth to meet the bridegroom .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ , ɩsɔtaa Kawulaɣa ká nəɣəsəna kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ pɛɛlaa naanʋwa wei ɩ kpaɣa fətəlanaa na ɩ ́ tɛɛ akpaɣalʋ səŋʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: And five of them were wise , and five were foolish .
text2: Pa taa kakpasɩ kɛ kʋmɛlɛməŋ na kakpasɩ kɛ laɣatʋnaa .

text: They that were foolish took their lamps , and took no oil with them :
text2: Kʋmɛlɛməŋ ná kpaɣa fətəlanaa , ɩlɛna pá yele nim cosuɣu sɩ pa tɔkəɣɩ pa tɔɔ .

text: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps .
text2: Ama laɣatʋnaa ná kpaɣa pa fətəlanaa , ɩlɛna pá cosi nim kɛ kpaləpanaa taa na pá tɔkɩ pa tɔɔ tɔtɔ .

text: While the bridegroom tarried , they all slumbered and slept .
text2: Akpaɣalʋ fɛɩ ɩ ́ kɔɔ lɔŋ , ɩlɛna tom caŋ na pə ́ kɛlɩ - wɛ na pá too pa naanʋwa ɩnɩ .

text: And at midnight there was a cry made , Behold , the bridegroom cometh ; go ye out to meet him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə kɛɛsa ahoo hɛka , ɩlɛna pá nɩɩ pə kiisaa sɩ : Akpaɣalʋ ntɛ ́ , ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ səŋɩ - ɩ .

text: Then all those virgins arose , and trimmed their lamps .
text2: Tənaɣa pɛɛlaa mpɛ pa fema na pá nyɔɔsəɣɩ pa fətəlanaa .

text: And the foolish said unto the wise , Give us of your oil ; for our lamps are gone out .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋmɛlɛməŋ tɔma laɣatʋnaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ pasa - tʋɣʋ mə nim , ta fətəlanaa caa tem .

text: But the wise answered , saying , Not so ; lest there be not enough for us and you : but go ye rather to them that sell , and buy for yourselves .
text2: Ɩlɛna laɣatʋnaa náá cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ye tə pasa - mɛ pə kaa tala tá . Ɩ ́ polo pɛɛtəlaa cɔlɔ na ɩ ́ ya .

text: And while they went to buy , the bridegroom came ; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage : and the door was shut .
text2: Waatʋ wei kʋmɛlɛməŋ tɛɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ nim yapʋ tɔ , ɩlɛna akpaɣalʋ tala . Na ɩ ́ na mpa pa sɔɔlʋ ka pɩɩwa mpʋ tɔ pá sʋʋ akpaɣalɛ kʋtɔɣɔʋ tətɔɣɔlɛ taa , na pá təkɩ nɔnɔɣɔ na pá kaləsɩ təkem .

text: Afterward came also the other virgins , saying , Lord , Lord , open to us .
text2: Pə lapa laasaɣa ɩlɛ kʋmɛlɛməŋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ məlaa kɛlɛ , na ɩ ́ tɔŋ sɩ : Tacaa Tacaa , tʋlɩ - tʋ .

text: But he answered and said , Verily I say unto you , I know you not .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ akpaɣalʋ ná cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , ma ta nyɩ - mɛ .

text: Watch therefore , for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ kpaalʋɣʋ sɩ ye mpʋ ɩ ́ feŋiɣi . Mpi tɔ , ɩ ́ ta nyɩ kʋyaŋku na ɩsəna waatʋ pɩɩ la tɔ .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country , who called his own servants , and delivered unto them his goods .
text2: Pɩɩ nəɣəsəna kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ kʋlʋɣʋ sɩ ɩ tɛɛ yɛla , na ɩ ́ yaa ɩ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma na ɩ ́ tʋ pa niŋ taa kɛ ́ ɩ wɛnaʋ tɔ .

text: And unto one he gave five talents , to another two , and to another one ; to every man according to his several ability ; and straightway took his journey .
text2: Ɩ yaa kancaalaɣa nyəŋ na ɩ ́ cɛlɛ ɩlɛɣɛ wʋla nyəɣətʋ nasəlɛ na nɩɩnʋwa ( 500 ) . Na ɩ ́ yaa lɛlʋ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ cɛla ɩlɛɣɛ wʋla nyəɣətʋ ŋmʋnʋɣʋ ( 200 ) . Pə tala tooso nyəŋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ cɛla ɩlɛɣɛ wʋla nyəɣətʋ nɩɩnʋwa ( 100 ) . Ɩ kɛɛsəna paa wei ɩ pəsʋɣʋ kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ cɛlɛ - ɩ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ .

text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same , and made them other five talents .
text2: Tənaɣa wei ɩ ka cɛla nyəɣətʋ nasəlɛ na nɩɩnʋwa ( 500 ) tɔ ɩ tɛɛ kpakpaa na ɩ ́ sʋʋ taatʋɣʋ , na pə ́ sɛɛ - ɩ nyəɣətʋ nasəlɛ na nɩɩnʋwa ( 500 ) tɔtɔ .

text: And likewise he that had received two , he also gained other two .
text2: Wei paa cɛla nyəɣətʋ ŋmʋnʋɣʋ ( 200 ) tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ taata mpʋ tɔtɔ , na pə ́ sɛɛ - ɩ nyəɣətʋ ŋmʋnʋɣʋ ( 200 ) tɔtɔ .

text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth , and hid his lord ' s money .
text2: Ama wei paa cɛla nyəɣətʋ nɩɩnʋwa tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ polaa kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ huli pʋ ́ ʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɛ atɛ na ɩ ́ ŋmɛsɩ pa caa liɣitee anɩ .

text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh , and reckoneth with them .
text2: Pə leelaa , ɩlɛna pa caa ɩnɩ ɩ ́ kɔɔ . Ɩ tala mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yaa - wɛ sɩ pá hʋlɩ - ɩ ɩsəna pa lapa pa liɣitee na pə lɩɩ mpi tɔ .

text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents , saying , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me five talents : behold , I have gained beside them five talents more .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ wei cɛcɛ ka cɛla nyəɣətʋ nasəlɛ na nɩɩnʋwa ( 500 ) tɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ hʋlɩ - ɩ nyəɣətʋ nasəlɛ na nɩɩnʋwa ( 500 ) wei pə sɛɛ - ɩ tɔ . Na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tacaa , n ka cɛla - m nyəɣətʋ nasəlɛ na nɩɩnʋwa ( 500 ) , na pə ́ sɛɛ - m nyəɣətʋ nasəlɛ na nɩɩnʋwa tɔtɔ .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , thou good and faithful servant : thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Pə wɛ teu , n kɛ ́ təmlɛ tʋ kʋpampaŋ . Ɩsəna mpi n lapəna pəcɔ nyəm kɛ teu kɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , maa cɛlɛ - ŋ sɔsɔm . Kɔɔ na má na - ŋ tə ́ yɔɔlɩ .

text: He also that had received two talents came and said , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me two talents : behold , I have gained two other talents beside them .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ kɛ ́ təmlɛ tʋ wei pa cɛla nyəɣətʋ ŋmʋnʋɣʋ ( 200 ) tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tacaa , n ka cɛla - m nyəɣətʋ ŋmʋnʋɣʋ ( 200 ) , na pə sɛɛ - m ŋmʋnʋɣʋ ( 200 ) tɔtɔ .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , good and faithful servant ; thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa caa ɩnɩ ɩ tɔma ɩ ́ lɛ ́ tɔtɔ sɩ : Pə wɛ teu , n kɛ ́ təmlɛ tʋ kʋpampaŋ . Ɩsəna mpi n lapəna pəcɔ nyəm kɛ teu kɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , maa cɛlɛ - ŋ sɔsɔm . Kɔɔ na ma na - ŋ tə ́ yɔɔlɩ .

text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said , Lord , I knew thee that thou art an hard man , reaping where thou hast not sown , and gathering where thou hast not strawed :
text2: Pə tala wei paa cɛla nyəɣətʋ nɩɩnʋwa ( 100 ) tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tacaa , ma nyəmá nyá tɔɔ sɩ n kɛ ́ yʋlʋ katɛ tʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , timpi n ta tuu tɔɣɔ n kʋŋ , na timpi n ta ŋmɩɩsɩ tɔɣɔ n cɛkɩ .

text: And I was afraid , and went and hid thy talent in the earth : lo , there thou hast that is thine .
text2: Sɔɣɔntʋ lapa - m , ɩlɛna má polo na má pi nyá liɣitee kɛ atɛ kɛ teu təkulakula . Mʋ nyá cɛɛ .

text: His lord answered and said unto him , Thou wicked and slothful servant , thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not , and gather where I have not strawed :
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ caa tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Ama n kɛ ́ təmlɛ tʋ ɩsaɣaʋ na felentu kɛ ́ . N ka nyəmá mpʋ sɩ timpi ma ta tuu tɔɣɔ ma kʋŋ , na timpi ma ta ŋmɩɩsɩ tɔɣɔ ma cɛkɩ ɩlɛ ,

text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers , and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury .
text2: pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ n taa tʋ ma liɣitee anəɣɩ panci taa ? Ma kɔma ɩsəntɔ tɔ maa maɣana pə sɛɛ a tɔɔ na má kpɛntɩ na má mʋ .

text: Take therefore the talent from him , and give it unto him which hath ten talents .
text2: Tɔʋ , ɩ ́ lɛɛkɩ nyəɣətʋ nɩɩnʋwa ( 100 ) ɩnəɣɩ ɩ niŋ taa , na ɩ ́ sɔɔsɩ nyəɣətʋ nasəlɛ na nɩɩnʋwa ( 500 ) tʋ .

text: For unto every one that hath shall be given , and he shall have abundance : but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , timpi pə wɛɛ tɔɣɔ pə sɔɔsəɣɩ teu sɩ pə ́ tɔɔləna pɛlɛ . Ama wei ɩ fɛɩna pʋlʋ tɔ , paa pəciiu maɣamaɣa kɛ ɩ wɛna , paa lɛɛkɩ kɛ ́ .

text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Ɩ ́ kpaɣa təmlɛ tʋ yem ɩnɩ na ɩ ́ pɛtɩ - ɩ awalɩ kɛ ́ səkpɛtʋɣʋ taa . Tənaɣa ɩ ká casəɣɩ kapusi na ɩ ́ nyasəɣɩ ɩ təɣɩ kela .

text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory , and all the holy angels with him , then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Waatʋ wei Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má , maa kɔɔ ɩsɩɩ wulaʋ sɔsɔ na ɩsɔtaa tillaa təna tɔ , maa caɣa ma teeli kumte tɔɔ .

text: And before him shall be gathered all nations : and he shall separate them one from another , as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats :
text2: Na atɛ piitimnaa təna ká koti ma ɩsɛntaa . Maa faɣasɩ yəlaa ɩsɩɩ tiikilu faɣasʋɣʋ heeŋ na pə ́ ŋ tɔ .

text: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand , but the goats on the left .
text2: Maa sɩɩ heeŋ kɛ ma ntɔɣɔŋ tɔɔ na pə ́ ŋ kɛ ma mpətəŋ tɔɔ .

text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand , Come , ye blessed of my Father , inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world :
text2: Wulaʋ Sɔsɔ má , maa heeli mpa pa wɛ ma ntɔɣɔŋ tɔɔ tɔ sɩ : Mɛ mpa ma Caa yelaa na ɩ ́ nɩɩ leleŋ tɔ , ɩ ́ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ Kawulaɣa ŋka paa sɩɩ - mɛɣɛ hatoo antulinya lapʋ waatʋ tɔ .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me drink : I was a stranger , and ye took me in :
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , nyɔɣɔsɩ ka kpa - m tɔ mə hana - m tɔɣɔnaɣa . Lʋkɔtʋ kpa - m tɔ mə hana - m lʋm na má nyɔɔ . Maa kɛ ́ mʋʋlʋ tɔ mə kpaɣana - m na ɩ ́ pona mə tɛ .

text: Naked , and ye clothed me : I was sick , and ye visited me : I was in prison , and ye came unto me .
text2: Maa wɛ kpɛtɛ tɔ mə hana - m wontu . Pə wɩɩkaɣa - m tɔ mə fɛpəna - m . Paa təka - m saləka taa tɔ mə kɔŋaɣana na ɩ ́ naa - m .

text: Then shall the righteous answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , and fed thee ? or thirsty , and gave thee drink ?
text2: Kʋpama ká cɔ - m sɩ : Tacaa , leɣe tə na - ŋ na nyɔɣɔsɩ wɩɩ - ŋ na tə ́ ha - ŋ tɔɣɔnaɣa , na lʋkɔtʋ wɛna - ŋ na tə ́ ha - ŋ lʋm ?

text: When saw we thee a stranger , and took thee in ? or naked , and clothed thee ?
text2: Leɣe tə na - ŋ na ń kɛ ́ mʋʋlʋ na tə ́ kpaɣa - ŋ na tə ́ pona ta tɛ ? Yaa n wɛ kpɛtɛ na tə ́ suu - ŋ wontu ?

text: Or when saw we thee sick , or in prison , and came unto thee ?
text2: Leɣe tə na - ŋ na pə ́ wɩɩkɩ - ŋ , yaa pa təka - ŋ saləka taa na tə ́ polo nyá wiiluɣu ?

text: And the King shall answer and say unto them , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren , ye have done it unto me .
text2: Wulaʋ ma maa cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , timpi ɩ ́ lapa ma taapalaa panɛ pa səkpema taa nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ kʋpantʋ tɔ , maɣa ɩ ́ lapa .
