text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand , Depart from me , ye cursed , into everlasting fire , prepared for the devil and his angels :
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Wulaʋ má , maa heeli mpa pa wɛna ma mpətəŋ tɔɔ tɔ sɩ : Mpusi nyə ́ ma mɛ ɩ ́ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ fɛɛ - m . Ɩ ́ polo kɔkɔ ŋka pa taɣana Ɩlɔɣɔʋ na ɩ ɩsɔtaa tillaa pa tɔɔ na kaa teŋ tɔ ka taa .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me no meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me no drink :
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , nyɔɣɔsɩ ka kpa - m tɔ ɩ ́ ta ha - m na má tɔɣɔ . Lʋkɔtʋ kpa - m tɔ ɩ ́ tá ha - m lʋm sɩ má nyɔɔ .

text: I was a stranger , and ye took me not in : naked , and ye clothed me not : sick , and in prison , and ye visited me not .
text2: Maa kɛ ́ mʋʋlʋ , ɩ ́ ta kpaɣa - m na ɩ ́ pona mə tɛ . Maa wɛ kpɛtɛ tɔ ɩ ́ ta ha - m wontu sɩ ma suu . Pɩɩ wɩɩkaɣa - m tɔ ɩ ́ ta fɛ - m . Waatʋ wei ma wɛ saləka taa tɔ ɩ ́ ta wiili - m .

text: Then shall they also answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , or athirst , or a stranger , or naked , or sick , or in prison , and did not minister unto thee ?
text2: Na pɛlɛ paa cɔ - m sɩ : Tacaa , leɣe tə na - ŋ na nyɔɣɔsɩ yaa lʋkɔtʋ pə wɛna - ŋ , yaa n kɛ ́ mʋʋlʋ , yaa n wɛ kpɛtɛ , yaa pə wɩɩkɩ - ŋ , yaa n wɛ saləka taa , na tə ta paasəna - ŋ ?

text: Then shall he answer them , saying , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these , ye did it not to me .
text2: Ɩlɛ maa cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , timpi ɩ ́ tá la səkpema panɛ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ kʋpantʋ tɔ , maɣa ɩ ́ tá la .

text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment : but the righteous into life eternal .
text2: Panɛ ɩnɩ paa polo saləka tam nyəŋ taa , na kʋpama náá polo weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ kʋ taa .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had finished all these sayings , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Yesu tɛma tɔm tənɛ tə tənaɣa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ heeli ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ :

text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover , and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified .
text2: Ntɔŋ ɩ ́ nyəmá teu sɩ pə kaasa kʋyɛɛŋ naalɛ na pá tɔɣɔ Tɛɛʋ acima na ? Tɛɛʋ acima anɩ a tɔɔ kɛ ́ paa tʋ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa maɣa yəlaa niŋ taa na pá ka - m səm tesika tɔɔ .

text: Then assembled together the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders of the people , unto the palace of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Yuta nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma pa kota kɔtəlaa wulaʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Kayifi tɔ ɩ təyaɣa .

text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty , and kill him .
text2: Na pá caɣa na pá maɣasɩ na pá sɩɩ ɩsəna paa kpa Yesu təhɛɛ na nɔɣɔlʋ ta na tɔ , na pá kʋ - ɩ .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar among the people .
text2: Pa yɔɣɔtaɣa pa taa sɩ : Tə taa kpa - ɩ acima waatʋ , tɔfɔ pɩɩ la yoou kɛ yəlaa taa .

text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany , in the house of Simon the leper ,
text2: Yesu ka wɛ Petanii kɛ tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ asilima kʋtɔŋ tʋ Simɔŋ təyaɣa taa .

text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment , and poured it on his head , as he sat at meat .
text2: Tənaɣa alʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kɔma ɩ kiŋ na ɩ ́ tɔka tulaalʋ kʋpampaŋ na pá lapa ɩ akpaləpiya kɛ liɣitee pəlɛ kʋhʋlʋməlɛ tɔ . Yesu caɣaa na ɩ ́ tɔŋna tɔɣɔʋ , ɩlɛna alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ pəlɩ tulaalʋ ɩnəɣɩ Yesu nyʋɣʋ taa .

text: But when his disciples saw it , they had indignation , saying , To what purpose is this waste ?
text2: Yesu ɩfalaa ná mpʋ tɔ pə ta maɣa - wɛ , na pá tɔ sɩ : Pa wakəlʋɣʋ tulaalʋ ɩnɛɣɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ suweɣelɛ ?

text: For this ointment might have been sold for much , and given to the poor .
text2: Ye paa pɛɛta - ɩ pə taa la liɣitee kɛ sɔsɔm na pá ha kʋnyɔntʋnaa ?

text: When Jesus understood it , he said unto them , Why trouble ye the woman ? for she hath wrought a good work upon me .
text2: Yesu cɛkənaa sɩ pa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ pəsəɣɩ alʋ ɩnɛ ɩ laŋlɛ kɛ mpʋ ? Mpi ɩ lapa - m mpʋ tɔ pə tewaɣa halɩ .

text: For ye have the poor always with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Mə na kʋnyɔntʋnaa ɩ ́ wɛnna tam . Ama má na - mɛ tə kaa wɛɛ təma kiŋ kɛ tam .

text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body , she did it for my burial .
text2: Ma pim tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ pəla tulaalʋ kɛ ma tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ mpʋ .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world , there shall also this , that this woman hath done , be told for a memorial of her .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , paa timpiɣi paa heeli Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ ɩnɛɣɛ antulinya təna taa , paa kɛɛsɩ alʋ ɩnɛ ɩ lapa mpi tɔ pə tɔm na pá tɔɔsəɣɩ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: Then one of the twelve , called Judas Iscariot , went unto the chief priests ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ɩfalaa naanʋwa na naalɛ taa lɛlʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Yutaasɩ Ɩsəkaleeu tɔ , ɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ maɣana kɔtəlaa sɔsaa ,

text: And said unto them , What will ye give me , and I will deliver him unto you ? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver .
text2: na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Ye ma tʋ Yesu kɛ ́ mə niŋ taa pepeɣe ɩ ́ ka ha - m ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɛlɛ pa kala liɣitee nyəɣətʋ kɛ hiu na naanʋwa na pá cɛlɛ - ɩ .

text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him .
text2: Pə kpaɣa kʋyaŋku tɔɣɔ Yutaasɩ sʋʋ kʋyakʋ kʋpaŋkʋ kɛ pɛɛkʋɣʋ sɩ ɩ ́ tʋ Yesu kɛ ́ pa niŋ taa .

text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus , saying unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover ?
text2: Pə tala potopotonaa mpa pa taa kʋkʋsʋm fɛɩ tɔ pə acima kʋyakʋ kancaalaɣa nyəŋkʋ wule . Ɩlɛna Yesu ɩfalaa polo na pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Leɣe n caa sɩ tə ́ polo na tə ́ la - ŋ Tɛɛʋ acima kʋtɔɣɔʋ ?

text: And he said , Go into the city to such a man , and say unto him , The Master saith , My time is at hand ; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ polo ɩcatɛ taa kɛ ́ akele tɛ na ɩ ́ heeli - ɩ sɩ : Ma wʋlɛ talaa , nyá tɛɣɛ má na ma ɩfalaa tɩɩ tɔɣɔ Tɛɛʋ acima .

text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them ; and they made ready the passover .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ɩfalaa lapa nti ɩ kɛɛsa - wɛ tɔ . Pa polaa na pá lá Tɛɛʋ acima kʋtɔɣɔʋ .

text: Now when the even was come , he sat down with the twelve .
text2: Pə kɔma ɩsɩɩ taanaɣa ɩlɛ , ɩ ́ na pa naanʋwa na naalɛ pa caɣa tɔɣɔʋ ntɛ ́ .

text: And as they did eat , he said , Verily I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Pa tɔŋna tɔɣɔʋ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna Yesu yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ ká la - m kɔlɔmɔtɔ .

text: And they were exceeding sorrowful , and began every one of them to say unto him , Lord , is it I ?
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ ɩfalaa ɩsɛntaa nyəŋa sɔsɔm na tɔm tənɛ . Ɩlɛna pá sʋʋ - ɩ pɔɔsʋɣʋ kɛ kʋlʋm kʋlʋm . Ɩnɛ sɩ : Matɔŋ pə taɣa má , Tacaa ?

text: And he answered and said , He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish , the same shall betray me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma na wei ta niŋ kpɛnta sʋsʋɣʋ kɛ nyənaɣa taa tɔ pʋntʋ ká lana - m kɔlɔmɔtɔ .

text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him : but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! it had been good for that man if he had not been born .
text2: Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má , ma səkɩ teitei kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ pa kɛɛsa ma tɔm kɛ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ . Ama wei ɩ ká la Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa maɣa kɔlɔmɔtɔ kɛ mpʋ tɔ ɩ tɔm ká la waɩyo kɛ ́ sɔsɔm . Pʋntʋ ɩnɩ , ye pa taa lʋlɩ - ɩ , pəlɛ pɩɩ lapa sana .

text: Then Judas , which betrayed him , answered and said , Master , is it I ? He said unto him , Thou hast said .
text2: Pə kpɛŋna Yutaasɩ wei ɩ lakɩ - ɩ kɔlɔmɔtɔ tɔ na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ Yesu sɩ : Matɔŋ pə taɣa má , Tacaa ? Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ntəɣəlɛ mpʋ .

text: And as they were eating , Jesus took bread , and blessed it , and brake it , and gave it to the disciples , and said , Take , eat ; this is my body .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ waatʋ wei pa tɔkaɣa tɔ Yesu kpaɣa potopoto na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ , na ɩ ́ faɣa - ɩ na ɩ ́ cɛla ɩ ɩfalaa , na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ mʋ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ , ma tɔnʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and gave it to them , saying , Drink ye all of it ;
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Yesu kpaɣa kɔpʋ na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ na təmlɛ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ cɛlɛ - wɛ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ nyɔɔ - wəɣɩ mə təna .

text: For this is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many for the remission of sins .
text2: Ma caləm ntɛ ́ mpi pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ Ɩsɔ nɔɣɔ pɛɛlʋɣʋ tampana tɔ . Mpɩ pə kpemna yəlaa paɣalɛ tɔɔ sɩ pə ́ hɩɩsɩ ɩsaɣatʋnaa .

text: But I say unto you , I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine , until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father ' s kingdom .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , saŋa waalɩ ma kaa tasa sʋlʋm pənɛɣɛ nyɔɔʋ . Haləna kʋyaŋku má na - mɛ tɩɩ nyɔɔ sʋlʋm kʋfam kɛ ma Caa Kawulaɣa taa tɔ .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Pa tɛma mpʋ ɩlɛna pá yoo acima yontu , ɩlɛna pá tɛɛ Olifinaa pʋɣʋ tɔɔ .

text: Then saith Jesus unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Saŋa ahoo anɛ a maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ ká yele - m mə təna na ɩ ́ se . Pa ŋmaa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Maa kʋ tiikilu na heeŋ ká ya yem yem .

text: But after I am risen again , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Ama waatʋ wei maa fe ɩlɛna , má tɛɛ - mɛɣɛ nɔɣɔ kɛ Kalilee .

text: Peter answered and said unto him , Though all men shall be offended because of thee , yet will I never be offended .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ nɔɣɔ təkpaʋ sɩ : Paa pa təna paa yele - ŋ na pá se , má , ma kaa la mpʋ .

text: Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this night , before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Ama Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - ŋ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , n ka kpɛɛsɩ tɔm tooso kɛ ́ ahoo anɛ sɩ n ta nyɩ - m kɛ ́ n ta nyɩ - m na pə ́ cɔ ́ kampaaʋ koo .

text: Peter said unto him , Though I should die with thee , yet will I not deny thee . Likewise also said all the disciples .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Paa ma na - ŋ tɩɩ sɩ tɩɩ sɩ kɛ ́ , ma kaa kpɛɛsɩ sɩ ma ta nyɩ - ŋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa təna pa yɔɣɔta mpʋ .

text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane , and saith unto the disciples , Sit ye here , while I go and pray yonder .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa tala timpi pa yaa sɩ Kɛtəsemanee tɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ caɣa cənɛ na má polo Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ kɛ hatoo cənɛ .

text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee , and began to be sorrowful and very heavy .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpaɣa Piyɛɛ na Sepetee pəyalaa naalɛ . Tənaɣa ɩsənyəŋlɛ na laŋwakəllɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ sʋʋ - ɩ kpaʋ .

text: Then saith he unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful , even unto death : tarry ye here , and watch with me .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma laŋlɛ wakəlaa kɛ ́ tətɔɣɔtɔɣɔ pə fɛɩ kɛɛsʋɣʋ . Ɩ ́ caɣa cənɛ na má na - mɛ tə ́ feŋiɣi .

text: And he went a little further , and fell on his face , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if it be possible , let this cup pass from me : nevertheless not as I will , but as thou wilt .
text2: Ɩ tuusa ɩ nɔɣɔ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pəcɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ luŋ na ɩ ́ sələmɩ sɩ : Ma Caa , ye pə wɛ pəsʋɣʋ kɛɛlɩ wahala sɔsɔ ɩnɛɣɛ ma nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ . Paa na mpʋ mpi n nɔkaa tɔ pəlɛ pə la , pə ́ taa la ma luɣu nyəntʋ .

text: And he cometh unto the disciples , and findeth them asleep , and saith unto Peter , What , could ye not watch with me one hour ?
text2: Ɩ tɛma mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ məlɩ ɩ ɩfalaa tooso ɩnɩ ɩ kiŋ na ɩ ́ maɣana pa tɔŋna tom . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ Piyɛɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ kpisa caɣaʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ má na - mɛ tə ́ feŋ paa pəcɔ maɣamaɣa .

text: Watch and pray , that ye enter not into temptation : the spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Ɩ ́ feŋ na ɩ ́ sələmɩ , tɔfɔ ɩ ́ ká hoti waatʋ wei maɣasʋɣʋ kɔŋ - mɛ tɔ . Pááná wɛɛ , ama tɔnʋɣʋ ɩɩ pəsəɣəna .

text: He went away again the second time , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if this cup may not pass away from me , except I drink it , thy will be done .
text2: Ɩ tasa tuusuɣu , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tasa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sələmʋɣʋ sɩ : Ma Caa , ye pə fɛɩ pəsʋɣʋ sɩ wahala sɔsɔ ɩnɛ ɩ ́ hatələna - m , nyá luɣu nyəntʋ ɩ ́ la .

text: And he came and found them asleep again : for their eyes were heavy .
text2: Ɩ tasa ɩ ɩfalaa kiŋ kɛ məlʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ maɣana pa tɔŋna tom tɔtɔ , pa kpisa pá caɣana pa ɩsɛ .

text: And he left them , and went away again , and prayed the third time , saying the same words .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ tasa - wɛɣɛ yeluɣu na ɩ ́ tuusi na ɩ ́ tasa Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ kɛ tɔm tooso nyəm kɛ tɔm kʋlʋmtʋ ntɩ .

text: Then cometh he to his disciples , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : behold , the hour is at hand , and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ məla ɩ ɩfalaa kiŋ na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ tɔŋna tom na ɩ ́ hɛɛsəɣɩ yaa ? Ɩɩ naa , pə talaa kɛlɛ . Paa tʋ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa maɣa asaɣaa niŋ taa .

text: Rise , let us be going : behold , he is at hand that doth betray me .
text2: Ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na tə ́ tɛɛ . Ɩ ́ nyənɩ kɔlɔmɔtɔ tʋ tala cənɛ .

text: And while he yet spake , lo , Judas , one of the twelve , came , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and elders of the people .
text2: Yesu tɔŋna yɔɣɔtaɣa kɛ mpʋ ɩlɛ , ɩ ɩfalaa naanʋwa na naalɛ taa lɛlʋ Yutaasɩ talaa kɛlɛ . Na ɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ yəlaa samaa tuutuuma , na pá tɔka laɣalɛɛ na kpatəŋ . Kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Yuta nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma pa tilina yəlaa mpɛ .

text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he : hold him fast .
text2: Yutaasɩ wei ɩnɩ ɩ lakɩ Yesu kɛ ́ kɔlɔmɔtɔ kɛ mpʋ tɔ ɩ ka kɛɛsa samaa ɩnəɣɩ ɩsəna ɩ ka la tɔ . Ɩ heela - wɛɣɛ sɩ : Ye ma polaa na má waɣala wei ɩlɛ , ɩnəɣəlɛ , ɩ ́ kpa - ɩ .

text: And forthwith he came to Jesus , and said , Hail , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Tənaɣa Yutaasɩ kpətəna Yesu kɛ kpakpaa na ɩ ́ sɛɛ - ɩ sɩ : Fɔɔ Tacaa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ waɣalɩ - ɩ .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Friend , wherefore art thou come ? Then came they , and laid hands on Jesus , and took him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Ma taapalʋ , la nti n kɔma lapʋ tɔ . Tənaɣa ɩ ́ na mpa tɔ , pɛlɛ pa tʋ niŋ kɛ Yesu tɔɔ na pá kpa - ɩ .

text: And , behold , one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand , and drew his sword , and struck a servant of the high priest ' s , and smote off his ear .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu na mpa paa wɛɛ tɔ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ kpɛɛ ɩ laɣatɛ na ɩ ́ lo kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ təmlɛ tʋ ŋkpaŋʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ kɔɔlɩ təfeŋ .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Put up again thy sword into his place : for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Suu nyá laɣatɛ kɛ tə suɣute taa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ye wei ɩ ́ kpaɣa laɣatɛ , pʋntʋ ká səna laɣatɛ .

text: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father , and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels ?
text2: N ta nyɩ sɩ , má sɔɔlaa , maa yaa ma Caa na ɩ ́ ha - m ɩsɔtaa tillaa kɛ iyisi naatoso ( 6000 ) kɛ loosi naanʋwa na naalɛɣɛ cənɛɣɛ kpakpaa yɛɛ ?

text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled , that thus it must be ?
text2: Ama ye ma lapa mpʋ nti paa kɛɛsa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ tɩɩ la tɔ , ɩsənaɣa pɩɩ la na təlɛ tə ́ lá ɩlɛ ?

text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes , Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me ? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple , and ye laid no hold on me .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pɔɔsa samaa ɩnɩ sɩ : Ɩ ́ kɔŋɩ - m kpaʋ na ɩ ́ nɔkɩ na ɩ ́ kpakəɣɩ laɣalɛɛ na kpatəŋ tɔ , maɣa ŋmɩɩlʋ ɩsaɣaʋ kɛ ? Kʋyɛɛŋ təna Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa kɛ ́ ma caɣaa na má sɛɣɛsəɣɩ , ɩ ́ tá kpa - m .

text: But all this was done , that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled . Then all the disciples forsook him , and fled .
text2: Ama pə təna ɩsəntɔ pə lapaɣa sɩ pə ́ la nti Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa ka yɔɣɔtaa na tə ́ wɛ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ . Tənaɣa ɩ ɩfalaa təna yela - ɩ na pá se na pá tɛɛ .

text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest , where the scribes and the elders were assembled .
text2: Mpa pa kpa Yesu tɔ pa pona - ɩ kɔtəlaa wulaʋ Kayifi tɛ na pá maɣana Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma pa kotaa .

text: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest ' s palace , and went in , and sat with the servants , to see the end .
text2: Piyɛɛ təŋaɣa Yesu kɛ ́ táálə ́ ḿ tɔɔ , haləna ɩ ́ tala kɔtəlaa wulaʋ taɣa tɔɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sʋʋ na ɩ ́ caɣa təmlɛ nyə ́ ma kiŋ sɩ ɩ naa sɩ pɩɩ tɛna - we .

text: Now the chief priests , and elders , and all the council , sought false witness against Jesus , to put him to death ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Kotuɣu sɔsɔɔŋkʋ nyə ́ ma pa pɛɛkaa sɩ paa tɔm suuu pa suu Yesu na pá hiki mpaaʋ na pá kʋ - ɩ .

text: But found none : yea , though many false witnesses came , yet found they none . At the last came two false witnesses ,
text2: Paa na yəlaa paɣalɛ kʋlaa na pá suuki - ɩ pɔpɔtʋ tɔmnaa tɔ , pa ta hiki nti paa waana - ɩ tɔ . Waalɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ yəlaa napəlɩ pa kʋla naalɛ

text: And said , This fellow said , I am able to destroy the temple of God , and to build it in three days .
text2: na pá tɔ sɩ : Apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ ka tɔma sɩ ɩnɩ ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ yɔkɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ na ɩ taɣanɩ - tɛɣɛ ŋmaʋ kɛ kʋyɛɛŋ tooso taa .

text: And the high priest arose , and said unto him , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɔtəlaa wulaʋ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ tɔ Yesu sɩ : N kaa yɔɣɔtɩ ? Suweɣe yəlaa panɛ pa yɔɣɔtəɣəna - ŋ ye ?

text: But Jesus held his peace . And the high priest answered and said unto him , I adjure thee by the living God , that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ , the Son of God .
text2: Ama Yesu suma . Tənaɣa kɔtəlaa wulaʋ tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Na Ɩsɔ wei ɩ wɛna weesuɣu tɔ , ye n kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ Mesii heelɩ - tʋ təfoo .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thou hast said : nevertheless I say unto you , Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ntəɣɩ n yɔɣɔtaa . Ma heeliɣi - mɛ təfoo sɩ pə kpaɣaʋ pənɛntɛ tɔ ɩ ́ ká ná Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má na má caɣa Ɩsɔ Toŋ təna tʋ kɔŋkɔŋ taa . Na ɩ ́ ká na - m ɩsɔtaa ŋmʋntʋɣʋ tɔɔ na má tiiki .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , saying , He hath spoken blasphemy ; what further need have we of witnesses ? behold , now ye have heard his blasphemy .
text2: Tənaɣa kɔtəlaa wulaʋ cəla ɩ wontu na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩ kpa Ɩsɔ tɔɔ . Tə tasəɣɩ aseeta nyə ́ ma kɛ pɛɛkʋɣʋ sɩ tə lepe ? Mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ ná ɩsəna ɩ kpa Ɩsɔ tɔɔ tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: What think ye ? They answered and said , He is guilty of death .
text2: Tɔʋ , ɩ ́ na - we ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa tɔma sɩ ɩ tɔm səpa , paa kʋ - ɩ kɛ ́ .

text: Then did they spit in his face , and buffeted him ; and others smote him with the palms of their hands ,
text2: Tənaɣa pa sʋʋ ntaɣama tɔʋ kɛ ɩ ɩsɛntaa , na pá makɩ - ɩ ŋkuma , na lɛlaa náá mapɩ - ɩ kataasɩ .

text: Saying , Prophesy unto us , thou Christ , Who is he that smote thee ?
text2: Na pá tɔŋ sɩ : Mesii kpeɣe , heeli - tʋɣʋ wei ɩ mapa - ŋ tɔ .

text: Now Peter sat without in the palace : and a damsel came unto him , saying , Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee .
text2: Piyɛɛ ka caɣa awalɩ kɛ ́ taɣa tɔɔ . Tənaɣa kɔtəlaa wulaʋ təmlɛ tʋ alʋ nyəŋ nɔɣɔlʋ kpətəna - ɩ na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Nyá tɔtɔ n ka wɛ Kalilee tʋ Yesu ɩnɩ ɩ kiŋ .

text: But he denied before them all , saying , I know not what thou sayest .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ kpɛɛsa yəlaa təna ɩsɛntaa sɩ : Ma ta nyɩ nti n yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ tɔ .

text: And when he was gone out into the porch , another maid saw him , and said unto them that were there , This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Piyɛɛ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ polo nɔnɔkeelasɩ . Ɩlɛna təmlɛ tʋ alʋ nyəŋ lɛlʋ náá na - ɩ na ɩ ́ heeli mpa paa wɛ təna tɔ sɩ : Ɩnɛ ɩnɩ ɩ ka wɛ Nasalɛtɩ Yesu ɩnɩ ɩ kiŋ kɛ ́ .

text: And again he denied with an oath , I do not know the man .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ taɣana kpɛɛsʋɣʋ sɩ : Na Ɩsɔ , ma ta nyɩ apalʋ ɩnɩ .

text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by , and said to Peter , Surely thou also art one of them ; for thy speech bewrayeth thee .
text2: Pə lapa laasaɣa ɩlɛna mpa paa wɛ təna tɔ pá kpətəna Piyɛɛ na pá tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Nyá n ta laŋ yəlaa mpɛ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ . Nyá yɔɣɔtaɣa hʋləɣəna timpi n lɩɩnaa tɔ .

text: Then began he to curse and to swear , saying , I know not the man . And immediately the cock crew .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ kpɛɛsaa təlalala na ɩ ́ tuu na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Na Ɩsɔ , ma ta nyɩ apalʋ ɩnɩ . Tənaɣa kampaaʋ koo kpakpaa .

text: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus , which said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice . And he went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Ɩlɛna Piyɛɛ tɔɔsɩ nti Yesu ka yɔɣɔta - ɩ tɔ tə tɔɔ sɩ : Mpi pɩɩ takɩ kampaaʋ koou tɔ n tɛma tɔm toosoɣo kpɛɛsʋɣʋ sɩ n ta nyɩ - m kɛ ́ n ta nyɩ - m . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ tukaa na ɩ ́ lɩɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ wii ɩsɩɩ ɩ səkɩ ɩ səkɩ .

text: When the morning was come , all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tanaŋ kʋpaŋkʋ tɛɛ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa təna na Yuta nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma caɣaa na pá maɣasɩ na pá sɩɩ sɩ pá kʋ Yesu .

text: And when they had bound him , they led him away , and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor .
text2: Tənaɣa pa hɔka - ɩ na pá kpaɣa - ɩ na pá polo na pá cɛla Kʋfənɛɛ Pilatɩ .

text: Then Judas , which had betrayed him , when he saw that he was condemned , repented himself , and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders ,
text2: Yutaasɩ wei ɩ lapa - ɩ kɔlɔmɔtɔ tɔ , ɩ nawa sɩ pa sɩɩwa sɩ paa kʋ Yesu kɛ ́ tampana ɩlɛna ɩ laŋlɛ pəsɩ sɔsɔm . Tənaɣa ɩ kpaɣa liɣitee nyəɣətʋ hiu na naanʋwa ɩnɩ na ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ cɛla kɔtəlaa sɔsɔ na nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma .

text: Saying , I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood . And they said , What is that to us ? see thou to that .
text2: Na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Ma lapa ɩsaɣatʋ , ma cɛla - mɛɣɛ yʋlʋ sɩ ɩ ́ kʋ - ɩ tulum kɛ yem . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma cɔ Yutaasɩ sɩ : Tá paaye , pə kɛ ́ nyá tɔm kɛ ́ .

text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple , and departed , and went and hanged himself .
text2: Tənaɣa Yutaasɩ məŋna liɣitee anɩ na ɩ ́ pɛtɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa , na ɩ ́ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ tʋ ŋmənaɣa kɛ ɩ luɣu tɛɛ na ɩ ́ sɩ .

text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces , and said , It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury , because it is the price of blood .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa ná tɔɔsa - yɛ na pá tɔ sɩ : Ta mpaaʋ taa pə fɛɩ pəsʋɣʋ sɩ tə ́ kpaɣa liɣitee anɛ na tə ́ tasa tʋɣʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ atakaa taa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , yʋlʋkʋlɛ liɣitee kɛ ́ .

text: And they took counsel , and bought with them the potter ' s field , to bury strangers in .
text2: Tənaɣa pa caɣaa na pá maɣasɩ , ɩlɛna pá kpaɣa liɣitee anɩ na pá yana tɛtʋ natəlɩ nti pa yaa sɩ cʋɣʋ təhulle tɔ , sɩ pa piŋ mʋʋlaa kɛ təna .

text: Wherefore that field was called , The field of blood , unto this day .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ haləna saŋa pa məŋna tɛtʋ ntəɣɩ hətɛ sɩ : Caləm tɛtʋ .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying , And they took the thirty pieces of silver , the price of him that was valued , whom they of the children of Israel did value ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa nti Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Selemii ka kpaalaa tɔ sɩ : Pa kpaɣa liɣitee nyəɣətʋ hiu na naanʋwa . Liɣitee anəɣɩ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ yəlaa tisaa sɩ pá fɛlɩ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: And gave them for the potter ' s field , as the Lord appointed me .
text2: Pa kpaɣa - yɛ na pá yana tɛtʋ nti pa yaa sɩ cʋɣʋ təhulle tɔ , na pə maɣamaɣa kɛ Tacaa ka heela - m .

text: And Jesus stood before the governor : and the governor asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And Jesus said unto him , Thou sayest .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa pona Yesu kɛ Kʋfənɛɛ ɩsɛntaa , na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Nyaɣalɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma wulaʋ sɔsɔ ɩnəɣɩ ? Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ntəɣəlɛ n yɔɣɔta mpʋ .

text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders , he answered nothing .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ waatʋ wei kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma tɔŋaɣa sɩ ɩ lapa pənɛ na pənɛ tɔ , ɩ ta cɔ sɩ pʋlʋ .

text: Then said Pilate unto him , Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee ?
text2: Tənaɣa Pilatɩ tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Nn nɩɩkɩ ɩsəna pa tɔŋʋɣʋ sɩ n lapa pənɛ na pənɛ tɔ ?

text: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly .
text2: Ama tə tənaɣa mpʋ Yesu tá cɔ - ɩ tə tɔɔ sɩ pʋlʋ . Ɩlɛna pə ́ lá Kʋfənɛɛ kɛ piti kɛ ́ sɔsɔm pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner , whom they would .
text2: Paa Tɛɛʋ acima wena Kʋfənɛɛ tʋləɣɩ saləka tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ wei samaa caa sɩ pá tʋlɩ tɔɣɔ .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: Pə pamna saləka tʋ kpitikpiti nɔɣɔlʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Palapaasɩ tɔ ɩ wɛ saləka taa .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: Samaa kota ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ təna , ɩlɛna Pilatɩ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Aweɣe ɩ ́ caa má tʋlɩ - mɛ , Yesu wei pa yaa sɩ Kilisiti tɔ ?

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ pɔɔsa - wɛɣɛ mpʋ , ɩ nyəmá təkelekele sɩ ɩsɛsɛɛmlɛ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa pona - ɩ Yesu .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: Waatʋ wei Pilatɩ caɣa təhʋʋlɛ tɔ ɩ alʋ tilaa sɩ pá heeli - ɩ sɩ : Taa sʋsɩ nyá nɔɣɔ kɛ tampana təŋlʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔm taa . Pə hʋla - m ɩ tɔm kɛ tom taa kɛ ́ ahoo anɛ , na pə ́ pɛkəlɩ - m sɔsɔm .

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma pa puɣusa samaa sɩ pá sələmɩ - ɩ na ɩ ́ tʋlɩ - wɛɣɛ Palapaasɩ , na pə ́ kaasɩ na ɩ ́ kʋ Yesu .

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: Tənaɣa Kʋfənɛɛ taɣana - wɛɣɛ pɔɔsʋɣʋ sɩ : Pa naalɛ pa taa aweɣe ɩ ́ caa sɩ má tʋlɩ - mɛ yee ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Palapaasɩ kɛ tə caa sɩ ń tʋlɩ .

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: Ɩlɛna Pilatɩ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Na ɩsənaɣa má la Yesu wei pa yaa sɩ Kilisiti tɔ ? Tənaɣalɛ pa təna sɩ : Kamɩ - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ .

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pilatɩ pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Ɩlɛ ɩsaɣatʋ ntiɣi ɩ lapa ? Tənaɣa pa tasa kapusi mapʋ na toŋ sɩ : Kamɩ - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ .

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: Pilatɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ ná sɩ ɩ kaa pəsɩ - tɩ , pəyele yoou caa tiluɣu . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ caa lʋm na ɩ ́ saŋ ɩ niŋ kɛ samaa ɩsɛntaa na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Apalʋ ɩnɛ , pə ́ taa wɛɛ sɩ má kʋɣʋna - ɩ yoo . Pə kɛ ́ mə tɔm kɛ ́ .

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ samaa təna cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Nnn , ɩ səm tɔm ɩ ́ məlɩ tá na tá piya tá nyɔɔŋ taa .

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: Tənaɣa Pilatɩ tʋla - wɛɣɛ Palapaasɩ . Pə kaasa Yesu ɩlɛna , ɩ ́ yele na pá casa - ɩ akpatɛɛ , na ɩ ́ kpaɣa - ɩ na ɩ ́ cɛlɛ - wɛ sɩ pá polo na pá kamɩ - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: Pilatɩ yoolaa pona Yesu kɛ ́ Kʋfənɛɛ təyaɣa taa , ɩlɛna pa samaa təna kotina - ɩ .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa wɔɣɔsa ɩ wontu , ɩlɛna pá suu - ɩ capa kʋsɛɛm təkpaɩɩ .

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Na pá lʋʋ sɔwa kɛ ntenuɣu na pá te ɩ nyʋɣʋ , na pá tʋ ɩ niŋ ntɔɣɔŋ taa kɛ ́ kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ , na pá paakəna - ɩ na pá luŋiɣi ɩ tɛɛ kɛ ́ akula , na pá sɛɛ - ɩ sɩ : Yuta nyə ́ ma wulaʋ sɔsɔ fɔɔ .

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: Na pá tɔɔkɩ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ntaɣama , na pá mʋɣɩ kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ na pá taɣanəɣɩ ɩ nyʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ mapʋ .

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: Pa tɛma - ɩ paanaʋ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá wɔɣɔsɩ capa ɩnɩ na pá məŋna - ɩ ɩ wontu na pá tɛɛna - ɩ kam kɛ səm tesika tɔɔ .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: Pa lɩɩkaɣa ɩcatɛ ɩlɛna , pá tə sulina Silɛɛnɩ tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ , pa yaa - ɩ sɩ Simɔŋ . Tənaɣa yoolaa kpipa ɩ ́ lɛ ́ na toŋ sɩ ɩ ́ səɣəlɩ Yesu tesika ŋkɛ .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa tala timpi pa yaa sɩ Kɔləkɔta tɔ , nti tə yɔɣɔtəɣɩ sɩ nyʋmpɔɣɔlaɣa tɛ tɔ .

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: Tənaɣa pa cɛla - ɩ sʋlʋm mpi pə taa pa sita tʋɣʋ nakʋlɩ kʋ cələm tɔ . Ama ɩ təŋaa ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kisi - wəɣɩ nyɔɔʋ .

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kama - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ , na pá tɔ tɛtɛ kɛ ́ ɩ wontu tɔɔ na pá tala - tɩ .

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: Pa tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩlɛna pá caɣa təna na pá taŋɩ - ɩ .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Pa ŋmaawa na pá pusi ɩ nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ sɩ : Yuta nyə ́ ma wulaʋ sɔsɔ Yesu kɔlɔ . Pa ŋmaa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ mpi pə tɔɔ pa kʋ - ɩ tɔ .

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: Pa kpɛŋna ɩ ́ na ŋmɩɩlaa kɛ naalɛ na pá ka - wɛɣɛ səm tesikasɩ tɔɔ , lɛlʋ kɛ ɩ ntɔɣɔŋ tɔɔ , lɛlʋ kɛ ɩ mpətəŋ tɔɔ .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: Yəlaa mpa pa tɛɛkaɣana təna tɔ pɛlɛ pa kpɛɛtəɣɩ nyɔɔŋ na pá tʋʋkɩ - ɩ sɩ :

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: Matɔŋ nyá tɔmna sɩ n yɔkəɣɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ na ń taɣanɩ kʋfatɛ ŋmaʋ kɛ kʋyɛɛŋ tooso taa . Waasɩ nyá tɩ ɩlɛ . Ye n kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa lɩɩ tesika tɔɔ na ń tii .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ na kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma tɔtɔ . Pɛlɛ pa tɔŋna - ɩ paanaʋ na pá yɔɣɔtəɣɩ sɩ :

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: Ɩ yapa lɛlaa nyɔɔŋ ɩsənaɣa na ɩ ́ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ ya ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ nyəŋkʋ . Ɩsɩɩ sɩ ɩnəɣəlɛ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ wulaʋ sɔsɔ na ? Pənɛntɛ ɩ ́ lɩɩ tesika tɔɔ na ɩ ́ tii . Ɩlɛna tə na na tə ́ tisi .

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: Ɩ tʋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ naani na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ ɩnəɣəlɛ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa . Tɔʋ , tə ́ ná sɩ Ɩsɔ ká sɔɔlɩ sɩ ɩ ́ waasɩ - ɩ yaa ɩsəna .

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: Na pə kpɛŋna ŋmɩɩlaa mpa paa kama ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ cɔlɔ tɔ na pɛlɛ pá tʋʋ - ɩ mpʋ tɔtɔ .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: Pə kɔma na pə ́ tala ilim sikuɣu , ɩlɛna səkpɛtʋɣʋ nyala ɩcatɛ tɔɔ haləna ilim kpili .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Ilim kpila mpʋ , ɩlɛna Yesu kiisina nɔɣɔ sɔsɔɣa sɩ : Eli Eli , lema sapatani ? Na təlɛ tə yɔɣɔtəɣɩ sɩ : Ma Ɩsɔ ma Ɩsɔ , pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ n lɔ - m ?

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Mpa paa səŋa təna tɔ pa taa lɛlaa nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá tɔ sɩ : Ɩ yaana ntɛɣɛ Ilii .

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: Ɩlɛna pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ kpaɣa asewa na ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ lii kpaləkpam saŋ kɛ lʋm kʋnyəŋəm napəlɩ pə taa , na ɩ ́ tʋʋ kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ nɔɣɔ taa na ɩ ́ hʋlɩ Yesu sɩ ɩ ́ nyɔɔ .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: Ama lɛlaa ná tɔma sɩ : Ɩ ́ yele na tə ́ ná Ilii ká kɔɔ na ɩ ́ waasɩ - ɩ yaa ɩsəna .

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tasa kiisuɣu kɛ sɔsɔm , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ hɛɛ .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ waatʋ ɩnəɣɩ kpakpaa , pʋʋɣʋ sɔsɔɔʋ ŋku kɩɩ kaɣa Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa tɔ , kʋ faɣa yem kɛ ́ hatoo ɩsɔtaa na pə ́ kaləsəna kʋ atɛ . Na tɛtʋ sele na kʋkpaməŋ ya pɔɣɔlɛɛ ,

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: na pəlaaŋ tʋlɩ na Ɩsɔ yəlaa mpa pa səpa tɔ pa taa paɣalɛ fe .

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa lɩɩ pəlaaŋ taa , na waatʋ wei Yesu kɔma na ɩ ́ fe tɔ pá sʋʋ Ɩsɔ ɩcatɛ naŋŋ nyəntɛ taa , na yəlaa paɣalɛ na - wɛ .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Lom yoolaa sɔsɔ na yoolaa mpa ɩ na - wɛ paa taŋa Yesu tɔ , pa nawa tɛtʋ seluɣu na pə təna mpi pə lapa tɔ , ɩlɛna pá nyá sɔsɔm na pá tɔ sɩ : Tampana , yʋlʋ ɩnɛ ɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ kɛ ́ .

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
text2: Alaa paɣalɛ ka wɛ təna na pá səŋa pooluŋ na pá nyənəɣɩ . Mpɛ ɩnɩ pa təŋaɣana Yesu kɛ ́ hatoo Kalilee na pá caləsəɣɩ - ɩ .

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: Makətala Malɩ na Saakɩ na Yosɛɛfʋ pa too Malɩ na Sepetee pəyalaa too , paa wɛ alaa mpɛ pa taa .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
text2: Waatʋ wei taanaɣa taanaa tɔ , Alimatee apalʋ toŋ tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Yosɛɛfʋ tɔ ɩ kɔma . Ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ka təŋaɣa Yesu kɛ ́ .

text: He went to Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus . Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ pola Pilatɩ kiŋ na ɩ ́ sələmɩ - ɩ sɩ ɩ kpakəɣɩ sətʋ Yesu . Tənaɣa Pilatɩ tɔma sɩ pá cɛlɛ - ɩ .

text: And when Joseph had taken the body , he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth ,
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpaɣa sətʋ na ɩ ́ takɩ - ɩ kponkpontu toŋ nyəntʋ nti pa yaa sɩ lɛŋ tɔ tə pʋŋkahʋlʋŋa kʋfalaɣa .

text: And laid it in his own new tomb , which he had hewn out in the rock : and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre , and departed .
text2: Na ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ pimi - ɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ pəlaaʋ ŋku pa hula kʋkpamʋɣʋ taa tɔ kʋ taa . Na ɩ ́ pilimi pɩɩʋ sɔsɔɔʋ nakʋlɩ na ɩ ́ suli pəlaaʋ nɔɣɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɛɛ ɩ ́ kpe .

text: And there was Mary Magdalene , and the other Mary , sitting over against the sepulchre .
text2: Na Makətala Malɩ na Malɩ lɛlʋ pá caɣa tənaɣa pəlaaʋ ɩsɛntaa .

text: Now the next day , that followed the day of the preparation , the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate ,
text2: Kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ tɔɔ sɔɔlʋ lapʋ tɛma na tɛʋ fe , ɩlɛna kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Falisanaa kpɛntɩ na pá polo Pilatɩ kiŋ ,

text: Saying , Sir , we remember that that deceiver said , while he was yet alive , After three days I will rise again .
text2: na pa heeli - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , tə tɔɔsaa sɩ pɔpɔtʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ka yɔɣɔtaa sɩ ye pə lapa wɛɛ tooso ɩnɩ ɩ ká fe .

text: Command therefore that the sepulchre be made sure until the third day , lest his disciples come by night , and steal him away , and say unto the people , He is risen from the dead : so the last error shall be worse than the first .
text2: Tɔʋ , mpʋ tɔ , yele na pá taŋ pəlaaʋ haləna pə ́ tala kʋyɛɛŋ tooso wule . Ɩ ɩfalaa ɩ ́ taa kɔɔ na pá ŋmɩɩlɩ - ɩ na pá looli samaa sɩ ɩ ́ fema sətaa taa . Ye pə lapa mpʋ , təlɛ tə pɔpɔtʋ ká kəlɩ kancaalaɣa nyəntʋ .

text: Pilate said unto them , Ye have a watch : go your way , make it as sure as ye can .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pilatɩ tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Yoolaa mpa paa taŋ tɔɣɔlɔ , ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ taŋ - kʋɣʋ teu teu .

text: So they went , and made the sepulchre sure , sealing the stone , and setting a watch .
text2: Tənaɣa kɔtəlaa polaa na pá taɣanɩ pəlaaʋ tɔɔ pɩɩʋ ŋkʋɣʋ teu , na pá tʋ pa kʋyʋsʋm sɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa tokina . Ɩlɛna pá sɩɩ yoolaa sɩ pá taŋ .

text: In the end of the sabbath , as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week , came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre .
text2: Kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ tɛɛwa na pə fe cimaasɩ , ɩlɛna Makətala Malɩ na Malɩ lɛlʋ pá kʋlɩ tanaŋ təpam sɩ pa puki pəlaaʋ tɔɔ .

text: And , behold , there was a great earthquake : for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven , and came and rolled back the stone from the door , and sat upon it .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɛtʋ sela sɔsɔm kɛ kpakpaa . Mpi tɔ , Tacaa ɩsɔtaa tillu lɩɩnna ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ tii , na ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ kuli pɩɩʋ ŋkʋɣʋ pəlaaʋ nɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ sɩɩ kpeeŋa , na ɩ ́ kpa tə tɔɔ na ɩ ́ caɣa .

text: His countenance was like lightning , and his raiment white as snow :
text2: Ɩ teu nəɣəsəna ɩsɩɩ tɛʋ nyəɣəsʋɣʋ tɔ , na ɩ wontu hʋlʋmaa ɩsɩɩ kpoŋkpomʋlʋm .

text: And for fear of him the keepers did shake , and became as dead men .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa taŋlaa kɛ sɔɣɔntʋ kɛ sɔsɔm na pá seliɣi , na pá səpa pa tɩɩŋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ yem təkpətɩɩ .

text: And the angel answered and said unto the women , Fear not ye : for I know that ye seek Jesus , which was crucified .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩsɔtaa tillu tɔma alaa sɩ : Mɩɩ taa nyá , ma nyəmá sɩ Yesu wei pa kama səm tesika tɔɔ tɔɣɔ ɩ ́ kɔma pɛɛkʋɣʋ .

text: He is not here : for he is risen , as he said . Come , see the place where the Lord lay .
text2: Ɩ fɛɩ cənɛ , ɩ fema ɩsɩɩ ɩ ka yɔɣɔtaa tɔ . Ɩ ́ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ ná timpi paa hɩɩsa - ɩ tɔ .

text: And go quickly , and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead ; and , behold , he goeth before you into Galilee ; there shall ye see him : lo , I have told you .
text2: Ɩ ́ polo lɔŋ na ɩ ́ heeli ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ , ɩ fema na ɩ ́ tɛɛ - mɛɣɛ nɔɣɔ kɛ Kalilee . Tənaɣa ɩ ́ ká na - ɩ . Nti ma wɛna sɩ ma heeliɣi - mɛ tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy ; and did run to bring his disciples word .
text2: Tənaɣa alaa mpɛ pa kʋla pəlaaʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ kpakpaa na pá tɛɛ , na sɔɣɔntʋ na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ pə kʋɣɩ - wɛ . Ɩlɛna pá polo na pá kaasɩ Yesu ɩfalaa kɛ laapaalɩ ɩnɩ .

text: And as they went to tell his disciples , behold , Jesus met them , saying , All hail . And they came and held him by the feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Pa tɔŋna tɛɛʋ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna Yesu suli - wɛɣɛ kpakpaa na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma sɛɛ - mɛ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kpətəna - ɩ na pá tɔkɩ ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ , na pá həntɩ - ɩ atɛ na pá sɛɛ - ɩ .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Be not afraid : go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee , and there shall they see me .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu heeli - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ taa nyá . Ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ heeli ma taapalaa sɩ pá polo Kalilee , tənaɣa paa na - m .

text: Now when they were going , behold , some of the watch came into the city , and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done .
text2: Alaa mpɛ pa wɛ mpaaʋ taa na pá kpeŋ mpʋ , ɩlɛ sɛsɛ yoolaa mpa paa taŋa pəlaaʋ tɔ , pa taa lɛlaa ná tɛma məlʋɣʋ kɛ ɩcatɛ taa kɛlɛ na pá kɛɛsɩ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa kɛ pə təna mpi pə lapa tɔ .

text: And when they were assembled with the elders , and had taken counsel , they gave large money unto the soldiers ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma pa kotaa na pá lá nɔɣɔ kʋlʋmaɣa na pá ha yoolaa kɛ liɣitee tuutuuma ,

text: Saying , Say ye , His disciples came by night , and stole him away while we slept .
text2: na pá heeli - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ tom kpaɣa - mɛɣɛ ahoo na ɩ ɩfalaa kɔɔ na pá ŋmɩɩlɩ - ɩ .

text: And if this come to the governor ' s ears , we will persuade him , and secure you .
text2: Na ye Kʋfənɛɛ ɩ ́ nɩɩ mpʋ , taa hɛɛsɩ ɩ laŋlɛ , ɩ kaa la - mɛɣɛ pʋlʋ .

text: So they took the money , and did as they were taught : and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day .
text2: Tənaɣa taŋlaa mʋ liɣitee anɩ na pá lá ɩsɩɩ pa heela - wɛ tɔ . Na tɔm tənɛ tə yɛkɩ Yuta nyə ́ ma hɛkʋ , haləna saŋa .

text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee , into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ɩfalaa naanʋwa na kʋlʋm ɩnɩ pa kʋlaa na pá polo Kalilee pulaɣa ŋka Yesu ka kɛɛsa - wɛ tɔ ka tɔɔ .

text: And when they saw him , they worshipped him : but some doubted .
text2: Pa na Yesu ɩlɛna , pá həntɩ - ɩ atɛ na pá sɛɛ - ɩ . Ama pa taa lɛlaa ka wɛna sika .

text: And Jesus came and spake unto them , saying , All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu kpətəna - wɛ na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Ma niŋ taa kɛ ́ pa tʋ ɩsɔtaa na atɛ .

text: Go ye therefore , and teach all nations , baptizing them in the name of the Father , and of the Son , and of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Mpʋ tɔ , ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ la na kateŋasɩ təna taa yəlaa pəsɩ ma ɩfalaa . Ɩ ́ sɔɔkɩ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm na ɩ ́ yaakəna Caa na Pəyaɣa na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ pa hətɛ .

text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you : and , lo , I am with you alway , even unto the end of the world . Amen .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsɩ - wɛ sɩ pá tɔkɩ pə təna mpi ma sɛɣɛsa - mɛ tɔ . Ɩ ́ nyɩ teu sɩ má , maa wɛɛ mə waalɩ kɛ ́ paa kʋyaŋkuɣu , haləna antulinya polo na ɩ ́ kʋlɩ .

text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ , the Son of God ;
text2: Ɩsɔ pəyalʋ Yesu Kilisiti Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ təcaallɛ ntɔ .

text: As it is written in the prophets , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Ɩsayii takəlaɣa taa sɩ : Nyənɩ , ma tillu ntɔ , ma tɛləsəɣɩ nyá nɔɣɔ tɔɔ sɩ ɩ ́ taɣanɩ nyá mpaaʋ na ń kɔŋ .

text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ yɔɣɔtəɣəna nɔɣɔ sɔsɔɣa kɛ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa sɩ : Ɩ ́ taɣanɩ Tacaa mpaaʋ , ɩ ́ siɣisi ɩ mpaɩsi .

text: John did baptize in the wilderness , and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa na Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ kɔɔ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa na ɩ ́ sɔɔkɩ yəlaa kɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm . Na ɩ ́ kpaaləɣɩ sɩ : Ɩ ́ laɣasɩ tɔntɛ na pá sɔ - mɛɣɛ lʋm na Ɩsɔ hɩɩsɩ mə ɩsaɣatʋ .

text: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea , and they of Jerusalem , and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yuta tɛtʋ yəlaa təna , na Yosalɛm nyə ́ ma təna puki ɩ kiŋ , na paa wei ɩ ́ kuliɣi ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ yəlaa taa , na Yohaanɩ sɔɔkɩ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm kɛ Yaatanɩ pɔɣɔ taa .

text: And John was clothed with camel ' s hair , and with a girdle of a skin about his loins ; and he did eat locusts and wild honey ;
text2: Yooyoo hʋntʋ kunti kɛ Yohaanɩ takaa , na ɩ ́ ləla tɔnʋɣʋ tampala kɛ ɩ tənaɣa taa . Ɩ tɔɣɔnaɣa ntɛ ́ cələŋ na taalɛ tɩɩŋ nim .

text: And preached , saying , There cometh one mightier than I after me , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose .
text2: Na ɩ ́ kpaaləɣɩ samaa taa sɩ : Ma waalɩ wei ɩ kɔŋ tɔ pʋntʋ kəla - m toŋ . Halɩ ma ta tɩɩ tala sɩ má sopi na má wɔɣɔsɩ ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ taa ntaŋkpala maɣamaɣa .

text: I indeed have baptized you with water : but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ma ɩlɛ , lʋm kɛ ma sɔ - mɛ . Ama Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kɛ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ká sɔ - mɛ .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee , and was baptized of John in Jordan .
text2: Saa ɩnɩ ɩ taa Yesu lɩɩna Nasalɛtɩ kɛ Kalilee tɛtʋ taa , na ɩ ́ polo na Yohaanɩ sɔ - ɩ Ɩsɔ lʋm kɛ Yaatanɩ pɔɣɔ taa .

text: And straightway coming up out of the water , he saw the heavens opened , and the Spirit like a dove descending upon him :
text2: Yesu lɩɩkaɣana lʋm taa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ná ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ tʋlaa na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ tii ɩ tɔɔ ɩsɩɩ alukuku .

text: And there came a voice from heaven , saying , Thou art my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá nɩɩ pə yɔɣɔtəɣəna ɩsɔtaa sɩ : Nyaɣalɛ ma luɣu tɛɛ Pəyaɣa , ma luɣu sʋʋ - ŋ sɔsɔm .

text: And immediately the Spirit driveth him into the wilderness .
text2: Pə tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kpakpaa , ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu pona Yesu kɛ ́ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa .

text: And he was there in the wilderness forty days , tempted of Satan ; and was with the wild beasts ; and the angels ministered unto him .
text2: Na ɩ ́ caɣa tənaɣa wɛɛ nɩɩlɛ , na Satanɩ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ maɣasəɣɩ - ɩ . Na ɩ ́ wɛ taalɛ wontu hɛkʋ na ɩsɔtaa tillaa paasəna - ɩ .

text: Now after that John was put in prison , Jesus came into Galilee , preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa tʋ Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ kɛ saləka , ɩlɛna Yesu náá polo Kalilee na ɩ ́ sʋʋ Ɩsɔ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ kpaalʋɣʋ .

text: And saying , The time is fulfilled , and the kingdom of God is at hand : repent ye , and believe the gospel .
text2: Na ɩ ́ tɔŋ sɩ : Pənɛntɛ pə tala mpʋ , Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa kpɛɣɛtaa . Ɩ ́ laɣasɩ na ɩ ́ mʋ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ .

text: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee , he saw Simon and Andrew his brother casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Yesu malaɣa Kalilee teŋku kʋteŋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ná tiina kpalaa kɛ naalɛ . Simɔŋ na ɩ neu Antəlɩɩ , na pá tʋɣɩ puluɣu kɛ lʋm taa .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Come ye after me , and I will make you to become fishers of men .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ təŋɩ - m na má la - mɛ na ɩ ́ puuki yəlaa ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ puukuɣu tiina tɔ .

text: And straightway they forsook their nets , and followed him .
text2: Tənaɣa pɛlɛ pa yela pa puluŋ na pá təŋɩ - ɩ kpakpaa .

text: And when he had gone a little further thence , he saw James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , who also were in the ship mending their nets .
text2: Ɩ tasa pote kɛ pəcɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ná Sepetee pəyalʋ Saakɩ na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ neu Yohaanɩ , na pá caɣa kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa na pá taɣanəɣɩ pa puluŋ .

text: And straightway he called them : and they left their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants , and went after him .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ yaa pɛlɛɣɛ kpakpaa , ɩlɛna pá yele pa caa Sepetee na ɩ paa nyə ́ ma kɛ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa na pá təŋɩ - ɩ .

text: And they went into Capernaum ; and straightway on the sabbath day he entered into the synagogue , and taught .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pa pola Kapənahum ɩcatɛ taa na ɩ ́ sʋʋ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile taa kɛ ́ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule na ɩ ́ niki sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for he taught them as one that had authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ cɛpa yəlaa laŋa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ sɛɣɛsaɣa - wɛɣɛ na toŋ ɩ ta nyá . Ɩ fɛɩ ɩsɩɩ pa Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa .

text: And there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit ; and he cried out ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa tuta Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile taa kɛ ́ apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ na ɩ ́ hii ɩlɔɣɔʋ nɔɣɔlʋ . Tənaɣa apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ koowa sɩ :

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art , the Holy One of God .
text2: Nasalɛtɩ Yesu , n caa - weɣe tá kiŋ ? N kɔma - tʋɣʋ wakəlʋɣʋ kɛ ? Ma nyəma - ŋ teu , n kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Yʋlʋ Naŋŋtʋ wei ɩ tilaa tɔ .

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu holina - ɩ sɩ : Hei , nyá , su na ń se apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ waalɩ .

text: And when the unclean spirit had torn him , and cried with a loud voice , he came out of him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩlɔɣɔʋ ɩnɩ ɩ selisa apalʋ ɩnəɣɩ teu . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ má kapuka na ɩ ́ se ɩ waalɩ .

text: And they were all amazed , insomuch that they questioned among themselves , saying , What thing is this ? what new doctrine is this ? for with authority commandeth he even the unclean spirits , and they do obey him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə cɛpa yəlaa təna laŋa kɛ sɔsɔm , na pá tɔŋ təma sɩ : Maamaaci wei kɛlɛ mpʋ ? Toŋ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ kʋfalʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ yaa . Pʋwɛ . Pə kpɛŋna alɔɣaa , ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ pɛlɛɣɛ na apalʋtʋ na pá nɩɩkəna - ɩ .

text: And immediately his fame spread abroad throughout all the region round about Galilee .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu hətɛ yaa kpakpaa ɩnəɣɩ Kalilee tɛtʋ təna taa .

text: And forthwith , when they were come out of the synagogue , they entered into the house of Simon and Andrew , with James and John .
text2: Pa lɩɩ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile taa , ɩlɛna pa na Saakɩ na Yohaanɩ pá polo Simɔŋ na Antəlɩɩ pa təyaɣa kɛ kpakpaa .

text: But Simon ' s wife ' s mother lay sick of a fever , and anon they tell him of her .
text2: Na pá maɣana watʋ wɛna Simɔŋ yɔsɔ na ɩ ́ həntaa . Yesu talaa , ɩlɛna pá heeli - ɩ alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ wʋsasɩ tɔm .

text: And he came and took her by the hand , and lifted her up ; and immediately the fever left her , and she ministered unto them .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pola ɩ kiŋ na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ ɩ niŋ taa na ɩ ́ kʋsɩ , na ɩ watʋ ya na ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ caləsɩ - wɛ .

text: And at even , when the sun did set , they brought unto him all that were diseased , and them that were possessed with devils .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kɔna - ɩ kʋtɔntʋnaa təna na alɔɣɔhilaa tənaɣa taanaɣa tɔɔ kɛ ́ waatʋ wei ilim tʋwa tɔ .

text: And all the city was gathered together at the door .
text2: Na ɩcatɛ təna koti təcəɣəcəɣɩ kɛ təyaɣa ŋkɛ ka nɔnɔɣɔ tɛɛ .

text: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases , and cast out many devils ; and suffered not the devils to speak , because they knew him .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu la na mpa kʋtɔməŋ cɔɔsaɣa tɔ pá hiki alaafəya . Na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔnɩ alɔɣaa paɣalɛ . Ɩ ta tisi sɩ alɔɣaa ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pɛlɛ pa nyəmá ɩ kɛ ́ mpi tɔ .

text: And in the morning , rising up a great while before day , he went out , and departed into a solitary place , and there prayed .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ waatʋ wei pə wʋsa fem na səkpɛtʋɣʋ wɛɛ tɔ , Yesu lɩɩwa na ɩ ́ polo timpi yəlaa fɛɩ tɔ na ɩ ́ sələmɩ Ɩsɔ .

text: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him .
text2: Ɩlɛna Simɔŋ pá sʋʋ - ɩ pɛɛkʋɣʋ .

text: And when they had found him , they said unto him , All men seek for thee .
text2: Pa kɔma na pá na - ɩ , ɩlɛna pá heeli - ɩ sɩ : Yəlaa təna caakɩ - ŋ .

text: And he said unto them , Let us go into the next towns , that I may preach there also : for therefore came I forth .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Tə ́ polo pəcɔlɔ pəcɔlɔ acalɛɛ lɛnna taa na má lá pɛlɛɣɛ waasʋ tɔtɔ . Pə maɣamaɣa pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma kɔma .

text: And he preached in their synagogues throughout all Galilee , and cast out devils .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ sʋʋ Kalilee tɛtʋ təna taa kɛ ́ cɔɔʋ , na ɩ ́ lakɩ waasʋnaa kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa mpa pa wɛna təna tɔɔ tɔ pa taa , na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔnəɣɩ alɔɣaa .

text: And there came a leper to him , beseeching him , and kneeling down to him , and saying unto him , If thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Tənaɣa tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ asilima kʋtɔŋ tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kɔma Yesu kiŋ , na ɩ ́ sopi ɩ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ tɛɣɛ - ɩ niŋ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ye n ka tisaɣa n taa waasɩ - m ?

text: And Jesus , moved with compassion , put forth his hand , and touched him , and saith unto him , I will ; be thou clean .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ kʋtɔŋ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔm lapa Yesu kɛ pətɔɔtəlɛ kɛ sɔsɔm , na ɩ ́ kʋsɩ ɩ niŋ na ɩ ́ tokina - ɩ na ɩ ́ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Teu , ma tisaa , alaafəya ɩ ́ la .

text: And as soon as he had spoken , immediately the leprosy departed from him , and he was cleansed .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kʋtɔŋ tɛma tənɛ ɩnəɣɩ kpakpaa na ɩ ́ məlɩ təmammam .

text: And he straitly charged him , and forthwith sent him away ;
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu tɔɣɔnɩ - ɩ kpakpaa , na ɩ ́ kpaalɩ - ɩ na toŋ sɩ :

text: And saith unto him , See thou say nothing to any man : but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing those things which Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Taa heeli nɔɣɔlʋ . Ama tɛɛ kpakpaa na kɔtʋlʋ na - ŋ . Ɩlɛna ń yiɣisi ɩsɩɩ Moisi ka kɛɛsʋɣʋ tɔ , na pá ná sɩ pə waa - ŋ .

text: But he went out , and began to publish it much , and to blaze abroad the matter , insomuch that Jesus could no more openly enter into the city , but was without in desert places : and they came to him from every quarter .
text2: Ama apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɛɛwa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sʋʋ pə tɔm kpaalʋɣʋ kɛ paa timpi . Haləna ɩ kpaalʋɣʋ mpɩ pə tɔɔ Yesu tá pəsɩ na ɩ ́ sʋʋ ɩcatɛ natəlɩ tə taa təkaa . Ama kpeeŋa tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ cakaɣa kpaɩ taa , na yəlaa lɩɩkəna paa timpi na pá makəna - ɩ .

text: And again he entered into Capernaum , after some days ; and it was noised that he was in the house .
text2: Wɛɛ lapa naalɛ , ɩlɛna Yesu məlɩ Kapənahum na yəlaa nɩɩ sɩ ɩ wɛ təyaɣa taa .

text: And straightway many were gathered together , insomuch that there was no room to receive them , no , not so much as about the door : and he preached the word unto them .
text2: Mpʋɣʋlɛ pa kota sɔsɔm pə tɩɩ fɛɩ . Pə nyəkaa kɛ ́ təkaŋŋ na pə ́ kpɛŋna nɔnɔɣɔ na pə ́ təkɩ , na Yesu tɔŋna - wɛɣɛ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ .

text: And they come unto him , bringing one sick of the palsy , which was borne of four .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yəlaa napəlɩ pa kɔma ɩ kiŋ na pa taa liɣiti səɣəla kʋtɔŋ kʋtʋʋlʋɣʋ tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ .

text: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press , they uncovered the roof where he was : and when they had broken it up , they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay .
text2: Ama yəlaa samaa tɔɔ pa kpisa ɩsəna paa la na pá tana - ɩ Yesu kiŋ tɔ . Ɩlɛna pá kpa na pá wɛsɩ kutuluɣu ŋku kʋ taa Yesu ka wɛɛ tɔ kʋ lɔpʋtʋ , na pá tisi kpatəlɛ nte tə taa kʋtɔntʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ka wɛɛ tɔ na pʋ ́ ʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ŋkʋ .

text: When Jesus saw their faith , he said unto the sick of the palsy , Son , thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Yesu nawa yəlaa mpɛ pa naani , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ kʋtɔŋ kʋtʋʋlʋɣʋ tʋ ɩnɩ sɩ : Ma pəyalʋ , nyá ɩsaɣatʋ hɩɩsaa .

text: But there were certain of the scribes sitting there , and reasoning in their hearts ,
text2: Pə pamna Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa napəlɩ paa caɣa təna na pá hʋʋkɩ pa taa sɩ :

text: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies ? who can forgive sins but God only ?
text2: Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ makɩ kaŋkantɛ na ɩ ́ kpakəɣɩ ɩ tɩ na ɩ ́ kɛɛsəɣəna Ɩsɔ ? Awe pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ hɩɩsɩ ɩsaɣatʋ ye pə taɣa Ɩsɔ paasi ?

text: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves , he said unto them , Why reason ye these things in your hearts ?
text2: Ama Yesu ná cɛkəna nti pa hʋʋkaɣa pa taa tɔɣɔ kpakpaa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ hʋʋkɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mə taa ?

text: Whether is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Nti tə yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ kələna təlɛʋ . Má heeli kʋtɔntʋ sɩ Nyá ɩsaɣatʋ hɩɩsaa , yaa Kʋlɩ na ń kɛlɩ nyá kpatəlɛ na ń tɔ ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( he saith to the sick of the palsy , )
text2: Tɔʋ , maa hʋlɩ - mɛ sɩ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má , ma pəsəɣɩ na má hɩɩsɩ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ atɛ cənɛ . Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma kʋtɔntʋ sɩ :

text: I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy bed , and go thy way into thine house .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - ŋ sɩ ń kʋlɩ na ń kpaɣa nyá kpatəlɛ na ń kpe .

text: And immediately he arose , took up the bed , and went forth before them all ; insomuch that they were all amazed , and glorified God , saying , We never saw it on this fashion .
text2: Tənaɣa kʋtɔntʋ kʋla kpakpaa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa ɩ kpatəlɛ na yəlaa nyənəɣɩ - ɩ mpʋ , na ɩ ́ tɛɛ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa pa tənaɣa piti kɛ sɔsɔm , na pá saŋ Ɩsɔ na pá tɔŋ sɩ : Tuu tɔ , tə ta nata ɩsəntɔ ɩnɩ ɩ nəɣəsəlɛ .

text: And he went forth again by the sea side ; and all the multitude resorted unto him , and he taught them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa Kalilee teŋku nɔɣɔ kɛ pote na yəlaa puki ɩ kiŋ kɛ sɔsɔm na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ - wɛ .

text: And as he passed by , he saw Levi the son of Alphaeus sitting at the receipt of custom , and said unto him , Follow me . And he arose and followed him .
text2: Yesu tɛɛkaɣa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ná Aləfe pəyalʋ Lefii na ɩ ́ caɣa lampuu təmʋlɛ . Ɩlɛna Yesu tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Kʋlɩ na ń təŋɩ - m . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Lefii kʋlaa na ɩ ́ təŋɩ - ɩ .

text: And it came to pass , that , as Jesus sat at meat in his house , many publicans and sinners sat also together with Jesus and his disciples : for there were many , and they followed him .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ Yesu caɣaa na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ kʋtɔɣɔʋ kɛ Lefii tɛ . Ɩ ́ na lampuu mʋlaa paɣalɛ , na asaɣaa paɣalɛ , na ɩ ɩfalaa pa tɔkaɣana . Yəlaa asaɣaa ɩsɩɩ mpʋ ka təŋaɣa - ɩ paɣalɛ tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners , they said unto his disciples , How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa mpa pa kɛ ́ Falisanaa kpekəle nyə ́ ma tɔ , pa nawa Yesu na asaɣaa , na lampuu mʋlaa pa caɣaa na pá tɔkɩ mpʋ . Ɩlɛna pá pɔɔsɩ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ Yesu na lampuu mʋlaa na yəlaa asaɣaa pa kpɛntəɣɩ na pá tɔkɩ ?

text: When Jesus heard it , he saith unto them , They that are whole have no need of the physician , but they that are sick : I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Yesu nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Pə taɣa alaafəya nyə ́ ma nyɩɩləɣəna fɛtaa . Ama kʋtɔntʋnaa kɛ ́ . Ma kɔmaɣa sɩ ma yaakɩ asaɣaa , pə taɣa kʋpama .

text: And the disciples of John and of the Pharisees used to fast : and they come and say unto him , Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ ɩfalaa na Falisanaa pa hɔka nɔɔsɩ . Tənaɣa yəlaa kɔma na pá pɔɔsɩ Yesu sɩ : Pə lapa ɩsəna na Lʋm Sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ ɩfalaa na Falisanaa nyə ́ ma ná hɔkəɣɩ nɔɔsɩ na nyá ɩfalaa naa toosiɣi pə tɔm .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ? as long as they have the bridegroom with them , they cannot fast .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ hʋʋ sɩ akpaɣalʋ taapalaa ká hɔkɔ nɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ na - wɛ pá wɛɛ ? Aaɩ , pəlɛ pə fɛɩ lapʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ . Ye ɩ wɛ pa hɛkʋ , paa tɔkɩ tam kɛ ́ .

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Ama pɩɩ kɔɔ na pə ́ kɛɛsɩ kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ , ɩlɛna pá ləsɩ - ɩ pa hɛkʋ . Ɩlɛ pəlɛɣɛlɛ paa hɔkɔ nɔɔsɩ .

text: No man also seweth a piece of new cloth on an old garment : else the new piece that filled it up taketh away from the old , and the rent is made worse .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ kaa kpaɣa saaliya kʋfalaɣa na ɩ ́ tɔ wontuɣu kʋpənʋɣʋ . Tɔfɔ , saaliya ŋkɛ kaa hɔ wontuɣu ŋkʋ na pʋ ́ ʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɛɛsɩ walʋɣʋ .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles : else the new wine doth burst the bottles , and the wine is spilled , and the bottles will be marred : but new wine must be put into new bottles .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ kaa suu sʋlʋm kʋfam kɛ sʋlʋm huluŋ kʋpəŋ taa . Tɔfɔ sʋlʋm kʋfam yasəɣɩ huluŋ kʋpəŋ ɩnəɣɩ , na sʋlʋm mpɩ na huluŋ pə ́ wakəlɩ yem . Ama huluŋ kʋfaŋ taa kɛ ́ pa suuki sʋlʋm kʋfam .

text: And it came to pass , that he went through the corn fields on the sabbath day ; and his disciples began , as they went , to pluck the ears of corn .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa faɣana tɔɣɔnaɣa pee taalɛ natəlɩ tə taa kɛ ́ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ kʋlɩ kʋ wule . Ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa sʋʋ tɔɣɔnaɣa pee pɛlʋɣʋ na mpaaʋ .

text: And the Pharisees said unto him , Behold , why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful ?
text2: Tənaɣa Falisanaa tɔma Yesu sɩ : Nyənɩ nyá ɩfalaa lakʋɣʋ mpi pə fɛɩ lapʋ kɛ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule tɔ yee .

text: And he said unto them , Have ye never read what David did , when he had need , and was an hungred , he , and they that were with him ?
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ye mpʋ ɩ ́ ta kaləta paa pəcɔɣɔ mpi Tafiiti lapa waatʋ wei pə caala - ɩ na nyɔɣɔsɩ pɩɩ ɩ ́ na mpa pa wɛ ɩ cɔlɔ tɔ ?

text: How he went into the house of God in the days of Abiathar the high priest , and did eat the shewbread , which is not lawful to eat but for the priests , and gave also to them which were with him ?
text2: Ɩsəna ɩ sʋʋ Ɩsɔ təyaɣa taa na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ potopotonaa mpa paa sɩɩ Ɩsɔ tɔ . Apiyataa ka kɛna kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ kɛ saa ɩnɩ . Pəyele pə fɛɩ sɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ potopotonaa mpɛɣɛ yem na pə ́ tá kɛ ́ kɔtəlaa . Ama Tafiiti ná tɔɣɔ - wɛ . Haləna ɩ ́ ha ɩ taapalaa .

text: And he said unto them , The sabbath was made for man , and not man for the sabbath :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa - wɛ tɔtɔ sɩ : Yʋlʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa sɩɩ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ . Ama pa ta la yʋlʋ kɛ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ tɔɔ .

text: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má , ma kɛ ́ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ sɔsɔ təsiɣisiɣi .

text: And he entered again into the synagogue ; and there was a man there which had a withered hand .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ Yesu taɣana Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile taa kɛ ́ məlʋɣʋ . Pə pamna ŋkpaləkpɛkaɣa tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛ təna .

text: And they watched him , whether he would heal him on the sabbath day ; that they might accuse him .
text2: Na yəlaa mpa paa wɛ təna tɔ pá caɣaa na pá keŋna Yesu kɛ ́ teu sɩ pa naa sɩ ɩ ká waasɩ apalʋ ɩnəɣɩ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule yaa ɩsəna ? Pa lakaɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pá hiki nti paa waana - ɩ tɔ .

text: And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand , Stand forth .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma ŋkpaləkpɛkaɣa tʋ sɩ : Kʋlɩ na ń səŋ hɛkʋ taa .

text: And he saith unto them , Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days , or to do evil ? to save life , or to kill ? But they held their peace .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu pɔɔsɩ mpa pa caɣa mpʋ tɔ sɩ : Ta mpaaʋ taa , kʋpantʋ kɛ pə mʋna pá la kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule yaa ɩsaɣatʋ ? Paa waasɩ yaa paa kʋ ? Ama pa ta cɔ sɩ pʋlʋ .

text: And when he had looked round about on them with anger , being grieved for the hardness of their hearts , he saith unto the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it out : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ nyəna pa təna pa ɩsɛntaa na pa tɔm lapɩ - ɩ pááná , na pa taa hʋwɛɛ asaɣɛɛ wakəlɩ ɩ laŋlɛ kɛ sɔsɔm tɔtɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ ŋkpaləkpɛkaɣa tʋ ɩnɩ sɩ : Tɔʋ , loosi nyá niŋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ŋkpaləkpɛkaɣa tʋ loosa ɩ niŋ , ɩlɛna ɩ niŋ hɛtɩ .

text: And the Pharisees went forth , and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Tənaɣa Falisanaa lɩɩna Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile taa kɛ ́ kpakpaa , ɩlɛna pa na Helɔtɩ nyə ́ ma pá caɣa na pá maɣasɩ ɩsəna paa la na pá kʋ Yesu tɔ .

text: But Jesus withdrew himself with his disciples to the sea : and a great multitude from Galilee followed him , and from Judaea ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu lɩɩ təna təfaʋ , na ɩ ́ na ɩ ɩfalaa pá polo Kalilee teŋku nɔɣɔ , na samaa tuutuuma hu ɩ waalɩ . Samaa ɩnɩ ɩ ka lɩɩna Kalilee , na Yuta ,

text: And from Jerusalem , and from Idumaea , and from beyond Jordan ; and they about Tyre and Sidon , a great multitude , when they had heard what great things he did , came unto him .
text2: na Yosalɛm , na Ɩtumee tɛtʋ taa , na Yaatanɩ pɔɣɔ waalɩ , na Tiii na Sitɔŋ pə acalɛɛ cɔlɔ hɔɣɔlʋɣʋ . Yəlaa panɛ pa nɩɩ mpi mpi Yesu tɔŋna lapʋ tɔɣɔ pa kotaɣa ɩ kiŋ kɛ sɔsɔm kɛ mpʋ .

text: And he spake to his disciples , that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude , lest they should throng him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ pá taŋɩ - ɩ na kpɩɩlʋɣʋ , tɔfɔ samaa yuŋ ka nyəkɩ - ɩ .

text: For he had healed many ; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him , as many as had plagues .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , yəlaa nawa sɩ Yesu tɔŋna lapʋ na kʋtɔntʋnaa hikiɣi alaafəya . Ɩlɛna pa təna mpa pə wɩɩkaɣa tɔ , pá huliɣi sɩ pá hiki - ɩ na pá tokina - ɩ .

text: And unclean spirits , when they saw him , fell down before him , and cried , saying , Thou art the Son of God .
text2: Ye alɔɣaa loosa Yesu , pa sʋʋkɩ kiisuɣu kɛ ́ na pá luŋi - ɩ na pá tɔŋ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ kɛ ́ .

text: And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known .
text2: Ama Yesu ná kaləna - wɛ sɩ pá taa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ .

text: And he goeth up into a mountain , and calleth unto him whom he would : and they came unto him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu kpa pʋɣʋ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ yaa mpa ɩ caa tɔɣɔ ɩ kiŋ , na pɛlɛ pá polo .

text: And he ordained twelve , that they should be with him , and that he might send them forth to preach ,
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ ləsa pa taa yəlaa naanʋwa na naalɛ na ɩ ́ ha - wɛɣɛ hətɛ sɩ tillaa . Ɩ ləsa pɛlɛɣɛ sɩ pá wɛɛ ɩ kiŋ kɛ tam na ɩ ́ tiliɣi - wɛɣɛ waasʋ lapʋ .

text: And to have power to heal sicknesses , and to cast out devils :
text2: Na ɩ ́ ha - wɛɣɛ alɔɣaa tɔɣɔnʋɣʋ pəsʋɣʋ .

text: And Simon he surnamed Peter ;
text2: Yəlaa naanʋwa na naalɛ wei ɩ ləsaa tɔ pa həla ntɔ . Simɔŋ wei Yesu ha hətɛ sɩ Piyɛɛ tɔ ,

text: And James the son of Zebedee , and John the brother of James ; and he surnamed them Boanerges , which is , The sons of thunder :
text2: na Sepetee pəyalʋ Saakɩ na ɩ neu Yohaanɩ . Pɛlɛ pa naalɛɣɛ Yesu ka ha hətɛ sɩ Pʋwanɛɛsɩ , na təlɛ tə hʋwɛɛ ntɛ ́ sɩ tɛʋ holuɣu piya .

text: And Andrew , and Philip , and Bartholomew , and Matthew , and Thomas , and James the son of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus , and Simon the Canaanite ,
text2: Na pə ́ kaasɩ Antəlɩɩ , na Filipʋ , na Paatelemii , na Matiyee , na Tomaa , na Aləfe pəyalʋ Saakɩ , na Tatee , na Simɔŋ wei ɩ ka lʋkaɣa tɛtʋ tɔkʋɣʋ tɔm taa tɔ ,

text: And Judas Iscariot , which also betrayed him : and they went into an house .
text2: na Yutaasɩ Ɩsəkaleeu wei ɩ hʋlaa sɩ Yesu kolontunaa ɩ ́ kpa - ɩ tɔ .

text: And the multitude cometh together again , so that they could not so much as eat bread .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ Yesu məla təyaɣa , na yəlaa tuutuuma tasa kotuɣu pə tɩɩ fɛɩ . Haləna Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa ta hiki tapacaɣalɛ sɩ pá tɔɣɔ tɔɣɔʋ maɣamaɣa .

text: And when his friends heard of it , they went out to lay hold on him : for they said , He is beside himself .
text2: Ɩ nyə ́ ma nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá kʋlɩ sɩ pá puki na pá kpa - ɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pa tɔŋaɣa kɛ ́ sɩ pə lakɩ - ɩ kɛ ́ .

text: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said , He hath Beelzebub , and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils .
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa mpa pa lɩɩna Yosalɛm na pá kɔɔ tɔ pɛlɛ pa tɔŋaɣa sɩ : Yesu nyəna Pesepule kɛ ́ . Ɩlɛna lɛlaa náá tɔŋ sɩ : Alɔɣaa wulaʋ toŋ kɛ Yesu tɔɣɔnəɣəna alɔɣaa lɛmpa .

text: And he called them unto him , and said unto them in parables , How can Satan cast out Satan ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu yaa - wɛ na ɩ ́ sɛɛ - wɛɣɛ ɩsɔnaa sɩ : Ɩsənaɣa Satanɩ ká tɔɣɔnɩ ɩ tɩ ?

text: And if a kingdom be divided against itself , that kingdom cannot stand .
text2: Ye kawulaɣa wɛɛ na ká fɛɩ nɔɣɔ kʋlʋmaɣa , nɔɔnɔɔ ka saaləɣɩ yem kɛ ́ .

text: And if a house be divided against itself , that house cannot stand .
text2: Na yəlaa ɩ ́ wɛ təyaɣa taa na pá fɛɩ nɔɣɔ kʋlʋmaɣa , nɔɔnɔɔ təyaɣa ŋkɛ ka saaləɣɩ yem kɛ ́ .

text: And if Satan rise up against himself , and be divided , he cannot stand , but hath an end .
text2: Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ ye Satanɩ wakələɣɩ ɩ tɩ na ɩ kawulaɣa nyə ́ ma yooki pa taa pa tike , ɩ kawulaɣa yaa kɛ ́ na ɩ toŋ saalɩ yem təkpataa .

text: No man can enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he will first bind the strong man ; and then he will spoil his house .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ sʋʋ yʋlʋ toŋ tʋ təyaɣa sɩ ɩ kuuki ɩ wontu na ɩ ́ tá tɛ toŋ tʋ ɩnəɣɩ hɔkʋɣʋ kɛ ŋmɩɩsɩ . Ama ɩ kpaa - ɩ kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ hɔkɔ - ɩ təkeŋkeŋ na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ sʋʋ ɩ wontu kuuu kɛ təyaɣa taa .

text: Verily I say unto you , All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men , and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme :
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , paa yəlaa kʋwakələm ká tɔɔ ɩsəna , yaa paa pa yɔɣɔta ɩsaɣatʋ ɩsɩɩ we , Ɩsɔ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - wɛɣɛ suulu .

text: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness , but is in danger of eternal damnation :
text2: Ama wei ɩ ká yɔɣɔtɩ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ tɔɔ tɔ pa kaa hɩɩsɩ pʋntʋ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pʋntʋ səɣəla ɩsaɣatʋ tam nyəntʋ kɛ ́ .

text: Because they said , He hath an unclean spirit .
text2: Mpi pə tɔɔ Yesu yɔɣɔta mpʋ tɔ , pa tɔŋaɣa - ɩ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ nyəna ɩlɔɣɔʋ .

text: There came then his brethren and his mother , and , standing without , sent unto him , calling him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu too na ɩ newaa apalaa nyə ́ ma pa kɔma na pá səŋ awalɩ na pá tili sɩ pá yaa - ɩ .

text: And the multitude sat about him , and they said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren without seek for thee .
text2: Pə pamna yəlaa samaa caɣaa na pá cɔɔna Yesu . Tənaɣa pa heela Yesu sɩ : Tə taa cɛ nyá nɔɣɔ tɔɔ , nyá too na nyá newaa pa wɛnna ntɛɣɛ awalɩ na pá caa - ŋ .

text: And he answered them , saying , Who is my mother , or my brethren ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu nɔɣɔ təkpaʋ sɩ : Aweɣe ma too na mpaɣa ma newaa ye ?

text: And he looked round about on them which sat about him , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Yesu nyəna mpa pa təna pa caɣaa na pá cɔɔna - ɩ kotaɣa tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩɩ naa ma toonaa na ma newaa ntɔ .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of God , the same is my brother , and my sister , and mother .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mpa pa lakɩ mpi Ɩsɔ caakɩ tɔ pʋntʋnaa ntɛ ́ ma newaa na ma toonaa .

text: And he began again to teach by the sea side : and there was gathered unto him a great multitude , so that he entered into a ship , and sat in the sea ; and the whole multitude was by the sea on the land .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ kɛ Kalilee teŋku nɔɣɔ . Tənaɣa yəlaa kota ɩ kiŋ kɛ sɔsɔm pə fɛɩ kɛɛsʋɣʋ . Haləna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ kpa kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa na ɩ ́ caɣa . Na yəlaa náá caɣa atɛɣɛ lʋm nɔɣɔ na ɩnɩ ɩ wɛ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ lʋm taa .

text: And he taught them many things by parables , and said unto them in his doctrine ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu sɛɣɛsa - wɛɣɛ tɔmnaa paɣalɛ na ɩsɔnaa sɛɛʋ taa . Haləna ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ - wɛ sɩ :

text: Hearken ; Behold , there went out a sower to sow :
text2: Ɩ ́ nɩɩ teu , tuulu poləna tuutu .

text: And it came to pass , as he sowed , some fell by the way side , and the fowls of the air came and devoured it up .
text2: Ɩ tuukaɣa ɩ mətutuuna , ɩlɛna lɛnna hoti mpaaʋ nɔɣɔ nɔɣɔ na sumasɩ tii na sɩ tɔɣɔ - yɛ .

text: And some fell on stony ground , where it had not much earth ; and immediately it sprang up , because it had no depth of earth :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ lɛnna hota kʋwaʋ tɔɔ timpi tɛtʋ ta lim tɔ , na alɛ á təŋna nyɔʋ kɛ tɛtʋ wɛ tətaɣasam tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: But when the sun was up , it was scorched ; and because it had no root , it withered away .
text2: Ilim kɔma na pə ́ haŋ na pə ́ nyaɣa məhoo , ɩlɛna a wʋlɩ . Mpi tɔ , a ta hiki tɛtʋ sɩ á ka hoosi kʋpaŋsɩ .

text: And some fell among thorns , and the thorns grew up , and choked it , and it yielded no fruit .
text2: Pee lɛnna náá hoti sɔwa taa na alɛ a nyɔ ɩsɩɩ a ká kʋlɩ teu , ɩlɛna sɔwa fɛtɛ - yɛ na á kpisi lʋlʋɣʋ .

text: And other fell on good ground , and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased ; and brought forth , some thirty , and some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Ama pee lɛnna ná hota tɛtʋ mʋsʋŋ nyəntʋ taa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alɛ a nyɔwa na á kʋlɩ na á pɩɩ tɩɩŋ na á lʋlɩ pee . Lɛnna kɛ pəcɔ , lɛnna kɛ maɣana , lɛnna kɛ sɔsɔm sɔsɔm .

text: And he said unto them , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Ye wei ɩ kɛ ́ tɔm nɩɩlʋ pʋntʋ ɩ ́ nɩɩ .

text: And when he was alone , they that were about him with the twelve asked of him the parable .
text2: Pa kɔma na pá lɩɩna kpeeŋa , ɩlɛna mpa paa wɛ Yesu cɔlɔ tɔ na ɩ ɩfalaa naanʋwa na naalɛ pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Kɛɛsɩ - tʋɣʋ ɩsɔnaa mpa n sɛɛ - tʋɣʋ mpʋ tɔ pa hʋwɛɛ .

text: And he said unto them , Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God : but unto them that are without , all these things are done in parables :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Mɛ , pə ha - mɛɣɛ sɩ ɩ ́ nyɩ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa tɔm kʋŋmɛsətʋ . Ama ɩsɔnaa sɛɛʋ taa kɛ ́ kpaɩ nyə ́ ma ná nyəŋna pə tampana .

text: That seeing they may see , and not perceive ; and hearing they may hear , and not understand ; lest at any time they should be converted , and their sins should be forgiven them .
text2: Pəcɔ pə tisi na paa pa nyəna teu , pá taa ná . Na paa pa nɩɩ teu , pá taa cɛkəna . Tɔfɔ tɔɔ paa kɔɔ na pá pəsəna Ɩsɔ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ hɩɩsɩ - wɛɣɛ pa ɩsaɣatʋ .

text: And he said unto them , Know ye not this parable ? and how then will ye know all parables ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ tá cɛkəna ɩsɔ wei ma sɛɛ - mɛɣɛ mpʋ tɔ yaa ? Na ɩsənaɣalɛ ɩ ́ ká cɛkəna ɩsɔnaa lɛlaa mpa paa sɛɛ - mɛ tɔ ?

text: The sower soweth the word .
text2: Pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm kɛ tuulu ɩnɩ ɩ tuuki .

text: And these are they by the way side , where the word is sown ; but when they have heard , Satan cometh immediately , and taketh away the word that was sown in their hearts .
text2: Yəlaa wɛɛ , na ye pa nɩɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm Satanɩ təŋ na ɩ ́ hɔɣɔsɩ - təɣɩ pa taa kɛ ́ kpakpaa . Pɛlɛ pa wɛnna ntɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ pee nna a hota mpaaʋ nɔɣɔ nɔɣɔ tɔ .

text: And these are they likewise which are sown on stony ground ; who , when they have heard the word , immediately receive it with gladness ;
text2: Pee wena alɛ a hota kʋwaʋ tɔɔ tɔ , alɛɣɛlɛ mpa pa nɩɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm na pá mʋ - təɣɩ kpakpaa na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ tɔ .

text: And have no root in themselves , and so endure but for a time : afterward , when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word ' s sake , immediately they are offended .
text2: Ama paa yeki sɩ tə sʋʋna - wɛɣɛ teu . Pa tɔkəɣɩ - təɣɩ tətantaa . Saa wei wahala nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ká tala , yaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm tɔɔ kʋnyɔŋ tʋɣʋ ká kɔɔ , ɩlɛna pá lɩɩ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ taa kɛ ́ kpakpaa .

text: And these are they which are sown among thorns ; such as hear the word ,
text2: Lɛlaa ná nəɣəsəna wena a hota sɔwa taa tɔ . Mpi tɔ pa tɛŋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm nɩɩʋ ,

text: And the cares of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , and the lusts of other things entering in , choke the word , and it becometh unfruitful .
text2: ɩlɛna atɛ cənɛ kʋlapʋtʋ nəɣəsɛɛ na wɛnaʋ kɔtɔɩ puɣusi - wɛ . Na kʋnyɩɩləŋ lɛləŋ kʋ tɔm ntəɣɩ pa taa , na halɩ tə caŋ na tə kpisi lʋlʋɣʋ .

text: And these are they which are sown on good ground ; such as hear the word , and receive it , and bring forth fruit , some thirtyfold , some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Pə kaasa pee lɛnna ná hota tɛtʋ mʋsʋŋ nyəntʋ taa . Aŋhaa , alɛ a wɛnna ntɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ yəlaa mpa pa nɩɩkɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm na pá mʋ - təɣɩ teu na pá lʋləɣɩ pee tɔ . Lɛlaa kɛ pəcɔ , lɛlaa kɛ maɣana , na lɛlaa kɛ sɔsɔm sɔsɔm .

text: And he said unto them , Is a candle brought to be put under a bushel , or under a bed ? and not to be set on a candlestick ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pɔɔsa - wɛ tɔtɔ sɩ : Yʋlʋ ká kpaɣa fətəla na ɩ ́ pamɩ - ɩ nyənaɣa tɛɛ yaa ɩ ́ sʋsɩ - ɩ kato tɛɛ ? Pə taɣa ye ɩ wɛ timpi taa , pɩɩ na yəlaa təna tɔɣɔ paa sɩɩ - ɩ ?

text: For there is nothing hid , which shall not be manifested ; neither was any thing kept secret , but that it should come abroad .
text2: Kʋŋmɛləm napəlɩ pə fɛɩ sɩ pə kaa kuli pə tɔɔ , pə ́ cɔ ́ mukaɣa tɛɛ pʋlʋ fɛɩ mpi pa kaa ləsɩ na paa wei ɩ ́ ná tɔ .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Ye wei ɩ kɛ ́ tɔm nɩɩlʋ pʋntʋ ɩ ́ nɩɩ .

text: And he said unto them , Take heed what ye hear : with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you : and unto you that hear shall more be given .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ heeluɣu sɩ : Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na nti nti ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ tɔ . Maɣasəlaɣa ŋka mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ maɣasəɣəna tɔ , ŋkɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ ká maɣasəna ɩ kʋcɔɔŋ na ɩ ́ ha - mɛ .

text: For he that hath , to him shall be given : and he that hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he hath .
text2: Wei ɩ wɛna tɔɣɔ paa ha . Paa lɛɛkɩ wei ɩ fɛɩna tɔɣɔ pəciimaɣa wei ɩ wɛna tɔ .

text: And he said , So is the kingdom of God , as if a man should cast seed into the ground ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasaa tɔtɔ sɩ : Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ tuukuɣu pee kɛ ɩ taalɛ taa tɔ .

text: And should sleep , and rise night and day , and the seed should spring and grow up , he knoweth not how .
text2: Paa ɩ tooki yaa ɩ wɛna ɩ ɩsɛ , paa ilim paa ahoo , ɩ kaa nyɩ ɩsəna pee anɩ a nyɔɔkɩ na á lakɩ məhoo tɔ .

text: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself ; first the blade , then the ear , after that the full corn in the ear .
text2: Tɛtʋ maɣamaɣa lakəna na pə ́ pɩɩkɩ . Pə caaləɣəna məhoo kɛ ́ , waalɩ kɛ ́ pə tʋɣɩ nyɔɔŋ . Pəlɛ pə waalɩ kɛ ́ pee ná pɩɩkɩ təcasəlaa .

text: But when the fruit is brought forth , immediately he putteth in the sickle , because the harvest is come .
text2: Pə pɩɩkɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá cɛ na pá hɩɩsɩ na pá niki kʋm .

text: And he said , Whereunto shall we liken the kingdom of God ? or with what comparison shall we compare it ?
text2: Yesu tasa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ tɔtɔ sɩ : Pepeɣe tɩɩ kɛɛsəna Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa ɩlɛ yee ? Na ɩsɔ wei kɛ ́ tɩɩ sɛɛ na pə ́ kɛɛsɩ ka tɔm ɩlɛ yee ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which , when it is sown in the earth , is less than all the seeds that be in the earth :
text2: Ka nəɣəsəna kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ sɔɔɣa pile . Pee nna pa tuuki tɔ a təna a taa ntɛ ́ tə kələna wɛɛʋ təminimini .

text: But when it is sown , it groweth up , and becometh greater than all herbs , and shooteth out great branches ; so that the fowls of the air may lodge under the shadow of it .
text2: Ama ye pa tuu - tɛ , tə pɩɩkɩ kɛ ́ na tə ́ kpa sɔsɔm na tə ́ kəlɩ tuusi lɛŋsɩ . Na tə ́ hɛlɩ piliŋasɩ kɛ sɔsɔm , haləna sumasɩ kɔŋ na sɩ tʋɣɩ tana kɛ sɩ hɔtʋ taa .

text: And with many such parables spake he the word unto them , as they were able to hear it .
text2: Yaasinaa paɣalɛ ɩsɩɩ mpʋ pə taka kɛ ́ Yesu kpaɣaa na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsəna - wɛ . Ɩ maɣasa ɩsəna yəlaa mpa pa kotina - ɩ mpʋ tɔ paa pəsɩ na pá cɛkəna tɔ .

text: But without a parable spake he not unto them : and when they were alone , he expounded all things to his disciples .
text2: Ɩ ta sɛɣɛsɩ - wɛɣɛ natələɣɩ yem na ɩ ́ ta kɛɛsəna pʋlʋ . Ɩ ́ na ɩ ɩfalaa pa kɔma na pá caɣa pa tike , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kilisi - wɛɣɛ pə təna .

text: And the same day , when the even was come , he saith unto them , Let us pass over unto the other side .
text2: Kʋyakʋ kʋnɛ ɩnɩ kʋ taanaɣa tɔɔ Yesu tɔma ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Tə ́ tɛsɩ na tə ́ polo kʋteŋ lɛŋkʋ tɔɔ .

text: And when they had sent away the multitude , they took him even as he was in the ship . And there were also with him other little ships .
text2: Pa tɛma yəlaa kɛ yasʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna Yesu ɩfalaa kɛlɩ - ɩ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ ŋku kʋ taa ɩ ka caɣaa tɔ , na kpɩɩləŋ lɛləŋ ka wɛ ɩ kiŋ təna .

text: And there arose a great storm of wind , and the waves beat into the ship , so that it was now full .
text2: Tənaɣa heelimuɣu sʋʋ mapʋ na lʋm huuki na pə ́ watəɣɩ pa kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa , haləna kʋlɛ kʋ caa suɣu .

text: And he was in the hinder part of the ship , asleep on a pillow : and they awake him , and say unto him , Master , carest thou not that we perish ?
text2: Pə pamna Yesu ná tʋ ɩ nyʋɣʋ kɛ lefeli na ɩ ́ tɔŋna tom na waalɩ tɔɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ɩfalaa feesa - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , n suma yaa ? Tə lepaɣa .
