text: And he arose , and rebuked the wind , and said unto the sea , Peace , be still . And the wind ceased , and there was a great calm .
text2: Ɩ fema ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kaləna heelim . Na ɩ ́ heeli lʋm sɩ : Su , hɛɛ təna . Tənaɣa heelim suma , na pə təna pə hɛɛ təli .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye so fearful ? how is it that ye have no faith ?
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ wɛna sɔɣɔntʋ kɛ mpʋ ? Ɩ ́ ta tɛ mə taa na Ɩsɔ kɛlɛ ?

text: And they feared exceedingly , and said one to another , What manner of man is this , that even the wind and the sea obey him ?
text2: Sɔɣɔntʋ pɩɩ - wɛɣɛ sɔsɔm na pá tɔŋ təma sɩ : Aweɣelɛ ɩnɛ ɩnɩ na pə kpɛŋna heelim na teŋku lʋm na pə ́ nɩɩkəna - ɩ ?

text: And they came over unto the other side of the sea , into the country of the Gadarenes .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa tala Kalilee teŋku kʋteŋ lɛŋkʋ kɛ Selasini nyə ́ ma tɛtʋ taa .

text: And when he was come out of the ship , immediately there met him out of the tombs a man with an unclean spirit ,
text2: Yesu lɩɩna kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ kpakpaa , ɩlɛna yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ lɩɩna pəlaaŋ taa na ɩ ́ səŋɩ - ɩ .

text: Who had his dwelling among the tombs ; and no man could bind him , no , not with chains :
text2: Apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ka hii ɩlɔɣɔʋ kɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ wɛ pəlaaŋ taa . Paa alukpala maɣamaɣa kɛ paa hɔkɔ - ɩ pɩɩ cakɩ .

text: Because that he had been often bound with fetters and chains , and the chains had been plucked asunder by him , and the fetters broken in pieces : neither could any man tame him .
text2: Tɔm paɣalɛ kɛ pa kama - ɩ ŋkpasɩ na ɩ ́ pɛlɩ , na pá hɔkɔ ɩ niŋ kɛ alukpala na ɩ ́ pʋtətɩ pə təna . Nɔɣɔlʋ fɛɩ wei ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ ŋmakəlɩ - ɩ tɔ .

text: And always , night and day , he was in the mountains , and in the tombs , crying , and cutting himself with stones .
text2: Pulasɩ taa na pəlaaŋ taa kɛ ́ ɩ wɛ ilim na ahoo kɛ tam , na ɩ ́ makɩ kapusi na ɩ ́ hɛɛtəɣɩ ɩ təɣɩ pɛɛ .

text: But when he saw Jesus afar off , he ran and worshipped him ,
text2: Apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ loosa Yesu kɛ ́ pooluŋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpaɣa asewa na ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ luŋ ɩ tɛɛ

text: And cried with a loud voice , and said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of the most high God ? I adjure thee by God , that thou torment me not .
text2: na ɩ ́ kooki sɩ : Ɩsɔtaa Ɩsɔ Sɔsɔ Pəyalʋ Yesu , ma na - ŋ suwe ? Ma wiina - ŋ , haɩ , nyənɩ Ɩsɔ , taa tʋ - m wahala .

text: For he said unto him , Come out of the man , thou unclean spirit .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ yɔɣɔta mpʋ , Yesu ka tɔma ɩ ɩlɔɣɔʋ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ se apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ waalɩ .

text: And he asked him , What is thy name ? And he answered , saying , My name is Legion : for we are many .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pɔɔsa apalʋ ɩnɩ sɩ : Pa yaa - ŋ suwe ? Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Pa yaa - m sɩ Kʋpiŋ kɛ tə wɛ paɣalɛ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: And he besought him much that he would not send them away out of the country .
text2: Ɩlɛna apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ wiina Yesu kɛ ́ teu sɩ ɩ ́ taa tɔɣɔnɩ - wɛɣɛ tɛtʋ ntɩ tə taa .

text: Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding .
text2: Afanaa kaləkʋ sɔsɔɔʋ nakʋlɩ kɩɩ wɛ tənaɣa pʋɣʋ cɔlɔ na kʋ tuliɣi .

text: And all the devils besought him , saying , Send us into the swine , that we may enter into them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alɔɣaa mpɛ pa wiina Yesu sɩ ɩ ́ yele na pá sʋʋ afanaa mpɛ pa taa .

text: And forthwith Jesus gave them leave . And the unclean spirits went out , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the sea , ( they were about two thousand ; ) and were choked in the sea .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tisaa . Tənaɣa alɔɣaa mpɛ pa yela apalʋ ɩnɩ na pá sʋʋ afanaa mpɛ pa taa . Ɩlɛna pɛlɛ pá tʋ casəlɛ kɛ yem na pá tii kalakala na pá tʋ lʋm na pá sɩ . Afanaa mpɛ pa nyʋɣʋ tala ɩsɩɩ iyisi naalɛɣɛ ( 2000 ) mpʋ .

text: And they that fed the swine fled , and told it in the city , and in the country . And they went out to see what it was that was done .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ afanaa mpɛ pá tiikilaa ná loma kpakpaa na pá polo na pá taɣasɩ tɔm ntɩ , na tə ́ yɛkɩ kpakpaa kɛ acalɛɛ taa na cacakəŋ tɛɛ , na yəlaa lɩɩ sɩ pa naakɩ mpi pə lapa tɔ .

text: And they come to Jesus , and see him that was possessed with the devil , and had the legion , sitting , and clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Yəlaa kɔma Yesu kiŋ , ɩlɛna pá maɣana apalʋ wei ɩ kiŋ alɔɣaa kʋpiŋ ŋkʋ kɩɩ wɛɛ tɔ na ɩ ́ caɣaa na ɩ ́ suu wontu na pə ́ cɛpa ɩ tɔɔ . Ɩlɛna sɔɣɔntʋ kpa - wɛ .

text: And they that saw it told them how it befell to him that was possessed with the devil , and also concerning the swine .
text2: Mpa pa na tɔm ntɩ na pa ɩsəpəle tɔ pá kɛɛsa - wɛɣɛ ɩsəna pə lapa na ɩlɔɣɔhilu alɔɣaa se tɔ . Na mpi pə lapa afanaa tɔ .

text: And they began to pray him to depart out of their coasts .
text2: Ɩlɛna yəlaa sʋʋ Yesu kɛ ́ tɛɛkʋɣʋ sɩ ɩ ́ lɩɩ pa tɛtʋ taa .

text: And when he was come into the ship , he that had been possessed with the devil prayed him that he might be with him .
text2: Yesu kɔma sɩ ɩ kpaa kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa , ɩlɛna ɩlɔɣɔhilu ɩnɩ sɩ : Ma təŋəɣɩ - ŋ .

text: Howbeit Jesus suffered him not , but saith unto him , Go home to thy friends , and tell them how great things the Lord hath done for thee , and hath had compassion on thee .
text2: Ama Yesu kisaa na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Məlɩ nyá təyaɣa taa kɛ ́ nyá nyə ́ ma kiŋ , na ń kɛɛsɩ - wɛɣɛ ɩsəna Tacaa nyəna nyá pətɔɔtəlɛ na ɩ ́ la - ŋ tɔ .

text: And he departed , and began to publish in Decapolis how great things Jesus had done for him : and all men did marvel .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɛɛwa na ɩ ́ niki mpi Yesu lapa - ɩ tɔɣɔ heeluɣu kɛ timpi pa yaa sɩ acalɛɛ naanʋwa tɔ pə tɛtʋ taa , na pa təna mpa pa nɩɩwa tɔ pa laŋa cɛpa .

text: And when Jesus was passed over again by ship unto the other side , much people gathered unto him : and he was nigh unto the sea .
text2: Yesu taɣana tɛsʋɣʋ kɛ kʋteŋ ŋku kʋ tɔɔ ɩ ka wɛɛ tɔ na kpɩɩlʋɣʋ . Ɩlɛna yəlaa koti sɔsɔm , na ɩnɩ ɩ wɛ lʋm nɔɣɔ .

text: And , behold , there cometh one of the rulers of the synagogue , Jairus by name ; and when he saw him , he fell at his feet ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile sɔsɔ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kɔma ɩ kiŋ , pa yaa - ɩ sɩ Yailu . Ɩ ná Yesu , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ hoti ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ ,

text: And besought him greatly , saying , My little daughter lieth at the point of death : I pray thee , come and lay thy hands on her , that she may be healed ; and she shall live .
text2: na ɩ ́ wiina - ɩ təkpɛɛ sɩ : Ma pɛɛliya caana ntɛɣɛ səm . La suulu na ń polo ń tənɩ nyá niŋ kɛ ka tɔɔ , na pə ́ waa - kɛ na ká hiki weesuɣu .

text: And Jesus went with him ; and much people followed him , and thronged him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu təŋa - ɩ na pá tɛɛ , na samaa sɔsɔ təŋaɣa - ɩ na pə ́ nyəka teu .

text: And a certain woman , which had an issue of blood twelve years ,
text2: Pə pamna alʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛ təna , hatoo pɩɩsɩ naanʋwa na naalɛ taa kɛ ́ ɩ tɔŋna tɔɣɔlʋɣʋ na pə ́ wɛ - ɩ toŋ .

text: And had suffered many things of many physicians , and had spent all that she had , and was nothing bettered , but rather grew worse ,
text2: Ɩ ná wahalanaa kɛ fɛtaa tɛ , na halɩ ɩ ́ caŋ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ ɩ liɣitee təna , pə ta tɩɩ lapʋ sooci maɣamaɣa . Pə məlaa kɛ ́ na pə ́ sɔɔsəɣɩ kʋsɔɔsʋ .

text: When she had heard of Jesus , came in the press behind , and touched his garment .
text2: Alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ nɩɩ Yesu taŋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ na ɩ ́ sʋʋ yəlaa samaa taa , na ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ tokina Yesu capa na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ waalɩ tɔɔ .

text: For she said , If I may touch but his clothes , I shall be whole .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ hʋʋwa ɩ taa kɛ ́ teu kɛ ́ sɩ : Ye ma pəsaa na má tɩɩ hiki ɩ tɔɔ wontu na má tokina te , pɩɩ waa - m .

text: And straightway the fountain of her blood was dried up ; and she felt in her body that she was healed of that plague .
text2: Tənaɣa pə tɛma - ɩ kpakpaa ɩnɩ , na ɩ ́ nɩɩ ɩ tɔnʋɣʋ taa sɩ ɩ hika alaafəya .

text: And Jesus , immediately knowing in himself that virtue had gone out of him , turned him about in the press , and said , Who touched my clothes ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu nɩɩ ɩ taa sɩ toma lɛnna lɩɩwa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pəsəna ɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ samaa taa təna na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ sɩ : Awe tokina ma wontu ?

text: And his disciples said unto him , Thou seest the multitude thronging thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu ɩfalaa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : A a , n naa yəlaa paɣalɛ nyəkəɣɩ - ŋ ɩsəntɔ na ń taɣanəɣɩ pɔɔsʋɣʋ sɩ awe tokina - ŋ ?

text: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu nyəna ɩ taa na ɩ waalɩ sɩ ɩ naa wei ɩ tokina - ɩ mpʋ tɔ .

text: But the woman fearing and trembling , knowing what was done in her , came and fell down before him , and told him all the truth .
text2: Alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ nyəmá mpi pə lapa - ɩ tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sʋʋ seluɣu na ɩ ́ polo ɩ hoti Yesu nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ heeli - ɩ ɩ tampana .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace , and be whole of thy plague .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Ma pu n tɛma Ɩsɔ na nyá taa tɔɣɔ pə waasa - ŋ . Tɛɛna laŋhʋlʋmlɛ , nyá kʋtɔŋ ɩ ́ tɛ - ŋ təkpataa .

text: While he yet spake , there came from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house certain which said , Thy daughter is dead : why troublest thou the Master any further ?
text2: Yesu tɔŋna yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛ tillaa lɩɩna Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile sɔsɔ Yailu ɩnɩ ɩ təyaɣa ntɛ ́ na pá heeli - ɩ sɩ : Nyá pɛɛlɔ fɛɩ . Taa tʋ Tacaa kɛ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ yem .

text: As soon as Jesus heard the word that was spoken , he saith unto the ruler of the synagogue , Be not afraid , only believe .
text2: Ama Yesu ta nyənɩ pa kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ sɩ tə ́ kɛ pʋlʋ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ Yailu sɩ : Taa nyá . Ama nyaa tɛ Ɩsɔ na nyá taa te .

text: And he suffered no man to follow him , save Peter , and James , and John the brother of James .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔɣɔna pa təna na pə kaasɩ Piyɛɛ na Saakɩ , na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ neu Yohaanɩ pa tike .

text: And he cometh to the house of the ruler of the synagogue , and seeth the tumult , and them that wept and wailed greatly .
text2: Pa tala Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile sɔsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ tɛ , ɩlɛna Yesu ná yəlaa wiliɣi na pá makɩ kapusi kɛ sɔsɔm na pə haŋa yem .

text: And when he was come in , he saith unto them , Why make ye this ado , and weep ? the damsel is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ sʋʋ təyaɣa taa na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ wiiki na pə ́ haŋa mpʋ ? Pəyaɣa kanɛ ka too kʋtoo kɛ ́ , ka ta sɩ se .

text: And they laughed him to scorn . But when he had put them all out , he taketh the father and the mother of the damsel , and them that were with him , and entereth in where the damsel was lying .
text2: Tənaɣa təyaɣa nyə ́ ma woŋa - ɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ tɔɣɔna pa təna na pá lɩɩna awalɩ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpaɣa pəyaɣa caa na ka too na ɩ ɩfalaa tooso ɩnɩ na pá sʋʋ timpi paa hɩɩsa pəyaɣa ŋkɛ tɔ .

text: And he took the damsel by the hand , and said unto her , Talitha cumi ; which is , being interpreted , Damsel , I say unto thee , arise .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔka ka niŋ taa na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Talita kum . Tɔm tənɛ tə hʋwɛɛ ntɛ ́ sɩ : Ma heeliɣi - ŋ sɩ ń kʋlɩ pɛɛliya nyá .

text: And straightway the damsel arose , and walked ; for she was of the age of twelve years . And they were astonished with a great astonishment .
text2: Tənaɣa pɛɛliya kʋla kpakpaa na ká sʋʋ tɔntɛ . Ka pɩɩsɩ ka wɛ naanʋwa na naalɛ . Pa ná mpʋ , ɩlɛna pə la - wɛɣɛ piti kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: And he charged them straitly that no man should know it ; and commanded that something should be given her to eat .
text2: Ama Yesu kpaala - wɛ sɩ pá taa yele na nɔɣɔlʋ nɩɩ - tɩ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ cɛla - kɛɣɛ kʋtɔɣɔʋ na ká tɔɣɔ .

text: And he went out from thence , and came into his own country ; and his disciples follow him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu lɩɩ təna na ɩ ́ polo ɩcatɛ nte tə taa ɩ pɩɩwa tɔ , na ɩ ɩfalaa kɛ ɩ waalɩ .

text: And when the sabbath day was come , he began to teach in the synagogue : and many hearing him were astonished , saying , From whence hath this man these things ? and what wisdom is this which is given unto him , that even such mighty works are wrought by his hands ?
text2: Kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ talaa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ niki sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile taa . Yəlaa paɣalɛ nɩɩ ɩ tɔm , ɩlɛna pə ́ la - wɛɣɛ piti kɛ ́ sɔsɔm , na pá tɔŋ sɩ : Leɣe ɩ hika pənɛ ɩnɩ pə təna ɩsəntɔ ? Na nyəm mpiɣilɛ pə ha - ɩ mpʋ ? Na ɩsənaɣa ɩ lakɩ piti təma anɛ a taka kɛ ́ mpʋ ?

text: Is not this the carpenter , the son of Mary , the brother of James , and Joses , and of Juda , and Simon ? and are not his sisters here with us ? And they were offended at him .
text2: Pə taɣa Malɩ pəyalʋ kaafənta ? Pə taɣa Saakɩ na Yosee na Yuti na Simɔŋ pa taalʋ ? Pə taɣa tá na ɩ newaa alaa nyə ́ ma ntɔ cənɛ ? Pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə lapa pa laŋa kɛ kpɩɩsəŋ na pá kpisi ɩ tɔm mʋɣʋ .

text: But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , but in his own country , and among his own kin , and in his own house .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ ta laŋ sam kɛ tiili , ye pə taɣa ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ɩcatɛ taa , na ɩ lʋlʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma na ɩ təyaɣa nyə ́ ma hɛkʋ .

text: And he could there do no mighty work , save that he laid his hands upon a few sick folk , and healed them .
text2: Ɩ ta pəsɩ na ɩ ́ la piti təmlɛ natələɣɩ təna . Ye pə taɣa kʋtɔntʋnaa pəcɔ wei ɩ tɔɔ ɩ təna niŋ na pə ́ waa tɔ .

text: And he marvelled because of their unbelief . And he went round about the villages , teaching .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ laŋlɛ cɛpəna ɩsəna pa fɛɩna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ naani tɔ . Pəlɛ pə waalɩ Yesu cɔɔ acalɛɛ nna a wɛ pəcɔlɔ təna tɔ a tɔɔ na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsɩ .

text: And he called unto him the twelve , and began to send them forth by two and two ; and gave them power over unclean spirits ;
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yaa ɩ ɩfalaa naanʋwa na naalɛ na ɩ ́ tili - wɛɣɛ naalɛ naalɛ . Na ɩ ́ tʋ - wɛɣɛ toŋ sɩ pá tɔɣɔnɩ alɔɣaa .

text: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey , save a staff only ; no scrip , no bread , no money in their purse :
text2: Na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ paasi , ɩ ́ taa tɔkɩ pʋlʋ tɔtɔ . Ɩ ́ taa kpaɣa tɔɣɔnaɣa , ɩ ́ taa tɔkɩ huluɣu , na ɩ ́ taa tɔkɩ liɣitee kɛ mə sipanaa taa .

text: But be shod with sandals ; and not put on two coats .
text2: Ɩ ́ lɛɛ ntaŋkpala . Ɩ ́ taa suu wontu na ɩ ́ tənɩ .

text: And he said unto them , In what place soever ye enter into an house , there abide till ye depart from that place .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ tasa - wɛ tɔtɔ sɩ : Ye ɩ ́ tala ɩcatɛ taa na ɩ ́ sʋʋ təyaɣa ŋka ka taa , ɩ ́ caɣa təna haləna mə kʋlʋɣʋ .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear you , when ye depart thence , shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them . Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Na ye pa ta mʋ - mɛɣɛ tiili yaa pa ta nɩɩna - mɛ , ɩ ́ lɩɩ təna na ɩ ́ kpiisi - wɛɣɛ mə nɔɔhɛɛ mʋsʋɣʋ , na pə ́ hʋlɩ - wɛ sɩ ɩ ́ kpaala - wɛ .

text: And they went out , and preached that men should repent .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ɩfalaa tɛɛwa na pá lakɩ yəlaa kɛ waasʋ sɩ pá laɣasɩ tɔntɛ .

text: And they cast out many devils , and anointed with oil many that were sick , and healed them .
text2: Na pá tɔɣɔnɩ alɔɣaa paɣalɛ , na pá taa kʋtɔntʋnaa paɣalɛ kɛ nim na pə ́ waa - wɛ .

text: And king Herod heard of him ; ( for his name was spread abroad : ) and he said , That John the Baptist was risen from the dead , and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Yesu hətɛ tɔŋna yaaʋ kɛ paa timpi . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ wulaʋ Helɔtɩ nɩɩ Yesu taŋ . Na yəlaa lɛlaa náá tɔŋ sɩ : Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ femna . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ wɛna piti təma lapʋ pəsʋɣʋ .

text: Others said , That it is Elias . And others said , That it is a prophet , or as one of the prophets .
text2: Ɩlɛna lɛlaa sɩ Ilii lɩɩna . Pə kaasɩ lɛlaa ná tɔŋ sɩ lɔŋtaa Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa taka nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ .

text: But when Herod heard thereof , he said , It is John , whom I beheaded : he is risen from the dead .
text2: Helɔtɩ nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Lʋm Sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ wei ɩ nyʋɣʋ ma yelaa na pá sɛtɩ tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ femna .

text: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John , and bound him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife : for he had married her .
text2: Nn kʋpam , wulaʋ Helɔtɩ ɩnɩ ɩ ka tɔmna sɩ pá kpa Yohaanɩ na pá hɔkɔ - ɩ na pá tʋ - ɩ saləka taa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Helɔtɩ lapa mpʋ . Ɩ ka kpaɣa ɩ taalʋ Filipʋ alʋ Helɔtiyatɩ kɛ ́ .

text: For John had said unto Herod , It is not lawful for thee to have thy brother ' s wife .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yohaanɩ yɔɣɔtɩ - ɩ sɩ : Pə ta mʋna sɩ ń lɛɛkɩ nyá taalʋ alʋ na ń sɩɩna nyá tɩ .

text: Therefore Herodias had a quarrel against him , and would have killed him ; but she could not :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Helɔtiyatɩ taa wɩɩna Yohaanɩ kɛ sɔsɔm , na ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ sɩ ɩ kʋ - ɩ . Ama Helɔtɩ tɔɔ ɩ ta pəsɩ na ɩ ́ la pʋlʋ .

text: For Herod feared John , knowing that he was a just man and an holy , and observed him ; and when he heard him , he did many things , and heard him gladly .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , wulaʋ Helɔtɩ nyə ́ ma sɩ Yohaanɩ kɛ ́ yʋlʋ kʋpaŋ , ɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ yʋlʋ . Pəyele ɩ nyaŋaɣana - ɩ kɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ kentiɣi ɩ tɔɔ . Ye ɩ nɩɩ Yohaanɩ tɔm pə pɛkələɣɩ - ɩ ɩ taa kɛ ́ . Paa na mpʋ ɩ nyɩɩlaɣa sɩ ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ - tɩ .

text: And when a convenient day was come , that Herod on his birthday made a supper to his lords , high captains , and chief estates of Galilee ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ wulaʋ Helɔtɩ lʋlʋɣʋ kʋyakʋ acima talaa . Na ɩ ́ la acima na ɩ ́ yaa ɩ kawulaɣa taa sɔsaa sɔsaa na yoolaa sɔsaa , na Kalilee tɛtʋ taa nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma . Sɛsɛ pə wɛɛ sɩ kʋyakʋ ŋkʋɣʋ Helɔtiyatɩ ká hiki mpi ɩ pɛɛkaɣa tɔ .

text: And when the daughter of the said Herodias came in , and danced , and pleased Herod and them that sat with him , the king said unto the damsel , Ask of me whatsoever thou wilt , and I will give it thee .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Helɔtiyatɩ ɩnɩ ɩ pɛɛlɔ sʋʋ timpi yəlaa sɛɛ mpʋ tɔ na ɩ ́ paa . Ntɛna pə ́ la Helɔtɩ na ɩ mʋʋlaa mpɛɣɛ leleŋ . Tənaɣa Helɔtɩ tɔma pɛɛlɔ ɩnɩ sɩ : Sələmɩ - m mpi n caa tɔ , maa ha - ŋ .

text: And he sware unto her , Whatsoever thou shalt ask of me , I will give it thee , unto the half of my kingdom .
text2: Haləna Helɔtɩ tuu sɩ paa mpiɣi ɩ sələma - ɩ , ɩnɩ ɩ ká ha - ɩ . Paa ɩnɩ ɩ kawulaɣa maɣamaɣa hɔɣɔlʋɣʋ .

text: And she went forth , and said unto her mother , What shall I ask ? And she said , The head of John the Baptist .
text2: Pɛɛlɔ ɩnɩ ɩ lɩɩwa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo ɩ pɔɔsɩ ɩ too sɩ : Pepeɣe ma sələmɩ - ɩ ? Ɩlɛna toto cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tɔ sɩ ɩ ́ ha - ŋ Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ nyʋɣʋ .

text: And she came in straightway with haste unto the king , and asked , saying , I will that thou give me by and by in a charger the head of John the Baptist .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ məla wulaʋ kiŋ kɛ kpakpaa na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ma caa sɩ ń ha - m Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ nyʋɣʋ kɛ nyənaɣa taa kɛ ́ cənɛɣɛ nɔɔnɔɔ .

text: And the king was exceeding sorry ; yet for his oath ' s sake , and for their sakes which sat with him , he would not reject her .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ wulaʋ Helɔtɩ laŋlɛ wakəla sɔsɔm . Ama ɩ tɛma tuuu kɛ ɩ mʋʋlaa mpɛ pa təna pa ɩsɛntaa , ɩlɛ pə fɛɩ sɩ ɩ ká kisi .

text: And immediately the king sent an executioner , and commanded his head to be brought : and he went and beheaded him in the prison ,
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ tila taŋlaa taa nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ kpakpaa sɩ ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ kɔna Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ nyʋɣʋ . Ɩlɛna taŋlʋ náá tɛɛ saləka naŋ taa na ɩ ́ sɛtɩ Yohaanɩ nyʋɣʋ .

text: And brought his head in a charger , and gave it to the damsel : and the damsel gave it to her mother .
text2: Na ɩ ́ tʋ - kʋɣʋ nyənaɣa taa na ɩ ́ kɔɔ ɩ ́ cɛla pɛɛlɔ ɩnɩ , na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ polo ɩ ́ cɛla ɩ too .

text: And when his disciples heard of it , they came and took up his corpse , and laid it in a tomb .
text2: Yohaanɩ ɩfalaa nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá polo pá kpaɣa Yohaanɩ na pá pi .

text: And the apostles gathered themselves together unto Jesus , and told him all things , both what they had done , and what they had taught .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tillaa məlaa , ɩlɛna pá kɛɛsɩ - ɩ pə təna mpi pa lapa na pa sɛɣɛsaa tɔ .

text: And he said unto them , Come ye yourselves apart into a desert place , and rest a while : for there were many coming and going , and they had no leisure so much as to eat .
text2: Mpa pa pukaɣa Yesu kiŋ , na mpa pa kʋlaɣaa sɩ pa kpeŋ tɔ pa paɣalɛ fɛɩ kɛɛsʋɣʋ . Haləna Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa ta na ɩsɛ sɩ pá tɔɣɔ tɔɣɔʋ maɣamaɣa . Ɩlɛna Yesu tɔ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ kɔɔ na tə ́ lɩɩna kpeeŋa kɛ timpi nɔɣɔlʋ fɛɩ tɔ na ɩ ́ hɛɛsɩ pəcɔ maɣamaɣa .

text: And they departed into a desert place by ship privately .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa sʋʋ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ kɛ pa tike na pá tɛɛna kpeeŋa tɔɔ .

text: And the people saw them departing , and many knew him , and ran afoot thither out of all cities , and outwent them , and came together unto him .
text2: Ama yəlaa paɣalɛ loosa - wɛ na pá nyɩ - wɛɣɛ kpakpaa . Ɩlɛna yəlaa lɩɩ acalɛɛ acalɛɛ na pá kpaɣa asewa na pá laalɩ - wɛɣɛ tənaɣa tatɛ .

text: And Jesus , when he came out , saw much people , and was moved with compassion toward them , because they were as sheep not having a shepherd : and he began to teach them many things .
text2: Yesu lɩɩna kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa na ɩ ́ na yəlaa samaa , ɩlɛna pa tɔm lapɩ - ɩ pətɔɔtəlɛ kɛ sɔsɔm . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pa nəɣəsəna kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ heeŋ wei ɩ fɛɩna tiikilu tɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ sɛɣɛsa - wɛɣɛ sɔsɔm .

text: And when the day was now far spent , his disciples came unto him , and said , This is a desert place , and now the time is far passed :
text2: Pə kɔma taanaɣa ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa polo na pá tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Cənɛ kɛ ́ nyɩɩtʋ taa kɛ ́ , na ilim tɛma .

text: Send them away , that they may go into the country round about , and into the villages , and buy themselves bread : for they have nothing to eat .
text2: Tɔɣɔnɩ - wɛ na pá yɛlɩ kʋtɔɣɔʋ yapʋ kɛ pəcɔlɔ pəcɔlɔ cacakəŋ tɛɛ na pə acalɛɛ taa .

text: He answered and said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they say unto him , Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread , and give them to eat ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Mɩɩ hana - wɛɣɛ tɔɣɔnaɣa kɛ mə maɣamaɣa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ɩfalaa pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Paa tɩɩ polo na tə ́ ya kʋtɔɣɔʋ kɛ Liɣitee nyəɣətʋ ŋmʋnʋɣʋ ( 200 ) , pɩɩ tala yəlaa panɛɣɛ we ?

text: He saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? go and see . And when they knew , they say , Five , and two fishes .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ wiili na má ná , potopotonaa ɩsənaɣa ɩ ́ wɛna ? Yesu ɩfalaa wiilaa , ɩlɛna pá heeli - ɩ sɩ : Potopotonaa kakpasɩ na pə kaasɩ tiina kɛ naalɛ .

text: And he commanded them to make all sit down by companies upon the green grass .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ caɣasɩ samaa tənaɣa tintika tintika kɛ nyələwee tɔɔ .

text: And they sat down in ranks , by hundreds , and by fifties .
text2: Tənaɣa pa caɣa loosi , lɛlaa kɛ nɩɩnʋwa ( 100 ) nɩɩnʋwa ( 100 ) , lɛlaa kɛ nɩɩlɛ na naanʋwa naanʋwa .

text: And when he had taken the five loaves and the two fishes , he looked up to heaven , and blessed , and brake the loaves , and gave them to his disciples to set before them ; and the two fishes divided he among them all .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu kpaɣa potopotonaa kakpasɩ na tiina naalɛ ɩnɩ , na ɩ ́ teki ɩsɛ na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ , na ɩ ́ faɣa - wɛ na ɩ ́ cɛla ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ pá tala yəlaa . Na ɩ ́ tɛɛsɩ tiina naalɛ kɛ mpʋ tɔtɔ , na pá tala pa təna təpaɩ .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa təna pa tɔɣaa na pá haɣa .

text: And they took up twelve baskets full of the fragments , and of the fishes .
text2: Na ɩ ɩfalaa koti hɔɣɔlasɩ nsi sɩ kpisaa tɔ , na pə ́ su tɔkʋŋ naanʋwa na naalɛ .

text: And they that did eat of the loaves were about five thousand men .
text2: Mpa pa tɔɣɔ mpʋ tɔ pa taa apalaa nyɔɔŋ tala ɩsɩɩ iyisi kakpasɩ ( 5000 ) .

text: And straightway he constrained his disciples to get into the ship , and to go to the other side before unto Bethsaida , while he sent away the people .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma ɩ ɩfalaa kɛ pə waalɩ kɛ ́ kpakpaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ sʋʋ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ - m nɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ tɛsəna Pɛtɛsaita ɩcatɛ tɔɔ . Ɩlɛna Yesu náá saalɩ təna na ɩ ́ paasəna samaa yasʋɣʋ .

text: And when he had sent them away , he departed into a mountain to pray .
text2: Pa ya təma , ɩlɛna Yesu polo ɩ ́ kpa pʋɣʋ nakʋlɩ kʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ .

text: And when even was come , the ship was in the midst of the sea , and he alone on the land .
text2: Pə kɔma yuɣu , ɩlɛ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ tala teŋku hɛkʋ taa kɛlɛ , na Yesu wɛ ɩ tike kɛ tɛtʋ tɔɔ .

text: And he saw them toiling in rowing ; for the wind was contrary unto them : and about the fourth watch of the night he cometh unto them , walking upon the sea , and would have passed by them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ loosa - wɛ na pá saakɩ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ pə fɛɩ pə polo . Heelim makɩ tuluŋa kɛ ́ na pə ́ mələɣəna - wɛ na waalɩ waalɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma lʋm tɔɔ na ɩ ́ puki pa kiŋ . Saa ɩnɩ pə wʋsəna kampaaŋ koou kɛ mpʋ .

text: But when they saw him walking upon the sea , they supposed it had been a spirit , and cried out :
text2: Pa na - ɩ na ɩ ́ tɔŋ lʋm tɔɔ , ɩlɛna pá hʋʋ sɩ asənaalɩɩ , na pá sʋʋ kapusi mapʋ .

text: For they all saw him , and were troubled . And immediately he talked with them , and saith unto them , Be of good cheer : it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pa təna pa naakaɣa - ɩ mpʋ tɔ pə lapa - wɛɣɛ sɔɣɔntʋ kɛ sɔsɔm kɛ ́ . Ama ɩ tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ tɔkɩ tɔnəŋ , maɣa , ɩ ́ taa nyá .

text: And he went up unto them into the ship ; and the wind ceased : and they were sore amazed in themselves beyond measure , and wondered .
text2: Ɩ yɔɣɔta mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpa pa kiŋ kɛ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa na ɩ ́ caɣa na heelim hɛɛ , na piti kpa ɩ ɩfalaa kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: For they considered not the miracle of the loaves : for their heart was hardened .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pa ta cɛkəna potopotonaa mpɛ pa piti təmlɛ kɛ pa laŋkpɩɩsəŋ tɔɔ .

text: And when they had passed over , they came into the land of Gennesaret , and drew to the shore .
text2: Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa tɛɛsa tɛsʋɣʋ kɛ lʋm na pá tala Kenesalɛtɩ tɛtʋ taa , ɩlɛna pá tʋ pa kpɩɩlʋɣʋ na kʋteŋ .

text: And when they were come out of the ship , straightway they knew him ,
text2: Yesu lɩɩna kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ kpakpaa , ɩlɛna yəlaa nyəmɩ - ɩ .

text: And ran through that whole region round about , and began to carry about in beds those that were sick , where they heard he was .
text2: Tənaɣa yəlaa sʋʋ cɔɔʋ kɛ tɛtʋ təna taa , na pá kɛlɩ kʋtɔntʋnaa na pa kʋhəntəŋ na pá pukina - wɛɣɛ timpi timpi pa nɩɩkɩ sɩ ɩ wɛɛ tɔ .

text: And whithersoever he entered , into villages , or cities , or country , they laid the sick in the streets , and besought him that they might touch if it were but the border of his garment : and as many as touched him were made whole .
text2: Paa timpiɣi Yesu polaa te , paa ɩsɩɩ acalisi taa , paa acalɛɛ sɔsɔɔna taa , paa cacakəŋ tɛɛ , yəlaa kɔŋaɣana pa kʋtɔntʋnaa kɛ ́ na pá hɩɩsəɣɩ - wɛɣɛ ɩcatɛ patəma taa , na pá wiikina - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ yele na pá tokina ɩ kpaɩ ntʋmpee maɣamaɣa . Na pa təna mpa pa tokina ɩ kpaɩ ɩnɩ tɔ pə waa - wɛ .

text: Then came together unto him the Pharisees , and certain of the scribes , which came from Jerusalem .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa napəlɩ pa lɩɩna Yosalɛm na pá kɔɔ na pá kotina Yesu .

text: And when they saw some of his disciples eat bread with defiled , that is to say , with unwashen , hands , they found fault .
text2: Pa nawa sɩ ɩ ɩfalaa lɛlaa tɔkəna niŋ asilima , paa saŋəɣɩ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ sɛɛtʋ taa yʋlʋ ká la na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ tɔ .

text: For the Pharisees , and all the Jews , except they wash their hands oft , eat not , holding the tradition of the elders .
text2: Tampana ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ , Falisanaa na Yuta nyə ́ ma lɛlaa təna tɔka pa caanaa kʋlapʋtʋ kɛ teu kɛ ́ . Ye pa ta saŋ pa niŋ təcɛɩcɛɩ paa tɔkɩ .

text: And when they come from the market , except they wash , they eat not . And many other things there be , which they have received to hold , as the washing of cups , and pots , brasen vessels , and of tables .
text2: Ye pa kɔmna kʋyakʋ na pá ta sɔ lʋm , paa tɔkɩ kʋtɔɣɔʋ . Na pə ́ kaasɩ pa təŋəɣɩ lɔŋtaa kʋlapʋtʋ lɛntənaa ɩsɩɩ kɔpʋnaa nyaalʋɣʋ , na nyənasɩ , na taanɩɩsɛnaa , na kʋhəntəŋ pə nyaalʋɣʋ , na yaasinaa paɣalɛ kɛ mpʋ .

text: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him , Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders , but eat bread with unwashen hands ?
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Falisanaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa pa pɔɔsa Yesu sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ nyá ɩfalaa lɔwa ta caanaa kʋlapʋtʋ na pá tɔkəna niŋ asilima kɛ mpʋ ?

text: He answered and said unto them , Well hath Esaias prophesied of you hypocrites , as it is written , This people honoureth me with their lips , but their heart is far from me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsayii ka nawa cɛsəlaa mɛɣɛ təkelekele na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ ŋmaa mə tɔm kɛ ɩ takəlaɣa taa sɩ : Nɔɣɔ taa kɛ ́ yəlaa panɛ pa saŋɩ - m yem . Paa caa - m paa pəcɔɣɔ hatoo pa taa . Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔtəna mpʋ .

text: Howbeit in vain do they worship me , teaching for doctines the commandments of men .
text2: Pa sɛɛkɩ - m yem kɛ ́ . Pa kpaɣa yəlaa kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ na pá sɛɣɛsəɣɩ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ nyəntʋ .

text: For laying aside the commandment of God , ye hold the tradition of men , as the washing of pots and cups : and many other such like things ye do .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ yeki Ɩsɔ kʋheelitu kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ paasəɣəna yəlaa kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ .

text: And he said unto them , Full well ye reject the commandment of God , that ye may keep your own tradition .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ : Ɩ ́ kpaɣa Ɩsɔ kʋheelitu na ɩ ́ fiɣitina waalɩ , na ɩ ́ paasəna mə maɣamaɣa mə kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ .

text: For Moses said , Honour thy father and thy mother ; and , Whoso curseth father or mother , let him die the death :
text2: Moisi ka yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Se nyá caa na nyá too . Na tɔtɔ sɩ : Ye wei ɩ tʋʋ ɩ caa yaa ɩ too , ɩsɩɩ pa kʋ - ɩ .

text: But ye say , If a man shall say to his father or mother , It is Corban , that is to say , a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ; he shall be free .
text2: Ama mɛ mə sɛɣɛsəɣɩ sɩ yʋlʋ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ heeli ɩ caa yaa ɩ too sɩ : Mpi ma ləsa ma wɛnaʋ taa sɩ maa tena - ŋ tɔ pə pəsa kɔɔpaŋ . ( Ɩsɔ kʋhaham kɛ pa yaa mpʋ ) .

text: And ye suffer him no more to do ought for his father or his mother ;
text2: Mɩɩ tasəɣɩ yeluɣu sɩ yʋlʋ ɩ ́ səna ɩ caa yaa ɩ too tɔtɔ .

text: Making the word of God of none effect through your tradition , which ye have delivered : and many such like things do ye .
text2: Tənɛ ɩnɩ maɣamaɣa kɛ ɩ ́ wakələɣəna Ɩsɔ Tɔm na mə kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ nti ɩ ́ tɛləsəɣɩ təma na ɩ ́ wɛɛ tɔ . Na ɩ ́ lakɩ lɛntənaa kɛ paɣalɛ kɛ mpʋ tɔtɔ .

text: And when he had called all the people unto him , he said unto them , Hearken unto me every one of you , and understand :
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ Yesu tasa samaa kɛ yaaʋ kɛ ɩ kiŋ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Mə təna təpaɩ ɩ ́ nɩɩ ma tɔm na ɩ ́ nyɩ sɩ

text: There is nothing from without a man , that entering into him can defile him : but the things which come out of him , those are they that defile the man .
text2: pʋlʋ fɛɩ mpi pə sʋʋkɩ yʋlʋ nɔɣɔ taa na pə ́ tii ɩ hiluɣu taa na pə ́ lapɩ - ɩ ɩsaɣaʋ tɔ . Ama mpi pə lɩɩkəna hatoo yʋlʋ lotu taa tɔ mpɩ pə lakəna - ɩ ɩsaɣaʋ .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Ye wei ɩ kɛ tɔm nɩɩlʋ pʋntʋ ɩ ́ nɩɩ .

text: And when he was entered into the house from the people , his disciples asked him concerning the parable .
text2: Yesu kɔma na ɩ ́ yele samaa na ɩ ́ sʋʋ təyaɣa , ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa pɔɔsɩ - ɩ ɩtuule ńtɛ ́ tə yaasi .

text: And he saith unto them , Are ye so without understanding also ? Do ye not perceive , that whatsoever thing from without entereth into the man , it cannot defile him ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Pə kpɛŋna - mɛ mə ta cɛkəna - təɣəlɛ ? Ɩ ́ ta nyɩ sɩ pʋlʋ fɛɩ mpi pə sʋʋkɩ yʋlʋ nɔɣɔ taa na pə tii ɩ hiluɣu taa na pə ́ lapɩ - ɩ ɩsaɣaʋ tɔ ?

text: Because it entereth not into his heart , but into the belly , and goeth out into the draught , purging all meats ?
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mpi pə sʋʋkɩ yʋlʋ nɔɣɔ tɔ ɩ hiluɣu taa kɛ ́ pə tiiki . Ɩlɛna pə ́ polo pə ́ lɩɩna ɩ tapʋɣʋ tɛɛ , pɩɩ cakɩ ɩ ləmaɣasɛɛ kiŋ . ( Yesu yɔɣɔta ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ yʋlʋ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ pə təna ) .

text: And he said , That which cometh out of the man , that defileth the man .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ heeluɣu sɩ : Mpi pə lɩɩkəna yʋlʋ taa tɔ mpɩ pə lakəna - ɩ ɩsaɣaʋ .

text: For from within , out of the heart of men , proceed evil thoughts , adulteries , fornications , murders ,
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , hatoo yʋlʋ taa kɛ ́ ɩ lotu taa maɣamaɣa kɛ ɩ caaləɣəna ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ hʋʋʋ na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ la - tɩ . Paa asilima kʋlapʋtʋ , paa ŋmɩɩləm , paa yʋlʋkʋlɛ ,

text: Thefts , covetousness , wickedness , deceit , lasciviousness , an evil eye , blasphemy , pride , foolishness :
text2: paa wasaŋkalətʋ , paa lɛlaa nyəm nyɩɩlʋɣʋ , na nyəməŋ na puɣusuɣu na yem yem lapʋ , na ɩsɛsɛɛmlɛ na yəlaa caɣanaʋ , na təhɔm na kʋmɛlɛntʋ .

text: All these evil things come from within , and defile the man .
text2: Pə tənaɣa mpʋ yʋlʋ taa kɛ ́ pə lɩɩkəna na pə ́ lakɩ - ɩ ɩsaɣaʋ .

text: And from thence he arose , and went into the borders of Tyre and Sidon , and entered into an house , and would have no man know it : but he could not be hid .
text2: Yesu lɩɩ təna , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo tɛtʋ nti tə wɛ Tiii cɔlɔ tɔ tə taa , na ɩ ́ caɣa təyaɣa nakəlɩ ka taa . Ɩ ta sɔɔlɩ sɩ yəlaa ɩ ́ nyɩ ɩ tɔɔ . Paa na mpʋ tete ɩsɩɩ saŋa tɔ pa tɛma ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ kulusuɣu .

text: For a certain woman , whose young daughter had an unclean spirit , heard of him , and came and fell at his feet :
text2: Alʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ pɛɛliya ka hiina ɩlɔɣɔʋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa heela alʋ ɩnəɣɩ Yesu tɔm , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo kpakpaa kɛ Yesu kiŋ na ɩ ́ hoti ɩ tɛɛ .

text: The woman was a Greek , a Syrophenician by nation ; and she besought him that he would cast forth the devil out of her daughter .
text2: Alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kɛ ́ piitim lɛmpɩ tʋ kɛ ́ . Pa lʋla - ɩ Fenisii kɛ Silii tɛtʋ taa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔma Yesu sɩ ɩ ́ tɔɣɔnɩ ɩ pɛɛliya ŋkɛ ka ɩlɔɣɔʋ .

text: But Jesus said unto her , Let the children first be filled : for it is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it unto the dogs .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu náá cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Yele na piya haɣa na pə ́ cɔ ́ . Pə ta mʋna sɩ pá kpaɣa piya tɔɣɔnaɣa na pá tʋ hasɩ .

text: And she answered and said unto him , Yes , Lord : yet the dogs under the table eat of the children ' s crumbs .
text2: Tənaɣa alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Haɩ , ma cɛ , ye piya tɔkɩ na pə pʋtʋta atɛ , hasɩ təŋəɣɩ kɛ ́ na sɩ tɔɔsəɣɩ mɛɛ .

text: And he said unto her , For this saying go thy way ; the devil is gone out of thy daughter .
text2: Mpʋɣʋlɛ Yesu sɩ : Nyá kʋcɔcɔtʋ tənɛ tə tɔɔ kpe . Nyá pɛɛlɔ ɩlɔɣɔʋ sewa .

text: And when she was come to her house , she found the devil gone out , and her daughter laid upon the bed .
text2: Tənaɣa alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ha lumaɣa na ɩ ́ kpe ɩ tɛ . Ɩ talaa ɩlɛna ɩ ́ maɣana ɩ pəyaɣa hənta kato tɔɔ , na ɩlɔɣɔʋ tɛma seu .

text: And again , departing from the coasts of Tyre and Sidon , he came unto the sea of Galilee , through the midst of the coasts of Decapolis .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ Yesu lɩɩ Tiii tɛtʋ na ɩ ́ təŋna Sitɔŋ na ɩ ́ faɣana timpi pa yaa sɩ Acalɛɛ Naanʋwa tɔ , na ɩ ́ məlɩ Kalilee teŋku kiŋ .

text: And they bring unto him one that was deaf , and had an impediment in his speech ; and they beseech him to put his hand upon him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kɔna - ɩ ntam nɔɣɔlʋ , ɩ matəɣɩ kʋmatʋ kɛ ́ , ɩɩ pəsəɣɩ yɔɣɔtaɣa . Na pá wiina Yesu sɩ ɩ ́ tənɩ niŋ kɛ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: And he took him aside from the multitude , and put his fingers into his ears , and he spit , and touched his tongue ;
text2: Yesu ləsa - ɩ kpeeŋa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sʋsɩ ɩ mpee kɛ ɩ ŋkpaŋŋ taa na ɩ ́ la ntaɣama kɛ ɩ mpəle tɔɔ na ɩ ́ taa ɩ nsəmlɛ .

text: And looking up to heaven , he sighed , and saith unto him , Ephphatha , that is , Be opened .
text2: Na ɩ ́ teki ɩ ɩsɛ na ɩ ́ tisi feesuɣu na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩfəfata . ( Tɔm ntɩ tə hʋwɛɛ ntɛ ́ sɩ : Tʋlɩ na pa tɛ taa ) .

text: And straightway his ears were opened , and the string of his tongue was loosed , and he spake plain .
text2: Tənaɣa ntam ŋkpaŋŋ tʋla kpakpaa , na ɩ nsəmlɛ hɛtɩ na ɩ ́ sʋʋ yɔɣɔtaɣa kɛ teu .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man : but the more he charged them , so much the more a great deal they published it ;
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu kpaalɩ pa təna sɩ pá taa heeli - təɣɩ nɔɣɔlʋ . Ama waatʋ ɩnəɣɩ pɛlɛ pa sʋʋ - təɣɩ kpaalʋɣʋ .

text: And were beyond measure astonished , saying , He hath done all things well : he maketh both the deaf to hear , and the dumb to speak .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa yəlaa kɛ piti kɛ sɔsɔm pə tɩɩ fɛɩ , na pá tɔŋ sɩ : Waasʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ ɩ waasəɣɩ yaa . Ɩ lakɩ na ntamaa maɣamaɣa náá nɩɩkɩ na kamumusi náá yɔɣɔtəɣɩ .

text: In those days the multitude being very great , and having nothing to eat , Jesus called his disciples unto him , and saith unto them ,
text2: Kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa , samaa tasa kotuɣu kɛ sɔsɔm , pa fɛɩna kʋtɔɣɔʋ . Tənaɣa Yesu yaa ɩ ɩfalaa na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ :

text: I have compassion on the multitude , because they have now been with me three days , and have nothing to eat :
text2: Yəlaa panɛ pa tɔm wɛ - m pətɔɔtəlɛ . Ɩ ́ nyənɩ kʋyɛɛŋ tooso kɔlɔ pa wɛ ma kiŋ cənɛ na pa kʋtɔɣɔʋ tɛma .

text: And if I send them away fasting to their own houses , they will faint by the way : for divers of them came from far .
text2: Ye ma yelaa sɩ pá kpena nyɔɣɔsɩ , lɛlaa ká kpisi tɔnəŋ kɛ mpaaʋ taa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa paɣalɛ lɩɩ pooluŋ kɛ ́ .

text: And his disciples answered him , From whence can a man satisfy these men with bread here in the wilderness ?
text2: Tənaɣalɛ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Leɣe yʋlʋ ná hikiɣi tɔɣɔnaɣa kɛ nyɩɩtʋ taa cənɛ na ɩ ́ cɛla kʋpiŋ kʋnɛ kʋ təna ?

text: And he asked them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Potopotonaa ɩsənaɣa ɩ ́ wɛna ? Ɩlɛna pá cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa kɛ ́ .

text: And he commanded the people to sit down on the ground : and he took the seven loaves , and gave thanks , and brake , and gave to his disciples to set before them ; and they did set them before the people .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu heela samaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ caɣa atɛ . Tənaɣa ɩ kpaɣa potopotonaa mpɛ pa naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ , na ɩ ́ faɣa - wɛ na ɩ ́ cɛla ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ cɔɔ na ɩ ́ tala - wɛ . Na pɛlɛ pá la mpʋ .

text: And they had a few small fishes : and he blessed , and commanded to set them also before them .
text2: Paa wɛna tiina səkpena kɛ pəcɔ tɔtɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ pə tɔɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ pá tala - wɛɣɛ - yɛ tɔtɔ .

text: So they did eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa təna pa tɔɣaa na pá haɣa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa koti hɔɣɔlasɩ nsi sɩ kpisaa tɔ na pə su tɔkʋŋ naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa .

text: And they that had eaten were about four thousand : and he sent them away .
text2: Pəyele yəlaa mpa pa tɔɣaa tɔ pa nyɔɔŋ ka tala ɩsɩɩ iyisi liɣiti ( 4000 ) . Pə tɛma mpʋ , ɩlɛna Yesu tɔ - wɛ sɩ pá kpe .

text: And straightway he entered into a ship with his disciples , and came into the parts of Dalmanutha .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩnɩ na ɩ ɩfalaa pá kpa kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ kpakpaa na pá polo timpi pa yaa sɩ Taləmanuta tɔ .

text: And the Pharisees came forth , and began to question with him , seeking of him a sign from heaven , tempting him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa kɔma na pá sʋʋ Yesu kɛ kpɛɛsənaʋ . Na pá kuuki ɩ nɔɣɔ sɩ ɩ ́ la piti təmlɛ natəlɩ na pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ ɩ toŋ lɩɩna Ɩsɔ kiŋ .

text: And he sighed deeply in his spirit , and saith , Why doth this generation seek after a sign ? verily I say unto you , There shall no sign be given unto this generation .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu mɔla ɩ taa kɛ ́ teu na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Kʋfalaŋ yəlaa mɛ , ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ piti təmlɛ suwe ? Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ , ɩ ́ kaa na piti təmlɛ natəlɩ se .

text: And he left them , and entering into the ship again departed to the other side .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ yela - wɛ na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ kpaʋ na ɩ ́ tɛsəna kʋteŋ lɛŋkʋ tɔɔ .

text: Now the disciples had forgotten to take bread , neither had they in the ship with them more than one loaf .
text2: Yesu ɩfalaa ka sɔɔ kʋtɔɣɔʋ kpaɣaʋ . Potopoto kʋlʋm ka wɛnna pa kiŋ kɛ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa .

text: And he charged them , saying , Take heed , beware of the leaven of the Pharisees , and of the leaven of Herod .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu kpaalɩ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na Falisanaa na Helɔtɩ pa kʋkʋsʋm .

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have no bread .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa sʋʋ təmaɣa tɔm sɩ : Tə fɛɩna potopotonaa tɔɣɔ ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ .

text: And when Jesus knew it , he saith unto them , Why reason ye , because ye have no bread ? perceive ye not yet , neither understand ? have ye your heart yet hardened ?
text2: Yesu nɩɩ nti pa tɔŋna yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ kɛ mpʋ tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ tɔŋ sɩ ɩ ́ fɛɩna potopotonaa tɔ pə tɔɔ ? Haləna saŋa ɩ ́ ta cɛkəna kɛlɛ ? Ɩ ́ ta nyənta kɛlɛ ? Pə kʋ mə laɣatʋ kɛ ?

text: Having eyes , see ye not ? and having ears , hear ye not ? and do ye not remember ?
text2: Ɩ ́ wɛna ɩsɛ pəyele ɩɩ naakɩ ? Ɩ ́ wɛna ŋkpaŋŋ pəyele ɩɩ nɩɩkɩ ? Ɩ ́ sɔɔwaɣa ?

text: When I brake the five loaves among five thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? They say unto him , Twelve .
text2: Saa wei ma faɣa potopotonaa kakpasɩ na yəlaa iyisi kakpasɩ ( 5000 ) tɔɣɔ tɔ , tɔkʋŋ ɩsənaɣa kʋkpisasɩ suwa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa cɔwa sɩ : Naanʋwa na naalɛ .

text: And when the seven among four thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? And they said , Seven .
text2: Pəlɛ pə paasi waatʋ wei ma faɣa potopotonaa naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa na yəlaa iyisi liɣiti ( 4000 ) tɔɣɔ tɔ , tɔkʋŋ ɩsənaɣa ɩ ́ tʋ hɔɣɔlasɩ kʋkpisasɩ ? Ɩlɛna pá tɔ sɩ : Tɔkʋŋ naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa .

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye do not understand ?
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Pə na pə mpʋ na ɩ ta cɛkənta ?

text: And he cometh to Bethsaida ; and they bring a blind man unto him , and besought him to touch him .
text2: Pa tala Pɛtɛsaita , ɩlɛna pá kɔna - ɩ yʋlʋm nɔɣɔlʋ , na pá wiina - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ tokina - ɩ .

text: And he took the blind man by the hand , and led him out of the town ; and when he had spit on his eyes , and put his hands upon him , he asked him if he saw ought .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu hɔma ɩ niŋ taa na ɩ ́ lɩɩna ɩcatɛ waalɩ , na ɩ ́ la ntaɣama na ɩ ́ taa yʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ ɩsɛ , na ɩ ́ tənɩ ɩ niŋ kɛ ɩ tɔɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : N naakɩ pʋlʋ ?

text: And he looked up , and said , I see men as trees , walking .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yʋlʋm kʋsa ɩsɛ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ma loosiɣi yəlaa təcantəlaa na pá wɛ ɩsɩɩ tɩɩŋ na pá tɔŋ .

text: After that he put his hands again upon his eyes , and made him look up : and he was restored , and saw every man clearly .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu tasa ɩ niŋ tənʋɣʋ kɛ yʋlʋm ɩsɛ tɔɔ na pə ́ waa - ɩ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ nyənɩ pooluŋ na ɩ ́ na pə təna təcɛɩcɛɩ .

text: And he sent him away to his house , saying , Neither go into the town , nor tell it to any in the town .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu heeli - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ kpe . Ɩ ́ taa məlɩ ɩcatɛ taa .

text: And Jesus went out , and his disciples , into the towns of Caesarea Philippi : and by the way he asked his disciples , saying unto them , Whom do men say that I am ?
text2: Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa kʋla təna ɩlɛna pá tɛɛ Sesalee Filipʋ acalɛɛ taa . Pa wɛ mpaaʋ taa ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Yəlaa tɔŋ sɩ ma kɛ ́ awe ?

text: And they answered , John the Baptist : but some say , Elias ; and others , One of the prophets .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɛlɛ sɩ : Pa tɔŋ sɩ n kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ . Lɛlaa sɩ Ilii , na lɛlaa sɩ n kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa taa nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ .

text: And he saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? And Peter answereth and saith unto him , Thou art the Christ .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Na mɛ se , mə hʋʋkɩ sɩ ma kɛ ́ awe ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ nɔɣɔ təkpaʋ sɩ : N kɛ ́ Mesii .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man of him .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpaalɩ - wɛ sɩ pá taa heeli - təɣɩ nɔɣɔlʋ .

text: And he began to teach them , that the Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders , and of the chief priests , and scribes , and be killed , and after three days rise again .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ kɛ ́ ɩ sʋʋ ɩ ɩfalaa kɛ heeluɣu sɩ : Pə wɛɛ sɩ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má maa tɔɣɔ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ sɔsɔm . Na nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma na kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa ká lɔ - m , halɩ pá kʋ - m . Ɩlɛ maa fe pə kʋyɛɛŋ tooso wule .

text: And he spake that saying openly . And Peter took him , and began to rebuke him .
text2: Ɩ heela - wɛɣɛ - təɣɩ təfoo kɛ ́ yəlaa taa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ yaa - ɩ kpeeŋa na ɩ ́ təkɩ - ɩ - tɩ .

text: But when he had turned about and looked on his disciples , he rebuked Peter , saying , Get thee behind me , Satan : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but the things that be of men .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pəsəna ɩ ɩfalaa tɔɔ na ɩ ́ kaləna Piyɛɛ kɛ teu sɩ : Satanɩ tɛɛ ma tɔɔ , nyá hʋwɛɛ ta kɛ Ɩsɔ nyəna , yəlaa nyəna kɛ ́ .

text: And when he had called the people unto him with his disciples also , he said unto them , Whosoever will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ ɩ yaa samaa na ɩ ɩfalaa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ye wei ɩ caa sɩ ɩ ́ təŋɩ - m , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ la ɩ təɣɩ awusa , na ɩ ́ səɣələɣɩ ɩ səm tesika na ɩ ́ təŋəɣəna - m .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it ; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel ' s , the same shall save it .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye wei ɩ pɛɛkəɣɩ ɩ weesuɣu təcututu ɩ tɛŋna səpʋ . Ama wei ɩ ́ lapa ɩ təɣɩ awusa kɛ ma tɔɔ , na ma Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔɔ , pʋntʋ ka hikina weesuɣu .

text: For what shall it profit a man , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ?
text2: Ye yʋlʋ pəsaa na ɩ ́ hiki antulinya nyəm təna na ɩnɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ sɩ ɩ kawaaɣa ntɛ ́ we ?

text: Or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Pʋlʋpʋ wɛɛ mpi yʋlʋ ká kpaɣa na ɩ ́ laɣasəna ɩ weesuɣu tɔ ?

text: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation ; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels .
text2: Ye wei ɩ səpa ma fɛɛlɛ yaa ma kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ fɛɛlɛ kɛ kʋfalaŋ yəlaa panɛ mpa pa kisa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ təŋʋɣʋ na pá lakɩ ɩsaɣatʋ tɔ pa hɛkʋ , Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má maa sɩ pʋntʋ fɛɛlɛ tɔtɔɣɔ ma məlʋɣʋ wule kɛ waatʋ wei maa kɔɔ na ma Caa teeli na ɩsɔtaa tillaa naŋŋ nyə ́ ma tɔ .

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That there be some of them that stand here , which shall not taste of death , till they have seen the kingdom of God come with power .
text2: Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ heeluɣu sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , mpa pa wɛ cənɛ tɔ pa taa lɛlaa ká na Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa kɔmna toma na pə ́ cɔ ́ pá sɩ .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh with him Peter , and James , and John , and leadeth them up into an high mountain apart by themselves : and he was transfigured before them .
text2: Kʋyɛɛŋ naatoso tɛɛwa , ɩlɛna Yesu kpaɣa Piyɛɛ na Saakɩ na Yohaanɩ na pá polo pʋɣʋ kʋkʋlʋɣʋ nakʋlɩ kʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa tike . Tənaɣa ɩ laɣasa pa ɩsɛntaa kɛ kpakpaa .

text: And his raiment became shining , exceeding white as snow ; so as no fuller on earth can white them .
text2: Na ɩ wontu paasɩ na tə ́ hʋlʋmɩ təlaɩlaɩ ɩsɩɩ kpoŋkpomʋlʋm na tə teeki kɔkɔ . Nɔɣɔlʋ fɛɩ atɛ cənɛ sɩ ɩ ká la na pʋlʋpʋ hʋlʋmɩ mpʋ pə taka .

text: And there appeared unto them Elias with Moses : and they were talking with Jesus .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ɩfalaa tooso ɩnɩ , pa nawa Ilii na Moisi na pá na Yesu pá yɔɣɔtəɣɩ .

text: And Peter answered and said to Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ tɔma Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , ɩsɩɩ tə wɛʋ cənɛ ɩsəntɔ ɩnɩ tɔ pə wɛ teu napələɣɩ te . Ɩlɛ pə mʋna ɩsɩɩ tə siki coka toosoɣo . Nyaɣa lɛntɛ , Moisi kɛ lɛntɛ , na Ilii kɛ lɛntɛ .

text: For he wist not what to say ; for they were sore afraid .
text2: Sɔɣɔntʋ kpa Piyɛɛ na ɩ taapalaa lɛlaa na ɩ ́ laŋ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɔɣɔ ɩ yɔɣɔta mpʋ .

text: And there was a cloud that overshadowed them : and a voice came out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩsɔŋmʋntʋɣʋ nakʋlɩ kʋ kɔɔ na kʋ takɩ - wɛ na pá nɩɩ pə yɔɣɔta ŋmʋntʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ tɛɛ sɩ : Ma luɣu tɛɛ Pəyaɣa ntɔ , ɩ ́ nɩɩna - kɛ .

text: And suddenly , when they had looked round about , they saw no man any more , save Jesus only with themselves .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu ɩfalaa caa pa taa na pa waalɩ pa ta na nɔɣɔlʋ . Ye pə taɣa Yesu tike kɛ pa ná pa kiŋ .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , he charged them that they should tell no man what things they had seen , till the Son of man were risen from the dead .
text2: Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa tiikaɣana pʋɣʋ tɔɔ , ɩlɛna Yesu kpaalɩ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ taa heeli nɔɣɔlʋ kɛ nti ɩ ́ nawa tɔ . Haləna kʋyaŋku Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má maa sɩ na má fe tɔ .

text: And they kept that saying with themselves , questioning one with another what the rising from the dead should mean .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ɩfalaa tɔka tɔm ntəɣɩ pa taa na pá pɔɔsəɣɩ təma sɩ : Pepeɣe səm na fem ɩlɛ ?

text: And they asked him , saying , Why say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ Yesu ɩfalaa pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa ná tɔŋ sɩ Ilii ká caaləna kɔntɛ ?

text: And he answered and told them , Elias verily cometh first , and restoreth all things ; and how it is written of the Son of man , that he must suffer many things , and be set at nought .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Tampana , pə wɛɛ sɩ Ilii ká kɔna kancaalaɣa na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ pə tənaɣa teitei na pə ́ cɔ ́ . Ye mpʋ ntiɣi pa ŋmaawa Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa tɔɔ sɩ kaa na kʋnyɔŋ kɛ sɔsɔm na pá la - kɛɣɛ nyaŋ ?

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is indeed come , and they have done unto him whatsoever they listed , as it is written of him .
text2: Ama ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ Ilii tɛma kɔntɛ na pá lana - ɩ ɩsɩɩ pa sɔɔlaa tɔɣɔ teitei ɩsɩɩ paa ŋmaaʋ ɩ tɔm tɔ .

text: And when he came to his disciples , he saw a great multitude about them , and the scribes questioning with them .
text2: Yesu na Piyɛɛ - wɛ pa tala ɩfalaa lɛlaa kiŋ , ɩlɛna pá maɣana samaa kotina - wɛ , na pá na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa pá hɔŋ tɔm .

text: And straightway all the people , when they beheld him , were greatly amazed , and running to him saluted him .
text2: Tuu ɩsɩɩ yəlaa naʋ Yesu tɔ pə yeɣeta - wɛɣɛ sɔsɔm ntɛ , na pá seeki na pá puki ɩ sɛɛʋ .

text: And he asked the scribes , What question ye with them ?
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Nti tə tɔɔ kɛ ́ mə na - wɛ ɩ ́ hɔŋ ?

text: And one of the multitude answered and said , Master , I have brought unto thee my son , which hath a dumb spirit ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ samaa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ cɔ Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , ma kɔna ma pəyaɣa kɛ ́ . Ka hii ɩlɔɣɔʋ kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ la - kɛɣɛ kamumuka .

text: And wheresoever he taketh him , he teareth him : and he foameth , and gnasheth with his teeth , and pineth away : and I spake to thy disciples that they should cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Paa timpiɣi pə kʋləna ɩlɔɣɔʋ ɩnɩ ɩ pɛtəɣɩ - kɛɣɛ atɛɣɛ . Na ka nɔɣɔ taa lɩɩ kuhulaŋ , na ká saləɣɩ ka kela na ka tɔnʋɣʋ kii təkekilee . Ma wiina nyá ɩfalaa sɩ pá loo - ɩ , pa ta pəsɩ .

text: He answereth him , and saith , O faithless generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him unto me .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma sɩ : Yəlaa laŋkpɩɩsəŋ nyə ́ ma mɛ , wɛɛ ɩsənaɣa má na - mɛ tii caɣa na má tɔkɩ mə kʋnyɔŋ ? Ɩ ́ kɔna - m pəyaɣa ŋkɛɣɛ cənɛ .

text: And they brought him unto him : and when he saw him , straightway the spirit tare him ; and he fell on the ground , and wallowed foaming .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pəyaɣa nyə ́ ma pona - kɛɣɛ Yesu . Tuu ɩsɩɩ ɩlɔɣɔʋ tɩɩ keesuɣu Yesu tɔ , ɩ sʋʋ pəyaɣa ŋkɛɣɛlɛ selisuɣu kɛ teu . Haləna ká hoti atɛ na ká pilimi na kuhulaŋ lɩɩkəna ka nɔɣɔ taa .

text: And he asked his father , How long is it ago since this came unto him ? And he said , Of a child .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu pɔɔsɩ ka caa sɩ : Waatʋ wei kɛ ́ pə caala - kɛɣɛ lapʋ kɛ mpʋ ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pəyaɣa caa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Hatoo ka pəcaatʋ pɛtɛpɛtɛ taa kɛ ́ .

text: And ofttimes it hath cast him into the fire , and into the waters , to destroy him : but if thou canst do any thing , have compassion on us , and help us .
text2: Tɔm paɣalɛ kɛ ɩlɔɣɔʋ pɛta - kɛɣɛ kɔkɔ taa na lʋm taa sɩ ká sɩ . Mpʋ tɔ , haɩ , ye n ka pəsɩ nyənɩ ta pətɔɔtəlɛ na ń waasɩ - tʋ .

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou canst believe , all things are possible to him that believeth .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ n tɔŋ sɩ ye ma pəsəɣɩ ? Ye yʋlʋ tɛma ɩ taa na Ɩsɔ , pʋlʋ fɛɩ mpi ɩ kpisiɣi tɔ .

text: And straightway the father of the child cried out , and said with tears , Lord , I believe ; help thou mine unbelief .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pəyaɣa ŋkɛ ka caa mapa kapuka sɩ : Ma tɛma Ɩsɔ na ma taa . Ɩlɛ səna - m na pə ́ sɔɔsɩ .

text: When Jesus saw that the people came running together , he rebuked the foul spirit , saying unto him , Thou dumb and deaf spirit , I charge thee , come out of him , and enter no more into him .
text2: Yesu nawa samaa kotiɣina - wɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kaləna ɩlɔɣɔʋ ɩnɩ , na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ɩlɔɣɔʋ nyá wei n pəsəɣɩ yəlaa kɛ kamumusi na ntamaa tɔ , ma heeliɣi - ŋ kʋlʋmaɣa sɩ ń se pəyaɣa kanɛ ka waalɩ . Taa tasa - kɛɣɛ təŋʋɣʋ .

text: And the spirit cried , and rent him sore , and came out of him : and he was as one dead ; insomuch that many said , He is dead .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩlɔɣɔʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kiisaa na ɩ ́ paasɩ na ɩ ́ selisi - kɛɣɛ teu , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ se ka waalɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pəyaɣa fiɣinaa . Haləna yəlaa tɔ sɩ ka səpaɣa təkpem .

text: But Jesus took him by the hand , and lifted him up ; and he arose .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu kpa ka niŋ taa na ɩ ́ kʋsɩ - kɛ na ká səŋ ɩsɔ .

text: And when he was come into the house , his disciples asked him privately , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Yesu kɔma na ɩ ́ sʋʋ təyaɣa na ɩ ́ na ɩ ɩfalaa pá caɣa , nɔɣɔlʋ ta siti pa taa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə ta pəsɩ na tə ́ loo ɩlɔɣɔʋ ɩnɩ ?

text: And he said unto them , This kind can come forth by nothing , but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩlɔɣɔʋ ɩsɩɩ mpʋ , ye pə taɣa Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ na sələmʋɣʋ , pʋlʋ ɩɩ tɔɣɔnəɣɩ - ɩ .

text: And they departed thence , and passed through Galilee ; and he would not that any man should know it .
text2: Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa lɩɩ təna , ɩlɛna pá tɛsɩ Kalilee teŋku . Yesu luɣu fɛɩ sɩ pá nɩɩ ɩ taŋ .

text: For he taught his disciples , and said unto them , The Son of man is delivered into the hands of men , and they shall kill him ; and after that he is killed , he shall rise the third day .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ sɛɣɛsaɣa na ɩ ́ heeliɣi ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Paa tʋ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa maɣa yəlaa niŋ taa na pɛlɛ pá kʋ - m . Ama maa fe pə kʋyɛɛŋ tooso wule .

text: But they understood not that saying , and were afraid to ask him .
text2: Ɩlɛ ɩ ɩfalaa ta cɛkəna tɔm tənɛ . Pəyele pa nyamna tə pɔɔsʋɣʋ .

text: And he came to Capernaum : and being in the house he asked them , What was it that ye disputed among yourselves by the way ?
text2: Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa tala Kapənahum , na Yesu sʋʋ təyaɣa taa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ntiɣi ɩ ́ kpɛɛsaɣana təmaɣa mpaaʋ taa ?

text: But they held their peace : for by the way they had disputed among themselves , who should be the greatest .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ɩfalaa suma . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pa hɔŋaɣa sɔsɔɔntʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ mpaaʋ taa kɛ ́ .

text: And he sat down , and called the twelve , and saith unto them , If any man desire to be first , the same shall be last of all , and servant of all .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu caɣaa na ɩ ́ yaa pa naanʋwa na naalɛ kɛ ɩ kiŋ na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Ye wei ɩ caa ɩ la mə nɔɣɔ tɔɔ tʋ , pʋntʋ ká pəsɩ ɩ təɣɩ mə taa səkpelu kɛ ́ , na mə təna mə təmlɛ tʋ .

text: And he took a child , and set him in the midst of them : and when he had taken him in his arms , he said unto them ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kpaɣa peiya na ɩ ́ sɩɩ - kɛɣɛ pa ɩsɛntaa na ɩ ́ waɣalɩ - kɛ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ :

text: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name , receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me , receiveth not me , but him that sent me .
text2: Ye wei ɩ mʋwa peiya kanɛ ka taka kɛ ́ ma nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ , maɣa pʋntʋ mʋwa . Na wei ɩ tɩɩ mʋ - m pə taɣa ma tike kɛ ɩ mʋwa . Ama pʋntʋ kpɛŋna wei ɩ tila - m tɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ mʋ .

text: And John answered him , saying , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name , and he followeth not us : and we forbad him , because he followeth not us .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yohaanɩ heela Yesu sɩ : Tacaa tə nawa nɔɣɔlʋ na ɩ ́ looki alɔɣaa na nyá hətɛ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩɩ təŋəɣɩ - tʋ . Ɩlɛna taa kisina - ɩ .

text: But Jesus said , Forbid him not : for there is no man which shall do a miracle in my name , that can lightly speak evil of me .
text2: Ama Yesu cɔwa Yohaanɩ sɩ : Ɩ ́ taa taŋɩ - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ taa la . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , nɔɣɔlʋ fɛɩ wei ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ la piti təmlɛ na ma hətɛ toŋ na ɩ ́ tɛ na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ ma tɔɔ kɛ ́ kpakpaa tɔ .

text: For he that is not against us is on our part .
text2: Ye yʋlʋ ta kɛ ta kolontu , ta nyəŋ kɛ ́ te .

text: For whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name , because ye belong to Christ , verily I say unto you , he shall not lose his reward .
text2: Na ye wei ɩ ha - mɛɣɛ lʋm sasala anɛ sɩ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ Kilisiti nyə ́ ma , pʋntʋ kaa laŋ pə kasəyaɣa .

text: And whosoever shall offend one of these little ones that believe in me , it is better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he were cast into the sea .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Ye wei ɩ lapa na piya nsi sɩ mʋ ma tɔm kɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ sɩ taa nakəlɩ pəntɩ , pə nəɣəsəna pá paa pʋntʋ luɣu tɛɛ kɛ ́ pɩɩʋ na pá tʋsɩ - ɩ teŋku taa .

text: And if thy hand offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter into life maimed , than having two hands to go into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Ye nyá niŋ tusiɣina - ŋ ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ taa , sɛtɩ - ɩ . Sana ń sʋʋ weesuɣu kʋpaŋkʋ taa na niŋ kʋlʋməŋ , na mpi n ka wɛɛna nyá niŋ təna na pá pɛtɩ - ŋ tənaasəlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa kɛ ́ kɔkɔ ŋka kaa teŋ tɔ ka taa tɔ .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Təna sonsompee nna a tɔkɩ yəlaa nantʋ tɔ aa səkɩ . Pəyele kɔkɔ ɩɩ teŋ paa pəcɔ .

text: And if thy foot offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter halt into life , than having two feet to be cast into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Ye nyá nɔɔhəlɛ tusiɣina - ŋ ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ taa , sɛtɩ - tɛ . Sana ń sʋʋ weesuɣu kʋpaŋkʋ taa na nɔɔhəlɛ kʋlʋmtəlɛ , na mpi n ká wɛɛna nɔɔhɛɛ naalɛ na pá pɛtɩ - ŋ tənaasəlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa tɔ .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Təna somsompee nna a tɔkɩ yəlaa nantʋ tɔ aa səkɩ . Pəyele kɔkɔ ɩɩ teŋ paa pəcɔ .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out : it is better for thee to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye , than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire :
text2: Ye nyá ɩsəlɛ tusiɣina - ŋ ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ taa , hɔɣɔsɩ - tɛ . Sana ń sʋʋ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa taa na ɩsəlɛ kʋlʋmtəlɛ na mpi n ká wɛɛna ɩsɛ naalɛ na pá pɛtɩ - ŋ tənaasəlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa tɔ .

text: Where their worm dieth not , and the fire is not quenched .
text2: Təna sonsompee nna a tɔkɩ yəlaa nantʋ tɔ aa səkɩ . Pəyele kɔkɔ ɩɩ teŋ .

text: For every one shall be salted with fire , and every sacrifice shall be salted with salt .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , paa piti yəlaa təna tɔɔ kɛ ́ kɔkɔ ɩsɩɩ pa tʋkʋɣʋ tɔm kɛ tɔɣɔnaɣa tɔɔ tɔ .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his saltness , wherewith will ye season it ? Have salt in yourselves , and have peace one with another .
text2: Tɔm kɛ ́ pʋlʋpʋ mpi pə waasəɣɩ tɔɣɔ . Ama ye tɔm lɔŋ səpa , pepeɣe paa la na pə lɔŋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ tasa məlʋɣʋ ? Ɩ ́ wɛɛna tɔm kɛ mə taa na ɩ ́ wɛɛna təma na leleŋ .

text: And he arose from thence , and cometh into the coasts of Judaea by the farther side of Jordan : and the people resort unto him again ; and , as he was wont , he taught them again .
text2: Yesu lɩɩ təna , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo Yuta tɛtʋ taa na Yaatanɩ pɔɣɔ waalɩ . Ɩlɛna samaa tasa kotuɣu kɛ ɩ kiŋ kɛ sɔsɔm , na ɩ ́ niki - wɛɣɛ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ ɩsɩɩ ɩ tɩɩ lakɩ tɔ .

text: And the Pharisees came to him , and asked him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife ? tempting him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa napəlɩ pa polaa sɩ pa kuuki ɩ nɔɣɔ . Ɩlɛna pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ta mpaaʋ taa yʋlʋ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔnɩ ɩ alʋ na ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , What did Moses command you ?
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Ntiɣi Moisi ka heela - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ la ?

text: And they said , Moses suffered to write a bill of divorcement , and to put her away .
text2: Ɩlɛna pɛlɛ pá cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Moisi ná ha mpaaʋ sɩ yʋlʋ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ ŋmaa ɩ alʋ kɛ kisuɣu takəlaɣa na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔnɩ - ɩ .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Mə laŋkpɩɩsəŋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Moisi ŋmaa - mɛɣɛ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɩ .

text: But from the beginning of the creation God made them male and female .
text2: Ama hatoo antulinya ŋmaʋ kancaalaɣa taa Ɩsɔ ŋma apalʋ na alʋ kɛ ́ .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and cleave to his wife ;
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ apalʋ ká yele ɩ caa na ɩ too , na ɩ ́ na ɩ alʋ pá caɣa .

text: And they twain shall be one flesh : so then they are no more twain , but one flesh .
text2: Na pa naalɛ pá pəsɩ yʋlʋ kʋlʋm . Saa ɩnɩ pa ta kɛ yəlaa naalɛ tɔtɔ . Ama pa pəsa yʋlʋ kʋlʋm kɛ ́ təkoŋ .

text: What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩlɛ , yʋlʋ ɩ ́ taa yasɩ mpi Ɩsɔ kpɛntaa tɔ .

text: And in the house his disciples asked him again of the same matter .
text2: Pa kɔma na pá sʋʋ təyaɣa , ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa taɣanɩ - ɩ tɔm pɔɔsʋɣʋ kɛ ntɩ ɩnɩ tə taa .

text: And he saith unto them , Whosoever shall put away his wife , and marry another , committeth adultery against her .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ye yʋlʋ tɔɣɔna ɩ alʋ na ɩ ́ kpaɣa lɛlʋ , ɩ wakələna kancaalaɣa nyəŋ , pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ lapa wasaŋkalətʋ .

text: And if a woman shall put away her husband , and be married to another , she committeth adultery .
text2: Na mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ na alʋ , ye ɩ ́ kisa ɩ paalʋ na ɩ ́ saa kʋfalʋ , ɩ lapa wasaŋkalətʋ .

text: And they brought young children to him , that he should touch them : and his disciples rebuked those that brought them .
text2: Yəlaa pukaɣana piya kɛ Yesu sɩ ɩ ́ tənɩ sɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ niŋ . Ama ɩ ɩfalaa kaləna sɩ kɔntaa .

text: But when Jesus saw it , he was much displeased , and said unto them , Suffer the little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Yesu ná mpʋ , ɩlɛ pə ta maɣa - ɩ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ yele na piya kɔɔ ma kiŋ , ɩ ́ taa kaɣatɩ - sɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mpa pa wɛ ɩsɩɩ piya tɔ , mpɛ pa tənna Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child , he shall not enter therein .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ tampana sɩ ye wei ɩ ta pəsɩ ɩsɩɩ pəyaɣa na Ɩsɔ tɔɣɔ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ kawulaɣa , pʋntʋ kaa la ka tʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ .

text: And he took them up in his arms , put his hands upon them , and blessed them .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu kpaɣa - səɣɩ ɩ niŋ taa na ɩ ́ tənɩ niŋ kɛ sɩ tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ kooli - səɣɩ kʋpantʋ .

text: And when he was gone forth into the way , there came one running , and kneeled to him , and asked him , Good Master , what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life ?
text2: Yesu tʋkaɣa mpaaʋ , ɩlɛna apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ kpaɣa asewa na ɩ ́ kɔɔ ɩ ́ luŋ ɩ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa kʋpaŋ , pepeɣe pə wɛɛ sɩ maa la na má hiki weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ ?

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Pə lapa ɩsəna na ń yaa - m sɩ kʋpaŋ ? Nɔɣɔlʋ ta kɛ kʋpaŋ ye pə taɣa Ɩsɔ tike .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Defraud not , Honour thy father and mother .
text2: Ntɔŋ n nyəmá nti pa sɩɩwa sɩ : Taa kʋ yʋlʋ , taa la wasaŋkalətʋ , taa ŋmɩɩlɩ , taa suu lɛlʋ kɛ tɔm , taa puɣusi lɛlaa . Se nyá caa na nyá too tɔ ?

text: And he answered and said unto him , Master , all these have I observed from my youth .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , ma tɔka kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɩ tə tənaɣa hatoo ma pəcaatʋ kɛ ́ .

text: Then Jesus beholding him loved him , and said unto him , One thing thou lackest : go thy way , sell whatsoever thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , take up the cross , and follow me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu nyəna - ɩ təpiŋŋ , ɩlɛna ɩ luɣu lapɩ - ɩ , na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Kʋlʋmtʋ tike təkoŋ kaasəna - ŋ lapʋ . Polo na ń pɛɛtɩ pə təna mpi n wɛna tɔ , na ń tala kʋnyɔntʋnaa kɛ pə liɣitee , na cele ń sʋʋ toŋ kɛ ɩsɔtaa . Ye n tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ lapʋ , ɩlɛ n kɔɔ na ń təŋɩ - m .

text: And he was sad at that saying , and went away grieved : for he had great possessions .
text2: Ama apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ɩsɛntaa nyəŋ na ɩ laŋlɛ wakəlɩ tətɔɣɔtɔɣɔ na ɩ tɛɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ ka wɛna kɛ ́ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: And Jesus looked round about , and saith unto his disciples , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Yesu caa ɩ ɩfalaa ɩsɛntaa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Ama liɣitee nyə ́ ma Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa sʋʋʋ wɛ katɛ kɛ ́ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: And the disciples were astonished at his words . But Jesus answereth again , and saith unto them , Children , how hard is it for them that trust in riches to enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Tɔm nti ɩ yɔɣɔta mpʋ tɔ tə lapa ɩ ɩfalaa kɛ piti . Ɩlɛna Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ heeluɣu sɩ : Nnn , ma piya , sɩ yʋlʋ ɩ ́ sʋʋ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa taa tɔ pə wɛ katɛ kɛ ́ fa .

text: It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Ɩsəna mpi pə wɛ yooyoo kɛ ́ katɛ sɩ ɩ ́ sʋʋna pənyalaɣa pʋʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ lɩɩ tɔ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ pə wɛ liɣitee tʋ kɛ katɛ sɩ ɩ ́ sʋʋ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa taa . Halɩ pə tɩɩ tɛɛ mpʋ .

text: And they were astonished out of measure , saying among themselves , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Tənaɣa pə tasa - wɛɣɛ piti lapʋ kɛ sɔsɔm , na pá tɔŋ təma sɩ : Ɩlɛ awe ka tʋləna ntɛɣɛ - tɩ ɩlɛ ?

text: And Jesus looking upon them saith , With men it is impossible , but not with God : for with God all things are possible .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu nyəna - wɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Yəlaa kiŋ kɛ pə fɛɩ pəsʋɣʋ . Ama Ɩsɔ kiŋ pə fɛɩ mpʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ ɩɩ kpisiɣi pʋlʋ .

text: Then Peter began to say unto him , Lo , we have left all , and have followed thee .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Tɔʋ , ta yela pə təna təkpataa kɛ ́ na taa hu nyá waalɩ .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my sake , and the gospel ' s ,
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , ye nɔɣɔlʋ yela ɩ təyaɣa , yaa ɩ taalʋnaa na ɩ kɔɣɔnaa , yaa ɩ newaa , yaa ɩ too , yaa ɩ caa , yaa ɩ piya , yaa ɩ haləmnaa kɛ ma tɔɔ , na Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔɔ ,

text: But he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time , houses , and brethren , and sisters , and mothers , and children , and lands , with persecutions ; and in the world to come eternal life .
text2: pɩɩ ha pʋntʋ kɛ pə tɔm nɩɩnʋwa ( 100 ) kɛ ́ atɛ cənɛ na pəcɔ . Paa tɛɛsɩ , paa taalʋnaa , paa kɔɣɔnaa , paa newaa , paa toonaa , paa piya , paa haləmnaa , na pə tənaɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ wahalanaa taa . Pəyele ɩ səm waalɩ ɩ ká wɛɛna weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last first .
text2: Mpa pa wɛ lɔlɔ kɛ ́ kaɣana tɔ , pa taa paɣalɛ ká məlɩ waalɩ . Na waalɩ nyə ́ ma paɣalɛ náá məlɩ lɔlɔ .

text: And they were in the way going up to Jerusalem ; and Jesus went before them : and they were amazed ; and as they followed , they were afraid . And he took again the twelve , and began to tell them what things should happen unto him ,
text2: Pa wɛ mpaaʋ taa na pá puki Yosalɛm , ɩlɛna Yesu tɛɛ ɩ ɩfalaa kɛ nɔɣɔ , na pɛlɛ pá tɔŋna piti . Na mpa pɛlɛ pa təŋaɣa - wɛ tɔ pɛlɛ pa caɣana sɔɣɔntʋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu taɣana yaaʋ kɛ pa naanʋwa na naalɛɣɛ ɩ kiŋ , na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛɣɛ mpi pɩɩ maɣana - ɩ nɔɔnɔɔ tɔ .

text: Saying , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be delivered unto the chief priests , and unto the scribes ; and they shall condemn him to death , and shall deliver him to the Gentiles :
text2: Nti ɩ heela - wɛ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Tɔʋ , tə puki Yosalɛm ɩsəntɔ tɔ , paa kpaɣa Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má na pá tʋ - m kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa pa niŋ taa . Paa tɔ sɩ pá kʋ - m . Paa kpaɣa - m na pá tʋ - m mpa pa ta nyɩ Ɩsɔ tɔ pa niŋ taa .

text: And they shall mock him , and shall scourge him , and shall spit upon him , and shall kill him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Pɛlɛ paa paana - m na pá tɔ - m ntaɣama , na pá casa - m akpatɛɛ . Pəlɛ pə waalɩ ɩlɛna pá kʋ - m . Ama maa fe pə kʋyɛɛŋ tooso wule .

text: And James and John , the sons of Zebedee , come unto him , saying , Master , we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ , Sepetee pəyalaa Saakɩ , na Yohaanɩ , pa pola Yesu kiŋ na pá tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , tə caa sɩ ń la - tʋɣʋ mpi tɩɩ sələmɩ - ŋ tɔ .

text: And he said unto them , What would ye that I should do for you ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Pepeɣe ɩ ́ caa sɩ má la - mɛ ?

text: They said unto him , Grant unto us that we may sit , one on thy right hand , and the other on thy left hand , in thy glory .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa cɔwa sɩ : Saa wei n ka wɛɛ nyá teeli kawulaɣa taa tɔ tə caa sɩ ń yele na tə ́ caɣa nyá cɔlɔ . Lɛlʋ kɛ nyá ntɔɣɔŋ tɔɔ , na lɛlʋ kɛ nyá mpətəŋ tɔɔ .

text: But Jesus said unto them , Ye know not what ye ask : can ye drink of the cup that I drink of ? and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ ta nyɩ mpi ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ tɔ yɛɛ ? Ɩ ́ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ wahala sɔsɔ wei maa tɔɣɔ tɔ ? Paa sɔ - m Ɩsɔ lʋm mpi tɔ , ɩ ́ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ sɔ - wɩ ?

text: And they said unto him , We can . And Jesus said unto them , Ye shall indeed drink of the cup that I drink of ; and with the baptism that I am baptized withal shall ye be baptized :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa cɔwa sɩ : Tɩɩ pəsɩ . Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Tampana , ɩ ́ ká tɔɣɔ wahala sɔsɔ wei maa tɔɣɔ tɔ , na ɩ ́ sɔ Ɩsɔ lʋm mpi paa sɔ - m tɔ yaa .

text: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give ; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared .
text2: Ama pə taɣa ma ləsəɣəna mpa paa caɣa ma ntɔɣɔŋ tɔɔ yaa mpa paa caɣa ma mpətəŋ tɔɔ tɔ . Mpa pa tɔɔ Ɩsɔ taɣana lona anɛ tɔ pɛlɛ pa kɛna a nyə ́ ma .

text: And when the ten heard it , they began to be much displeased with James and John .
text2: Yesu ɩfalaa naanʋwa wei ɩ kaasaa tɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ na mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ taa wɩɩna Saakɩ na Yohaanɩ .

text: But Jesus called them to him , and saith unto them , Ye know that they which are accounted to rule over the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and their great ones exercise authority upon them .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu yaa pa təna na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ nyəmá sɩ mpa pa nyənəɣɩ ɩsɩɩ yəlaa awulaa tɔ pɛlɛ pa tɔkɩ kawulaɣa kɛ lɛlaa tɔɔ . Na mpa pɛlɛ pa kɛ ́ kʋfeelaa tɔ pɛlɛ pa ŋmakələɣɩ səkpema .

text: But so shall it not be among you : but whosoever will be great among you , shall be your minister :
text2: Pə fɛɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mə kiŋ se . Nti tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ , ye mə taa wei ɩ ́ caa ɩ la sɔsɔ kɛ mə hɛkʋ , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ pəsɩ mə təmlɛ tʋ .

text: And whosoever of you will be the chiefest , shall be servant of all .
text2: Na ye mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ caa ɩ la mə nɔɣɔ tʋ , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ pəsɩ mə təna mə yom .

text: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa ma tɔtɔ ma ta kɔɔ sɩ má tɔɣɔ cɛcɛɛlɛ . Ama ma kɔmaɣa sɩ ma pəsəɣɩ yəlaa təna təmlɛ tʋ , na má ha ma weesuɣu na pə ́ cɛ yəlaa paɣalɛ kɛ pa yomle taa .

text: And they came to Jericho : and as he went out of Jericho with his disciples and a great number of people , blind Bartimaeus , the son of Timaeus , sat by the highway side begging .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa tala Yeliko . Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa , na yəlaa samaa pa kɔma sɩ pa lɩɩkɩ ɩcatɛ ńtɛ ́ tə nɔɣɔ ɩlɛna pá maɣana yʋlʋm nɔɣɔlʋ , Timee pəyalʋ Paatimee , na ɩ ́ caɣa mpaaʋ nɔɣɔ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ lakɩ pala .

text: And when he heard that it was Jesus of Nazareth , he began to cry out , and say , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa heela - ɩ sɩ : Nasalɛtɩ Yesu tɛɛkəna . Tənaɣa ɩ koo sɔsɔm sɩ : Tafiiti Pəyaɣa Yesu , nyənɩ ma pətɔɔtəlɛ .

text: And many charged him that he should hold his peace : but he cried the more a great deal , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Tənaɣa paɣalɛ kaləna - ɩ na pá heelɩ - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ su . Ama ɩ sɔɔsa koou kɛ sɔsɔm sɩ : Tafiiti Pəyalʋ , nyənɩ ma pətɔɔtəlɛ .

text: And Jesus stood still , and commanded him to be called . And they call the blind man , saying unto him , Be of good comfort , rise ; he calleth thee .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu səŋaa , na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ pá yaa - ɩ . Tənaɣa pa heela yʋlʋm sɩ : Nyaɣa apalʋtʋ na ń kʋlɩ , ɩ yaa - ŋ .

text: And he , casting away his garment , rose , and came to Jesus .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lɔ ɩ kpaɩ na ɩ ́ kʋlɩ təwaka na ɩ ́ polo Yesu kiŋ .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , What wilt thou that I should do unto thee ? The blind man said unto him , Lord , that I might receive my sight .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : N caa ma la - ŋ we ? Ɩlɛna yʋlʋm cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , ma caa kɛ ́ sɩ n la na má naakɩ .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Go thy way ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And immediately he received his sight , and followed Jesus in the way .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Polo , nyá taa tɛmnaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ waasa - ŋ kɛ ́ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ sʋʋ naʋ kɛ təna ɩnəɣɩ kpakpaa na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ Yesu kɛ mpaaʋ taa .

text: And when they came nigh to Jerusalem , unto Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount of Olives , he sendeth forth two of his disciples ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa tala Olifinaa pʋɣʋ . Waatʋ ɩnɩ tɔ pa kpɛɣɛtəna Yosalɛm . Pa fɛɩ pooluŋ na Petafasɩ na Petanii . Tənaɣa Yesu tila ɩ ɩfalaa taa naalɛ

text: And saith unto them , Go your way into the village over against you : and as soon as ye be entered into it , ye shall find a colt tied , whereon never man sat ; loose him , and bring him .
text2: sɩ : Ɩ ́ polo ɩcatɛ nte tə wɛ mə nɔɣɔ tɔɔ tɔ tə taa . Ɩ ́ takɩ kpakpaa tɔ ɩ ́ ká maɣana pa tʋ kpaŋaɣa pile natələɣɩ ŋmənaɣa . Nɔɣɔlʋ ta caɣata tə tɔɔ . Ɩ ́ hɛtɩ - tɛ na ɩ ́ kɔna .

text: And if any man say unto you , Why do ye this ? say ye that the Lord hath need of him ; and straightway he will send him hither .
text2: Ye nɔɣɔlʋ pɔɔsa - mɛ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ lakɩ mpʋ ? Ɩlɛ ɩ ́ cɔ pʋntʋ sɩ : Ta Sɔsɔ caakəna , ye ɩ tɛma ɩ ká mələna - tɛɣɛ nɔɔnɔɔ kɛ ́ cənɛ .

text: And they went their way , and found the colt tied by the door without in a place where two ways met ; and they loose him .
text2: Ɩ ɩfalaa tɛɛwa , ɩlɛna pá maɣana kpaŋaɣa pile ntɛɣɛ mpaaʋ taa , na pá tʋ - tɛɣɛ ŋmənaɣa kɛ təyaɣa nakəlɩ ka nɔɣɔ , ɩlɛna pá hɛtɩ - tɛ .

text: And certain of them that stood there said unto them , What do ye , loosing the colt ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mpa paa wɛ təna tɔ pa taa napəlɩ pa pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Pepeɣe ɩ ́ lakɩ təna ? Ɩ ́ hɛtəɣɩ kpaŋaɣa pile ńtɛ ́ suwe ?

text: And they said unto them even as Jesus had commanded : and they let them go .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ɩfalaa cɔwa ɩsɩɩ Yesu ka heela - wɛ tɔ , ɩlɛna pá yele - wɛ na pá tɛɛna .

text: And they brought the colt to Jesus , and cast their garments on him ; and he sat upon him .
text2: Na pá pona - tɛɣɛ Yesu , na pá pɔ tə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa wontu , na Yesu caɣa pə tɔɔ .

text: And many spread their garments in the way : and others cut down branches off the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yəlaa paɣalɛ pɔ pa wontu kɛ mpaaʋ taa , na lɛlaa náá cɛ hatʋ na pá pɔ .

text: And they that went before , and they that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna ; Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord :
text2: Ɩlɛna mpa paa wɛ Yesu nɔɣɔ tɔɔ na mpa paa wɛ ɩ waalɩ tɔ pá kooki sɩ : Paa wei ɩ ́ tʋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teeli . Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ wɛɛ wei ɩ kɔŋna Tacaa toŋ tɔ ɩ waalɩ .

text: Blessed be the kingdom of our father David , that cometh in the name of the Lord : Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ hɛtɩ kawulaɣa ŋka ka tɔŋna kɔntɛ tɔ , ŋka ka kɛ ́ Tacaa Tafiiti nyəŋka tɔ . Paa wei ɩ ́ tʋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teeli kɛ hatoo ɩsɔtaa .

text: And Jesus entered into Jerusalem , and into the temple : and when he had looked round about upon all things , and now the eventide was come , he went out unto Bethany with the twelve .
text2: Yesu tala Yosalɛm , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sʋʋ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa . Ɩ nyəna ɩ taa na ɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ teu , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ na ɩ ɩfalaa naanʋwa na naalɛ pá tɛɛ Petanii kɛ ilim tɛma tɛm tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: And on the morrow , when they were come from Bethany , he was hungry :
text2: Kʋ fema na pá lɩɩkɩ Petanii , ɩlɛ nyɔɣɔsɩ kpa Yesu kɛlɛ .

text: And seeing a fig tree afar off having leaves , he came , if haply he might find any thing thereon : and when he came to it , he found nothing but leaves ; for the time of figs was not yet .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ loosa fiki tʋɣʋ kɛ pooluŋ na kʋ ́ lɔpa təkpimm . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo sɩ ntanyɩ ɩsəntɔ kʋ lʋla pee . Ɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ tala kʋ tɛɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ maɣana hatʋ tike . Mpi tɔ , pə ta kɛ fiki tɩɩŋ lʋlʋɣʋ waatʋ .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto it , No man eat fruit of thee hereafter for ever . And his disciples heard it .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma fiki tʋɣʋ ŋkʋ sɩ : Nɔɣɔlʋ kaa tasa nyá pile kɛ təŋʋɣʋ . Na ɩ ɩfalaa nɩɩ mpʋ .

text: And they come to Jerusalem : and Jesus went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa tala Yosalɛm . Ɩlɛna Yesu sʋʋ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa na ɩ ́ niki tɔɣɔnʋɣʋ kɛ mpa pa pɛɛtaɣaa na mpa pa yakaɣa tɔ . Na ɩ ́ pəsɩ liɣitee yɔkəlaa taapələnaa kɛ alele , na alukukunaa pɛɛtəlaa kpelasɩ tɔtɔ .

text: And would not suffer that any man should carry any vessel through the temple .
text2: Ɩ ta tisi sɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ səɣəlɩ pʋlʋ na ɩ ́ təŋna Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa .

text: And he taught , saying unto them , Is it not written , My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer ? but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ ɩ sɛɣɛsa - wɛ sɩ : Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ , paa yaa ma təyaɣa sɩ yəlaa təna Ɩsɔ təsələmlɛ . Ama mə pəsa - kɛɣɛ ŋmɩɩlaa təyaɣa .

text: And the scribes and chief priests heard it , and sought how they might destroy him : for they feared him , because all the people was astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá pɛɛkəɣɩ ɩsəna paa la na pá kʋ Yesu tɔ . Ama paa wɛna ɩ sɔɣɔntʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ sʋʋ yəlaa samaa kɛ teu kɛ ́ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: And when even was come , he went out of the city .
text2: Ilim kɔma na pə tɛ ɩlɛna Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pá kʋlɩ ɩcatɛ taa na pá lɩɩ .

text: And in the morning , as they passed by , they saw the fig tree dried up from the roots .
text2: Tɛʋ fema na pá kʋlɩ tanaŋ kɛ lɔŋ na pá tɛɛkɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa na fiki tʋɣʋ ŋkʋ na kʋ wʋlaa təwoŋwoŋ na pə ́ kpɛŋna kʋ kite .

text: And Peter calling to remembrance saith unto him , Master , behold , the fig tree which thou cursedst is withered away .
text2: Piyɛɛ tɔɔsa nti tɩɩ lapa tɔ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Nyənɩ Tacaa , fiki tʋɣʋ ŋku n ka təŋsa mpusi tɔ kʋ wʋlaa təwoŋwoŋ .

text: And Jesus answering saith unto them , Have faith in God .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , ye ɩ ́ tʋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ naani ,
