text: For verily I say unto you , That whosoever shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; and shall not doubt in his heart , but shall believe that those things which he saith shall come to pass ; he shall have whatsoever he saith .
text2: ɩ ́ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ tɔ pulaɣa kanɛ sɩ ká kpɛsɩ na ká hoti teŋku taa . Ye ɩ ́ tɛma mə taa təkpataa sɩ pɩɩ la na sika fɛɩ , pə lakɩ kɛ ́ .

text: Therefore I say unto you , What things soever ye desire , when ye pray , believe that ye receive them , and ye shall have them .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ pə təna mpi ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ tɔ ɩ ́ hʋʋ sɩ ɩ ́ tɛma - wəɣɩ hikuɣu , ɩlɛ paa ha - mɛɣɛ - wɩ .

text: And when ye stand praying , forgive , if ye have ought against any : that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses .
text2: Saa wei ɩ ́ kʋləɣɩ sələmʋɣʋ tɔ , ye ɩ ́ nawa sɩ mə na nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ wɛna natəlɩ , ɩlɛ ɩ ́ kʋ - təɣɩ mə taa . Waatʋ ɩnəɣɩ mə Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ , ɩ ká hɩɩsɩ - mɛɣɛ mə ɩsaɣatʋ tɔtɔ .

text: But if ye do not forgive , neither will your Father which is in heaven forgive your trespasses .
text2: Ye mə tɔɣɔntəlɛnaa wakələɣəna - mɛ na ɩɩ hʋləɣɩ - wɛɣɛ suulu na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ , mə Caa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ , ɩ kaa hɩɩsɩ - mɛɣɛ mə ɩsaɣatʋ tɔtɔ .

text: And they come again to Jerusalem : and as he was walking in the temple , there come to him the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa tasa Yosalɛm kɛ pote , na Yesu polo na ɩ ́ cɔɔkɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa . Tənaɣa kɔtəlaa sɔsaa , na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa , na sɔsaa pa kɔma ɩ kiŋ ,

text: And say unto him , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority to do these things ?
text2: na pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Kaŋkantɛ nteɣe n makɩ nyá taa na ń lakɩ ɩsəntɔ ? Yaa awe tɩɩ hana - ŋ pə mpaaʋ ?

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I will also ask of you one question , and answer me , and I will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Maa pɔɔsɩ - mɛɣɛ tɔm kʋlʋmtʋ . Ye ɩ ́ cɔ - m - tɩ , ɩlɛ maa heeli - mɛɣɛ kaŋkantɛ nte ma makɩ ma taa na má lakɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ? answer me .
text2: Ɩsɔ yaa yəlaa tilina Yohaanɩ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔɔkɩ yəlaa kɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm ? Ɩ ́ cɔ - m .

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then did ye not believe him ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa maɣasa - təɣɩ pa taa pa tike . Ɩlɛna pá tɔ sɩ : Ye tə tɔma sɩ Ɩsɔ tilina - ɩ , ɩ ká pɔɔsɩ - tʋ sɩ : Na pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ tá mʋ ɩ tɔm ?

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; they feared the people : for all men counted John , that he was a prophet indeed .
text2: Pəyele ye tə tɔma sɩ yəlaa tilina - ɩ . . . ( Pa nyaŋaɣana samaa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , yəlaa nyənaɣa Yohaanɩ kɛ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ kʋpaŋ kɛ ́ ) .

text: And they answered and said unto Jesus , We cannot tell . And Jesus answering saith unto them , Neither do I tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa pəsəna Yesu sɩ : Tə ta nyɩ . Tənaɣa Yesu ná cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Aŋhaa , ma kaa heeli - mɛɣɛ kaŋkantɛ nte ma makɩ na má lakɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ .

text: And he began to speak unto them by parables . A certain man planted a vineyard , and set an hedge about it , and digged a place for the winefat , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu sʋʋ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa kɛ ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ sɩ : Yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka sɔna lɛsɛŋ tɩɩŋ kɛ taalɛ təcu . Na ɩ ́ ŋma koluŋa na ɩ ́ cɔɔna , na ɩ ́ la timpi ɩ ká nyaasəɣɩ pə lʋm tɔ . Na ɩ ́ ŋma akele taŋkaʋ nɔɣɔlʋ , wei ɩ tɔɔ pa səŋəɣɩ na pá feŋiɣi tɔ . Ɩ tɛma mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ caa yəlaa na ɩ ́ sɩɩ tə taa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɛɛ yɛla .

text: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant , that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard .
text2: Pə kɔma na pə ́ tala tɩɩŋ ɩnɩ ɩ kooluɣu waatʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋsɩ ɩ tillu nɔɣɔlʋ sɩ ɩ ́ polo təmlɛ nyə ́ ma kiŋ na pá cɛlɛ - ɩ ɩnɩ ɩ tete .

text: And they caught him , and beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Tənaɣa təmlɛ nyə ́ ma mpɛ pa kpa tillu ɩnɩ na pá má . Ɩlɛna pá tɔɣɔnɩ - ɩ ɩ niŋ naanʋwa təyələyəlɩ .

text: And again he sent unto them another servant ; and at him they cast stones , and wounded him in the head , and sent him away shamefully handled .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ taalɛ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tasa tillu lɛlʋ kɛ kʋsʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ tili . Ɩlɛna pá kpa ɩ ́ lɛ ́ na pá má ɩ nyʋɣʋ kɛ teu na pá tʋʋ - ɩ .

text: And again he sent another ; and him they killed , and many others ; beating some , and killing some .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ taalɛ tʋ tasa lɛlʋ kɛ tiluɣu , ɩlɛna pá kpa ɩ ́ lɛ ́ na pá kʋ . Pa lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɔm paɣalɛ tɔtɔ . Pa mapa lɛlaa na pá kʋ lɛlaa .

text: Having yet therefore one son , his wellbeloved , he sent him also last unto them , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: Yʋlʋ wei pɩɩ kaasa taalɛ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kiŋ tɔɣɔlɛ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ kʋlʋlʋ wei ɩ luɣu sʋʋ teu tɔ . Ɩlɛɣɛ ɩ tɛɛsa tiluɣu kɛ pa kiŋ , na ɩ ́ hʋʋkɩ sɩ paa nya ɩ pəyaɣa ɩsəlɛ .

text: But those husbandmen said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and the inheritance shall be ours .
text2: Ama təmlɛ nyə ́ ma mpɛ pa heela təma sɩ : Ɩɩ loosiɣi kpancoou tʋ kɔŋna ntɛ ́ . Ɩ ́ kɔɔ na tə kʋ - ɩ na taalɛ pəsɩ tá nyəntɛ .

text: And they took him , and killed him , and cast him out of the vineyard .
text2: Tənaɣa pa kpa taalɛ tʋ pəyalʋ ɩnɩ na pá kʋ - ɩ , na pá lɔ taalɛ na waalɩ .

text: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do ? he will come and destroy the husbandmen , and will give the vineyard unto others .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Ɩsənaɣa taalɛ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ka la ? Ɩ ká kɔɔ kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ kʋ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma mpɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ caa yəlaa kʋfama na ɩ ́ sɩɩ taalɛ taa .

text: And have ye not read this scripture ; The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner :
text2: Matɔŋ ɩ ́ tɛma kalʋɣʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ tɔm taa sɩ : Pəlɛ nte tɛtʋ ŋmalaa ŋmaakaɣa na pá lɔ tɔ , ntɛ ́ tə tɔɔ kɔlɔ ŋmatʋ təna məlaa na tə səŋ .

text: This was the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Mpi Tacaa lapa na tə nyənəɣɩ na pə ́ wɛ - tʋɣʋ piti tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: And they sought to lay hold on him , but feared the people : for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them : and they left him , and went their way .
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma taa sɔsaa pɛɛka ɩsəna paa la na pá kpa Yesu tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pa nyəmá teu sɩ mpɛɣɛ ɩ sɛɛna ɩsɔ ɩnɩ . Ama pa nyamna samaa . Ɩlɛna pá yele - ɩ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ .

text: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians , to catch him in his words .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma taa sɔsaa tila Falisanaa napəlɩ na Helɔtɩ kpekəle taa nyə ́ ma napəlɩ tɔtɔ sɩ pá polo na pá má Yesu nɔɣɔ tɔɔ na pá ná .

text: And when they were come , they say unto him , Master , we know that thou art true , and carest for no man : for thou regardest not the person of men , but teachest the way of God in truth : Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar , or not ?
text2: Pɛlɛ pa talaa , ɩlɛna pá tɔ Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , tə nyəmá sɩ tampana kɛ n yɔɣɔtəɣɩ . Nn sɔɣɔməɣəna mpi yəlaa hʋʋkɩ pa taa tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , nn paasəɣəna tɔɔ , nn faɣasəɣɩ yəlaa . Ama ɩsəna mpi maɣamaɣa Ɩsɔ caa sɩ yəlaa ɩ ́ la tɔ pə tampana kɛ n heeliɣi . Tɔʋ , pə wɛ mpʋ tɔ , tá mpaaʋ taa pə wɛɛ sɩ ye lampuu tə ́ fɛlɩ Lom wulaʋ sɔsɔ na ? Tə ́ fɛlɩ yaa tə ́ taa fɛlɩ ? Tə caa sɩ ń heeli - tʋ .

text: Shall we give , or shall we not give ? But he , knowing their hypocrisy , said unto them , Why tempt ye me ? bring me a penny , that I may see it .
text2: Ama Yesu ná nyəmá pa taa laɣatʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ nyəkɩ - m katɔka kɛ kʋnyəpʋ ? Ɩ ́ kɔna - m liɣitee nyəɣəlʋɣʋ na má na .

text: And they brought it . And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ? And they said unto him , Caesar ' s .
text2: Tənaɣa yəlaa kɔna - ɩ - kʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ Yuta nyə ́ ma taa sɔsaa sɩ : Awe nyʋɣʋ fotoo na ɩ hətɛ kɛ pa ŋmaa liɣitee nyəɣəlʋɣʋ tɔɔ cənɛ ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Lom wulaʋ sɔsɔ kɛ ́ .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Render to Caesar the things that are Caesar ' s , and to God the things that are God ' s . And they marvelled at him .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Aŋhaa , ɩ ́ cɛla Lom wulaʋ sɔsɔ kɛ mpi ɩ tɩ tɔ , na ɩ ́ cɛla Ɩsɔ ɩlɛɣɛ mpi ɩ tɩ tɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu kʋcɔcɔtʋ ntɩ tə məla - wɛɣɛ təmsʋɣʋ kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: Then come unto him the Sadducees , which say there is no resurrection ; and they asked him , saying ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Satusee nyə ́ ma napəlɩ pa kɔma Yesu kiŋ . Satusee nyə ́ ma mpɛ pa tɔŋaɣana sɩ paa pə la ɩsəna sətaa kaa tɛ na pá fe . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa pɔɔsa Yesu sɩ :

text: Master , Moses wrote unto us , If a man ' s brother die , and leave his wife behind him , and leave no children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: Tacaa , Moisi sɩɩ - tʋɣʋ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kɛ takəlasɩ taa sɩ : Yʋlʋ ɩ ́ wɛna neu , na yʋlʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ sɩ na ɩ ́ yele ɩ alʋ , na alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ fɛɩna - ɩ na pəyaɣa , neu ká hɔ leelu ɩnɩ na ɩ ́ hikina - ɩ piya . Ɩlɛna pa yaakɩ - sɩ na ɩ taalʋ sɔlʋ hətɛ .

text: Now there were seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and dying left no seed .
text2: Tɔʋ , yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ na ɩ newaa paa kɛna yʋlʋnyɔɔŋ naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ taalʋ kpaɣa alʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sɩ , ɩ fɛɩ pəyaɣa .

text: And the second took her , and died , neither left he any seed : and the third likewise .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ waalɩ nyəŋ hɔma leelu , na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ caŋ ɩ sɩ tɔtɔ , ɩ fɛɩ pəyaɣa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ waalɩ nyəŋ ná kpaɣa alʋ ɩnɩ na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ sɩ mpʋ tɔtɔ .

text: And the seven had her , and left no seed : last of all the woman died also .
text2: Haləna pə polo pə siɣili pa naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa ŋkɛ ka tənaɣa mpʋ təpaɩ na pá səkɩ mpʋ , nɔɣɔlʋ ta hiki pəyaɣa . Pəlɛ pə waalɩ kɛ ́ alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɛɛsa səpʋ .

text: In the resurrection therefore , when they shall rise , whose wife shall she be of them ? for the seven had her to wife .
text2: Tɔʋ , pa təna pa kpaɣa - ɩ mpʋ tɔ , sətaa fem wule pa naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa ɩnɩ ɩ taa aweɣelɛ alʋ tʋ ?

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Do ye not therefore err , because ye know not the scriptures , neither the power of God ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ nyəmá mpi pə tɔɔ pə liɣitiɣi - mɛ tɔ ? Ɩ ́ ta nyɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm na Ɩsɔ toma tɔ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: For when they shall rise from the dead , they neither marry , nor are given in marriage ; but are as the angels which are in heaven .
text2: Waatʋ wei sətaa ká fe tɔ akpaɣalɛ tɔm kaa wɛɛ . Ama apalaa na alaa paa wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ɩsɔtaa tillaa wɛʋ tɔ .

text: And as touching the dead , that they rise : have ye not read in the book of Moses , how in the bush God spake unto him , saying , I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ?
text2: Ye sətaa fem tɔm ɩlɛ , ɩ ta kaləta Moisi takəlaɣa taa kɛ ́ timpi pa yɔɣɔta sɔwa hotiya tɔm tɔ yɛɛ ? Pa ŋmaa təna sɩ Ɩsɔ tɔma Moisi sɩ : Ma kɛ ́ Apəlaham na Ɩsaaka na Yakɔpʋ pa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ .

text: He is not the God of the dead , but the God of the living : ye therefore do greatly err .
text2: Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ weesuɣu nyə ́ ma nyəŋ kɛ ́ , ɩ ta kɛ sətaa Ɩsɔ . Pə liɣita - mɛɣɛ yem kɛ ́ .

text: And one of the scribes came , and having heard them reasoning together , and perceiving that he had answered them well , asked him , Which is the first commandment of all ?
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛ təna na ɩ ́ naakɩ ɩsəna pá na Yesu pa lakɩ tɔ . Ɩ nawa sɩ Yesu cɔwa Satusee nyə ́ ma kɛ teu . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təna taa ntiɣilɛ sɔsɔɔntʋ təkpem ?

text: And Jesus answered him , The first of all the commandments is , Hear , O Israel ; The Lord our God is one Lord :
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa sɔsɔɔntʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ , Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma ɩ ́ nɩɩ , Tacaa Ɩsɔ tike kɛna Sɔsɔ təkoŋ .

text: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind , and with all thy strength : this is the first commandment .
text2: N ka sɔɔlɩ Tacaa nyá Ɩsɔ na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ , na nyá ləsaɣa sʋʋ - ɩ təmammam kɛ paa mpi pə taa .

text: And the second is like , namely this , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself . There is none other commandment greater than these .
text2: Təlɛ tə waalɩ nti tə wɛɛ tɔɣɔlɔ . N ká sɔɔlɩ nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ ɩsɩɩ nyá tɩ . Kʋsəsɩɩtʋ natəlɩ tə fɛɩ tɔtɔ na tə ́ kəla tənɛ tə naalɛ ɩnɛ .

text: And the scribe said unto him , Well , Master , thou hast said the truth : for there is one God ; and there is none other but he :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlʋ tɔma Yesu sɩ : Tacaa n cɔ teu pə tɩɩ fɛɩ . Timpi n yɔɣɔtaa sɩ Tacaa tike kɛna Ɩsɔ na ɩ paasi Ɩsɔ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ fɛɩ tɔ tampana kɛ n yɔɣɔtaa .

text: And to love him with all the heart , and with all the understanding , and with all the soul , and with all the strength , and to love his neighbour as himself , is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices .
text2: Mpʋ tɔ yʋlʋ ká sɔɔlɩ Ɩsɔ na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ na ɩ ləsaɣa sʋʋ - ɩ paa mpi pə taa . Na pəlɛ pə waalɩ ɩ ́ sɔɔlɩ ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩ tɩ . Mpʋ ɩnɩ pə kəla ɩsɩɩ pa lakʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ kɔtaɣa ŋka kɔkɔ nyaɣa ka təna tɔ , na kɔtasɩ nsɩ sɩ təna təpaɩ tɔtɔ .

text: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly , he said unto him , Thou art not far from the kingdom of God . And no man after that durst ask him any question .
text2: Yesu nawa sɩ ɩ cɔna ləmaɣasɛɛ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Nyá na Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa sʋʋʋ ɩ ́ fɛɩ pooluŋ . Pəlɛ pə waalɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩɩ nyɩɩləɣɩ sɩ ɩ ́ tasa - ɩ tɔm pɔɔsʋɣʋ .

text: And Jesus answered and said , while he taught in the temple , How say the scribes that Christ is the Son of David ?
text2: Yesu tɔŋna sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ sɩ : Ɩsənaɣa Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa tɔŋ mpʋ sɩ Mesii kɛ Tafiiti pəyaɣa ye ?

text: For David himself said by the Holy Ghost , The Lord said to my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: Pəyele Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ ná tʋna Tafiiti taa kɛ ́ tɔm na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ : Tacaa heela ma Sɔsɔ sɩ , caɣa ma kɔŋkɔŋ taa , haləna má kɔɔ na má sɩɩ nyá kolontunaa kɛ nyá nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ .

text: David therefore himself calleth him Lord ; and whence is he then his son ? And the common people heard him gladly .
text2: Tafiiti maɣamaɣa ná yaa - ɩ sɩ Sɔsɔ ntɛ ́ , ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣa Mesii ná məlaa na ɩ ́ kɛ ́ Tafiiti ɩnɩ ɩ pəyaɣa tɔtɔ ɩlɛ ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ samaa tuutuuma nɩɩ Yesu tɔm na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ .

text: And he said unto them in his doctrine , Beware of the scribes , which love to go in long clothing , and love salutations in the marketplaces ,
text2: Ɩ kpaalaɣa yəlaa mpa ɩ sɛɣɛsaɣa tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ lana Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa mpɛ na laakalɩ . Pa sɔɔla tokonaa sɔsaa suuu kɛ ́ na pá cɔɔkɩ , na pá caakɩ pa sɛɛkɩ - wɛɣɛ samaa taa na pá luŋiɣi .

text: And the chief seats in the synagogues , and the uppermost rooms at feasts :
text2: Na Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa taa teeli teeli təcaɣalɛnaa kɛ pa pɛɛkəɣɩ , na acimanaa taa sɔsaa sɔsaa təcaɣalɛ kɛ pa pɛɛkəɣɩ na pá cakɩ .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayers : these shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Mpɛ pa lɛɛkəɣəna leelaa kɛ pə təna mpi pɛlɛ pa wɛna tɔ . Ɩlɛna pá sʋʋ Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ na pə taɣalɩ sɩ pə hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ mpɛɣɛ kʋpama . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ paa tɛ na pá ná katatəlaɣa naʋ napələɣɩ teu .

text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury , and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury : and many that were rich cast in much .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu caɣa Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa kɛ ́ kʋhaaŋ atakaanaa ɩsɛntaa , na yəlaa samaa kɔŋ na pá tʋɣɩ liɣitee na ɩ ́ nyənəɣɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ toŋtʋnaa paɣalɛ kɔna liɣitee kɛ sɔsɔm na pá tʋ .

text: And there came a certain poor widow , and she threw in two mites , which make a farthing .
text2: Tənaɣa leelu kʋnyɔntʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kɔna santiinaa kɛ naalɛ na ɩ ́ pɛtɩ .

text: And he called unto him his disciples , and saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That this poor widow hath cast more in , than all they which have cast into the treasury :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu yaa ɩ ɩfalaa na ɩ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , leelu kʋnyɔntʋ ɩnɛ ɩ tʋ mpiɣi kʋhaaŋ atakaa taa tɔ pə kəla pa təna pa nyəm .

text: For all they did cast in of their abundance ; but she of her want did cast in all that she had , even all her living .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , yəlaa lɛlaa ná kpaɣa pa liɣitee nna a kpisa yem tɔɣɔ na pá tʋ . Ama alʋ ɩnɛ ɩlɛ paa na ɩ kɛ ́ kʋnyɔntʋ tɔ pə təna mpi ɩ ka wɛna tɔɣɔ ɩ kpaɣaa na ɩ tʋ . Pə ta kaasɩ - ɩ pʋlʋ sɩ ɩ ́ yana tɔɣɔnaɣa maɣamaɣa .

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: Yesu kɔma sɩ ɩ ́ lɩɩkəna Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa , ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa taa nɔɣɔlʋ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , nyənɩ ŋmatʋ tənɛ tə tɔɔʋ , na tə pɛɛ kʋpana teu yee ?

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Matɔŋ n na ŋmatʋ sɔsɔɔntʋ tənɛ ? Pə kaa kaasɩ pəlɛ lɛntɛ na tə təna lɛntɛ tɔɔ , paa tusi pə təna .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu caɣa Olifinaa pʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ ɩsɛntaa . Pə pamna Piyɛɛ na Saakɩ na Yohaanɩ na Antəlɩɩ pa liɣiti pa wɛnna ɩ kiŋ . Tənaɣa pa pɔɔsa Yesu sɩ :

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: Pəlee kɛ ́ mpʋ ɩnɩ pɩɩ la ? Na ŋmaatəlɛ nteɣe pɩɩ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ na tə ́ nyəna sɩ pə wʋsaa ?

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu sʋʋ - wɛɣɛ kpaalʋɣʋ sɩ : Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ , ɩ ́ taa yele na nɔɣɔlʋ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ tolisi - mɛ .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Mpi tɔ paɣalɛ ká kɔɔ na pá ha pa təɣɩ ma hətɛ sɩ mpɛɣɛlɛ Mesii , na paa tolisi paɣalɛ .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: Ye ɩ ́ kɔma na ɩ ́ nɩɩ yooŋ taŋ kɛ mə cɔlɔ mə cɔlɔ , na pá heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ pooluŋ nyəŋ tɔmnaa , sɔɣɔntʋ ɩ ́ taa la - mɛ . Pə wɛɛ sɩ mpʋ ɩnɩ pəlɛ pɩɩ la kɛ ́ . Ama waalɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ antulinya náá kɔŋ na ɩ ́ tɛŋ .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: Tɛtʋ kateŋa lɛŋka ká yoona lɛŋka nyə ́ ma . Kawulaɣa lɛŋka ká kʋlɩ lɛŋka tɔɔ , na tɛtʋ ká sele tiiliwɛ tiiliwɛ , na nyɔɣɔsənaa ká la . Na mpʋ ɩnɩ pəlɛ pɩɩ wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ alʋ kʋlʋɣʋʋ lʋlʋɣʋ na pə ́ caalɩ - ɩ wɩɩʋ kɛ səŋŋsəŋŋ tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: Mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ la laakalɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , paa yaa - mɛɣɛ puloonaa taa . Paa ma - mɛɣɛ kpatəŋ kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa taa . Paa yaa - mɛɣɛ nɔnɔɔsɩ kɛ tɛtʋ tɔkəlaa na awulaa sɔsaa pa kiŋnaa kɛ ma tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ ká hʋ ́ lɩ ́ ma tɔm tampana .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Ama pə wɛɛ sɩ paa heeli Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ kateŋasɩ təna taa yəlaa kɛ ́ na pə ́ cɔ ́ .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: Saa wei paa kpa - mɛ na pá pona - mɛɣɛ puloonaa taa kɛ mpʋ tɔ , ɩ ́ taa nəɣəsɩ nti ɩ ́ ká yɔɣɔtɩ tɔ na pə ta tata . Ama ye pə talaa , ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ nti tɩɩ kɔɔ mə luuŋ tɛɛ tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ ka tʋna - təɣɩ mə luuŋ tɛɛ , pə taɣa mə cɔlɔɣɔ tɩɩ lɩɩna .

text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death , and the father the son ; and children shall rise up against their parents , and shall cause them to be put to death .
text2: Halɩ yəlaa ká kʋlɩ na pá hʋ ́ lɩ ́ pa taalʋnaa yaa pa newaa maɣamaɣa sɩ pá kʋ - wɛ . Na cɛcɛnaa ká la pa piya kɛ mpʋ tɔtɔ . Piya səlɛ sɩɩ kʋlɩ sɩ nyə ́ ma tɔɔ na sɩ la na pá kʋ - wɛ .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Yəlaa təna taa ká kpana - mɛɣɛ ma tɔɔ . Ama ye wei ɩ ́ nyaɣa apalʋtʋ na ɩ ́ tala tənaɣa , pʋntʋ nyʋɣʋ kɛ pɩɩ ya .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Ɩ ́ ká kɔɔ na ɩ ́ na acaalətʋ taa acaalətʋ kɛ timpi pə ta nəɣəsəna tə wɛɛ tɔ . Wei ɩ kaləɣɩ tɔ ɩ ́ cɛkəna - təɣɩ teu . Mpʋ ɩnɩ tɔ , mpa paa wɛɛ Yuta tɔ pá se na pá kpa pɔ ́ ɔ ́ ŋ .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Ye pə maɣana wei na ɩ ́ wɛ kutuluɣu tɔɔ na ɩ ́ tiiwa , ɩ ́ taa tɔ sɩ ɩ sʋʋkɩ təyaɣa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa pʋlʋ .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Na wei pɩɩ maɣana ɩ wɛ taalɛ tɔ , ɩ ́ taa tɔ sɩ ɩ kpeŋ ɩ tɛ na ɩ ́ kɛlɩ ɩ kpaɩ .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: Ahusitonaa na asɔŋ tɔm ká la waɩyo kɛ waatʋ ɩnɩ .

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: Ɩ ́ sələmɩ Ɩsɔ na kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ taa pamsəna watʋ waatʋ .

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , wahala ká la kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa kɛ ́ sɔsɔm kɛ ́ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ . Wahala wei ɩ taka hatoo Ɩsɔ lapʋ antulinya tɔ pa ta nata , pəyele pa kaa tasa ɩ taka kɛ ́ naʋ tɔ .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: Na ye pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ Tacaa hʋʋwa sɩ ɩ ká pasa kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔɔ nɔɣɔlʋ kaa tʋlɩ - tɩ . Ama ɩ pasa pə kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnəɣɩ yəlaa mpa ɩ ləsaa sɩ pá pəsɩ ɩ nyə ́ ma tɔ pa tɔɔ .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: Na ye yʋlʋ tɔma - mɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ nyənɩ , Mesii wɛ cənɛ yaa cənɛ , ɩ ́ taa nɩɩ .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Mesiinaa na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa pɔpɔtʋnaa ká lɩɩ na pá la kɔkɔlɔ nyəm na piti təma . Halɩ paa pəsaɣa pa puɣusiɣi mpa pa maɣamaɣa Ɩsɔ ləsaa tɔɣɔ .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: Mpʋ tɔ ɩ ́ la laakalɩ , ma tɛma - mɛɣɛ kpaalʋɣʋ .

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: Wahala ɩnɩ ɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa , ilim ká sɩ təkpitii , ɩsɔtʋ kaa tasa hʋlʋmʋɣʋ .

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Ɩsɔtʋlʋŋasɩ ká lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa na sɩ hoti , pɩɩ ciɣiti ɩsɔtaa kɔkɔlɔnaa .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnəɣɩ paa na Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma səŋa ɩsɔŋmʋntʋ tɔɔ na má tiiki na ma toma kɛ sɔsɔm na ma teeli .

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: Maa tili ma ɩsɔtaa tillaa sɩ pá koti ma ləsəlaa kɛ antulinya hɔɣɔləŋ təna taa . Pə kpaɣaʋ ilim təlɩɩlɛ na pə tətʋlɛ na pə polo pə ntɔɣɔŋ na pə mpətəŋ tɔɔ tɔ .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: Ɩ ́ nyənna fiki tʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ cɛkəna , saa wei kʋ nɛɣɛtəɣɩ na hatʋ yɛɣɛləɣɩ tɔ ɩ ́ nyəmá kpakpaa sɩ hɛɛsʋɣʋ talaa kɛlɛ .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ waatʋ wei ɩ ́ ká ná tɔmnaa panɛ pa lakɩ tɔ ɩ ́ nyɩ sɩ pə wʋsaa kɛlɛ , pə caa lapʋ ntɛ ́ .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , yəlaa mpa pa wɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ pa kaa sɩ pa təna na pə ́ cɔ ́ pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə la .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ na atɛ ká mʋkɩ yem . Ama ma kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ kaa saalɩ paa pəcɔ .

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ fɛɩ wei ɩ nyəmá pə waatʋ yaa pə wʋlɛ tɔ , paa ɩsɔtaa tillaa , na Pəyaɣa má ma maɣamaɣa . Ama Tacaa tike koŋ nyəmna .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: Mpʋ tɔ , ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na ɩ ́ feŋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ ́ ta nyɩ wʋlɛ nte mpʋ ɩnɩ pɩɩ tii təkpili tɔ .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: Pɩɩ wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ sɔsɔ kʋlʋɣʋʋ ɩ təyaɣa sɩ ɩ puki mpaa na ɩ ́ yaa ɩ pəyalaa mpa pa lakɩ ɩ kiŋ kɛ təmlɛ tɔ , na ɩ ́ tʋ pə tənaɣa pa niŋ taa , na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ paa wei kɛ ́ nte ɩ ká la tɔ , na ɩ ́ heeli təyaɣa tɔɔ nyənlʋ sɩ ɩ ́ feŋ teu .

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: Ye ɩ ta nyɩ waatʋ wei təyaɣa caa ká kɔɔ tɔ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ feŋ teu . Taanaɣa kɛ ɩ ká kɔɔ , ahoo hɛka kɛ , kampaaŋ koou na , yaa tanaŋ kɛ ́ , nɔɣɔlʋ ta nyɩ .

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: Ye ɩ ká kɔɔ tɔm kʋlʋm tɔɔ tənyɔsɔ , ɩlɛ ɩ ́ taa yele na ɩ ́ maɣana ɩ ́ tɔŋna tom .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Nti ma heeliɣi - mɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ ntəɣɩ ma heeliɣi paa wei sɩ ɩ ́ feŋ yoo .

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Pə kaasa kʋyɛɛŋ naalɛ sɩ pá tɔɣɔ Tɛɛʋ acima na potopotonaa mpa pa taa fɛɩ kʋkʋsʋm tɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa pa pɛɛka ɩsəna paa la na pá kpa Yesu təhɛɛ na nɔɣɔlʋ ta na tɔ na pá kʋ - ɩ .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: Pa yɔɣɔtaɣa pa taa sɩ : Ye tə tɔma sɩ tə ́ kpa - ɩ acima waatʋ taa , pɩɩ la yoou kɛ yəlaa taa .

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: Kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ Yesu wɛ Petanii kɛ tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ asilima kʋtɔŋ tʋ Simɔŋ təyaɣa taa , na ɩ ́ caɣaa na ɩ ́ tɔŋna tɔɣɔʋ . Tənaɣa alʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ sʋʋwa na ɩ ́ tɔka tulaalʋ kʋpaŋ wei pa yaa sɩ naatɩ na pá lapa ɩ akpaləpiya kɛ liɣitee pəlɛ kʋhʋlʋməlɛ tɔ na tulaalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ wɛ liɣitee kɛ sɔsɔm . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ pɛla akpaləpiya ŋkɛ na ɩ ́ pəlɩ tulaalʋ ɩnəɣɩ Yesu nyʋɣʋ taa .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
text2: Tənaɣa mpʋ ɩnɩ pə ta maɣa mpa pa caɣa təna tɔ pa taa lɛlaa na pá tɔ sɩ : Ɩ lɔʋ tulaalʋ ɩnɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ pə teu ntɛ we ?

text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence , and have been given to the poor . And they murmured against her .
text2: Ye paa pɛɛta - ɩ ɩ liɣitee taa kəlɩ liɣitee nyəɣətʋ ŋmʋnʋɣʋ na nɩɩnʋwa ( 300 ) na pá ha kʋnyɔntʋnaa ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kala alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔm kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: Ama Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ yele alʋ ɩnɩ təkpi yoo . Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ pəsəɣɩ ɩ laŋlɛ kɛ mpʋ ? Mpi ɩ lapa - m mpʋ tɔ pə tewaɣa halɩ .

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: Mə na kʋnyɔntʋnaa ɩ ́ wɛnna tam . Paa waatʋ wei kɛ ́ ɩ ́ nɔkaa ɩ ́ ká la - wɛɣɛ kʋpantʋ . Ama má na - mɛ tə kaa wɛɛ təma kiŋ kɛ tam .

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: Mpi ɩ pəsaa tɔɣɔ ɩ lapa . Ɩ laalaa na ɩ ́ saɣalɩ - m tulaalʋ kɛ kpakpaa sɩ pá pina - m .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , paa timpiɣi paa heeli Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ antulinya ɩnɩ ɩ təna ɩ taa , paa kɛɛsɩ alʋ ɩnɛ ɩ lapa mpi tɔ pə tɔm na pá tɔɔsəɣɩ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ɩfalaa naanʋwa na naalɛ taa nɔɣɔlʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Yutaasɩ Ɩsəkaleeu tɔ ɩ kʋlaa , na ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ maɣana kɔtəlaa sɔsaa , sɩ ɩnɩ ɩ ka tʋ Yesu kɛ ́ pa niŋ taa .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: Pɛlɛ pa nɩɩ mpʋ ɩlɛna pa laŋa hɛɛ sɔsɔm na pá tɔ sɩ paa ha - ɩ liɣitee . Ɩlɛna Yutaasɩ sʋʋ kʋyakʋ kʋpaŋkʋ kɛ pɛɛkʋɣʋ sɩ ɩ ́ tʋ Yesu kɛ ́ pa niŋ taa .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: Pə tala potopotonaa mpa pa taa kʋkʋsʋm fɛɩ tɔ pə acima kʋyakʋ kancaalaɣa nyəŋkʋ wule , ɩlɛna Yesu ɩfalaa pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Leɣe n caa sɩ tə ́ polo na tə ́ la - ŋ Tɛɛʋ acima kʋtɔɣɔʋ ? Pə wule ntɛɣɛ pa kʋɣɩ ɩwɛɛsɩ nsi pa lakəna Tɛɛʋ acima kʋtɔɣɔʋ tɔ .

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tila ɩ ɩfalaa taa naalɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ polo ɩcatɛ taa , ɩ ́ ka sulina apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ na ɩ ́ səɣəla lʋm na həyaɣa , ɩ ́ təŋɩ - ɩ .

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Pʋntʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ sʋʋ timpi , ɩlɛ mɩɩ pɔɔsɩ təyaɣa tʋ sɩ : Tacaa sɩ kutuluɣu ŋku kʋ taa ɩ ́ na ɩ ɩfalaa paa caɣa na pá tɔɣɔ Tɛɛʋ acima kʋtɔɣɔʋ tɔ kʋ wɛ le ?

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: Apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ká hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ atɛ na ɩsɔtaa kutuluɣu taa kɛ ́ naŋ sɔsɔɔŋkʋ nakʋləɣɩ ɩsɔtaa , na pá tɛma - kʋɣʋ taɣanʋɣʋ na kʋ taa wɛ wontu nti ɩ ́ ká lana tɔ . Kʋ taa tənaɣa ɩ ́ ká təsɩ - tʋɣʋ pə təna .

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu ɩfalaa kʋlaa na pá tɛɛ ɩcatɛ taa na pá maɣana teitei ɩsɩɩ Yesu ka heela - wɛ tɔ . Ɩlɛna pá təsɩ Tɛɛʋ acima kʋtɔɣɔʋ kɛ təna .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: Pə kɔma ɩsɩɩ taanaɣa ɩlɛ Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa naanʋwa na naalɛ pa talaa kɛlɛ .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: Pa caɣaa na pa tɔŋna tɔɣɔʋ , ɩlɛna Yesu yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , má na mpa mɛ tə caɣaa na tə ́ tɔkɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ ká la - m kɔlɔmɔtɔ .

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu ɩfalaa ɩsɛntaa nyəŋa sɔsɔm , na pá sʋʋ - ɩ pɔɔsʋɣʋ kɛ kʋlʋm kʋlʋm . Ɩnɛ sɩ : Matɔŋ pə taɣa ma ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Mə naanʋwa na naalɛ taa nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ . Má na wei tá niŋ ká kpɛntɩ sʋsʋɣʋ kɛ nyənaɣa taa tɔ .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má , ma səkɩ teitei kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ paa kɛɛsa ma tɔm kɛ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ . Ama wei ɩ ká la Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa maɣa kɔlɔmɔtɔ kɛ mpʋ tɔ ɩ tɔm ká la waɩyo kɛ ́ sɔsɔm . Pʋntʋ ɩnɩ ye pa taa lʋlɩ - ɩ pəlɛ pɩɩ lapa sana .

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ waatʋ wei Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa tɔkaɣa tɔ , Yesu kpaɣa potopoto na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ , na ɩ ́ faɣa - ɩ na ɩ ́ cɛla ɩ ɩfalaa , na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ mʋ , ma tɔnʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ .

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ kɛ ́ ɩ kpaɣa kɔpʋ na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ na ɩ ́ cɛlɛ - wɛ , na pɛlɛ pá nyɔɔ pa təna .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Ma caləm ntɛ ́ mpi pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ Ɩsɔ nɔɣɔ pɛɛlʋɣʋ tampana tɔ . Mpɩ pə kpemna yəlaa paɣalɛ tɔɔ .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , ma kaa tasa sʋlʋm pənɛɣɛ nyɔɔʋ haləna kʋyaŋku maa tasa pə nyɔɔʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa taa tɔ .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa tɛma mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá yoo acima yontu , ɩlɛna pá tɛɛ Olifinaa pʋɣʋ tɔɔ .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Mə təna ɩ ́ ká yele - m na ɩ ́ se . Pa ŋmaa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Maa kʋ tiikilu na heeŋ ká ya yem yem .

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: Ama waatʋ wei maa fe , ɩlɛna má tɛɛ - mɛɣɛ nɔɣɔ kɛ Kalilee .

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Paa pa təna paa yele - ŋ na pá se , má ma kaa la mpʋ .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Ama Yesu tɔma Piyɛɛ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - ŋ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , n ká kpɛɛsɩ tɔm tooso kɛ ́ saŋa ahoo anɛ a maɣamaɣa sɩ n ta nyɩ - m kɛ ́ n ta nyɩ - m na pə ́ cɔ ́ kampaaʋ koo tɔm naalɛ nyəm .

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: Ama Piyɛɛ tasa kpɛɛsʋɣʋ na toŋ sɩ : Paa má na - ŋ tɩɩ sɩ tɩɩ sɩ kɛ ́ . Ma kaa kpɛɛsɩ sɩ ma ta nyɩ - ŋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa təna pa yɔɣɔta mpʋ .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ pa tala timpi pa yaa sɩ Kɛtəsemanee tɔ , ɩlɛna Yesu tɔ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ caɣa cənɛ na má polo Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ kɛ hatoo cənɛ .

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kpaɣa Piyɛɛ na Saakɩ na Yohaanɩ . Tənaɣa sɔɣɔntʋ na laŋwakəllɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ sʋʋ - ɩ kpaʋ ,

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma laŋlɛ wakəlaa kɛ ́ tətɔɣɔtɔɣɔ pə fɛɩ kɛɛsʋɣʋ . Ɩ ́ caɣa cənɛ na ɩ ́ feŋiɣi .

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: Ɩ tuusa ɩ nɔɣɔ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pəcɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ luŋ na ɩ ́ sələmɩ sɩ ye pə wɛ pəsʋɣʋ wahala waatʋ ɩnɛ ɩ ́ taa kɔɔ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: Ɩ sələmaa kɛ ́ sɩ : Haɩ , ma Caa , n pəsəɣɩ pə təna , kɔɔlɩ wahala sɔsɔ ɩnɛɣɛ ma nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ . Paa na mpʋ mpi n nɔkaa tɔ pəlɛ pə la , pə ́ taa wɛɛ ma luɣu nyəntʋ .

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Yesu tɛma mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ məlɩ ɩ ɩfalaa tooso ɩnɩ ɩ kiŋ na ɩ ́ maɣana pa tɔŋna tom . Tənaɣa ɩ pɔɔsa Piyɛɛ sɩ : Simɔŋ , n too kɛ ? N kpisa feŋuɣu kɛ pəcɔ maɣamaɣa ?

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Ɩ ́ feŋ na ɩ ́ sələmɩ , tɔfɔ ɩ ́ ká hoti waatʋ wei maɣasʋɣʋ kɔŋ - mɛ tɔ . Pááná wɛɛ , ama tɔnʋɣʋ ɩɩ pəsəɣəna .

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa tuusuɣu , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tasa kʋlʋmtʋ ntəɣɩ sələmʋɣʋ .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Ɩ tasa ɩ ɩfalaa cɔlɔɣɔ məlʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ maɣana pa tɔŋna tom tɔtɔ . Pa kpisa pá caɣana pa ɩsɛ . Ɩlɛ pa ta nyɩ nti pá cɔ - ɩ tɔ .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Yesu məla tooso nyəm ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ tɔŋna tom na ɩ ́ hɛɛsəɣɩ yaa ? Tɔʋ , ɩ ́ yele mpʋ , pə talaa kɛlɛ . Ɩ ́ nyənɩ , paa tʋ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa maɣa asaɣaa niŋ taa .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: Ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na tə tɛɛ . Ɩ ́ nyənɩ , ma kɔlɔmɔtɔ tʋ tala cənɛ .

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Yesu tɔŋna yɔɣɔtaɣa kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛ ɩ ɩfalaa naanʋwa na naalɛ taa lɛlʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Yutaasɩ tɔ ɩ talaa kɛlɛ . Na ɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ yəlaa tuutuuma na pá tɔka laɣalɛɛ na kpatəŋ . Kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma pa tilina yəlaa mpɛ .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Yutaasɩ wei ɩnɩ ɩ lakɩ Yesu kɛ ́ kɔlɔmɔtɔ kɛ mpʋ tɔ ɩ ka kɛɛsa samaa ɩnəɣɩ ɩsəna ɩ ká la tɔɣɔ . Ɩ heela - wɛɣɛ sɩ : Ye ma polaa na má waɣala wei ɩlɛ ɩnəɣəlɛ . Ɩ ́ kpa - ɩ na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ - ɩ teu na ɩ ́ tɛɛna .

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Yutaasɩ talaa ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpətəna Yesu na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tacaa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ waɣalɩ - ɩ .

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ samaa ɩnɩ ɩ tʋ niŋ kɛ Yesu tɔɔ na pá kpa - ɩ .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: Tənaɣa mpa na Yesu paa wɛ təna tɔ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kpɛɛ ɩ laɣatɛ na ɩ ́ lo kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ təmlɛ tʋ ŋkpaŋʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ kɔɔlɩ təfeŋ .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu pɔɔsɩ samaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ kɔŋɩ - m kpaʋ na ɩ ́ nɔkɩ na ɩ ́ kpakəɣɩ laɣalɛɛ na kpatəŋ tɔ , maɣa ŋmɩɩlʋ ɩsaɣaʋ kɛ ?

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: Ma na - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa kɛ ́ kʋyɛɛŋ tənaɣa na má sɛɣɛsəɣɩ . Pəyele ɩ ́ ta kpa - m . Ama pə lapa ɩsəntɔɣɔ sɩ pə ́ la ɩsəna paa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ .

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu ɩfalaa təna yela - ɩ na pá se na pá tɛɛ .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: Pə pamna ɩfepu nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka taka kunti tike na ɩ ́ tɔŋ Yesu waalɩ . Pa siisaa sɩ pa kpaa ɩfepu ɩnɩ ,

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: ɩlɛna kunti fiti na ɩ ́ yele na ɩ ́ tɛɛ tapakpɛtɛ təyələyəlɩ .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu kpalaa pona Yesu kɛ ́ kɔtəlaa wulaʋ tɛ , na pá maɣana kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa pa kota təna .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: Piyɛɛ təŋaɣa Yesu kɛ ́ táálə ́ ḿ tɔɔ , haləna ɩ ́ tala kɔtəlaa wulaʋ taɣa tɔɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ caɣa təna na ɩ ́ na təmlɛ nyə ́ ma pá holiɣi kɔkɔ .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Kotuɣu sɔsɔɔŋkʋ nyə ́ ma pɛɛka taalɩ wei paa tʋ Yesu na pá hiki mpaaʋ na pá kʋ - ɩ tɔ , na pá kpisi .

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: Ɩlɛna yəlaa paɣalɛ náá kʋlɩ na pá tɔŋ sɩ : Taalɩ ɩnɛɣɛ ɩ lapa , ɩnɛɣɛ ɩ lapa . Lɛlaa sɩ ɩnɛɣɛ , na pá taɣanəɣɩ pa taa pa tike kɛ kpɛɛsʋɣʋ .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Na lɛlaa náá lɩɩ yem na pá looli tɔm na pá suu - ɩ sɩ :

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: Tə nɩɩ Yesu yɔɣɔtaa sɩ ɩnɩ ɩ ká yɔkɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ tənɛ , nte yəlaa niŋ ŋmawa tɔ . Ɩnɩ ɩ ká lɛɛtɩ kʋfatɛ nte yʋlʋ niŋ kaa ŋma tɔɣɔ kʋyɛɛŋ tooso wule .

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Paa na mpʋ pa tɔm ta kaa .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɔtəlaa wulaʋ kʋla pa təna pa ɩsɛntaa na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ Yesu sɩ : N kaa yɔɣɔtɩ ? Suweɣe yəlaa panɛ pa yɔɣɔtəɣəna - ŋ ye ?

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: Ama Yesu suma , ɩ ta cɔ sɩ pʋlʋ . Ɩlɛna kɔtəlaa wulaʋ tasa - ɩ pɔɔsʋɣʋ sɩ : Nyaɣalɛ Ɩsɔ wei pa pʋɣʋləɣɩ tɔ ɩ pəyalʋ Mesii ?

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Nn , ma maɣamaɣa kɛlɛ . Na mə təna təpaɩ ɩ ́ ká na Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má na má caɣa Ɩsɔ toŋ təna tʋ kɔŋkɔŋ taa . Na ɩ ́ ká na - m ɩsɔtaa ŋmʋntʋ taa na má tiiki .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Tənaɣa kɔtəlaa wulaʋ cəla ɩ wontu na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Seliya nyə ́ ma mpaɣa tə tasəɣɩ pɛɛkʋɣʋ tɔtɔ .

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: Mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ ná ɩsəna ɩ kpa Ɩsɔ tɔɔ tɔɣɔlɛ . Tɔʋ , ɩ ́ na - we ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa təna pa tɔma sɩ ɩ tɔm səpaɣa , paa kʋ - ɩ kɛ ́ .

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: Tənaɣa yəlaa mpɛ pa lɛlaa sʋʋ - ɩ ntaɣama tɔʋ , na pá takɩ ɩ ɩsɛntɔɔ na pá mapɩ - ɩ ŋkuma , na pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Kpeɣe wei ɩ mapa - ŋ tɔ . Pəlɛ pə waalɩ yoolaa kpaɣa Yesu na pá mapɩ - ɩ kataasɩ .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: Piyɛɛ ka wɛ taɣa tɔɔ kɛ ́ atɛɣɛ mpʋ tɔɣɔ kɔtəlaa wulaʋ təmlɛ tʋ alʋ nyəŋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kɔma

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: na ɩ ́ maɣana - ɩ na ɩ ́ holiɣi kɔkɔ , na ɩ ́ nyənɩ - ɩ təpiŋŋ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Nyá tɔtɔ , n ka wɛ Nasalɛtɩ tʋ Yesu ɩnɩ ɩ kiŋ .

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ kpɛɛsaa na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ma ta nyɩ nti n yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ tɔ . Ma ta cɛkəna - tɩ . Pəlɛ pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Piyɛɛ lɩɩwa na ɩ ́ polo kpaaŋ taa . Ɩlɛna kampaaʋ koo .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: Tənaɣa təmlɛ tʋ alʋ nyəŋ ɩnɩ ɩ taɣana - ɩ naʋ , na ɩ ́ tasa ɩ ́ na mpa paa wɛ təna tɔɣɔ heeluɣu sɩ : Pa taa mpɛɣɛlɛ na apalʋ ɩnɛ tɔtɔ .

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ taɣana kpɛɛsʋɣʋ . Pə lapa laasaɣa ɩlɛna mpa paa wɛ təna tɔ pá tɔ Piyɛɛ sɩ : Nyá , n ta laŋ yəlaa mpɛ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , n kɛ ́ Kalilee tʋ tɔ se .

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ kpɛɛsaa təlalala na ɩ ́ tuu na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Na Ɩsɔ , ma ta nyɩ apalʋ wei ɩ tɔm ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔ .

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Tənaɣa kampaaʋ lɛla koou kɛ tɔm naalɛ nyəm , ɩlɛna Piyɛɛ tɔɔsɩ nti Yesu ka yɔɣɔta - ɩ tɔ tə tɔɔ sɩ : Mpi pɩɩ takɩ kampaaʋ koou naalɛ nyəm tɔ n tɛma tɔm toosoɣo kpɛɛsʋɣʋ sɩ n ta nyɩ - m kɛ ́ n ta nyɩ - m . Ɩlɛna Piyɛɛ wii ɩsəlʋm .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Kɔtəlaa sɔsaa , na nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma , na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa , na Kotuɣu sɔsɔɔʋ nyə ́ ma pa kota təmaɣa tanaŋ kʋpaŋkʋ tɛɛ sɩ pa paasəɣəna Yesu tɔm . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa hɔka - ɩ na pá kpaɣa - ɩ na pá polo pá cɛla Pilatɩ .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: Tənaɣa Pilatɩ pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Nyaɣalɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma wulaʋ sɔsɔ ɩnəɣɩ ? Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ntəɣəlɛ n yɔɣɔta mpʋ .

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Na kɔtəlaa sɔsaa náá tɔŋ sɩ ɩ lapa taalənaa kɛ sɔsɔm kɛ ́ .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: Tənaɣa Pilatɩ tasa - ɩ pɔɔsʋɣʋ sɩ : N sumaɣa ? Nyənɩ pa tɔŋʋɣʋ sɩ n lapa pənɛ na pənɛ tɔ .

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: Ama Yesu tá cɔ sɩ pʋlʋ . Ɩlɛna pə la Pilatɩ kɛ piti kɛ ́ sɔsɔm .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: Paa Tɛɛʋ acima wena Pilatɩ tʋləɣɩ saləka tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ wei samaa caa sɩ pá tʋlɩ tɔɣɔ .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Pə pamna apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Palapaasɩ tɔ , ɩ ́ na lɛlaa paa kʋwa yʋlʋ kɛ tɛtʋ tɔm yoou ŋku kɩɩ kʋlaa tɔ kʋ taa na pá təka - wɛɣɛ saləka .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ samaa kʋlaa na pá kpa na pá maɣana Pilatɩ sɩ ɩ ́ la - wɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩ tɩɩ lakɩ - wɛ tɔ .

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Tənaɣa Pilatɩ pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ caa má tʋlɩ - mɛɣɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma wulaʋ sɔsɔ na ?

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ pɔɔsa - wɛɣɛ mpʋ , ɩ ka nyəmaɣa təkelekele sɩ ɩsəsɛɛmlɛ tɔɔ kɛ ́ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa ka pona - ɩ Yesu .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: Ama kɔtəlaa sɔsaa mpɛ pa sɛɣɛsəna yəlaa sɩ pá tɔ sɩ Palapaasɩ kɛ pá tʋlɩ - wɛ .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pilatɩ taɣana samaa kɛ pɔɔsʋɣʋ sɩ : Tɔʋ , ɩsənaɣa ɩ ́ caa má lana mə Yuta nyə ́ ma wulaʋ sɔsɔ ɩnɩ ?

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: Tənaɣa pa mapa kapusi sɩ : Kamɩ - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ .

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: Ɩlɛna Pilatɩ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩlɛ ɩsaɣatʋ ntiɣi ɩ lapa ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa tasa kapusi mapʋ na toŋ sɩ : Kamɩ - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ , kamɩ - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ .

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: Pilatɩ sɔɔlaa sɩ samaa ɩnɩ ɩ laŋlɛ ɩ ́ hɛɛna - ɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tʋlɩ Palapaasɩ , na ɩ ́ yele na pá casa Yesu kɛ akpatɛɛ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpaɣa - ɩ na ɩ ́ cɛlɛ - wɛ sɩ pá polo pá kamɩ - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yoolaa pona Yesu kɛ ́ kʋfənɛɛ təyaɣa taɣa tɔɔ , ɩlɛna pa yaa pa looŋa təna .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa suu Yesu kɛ ́ capa kʋsɛɛm təkpaɩɩ , na pá lʋʋ sɔwa kɛ ntenuɣu na pá te ɩ nyʋɣʋ .

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Ɩlɛna pá sɛɛ - ɩ sɩ : Yuta nyə ́ ma wulaʋ sɔsɔ , fɔɔ .

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: Na pá makɩ ɩ nyʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ , na pá tɔ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ntaɣama , na pá luŋiɣi ɩ tɛɛ kɛ ́ akula kɛ teu təkulakula .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: Pa tɛma - ɩ paanaʋ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá wɔɣɔsɩ capa kʋsɛɛm ɩnɩ , na pá mələna - ɩ ɩ wontu . Ɩlɛna pá lɩɩna - ɩ sɩ pa kaŋɩ - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Pə pamna Silɛɛnɩ tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ná lɩɩna taalɛ , pa yaa - ɩ sɩ Simɔŋ . Ɩ kɛ ́ Alɛkəsantəlɩ na Lufusi pa caa . Tənaɣa pa kpipa ɩlɛ na toŋ sɩ ɩ ́ səɣəlɩ Yesu səm tesika ŋkɛ .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa pona Yesu kɛ ́ timpi pa yaa sɩ Kɔləkɔta tɔ . ( Pə hʋwɛɛ ntɛ ́ sɩ nyʋmpɔɣɔlaɣa tɛ ) .

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa nyəmá sɩ pa cɛləɣɩ - ɩ sʋlʋm mpi pə taa pa sita kɔɔlɛ nte pa yaa sɩ miili tɔ sɩ ɩ ́ nyɔɔ . Ama Yesu kisa nyɔɔʋ .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ pa kama - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ , na pá tɔ tɛtɛ kɛ ́ ɩ wontu tɔɔ sɩ pa nyəŋ ɩsəna paa wei ɩ ká hiki tɔ na pə ́ cɔ ́ pá tala - tɩ .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Waatʋ wei pa kaŋaɣa - ɩ mpʋ tɔ pə wɛ tanaŋ ilim kaləfu pɔɣɔlaɣafɛɩ naanʋwa tɔɔ .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa lapa lampa na pá ŋmaa ɩ tɔɔ sɩ : Yuta nyə ́ ma wulaʋ sɔsɔ . Pa lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pə hʋlɩ mpi pə tɔɔ pa lapa - ɩ mpʋ tɔ .

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: Pa kpɛŋna ɩ ́ na ŋmɩɩlaa kɛ naalɛ na pá ká səm tesikasɩ tɔɔ , lɛlʋ kɛ ɩ ntɔɣɔŋ tɔɔ , na lɛlʋ kɛ ɩ mpətəŋ tɔɔ ,

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: sɩ pə la ɩsɩɩ paa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ sɩ : Asaɣaa taa kɛ ́ pa tʋ - ɩ .

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Yəlaa mpa paa tɛɛkaɣana təna tɔ pɛlɛ pa kpɛɛtəɣɩ nyɔɔŋ na pá tʋʋkɩ - ɩ sɩ : Anyaŋka , matɔŋ nyá tɔmna sɩ n yɔkəɣɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ na ń taɣanɩ kʋfatɛ kɛ ŋmaʋ kɛ kʋyɛɛŋ tooso taa .

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: Waasɩ nyá tɩ ɩlɛ . Lɩɩ tesika tɔɔ na ń tii ɩlɛ .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ na kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa tɔtɔ . Pɛlɛ pa tɔŋna - ɩ paanaʋ na pá yɔɣɔtəɣɩ pa təma sɩ , ɩ yapa lɛlaa nyɔɔŋ ɩsənaɣa na ɩ ́ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ ya ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ nyəŋkʋ .

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: Pənɛntaa Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ wulaʋ sɔsɔ Mesii ɩ ́ lɩɩ tesika tɔɔ na ɩ ́ tii na tə ́ ná na tə ́ tisi . Pə kpɛŋna ɩ ́ na mpa paa kama tɔ na pɛlɛ pá tʋʋkɩ - ɩ tɔtɔ .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: Pə kɔma na pə tala ilim sikuɣu , ɩlɛna səkpɛtʋɣʋ nyala ɩcatɛ tɔɔ haləna ilim kpili .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Ilim kpila mpʋ , ɩlɛna Yesu kiisina nɔɣɔ sɔsɔɣa sɩ : Eloi , Eloi , Lema sapatani . ( Na təlɛ tə hʋwɛɛ ntɛ ́ sɩ : Ma Ɩsɔ ma Ɩsɔ , pepe tɔɔ kɛ n lɔ - m ? )

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Mpa paa wɛ təna tɔ pa taa lɛlaa nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ nɩɩ , ɩ yaana ntɛɣɛ Ilii .

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: Ɩlɛna pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ kpaɣa asewa na ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ lii kpaləkpam saŋ kɛ lʋm kʋnyəŋəm napəlɩ pə taa na ɩ ́ tʋʋ kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ nɔɣɔ taa na ɩ ́ hʋlɩ Yesu sɩ ɩ ́ nyɔɔ . Na ɩ tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ yele na tə ́ ná Ilii ká kɔɔ na ɩ ́ tisi - ɩ yaa ɩsəna ?

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu kiisa sɔsɔm ɩlɛna ɩ ́ hɛɛ .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pʋʋɣʋ sɔsɔɔʋ ŋku kʋ kaɣa Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa tɔ kʋ faɣa kʋ hɛkʋ taa kɛ ́ huŋ naalɛ kɛ yem kɛ hatoo ɩsɔtaa na pə ́ kaləsəna atɛ .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Lom yoolaa sɔsɔ wei ɩ ka səŋa Yesu ɩsɛntaa tɔ ɩ na ɩsəna Yesu tɛma kiisuɣu na ɩ ́ sɩ tɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tampana , yʋlʋ ɩnɛ ɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa .

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: Alaa napəlɩ paa səŋa pooluŋ na pá nyənəɣɩ . Makətala Malɩ ka wɛ pa hɛkʋ . Ɩlɛna pə kaasɩ Saakɩ səkpelu na Yosee pa too Malɩ na Salomee tɔtɔ .

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: Alaa mpɛ pa təŋaɣa Yesu kɛ ́ saa wei ɩ ka wɛ Kalilee tɔ na pá caləsəɣɩ - ɩ . Na pə kaasa alaa lɛlaa paɣalɛ mpa ɩ ́ na - wɛ paa kpawa Yosalɛm tɔ .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: Pə pamna kʋyakʋ ŋkʋɣʋ pa lakɩ acima sɔɔlʋ . Mpi tɔ pə feŋ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ kɛ ́ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə kɔma na pə kɛɛsɩ taanaɣa ,

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: ɩlɛna Alimatee Yosɛɛfʋ kɔɔ . Mpɛ pa kotaɣana kotuɣu sɔsɔɔʋ ŋkʋ , na yəlaa tʋkaɣana - ɩ kɛ ́ . Ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ka keŋaɣana Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa tɔɔ . Yosɛɛfʋ ɩnɩ ɩ nyaɣa apalʋtʋ kɛ teu na ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ maɣana Pilatɩ na ɩ ́ sələmɩ - ɩ sɩ ɩ kpakəɣɩ sətʋ .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: Ama pə lapa Pilatɩ kɛ piti kɛ ɩsəna Yesu səpa lɔŋ kɛ mpʋ tɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yaa yoolu na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Yesu səpa tɔ pə leelaa .

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: Yoolu heela - ɩ pə tampana , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ha Yosɛɛfʋ kɛ mpaaʋ sɩ ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ kpaɣa sətʋ .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yosɛɛfʋ yapa kpoŋkpontu toŋ nyəntʋ nti pa yaa sɩ lɛŋ tɔ tə pʋŋkahʋlʋŋa , na ɩ ́ tisi sətʋ kɛ tesika tɔɔ na ɩ ́ takɩ - ɩ pʋŋkahʋlʋŋa ŋkɛ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ pimi - ɩ pəlaaʋ ŋku pa hula kʋkpamʋɣʋ taa tɔ kʋ taa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pilimi pɩɩʋ sɔsɔɔʋ nakʋlɩ na ɩ ́ suli pəlaaʋ nɔɣɔ .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: Makətala Malɩ na Yosee too Malɩ paa wɛɛ na pá naakɩ timpi pa pima - ɩ tɔ .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ tɛɛwa , ɩlɛna Makətala Malɩ na Saakɩ too Malɩ na Salomee pá ya nim sɔɔsʋŋ nyəm sɩ pa puki na pá saɣalɩ Yesu kɛ ́ pəlaaʋ taa .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ cimaasɩ wule pa kʋla tanaŋ təpam na pá polo pəlaaʋ kiŋ kɛ ilim lɩɩʋ waatʋ .

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: Pa pɔɔsaɣa təma sɩ : Awe ká tʋlɩ - tʋɣʋ pɩɩʋ ŋkʋɣʋ pəlaaʋ nɔɣɔ ɩlɛ ?

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Pa kʋsa pa ɩsɛ ɩlɛna pá na sɩ pa tɛma pɩɩʋ sɔsɔɔʋ ŋkʋɣʋ pilimuɣu na pá sɩɩ kpeeŋa . Kɩɩ tɔɔ teu kɛ ́ .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá sʋʋ pəlaaʋ taa na pá maɣana ɩfepu nɔɣɔlʋ na ɩ ́ suu capa kʋhʋlʋm na ɩ ́ caɣa ntɔɣɔŋ tɔɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɔɣɔntʋ lapa - wɛ .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩfepu ɩnɩ ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Sɔɣɔntʋ ɩ ́ taa la - mɛ . Nasalɛtɩ Yesu wei pa kama səm tesika tɔɔ tɔɣɔ ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ . Ɩ fema , ɩ fɛɩ cənɛ . Ɩ ́ nyənɩ , ɩɩ naa timpi paa hɩɩsa - ɩ tɔ .

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: Tɔʋ , ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ heeli ɩ ɩfalaa lɛlaa na Piyɛɛ sɩ ɩ tɛɛ - mɛɣɛ nɔɣɔ kɛ Kalilee , tənaɣa ɩ ́ ká maɣana - ɩ ɩsɩɩ ɩ ka heela - mɛ tɔ .

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: Pa lɩɩ pəlaaʋ taa na sɔɣɔntʋ pɩɩ - wɛ təkaŋkaŋ na pá seliɣi . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa sewa na pa sɔɣɔntʋ katatəlaɣa tɔɔ pa ta pəsɩ na pá heeli nɔɣɔlʋ sɩ pʋlʋ .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: Yesu fem ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ cimaasɩ tanaŋ kʋpaŋkʋ tɛɛ tɔ , Makətala Malɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ caala lɩɩʋ . Alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ Yesu ka tɔɣɔna alɔɣaa naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa .

text: And she went and told them that had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
text2: Tənaɣa Malɩ ɩnɩ ɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ pona laapaalɩ kɛ ɩ ́ na mpa paa wɛɛ na pá caɣa ləyaɣa na pá wiiki tɔ .

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: Alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ heela - wɛɣɛ mpʋ sɩ Yesu wɛna ɩ weesuɣu na ɩnɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ na - ɩ tɔ . Pa ta mʋ ɩ tɔm .

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ Yesu lɩɩ pa taa naalɛ tɔɔ na wɛɛtʋ lɛntɩ kɛ waatʋ wei pɛlɛ pa wɛ mpaaʋ taa na pá puki tawa taa tɔ .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɛlɛ pa məlaa na pá heeli lɛlaa , na pɛlɛ tɔtɔ pa ta mʋ - tɩ .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Yesu lɩɩ ɩ ɩfalaa naanʋwa na kʋlʋm tɔɔ kɛ ́ waatʋ wei pa caɣa tɔɣɔʋ tɔ , na ɩ ́ kaləna - wɛ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ lapa katɛ na mə laŋa la kpɩɩsəŋ na pá heeli - mɛ sɩ ma fema na ɩ ́ ta tisi .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ ɩ tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ ya antulinya təna taa na ɩ ́ heeli paa wei kɛ ́ ma Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: Ye wei ɩ mʋwa na pá sɔ - ɩ Ɩsɔ lʋm , pɩɩ ya pʋntʋ nyʋɣʋ . Ama ye wei ɩ kisa tə mʋɣʋ , paa kʋ pʋntʋ tɔm .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: Ye mpa pa mʋwa , piti təma nna paa la tɔɣɔlɔ . Paa tɔɣɔnɩ alɔɣaa na ma toŋ , na pá yɔɣɔtɩ nsəma lɛnna .

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: Paa kpa tʋmaa na pa niŋ , yaa pá nyɔɔ kɔɔ wena a kʋɣɩ yəlaa tɔ , pə kaa la - wɛɣɛ pʋlʋ . Paa tənɩ kʋtɔntʋnaa tɔɔ kɛ ́ niŋ na pə ́ waa - wɛ .

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: Tacaa Yesu tɛma ɩ ɩfalaa kɛ yɔɣɔtənaʋ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pə kpaasɩ - ɩ ɩsɔtaa na ɩ ́ caɣa Ɩsɔ kɔŋkɔŋ taa .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ɩfalaa ná tɛɛwa na pá heeliɣi Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ paa timpi . Tacaa ka wɛ pa waalɩ kɛ ́ pa kʋlapʋtʋ taa na ɩ ́ kʋsəɣɩ pa waasʋnaa nyɔɔŋ na piti təma wena a tɔŋna lapʋ tɔ .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: Ma yʋlʋ Teufiili , yəlaa paɣalɛ maɣasaa sɩ pá kɛɛsɩ mpi pə lapa tá hɛkʋ taa tɔɣɔ takəlaɣa taa .

text: Even as they delivered them unto us , which from the beginning were eyewitnesses , and ministers of the word ;
text2: Ɩsɩɩ mpa pa nana pa ɩsɛ kɛ pə kancaalaɣa na pá pəsɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm təmlɛ nyə ́ ma tɔ .

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: Ma maɣamaɣa ma tɛma yasʋɣʋ kɛ pə kpaɣaʋ tɔm ntɩ tə kancaalaɣa tɔ , na ma nawa pə tampana təna . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə lapa - m teu sɩ má kɛɛsɩ - ŋ tɔm ntɩ tə təna təcʋŋŋ ma yʋlʋ kʋpaŋ .

text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things , wherein thou hast been instructed .
text2: Sɩ ń cɛkəna pə təna mpi pa sɛɣɛsa - ŋ tɔ pə tampana kɛ teu .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Yuta wulaʋ sɔsɔ Helɔtɩ waatʋ taa , kɔtʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛ Apiya kɔtəlaa looŋa taa , pá yaa - ɩ sɩ Sakalɩ . Ɩ alʋ ka kɛ ́ kɔtʋlʋ Alɔŋ lʋlʋɣʋ tʋ , pa yaa ɩ ́ lɛ ́ sɩ Ɩlisapɛtɩ .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: Pa naalɛ ɩnɩ pa tɔntɛ ka kɛɛsa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ pa təŋaɣa Tacaa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ na ɩ kʋheelitu tənaɣa teitei .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Ɩlisapɛtɩ ka kɛ ́ kaalʋlaɣa , ɩlɛ pa fɛɩna pəyaɣa . Pəyele pa naalɛ ɩnɩ pa pɩɩwa .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ pə tala Sakalɩ looŋa təmlɛ waatʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ tɔŋna kɔtʋɣʋ təmlɛ lapʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa .

text: According to the custom of the priest ' s office , his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa tɔ tɛtɛ ɩsɩɩ kɔtəlaa lakɩ tɔ , ɩlɛna pə ́ kpa Sakalɩ sɩ ɩ ́ sʋʋ na ɩ ́ wɔ tulaalʋnaa kɛ hatoo kɔtaɣa təlatɛ tɔɔ .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Na yəlaa samaa təna wɛ awalɩ na pá tɔŋna Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ kɛ tulaalʋ wɔpʋ waatʋ .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Tənaɣa Tacaa ɩsɔtaa tillu nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ lɩɩ Sakalɩ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ səŋ tulaalʋ kɔtaɣa təwɔtɛ ntɔɣɔŋ tɔɔ .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Waatʋ wei Sakalɩ nawa ɩsɔtaa tillu ɩlɛna sɔɣɔntʋ kpa - ɩ na ɩ laŋlɛ cɛ .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: Ama ɩsɔtaa tillu heela - ɩ sɩ : Sakalɩ taa nyá , Ɩsɔ mʋ nyá sələmʋɣʋ . Nyá alʋ Ɩlisapɛtɩ ká lʋlɩ - ŋ apalʋpəyaɣa , na n ká ha - kɛɣɛ hətɛ sɩ Yohaanɩ .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: Nyá laŋlɛ ká hɛɛna - kɛ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ , na paɣalɛ laŋa ká hʋləməna ka lʋlʋɣʋ .

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , kaa la sɔsɔ kɛ Tacaa ɩsɛntaa . Ka kaa təŋ sʋlʋmaɣa yaa kʋnyɔnyɔɔm kʋkʋkʋm napəlɩ . Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toŋ ká wɛɛ ka taa kɛ ́ sɔsɔm kɛ hatoo ka too lotu taa .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: Kaa məŋna Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma paɣalɛ kɛ pa Caa Ɩsɔ kiŋ .

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Kaa yoosi ka təmlɛ kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toŋ . Ka ləmaɣasəlɛ na ka toŋ ká wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ Ilii . Kaa kpɛntɩ caanaa na pa piya . Kaa la na kaanɩɩtʋnaa təŋ tampana . Kaa la ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ ká taɣanɩ Tacaa kɛ yəlaa kʋpampama mpa pa mʋna ɩ təmlɛ lapʋ tɔ .

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: Tənaɣa Sakalɩ cɔ ɩsɔtaa tillu sɩ : Nyá tɔm tənɛ tə wɛ mʋɣʋ ntɛ ? Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma wɛʋ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , ma pɩɩwaɣa . Pə ́ cɔ ́ ma alʋ maɣamaɣa ná pɩɩwa .

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩsɔtaa tillu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Maɣa Kapiyɛɛ kɛ ́ , Ɩsɔ cɔlɔɣɔ ma wɛɛ . Ɩnɩ ɩ tilina - m sɩ má yɔɣɔtəna - ŋ na má heeli - ŋ tɔm kʋpantʋ tənɛ .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: Mpi pə tɔɔ n ta tʋna ma tɔm nti tɩɩ tɛ na tə ́ la tampana kɛ tə waatʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ n ká la kamumuka . Nyá nɔɣɔ kaa kuli , haləna wule nte ma tɔm tənɛ tɩɩ la ɩsɩɩ ma yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnɩ tɔ na yəlaa wɛ awalɩ kɛ ́ na pá taŋa Sakalɩ na piti kɛ ́ mpi pə tɔɔ ɩ taaŋa sɔsɔm kɛ hatoo pə taa təna tɔ .

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Waatʋ wei ɩ lɩɩwa tɔ ɩ ta pəsɩ na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəna - wɛ . Ɩlɛna pɛlɛ pá cɛkəna sɩ ɩ ná pʋlʋɣʋ pə taa təna . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ yɔɣɔtəna - wɛ na niŋ , na ɩ nɔɣɔ sula mpʋ .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Sakalɩ təmlɛ kʋyɛɛŋ tɛma Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpe .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: Pə lapa wɛɛ naalɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ alʋ Ɩlisapɛtɩ la teu . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ŋmɛla ɩsɔtʋnaa kakpasɩ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ :

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: Tacaa ləsʋɣʋ ma fɛɛlɛ tənɛɣɛ pənɛntɛɣɛ yəlaa taa tɔ , kʋpantʋ kɛ ɩ lapa - m sɔsɔm .

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Pə kɔma na Ɩlisapɛtɩ ɩsɔtʋnaa la naatoso , ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ tili ɩsɔtaa tillu Kapiyɛɛ kɛ Kalilee ɩcatɛ nte pa yaa sɩ Nasalɛtɩ tɔ tə taa kɛ ́ pɛɛlɔ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kiŋ .

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: Pɛɛlɔ ɩnəɣɩ Tafiiti lʋlʋɣʋ taa tʋ Yosɛɛfʋ ka mʋsaa , na pá yaa - ɩ sɩ Malɩ .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: Ɩsɔtaa tillu pola ɩ kiŋ na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ma sɛɛ - ŋ . Tacaa wɛ nyá waalɩ kɛ ́ , ɩ hʋla - ŋ pɛɛlɛɛ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Malɩ laŋlɛ cɛpəna ɩsɔtaa tillu tɔm ntəɣɩ sɔsɔm , na ɩ ́ maɣasɩ sɛɛtʋ ntɩ tə hʋwɛɛ kɛ ɩ taa ɩ ta cɛkəna .

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩsɔtaa tillu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Malɩ taa nyá , kʋpantʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ caana - ŋ .

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: Nyənɩ , n ká la teu , n ká lʋlɩ apalʋpu na ń yaa - ɩ sɩ Yesu .

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: Ɩ ká la sɔsɔ na paa yaa - ɩ sɩ ɩsɔtaa Ɩsɔ Sɔsɔ Pəyalʋ . Tacaa Ɩsɔ ká cɛlɛ - ɩ ɩ lɔŋcɛ Tafiiti kawulaɣa .

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: Ɩ ká la Yakɔpʋ piitim nyə ́ ma wulaʋ sɔsɔ kɛ tam tɔɔ , ɩ kawulaɣa kaa sɩɩ tənaɣa .

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Malɩ pɔɔsa ɩsɔtaa tillu sɩ : Ɩsənaɣalɛ pɩɩ la mpʋ na má ta nyənta apalʋ ?

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩsɔtaa tillu cɔ Malɩ sɩ : Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ ká tiina nyá tɔɔ , na ɩsɔtaa Ɩsɔ Sɔsɔ ká lana ɩ toma kɛ nyá kiŋ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pəyaɣa ŋka n ká lʋlɩ tɔ paa yaa - kɛ sɩ yʋlʋ naŋŋtʋ na Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: Nyənɩ , nyá lʋlʋɣʋ tʋ Ɩlisapɛtɩ wei pa yaakaɣa kaalʋlaɣa tɔ , ɩ haɣa apalʋpəyaɣa hɔɣɔ na ɩ kpatəlaɣa , halɩ ɩ ɩsɔtʋnaa naatoso kɔlɔ .

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ tá kpisi pʋlʋpʋ se .

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Malɩ tɔma sɩ : Ma tɩɩ kɛ ́ Tacaa təmlɛ tʋ kɛ ́ . Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ mʋ nyá nɔɣɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩsɔtaa tillu yele - ɩ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: Wɛɛ anɩ a taa kɛ ́ Malɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ lɔɣɔ ɩ təɣɩ Yuta ɩcatɛ natəlɩ tə taa kɛ ́ pɔ ́ ɔ ́ ŋ taa .

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Ɩ talaa ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sʋʋ Sakalɩ təyaɣa na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩlisapɛtɩ .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: Waatʋ wei Ɩlisapɛtɩ nɩɩ Malɩ sɛɛtʋ kɛ kpakpaa tɔ , ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ taa pəyaɣa yɔkaa na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toŋ tii ɩ tɔɔ .

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: Na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəna nɔɣɔ sɔsaɣa sɩ : Ɩsɔ koola - ŋ kʋpantʋ kɛ alaa taa , na ɩ koola pəyaɣa ŋka n ka lʋlɩ tɔɣɔ kʋpantʋ tɔtɔ .

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: Halɩ ma taka ma tɔɔ kɛlɛ wei ɩ ka lʋlɩ ma Caa tɔ ɩ kɔma cɔɔʋ na ?

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: Ma nɩɩ nyá sɛɛtʋ na ma taa pəyaɣa yɔkəna laŋhʋlʋmlɛ kɛ kpakpaa .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: Ama n nɩɩ leleŋ yoo . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , n tɛma nyá taa na tɔm nti Tacaa heela - ŋ sɩ ɩ ká la - ŋ tɔ .

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Malɩ tɔma sɩ : Ma sama Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ hatoo ma lotu taa kɛ ́ ɩ kəlʋɣʋ tɔɔ .

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: Ma laŋlɛ hʋlʋməna ma waasʋlʋ Ɩsɔ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden : for , behold , from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ nawa ɩ təmlɛ tʋ kʋnyɔntʋ má . Saŋa waalɩ yəlaa təna ká yaa - m sɩ leleŋ nɩɩlʋ .

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Toma təna tʋ lapa - m kʋpantʋ sɔsɔɔntʋ kɛ sɔsɔm . Ama ɩ hətɛ kɛ ́ sɔsɔɔlɛ kɛ ́ .

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: Ɩ wiiki mpa pa nyaŋna - ɩ na pá see - ɩ tɔ pa pətɔɔtəlɛ kɛ paa pepe wule .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: Ɩ hʋla ɩ toma kɛ sɔsɔm . Ɩ yasa mpa pa lotu taa wɛ ɩsəcaʋ hʋwɛɛ tɔ .

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: Ɩ kʋsa awulaa sɔsaa kɛ pa kumlee tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔnɩ - wɛ . Ɩ kʋsa kʋnyɔntʋnaa nyɔɔŋ .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Ɩ haɣasa nyɔɣɔtʋnaa kɛ tɔɣɔnaɣa kʋpaŋka . Ɩ tɔɣɔna toŋtʋnaa kɛ niŋ naanʋwa .

text: He hath holpen his servant Israel , in remembrance of his mercy ;
text2: Ɩ sɛɛna ɩ ɩfalaa Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma tɔɔ . Ɩ lapa nti ɩ ka sɩɩ ta lɔŋcɛnaa sɩ ɩ ká la tɔ .

text: As he spake to our fathers , to Abraham , and to his seed for ever .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ ɩ ka heeluɣu ta caanaa Apəlaham na ɩ piitim nyə ́ ma kɛ tam tɔɔ tɔ .

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: Malɩ caɣa Ɩlisapɛtɩ kiŋ ɩsɩɩ ɩsɔtʋnaa tooso , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpe .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Pə kɔma na pə tala Ɩlisapɛtɩ lʋlʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lʋlɩ apalʋpəyaɣa .

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ cɔlɔ nyə ́ ma na ɩ lʋlʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma nɩɩwa sɩ Tacaa lapa - ɩ kʋpantʋ kɛ sɔsɔm . Ɩlɛna pa na - ɩ pá kpɛntɩ na pa laŋa hɛɛ sɔsɔm .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Pəyaɣa kʋyɛɛŋ lapa pəlefɛi naanʋwa ɩlɛna pá kɔɔ - kɛɣɛ pɛlʋɣʋ , na pá tɔŋ sɩ pa haa - kɛɣɛ ka caa hətɛ sɩ Sakalɩ .

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: Tənaɣa ka too yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Aaɩ , Yohaanɩ kɛ paa yaa - kɛ .

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɛlɛ pa tɔma sɩ : Nyá lʋlʋɣʋ taa aweɣe paa yaawa hətɛ ńtɛ ́ ?

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Tənaɣa pa yɔɣɔtəna ka caa na niŋ sɩ pa naa nte ɩ luɣu wɛɛ sɩ pá yaa - kɛ tɔ .

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ hʋlaa sɩ pá kɔna - ɩ kpaata . Pa kɔnaa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ŋmaa sɩ ka hətɛ ntɛ ́ Yohaanɩ . Ɩlɛna pə ́ la pa tənaɣa piti .

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Tənaɣa Sakalɩ nsəmlɛ hɛta kpakpaa na ɩ ́ sʋʋ yɔɣɔtaɣa , na ɩ ́ saŋ Ɩsɔ na nɔɣɔ sɔsɔɣa .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɔɣɔntʋ kpa pa cɔlɔ nyə ́ ma təna , na Yuta pɔ ́ ɔ ́ ŋ taa nyə ́ ma təna lakaɣa tə faaci .

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: Pa təna mpa pa nɩɩwa tɔm tənɛ tɔ pa maɣasa - təɣɩ pa taa na pá tɔŋ sɩ : Pepeɣe pəyaɣa kanɛ kaa tɛ na ká la ? Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Tacaa ka wɛ ka waalɩ kɛ ́ teu kɛ ́ .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toŋ kʋləna Sakalɩ kɛ sɔsɔm , na ɩ ́ ná tɔmnaa na ɩ ́ sʋʋ tə yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ :

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: Tə sa Tacaa Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ Ɩsɔ . Ɩ paasəna ɩ yəlaa kɛ nɔɔnɔɔ . Ɩ hɛta - tʋɣʋ tá yomle .

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Ɩ ləsa - tʋɣʋ waasʋlʋ wei ɩ wɛna toma tɔɣɔ ɩ təmlɛ tʋ Tafiiti lʋlʋɣʋ taa .

text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets , which have been since the world began :
text2: Mpʋ ɩnəɣɩ ɩ ka lapa na ɩ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa kʋpama kpaalɩ .

text: That we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all that hate us ;
text2: Halɩ ɩ sɩɩ ɩ nɔɣɔ sɩ ɩ ká ya - tʋɣʋ ta kolontunaa na mpa pa luɣu fɛɩ - tʋ tɔ pa niŋ taa .

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: Na ɩ ́ wii ta caanaa caanaa pətɔɔtəlɛ , na ɩ ́ tɔɔsɩ nɔɔsɩ pɛɛlʋɣʋ kʋpam mpi ɩ ́ na - wɛ paa pɛɛlaa na tampana tɔ .

text: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham ,
text2: Ɩ ka tɩɩ yɔɣɔtəna tuunaʋ kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tá caanaa caanaa caa sɔsɔ Apəlaham kiŋ kɛ ́ ,

text: That he would grant unto us , that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear ,
text2: sɩ ɩ ká ya - tʋɣʋ ta kolontunaa niŋ taa , na tə ́ paasəna ɩ luɣu nyəntʋ na sɔɣɔntʋ fɛɩ .

text: In holiness and righteousness before him , all the days of our life .
text2: Na tə ́ wɛɛ tənaŋŋ kɛ ́ ɩ ɩsɛntaa . Ɩsaɣatʋ kaa wɛɛ haləna ta səm .

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: Pəyaɣa nyá , paa yaa nyá sɩ ɩsɔtaa Ɩsɔ Sɔsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , n ká tɛɛ ta Sɔsɔ kɛ nɔɣɔ na n taɣanɩ ɩ mpaaŋ .

text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins ,
text2: N ká heeli ɩ yəlaa kɛ ɩsəna paa la na pa ɩsaɣatʋ taɣanɩ na pə ́ ya pa nyɔɔŋ tɔ .

text: Through the tender mercy of our God ; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us ,
text2: Ta Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ yʋlʋ pətɔɔtəlɛ tʋ , na ɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ suulu . Ilim lɩɩkɩ tanaŋ na pə tewa sɔsɔm kɛ ɩsəna tɔ , ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ka kɔna tá nyʋɣʋ yapʋ .

text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace .
