text2: Pɩɩ lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa na pə ́ waasɩ mpa pa wɛ səkpɛtʋɣʋ tɛɛ na pá nɩɩkɩ səm sɔŋ tɔ . Pɩɩ la na tə nyɩ alaafəya mpaaʋ .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: Pəyaɣa tɔŋna pɩɩʋ na ká nyəŋ laɣatʋ na ká caɣa nyɩɩtʋ taa . Haləna kʋyaŋku ka lɩɩ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma taa kɛ ́ patəma tɔ .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa kɛ ́ Wulaʋ sɔsɔ Akusi kpaalaa sɩ paa kala ɩ tɛtʋ təna taa yəlaa .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Kʋkalʋɣʋ kancaalaɣa nyəŋkʋ kʋnɛ kʋ lapa Silii kʋfənɛɛ Kiliniyusi pɔɔlɛ taa .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ paa wei ɩ pola ɩ ɩcatɛ taa sɩ pá kala - ɩ .

text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee , out of the city of Nazareth , into Judaea , unto the city of David , which is called Bethlehem ; ( because he was of the house and lineage of David : )
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Yosɛɛfʋ lɩɩna Nasalɛtɩ ɩcatɛ kɛ Kalilee na ɩ ́ polo Yuta kɛ wulaʋ Tafiiti ɩcatɛ Pɛtəlɛhɛm taa ,

text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife , being great with child .
text2: sɩ pá kala ɩ ́ na ɩ amʋsaɣa ahonto Malɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ kɛ ́ Tafiiti lʋlʋɣʋ taa tʋ .

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ waatʋ wei pa wɛ təna tɔ , Malɩ lʋlʋɣʋ talaa .

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lʋlɩ ɩ kancaalaɣa pəyaɣa kɛ apalʋpəyaɣa . Na ɩ ́ hɩɩsɩ - kɛɣɛ wontu kʋtɔɣɔʋ tətʋlɛ taa na ɩ ́ takɩ - kɛɣɛ saalasɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , təcaɣalɛ taa tala - wɛɣɛ mʋʋlaa təsʋʋlɛ .

text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field , keeping watch over their flock by night .
text2: Tiikilaa napəlɩ paa wɛ ɩcatɛ ńtɛ ́ tə tawa taa na pá feŋiɣi pa kaləkəŋ kɛ ahoo ahoo .

text: And , lo , the angel of the Lord came upon them , and the glory of the Lord shone round about them : and they were sore afraid .
text2: Tənaɣa Tacaa ɩsɔtaa tillu kɔma pa kiŋ na Tacaa teeli na pa tɔɔ ɩsɩɩ kɔkɔ sɔsɔɔŋka nyaləməlɛ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɔɣɔntʋ kpa - wɛɣɛ sɔsɔm .

text: And the angel said unto them , Fear not : for , behold , I bring you good tidings of great joy , which shall be to all people .
text2: Ama ɩsɔtaa tillu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Sɔɣɔntʋ ɩ ́ taa kpa - mɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma kɔmaɣa sɩ ma heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ tɔm kʋpantʋ nti yəlaa təna laŋa ká hɛɛna teu tɔ .

text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour , which is Christ the Lord .
text2: Tɔm ntəɣəlɛ sɩ , pa lʋla - mɛɣɛ waasʋlʋ kɛ saŋa ahoo anɛɣɛ Tafiiti ɩcatɛ taa wei ɩ kɛ ́ Tacaa Kilisiti tɔ .

text: And this shall be a sign unto you ; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes , lying in a manger .
text2: Ɩɩ naa ɩsəna ɩ ́ ká nyəna - ɩ tɔ . Ɩ ́ ká maɣana pa hɩɩsa ahʋlʋm nɔɣɔlʋ kɛ wontu kʋtɔɣɔʋ tətʋlɛ taa na pá taka - ɩ saalasɩ .

text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God , and saying ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩsɔtaa tillaa samaa tuutuuma sɔɔsa ɩsɔtaa tillu ɩnɩ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ kpakpaa na pá saŋ Ɩsɔ na yontu sɩ :

text: Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace , good will toward men .
text2: Ɩsɔ kɛlɛ teeli tʋ təkpapa kɛ hatoo ɩsɔtaa te . Atɛ yəlaa mpa ɩ sɔɔlaa tɔ pa laŋa ɩ ́ hʋlʋmɩ .

text: And it came to pass , as the angels were gone away from them into heaven , the shepherds said one to another , Let us now go even unto Bethlehem , and see this thing which is come to pass , which the Lord hath made known unto us .
text2: Waatʋ wei ɩsɔtaa tillaa yela tiikilaa na pá məlɩ ɩsɔtaa tɔ tiikilaa mpɛ pa tɔma pa təma sɩ : Tə ́ kʋlɩ na tə ́ polo Pɛtəlɛhɛm təna , na tə ́ ná mpi pə lapa na Tacaa heeliɣi - tʋɣʋ pə tɔm tɔ .

text: And they came with haste , and found Mary , and Joseph , and the babe lying in a manger .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tiikilaa lɔɣɔ pa tɩ na pá maɣana Malɩ na Yosɛɛfʋ na pá hɩɩsa ahʋlʋm ɩnəɣɩ wontu kʋtɔɣɔʋ tətʋlɛ taa .

text: And when they had seen it , they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child .
text2: Tiikilaa tɛma - kɛɣɛ naʋ , ɩlɛna pá kɛɛsɩ nti ɩsɔtaa tillu ka tɛma - wɛɣɛ heeluɣu kɛ ahʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ tɔm tɔ .

text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ piti kpa pa təna mpa pa nɩɩ tiikilaa tɔm ntɩ tɔ .

text: But Mary kept all these things , and pondered them in her heart .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Malɩ tɔka tɔm ntɩ tə tənaɣa ɩ taa na ɩ ́ maɣasəɣɩ tə hʋwɛɛ .

text: And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them .
text2: Tiikilaa mpɛ pa məlaɣa kpente ɩlɛna , pá pʋɣʋləɣɩ Ɩsɔ sɔsɔɔntʋ na pá saŋɩ - ɩ pə təna mpi pa nɩɩwa na mpi pa nawa tɔ pə tɔɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pə təna pə lapa teitei kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ɩsɔtaa tillu ka kɛɛsʋɣʋ - wɛ tɔ .

text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child , his name was called JESUS , which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
text2: Pəyaɣa ŋkɛ ka kʋyɛɛŋ kɔma na pə ́ tala pəlefɛi naanʋwa sɩ pa pɛləɣɩ - kɛ tɔ , pa ha - kɛɣɛ hətɛ nte ɩsɔtaa tillu ka heela - wɛ na pə ́ cɔ ́ ka too kpaɣa ka hɔɣɔ tɔ sɩ Yesu .

text: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished , they brought him to Jerusalem , to present him to the Lord ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ waatʋ wei pə tapa sɩ Yosɛɛfʋ na Malɩ pá kɔtɩ pa tɩ taɣanʋɣʋ tɔɔ ɩsɩɩ paa kɛɛsʋɣʋ Moisi kʋsəsɩɩɩtʋ taa tɔ , pa pona pəyaɣa kɛ Yosalɛm sɩ pa hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - kɛɣɛ Tacaa .

text: ( As it is written in the law of the Lord , Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord ; )
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , paa ŋmaa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Tacaa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa kɛ ́ sɩ : Paa apalʋpəyaɣa kancaalaɣa nyəŋka ŋka Tacaa tənna - kɛ .

text: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord , A pair of turtledoves , or two young pigeons .
text2: Na pa polaa sɩ pa lakɩ kɔtaɣa na ɩhokasɩ naalɛ yaa alukukunaa naalɛ ɩsɩɩ paa kɛɛsʋɣʋ Tacaa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa tɔ .

text: And , behold , there was a man in Jerusalem , whose name was Simeon ; and the same man was just and devout , waiting for the consolation of Israel : and the Holy Ghost was upon him .
text2: Apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛ Yosalɛm na pá yaa - ɩ sɩ Simiyɔŋ . Apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ təŋaɣa tampana , na ɩ ɩsəlɛ sɛɛna Ɩsɔ təmlɛ , na ɩ taŋaa sɩ ɩ ́ na wei ɩ ká kɔɔ na ɩ ́ waasɩ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma tɔ . Na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ wɛ ɩ waalɩ .

text: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost , that he should not see death , before he had seen the Lord ' s Christ .
text2: Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ka hʋləna - ɩ sɩ ɩ ká ná Tacaa tillu Mesii na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ sɩ .

text: And he came by the Spirit into the temple : and when the parents brought in the child Jesus , to do for him after the custom of the law ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ lapa na ɩ ́ polo Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa kɛ ́ waatʋ wei ahʋlʋm caa na ɩ too pa pona - ɩ sɩ pa lakɩ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ mpi paa sɩɩwa tɔ .

text: Then took he him up in his arms , and blessed God , and said ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ mʋ - ɩ ɩ niŋ taa na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ sɩ :

text: Lord , now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace , according to thy word :
text2: Pənɛntɛ Tacaa , nti n ka yɔɣɔtaa tɔ n lapa - tɩ . Ɩlɛ yele nyá təmlɛ tʋ má na má tɛɛna laŋhʋlʋmlɛ .

text: For mine eyes have seen thy salvation ,
text2: Ma nana ma ɩsəpəle kɛ waasʋlʋ

text: Which thou hast prepared before the face of all people ;
text2: wei n taɣana yəlaa təna ɩsɛntaa tɔ .

text: A light to lighten the Gentiles , and the glory of thy people Israel .
text2: Fətəla wei piitimnaa ká nana tɔ . Ɩnəɣəlɛ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma teeli .

text: And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ piti kpa ka caa na ka too na nti ɩnɩ ɩ yɔɣɔta ka tɔɔ kɛ ́ mpʋ tɔ .

text: And Simeon blessed them , and said unto Mary his mother , Behold , this child is set for the fall and rising again of many in Israel ; and for a sign which shall be spoken against ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Simiyɔŋ koola - wɛɣɛ kʋpantʋ na ɩ ́ tɔ ka too Malɩ sɩ : Pəyaɣa kanɛ ka nyəntɛ ntɛ ́ sɩ ká hu paɣalɛ na ká kʋsɩ paɣalɛ kɛ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ taa . Yəlaa paɣalɛ ká kpɛɛsəna mpi ɩ ká hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - wɛ tɔ .

text: ( Yea , a sword shall pierce through thy own soul also , ) that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed .
text2: Pɩɩ kuli pa paɣalɛ taa tɔmnaa tɔɔ təkeelee . Laŋwakəllɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ ká tʋlɩ toto nyaɣa pʋ ́ ʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩsɩɩ laɣatɛ kɛ pa sɔpa - ŋ .

text: And there was one Anna , a prophetess , the daughter of Phanuel , of the tribe of Aser : she was of a great age , and had lived with an husband seven years from her virginity ;
text2: Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ alʋnyəŋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛ təna tɔtɔ . Asɛɛ lʋlʋɣʋ taa tʋ Fanʋwɛlɩ pɛɛlɔ Ana . Ɩ kpatəla teu təkuŋkuŋku . Ɩ saaʋ ɩ paalʋ tɔ , pɩɩsɩ naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa kɛ pa caɣaa ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ sɩ .

text: And she was a widow of about fourscore and four years , which departed not from the temple , but served God with fastings and prayers night and day .
text2: Na ɩnɩ ɩ caɣa mpʋ haləna pɩɩsɩ nɩɩnaasa na liɣiti . Ɩlɛ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa kɛ ́ ɩ ka wɛ tam na ɩ ́ lakɩ Ɩsɔ təmlɛ kɛ ilim na ahoo . Paa Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ ɩ sələməɣɩ , paa nɔhɔkʋtʋ ɩ hɔkəɣɩ .

text: And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord , and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in Jerusalem .
text2: Simiyɔŋ pa tɔŋna ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ lapʋ tɔɣɔ ɩnɩ ɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ sʋʋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sam , na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəɣəna pa təna mpa pa taŋaa sɩ Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ waasɩ Yosalɛm tɔɣɔ Yesu tɔm .

text: And when they had performed all things according to the law of the Lord , they returned into Galilee , to their own city Nazareth .
text2: Waatʋ wei pa tɛma pə təna mpi pa kɛɛsa Tacaa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa tɔɣɔ lapʋ tɔ , Yosɛɛfʋ na Malɩ pa məla pa tɛ Nasalɛtɩ kɛ Kalilee .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , filled with wisdom : and the grace of God was upon him .
text2: Mpʋ tɔ na pəyaɣa tɔŋna pɩɩʋ na ka tɔnʋɣʋ tɔkəɣɩ na ká tɔŋna laɣatʋ nyəm kɛ teu na Ɩsɔ wɛ ka waalɩ .

text: Now his parents went to Jerusalem every year at the feast of the passover .
text2: Paa pənaɣa ŋka Yesu nyə ́ ma pukaɣa Yosalɛm kɛ Tɛɛʋ acima tɔɣɔʋ kɛ ́ .

text: And when he was twelve years old , they went up to Jerusalem after the custom of the feast .
text2: Yesu lʋlʋɣʋ pənaɣa naanʋwa na naalɛ nyəŋka taa pa pola acima tɔtɔ ɩsɩɩ pa tɩɩ pukuɣu tɔ .

text: And when they had fulfilled the days , as they returned , the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem ; and Joseph and his mother knew not of it .
text2: Acima wɛɛ kɔma na a tɛ ɩlɛna ɩ nyə ́ ma tʋ mpaaʋ na pá kpeŋ . Ama Yesu ná saala Yosalɛm , na ɩ nyə ́ ma ta nyɩ mpʋ .

text: But they , supposing him to have been in the company , went a day ' s journey ; and they sought him among their kinsfolk and acquaintance .
text2: Pɛlɛ paa hʋʋwa sɩ ntanyɩ ɩ wɛ tɔntaa lɛlaa taa , haləna pá tɔ ilim na pə tɛm ɩlɛna pá sʋʋ - ɩ pɛɛkʋɣʋ kɛ pa lʋlʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma na pa asəmaa kiŋ .

text: And when they found him not , they turned back again to Jerusalem , seeking him .
text2: Pa ta na - ɩ , ɩlɛna pá taɣanɩ Yosalɛm kɛ məlʋɣʋ sɩ pa pɛɛkəɣɩ - ɩ .

text: And it came to pass , that after three days they found him in the temple , sitting in the midst of the doctors , both hearing them , and asking them questions .
text2: Pə lapa kʋyɛɛŋ tooso ɩlɛna pá na - ɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa na ɩ ́ caɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma sɛɣɛsəlaa sɔsaa kiŋ na ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ pa sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ pɔɔsəɣɩ - wɛɣɛ tɔmnaa .

text: And all that heard him were astonished at his understanding and answers .
text2: Na ɩ nyəm na nti ɩ cɔɔkaɣa - wɛ tɔ tə lapa pa təna mpa pa nɩɩkaɣa tɔɣɔ piti kɛ ́ sɔsɔm .

text: And when they saw him , they were amazed : and his mother said unto him , Son , why hast thou thus dealt with us ? behold , thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing .
text2: Waatʋ wei ɩ nyə ́ ma na - ɩ tɔ sɔɣɔntʋ kpa - wɛ . Ɩlɛna ɩ too tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ma pəyaɣa , n lapa - tʋɣʋ mpʋ suwe ? Nyənɩ , má na nyá caa tə pɛɛka - ŋ na laŋwakəllɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ kɛ ́ .

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye sought me ? wist ye not that I must be about my Father ' s business ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔwa sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ mə pɛɛkaɣa - m ? Ɩ ́ ta nyɩ taa sɩ pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ má wɛɛ ma Caa təyaɣa taa ?

text: And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them .
text2: Ama pɛlɛ pa ta cɛkəna nti ɩ yɔɣɔta mpʋ tɔ .

text: And he went down with them , and came to Nazareth , and was subject unto them : but his mother kept all these sayings in her heart .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ təŋa - wɛ na pá məlɩ Nasalɛtɩ , na ɩ ́ nɩɩkəna - wɛɣɛ pə təna pə taa . Ama ɩ too tɔka tɔm tənɛ ɩnɩ tə tənaɣa ɩ taa .

text: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature , and in favour with God and man .
text2: Yesu tɔŋna pɩɩʋ na ɩ laɣatʋ nyəm tɔŋna sɔɔsʋɣʋ , na Ɩsɔ na yəlaa pa laŋa tɔŋna - ɩ hɛɛnaʋ kɛ tam .

text: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar , Pontius Pilate being governor of Judaea , and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee , and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituraea and of the region of Trachonitis , and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene ,
text2: Waatʋ wei wulaʋ sɔsɔ Tipɛɛ kawulaɣa pɩɩsɩ lapa naanʋwa na kakpasɩ tɔ , Pɔŋsɩ Pilatɩ ná kɛ ́ Yuta kʋfənɛɛ , na Helɔtɩ náá kɛ ́ Kalilee wulaʋ , na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ neu Filipʋ náá tɔkɩ kawulaɣa kɛ Ɩtulee na Təlakoniti pə tɛtʋ taa , na Lisaniya náá kɛ ́ Apileni wulaʋ .

text: Annas and Caiaphas being the high priests , the word of God came unto John the son of Zacharias in the wilderness .
text2: Ɩlɛna Ana na Kayifi pɛlɛ pa kɛ ́ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa tɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ tɔm kɔma Sakalɩ pəyalʋ Yohaanɩ taa kɛ ́ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa .

text: And he came into all the country about Jordan , preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins ;
text2: Na ɩ ́ cɔɔ Yaatanɩ tɛtɛkəlɛ təna na ɩ ́ heeliɣi yəlaa sɩ pá laɣasɩ tɔntɛ , na pá sɔ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm na Ɩsɔ hɩɩsɩ pa ɩsaɣatʋ .

text: As it is written in the book of the words of Esaias the prophet , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Ɩlɛna pə ́ lá ɩsɩɩ paa ŋmaaʋ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Ɩsayii takəlaɣa taa tɔ sɩ : Nɔɣɔlʋ yɔɣɔtəɣəna nɔɣɔ sɔsɔɣa kɛ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa sɩ , ɩ ́ taɣanɩ Tacaa mpaaʋ , ɩ ́ hɛɛ - ɩ mpaɩsi na sɩ siɣisi .

text: Every valley shall be filled , and every mountain and hill shall be brought low ; and the crooked shall be made straight , and the rough ways shall be made smooth ;
text2: Paa suuli kʋtaalomiŋ təna . Paa yɔsɩ pɔ ́ ɔ ́ ŋ na pulasɩ təna . Paa siɣisi təkɛɛlɛnaa . Paa kuli pɛɛ təna .

text: And all flesh shall see the salvation of God .
text2: Na yʋlʋpiya təna ká ná ɩsəna Ɩsɔ waasəɣɩ - tʋ tɔ .

text: Then said he to the multitude that came forth to be baptized of him , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Yohaanɩ yɔɣɔtaɣa samaa wei ɩ kɔŋaɣa ɩ kiŋ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm tɔ sɩ : Akala piya mɛ , awe kpaala - mɛ na ɩ ́ seeki Ɩsɔ pááná nna a kɔŋ tɔ ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance , and begin not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , That God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Ɩ ́ la mpa pa yela ɩsaɣatʋ tɔ pa kʋlapəlɛ . Ɩlɛ ɩ ́ taa tɛləsəɣɩ lɔlɔ sɩ mə caa kɛlɛ Apəlaham . Ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ye təlɛ tə tɔɔ ɩlɛ , Ɩsɔ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ la na pɛɛ anɛ á pəsɩ Apəlaham piya .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : every tree therefore which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Pa tɛma laalɛ tʋɣʋ kɛ tɩɩŋ sɩ pa huɣu - ɩ na ɩ tɛɛ kɛ ́ te . Tʋɣʋ ŋku kɩɩ lʋləɣɩ pee kʋpana tɔ , paa hu - kʋ na pá tʋ kɔkɔ .

text: And the people asked him , saying , What shall we do then ?
text2: Tənaɣa samaa pɔɔsa Yohaanɩ sɩ : Ye mpʋ nti na ntiɣi tɩɩ la ?

text: He answereth and saith unto them , He that hath two coats , let him impart to him that hath none ; and he that hath meat , let him do likewise .
text2: Yohaanɩ cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ye wei ɩ wɛna tokonaa kɛ naalɛ ɩ ́ pasa wei ɩ fɛɩna tɔ . Na ye wei ɩ wɛna kʋtɔɣɔʋ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ la mpʋ tɔtɔ .

text: Then came also publicans to be baptized , and said unto him , Master , what shall we do ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə kpɛŋna lampuu mʋlaa na pá kɔɔ ɩ kiŋ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm , na pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , nti na ntiɣi tɩɩ la ?

text: And he said unto them , Exact no more than that which is appointed you .
text2: Yohaanɩ cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ taa mʋ na pə ́ tɛɛ ɩsəna paa sɩɩwa tɔ .

text: And the soldiers likewise demanded of him , saying , And what shall we do ? And he said unto them , Do violence to no man , neither accuse any falsely ; and be content with your wages .
text2: Yoolaa ná pɔɔsa - ɩ tɔtɔ sɩ : Na tá se , nti na ntiɣi táá la ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yohaanɩ cɔ pɛlɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ taa muɣuli nɔɣɔlʋ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ taa tʋ nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ tɔm . Mə laŋa ɩ ́ hɛɛna mə kʋfɛlʋɣʋ .

text: And as the people were in expectation , and all men mused in their hearts of John , whether he were the Christ , or not ;
text2: Yəlaa tɛɛlaɣaa teu sɩ pʋlʋ ká la , haləna pá kɔɔ pá sʋʋ maɣasʋɣʋ kɛ pa taa sɩ , yaa Yohaanɩ kɛlɛ Mesii ɩnɩ .

text: John answered , saying unto them all , I indeed baptize you with water ; but one mightier than I cometh , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to unloose : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost and with fire :
text2: Ɩlɛna Yohaanɩ heeli pa təna sɩ : Ma ɩlɛ , lʋm kɛ ma sɔɔ - mɛ . Ama nɔɣɔlʋ wɛɛ ɩ kɔŋ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kəla - m . Halɩ ma ta tala má wɔɣɔsɩ ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ taa ntaŋkpala maɣamaɣa . Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ na kɔkɔ kɛ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ká sɔ - mɛ .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and will gather the wheat into his garner ; but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable .
text2: Ɩ tɔka ɩ kʋfalʋɣʋ kɛ ɩ niŋ taa . Ɩ ká fala pə təna təcaɣacaɣa na ɩ ́ suu pee kɛ kp + oú taa . Ama ɩ ká tʋ lɔɔtʋ kɛ kɔkɔ ŋka kaa teŋ tɔ ka taa .

text: And many other things in his exhortation preached he unto the people .
text2: Sɛɣɛsəŋ waanɩ waanɩ kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kaakaɣana samaa na ɩ ́ heeliɣina - wɛɣɛ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ .

text: But Herod the tetrarch , being reproved by him for Herodias his brother Philip ' s wife , and for all the evils which Herod had done ,
text2: Yohaanɩ ka kaləna wulaʋ Helɔtɩ kɛ timpi ɩ kpaɣa ɩ taalʋ alʋ Helɔtiyatɩ tɔ , na ɩsaɣatʋ təna nti ɩ ka lapa tɔ tə tɔɔ .

text: Added yet this above all , that he shut up John in prison .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ lɛla ɩsaɣatʋ lɛntɩ tɔtɔ , ɩ kpa Yohaanɩ na ɩ ́ təkɩ - ɩ saləka .

text: Now when all the people were baptized , it came to pass , that Jesus also being baptized , and praying , the heaven was opened ,
text2: Yohaanɩ tɔŋna yəlaa tənaɣa Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔʋ , ɩlɛna Yesu náá polo tɔtɔ na pá sɔ - ɩ .

text: And the Holy Ghost descended in a bodily shape like a dove upon him , and a voice came from heaven , which said , Thou art my beloved Son ; in thee I am well pleased .
text2: Waatʋ wei Yesu tɔŋna sələmʋɣʋ tɔ , ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ tʋlaa na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ tii ɩ tɔɔ , na pá naakɩ - ɩ ɩsɩɩ alukuku . Na pá nɩɩ nɔɣɔlʋ nɔɣɔ kɛ ɩsɔtaa sɩ : Nyaɣalɛ ma luɣu tɛɛ Pəyaɣa , ma laŋlɛ hɛɛna - ŋ sɔsɔm .

text: And Jesus himself began to be about thirty years of age , being ( as was supposed ) the son of Joseph , which was the son of Heli ,
text2: Yesu caalʋɣʋ ɩ təmlɛ kɛ waatʋ wei kɛ ́ mpʋ tɔ , ɩ pɩɩsɩ wɛ ɩsɩɩ hiu na naanʋwa , na yəlaa nyənaɣa - ɩ ɩsɩɩ Yosɛɛfʋ pəyaɣa . Yosɛɛfʋ ná kɛ ́ Heli pəyaɣa ,

text: Which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi , which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Janna , which was the son of Joseph ,
text2: na Heli kɛ ́ Matatɩ pəyaɣa , na Matatɩ kɛ ́ Lefii pəyaɣa , na Lefii kɛ ́ Mɛlɛci pəyaɣa , na Mɛlɛci kɛ ́ Yannayi pəyaɣa , na Yannayi kɛ ́ Yosɛɛfʋ pəyaɣa ,

text: Which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Amos , which was the son of Naum , which was the son of Esli , which was the son of Nagge ,
text2: na Yosɛɛfʋ kɛ ́ Matatiyasɩ pəyaɣa , na Matatiyasɩ kɛ ́ Amɔɔsɩ pəyaɣa , na Amɔɔsɩ kɛ ́ Nahum pəyaɣa , na Nahum kɛ ́ Ɩsali pəyaɣa , na Ɩsali kɛ ́ Nakayi pəyaɣa ,

text: Which was the son of Maath , which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Semei , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: na Nakayi kɛ ́ Maatɩ pəyaɣa , na Maatɩ kɛ ́ Matatiyasɩ pəyaɣa , na Matatiyasɩ kɛ ́ Semeyiŋ pəyaɣa , na Semeyiŋ kɛ ́ Yosɛci pəyaɣa , na Yosɛci kɛ ́ Yota pəyaɣa ,

text: Which was the son of Joanna , which was the son of Rhesa , which was the son of Zorobabel , which was the son of Salathiel , which was the son of Neri ,
text2: na Yota kɛ ́ Yowanaŋ pəyaɣa , na Yowanaŋ kɛ ́ Lesa pəyaɣa , na Lesa kɛ ́ Solopapɛɛlɩ pəyaɣa , na Solopapɛɛlɩ kɛ ́ Salatiyɛɛ pəyaɣa , na Salatiyɛɛ kɛ ́ Neli pəyaɣa ,

text: Which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Addi , which was the son of Cosam , which was the son of Elmodam , which was the son of Er ,
text2: na Neli kɛ ́ Mɛlɛci pəyaɣa , na Mɛlɛci kɛ ́ Atii pəyaɣa , na Atii kɛ ́ Kosam pəyaɣa , na Kosam kɛ ́ Ɩlimatam pəyaɣa , na Ɩlimatam kɛ ́ Ɛɛlɩ pəyaɣa ,

text: Which was the son of Jose , which was the son of Eliezer , which was the son of Jorim , which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi ,
text2: na Ɛɛlɩ kɛ ́ Yosuwee pəyaɣa , na Yosuwee kɛ ́ Ɩliyesɛɛ pəyaɣa , na Ɩliyesɛɛ kɛ ́ Yolim pəyaɣa , na Yolim kɛ ́ Matatɩ pəyaɣa , na Matatɩ kɛ ́ Lefii pəyaɣa ,

text: Which was the son of Simeon , which was the son of Juda , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Jonan , which was the son of Eliakim ,
text2: na Lefii kɛ ́ Simiyɔŋ pəyaɣa , na Simiyɔŋ kɛ ́ Yuta pəyaɣa , na Yuta kɛ ́ Yosɛɛfʋ pəyaɣa , na Yosɛɛfʋ kɛ ́ Yonam pəyaɣa , na Yonam kɛ ́ Ɩliyakim pəyaɣa ,

text: Which was the son of Melea , which was the son of Menan , which was the son of Mattatha , which was the son of Nathan , which was the son of David ,
text2: na Ɩliyakim kɛ ́ Meleya pəyaɣa , na Meleya kɛ ́ Menna pəyaɣa , na Menna kɛ ́ Matata pəyaɣa , na Matata kɛ ́ Nataŋ pəyaɣa , na Nataŋ kɛ ́ Tafiiti pəyaɣa ,

text: Which was the son of Jesse , which was the son of Obed , which was the son of Booz , which was the son of Salmon , which was the son of Naasson ,
text2: na Tafiiti kɛ ́ Sesee pəyaɣa , na Sesee kɛ ́ Opɛtɩ pəyaɣa , na Opɛtɩ kɛ ́ Powaasɩ pəyaɣa , na Powaasɩ kɛ ́ Sala pəyaɣa , na Sala kɛ ́ Naasɔŋ pəyaɣa ,

text: Which was the son of Aminadab , which was the son of Aram , which was the son of Esrom , which was the son of Phares , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: na Naasɔŋ kɛ ́ Aminatapɩ pəyaɣa , na Aminatapɩ kɛ ́ Atamiŋ pəyaɣa , na Atamiŋ kɛ ́ Alini pəyaɣa , na Alini kɛ ́ Ɩsəlɔm pəyaɣa , na Ɩsəlɔm kɛ ́ Falɛsɩ pəyaɣa , na Falɛsɩ kɛ ́ Yuta pəyaɣa ,

text: Which was the son of Jacob , which was the son of Isaac , which was the son of Abraham , which was the son of Thara , which was the son of Nachor ,
text2: na Yuta kɛ ́ Yakɔpʋ pəyaɣa , na Yakɔpʋ kɛ ́ Ɩsaaka pəyaɣa , na Ɩsaaka kɛ ́ Apəlaham pəyaɣa , na Apəlaham kɛ ́ Tala pəyaɣa , na Tala kɛ ́ Nasoo pəyaɣa ,

text: Which was the son of Saruch , which was the son of Ragau , which was the son of Phalec , which was the son of Heber , which was the son of Sala ,
text2: na Nasoo kɛ ́ Seluci pəyaɣa , na Seluci kɛ ́ Lakao pəyaɣa , na Lakao kɛ ́ Falɛkɩ pəyaɣa , na Falɛkɩ kɛ ́ Ɩpɛɛ pəyaɣa , na Ɩpɛɛ kɛ ́ Sala pəyaɣa ,

text: Which was the son of Cainan , which was the son of Arphaxad , which was the son of Sem , which was the son of Noe , which was the son of Lamech ,
text2: na Sala kɛ ́ Kayinam pəyaɣa , na Kayinam kɛ ́ Alafasatɩ pəyaɣa , na Alafasatɩ kɛ ́ Sɛm pəyaɣa , na Sɛm kɛ ́ Nowee pəyaɣa , na Nowee kɛ ́ Lamɛkɩ pəyaɣa ,

text: Which was the son of Mathusala , which was the son of Enoch , which was the son of Jared , which was the son of Maleleel , which was the son of Cainan ,
text2: na Lamɛkɩ kɛ ́ Matusala pəyaɣa , na Matusala kɛ ́ Henɔkɩ pəyaɣa , na Henɔkɩ kɛ ́ Yalɛtɩ pəyaɣa , na Yalɛtɩ kɛ ́ Maleleyɛɛ pəyaɣa , na Maleleyɛɛ kɛ ́ Kayinaŋ pəyaɣa ,

text: Which was the son of Enos , which was the son of Seth , which was the son of Adam , which was the son of God .
text2: na Kayinaŋ kɛ ́ Ɩnɔɔsɩ pəyaɣa , na Ɩnɔɔsɩ kɛ ́ Sɛtɩ pəyaɣa , na Sɛtɩ kɛ ́ Atam pəyaɣa , na Atam kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ pəyaɣa .

text: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan , and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness ,
text2: Yesu lɩɩna Yaatanɩ na Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toŋ tɔɔ ɩ kiŋ kɛ sɔsɔm . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ tɛɛna - ɩ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa .

text: Being forty days tempted of the devil . And in those days he did eat nothing : and when they were ended , he afterward hungered .
text2: Ɩlɛna Ɩlɔɣɔʋ maɣasɩ - ɩ wɛɛ nɩɩlɛ . Ɩ ta tɔɣɔ pʋlʋɣʋ kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa . Pə yoosa wɛɛ nɩɩlɛ ɩlɛna nyɔɣɔsɩ kpa - ɩ .

text: And the devil said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , command this stone that it be made bread .
text2: Tənaɣa Ɩlɔɣɔʋ tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Ye n kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa , yɔɣɔtɩ na pəlɛ tənɛ tə pəsɩ tɔɣɔnaɣa .

text: And Jesus answered him , saying , It is written , That man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word of God .
text2: Ama Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ , pə taɣa tɔɣɔnaɣa tike kɛ yʋlʋ ka hikina weesuɣu .

text: And the devil , taking him up into an high mountain , shewed unto him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩlɔɣɔʋ pona - ɩ timpi pə kʋlaa tɔ , na ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ antulinya kawulasɩ tənaɣa tɔm kʋlʋm na ɩ ́ hʋlɩ - ɩ .

text: And the devil said unto him , All this power will I give thee , and the glory of them : for that is delivered unto me ; and to whomsoever I will I give it .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Maa ha - ŋ pə toŋ na pə teeli təna . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma niŋ taa kɛ ́ pa tʋ pə təna , na má nɔkaa ma ha wei ma sɔɔlaa tɔ .

text: If thou therefore wilt worship me , all shall be thine .
text2: Ɩlɛ ye n ka hənta - m atɛ , n ká kpaɣa pə təna .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Get thee behind me , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Ama Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ , ń ká sɛɛ nyá Caa Ɩsɔ , na ɩ tike ɩ təmlɛ kɛ n ká la .

text: And he brought him to Jerusalem , and set him on a pinnacle of the temple , and said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down from hence :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩlɔɣɔʋ pona - ɩ Yosalɛm na ɩ ́ kpaasɩ - ɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ comcom nɔɣɔ taa , na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ye n kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa ŋmaa atɛ .

text: For it is written , He shall give his angels charge over thee , to keep thee :
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ , ɩ ká heeli ɩ ɩsɔtaa tillaa kɛ nyá tɔm sɩ pá paasəna - ŋ teu .

text: And in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: Pə ́ cɔ ́ lɛntɩ wɛɛ tɔtɔ sɩ : Paa teeli - ŋ pa niŋ taa kɛ ́ teu təkpa sɩ pə ́ taa kɔɔ na pəlɛ natəlɩ tə ́ co - ŋ .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , It is said , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Ama Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ , n kaa maɣasɩ nyá Caa Ɩsɔ sɩ ń ná ɩ waalɩ .

text: And when the devil had ended all the temptation , he departed from him for a season .
text2: Waatʋ wei Ɩlɔɣɔʋ tɛma - ɩ maɣasʋɣʋ kɛ pə tənaɣa mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ taŋa wʋlɛ kʋfatɛ .

text: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee : and there went out a fame of him through all the region round about .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ ɩlɛ Yesu məla Kalilee na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toŋ haɣa - ɩ , na ɩ tɔm yɛkəɣɩ hɔɣɔlʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ təna kʋ taa .

text: And he taught in their synagogues , being glorified of all .
text2: Ɩ sɛɣɛsaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa taa na yəlaa təna pʋɣʋlaɣa - ɩ .

text: And he came to Nazareth , where he had been brought up : and , as his custom was , he went into the synagogue on the sabbath day , and stood up for to read .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pola Nasalɛtɩ timpi ɩ pɩɩwa tɔ , na ɩ ́ sʋʋ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile taa kɛ ́ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule , ɩsɩɩ ɩ tɩɩ lakɩ tam tɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kʋlaa sɩ ɩ kaləɣɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm .

text: And there was delivered unto him the book of the prophet Esaias . And when he had opened the book , he found the place where it was written ,
text2: Ɩlɛna pá cɛlɛ - ɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Ɩsayii takəlaɣa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ hɛta timpi pa ŋmaawa sɩ :

text: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me , because he hath anointed me to preach the gospel to the poor ; he hath sent me to heal the brokenhearted , to preach deliverance to the captives , and recovering of sight to the blind , to set at liberty them that are bruised ,
text2: Tacaa Feesuɣu wɛ ma kiŋ , na ɩ ləsa - m sɩ má heeli Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ kʋnyɔntʋnaa . Na ɩ tila - m sɩ má heeli saləkatʋnaa kɛ pa hɛtʋɣʋ tɔm . Na yʋlʋmaa kɛ pa ɩsɛ kuluɣu tɔm . Sɩ má waasɩ mpa pa muɣuliɣi tɔ .

text: To preach the acceptable year of the Lord .
text2: Sɩ má heeli - wɛɣɛ pənaɣa ŋka Tacaa ká waasɩ ɩ yəlaa tɔ ka kɔntɛ tɔm .

text: And he closed the book , and he gave it again to the minister , and sat down . And the eyes of all them that were in the synagogue were fastened on him .
text2: Yesu tɛma ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpili - kɛ na ɩ ́ cɛla paasənlʋ na ɩ ́ caɣa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile taa nyə ́ ma təna pama ɩsɛ kɛ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: And he began to say unto them , This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ sʋʋ - wɛɣɛ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ : Tɔm nti paa ŋmaawa na ɩ ́ tɩɩ nɩɩ - təɣɩ nɔɔnɔɔ tɔ , saŋa ntɛ ́ tə lapa .

text: And all bare him witness , and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth . And they said , Is not this Joseph ' s son ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa təna pa tisa teu na pá samɩ - ɩ . Na ɩ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ təna lapa - wɛɣɛ leleŋ , halɩ pə ́ la - wɛɣɛ piti na pá tɔ sɩ : Ɩsɩɩ Yosɛɛfʋ pəyalʋ ?

text: And he said unto them , Ye will surely say unto me this proverb , Physician , heal thyself : whatsoever we have heard done in Capernaum , do also here in thy country .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Tampana tɔɔ , ɩ ́ ká tɛ na ɩ ́ tuku - m ɩtuule sɩ : Fɛtʋ , fɛ nyá tɩ . Halɩ ɩ ́ ká yɔɣɔtɩ - m sɩ má la ma ɩcatɛ taa cənɛɣɛ mpi pə lapa Kapənahum na ɩ ́ nɩɩ tɔ .

text: And he said , Verily I say unto you , No prophet is accepted in his own country .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa - wɛ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , paa nyənəɣɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ pʋlʋɣʋ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ɩcatɛ taa .

text: But I tell you of a truth , many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias , when the heaven was shut up three years and six months , when great famine was throughout all the land ;
text2: Ntɔŋ ɩ nyəmá sɩ alaa leelaa ka wɛ paɣalɛ kɛ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ taa kɛ ́ waatʋ wei wʋlaɣa lapa pɩɩsɩ tooso na ɩsɔtʋnaa naatoso kɛ Ilii waatʋ taa tɔ . Halɩ nyɔɣɔsɩ sɔsɔɔŋsɩ lɩɩ tɛtʋ təna .

text: But unto none of them was Elias sent , save unto Sarepta , a city of Sidon , unto a woman that was a widow .
text2: Paa na mpʋ Ɩsɔ tá tili Ilii kɛ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ kiŋ . Ama alʋ leelu nɔɣɔlʋ wei ɩ ka wɛ Sitɔŋ tɛtʋ taa kɛ ́ Salɛpəta tɔ , ɩ kiŋ kɛ ɩ tila - ɩ .

text: And many lepers were in Israel in the time of Eliseus the prophet ; and none of them was cleansed , saving Naaman the Syrian .
text2: Na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Ilisee waatʋ taa tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ asilima kʋtɔŋ nyə ́ ma ka wɛ sɔsɔm tɔtɔɣɔ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ . Paa na mpʋ pa ta waasɩ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ ɩ kʋtɔŋ . Ama Silii tʋ Naamaŋ tike kɛ pa waasaa .

text: And all they in the synagogue , when they heard these things , were filled with wrath ,
text2: Waatʋ wei Yuta təkotile taa nyə ́ ma nɩɩ ɩ tɔm ntɩ tɔ , pə haŋa - wɛɣɛ sɔsɔm .

text: And rose up , and thrust him out of the city , and led him unto the brow of the hill whereon their city was built , that they might cast him down headlong .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kʋlaa na pá hɔmɩ - ɩ na pá lɩɩna ɩcatɛ waalɩ , na pa kpaana - ɩ hatoo pʋɣʋ ŋku kʋ tɔɔ pa ɩcatɛ wɛɛ tɔ kʋ nyʋɣʋ taa , timpi pə lapa tokuɣu tɔ , sɩ pa tusiɣi - ɩ .

text: But he passing through the midst of them went his way ,
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu faɣana pa hɛkʋ taa na ɩ ́ tɛɛ ɩ nyəŋkʋ .

text: And came down to Capernaum , a city of Galilee , and taught them on the sabbath days .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pola Kapənahum , Kalilee tɛtʋ taa ɩcatɛ natəlɩ , na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsɩ - wɛɣɛ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for his word was with power .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ cɛpa pa laŋa kɛ teu . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ sɛɣɛsa - wɛɣɛ na toŋ , ɩ ta nyá .

text: And in the synagogue there was a man , which had a spirit of an unclean devil , and cried out with a loud voice ,
text2: Pə pamna apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ka wɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile taa na ɩ ́ hii ɩlɔɣɔʋ ɩsaɣaʋ nɔɣɔlʋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ koo sɔsɔm sɩ :

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art ; the Holy One of God .
text2: Ee Nasalɛtɩ Yesu , n caa - weɣe tá kiŋ ? Ta wakəlʋɣʋ kɛ n kɔma ? Ma nyəma - ŋ teu , n kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ yʋlʋ naŋŋtʋ wei ɩ tilaa tɔ .

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him . And when the devil had thrown him in the midst , he came out of him , and hurt him not .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu kaləna - ɩ sɩ : Hei nyá , su na ń se apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ waalɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩlɔɣɔʋ pɛta - ɩ samaa hɛkʋ taa na ɩ ́ yele - ɩ na ɩ ́ se . Ama ɩ ta lapɩ - ɩ pʋlʋ .

text: And they were all amazed , and spake among themselves , saying , What a word is this ! for with authority and power he commandeth the unclean spirits , and they come out .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa yəlaa kɛ sɔɣɔntʋ na pá tɔŋ təma sɩ : Hm , tɔm tənɛ . Ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣəna alɔɣaa na apalʋtʋ na toma , na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔnəɣɩ - wɛ .

text: And the fame of him went out into every place of the country round about .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ hətɛ yaa tɛtʋ təna taa .

text: And he arose out of the synagogue , and entered into Simon ' s house . And Simon ' s wife ' s mother was taken with a great fever ; and they besought him for her .
text2: Yesu lɩɩna Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile taa ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo Simɔŋ təyaɣa . Watʋ sʋʋkaɣa Simɔŋ yɔsɔ kɛ sɔsɔm , ɩlɛna pá wiina Yesu sɩ ɩ ́ waasɩ - ɩ .

text: And he stood over her , and rebuked the fever ; and it left her : and immediately she arose and ministered unto them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu luŋa ɩ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ kaləna watʋ , na tə ya ɩ tɔɔ . Tənaɣa alʋ kʋla kpakpaa na ɩ ́ caləsɩ - wɛ .

text: Now when the sun was setting , all they that had any sick with divers diseases brought them unto him ; and he laid his hands on every one of them , and healed them .
text2: Ilim tʋ kpakpaa , ɩlɛna pa təna mpa paa wɛna kʋtɔntʋnaa kɛ waanɩ waanɩ tɔ pá kɔna - wɛ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ təna ɩ niŋ kɛ paa wei ɩ tɔɔ na pá hiki alaafəya .

text: And devils also came out of many , crying out , and saying , Thou art Christ the Son of God . And he rebuking them suffered them not to speak : for they knew that he was Christ .
text2: Alɔɣaa maɣamaɣa ná se yəlaa paɣalɛ waalɩ na pá kooki sɩ : N kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ kɛ ́ . Ama ɩ kaləna - wɛ , ɩ ta tisi sɩ pá yɔɣɔtɩ : Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa nyəmá sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ Mesii .

text: And when it was day , he departed and went into a desert place : and the people sought him , and came unto him , and stayed him , that he should not depart from them .
text2: Waatʋ wei tɛʋ fema tɔ , Yesu lɩɩwa na ɩ ́ polo timpi yəlaa fɛɩ tɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yəlaa samaa pɛɛka - ɩ , haləna pá tala ɩ cɔlɔ . Pa luɣu lapa sɩ pá tɔkɩ - ɩ , pá taa yele na ɩ ́ tɛɛ .

text: And he said unto them , I must preach the kingdom of God to other cities also : for therefore am I sent .
text2: Ama Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Aai , pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ má heeli acalɛɛ lɛnna kɛ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pə maɣamaɣa pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ tila - m .

text: And he preached in the synagogues of Galilee .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɛɛwa na ɩ ́ lakɩ waasʋ kɛ Yuta tɛtʋ taa təkotilenaa taa .

text: And it came to pass , that , as the people pressed upon him to hear the word of God , he stood by the lake of Gennesaret ,
text2: Kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ yəlaa nyəkaɣaa Yesu kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm nɩɩʋ tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ səŋa Kenesalɛtɩ lʋm nɔɣɔ .

text: And saw two ships standing by the lake : but the fishermen were gone out of them , and were washing their nets .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ nawa kpɩɩləŋ naalɛ səŋa kʋteŋ tɔɔ , na tiina kpalaa lɩɩ ɩ taa na pá polo pa puluŋ cɔtʋɣʋ .

text: And he entered into one of the ships , which was Simon ' s , and prayed him that he would thrust out a little from the land . And he sat down , and taught the people out of the ship .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpa ɩ taa lɛŋkʋ taa , na kpɩɩlʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kɩɩ kɛ ́ Simɔŋ nyəŋkʋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ sələma - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ hatələna - ɩ - kʋɣʋ kʋteŋ kɛ pəcɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ caɣa kʋ taa na ɩ ́ sʋʋ ɩ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ taa .

text: Now when he had left speaking , he said unto Simon , Launch out into the deep , and let down your nets for a draught .
text2: Waatʋ wei ɩ tɛma - wɛɣɛ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ tɔ ɩ heela Simɔŋ sɩ : Tuusi na ń polo lumaŋ taa na ɩ ́ tʋ mə puluŋ na ɩ ́ puu tiina .

text: And Simon answering said unto him , Master , we have toiled all the night , and have taken nothing : nevertheless at thy word I will let down the net .
text2: Simɔŋ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , tə tɛma wɩɩʋ kɛ yem kɛ ́ tɛʋ na kʋ fem , tə ta puu pʋlʋ . Paa na mpʋ n tɔma sɩ má tʋ tɔ , maa tʋ .

text: And when they had this done , they inclosed a great multitude of fishes : and their net brake .
text2: Pa tʋ mpʋ ɩlɛna pá puu tiina kɛ sɔsɔm pə tɩɩ fɛɩ , halɩ pa puluŋ caakaɣa cəlʋɣʋ .

text: And they beckoned unto their partners , which were in the other ship , that they should come and help them . And they came , and filled both the ships , so that they began to sink .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa hata pa taapalaa mpa paa wɛ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ lɛŋkʋ taa tɔɣɔ niŋ sɩ pá kɔɔ pá səna - wɛ . Pɛlɛ pa kɔma ɩlɛna pá ləsɩ tiina na pá suuli kpɩɩləŋ ɩnɩ ɩ naalɛ , haləna pə ŋmilisiɣi - wɛ .

text: When Simon Peter saw it , he fell down at Jesus ' knees , saying , Depart from me ; for I am a sinful man , O Lord .
text2: Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ nawa mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ luŋ Yesu kɛ akula kɛ kpakpaa na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tacaa , taa kpətəna - m , ma kɛ ́ ɩsaɣaʋ maɣamaɣa kɛ ́ .

text: For he was astonished , and all that were with him , at the draught of the fishes which they had taken :
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tiina nna pa kpa mpʋ tɔ , a tɔɔʋ ka lapa ɩ ́ na mpa paa wɛɛ tɔɣɔ sɔɣɔntʋ kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: And so was also James , and John , the sons of Zebedee , which were partners with Simon . And Jesus said unto Simon , Fear not ; from henceforth thou shalt catch men .
text2: Haləna pə la mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ ɩ taapalaa Sepetee pəyalaa Saakɩ na Yohaanɩ . Tənaɣa Yesu heela Simɔŋ sɩ : Taa nyá pənɛntɛ yəlaa kɛ n ká puu .

text: And when they had brought their ships to land , they forsook all , and followed him .
text2: Pa ləsa kpɩɩləŋ kɛ lʋm taa , ɩlɛna pá yele pə təna təpaɩ na pá hu ɩ waalɩ .

text: And it came to pass , when he was in a certain city , behold a man full of leprosy : who seeing Jesus fell on his face , and besought him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Yesu ka wɛ ɩcatɛ natəlɩ tə taa , na yʋlʋ wei tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ asilima kʋtɔŋ waasa ɩ təna tɔ ɩ ka wɛ təna . Ɩ na Yesu ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ həntɩ - ɩ atɛ na ɩ ́ wiina - ɩ təkpɛɛ sɩ : Tacaa , ye n ka tisaɣa n taa waasɩ - m ?

text: And he put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will : be thou clean . And immediately the leprosy departed from him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu kʋsa ɩ niŋ na ɩ ́ tokəna - ɩ na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Teu ma tisaa , alaafəya ɩ ́ la . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kʋtɔŋ tɛma kpakpaa .

text: And he charged him to tell no man : but go , and shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing , according as Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu kpaalɩ - ɩ sɩ : Taa heeli nɔɣɔlʋ . Ama tɛɛ kpakpaa na kɔtʋlʋ na - ŋ , ɩlɛna ń yiɣisi ɩsɩɩ Moisi ka kɛɛsʋɣʋ tɔ , na pə ́ la yəlaa kɛ aseeta .

text: But so much the more went there a fame abroad of him : and great multitudes came together to hear , and to be healed by him of their infirmities .
text2: Paa na mpʋ tɔ , ɩ hətɛ tɔŋna yaaʋ na pə puki , na samaa kotiɣi ɩ kiŋ kɛ sɔsɔm sɔsɔm sɩ pa nɩɩkɩ ɩ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ , na ɩ ́ waasəɣɩ - wɛɣɛ pa kʋtɔməŋ .

text: And he withdrew himself into the wilderness , and prayed .
text2: Ama ɩnɩ ɩ pukaɣa waatʋ waatʋ kɛ timpi timpi yəlaa fɛɩ tɔ , na ɩ sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ .

text: And it came to pass on a certain day , as he was teaching , that there were Pharisees and doctors of the law sitting by , which were come out of every town of Galilee , and Judaea , and Jerusalem : and the power of the Lord was present to heal them .
text2: Kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ Yesu sɛɣɛsaɣa . Pə pamna Falisanaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa mpa pa lɩɩna Kalilee na Yuta pa acalɛɛ təna taa na Yosalɛm tɔ paa wɛ təna na pa caɣaa . Na Tacaa toma ka wɛ Yesu kiŋ na ɩ lakɩ na kʋtɔntʋnaa hikiɣi alaafəya .

text: And , behold , men brought in a bed a man which was taken with a palsy : and they sought means to bring him in , and to lay him before him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yəlaa səɣəla kʋtɔŋ kʋtʋʋlʋɣʋ tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ na kpatəlɛ , na pá pɛɛkəɣɩ sɩ pá tana - ɩ Yesu kiŋ kɛ kutuluɣu taa na pá sɩɩ - ɩ ɩ ɩsɛntaa .

text: And when they could not find by what way they might bring him in because of the multitude , they went upon the housetop , and let him down through the tiling with his couch into the midst before Jesus .
text2: Ama yəlaa samaa tɔɔ pa ta na timpi tɔɔ paa sʋsəna - ɩ tɔ . Ɩlɛna pá kpaana - ɩ lɔpʋtʋ tɔɔ na pá wɛsɩ - tɩ , na pá tisi ɩ ́ na ɩ kpatəlɛ kɛ samaa hɛkʋ kɛ Yesu ɩsɛntaa .

text: And when he saw their faith , he said unto him , Man , thy sins are forgiven thee .
text2: Waatʋ wei Yesu ná pa naani tɔ ɩ tɔma sɩ : Ma taapalʋ , nyá ɩsaɣatʋ hɩɩsaa .

text: And the scribes and the Pharisees began to reason , saying , Who is this which speaketh blasphemies ? Who can forgive sins , but God alone ?
text2: Tənaɣa Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na Falisanaa pa sʋʋ miituɣu sɩ : Aweɣelɛ ɩnɛ ɩnɩ na ɩ ́ kpakəɣɩ ɩ tɩ na ɩ ́ kɛɛsəɣəna Ɩsɔ ? Awe pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ hɩɩsɩ ɩsaɣatʋ , ye pə taɣa Ɩsɔ paasi ?

text: But when Jesus perceived their thoughts , he answering said unto them , What reason ye in your hearts ?
text2: Ama Yesu ná cɛkəna pa hʋwɛɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ hʋʋkɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mə taa ?

text: Whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Rise up and walk ?
text2: Nti tə yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ kələna təlɛʋ ? Nyá ɩsaɣatʋ hɩɩsaa , yaa kʋlɩ na ń tɔ ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power upon earth to forgive sins , ( he said unto the sick of the palsy , ) I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy couch , and go into thine house .
text2: Tɔʋ , maa hʋlɩ - mɛ sɩ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má , ma pəsəɣɩ na má hɩɩsɩ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ atɛ cənɛ . Tənaɣa ɩ tɔma kʋtɔntʋ sɩ : Kʋlɩ na ń kpaɣa nyá kpatəlɛ na ń kpe .

text: And immediately he rose up before them , and took up that whereon he lay , and departed to his own house , glorifying God .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ kʋla kpakpaa kɛ pa təna pa ɩsɛntaa , na ɩ ́ kpaɣa kpatəlɛ nte tə tɔɔ paa hɩɩsa - ɩ tɔ na ɩ ́ saŋ Ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ kpeŋ .

text: And they were all amazed , and they glorified God , and were filled with fear , saying , We have seen strange things to day .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa pa tənaɣa piti kɛ ́ sɔsɔm na pá saŋ Ɩsɔ . Halɩ pə ́ la - wɛɣɛ sɔɣɔntʋ na pá caŋ pá yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ : Ama pʋwɛ , saŋa kɛ tá na kɔkɔlɔ tɔm .

text: And after these things he went forth , and saw a publican , named Levi , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he said unto him , Follow me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu lɩɩwa na ɩ ́ maɣana lampuu mʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Lefii tɔ , na ɩ ́ caɣa ɩ lampuu təmʋlɛ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Kʋlɩ na ń təŋɩ - m .

text: And he left all , rose up , and followed him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Lefii kʋlaa na ɩ ́ yele pə təna na ɩ ́ hu ɩ waalɩ .

text: And Levi made him a great feast in his own house : and there was a great company of publicans and of others that sat down with them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Lefii lapa - ɩ mʋʋllɛ kɛ teu kɛ ɩ təyaɣa taa , na pá na lampuu mʋlaa paɣalɛ na yəlaa lɛlaa pá caɣa tɔɣɔʋ .

text: But their scribes and Pharisees murmured against his disciples , saying , Why do ye eat and drink with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa na pɛlɛ pa Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa pa kɔma na pá pɔɔsɩ ɩ ɩfalaa kɛ ɩmiitaʋ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ mə na lampuu mʋlaa na asaɣaa ɩ ́ kpɛnta tətɔɣɔlɛ na tənyɔɔlɛ ?

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , They that are whole need not a physician ; but they that are sick .
text2: Ama Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Pə taɣa alaafəya nyə ́ ma nyɩɩləɣəna fɛtaa , ama kʋtɔntʋnaa kɛ ́ .

text: I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Ma kɔmaɣa sɩ ma heeliɣi asaɣaa sɩ pá laɣasɩ , pə taɣa kʋpama .

text: And they said unto him , Why do the disciples of John fast often , and make prayers , and likewise the disciples of the Pharisees ; but thine eat and drink ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yəlaa napəlɩ pa tɔma Yesu sɩ : Yohaanɩ ɩfalaa na Falisanaa nyə ́ ma pa hɔkəɣɩ nɔɔsɩ kɛ tam na pa sələməɣɩ pə waatʋnaa , na nyá nyə ́ ma náá tɔkɩ na pá nyɔɔkɩ yem .

text: And he said unto them , Can ye make the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ?
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ ká pəsɩ na ɩ ́ la na akpaɣalʋ taapalaa hɔkɔ nɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ na - wɛ pá wɛɛ ? Aaɩ .

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Ama pɩɩ kɔɔ pə kɛɛsɩ kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ , ɩlɛna pá ləsɩ - ɩ pa hɛkʋ , ɩlɛ waatʋ ɩnəɣɩ paa hɔkɔ nɔɣɔ .

text: And he spake also a parable unto them ; No man putteth a piece of a new garment upon an old ; if otherwise , then both the new maketh a rent , and the piece that was taken out of the new agreeth not with the old .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ tasa - wɛɣɛ ɩtuule kɛ tukuɣu tɔtɔ sɩ : Paa cələɣɩ pʋʋɣʋ kʋfalʋɣʋ tɔɔ na pá tɔ kʋpənʋɣʋ . Pá lapa mpʋ , pa wakəla kʋfalʋɣʋ . Pəyele saaliya kaa mʋna kʋpənʋɣʋ .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles ; else the new wine will burst the bottles , and be spilled , and the bottles shall perish .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ kaa suu sʋlʋm kʋfam kɛ sʋlʋm huluŋ kʋpəŋ taa , tɔfɔ sʋlʋm kʋfam yasəɣɩ huluŋ kʋpəŋ ɩnəɣɩ na pə ti na huluŋ wakəlɩ yem .

text: But new wine must be put into new bottles ; and both are preserved .
text2: Ama huluŋ kʋfaŋ taa kɛ ́ pa suuki sʋlʋm kʋfam .

text: No man also having drunk old wine straightway desireth new : for he saith , The old is better .
text2: Yʋlʋ wei ɩ tɛma sʋlʋm kʋpəpɩɩm kɛ nyɔɔʋ tɔ , ɩ luɣu ɩɩ lakɩ apila . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , kʋpəpɩɩm kɛ yəlaa saŋ .

text: And it came to pass on the second sabbath after the first , that he went through the corn fields ; and his disciples plucked the ears of corn , and did eat , rubbing them in their hands .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa faɣana tɔɣɔnaɣa pee taalɛ natəlɩ tə taa kɛ ́ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ kʋlɩ kʋ wule . Tənaɣa ɩ ɩfalaa sʋʋ tɔɣɔnaɣa pee nyəŋka kɛ pɛlʋɣʋ , na pá nuɣutiɣi pa niŋ taa na pá saləɣɩ .

text: And certain of the Pharisees said unto them , Why do ye that which is not lawful to do on the sabbath days ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa napəlɩ pa pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ lakɩ mpi pə fɛɩ lapʋ kɛ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule tɔ ?

text: And Jesus answering them said , Have ye not read so much as this , what David did , when himself was an hungred , and they which were with him ;
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ye mpʋ ɩ ́ ta kala mpi Tafiiti lapa waatʋ wei nyɔɣɔsɩ pɩɩ ɩ ́ na mpa paa wɛ ɩ cɔlɔ tɔ ?

text: How he went into the house of God , and did take and eat the shewbread , and gave also to them that were with him ; which it is not lawful to eat but for the priests alone ?
text2: Ɩsəna ɩ sʋʋ Ɩsɔ təyaɣa taa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa potopotonaa mpa paa sɩɩ Ɩsɔ tɔ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ ha ɩ taapalaa tɔ . Pəyele pə fɛɩ sɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ - wɛɣɛ yem na pə ta kɛ ́ kɔtəlaa .

text: And he said unto them , That the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ heeluɣu tɔtɔ sɩ : Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa maɣalɛ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ sɔsɔ tɔtɔ .

text: And it came to pass also on another sabbath , that he entered into the synagogue and taught : and there was a man whose right hand was withered .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu sʋʋ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile taa kɛ ́ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ kʋlɩ kʋ wule na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ . Pə pamna apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ wɛ təna na ɩ ŋkpalaɣa ntɔɣɔŋ nyəŋka kpɛkaa .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees watched him , whether he would heal on the sabbath day ; that they might find an accusation against him .
text2: Na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na Falisanaa caɣaa na pá keŋna - ɩ teu , sɩ pa naa sɩ ɩ ká waasɩ yʋlʋ kɛ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule yaa ɩsəna . Pa lakɩ mpʋɣʋlɛ sɩ pá hiki nti paa waanna - ɩ tɔ .

text: But he knew their thoughts , and said to the man which had the withered hand , Rise up , and stand forth in the midst . And he arose and stood forth .
text2: Ama ɩ cɛkəna pa hʋwɛɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ ŋkpaləkpɛkaɣa tʋ ɩnɩ sɩ : Kʋlɩ na ń səŋ hɛkʋ taa cənɛ . Ɩlɛna ŋkpaləkpɛkaɣa tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ səŋ təna .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , I will ask you one thing ; Is it lawful on the sabbath days to do good , or to do evil ? to save life , or to destroy it ?
text2: Na Yesu tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma pɔɔsəɣɩ - mɛ sɩ tá mpaaʋ taa , kʋpantʋ kɛ pə mʋna pá la kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule yaa ɩsaɣatʋ ? Paa waasɩ yaa paa kʋ ?

text: And looking round about upon them all , he said unto the man , Stretch forth thy hand . And he did so : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu nyəna pa təna pa ɩsɛntaa , na ɩ ́ tɔ apalʋ ɩnɩ sɩ : Tɔʋ , loosi nyá niŋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ŋkpaləkpɛkaɣa tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ lapa mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ niŋ hɛtɩ .

text: And they were filled with madness ; and communed one with another what they might do to Jesus .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pááná kpa - wɛɣɛ sɔsɔm , na pá maɣasəɣɩ ɩsəna pá la Yesu tɔ .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that he went out into a mountain to pray , and continued all night in prayer to God .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa kɛ ́ Yesu kpa pʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ , na ɩ ́ sələmɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɛʋ na kʋ fem .

text: And when it was day , he called unto him his disciples : and of them he chose twelve , whom also he named apostles ;
text2: Pə kɔma pə fe ɩlɛna , ɩ ́ yaa ɩ ɩfalaa na ɩ ́ ləsɩ pa taa kɛ ́ yəlaa naanʋwa na naalɛ , na ɩ ́ ha - wɛɣɛ hətɛ sɩ tillaa .

text: Simon , ( whom he also named Peter , ) and Andrew his brother , James and John , Philip and Bartholomew ,
text2: Mpɛ ɩnɩ pa həla ntɔ . Simɔŋ wei ɩ cuɣusaa sɩ Piyɛɛ tɔ , na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ neu Antəlɩɩ , na Saakɩ na Yohaanɩ , na Filipʋ , na Paatelemii ,

text: Matthew and Thomas , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon called Zelotes ,
text2: na Matiyee , na Tomaa , na Aləfe pəyalʋ Saakɩ , na Simɔŋ wei pa cuɣusaa sɩ Selotɩ tɔ ,

text: And Judas the brother of James , and Judas Iscariot , which also was the traitor .
text2: na Saakɩ pəyalʋ Yutaasɩ , na Yutaasɩ Ɩsəkaleeu wei ɩ lapa Yesu kɛ kɔlɔmɔtɔ tɔ .

text: And he came down with them , and stood in the plain , and the company of his disciples , and a great multitude of people out of all Judaea and Jerusalem , and from the sea coast of Tyre and Sidon , which came to hear him , and to be healed of their diseases ;
text2: Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa tiikaɣana pʋɣʋ tɔɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ səŋ timpi taa pʋɣʋ fɛɩ ɩpilisaʋ na pə ́ walaa tɔ . Təna ɩnəɣɩ ɩ ɩfalaa paɣalɛ na Yuta təna samaa na Yosalɛm nyə ́ ma na Tiii na Sitɔŋ lʋm nɔɣɔ nyə ́ ma pa təna paa timsaa .

text: And they that were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed .
text2: Paa kɔmaɣa sɩ pa nɩɩkɩ ɩ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ , na ɩ ́ waasɩ - wɛɣɛ pa kʋtɔməŋ tɔtɔ . Na ɩ waasa mpa pɛlɛ alɔɣaa tʋkaɣa wahala tɔ tɔtɔ .

text: And the whole multitude sought to touch him : for there went virtue out of him , and healed them all .
text2: Samaa ɩnɩ ɩ təna ɩ lʋkaɣa kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ tokiɣina - ɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , toma naalɩ a ka wɛ ɩ kiŋ na pá nɩɩkɩ a taŋ , na a waasəɣɩ pa tənaɣa pa kʋtɔməŋ .

text: And he lifted up his eyes on his disciples , and said , Blessed be ye poor : for yours is the kingdom of God .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu kʋsa ɩsɛ na ɩ ́ nyənɩ ɩ ɩfalaa na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Mpa mɛ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ kʋnyɔntʋnaa tɔ , ɩ ́ nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ . Mə tənna Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa .

text: Blessed are ye that hunger now : for ye shall be filled . Blessed are ye that weep now : for ye shall laugh .
text2: Mɛ mpa nyɔɣɔsɩ wɛna kaɣana tɔ , ɩ ́ nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ . Mɩɩ tɛna na ɩ ́ haɣa teu . Mɛ mpa ɩ ́ wiiki kaɣana tɔ , ɩ ́ nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ . Ɩ ́ ká tɛ na ɩ ́ woŋ teu .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall hate you , and when they shall separate you from their company , and shall reproach you , and cast out your name as evil , for the Son of man ' s sake .
text2: Paa yəlaa taa huuna - mɛ , yaa pa tɔɣɔna - mɛ , yaa pa tʋʋ - mɛ , yaa pa kʋ mə nyɔɔŋ kɛ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma tɔɔ , ɩ ́ nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ .

text: Rejoice ye in that day , and leap for joy : for , behold , your reward is great in heaven : for in the like manner did their fathers unto the prophets .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnɩ mə laŋa ɩ ́ hɛɛ sɔsɔm na ɩ ́ paa teu . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , mə kasəyaɣa ká tɔɔ sɔsɔm kɛ ɩsɔtaa kɛ ́ . Mpʋ ɩnɩ pə maɣamaɣa kɛ pa caanaa ka lapa Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa .

text: But woe unto you that are rich ! for ye have received your consolation .
text2: Toŋtʋnaa mɛ mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo kɛ ́ , ɩ ́ tɛma mə leleŋ tɔɣɔʋ tɔ se .

text: Woe unto you that are full ! for ye shall hunger . Woe unto you that laugh now ! for ye shall mourn and weep .
text2: Haɣalaa mɛ mə tɔm ná wɛ waɩyo kɛ ́ mpʋ ɩnəɣɩ . Ɩ ́ ká ná nyɔɣɔsɩ kɛ teu tɔ se . Mpa mɛ mə woŋiɣi kaɣana tɔ , mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo kɛ ́ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ . Ɩ ́ tɛŋ ɩ ́ caɣa ləyaɣa na ɩsəlʋm pə taa kɛ ́ .

text: Woe unto you , when all men shall speak well of you ! for so did their fathers to the false prophets .
text2: Yəlaa təna ɩ ́ kɔma na pá saŋ - mɛ , mə tɔm ká la waɩyo kɛ ́ . Mpʋ ɩnɩ pə maɣamaɣa kɛ mpɛ pa caanaa ka lapa Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa pɔpɔtʋnaa .

text: But I say unto you which hear , Love your enemies , do good to them which hate you ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Ma heeliɣi mpa mɛ ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ ma tɔm tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ sɔɔlɩ mə kolontunaa , na ɩ ́ lá mpa paa caa - mɛ tɔɣɔ kʋpantʋ .

text: Bless them that curse you , and pray for them which despitefully use you .
text2: Ɩ ́ kooli kʋpantʋ kɛ mpa pa kooliɣi - mɛɣɛ mpusi tɔ . Ɩ ́ sələməna mə ɩsaɣalataa kɛ Ɩsɔ .

text: And unto him that smiteth thee on the one cheek offer also the other ; and him that taketh away thy cloke forbid not to take thy coat also .
text2: Wei ɩ ́ mapa nyá ləkpaɣasaɣa , kɛɛsɩ - ɩ lɛŋka . Nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ lɛɛka nyá kpaɩ , cɛlɛ - ɩ nyá capa tɔtɔ .

text: Give to every man that asketh of thee ; and of him that taketh away thy goods ask them not again .
text2: Wei ɩ ́ sələma - ŋ , taa pɛmɩ - ɩ , wei ɩ ́ lɛɛka nyá kʋwɛnam , taa pɔɔsɩ - ɩ pə tɔm .

text: And as ye would that men should do to you , do ye also to them likewise .
text2: Mpi mə caa sɩ yəlaa ɩ ́ la - mɛ tɔ , mɩɩ la pɛlɛɣɛ - wɩ tɔtɔ .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also love those that love them .
text2: Ye mpa pa sɔɔləɣɩ - mɛ tɔ pa tike kɛ ́ mə sɔɔləɣɩ , ɩlɛ pepeɣe ɩ ́ tɛɛwa tɔtɔ ? Asaɣaa maɣamaɣa ná sɔɔləɣɩ mpa pa sɔɔla - wɛ tɔ pa tike tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: And if ye do good to them which do good to you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also do even the same .
text2: Ye mpa pa lakɩ - mɛɣɛ kʋpantʋ tɔ pa tike kɛ ɩ ́ ká təŋəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ , ɩlɛ pepeɣelɛ ɩ ́ tɛɛwa ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ asaɣaa maɣamaɣa ná lakɩ tɔtɔ mɛɛ .

text: And if ye lend to them of whom ye hope to receive , what thank have ye ? for sinners also lend to sinners , to receive as much again .
text2: Ye mpa ɩ ́ tɛɛləɣɩ sɩ paa tɛ na pá fɛlɩ - mɛ tɔɣɔ ɩ təŋəɣɩ na ɩ ́ kəntəɣɩ , ɩlɛ pepeɣelɛ mə tɛɛwa ? Asaɣaa maɣamaɣa ná tɛɛləɣɩ sɩ paa tɛ na pá fɛlɩ pɛlɛ tɔɣɔ pa kəntəɣɩ pa təma mɛɛ .

text: But love ye your enemies , and do good , and lend , hoping for nothing again ; and your reward shall be great , and ye shall be the children of the Highest : for he is kind unto the unthankful and to the evil .
text2: Aaɩ , ɩ ́ sɔɔləɣɩ mə kolontunaa na ɩ ́ lakɩ - wɛɣɛ kʋpantʋ . Ɩ ́ kəntəɣɩ , ɩ ́ taa tɛləsɩ fɛlʋɣʋ tɔm kɛ lɔlɔ . Pɩɩ yele na mə kasəyaɣa tɔɔ sɔsɔm , na ɩ ́ ká pəsɩ ɩsɔtaa Ɩsɔ Sɔsɔ pəyalaa . Paa fɔɔfɛɩnaa na asaɣaa , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ lakɩ kʋpantʋ kɛ ́ .

text: Be ye therefore merciful , as your Father also is merciful .
text2: Ɩ ́ lakɩ təmaɣa kʋpantʋ kɛ teu ɩsɩɩ mə Caa lakɩ - mɛɣɛ kʋpantʋ tɔ .

text: Judge not , and ye shall not be judged : condemn not , and ye shall not be condemned : forgive , and ye shall be forgiven :
text2: Ɩ ́ taa footi lɛlaa , pə ́ taa kɔɔ na Ɩsɔ footi - mɛ . Ɩ ́ taa tʋ lɛlaa kɛ tasəkəlɛ , pə taa kɔɔ na Ɩsɔ tʋ - mɛɣɛ tasəkəlɛ . Ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ təmaɣa suulu kɛ timpi ɩ ́ pəntəɣəna təma tɔ , na Ɩsɔ ká hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ suulu .

text: Give , and it shall be given unto you ; good measure , pressed down , and shaken together , and running over , shall men give into your bosom . For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Ɩ ́ haakɩ na Ɩsɔ ká haakɩ - mɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ ká maɣasɩ kɛ ́ na pə ́ su na pə ́ watɩ na ɩ ́ ciɣiti na ɩ ́ nyəkɩ na ɩ ́ pəlɩ - mɛ . Maɣasəlaɣa ŋka mə maɣasəɣəna lɛlaa tɔ , ŋkɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ ná kɔŋ na ɩ ́ maɣasəna - mɛ tɔtɔ .

text: And he spake a parable unto them , Can the blind lead the blind ? shall they not both fall into the ditch ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ lɛntɩ sɩ : Ntɔŋ ɩ ́ nyəmá teu sɩ yʋlʋm kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ hɔ ɩ lɛlʋ , tɔfɔ pa naalɛ paa hoti pʋ ́ ʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ taa kɛ ́ .

text: The disciple is not above his master : but every one that is perfect shall be as his master .
text2: Təmlɛ kpɛlɛməlʋ ta kəlɩ ɩ hʋllʋ . Ama kpɛlɛməlʋ ɩ ́ kɔma na ɩ ́ nyɩ təkpəsəkpəsɩ , ɩ ́ na ɩ hʋllʋ pa pəsa kʋlʋm kɛ ́ .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but perceivest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: Ɩsənaɣa pə lapa na ń naakɩ nyɩɩliim wei ɩ wɛ nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ ɩsəpəle taa tɔ , na ń kaa na kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ŋku kʋ wɛ nyá maɣamaɣa nyá nyəntɛ taa tɔ ?

text: Either how canst thou say to thy brother , Brother , let me pull out the mote that is in thine eye , when thou thyself beholdest not the beam that is in thine own eye ? Thou hypocrite , cast out first the beam out of thine own eye , and then shalt thou see clearly to pull out the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye .
text2: Ɩsənaɣalɛ nyá pəsəɣɩ na ń tɔ sɩ : Apaŋ nyá səŋ təkpi na má ləsɩ nyá ɩsəlɛ taa nyɩɩliim , na kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ wɛ nyá nyəntɛ taa ? Cɛsəlʋ nyá , ləsɩ kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ŋku kʋ wɛ nyá maɣamaɣa nyá ɩsəpəle taa tɔ , ɩlɛna pə ́ cɔ ́ ń ná teu təcɛɩcɛɩ na ń ləsɩ nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ ɩsəlɛ taa nyɩɩliim ɩnɩ .

text: For a good tree bringeth not forth corrupt fruit ; neither doth a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: Tʋɣʋ kʋpaŋkʋ ɩɩ lʋləɣɩ kpaɩ pile se , pə ́ cɔ ́ kpaɩ tʋɣʋ naa lʋləɣɩ pile kʋpantɛ tɔtɔ .

text: For every tree is known by his own fruit . For of thorns men do not gather figs , nor of a bramble bush gather they grapes .
text2: Pa nyəŋna paa tʋɣʋ ŋku na kʋ pile cɔlɔɣɔ . Yʋlʋ kaa kooli tʋɣʋ ŋku pa yaa sɩ fiki tɔ kʋ pee kɛ sɔsɔʋ tɔɔ se , pə ́ cɔ ́ paa kooliɣi tʋɣʋ ŋku pa yaa sɩ lɛsɛŋ tɔ kʋ pee kɛ kɔlɔŋ tɔɔ tɔtɔ .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is good ; and an evil man out of the evil treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is evil : for of the abundance of the heart his mouth speaketh .
text2: Yʋlʋpaŋ kʋpantʋ lɩɩkəna tuu ɩ lotu taa kʋpantʋ kiŋ kɛ ́ . Ɩlɛna ɩsaɣaʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ lɩɩna tuu ɩ lotu taa ɩsaɣatʋ kiŋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩsəna yʋlʋ lotu taa tɔɔwa tɔ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ yɔɣɔtaɣa hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ .

text: And why call ye me , Lord , Lord , and do not the things which I say ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Ɩ ́ yaa - m Tacaa Tacaa suwe na ɩɩ təŋəɣɩ ma kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ ?

text: Whosoever cometh to me , and heareth my sayings , and doeth them , I will shew you to whom he is like :
text2: Maa hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ yʋlʋ ɩ ́ kɔma ma kiŋ na ɩ ́ nɩɩ ma tɔm na ɩ ́ təŋ - tɩ pʋntʋ wɛ ɩsəna tɔ .

text: He is like a man which built an house , and digged deep , and laid the foundation on a rock : and when the flood arose , the stream beat vehemently upon that house , and could not shake it : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Ɩ nəɣəsəna kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ caakʋɣʋ kutuluɣu ŋmaʋ na ɩ ́ huli na ɩ ́ tala atɛ kʋkpamʋɣʋ na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ sɩɩ kite tɔɣɔ . Pɔɣɔ kɔma na ká su ɩlɛna lʋm watɩ , haləna pə hola ma - kʋ . Paa na mpʋ pə ta ciɣiti - kʋɣʋ kʋ ŋmatʋ teu tɔɔ .

text: But he that heareth , and doeth not , is like a man that without a foundation built an house upon the earth ; against which the stream did beat vehemently , and immediately it fell ; and the ruin of that house was great .
text2: Ama wei ɩ nɩɩkɩ ma tɔm na ɩɩ təŋəɣɩ - tɩ tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ wei ɩ ŋma kutuluɣu kɛ atɛɣɛ yem tɔ , kite kʋpantɛ fɛɩ . Lʋm hola mapa - kʋ , ɩlɛna kʋ ti kpakpaa na kʋ la asaala sɔsɔ kɛ yem .

text: Now when he had ended all his sayings in the audience of the people , he entered into Capernaum .
text2: Yesu kɔma na ɩ ́ tɛ yəlaa kɛ faaci lapʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ məlɩ Kapənahum .

text: And a certain centurion ' s servant , who was dear unto him , was sick , and ready to die .
text2: Lom yoolu sɔsɔ nɔɣɔlʋ ka wɛna yom na ɩ luɣu sʋʋ - ɩ sɔsɔm . Yom ɩnəɣɩ pə wɩɩkaɣa na ɩ ́ caakɩ səm .

text: And when he heard of Jesus , he sent unto him the elders of the Jews , beseeching him that he would come and heal his servant .
text2: Ɩ nɩɩ Yesu taŋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tili Yuta nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma napəlɩ sɩ pá wiina - ɩ na ɩ ́ kɔɔ ɩ ́ waasɩ ɩ yom ɩnɩ .

text: And when they came to Jesus , they besought him instantly , saying , That he was worthy for whom he should do this :
text2: Pɛlɛ pa tala Yesu kiŋ , ɩlɛna pá wiina - ɩ təkpɛɛ sɩ : Apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ nəɣəsəna ń waasɩ - ɩ .

text: For he loveth our nation , and he hath built us a synagogue .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ sɔɔla ta piitim kɛ sɔsɔm , halɩ ɩ ŋma - tʋɣʋ təkotile .

text: Then Jesus went with them . And when he was now not far from the house , the centurion sent friends to him , saying unto him , Lord , trouble not thyself : for I am not worthy that thou shouldest enter under my roof :
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu təŋa - wɛ . Ɩ kɔma ɩ ́ kpətəna təyaɣa , ɩlɛ yoolu ɩnɩ ɩ tila ɩ taapalaa ntɛ ́ sɩ : Tacaa , taa kʋ nyá təɣɩ yem , ma ta tala sɩ ń sʋʋ ma təyaɣa .

text: Wherefore neither thought I myself worthy to come unto thee : but say in a word , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Halɩ mpʋ ɩnəɣɩ maa hʋʋwa sɩ ma ta tala má kɔɔ ma maɣamaɣa kɛ nyá kiŋ . Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ , yɔɣɔtɩ kʋyɔɣɔtʋ kɛ tɔm kʋlʋm na ma yom hiki alaafəya .

text: For I also am a man set under authority , having under me soldiers , and I say unto one , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma ɩsəntɔ ma see ma sɔsaa kɛ ́ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ ma wɛna ma səkpema na pɛlɛ pa lakɩ ma luɣu nyəntʋ . Na má heela pa taa wei sɩ ɩ ́ polo cənɛ , ɩ puki kɛ ́ . Na má heela wei sɩ ɩ ́ kɔɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kɔɔ tɔtɔ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ ye ma heela ma yom sɩ ɩ ́ la pənɛ , ɩ lakɩ kɛ ́ .

text: When Jesus heard these things , he marvelled at him , and turned him about , and said unto the people that followed him , I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Yesu nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sa yoolu sɔsɔ ɩnɩ , na ɩ ́ pəsəna samaa wei ɩ təŋaɣa - ɩ tɔ ɩ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Pɔpɔtʋ fɛɩ leleŋ , paa Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ taa maɣamaɣa ma ta nata yʋlʋ na ɩ ́ tɛma ɩ taa na Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩsəntɔ .

text: And they that were sent , returning to the house , found the servant whole that had been sick .
text2: Yoolu ɩnɩ ɩ tillaa kɔma na pá məlɩ təyaɣa , ɩlɛ pa maɣana yom ɩnəɣəlɛ na ɩ alaafəya təmammam .

text: And it came to pass the day after , that he went into a city called Nain ; and many of his disciples went with him , and much people .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ Yesu pola ɩcatɛ nte pa yaa sɩ Nayiŋ tɔ tə taa kɛ ́ kpakpaa , na ɩ ɩfalaa na samaa paɣalɛ kɛ ɩ waalɩ .

text: Now when he came nigh to the gate of the city , behold , there was a dead man carried out , the only son of his mother , and she was a widow : and much people of the city was with her .
text2: Yesu kɔma ɩsɩɩ ɩ sʋʋkɩ ɩcatɛ , ɩlɛ alʋ leelu nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ pəyaɣa səpaɣalɛ na pá pukina - kɛɣɛ pim , na ɩcatɛ nyə ́ ma samaa təŋ leelu ɩnɩ ɩ waalɩ . Nkɛ ɩnɩ ka tike kɛ leelu ɩnɩ ɩ ka lʋlaa .

text: And when the Lord saw her , he had compassion on her , and said unto her , Weep not .
text2: Tacaa na - ɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ tɔm lapɩ - ɩ pətɔɔtəlɛ , na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Taa wii .

text: And he came and touched the bier : and they that bare him stood still . And he said , Young man , I say unto thee , Arise .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu polaa na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ sətʋ kpatəlɛ , ɩlɛna səɣəllaa náá səŋ , na Yesu tɔ sɩ : Ɩfepu nyá ma caa sɩ ń kʋlɩ .

text: And he that was dead sat up , and began to speak . And he delivered him to his mother .
text2: Tənaɣa sətʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ sʋʋ yɔɣɔtaɣa , na Yesu cɛlɛ - ɩ ɩ too .

text: And there came a fear on all : and they glorified God , saying , That a great prophet is risen up among us ; and , That God hath visited his people .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɔɣɔntʋ kpa pa təna na pá saŋ Ɩsɔ na pá tɔŋ sɩ : Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ sɔsɔ lɩɩ ta hɛkʋ taa . Na pá tasa tɔtɔ sɩ : Pʋwɛ , Ɩsɔ kɔma sɩ ɩ teŋ ɩ yəlaa .

text: And this rumour of him went forth throughout all Judaea , and throughout all the region round about .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mpi Yesu lapa mpʋ tɔ pə tɔm ya Yuta tɛtʋ təna , na pə cɔlɔ tɛtʋnaa təna taa .

text: And the disciples of John shewed him of all these things .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yohaanɩ ɩfalaa heela - ɩ tɔm ntɩ tə təna . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yaa pa taa naalɛ ,

text: And John calling unto him two of his disciples sent them to Jesus , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: na ɩ ́ tili - wɛɣɛ Yesu kiŋ sɩ pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ ɩnəɣəlɛ wei ɩ tɔm paa tɔma sɩ ɩ ká kɔɔ tɔ , yaa nɔɣɔlʋ wɛɛ ɩ kɔŋ , tə taŋ ɩlɛ ?

text: When the men were come unto him , they said , John Baptist hath sent us unto thee , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: Pɛlɛ pa tala Yesu cɔlɔ , ɩlɛna pá tɔ sɩ : Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ kʋsəna - tʋ sɩ tə pɔɔsɩ - ŋ sɩ : Nyaɣalɛ wei ɩ tɔm paa tɔma sɩ ɩ ká kɔɔ tɔ , yaa nɔɣɔlʋ wɛɛ ɩ kɔŋ , tə taŋ ɩlɛ ?

text: And in that same hour he cured many of their infirmities and plagues , and of evil spirits ; and unto many that were blind he gave sight .
text2: Pə pamna waatʋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa Yesu waasaɣa yəlaa paɣalɛ kɛ pa kʋtɔməŋ , na ɩ ́ lakɩ na acamaa hikiɣi alaafəya , na ɩ ́ looki alɔɣaa , na ɩ ́ kuliɣi yʋlʋmaa paɣalɛ ɩsɛ .

text: Then Jesus answering said unto them , Go your way , and tell John what things ye have seen and heard ; how that the blind see , the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , the deaf hear , the dead are raised , to the poor the gospel is preached .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ heeli Yohaanɩ kɛ mpi ɩ ́ nawa na nti ɩ ́ nɩɩwa tɔ sɩ : Yʋlʋmaa naakɩ , kaakalasɩ tɔŋ , tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ asilima kʋtɔŋ nyə ́ ma naakɩ nyʋɣʋ , na ntamaa ná nɩɩkɩ , na sətaa ná feŋ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ kʋnyɔntʋnaa ná tɔŋa Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ nɩɩʋ .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Wei ɩ naani kaa lɩɩ ma tɔɔ tɔ , pʋntʋ nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ .

text: And when the messengers of John were departed , he began to speak unto the people concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness for to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Yohaanɩ tillaa mpɛ pɛlɛ pa kɔma na pá kpe , ɩlɛna Yesu sʋʋ samaa kɛ Yohaanɩ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔm kɛ pɔɔsʋɣʋ sɩ : Pepeɣe ɩ ́ ka pola wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa kɛ ́ naʋ ye ? Heelim makɩ na pə ́ ciɣitiɣi səsəncaŋa ŋka tɔ ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? Behold , they which are gorgeously apparelled , and live delicately , are in kings ' courts .
text2: Ɩlɛ pepe naʋ kɛ ɩ polaa ? Yaa yʋlʋ wei ɩ suu kacɔka wontu tɔ ? Tɔʋ , mpa pɛlɛ pa suuki kacɔka wontu na pá wɛ leleŋ taa tɔ , awulaa tɛɛsɩ taa kɛ ́ pɛlɛ pa wɛɛ .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? Yea , I say unto you , and much more than a prophet .
text2: Ɩlɛ pepe maɣamaɣa kɛ ɩ ka tɩɩ pola naʋ ? Yaa Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ? Tampam , Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ kɛ ́ , halɩ ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ɩ tɩɩ kəla mpʋ .

text: This is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Ɩ tɔm kɛ pa tɩɩ ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Nyənɩ ma tillu ntɔ , ma tɛləsəɣɩ nyá nɔɣɔ tɔɔ sɩ ɩ ́ taɣanɩ nyá mpaaʋ na ń kɔŋ .

text: For I say unto you , Among those that are born of women there is not a greater prophet than John the Baptist : but he that is least in the kingdom of God is greater than he .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , tuu tɔ pa ta lʋləta nɔɣɔlʋ na pʋntʋ tɛɛ Yohaanɩ fa . Ɩlɛ paa na mpʋ tɔ , ye mpa pa tisaa na Ɩsɔ tɔɣɔ pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ kawulaɣa , pa taa səkpelu maɣamaɣa tɛɛ - ɩ .

text: And all the people that heard him , and the publicans , justified God , being baptized with the baptism of John .
text2: Pa təna mpa pa nɩɩ tɔm ntɩ tɔ pa ha Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tampana , halɩ pə kpɛŋna lampuu mʋlaa maɣamaɣa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , paa tɛma tisuɣu sɩ Yohaanɩ ɩ ́ sɔ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm .

text: But the Pharisees and lawyers rejected the counsel of God against themselves , being not baptized of him .
text2: Ama Falisanaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa ná kisa təmlɛ nte Ɩsɔ ka hʋʋwa sɩ ɩ ká la - wɛ tɔ , pa ta tisi sɩ Yohaanɩ ɩ ́ sɔ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm .

text: And the Lord said , Whereunto then shall I liken the men of this generation ? and to what are they like ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasaa sɩ : Pepeɣelɛ má kɛɛsəna kʋfalaŋ yəlaa panɛ ? Ɩsɩɩ pepe caʋ kɛlɛ pa nəɣəsənaa tɔ ?

text: They are like unto children sitting in the marketplace , and calling one to another , and saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned to you , and ye have not wept .
text2: Pa nəɣəsəna kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ piya cakʋɣʋ kataɣa taa na sɩ tɔŋ təma sɩ : Anɩ tə hʋla həsɩ ɩ ́ ta paa . Pə ́ cɔ ́ tə wii ləyaɣa wula , ɩ ́ tá wii .

text: For John the Baptist came neither eating bread nor drinking wine ; and ye say , He hath a devil .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , lʋm sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ kɔma tɔ , ɩɩ tɔkɩ tɔɣɔnaɣa , pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩɩ nyɔɔkɩ sʋlʋm . Ɩlɛna mɩɩ tɔŋ sɩ ɩlɔɣɔhilu kɛ - ɩ kɛ ́ .

text: The Son of man is come eating and drinking ; and ye say , Behold a gluttonous man , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners !
text2: Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má , ma məlaa na má kɔɔ na má tɔkɩ na má nyɔɔkɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ taɣanəɣɩ maɣa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ tɔtɔ sɩ ma kɛ ́ hilitu na sʋlʋnyɔɔlʋ . Aaɩyee sɩ lampuu mʋlaa na asaɣaa pa ceu kɛ ́ .

text: But wisdom is justified of all her children .
text2: Ama Ɩsɔ ləmaɣasɛɛ tewaɣa , halɩ pə naakɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mpa pa təŋəɣɩ - yɛ tɔ pa kiŋ .

text: And one of the Pharisees desired him that he would eat with him . And he went into the Pharisee ' s house , and sat down to meat .
text2: Kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ Falisa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ yaa Yesu kɛ ́ tɔɣɔʋ . Ɩlɛna Yesu sʋʋ ɩ tɛ na ɩ ́ caɣa na ɩ ́ tɔŋna tɔɣɔʋ .

text: And , behold , a woman in the city , which was a sinner , when she knew that Jesus sat at meat in the Pharisee ' s house , brought an alabaster box of ointment ,
text2: Apalaa təna alʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛ ɩcatɛ ńtɛ ́ tə taa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ nɩɩwa sɩ Yesu caɣa tɔɣɔʋ kɛ Falisa təyaɣa taa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kɔna tulaalʋ kʋpaŋ nɔɣɔlʋ na akpaləpiya .

text: And stood at his feet behind him weeping , and began to wash his feet with tears , and did wipe them with the hairs of her head , and kissed his feet , and anointed them with the ointment .
text2: Na ɩ ́ luŋ Yesu nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ na ɩ waalɩ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ wiiki . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ taana Yesu nɔɔhɛɛ kɛ ɩsəlʋm , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ hɩɩsɩ - yɛ na ɩ ́ nyɔɔsɩ , na ɩ ́ waɣalɩ - yɛ na ɩ ́ saɣalɩ - yɛɣɛ tulaalʋ .

text: Now when the Pharisee which had bidden him saw it , he spake within himself , saying , This man , if he were a prophet , would have known who and what manner of woman this is that toucheth him : for she is a sinner .
text2: Falisa wei ɩnɩ ɩ yaa - ɩ tɔɣɔʋ kɛ mpʋ tɔ ɩ na mpʋ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ mɔlɩ ɩ taa sɩ : Ye apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ ka kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ ɩ ka nyəmá alʋ wei ɩnɩ ɩ tokiɣina - ɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ ɩ cakəlɛ na ɩ yaasi wɛ ɩsəna tɔ . Ɩ ka nyəma - ɩ sɩ ɩ fɛɩ teu .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Simon , I have somewhat to say unto thee . And he saith , Master , say on .
text2: Mpʋɣʋlɛ Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Simɔŋ maa heeli - ŋ tɔm natəlɩ . Tənaɣalɛ Simɔŋ cɔwa sɩ : Tacaa yɔɣɔtɩ .

text: There was a certain creditor which had two debtors : the one owed five hundred pence , and the other fifty .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Liɣitee kəntʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛnna kəma nyə ́ ma kɛ naalɛ , lɛlʋ fɛləɣɩ - ɩ liɣitee nyəɣətʋ nasəlɛ nɩɩnʋwa ( 500 ) , na lɛlʋ kɛ nyəɣətʋ nɩɩlɛ na naanʋwa .

text: And when they had nothing to pay , he frankly forgave them both . Tell me therefore , which of them will love him most ?
text2: Pa ta hiki sɩ pá fɛlɩ - ɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ cɛ pa naalɛ ɩnɩ . Tɔʋ , pa taa awe laŋlɛ ká kələna - ɩ hɛɛnaʋ ?

text: Simon answered and said , I suppose that he , to whom he forgave most . And he said unto him , Thou hast rightly judged .
text2: Tənaɣa Simɔŋ cɔwa sɩ : Ma hʋʋ sɩ , wei ɩ nyəntɛ kəla tɔɔʋ tɔ . Yesu sɩ : Ama n hʋʋ teu .

text: And he turned to the woman , and said unto Simon , Seest thou this woman ? I entered into thine house , thou gavest me no water for my feet : but she hath washed my feet with tears , and wiped them with the hairs of her head .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pəsəna alʋ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ tɔ Simɔŋ sɩ : Simɔŋ n ná alʋ ɩnɛ ? Ma sʋʋ nyá təyaɣa taa tɔ , n ta ha - m lʋm sɩ má kɔ ma nɔɔhɛɛ . Ama ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ taana - yɛɣɛ ɩsəlʋm , na ɩ ́ hɩɩsɩ - yɛ na ɩ nyɔɔsɩ .

text: Thou gavest me no kiss : but this woman since the time I came in hath not ceased to kiss my feet .
text2: Ma tala nyá tɛ tɔ , n ta waɣalɩ - m . Ama tuu ɩsɩɩ ma sʋʋʋ tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ta hɛɛsɩ ma nɔɔhɛɛ waɣalʋɣʋ .

text: My head with oil thou didst not anoint : but this woman hath anointed my feet with ointment .
text2: N ta pəlɩ ma nyʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ nim . Ama tulaalʋ kʋpampaŋ kɛ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ pəla , halɩ ma nɔɔhɛɛ tɔɔ .

text: Wherefore I say unto thee , Her sins , which are many , are forgiven ; for she loved much : but to whom little is forgiven , the same loveth little .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma heeliɣi - ŋ sɩ , ɩ sɔɔlʋɣʋ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɔsɔm tɔ pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ kɛ ́ sɩ paa ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ na tə tɔɔʋ kɛ mpʋ tɔ pa hɩɩsa - tɩ . Pə tɔɔ ɩnəɣɩ wei ɩ wɛna ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ pəcɔ na pá hɩɩsa - tɩ tɔ , pʋntʋ sɔɔləɣɩ maɣana kɛ ́ .

text: And he said unto her , Thy sins are forgiven .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ heela alʋ ɩnɩ sɩ : Nyá ɩsaɣatʋ hɩɩsaa .

text: And they that sat at meat with him began to say within themselves , Who is this that forgiveth sins also ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ́ na mpa pa caɣa tɔɣɔʋ tɔ pɛlɛ pa sʋʋ pa taa kɛ ́ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ : Aweɣelɛ ɩnɛ ɩnɩ na halɩ ɩnɩ ɩ taka ɩ hɩɩsəɣɩ ɩsaɣatʋ ?

text: And he said to the woman , Thy faith hath saved thee ; go in peace .
text2: Ama Yesu ná heela alʋ ɩnɩ sɩ : N tɛma nyá taa na Ɩsɔ tɔɣɔ ɩ yapa nyá nyʋɣʋ . Tɛɛna laŋhʋlʋmlɛ .

text: And it came to pass afterward , that he went throughout every city and village , preaching and shewing the glad tidings of the kingdom of God : and the twelve were with him ,
text2: Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Yesu sʋʋ cɔɔʋ kɛ acalɛɛ sɔsɔɔna na səkpena na ɩ ́ lakɩ waasʋ , na ɩ ́ kpaaləɣɩ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ . Na ɩ ɩfalaa naanʋwa na naalɛ ,

text: And certain women , which had been healed of evil spirits and infirmities , Mary called Magdalene , out of whom went seven devils ,
text2: na alaa mpa pa alɔɣaa ɩ loowa , na ɩ waasa mpa pɛlɛɣɛ pa kʋtɔməŋ tɔ . Ɩsɩɩ Malɩ wei pa yaakaɣa Makətala tʋ na paa loo - ɩ alɔɣaa naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa tɔ ,

text: And Joanna the wife of Chuza Herod ' s steward , and Susanna , and many others , which ministered unto him of their substance .
text2: na Helɔtɩ pəyalʋ Cusa alʋ Saanɩ , na Susaanɩ , na lɛlaa kɛ paɣalɛ mpa pa səŋaɣana Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa na pa wɛnaʋ tɔ .

text: And when much people were gathered together , and were come to him out of every city , he spake by a parable :
text2: Yəlaa samaa lɩɩkaɣana acalɛɛ acalɛɛ na pá kɔŋ ɩ kiŋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sɛɛ - wɛɣɛ ɩsɔ sɩ :

text: A sower went out to sow his seed : and as he sowed , some fell by the way side ; and it was trodden down , and the fowls of the air devoured it .
text2: Tuulu poləna tuutu . Ɩ tuukaɣa ɩ mətutuuna , ɩlɛna lɛnna hoti mpaaʋ nɔɣɔ nɔɣɔ . Na pá fɛləɣɩ - yɛɣɛ nɔɔhɛɛ , na sumasɩ tii na sɩ tɔɔsɩ - yɛ .

text: And some fell upon a rock ; and as soon as it was sprung up , it withered away , because it lacked moisture .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ lɛnna hota kʋwaʋ tɔɔ , ɩlɛna a nyɔ na a taɣanɩ wʋlʋɣʋ kɛ nikaɣa fɛɩ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprang up with it , and choked it .
text2: Lɛnna náá hoti sɔwa taa na a na sɔwa pá kpɛntɩ nyɔʋ , ɩlɛna sɔwa náá kʋ - yɛ .

text: And other fell on good ground , and sprang up , and bare fruit an hundredfold . And when he had said these things , he cried , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Lɛnna náá hoti tɛtʋ mʋsʋŋ nyəntʋ taa , na a nyɔ na a lʋlɩ teu pə tɩɩ fɛɩ . Ɩ tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ cuɣusina nɔɣɔ sɔsaɣa sɩ : Ye wei ɩ kɛ ́ tɔm nɩɩlʋ pʋntʋ ɩ ́ nɩɩ .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , What might this parable be ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ɩfalaa pɔɔsa - ɩ ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ mpɩ pə hʋwɛɛ .

text: And he said , Unto you it is given to know the mysteries of the kingdom of God : but to others in parables ; that seeing they might not see , and hearing they might not understand .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ sɩ : Pə ha - mɛɣɛ sɩ ɩ ́ nyɩ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa tɔm kʋŋmɛsətʋ . Ama pə kaasa lɛlaa tɔ , ɩsɔnaa kɛ paa sɛɛ - wɛ sɩ : Paa pa nyənəɣɩ ɩsəntɔ , pá taa ná . Paa pa nɩɩkɩ , pá taa cɛkəna pə hʋwɛɛ .

text: Now the parable is this : The seed is the word of God .
text2: Maa kilisi - mɛɣɛ ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ mpɩ pə hʋwɛɛ . Ɩsɔ Tɔm ntɛ ́ mətutuuna anɩ .

text: Those by the way side are they that hear ; then cometh the devil , and taketh away the word out of their hearts , lest they should believe and be saved .
text2: Wena wena a hota mpaaʋ nɔɣɔ nɔɣɔ tɔ , alɛ a wɛnna ɩsɩɩ mpa pa nɩɩkɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm na Ɩlɔɣɔʋ təŋ na ɩ ́ ləsɩ - təɣɩ kpakpaa kɛ pa lotu taa , sɩ pá taa kɔɔ na pá mʋ - tɩ na Ɩsɔ ya pa nyɔɔŋ .

text: They on the rock are they , which , when they hear , receive the word with joy ; and these have no root , which for a while believe , and in time of temptation fall away .
text2: Nna alɛ a hota kʋwaʋ tɔɔ tɔ , alɛ a wɛnna ɩsɩɩ mpa pa nɩɩkɩ - tɩ na pá mʋ - tɩ na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ , ɩlɛ tə ta caɣa pa taa . Pa mʋɣɩ kɛ ́ na pə ́ la wɛɛ naalɛ , maɣasʋɣʋ kɔŋ kʋ kɔɔ , ɩlɛna pá lɩɩ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ kɛ kpakpaa .

text: And that which fell among thorns are they , which , when they have heard , go forth , and are choked with cares and riches and pleasures of this life , and bring no fruit to perfection .
text2: Wena a hota sɔwa taa tɔ , alɛ a wɛnna ɩsɩɩ mpa pa tɛŋ tə nɩɩʋ , ɩlɛna atɛ cənɛ nəɣəsɛɛ na pə wɛnaʋ na pə kʋnyɩɩləŋ pə tɔm kɔɔ na pə ́ kʋ - təɣɩ pa taa , na pá kpisi pee kʋpana lʋlʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: But that on the good ground are they , which in an honest and good heart , having heard the word , keep it , and bring forth fruit with patience .
text2: Wena alɛ a hota tɛtʋ mʋsʋŋ nyəntʋ taa tɔ , alɛ a wɛnna ɩsɩɩ mpa pa nɩɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm na pá mʋ - tɩ na lotu kʋlʋmtʋ na hʋwɛɛ nna a tewa tɔ , na pá tɔka - tɩ təkpaŋkpaŋkpa , na pá lʋləɣɩ pee kʋpana kɛ teu tɔ .

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , covereth it with a vessel , or putteth it under a bed ; but setteth it on a candlestick , that they which enter in may see the light .
text2: Awe mʋsəɣɩ fətəla na ɩ ́ pamɩ - ɩ pʋlʋpʋ tɛɛ , yaa ɩ ́ sʋsɩ - ɩ kato tɛɛ ye ? Tesika tɔɔ kɛ ́ paa pusi - ɩ sɩ pə ́ ná mpa pa sʋʋkɩ təyaɣa taa tɔ .

text: For nothing is secret , that shall not be made manifest ; neither any thing hid , that shall not be known and come abroad .
text2: Kʋŋmɛləm napəlɩ pə fɛɩ sɩ pə kaa kuli pə tɔɔ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ mukaɣa tɛɛ pʋlʋpʋ fɛɩ mpi pa kaa ləsɩ na paa awe na tɔ .

text: Take heed therefore how ye hear : for whosoever hath , to him shall be given ; and whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he seemeth to have .
text2: Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na ɩsəna ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , wei ɩ wɛna tɔɣɔ paa ha , na pá lɛɛkɩ wei ɩ fɛɩna tɔɣɔ pəciimaɣa wei ɩ hʋʋ sɩ ɩ tɩ tɔ .

text: Then came to him his mother and his brethren , and could not come at him for the press .
