text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu too na ɩ newaa pa kɔma ɩ kiŋ . Ama samaa tɔɔ pa ta pəsɩ pá tala ɩ kiŋ .

text: And it was told him by certain which said , Thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to see thee .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ nɔɣɔlʋ heela - ɩ sɩ : Nyá too na nyá newaa pa wɛ awalɩ na pá caa pa na - ŋ .

text: And he answered and said unto them , My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God , and do it .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma too na ma newaa ntɛ ́ mpa pa nɩɩkɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm na pá təŋəɣɩ - tɩ tɔ .

text: Now it came to pass on a certain day , that he went into a ship with his disciples : and he said unto them , Let us go over unto the other side of the lake . And they launched forth .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa kpa kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ ɩ ́ na - wɛ pá tɛsɩ lʋm . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa tɛɛwa .

text: But as they sailed he fell asleep : and there came down a storm of wind on the lake ; and they were filled with water , and were in jeopardy .
text2: Pa tɔŋna pote kɛ lʋm tɔɔ kɛ ́ mpʋ , ɩlɛna Yesu too . Tənaɣa heelimuɣu hɔka lʋm tɔɔ təna , na lʋm faləɣɩ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa haləna kʋ caa suɣu , na lʋm caa pə tɔɣɔ - wɛ .

text: And they came to him , and awoke him , saying , Master , master , we perish . Then he arose , and rebuked the wind and the raging of the water : and they ceased , and there was a calm .
text2: Tənaɣa pa pola Yesu kiŋ na pá feesi - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , Tacaa , tə lepaɣa . Yesu fema , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kaləna heelim na lʋm hola na pə təna pə ́ hɛɛ təli .

text: And he said unto them , Where is your faith ? And they being afraid wondered , saying one to another , What manner of man is this ! for he commandeth even the winds and water , and they obey him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Mə taa tɛmnaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ kɛlɛ le ɩlɛ ? Tənaɣa sɔɣɔntʋ na piti kpa Yesu ɩfalaa , na pá tɔŋ təma sɩ : Aweɣelɛ ɩnɛ ɩnɩ na halɩ ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəɣəna heelim na lʋm na pə ́ nɩɩkəna - ɩ ?

text: And they arrived at the country of the Gadarenes , which is over against Galilee .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa tapəna pa kpɩɩlʋɣʋ kɛ Selasini nyə ́ ma tɛtʋ nti tə wɛ kʋtɛsʋɣʋ tɔɔ na tə ́ nyənəɣɩ Kalilee tɔ .

text: And when he went forth to land , there met him out of the city a certain man , which had devils long time , and ware no clothes , neither abode in any house , but in the tombs .
text2: Yesu tii tɛtʋ tɔɔ , ɩlɛna ɩcatɛ ńtɛ ́ tə yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ wei ɩ hii alɔɣaa tɔ ɩ ́ kɔɔ ɩ kiŋ . Hatoo tɔ yʋlʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ta nyɩ wontuɣu kɛ ɩ tɔɔ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ təcaɣalɛ ntɛ ́ pəlaaŋ taa , ɩ ta nyɩ təyaɣa .

text: When he saw Jesus , he cried out , and fell down before him , and with a loud voice said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God most high ? I beseech thee , torment me not .
text2: Ɩ na Yesu , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ma kapuka na ɩ ́ hoti ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ kooki sɩ : Ɩsɔtaa Ɩsɔ Sɔsɔ Pəyalʋ Yesu , ma na - ŋ suwe ? Haɩ , la suulu taa tʋ - m wahala .

text: ( For he had commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man . For oftentimes it had caught him : and he was kept bound with chains and in fetters ; and he brake the bands , and was driven of the devil into the wilderness . )
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Yesu ka heela ɩlɔɣɔʋ sɩ ɩ ́ se ɩ waalɩ tɔɣɔ ɩ yɔɣɔta mpʋ . Pə kɛɛsəɣɩ na pə ́ kʋləɣəna - ɩ tɔ , pa hɔkəɣɩ - ɩ alukpala na ɩ ́ cɛkɩ , na ɩlɔɣɔʋ sʋsʋɣɩ - ɩ nyɩɩtʋ .

text: And Jesus asked him , saying , What is thy name ? And he said , Legion : because many devils were entered into him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pɔɔsa ɩlɔɣɔhilu sɩ : Pa yaa - ŋ suwe ? Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ cɔ sɩ : Pa yaa - m sɩ Kʋpiŋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , alɔɣaa paɣalɛ ka wɛna ɩ waalɩ .

text: And they besought him that he would not command them to go out into the deep .
text2: Na alɔɣaa mpɛ pa wiikaɣana Yesu sɩ ɩ ́ taa tɔ - wɛ sɩ pá məlɩ pa hɔɔʋ tɛɛ .

text: And there was there an herd of many swine feeding on the mountain : and they besought him that he would suffer them to enter into them . And he suffered them .
text2: Afanaa kaləkʋ sɔsɔɔʋ nakʋlɩ kɩɩ wɛ tənaɣa pɔ ́ ɔ ́ ŋ taa na kʋ tuliɣi . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alɔɣaa mpɛ pa wiina Yesu sɩ ɩ ́ yele na mpɛ pá sʋʋ afanaa mpɛ pa taa , ɩlɛna Yesu tisi .

text: Then went the devils out of the man , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the lake , and were choked .
text2: Tənaɣa alɔɣaa mpɛ pa yela apalʋ ɩnɩ na pá sʋʋ afanaa taa . Ɩlɛna afanaa tʋ casəlɛ kɛ yem na pá tii kalakala na pá tʋ lʋm na pá sɩ .

text: When they that fed them saw what was done , they fled , and went and told it in the city and in the country .
text2: Afanaa tiikilaa ná mpʋ , ɩlɛna pɛlɛ pá lo kpakpaa na pá polo pá heeli tɔm ntɩ , na tɔm yɛkɩ kpakpaa kɛ acalɛɛ taa na cacakəŋ tɛɛ .

text: Then they went out to see what was done ; and came to Jesus , and found the man , out of whom the devils were departed , sitting at the feet of Jesus , clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yəlaa kʋlaa sɩ mpɛ pa puki na pá ná mpi pə lapa tɔ . Pa pola Yesu kiŋ , ɩlɛna pá maɣana apalʋ wei ɩnɩ ɩ alɔɣaa pa loowa tɔ , na pə ́ cɛpa ɩ tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ caɣa Yesu nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ suu wontu . Ɩlɛna sɔɣɔntʋ kpa - wɛ .

text: They also which saw it told them by what means he that was possessed of the devils was healed .
text2: Mpa pa ná tɔm ntɩ na pa ɩsəpəle tɔ , pa kɛɛsa - wɛɣɛ ɩsəna pə lapa na apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ hiki alaafəya tɔ .

text: Then the whole multitude of the country of the Gadarenes round about besought him to depart from them ; for they were taken with great fear : and he went up into the ship , and returned back again .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa Selasini tɛtʋ nyə ́ ma kɛ sɔɣɔntʋ kɛ sɔsɔm , ɩlɛna pá tɔ Yesu sɩ ɩ ́ la suulu na ɩ ́ tɛɛ . Ɩlɛna Yesu kpa kpɩɩlʋɣʋ sɩ ɩ tɛɛkɩ .

text: Now the man out of whom the devils were departed besought him that he might be with him : but Jesus sent him away , saying ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ apalʋ wei ɩnɩ ɩ alɔɣaa pa loo mpʋ tɔ , ɩ sələma Yesu sɩ ɩ ́ yele na ɩnɩ ɩ ́ təŋɩ - ɩ . Ɩlɛna Yesu náá kisi na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ :

text: Return to thine own house , and shew how great things God hath done unto thee . And he went his way , and published throughout the whole city how great things Jesus had done unto him .
text2: Məlɩ nyá təyaɣa taa na ń heeli pə təna mpi Ɩsɔ lapa - ŋ tɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɛɛwa na ɩ ́ heeli ɩcatɛ təna taa kɛ ́ pə təna mpi Yesu lapa - ɩ tɔ .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Jesus was returned , the people gladly received him : for they were all waiting for him .
text2: Yesu məla Kalilee taa , ɩlɛna samaa laŋa hɛɛ teu . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa təna paa taŋa - ɩ teu kɛ ́ .

text: And , behold , there came a man named Jairus , and he was a ruler of the synagogue : and he fell down at Jesus ' feet , and besought him that he would come into his house :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Yailu na ɩ ́ kɛ ́ pa təkotile nyʋɣʋ tʋ tɔ ɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ hoti Yesu nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ , na ɩ ́ wiina - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ polo ɩnɩ ɩ tɛ .

text: For he had one only daughter , about twelve years of age , and she lay a dying . But as he went the people thronged him .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ ka wɛna pɛɛlɔ na ɩ ́ caakɩ səpʋ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ tike kɛ ɩ ka wɛna , na ɩ pɩɩsɩ wɛ naanʋwa na naalɛ . Yesu kʋlaa sɩ ɩ puki tɔ na samaa nyəkaa kɛ ́ teu .

text: And a woman having an issue of blood twelve years , which had spent all her living upon physicians , neither could be healed of any ,
text2: Alʋ nɔɣɔlʋ náá wɛ təna wei hatoo pɩɩsɩ naanʋwa na naalɛ taa ɩ tɔŋna tɔɣɔlʋɣʋ na pə ́ wɛ - ɩ toŋ tɔ . Alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ liɣitee təna tɛmna fɛtaa . Pə ́ cɔ ́ nɔɣɔlʋ ta pəsɩ na ɩ ́ waasɩ - ɩ .

text: Came behind him , and touched the border of his garment : and immediately her issue of blood stanched .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kpətəna Yesu na ɩ waalɩ tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ tokina ɩ capa ntʋmpile . Ɩlɛna pə tɛmɩ - ɩ kpakpaa ɩnɩ .

text: And Jesus said , Who touched me ? When all denied , Peter and they that were with him said , Master , the multitude throng thee and press thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Ntɛna Yesu pɔɔsɩ sɩ : Awe tokina - m ye ? Mpʋɣʋlɛ yəlaa təna kpɛɛsaa . Ɩlɛna Piyɛɛ nɔɣɔ təkpaʋ sɩ : Tacaa , kɛ yəlaa timsina - ŋ na pá nyəkəɣɩ - ŋ ?

text: And Jesus said , Somebody hath touched me : for I perceive that virtue is gone out of me .
text2: Ama Yesu cɔwa sɩ : Aaɩ , nɔɣɔlʋ tokina - m kɛ ́ . Ma nɩɩ ma toma lɛnna lɩɩwa .

text: And when the woman saw that she was not hid , she came trembling , and falling down before him , she declared unto him before all the people for what cause she had touched him and how she was healed immediately .
text2: Alʋ kɔma na ɩ ́ nyɩ sɩ pə nyəmá ɩ tɔɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ hoti Yesu nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ seliɣi . Na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ samaa təna ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ mpi pə tɔɔ ɩ tokina - ɩ , na ɩsəna pə tɩɩ waasa - ɩ kpakpaa tɔ .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , be of good comfort : thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace .
text2: Mpʋɣʋlɛ Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : N tɛma Ɩsɔ na nyá taa tɔɣɔ pə waasa - ŋ ma pu , tɛɛna laŋhʋlʋmlɛ .

text: While he yet spake , there cometh one from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house , saying to him , Thy daughter is dead ; trouble not the Master .
text2: Yesu tɔŋa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile nyʋɣʋ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ təyaɣa tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ heeli - ɩ sɩ : Taa tʋ Tacaa kɛ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ yem , nyá pɛɛlɔ fɛɩ .

text: But when Jesus heard it , he answered him , saying , Fear not : believe only , and she shall be made whole .
text2: Tənaɣalɛ Yesu nɔɣɔ təkpaʋ sɩ : Taa nyá , nyaa tɛ Ɩsɔ na nyá taa te , ɩ ká hiki alaafəya .

text: And when he came into the house , he suffered no man to go in , save Peter , and James , and John , and the father and the mother of the maiden .
text2: Yesu - wɛ pa kɔma pá tala təyaɣa tɔ Yesu ta tisi sɩ samaa ɩ ́ təŋɩ - ɩ na pá sʋʋ . Ama Piyɛɛ na Yohaanɩ na Saakɩ na pəyaɣa caa na ka too pa tike pa sʋʋna .

text: And all wept , and bewailed her : but he said , Weep not ; she is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Pa təna paa kpa pa laŋa kɛ ́ na pá wiiki sɔsɔm . Ama Yesu heela - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ taa wii , ka too kʋtoo kɛ ́ , ka ta sɩ se .

text: And they laughed him to scorn , knowing that she was dead .
text2: Yəlaa nyəmá sɩ yʋlʋ tɛma tɛɛʋ təkpataa , ɩlɛna pá woŋi - ɩ .

text: And he put them all out , and took her by the hand , and called , saying , Maid , arise .
text2: Ama Yesu tɔka pəyaɣa niŋ taa na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəna nɔɣɔ sɔsaɣa sɩ : Pəyaɣa nyá , kʋlɩ .

text: And her spirit came again , and she arose straightway : and he commanded to give her meat .
text2: Tənaɣa ka məlaa na ká kʋlɩ kpakpaa . Ɩlɛna Yesu sɩ pá ha - kɛɣɛ tɔɣɔnaɣa .

text: And her parents were astonished : but he charged them that they should tell no man what was done .
text2: Ɩlɛna piti kpa pɛɛlɔ ɩnɩ ɩ nyə ́ ma . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu heela - wɛ sɩ pá taa yele na nɔɣɔlʋ nɩɩ nti ɩnɩ tə lapa mpʋ tɔ .

text: Then he called his twelve disciples together , and gave them power and authority over all devils , and to cure diseases .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu kota pa naanʋwa na naalɛ na ɩ ́ tʋ alɔɣaa kɛ pa niŋ taa , na ɩ ́ ha - wɛɣɛ toma sɩ pá looki - wɛ paa mpa , na pá waakɩ kʋtɔməŋ .

text: And he sent them to preach the kingdom of God , and to heal the sick .
text2: Na ɩ ́ tili - wɛ sɩ pá polo pá kpaalɩ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa tɔm , na pá waasəɣɩ kʋtɔntʋnaa kɛ pa kʋtɔməŋ .

text: And he said unto them , Take nothing for your journey , neither staves , nor scrip , neither bread , neither money ; neither have two coats apiece .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ye ɩ ́ tɛɛkɩ ɩ ́ taa kpaɣa pʋlʋ , paa kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ , paa huluɣu , paa tɔɣɔnaɣa , paa liɣitee , pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ taa kpaɣa capanaa kɛ naalɛ naalɛ .

text: And whatsoever house ye enter into , there abide , and thence depart .
text2: Ye ɩ ́ tala timpi na ɩ ́ laalɩ na ɩ ́ sʋʋ təyaɣa ŋka ka taa , ɩ ́ saalɩ təna halɩ mə tɛɛʋ .

text: And whosoever will not receive you , when ye go out of that city , shake off the very dust from your feet for a testimony against them .
text2: Na ye ɩ ́ tala timpi na yəlaa ɩ ́ ta mʋ - mɛ , ɩ ́ lɩɩ na ɩ ́ kpiisi - wɛɣɛ mə nɔɔhɛɛ mʋsʋɣʋ , na pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ lapa - wɛɣɛ tɔʋ , ɩ ́ yele .

text: And they departed , and went through the towns , preaching the gospel , and healing every where .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa tɛɛwa na pá cɔɔkɩ ɩcatɛ ɩcatɛ na pá heeliɣi Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ , na pá waasəɣɩ kʋtɔntʋnaa kɛ pa kʋtɔməŋ .

text: Now Herod the tetrarch heard of all that was done by him : and he was perplexed , because that it was said of some , that John was risen from the dead ;
text2: Wulaʋ Helɔtɩ nɩɩ pə təna mpi pə tɔŋa lapʋ kɛ mpʋ tɔ , ɩlɛna pə liɣiti - ɩ sɔsɔm , ɩ ta nyɩ ɩsəna ɩ ́ la tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , lɛlaa ná tɔŋaɣa kɛ ́ sɩ Yohaanɩ wei paa kʋwa tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ femna .

text: And of some , that Elias had appeared ; and of others , that one of the old prophets was risen again .
text2: Lɛlaa sɩ Ilii lɩɩna . Haləna lɛlaa sɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa kʋpəma taa nɔɣɔlʋ lɩɩna .

text: And Herod said , John have I beheaded : but who is this , of whom I hear such things ? And he desired to see him .
text2: Ɩlɛna Helɔtɩ sɩ : Ma yelaa na pá sɛtɩ Yohaanɩ nyʋɣʋ ɩlɛ , aweɣelɛ pʋntʋ wei ɩnɩ ɩ tɔm ma nɩɩ pa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ ? Haləna ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ sɩ ɩ ́ na - ɩ .

text: And the apostles , when they were returned , told him all that they had done . And he took them , and went aside privately into a desert place belonging to the city called Bethsaida .
text2: Yesu Tillaa kɔma pá məlɩ Yesu kiŋ , ɩlɛna pá kɛɛsɩ - ɩ pə təna mpi pa lapa tɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kpaɣa - wɛ na ɩ ́ pona - wɛɣɛ kpeeŋa kɛ ɩcatɛ nte pa yaa sɩ Pɛtɛsaita tɔ tə kiŋ .

text: And the people , when they knew it , followed him : and he received them , and spake unto them of the kingdom of God , and healed them that had need of healing .
text2: Paa na mpʋ tɔ , samaa nɩɩwa na pá hu ɩ waalɩ , na ɩ laŋlɛ hʋlʋməna pa kɔntɛ . Na ɩ ́ heela - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa tɔm , na ɩ ́ waasɩ pa təna mpa pa fɛɩna alaafəya tɔ .

text: And when the day began to wear away , then came the twelve , and said unto him , Send the multitude away , that they may go into the towns and country round about , and lodge , and get victuals : for we are here in a desert place .
text2: Pə kɔma na ilim caa tɛm , ɩlɛ ɩ ɩfalaa naanʋwa na naalɛ kɔma ɩ kiŋ ntɛ ́ , na pá tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tɔɣɔnɩ samaa ɩnɛ ɩnɩ na ɩ ́ polo acalɛɛ taa na pə cɔlɔ cacakəŋ tɛɛ na pá hiki təsʋʋlɛnaa na tɔɣɔnasɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , cənɛ kɛ ́ nyɩɩtʋ taa kɛ ́ .

text: But he said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they said , We have no more but five loaves and two fishes ; except we should go and buy meat for all this people .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔwa sɩ : Mɩɩ hana samaa ɩnəɣɩ tɔɣɔnaɣa kɛ mə maɣamaɣa . Tənaɣalɛ pa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ntɔŋ potopotonaa kakpasɩ na tiina naalɛɣɛ tə wɛna yaa ? Yaa n caa sɩ táá yana tɔɣɔnaɣa na tə cɛla samaa tuutuuma ɩnɛ ɩ təna ?

text: For they were about five thousand men . And he said to his disciples , Make them sit down by fifties in a company .
text2: Apalaa ka wɛ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋpee iyisi kakpasɩ ( 5000 ) kɛ mpʋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu heela ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ caɣasɩ - wɛɣɛ tintika tintika ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋpee nɩɩlɛ na naanʋwa naanʋwa .

text: And they did so , and made them all sit down .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu ɩfalaa nɩɩ ntɩ na pá caɣasɩ pa təna təmam .

text: Then he took the five loaves and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed them , and brake , and gave to the disciples to set before the multitude .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu kpaɣa potopotonaa kakpasɩ na tiina naalɛ ɩnɩ , na ɩ ́ teki ɩ ɩsɛ na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ na təmlɛ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ faɣa - wɛ na ɩ ́ cɛla ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ pá tala samaa ɩnɩ .

text: And they did eat , and were all filled : and there was taken up of fragments that remained to them twelve baskets .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa təna pa tɔɣaa na pá haɣa . Haləna pá tɔɔsɩ hɔɣɔlasɩ kʋkpisasɩ kɛ tɔkəŋ naanʋwa na naalɛ .

text: And it came to pass , as he was alone praying , his disciples were with him : and he asked them , saying , Whom say the people that I am ?
text2: Kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ Yesu sələmaɣa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ tike kɛ kpeeŋa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa polo ɩ kiŋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Yəlaa tɔŋ sɩ ma kɛ ́ awe ?

text: They answering said , John the Baptist ; but some say , Elias ; and others say , that one of the old prophets is risen again .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ɩfalaa cɔwa sɩ : Pa tɔŋ sɩ Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ , na lɛlaa sɩ Ilii , na lɛlaa sɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa kʋpəma taa nɔɣɔlʋ lɩɩna .

text: He said unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? Peter answering said , The Christ of God .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pɔɔsa ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Na mɛ se , mə hʋʋkɩ sɩ ma kɛ ́ awe ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ nɔɣɔ təkpaʋ sɩ : N kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Mesii .

text: And he straitly charged them , and commanded them to tell no man that thing ;
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu kpaala - wɛɣɛ teu sɩ pá taa heeli - təɣɩ nɔɣɔlʋ .

text: Saying , The Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be slain , and be raised the third day .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ heela - wɛ tɔtɔ sɩ : Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má maa tɔɣɔ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ sɔsɔm . Nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma na kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa ká lɔ - m , halɩ pá kʋ - m . Ama maa fe kʋyɛɛŋ tooso wule .

text: And he said to them all , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross daily , and follow me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa pa tənaɣa heeluɣu sɩ : Wei ɩ caa sɩ ɩ ́ təŋɩ - m pʋntʋ ɩ ́ la ɩ təɣɩ awusa , na ɩ ́ səɣələɣɩ ɩ səm tesika kɛ paa ɩfemle nte , na ɩ ́ təŋəɣəna - m .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : but whosoever will lose his life for my sake , the same shall save it .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye wei ɩ pɛɛkəɣɩ ɩ weesuɣu təcututu , ɩ tɛŋna səpʋ . Ama wei ɩ ́ lapa ɩ təɣɩ awusa kɛ ma tɔɔ , pʋntʋ ká hikina weesuɣu .

text: For what is a man advantaged , if he gain the whole world , and lose himself , or be cast away ?
text2: Ye yʋlʋ pəsaa na ɩ ́ hiki antulinya nyəm təna , na ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ wakəlaa , yaa ɩ lapa yem , leɣelɛ pʋntʋ kasəyaɣa ɩlɛ ?

text: For whosoever shall be ashamed of me and of my words , of him shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he shall come in his own glory , and in his Father ' s , and of the holy angels .
text2: Ye wei ɩ səpa ma fɛɛlɛ yaa ma kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ fɛɛlɛ , Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má maa sɩ pʋntʋ fɛɛlɛ tɔtɔɣɔ waatʋ wei maa kɔnna ma teeli na ma Caa nyəŋ na ma ɩsɔtaa tillaa naŋŋ nyə ́ ma nyəŋ tɔ .

text: But I tell you of a truth , there be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the kingdom of God .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ , mpa pa wɛ cənɛ tɔ pa taa napəlɩ ká ná Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa na pə ́ cɔ ́ pá sɩ .

text: And it came to pass about an eight days after these sayings , he took Peter and John and James , and went up into a mountain to pray .
text2: Ɩ tɛma tɔm ntəɣɩ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ na kʋyakʋ siki kɛ ́ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpaɣa Piyɛɛ na Yohaanɩ na Saakɩ na pá kpa pʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ .

text: And as he prayed , the fashion of his countenance was altered , and his raiment was white and glistering .
text2: Ɩ tɔŋna sələmʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ɩsɛntaa laɣasɩ , na ɩ wontu hʋlʋmɩ , haləna tə tee kɔkɔ kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: And , behold , there talked with him two men , which were Moses and Elias :
text2: Tənaɣa pa tuta apalaa napələɣɩ ɩ kiŋ kɛ naalɛ na pá na - ɩ pá yɔɣɔtəɣɩ . Apalaa mpɛ sɛsɛ Moisi na Ilii kɛlɛ .

text: Who appeared in glory , and spake of his decease which he should accomplish at Jerusalem .
text2: Mpɛ pa kɔmna na ɩsɔtaa teu sɔsɔɔm , na pá yɔɣɔtəɣəna - ɩ ɩ kpente nte tə caa Yosalɛm kɛ lapʋ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ ka sɩɩwa tɔ tə tɔm .

text: But Peter and they that were with him were heavy with sleep : and when they were awake , they saw his glory , and the two men that stood with him .
text2: Mpʋ tɔ na Piyɛɛ na ɩ taapalaa pa tɔŋa tom kɛ pə fɛɩna . Paa na mpʋ pa fema , na pá ná Yesu teu sɔsɔɔm na apalaa mpa pa naalɛ pa səŋa ɩ kiŋ tɔ .

text: And it came to pass , as they departed from him , Peter said unto Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias : not knowing what he said .
text2: Pə kɔma ɩsɩɩ apalaa mpɛ pa yeki Yesu , ɩlɛna Piyɛɛ tɔ sɩ : Tacaa , ɩsɩɩ tə wɛʋ cənɛ ɩnɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , pə wɛ teu napələɣɩ te . Ɩlɛ pə mʋna ɩsɩɩ tə ́ siki coka toosoɣo . Nyaɣa lɛntɛ , Moisi kɛ lɛntɛ , na Ilii kɛ lɛntɛ . Nti ɩnɩ ɩ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ mpʋ tɔ tə lɩɩ yem kɛ ́ , ɩ ta na - tɩ .

text: While he thus spake , there came a cloud , and overshadowed them : and they feared as they entered into the cloud .
text2: Ɩ tɔŋa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtaɣa , ɩlɛna ɩsɔŋmʋntʋɣʋ nakʋlɩ kʋ kɔɔ na kʋ takɩ pa tɔɔ . Kʋ tɔŋa pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ tiiu , ɩlɛna sɔɣɔntʋ kpa Piyɛɛ - wɛɣɛ sɔsɔm .

text: And there came a voice out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa nɩɩ pə yɔɣɔta ɩsɔŋmʋntʋɣʋ tɛɛ sɩ : Ɩnəɣəlɛ ma Pəyaɣa kʋləsaɣa , ɩ ́ nɩɩna - kɛ .

text: And when the voice was past , Jesus was found alone . And they kept it close , and told no man in those days any of those things which they had seen .
text2: Pə yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ mpʋ na pə tɛ tɔ , Yesu tike ntɛ ́ pa naakɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ɩfalaa tɔka pə təna mpi pa nɩɩ mpʋ tɔɣɔ pa taa , pa ta yele na nɔɣɔlʋ nɩɩ - tɩ .

text: And it came to pass , that on the next day , when they were come down from the hill , much people met him .
text2: Pə kɔma pə fe na pá tiikina pʋɣʋ tɔɔ , ɩlɛna samaa anaam nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ katɩ Yesu .

text: And , behold , a man of the company cried out , saying , Master , I beseech thee , look upon my son : for he is mine only child .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ yɔɣɔtəna nɔɣɔ sɔsaɣa kɛ samaa ɩnɩ ɩ taa sɩ : Tacaa , ma wiina - ŋ nyənɩ ma pəyalʋ yee . Anɩ ɩ tike kɛ ma lʋlaa .

text: And , lo , a spirit taketh him , and he suddenly crieth out ; and it teareth him that he foameth again , and bruising him hardly departeth from him .
text2: Ye ɩlɔɣɔʋ kʋla ɩ tɔɔ ɩ makɩ kapusi kɛ ́ , na pə ́ pɛtɩ - ɩ atɛ na kuhulaŋ lɩɩkəna ɩ nɔɣɔ . Ye pə lapa - ɩ mpʋ , pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ na pə tʋɣʋ - ɩ wahala , pɩɩ cɛkɩ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ lɔŋ .

text: And I besought thy disciples to cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Ma wiina nyá ɩfalaa sɩ pá loo - ɩ , pa ta pəsɩ .

text: And Jesus answering said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you , and suffer you ? Bring thy son hither .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Laŋkpɩɩsəŋ nyə ́ ma na kʋtakɛɛsəŋ mɛ , wɛɛ ɩsənaɣa má na - mɛ tɩɩ caɣa na má tɔkɩ mə kʋnyɔŋ ? Kɔna nyá pəyalʋ ɩnəɣɩ cənɛ .

text: And as he was yet a coming , the devil threw him down , and tare him . And Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit , and healed the child , and delivered him again to his father .
text2: Pəyaɣa kpɛɣɛtəna - ɩ , ɩlɛna ɩlɔɣɔʋ selisi - kɛɣɛ teu , na ɩ ́ pɛtɩ - kɛɣɛ atɛ . Ama Yesu ná kaləna ɩlɔɣɔʋ na toŋ , na ɩ ́ la na pəyaɣa hiki alaafəya , na ɩ ́ cɛla - kɛɣɛ ka caa .

text: And they were all amazed at the mighty power of God . But while they wondered every one at all things which Jesus did , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ toma sɔsɔɔna anɛ a tɔm kpa pa tənaɣa sɔɣɔntʋ . Pa təna pa tɔŋna ɩ kʋlapʋtʋ tənaɣa sam , ɩlɛna Yesu heeli ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ :

text: Let these sayings sink down into your ears : for the Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men .
text2: Paa tʋ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa maɣa yəlaa niŋ taa , ɩ ́ nɩɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ teu yoo .

text: But they understood not this saying , and it was hid from them , that they perceived it not : and they feared to ask him of that saying .
text2: Ama Yesu ɩfalaa ná tá cɛkəna tɔm tənɛ ɩnɩ . Tə hʋwɛɛ ka wɛ - wɛɣɛ ɩŋmɛsaʋ kɛ ́ , sɩ pá taa cɛkəna tə tapʋɣʋ . Paa na mpʋ pa nyámna tə pɔɔsʋɣʋ .

text: Then there arose a reasoning among them , which of them should be greatest .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ɩfalaa hɔma sɔsɔɔntʋ tɔɔ sɩ pa naa sɩ pa taa aweɣelɛ sɔsɔ .

text: And Jesus , perceiving the thought of their heart , took a child , and set him by him ,
text2: Yesu ná cɛkəna pa lotu taa hʋwɛɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpaɣa peiya na ɩ ́ səŋsɩ - kɛɣɛ ɩ cɔlɔ ,

text: And said unto them , Whosoever shall receive this child in my name receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me receiveth him that sent me : for he that is least among you all , the same shall be great .
text2: na ɩ tɔ sɩ : Ye wei ɩ mʋ peiya kanɛɣɛ ma nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ , maɣa pʋntʋ mʋwa . Na wei ɩ ́ tɩɩ mʋ - m , ɩ mʋ wei ɩ tila - m tɔɣɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , wei ɩ ́ pəsa ɩsɩɩ mə taa səkpelu , pʋntʋ ntɛ ́ sɔsɔ .

text: And John answered and said , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name ; and we forbad him , because he followeth not with us .
text2: Tənaɣalɛ Yohaanɩ nɔɣɔ təkpaʋ sɩ : Tacaa tə na nɔɣɔlʋ na ɩ ́ looki alɔɣaa na nyá hətɛ , pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩɩ təŋəɣɩ - tʋ . Ɩlɛna taa kisina - ɩ .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Forbid him not : for he that is not against us is for us .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔwa sɩ : Ɩ ́ taa taŋɩ - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ taa la . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , yʋlʋ ɩ ́ ta kɛ mə kolontu , mə nyəŋ kɛ ́ te .

text: And it came to pass , when the time was come that he should be received up , he stedfastly set his face to go to Jerusalem ,
text2: Pə kɔma pə kpɛɣɛtəna Yesu kʋlʋɣʋ kɛ antulinya taa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sɩɩ sɩ ɩ ká polo Yosalɛm .

text: And sent messengers before his face : and they went , and entered into a village of the Samaritans , to make ready for him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kʋsa yəlaa na ɩ ́ tɛləsɩ nɔɣɔ sɩ pá polo Samalii ɩcaliya kalɩ ka taa , na pá caa - ɩ təsʋʋlɛ .

text: And they did not receive him , because his face was as though he would go to Jerusalem .
text2: Ama pɛlɛ pa kisa - ɩ mʋɣʋ , sɩ ɩ pukina Yosalɛm tɔɔ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: And when his disciples James and John saw this , they said , Lord , wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven , and consume them , even as Elias did ?
text2: Ɩ ɩfalaa Saakɩ na Yohaanɩ pa ná mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá tɔ sɩ : Tacaa , yaa tə yele na ɩsɔtaa kɔkɔ tii na ká nyaɣa - wɛ ?

text: But he turned , and rebuked them , and said , Ye know not what manner of spirit ye are of .
text2: Ama Yesu pəsa pa tɔɔ na ɩ ́ kaləna - wɛ .

text: For the Son of man is not come to destroy men ' s lives , but to save them . And they went to another village .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá tɛɛ ɩcatɛ lɛntɛ taa .

text: And it came to pass , that , as they went in the way , a certain man said unto him , Lord , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa wɛ mpaaʋ taa na pá tɔŋa pote tɔ nɔɣɔlʋ tɔma Yesu sɩ : Maa təŋəɣɩ - ŋ nyá təpote təna taa .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Foxes have holes , and birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Mpʋɣʋlɛ Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Taalɛ hasɩ wɛna sɩ lona na sumasɩ ná wɛna sɩ tana . Ama Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má , ma fɛɩna nyʋɣʋ tətʋlɛ maɣamaɣa .

text: And he said unto another , Follow me . But he said , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu tɔ lɛlʋ sɩ : Nyaa kɔɔ na ń təŋɩ - m . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ tɔma sɩ : Tacaa , yele má polo má pi ma caa na pə ́ cɔ ́ .

text: Jesus said unto him , Let the dead bury their dead : but go thou and preach the kingdom of God .
text2: Tənaɣalɛ Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Yele na sətaa pi pa sətaa . Ama nyaa polo na ń kpaalɩ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa tɔm .

text: And another also said , Lord , I will follow thee ; but let me first go bid them farewell , which are at home at my house .
text2: Ɩlɛna lɛlʋ náá tɔ sɩ : Tacaa maa təŋɩ - ŋ , ɩlɛ yele na má polo má la ma nyə ́ ma kɛ pə lapa wulee na pə ́ cɔ ́ .

text: And Jesus said unto him , No man , having put his hand to the plough , and looking back , is fit for the kingdom of God .
text2: Ama Yesu cɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ sɩ : Ye yʋlʋ kpaɣa akuɣu sɩ ɩ haləɣɩ na ɩ ́ nyənəɣəna kpaɩ taa , pʋntʋ ta mʋna Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa .

text: After these things the Lord appointed other seventy also , and sent them two and two before his face into every city and place , whither he himself would come .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ Tacaa tasa apalaa nɩɩtoso na naanʋwa na naalɛɣɛ ləsʋɣʋ , na ɩ ́ tili - wɛɣɛ naalɛ naalɛɣɛ acalɛɛ na timpiwɛ ɩ wɛɛ sɩ ɩ puki tɔ .

text: Therefore said he unto them , The harvest truly is great , but the labourers are few : pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he would send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Kʋmtʋ tɔɔwaɣa , ama kʋntaa fɛɩna . Ɩ ́ sələmɩ hatʋcɛ na ɩ ́ sɔɔsɩ kʋntaa kɔnaʋ kɛ lɔŋ kɛ ɩ kʋmtʋ taa .

text: Go your ways : behold , I send you forth as lambs among wolves .
text2: Tɔʋ , ɩ ́ polo , ɩsɩɩ ma tiluɣu - mɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , ɩ ́ pəsaa kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ heeŋ kɛ taalɛ hasɩ hɛkʋ .

text: Carry neither purse , nor scrip , nor shoes : and salute no man by the way .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa kpaɣa liɣitee yaa huluɣu , ɩ ́ taa kpɩ ntaŋkpala , pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ taa paasəna yəlaa sɛɛʋ kɛ mpaaʋ taa .

text: And into whatsoever house ye enter , first say , Peace be to this house .
text2: Ye ɩ ́ sʋʋ təyaɣa ŋka ka taa ɩ ́ kooliɣi sɩ : Alaafəya ɩ ́ tɔɔ təyaɣa kanɛ ka tɔɔ , na pə ́ cɔ ́ .

text: And if the son of peace be there , your peace shall rest upon it : if not , it shall turn to you again .
text2: Ɩlɛ ye pə kɛ ́ sɩ təyaɣa tʋ sɔɔla alaafəya , mə koolee anɩ a ka təŋɩ - ɩ . Tɔfɔ ye pə taɣa mpʋ , kʋlʋmaa mɛ mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ mə koolee anɩ a taɣanəɣɩ məlʋɣʋ .

text: And in the same house remain , eating and drinking such things as they give : for the labourer is worthy of his hire . Go not from house to house .
text2: Ɩ ́ caɣa təyaɣa ŋka ka taa na pá cɛla - mɛɣɛ mpi , ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ nyɔɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , təmlɛ tʋ mʋna pá fɛlɩ - ɩ kɛ ́ . Ɩ ́ taa laɣasəɣɩ tɛɛsɩ kɛ yem yem .

text: And into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you , eat such things as are set before you :
text2: Paa ɩcatɛ nte tə taa kɛ ́ ɩ sʋʋwa na pá mʋ - mɛ na pá cɛla - mɛɣɛ pʋlʋ , ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ .

text: And heal the sick that are therein , and say unto them , The kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: Ɩ ́ waasɩ pa kʋtɔntʋnaa , na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa sʋʋ mə tɛɛ kɛ ́ .

text: But into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you not , go your ways out into the streets of the same , and say ,
text2: Ye ɩ ́ sʋʋ ɩcatɛ nte tə taa na tə yəlaa ɩ ́ ta mʋ - mɛ , ɩ ́ lɩɩ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ :

text: Even the very dust of your city , which cleaveth on us , we do wipe off against you : notwithstanding be ye sure of this , that the kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: Tə kpiisiɣi mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ mə maɣamaɣa mə ɩcatɛ mʋsʋɣʋ ŋku kʋ taana ta nɔɔhɛɛ tɔ . Ɩlɛ paa na mpʋ , ɩ ́ nyɩ teu kɛ ́ sɩ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa sʋʋ mə tɛɛ mə tɛɛ na ká lɩɩ .

text: But I say unto you , that it shall be more tolerable in that day for Sodom , than for that city .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ Sɔtɔm ká la sana na ɩcatɛ ntɛɣɛ tənaɣa hʋʋlɛ wule kɛ suulu hʋlʋɣʋ tɔm taa .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works had been done in Tyre and Sidon , which have been done in you , they had a great while ago repented , sitting in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: Haɩ , Colasɛŋ nyə ́ ma mɛ , mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo . Haɩ , Pɛtɛsaita nyə ́ ma mɛ , mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo kɛ ́ . Piti təma nna pa lapa - yɛɣɛ mə hɛkʋ taa tɔ , ye ɩsɩɩ ɩsəntɔ Tiii na Sitɔŋ kɛ paa lapa - yɛ , paa tɛma pa ɩsaɣatʋ lɔʋ kɛ lɔŋ , halɩ pá suu fɔlətɔnaa na pá caɣa hula taa .

text: But it shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the judgment , than for you .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ paa hʋlɩ suulu kɛ Tiii na Sitɔŋ pə nyə ́ ma kɛ hʋʋlɛ kʋyakʋ wule na pə kəlɩ - mɛ .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted to heaven , shalt be thrust down to hell .
text2: Pə kaasʋɣʋ Kapənahum nyá tɔ , n hʋʋ sɩ n ká pɩɩ na ń kaləsəna hatoo ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ na ? Ama paa tisi - ŋ kɛ ́ təfɛ kɛ tuu tənaasəlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa .

text: He that heareth you heareth me ; and he that despiseth you despiseth me ; and he that despiseth me despiseth him that sent me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ tasa ɩ ɩfalaa kɛ heeluɣu sɩ : Yʋlʋ ɩ ́ nɩɩkəna - mɛ , maɣa pʋntʋ nɩɩkəna . Wei ɩ ́ kisa - mɛ , ma ɩnɩ tɔtɔɣɔ pʋntʋ kisaa . Na wei ɩ ́ kisa - m , ɩ ́ kisa wei ɩ tila - m tɔɣɔ .

text: And the seventy returned again with joy , saying , Lord , even the devils are subject unto us through thy name .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa nɩɩtoso na naanʋwa na naalɛ məla ɩ kiŋ na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ , na pá tɔŋ sɩ : Tacaa nyá tɔɔ alɔɣaa maɣamaɣa nɩɩna - tʋ .

text: And he said unto them , I beheld Satan as lightning fall from heaven .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ma nawa Satanɩ na ɩ ́ hotiɣina ɩsɔtaa ɩsɩɩ tɛʋ nyəɣəsʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: Behold , I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions , and over all the power of the enemy : and nothing shall by any means hurt you .
text2: Ɩlɛ ma ha - mɛɣɛ toma sɩ ɩ ́ tɔ tʋmaa tɔɔ , na pəcɛsɩ tɔɔ , na kolontu toma təna tɔɔ , pʋlʋ kaa la - mɛ .

text: Notwithstanding in this rejoice not , that the spirits are subject unto you ; but rather rejoice , because your names are written in heaven .
text2: Ɩlɛ paa na mpʋ mə laŋa ɩ ́ taa hʋləmɩ sɩ alɔɣaa se - mɛ . Ama a hʋləmɩ kɛ ́ sɩ pa ŋmaa mə həla kɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: In that hour Jesus rejoiced in spirit , and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , that thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes : even so , Father ; for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Tənaɣa Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ lapa na Yesu laŋlɛ hʋləmɩ sɔsɔm . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ma Caa , ɩsɔtaa na atɛ pə tʋ , ma sɛɛ - ŋ . N ŋmɛsa tɔm tənɛɣɛ ləmaɣasɛɛ nyə ́ ma na nyəntaa , ɩlɛna ń kuli - təɣɩ piya . Ma Caa , pɔpɔtʋ fɛɩ , ma sɛɛ - ŋ , nyá ɩnɩ nyá luɣu tɩɩ lapəna mpʋ .

text: All things are delivered to me of my Father : and no man knoweth who the Son is , but the Father ; and who the Father is , but the Son , and he to whom the Son will reveal him .
text2: Ama ma Caa cɛla - m pə tənaɣa . Ye pə taɣa ma Caa tike , nɔɣɔlʋ ta nyɩ sɩ aweɣelɛ Pəyalʋ . Na ye pə taɣa Pəyalʋ tike , nɔɣɔlʋ ta nyɩ sɩ aweɣelɛ Cɛcɛ . Aŋha , ye Pəyalʋ nɔkənaa sɩ ɩ hʋləɣɩ wei pə paasi .

text: And he turned him unto his disciples , and said privately , Blessed are the eyes which see the things that ye see :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ pəsəna ɩ ɩfalaa tike tɔɔ na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Mpi mpi mə ɩsəpee naakɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , leleŋ kɛ ɩ ́ nɩɩwa .

text: For I tell you , that many prophets and kings have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ , Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa paɣalɛ na awulaa sɔsaa paɣalɛ nyɩɩlaa sɩ pá ná mpi mə naakɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , na pá laŋ . Pəyele pa nyɩɩlaa tɔtɔ sɩ pá nɩɩ nti mə nɩɩkɩ tɔ , na pá kpisi .

text: And , behold , a certain lawyer stood up , and tempted him , saying , Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kʋlaa sɩ ɩ maɣasəɣɩ Yesu . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tacaa , ntiɣi má la na má hiki weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ ?

text: He said unto him , What is written in the law ? how readest thou ?
text2: Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Susuweɣe pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa ? Na n kaləɣɩ tɔ , hʋwɛɛ nnaɣa n nɩɩkɩ pə taa ?

text: And he answering said , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy strength , and with all thy mind ; and thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ma nɩɩkɩ sɩ n ká sɔɔlɩ Tacaa nyá Ɩsɔ na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ na nyá ləsaɣa sʋʋ - ɩ təmamam kɛ paa mpi pə taa , na n sɔɔlɩ nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ ɩsɩɩ nyá tɩ .

text: And he said unto him , Thou hast answered right : this do , and thou shalt live .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Ama n cɔ teu . Aŋha , lakɩ mpʋ , n ka hiki weesuɣu .

text: But he , willing to justify himself , said unto Jesus , And who is my neighbour ?
text2: Ɩnɩ ɩ caakaɣa sɩ paa na mpʋ ɩ tɔm ɩ te , ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ lɛ ɩ tasa Yesu kɛ ́ pɔɔsʋɣʋ sɩ : Na aweɣelɛ ɩsɩɩ ma tɔɣɔntəlɛ ɩnɩ ɩlɛ ?

text: And Jesus answering said , A certain man went down from Jerusalem to Jericho , and fell among thieves , which stripped him of his raiment , and wounded him , and departed , leaving him half dead .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tɔʋ , yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ lɩɩnna Yosalɛm na ɩ ́ pukina Yeliko , na ɩ ́ lɩɩ ŋmɩɩlaa tɔɔ na pá kpa - ɩ na pá wɔɣɔsɩ ɩ wontu na pá mapɩ - ɩ ɩsɩɩ ɩsəna mpi pə wɛɛ tɔ . Ɩlɛna pá tɛɛ pa yele - ɩ na ɩ ́ kaasa weesuɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ .

text: And by chance there came down a certain priest that way : and when he saw him , he passed by on the other side .
text2: Pə pamna kɔtʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ná təŋaɣa mpaaʋ ŋkʋ . Ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ na - ɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ cɔlɔ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ .

text: And likewise a Levite , when he was at the place , came and looked on him , and passed by on the other side .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Lefii tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ná talaa na ɩ ́ maɣana - ɩ mpʋ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ cɔlɔ tɔtɔ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ .

text: But a certain Samaritan , as he journeyed , came where he was : and when he saw him , he had compassion on him ,
text2: Ama Samalii tʋ tɔntʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ná tala təna na ɩ ́ na apalʋ ɩnɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ tɔm lapɩ - ɩ pətɔɔtəlɛ kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: And went to him , and bound up his wounds , pouring in oil and wine , and set him on his own beast , and brought him to an inn , and took care of him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ hɛla ɩ kiŋ , na ɩ ́ taa nim na kɔɔlɛ kɛ ɩ hiŋ taa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpɛɛlɩ - ɩ saalasɩ , na ɩ ́ caɣasɩ - ɩ ɩ kpaŋaɣa tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ pona - ɩ mʋʋlaa təsʋʋlɛ na ɩ ́ paasəna - ɩ teu .

text: And on the morrow when he departed , he took out two pence , and gave them to the host , and said unto him , Take care of him ; and whatsoever thou spendest more , when I come again , I will repay thee .
text2: Kʋ fema ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ləsɩ liɣitee nyəɣətʋ naalɛ na ɩ ́ cɛla mʋʋlaa təsʋʋlɛ tʋ , na ɩ ́ heeli - ɩ sɩ : Paasəna - ɩ teu , na ń tɩɩ tɔɣa ɩ nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ na pə tɛɛ mpʋ , ma kɔma , maa fɛlɩ - ŋ yoo .

text: Which now of these three , thinkest thou , was neighbour unto him that fell among the thieves ?
text2: Tɔʋ , pa tooso ɩnɩ pa taa , aweɣe n hʋʋ sɩ ŋmɩɩlaa mapa wei ɩnɩ tɔ ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ ɩlɛ ?

text: And he said , He that shewed mercy on him . Then said Jesus unto him , Go , and do thou likewise .
text2: Ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsʋlʋ ɩnɩ ɩ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Wei ɩnɩ ɩ lapa - ɩ kʋpantʋ tɔ . Mpʋɣʋlɛ Yesu sɩ : Tɔʋ , polo na nyá maɣamaɣa ń lakɩ mpʋ .

text: Now it came to pass , as they went , that he entered into a certain village : and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house .
text2: Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa tɔŋna pote , ɩlɛna pá tala ɩcatɛ natəlɩ na alʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ lapɩ - ɩ mʋʋllɛ . Pa yaa alʋ ɩnɩ sɩ Maləta .

text: And she had a sister called Mary , which also sat at Jesus ' feet , and heard his word .
text2: Ɩ wɛna neu , pa yaa - ɩ sɩ Malɩ . Ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ka caɣa Tacaa nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ ɩ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ .

text: But Martha was cumbered about much serving , and came to him , and said , Lord , dost thou not care that my sister hath left me to serve alone ? bid her therefore that she help me .
text2: Taɣa tɔɔ təma kpəpa Maləta , ɩlɛna pə pɛkəlɩ - ɩ ɩ taa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kɔma Tacaa kiŋ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩsɩɩ ma neu yeluɣu - m ma tike na má cɔɔkəna taɣa kɛ ɩsəntɔ ɩnɩ tɔ pə wɛ - ŋ teu ntɛ ́ ma cɛ ? Pəlɛ pə tɔɔ tɔ , heeli - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ səna - m .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto her , Martha , Martha , thou art careful and troubled about many things :
text2: Mpʋɣʋlɛ Tacaa ná cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Haɩ , Maləta , n kʋɣɩ nyá təɣɩ yem kɛ ́ na ń kpetiliɣina təma paɣalɛ .

text: But one thing is needful : and Mary hath chosen that good part , which shall not be taken away from her .
text2: Pəyele mpi pə waasəɣɩ tɔ pə kɛ ́ kʋlʋməm tike kɛ ́ . Malɩ ləsəna təpantɛ , ɩ ́ na nɔɣɔlʋ pa kaa hɔ .

text: And it came to pass , that , as he was praying in a certain place , when he ceased , one of his disciples said unto him , Lord , teach us to pray , as John also taught his disciples .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ Yesu caɣa tiili na ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ . Ɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ tɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - tʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ ɩsɩɩ Yohaanɩ ná hʋ ́ lʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ɩfalaa tɔ .

text: And he said unto them , When ye pray , say , Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name . Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done , as in heaven , so in earth .
text2: Mpʋɣʋlɛ Yesu heela - wɛ sɩ : Ye ɩ caa sələmʋɣʋ ɩ ́ sələmɩ sɩ : Tacaa , nyá hətɛ ɩ ́ wɛɛ katɛ . Tɔɣɔ nyá kawulaɣa .

text: Give us day by day our daily bread .
text2: Haakɩ - tʋɣʋ paa ɩfemle nteɣe tɔɣɔnaɣa .

text: And forgive us our sins ; for we also forgive every one that is indebted to us . And lead us not into temptation ; but deliver us from evil .
text2: Hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ - tʋɣʋ suulu kɛ timpi tə pəntəɣəna - ŋ tɔ , ɩsɩɩ tá tɔtɔ tá hʋlʋɣʋʋ suulu kɛ mpa pa pəntəɣəna ta tɔ . Taa yele na tə ́ sʋʋ maɣasʋɣʋ ɩsaɣaʋ taa .

text: And he said unto them , Which of you shall have a friend , and shall go unto him at midnight , and say unto him , Friend , lend me three loaves ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ heeluɣu tɔtɔ sɩ : Ye ɩsɩɩ mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ wɛna taapalʋ ntɛ ́ , na pʋntʋ polo ahoo hɛka na ɩ ́ maɣana - ɩ sɩ : Haɩ , ma taapalʋ , kəntɩ - m potopotonaa tooso .

text: For a friend of mine in his journey is come to me , and I have nothing to set before him ?
text2: Ma taapalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ lɩɩnna ntɛɣɛ mpaa na ɩ ́ tala - m nɔɔnɔɔ , pə ́ cɔ ́ ma fɛɩna mpi maa cɛlɛ - ɩ tɔ .

text: And he from within shall answer and say , Trouble me not : the door is now shut , and my children are with me in bed ; I cannot rise and give thee .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ náá cɔ - ɩ hatoo pə taa sɩ : Taa caalɩ - m mpʋ . Má na ma piya tə tɛma sʋʋʋ na tə ́ təkɩ na tə ́ kaləsɩ . Maa pəsəɣɩ má tasa kʋlʋɣʋ kɛ nyá tɔɣɔnaɣa cɛlʋɣʋ tɔɔ .

text: I say unto you , Though he will not rise and give him , because he is his friend , yet because of his importunity he will rise and give him as many as he needeth .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ , paa ɩ kɔma ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ cɛlɛ - ɩ ɩ kʋlaŋəm təna , pə taɣa taapallɛ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ lapa mpʋ , ama caalʋɣʋ kɛ ɩ kisaa .

text: And I say unto you , Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you .
text2: Ɩlɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ sɩ ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ , paa ha - mɛɣɛ , ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ , ɩ ́ hikiɣi kɛ ́ , ɩ ́ makɩ , pa tʋləɣɩ - mɛɣɛ .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Sələməlʋ kɛ pa haakɩ , na pɛɛkəlʋ hikiɣina , na matʋ kɛ pa tʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ .

text: If a son shall ask bread of any of you that is a father , will he give him a stone ? or if he ask a fish , will he for a fish give him a serpent ?
text2: Wulee mə taa awe pəyaɣa sələma - ɩ potopoto na pʋntʋ cɛlɛ - kɛɣɛ pəlɛ ye ? Yaa ye ka sələma - ɩ tinte pʋntʋ cɛlɛ - kɛɣɛ tʋm .

text: Or if he shall ask an egg , will he offer him a scorpion ?
text2: Yaa mə taa awe pəyaɣa sələməna - ɩ yatɛ , na pʋntʋ cɛlɛ - kɛɣɛ pəcɛka ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children : how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him ?
text2: Ye asaɣaa mɛ mɩɩ pəsa mə piya kɛ kʋpantʋ lapʋ , Tacaa wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩ kaa cɛla ɩ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kɛ mpa pa sələməɣɩ - ɩ tɔ ?

text: And he was casting out a devil , and it was dumb . And it came to pass , when the devil was gone out , the dumb spake ; and the people wondered .
text2: Yesu loo ɩlɔɣɔhilu kaayɔɣɔtaɣa , ɩlɛna ɩlɔɣɔʋ se . Ɩ se ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩlɛna kamumuka sʋʋ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ na pə la samaa kɛ piti kɛ ́ sɔsɔm .

text: But some of them said , He casteth out devils through Beelzebub the chief of the devils .
text2: Mpʋɣʋlɛ pa taa lɛlaa pəsənaa sɩ : Pesepule toŋ kɛ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔɣɔnəɣəna alɔɣaa lɛmpa .

text: And others , tempting him , sought of him a sign from heaven .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu tɔm tʋlaa taa lɛlaa náá tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : La piti təmlɛ na pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ Ɩsɔ toŋ kɛ n lakəna . Pa yɔɣɔta ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pa naa ɩ waalɩ .

text: But he , knowing their thoughts , said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and a house divided against a house falleth .
text2: Yesu ná cɛkəna pa taa hʋwɛɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ye kawulaɣa wɛɛ na ká fɛɩ nɔɣɔ kʋlʋmaɣa , nɔɔnɔɔ ka yawaɣa . Təyaɣa ɩ ́ wɛ mpʋ , kɛlɛ ka yɔkəɣɩ kɛ ́ .

text: If Satan also be divided against himself , how shall his kingdom stand ? because ye say that I cast out devils through Beelzebub .
text2: Ye Satanɩ kawulaɣa nyə ́ ma yooki pa taa pa tike , ɩ kawulaɣa nyʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ ka ɩsəna ? Mpi tɔ , mə tɔŋ sɩ Pesepule toŋ kɛ ma lookina alɔɣaa .

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your sons cast them out ? therefore shall they be your judges .
text2: Ye Pesepule toŋ kɛ ma lookina alɔɣaa ɩsɩɩ mə hʋʋkʋɣʋ tɔ , ɩlɛ awe toŋ kɛ mə pəyalaa ná lookina pa nyə ́ ma ? Tənaɣa pa maɣamaɣa paa kʋna mə tɔm .

text: But if I with the finger of God cast out devils , no doubt the kingdom of God is come upon you .
text2: Ama ye Ɩsɔ toŋ taa kɛ ́ ma lookina alɔɣaa , ɩlɛ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa wɛ mə tɛɛ mə tɛɛ kɛlɛ .

text: When a strong man armed keepeth his palace , his goods are in peace :
text2: Yʋlʋ toŋ tʋ ɩ ́ taŋa ɩ təyaɣa kɛ teu na yoou wontu , pʋlʋpʋ ɩɩ tokiɣina ɩ wɛnaʋ .

text: But when a stronger than he shall come upon him , and overcome him , he taketh from him all his armour wherein he trusted , and divideth his spoils .
text2: Ama wei ɩ kəla - ɩ toŋ tɔ ɩ ́ kɔma na ɩ ́ kʋlɩ ɩ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ pəsɩ - ɩ , ɩlɛ ɩ lɛɛkəɣɩ ɩ yoou wontu nti ɩnɩ ɩ taakaɣa tɔɣɔ , na ɩ ́ məŋna ɩ wɛnaʋ mpɩ , na ɩ ́ tala lɛlaa .

text: He that is not with me is against me : and he that gathereth not with me scattereth .
text2: Wei ɩ fɛɩ ma tɔɔ , pʋntʋ kɛ ́ ma kolontu kɛ ́ . Wei ɩɩ səŋna - m tɔɔsʋɣʋ tɔ , ɩ yaasəɣɩ kɛ ́ .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest ; and finding none , he saith , I will return unto my house whence I came out .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Ye pa loowa ɩlɔɣɔʋ , wʋlaɣa taa kɛ ́ ɩ cɔɔkɩ sɩ ɩ ́ hɛɛsɩ . Ɩ laŋəɣɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ taɣanɩ ɩ taa sɩ : Maa məlɩ təyaɣa ŋka ka taa maa lɩɩwa tɔɣɔ .

text: And when he cometh , he findeth it swept and garnished .
text2: Ɩ takɩ kɛlɛ ka taa , ɩlɛ ɩ ká maɣana pa hasa - kɛ na pá taɣanɩ pə tənaɣa teu .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh to him seven other spirits more wicked than himself ; and they enter in , and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first .
text2: Pəlɛ tɔ , ɩ puki kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ caa alɔɣaa lɛlaa mpa pa kəla ɩnəɣɩ ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɣɔ naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa , na pá kɔɔ na pá caɣa təyaɣa ŋkɛ ka taa . Ɩlɛna lɔŋ nyəntʋ náá məlɩ na tə ́ la sana na nɔɔnɔɔ nyəntʋ .

text: And it came to pass , as he spake these things , a certain woman of the company lifted up her voice , and said unto him , Blessed is the womb that bare thee , and the paps which thou hast sucked .
text2: Yesu tɔŋna ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna alʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ yɔɣɔtəna nɔɣɔ sɔsaɣa kɛ samaa taa sɩ : Pʋwɛ nyá too wei ɩ lʋla - ŋ na ń mʋsɩ - ɩ tɔ , ɩ nyʋleleŋ wɛ sɔɣɔntʋ .

text: But he said , Yea rather , blessed are they that hear the word of God , and keep it .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ alʋ ɩnɩ sɩ : Mpa pa nɩɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm na pá tɔkɩ - tɩ , pʋntʋnaa ntɛ ́ nyʋleleŋ nyə ́ ma te .

text: And when the people were gathered thick together , he began to say , This is an evil generation : they seek a sign ; and there shall no sign be given it , but the sign of Jonas the prophet .
text2: Samaa tɔŋna - ɩ nyəkʋɣʋ kɛ sɔsɔm , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sʋʋ ɩ faaci taa sɩ : Kʋfalaŋ yəlaa panɛ asaɣaa kɛ ́ . Piti təmlɛ nte tə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ sɩ Ɩsɔ lakəna tɔɣɔ mpɛ pa caakɩ . Ɩlɛ pa kaa na natəlɩ , ye pə taɣa Yonaasɩ nyəntɛ .

text: For as Jonas was a sign unto the Ninevites , so shall also the Son of man be to this generation .
text2: Ɩsəna mpi pə lapa Yonaasɩ kiŋ tɔ pə hʋla Ninifi nyə ́ ma kɛ ́ sɩ Ɩsɔ lakəna . Na mpʋ ɩnɩ tɔtɔɣɔ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma nyəntʋ ká hʋ ́ lɩ ́ kʋfalaŋ yəlaa tɔtɔ sɩ Ɩsɔ lakəna .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation , and condemn them : for she came from the utmost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Ye pə tala hʋʋlɛ wule , ilim mpətəŋ tɔɔ wulaʋ alʋ nyəŋ ká kʋ kʋfalaŋ yəlaa panɛ pa tɔm kɛ mpi pə tɔɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ka lɩɩ hatoo tɛtʋ pooluŋ taa na ɩ ́ kɔɔ , sɩ ɩ nɩɩkɩ ɩsəna Salʋmɔŋ yɔɣɔtəna ləmaɣasɛɛ tɔ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ pʋlʋpʋ wɛ cənɛ na pə ́ tɛɛ Salʋmɔŋ təcaɣacaɣa .

text: The men of Nineve shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Ye pə tala hʋʋlɛ wule Ninifi nyə ́ ma ká kʋ kʋfalaŋ yəlaa panɛ pa tɔm . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , kʋyaŋku pɛlɛ pa nɩɩ Yonaasɩ waasʋ tɔ , pa yela pa ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ kpakpaa kɛ ́ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ pʋlʋpʋ wɛ cənɛ na pə tɛɛ Yonaasɩ ɩnɩ .

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , putteth it in a secret place , neither under a bushel , but on a candlestick , that they which come in may see the light .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ ɩɩ mʋsəɣɩ fətəla na ɩ ́ ŋmɛsɩ - ɩ , yaa ɩ ́ pamɩ - ɩ nyanaɣa tɛɛ . Ama ɩ sɩɩ - ɩ timpi taa ɩ ́ wɛɛ pɩɩ naa yəlaa təna tɔɣɔ . Ɩlɛna mpa pa kɔŋ tɔ , fətəla kɔkɔ na - wɛ .

text: The light of the body is the eye : therefore when thine eye is single , thy whole body also is full of light ; but when thine eye is evil , thy body also is full of darkness .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ na nyá ɩsɛ . Anɩ a kɛna nyá tɔnʋɣʋ pəlimile fətəla . Ye nyá ɩsɛ ɩ ́ naakɩ teu , pə waasəɣɩ nyá tɔnʋɣʋ tənaɣa . Ama ye nyá ɩsɛ ɩ ́ yʋlʋmaa , nyá tɔnʋɣʋ təna pəlimile wɛ səkpɛtʋɣʋ tɛɛ kɛ ́ .

text: Take heed therefore that the light which is in thee be not darkness .
text2: La laakalɩ , pə taa kɔɔ na ɩsəna n naakɩ tɔ pə məlɩ səkpɛtʋɣʋ .

text: If thy whole body therefore be full of light , having no part dark , the whole shall be full of light , as when the bright shining of a candle doth give thee light .
text2: Pə wɛ mpʋ tɔ , ye n naa təcɛɩcɛɩ , na pə fɛɩ - ŋ təyuɣulee , n naa teu kɛ ́ , ɩsɩɩ fətəla kɔkɔ naakʋɣʋ yʋlʋ tɔ səkpɛtʋɣʋ fɛɩ .

text: And as he spake , a certain Pharisee besought him to dine with him : and he went in , and sat down to meat .
text2: Yesu tɛma yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna Falisa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ yaa - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ sʋʋ ɩ tɛ na ɩ ́ nyɔɔ lʋm . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu sʋʋwa Falisa tɛ na ɩ ́ niki tɔɣɔʋ .

text: And when the Pharisee saw it , he marvelled that he had not first washed before dinner .
text2: Falisa nawa ɩ tɔkɩ na ɩ ́ nyɔɔkəna asilima , ɩlɛna pə lapɩ - ɩ ha .

text: And the Lord said unto him , Now do ye Pharisees make clean the outside of the cup and the platter ; but your inward part is full of ravening and wickedness .
text2: Tənaɣa Tacaa tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Anɩ Falisanaa mə nyəntʋ ntɛ ́ mpʋ . Iyisi na nyənasɩ waalənaa kɛ ɩ ́ nyaaləɣɩ təlaɩlaɩ . Ama pə kpaɣaʋ mə taanaa tɔ , ŋmɩɩləm na ɩsaɣatʋ pə hʋwɛɛ maɣaləna .

text: Ye fools , did not he that made that which is without make that which is within also ?
text2: Ləmaɣasɛɛ fɛɩnaa mɛ , Ɩsɔ wei ɩ ŋma yʋlʋ tɔɔ tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ wɛna ɩ tɩ na wei ɩ ŋma yʋlʋ lotu taa tɔ yɛɛ ?

text: But rather give alms of such things as ye have ; and , behold , all things are clean unto you .
text2: Pə kəla teu sɩ ɩ ́ ha mpi ɩ wɛna mə iyisi na mə nyənasɩ taa tɔɣɔ kʋnyɔntʋnaa , ɩlɛ pə təna pɩɩ wɛɛ - mɛɣɛ teu .

text: But woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye tithe mint and rue and all manner of herbs , and pass over judgment and the love of God : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: Pɔpɔtʋ fɛɩ , Falisanaa mɛ , mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo kɛ ́ . Ɩ ́ kpɛsəɣɩ nyɩɩtʋ nti pa yaakɩ sɩ mantɩ na luu tɔ na tuusi hatʋ təna na ɩ ́ hiliɣi na ɩ ́ ləsəɣɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ pə hɔɣɔləŋ naanʋwa taa kʋlʋm . Pəyele mə paa fɛɩna tampana təŋʋɣʋ na Ɩsɔ sɔɔlʋɣʋ tɔm . Ama tampana təŋʋɣʋ na Ɩsɔ sɔɔlʋɣʋ tɔm kɛ pɩɩ mʋna ɩ ́ sɛɛsəna ɩsəlɛ , ɩlɛ ɩ ́ taa sɔɔ hɔɣɔləŋ naanʋwa taa kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: Woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye love the uppermost seats in the synagogues , and greetings in the markets .
text2: Falisanaa mɛ , mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo kɛ ́ . Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa taa , teeli teeli təcaɣalɛnaa kɛ ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ . Na ɩ ́ sɔɔla pa sɛɛkɩ - mɛɣɛ samaa taa kɛ ́ na pá luŋiɣi .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are as graves which appear not , and the men that walk over them are not aware of them .
text2: Falisanaa mɛ , mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo kɛ ́ . Ɩ ́ wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ pəlaaŋ wei ɩ salətaa na pá tɔŋ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ yem , na pá ta nyɩ sɩ pəlaaŋ tɔ .

text: Then answered one of the lawyers , and said unto him , Master , thus saying thou reproachest us also .
text2: Tənaɣa Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlʋ sɔsɔ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ pəsəna - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , n yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ mpʋ tɔ n kpɛntəna tá tɔtɔɣɔ na ń tʋʋ .

text: And he said , Woe unto you also , ye lawyers ! for ye lade men with burdens grievous to be borne , and ye yourselves touch not the burdens with one of your fingers .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔwa sɩ : Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa sɔsaa mɛ , mə tɔm ná wɛ waɩyo tɔtɔɣɔ . Ɩ ́ sʋkəɣɩ yəlaa kɛ səɣəla yuŋ nyəna . Pəyele mɩɩ tɩɩ taa - wɛɣɛ taaʋ maɣamaɣa .

text: Woe unto you ! for ye build the sepulchres of the prophets , and your fathers killed them .
text2: Waɩyo na mə tɔm kɛ ́ , mə caanaa ná kʋna Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa , na mɩɩ hələɣɩ pa pəlaaŋ na ɩ ́ taɣanəɣɩ tətetete .

text: Truly ye bear witness that ye allow the deeds of your fathers : for they indeed killed them , and ye build their sepulchres .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ lakʋɣʋ mpʋ tɔ , pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ kɛ ́ sɩ mə laŋa hɛɛna mə caanaa lapa mpi tɔ . Pɛlɛ pa kʋna Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa , na mə hələɣəna pa pəlaaŋ .

text: Therefore also said the wisdom of God , I will send them prophets and apostles , and some of them they shall slay and persecute :
text2: Pə maɣamaɣa pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ ləmaɣasɛɛ ka hʋla mpʋ sɩ : Ɩsɔ má , maa tili Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa na tillaa kɛ pa kiŋ . Ama paa kʋ lɛlaa , na paa tʋ lɛlaa kɛ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ kʋtʋɣʋ .

text: That the blood of all the prophets , which was shed from the foundation of the world , may be required of this generation ;
text2: Tuu pə ŋmaʋ antulinya na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa mpa pá kʋ tɔ , kaɣana nyə ́ ma nyɔɔŋ taa kɛ ́ pa səm tɔm ká tɛna .

text: From the blood of Abel unto the blood of Zacharias , which perished between the altar and the temple : verily I say unto you , It shall be required of this generation .
text2: Kpaɣa Apɛɛlɩ kʋɣʋ , haləna Sakalɩ wei pa kʋ kɔtaɣa təlatɛ na Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ pə hɛkʋ taa tɔ pa səm , ma heeliɣi - mɛ təfoo kɛ ́ sɩ , ɩsɩɩ pə tɛma pa nyɔɔŋ taa .

text: Woe unto you , lawyers ! for ye have taken away the key of knowledge : ye entered not in yourselves , and them that were entering in ye hindered .
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa sɔsaa mɛ , mə tɔm wɛ waɩyo kɛ ́ . Ɩ ́ tɔka saafʋ wei pa tʋləɣəna Ɩsɔ Tɔm nyəm tɔɔ tɔ , na mə luɣu fɛɩ sʋʋʋ . Pəyele ɩɩ tisiɣi sɩ mpa pɛlɛ pa caa tɔ pá sʋʋ .

text: And as he said these things unto them , the scribes and the Pharisees began to urge him vehemently , and to provoke him to speak of many things :
text2: Yesu kʋla təna , ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na Falisanaa pá səŋ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ nɔɔhɛɛ naalɛ na pááná , na pá makɩ ɩ nɔɣɔ tɔɔ na kʋpɔɔsʋtʋ kɛ yem yem .

text: Laying wait for him , and seeking to catch something out of his mouth , that they might accuse him .
text2: Na pá kuuki ɩ nɔɣɔ sɩ ɩ ́ cotaa ɩlɛ pa kpa - ɩ na təna .

text: In the mean time , when there were gathered together an innumerable multitude of people , insomuch that they trode one upon another , he began to say unto his disciples first of all , Beware ye of the leaven of the Pharisees , which is hypocrisy .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ samaa kota sɔsɔm kɛ waatʋ ɩnɩ , haləna pá tusiɣi təma . Tənaɣa Yesu caaləna ɩ ɩfalaa kɛ kpaalʋɣʋ sɩ : Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na Falisanaa kʋkʋsʋm , pa mənaafikitʋ kɛ ma yaa mpʋ .

text: For there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; neither hid , that shall not be known .
text2: Pə təna mpi pə ŋmɛlaa tɔ , ɩsɩɩ pə tɛma na pə ́ kuli pə tɔɔ . Na pə təna mpi pə lapa mukaɣa tɛɛ tɔ , ɩsɩɩ pa tɛma na pá nyɩ - wɩ .

text: Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness shall be heard in the light ; and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed upon the housetops .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ paa ɩ ́ ka ŋmɛsɩ tɔm na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ - təɣɩ ahoo , ɩsɩɩ tə yawa ilim taa . Na paa naŋ taa kɛ ́ ɩ ́ wɛləta ŋkpaŋʋɣʋ taa , ɩsɩɩ pa kpaala - tɩ na nɔɣɔ sɔsɔɣa .

text: And I say unto you my friends , Be not afraid of them that kill the body , and after that have no more that they can do .
text2: Mpa mɛ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ ma taapalaa tɔ , ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ taa nyana mpa pa pəsəɣɩ na pá ləsɩ yʋlʋ weesuɣu tike , na pə waalɩ paa pəsəɣɩ pʋlʋ tɔ .

text: But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear : Fear him , which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell ; yea , I say unto you , Fear him .
text2: Maa hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ wei pə mʋna sɩ ɩ ́ se tɔ . Ɩ ́ se Ɩsɔ , ɩnɩ ɩ pəsəɣəna na ɩ ́ kʋ yʋlʋ . Pəyele ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ tʋ - ɩ tənaasəlɛ taa . Tampana tɔɔ ɩsəntɔ , ɩnəɣɩ pə mʋna ɩ ́ se .

text: Are not five sparrows sold for two farthings , and not one of them is forgotten before God ?
text2: Pə taɣa santiinaa naalɛ kɛ pa pɛɛtəɣɩ sumpɩʋpɩʋnaa kakpasɩ taa ? Paa na mpʋ pa wɛʋ mpʋ tɔ , Ɩsɔ tá sɔɔ pa taa kʋlʋm tɔɔ .

text: But even the very hairs of your head are all numbered . Fear not therefore : ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Mpʋ ɩnɩ tɔtɔɣɔ na mə nyʋɣʋ taa nyɔɔsɩ , Ɩsɔ nyəmá sɩ təna sɩ nyʋɣʋ kɛ ́ . Ye mpʋ ɩ ́ taa nəɣəsɩ , ɩ ́ kəla sumpɩʋpɩʋnaa təcaɣacaɣa .

text: Also I say unto you , Whosoever shall confess me before men , him shall the Son of man also confess before the angels of God :
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ , ye yʋlʋ ta ŋmɛsɩ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma nyəŋ , ma maɣamaɣa maa tisi Ɩsɔ ɩsɔtaa tillaa ɩsɛntaa sɩ pʋntʋ kɛ ́ ma nyəŋ .

text: But he that denieth me before men shall be denied before the angels of God .
text2: Ama wei ɩ ́ kpɛɛsa yəlaa ɩsɛntaa sɩ ɩ ta nyɩ - m , ma maɣamaɣa maa tɔ Ɩsɔ ɩsɔtaa tillaa ɩsɛntaa sɩ ma ta nyəmɩ - ɩ tɔtɔ .

text: And whosoever shall speak a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but unto him that blasphemeth against the Holy Ghost it shall not be forgiven .
text2: Ye wei ɩ ́ yɔɣɔta Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩsaɣatʋ , paa hʋ ́ lɩ ́ pʋntʋ kɛ suulu . Ama ye Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kɛ ɩ yɔɣɔta ɩsaɣatʋ , pa kaa hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - ɩ suulu .

text: And when they bring you unto the synagogues , and unto magistrates , and powers , take ye no thought how or what thing ye shall answer , or what ye shall say :
text2: Ye pə kɔma na pá yaa - mɛɣɛ nɔnɔɔsɩ kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa taa , yaa awulaa kpaaməŋ taa , yaa toŋtʋnaa kiŋ , ɩ ́ taa nəɣəsɩ nti ɩ ́ ká hʋʋ na ɩ ́ lɩɩ na nti ɩ ́ ká yɔɣɔtɩ tɔ tə tɔɔ .

text: For the Holy Ghost shall teach you in the same hour what ye ought to say .
text2: Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ ka sɛɣɛsɩ - mɛɣɛ kpakpaa kɛ nti ɩ ́ ká yɔɣɔtɩ tɔ .

text: And one of the company said unto him , Master , speak to my brother , that he divide the inheritance with me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ nɔɣɔlʋ lɩɩ samaa taa na ɩ ́ tɔ Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , heeli ma taalʋ sɩ má na - ɩ tə ́ tala tá caa yelina - tʋɣʋ mpi tɔ .

text: And he said unto him , Man , who made me a judge or a divider over you ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pəsəna - ɩ sɩ : Apaŋ nyá , awe kpa - m mə tɔm taɣanlʋ na mə wontu tallʋ ?

text: And he said unto them , Take heed , and beware of covetousness : for a man ' s life consisteth not in the abundance of the things which he possesseth .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu heeli pa təna sɩ : Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na wɛnaʋ luluɣu . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , wɛnaʋ hikuɣu ɩɩ hʋləɣɩ sɩ yʋlʋ tʋla - tɩ se . Paa pʋntʋ ká wɛna ɩsɩɩ cənɛ na le .

text: And he spake a parable unto them , saying , The ground of a certain rich man brought forth plentifully :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu sɛɛ - wɛɣɛ ɩsɔ sɩ : Apalʋ toŋ tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ka wɛnna haləmnaa , na ɩ ́ kʋ kʋtɔɣɔʋ kɛ pə taa pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: And he thought within himself , saying , What shall I do , because I have no room where to bestow my fruits ?
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ caɣa na ɩ ́ maɣasɩ ɩ taa sɩ : Ɩsənaɣalɛ maa la ɩlɛ ? Kpeeŋ ɩɩ takɩ - m sɩ má nyəkɩ ma tɔɣɔnaɣa .

text: And he said , This will I do : I will pull down my barns , and build greater ; and there will I bestow all my fruits and my goods .
text2: Ɩ taa ɩ taa ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ma nyəmá ɩsəna maa la tɔɣɔlɛ . Ma yɔkəɣɩ ma kpeeŋ ɩnɛɣɛ na má sɩɩ sɔsɔɔŋ . Ɩlɛna má suu kʋtɔɣɔʋ na ma kʋpam lɛmpənaa tənaɣa ɩ taa .

text: And I will say to my soul , Soul , thou hast much goods laid up for many years ; take thine ease , eat , drink , and be merry .
text2: Ɩlɛ maa ma ma laŋlɛ taa na má tɔ sɩ , yʋlʋ wɛna pɩɩsɩ paɣalɛ taa kʋtɔɣɔʋ ɩlɛ pə kaasa we , ye pə taɣa caɣaʋ na tɔɣɔʋ na nyɔɔʋ na yɔɔlʋɣʋ pə paasi ?

text: But God said unto him , Thou fool , this night thy soul shall be required of thee : then whose shall those things be , which thou hast provided ?
text2: Tənaɣa Ɩsɔ tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Kʋmɛlɛŋ nyá , n ká sɩ ahoo anɛ a maɣamaɣa . Ɩlɛna má ná wei ɩ ká kpaɣa pə təna mpi n taɣana nyá tɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ mpʋ tɔ .

text: So is he that layeth up treasure for himself , and is not rich toward God .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu tasa sɩ : Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ na mpa pa kaa wɛnaʋ kɛ pa maɣamaɣa pa tike tɔɔ , na Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa pa kɛ kʋnyɔntʋnaa tɔ .

text: And he said unto his disciples , Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat ; neither for the body , what ye shall put on .
text2: Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Yesu tɔma ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ tá ná mpi pə tɔɔ ma heela - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ taa nəɣəsəɣɩ mə tɔɣɔnaɣa ŋka pə wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ́ ká tɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ hiki weesiŋ , na mə tɔnəŋ tɔɔ kʋtakəm pə tɔm tɔ .

text: The life is more than meat , and the body is more than raiment .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , weesuɣu kəla tɔɣɔnaɣa , na yʋlʋ tɔnʋɣʋ kəla wontu kʋsusuutu .

text: Consider the ravens : for they neither sow nor reap ; which neither have storehouse nor barn ; and God feedeth them : how much more are ye better than the fowls ?
text2: Ɩ ́ nyənna katəkatəŋ na ɩ ́ na . Ɩɩ tuuki , ɩɩ kʋŋ . Pəyele ɩ fɛɩ kʋtɔɣɔʋ təsɩɩlɛ , ɩ fɛɩna kpou , Ɩsɔ caləɣəna - ɩ . Na mə tá kəlɩ sumasɩ kɛ tɔm napəlɛ ?

text: And which of you with taking thought can add to his stature one cubit ?
text2: Paa mə taa yʋlʋ ká kʋ ɩ təɣɩ ɩsəna , pʋntʋ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ tuusi ɩ təɣɩ wʋlɛ kʋlʋmtəlɛ maɣamaɣa ?

text: If ye then be not able to do that thing which is least , why take ye thought for the rest ?
text2: Ye ɩɩ pəsəɣɩ səkpetu səkpetu , pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ kʋɣɩ mə tɩ na sɔsɔɔntʋ nti tə kaasaa tɔ ?

text: Consider the lilies how they grow : they toil not , they spin not ; and yet I say unto you , that Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyənna tawa nyɩɩtʋ tʋkʋɣʋ hɛtʋ nti tɔ na ɩ ́ na . Nyɩɩtʋ ntɩ , tɩɩ lakɩ təmlɛ təlɩ , tɩɩ lʋʋkɩ pɔɔŋ . Paa na mpʋ ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ wulaʋ Salʋmɔŋ na ɩ toŋ təna ɩ ta suu wontu na ɩ ́ tala paa tə taa kʋlʋmʋɣʋ kɛ kacɔka .

text: If then God so clothe the grass , which is to day in the field , and to morrow is cast into the oven ; how much more will he clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Ye Ɩsɔ lakɩ kacɔka kɛ tawa taa nyɩɩtʋ nti tə wɛ saŋa na cele ɩsəntɔ pa tika - tɩ tɔ , ɩ kaa la - mɛɣɛ kacɔka na pə kəlɩ mpʋ ? Ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ tɛɛ , ɩɩ tɛŋ Ɩsɔ na mə taa təcaɣacaɣa tɔ se .

text: And seek not ye what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink , neither be ye of doubtful mind .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa pɛkəlɩ mə tɩ na ɩ ́ nəɣəsəɣɩ tam kɛ ́ mə kʋtɔɣɔm na mə kʋnyɔnyɔɔm pə tɔm .

text: For all these things do the nations of the world seek after : and your Father knoweth that ye have need of these things .
text2: Antulinya taa cənɛ ma ta nyɩ ɩsɔnaa pɛɛkəɣəna təlɛɣɛ tam . Ama mɛ mə wɛna Caa , na mə Caa ɩnɩ ɩ nyəmá mpi ɩ ́ nyɩɩləɣɩ tɔ .

text: But rather seek ye the kingdom of God ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɔ nyʋɣʋ na Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa pɛɛkʋɣʋ , na Ɩsɔ ká ha - mɛ tɔtɔɣɔ mpi pə kaasaa tɔ .

text: Fear not , little flock ; for it is your Father ' s good pleasure to give you the kingdom .
text2: Ma kalakiya nyá , taa nyá , mə Caa sɔɔləna sɩ ɩ haa - mɛɣɛ ɩ kawulaɣa .

text: Sell that ye have , and give alms ; provide yourselves bags which wax not old , a treasure in the heavens that faileth not , where no thief approacheth , neither moth corrupteth .
text2: Ɩ ́ pɛɛtɩ mə kʋpamnaa na ɩ ́ məŋna pə liɣitee na ɩ ́ ha kʋnyɔntʋnaa . Ɩ ́ pɛɛkɩ fatakanaa mpa paa səkɩ tɔ , na ɩ ́ kaakɩ mə wɛnaʋ kɛ ɩsɔtaa timpi pʋlʋ ɩɩ leki tɔ . Nmɩɩlʋ kaa tala tənaɣa ŋmɩɩlʋɣʋ , pə ́ cɔ ́ puka kaa tɔɣɔ .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , kpaŋtʋ ləmaɣasɛɛ ɩ ́ wɛ timpi , tənaɣa ɩ akalʋɣʋ wɛɛ .

text: Let your loins be girded about , and your lights burning ;
text2: Ɩ ́ tantɩ na ɩ ́ taŋaa , ɩ ́ ləlɩ mə hɔɔ taa , ɩ ́ mʋsɩ mə fətəlanaa .

text: And ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord , when he will return from the wedding ; that when he cometh and knocketh , they may open unto him immediately .
text2: Ɩ ́ la ɩsɩɩ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma mpa pa taŋaa sɩ pa caa ɩ ́ lɩɩna akpaɣalɛ taa na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ma talaa , pa tʋlɩ - ɩ tɔ .

text: Blessed are those servants , whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching : verily I say unto you , that he shall gird himself , and make them to sit down to meat , and will come forth and serve them .
text2: Cɛcɛ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ talaa na ɩ ́ maɣana ɩ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma mpɛ na pa taŋaa , pa nyʋɣʋ lapa leleŋ kɛ ́ . Ma heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ tampana sɩ ɩ kootiɣi ɩ wontu kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ hɔkəna ɩ tɩ , na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - wɛɣɛ təcaɣalɛ sɩ pá caɣa na ɩ ́ tʋ - wɛɣɛ tɔɣɔnaɣa .

text: And if he shall come in the second watch , or come in the third watch , and find them so , blessed are those servants .
text2: Paa tapɩɩlɛ yaa tefemle kɛ ɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ maɣana - wɛɣɛ mpʋ na pá taŋaa , pa lapa nyʋleleŋ kɛ ́ .

text: And this know , that if the goodman of the house had known what hour the thief would come , he would have watched , and not have suffered his house to be broken through .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyɩ teu sɩ , ye nyəm ka nyəŋaɣa kɔlɔ na təyaɣa caa nyɩ ŋmɩɩlʋ kɔntɛ waatʋ , ɩ kaa yele - ɩ na ɩ ́ sʋʋ təyaɣa taa se .

text: Be ye therefore ready also : for the Son of man cometh at an hour when ye think not .
text2: Mɛ tɔtɔ , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ mɩɩ taɣanɩ mə təɣɩ mpʋ . Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa ma , ma kɔŋ kɔntɛ kɛ waatʋ wei ɩ ́ kaa hʋʋ tɔɣɔ .

text: Then Peter said unto him , Lord , speakest thou this parable unto us , or even to all ?
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ pɔɔsa Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , ta tike kɛ n sɛɛkəna ɩsɔ ɩnɩ , yaa yəlaa tənaɣa n sɛɛkəna - ɩ ?

text: And the Lord said , Who then is that faithful and wise steward , whom his lord shall make ruler over his household , to give them their portion of meat in due season ?
text2: Mpʋɣʋlɛ Tacaa cɔwa sɩ : Aweɣelɛ təmlɛ tʋ kʋpaŋ na laɣatʋ ? Ye pə taɣa wei ɩ caa ká yelina təyaɣa feŋuɣu , sɩ nyɔɣɔsɩ ɩ kpa təmlɛ nyə ́ ma lɛlaa , ɩlɛ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ cɛla - wɛɣɛ tɔɣɔnaɣa tɔ .

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: Cɛcɛ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ kɔma na ɩ ́ məlɩ na ɩ ́ maɣana təmlɛ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ɩsəlɛ sɛɛna təmlɛ ntɛ ́ tə lapʋ , ɩ nyʋɣʋ lapa leleŋ kɛ ́ .

text: Of a truth I say unto you , that he will make him ruler over all that he hath .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ tampana tɔɔ sɩ , təyaɣa caa ká tʋ təmlɛ tʋ ɩnəɣɩ ɩ kʋpam təna tɔɔ feŋuɣu kɛ ́ .

text: But and if that servant say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ; and shall begin to beat the menservants and maidens , and to eat and drink , and to be drunken ;
text2: Ama ye pə cəpa təmlɛ tʋ ɩnɩ , na ɩ ́ tʋ ɩ taa sɩ : Ma caa kaa kɔɔ lɔŋ se , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sʋʋ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma apalʋnyəma na alʋnyəma kɛ mapʋ . Na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ , na ɩ ́ nyɔɔkɩ na pə ́ kʋɣɩ - ɩ .

text: The lord of that servant will come in a day when he looketh not for him , and at an hour when he is not aware , and will cut him in sunder , and will appoint him his portion with the unbelievers .
text2: Pɩɩ kɔɔ na kʋyakʋ ŋku na ɩsəna taa ɩ taa tʋ ɩ taa sɩ təyaɣa tʋ ka tala tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ka sʋʋ təkpʋʋ . Na ɩ ká la təmlɛ tʋ ɩnəɣɩ təkaŋkaŋ , na ɩ ́ məŋna - ɩ na ɩ ́ pɛtɩ - ɩ ma ta nyɩ ɩsɔnaa tɔɔ .

text: And that servant , which knew his lord ' s will , and prepared not himself , neither did according to his will , shall be beaten with many stripes .
text2: Təmlɛ tʋ wei ɩ nyəmá ɩ caa luɣu tɛɛ nyəm na ɩ ́ tá taɣanɩ ɩ tɩ , pəyele ɩ ta la mpi ɩ caa sɔɔlaa tɔ , paa həlɩ - ɩ teu .

text: But he that knew not , and did commit things worthy of stripes , shall be beaten with few stripes . For unto whomsoever much is given , of him shall be much required : and to whom men have committed much , of him they will ask the more .
text2: Ama təmlɛ tʋ wei ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ta nyɩ ɩ caa luɣu tɛɛ nyəm , na ɩ ́ lakɩ mpi pə mʋna pá mapɩ - ɩ pə tɔɔ tɔ , pəciiu tike kɛ paa ma ɩ ́ lɛ ́ . Wei pa ha sɔsɔm tɔ , sɔsɔm kɛ pa kɔŋɩ - ɩ pɔɔsʋɣʋ . Na wei pa paasaa na pá kaa sɔsɔm tɔ , sɔsɔm taa sɔsɔm kɛ pa kɔŋɩ - ɩ pɔɔsʋɣʋ .

text: I am come to send fire on the earth ; and what will I if it be already kindled ?
text2: Kɔkɔ kɛ ma kɔma tɛtʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ mʋsʋɣʋ , na pə caɣa - m ɩsɩɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ kaa tɛma mʋɣʋ ɩlɛ mhmm teu ntɛ ́ .

text: But I have a baptism to be baptized with ; and how am I straitened till it be accomplished !
text2: Pə wɛɛ sɩ pá sɔ - m Ɩsɔ lʋm napəlɩ , ɩlɛ ye pa ta sɔ - m lʋm mpɩ ma nəɣəsɛɛ kaa tɛ .

text: Suppose ye that I am come to give peace on earth ? I tell you , Nay ; but rather division :
text2: Mə hʋʋ sɩ hɛɛsʋɣʋ kɛ ma kɔna antulinya taa ? Aaɩ , ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ koloŋa kɛ ma kɔnaa .

text: For from henceforth there shall be five in one house divided , three against two , and two against three .
text2: Pə kpaɣa pənɛntɛ tɔ , yəlaa ɩ ́ wɛ kakpasɩ kɛ pa təyaɣa taa , paa faɣa . Tooso ká lɩɩ naalɛ ɩnɛɣɛ koloŋa , na naalɛ náá lɩɩ tooso kɛ ́ koloŋa .

text: The father shall be divided against the son , and the son against the father ; the mother against the daughter , and the daughter against the mother ; the mother in law against her daughter in law , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Cɛcɛ ká kʋlɩ ɩ pəyalʋ tɔɔ , na pəyalʋ kʋlɩ cɛcɛ tɔɔ . Toto ká kʋlɩ ɩ pɛɛlɔ tɔɔ na pɛɛlɔ náá kʋlɩ toto tɔɔ . Paŋ alʋ nyəŋ ká kʋlɩ poolu tɔɔ , na poolu kɛ ́ paŋ tɔɔ .

text: And he said also to the people , When ye see a cloud rise out of the west , straightway ye say , There cometh a shower ; and so it is .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma samaa tɔtɔ sɩ : Ye ɩ ́ ná tɛʋ pɩɩ ŋmaalaɣa na ilim tətʋlɛ , ɩ ́ tɔŋ kpakpaa sɩ saŋa ɩnɩ tɛʋ wɛɛ . Ɩlɛna tampana tɔɔ kʋlɛ kʋ nɩɩ .

text: And when ye see the south wind blow , ye say , There will be heat ; and it cometh to pass .
text2: Na ɩ ́ kɔma na ɩ ́ ná ilim nyakɩ sɔsɔm , ɩ ́ tɔŋ sɩ tahaŋlɛ wʋsaa . Ɩlɛna tahaŋlɛ náá haŋ .

text: Ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky and of the earth ; but how is it that ye do not discern this time ?
text2: Mənaafikinaa mɛ , ɩ ́ lapa ɩsəna na ɩ ́ nyəŋ atɛ na ɩsɔ pə kɔkɔlɔnaa faɣasʋɣʋ , na ɩɩ cɛkəɣəna nti təlɛ tə lakɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ tə hʋwɛɛ .

text: Yea , and why even of yourselves judge ye not what is right ?
text2: Ɩsənaɣa pə wɛɛ na mə maɣamaɣa ɩɩ tɩɩ maɣasəɣɩ sɩ ɩ ́ nyɩ tampana na ɩ ́ təŋ - yɛ ye ?

text: When thou goest with thine adversary to the magistrate , as thou art in the way , give diligence that thou mayest be delivered from him ; lest he hale thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and the officer cast thee into prison .
text2: Ye n wakəla nɔɣɔlʋ na ɩ ́ yaa - ŋ nɔnɔɣɔ , la kookalɩ na nyá na - ɩ ɩ ́ taɣanɩ mə tɔm kɛ mpaaʋ taa na ɩ ́ ta tata hʋʋlʋ kiŋ . Pə taa kɔɔ na hʋʋlʋ náá tʋ - ŋ toŋtʋnaa niŋ taa , na pɛlɛ pá təkɩ - ŋ .

text: I tell thee , thou shalt not depart thence , till thou hast paid the very last mite .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - ŋ tampana sɩ ye n ta tɛ pə təna mpi pa pɛla - ŋ tɔɣɔ fɛlʋɣʋ n kaa lɩɩ təna .

text: There were present at that season some that told him of the Galilaeans , whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifices .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yəlaa napəlɩ pa kɔma tənɛ ɩnəɣɩ kpakpaa na pá heeli Yesu sɩ : Kalilee nyə ́ ma napəlɩ pa lakaɣa kɔtaɣa kɛ Ɩsɔ , ɩlɛna Pilatɩ yele na pá kʋ - wɛ .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Suppose ye that these Galilaeans were sinners above all the Galilaeans , because they suffered such things ?
text2: Tənaɣalɛ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ hʋʋ sɩ Kalilee nyə ́ ma mpa pa kʋ mpʋ tɔ , pa tɛɛ Kalilee nyə ́ ma lɛlaa tənaɣa kawalasɩ tɔɣɔ pa kʋ - wɛ ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Aaɩ , ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ , pə taɣa mpʋ se . Ama mɩɩ ta laɣasɩ tɔntɛ , ɩ ́ ká sɩ mə tənaɣa ɩsɩɩ pɛlɛ pa səpʋ tɔ .

text: Or those eighteen , upon whom the tower in Siloam fell , and slew them , think ye that they were sinners above all men that dwelt in Jerusalem ?
text2: Na yəlaa pəlefɛi hiu wei Silowee kutuluɣu kpɛsaa na kʋ takɩ na kʋ naŋtɩ tɔ , ɩ ́ hʋʋ sɩ Yosalɛm nyə ́ ma təna taa pɛlɛ pa kələna ɩsaɣatʋ na ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: Aaɩ , ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ , pə taɣa mpʋ se . Ama mɩɩ ta laɣasɩ , ɩ ́ ká sɩ mə tənaɣa ɩsɩɩ pɛlɛ pa səpʋ tɔ .

text: He spake also this parable ; A certain man had a fig tree planted in his vineyard ; and he came and sought fruit thereon , and found none .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu sɛɛ - wɛɣɛ ɩsɔ sɩ : Apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka sɔna ɩ lɛsɛŋ tɩɩŋ taalɛ taa kɛ ́ fiki . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ pola pee kooluɣu . Ama ɩ ta maɣana kʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ paa pʋlʋpʋ cəcəka .

text: Then said he unto the dresser of his vineyard , Behold , these three years I come seeking fruit on this fig tree , and find none : cut it down ; why cumbereth it the ground ?
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ tɔma taalɛ tɔkʋlʋ sɩ : Nyənɩ , pɩɩsɩ tooso kɔlɔ ma tʋ kɔntɛ sɩ ma kooliɣi pee . Ama maa makəna pʋlʋ cəcəka kɛ kʋ tɔɔ . Sɛtɩ - kʋ . Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ kɩɩ səŋ yem na kɩɩ lʋləɣɩ ?

text: And he answering said unto him , Lord , let it alone this year also , till I shall dig about it , and dung it :
text2: Ɩlɛna taalɛ tɔkʋlʋ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , tasa - kʋɣʋ yeluɣu kɛ pʋntɔ , na maa huli na má cɔɔna kʋ kite na ma tʋ hute na má ná .

text: And if it bear fruit , well : and if not , then after that thou shalt cut it down .
text2: Ntanyɩ pə ́ taləna pənte kɩɩ lʋlɩ pee . Kʋ ta lʋlɩ ɩlɛ n sɛtɩ - kʋ .

text: And he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the sabbath .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ nakʋlɩ kʋ wule Yesu sɛɣɛsaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile natəlɩ tə taa .

text: And , behold , there was a woman which had a spirit of infirmity eighteen years , and was bowed together , and could in no wise lift up herself .
text2: Pə pamna alʋ kʋtɔntʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛ təna . Ɩ hii ɩlɔɣɔʋ na pə kɔkəlɩ - ɩ pɩɩsɩ pəlefɛi hiu təcu , ɩɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ siɣisi ɩ təɣɩ paa pəcɔ maɣamaɣa .

text: And when Jesus saw her , he called her to him , and said unto her , Woman , thou art loosed from thine infirmity .
text2: Yesu na - ɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yaa - ɩ na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Alʋ nyá , saŋa waalɩ n hika alaafəya kɛ ́ .

text: And he laid his hands on her : and immediately she was made straight , and glorified God .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu tənɩ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ niŋ , na alʋ siɣile siɣisi tənɛ ɩnəɣɩ kpakpaa , na ɩ ́ niki Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sam .

text: And the ruler of the synagogue answered with indignation , because that Jesus had healed on the sabbath day , and said unto the people , There are six days in which men ought to work : in them therefore come and be healed , and not on the sabbath day .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ Yesu lapʋ na yʋlʋ hiki alaafəya kɛ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule kɛ mpʋ tɔ pə ta maɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile nyʋɣʋ tʋ ntɛ ́ . Tənaɣa ɩ pəsəna samaa sɩ : Kʋyɛɛŋ naatoso kɛ pa lakɩ təmlɛ . Ye ɩ ́ caa ɩ ́ hiki alaafəya , ɩ ́ kɛɛsəna kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa na ɩ ́ kɔɔ . Ɩ ́ taa kɔŋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule sɩ pá ha - mɛɣɛ alaafəya .

text: The Lord then answered him , and said , Thou hypocrite , doth not each one of you on the sabbath loose his ox or his ass from the stall , and lead him away to watering ?
text2: Tənaɣa Tacaa ná cɔ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile nyʋɣʋ tʋ ɩnɩ sɩ : Mənaafikinaa mɛ , ye pə tala kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule mə taa awe yeki ɩ naʋ yaa ɩ kpaŋaɣa kɛ tʋ ́ lʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ ká nyɔɔ lʋm ye ?

text: And ought not this woman , being a daughter of Abraham , whom Satan hath bound , lo , these eighteen years , be loosed from this bond on the sabbath day ?
text2: Yaa ɩ ́ nyəmá sɩ Apəlaham lʋlʋɣʋ taa alʋ ɩnɛɣɛ pa kaa waasɩ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule ? Pə ́ cɔ ́ Satanɩ tɔka - ɩ na ɩ ́ cɔɔsəɣɩ - ɩ tɔ pɩɩsɩ pəlefɛi hiu ntɔ .

text: And when he had said these things , all his adversaries were ashamed : and all the people rejoiced for all the glorious things that were done by him .
text2: Yesu cɔ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile nyʋɣʋ tʋ ɩnəɣɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna fɛɛlɛ kpa mpa paa caa - ɩ tɔ . Ama samaa wei pə kaasaa tɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ təna ɩ laŋlɛ ná hɛɛna təma kʋpampana nna Yesu lakaɣa tɔ .

text: Then said he , Unto what is the kingdom of God like ? and whereunto shall I resemble it ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ : Ɩsɩɩ pepeɣelɛ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa nəɣəsənaa , na pepeɣe maa kɛɛsəna - kɛ ɩlɛ yee ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and cast into his garden ; and it grew , and waxed a great tree ; and the fowls of the air lodged in the branches of it .
text2: Ka nəɣəsəna kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ tuukuɣu sɔɔɣa pile kɛ ɩ taalɛ taa na tə nyɔ , na tə pɩɩ tʋɣʋ sɔsɔɔʋ na sumasɩ kɔŋ na sɩ ́ tʋɣɩ tana kɛ kʋ pəliŋasɩ tɔɔ tɔɣɔ .

text: And again he said , Whereunto shall I liken the kingdom of God ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasaa sɩ : Pepe caʋ kɛ ́ maa kɛɛsəna Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa ɩlɛ yee ?

text: It is like leaven , which a woman took and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Ka nəɣəsəna kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ alʋ maɣasʋɣʋ mʋlʋm kɛ cɛmsɛ təpam na ɩ ́ kpaɣa kʋkʋsʋm kɛ pəcɔ na ɩ ́ tʋ , na ɩ ́ huɣuti na pə təna pə ́ kpa təfʋʋ tɔ .

text: And he went through the cities and villages , teaching , and journeying toward Jerusalem .
text2: Yesu kʋlaa sɩ ɩ puki Yosalɛm , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsəɣəna mpaa kɛ acalɛɛ sɔsɔɔna na səkpena nna a taa ɩ təŋaɣana tɔ na ɩ ́ puki .

text: Then said one unto him , Lord , are there few that be saved ? And he said unto them ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ nɔɣɔlʋ pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , ntɔŋ yəlaa pəciimaɣa tike nyɔɔŋ kɛ pɩɩ ya na ? Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ :

text: Strive to enter in at the strait gate : for many , I say unto you , will seek to enter in , and shall not be able .
text2: Ɩ ́ la kookalɩ na ɩ ́ sʋʋna nɔnɔɣɔ ŋka ka wɛ təfəkɩɩ tɔ . Tɔm faawɩɩ tɔɔ , yəlaa paɣalɛ ká lʋna teu sɩ pá təŋna təna na pá sʋʋ . Ama pa kaa hiki mpaa .

text: When once the master of the house is risen up , and hath shut to the door , and ye begin to stand without , and to knock at the door , saying , Lord , Lord , open unto us ; and he shall answer and say unto you , I know you not whence ye are :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Pɩɩ kɔɔ na təyaɣa caa təkɩ na ɩ ́ kaləsɩ , na mɩɩ wɛna awalɩ tɔɔ , ɩlɛ ɩ ́ sʋʋ mapʋ ntɛ ́ nɔnɔɣɔ sɩ : Tacaa , tʋlɩ - tʋ . Ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ká cɔ - mɛ sɩ : Ma ta nyɩ timpi ɩ ́ lɩɩnaa tɔ .

text: Then shall ye begin to say , We have eaten and drunk in thy presence , and thou hast taught in our streets .
text2: Pəlɛɣɛlɛ ɩ ́ ka sʋʋ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ : Tá na - ŋ tə tɔkaɣana na tə nyɔɔkɩ . Ta ɩcatɛ hapɛɛ tɔɔ kɛ ́ n tɩɩ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ .

text: But he shall say , I tell you , I know you not whence ye are ; depart from me , all ye workers of iniquity .
text2: Ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ká lɛlɩ - mɛɣɛ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ : Ma ta nyɩ timpi ɩ ́ lɩɩnaa tɔ yoo . Mə təna ɩ ́ tɛɛ ɩ ́ fɛɛ - m , ɩsaɣalataa mɛ .

text: There shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth , when ye shall see Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , and all the prophets , in the kingdom of God , and you yourselves thrust out .
text2: Ɩ ́ ká kɔɔ na ɩ ́ na Apəlaham na Ɩsaaka na Saakɩ na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa tənaɣa Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa taa , na pá fiɣita - mɛ na awalɩ tɔɣɔlɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ ká tɩɩ casɩ kapusi na ɩ ́ nyasəɣɩ mə təɣɩ kela te .

text: And they shall come from the east , and from the west , and from the north , and from the south , and shall sit down in the kingdom of God .
text2: Yəlaa ká lɩɩna ilim təlɩɩlɛ tɔɔ , na pə tətʋlɛ tɔɔ , na lɛlaa lɩɩna pə ntɔɣɔŋ na pə mpətəŋ tɔɔ na pá suli Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa taa kɛ ́ tɔɣɔʋ .

text: And , behold , there are last which shall be first , and there are first which shall be last .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnɩ mpa pa wɛ lɔlɔ kɛ ́ kaɣana tɔ pa taa lɛmpa ká məlɩ waalɩ , na waalɩ nyə ́ ma náá məlɩ lɔlɔ .

text: The same day there came certain of the Pharisees , saying unto him , Get thee out , and depart hence : for Herod will kill thee .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa kɛ Falisanaa napəlɩ pa kɔma Yesu kiŋ na pá heeli - ɩ sɩ : Wulaʋ sɔsɔ Helɔtɩ pɛɛkəɣɩ - ŋ kʋɣʋ . Pəlɛ pə tɔɔ lɩɩ cənɛ na ń laɣasɩ ɩcatɛ .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye , and tell that fox , Behold , I cast out devils , and I do cures to day and to morrow , and the third day I shall be perfected .
