text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ heeli mə taalɛ haɣa ŋkɛ sɩ , saŋa na cele pə taa ma tɔɣɔnəɣɩ alɔɣaa , na má waasəɣɩ kʋtɔntʋnaa , na pə kʋfemuɣu kɛ maa tɛ ma təmlɛ .

text: Nevertheless I must walk to day , and to morrow , and the day following : for it cannot be that a prophet perish out of Jerusalem .
text2: Ama pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ má tɔ ma mpaaʋ kɛ saŋa na cele na pə kʋfemuɣu . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , paa kʋɣɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ kɛ tiiliɣi yem na pə ta kɛna Yosalɛm taa .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , which killest the prophets , and stonest them that are sent unto thee ; how often would I have gathered thy children together , as a hen doth gather her brood under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: Hei Yosalɛm , Yosalɛm , nyá taa kɛ ́ pa kʋɣɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa , na nyá taa tɔtɔɣɔ pa yooki Ɩsɔ tillaa kɛ pɛɛ na pá kʋɣɩ . Tɔm paɣalɛ kɛ ma sɔɔlaa sɩ ma kpeɣeliɣi nyá taa yəlaa təna təkotokoto ɩsɩɩ kantuɣu papʋɣʋ kʋ piya tɔɔ tɔ . Ama pa kisaa .

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate : and verily I say unto you , Ye shall not see me , until the time come when ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Tɔʋ , mə təyaɣa ka təkɩ kaaʋ təkpataa , nɔɣɔlʋ kaa paasəna - kɛ . Ma heeliɣi - mɛ təfoo sɩ , ɩ ́ kaa tasa - m keesuɣu , haləna pə ́ tala wule nte ɩ ́ ka yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ , Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ səna Tacaa tillu tɔ .

text: And it came to pass , as he went into the house of one of the chief Pharisees to eat bread on the sabbath day , that they watched him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ nakʋlɩ Yesu sʋʋ Falisanaa sɔsɔ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ tɛɣɛ tɔɣɔʋ . Mpa paa wɛ təna tɔ pa caɣaa na pá keŋna - ɩ teu .

text: And , behold , there was a certain man before him which had the dropsy .
text2: Yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka səŋa ɩ ɩsɛntaa , na tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ asilima kʋtɔŋ wɛna - ɩ .

text: And Jesus answering spake unto the lawyers and Pharisees , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath day ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pɔɔsa Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na Falisanaa sɩ : Ta mpaaʋ taa , pə mʋna pá waasɩ kʋtɔntʋ kɛ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule yaa pá taa waasɩ - ɩ ?

text: And they held their peace . And he took him , and healed him , and let him go ;
text2: Ama Falisanaa mpɛ pa ta tisi cɔʋ . Tənaɣa Yesu hɔma kʋtɔntʋ na ɩ ́ waasɩ - ɩ , na ɩ ́ heeli - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ tɛɛ .

text: And answered them , saying , Which of you shall have an ass or an ox fallen into a pit , and will not straightway pull him out on the sabbath day ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pɔɔsa Falisanaa sɩ : Kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule , mə taa awe nawa ɩ pəyaɣa yaa ɩ naʋ hota lɔkɔ taa , na ɩ ́ yele ləsʋɣʋ kɛ kpakpaa sɩ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule ?

text: And they could not answer him again to these things .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá maɣasɩ - təɣɩ cɔʋ na pá kpisi .

text: And he put forth a parable to those which were bidden , when he marked how they chose out the chief rooms ; saying unto them ,
text2: Yesu nawa sɩ mpa pa yaa tɔɣɔʋ kɛ mpʋ tɔ , pa huliɣina təmaɣa kpelee kʋpana tɔɔ caɣaʋ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsɩ - wɛ sɩ :

text: When thou art bidden of any man to a wedding , sit not down in the highest room ; lest a more honourable man than thou be bidden of him ;
text2: Ye nɔɣɔlʋ kpaɣa alʋ na ɩ ́ yaa - ŋ tɔɣɔʋ , ń talaa , taa hulina təcaɣalɛ kʋpantɛ na pə ́ cɔ ́ . Ntanyɩ ɩsəntɔ pa yaa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ na ɩ ́ kəla - ŋ .

text: And he that bade thee and him come and say to thee , Give this man place ; and thou begin with shame to take the lowest room .
text2: Pə ́ taa kɔɔ na wei ɩ yaa - mɛɣɛ tɔɣɔʋ tɔ ɩ ́ heeli - ŋ sɩ : Kʋlɩ na ń kaasɩ ɩnɛɣɛ təcaɣalɛ . Ɩlɛ n kʋləna fɛɛlɛ ntɛ ́ tənyɔɔmɩɩ , na ń caɣana waalɩ tɔɔ .

text: But when thou art bidden , go and sit down in the lowest room ; that when he that bade thee cometh , he may say unto thee , Friend , go up higher : then shalt thou have worship in the presence of them that sit at meat with thee .
text2: Ama ye pa yaa - ŋ tɔɣɔʋ , ń talaa , caɣana waalɩ tɔɔ . Ɩlɛ wei ɩ yaa - mɛɣɛ tɔɣɔʋ tɔ ye ɩ kɔma ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ká tɔna - ŋ sɩ : Apaŋ nyá , tuusina cənɛ tɔɔ na ń caɣa təcaɣalɛ kʋpantɛ . Saa ɩnɩ pa tʋ - ŋ teeli kɛ nyá na pa təna mpa ɩ ́ caɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɔɣɔʋ tɔ pa ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ .

text: For whosoever exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , wei ɩ ́ hɔŋ ɩ tɩ paa tisi - ɩ , na wei ɩ ́ pasəɣɩ ɩ tɩ , paa kʋsɩ ɩ nyʋɣʋ .

text: Then said he also to him that bade him , When thou makest a dinner or a supper , call not thy friends , nor thy brethren , neither thy kinsmen , nor thy rich neighbours ; lest they also bid thee again , and a recompence be made thee .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu heela wei ɩ yaa - ɩ tɔɣɔʋ tɔ sɩ : Ye n lapa tɔɣɔnaɣa yaa acima , taa yaa nyá cewaa , yaa nyá tɛɛtʋnaa , yaa nyá lʋlʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma , yaa nyá toŋtʋnaa lɛlaa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pɛlɛ pa pəsəɣɩ tɔtɔ na pá yaa - ŋ tɔɣɔʋ , na pá lɛɛtɩ - ŋ nyá kʋcɔɔʋ kɛ kpakpaa .

text: But when thou makest a feast , call the poor , the maimed , the lame , the blind :
text2: Ama ye n lapa acima , koti kʋnyɔntʋnaa , na acamaa , na kaakalasɩ , na yʋlʋmaa , na pá tɔɣɔ .

text: And thou shalt be blessed ; for they cannot recompense thee : for thou shalt be recompensed at the resurrection of the just .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnəɣəlɛ n hika kʋpantʋ . Pə taɣa pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ká pəsəna na ɩ ́ lɛɛtɩ - ŋ - tɩ . Ama Ɩsɔ ká fɛləna - ŋ kʋyaŋku ɩ ká feesi sətaa mpa paa lapa kʋpantʋ tɔ .

text: And when one of them that sat at meat with him heard these things , he said unto him , Blessed is he that shall eat bread in the kingdom of God .
text2: Pa nɩɩ tɔm tənɛ ɩnɩ ɩlɛna Yesu na mpa pa caɣa tɔɣɔʋ tɔ pa taa lɛlʋ yɔɣɔtɩ - ɩ sɩ : Wei ɩ ká caɣa tɔɣɔʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa taa tɔɣɔlɛ ɩsɩɩ leleŋ nɩɩlʋ te .

text: Then said he unto him , A certain man made a great supper , and bade many :
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ pʋntʋ ɩnɩ sɩ : Apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ lapəna tɔɣɔnaɣa təkpɛtɛkpɛtɛ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yaa yəlaa samaa sɩ pá kɔɔ pá tɔɣɔ .

text: And sent his servant at supper time to say to them that were bidden , Come ; for all things are now ready .
text2: Pə kɔma na pə pɩɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tili ɩ pəyalʋ sɩ ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ heeli mpa ɩ yaa tɔɣɔʋ tɔ sɩ pá kɔɔ mpʋ , pə talaa .

text: And they all with one consent began to make excuse . The first said unto him , I have bought a piece of ground , and I must needs go and see it : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: Ama pa təna pa sʋʋ - ɩ wiinaʋ sɩ pa kaa pəsɩ . Kancaalaɣa nyəŋ heela tillu sɩ : Ma yapa taalɛ , ye ma ta polo ma na - tɛ pə kaa la - m teu . Mpʋ tɔ , ma sələməɣɩ - ŋ mpaa , ma kaa pəsɩ na má kɔɔ .

text: And another said , I have bought five yoke of oxen , and I go to prove them : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: Lɛlʋ náá tɔ sɩ : Ma yapa naaŋ kʋhaləŋ kɛ naanʋwa , ma caa ma tamsɩ - ɩ naalɛ naalɛ na ma faləsɩ - ɩ . Mpʋ tɔ , ma sələməɣɩ - ŋ mpaa , ma kaa pəsɩ na má kɔɔ .

text: And another said , I have married a wife , and therefore I cannot come .
text2: Na lɛlʋ tɔ tɔtɔ sɩ : Nɔɔnɔɔ kɛ ́ ma kpaɣa alʋ , ma kaa pəsɩ na má kɔɔ .

text: So that servant came , and shewed his lord these things . Then the master of the house being angry said to his servant , Go out quickly into the streets and lanes of the city , and bring in hither the poor , and the maimed , and the halt , and the blind .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tillu məla ɩ caa kiŋ na ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ - ɩ ɩsəna pə lɩɩwa tɔ . Tənaɣa təyaɣa caa ɩnɩ pááná lapa - ɩ , na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ tillu kɛ tiluɣu sɩ : Polo lɔŋ kɛ kʋyɛɛŋ taa na hapɛɛ nɔɔsɩ na ń kuu kʋnyɔntʋnaa , na acamaa , na yʋlʋmaa , na kaakalasɩ , na ń kɔna .

text: And the servant said , Lord , it is done as thou hast commanded , and yet there is room .
text2: Pə tasa pəcɔ ɩlɛna tillu taɣanɩ məlʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ heelɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , ma lapa nti n kɛɛsaa tɔ , paa na mpʋ təcaɣalɛ kpisa yem kɛ ́ .

text: And the lord said unto the servant , Go out into the highways and hedges , and compel them to come in , that my house may be filled .
text2: Tənaɣa təyaɣa caa tasa - ɩ tɔm sɩ : Cɛ mpaaŋ taa na ń cɔɔ kutuluŋ kila kila , ye n hika mpa n kpa - wɛɣɛ yem yem na ń sʋʋna na ma təyaɣa su .

text: For I say unto you , That none of those men which were bidden shall taste of my supper .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ yəlaa mpa pa hətɛ pa yaanaa tɔ , pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ kaa tɔɣɔ ma tɔɣɔnaɣa .

text: And there went great multitudes with him : and he turned , and said unto them ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ samaa tuutuuma hu Yesu waalɩ . Tənaɣa Yesu pəsaa na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ :

text: If any man come to me , and hate not his father , and mother , and wife , and children , and brethren , and sisters , yea , and his own life also , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: Ye yʋlʋ ɩ ́ caa ɩ təŋɩ - m na ɩ ́ ta lɩɩ luɣu kɛ ɩ caa na ɩ too , na ɩ alʋ na ɩ piya , na ɩ taalʋnaa na ɩ kɔɣɔnaa na ɩ newaa , haləna ɩ ́ kpɛntəna ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ tɩ , paa ɩ təŋa - m , ɩ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ la ma ɩfalʋ .

text: And whosoever doth not bear his cross , and come after me , cannot be my disciple .
text2: Ye wei ɩ ta səɣəlɩ ɩ səm tesika na ɩ ́ təŋɩ - m , pʋntʋ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ la ma ɩfalʋ .

text: For which of you , intending to build a tower , sitteth not down first , and counteth the cost , whether he have sufficient to finish it ?
text2: Ye mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ caa kutuluɣu sɔsɔɔŋkʋ ŋmaʋ , ɩ cakɩ kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ maɣasɩ pə təna pə liɣitee nyʋɣʋ , sɩ ɩ naa sɩ ɩ liɣitee ká tala - ɩ yaa a kaa tala - ɩ .

text: Lest haply , after he hath laid the foundation , and is not able to finish it , all that behold it begin to mock him ,
text2: Tɛfɛ ɩ kɔŋ ɩ ́ tɛ kite sɩɩʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpisi kʋ kʋɣʋ , na tɛɛlaa kɔɔ na pá woŋi - ɩ ,

text: Saying , This man began to build , and was not able to finish .
text2: sɩ halɩ yʋlʋ ɩ ́ sɩɩ kutuluɣu na ɩ ́ kpisi kʋ kʋɣʋ na ?

text: Or what king , going to make war against another king , sitteth not down first , and consulteth whether he be able with ten thousand to meet him that cometh against him with twenty thousand ?
text2: Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ pə wɛɛ , ye wulaʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ caa ɩ yoona wulaʋ lɛlʋ , ɩ cakɩ kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ maɣasɩ teu na ɩ ́ ná sɩ yoolaa iyisi naanʋwa ( 10000 ) wei ɩ wɛna tɔ , ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ yoona ɩ kolontu wei ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ wɛna yoolaa iyisi hiu ( 20000 ) tɔ , yaa ɩ kaa pəsɩ .

text: Or else , while the other is yet a great way off , he sendeth an ambassage , and desireth conditions of peace .
text2: Ye ɩ nawa sɩ ɩ kaa pəsɩ , ɩ kʋsəɣɩ yəlaa kɛ kʋtatʋɣʋ kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ tili sɩ pá heeli ɩ kolontu kɛ lɔŋ sɩ ɩ ́ yele tɔm ntɩ , na pá suli tiili na pá taɣanɩ .

text: So likewise , whosoever he be of you that forsaketh not all that he hath , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ : Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ la ma ɩfalʋ , ye pʋntʋ ɩ ́ ta ləsɩ ɩ kʋnyɩɩlʋɣʋ kɛ ɩ nyəm təna tɔɔ .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be seasoned ?
text2: Tɔm kɛ pʋlʋpʋ mpi pə waasəɣɩ tɔɣɔ . Ama ye tɔm mpɩ pə lɔŋ kɔma na ɩ ́ sɩ , pepeɣe paa la na pə lɔŋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ məlɩ ?

text: It is neither fit for the land , nor yet for the dunghill ; but men cast it out . He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Pəlɛ tɔ pɩɩ waasəɣɩ pʋlʋ . Paa n ŋmɩɩsa haləm taa , paa n pɛta hute taa , ɩsɩɩ pa lɔ - wɩ paasi . Mpa pa wɛna ləmaɣasɛɛ tɔ pá ke ŋkpaŋŋ na tɔm tənɛ .

text: Then drew near unto him all the publicans and sinners for to hear him .
text2: Lampuu mʋlaa na tɛtɛlataa lɛlaa pa pola Yesu kiŋ kɛ pa təna sɩ pa nɩɩ ɩ tɔm .

text: And the Pharisees and scribes murmured , saying , This man receiveth sinners , and eateth with them .
text2: Tənaɣa pə ta maɣa Falisanaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na pa tɔ sɩ : Yʋlʋ ɩnɛ ɩnɩ na tɛtɛlataa pa cakəna , na ɩ na - wɛ pa tɔkəna .

text: And he spake this parable unto them , saying ,
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ :

text: What man of you , having an hundred sheep , if he lose one of them , doth not leave the ninety and nine in the wilderness , and go after that which is lost , until he find it ?
text2: Ye ɩsɩɩ mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ wɛna heeŋ ntɛ ́ nɩɩnʋwa ( 100 ) , ɩlɛna ɩ taa kʋlʋm tə le , ɩ kaa yele pɔɣɔlaɣafɛɩ nɩɩnʋwa ɩnɛɣɛ nyɩɩtʋ tətɔɣɔlɛ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ sʋʋ kʋlepu ɩnəɣɩ pɛɛkʋɣʋ haləna ɩ na - ɩ ?

text: And when he hath found it , he layeth it on his shoulders , rejoicing .
text2: Ɩ naa - ɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ laŋlɛ hʋlʋmɩ teu , na ɩ ́ kpaɣa - ɩ na ɩ ́ hɔɣɔlɩ .

text: And when he cometh home , he calleth together his friends and neighbours , saying unto them , Rejoice with me ; for I have found my sheep which was lost .
text2: Ɩ takɩ təyaɣa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yaa ɩ cewaa na ɩ cɔlɔ ɩ cɔlɔ nyə ́ ma sɩ : Ɩ ́ kɔɔ na má na - mɛ tə yɔɔlɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma ná ma heu wei ɩ ka lepa tɔ .

text: I say unto you , that likewise joy shall be in heaven over one sinner that repenteth , more than over ninety and nine just persons , which need no repentance .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ , ye ɩsaɣaʋ kʋlʋm yelina ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ , laŋhʋlʋmlɛ tɔɔkɩ Ɩsɔ təyaɣa taa kɛ ́ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ , na pə ́ kəlɩ kʋpama pɔɣɔlaɣafɛɩ nɩɩnʋwa mpa pa fɛɩna taalɩ nɔɣɔlʋ tɔ .

text: Either what woman having ten pieces of silver , if she lose one piece , doth not light a candle , and sweep the house , and seek diligently till she find it ?
text2: Na ɩ ́ tasa lɛntɩ tɔtɔ sɩ : Ye ɩsɩɩ alʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛna liɣitee nyəɣətʋ naanʋwa , ɩlɛna kʋlʋmʋɣʋ le , ɩ mʋsəɣɩ fətəla kɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ hasa ɩ təyaɣa təna na ɩ ́ taasɩ tətetete , haləna ɩ ́ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ na - kʋ .

text: And when she hath found it , she calleth her friends and her neighbours together , saying , Rejoice with me ; for I have found the piece which I had lost .
text2: Ɩ naa - kʋɣʋ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yaa ɩ cewaa na ɩ cɔlɔ ɩ cɔlɔ nyə ́ ma na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ kɔɔ na má na mɛ tə ́ yɔɔlɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma ná ma liɣitee nyəɣəlʋɣʋ ŋku kɩɩ lepa tɔ .

text: Likewise , I say unto you , there is joy in the presence of the angels of God over one sinner that repenteth .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ , ye ɩsaɣaʋ kʋlʋm yelina ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ , Ɩsɔ ɩsɔtaa tillaa laŋa hʋlʋma teu kɛ ́ .

text: And he said , A certain man had two sons :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ sɩ : Apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛnna pəyalaa naalɛ .

text: And the younger of them said to his father , Father , give me the portion of goods that falleth to me . And he divided unto them his living .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ səkpelu nyəŋ tɔma ɩ caa sɩ ɩ ́ cɛlɛ - ɩ pa wontu hɔɣɔlʋɣʋ ŋku ɩnɩ ɩ kaɣa ɩ hiki pa caa ɩnɩ ɩ səm waalɩ tɔɣɔ kpakpaa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa caa tala - wɛɣɛ ɩ wɛnaʋ .

text: And not many days after the younger son gathered all together , and took his journey into a far country , and there wasted his substance with riotous living .
text2: Pə lapa wɛɛ naalɛ , ɩlɛna səkpelu nyəŋ pɛɛtɩ ɩ nyəm təna , na ɩ ́ koti liɣitee na ɩ ́ sʋʋ nyɩɩtʋ təyutulu . Ɩ tala təna ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sʋʋ təkpaalətʋ lapʋ , na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ ɩ liɣitee təna təpaɩpaɩ .

text: And when he had spent all , there arose a mighty famine in that land ; and he began to be in want .
text2: Ɩ tɛma a tənaɣa tɔɣɔʋ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna nyɔɣɔsɩ anaam nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ lɩɩ ɩcatɛ ntɛ ́ tə taa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ sʋʋ wahala taa .

text: And he went and joined himself to a citizen of that country ; and he sent him into his fields to feed swine .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ pola ɩcatɛ tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kiŋ na ɩ ́ sələmɩ təmlɛ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ pona - ɩ taalɛ sɩ ɩ ́ nyənəɣɩ afanaa .

text: And he would fain have filled his belly with the husks that the swine did eat : and no man gave unto him .
text2: Ɩ nyɩɩla teu ɩsɩɩ paa afanaa tɔɣɔnaɣa maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ , ama ɩ ta hiki .

text: And when he came to himself , he said , How many hired servants of my father ' s have bread enough and to spare , and I perish with hunger !
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ caɣaa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa hʋwɛɛ na ɩ ́ maɣasɩ ɩ tɩ tɔm , na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Halɩ pá tɔ sɩ ma caa təyaɣa taa kɛlɛ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma tɔɔ sɔsɔm , na pá tɔkɩ na pá kpisiɣi , na nyɔɣɔsɩ náá kʋɣɩ maɣa cənɛ .

text: I will arise and go to my father , and will say unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and before thee ,
text2: Maa kʋlɩ kɛ ́ na má məlɩ ma caa tɛ . Ma talaa ma heeli - ɩ sɩ : Paapa , ma pəntəna Ɩsɔ , na ma pəntəna nyá tɔtɔ .

text: And am no more worthy to be called thy son : make me as one of thy hired servants .
text2: Pənɛntɛ ma ta nəɣəsəna sɩ ń yaa - m nyá pəyalʋ . Ama nyənəɣɩ - m teitei ɩsɩɩ n nyənʋɣʋ nyá təmlɛ nyə ́ ma tɔ .

text: And he arose , and came to his father . But when he was yet a great way off , his father saw him , and had compassion , and ran , and fell on his neck , and kissed him .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa mpaaʋ sɩ ɩ kpeŋ ɩ caa tɛ . Ɩ kɔma ɩ ́ wʋsəna təyaɣa , ɩlɛ ɩ caa loosa - ɩ kɛlɛ , na ɩ tɔm lapɩ - ɩ pətɔɔtəlɛ kɛ sɔsɔm . Tənaɣa ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ se lɔŋ na ɩ ́ səŋɩ - ɩ , na ɩ ́ kpipi - ɩ na ɩ ́ waɣalɩ - ɩ .

text: And the son said unto him , Father , I have sinned against heaven , and in thy sight , and am no more worthy to be called thy son .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ pəyalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Paapa , ma pəntəna Ɩsɔ , na ma pəntəna nyá tɔtɔ . Ma ta nəɣəsəna ń yaa - m nyá pəyaɣa tɔtɔ .

text: But the father said to his servants , Bring forth the best robe , and put it on him ; and put a ring on his hand , and shoes on his feet :
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ caa tɔma ɩ pəyalaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ kɔna toko kʋpampaŋ kɛ lɔŋ na ɩ ́ suu - ɩ . Ɩ ́ lɛɛ - ɩ kukuule kɛ ɩ mpəle tɔɔ , na ntaŋkpala kɛ ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ taa .

text: And bring hither the fatted calf , and kill it ; and let us eat , and be merry :
text2: Ɩ ́ kɔna ta naʋ wei ɩnɩ ɩ wɛna nim kɛ teu tɔ na ɩ ́ kʋ , na tə la tɔɣɔnaɣa kʋpaŋka .

text: For this my son was dead , and is alive again ; he was lost , and is found . And they began to be merry .
text2: Ma pəyalʋ ɩnɛ pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩ səpaɣa na ɩ ́ fe . Ɩ ka lepaɣa na má hii - ɩ . Tənaɣa pa nika acima tɔɣɔʋ kɛ kpakpaa .

text: Now his elder son was in the field : and as he came and drew nigh to the house , he heard musick and dancing .
text2: Pə lakaɣa mpʋ tɔ , pə pamna pəyalʋ sɔsɔ náá wɛna taalɛ . Ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kɔma ɩ ́ lɩɩna taalɛ na ɩ ́ wʋsəna təyaɣa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ nɩɩ soo na paalɛ pə haŋa kaɩɩɩ .

text: And he called one of the servants , and asked what these things meant .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ yaa ɩ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma taa nɔɣɔlʋ , na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Pepe lapa na pə haŋa mpʋ ?

text: And he said unto him , Thy brother is come ; and thy father hath killed the fatted calf , because he hath received him safe and sound .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Nyá neu ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ mələna , na mə caa kʋ ta naʋ wei ɩnɩ ɩ wɛ nim kɛ teu tɔ . Mpi tɔ ɩ tasa - ɩ naʋ na ɩ alaafəya tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: And he was angry , and would not go in : therefore came his father out , and intreated him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ pəyalʋ sɔsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ mʋ pááná na ɩ ́ kisi təyaɣa sʋʋʋ . Ɩlɛna ɩ caa lɩɩ na ɩ ́ pɔɔlɩ - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ sʋʋ .

text: And he answering said to his father , Lo , these many years do I serve thee , neither transgressed I at any time thy commandment : and yet thou never gavest me a kid , that I might make merry with my friends :
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ tɔma ɩ caa sɩ : Nyənɩ , pɩɩsɩ paɣalɛ ntɔ ma haləɣɩ nyá taalɛ , na n yɔɣɔta nti maa kpɛɛsəɣɩ . Na paa kʋyakʋ kʋlʋmʋɣʋ n ta tɔnta sɩ , ooo ma pəyalʋ , kpaɣa pinaɣa kanɛ , na nyá na nyá taapalaa ɩ ́ leɣelina .

text: But as soon as this thy son was come , which hath devoured thy living with harlots , thou hast killed for him the fatted calf .
text2: Nyá pəyalʋ kɔma tɔ , n ka yele ta naʋ wei ɩnɩ ɩ wɛ nim kɛ teu tɔɣɔ kʋɣʋ na ? Pəyele ɩnɩ ɩ kpaɣana nyá wɛnaʋ təna təpaɩ , na ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ wakələna acacaalɛ .

text: And he said unto him , Son , thou art ever with me , and all that I have is thine .
text2: Tənaɣa cɛcɛ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ma pu , nyá wɛ ma kiŋ kɛ ́ tam kɛ ́ , na pə təna mpi ma tɩ tɔ nyá tənna tɔtɔ .

text: It was meet that we should make merry , and be glad : for this thy brother was dead , and is alive again ; and was lost , and is found .
text2: Pə mʋna tə la acima kɛ ́ na tə yɔɔlɩ . Nyá neu ɩnɛ , pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩ səpaɣa na ɩ ́ fe . Ɩ ́ ká lepaɣa na ma hɩɩ - ɩ .

text: And he said also unto his disciples , There was a certain rich man , which had a steward ; and the same was accused unto him that he had wasted his goods .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu sɛɛ ɩ ɩfalaa kɛ ɩsɔ sɩ : Apalʋ toŋ tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ka wɛnna təmlɛ tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ wei ɩ niŋ taa toŋ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ mələna ɩ wɛnaʋ təna na ɩ ́ tʋ tɔ . Tənaɣa yəlaa polaa na pá maɣana toŋ tʋ ɩnɩ na pá heeli - ɩ sɩ : Nyá təmlɛ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ wakələɣɩ nyá wɛnaʋ kɛ ́ .

text: And he called him , and said unto him , How is it that I hear this of thee ? give an account of thy stewardship ; for thou mayest be no longer steward .
text2: Tənaɣa toŋ tʋ yaa ɩ təmlɛ tʋ na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Nti nti ma nɩɩkɩ sɩ n lakɩ tɔ , tə wɛ tampana yaa pɔpɔtʋ ? Ama maa ləsɩ - ŋ ma təmlɛ taa . Mpʋ tɔ , kɛɛsɩ - m ɩsəna nyá təmlɛ yaasi lapa tɔ na pə ́ cɔ ́ ń tɛɛ nyá nyəŋkʋ .

text: Then the steward said within himself , What shall I do ? for my lord taketh away from me the stewardship : I cannot dig ; to beg I am ashamed .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ təmlɛ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ caɣaa na ɩ ́ hʋʋ ɩ taa sɩ : Tacaa ləsəɣɩ - m təmlɛ taa tɔ , nteɣelɛ maa la ɩlɛ ? Anɩ ma kaa pəsɩ haləm . Pəyele pala lapʋ ná wɛ fɛɛlɛ .

text: I am resolved what to do , that , when I am put out of the stewardship , they may receive me into their houses .
text2: Ɛɛhɛɛ , ma nyəmá nti maa la , na pá kɔma na pá tɔɣɔnɩ - m , má taa laŋ yəlaa mpa paa tɔɔkɩ - m tɔ .

text: So he called every one of his lord ' s debtors unto him , and said unto the first , How much owest thou unto my lord ?
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ yaa mpa mpa paa wɛna ɩ caa kɛ kəmlɛ tɔɣɔ kʋlʋm kʋlʋm , na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ kancaalaɣa nyəŋ sɩ : Ɩsənaɣa n wɛna ta caa kɛ kəmlɛ ?

text: And he said , An hundred measures of oil . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and sit down quickly , and write fifty .
text2: Ɩ ́ lɛ ́ sɩ : Olifinaa nim tonoonaa nɩɩnʋwa ( 100 ) kɛ ma wɛna - ɩ kəmlɛ . Tənaɣa təmlɛ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ heela - ɩ sɩ : Nn naa pə takəlaɣa ntɔ , caɣa lɔŋ na ń ŋmaa sɩ nim tonoonaa nɩɩlɛ na naanʋwa .

text: Then said he to another , And how much owest thou ? And he said , An hundred measures of wheat . And he said unto him , Take thy bill , and write fourscore .
text2: Ɩ yela ɩ ́ lɛ ́ na ɩ ́ ŋmaa lɛlʋ tɔɔ sɩ : Na nyá se , ɩsənaɣa nyá nyəntɛ wɛɛ ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tɔɣɔnaɣa pee saakənaa nɩɩnʋwa ( 100 ) . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ heeli ɩ ́ lɛ ́ sɩ : Nn naa pə takəlaɣa ntɔ , ŋmaa sɩ tɔɣɔnaɣa pee saakənaa nɩɩnaasa .

text: And the lord commended the unjust steward , because he had done wisely : for the children of this world are in their generation wiser than the children of light .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ toŋ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ sama ɩ təmlɛ tʋ ɩsaɣaʋ ɩnəɣɩ ɩ laɣatʋ tɔɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ yəlaa wɛna nyəm kɛ ɩsəna pa lakəna təma tɔɣɔ , na pə ́ kəlɩ mpa pa ta kɛ antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ nyə ́ ma tɔ .

text: And I say unto you , Make to yourselves friends of the mammon of unrighteousness ; that , when ye fail , they may receive you into everlasting habitations .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ heeluɣu sɩ : Má , ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ kpaɣa wɛnaʋ ŋku ɩ ́ wɛna atɛ cənɛ tɔ na ɩ ́ lana na ɩ ́ hiki taapalaa , na pə ́ kɔma na ɩ ́ laŋ - wɩ pa mʋ - mɛɣɛ ɩcatɛ nte tə wɛ tam tɔɔ tɔ tə taa .

text: He that is faithful in that which is least is faithful also in much : and he that is unjust in the least is unjust also in much .
text2: Wei ɩ ́ te səkpetu taa , mpʋ ɩnɩ tɔtɔɣɔ ɩ te sɔsɔɔntʋ taa . Na wei ɩ ta te səkpetu taa , mpʋ ɩnɩ tɔtɔɣɔ ɩ kaa te sɔsɔɔntʋ taa .

text: If therefore ye have not been faithful in the unrighteous mammon , who will commit to your trust the true riches ?
text2: Ye ɩ ́ lapa cakəlɩ cakəlɩ na atɛ cənɛ wɛnaʋ , pa kaa nɔkɩ - mɛɣɛ ɩsɔtaa nyəm kɛ cɛlʋɣʋ .

text: And if ye have not been faithful in that which is another man ' s , who shall give you that which is your own ?
text2: Ye ɩ ́ ta pəsɩ lɛlʋ nyəm tɔkʋɣʋ kɛ teu na tampana , leɣe ɩ ́ ká hiki mə maɣamaɣa mə niŋ nyəm .

text: No servant can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: Təmlɛ tʋ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ kpɩ yəlaa naalɛ na ɩ ́ lakɩ pa təma . Ye ɩ kpəpa mpʋ , ɩ ləmaɣasɛɛ kɔŋ a wɛɛ lɛlʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ yele lɛlʋ . Yaa ntanyɩ , ɩ paasəna lɛlʋ na ɩ ́ kisi lɛlʋ . Mɛ ɩ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ kpɩ Ɩsɔ na liɣitee na ɩ ́ təŋ mpʋ .

text: And the Pharisees also , who were covetous , heard all these things : and they derided him .
text2: Falisanaa nɩɩ tɔm ntɩ tə təna , ɩlɛna pá woŋ Yesu . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , mpɛ paa wɛna liɣitee kɔtɔɩ kɛ ́ .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are they which justify yourselves before men ; but God knoweth your hearts : for that which is highly esteemed among men is abomination in the sight of God .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ lakɩ sɩ yəlaa ɩ ́ nyənɩ - mɛɣɛ tampana nyə ́ ma . Ama Ɩsɔ nyəmá mə lotu taa hʋwɛɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , mpi yəlaa ná nyənəɣɩ sɔsɔɔm tɔ , Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa pəlɛ pə ta kɛ pʋlʋ .

text: The law and the prophets were until John : since that time the kingdom of God is preached , and every man presseth into it .
text2: Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa kʋŋmaŋmaatʋ lapa tə waatʋ haləna Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔlʋ Yohaanɩ náá kɔɔ . Pə kpaɣaʋ waatʋ ɩnɩ tɔɣɔ pa sʋʋ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔm kpaalʋɣʋ , na paa wei ɩ lʋkəna ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ sɩ ɩ ́ sʋʋ Kawulaɣa ŋkɛ ka taa .

text: And it is easier for heaven and earth to pass , than one tittle of the law to fail .
text2: Ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ na atɛ pə tɛɛʋ ta tala katɛ kɛ Ɩsɔ tɔm taa tɔmiya kʋlʋmaɣa saalʋɣʋ .

text: Whosoever putteth away his wife , and marrieth another , committeth adultery : and whosoever marrieth her that is put away from her husband committeth adultery .
text2: Ye yʋlʋ tɔɣɔna ɩ alʋ na ɩ ́ kpaɣa kʋfalʋ , ɩ lapa wasaŋkalətʋ kɛ ́ . Ye pa kisa alʋ na nɔɣɔlʋ náá təŋ na ɩ ́ kpaɣa - ɩ , pʋntʋ lapa wasaŋkalətʋ kɛ ́ .

text: There was a certain rich man , which was clothed in purple and fine linen , and fared sumptuously every day :
text2: Apalʋ toŋ tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛnna , na ɩ ́ suuki liɣitee wontu tənyənənyənɩ kɛ teu . Paa ɩfemle nte leleŋ taa kɛ ́ ɩ wɛɛ , na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ tɔɣɔnaɣa kʋpaŋka .

text: And there was a certain beggar named Lazarus , which was laid at his gate , full of sores ,
text2: Pə kaasɩ kʋyɔntʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛɛ tɔtɔ , na pá yaa - ɩ sɩ Lasaa . Ɩ təna ɩsəntɔ tɔ hiŋ kɛ ́ , na ɩ həntaɣa toŋ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ təyaɣa nɔɣɔ .

text: And desiring to be fed with the crumbs which fell from the rich man ' s table : moreover the dogs came and licked his sores .
text2: Na ɩ ́ taŋaa sɩ , ye toŋ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kɔma na ɩ tɔkɩ ɩ tɔɣɔnaɣa na cəɣəlasɩ hoti atɛ , ɩlɛ ɩ tɔɔsɩ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ . Haləna hasɩ maɣamaɣa kɔŋaɣa na sɩ niisiɣi kʋnyɔntʋ ɩnɩ ɩ hiŋ taa .

text: And it came to pass , that the beggar died , and was carried by the angels into Abraham ' s bosom : the rich man also died , and was buried ;
text2: Tənaɣa kʋnyɔntʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ sɩ , na ɩsɔtaa tillaa kpaɣa - ɩ na pá pona - ɩ Apəlaham cɔlɔɣɔ aləsanna taa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ toŋ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ sɩ tɔtɔ , na pá pimi - ɩ .

text: And in hell he lift up his eyes , being in torments , and seeth Abraham afar off , and Lazarus in his bosom .
text2: Na ɩ ́ sʋʋ wahala taa kɛ ́ atɛtəlɛ taa təna . Tənaɣa toŋ tʋ teka ɩ ɩsɛ na ɩ ́ loosi Apəlaham , na Lasaa caɣa ɩ kɔŋkɔŋ taa .

text: And he cried and said , Father Abraham , have mercy on me , and send Lazarus , that he may dip the tip of his finger in water , and cool my tongue ; for I am tormented in this flame .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ wuli na ɩ ́ yaa sɩ : Haɩ ta caa Apəlaham , nyənɩ ma pətɔɔtəlɛ na ń tili Lasaa na ɩ ́ lii ɩ mpəle nɔɣɔ taa kɛ ́ lʋm , na ɩ ́ tosi ma nsəmlɛ tɔɔ na pə tɩɩ niɣiti - m niɣituɣu maɣamaɣa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pə haŋa - m kɔkɔ kanɛ ka taa kɛ ́ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: But Abraham said , Son , remember that thou in thy lifetime receivedst thy good things , and likewise Lazarus evil things : but now he is comforted , and thou art tormented .
text2: Tənaɣa Apəlaham cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ma pəyalʋ , tɔɔsɩ sɩ , n ka wɛʋ atɛ tɔ , n tɔɣɔ nyá leleŋ kɛ teu , na Lasaa ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ tɔɣɔ nyaŋ kɛ ́ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ . Nɔɔnɔɔ kɛlɛ pə tala ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ leleŋ sɩ ɩ laŋlɛ ɩ ́ hɛɛ , na pə tala nyá wahala .

text: And beside all this , between us and you there is a great gulf fixed : so that they which would pass from hence to you cannot ; neither can they pass to us , that would come from thence .
text2: Pəlɛ pə paasi tá na - mɛ tá hɛkʋ wɛ pʋ ́ ʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɛ yem təlemm , ŋku kʋ lumaŋ na kʋ walasɩ fɛɩ tənaɣa tɔ . Mpʋ tɔ , yʋlʋ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ lɩɩ cənɛ na ɩ ́ polo mə kiŋ , na mə cɔlɔ tʋ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ lɩɩ na ɩ ́ kɔɔ tá kiŋ cənɛ .

text: Then he said , I pray thee therefore , father , that thou wouldest send him to my father ' s house :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ toŋ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tasa - ɩ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ : Tacaa la suulu na ń tili Lasaa kɛ ma caa təyaɣa taa .

text: For I have five brethren ; that he may testify unto them , lest they also come into this place of torment .
text2: Ma wɛna newaa kɛ kakpasɩ kɛ təna . Ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ kpaalɩ - wɛɣɛ teu , na pɛlɛ pá taa kɔɔ pá tasa wahala ɩnɛ ɩ taa kɛ ́ sʋʋʋ tɔtɔ .

text: Abraham saith unto him , They have Moses and the prophets ; let them hear them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Apəlaham cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ye kpaalʋɣʋ kɛ pa caa , Moisi na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa pa wɛɛ ɩlɛ , pá nɩɩna pɛlɛ .

text: And he said , Nay , father Abraham : but if one went unto them from the dead , they will repent .
text2: Tənaɣa toŋ tʋ tɔma sɩ : Aaɩ haɩ , ta caa Apəlaham . Ye ɩsɩɩ atɛtʋnaa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ka mələna na ɩ ́ maɣana - wɛ , paa laɣasa tɔntɛ .

text: And he said unto him , If they hear not Moses and the prophets , neither will they be persuaded , though one rose from the dead .
text2: Apəlaham tasa - ɩ heeluɣu sɩ : Ye pa kpɛɛsa Moisi na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa pa tɔm , paa atɛtʋnaa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ka pona , pa kaa tʋna .

text: Then said he unto the disciples , It is impossible but that offences will come : but woe unto him , through whom they come !
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Mpi pɩɩ tusi yəlaa kɛ ɩsaɣatʋ taa tɔ pə kaa laŋ . Ama ye pə cəpa wei na ɩ ́ la na ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ la ɩsaɣatʋ , pʋntʋ ká na .

text: It were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he cast into the sea , than that he should offend one of these little ones .
text2: Ye yʋlʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ká la na piya sənɛ sɩ taa nakəlɩ pəntɩ , pə nəɣəsəna pá tʋ pʋntʋ luɣu tɛɛ kɛ ́ namlɛ na pá tʋsɩ - ɩ teŋku taa .

text: Take heed to yourselves : If thy brother trespass against thee , rebuke him ; and if he repent , forgive him .
text2: Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ . Ye nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ lapa - ŋ ɩsaɣatʋ , yaa - ɩ na ń hʋlɩ - ɩ sɩ ɩ lapa mpi tɔ pə fɛɩ teu . Ye ɩ tisaa na ɩ ́ laɣasɩ ɩ kʋlapʋtʋ , n kʋ - təɣɩ nyá taa təkpataa .

text: And if he trespass against thee seven times in a day , and seven times in a day turn again to thee , saying , I repent ; thou shalt forgive him .
text2: Ye wʋlɛ kʋlʋmtəlɛ taa ɩ pəntəna - ŋ tɔm naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa , na ɩ ́ kɔŋ tam na ɩ ́ wiiki sɩ ma pəntaa kɛ ́ , n ká hʋlɩ - ɩ suulu kɛ ́ .

text: And the apostles said unto the Lord , Increase our faith .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tillaa tɔma Tacaa sɩ : La na ta taa tɛmnaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ sɔɔsɩ .

text: And the Lord said , If ye had faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye might say unto this sycamine tree , Be thou plucked up by the root , and be thou planted in the sea ; and it should obey you .
text2: Tənaɣa Tacaa cɔwa sɩ : Ɩsəna ɩ ́ tɛmna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ mə taa tɔ ye pɩɩ tɩɩ tala ɩsɩɩ sɔɔɣa pile kɛ yasəlaɣa , paa tʋɣʋ ŋku kʋ səŋa ɩsəntɔ tɔɣɔ ɩ ́ tɔma sɩ : Kpɛsɩ təna na ń polo ń səŋ teŋku taa , pə lakɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ .

text: But which of you , having a servant plowing or feeding cattle , will say unto him by and by , when he is come from the field , Go and sit down to meat ?
text2: Mə taa awe wɛna yom na ɩ ́ haləɣɩ ɩ tawa na ɩ ́ tiikiɣi ɩ kalakəŋ , na ɩ ́ lɩɩna taalɛ kɛ kpakpaa , na pʋntʋ paatəna - ɩ heeluɣu sɩ : Kɔɔ lɔŋ na ń caɣa na ń niki tɔɣɔʋ ?

text: And will not rather say unto him , Make ready wherewith I may sup , and gird thyself , and serve me , till I have eaten and drunken ; and afterward thou shalt eat and drink ?
text2: Aaɩ , ɩ tɔŋɩ - ɩ kɛ ́ sɩ : Saa - m , ɩlɛna ń laɣasɩ nyá wontu na ń kɔŋna - m tɔɣɔnaɣa , na má tɔɣɔ na má nyɔɔ . Maa haɣaa ɩlɛ , nyaa caɣa na ń tɔɣɔ na ń nyɔɔ .

text: Doth he thank that servant because he did the things that were commanded him ? I trow not .
text2: Ɩ ká nɔkɩ - ɩ sɛɛʋ sɩ ɩ lapa mpi ɩ tɔma - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ la na ɩ ́ la tɔ ?

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall have done all those things which are commanded you , say , We are unprofitable servants : we have done that which was our duty to do .
text2: Mpʋ ɩnɩ tɔtɔɣɔ na mɛ , ye ɩ ́ kɔma na ɩ ́ tɛ mpi Ɩsɔ ka tʋ - mɛ tɔ pə lapʋ , ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tə kɛ ́ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma kɛ yem kɛ ́ , nti pɩɩ wɛɛ sɩ tə la tɔ , tə tike kɛ tə lapa .

text: And it came to pass , as he went to Jerusalem , that he passed through the midst of Samaria and Galilee .
text2: Yesu kʋlaa na ɩ ́ puki Yosalɛm , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ təŋna Samalii na Kalilee pə hɛkʋ taa .

text: And as he entered into a certain village , there met him ten men that were lepers , which stood afar off :
text2: Ɩ sʋʋkaɣa ɩcatɛ natəlɩ tə taa , ɩlɛna tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ asilima kʋtɔŋ nyə ́ ma napəlɩ pá tɔ na pá suli - ɩ . Pa wɛ yəlaa naanʋwa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa səŋa pooluŋ ,

text: And they lifted up their voices , and said , Jesus , Master , have mercy on us .
text2: na pá kpɛɛsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa Yesu , wii tá pətɔɔtəlɛ .

text: And when he saw them , he said unto them , Go shew yourselves unto the priests . And it came to pass , that , as they went , they were cleansed .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu na - wɛ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ polo na kɔtəlaa wiili - mɛ . Asilima kʋtɔŋ nyə ́ ma tɔŋna pote , ɩlɛna pə waa - wɛ .

text: And one of them , when he saw that he was healed , turned back , and with a loud voice glorified God ,
text2: Pa taa lɛlʋ nawa sɩ pə waa - ɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ mələna ɩ waalɩ kɛ kpakpaa , na ɩ ́ saŋ Ɩsɔ na nɔɣɔ sɔsɔɣa .

text: And fell down on his face at his feet , giving him thanks : and he was a Samaritan .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ hota Yesu tɛɛ na ɩ ́ sɛɛ - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ . Apalʋ wei ɩ məla mpʋ na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Yesu tɔ , ɩ kɛ ́ Samalii tʋ .

text: And Jesus answering said , Were there not ten cleansed ? but where are the nine ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma sɩ : Pə taɣa asilima kʋtɔŋ nyə ́ ma mpɛ pa naanʋwa hikina alaafəya ? Na pɔɣɔlaɣafɛɩ naanʋwa ɩnɛ ɩ wɛ le ?

text: There are not found that returned to give glory to God , save this stranger .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ta tɩɩ toosi kɛlɛ sɩ ɩ mələɣɩ na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ , ye pə taɣa kpaɩ tʋ ɩnɛ ɩ paasi ?

text: And he said unto him , Arise , go thy way : thy faith hath made thee whole .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu heeli asilima kʋtɔŋ tʋ sɩ : Kʋlɩ , n tɛma Ɩsɔ na nyá taa tɔ ɩ yelaa na ń hiki alaafəya .

text: And when he was demanded of the Pharisees , when the kingdom of God should come , he answered them and said , The kingdom of God cometh not with observation :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa pɔɔsa Yesu sɩ : Pəlee kɛlɛ pɩɩ tala Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa tɔɣɔʋ ɩlɛ ? Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Pə taɣa sɩ Ɩsɔ tɔkɩ ɩ Kawulaɣa na yəlaa naa təkeelee se .

text: Neither shall they say , Lo here ! or , lo there ! for , behold , the kingdom of God is within you .
text2: Pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ paa yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ ka wɛ cənɛ yaa hatoo təna . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ ́ nyɩ teu sɩ Ɩsɔ tɔŋna ɩ Kawulaɣa tɔɣɔʋ kɛ mə hɛkʋ taa .

text: And he said unto the disciples , The days will come , when ye shall desire to see one of the days of the Son of man , and ye shall not see it .
text2: Yesu tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ heeli ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Pɩɩ kɔɔ na mɛ ɩ ́ nyɩɩlɩ sɩ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma kʋyakʋ ɩ ́ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ na - kʋ . Ama ɩ ́ kaa na .

text: And they shall say to you , See here ; or , see there : go not after them , nor follow them .
text2: Paa heeli - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ paasəna hatoo təna , yaa ɩ ́ paasəna cənɛ . Ama mɩɩ taa polo sɩ ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ .

text: For as the lightning , that lighteneth out of the one part under heaven , shineth unto the other part under heaven ; so shall also the Son of man be in his day .
text2: Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma kʋyakʋ wule pɩɩ la kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ tɛʋ nyəɣəsʋɣʋ təŋmɛlɛʋ na pə ná na pə cɔɔ antulinya təna təpaɩ tɔɣɔ .

text: But first must he suffer many things , and be rejected of this generation .
text2: Ama maa tɔɣɔ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ sɔsɔm , na tá kʋfalaŋ yəlaa panɛ paa lɔ - m təkpataa .

text: And as it was in the days of Noe , so shall it be also in the days of the Son of man .
text2: Ɩsəna pɩɩ lapa Nowee pɔɔlɛ taa tɔ , mpʋ ɩnɩ pə maɣamaɣa pɩɩ lana Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma kʋyɛɛŋ taa .

text: They did eat , they drank , they married wives , they were given in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark , and the flood came , and destroyed them all .
text2: Pə kɛɛsa Nowee wɛɛ anɩ a taa tɔ , pə tɔkaɣa kɛ ́ na pə nyɔɔkɩ , na pə ́ haakɩ təmaɣa alaa na pə ́ kpakəɣɩ mpʋ yooo , haləna kʋyaŋku Nowee sʋʋ atakaa pɔɣɔlʋɣʋ sɔsɔɔʋ taa na pə yele - wɛ , na lʋm kɔɔ na pə ́ tɔɣɔ pa təna təpaɩpaɩ tɔ .

text: Likewise also as it was in the days of Lot ; they did eat , they drank , they bought , they sold , they planted , they builded ;
text2: Pɩɩ la teitei kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ pɩɩ lapʋ Lɔɔtɩ pɔɔlɛ taa tɔ . Pə tɔkaɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ na pə ́ nyɔɔkɩ , na pə ́ pɛɛtəɣɩ na pə ́ yakɩ , na pə ́ haləɣɩ tawa na pə ́ ŋmaakɩ kutuluŋ .

text: But the same day that Lot went out of Sodom it rained fire and brimstone from heaven , and destroyed them all .
text2: Ama kʋyaŋku Lɔɔtɩ lɩɩ Sɔtɔm təkɛʋ tɔ , asimti na kɔkɔ pə lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa təyooo ɩsɩɩ tɛʋ , na ká nyaɣa pa təna təpaɩpaɩ .

text: Even thus shall it be in the day when the Son of man is revealed .
text2: Kʋyaŋku Yʋlʋ pəyaɣa má maa kɔɔ tɔ , mpʋ pə maɣamaɣa pɩɩ lana .

text: In that day , he which shall be upon the housetop , and his stuff in the house , let him not come down to take it away : and he that is in the field , let him likewise not return back .
text2: Pə wʋlɛ ntɛ ́ ye pə maɣana yʋlʋ wɛ kutuluɣu pata tɔɔ na ɩ wontu wɛ təyaɣa taa , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ taa tɔ sɩ ɩ tiiki na ɩ ́ sʋʋ təyaɣa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa ɩ wontu nti tə wɛɛ tɔ . Na ye pə pamma taalɛ kɛ ɩ wɛɛ , ɩ ́ taa tɔ sɩ ɩ mələɣɩ təyaɣa .

text: Remember Lot ' s wife .
text2: Ɩ ́ tɔɔsɩ Lɔɔtɩ alʋ tɔm .

text: Whosoever shall seek to save his life shall lose it ; and whosoever shall lose his life shall preserve it .
text2: Wei ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ ɩ weesuɣu təcututu ɩ tɛŋna səpʋ kɛ ́ . Na wei ɩ ́ lapa ɩ təɣɩ awusa , ɩnɩ ɩ ká hikina weesuɣu .

text: I tell you , in that night there shall be two men in one bed ; the one shall be taken , and the other shall be left .
text2: Pə wʋlɛ ntɛ ́ pə ahoo , pɩɩ pana yəlaa naalɛ hənta nyáalʋɣʋ kʋlʋmʋɣʋ tɔɔ , na pə ́ kpaɣa lɛlʋ , na pə ́ yele lɛlʋ .

text: Two women shall be grinding together ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Pɩɩ pana alaa naalɛ wɛ nama tɔɔ , na pə ́ kpaɣa lɛlʋ na pə ́ yele lɛlʋ .

text: Two men shall be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Pɩɩ pana apalaa naalɛ wɛ taalɛ taa , na pə ́ kpaɣa lɛlʋ na pə ́ yele lɛlʋ .

text: And they answered and said unto him , Where , Lord ? And he said unto them , Wheresoever the body is , thither will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ɩfalaa pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , leɣelɛ mpʋ ɩnɩ pɩɩ la ɩlɛ ? Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Timpi pʋlʋ səpa na pə ́ həntaa tɔ , tənaɣa yepelekunaa kotiɣi .

text: And he spake a parable unto them to this end , that men ought always to pray , and not to faint ;
text2: Yesu caa ɩ hʋlɩ - wɛ sɩ pá sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tam , pá taa tɔ sɩ pə nɩɩ - wɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sɛɛ - wɛɣɛ ɩsɔ ɩnɛ sɩ :

text: Saying , There was in a city a judge , which feared not God , neither regarded man :
text2: Wulaʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛnna ɩcatɛ natəlɩ tə taa , ɩ paa fɛɩna Ɩsɔ . Pəyele ɩɩ nyənəɣɩ yʋlʋ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ pʋlʋ .

text: And there was a widow in that city ; and she came unto him , saying , Avenge me of mine adversary .
text2: Pə pamma alʋ leelu nɔɣɔlʋ naa wɛ ɩcatɛ ńtɛ ́ tə taa , tam kɛ ́ ɩ pukaɣa ɩ kiŋ na ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ waasɩ - ɩ . Sɩ nɔɣɔlʋ tɔkəna ɩ ɩsɛ , na ɩ ́ caa sɩ ɩ ́ waasɩ - ɩ .

text: And he would not for a while : but afterward he said within himself , Though I fear not God , nor regard man ;
text2: Paa alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ puki tam kɛ mpʋ tɔ , wulaʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kisa - ɩ nɩɩnaʋ . Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ ɩ maɣasa ɩ taa sɩ : Anɩ ma paa fɛɩna Ɩsɔ , pəyele maa nyənəɣɩ yʋlʋ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ pʋlʋ .

text: Yet because this widow troubleth me , I will avenge her , lest by her continual coming she weary me .
text2: Ama ɩsɩɩ leelu ɩnɛ ɩ kɔŋʋɣʋ tam na ɩ ́ pɛkələɣɩ - m tɔ pə tɔɔ , maa paasəna ɩ tɔm na má waasɩ - ɩ . Tɛfɛ ɩ ka kɔŋ ɩsənɔɣɔ tam kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ cɔɔsəɣɩ - m .

text: And the Lord said , Hear what the unjust judge saith .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Tacaa tasaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ ta nɩɩ nti wulaʋ ɩsaɣaʋ ɩnɛ ɩ yɔɣɔtaa tɔ taa ?

text: And shall not God avenge his own elect , which cry day and night unto him , though he bear long with them ?
text2: Ɩlɛ Ɩsɔ ká yelina ntɛɣɛ waasʋɣʋ kɛ mpa ɩ ləsaa na pá wiikina - ɩ ilim na ahoo tɔ ? Ɩ ká la kaninika na pa sənaʋ na ?

text: I tell you that he will avenge them speedily . Nevertheless when the Son of man cometh , shall he find faith on the earth ?
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ : Ɩsɔ ká taɣanɩ pa tɔm kɛ lɔŋ təlɛʋ . Ɩlɛ waatʋ wei Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa ma maa kɔɔ tɔ , maa maɣana atɛ cənɛɣɛ yəlaa mpa pa tɛmna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ pa taa tɔɣɔlɛ yee ?

text: And he spake this parable unto certain which trusted in themselves that they were righteous , and despised others :
text2: Yəlaa lɛlaa ka tɛma pa taa təkpataa sɩ mpɛ pa kɛna kʋpama kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa , haləna pá nyənəɣɩ lɛlaa kɛ yem . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu sɛɛ - wɛɣɛ ɩsɔ sɩ :

text: Two men went up into the temple to pray ; the one a Pharisee , and the other a publican .
text2: Yəlaa naalɛ kpana Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ . Lɛlʋ kɛ Falisa na lɛlʋ kɛ lampuu mʋlʋ .

text: The Pharisee stood and prayed thus with himself , God , I thank thee , that I am not as other men are , extortioners , unjust , adulterers , or even as this publican .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisa səŋna ɩ mpaa na ɩ ́ sələmɩ Ɩsɔ sɩ : Ɩsɔ nyana təmlɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ma fɛɩ ɩsɩɩ yəlaa lɛlaa wɛʋ tɔ . Pɛlɛ pa kɛ ́ ŋmɩɩlaa na asaɣaa na wasaŋkalənaa kɛ ́ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ ma fɛɩ ɩsɩɩ lampuu mʋlʋ ɩnɛ ɩ wɛʋ tɔ .

text: I fast twice in the week , I give tithes of all that I possess .
text2: Cimaasɩ na cimaasɩ , kʋyɛɛŋ naalɛ naalɛɣɛ ma hɔkəɣɩ nɔɣɔ . Na pə təna mpi ma hikiɣi tɔ , ma ləsəɣɩ pə hɔɣɔləŋ naanʋwa taa kʋlʋmʋɣʋ kɛ ́ na má ha - ŋ .

text: And the publican , standing afar off , would not lift up so much as his eyes unto heaven , but smote upon his breast , saying , God be merciful to me a sinner .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ lampuu mʋlʋ ná cɔɔsa kpeeŋa na ɩ ́ kama nyʋɣʋ na kʋsʋɣʋ fɛɩ , na ɩ ́ tɛkəɣɩ niŋ sɩ : Haɩ Ɩsɔ , ma kɛ ́ ɩsaɣaʋ kɛ ́ , wii ma pətɔɔtəlɛ .

text: I tell you , this man went down to his house justified rather than the other : for every one that exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ Ɩsɔ na apalʋ ɩnɛ pa taɣanaa , na ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ kpe . Ama ɩ ́ na Falisa pa ta taɣanɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , wei ɩ hɔŋ ɩ tɩ , paa tisi - ɩ . Na wei ɩ ́ pasəɣɩ ɩ tɩ , paa kʋsɩ ɩ nyʋɣʋ .

text: And they brought unto him also infants , that he would touch them : but when his disciples saw it , they rebuked them .
text2: Yəlaa pukaɣana piya səkpesi tɔtɔɣɔ Yesu sɩ ɩ ́ tənɩ sɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ niŋ . Ama Yesu ɩfalaa na yəlaa mpɛ ɩlɛna pá kaləna - wɛ .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Suffer little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu yelaa na pá kpətəna piya kɛ ɩ kiŋ , na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ yele na piya kɔɔ ma kiŋ , ɩ ́ taa kaɣatɩ - sɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mpa pa wɛ ɩsɩɩ piya tɔ , mpɛ pa tənna Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child shall in no wise enter therein .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ tampana sɩ , ye wei ɩ ta pəsɩ ɩsɩɩ pəyaɣa na Ɩsɔ tɔɣɔ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ kawulaɣa , pʋntʋ kaa la kawulaɣa ŋkɛ ka tʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ .

text: And a certain ruler asked him , saying , Good Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma nyʋɣʋ tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ pɔɔsa Yesu sɩ : Tacaa kʋpaŋ , pepeɣe pə wɛɛ sɩ maa la ɩlɛna má hiki weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ ?

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? none is good , save one , that is , God .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Pə lapa ɩsəna na ń yaa - m kʋpaŋ ? Nɔɣɔlʋ ta kɛ kʋpaŋ ye pə taɣa Ɩsɔ tike təkoŋ .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Honour thy father and thy mother .
text2: Ntɔŋ n nyəmá nti pa sɩɩwa sɩ : Taa la wasaŋkalətʋ , taa kʋ yʋlʋ , taa ŋmɩɩlɩ , taa suu lɛlʋ kɛ tɔm . Se nyá caa na nyá too .

text: And he said , All these have I kept from my youth up .
text2: Tənaɣa apalʋ toŋ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ cɔwa Yesu sɩ : Ma tɔka kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɩ tə tənaɣa hatoo ma pəcaatʋ kɛ ́ .

text: Now when Jesus heard these things , he said unto him , Yet lackest thou one thing : sell all that thou hast , and distribute unto the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , follow me .
text2: Yesu nɩɩ mpʋ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ama kʋlʋmtʋ tike təkoŋ kaasəna - ŋ lapʋ . Polo ń pɛɛtɩ pə təna mpi n wɛna tɔ na ń tala kʋnyɔntʋnaa kɛ pə liɣitee , na cele ń sʋʋ toŋ kɛ ɩsɔtaa . Ń tɛma mpʋ pə lapʋ ɩlɛ n kɔɔ na ń təŋɩ - m .

text: And when he heard this , he was very sorrowful : for he was very rich .
text2: Apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ nɩɩ tɔm tənɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ laŋlɛ wakəlɩ tətɔɣɔtɔɣɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ ka wɛna kɛ ́ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: And when Jesus saw that he was very sorrowful , he said , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Yesu nawa sɩ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ laŋlɛ wakəlaa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ama liɣitee nyə ́ ma Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa sʋʋʋ wɛ katɛ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: For it is easier for a camel to go through a needle ' s eye , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Ɩsəna mpi pə wɛ yooyoo kɛ ́ katɛ sɩ ɩ ́ sʋʋna pənyálaɣa pʋ ́ ʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ na ɩ ́ lɩɩ tɔ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ pə wɛ liɣitee tʋ kɛ katɛ sɩ ɩ ́ sʋʋ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa taa , halɩ pə tɩɩ tɛɛ mpʋ .

text: And they that heard it said , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Tənaɣa mpa pa caɣaa na pá nɩɩkɩ ɩ tɔm tɔ , pa tɔma sɩ : Ɩlɛ awe ká tʋləna ntɛɣɛ - tɩ ?

text: And he said , The things which are impossible with men are possible with God .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔwa sɩ : Mpi yəlaa tɔŋ sɩ pə fɛɩ pəsʋɣʋ tɔ , Ɩsɔ kiŋ təlɛʋ kɛ ́ .

text: Then Peter said , Lo , we have left all , and followed thee .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ nɔɣɔ təkpaʋ sɩ : Tɔʋ , ta yela pə təna təkpataa kɛ ́ na taa hu nyá waalɩ .

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or parents , or brethren , or wife , or children , for the kingdom of God ' s sake ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ tampana tɔɔ sɩ , ye nɔɣɔlʋ yela ɩ təyaɣa yaa ɩ alʋ , yaa ɩ taalʋnaa yaa ɩ kɔɣɔnaa yaa ɩ newaa , yaa ɩ nyə ́ ma yaa ɩ piya kɛ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ ,

text: Who shall not receive manifold more in this present time , and in the world to come life everlasting .
text2: pɩɩ ha pʋntʋ na pə kəlɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə kpaɣaʋ nɔɔnɔɔ tɔ . Pəyele ɩ səm waalɩ ɩ ká wɛɛna weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ .

text: Then he took unto him the twelve , and said unto them , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem , and all things that are written by the prophets concerning the Son of man shall be accomplished .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu yaa ɩ ɩfalaa naanʋwa na naalɛɣɛ ɩ kiŋ , na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Tɔʋ , tə kpaa Yosalɛm kɛlɛ . Pə təna mpi Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa ka ŋmaawa sɩ pɩɩ maɣana Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má tɔ , tənaɣa pɩɩ la .

text: For he shall be delivered unto the Gentiles , and shall be mocked , and spitefully entreated , and spitted on :
text2: Paa tʋ - m ma ta nyɩ ɩsɔnaa niŋ taa . Pɛlɛ paa paana - m , paa tʋʋ - m , paa tɔ - m ntaɣama .

text: And they shall scourge him , and put him to death : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Paa casa - m hikasɩ , paa kʋ - m . Ama kʋyɛɛŋ tooso wule , maa fe .

text: And they understood none of these things : and this saying was hid from them , neither knew they the things which were spoken .
text2: Ama Yesu ɩfalaa ta cɛkəna tɔm ntɩ . Tɔm ntɩ tə hʋwɛɛ tɛɛ pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ , ɩlɛ pa ta tɩɩ nyəm mpi pə tɔm Yesu yɔɣɔtaa tɔ .

text: And it came to pass , that as he was come nigh unto Jericho , a certain blind man sat by the way side begging :
text2: Yesu kɔma na ɩ ́ kpɛɣɛtəna Yeliko ɩlɛ , sɛsɛ yʋlʋm nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka caɣa mpaaʋ nɔɣɔ ntɛ ́ na ɩ ́ lakɩ pala .

text: And hearing the multitude pass by , he asked what it meant .
text2: Ɩ nɩɩ yəlaa samaa taŋ na pá tɛɛkɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ sɩ : Pepe lapa ye ?

text: And they told him , that Jesus of Nazareth passeth by .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa heela - ɩ sɩ : Nasalɛtɩ Yesu tɛɛkəna .

text: And he cried , saying , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ koo sɔsɔm sɩ : Tafiiti Pəyaɣa Yesu , nyənɩ ma pətɔɔtəlɛ .

text: And they which went before rebuked him , that he should hold his peace : but he cried so much the more , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Mpa paa tɛɛ nɔɣɔ tɔ , pɛlɛ pa kaləna yʋlʋm na pá heeli - ɩ sɩ : Su . Ama ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ sɔɔsa koou kɛ sɔsɔm sɩ : Tafiiti Pəyaɣa , nyənɩ ma pətɔɔtəlɛ .

text: And Jesus stood , and commanded him to be brought unto him : and when he was come near , he asked him ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu səŋaa , na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ kɔna - ɩ ma kiŋ . Yʋlʋm tala Yesu kiŋ , ɩlɛna Yesu pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ :

text: Saying , What wilt thou that I shall do unto thee ? And he said , Lord , that I may receive my sight .
text2: N caa má la - ŋ we ? Yʋlʋm cɔwa sɩ : Tacaa , ma caa kɛ ́ sɩ ń la na má naakɩ ɩsɩɩ maa wɛʋ ma wule taa tɔ .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Receive thy sight : thy faith hath saved thee .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Tɔʋ , naa ɩlɛ , nyá taa tɛmnaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ waasa - ŋ kɛ .

text: And immediately he received his sight , and followed him , glorifying God : and all the people , when they saw it , gave praise unto God .
text2: Ɩ sʋʋ naʋ ntɛ ́ tənɛ ɩnəɣɩ kpakpaa , na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ Yesu na ɩ ́ saŋ Ɩsɔ . Samaa təna ná mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá sʋʋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sam tɔtɔ .

text: And Jesus entered and passed through Jericho .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu sʋʋ Yeliko , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ faɣana ɩcatɛ taa na ɩ ́ tɛɛkɩ .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Zacchaeus , which was the chief among the publicans , and he was rich .
text2: Apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛ tə taa təna , na pá yaa - ɩ sɩ Sakee . Apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kɛna lampuu mʋlaa sɔsɔ , na ɩ ka pilaa kɛ ́ .

text: And he sought to see Jesus who he was ; and could not for the press , because he was little of stature .
text2: Ɩ caakaɣa sɩ ɩ ́ nyɩ wei pa yaa sɩ Yesu Yesu tɔ . Ama ɩ topuluŋ tɔɔ ɩ taa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ na - ɩ . Mpi tɔ , samaa nyəkaa kɛ ́ .

text: And he ran before , and climbed up into a sycomore tree to see him : for he was to pass that way .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Sakee tɛɛ nɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ kpaɣa asewa , na ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ kpa tʋɣʋ nakʋlɩ kʋ tɔɔ , sɩ Yesu ɩ ́ tɛɛkəna kʋ tɛɛ ɩlɛ ɩ na - ɩ .

text: And when Jesus came to the place , he looked up , and saw him , and said unto him , Zacchaeus , make haste , and come down ; for to day I must abide at thy house .
text2: Yesu kɔma na ɩ ́ tala təna , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ teki ɩ ɩsɛ na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Sakee tii təcaʋ , saŋa nyá təyaɣa kɛ maa caɣa .

text: And he made haste , and came down , and received him joyfully .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Sakee tii kpakpaa , na ɩ ́ mʋ Yesu na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ .

text: And when they saw it , they all murmured , saying , That he was gone to be guest with a man that is a sinner .
text2: Pa təna mpa pa ná mpʋ tɔ pə ta maɣa - wɛ , ɩlɛna pá tɔŋ sɩ : Halɩ yʋlʋ ɩsaɣaʋ tɛɣɛlɛ ɩ kʋlaa ɩ ́ polo .

text: And Zacchaeus stood , and said unto the Lord ; Behold , Lord , the half of my goods I give to the poor ; and if I have taken any thing from any man by false accusation , I restore him fourfold .
text2: Pa tala təyaɣa taa , ɩlɛna Sakee kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ heeli Tacaa sɩ : Tacaa , ma seee , maa faɣa ma kʋpam kɛ calɩ na má ha kʋnyɔntʋnaa . Ye maa muɣula nɔɣɔlʋ na má tɔɣɔ ɩ liɣitee , maa fɛlɩ pʋntʋ kɛ pə tɔm liɣiti .

text: And Jesus said unto him , This day is salvation come to this house , forsomuch as he also is a son of Abraham .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma sɩ : Saŋa təyaɣa kanɛ kɛlɛ ka nyə ́ ma ná nyʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Sakee maɣamaɣa ná kɛ ́ Apəlaham pəyaɣa tɔtɔɣɔ mɛɛ .

text: For the Son of man is come to seek and to save that which was lost .
text2: Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma kɔmaɣa sɩ ma pɛɛkəɣɩ mpi pə lepa tɔ na má ya pə nyʋɣʋ .

text: And as they heard these things , he added and spake a parable , because he was nigh to Jerusalem , and because they thought that the kingdom of God should immediately appear .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa mpa pa nɩɩ tɔm nti ɩ yɔɣɔtaa tɔɣɔ ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa kpɛɣɛtəna Yosalɛm tɔ , yəlaa hʋʋkaɣa sɩ ntanyɩ Ɩsɔ ká sʋʋ Kawulaɣa tɔɣɔʋ kɛ tənɛ ɩnəɣɩ kpakpaa na pá ná .

text: He said therefore , A certain nobleman went into a far country to receive for himself a kingdom , and to return .
text2: Ɩsɔ wei ɩ sɛɛ - wɛ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Kawulaɣa təyaɣa taa awulumpu nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kʋləna na ɩ ́ polo tɛtʋ pooluŋ nyəntʋ sɩ pá tʋ - ɩ kawulaɣa , na pə ́ tɛma ɩlɛ ɩ məlɩ .

text: And he called his ten servants , and delivered them ten pounds , and said unto them , Occupy till I come .
text2: Ɩ caakaɣa tɛɛʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yaa ɩ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma naanʋwa , na ɩ tala - wɛɣɛ liɣitee nyəɣəlʋɣʋ nyəɣəlʋɣʋ kɛ pa nyɔɔŋ tɔɔ . Na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ taatəna liɣitee anɛ , halɩ má polo má kɔɔ .

text: But his citizens hated him , and sent a message after him , saying , We will not have this man to reign over us .
text2: Ama ɩ ɩcatɛ nyə ́ ma luɣu ná fɛɩ - ɩ , ɩlɛna pá kʋsɩ tillaa sɩ pá polo pá heeli - wɛ sɩ : Tɩɩ caa sɩ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ la ta wulaʋ .

text: And it came to pass , that when he was returned , having received the kingdom , then he commanded these servants to be called unto him , to whom he had given the money , that he might know how much every man had gained by trading .
text2: Pa tʋ apalʋ ɩnəɣɩ kawulaɣa ŋkɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ məlɩ ɩ ɩcatɛ taa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kota ɩ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma mpa ɩ ka cɛla liɣitee tɔ , sɩ ɩ naa ɩsəna ɩsəna pə sɛɛ - wɛnaa tɔ .

text: Then came the first , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained ten pounds .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kancaalaɣa nyəŋ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tacaa , pə sɛɛ - m liɣitee nyəɣətʋ naanʋwa kɛ ́ nyəɣəlʋɣʋ ŋku n ka cɛla - m tɔ kʋ tɔɔ .

text: And he said unto him , Well , thou good servant : because thou hast been faithful in a very little , have thou authority over ten cities .
text2: Tənaɣa wulaʋ tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Pə wɛ teu , n kɛ ́ təmlɛ tʋ kʋpaŋ kɛ ́ . Timpi ɩsɩɩ n lapa teu kɛ pəcɔ nyəm taa ɩsəntɔ tɔ , n ká tɔɣɔ acalɛɛ naanʋwa tɔɔ kɛ ́ kawulaɣa .

text: And the second came , saying , Lord , thy pound hath gained five pounds .
text2: Ɩlɛna naalɛ nyəŋ náá kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tacaa , pə sɛɛ - m liɣitee nyəɣətʋ kakpasɩ kɛ nyəɣəlʋɣʋ ŋku n ka cɛla - m tɔ kʋ tɔɔ .

text: And he said likewise to him , Be thou also over five cities .
text2: Tənaɣa wulaʋ tɔma ɩ ́ lɛ ́ sɩ : Nyaa tɔɣɔ acalɛɛ kakpasɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ kawulaɣa .

text: And another came , saying , Lord , behold , here is thy pound , which I have kept laid up in a napkin :
text2: Təmlɛ tʋ lɛlʋ ná kʋlaa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tacaa , nyá nyəɣəlʋɣʋ ŋku n ka cɛla - m tɔɣɔlɔ . Ma hɔka - kʋɣʋ saalaɣa taa kɛ ́ na má sɩɩ .

text: For I feared thee , because thou art an austere man : thou takest up that thou layedst not down , and reapest that thou didst not sow .
text2: N wɛ - m sɔɣɔntʋ kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , n kɛ ́ yʋlʋ katɛ tʋ kɛ ́ . N ta sɩɩ mpi tɔ mpəɣɩ n kpakəɣɩ , na timpi n ta tuu tɔ tənaɣa n kʋŋ .

text: And he saith unto him , Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee , thou wicked servant . Thou knewest that I was an austere man , taking up that I laid not down , and reaping that I did not sow :
text2: Tənaɣa wulaʋ tɔma - ɩ sɩ : N kɛ ́ təmlɛ tʋ ɩsaɣaʋ kɛ ́ , nyá maɣamaɣa nyá kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ kɛ ma kʋɣʋna nyá tɔm . N ka nyəmá teu sɩ ma kɛ ́ yʋlʋ katɛ tʋ , na mpi ma ta sɩɩ tɔɣɔ ma kpakəɣɩ , pə ́ cɔ ́ timpi ma ta tuu tɔɣɔ ma kʋŋ .

text: Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank , that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury ?
text2: Ɩlɛ pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ n taa tʋ ma liɣitee kɛ panci taa ? Ma kɔma ɩsəntɔ tɔ , maa maɣana pə sɛɛ a tɔɔ na má kpɛntɩ na má mʋ .

text: And he said unto them that stood by , Take from him the pound , and give it to him that hath ten pounds .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ heela ɩ cɔlɔ nyə ́ ma sɩ : Ɩ ́ lɛɛkɩ liɣitee nyəɣəlʋɣʋ ŋkʋɣʋ ɩ niŋ taa , na ɩ ́ sɔɔsɩ nyəɣətʋ naanʋwa tʋ .

text: ( And they said unto him , Lord , he hath ten pounds . )
text2: Tənaɣa pɛlɛ pa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , kɛ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ wɛna naanʋwa ?

text: For I say unto you , That unto every one which hath shall be given ; and from him that hath not , even that he hath shall be taken away from him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ wulaʋ cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ timpi pə wɛɛ tɔ tənaɣa pə sɔɔsəɣɩ . Ama wei ɩ fɛɩna pʋlʋ tɔ , paa pəciimaɣa kɛ ́ ɩ wɛna , paa lɛɛkɩ kɛ ́ .

text: But those mine enemies , which would not that I should reign over them , bring hither , and slay them before me .
text2: Tɔʋ , ɩ ́ kɔna ma kolontunaa mpa pa kisaa sɩ má taa tɔɣɔ pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ kawulaɣa tɔɣɔ cənɛ , na ɩ ́ kʋ - wɛɣɛ ma ɩsɛntaa .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he went before , ascending up to Jerusalem .
text2: Yesu tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɛɛ nɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ pukina Yosalɛm .

text: And it came to pass , when he was come nigh to Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount called the mount of Olives , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Pa kɔma pa kpɛɣɛtəna Petafasɩ na Petanii na Olifinaa pʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tili ɩ ɩfalaa taa naalɛ sɩ :

text: Saying , Go ye into the village over against you ; in the which at your entering ye shall find a colt tied , whereon yet never man sat : loose him , and bring him hither .
text2: Ɩ ́ polo ɩcatɛ nte tə wɛ nɔɣɔ tɔɔ cənɛ tɔ . Ɩ ́ talaa , ɩ ́ ká maɣana pa tʋ kpaŋaɣa pile natələɣɩ ŋmənaɣa . Nɔɣɔlʋ ta caɣata tə tɔɔ . Ɩ ́ hɛtɩ - tɛ na ɩ ́ kɔna .

text: And if any man ask you , Why do ye loose him ? thus shall ye say unto him , Because the Lord hath need of him .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ pɔɔsa - mɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ hɛtəɣɩ - tɛ suwe ? Ɩ ́ cɔ pʋntʋ sɩ : Tacaa caakəna .

text: And they that were sent went their way , and found even as he had said unto them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mpa ɩ tilaa tɔ pa tɛɛwa , na pá maɣana pə tənaɣa teitei ɩsɩɩ Yesu ka tɛm - wɛɣɛ heeluɣu tɔ .

text: And as they were loosing the colt , the owners thereof said unto them , Why loose ye the colt ?
text2: Pa kɔma pa hɛtəɣɩ kpaŋaɣa pile ńtɛ ́ ɩlɛna tə nyə ́ ma sɩ : Ɩ ́ hɛtəɣɩ kpaŋaɣa pile ńtɛ ́ suwe ?

text: And they said , The Lord hath need of him .
text2: Ntɛna Yesu tillaa cɔ sɩ : Tacaa caakəna .

text: And they brought him to Jesus : and they cast their garments upon the colt , and they set Jesus thereon .
text2: Ɩlɛna tillaa pona - tɛɣɛ Yesu . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa pɔ pa wontu kɛ kpaŋaɣa pile tɔɔ na pá kpaɣa Yesu na pá caɣasɩ .

text: And as he went , they spread their clothes in the way .
text2: Yesu tɔŋa tɛɛʋ , ɩlɛna yəlaa pɔɔkɩ - ɩ pa wontu na ɩ ́ tɔŋ pə tɔɔ .

text: And when he was come nigh , even now at the descent of the mount of Olives , the whole multitude of the disciples began to rejoice and praise God with a loud voice for all the mighty works that they had seen ;
text2: Ɩ kɔma ɩ ́ tiikina Olifinaa pʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ kpɛɣɛtəna Yosalɛm , ɩlɛna ɩ təŋlaa samaa ɩnɩ ɩ təna ɩ laŋa hʋlʋmɩ teu , na pá saŋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sɔsɔm kɛ piti təma nna pa nawa tɔ a tɔɔ sɩ :

text: Saying , Blessed be the King that cometh in the name of the Lord : peace in heaven , and glory in the highest .
text2: Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ wɛɛ wulaʋ sɔsɔ wei ɩ kɔŋna Tacaa toŋ tɔ ɩ waalɩ . Laŋhʋlʋmlɛ ɩ ́ wɛɛ hatoo ɩsɔtaa . Paa wei ɩ ́ tʋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teeli .

text: And some of the Pharisees from among the multitude said unto him , Master , rebuke thy disciples .
text2: Falisanaa napəlɩ paa wɛ samaa ɩnɩ ɩ hɛkʋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɛlɛ pa tɔma Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , sumsi nyá ɩfalaa mpɛ .

text: And he answered and said unto them , I tell you that , if these should hold their peace , the stones would immediately cry out .
text2: Kɛlɛ na Yesu sɩ : Ma heeliɣi - mɛ təfoo sɩ , paa pɛlɛ pa suma , atɛ pɛɛ maɣamaɣa ká kʋlɩ na á yɔɣɔtɩ .

text: And when he was come near , he beheld the city , and wept over it ,
text2: Yesu kɔma na ɩ ́ kpətəna ɩcatɛ kɛ teu , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ nyənɩ - tɛ , na ɩ ́ wii - tɛ sɩ :

text: Saying , If thou hadst known , even thou , at least in this thy day , the things which belong unto thy peace ! but now they are hid from thine eyes .
text2: Aaa , kasa , Yosalɛm , nyá maɣamaɣa , saŋa kʋyakʋ kʋnɛ , ye n ka tɩɩ cɛkəna cɛkənaʋ maɣamaɣa kɛ mpi pə pəsəɣɩ na pə ́ ha - ŋ laŋhʋlʋmlɛ tɔ . Ama pənɛntɛ pə ŋmɛsa - ŋ - wɩ , n kaa ná .

text: For the days shall come upon thee , that thine enemies shall cast a trench about thee , and compass thee round , and keep thee in on every side ,
text2: Wɛɛ kɔŋ nna a taa nyá kolontunaa ká cɔɔna - ŋ na yoou wontu toŋ nyəntʋ , na paa ta - ŋ kotaɣa na pá nyala - ŋ təkpələkpəlɩ .

text: And shall lay thee even with the ground , and thy children within thee ; and they shall not leave in thee one stone upon another ; because thou knewest not the time of thy visitation .
text2: Paa naŋtɩ nyá na nyá taa yəlaa təna tənaŋnaŋ , halɩ pa kaa tɩɩ sɔɔ pəlɛ lɛntɛ kɛ lɛntɛ tɔɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , n taa cɛkəna waatʋ wei Ɩsɔ kɔma sɩ ɩ waasəɣɩ - ŋ tɔ .

text: And he went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold therein , and them that bought ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu sʋʋ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa na ɩ ́ niki pɛɛtəlaa kɛ tɔɣɔnʋɣʋ .

text: Saying unto them , It is written , My house is the house of prayer : but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ sɩ , ma təyaɣa ká la Ɩsɔ təsələmlɛ kɛ ́ . Ama mə pəsəna - kɛɣɛ ŋmɩɩlaa təyaɣa .

text: And he taught daily in the temple . But the chief priests and the scribes and the chief of the people sought to destroy him ,
text2: Yesu sɛɣɛsaɣa Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa kɛ ́ paa ɩfemle nte . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɔtəlaa taa sɔsaa sɔsaa na Ɩsɔ tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na samaa taa nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma pa pɛɛkaɣa sɩ pa kʋɣʋ - ɩ .

text: And could not find what they might do : for all the people were very attentive to hear him .
text2: Ama pa ta nyɩ nti pá pusina tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , samaa təna tʋ ŋkpaŋʋɣʋ kɛ teu kɛ ́ na pá nɩɩkɩ ɩ tɔm .

text: And it came to pass , that on one of those days , as he taught the people in the temple , and preached the gospel , the chief priests and the scribes came upon him with the elders ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ Yesu sɛɣɛsaɣa samaa kɛ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa na ɩ ́ heeliɣi Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ . Ɩlɛna kɔtəlaa taa sɔsaa sɔsaa , na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa , na sɔsaa pa polo

text: And spake unto him , saying , Tell us , by what authority doest thou these things ? or who is he that gave thee this authority ?
text2: pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Heeli - tʋɣʋ kaŋkantɛ nte n makɩ nyá taa na ń lakɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ . Yaa awe tɩɩ hana - ŋ pə mpaaʋ ?

text: And he answered and said unto them , I will also ask you one thing ; and answer me :
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔwa sɩ : Tɔʋ , ma maɣamaɣa maa pɔɔsɩ - mɛɣɛ tɔm .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ?
text2: Ɩsɔ yaa yəlaa tilina Yohaanɩ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔɔkɩ yəlaa kɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm ? Ɩ ́ cɔ - m ma nɩɩ .

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then believed ye him not ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa maɣasa - təɣɩ pa taa pa tike , ɩlɛna pá tɔ sɩ : Ye tə tɔma sɩ Ɩsɔ tilina - ɩ ɩ ká pɔɔsɩ - tʋ sɩ : Na pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ ta mʋ ɩ tɔm ?

text: But and if we say , Of men ; all the people will stone us : for they be persuaded that John was a prophet .
text2: Pəyele tə ́ tɔma sɩ : Yʋlʋ tilina - ɩ kɔlɔ , samaa təna ká kʋ - tʋ na pɛɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pɛlɛ pa tɛma pa taa təkpataa kɛ ́ sɩ Yohaanɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ .

text: And they answered , that they could not tell whence it was .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa pəsənaa sɩ : Tə ta nyɩ wei ɩ tila - ɩ Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔʋ tɔ se .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu ná cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Aŋha , ma kaa heeli - mɛɣɛ kaŋkantɛ nte ma makɩ na má lakɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ .

text: Then began he to speak to the people this parable ; A certain man planted a vineyard , and let it forth to husbandmen , and went into a far country for a long time .
text2: Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Yesu sɛɛ samaa kɛ ɩsɔ sɩ : Yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ka sɔna lɛsɛŋ tɩɩŋ kɛ taalɛ təcu . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ caa yəlaa na ɩ ́ sɩɩ tə taa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ yɛla na pə ́ taaŋɩ .

text: And at the season he sent a servant to the husbandmen , that they should give him of the fruit of the vineyard : but the husbandmen beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Pə kɔma na pə ́ tala tɩɩŋ ɩnɩ ɩ kooluɣu waatʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋsɩ ɩ tillu nɔɣɔlʋ , sɩ ɩ ́ polo təmlɛ nyə ́ ma kiŋ na pá cɛlɛ - ɩ ɩnɩ ɩ tete . Tənaɣa təmlɛ nyə ́ ma mpɛ pa kpa tillu ɩnɩ na pá má , ɩlɛna pá tɔɣɔnɩ - ɩ niŋ naanʋwa təyələyəlɩ .

text: And again he sent another servant : and they beat him also , and entreated him shamefully , and sent him away empty .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ taalɛ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tasa ɩ tillu nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ kʋsʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ tili . Ɩlɛna təmlɛ nyə ́ ma mpɛ pá má ɩ ́ lɛ ́ , na pá tʋʋ - ɩ , na pá tɔɣɔnɩ - ɩ niŋ naanʋwa təyələyəlɩ .

text: And again he sent a third : and they wounded him also , and cast him out .
text2: Ɩ tasa tooso nyəŋ kɛ tiluɣu , ɩlɛna təmlɛ nyə ́ ma ma ɩ ́ lɛ ́ , na pə ́ kʋ ɩ təna , ɩlɛna pá pɛtɩ - ɩ haləm na waalɩ .

text: Then said the lord of the vineyard , What shall I do ? I will send my beloved son : it may be they will reverence him when they see him .
text2: Tənaɣa haləm tʋ tɔma sɩ : Tɔʋ , ɩsənaɣalɛ maa la ɩlɛ ? Ma maɣamaɣa ma kʋlʋlʋ wei ma luɣu sʋʋ teu tɔɣɔ maa tili . Ntanyɩ paa nya ɩ ɩsəlɛ .

text: But when the husbandmen saw him , they reasoned among themselves , saying , This is the heir : come , let us kill him , that the inheritance may be ours .
text2: Ama təmlɛ nyə ́ ma ná kɔma na pá loosi ɩ pəyalʋ na ɩ ́ puki , ɩlɛna pá heeli təma sɩ : Ɩɩ loosiɣi kpancoou tʋ kɔŋna ntɛ ́ . Ɩ ́ kɔɔ tə kʋ - ɩ , na taalɛ pəsɩ ta nyəntɛ .

text: So they cast him out of the vineyard , and killed him . What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kpa - ɩ , na pá ləsɩ - ɩ taalɛ na waalɩ na pá kʋ - ɩ . Tənaɣa Yesu pɔɔsaa sɩ : Taalɛ tʋ ɩnɩ , ɩsənaɣa ɩ ká la təmlɛ nyə ́ ma mpɛ ?

text: He shall come and destroy these husbandmen , and shall give the vineyard to others . And when they heard it , they said , God forbid .
text2: Ɩ ́ kɔma na ɩ ́ kɔɔ , ɩ ká kʋ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma mpɛɣɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ caa yəlaa kʋfama na ɩ ́ sɩɩ taalɛ taa . Samaa nɩɩ tɔm tənɛ ɩlɛna pá tɔ sɩ : Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ pona təlɛɣɛ pooluŋ .

text: And he beheld them , and said , What is this then that is written , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu caa pa ɩsɛntaa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa pa ŋmaawa sɩ : Pəlɛ nte tɛtʋ ŋmalaa ŋmaakaɣa na pá lɔ tɔ , ńtɛ ́ tə tɔɔ kɔlɔ ŋmatʋ təna məlaa na tə ́ səŋ . Suweɣelɛ mpʋ ?

text: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken ; but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: Ye pə cəpa wei na ɩ ́ hoti pəlɛ ńtɛ ́ tə tɔɔ , pə pʋtʋtəɣɩ - ɩ kɛ ́ , ɩ kaa wɛɛ hiiu . Ye pə cəpa yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ na pəlɛ ńtɛ ́ tə hoti ɩ tɔɔ , tə taaləɣɩ - ɩ na tɛtʋ kɛ ́ .

text: And the chief priests and the scribes the same hour sought to lay hands on him ; and they feared the people : for they perceived that he had spoken this parable against them .
text2: Tənɛ ɩnəɣɩ kpakpaa tɔ Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na kɔtəlaa taa sɔsaa sɔsaa caakaɣa Yesu kɛ ́ kpaʋ ntɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pa nyəmá teu sɩ mpɛɣɛ ɩ kpəpənaa na ɩ ́ sɛɛna ɩsɔ ɩnɩ . Ama pa nyámna samaa .

text: And they watched him , and sent forth spies , which should feign themselves just men , that they might take hold of his words , that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa sʋʋ Yesu kɛ cɔŋʋɣʋ , haləna pá caŋ pá tili feŋlaa sɩ pá feŋiɣi - ɩ . Ɩlɛna feŋlaa mpɛ pɛlɛ pá cɛsɩ ɩsɩɩ pa kɛ ́ kʋpama napəlɩ pəyele yem . Pa makaɣa Yesu nɔɣɔ tɔɔ na pa tɔm kʋpɔɔsʋtʋ sɩ pá ná . Pa caakaɣa kɛ ́ sɩ pá hiki mpi pə tɔɔ paa kpa - ɩ tɔ , na pá tʋ - ɩ kʋfənɛɛ niŋ taa .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , we know that thou sayest and teachest rightly , neither acceptest thou the person of any , but teachest the way of God truly :
text2: Tənaɣa pa tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , tə nyəmá teu sɩ nyá kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ na nyá kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ pə təna kʋpantʋ kɛ ́ . Nn paasəɣəna tɔɔ , nn faɣasəɣɩ yəlaa . Ama ɩsəna mpi maɣamaɣa Ɩsɔ caa sɩ yəlaa ɩ ́ la tɔ , pə tampana kɛ n heeliɣi .

text: Is it lawful for us to give tribute unto Caesar , or no ?
text2: Pə wɛ mpʋ tɔ , ta mpaaʋ taa pə mʋna tə ́ fɛlɩ lampuu kɛ Lom wulaʋ sɔsɔ na ?

text: But he perceived their craftiness , and said unto them , Why tempt ye me ?
text2: Yesu tɛma Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa acilaɣatʋ tənaɣa nyəm , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ :

text: Shew me a penny . Whose image and superscription hath it ? They answered and said , Caesar ' s .
text2: Ɩ ́ hʋlɩ - m liɣitee nyəɣəlʋɣʋ na má ná . Awe nyʋɣʋ fotoo na ɩ hətɛ kɛ pa ŋmaa pə tɔɔ ?

text: And he said unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which be Caesar ' s , and unto God the things which be God ' s .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa cɔwa sɩ : Lom wulaʋ sɔsɔ . Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Aŋha , ɩ ́ cɛla Lom wulaʋ sɔsɔ kɛ mpi ɩ tɩ tɔ , na ɩ ́ cɛla Ɩsɔ ɩlɛɣɛ mpi ɩ tɩ tɔ .

text: And they could not take hold of his words before the people : and they marvelled at his answer , and held their peace .
text2: Tə təna nti Yesu yɔɣɔta samaa taa tɔ , feŋlaa ta na ɩsaɣatʋ natələɣɩ tə taa . Ama Yesu kʋcɔcɔtʋ mələna - wɛɣɛ təmsʋɣʋ na pá su təkulum .

text: Then came to him certain of the Sadducees , which deny that there is any resurrection ; and they asked him ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Satusee nyə ́ ma napəlɩ pa kɔma Yesu kiŋ . Satusee nyə ́ ma mpɛ pa tɔŋaɣana sɩ , sətaa kaa tɛ na pá fe . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa pɔɔsa Yesu sɩ :

text: Saying , Master , Moses wrote unto us , If any man ' s brother die , having a wife , and he die without children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: Tacaa , Moisi sɩɩna - tʋɣʋ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kɛ takəlasɩ taa sɩ , yʋlʋ ɩ ́ wɛna neu , na yʋlʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ sɩ na ɩ ́ yele ɩ alʋ , na alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ fɛɩna - ɩ na pəyaɣa , neu ká hɔ leelu ɩnɩ na ɩ ́ hikina ɩ taalʋ sɔlʋ kɛ piya .

text: There were therefore seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and died without children .
text2: Tɔʋ , Yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ na ɩ newaa , paa kɛna yʋlʋ nyɔɔŋ naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ taalʋ kpaɣa alʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sɩ , ɩ fɛɩ pəyaɣa .

text: And the second took her to wife , and he died childless .
text2: Tənaɣa naalɛ nyəŋ hɔma leelu , haləna tooso nyəŋ náá hɔ tɔtɔ .

text: And the third took her ; and in like manner the seven also : and they left no children , and died .
text2: Pa naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa ŋkɛ ka təna ka səpaɣa , alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ta hiki pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ na pəyaɣa .

text: Last of all the woman died also .
text2: Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɛɛsa səpʋ .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife of them is she ? for seven had her to wife .
text2: Tɔʋ , pa təna pa kpaɣaʋ - ɩ mpʋ tɔ , sətaa fem wule pa taa aweɣelɛ alʋ tʋ ?

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , The children of this world marry , and are given in marriage :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ taa cənɛɣɛ apalaa kpakəɣɩ alaa , na alaa náá saakɩ apalaa .

text: But they which shall be accounted worthy to obtain that world , and the resurrection from the dead , neither marry , nor are given in marriage :
text2: Ama apalaa na alaa mpa pa kɛ ́ sɩ paa tɛ na pá fe na pá caɣa cele antulinya wei ɩ kɔŋ tɔ ɩ taa tɔ , akpaɣalɛ kaa wɛɛ təna .

text: Neither can they die any more : for they are equal unto the angels ; and are the children of God , being the children of the resurrection .
text2: Mpɛ ɩnɩ paa tasəɣɩ səpʋ tɔtɔ , paa wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ɩsɔtaa tillaa wɛʋ tɔ . Pa fem mpʋ tɔ pa pəsa Ɩsɔ piya kɛ ́ .

text: Now that the dead are raised , even Moses shewed at the bush , when he calleth the Lord the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
text2: Moisi hʋlaa təkelekele kɛ ́ sɩ sətaa ká tɛ na pá fe . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ yaa Tacaa sɩ : Apəlaham na Ɩsaaka na Yakɔpʋ pa Ɩsɔ , kɛ ́ timpi pə yɔɣɔta hotiya tɔm tɔ .

text: For he is not a God of the dead , but of the living : for all live unto him .
text2: Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ weesuɣu nyə ́ ma nyəŋ kɛ ́ , ɩ ta kɛ sətaa Ɩsɔ . Ɩsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa təna pa wɛna weesiŋ sɩ pá lakɩ ɩ təmlɛ .

text: Then certain of the scribes answering said , Master , thou hast well said .
text2: Tənaɣa Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa taa napəlɩ pa tɔma sɩ : Tacaa , n tɩɩ yɔɣɔta teu kɛ ́ .

text: And after that they durst not ask him any question at all .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa taa nyɩ nti pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ tɔ .

text: And he said unto them , How say they that Christ is David ' s son ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pɔɔsa Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa sɩ : Ɩsənaɣa pa tɔŋ mpʋ sɩ Mesii kɛ Tafiiti pəyaɣa ye ?

text: And David himself saith in the book of Psalms , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Pəyele Tafiiti maɣamaɣa ná ŋmaa ɩ yontu takəlaɣa taa kɛ ́ sɩ : Tacaa Ɩsɔ heela ma Sɔsɔ sɩ , caɣa ma kɔŋkɔŋ taa .

text: Till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: Haləna má kɔna nyá kolontunaa na ń loosi nyá nɔɔhɛɛ kɛ pa tɔɔ .

text: David therefore calleth him Lord , how is he then his son ?
text2: Tɔʋ , Tafiiti ná yaawa sɩ Tacaa kɛlɛ , ɩsənaɣa Mesii náá məlɩ na ɩ ́ kɛ ́ Tafiiti pəyaɣa ?

text: Then in the audience of all the people he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Samaa təna tɔŋna Yesu tɔm nɩɩʋ , ɩlɛna Yesu tɔ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ :

text: Beware of the scribes , which desire to walk in long robes , and love greetings in the markets , and the highest seats in the synagogues , and the chief rooms at feasts ;
text2: Ɩ ́ lana Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa mpɛ na laakalɩ . Pa sɔɔla tokonaa sɔsaa suuu kɛ ́ na pá cɔɔkɩ . Pa caakɩ sɩ pá sɛɛkɩ - wɛɣɛ kʋyɛɛŋ taa kɛ ́ . Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa taa , teeli teeli təcaɣalɛ kɛ pa pɛɛkəɣɩ . Acima taa , sɔsaa təcaɣalɛ kɛ pa pɛɛkəɣɩ na pá cakɩ .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a shew make long prayers : the same shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Mpɛ pa lɛɛkəɣəna leelaa kɛ pə təna mpi pɛlɛ pa wɛna tɔ . Ɩlɛna pá sʋʋ Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ na pə taɣalɩ , sɩ pə hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ mpɛɣɛ kʋpama . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ paa tɛ na pá ná katatəlaɣa .

text: And he looked up , and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury .
text2: Yesu kʋsa ɩsɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ na toŋtʋnaa tʋɣɩ pa kʋhaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ kʋhaaŋ atakaanaa taa .

text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites .
text2: Na ɩ ́ ná tɔtɔɣɔ alʋ leelu kʋnyɔntʋ nɔɣɔlʋ , na ɩ ́ pɛtəɣɩ santiinaa naalɛɣɛ pə taa təna .

text: And he said , Of a truth I say unto you , that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all :
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma sɩ : Tɔm tampana tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma heeliɣi - mɛ . Mpi leelu kʋnyɔntʋ ɩnɛ ɩ tʋwa tɔ , pə kəla panɛ pa təna pa kʋtʋtʋm .

text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God : but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , yəlaa lɛlaa təna ná kpaɣa pa liɣitee nna a kpisa yem tɔɣɔ na pá haakɩ . Ama alʋ ɩnɛ , paa na ɩ kɛ ́ kʋnyɔntiya tɔ ɩ kpaɣa ɩ liɣitee təna na ɩ ́ tʋ . Pə ta kaasɩ - ɩ pʋlʋ sɩ ɩ ́ yana paa tɔɣɔnaɣa maɣamaɣa .

text: And as some spake of the temple , how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts , he said ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ napəlɩ pa caɣaa na pá yɔɣɔtəɣɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ tɔm sɩ : Pɛɛ kʋpana wena pa lapəna Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ kɛ caŋəm tɔ na mpi mpi pa haakɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tə taa tɔ , pə lapa na tə ́ te teu kɛ ́ . Tənaɣa Yesu heela pʋntʋnaa sɩ :

text: As for these things which ye behold , the days will come , in the which there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Pə təna mpi ɩ ́ naa ɩsəntɔ tɔ , kʋyɛɛŋ ká kɔɔ wei ɩ taa pə kaa kaasɩ pəlɛ lɛntɛ na tə təna lɛntɛ tɔɔ tɔ , paa tusi pə təna .

text: And they asked him , saying , Master , but when shall these things be ? and what sign will there be when these things shall come to pass ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mpɛ ɩnɩ pa pɔɔsa Yesu sɩ : Pəlee kɛ ́ mpʋ ɩnɩ pɩɩ la ? Na ŋmaatəlɛ nteɣe pɩɩ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ na tə ́ nyəna sɩ pə wʋsaa ?

text: And he said , Take heed that ye be not deceived : for many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and the time draweth near : go ye not therefore after them .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu sɩ : Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ , ɩ ́ taa yele na nɔɣɔlʋ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ tolisi - mɛ . Mpi tɔ , paɣalɛ ká kɔɔ na pá haa pa təɣɩ ma hətɛ , sɩ mpɛɣɛlɛ Mesii , na pá tɔŋ sɩ , pə wʋsaa kɛ ́ . Ama ɩ ́ taa nɩɩna - wɛ .

text: But when ye shall hear of wars and commotions , be not terrified : for these things must first come to pass ; but the end is not by and by .
text2: Ɩ ́ kɔma na ɩ ́ nɩɩ yooŋ na pə təna pə pəsʋɣʋ yem kɛ ́ kpɛntəlasɩ tɔ pə taŋ , ɩ ́ taa nyá . Təlɛ tə tənaɣa mpʋ , pə wɛɛ sɩ tə la na pəcɔɣɔ . Ama waalɩ kɛ ́ antulinya náá kɔɔ na ɩ ́ tɛŋ .

text: Then said he unto them , Nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ heeluɣu sɩ : Tɛtʋ kateŋa lɛŋka ká yoona lɛŋka nyə ́ ma , na kawulaɣa lɛŋka ká kʋlɩ lɛŋka tɔɔ .

text: And great earthquakes shall be in divers places , and famines , and pestilences ; and fearful sights and great signs shall there be from heaven .
text2: Tɛtʋ ká sele pə kaa la nyənʋɣʋ , nyɔɣɔsɩ na yʋlʋkʋsəkʋ ká lɩɩ tiiliwɛ tiiliwɛ . Kɔkɔlɔ təma sɔɣɔntʋ nyəna na atɔma sɔsɔɔna ká lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa na pə ́ tii .

text: But before all these , they shall lay their hands on you , and persecute you , delivering you up to the synagogues , and into prisons , being brought before kings and rulers for my name ' s sake .
text2: Ama na pə ́ cɔ ́ tənɛ ɩnɩ tə təna tə lakɩ ɩlɛ , paa kpa - mɛ , na pá tʋ - mɛɣɛ wahala sɔsɔ . Paa cɛlɛ - mɛɣɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa taa nyə ́ ma , na pɛlɛ pá hʋʋna - mɛ . Paa tʋ - mɛɣɛ saləkanaa , paa yaa - mɛɣɛ nɔnɔɔsɩ kɛ awulaa sɔsaa na tɛtʋ tɔkəlaa pa kiŋ kɛ ma tɔɔ .

text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony .
text2: Ama təna wɛɣɛ pɩɩ topili - mɛɣɛ mpaaŋ sɩ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ ma tɔm tampana .

text: Settle it therefore in your hearts , not to meditate before what ye shall answer :
text2: Ɩ ́ taɣanɩ mə tɩ sɩ , paa pɩɩ la ɩsəna , ɩ ́ taa nəɣəsɩ nti ɩ ́ ka hʋʋ na ɩ ́ lɩɩ tɔ na pə ta tata .

text: For I will give you a mouth and wisdom , which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma maɣamaɣa maa tasəna - mɛɣɛ laɣatʋ kɛ tɔm nti ɩ ́ ká yɔɣɔtɩ na mə kolontunaa taa nɔɣɔlʋ kaa na kʋcɔcɔtʋ , pəyele pa kaa kɛɛ pa nyəntʋ tɔ .

text: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents , and brethren , and kinsfolks , and friends ; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death .
text2: Mə caanaa na mə toonaa na mə taalʋnaa na mə newaa na mə nyə ́ ma na mə cewaa ka tɩɩ tʋna - mɛɣɛ mə kolontunaa niŋ taa , halɩ paa kʋ mə taa paɣalɛ .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake .
text2: Yəlaa təna taa ká kpana - mɛɣɛ ma tɔɔ .

text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish .
text2: Paa na mpʋ mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ nyʋɣʋ kaa holi - ɩ holuɣu maɣamaɣa .

text: In your patience possess ye your souls .
text2: Ɩlɛ mɩɩ nyaɣa apalʋtʋ , pɩɩ ya mə nyɔɔŋ .

text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies , then know that the desolation thereof is nigh .
text2: Ye ɩ ́ kɔma na ɩ ́ ná yoolaa kʋpiŋ tama Yosalɛm kɛ kotaɣa , ɩ ́ nyɩ sɩ ɩ yɔkʋɣʋ wʋsaa kɛlɛ waatʋ ɩnɩ .

text: Then let them which are in Judaea flee to the mountains ; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out ; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto .
text2: Mpʋ ɩnɩ tɔ , mpa pá wɛ Yuta , pa se na pá kpa pɔ ́ ɔ ́ ŋ . Na mpa pɛlɛ pá wɛ Yosalɛm taa , pá lɩɩ na pá hatəlɩ . Na mpa pɛlɛ pá wɛ tawa taa , pá taa kpe .

text: For these be the days of vengeance , that all things which are written may be fulfilled .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa kɛ ́ pɩɩ naasɩ Yosalɛm nyə ́ ma ɩlɛna pə ́ cɔ ́ pə təna pə ́ lá ɩsɩɩ paa ŋmaaʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ .

text: But woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck , in those days ! for there shall be great distress in the land , and wrath upon this people .
text2: Ahusitonaa na asɔŋ pa tɔm ká la waɩyo kɛ ́ waatʋ ɩnɩ . Wahala ká tɔɔ ɩcatɛ ńtɛ ́ tə taa , yəlaa panɛ paa ná Ɩsɔ pááná .
