text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword , and shall be led away captive into all nations : and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles , until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled .
text2: Paa kʋ - wɛ na laɣatɛ , paa kpa - wɛɣɛ yomle kɛ piitimnaa təna taa . Ma ta nyɩ ɩsɔnaa kɛ pɩɩ yelina Yosalɛm na pá páálə ́ ɣɩ ́ ɩ taa , haləna pɛlɛ pa waatʋ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ sɩɩ tənaɣa .

text: And there shall be signs in the sun , and in the moon , and in the stars ; and upon the earth distress of nations , with perplexity ; the sea and the waves roaring ;
text2: Pɩɩ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ ŋmaatɛɛ kɛ ilim na ɩsɔtʋ na ɩsɔtʋlʋŋasɩ pə tɔɔ . Laŋwakəllɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ ká kpa kateŋa təna , na nəɣəsɛɛ ká kʋ - wɛɣɛ teŋku na ɩ hola sɔsɔɔna pə kɔkɔtɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ tɔɔ .

text: Men ' s hearts failing them for fear , and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth : for the powers of heaven shall be shaken .
text2: Yəlaa ká hʋʋ mpi pɩɩ kɔɔ antulinya təna taa tɔ pə tɔm , ɩlɛna sɔɣɔntʋ sɔsɔɔntʋ kpa - wɛ na pá sɩ pa tɩɩŋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ yem təkpətɩɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pɩɩ ciɣiti ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ taa kɔkɔlɔnaa .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnəɣɩ paa na Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma səŋa ɩsɔŋmʋntʋɣʋ tɔɔ , na má tiiki na ma toma kɛ sɔsɔm na ma teeli .

text: And when these things begin to come to pass , then look up , and lift up your heads ; for your redemption draweth nigh .
text2: Ɩ ́ kɔma na ɩ ́ na mpʋ ɩnɩ pə sʋʋ lapʋ ɩlɛ , ɩ ́ kʋsɩ mə nyɔɔŋ na ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ feesi təfʋʋʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , mə waasʋɣʋ caana kɔntɛ .

text: And he spake to them a parable ; Behold the fig tree , and all the trees ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ nyənna tʋɣʋ ŋku pa yaa sɩ fiki tɔ na tɩɩŋ lɛləŋ na ɩ ́ na .

text: When they now shoot forth , ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand .
text2: Ye ɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ sʋʋ nɛɣɛtʋɣʋ ɩ ́ nyəmá kpakpaa sɩ hɛɛsʋɣʋ talaa kɛ ́ .

text: So likewise ye , when ye see these things come to pass , know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand .
text2: Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ pə wɛɛ , ɩ ́ kɔma na ɩ ́ na mpʋ ɩnɩ pə lakɩ , ɩ ́ nyɩ kpakpaa sɩ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa wʋsaa .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass away , till all be fulfilled .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ , yəlaa mpa pa wɛʋ ɩsəntɔ tɔ pa kaa sɩ pa təna na pə ́ cɔ ́ pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə ́ la .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ na atɛ ká mʋkɩ yem . Ama ma kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ kaa saalɩ paa pəcɔ .

text: And take heed to yourselves , lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting , and drunkenness , and cares of this life , and so that day come upon you unawares .
text2: Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ , ɩ ́ taa yele na tətɔɣɔlɛ na sʋlʋnyɔɔlɛ pə ́ pəsɩ - mɛ , na kaɣana antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ nyəntʋ nəɣəsɛɛ kʋ - mɛ . Ye ɩ ́ paasəna mpʋ kʋyakʋ ŋkʋ kɩɩ tuti - mɛɣɛ .

text: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth .
text2: Pə kɔŋ kuuu kɛ antulinya təna taa yəlaa təna təmaa kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ pa pɛtʋɣʋ puluɣu tɔ .

text: Watch ye therefore , and pray always , that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass , and to stand before the Son of man .
text2: Pə tɔɔ tɔ ɩ ́ feŋ na ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tam , na ɩ ́ hiki toma na ɩ ́ lɩɩ mpi pɩɩ kɔɔ tɔ pə taa , na ɩ ́ kɔɔ ɩ ́ səŋ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma ɩsɛntaa .

text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple ; and at night he went out , and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives .
text2: Yesu sɛɣɛsaɣa Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa kɛ ́ ilim ilim na ɩ ́ mələɣɩ Olifinaa pʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ taanaɣa taanaɣa na ɩ ́ sʋʋkɩ .

text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple , for to hear him .
text2: Yəlaa təna pukaɣa Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa kɛ ́ tanaŋ tanaŋ təhuluhulu na pá nɩɩkɩ ɩ waasʋ .

text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh , which is called the Passover .
text2: Potopotonaa mpa pa taa kʋkʋsʋm fɛɩ tɔ pa acima wena pa yaa sɩ Tɛɛʋ acima tɔ a wʋsaa .

text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him ; for they feared the people .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa pa tɔŋna maɣasʋɣʋ kɛ ɩsəna paa la na pá kʋ Yesu tɔ . Ama pa sɔɣɔmaɣaana samaa kɛ ́ .

text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot , being of the number of the twelve .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Satanɩ sʋʋ Yutaasɩ Ɩsəkaleeu pa naanʋwa na naalɛ taa lɛlʋ taa .

text: And he went his way , and communed with the chief priests and captains , how he might betray him unto them .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ na kɔtəlaa sɔsaa , na Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taŋlaa taa sɔsaa pá sɛɣɛsɩ ɩsəna ɩ ká la na ɩ ́ tʋ Yesu kɛ ́ pa niŋ taa tɔ na pá sɩɩ .

text: And they were glad , and covenanted to give him money .
text2: Tənaɣa pɛlɛ pa laŋa hɛɛwa sɔsɔm . Ɩlɛna pá tɔ sɩ paa ha - ɩ liɣitee .

text: And he promised , and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yutaasɩ tisi , na ɩ ́ sʋʋ pɛɛkʋɣʋ kɛ kʋyakʋ kʋpaŋkʋ ŋku kʋ taa ɩ ká tʋ Yesu kɛ ́ pa niŋ taa na samaa ta nyɩ tɔ .

text: Then came the day of unleavened bread , when the passover must be killed .
text2: Potopotonaa mpa pa taa kʋkʋsʋm fɛɩ tɔ pa acima kʋyakʋ ŋku kʋ wule pa kʋɣɩ Tɛɛʋ acima ɩwɛɛsɩ tɔ kʋ talaa .

text: And he sent Peter and John , saying , Go and prepare us the passover , that we may eat .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu kʋsa Piyɛɛ na Yohaanɩ sɩ : Ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ təsəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ Tɛɛʋ acima tɔɣɔnaɣa .

text: And they said unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare ?
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ pa pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Leɣe n caa sɩ tə təsɩ - kɛ ?

text: And he said unto them , Behold , when ye are entered into the city , there shall a man meet you , bearing a pitcher of water ; follow him into the house where he entereth in .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩɩ naa , ɩ ́ ká kɔɔ ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ sʋʋ ɩcatɛ tɔ , ɩ ́ ká sulina apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ na ɩ ́ səɣəla lʋm na həyaɣa . Ɩ ́ təŋɩ - ɩ na ɩ ́ sʋʋ təyaɣa ŋka ka taa ɩ ká sʋʋ tɔ .

text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house , The Master saith unto thee , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ təyaɣa tʋ sɩ : Tacaa sɩ , kutuluɣu ŋku kʋ taa kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na ɩ ɩfalaa paa caɣa na pá tɔɣɔ Tɛɛʋ acima kʋtɔɣɔʋ ?

text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished : there make ready .
text2: Apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ká hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ atɛ na ɩsɔ kutuluɣu taa kɛ ́ naŋ sɔsɔɔʋ nakʋləɣɩ ɩsɔtaa , ŋku kʋ taa wɛ wontu nti ɩ ́ ká lana tɔ . Kʋ taa tənaɣa ɩ ́ ká təsɩ pə təna .

text: And they went , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ pa polaa na pá maɣana teitei ɩsɩɩ Yesu ka heela - wɛ tɔ . Na pá təsɩ Tɛɛʋ acima kʋtɔɣɔʋ kɛ təna .

text: And when the hour was come , he sat down , and the twelve apostles with him .
text2: Tɛɛʋ acima waatʋ talaa , ɩlɛna Yesu na ɩ tillaa pá caɣa tɔɣɔʋ .

text: And he said unto them , With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer :
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Ɩsəna ma nyɩɩla teu sɩ má na - mɛ tə ́ tɔɣɔ Tɛɛʋ acima tɔɣɔnaɣa na pə ́ cɔ ́ má sʋʋ ma kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛ taa tɔ pə wɛ sɔɣɔntʋ .

text: For I say unto you , I will not any more eat thereof , until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ma kaa tasa - yɛɣɛ tɔɣɔʋ haləna pə ́ kɔɔ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ a tɔɣɔʋ tampana kɛ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa taa na pə ́ cɔ ́ .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and said , Take this , and divide it among yourselves :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu kpaɣa sʋlʋm na kɔpʋ , na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ mʋ - wɩ na ɩ ́ nyɔɔ mə təna .

text: For I say unto you , I will not drink of the fruit of the vine , until the kingdom of God shall come .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ pə kpaɣaʋ pənɛntɛ tɔ ma kaa tasa sʋlʋm nyɔɔʋ haləna Ɩsɔ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ ɩ Kawulaɣa na pə ́ cɔ ́ .

text: And he took bread , and gave thanks , and brake it , and gave unto them , saying , This is my body which is given for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Yesu kpaɣa potopoto na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ faɣa - ɩ na ɩ ́ cɛlɛ - wɛ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Potopoto ɩnɛ ɩ kɛna ma tɔnʋɣʋ ŋku pə ha mə tɔɔ tɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ́ ká lakɩ na ɩ ́ tɔɔsəɣɩ ma tɔɔ .

text: Likewise also the cup after supper , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood , which is shed for you .
text2: Pa tɛma tɔɣɔʋ ɩlɛna Yesu kpaɣa kɔpʋ kɛ mpʋ tɔtɔ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Kɔpʋ ɩnɛ ɩ kɛna Ɩsɔ nɔɣɔ pɛɛlʋɣʋ kʋfam yoo , na ma caləm mpi pə kpema mə tɔɔ tɔ mpɩ pə hʋləna pə tampana .

text: But , behold , the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyɩ teu sɩ wei ɩ tʋɣʋ - m kolontunaa niŋ taa tɔ ɩ wɛ cənɛ , na ma na - ɩ tə tɔkəna .

text: And truly the Son of man goeth , as it was determined : but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed !
text2: Tampana tɔɔ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má maa tɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ ká sɩɩʋ tɔ . Ama wei ɩ tʋɣʋ - m kolontunaa niŋ taa tɔ ɩ tɔm wɛ waɩyo .

text: And they began to inquire among themselves , which of them it was that should do this thing .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu ɩfalaa sʋʋ təmaɣa pɔɔsʋɣʋ sɩ : Ɩlɛ tá taa awe ká lana ntɛɣɛ mpʋ ?

text: And there was also a strife among them , which of them should be accounted the greatest .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ɩfalaa sʋʋ hɔm kɛ pa taa pa tike sɩ pa naa wei paa nyənəɣɩ sɔsɔ tɔ .

text: And he said unto them , The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors .
text2: Tənaɣalɛ Yesu sɩ : Piitimnaa awulaa sɔsaa ŋmakələɣɩ pa yəlaa kɛ ́ . Na mpa pa kɛ ́ toŋtʋnaa tɔ , pɛlɛ pa caa pá cuɣusiɣi - wɛɣɛ ta caa ta caa kɛ ́ .

text: But ye shall not be so : but he that is greatest among you , let him be as the younger ; and he that is chief , as he that doth serve .
text2: Ama mɛ ɩlɛ pə ́ taa wɛɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mə kiŋ . Mə taa sɔsɔ ɩ ́ pəsɩ ɩ təɣɩ mə səkpelu , na wei ɩ kɛ ́ wulaʋ tɔ , ɩ ́ pəsɩ ɩ təɣɩ təmlɛ latʋ .

text: For whether is greater , he that sitteth at meat , or he that serveth ? is not he that sitteth at meat ? but I am among you as he that serveth .
text2: Kʋtɔɣɔʋ latʋ na wei pa lakɩ - kʋ tɔ , awe kələna ? Pə taɣa wei pa lakɩ - kʋ tɔ . Aŋha , mpʋ ɩnəɣɩ na má , ma wɛ mə hɛkʋ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ kʋtɔɣɔʋ latʋ .

text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations .
text2: Mɛ mə tɔka mə təɣɩ teu na ɩ ́ ta kisi - m ma wahalanaa taa .

text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom , as my Father hath appointed unto me ;
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma tʋɣɩ - mɛɣɛ kawulaɣa ɩsɩɩ ma Caa ná tʋɣʋ ma tɔ .

text: That ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom , and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Má na - mɛ tɩɩ tɔkəna na tə ́ nyɔɔkɩ ma kawulaɣa taa , na ɩ ́ ká caɣa kumlee tɔɔ na ɩ ́ hʋʋkəna Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ kpeka naanʋwa na naalɛ .

text: And the Lord said , Simon , Simon , behold , Satan hath desired to have you , that he may sift you as wheat :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Simɔŋ Simɔŋ Simɔŋ , ke ŋkpaŋŋ . Satanɩ sələma nɔɣɔ na pə ́ ha - ɩ sɩ ɩ paɣaləɣɩ mə təna ɩsɩɩ pa paɣalʋɣʋ tɔɣɔnaɣa pee na pá ləsəɣɩ lɔɔtʋ tɔ .

text: But I have prayed for thee , that thy faith fail not : and when thou art converted , strengthen thy brethren .
text2: Ama ma sələma Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ nyá tɔɔ sɩ pə ́ taa kɔɔ na ń yele Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ nyá taa tɛmmaʋ . Nyaa kɔma na ń laɣasɩ ɩlɛ nyaa sɔɔsɩ nyá taapalaa kɛ apalʋtʋ .

text: And he said unto him , Lord , I am ready to go with thee , both into prison , and to death .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ tɔma Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , ma tɛma ma təɣɩ tɔkʋɣʋ kɛ ́ , paa saləka pá təkɩ ma na - ŋ , na paa səm ma na - ŋ tɩɩ səna .

text: And he said , I tell thee , Peter , the cock shall not crow this day , before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ Piyɛɛ sɩ : Piyɛɛ , ma heeliɣi - ŋ təfoo sɩ mpi pɩɩ takɩ kampaaʋ koou kɛ saŋa tɔ , n tɛma tɔm toosoɣo kpɛɛsʋɣʋ sɩ n ta nyɩ - m kɛ ́ n ta nyɩ - m .

text: And he said unto them , When I sent you without purse , and scrip , and shoes , lacked ye any thing ? And they said , Nothing .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Yesu pɔɔsa ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Maa tiluɣu - mɛ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ mpʋ təyələyəlɩ , liɣitee fɛɩ , huluɣu fɛɩ , ŋtankpatɛ fɛɩ tɔ , ɩ ́ laŋa pʋlʋpʋ cəcəka na ? Pa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Aaɩ tə ta la - ŋ pʋlʋ .

text: Then said he unto them , But now , he that hath a purse , let him take it , and likewise his scrip : and he that hath no sword , let him sell his garment , and buy one .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Tɔʋ , pənɛntɛ wei ɩ ́ wɛna liɣitee , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ tɔkɩ ɩ tɔɔ , na wei ɩ ́ wɛna huluɣu ɩ ́ tɔkɩ - kʋ , na wei ɩ ́ fɛɩna laɣatɛ , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ pɛɛtɩ ɩ toko na ɩ ́ yana .

text: For I say unto you , that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me , And he was reckoned among the transgressors : for the things concerning me have an end .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛ təfoo sɩ , nti pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Asaɣaa taa kɛ ́ pa tʋ - ɩ tɔ , pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ pə ́ la ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ma nyʋɣʋ taa . Na nti ŋmaatʋ taa yɔɣɔta ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ma tɔɔ tɔ tɩɩ la teitei kɛ ́ .

text: And they said , Lord , behold , here are two swords . And he said unto them , It is enough .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu ɩfalaa tɔma sɩ : Tacaa , laɣalɛɛ ntɔ cənɛɣɛ naalɛ . Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Aaɩ , ɩ ́ yele təlɛ .

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu kʋlaa na ɩ ́ lɩɩ , na ɩ ́ polo Olifinaa pʋɣʋ tɔɔ , ɩsɩɩ ɩ tɩɩ lakʋɣʋ tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa təŋ ɩ waalɩ .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: Pa talaa ɩlɛna Yesu tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ na pə ́ taa kɔɔ na ɩ ́ hoti maɣasʋɣʋ taa .

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu yela - wɛ na ɩ ́ hatəlɩ pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ ɩ ́ lɔɣɔ pəlɛ tɩɩ tala timpi tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ luŋ akula , na ɩ ́ sələmɩ Ɩsɔ sɩ :

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: Haɩ , ma Caa , ye n nɔkaa , kɔɔlɩ wahala sɔsɔ ɩnɛɣɛ ma nyʋɣʋ taa . Ɩlɛ paa na mpʋ la mpi n nɔkaa tɔ , yele ma kʋnɔkəm .

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩsɔtaa tillu nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ lɩɩ Yesu tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ sɔɔsɩ - ɩ apalʋtʋ .

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ laŋwakəllɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ kpa Yesu , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sɛɛsɩ ɩsəlɛ təkaŋkaŋ na Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ . Na haŋaɣa lɩɩkaɣa ɩsɩɩ caləm na ká tosiɣi atɛ .

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Yesu tɛma Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ məlɩ ɩ ɩfalaa cɔlɔ na ɩ ́ maɣana ɩsənyəŋlɛ kpa pɛlɛ na halɩ pá caŋ pa too .

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Suweɣelɛ ɩ ́ tookuɣu mpʋ tɔ ? Ɩ ́ kʋlɩ , ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ , pə taa kɔɔ na ɩ ́ hoti maɣasʋɣʋ taa .

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: Yesu tɔŋna ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ , ɩlɛ yəlaa samaa tapaɣalɛ , na ɩfalaa naanʋwa na naalɛ taa lɛlʋ Yutaasɩ tɛɛna - wɛɣɛ nɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ kɔna - wɛ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kpətəna Yesu sɩ ɩ kpɛkəɣəna - ɩ .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Yutaasɩ , kpɛkənaʋ kɛ n hʋləɣəna kolontunaa sɩ pá kpa Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má na ?

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Mpa pa wɛ Yesu tɔɔ tɔ , pa ná mpi pə caa lapʋ tɔ , ɩlɛna pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa tə yoona ta laɣalɛɛ kɛ ?

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔɔ nyə ́ ma mpɛ pa taa lɛlʋ loma kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ təmlɛ tʋ ntɔɣɔŋ ŋkpaŋʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ kɔɔlɩ təfeŋ .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ yele mpʋ pə maɣanaa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tokina yʋlʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ŋkpaŋʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna kʋ məlɩ ɩsɩɩ kɩɩ wɛʋ tɔ .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Yesu pɔɔsa kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taŋlaa taa sɔsaa na Yuta nyə ́ ma taa nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma mpa pa kɔma - ɩ kpaʋ tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ kɔŋ na ɩ ́ nɔkɩ na ɩ ́ kpaɣa laɣalɛɛ na kpatəŋ tɔ , maɣa ŋmɩɩlʋ ɩsaɣaʋ kɛ ?

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: Má na - mɛ tɩɩ wɛnna Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa kɛ ́ kʋyɛɛŋ təna na ɩ ́ tá pɛɛkɩ sɩ ɩ ́ kpa - m . Ama mə na ahoo səkpɛtʋɣʋ tɛɛ asaɣaa sɔsaa mə waatʋ tapəna saŋa .

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kpa Yesu na pá pona kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ təyaɣa , na Piyɛɛ təŋaɣa ɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ táálə ́ ḿ tɔɔ .

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: Paa taɣana kɔkɔ kɛ taɣa hɛkʋ taa . Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ polaa na ɩ ́ sɔtɩ mpa pa pamna kɔkɔ ŋkɛ tɔ pa hɛkʋ taa .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: Təmlɛ tʋ alʋnyəŋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ na - ɩ kɔkɔ kpeeŋa na ɩ ́ caɣaa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ nyənɩ - ɩ təpəŋŋ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ na apalʋ ɩnɛɣɛ .

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ kpɛɛsaa sɩ : Alʋ nyá , aaɩ , ma ta nyəmɩ - ɩ yoo .

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Pə lapa laɣasaɣa kɛ pəcɔ , ɩlɛna nɔɣɔlʋ tɔtɔ náá na Piyɛɛ , na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Pa taa wɛɣɛlɛ na nyá tɔtɔ . Ama Piyɛɛ cɔ apalʋ ɩnɩ sɩ : Pə taɣa ma .

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Pə tasa laɣasaɣa kɛ lapʋ , ɩlɛna nɔɣɔlʋ tɔtɔ náá sɛɛsɩ ɩsəlɛ sɩ : Tampana tɔɔ , apalʋ ɩnɛ na Yesu kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ kɛ ́ Kalilee tʋ kɛ ́ .

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ cɔwa sɩ : Nti apalʋ nyá n yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔ ma ta nyɩ - tɩ . Ɩ nɔɣɔ ta tɩɩ tiita atɛ ɩlɛ kampaaʋ koo kpakpaa ɩnəɣəlɛ .

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Tənaɣa Tacaa pəsaa na ɩ ́ yaɣa Piyɛɛ kɛ ɩsəlɛ . Ɩlɛna Piyɛɛ tɔɔsɩ nti Tacaa ka yɔɣɔta - ɩ tɔ tə tɔɔ sɩ : Mpi pɩɩ takɩ kampaaʋ koou kɛ saŋa tɔ n tɛma tɔm toosoɣo kpɛɛsʋɣʋ sɩ n ta nyɩ - m kɛ ́ n ta nyɩ - m .

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ tukaa na ɩ ́ lɩɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ wii ɩsɩɩ ɩ səkɩ ɩ səkɩ .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: Yəlaa mpa pa taŋa Yesu tɔ , pa paakaɣana - ɩ , na pá makɩ - ɩ .

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: Pa taka ɩ ɩsɛntɔɔ kɛ ́ na pá tɔŋɩ - ɩ sɩ : Kpeɣe , awe mapəna - ŋ ?

text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him .
text2: Pa yɔɣɔta - ɩ tɔmnaa tɔmnaa kʋwəwɩɩtʋ kɛ paɣalɛ tɔtɔ .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Kʋ fema , ɩlɛna Yuta nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma na kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa pá koti pa təma . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa pona Yesu kɛ ́ pa kotuɣu sɔsɔɔʋ taa .

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: Na pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : N kɛ ́ Mesii ? Cɔ - tʋ na tə nɩɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ Yuta nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma sɩ : Ma heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ na ɩɩ tisiɣina - m .

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: Ye ma pɔɔsa - mɛɣɛ kʋpɔɔsʋtʋ nti , ɩɩ cɔɔ - m natəlɩ .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: Ama pə kpaɣaʋ pənɛntɛ tɔ , Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má maa caɣa Ɩsɔ toŋ təna tʋ kɔŋkɔŋ taa .

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma təna pəsənaa sɩ : Ye mpʋ n kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa ntɔ ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Tə maɣamaɣa tə lɩɩnna mə nɔɔsɩ taa , ma kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa kɛ ́ .

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma tɔma sɩ : Tə lɩɩna ɩ nɔɣɔ na tá maɣamaɣa tə nɩɩ ɩlɛ , tə tasəɣɩ aseeta nyə ́ ma kɛ pɛɛkʋɣʋ sɩ tə lepe ?

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Tənaɣa kotilaa təna kʋlaa na pá pona - ɩ Pilatɩ ɩsɛntaa .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa sʋʋ - ɩ tɔm tʋɣʋ kɛ təna sɩ : Tə maɣana apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ tʋsəɣɩ tá yəlaa sɩ pá taa fɛlɩ Lom wulaʋ sɔsɔ kɛ lampuunaa . Haləna ɩ ́ tɔŋ sɩ ɩnəɣəlɛ wulaʋ sɔsɔ Kilisiti .

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pilatɩ pɔɔsa Yesu sɩ : Nyaɣalɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma wulaʋ sɔsɔ ɩnəɣɩ ? Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ Pilatɩ sɩ : Ntəɣəlɛ n yɔɣɔta mpʋ .

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pilatɩ heela kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na samaa sɩ : Maa naa apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ kʋwakələtʋ se .

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: Ama kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na sɛɛsa ɩsəlɛ sɩ : Ɩ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ yəlaa kɛ ́ sɩ pá kisi tɛtʋ sɔsaa . Hatoo Kalilee kɛ ɩ caala - tɩ , na ɩ ́ cɔɔ Yuta tɛtʋ təna , halɩ nɔɔnɔɔ kɛlɛ ɩ tala cənɛ .

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: Pilatɩ nɩɩ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa tɔm ntɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ sɩ : Apalʋ ɩnɩ Kalilee tʋ kɛ ?

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: Pilatɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ cɛkəna sɩ Yesu kɛ ́ Helɔtɩ ɩfalʋ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ pona - ɩ Helɔtɩ . Pə pamna ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ka wɛ Yosalɛm kɛ kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa tɔtɔ .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: Helɔtɩ ná Yesu ɩlɛna ɩ laŋlɛ hʋlʋmɩ sɔsɔm . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ ka nɩɩ ɩ tɔm , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ nyɩɩlɩ hatoo lɔŋ sɩ ɩ ́ na - ɩ . Na ɩ tɛɛlaɣaa sɩ ɩ ká lapɩ - ɩ piti təmlɛ natəlɩ na ɩ ́ ná .

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: Na ɩ ́ pɔɔsa - ɩ tɔmnaa paɣalɛ . Ama Yesu ta cɔ - ɩ paa kʋlʋmʋɣʋ .

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: Kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa naa wɛ təna na pɛlɛ pá suuki - ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ na ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Helɔtɩ na ɩ yoolaa pa woŋaɣa Yesu kɛ ́ na pá lakɩ - ɩ nyaŋ kɛ sɔsɔm . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa suu Yesu kɛ kacɔka toko sɔsɔ nɔɣɔlʋ , ɩlɛna pá məŋna - ɩ Pilatɩ kiŋ .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: Kʋyakʋ ŋkʋ kʋ maɣamaɣa kɛ Helɔtɩ na Pilatɩ pa ciikaa . Pəyele paa wɛna təma na koloŋa kɛ ́ .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pilatɩ kota kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na ɩcatɛ nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma na samaa ,

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ kɔna - m apalʋ ɩnɛ sɩ ɩ tolisiɣi yəlaa . Tɔʋ , ɩlɛ ma pɔɔsa - ɩ tɔmnaa kɛ mə ɩsɛntaa . Ama ma ta na kawalasɩ nsi ɩ ́ tʋ - ɩ tɔ sɩ taa nakələɣɩ ɩ kiŋ .

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Helɔtɩ maɣamaɣa ná tá na ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ Yesu kiŋ tɔtɔ , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ taɣana - tʋɣʋ - ɩ məŋnaʋ . Apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ ta wakəlɩ pʋlʋ mpi pə nəɣəsəna pá kʋ - ɩ pə tɔɔ tɔ .

text: I will therefore chastise him , and release him .
text2: Ɩlɛ maa yele na pá mapɩ - ɩ akpatɛɛ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɛɛ .

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: Paa Tɛɛʋ acima wena a tɔɔ pə wɛɛ sɩ Pilatɩ ɩ ́ tʋlɩ - wɛɣɛ saləka tʋ nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ .

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa təna pa kpɛntaa na pá koo sɩ : Yele pá kʋ ɩnɛ ɩnɩ , na ń tʋlɩ - tʋɣʋ Palapaasɩ .

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: Yʋlʋkʋlɛ tɔm na yoou nakʋlɩ kɩɩ lapəna ɩcatɛ taa na pá təkɩ Palapaasɩ .

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: Pilatɩ sɔɔla teu sɩ ɩ yeki Yesu , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tasəna - wɛɣɛ yɔɣɔtənaʋ .

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: Ama pɛlɛ pa mapa kapusi sɩ : Kamɩ - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ , kamɩ - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ .

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pilatɩ tasa - wɛɣɛ yɔɣɔtənaʋ kɛ tɔm tooso nyəm sɩ : Ɩlɛ ɩsaɣatʋ ntiɣi ɩ lapa ? Ma ta na nti tə tɔɔ paa kʋ - ɩ tɔ . Ɩlɛ maa yele na pá mapɩ - ɩ akpatɛɛ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɛɛ .

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: Ama pa tasa kiisuɣu na toŋ na ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ sɩ paa kamɩ - ɩ tesika tɔɔ . Haləna pa kakiisasɩ nsɩ sɩ nɩɩ Pilatɩ .

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: Tənaɣa Pilatɩ tɔma sɩ : Ɩ ́ la ɩsəna ɩ ́ caa tɔ .

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tʋlɩ - wɛɣɛ wei paa təka yʋlʋkʋlɛ na yoou tɔɔ na pa tɔŋaɣa sɩ pá yele - ɩ tɔ , na ɩ ́ cɛlɛ - wɛɣɛ Yesu sɩ pá lana - ɩ nti pa sɔɔlaa tɔ .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: Pa tɛɛkaɣana Yesu ɩlɛ pə pamna Silɛɛnɩ tʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Simɔŋ tɔ ɩ lɩɩna taalɛ ntɛ ́ na pá suli - ɩ , na pá kpa - ɩ na pá sʋkɩ - ɩ Yesu tesika sɩ ɩ ́ təŋna ɩ waalɩ .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Yəlaa samaa tuutuuma təŋaɣa ɩ waalɩ na alaa tɔtɔ , na pɛlɛ pá kpa pa laŋa na pá wiiki ɩ tɔɔ .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pəsəna alaa mpɛ pa tɔɔ na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Haɩ Yosalɛm alaa mɛ , ɩ ́ taa wii - m . Ama ɩ ́ wii mə na mə piya .

text: For , behold , the days are coming , in the which they shall say , Blessed are the barren , and the wombs that never bare , and the paps which never gave suck .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , kʋyɛɛŋ wɛɛ ɩ ká kɔɔ wei ɩ taa paa tɔ sɩ : Nyʋleleŋ nyə ́ ma ntɛ ́ kaalʋlasɩ , mpa pa ta tɩɩ mɔlɩ mɔlʋɣʋ maɣamaɣa yaa , mpa pa həla pə ta mʋsɩ tɔ .

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnəɣɩ paa wiikina pɔ ́ ɔ ́ ŋ sɩ : Ɩ ́ nyəkɩ - tʋ . Na paa tɔ pulasɩ sɩ : Ɩ ́ takɩ - tʋ .

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: Pa ta kpisi talɛɛ , kacaŋfana tawʋsɩ na ?

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kpɛŋna yəlaa asaɣaa kɛ naalɛ tɔtɔ sɩ pa kʋɣɩ pá na Yesu .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Pa kɔma pa tala timpi pa yaa sɩ Nyʋmpɔɣɔlaɣa tɔ , ɩlɛna pá ká Yesu kɛ ́ səm tesika tɔɔ kɛ ́ təna , na pá ká asaɣaa mpɛ tɔtɔɣɔ tesikasɩ tɔɔ , lɛlʋ kɛ ɩ ntɔɣɔŋ tɔɔ , lɛlʋ kɛ ɩ mpətəŋ tɔɔ .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , taa nyənɩ pa ɩsaɣatʋ , pa ta nyɩ nti pa lakɩ tɔ . Ɩlɛna pá tɔ tɛtɛ kɛ ́ ɩ wontu tɔɔ na pá tala - tɩ .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: Yəlaa samaa səŋa təna na pá nyənəɣɩ . Yuta nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma woŋaɣa - ɩ na pá tɔŋ sɩ : Ye tampana ɩ kɛ ́ Mesii wei Ɩsɔ ləsaa tɔ ɩ ́ ya ɩ tɩ nyʋɣʋ , ɩsɩɩ ɩ ka yapʋ lɛlaa tɔ ɩlɛ .

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: Yoolaa ná woŋaɣa - ɩ tɔtɔ na pá pona - ɩ lʋm kʋnyəŋəm napəlɩ ,

text: And saying , If thou be the king of the Jews , save thyself .
text2: na pá tɔŋɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ye n kɛ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma Wulaʋ sɔsɔ , waasɩ nyá təɣɩ nyá maɣamaɣa .

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Paa ŋmaawa na pá pusi ɩ nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ sɩ : Yuta nyə ́ ma Wulaʋ sɔsɔ ntɔ .

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Asaɣaa mpa pa kama tesika tɔɔ tɔ pa taa lɛlʋ ná tʋʋ - ɩ sɩ : Ɩsɩɩ sɩ Mesii kɛlɛ nyá yaa ? Ya nyá tɩ nyʋɣʋ na ń kpɛntəna tá na ń ya tɔtɔ .

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: Ama lɛlʋ ná kaləna ɩ ́ lɛ ́ sɩ : Saləka kʋlʋm ɩnəɣɩ pa tʋ nyá , ɩlɛ pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ nn see Ɩsɔ ?

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Pa tʋɣʋ taɣa saləka ɩnɛ tɔ pə kɛɛsaa kɛ ́ . Ta kʋlapʋtʋ fɛləɣəna - tʋ . Ama ɩnɛ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ , ɩ ta la kawalaɣa nakəlɩ .

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ Yesu sɩ : Yesu n kɔŋ ń kɔɔ nyá kawulaɣa tɔɣɔʋ tɔ tɔɔsɩ ma tɔɔ .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tɔm tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - ŋ , saŋa wʋlɛ tənɛ tə maɣamaɣa má na - ŋ tɩɩ sʋʋ aləsanna .

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: Tənaɣa pə məla yuɣu ɩsɩɩ ahoo , pəyele pɩɩ wɛ ɩsɩɩ ilim sikuɣu taka kɛ ́ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ səkpɛtʋɣʋ nyala ɩcatɛ tɔɔ , haləna pə tala ilim hʋʋʋ waatʋ .

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: Pʋʋɣʋ ŋku kɩɩ kaɣa Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa tɔ kʋlɛ kʋ kɛɛsəna kʋ hɛkʋ taa na kʋ faɣa huŋ naalɛ kɛ yem .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu kiisina nɔɣɔ sɔsɔɣa sɩ : Ma Caa , kpaɣa - m . Ɩ tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ hɛɛ .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: Lom yoolaa nyʋɣʋ tʋ ná pə təna mpi pə lapa mpʋ tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sa Ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tampana tɔɔ , yʋlʋ ɩnɛ ɩ ka kɛ ́ yʋlʋpaŋ kɛ ́ .

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Samaa wei ɩ təna ɩ kɔma nyənʋɣʋ tɔ ɩ ná pə təna mpi pə lapa mpʋ tɔ , ɩlɛna pá kpa pa laŋa na pá məlɩ kpente .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Yesu cewaa təna , na alaa mpa pa təŋaɣa - ɩ hatoo Kalilee tɔ pa səŋa táálə ́ ḿ tɔɔ na pá nyənəɣɩ mpi pə lakɩ tɔ .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Joseph , a counseller ; and he was a good man , and a just :
text2: Yuta ɩcatɛ Alimatee apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ pa yaakaɣa Yosɛɛfʋ . Apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ kɛ ́ yʋlʋpaŋ na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ tampana na ɩ keŋaɣana Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa tɔɔ . Mpɛ pa kotaɣana kotuɣu sɔsɔɔʋ ŋkʋ . Ama ɩ taapalaa kotuɣu nyə ́ ma lɛlaa tʋ nti tə pəlɛ na pá la tɔ tə ta maɣa - ɩ .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ polo Pilatɩ kiŋ na ɩ ́ sələmɩ - ɩ sɩ ɩ kpakəɣɩ sətʋ .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ tisi sətʋ kɛ tesika tɔɔ na ɩ ́ caa kpoŋkpontu toŋ nyəntʋ pʋŋkahʋlʋŋa na ɩ ́ takɩ - ɩ , na ɩ ́ pimi - ɩ pəlaaʋ ŋku paa hula kʋkpamʋɣʋ taa na pa ta pinta nɔɣɔlʋ tɔ kʋ taa .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Aləsima wule ntɛ ́ pə təna pə hɔla mpʋ , na kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ caakɩ caalʋɣʋ .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Alaa mpa pa təŋaɣa Yesu kɛ ́ hatoo Kalilee tɔ pá na Yosɛɛfʋ pa poləna . Pa wiila pəlaaʋ taa na pá ná ɩsəna pa hɩɩsa sətʋ tɔ .

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá kpe na pá taɣanɩ nimnaa na tulaalʋnaa mpa paa saɣalɩ sətʋ tɔ . Ama pa hɛɛsa kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule ɩsɩɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa wɛʋ tɔ .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alaa taa tɛʋ kɛ cimaasɩ tanaŋ tɛɛ na pá kʋlɩ na pá polo pəlaaʋ tɔɔ , na pá tɔka pa nim sɔɔsʋŋ nyəm mpi paa taɣanaa tɔ .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa maɣana pə kula pəlaaʋ pəlɛ kɛ pəlaaʋ nɔɣɔ na pə ́ pilimi - tɛ na pə ́ pona pooluŋ .

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Tənaɣa pa sʋʋ pəlaaʋ taa , ama pa ta maɣana Tacaa Yesu .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Pa wɛɛ na pa tɔŋna pə tɔm maɣasʋɣʋ , ɩlɛ apalaa napələɣɩ naalɛ lɩɩ pa tɔɔ kɛlɛ na pá suu wontu na tə tee kɔkɔ tənyənənyənɩ .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: Sɔɣɔntʋ kpa alaa na pá ká pa nyɔɔŋ na atɛ . Ɩlɛna yəlaa mpɛ pá tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Weesuɣu tʋ kɛ mə pɛɛkəɣɩ sətaa hɛkʋ na ?

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: Ɩ fɛɩ cənɛ , ɩ fema . Ɩ ́ tá tɔɔsɩ nti ɩ ka heela - mɛɣɛ ɩ ka wɛʋ Kalilee tɔ sɩ :

text: Saying , The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men , and be crucified , and the third day rise again .
text2: Pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ pá tʋ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa kɛ asaɣaa niŋ taa , na pá ka - kɛɣɛ səm tesika tɔɔ , ɩlɛ kaa fe pə wɛɛ tooso wule .

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Tənaɣa pa tɔɔsa Yesu kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ ntɩ .

text: And returned from the sepulchre , and told all these things unto the eleven , and to all the rest .
text2: Alaa lɩɩna pəlaaʋ tɔɔ , ɩlɛna pá kpaɣa pə tənaɣa mpʋ na pá kɛɛsɩ Yesu ɩfalaa naanʋwa na kʋlʋm na lɛlaa təna .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: Alaa mpɛɣɛlɛ Makətala Malɩ na Saanɩ na Saakɩ too Malɩ . Pa na lɛlaa kɛ ́ , na tɔm kʋlʋmtʋ ntəɣɩ pɛlɛ pa tasa tillaa kɛ heeluɣu .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: Ama tillaa ná hʋʋkaɣa sɩ tɔm nti alaa heela - wɛ tɔ tə lɩɩna - wɛɣɛ yem kɛ ́ , pa ta mʋ - wɛ na - tɩ .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: Paa na mpʋ Piyɛɛ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa asewa na ɩ ́ polo pəlaaʋ tɔɔ . Ɩ talaa ɩlɛna ɩ ́ luŋ na ɩ ́ wiili na ɩ ́ maɣana kpoŋkpontu toŋ nyəntʋ pʋŋkahʋlʋŋa saalasɩ tike . Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ ɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ məlɩ ɩ tɛ na piti kpa - ɩ sɔsɔm kɛ nti tə lapa mpʋ tɔ tə tɔɔ .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: Wʋlɛ ntɛ ́ tə maɣamaɣa kɛ Yesu na tillaa taa naalɛ napəlɩ ná kʋlaa na pá puki ɩcatɛ nte pa yaa sɩ Ɩmayusi tɔ . Ɩcatɛ ntɛ ́ na Yosalɛm pə pooluŋ nəɣəsəna kilomɛɛtələnaa naanʋwa na kʋlʋm .

text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened .
text2: Mpi pə təna pə hɔlaa tɔ pə faaci kɛ pa lakaɣa .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Pa tɔŋna yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ na pá maɣasəɣɩ - tɩ ɩlɛ Yesu maɣamaɣa hika - wɛɣɛlɛ , na ɩ ́ na - wɛ pá tɔŋ .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: Pa na - ɩ , ɩlɛ pə ta cɛ pa ɩsɛntɔɔ kɛ ́ sɩ pá nyəmɩ - ɩ .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ tɔŋ ɩlɛ tɔm ntiɣi ɩ ́ maɣasəɣɩ mpʋ ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa səŋaa na pa laŋa wakəla tənaŋnaŋ .

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: Tənaɣa pa taa lɛlʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Kəleupaasɩ tɔ ɩ tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Pə pɔʋ Yosalɛm ɩnɛ ɩ təna tɔ , nyá tike nyá ta nɩɩna ntɛɣɛ kɔkɔlɔnaa mpa pa hɔla kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɛ ɩ taa tɔ ?

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Kɔkɔlɔnaa mpa ye ? Ɩlɛna təŋlaa naalɛ cɔ Yesu sɩ : Mpi pə maɣana Nasalɛtɩ Yesu wei ɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ sɔsɔ tɔ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ka pəsa təma sɔsɔɔna lapʋ na sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ kɛ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ , haləna Ɩsɔ maɣamaɣa nyəna - ɩ sɔsɔ na yəlaa təna tɔtɔ .

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: Ta kɔtəlaa sɔsaa , na tá nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma pa kpana - ɩ na pá kʋ - ɩ , na səm tesika tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa kama - ɩ .

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: Tá tɛɛlaɣaa sɩ ɩnɩ ɩ ká yana ntɛɣɛ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyʋɣʋ . Tɔʋ saŋa taa wɛɛ tooso kɔlɔ , pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə hɔlʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: Pəlɛ pə paasi tá taa alaa napəlɩ pa tʋ - tʋɣʋ piti taa . Pa taa tɛʋ na pá polo pəlaaʋ tɔɔ .

text: And when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , which said that he was alive .
text2: Ama pa ta maɣana sətʋ . Pa məlaa ɩlɛna pá heeli - tʋ sɩ : Ɩsɔtaa tillu lɩɩ tá tɔɔ , na ɩ heela - tʋ sɩ ɩ fema .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Tá taa lɛlaa ná pola pəlaaʋ tɔɔ na ɩsəna mpi alaa kɛɛsaa tɔ , ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa maɣanaa tətɛŋɛlɛŋ . Ama ɩ maɣamaɣa kɛ pa ta ná .

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ kɛ ́ laɣatʋ fɛɩnaa kɛ ́ . Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩɩ mʋɣɩ lɔŋ kɛ nti Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa ka kpaalaa tɔ ye ?

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: Pɩɩ wɛɛ sɩ Mesii ká tɔɣɔ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ na pə ́ cɔ ́ pá tʋ - ɩ teeli mɛɛ .

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kpaɣa Ɩsɔ Tɔm takəlaɣa taa tɔm na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsɩ - wɛɣɛ timpi pa yɔɣɔta ɩ tɔm tɔ . Moisi takəlasɩ kɛ ɩ ́ caalənaa na ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ na ɩ ́ tʋɣʋtəna Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa təna nyəŋsɩ taa .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: Pa kɔma na pá tala ɩcatɛ nte pa pukaɣa tɔ , ɩlɛna Yesu la ɩsɩɩ ɩ tɛɛkɩ təna tɔɔ .

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: Ama pa kpa - ɩ sɩ : Tá na - ŋ tə ́ sʋʋ , nn naa taanaɣa taanaa , na pə ́ caa yuɣu . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu caɣaa na ɩ ́ na - wɛ pá taŋ taanaɣa .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Ɩ ́ na - wɛ pa caɣaa na pá tɔkɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpaɣa potopoto na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ faɣa - ɩ na ɩ ́ cɛlɛ - wɛ .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Tənaɣa pə cɛpa pa ɩsɛntɔɔ na pá nyəmɩ - ɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ mʋka yem kɛ ́ pa hɛkʋ taa təna .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Tənaɣa pa tɔma təma sɩ : Aŋhaa , pətooli , tə yɔɣɔtaɣa na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm kɛ mpaaʋ taa tɔ pə sʋʋ - tʋɣʋ teu təkaŋkaŋ na ?

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: Tənaɣa təŋlaa naalɛ ɩnɩ ɩ kʋla kpakpaa na pá məlɩ Yosalɛm . Ɩlɛna pá maɣana pa naanʋwa na kʋlʋm ɩnɩ na pa taapalaa pa kotaa ,

text: Saying , The Lord is risen indeed , and hath appeared to Simon .
text2: na pá tɔŋ sɩ : Tampana tɔɔ Tacaa fema . Simɔŋ na - ɩ .

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mpɛ pa maɣamaɣa pa kɛɛsa - wɛɣɛ mpi pə lapa - wɛɣɛ mpaaʋ taa tɔ , na ɩsəna pa nyəmna Yesu kɛ ́ potopoto təfaɣalɛ tɔ .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Pa tɔŋna ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna Yesu maɣamaɣa lɩɩ pa hɛkʋ taa na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ hɛɛsɩ laŋa .

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: Tənaɣa sɔɣɔntʋ kpa - wɛ na pá tɔnəŋ paakɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , paa nyəmaɣa sɩ asənaalɩɩ kɛ ́ .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ mə pʋntʋ kpɛɛtəɣɩ mpʋ ? Na pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ lakɩ sika kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mə taa ?

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyənɩ ma niŋ na ma nɔɔhɛɛ na ɩ ́ ná , maɣa te . Ɩ ́ takɩ - m na ɩ ́ ná . Ma wɛna tɔnʋɣʋ na mʋwa , ma fɛɩ ɩsɩɩ mpi pə naa yem tɔ .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Yesu yɔɣɔta mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - wɛɣɛ ɩ niŋ na ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Laŋhʋlʋmlɛ na piti wei ɩ kpa - wɛ tɔ pə katatəlaɣa tɔɔ pa ta pəsɩ na pá mʋ - tɩ . Tənaɣa ɩ pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ wɛna tɔɣɔnaɣa nakələɣɩ cənɛ ?

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kɔna - ɩ tinte kʋwɔpəlɛ tilimle ,

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: na ɩ ́ mʋ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ pa ɩsɛntaa .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ ɩ tɔma sɩ : Ntəɣɩ maa heela - mɛɣɛ waatʋ wei ma na - mɛ tɩɩ wɛɛ tɔ sɩ , ma tɔm nti nti paa ŋmaa Moisi takəlasɩ taa na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa nyəŋsɩ taa na Yontu taa tɔ tɩɩ la .

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kula pa ɩsɛ sɩ pá cɛkəna Ɩsɔ Tɔm takəlasɩ .

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: Na ɩ heela - wɛ sɩ : Pa ŋmaawaɣa sɩ pə wɛɛ sɩ Mesii ká sɩ kɛ ́ na ɩ ká fe pə kʋyɛɛŋ tooso nyəŋkʋ wule .

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: Pə wɛɛ sɩ pá tɔkɩ ɩ hətɛ na pá lakəna waasʋ kɛ piitimnaa təna , na pə ́ hɔ yəlaa na pá laɣasɩ tɔntɛ na pə ́ hɩɩsɩ pa ɩsaɣatʋnaa . Ɩlɛ Yosalɛm kɛ paa caaləna na pə ́ cɔ ́ .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: Mɛɣɛlɛ mpa pa nawa na paa hʋ ́ lɩ ́ pə tampana tɔ pə seeta nyə ́ ma .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: Ma Caa tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la - mɛɣɛ kʋcɔɔʋ ŋku tɔ ma maɣamaɣa maa yelina na kʋ kɔɔ - mɛ . Ama ɩ ́ ká caɣa Yosalɛm taa kɛ ́ haləna Ɩsɔ toma kɔɔ na a tii mə tɔɔ na pə ́ cɔ ́ .

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Yesu kpaɣa - wɛ na pá lɩɩ ɩcatɛ waalɩ na pá wʋsəna Petanii . Tənaɣa ɩ kʋsa ɩ niŋ na ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ kooliɣi - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ kʋpantʋ .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Ɩ tɔŋna - wɛɣɛ koolee kɛ kooluɣu , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yele - wɛ na pə ́ kpaasɩ - ɩ ɩsɔtaa .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Pɛlɛ pa tɛma - ɩ sɛɛʋ ɩlɛna pá məlɩ Yosalɛm na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ kʋɣɩ - wɛ .

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: Pa saasaɣa Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ kɛ tam kɛ ́ na pá saŋ Ɩsɔ .

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Hatoo kancaalaɣa Tɔm ka wɛnna . Na Ɩsɔ cɔlɔɣɔ Tɔm ka wɛɛ , na Tɔm ɩnɩ ɩ ka tɩɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Ɩsɔ cɔlɔɣɔ ɩ ka wɛ hatoo kancaalaɣa .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Ɩ niŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ lapəna pə təna . Pʋlʋ cəcəka fɛɩ mpi pə lapa na ɩ niŋ fɛɩ pə taa tɔ .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: Ɩnɩ ɩ kiŋ kɛ weesuɣu ka wɛɛ , na weesuɣu ŋkʋ kʋ yelina na kɔkɔ kɔɔ yəlaa kiŋ na pə ́ naa - wɛ .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Kɔkɔ naakɩ səkpɛtʋɣʋ na səkpɛtʋɣʋ , ta teesi - kɛɣɛ paa pəcɔ maɣamaɣa .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ tila ɩ tillu nɔɣɔlʋ , pa yaa - ɩ sɩ Yohaanɩ .

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: Ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kɔma sɩ ɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ kɔkɔ ŋka ka naa mpʋ tɔ ka yaasi . Na ɩ kɔntɛ nyʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ na yəlaa təna mʋ , na pá təŋ - tɩ .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: Pə taɣa ɩnɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ kɛna kɔkɔ ŋkɛ . Ama ɩ kɔmaɣa sɩ ɩ kɛɛsəɣɩ kɔkɔ ŋkɛ ka yaasi .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Kɔkɔ ŋkɛ ka tike ka kɛna tampana nyəŋka , na ká kɔɔ antulinya taa na ká yele na yəlaa təna naakɩ .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Tɔm ɩnɩ ɩ ka kɔma antulinya taa , paa na mpʋ antulinya tá nyəmɩ - ɩ . Pəyele ɩ niŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ ka lapəna antulinya .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: Ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ tɛɣɛ ɩ kɔma . Ama ɩ tɛ nyə ́ ma ta mʋ - ɩ .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: Paa na mpʋ lɛlaa mʋ - ɩ na pá tisi ɩ tɔm , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ha - wɛɣɛ toŋ sɩ pá pəsɩ Ɩsɔ piya .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ pa lʋla - wɛɣɛ kʋlʋlʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ piya , yaa pə kɛ ́ yʋlʋ sɔɔlʋɣʋ tɔm , yaa yʋlʋ nɔkʋɣʋ tɔm . Ama Ɩsɔ lapəna ɩ maɣamaɣa sɩ pá pəsɩ ɩ piya .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Tɔm ɩnɩ ɩ pəsa yʋlʋ təkpataa na ɩ ́ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ caɣa tá hɛkʋ , na ɩ pɛɛlɛɛ na ɩ tampana fɛɩna taka . Tə nawa ɩ teeli kɛ teu , teeli ɩnəɣɩ Tacaa ha Pəyaɣa ɩkpamlɛ .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Yohaanɩ ka yɔɣɔta ɩ tɔm na ɩ ́ kpaalɩ sɩ : Ɩ tɔm kɛ maa yɔɣɔtaa , sɩ ma waalɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ká tɛ na ɩ ́ kɔɔ , ɩlɛ ɩ kəla - m . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa lʋla - m tɔ , ma maɣana - ɩ kɛ ́ .

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Ɩ kʋpantʋ sɔsɔɔntʋ tɔɔ , tá təna tə nɩɩ ɩ leleŋ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ . Ɩ lapa - tʋɣʋ kʋpantʋ kɛ təma tɔɔ , tənɛ tə tɛŋ na tənɛ tə lɛɛtəɣɩ .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Moisi kiŋ kɛ tə hika kiiŋ . Ɩlɛna Yesu Kilisiti náá kɔna pɛɛlɛɛ na tampana pə tɔm .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Too tɔ , nɔɣɔlʋ ta nata Ɩsɔ . Ama Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa ɩkpamlɛ ŋka ka kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ na ká wɛ ka Caa Ɩsɔ kiŋ tɔ , ŋkɛ ka lapəna na yəlaa nyɩ Ɩsɔ .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Waatʋ wei Yuta nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma kʋsa kɔtəlaa na Lefii nyə ́ ma kɛ Yosalɛm na pá tili - wɛ sɩ pá polo pá pɔɔsɩ Yohaanɩ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ awe tɔ , nti Yohaanɩ ɩnɩ ɩ yɔɣɔtaa tɔɣɔlɔ :

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Yohaanɩ ta kisi cɔʋ , ɩ tisa tampana kɛ ́ sɩ : Ma ta kɛ Mesii .

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Ɩlɛna tillaa mpɛ pá pɔɔsɩ Yohaanɩ sɩ : Ɩlɛ n kɛ ́ awe ? Ilii ? Na ɩ ́ cɔ sɩ : Ma ta kɛ Ilii . Pa tasa - ɩ sɩ : Nyaɣalɛ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ wei tɔ ? Na ɩ ́ cɔ sɩ : Aaɩ .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Tənaɣa pa taɣana - ɩ tɔm sɩ : Ɩlɛ n kɛ awe ? Heeli - tʋ na tə ́ polo tə ́ heeli mpa pa tila - tʋ tɔ . Nyá maɣamaɣa n yaa nyá tɩ suwe ?

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yohaanɩ tɔma sɩ : Má , ma kɛ ́ nɔɣɔlʋ wei ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣəna nɔɣɔ sɔsɔɣa kɛ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa sɩ pá taɣanɩ Tacaa kɛ mpaaʋ na kʋ ́ siɣisi teu . Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Ɩsayii ka yɔɣɔtəna - tɩ .

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: Tillaa mpɛ paa kɛ ́ Falisanaa .

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: Na pɛlɛ pa pɔɔsəna - ɩ təcululu sɩ : Ye n ta kɛ Mesii , n ta kɛ Ilii , pəyele n ta kɛ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ wei tɔ ɩlɛ , pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ n sɔɔ yəlaa kɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm ?

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yohaanɩ cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma ɩlɛ lʋm kɛ ma sɔɔ - mɛ . Ama nɔɣɔlʋ wɛ mə hɛkʋ taa wei ɩ ́ ta nyɩ tɔ .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: Ma waalɩ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kɔŋ , ma ta tala má wɔɣɔsɩ ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ taa ntaŋkpala maɣamaɣa .

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə lapa Petanii kɛ Yaatanɩ pɔɣɔ waalɩ kɛ ́ timpi Yohaanɩ sɔɔkaɣa yəlaa kɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm tɔ .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Tɛʋ fema na Yohaanɩ na Yesu na ɩ ́ kɔŋ ɩ kiŋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩɩ naa Ɩsɔ Ɩwəyaɣa ŋka ka hɩɩsəɣɩ antulinya ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɣɔlɛ ?

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Ɩ tɔm kɛ maa heela - mɛ sɩ : Ma waalɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ká tɛ na ɩ ́ kɔɔ , ɩlɛ ɩ kəla - m . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa lʋla má tɔ , ma maɣana - ɩ kɛ ́ .

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: Ma taa nyɩ sɩ aweɣelɛ pʋntʋ ɩnɩ . Ama ma kɔmaɣa sɩ ma sɔɔ yəlaa kɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm na lʋm sɩ pə ́ la na Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma nyəmɩ - ɩ .

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Yohaanɩ tasa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ tɔtɔ sɩ : Ma nana ma ɩsəpəle kɛ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu , na kʋ wɛ ɩsɩɩ alukuku na kʋ tiina ɩsɔ na kʋ caɣa Yesu tɔɔ .

text: And I knew him not : but he that sent me to baptize with water , the same said unto me , Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ma taa nyənta Yesu . Ama Ɩsɔ wei ɩ tila - m sɩ má sɔ yəlaa kɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ heelina - m sɩ : Ń kɔma ń ná Feesuɣu tiiwa na kʋ ́ caɣa yʋlʋ wei ɩ tɔɔ , pʋntʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ ká sɔna yəlaa kɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ .

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Tɔʋ , ma ná mpʋ tɔɣɔ ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ təcɛɩcɛɩ sɩ ɩnɩ ɩ kɛna Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ .

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Tɛʋ fema ɩlɛna Yohaanɩ wɛ təna tɔtɔ , ɩ ́ na ɩ ɩfalaa taa naalɛ .

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: Ɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ ná Yesu tɛɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩɩ naa Ɩsɔ Ɩwəyaɣa ntɛ ́ .

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Yohaanɩ ɩfalaa naalɛ ɩnɩ ɩ nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá təŋ Yesu waalɩ .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Yesu pəsəna ɩ waalɩ təkpɛʋ na ɩ ́ ná sɩ pa təŋəɣɩ - ɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Pepeɣe ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ ? Ɩlɛna ɩfalaa naalɛ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Lapi , ( Tacaa kɛ pa yaa mpʋ na pa tɛ taa . ) Leɣe nyá təyaɣa ?

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ ná . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yohaanɩ ɩfalaa polaa na pá nyɩ Yesu tɛ , na ɩ ́ na - wɛ pá la taanaɣa kɛ təna . ( Waatʋ ɩnɩ tɔ ilim hʋʋwaɣa . )

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Mpa pa naalɛ pa nɩɩ Yohaanɩ tɔm na pá təŋ Yesu tɔ pa taa lɛlʋ ntɛ ́ Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ neu Antəlɩɩ .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Na Antəlɩɩ ɩnɩ ɩ sulina ɩ taalʋ Simɔŋ kɛ kancaalaɣa na ɩ ́ heeli Simɔŋ sɩ : Tə hika Mesii . ( Kilisiti kɛ pa yaa mpʋ na pa tɛ taa . )

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Ɩlɛna Antəlɩɩ kpaɣa Simɔŋ na ɩ ́ pona Yesu kiŋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu nyəna - ɩ təpiŋŋ na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : N kɛ ́ Yohaanɩ pəyalʋ Simɔŋ kɛ ́ , ɩlɛ kaɣana paa cuɣusɩ - ŋ sɩ Sefasɩ . ( Piyɛɛ kɛ pa yaa mpʋ na pa tɛ taa . )

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Tɛʋ fema , ɩlɛna Yesu luɣu la sɩ ɩ lɔkɩ ɩ təɣɩ Kalilee . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ sula Filipʋ , na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Kɔɔ ń təŋɩ - m .

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: Filipʋ ka kɛ ́ Antəlɩɩ na Piyɛɛ pa ɩcatɛ Pɛtɛsaita tʋ kɛ ́ .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Filipʋ nawa Natanayɛɛ na ɩ ́ heeli - ɩ sɩ : Wei ɩ tɔm Moisi ka ŋmaa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ takəlaɣa taa na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa náá yɔɣɔtɩ tɔtɔ tɔ , tə hika - ɩ pənɛ . Ɩnəɣəlɛ Nasalɛtɩ tʋ Yosɛɛfʋ pəyalʋ Yesu .

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Tənaɣa Natanayɛɛ nɔɣɔ təkpaʋ sɩ : Kʋpantʋ natəlɩ tə wɛɛ sɩ tɩɩ lɩɩna Nasalɛtɩ ? Ɩlɛna Filipʋ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Kɔɔ na ń nana nyá ɩsəlɛ .

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Yesu nawa Natanayɛɛ na ɩ ́ kɔŋna ɩ tɔɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ : Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ tʋ maɣamaɣa ntɔ cənɛ . Pɔpɔtiya tɩɩ fɛɩ ɩ kiŋ kɛ paa pəcɔ .

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Natanayɛɛ pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Leɣe n nyəmna - m ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ma na - ŋ fiki tʋɣʋ tɛɛ na pə ́ cɔ ́ Filipʋ yaa - ŋ .

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Tənaɣa Natanayɛɛ tɔma sɩ : Ama Tacaa , n kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ , Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma wulaʋ sɔsɔ kɛ ́ .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ɩsɩɩ ma heeluɣuu - ŋ sɩ ma na - ŋ fiki tʋɣʋ tɛɛ tɔɣɔlɛ n mʋ - tɩ yaa ? N ká tɛ na ń na mpi pə kəla tənɛ ɩnɩ təkpataa tɔ .

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Tamapana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ . Ɩ ́ ká tɛ na ɩ ́ ná ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ tʋlaa na Ɩsɔ ɩsɔtaa tillaa təŋəɣɩ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má na pá kpaa na pá tiiki .

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Kʋyakʋ tooso nyəŋkʋ wule pa kpa pɛɛlɔ kɛ Kalilee Kana taa , na Yesu too polo .

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: Na pá yaa Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa tɔtɔɣɔ akpaɣalɛ ńtɛ ́ tə taa .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: Tənaɣa sʋlʋm tɛma , ɩlɛna Yesu too heeli Yesu sɩ : Pa sʋlʋm tɛma .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ ɩ too sɩ : Alʋ nyá , nyaa heelina - m na pə ́ cɔ ́ má lá na ? Ma waatʋ ta tata .

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu too heela təmlɛ nyə ́ ma sɩ : Ye ɩ ́ heela - mɛɣɛ nti ɩ ́ la ntɩ .

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Pɛɛ ŋkpaaŋ naatoso wei ɩ taa Yuta nyə ́ ma alʋwala lʋm ka wɛɛ tɔ ɩ ka wɛ təna , na paa ɩ taa ŋku kʋ tɔkɩ ɩsɩɩ liitilinaa nɩɩnʋwa ( 100 ) kɛ ́ mpʋ .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma təmlɛ nyə ́ ma sɩ : Ɩ ́ suuli ŋkpaaŋ ɩnəɣɩ lʋm . Tənaɣa pa suulina ɩ nɔɔsɩ təke təke .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Tɔʋ , pənɛntɛ ɩ ́ cosi lʋm mpɩ na ɩ ́ pona kʋtɔɣɔʋ tallʋ ɩlɛ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma cosaa na pá pona kʋtɔɣɔʋ tallʋ .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Ɩlɛna tallʋ təŋ lʋm mpi pə pəsa sʋlʋm kɛ mpʋ tɔ . Ama ɩ ta nyɩ timpi sʋlʋm mpɩ pə lɩɩnaa tɔ . Ɩlɛ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma mpa paa cosa lʋm tɔ pɛlɛ pa nyəmá . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tallʋ yaa akpaɣalʋ ,

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Sʋlʋm kʋpam kɛ yəlaa təna caaləɣəna ləsʋɣʋ , na pə ́ kɔma na pa təna pá haɣa ɩlɛ , pa təkəna mpi pə ta tʋlɩ tɔ . Ama nyá , nyá sʋlʋm kʋpam ná wɛ haləna nɔɔnɔɔ .

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Piti təmlɛ kancaalaɣa nyəntɛ nte Yesu lapa Kalilee Kana taa tɔɣɔlɛ . Na piti təmlɛ ntɛɣɛ ɩ hʋləna ɩ teeli , na ɩ ɩfalaa tɛna - ɩ na pa taa .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ ɩlɛ , Yesu na ɩ too na ɩ newaa na ɩ ɩfalaa pa pola Kapənahum na pá caɣa tənaɣa wɛɛ naalɛ , ɩlɛ pa ta taaŋɩ .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: Yuta nyə ́ ma Tɛɛʋ acima wʋsaa , ɩlɛna Yesu polo Yosalɛm .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ maɣana naaŋ na heeŋ na alukukunaa pɛɛtəlaa caɣa Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa , na liɣitee yɔkəlaa náá caɣa pɛlɛ pa taapələnaa tɛɛ .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu kpaɣa ŋmɩɩsɩ na ɩ ́ kuntili - sɩ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔnna pa tənaɣa Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa , pa na pa heeŋ na pa naaŋ tɔtɔ . Na ɩ ́ ŋmɩɩsɩ liɣitee yɔkəlaa liɣitee kɛ atɛ , na ɩ ́ pəsɩ pa taapələnaa kɛ alele .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ holina alukukunaa pɛɛtəlaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ ləsɩ - wɛɣɛ cənɛ . Ɩ ́ taa pəsɩ ma Caa təyaɣa kɛ kʋyakʋ kɛ mpʋ .

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ɩfalaa tɔɔsaa sɩ pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Haɩ Ɩsɔ , ma luɣu sʋʋ nyá təyaɣa təmlɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ yem na kpɛtɛ .

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma təŋa - ɩ təkpɩɩ sɩ : Piti təmlɛ nteɣe n ka la - tʋ na pə ́ cɔ ́ tə ́ nyɩ sɩ pə ha - ŋ mpaaʋ sɩ ń la ɩsəntɔ ɩnɩ ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ yɔkɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ tənɛ , na maa taɣanɩ - tɛɣɛ ŋmaʋ kɛ kʋyɛɛŋ tooso taa .

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Pɩɩsɩ nɩɩlɛ na naatoso kɛ pa ŋma Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ tənɛ , na nyaa ŋmaa - tɛɣɛ kʋyɛɛŋ tooso taa ?

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: Ama Yesu maɣamaɣa ɩ təɣɩ ɩ yaakaɣa mpʋ sɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ waatʋ wei Yesu kɔma na ɩ ́ sɩ na ɩ ́ fe tɔ , ɩ ɩfalaa tɔɔsaa sɩ ɩ ka yɔɣɔta - tɩ . Haləna pá tɛ pa taa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm na Yesu kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɔtɔ .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Yesu wɛʋ Yosalɛm kɛ Tɛɛʋ acima tɔɔ kɛ ́ mpʋ tɔ , yəlaa paɣalɛ nawa piti təma nna ɩ lakaɣa tɔ na pá mʋ - ɩ kpakpaa təkpa sɩ ɩnəɣɩ .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: Ama Yesu ná tá tɛ - wɛ na ɩ taa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ nyəmá pa tənaɣa teu kɛ ́ .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Pə fɛɩ sɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsɩ - ɩ pa tɔm na pə ́ cɔ ́ . Ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ nyəmá mpi pə wɛ yʋlʋ taa tɔ .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛnna Falisanaa taa na pá yaa - ɩ sɩ Nikotɛm . Ɩ kɛ ́ Yuta nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma taa lɛlʋ .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ pola Yesu kiŋ kɛ ahoo naalɩ na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , tə nyəmá sɩ Ɩsɔ kɔnna - ŋ sɩ ń sɛɣɛsɩ - tʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , nɔɣɔlʋ fɛɩ wei ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ la piti təma ɩsɩɩ n lakʋɣʋ tɔ na pə ́ tá kɛna Ɩsɔ toŋ .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - ŋ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ , ye pə ta lɛlɩ yʋlʋ kɛ lʋlʋɣʋ , ɩ kaa na Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa .

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Tənaɣa Nikotɛm pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Ɩsənaɣalɛ pɩɩ taɣanɩ yʋlʋ kɛ lʋlʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ tɛma sɔsɔ kɛ lapʋ ? Ama ɩ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ lɛlɩ ɩ too lotu taa kɛ ́ sʋʋʋ na pə ́ taɣanɩ - ɩ lʋlʋɣʋ ?

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - ŋ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ , ye pə ta lʋlɩ - ŋ na lʋm na Feesuɣu , n kaa sʋʋ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Yʋlʋ kɛ yʋlʋ lʋləɣɩ . Ama Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu lʋlʋɣʋ wɛna pə mpaa , na pəlɛ pə wɛ yʋlʋ taa tɔm kɛ ́ .

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: Taa la piti na nti ma heela - ŋ sɩ pə wɛɛ sɩ mə təna pɩɩ lɛlɩ - mɛɣɛ lʋlʋɣʋ tɔ tə tɔɔ .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: Nyənɩ , heelim makɩ timpi pə luɣu wɛɛ tɔɣɔ , na ń nɩɩkɩ pə taŋ . Pəyele n ta nyɩ pə təlɩɩlɛ yaa pə təpote . Wei Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu lʋlaa tɔ ɩ wɛ mpʋ tɔtɔ .

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Nikotɛm tɔma sɩ : Ɩsənaɣalɛ mpʋ ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Halɩ mɛɣɛlɛ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ sɛɣɛsəlaa sɔsaa na ń ta cɛkəna tɔm tənɛ ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - ŋ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ , tə nyəmá nti tə yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔ na nti tə nawa tɔ ntəɣɩ tə kɛɛsəɣɩ - mɛ . Pə na pə mpʋ tɔ mɩɩ caa tá tɔm mʋɣʋ .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Ɩsəna pə tɔŋa lapʋ kɛ atɛ cənɛ tɔɣɔlɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ na ɩɩ saŋ mʋɣʋ . Ɩlɛ ye ma kɛɛsa - mɛɣɛ ɩsəna pə wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ , mə taa aweɣelɛ mʋlʋ ?

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ ta kpata ɩsɔtaa ye pə taɣa Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má wei ma lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa na má tii tɔ ma paasi .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: Ɩsɩɩ Moisi ka tʋɣʋ nyəɣəlʋɣʋ kʋsɛɛmʋɣʋ tʋm kɛ tesika nyʋɣʋ taa na ɩ ́ siki wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa tɔ , mpʋ ɩnɩ tɔtɔɣɔ pə wɛɛ sɩ paa kpaasɩ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má .

text: That whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have eternal life .
text2: Ɩlɛna yəlaa mpa pa təna paa mʋ ma tɔm tɔ pá hiki weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ sɔɔla yəlaa tənaɣa sɔsɔm , haləna ɩ ́ caŋ ɩ ́ ha ɩ Pəyaɣa ɩkpamlɛ , sɩ pa təna mpa paa təŋ ka tɔm tɔ , pá taa sɩ , ama pá hiki weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ yəlaa tɔm kʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ tila ɩ Pəyaɣa . Ama pa nyʋɣʋ yapʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: Paa kʋɣɩ wei ɩ təŋa ka tɔm tɔ pʋntʋ tɔm . Ama wei ɩɩ təŋəɣɩ ka tɔm tɔ , pʋntʋ tɔm tɛma səpʋ , ɩ ta təŋ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa ɩkpamlɛ tɔm tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Pa tɔm səpa timpi tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ fətəla wei ɩ naakɩ tɔ ɩ kɔma antulinya taa , na yəlaa sɔɔlɩ səkpɛtʋɣʋ na pá kisi - ɩ pa lakasɩ ɩsaɣasɩ tɔɔ .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Ye wei ɩ lakɩ ɩsaɣatʋ ɩ taa kpaakəna fətəla ɩnəɣɩ . Ɩɩ kpətəɣəna - ɩ sɩ pə taa kɔɔ na ɩ ́ la na pə ́ ná ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɔ .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: Ama wei ɩ təŋəɣɩ tampana tɔ ɩ kpətəɣəna fətəla ɩnəɣɩ sɩ ɩ ́ la na pə ́ ná təcɛɩcɛɩ sɩ Ɩsɔ nɩɩnaʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ lakɩ mpʋ .

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa kʋla təna na pá polo Yuta tɛtʋ taa , na ɩ ́ na - wɛ pá caɣa tənaɣa wɛɛ naalɛ , na ɩ sɔɔkɩ yəlaa kɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: Yohaanɩ ná sɔɔkaɣa yəlaa kɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm tɔtɔɣɔ Ayinʋŋ kɛ Salim kiŋ . Lʋm ka wɛ tənaɣa sɔsɔm kɛ ́ . Yəlaa kɔŋaɣa Yohaanɩ kiŋ na ɩ ́ sɔɔkɩ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnɩ tɔ pa ta təkəta Yohaanɩ kɛ saləka .

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yohaanɩ ɩfalaa taa lɛlaa na Yuta tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ pa sʋʋ hɔm kɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ kɔtasɩ nsi yʋlʋ taɣanəɣəna ɩ tɩ tɔ sɩ tɔɔ .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa pola Yohaanɩ kiŋ na pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , n tɔɔsa yʋlʋ wei ɩ tɔm n ka heela - tʋ na nyá na - ɩ ɩ ́ ka wɛ Yaatanɩ waalɩ tɔ ɩ tɔɔ ? Nyənɩ pənɛntɛ ɩnɩ ɩ sɔɔkəna ntɛɣɛ yəlaa kɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm , na pa təna pá puki ɩ kiŋ .

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yohaanɩ cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Yʋlʋ ɩɩ hikiɣi pʋlʋɣʋ yem na Ɩsɔ tá ha - ɩ - wɩ .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: Mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ ləsɩ ma aseeta sɩ ma yɔɣɔtaa sɩ ma ta kɛ Mesii . Ama ma tɛɛ ɩ nɔɣɔ kɛ kʋtɛɛ .

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: Akpaɣalʋ tənna asasaalʋ . Ama akpaɣalʋ taapalʋ səŋa təna na ɩ ́ kema ŋkpaŋŋ . Pə kɔma na ɩ ́ nɩɩ akpaɣalʋ nɔɣɔ , ɩlɛ ɩ laŋlɛ hʋlʋmɩ sɔsɔm . Mpʋ ɩnɩ tɔtɔɣɔ ma laŋlɛ hʋlʋmaa , na pənɛntɛ pə maɣa - m teu .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: Pə wɛɛ sɩ Yesu ɩ ́ pɩɩkəna na maa səkɩ .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: Wei ɩ lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ kələna pə təna . Na wei ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ wɛ atɛ cənɛ tɔ , ɩ kɛ ́ atɛ nyəŋ kɛ ́ , na atɛ nyəntʋ kɛ ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ . Ama wei ɩ lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ kələna pə təna .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: Na ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpi ɩ nawa na ɩ ́ nɩɩ tɔ pə tɔm , ama nɔɣɔlʋ ɩɩ mʋɣɩ ɩ tɔm .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: Ɩlɛ wei ɩ ́ tɩɩ mʋ ɩ tɔm , pʋntʋ tisina ntɛ ́ sɩ Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tampana .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Wei Ɩsɔ tilaa tɔ pʋntʋ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ Ɩsɔ tɔm kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ cɛləɣɩ - ɩ ɩ Feesuɣu tənaɣa .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Tacaa sɔɔla ɩ Pəyaɣa na ɩ ́ tʋ pə tənaɣa ka niŋ taa .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Ye wei ɩ ́ nɩɩna Pəyaɣa ɩ tɛma weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔɣɔ hikuɣu . Ama wei ɩ ́ kisa Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa kɛ nɩɩnaʋ tɔ ɩ laŋaa kɛ ́ , na Ɩsɔ mʋna - ɩ na pááná kɛ tam kɛ ́ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ .

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: Falisanaa nɩɩwa sɩ Yesu hikiɣi təŋlaa na ɩ ́ sɔɔkɩ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm na pə ́ kələɣɩ Yohaanɩ .

text: ( Though Jesus himself baptized not , but his disciples , )
text2: Pə ́ cɔ ́ pə taɣa Yesu maɣamaɣa sɔɔkaɣana - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm , ama ɩ ɩfalaa kɛ ́ .

text: He left Judaea , and departed again into Galilee .
text2: Yesu kɔma na ɩ ́ nɩɩ sɩ Falisanaa nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ Yuta tɛtʋ taa na ɩ ́ mənna Kalilee tɛtʋ taa .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: Na pə wɛɛ sɩ Samalii nyəŋkʋ kɛ ɩ ́ təŋ .

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu wʋsəna Samalii ɩcatɛ natəlɩ nte pa yaa sɩ Sikaa tɔ , na tə kpətəna tɛtʋ nti Yakɔpʋ ka ha ɩ pəyaɣa Yosɛɛfʋ tɔ .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: Na Yakɔpʋ lɔkɔ ka wɛ təna . Tɔntɛ nɩɩ Yesu ɩlɛna ɩ ́ caɣa lɔkɔ nɔɣɔ , na waatʋ ɩnɩ ilim sikaa .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Samalii alʋ nɔɣɔlʋ kɔma lʋm luɣu , na Yesu sələmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ha - m lʋm na má nyɔɔ .

text: ( For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat . )
text2: Waatʋ ɩnɩ Yesu ɩfalaa ka tɛma tɛɛʋ kɛ ɩcatɛ taa kɛ ́ kʋtɔɣɔʋ yapʋ .

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: Samalii alʋ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ nyaɣa Yuta tʋ na ń sələməɣɩ - m lʋm sɩ n nyɔɔ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ maɣa Samalii tʋ ? ( Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Yuta nyə ́ ma na Samalii nyə ́ ma paa suliɣi . )

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ye n ka cɛkəna mpi Ɩsɔ haakɩ tɔ , na ń ka nyəmá wei má ma sələməɣɩ - ŋ lʋm kʋnyɔnyɔɔm kɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , nyá maɣamaɣa n ka laaləna - m sələmʋɣʋ na maa ha - ŋ weesuɣu lʋm .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alʋ cɔ Yesu sɩ : Ma cɛ , n fɛɩna kʋlulunaʋ ŋku n ká luna tɔ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ lɔkɔ ná tɩɩ lumaa . Ɩlɛ leɣe n ká hiki weesuɣu lʋm mpɩ ?

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: Tá lɔŋcɛ Yakɔpʋ hulina lɔkɔ ɩnɛ na táá maɣana - ɩ . Halɩ Yakɔpʋ na ɩ piya na ɩ kaləkəŋ pa nyɔɔ lɔkɔ ɩnɩ ɩ lʋm . Ɩlɛ n hʋʋ sɩ n kəla ɩlɛ ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ alʋ sɩ : Wei ɩ ́ nyɔɔ lɔkɔ ɩnɛ ɩ lʋm lʋkɔtʋ tasəɣɩ - ɩ kpaʋ kɛ ́ .

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: Ama wei ɩ ́ nyɔɔ lʋm mpi maa ha - ɩ tɔ , lʋkɔtʋ ɩɩ lɛləɣɩ - ɩ kpaʋ paa pəlee . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , lʋm mpi maa ha - ɩ tɔ pɩɩ la ɩ taa kɛ ́ lʋm sɛɛlʋ wei ɩ cɛtəɣɩ tɔ . Haləna ɩ ́ hiki weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ na ɩ kiŋ .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alʋ cɔ Yesu sɩ : Ma cɛ ha - m lʋm mpɩ , ɩlɛ lʋkɔtʋ kaa tasa - m kpaʋ , na má taa tasa cənɛɣɛ məlʋɣʋ kɛ lʋm luɣu .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma alʋ sɩ : Polo ń yaa nyá paalʋ na nyá na - ɩ ɩ ́ kɔɔ cənɛ .

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alʋ cɔwa sɩ : Ma fɛɩna apalʋ . Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ alʋ sɩ : Tampana kɛ n yɔɣɔtaa sɩ n fɛɩna apalʋ .

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , n tɛma apalaa kakpasɩ kɛ saaʋ , na wei ɩ tɛ n tɩɩ wɛ kaɣana ɩsəntɔ tɔ n wɛ yem , pə taɣa nyá paalʋ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ nyá tɔm wɛna tampana .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alʋ cɔ Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , ma naa sɩ n kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ .

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: Ta lɔŋcɛnaa sɛɛkaɣa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ pʋɣʋ kʋnɛ kʋ tɔɔ . Ama Yuta nyə ́ ma mɛ mə tɔŋ sɩ ye paa sɛɛ Ɩsɔ Yosalɛm kɛ ́ .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ alʋ sɩ : Alʋ nyá nɩɩ ma tɔm , pɩɩ kɔɔ tɔ , Tacaa Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ kaa wɛɛ təntəmlɛ tɔm , sɩ pʋɣʋ kʋnɛ kʋ tɔɔ yaa Yosalɛm .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Samalii nyə ́ ma mɛ ɩ ́ ta nyɩ wei ɩ ́ sɛɛkɩ tɔ . Ama Yuta nyə ́ ma ta tá nyəmá wei tá sɛɛkɩ tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Yuta nyə ́ ma kiŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ mpi pə waasəɣɩ tɔ pə wɛɛ .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: Ama pə wɛɛ pɩɩ kɔɔ , halɩ pə tɩɩ tɛma kɔntɛ te , na mpa pa sɛɛkɩ Ɩsɔ na tampana tɔ paa sɛɛ - ɩ hatoo pa taa kɛ ́ na cɛsʋɣʋ fɛɩ . Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa ɩsɩɩ mpʋ wɛɣɛ Caa Ɩsɔ sɔɔlaa .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Ɩsɔ ɩɩ naa ɩsɛntɔɔ , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ mpa pa sɛɛ - ɩ tɔ , pə taɣa ɩsɛntɔɔ kɛ paa sɛɛ . Ama pa taanaa kɛ ́ na cɛsʋɣʋ fɛɩ .
