text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alʋ cɔ Yesu sɩ : Ma nyəmá sɩ Mesii wei pa yaa sɩ Kilisiti tɔ ɩ ká kɔɔ te , ye ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kɔma , ɩ ká kilisi - tʋɣʋ pə təna .

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ alʋ sɩ : Ma wei ma yɔɣɔtəɣəna - ŋ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , maɣalɛ Mesii ɩnɩ .

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Yesu na alʋ pa tɔŋna yɔɣɔtaɣa kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa tala , na pə ́ la - wɛɣɛ piti kɛ ́ mpi pə tɔɔ ɩ na alʋ taka pa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔ . Paa na mpʋ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ta pɔɔsɩ sɩ : Pepeɣe n caa ɩ kiŋ ? Yaa ntiɣi nyá yɔɣɔtəɣəna - ɩ ?

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Tənaɣa alʋ məŋna ɩ həyaɣa na ɩ ́ sɩɩ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ məlɩ ɩcatɛ taa na ɩ ́ yaa yəlaa sɩ :

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: Ɩ ́ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ ná apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ wei ɩ kpaɣa pə təna mpi tuu ma lapa tɔ na ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ . Ɩ ta kɛ Mesii yee ?

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yəlaa lɩɩ ɩcatɛ taa na pá puki Yesu kiŋ .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɛɛ mpʋ tɔ , na ɩ ɩfalaa náá tɔŋna - ɩ tɛɛkʋɣʋ kɛ ́ sɩ : Tacaa n kaa tɔɣɔ mpʋ ?

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: Ama Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Tɔɣɔnaɣa ŋka ma tɔkɩ tɔ ɩ ta nyɩ - kɛ .

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ɩfalaa pɔɔsa təma sɩ : Nɔɣɔlʋ kɔna - ɩ tɔɣɔnaɣa kɛ yee ?

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma tɔɣɔnaɣa ntɛ ́ wei ɩ tila - m tɔ ɩ luɣu nyəntʋ lapʋ , na ɩ təmlɛ nte ɩ hʋla - m sɩ má la tɔ tə yoosuɣu .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Mɛ mə tɔŋ sɩ : Pə kaasa ɩsɔtʋnaa liɣiti na kʋmtʋ tala . Ama má , ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ , ɩ ́ kʋsɩ mə ɩsɛ na ɩ ́ na ɩsəna kʋtɔɣɔʋ sɛɛna tawa na kʋ taŋa kʋntaa tɔ .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Kʋntʋ wei ɩ kʋŋ tɔ , ɩ tɔŋa ɩ kʋfɛlʋɣʋ hikuɣu kɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ nyəkəɣɩ pee tɔtɔɣɔ ɩ weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ kʋ tɔɔ . Mpʋ pə lakəna na tuulu na kʋntʋ pá kpɛntəɣɩ yɔɔlʋɣʋ .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɔm nti pa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔ tə wɛna tampana sɩ : Lɛlʋ tuuki kɛ ́ na lɛlʋ náá kʋ .

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ , ma tila - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ kʋ haləm mpi ɩ ́ taa hala tɔ . Lɛlaa ná halaa na kaɣana pə waasəɣɩ - mɛ .

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: Ɩcatɛ ńtɛ ́ tə taa Samalii nyə ́ ma paɣalɛ mʋ Yesu tɔm kɛ tɔm nti alʋ ka yɔɣɔtaa təfoo sɩ : Ɩ kpaɣa pə təna mpi tuu ma lapa tɔ na ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ tɔ tə tɔɔ .

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Waatʋ wei Samalii nyə ́ ma tala Yesu kiŋ na pá na - ɩ tɔ , pa wiina - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ la wɛɛ naalɛɣɛ pa kiŋ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ caɣa tənaɣa kʋyɛɛŋ naalɛ .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: Pə kɔma na pá nɩɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ , ɩlɛna yəlaa samaa kɛ sɔsɔm tasa ɩ tɔm kɛ mʋɣʋ .

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: Na pá tɔŋ alʋ sɩ : Pənɛntɛ pə taɣa nti n heela - tʋ tɔ tə tɔɔ tike kɛ tə mʋ ɩ tɔm . Ama tá maɣamaɣa tə nɩɩna tá ŋkpaŋŋ na tə tɛma tá taa sɩ , tampana ɩ kɛ ́ antulinya Waasʋlʋ .

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Yesu lapa kʋyɛɛŋ naalɛɣɛ təna , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ tɛɛna Kalilee .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Yesu maɣamaɣa ka tɛma yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ : Nɔɣɔlʋ ɩɩ tʋɣʋna Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ kɛ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ɩcatɛ taa .

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Waatʋ wei Yesu tala Kalilee tɔ , təna nyə ́ ma mʋ - ɩ teu kɛ niŋ naalɛ . Mpi tɔ pa maɣamaɣa paa pola Tɛɛʋ acima tɔɣɔʋ kɛ Yosalɛm , na pa nawa pə təna mpi ɩ lapa Tɛɛʋ acima anɩ a tɔɔ tɔ .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu məla Kalilee Kana timpi ɩ ka pəsa lʋm kɛ sʋlʋm tɔ . Akewe sɔsɔ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛ təna , na ɩ pəyaɣa wɛ Kapənahum na pə wɩɩkɩ - kɛ .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Akewe nɩɩwa sɩ Yesu lɩɩna Yuta na ɩ ́ kɔɔ Kalilee , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ sələmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ma pəyaɣa wɛ Kapənahum na ká caa səpʋ , polo ń waasɩ - kɛ .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Anɩ tamm mɩɩ ta na piti təma na kɔkɔlɔ nyəm , ɩɩ tisiɣi .

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ akewe ɩnɩ ɩ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Haɩ ma cɛ , tə tɛɛ pə ́ cɔ ́ ma pəyaɣa ɩ ́ taa kɔɔ na ká sɩ .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ akewe sɩ : Kpe , nyá pəyaɣa kaa sɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ mʋ Yesu kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ na ɩ ́ tʋ mpaaʋ .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: Akewe kpeŋaɣa , ɩlɛna ɩ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma səŋɩ - ɩ na pá heeli - ɩ sɩ : Nyá pəyaɣa hika alaafəya .

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ akewe pɔɔsa - wɛɣɛ ɩsəna waatʋ pə cɛpa pəyaɣa tɔɔ tɔ . Ɩlɛna təmlɛ nyə ́ ma cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tete ilim kpila pəcɔ tɔɣɔ watʋ cɛpa ka tɔɔ .

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pəyaɣa caa tɔɔsa kpakpaa sɩ , tete mpʋ ɩnɩ pə taka teitei kɛ ́ Yesu ka heela - ɩ sɩ : Nyá pəyaɣa kaa sɩ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ na ɩ təyaɣa təna pá tɛ Yesu na pa taa .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Yesu piti təma kpɛnta naalɛɣɛlɛ ɩ lɩɩʋ Yuta na ɩ ́ kɔɔ Kalilee tɔ .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ Yuta nyə ́ ma Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ acima naalɩ a talaa , na Yesu polo Yosalɛm .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Lɩɩlɛ natəlɩ tə wɛ heeŋ nɔnɔɣɔ cɔlɔɣɔ Yosalɛm , na akelenaa sakasɩ taka kakpasɩ səŋa təna . Tənɛ ɩnəɣɩ pa yaa sɩ Pɛtasata kɛ Alaamee nyə ́ ma tɔm taa .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Na kʋtɔntʋnaa sɛləta laŋasɩ nsɩ sɩ tɛɛ kɛ ́ sɔsɔm . Yʋlʋmaa na kaakalasɩ , na mpa kʋtɔməŋ tʋʋlaa tɔ . Pa taŋa lʋm laŋtʋɣʋ .

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩsɔtaa tillu tiikaɣa waatʋ waatʋ kɛ lɩɩlɛ taa , na ɩ ́ lakɩ na lʋm laŋtəɣɩ . Na wei ɩ ́ laala tiiu kɛ waatʋ wei lʋm laŋtəɣɩ kpakpaa tɔ pə waa - ɩ , paa ɩ kʋtɔŋ kɛ ŋku .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: Apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛ təna na ɩ hənta kʋtɔŋ tɔ pɩɩsɩ pəlefɛɩ nɩɩlɛ kɔlɔ .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: Yesu na - ɩ na ɩ ́ hənta mpʋ , na ɩ nyəmá sɩ ɩ taaŋa tənaɣa sɔsɔm , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : N caa pə waa - ŋ kɛ ?

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋtɔntʋ cɔ Yesu sɩ : Ma cɛ , ma fɛɩna nɔɣɔlʋ sɩ ɩ ́ tisi - m lʋm taa kɛ ́ waatʋ wei pə laŋtəɣɩ tɔ . Na má polaa sɩ ma tiiki , nɔɣɔlʋ náá laalɩ - m .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu heela - ɩ sɩ : Kʋlɩ na ń kpaɣa nyá kʋhəntʋɣʋ na ń tɔ .

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Tənaɣa pə waa kʋtɔntʋ kɛ kpakpaa , na ɩ ́ kɛlɩ ɩ kʋhəntʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ tɔŋ . Pə pamna kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule .

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔma wei pə waa mpʋ tɔ sɩ : Saŋa kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ kɛ ́ , pə fɛɩ sɩ ń səɣəlɩ nyá kʋhəntʋɣʋ kɛ mpʋ .

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Ama kʋtɔntʋ na cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Wei ɩ waasa - m tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ heelina - m sɩ má kɛlɩ ma kʋhəntʋɣʋ na má tɔ .

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma cɔ kʋtɔntʋ sɩ : Aweɣe pʋntʋ na ɩ ́ heela - ŋ sɩ ń kɛlɩ nyá kʋhəntʋɣʋ na ń tɔ ?

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: Ama wei pə waawa tɔ ɩ ta nyɩ Yesu . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ka saala samaa wei ɩ suwa təna tɔ ɩ taa .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ Yesu ná apalʋ ɩnəɣɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa na ɩ ́ heeli - ɩ sɩ : Nyənɩ , pənɛntɛ pə waa - ŋ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , taa tasa ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ tɔtɔ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ pə taa kɔɔ na ŋku kʋlɛ kʋ kəla mpʋ tɔ kʋ maɣana - ŋ .

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Tənaɣa apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ polaa na ɩ ́ heeli Yuta nyə ́ ma sɩ : Yesu waasəna - m .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma sʋʋ Yesu kɛ ́ kʋnyɔŋ tʋɣʋ kɛ ɩ lapʋ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Mpʋ pə yelina na Yesu yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ : Ma Caa ná tɔŋa təmlɛ lapʋ kɛ tam kɛ ́ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma tɔtɔ ma tɔŋna lapʋ .

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Tɔm tənɛ tə maɣamaɣa tə tɔɔ Yuta nyə ́ ma mʋ sɔɣɔna kɛ teu sɩ pa ləsəɣɩ Yesu weesuɣu . Sɩ pə taɣa kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ tike kɛ ɩ wakəlaa , pə kpɛnna ɩsəna ɩ kɛɛsa ɩ tɩ na Ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ yaa - ɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ Caa tɔ pə tɔɔ tɔtɔ .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ . Pəyaɣa ma ma kaa lu natəlɩ na má la . Ama nti ma Caa tɔŋa lapʋ na má naakɩ tɔ ntəɣɩ ma təŋəɣɩ . Ma Caa lakɩ pə təna mpi tɔ , Pəyaɣa ma ma lakɩ - wɩ tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma Caa sɔɔla - m kɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - m pə təna mpi ɩ lakɩ tɔ . Ɩ ká hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - m təma sɔsɔɔna nna a kəla anɛ tɔ sɩ má la , na pɩɩ la - mɛɣɛ ha .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ ma Caa feesiɣi sətaa na ɩ ́ mənna - wɛɣɛ weesuɣu nyə ́ ma hɛkʋ tɔ , mpʋ ɩnɩ tɔtɔɣɔ Pəyaɣa má ma tʋɣɩ weesuɣu kɛ mpa ma nɔkaa tɔ .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Təlɛ tə paasi ma Caa ɩɩ hʋʋkəna nɔɣɔlʋ . Ama ɩ tʋ hʋʋlɛ tənaɣa Pəyaɣa ma ma niŋ taa .

text: That all men should honour the Son , even as they honour the Father . He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him .
text2: Ɩlɛna pa təna pa se - m ɩsɩɩ pa seekuɣu ma Caa tɔ . Yʋlʋ ɩ ́ ta se Pəyaɣa ma , ɩ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ se ma Caa wei ɩ tila - m tɔ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ , ye wei ɩ nɩɩ ma tɔm na ɩ ́ tɛ ɩ taa na wei ɩ tila - m tɔ , ɩ tɛma weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔɣɔ hikuɣu , pa kaa hʋʋna - ɩ . Ama ɩ tɛma weesuɣu tʋ kɛ pəsʋɣʋ kɛ ́ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo maa cɛsəɣɩ , pə wɛɛ pɩɩ kɔɔ , halɩ pə tɩɩ tɛma kɔntɛ te . Sətaa ká nɩɩ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa má ma nɔɣɔ , mpa paa nɩɩ - kɛ tɔ , paa fe na pá kʋləna pa ɩsɛ .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Ɩsɩɩ Tacaa Ɩsɔ wɛna weesuɣu kɛ ɩ taa tɔ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ ɩ yelaa sɩ Pəyaɣa ma má wɛɛna weesuɣu kɛ ma taa .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Ma kɛ ́ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa tɔɣɔ ɩ ha - m mpaaʋ sɩ má hʋʋna yəlaa kɛ tɔm .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
text2: Ɩlɛ pə ́ taa la - mɛɣɛ ha . Mpi tɔ pɩɩ kɔɔ na pa təna mpa pa wɛ pəlaaŋ taa tɔ pá nɩɩ ma nɔɣɔ ,

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: na pá lɩɩ ɩ taa . Mpa pa lapa kʋpantʋ tɔ paa fe sɩ pá wɛɛ tam tɔɔ . Mpa pɛlɛ pa lapa ɩsaɣatʋ tɔ , paa fe sɩ pá hʋʋna - wɛ na pá tʋ - wɛɣɛ saləka .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: Maa pəsəɣɩ na má lu tələɣɩ ma maɣamaɣa . Ama ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ kɛɛsəɣɩ - m tɔ , ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ma hʋʋkəna , na ma hʋʋlɛ tewa . Mpi tɔ , pə taɣa ma maɣamaɣa ma luɣu nyəntʋ kɛ ma pɛɛkəɣɩ lapʋ . Ama wei ɩ tila - m tɔ ɩ luɣu nyəntʋ kɛ ́ .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: Ye ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ ma tɩ tɔm , nɔɣɔlʋ kaa sa tampana wena maa hʋ ́ lɩ ́ tɔ .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Ama nɔɣɔlʋ wɛnna na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ sɩ ma kɛ ́ tampana tʋ . Na ma nyəmá sɩ nti ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ ma tɔɔ tɔ tə wɛ tampana .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: Halɩ mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ tila mə tillaa kɛ Yohaanɩ kiŋ na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ hʋla - mɛɣɛ tampana .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Ye ma , pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ ma nyɩɩlaa sɩ yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ ma tampana . Ama sɩ pə səna - mɛ na pə ya mə nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Yohaanɩ naa wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ fətəla wei ɩ mʋɣɩ na pə naakɩ tɔ . Ɩ ́ tisaa na ɩ ́ yɔɔləna fətəla ɩnɩ ɩ naʋ kɛ pəcɔ .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: Ama ma wɛna mpi pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ ma tampana na pə kəlɩ tə təna nti Yohaanɩ yɔɣɔta ma tɔɔ tɔ . Təma nna ɩnɩ ma Caa hʋla - m sɩ má la na ma tɔŋna a lapʋ kɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , anɩ a hʋləɣəna ma tampana sɩ ma Caa tilina - m .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: Ma Caa wei ɩ tila - m tɔ ɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ ma tampana tɔtɔ . Mɛ ɩ ́ ta nɩɩ ɩ nɔɣɔ kɛ paa tɔm kʋlʋm . Pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ ta loosi ɩ ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ paa tɔm kʋlʋm tɔtɔ .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: Pəyele ɩɩ saŋ ɩ tɔm mʋɣʋ sɩ tə ́ caɣa mə taa kɛ ́ paa pəcɔ . Ɩlɛ ɩɩ tɛŋ mə taa na wei Ɩsɔ tilaa tɔ , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə wɛ mpʋ .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: Ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm takəlasɩ taa təcututu , na ɩ ́ tɛɛləɣɩ sɩ pə taa kɛ ́ ɩ ́ ká hikina weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ . Anɩ tá takəlasɩ kʋlʋmasɩ nsɩ sɩ yɔɣɔtəɣəna ma tɔm .

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: Pə na pə mpʋ tɔ , ɩɩ saŋ sɩ ɩ ́ kɔɔ ma kiŋ na ɩ ́ hiki weesuɣu kʋpaŋkʋ .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: Pə taɣa yəlaa ɩsantɛ kɛ ma pɛɛkəɣɩ .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: Ama ma nyəma - mɛ , ma nyəmá sɩ ɩɩ caa Ɩsɔ .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Ma Caa kɔntɛ kɛ ma kɔma na mɩɩ saŋ ma mʋɣʋ . Ama ye nɔɣɔlʋ ná lɩɩ yem na ɩ ́ kɔɔ , ɩ ́ mʋ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ təkpa .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: Mɛ mə sɔɔla mə təma ɩsantɛ kɛ ́ , ɩɩ pɛɛkəɣɩ Ɩsɔ wei ɩ tike ntɛ ́ Ɩsɔ tɔ ɩ nyəntɛ . Ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣa ɩ ́ ká la na ɩ ́ mʋ ma tɔm .

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa hʋʋ sɩ maa polo má kuli mə waalɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa . Ama Moisi wei ɩ ́ tɛɛləɣɩ tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ ká kulina mə waalɩ .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: Ye ɩ ́ ka mʋwa Moisi tɔm na tampam , ɩsəntɔ tɔ ɩ ́ ka mʋ ma nyəntʋ tɔtɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma tɔm kɛ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ŋmaawa .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: Ɩ ́ ta tisi na ɩ ́ mʋ nti Moisi ŋmaawa tɔ , ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣa ɩ ́ ká tisi na ɩ ́ tʋna ma tɔm nti ma heeliɣi - mɛ tɔ .

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Yesu taɣana Kalilee teŋku waalɩ kɛ ́ tɛsʋɣʋ . ( Lɛlaa yaa sɩ Tipeliyatɩ teŋku ) .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: Na yəlaa samaa hu ɩ waalɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pa ná piti təma nna ɩ waakaɣana kʋtɔntʋnaa tɔ .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa kpa pʋɣʋ tɔɔ na pá caɣa təna .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: Na Yuta nyə ́ ma acima wena pa yaa sɩ Tɛɛʋ acima tɔ a wʋsaa .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu nyəna ɩ taa na ɩ waalɩ na ɩ ́ ná sɩ samaa sɔsɔ tɔŋna ɩ kiŋ kɛ kɔntɛ . Tənaɣa ɩ pɔɔsa Filipʋ sɩ : Leɣe tɩɩ ya kʋtɔɣɔʋ na tə ́ cɛla samaa ɩnɛ ɩnɩ na ɩ təna ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ ?

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: Yesu yɔɣɔta mpʋ sɩ ɩ ́ nɩɩ nti Filipʋ ká cɔ tɔ . Tɔfɔ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ tɛma ɩsəna ɩ ká la tɔɣɔ nyəm .

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Filipʋ cɔwa Yesu sɩ : Paa liɣitee nyəɣətʋ ŋmʋnʋɣʋ ( 200 ) maɣamaɣa kɛ tə yapa kʋtɔɣɔʋ , kɩɩ haŋna yəlaa panɛ pa tiili ?

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu ɩfalaa taa nɔɣɔlʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Antəlɩɩ na ɩ ́ kɛ ́ Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ neu tɔ ɩ ́ cɔ - ɩ sɩ :

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: Ɩwaasəlɛ natəlɩ tə wɛ cənɛ na tə tɔka potopotonaa kɛ kakpasɩ na tiina kɛ naalɛ . Ama pəlɛ pɩɩ la - weɣe samaa tuutuuma ɩnɛ ?

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma sɩ : Ɩ ́ heeli pa təna sɩ pá caɣa atɛ . ( Pə pamna nyɩɩtʋ ka pɔ atɛɣɛ tənaɣa sɔsɔm , ɩlɛna pá caɣa . ) Pa taa apalaa nyɔɔŋ tala ɩsɩɩ iyisi kakpasɩ ( 5000 ) .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu kpaɣa potopotonaa mpɛ na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ pa tɔɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tala mpa pa caɣaa tɔ . Na ɩ ́ tala - wɛɣɛ tiina kɛ mpʋ tɔtɔ , na paa wei ɩ ́ haɣa .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: Waatʋ wei pa haɣaa tɔ , ɩ tɔma ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ tɔɔsɩ potopotonaa hɔɣɔləŋ wei ɩ kaasaa tɔ , na pʋlʋpʋ ɩ ́ taa le .

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa tɔɔsɩ hɔɣɔləŋ ɩnɩ , na pə ́ su tɔkəŋ naanʋwa na naalɛ . Potopotonaa kakpasɩ ɩnɩ ɩ kpisina ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ waatʋ wei pa tɛma tɔɣɔʋ tɔ .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Waatʋ wei yəlaa ná Yesu piti təmlɛ ńtɛ ́ tɔ , pa tɔma sɩ : Tampana Yʋlʋ ɩnɛ ɩnəɣəlɛ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ wei ɩ tɔm paa yɔɣɔtaa sɩ ɩ ká kɔɔ antulinya taa tɔ .

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Yesu nyəmá sɩ pa sɔɔlʋ pɩɩwa sɩ paa kpa - ɩ wulaʋ na toŋ kɛ tənɛ ɩnəɣɩ kpakpaa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ŋmɛlɩ təkɛʋ na ɩ ́ kpa pɔ ́ ɔ ́ ŋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ tike .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Pə kɔma na pə taanɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ɩfalaa tii lʋm nɔɣɔ ,

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: na pá kpa kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa sɩ pa tɛsəɣɩ Kapənahum . Halɩ pə ́ caŋ pə ́ yu Yesu ta kɔnta pa kiŋ .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ heelim sɔsɔɔm mapa na pə laŋtəɣɩ teŋku lʋm kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: Yesu ɩfalaa tɔma lʋm taa ɩsɩɩ kilomɛɛtələnaa kakpasɩ yaa naatoso , ɩlɛ pa na Yesu kɛlɛ na ɩ ́ tɔŋ lʋm tɔɔ na ɩ ́ kɔŋna pa tɔɔ tɔɔ . Tənaɣa sɔɣɔntʋ kpa - wɛ .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Ama Yesu heela - wɛ sɩ : Sɔɣɔntʋ ɩ ́ taa la - mɛ , maɣa .

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Yesu ɩfalaa luɣu lapa na pá kpaɣa Yesu kɛ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ taa . Tete ɩsɩɩ saŋa tɔ , pa tɛma tatɛ kɛ timpi pa pukaɣa tɔ .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: Kʋ fema ɩlɛna samaa wei pə yela teŋku waalɩ tɔ , ɩ ́ ná sɩ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ kʋlʋmʋɣʋ ka kaasəna təna . Pə ́ cɔ ́ pa nyəmá sɩ Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa ta kaa kpɩɩlʋɣʋ . Ama pɛlɛ pa tike pa tɛɛna .

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: Paa na mpʋ kpɩɩləŋ lɛləŋ wei ɩ lɩɩna Tipeliyatɩ tɔ ɩ kɔma , na ɩ ta hatələna timpi Tacaa ka sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ na təmlɛ na pə ́ cɔ ́ pá tɔɣɔ potopotonaa tɔ .

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: Samaa ɩnɩ ɩ nawa sɩ Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ fɛɩ təna , ɩlɛna pá kpa kpɩɩləŋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa na pá tɛɛ Kapənahum kɛ Yesu pɛɛkʋɣʋ .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Samaa kɔma na pá na - ɩ teŋku waalɩ ɩlɛna pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , pəlee kɛ ́ n kɔma cənɛ ?

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔwa samaa sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ , pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ ná ma piti təma tɔɣɔ ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ - m . Ama ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ potopotonaa na ɩ ́ haɣa tɔɣɔ .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa nɔkɩ na ɩ ́ kana kʋtɔɣɔʋ ŋku kʋ tɛŋ tɔɣɔ pɛɛkʋɣʋ . Ama ɩ ́ lʋ ŋku kʋ wɛ tam na kʋ kɔŋna weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ kʋ tɔɔ . Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má maa hana - mɛɣɛ kʋtɔɣɔʋ ŋkʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Tacaa Ɩsɔ tɛma - m ɩ toŋ cacaalaɣa tʋɣʋ .

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ samaa pɔɔsa Yesu sɩ : Pepeɣe tɩɩ la na pə ́ cɔ ́ tə ́ la təma nna Ɩsɔ caakɩ tɔ ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ samaa sɩ : Təmlɛ nte Ɩsɔ caa sɩ ɩ ́ lapɩ - ɩ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ ɩ ́ mʋ ɩ tillu tɔm .

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ samaa pɔɔsa Yesu tɔtɔ sɩ : Ɩlɛ n kaa la piti təmlɛ natəlɩ na tə ná na pə ́ cɔ ́ tə mʋ nyá tɔm ? Tɔʋ , təmlɛ nteɣe n ka la ?

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Ta caanaa caanaa tɔɣɔna manna kɛ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa , ɩsɩɩ pa ŋmaaʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ sɩ : Ɩ tisa ɩsɔtaa kʋtɔɣɔʋ na ɩ ́ cɛla - wɛ na pá tɔɣɔ .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ samaa sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ , mpi Moisi cɛla - mɛ tɔ pə ta kɛ ɩsɔtaa kʋtɔɣɔʋ kɛ təna . Ama pənɛntɛ ɩsɔtaa kʋtɔɣɔʋ maɣamaɣa kɛ ma Caa cɛləɣɩ - mɛ .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Na kʋtɔɣɔʋ ŋku Ɩsɔ cɛləɣɩ - mɛ tɔɣɔlɛ ŋku kʋ lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa na kʋ tii na kʋ haakɩ yəlaa tənaɣa weesuɣu tɔ .

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Tənaɣa samaa cɔ Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , haakɩ - tʋɣʋ kʋtɔɣɔʋ ŋkʋɣʋ tam .

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ samaa ɩnɩ sɩ : Ma maɣamaɣa kɛlɛ kʋtɔɣɔʋ ŋku kʋ haakɩ weesuɣu tɔ . Ye wei ɩ ́ kɔma ma kiŋ nyɔɣɔsɩ kaa kpa pʋntʋ paa pəcɔ . Pəyele wei ɩ mʋ ma tɔm tɔ , lʋkɔtʋ kaa kpa pʋntʋ tɔtɔ .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: Ama ma tɛma - mɛɣɛ - təɣɩ heeluɣu sɩ ɩ ́ na - m , pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ tá mʋ ma tɔm .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Pa təna mpa ma Caa haa - m tɔ , pa kɔŋ ma kiŋ kɛ ́ . Ma kaa tɔɣɔnɩ wei ɩ kɔŋ ma kiŋ tɔ .

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma tiina ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sɩ ma lakɩ wei ɩ tila - m tɔ ɩ luɣu nyəntʋ , pə taɣa ma maɣamaɣa ma nyəntʋ .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Wei ɩ tila - m tɔ ɩ luɣu nyəntʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ má taa yele na mpa ɩ cɛla - m tɔ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ le . Ama sɩ má kʋsɩ pa tənaɣa sətaa taa kɛ ́ kʋyakʋ kantəkaɣa nyəŋkʋ wule kɛ ́ .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Ma Caa luɣu nyəntʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ mpa mpa pa ná Pəyaɣa má na pá mʋ ma tɔm tɔ , pʋntʋnaa ɩ ́ hiki weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ , na maa feesi - wɛɣɛ kantəkaɣa kʋyakʋ wule .

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ Yesu yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ mpʋ sɩ ɩnəɣəlɛ kʋtɔɣɔʋ ŋku kʋ tiina ɩsɔtaa tɔ , sɛsɛ pə ta maɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma ntɛ ́ .

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Tənaɣa pa tɔma sɩ : Ɩsɩɩ Yosɛɛfʋ pəyalʋ Yesu kɛlɛ ? Tə nyəmá ɩ caa na ɩ too mɛɛ . Ɩlɛ ntiɣi ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ sɩ ɩnɩ ɩ tiina ɩsɔtaa ?

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ Yuta nyə ́ ma sɩ : Ɩ ́ taa miitina - m mpʋ .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Tacaa wei ɩ tila - m tɔ ɩ ́ yaa wei , pʋntʋ tike kɔŋna ma kiŋ , na maa feesi - ɩ kantəkaɣa kʋyakʋ wule .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa ŋmaa tɔm tənɛ sɩ : Yəlaa təna ká wɛɛ Ɩsɔ kʋsɛɣɛsaa . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ yəlaa təna mpa pa nɩɩkəna Tacaa Ɩsɔ na pá mʋ ɩ kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ tɔ , pa kɔŋ ma kiŋ .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: Ɩlɛ pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ nɔɣɔlʋ tɛma Tacaa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ naʋ se . Ye pə taɣa wei ɩ lɩɩna Ɩsɔ kiŋ tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ nana - ɩ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ , wei ɩ mʋ ma tɔm , pʋntʋ tɛma weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔɣɔ hikuɣu kɛ ́ .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Maɣalɛ kʋtɔɣɔʋ ŋku kʋ haakɩ weesuɣu tɔ .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Mə caanaa caanaa tɔɣɔna manna kɛ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa , pəyele pa səpa .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Ama kʋtɔɣɔʋ ŋku kʋ lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa tɔ , ŋkʋɣʋ yʋlʋ ɩ ́ tɔɣaa ɩ kaa sɩ .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Maɣalɛ kʋtɔɣɔʋ ŋku kʋ tiina ɩsɔtaa na kʋ haa weesuɣu tɔ . Ye wei ɩ tɔɣɔ kʋtɔɣɔʋ ŋkʋ , pʋntʋ ká wɛɛ tam kɛ ́ , ɩɩ tasəɣɩ səpʋ . Kʋtɔɣɔʋ ŋku maa ha tɔɣɔlɛ ma maɣamaɣa ma tɔnʋɣʋ nantʋ . Ma haakɩ - təɣɩ sɩ yəlaa təna ɩ ́ hiki weesuɣu .

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma sʋʋ tə tɔɔ kɛ ́ hɔm na ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ kɛ pa taa pa tike sɩ : Ɩsənaɣa ɩnɩ ɩ ká kpaɣa ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ tɔnʋɣʋ nantʋ na ɩ ́ ha - tʋ sɩ tə ́ tɔɣɔ ?

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔwa sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ , ye ɩ ta tɔɣɔ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma tɔnʋɣʋ nantʋ , na ɩ ́ ta nyɔɔ ma caləm , ɩ ́ kaa hiki weesuɣu kɛ mə maɣamaɣa .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Ye wei ɩ tɔkɩ ma tɔnʋɣʋ nantʋ na ɩ ́ nyɔɔkɩ ma caləm , pʋntʋ tɛma weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔɣɔ hikuɣu kɛ ́ , na maa feesi - ɩ sətaa taa kɛ ́ kantəkaɣa kʋyakʋ wule .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma tɔnʋɣʋ nantʋ kɛ kʋtɔɣɔʋ kʋpaŋkʋ kɛ ́ , na ma caləm kɛ kʋnyɔnyɔɔm kʋpam tɔtɔ .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Ye wei ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ ma tɔnʋɣʋ nantʋ , na ɩ ́ nyɔɔ ma caləm , ma na pʋntʋ tɩɩ wɛɛ təma taa kɛ ́ .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: Tacaa Ɩsɔ wei ɩ tila - m tɔ , ɩ wɛna ɩ weesuɣu , na ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma wɛna ma weesuɣu tɔtɔ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ wei ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ - m , pʋntʋ wɛɛna weesuɣu kɛ ma tɔɔ tɔtɔ .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Tɔʋ , kʋtɔɣɔʋ ŋku kʋ lɩɩna ɩsɔ tɔɣɔlɛ . Kʋ ta kɛ ŋku mə caanaa caanaa ka tɔɣaa na kaɣana pa fɛɩ tɔ . Ama ye wei ɩ tɔkɩ kʋtɔɣɔʋ kʋnɛ , pʋntʋ ká wɛɛna ɩ weesuɣu kɛ tam .

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Kapənahum kɛ Yesu sɛɣɛsa tɔm tənɛɣɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile taa .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: Waatʋ wei Yesu ɩfalaa nɩɩ tɔm tənɛ tɔ , pa taa paɣalɛ tɔma sɩ : Tɔm tənɛ tə kəla katɛ . Awe ná pəsəɣɩ tə nɩɩʋ ?

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: Yesu nawa sɩ tɔm tənɛ tə ta maɣa ɩ ɩfalaa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩsɩɩ tɔm tənɛ tə kəla - mɛɣɛlɛ yaa ?

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: Na ɩ ́ ká kɔɔ na ɩ ́ na Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má na má kpaa timpi maa wɛɛ tɔ , ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣalɛ ɩ ́ ká la ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu haakəna weesuɣu , yʋlʋ tɔnʋɣʋ kʋnɛ kʋlɛ kɩɩ waasəɣɩ pʋlʋ . Tɔm nti ma heela - mɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔɣɔlɛ Feesuɣu nyəntʋ , na ntɩ ɩnɩ tə haakəna weesuɣu .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: Paa na mpʋ , mə taa lɛlaa ɩɩ tʋɣʋna - tɩ . ( Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , hatoo kancaalaɣa Yesu ka nyəmá mpa pa kaa tɔkɩ ɩ tɔm tɔ . Halɩ ɩ nyəmá wei ɩ ká lapɩ - ɩ kɔlɔmɔtɔ tɔ . )

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Yesu sɔɔsa lɛntɩ sɩ : Pə maɣamaɣa pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ maa heela - mɛ sɩ : Nɔɣɔlʋ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ kɔɔ ma cɔlɔ , na pə tá kɛna sɩ Ɩsɔ hana - ɩ pə mpaaʋ .

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Pə kpaɣaʋ kʋyaŋkʋ tɔɣɔ Yesu ɩfalaa taa lɛlaa yela - ɩ , pa ta tasa - ɩ təŋʋɣʋ .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu pɔɔsa pa naanʋwa na naalɛ wei ɩ kaasaa tɔ sɩ : Na mɛ se , mɩɩ tɛɛ mə nyəŋkʋ ?

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Tənaɣa Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ cɔwa Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , awe kiŋ kɛ tɩɩ polo ? Nyá tɔm pee haakəna weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ ɩlɛ .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Na pənɛntɛ tə mʋwa na tə ́ tɛ tá taa sɩ n kɛ ́ Yʋlʋ Naŋŋtʋ ɩnɩ , na n lɩɩna Ɩsɔ kiŋ .

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu naa tɔ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Mə naanʋwa na naalɛ ɩnɛ pə taɣa má ləsəna - mɛ ? Pə ́ cɔ ́ mə taa lɛlʋ ná kɛ ́ ɩlɔɣɔʋ .

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: Simɔŋ Ɩsəkaleeu pəyalʋ Yutaasɩ tɔm kɛ Yesu yɔɣɔtaɣa mpʋ . Paa na ɩ kɛ ́ pa naanʋwa na naalɛ taa lɛlʋ tɔ , kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ kɔmna na ɩ ́ lapɩ - ɩ kɔlɔmɔtɔ .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ Yesu cɔɔkaɣa Kalilee tɛtʋ taa . Ɩ luɣu fɛɩ Yuta tɛtʋ taa kɛ ́ cɔɔʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Yuta nyə ́ ma pɛɛkaɣa ɩ kʋɣʋ .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Yuta nyə ́ ma acima wena pa yaa sɩ coka acima tɔ a wʋsaa .

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ newaa tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Kʋlɩ cənɛ na ń polo Yuta na nyá ɩfalaa na təma nna n lakɩ tɔ tɔtɔ .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Ye yʋlʋ caa sɩ pá nyəmɩ - ɩ ɩɩ ŋmɛsəɣɩ ɩ təma . Ye n lakɩ təma anəɣɩ mpʋ ɩlɛ , yele na yəlaa təna nyɩ - ŋ mɛɛ . (

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Yesu newaa maɣamaɣa ná tá mʋ ɩ tɔm tɔtɔ . )

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Pə ta maɣata - m na pə ́ cɔ ́ . Ama ye mɛ , paa pəlee pə maɣa - mɛɣɛ .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , antulinya nyə ́ ma taa kaa kpana - mɛ . Ama pa taa kpaana má . Mpi tɔ , ma hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ sɩ pa kʋlapʋtʋ fɛɩ teu .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Mɩɩ kpa tənaɣa acima . Ye ma , ma kaa polo . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pə ta maɣata má .

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: Yesu tɛma - wɛɣɛ heeluɣu kɛ mpʋ ɩlɛna ɩnɩ ɩ ́ saalɩ Kalilee .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: Yesu newaa kɔma na pá kpa acima tɔɣɔʋ , ɩlɛna Yesu maɣamaɣa polo . Ama ɩ ta yele sɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ nyɩ , ɩ pola ɩŋmɛlaʋ kɛ ́ .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Yuta nyə ́ ma pɛɛkaɣa - ɩ acima wɛɛ taa , na pá tɔŋna təmaɣa pɔɔsʋɣʋ sɩ : Ɩlɛ leɣe ɩ wɛɛ ?

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Halɩ samaa wɛlətaɣa Yesu tɔm kɛ pa taa pa tike kɛ sɔsɔm . Lɛlaa sɩ : Yʋlʋ kʋpaŋ kɛ ́ . Lɛlaa sɩ : Aaɩ , ɩ kɛ ́ yʋlʋ tʋsʋlʋ kɛ ́ .

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: Paa na mpʋ Yuta nyə ́ ma sɔɣɔntʋ tɔɔ nɔɣɔlʋ taa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ təfoo .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: Pə kɔma na acima haɣa hɛkʋ , ɩlɛna Yesu polo na ɩ ́ sʋʋ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa Yuta nyə ́ ma kɛ piti , na pá tɔŋ sɩ : Ɩsənaɣa pə lapa na ɩ ́ nyɩ pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ta la ceu ?

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Nti ma sɛɣɛsəɣɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , ma ta lu - təɣɩ kʋlupu . Ama wei ɩ tila - m tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ hʋləna - m - tɩ .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Ye wei ɩ sɔɔla Ɩsɔ luɣu nyəntʋ təŋʋɣʋ , pʋntʋ tike ka nyəna sɩ ma kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ lɩɩna Ɩsɔ kiŋ yaa ma maɣamaɣa ma kaŋkantɛ kɛ ma lakəna .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: Wei ɩ lakəna ɩ kaŋkantɛ tɔ , ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ sam kɛ ɩ pɛɛkəɣɩ . Ama wei ɩ pɛɛkəɣɩ ɩ tillu sam , pʋntʋ ntɛ ́ tampana tʋ , pɔpɔtʋ fɛɩ ɩ kiŋ .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: Ntɔŋ Moisi hʋla - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təna na ? Pə ́ cɔ ́ paa mə taa kʋlʋm ɩɩ təŋəɣɩ - tɩ . Aŋha , na ɩ ́ caa ɩ ́ kʋ - m suwe ?

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ samaa cɔwa Yesu sɩ : N nyəna alɔɣaa kɛ ? Awe caa ɩ kʋ - ŋ ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔwa sɩ : Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , wule təlɩ ma lapa təmlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ natəlɩ na piti kpa mə təna .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Moisi ná tʋ - mɛɣɛ pɛlʋɣʋ , ( pəyele pə ta tɩɩ kɛʋ Moisi kiŋ kɛ pə lɩɩnaa . Ama hatoo mə caanaa caanaa kiŋ kɛ ́ , ) na paa kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule ɩ ́ pɛləɣɩ pəyaɣa kɛ ́ .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Ye ɩ ́ pɛləɣɩ pəyaɣa kɛ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule sɩ pə taa kɔɔ na ɩ ́ yɔkɩ Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ . Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ má waa yʋlʋ pilimile təcu kɛ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule na mɩɩ mʋ - m na pááná ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa nyənəɣɩ tɔɔ tike . Ama ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ tampana na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ .

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: Yosalɛm nyə ́ ma napəlɩ pa yɔɣɔtaɣa sɩ : Pə taɣa wei pa pɛɛkaɣa sɩ pa kʋɣɩ tɔɣɔlɛ ?

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Ɩ ́ nyənɩ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ məlaa na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəɣəna - wɛ na ɩɩ nyaŋna pʋlʋ , na pá suma . Ɩsɩɩ tá sɔsaa mpɛ pa tɛŋ pa taa sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ Mesii kɛlɛ yaa ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: Tə nyəmá sɩ waatʋ wei Mesii ká kɔɔ tɔ , nɔɣɔlʋ ɩɩ nyəŋ ɩ tɛ . Tɔfɔ ye pə kaasa ɩnɛ ɩlɛ , tə nyəmá ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ təlɩɩlɛ mɛɛ .

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Yesu tɔŋna sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ na nɔɣɔ sɔsaɣa sɩ : Mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ nyəma - m , na ɩ ́ nyəmá ma təlɩɩlɛ yaa ? Aaɩ , ma ta kɔɔ ma maɣamaɣa ma kɔntɛ se . Ama wei ɩ tila - m tɔ ɩ wɛɛ na ɩ kɛ ́ tampana tʋ . Ɩlɛ mə ta nyəmɩ - ɩ .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: Ama ma , ma nyəma - ɩ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ kiŋ kɛ ma lɩɩnaa , na ɩnɩ ɩ tilina - m .

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Yəlaa luɣu lapa sɩ pá kpa - ɩ , ɩlɛ nɔɣɔlʋ ta tʋ niŋ kɛ ɩ tɔɔ , ɩ wʋlɛ ta tata tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: Paa na mpʋ samaa ɩnɩ ɩ taa paɣalɛ mʋ Yesu tɔm na pá tɛ pa taa . Haləna pá tɔŋ sɩ : Mesii ɩ kɔma ɩ ká la piti təma na a kəlɩ ɩnɛ ɩ nyəna na ?

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Pə kɔma na Falisanaa nɩɩ nti samaa miitiɣi Yesu tɔɔ tɔ , ɩlɛna pá na kɔtəlaa sɔsaa pá tili filisinaa sɩ pá polo pá kpa - ɩ .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma sɩ : Pə kaasa - m wɛɛ naalɛɣɛ mə hɛkʋ kɛ ́ , ɩlɛna má məlɩ wei ɩ ka tila - m tɔ ɩ kiŋ .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Ɩ ́ ká pɛɛkɩ - m ɩ ́ kaa na - m . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ ́ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ kɔɔ timpi maa wɛɛ tɔ .

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma pɔɔsa təma sɩ : Leɣe Yesu ká polo na tə ́ kaa na - ɩ ? Ɩ ká polo Yuta nyə ́ ma mpa pa yawa na pá polo tuu Kəlɛɛkɩ acalɛɛ taa tɔ pa kiŋ na ɩ ́ paasəna Kəlɛɛkɩ nyə ́ ma yaa ɩsəna ?

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: Ye pə taɣa mpʋ , ntiɣilɛ ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ sɩ : Tɩɩ pɛɛkɩ - ɩ tə kaa na - ɩ ? Tə kaa pəsɩ na tə ́ polo timpi ɩ ka wɛɛ tɔ ?

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: Acima kʋyakʋ kantəkaɣa nyəŋkʋ ŋku kʋ kɛ kʋyakʋ sɔsɔɔʋ tɔ kʋ wule , Yesu səŋa ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ kpaalɩ sɩ : Ye lʋkɔtʋ ɩ ́ wɛna wei , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ kɔɔ ma kiŋ na ɩ ́ nyɔɔ .

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: Wei ɩ ́ mʋ ma tɔm weesuɣu lʋm pusi ká lɩɩkəna ɩ taa na pə ́ kpeŋ , ɩsɩɩ pa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ .

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: ( Mpa pa mʋ Yesu paa kɔɔ pá hiki Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu ŋku tɔ , kʋ tɔm kɛ ɩ yɔɣɔtaɣa . Mpi tɔ , waatʋ ɩnɩ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu taa kɔnta . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Yesu taa sʋʋta ɩ teeli taa tɔ pə tɔɔ ) .

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: Samaa ɩnɩ ɩ taa yəlaa nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá tɔ sɩ : Ɩnəɣəlɛ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ wei tɔ .

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ lɛlaa sɩ : Mesii kɛ ́ . Na lɛlaa náá tɔŋ sɩ : Kalilee kɛ Mesii ká lɩɩna ?

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm takəlasɩ taa wɛɛ sɩ : Mesii ka wɛɛ Tafiiti lʋlʋɣʋ taa tʋ kɛ ́ . Pɛtəlɛhɛm timpi Tafiiti ka wɛɛ tɔɣɔ ɩ ká lɩɩna .

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ samaa faɣa Yesu tɔɔ .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: Pa taa lɛlaa luɣu lapa sɩ pá kpa Yesu . Ama nɔɣɔlʋ ta tʋ niŋ kɛ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ filisinaa məla kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Falisanaa pa kiŋ na pɛlɛ pá pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ tá kɔna - ɩ ?

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Tənaɣa filisinaa cɔwa sɩ : Tuu tɔ yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ta yɔɣɔtəta ɩsɩɩ ɩnɩ .

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ kpɛnna - mɛ na ɩ ́ puɣusi tɔtɔɣɔ ?

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: Wulee ɩ ́ keesa tá sɔsaa yaa Falisanaa taa nɔɣɔlʋ na pʋntʋ təŋəɣɩ - ɩ ?

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: Samaa wei ɩ ta nyɩ Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kɛ mpʋ tɔ , sɔntɔ nyə ́ ma kɛ ́ .

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Falisanaa taa lɛlʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Nikotɛm na ɩ ́ ka pola Yesu kiŋ kɛ ahoo tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ tɔma - wɛ sɩ :

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: Anɩ ɩ nyəmá sɩ , ta kʋlapʋtʋ taa pə fɛɩ sɩ tə kʋ yʋlʋ tɔm kɛ mpʋ , na tə tá caɣa na tə nɩɩ pə təna na tə cɛkəna mpi ɩ wakəlaa tɔ .

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa cɔwa Nikotɛm sɩ : Sɛsɛ Kalilee nyə ́ ma mpɛɣɛlɛ na nyaɣa ? Wiili Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa na ń ná , tuu tɔ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ta tɛnta lɩɩʋ na Kalilee se .

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ kɛ ́ pa yawa na paa wei ɩ ́ məlɩ ɩ təyaɣa .

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ná kpa Olifinaa pʋɣʋ .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: Tɛʋ fema ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ lɔŋ kɛ tanaŋ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ məlɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa na samaa təna kɔɔ ɩ kiŋ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ caɣa na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ - wɛ .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Tənaɣa Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa na Falisanaa pa kɔna - ɩ alʋ nɔɣɔlʋ wei pa kpəlaa na ɩ ́ lakɩ wasaŋkalətʋ tɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa səŋsa - ɩ samaa hɛkʋ taa .

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá tɔ Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , tə kpəla alʋ ɩnɛ ɩnɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ wasaŋkalətʋ .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Moisi yɔɣɔta ɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa sɩ , alʋ ɩ ́ lapa mpʋ pə taka , tə yaɣa - ɩ pɛɛ na tə ́ kʋ - ɩ . Nyá ná we ?

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Pa nyəpa Yesu kɛ tɔm kɛ kʋnyəpʋ kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pá hiki timpi paa tʋna - ɩ taalɩ tɔ . Ama Yesu luŋaa na ɩ ́ ŋmaana mpəle kɛ atɛ .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Pa tɔŋna - ɩ pɔɔsʋɣʋ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Mə taa wei ɩ nyəmá sɩ tuu tɔ ɩ ta lata ɩsaɣatʋ , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ caalɩ - ɩ pəlɛ lɔɣɔʋ .

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu tasa luŋuɣu na ɩ ́ ŋmaa atɛ .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Waatʋ wei pa nɩɩ tɔm tənɛ ɩlɛna , pá sʋʋ lɔɔlʋɣʋ kɛ kʋlʋm kʋlʋm . Pə kpaɣaʋ sɔsaa na pə ́ polo piya tɔ . Halɩ pə ́ kɔɔ pə ́ yele Yesu tike na alʋ ɩnɩ , na ɩ ́ səŋa tənaɣa tam .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: Yesu kɔma na ɩ ́ kʋlɩ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Alʋ nyá , nyá yəlaa mpɛ pa wele ? Ntɔŋ nɔɣɔlʋ ta la - ŋ pʋlʋ ?

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: Ɩlɛna alʋ cɔ sɩ : Nn Tacaa . Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tɛɛ , ma tɔtɔ ma kaa yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ pá la - ŋ pʋlʋ . Ama taa tasa ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ ́ .

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu məla ɩ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ taa sɩ : Ma wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ kɔkɔ ŋka ka naa yəlaa tɔ . Ye wei ɩ təŋəɣɩ - m , kɔkɔ ŋka ka kɔŋna weesuɣu tɔ kaa naa - ɩ na ɩ ́ tɔŋ . Ɩ kaa fɛlɩ səkpɛtʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ nɔɔhəlɛ kɛ paa pəcɔ təta .

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Tənaɣa Falisanaa tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Ɩsɩɩ n kɛɛsʋɣʋʋ nyá tɩ tɔm kɛ mpʋ tɔ , pə fɛɩna nyʋɣʋ se .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Paa ma kɛɛsəɣɩ ma tɩ tɔm , tə wɛ tampana tɔɣɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma nyəmá timpi ma lɩɩnaa tɔ , pə ́ cɔ ́ ma nyəmá timpi ma puki tɔ . Ama mə ta nyɩ ma təlɩɩlɛ , pəyele ɩ ́ ta nyɩ ma təpote .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Mə hʋʋkɩ yʋlʋhʋʋlɛ kɛ yem kɛ ́ . Ama ma ɩlɛ maa hʋʋkɩ nɔɣɔlʋ tɔm kɛ ma taa .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: Ɩlɛ paa ma tɩɩ hʋʋwa , tampana tɔɔ kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma fɛɩ ma tike tɔ se : Ama má na ma Caa wei ɩ tila - m tɔɣɔ .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Pa ŋmaawa mə kʋsəsɩɩtʋ takəlasɩ taa sɩ : Ye yəlaa naalɛ ləsa aseeta kʋlʋm , pa aseeta ɩnɩ ɩ wɛ tampana .

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Ma , ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ ma tɩ tɔm na ma Caa wei ɩ tila - m tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ ma tɔm kɛ mpʋ tɔtɔ .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa pɔɔsa Yesu sɩ : Leɣe nyá Caa ɩnɩ ɩ wɛɛ ? Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ Falisanaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ ta nyɩ má , pəyele ɩ ta nyɩ ma Caa . Ye ɩ ́ ka nyəma - m , ɩ ́ ka nyəmá ma Caa tɔtɔ .

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Yesu yɔɣɔta tɔm tənɛɣɛ ɩ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa kɛ ́ kʋcɔɔŋ tətʋlɛ cɔlɔ . Na nɔɣɔlʋ ta kpa - ɩ , ɩ wʋlɛ ta tata tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ heeluɣu sɩ : Ma tɛɛkɩ na ɩ ́ ká pɛɛkɩ - m . Ama ɩ ́ ká sɩ mə ɩsaɣatʋ taa . Mpi tɔ , ɩ ́ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ polo timpi ma puki tɔ .

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔma sɩ : Ɩ ká kʋ ɩ tɩ , yaa ɩsənaɣalɛ ɩ tɔŋ sɩ tá kaa pəsɩ na tə ́ polo timpi ɩ puki tɔ ?

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma Yuta nyə ́ ma sɩ : Mə kɛ ́ atɛ nyə ́ ma kɛ ́ . Ama má , ma kɛ ́ ɩsɔtaa tʋ . Mə kɛ ́ antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ nyə ́ ma . Ama má tá kɛ ́ antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ nyəŋ .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Pə tɔɔ ɩnəɣɩ ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ , ɩ ́ ka sɩ mə ɩsaɣatʋ taa . Ye ɩ ta tisi sɩ tampam ma wɛɛ , ɩ ́ ká sɩ mə ɩsaɣatʋ taa .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ɩlɛ n tɩɩ kɛ ́ aweɣe təkpem ye ? Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ Yuta nyə ́ ma sɩ : Ma kɛ ́ wei ɩ tɔm maa heela - mɛɣɛ hatoo kancaalaɣa tɔ .

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: Ma wɛna tɔm paɣalɛ nti maa yɔɣɔtɩ mə tɔɔ na nti maa hʋʋna - mɛ tɔ . Ɩlɛ wei ɩ tila - m tɔ ɩ kɛ ́ tampana tʋ , na nti ma nɩɩ ɩ kiŋ tɔ , tə tike kɛ ma heeliɣi antulinya taa .

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: Pa ta cɛkəna sɩ Tacaa Ɩsɔ tɔm kɛ ɩ heeliɣi - wɛ .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Waatʋ wei ɩ ́ ká kpaasɩ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ɩlɛ , waatʋ ɩnəɣɩ ɩ ́ ká nyɩ sɩ , maɣalɛ wei ɩnɩ tɔ . Na ɩ ́ ká nyɩ tɔtɔ sɩ , maa lakɩ pʋlʋ na ma maɣamaɣa ma kaŋkantɛ . Ama nti Tacaa Ɩsɔ sɛɣɛsa - m tɔɣɔ ma lakɩ .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: Wei ɩ tila - m tɔ ɩ wɛ ma waalɩ , ɩ ta yele - m ma tike . Mpi tɔ , ɩ luɣu tɛɛ nyəntʋ kɛ ma lakɩ .

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Yesu yɔɣɔta mpʋ ɩlɛna paɣalɛ mʋ - ɩ .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu heela Yuta nyə ́ ma mpa pa mʋ - ɩ tɔ sɩ : Ye ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ ma tɔm kɛ teu , ɩ ́ ká pəsɩ ma ɩfalaa na tampana .

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: Na ɩ ́ ká nyɩ tampana , na tampana anɩ a ká cɛna - mɛɣɛ mə yomle taa .

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɛlɛ pa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tə kɛ ́ Apəlaham lʋlʋɣʋ kɛ ́ , nɔɣɔlʋ taa kpa - tʋɣʋ yomle kɛ paa pəcɔ . Ɩlɛ pepe cɛpʋ kɛ n tɔŋ sɩ pɩɩ cɛ - tʋ ?

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ , wei ɩ lakɩ ɩsaɣatʋ tɔ , pʋntʋ pəsa tə yom kɛ ́ .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Na yom ná wɛ saŋa kɛ ́ , ɩ fɛɩ cele . Ama təyaɣa pəyaɣa ná wɛ tam .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Ɩlɛ ye Pəyaɣa má ma hɛta - mɛ , mə yomle tɛma tampana tɛm kɛ ́ .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Ma nyəmá sɩ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ Apəlaham lʋlʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma te . Paa na mpʋ , ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ ma kʋɣʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ ́ kisiɣi ma kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: Nti ma Caa ná hʋla - m tɔɣɔ ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ , na mɩɩ lakɩ nti mə caa ná heela - mɛ tɔ .

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Aaɩ tá caa kɛlɛ Apəlaham . Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ye tampana ɩ ́ ka kɛ ́ Apəlaham piya , ɩsəntɔ ɩ ́ ka lakaɣa Apəlaham kʋlapʋtʋ mɛɛ .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: Anɩ tampana nna ma nɩɩ Ɩsɔ kiŋ tɔ , a tike kɛ ma heela - mɛ , pə ́ cɔ ́ paa na mpʋ ɩ ́ caa ɩ ́ kʋ - m təkpem . Ɩlɛ Apəlaham ná taa la mpʋ .

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Mə caa kʋlapʋtʋ kɛ ɩ ́ lakɩ . Tənaɣa Falisanaa cɔ Yesu sɩ : Tə ta kɛ apalaa naalɛ piya se . Ama ta Caa kɛ kʋlʋm kɛ ́ , ɩnəɣəlɛ Ɩsɔ .

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu tɔ Falisanaa sɩ : Ye tampana , Ɩsɔ ka kɛ ́ mə Caa , ɩ ́ ka sɔɔla - m . Mpi tɔ , ɩ kiŋ kɛ ma lɩɩnaa , na ɩ kɔntɛ kɛ ma kɔma . Ma ta kɔɔ ma maɣamaɣa ma kɔntɛ . Ama ɩnɩ ɩ tilina - m .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩɩ cɛkəɣəna ma kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ , ɩɩ caa tə nɩɩʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ tɔɣɔ .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Mə Caa kɛlɛ Ɩlɔɣɔʋ , na ɩ luɣu nyəntʋ kɛ mə sɔɔla lapʋ . Hatoo kancaalaɣa ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kɛ ́ yʋlʋkʋlʋ kɛ ́ , ɩɩ caa tampana təŋʋɣʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ta kɛ tampana tʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ . Waatʋ wei ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ pɔpɔtʋ tɔ , ɩ tənaɣalɛ təna . Mpi tɔ , ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ kɛ ́ pɔpɔtʋ , na pɔpɔtʋ təna caa kɛ ́ .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: Ye ma , tampana kɛ ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ . Pə maɣamaɣa pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩɩ mʋɣɩ ma tɔm .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: Mə taa awe pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ ma təpəntəlɛ ? Tɔʋ , na ma tɩɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tampana tɔ , pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩɩ saŋ mʋɣʋ ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Wei ɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ nyəŋ tɔ , pʋntʋ nɩɩkɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm kɛ ́ . Ama mə tá kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ yəlaa napəlɩ , na pə tɔɔ ɩnəɣɩ ɩɩ tɩɩ nɩɩkɩ .

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Pə taɣa ɩsəntɔ tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɩɩ tɔma sɩ n kɛ ́ Samalii tʋ , pə ́ cɔ ́ n hii alɔɣaa ?

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma ta hii alɔɣaa kɛ paa pəcɔ . Ama ma Caa kɛ ma seeki . Na mɛ , mɩɩ nyənəɣɩ - m yem təkpataa .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ má pɛɛkəɣəna ma maɣamaɣa ma teeli kɛ ma tɩ . Nɔɣɔlʋ tʋɣʋna - m teeli na ɩ ́ haakɩ - m tampana .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ , ye wei ɩ tɔkəɣɩ ma tɔm , pʋntʋ kaa sɩ .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔma Yesu sɩ : Pənɛɣɛlɛ tə nyəmá təkpataa sɩ n kɛ ́ ɩlɔɣɔhilu . Apəlaham səpa , na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa náá sɩ tɔtɔ , ɩlɛna náá tɔŋ sɩ , wei ɩ ́ tɔka nyá tɔm pʋntʋ kaa sɩ ?

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: Ta caa Apəlaham ná səpa , ye mpʋ nyá hʋʋ sɩ n kəla ɩlɛɣɛlɛ ? Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa maɣamaɣa ná səpa tɔtɔ . Ɩlɛ n nyənəɣɩ nyá təɣɩ we ?

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔwa sɩ : Ye maa tʋkaɣana ma təɣɩ teeli , ɩlɛ ma teeli ɩnɩ ɩ taa kɛ ́ pʋlʋ se . Ama ma teeli tʋlʋ ntɛ ́ ma Caa , wei mə tɔŋ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ mə Ɩsɔ tɔ .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: Pəyele ɩnəɣɩ ɩ ́ tá nyɩ . Ama má nyəma - ɩ . Haləna ye ma kpɛɛsaa sɩ ma ta nyəmɩ - ɩ , ma pəsa pɔpɔtʋ kɛ teitei ɩsɩɩ mɛɣɛ . Ama ma nyəma - ɩ , na ma təŋəɣɩ ɩ kʋheelitu na má lakɩ .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Mə caa Apəlaham laŋlɛ naa hʋlʋma teu . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ tɛɛlaɣaa sɩ ɩ ká ná ma kɔntɛ . Na ɩ tɩɩ na - tɛ , na pə hɛɛsɩ ɩ laŋlɛ kɛ teu .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Nyá pɩɩsɩ ná ta tɩɩ tata nɩɩlɛ na naanʋwa na ń tɔŋ sɩ n tɛma Apəlaham kɛ naʋ na ?

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ Yuta nyə ́ ma sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ tuu na pə ́ cɔ ́ pá lʋlɩ Apəlaham tɔ , ma wɛɛ kɛ ́ .

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Tənaɣa pa kpaɣa pɛɛ sɩ pa yakɩ - ɩ . Ama Yesu ŋmɛlaa na ɩ ́ lɩɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa .

text: And as Jesus passed by , he saw a man which was blind from his birth .
text2: Yesu tɛɛkaɣa ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ná yʋlʋ wei pa lʋləna yʋlʋmtʋ tɔ .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu ɩfalaa pɔɔsa Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩnɩ ɩ lapəna ɩsaɣatʋ yaa ɩ caanaa na pá lʋlɩ - ɩ mpʋ ?

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Pə ta kɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩnɩ ɩ lapəna ɩsaɣatʋ yaa ɩ caanaa . Ama pə lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə ́ cɔ ́ Ɩsɔ toma nana nti ɩ ka lapɩ - ɩ tɔ tə kiŋ .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Pə nəɣəsəna tə lakɩ wei ɩ tila - m tɔ ɩ təma kɛ ilim taa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ahoo caa yuɣu , ɩlɛ təmlɛ kaa wɛɛ pəsʋɣʋ tɔtɔ .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Kʋyɛɛŋ wei ɩ taa ma wɛ antulinya taa cənɛ tɔ , maɣalɛ kɔkɔ ŋka ka naa yəlaa təna tɔ .

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Yesu tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ ntaɣama kɛ atɛ , na ɩ ́ lá tɛɛliya , na ɩ ́ taa yʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ ɩsɛ .

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: Na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Polo na ń saŋ nyá ɩsɛ kɛ Silowee lɩɩlɛ taa . ( Hətɛ tənɛ tə hʋwɛɛ wɛɛ sɩ : Pa tilaa . ) Yʋlʋm polaa na ɩ ́ saŋ ɩ ɩsɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ məlɩ na ɩ ́ naakɩ təcɛɩcɛɩ .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yʋlʋm cɔlɔ nyə ́ ma mpa paa nyəma - ɩ lɔŋ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ pala latʋ tɔ , pa tɔma sɩ : Pə taɣa ɩnɛ ɩnɩ ɩ ka cakaɣana na ɩ ́ lakɩ pala ?

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Lɛlaa sɩ ɩnəɣɩ . Lɛlaa sɩ : Aaɩ pə taɣa ɩnɩ , ɩ nəɣəsəlɛ kɛ ́ . Ama apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ cɔwa sɩ : Ma maɣamaɣa kɛ ́ .

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Tənaɣa pa pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Ɩsənaɣa n lapa na nyá ɩsɛ anɩ a kuli ?

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Apalʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Yesu tɔ , ɩnɩ ɩ lapəna tɛɛliya na ɩ ́ taa ma ɩsɛ , na ɩ ́ tɔ - m sɩ má polo Silowee lɩɩlɛ taa na má saŋ ma ɩsɛ . Ma polaa na ma saŋ , ɩlɛna má sʋʋ naʋ .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Tənaɣa pa pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Leɣe apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ wɛɛ ? Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ cɔ sɩ : Ma ta nyɩ .

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kpaɣa wei ɩnɩ ɩ ka kɛ ́ yʋlʋm tɔ na pá pona - ɩ Falisanaa kiŋ .

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ wule kɛ Yesu lapa tɛɛliya na ɩ ́ kulina apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ɩsɛ .

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: Pə tɔɔ ɩnɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa kɛ Falisanaa ná lɛla - ɩ pɔɔsʋɣʋ kɛ ɩsəna pə lapa na ɩ ɩsɛ kuli tɔ . Ɩlɛna yʋlʋm cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Tɛɛliya kɛ ɩ taa ma ɩsɛ , ɩlɛna má saŋ na pənɛ má naakɩ .

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Tənaɣa Falisanaa taa lɛlaa ná tɔma sɩ : Pə taɣa Ɩsɔ kiŋ kɛ apalʋ wei ɩnɩ ɩ lakɩ mpʋ tɔ ɩ lɩɩnaa . Mpi tɔ , ɩɩ təŋəɣɩ kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ kiiŋ . Lɛlaa sɩ : Ye ɩ ka kɛ ́ ɩsaɣaʋ ɩsənaɣa ɩ ka pəsaa na ɩ ́ lá piti təma anɛ a takanaa kɛ mpʋ ? Halɩ pá caŋ pa faɣa pa taa pa tike .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa tasa yʋlʋ wei ɩ ɩsɛ pə kula mpʋ tɔɣɔ pɔɔsʋɣʋ sɩ : Na nyá hʋʋkɩ suweɣe apalʋ wei ɩnɩ n tɔŋ sɩ ɩ kula nyá ɩsɛ tɔ ɩ tɔɔ ? Ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ kɛ ́ .

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Ama Yuta nyə ́ ma mpɛ pa ta mʋ - tɩ sɩ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ka kɛ ́ yʋlʋm kɛ ́ na ɩ ɩsɛ kuli , haləna pá kɔna ɩ caa na ɩ too .

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: Na pá pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Ntɔŋ mə pəyaɣa kɛ ɩnɛ ɩnəɣɩ təkpem na ? Pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ tɔŋ sɩ ɩ ́ lʋla - ɩ na yʋlʋmtʋ yɛɛ ? Tɔʋ , ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣa pə lapa na ɩ ́ naakɩ pənɛ ?

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ nyə ́ ma ná cɔwa sɩ : Tə nyəma - ɩ sɩ tá pəyaɣa kɛ - ɩ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ tə lʋla - ɩ na yʋlʋmtʋ .

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: Ama tə ta nyɩ ɩsəna pə lapa na kaɣana ɩ ́ naakɩ tɔ . Pəyele tə ta nyɩ wei ɩ kula ɩ ɩsɛ tɔ . Ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ta kɛ pəyaɣa , ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ ɩ ká heeli - mɛɣɛ ɩsəna pə lapa tɔ .

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Yʋlʋm nyə ́ ma ná yɔɣɔta mpʋ , mpi tɔ , pa see Yuta nyə ́ ma . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Yuta nyə ́ ma ka pɛɛla nɔɣɔ sɩ , ye wei ɩ tɛma ɩ taa na ɩ ́ tisi sɩ Yesu kɛ ́ Mesii , paa ləsɩ pʋntʋ kɛ pa təkotile taa .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ nyə ́ ma ná tɔma sɩ : Ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ta kɛ pəyaɣa , ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ .

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa tasa apalʋ wei ɩ ka kɛ yʋlʋm tɔɣɔ yaaʋ na pá tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ama na Ɩsɔ tɔɔ yɔɣɔtɩ tampana . Tə nyəmá apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ tɔɔ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ ɩsaɣaʋ kɛ ́ .

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Tənaɣa apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ cɔ Falisanaa sɩ : Ma ta nyɩ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ ɩsaɣaʋ yaa ɩ kɛ ́ kʋpaŋ tɔ . Ama kʋlʋmtʋ tike kɛ ma nyəmá sɩ , maa kɛ ́ yʋlʋm na pənɛ pə taa ma naakɩ .

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Ɩlɛna pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Pepeɣe ɩ lapa - ŋ ? Ɩsənaɣa ɩ lapa na pə ́ cɔ ́ nyá ɩsɛ kuli ?

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma tɛma - mɛɣɛ heeluɣu na ɩ ́ tá mʋ . Ɩlɛ pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ caa ɩ ́ tasa - təɣɩ nɩɩʋ ? Yaa mə caa ɩ ́ sɔɔsɩ ɩ ɩfalaa tɔɔ tɔtɔ ?

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Tənaɣa Falisanaa tʋʋ - ɩ na pá tɔ sɩ : Nyá kɛna yʋlʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ɩfalʋ . Ama ta kɛ ́ Moisi ɩfalaa kɛ ́ .

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Tə nyəmá sɩ , Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔtəna Moisi . Ama pə kaasʋɣʋ yʋlʋ ɩnɩ tɔ , tə ta tɩɩ nyəm ɩ təlɩɩlɛ .

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ama nti tə wɛ piti tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ , mə tá nyɩ ɩ təlɩɩlɛ , pəyele ɩ kula maɣa ma ɩsɛ .

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Tə nyəmá sɩ Ɩsɔ ɩɩ mʋɣɩ asaɣaa nɔɔsɩ . Ama wei ɩ tʋɣɩ - ɩ teeli na ɩ ́ lakɩ ɩ luɣu nyəntʋ tɔ , pʋntʋ nɔɣɔ kɛ ɩ mʋɣɩ .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Tuu tɔ , tə ta nɩɩta sɩ nɔɣɔlʋ kula yʋlʋ wei pa lʋləna yʋlʋmtʋ tɔ ɩ ɩsɛ .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ye apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ taa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ nyəŋ ɩ taa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ la pʋlʋ .

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa cɔ yʋlʋm sɩ : Hatoo pa lʋlʋɣʋ nyá tɔ , ɩsaɣatʋ tike kɛ nyá nyəmá , na nyaa caa n sɛɣɛsɩ ta na ? Ɩlɛna Falisanaa tɔɣɔnɩ - ɩ pa Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu nɩɩwa sɩ pa tɔɣɔna yʋlʋm ɩnɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kɔɔ ɩ ́ suli - ɩ na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : N mʋ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa tɔm na ?

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Tənaɣa yʋlʋm cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , hʋlɩ - m wei pa yaa mpʋ tɔ na má mʋ .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : N na - ɩ mɛɛ , ɩ maɣamaɣa kɛlɛ ma wei ma yɔɣɔtəɣəna - ŋ ɩsəntɔ tɔ .

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Ɩlɛna yʋlʋm tɔ sɩ : Tacaa , ma mʋwa . Na ɩ ́ luŋi - ɩ atɛ .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Ma kɔma antulinya taa cənɛɣɛ sɩ ma fakɩ tampana nyə ́ ma na tasəkəlɛ nyə ́ ma , na mpa paa naakɩ tɔ pá ná , na mpa pa naakaɣa tɔ pá yʋlʋmɩ .

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Falisanaa napəlɩ paa wɛ təna na pá nɩɩkɩ tɔm ntɩ , ɩlɛna pá pɔɔsɩ Yesu sɩ : Pə kpɛŋna tá , tá kɛ ́ yʋlʋmaa tɔtɔ ?

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ Falisanaa sɩ : Ye tampana ɩ ́ ka kɛ ́ yʋlʋmaa , ɩ ́ taa wɛna ɩsaɣatʋ . Ama ɩsɩɩ ɩ tɔŋʋɣʋ sɩ ɩ ́ naakɩ tɔ , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ mə ɩsaɣatʋ wɛ tam .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ , wei ɩ ́ yela heeŋ kaləkʋ nɔnɔɣɔ kɛ sʋʋnaʋ na ɩ ́ ŋmaana tiili tɔɔ na ɩ ́ sʋʋ tɔ , pʋntʋ kɛ ́ ŋmɩɩlʋ na wakəllʋ kɛ ́ .

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: Ama wei ɩ təŋəɣəna nɔnɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ sʋʋ tɔ , pʋntʋ ntɛ ́ tiikulu .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Nɔnɔɣɔ taŋlʋ tʋləɣɩ - ɩ na ɩ ́ sʋʋ . Heeŋ nyəmá ɩ nɔɣɔ . Ɩ kaləɣɩ ɩ heeŋ həla kɛ kʋlʋm kʋlʋm na ɩ ́ lɩɩkəna - ɩ awalɩ .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: Waatʋ wei ɩ tɛŋ ɩ heeŋ ɩnɩ ɩ tənaɣa lɩɩnaʋ tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɛɛ - ɩ nɔɣɔ na heeŋ naa tʋ ɩ waalɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ nyəmá ɩ nɔɣɔ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Ama ye kpaɩ tʋ , ɩ kaa təŋ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ , halɩ ɩ ká se - ɩ sɔsɔm kɛ ́ . Mpi tɔ , ɩ ta nyɩ kpaɩ nyəmá nɔɔsɩ tɔ se .

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Yesu kɛɛsa - wɛɣɛ tənɛ ɩnɩ . Ama pa ta cɛkəna tə hʋwɛɛ .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa yɔɣɔtaɣa sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ . Maɣalɛ heeŋ kaləkʋ ŋkʋ kʋ nɔnɔɣɔ .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Pa təna mpa pa laala - m kɔntɛ tɔ , paa kɛ ́ ŋmɩɩlaa na wakəllaa kɛ ́ , heeŋ ta tɩɩ nɩɩna - wɛ .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Maɣalɛ nɔnɔɣɔ , wei ɩ ́ təŋna ma tɔɔ na ɩ ́ sʋʋ , pɩɩ ya ɩ nyʋɣʋ . Ɩ ká sʋʋkɩ na ɩ ́ lɩɩkɩ , na ɩ ́ hikiɣi nyɩɩtʋ kʋpantʋ .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: Nmɩɩlʋɣʋ na lɛntʋɣʋ na wakəlʋɣʋ tɔɔ tike kɛ ŋmɩɩlʋ ná kɔŋ . Ama ma kɔmaɣa sɩ ma heeŋ ɩ ́ wɛɛ alaafəya taa kɛ ́ tam təpɔkɛɛɛ .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: Má kɛna ntɛɣɛ tiikulu kʋpaŋ ɩnɩ . Wei ɩ kɛ tiikulu kʋpaŋ tɔ , pʋntʋ ɩnɩ ɩɩ kisiɣi ɩ heeŋ səm səpʋ .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: Apaa tʋ wei ɩ ta kɛ tiikulu , na ɩ ́ ta tɩ heeŋ tɔ , ye ɩ na taalɛ haɣa kɔŋ ɩ see kɛ ́ , na taalɛ haɣa kɔɔ na ka kpa heeŋ na ka yasɩ - ɩ yem yem .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Apaa tʋ seeki tɔ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , liɣitee tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ lakɩ , na heeŋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔm ɩɩ caaləɣɩ - ɩ .

text: I am the good shepherd , and know my sheep , and am known of mine .
text2: Má kɛna ntɛɣɛ tiikulu kʋpaŋ ɩnɩ . Ma nyəmá ma heeŋ na ma heeŋ nyəma - m ,

text: As the Father knoweth me , even so know I the Father : and I lay down my life for the sheep .
text2: teitei ɩsɩɩ ma Caa nyəmɩ - m na maa nyəma - ɩ tɔ . Ma sɔɔlʋ pɩɩwa sɩ má sɩ ma heeŋ səm .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: Ma wɛna heeŋ lɛləŋ wei ɩ fɛɩ kaləkʋ kʋnɛ kʋ taa tɔ , na ɩnɩ ɩnɩ , ɩsɩɩ ma polaa na ma kɔna - ɩ . Ɩ ká nyɩ ma nɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ kaləkʋ kʋlʋmʋɣʋ na tiikulu kʋlʋm .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: Ma lɔɔ ma weesuɣu kɛ ́ sɩ cele má taɣanɩ - kʋɣʋ hikuɣu . Ma sɔɔlʋ pɩɩwa sɩ má la mpʋ tɔɣɔ ma Caa luɣu wɛ - m .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ nɔɣɔlʋ lɛɛkəɣɩ - m - kʋɣʋ kʋlɛɛkʋ se . Ama na ma luɣu kɛ ma lɔɔna - kʋ . Ma wɛna pəsʋɣʋ sɩ má lɔ - kʋ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ ma wɛna pəsʋɣʋ sɩ má taɣanɩ kʋ hikuɣu . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ma Caa heela - m sɩ má la .

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ tɔm tənɛ tə tɔɔ Yuta nyə ́ ma tasa faɣaʋ kɛ pa taa pa tike .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: Pa taa paɣalɛ ná tɔŋaɣa sɩ : Ɩ hii alɔɣaa , pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ sʋʋ kpaŋʋɣʋ . Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ ɩ tɔm ?

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Lɛlaa sɩ pə taɣa ɩlɔɣɔhilu kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ ntɛ ́ tənɛ ɩnɩ . Ɩlɔɣɔʋ ká pəsɩ na ɩ ́ kuli yʋlʋmaa ɩsɛ na ?

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: Pa lakaɣa Yosalɛm kɛ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taɣanʋɣʋ acima na pə pamna watʋ waatɩ .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Na Yesu cɔɔkɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa kɛ ́ Salʋmɔŋ laŋaɣa tɛɛ .

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma tama - ɩ kotaɣa na pá pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ye tampana nyaɣalɛ Mesii , pəlee kɛ ́ n ka heeli - tʋ təfoo na tə hɛɛsɩ liɣiliɣi ɩnɛ ?

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma tɛma - mɛɣɛ heeluɣu ɩ ́ ta mʋ . Təma nna ma lakəna ma Caa toŋ tɔ , alɛ a hʋləɣɩ ma kɛ ́ wei tɔ .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Ama ɩɩ saŋ mʋɣʋ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ ́ tá kɛ ́ ma heeŋ tɔ se .
