text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Ma heeŋ nyəmá ma nɔɣɔ , na ma nyəma - ɩ , na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ - m .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Na má haa - ɩ weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ , ɩ kaa le , pə ́ cɔ ́ nɔɣɔlʋ kaa lɛɛkɩ - ɩ ma niŋ taa .

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: Ma Caa wei ɩ hamɩ - ɩ tɔ ɩ kəla pə təna , na nɔɣɔlʋ kaa pəsɩ ɩ ́ lɛɛkɩ - ɩ ma Caa niŋ taa .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Ma na ma Caa tə wɛ kʋlʋm .

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma tasa pɛɛ kɛ kpaɣaʋ sɩ pa yakɩ - ɩ .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ma hʋla - mɛɣɛ təma kʋpana paɣalɛ nna ma lakəna ma Caa toŋ tɔ , a taa nte tə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ caa - m pɛɛ yaɣaʋ ?

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yuta nyə ́ ma cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Aaɩ , ta paa fɛɩna nyá təma kʋpana . Ama ɩsɩɩ n tɩɩ kpaʋ Ɩsɔ tɔɔ tɔɣɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , nyaɣa yʋlʋ na ń kɛɛsəɣəna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ nyá tɩ .

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Pa ŋmaawa mə kʋsəsɩɩtʋ takəlasɩ taa maɣamaɣa sɩ Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔta napəlɩ sɩ pa kɛ ́ ɩsɔnaa .

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Tɔʋ , pa ta kisi mpa pa heela Ɩsɔ tɔm tɔɣɔ yaaʋ sɩ ɩsɔnaa pə ́ cɔ ́ tə nyəmá sɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm Nmaatʋ kaa laɣasɩ ,

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: na má wei Tacaa paasaa na ɩ ́ ləsɩ - m na ɩ ́ tisi atɛ cənɛ tɔ ma yɔɣɔtaa sɩ ma kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ , ɩlɛ pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ tɔŋ sɩ ma kpaa Ɩsɔ tɔɔ ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: Ye pə taɣa ma Caa təma kɛ ma lakɩ , ɩ ́ taa mʋ ma tɔm .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: Ama ye ma tɔŋa ma Caa təma kɛ lapʋ , ɩ ́ mʋ - yɛ , paa ɩ ́ kaa mʋ ma maɣamaɣa . Ɩlɛ ɩ ́ ká cɛkəna kpakpaa kɛ tam tɔɔ sɩ má na ma Caa tə wɛ təma taa .

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Tənaɣa pa tasa ŋmiluɣu sɩ pa kpaa - ɩ . Ama ɩ fita pa niŋ taa .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu kʋlaa na ɩ ́ məlɩ Yaatanɩ waalɩ , timpi Yohaanɩ ka caala Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔʋ tɔ , na ɩ ́ caɣa təna .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Na yəlaa paɣalɛ polo ɩ kiŋ na pá tɔŋ sɩ : Yohaanɩ ná táá lá piti təmlɛ natəlɩ . Ama nti ɩ tɩɩ yɔɣɔta apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ tɔɔ tɔ tə wɛ tampana .

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Na yəlaa paɣalɛ mʋ ɩ tɔm kɛ təna .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: Pə wɩɩkaɣa apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ , pa yaa - ɩ sɩ Lasaa , na ɩ ́ wɛ Petanii ɩcatɛ taa , timpi Malɩ na ɩ kɔɣɔ Maləta pa wɛɛ tɔ .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: Malɩ ɩnɩ ɩ ka pələna Tacaa nɔɔhɛɛ tɔɔ kɛ ́ tulaalʋ na ɩ ́ hɩɩsɩ - yɛ na ɩ nyɔɔsɩ . Ɩ neu Lasaa kɛ pə wɩɩkaɣa .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alaa mpɛ pa tilaa na pá heeli Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , nyá taapalʋ fɛɩna alaafəya .

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Waatʋ wei Yesu nɩɩ mpʋ tɔ , ɩ tɔma sɩ : Pə taɣa kʋtɔŋ ŋkʋɣʋ ɩ ká səna . Ama kʋ kiŋ kɛ yəlaa ká nana Ɩsɔ teeli , na kʋ kiŋ tɔtɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa má maa hikina teeli .

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Ama Yesu ka sɔɔla Maləta na ɩ neu Malɩ na Lasaa kɛ teu .

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Waatʋ wei Yesu nɩɩwa mpʋ sɩ Lasaa fɛɩna alaafəya tɔ , ɩ tasa caɣaʋ kɛ kʋyɛɛŋ naalɛɣɛ timpi ɩ ka wɛɛ tɔ .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ ɩ tɔma ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Tə ́ məlɩ Yuta .

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu ɩfalaa tɔma sɩ : Tacaa nɔɔnɔɔ kɛ ́ pɛlɛ pa kʋlaa sɩ pa yakɩ - ŋ pɛɛ , na ń caa tənaɣa məlʋɣʋ na ?

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ilim na pə tɛm , pə taɣa kalufunaa naanʋwa na naalɛ wɛnna ? Ye wei ɩ tɔŋ ilim , pɩɩ tuɣuliɣi - ɩ , ilim lakɩ na pə təna pə ́ naa antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ taa tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: Ye yʋlʋ ɩ ́ tɔŋ ahoo pɩɩ tuɣuli - ɩ , ɩ fɛɩna kɔkɔ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Yesu tɛma tɔm tənɛɣɛ yɔɣɔtaɣa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ heeli ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ta taapalʋ Lasaa toowa , ɩlɛ maa polo má feesi - ɩ .

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu ɩfalaa tɔma sɩ : Tacaa , ye Lasaa hikiɣi tom , alaafəya caa kɔntɛ kɛ ́ .

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Ama Lasaa səm tɔm kɛ Yesu ka heela ɩ ɩfalaa . Ɩlɛ mpɛ pa nyəmá sɩ tom maɣamaɣa kɛ ́ .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu heela - wɛ təfoo sɩ : Lasaa səpa .

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: Na pə lapa mpʋ na má fɛɩ tɔ , mə tɔɔ ma laŋlɛ hɛɛwa . Pɩɩ la na ɩ ́ tɛna - m na mə taa kɛ ́ teu . Tɔʋ , tə ́ polo tə ́ na - ɩ .

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Tənaɣa Tomaa wei pa yaakaɣa tompu tɔ ɩ tɔma Yesu ɩfalaa lɛlaa sɩ : Aŋha tə ́ təŋ Tacaa na tá na - ɩ tə ́ kpɛntɩ səm ɩlɛ .

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Yesu tala Petanii , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ maɣana sɩ pa pim Lasaa kɛ pəlaaʋ taa tɔ kʋyɛɛŋ liɣiti kɔlɔ .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Na ɩsɩɩ Petanii ɩcatɛ ta hatələna Yosalɛm tɔ , halɩ pə ta tɩɩ talʋ kilomɛɛtələnaa tooso kɛ teitei .

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma paɣalɛ polaa sɩ pa səŋna Maləta na Malɩ kɛ pa neu ləyaɣa caɣaʋ .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Waatʋ wei Maləta nɩɩwa sɩ Yesu kɔŋ tɔ , ɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ səŋɩ - ɩ , na Malɩ náá caɣa təyaɣa .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Tənaɣa Maləta tɔma Yesu sɩ : Haɩ ma Cɛ , ye n ka wɛ cənɛ , ma neu taa sɩ .

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: Paa na mpʋ ma nyəmá sɩ nɔɔnɔɔ ɩsəntɔ ń sələma mpiɣi Ɩsɔ , ɩ ká ha - ŋ - wɩ .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu heela Maləta sɩ : Nyá neu ka fe .

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Tənaɣa Maləta cɔwa sɩ : Ma nyəmá sɩ ɩ ká fe kantəkaɣa kʋyakʋ ŋku kʋ wule sətaa ká fe tɔ .

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu heela - ɩ sɩ : Ma maɣamaɣa ma tənna sətaa kʋsʋɣʋ na weesuɣu haʋ . Wei ɩ ́ tɛma - m na ɩ taa pʋntʋ ká wɛɛna weesuɣu , paa ɩ səpa .

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Na wei ɩ ́ wɛna weesuɣu na ɩ ́ tɛŋna - m na ɩ taa , ɩ kaa sɩ paa pəlee . Ɩlɛ nyá tisa mpʋ ?

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: Maləta cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Nn ma Cɛ , ma tisaa sɩ n kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ Mesii wei pɩɩ wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ká kɔɔ antulinya taa tɔ .

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Maləta tɛma yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɛɛ , na ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ yaa ɩ neu Malɩ na ɩ ́ wɛlətɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa wɛ cənɛ na ɩ ́ pɔɔsəɣɩ nyá tɔɔ .

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: Waatʋ wei Malɩ nɩɩ mpʋ tɔ ɩ kʋlaa təwaka na ɩ ́ polo Yesu kiŋ ,

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: na Yesu ta sʋʋta ɩcatɛ taa . Ama timpi Maləta ka səŋa - ɩ tɔ tənaɣa ɩ wɛɛ na ɩ ́ səŋa mpʋ .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: Yuta nyə ́ ma mpa paa kɔma na pá səŋna Malɩ kɛ ləyaɣa caɣaʋ tɔ , pa na ɩ kʋla mpʋ təwaka na ɩ ́ lɩɩ , ɩlɛna pá təŋɩ - ɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ pa hʋʋwa sɩ ɩ puki pəlaaʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ wula kɛ ́ .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Waatʋ wei Malɩ tala Yesu kiŋ na ɩ ́ na - ɩ tɔ , ɩ hota ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Haɩ ma Cɛ , ye n ka wɛ cənɛ ma neu taa sɩ .

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Yesu na - ɩ na ɩ ́ wiiki na pə kpɛŋna Yuta nyə ́ ma mpa ɩ ́ na - wɛ paa polaa tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ laŋlɛ wakəlɩ sɔsɔm na pə pɛkəlɩ - ɩ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Leɣe ɩ ́ pima - ɩ ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa kɔɔ na ń ná .

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu sʋʋ wula .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔma sɩ : Ɩ ́ nyənɩ ɩsəna ɩ ka sɔɔla - ɩ tɔ .

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Ɩlɛna pa taa lɛlaa náá tɔ sɩ : Ɩnɩ wei ɩ kula yʋlʋm ɩsɛ tɔ , pɩɩ lapa ɩsəna na ɩ ́ yele na yʋlʋ ɩnɛ ɩ ́ sɩ ?

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu laŋlɛ tasa wakəlʋɣʋ kɛ sɔsɔm , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo pəlaaʋ tɔɔ . Kɩɩ kɛ ́ kʋkpamʋɣʋ tɛɛ pʋ ́ ʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɛ ́ na pá təka pɩɩʋ .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Ɩ ́ kuli pɩɩʋ ŋkʋ . Tənaɣa sətʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kɔɣɔ Maləta tɔma sɩ : Tacaa , ɩsəntɔ ɩ tɛma sɔŋʋɣʋ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa pima - ɩ tɔ ɩ kʋyɛɛŋ liɣiti kɔlɔ .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ma taa heeli - ŋ sɩ ye n tɛma - m na nyá taa n ká ná Ɩsɔ teeli ?

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kula pɩɩʋ , ɩlɛna Yesu teki ɩ ɩsɛ na ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tacaa , n mʋ ma nɔɣɔ tɔ ma sɛɛ - ŋ .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Ye má , ma nyəmá sɩ tam kɛ ́ n mʋɣɩ ma nɔɣɔ . Ama yəlaa mpa pa cɔɔna - m ɩsəntɔ tɔ , pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma yɔɣɔta mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá tʋna sɩ nyá tilina - m .

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Yesu yɔɣɔta mpʋ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ holi sɔsɔm sɩ : Lasaa lɩɩ .

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Ɩlɛna sətʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ lɩɩ , na saalasɩ hɔka ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ na ɩ niŋ , na pʋʋɣʋ hɔka ɩ ɩsɛntɔɔ . Ɩlɛna Yesu tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ hɛtɩ - ɩ na ɩ ́ yele - ɩ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ .

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Yuta nyə ́ ma mpa paa kɔma Malɩ tɛ tɔ , pa ná mpi Yesu lapa mpʋ tɔ , ɩlɛna pa paɣalɛ mʋ ɩ tɔm .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: Ama pa taa lɛlaa ná lɩɩwa na pá polo pá maɣana Falisanaa , na pá heeli - wɛɣɛ mpi Yesu lapa tɔ .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Tənaɣa Falisanaa na kɔtəlaa sɔsaa pa kota pa kotuɣu sɔsɔɔʋ , na pá tɔ sɩ : Ɩsɩɩ apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ lakʋɣʋ piti təma paɣalɛ kɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , ɩsənaɣa tɩɩ la ɩ tɔm ?

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye tə yela - ɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ mpʋ , yəlaa təna ká mʋ ɩ tɔm , na Lom tɛtʋ sɔsaa ká kɔɔ na pá sʋʋ pə taa , na pá wakəlɩ tá Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ na pá sɔ ́ ta tɛtʋ .

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Kotuɣu sɔsɔɔʋ nyə ́ ma taa nɔɣɔlʋ ka kɛ ́ kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ kɛ pənaɣa ŋkɛ , pa yaa - ɩ sɩ Kayifi . Tənaɣa ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ tá cɛkəna kɛ ?

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: Ɩ ́ tá cɛkəna sɩ pə kəla teu sɩ yʋlʋ kʋlʋm ɩ ́ sɩ yəlaa təna səm na mpi tá tɛtʋ təna ká la yem tɔ ?

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Nti ɩ yɔɣɔta mpʋ tɔ tə ta lɩɩna ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ kiŋ . Ama ɩ kɛ ́ kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ kɛ pənaɣa ŋkɛ tɔɣɔ ɩ na nti tɩɩ kɔɔ cele tɔ , sɩ Yesu ká sɩ Yuta nyə ́ ma səm .

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Pə taɣa pəlɛ pə tɔɔ tike , sɩ ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ Ɩsɔ piya təna mpa pa yawa tɔ na pá pəsɩ kʋlʋm tɔtɔ .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Pə kpaɣaʋ kʋyaŋkʋ tɔ Yuta toŋtʋnaa tʋ ɩ pəlɛ ntɛ ́ sɩ pa kʋɣɩ - ɩ .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Yesu tá tasa lɩɩʋ kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma samaa taa təyɛkɛɛ . Ama ɩ tuusina wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ kiŋ kɛ ɩcatɛ nte pa yaa sɩ Ɩfəlayim tɔ tə taa , na ɩ ́ na ɩ ɩfalaa pá caɣa təna .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Yuta nyə ́ ma acima wena pa yaa sɩ Tɛɛʋ acima tɔ a wʋsaa , na yəlaa lɩɩkaɣana acalɛɛ acalɛɛ sɩ pa puki Yosalɛm kɛ pa nyɔɔŋ tɔɔ asilima kɛɛlʋɣʋ kɔtasɩ lapʋ na pə ́ cɔ ́ acima anɩ a tala .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Na pá pɛɛkəɣɩ Yesu na pá pɔɔsəɣɩ təmaɣa Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa sɩ : Ɩlɛ ɩ ́ hʋʋ suwe ? Ɩ ká kɔɔ acima yaa ɩ kaa kɔɔ ?

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Na kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Falisanaa paa tʋwa nɔɣɔ sɩ ye wei ɩ nyəmá timpi ɩ wɛɛ tɔ ɩ ́ kulisi ɩ tɔɔ na pá polo pá kpa - ɩ .

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: Pə kaasa kʋyɛɛŋ naatoso sɩ Tɛɛʋ acima ɩ ́ tala , ɩlɛna Yesu məlɩ Petanii ɩcatɛ taa timpi Lasaa wei ɩ ka feesa sətaa taa tɔ ɩ wɛɛ tɔ .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Na tənaɣa pa lapa - ɩ ɩkɔntʋ , na Maləta náá pukina kʋtɔɣɔʋ . Lasaa wɛ ɩ ́ na mpa pa caɣa tətɔɣɔlɛ tɔ pa taa .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Malɩ kpaɣa liɣitee tulaalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ na akpaləpa . Ɩ wɛ ɩsɩɩ liitili titite . Tʋɣʋ ŋku pa yaa sɩ naatɩ tɔɣɔ pa lapa tulaalʋ ɩnɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Malɩ pəla - ɩ Yesu nɔɔhɛɛ tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ - yɛɣɛ hɩɩsʋɣʋ na ɩ nyɔɔsɩ . Ɩlɛna tulaalʋ sɔɔsʋŋ nyaləna təyaɣa təkpɛmm .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Yesu ɩfalaa taa lɛlʋ , Ɩsəkaleeu pəyalʋ Yutaasɩ wei ɩ ká tɛ na ɩ ́ lapɩ - ɩ kɔlɔmɔtɔ tɔ , ɩ tɔma sɩ :

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa taa pɛɛtɩ tulaalʋ ɩnɩ ɩsɩɩ liɣitee nyəɣətʋ ŋmʋnʋɣʋ na nɩɩnʋwa ( 300 ) na pá ha kʋnyɔntʋnaa ?

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ ɩ wiikaɣa kʋnyɔntʋnaa tɔɣɔ ɩ yɔɣɔta mpʋ , ama ɩ kɛ ́ ŋmɩɩlʋ tɔɣɔ . Halɩ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔkaɣana huluɣu , na ɩ ŋmɩɩlaɣa mpi pa tʋɣʋ kʋ taa tɔ .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Ama Yesu tɔma sɩ : Ɩ ́ yele - ɩ təkpi yoo , ma kʋyakʋ kʋpimuɣu tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ sɩɩ tulaalʋ ɩnɛ .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Mə na kʋnyɔntʋnaa ɩ ́ wɛ tam kɛ ́ . Ama má na - mɛ tə fɛɩ tam .

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma samaa tuutuuma nɩɩwa sɩ Yesu wɛ Petanii ɩcatɛ taa , ɩlɛna pá kɔɔ . Pə taɣa Yesu tike tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa kɔma . Ama na Lasaa wei ɩ ka feesa sətaa taa tɔ ɩ naʋ tɔɔ tɔtɔ .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Tənaɣa kɔtəlaa sɔsaa tʋ Lasaa pəlɛ sɩ pa kʋɣɩ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ tɔtɔ .

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma paɣalɛ lɩɩkaɣa pa hɛkʋ na pá təŋəɣɩ Yesu .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: Pə fema ɩlɛna yəlaa samaa paɣalɛ mpa pa kɔma Tɛɛʋ acima tɔ pá nɩɩ sɩ Yesu tɔŋna Yosalɛm kɛ kɔntɛ .

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá kpaɣa pacʋntʋ na pá səŋəɣɩ - ɩ , na pá yɔɣɔtəɣəna nɔɔsɩ sɔsɔɔnsɩ sɩ : Paa wei ɩ ́ tʋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teeli . Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ wɛɛ wei ɩ kɔŋna Tacaa toŋ tɔ ɩ waalɩ . Ɩnəɣəlɛ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ wulaʋ sɔsɔ .

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu hika kpaŋaɣa na ɩ ́ caɣa ka tɔɔ , ɩlɛna pə ́ lɩɩ teitei ɩsɩɩ paa ŋmaaʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ sɩ :

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: Siyɔŋ ɩcatɛ nyə ́ ma mɛ , ɩ ́ taa nəɣəsɩ . Ɩ ́ nyənɩ , mə wulaʋ kɔŋna ntɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ caɣa kpaŋaɣa pile .

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Yesu ɩfalaa ná tá cɛkəna - tɩ na pə ́ cɔ ́ . Ama pə kɔma na Yesu tɛ ɩ teeli taa kɛ ́ sʋʋʋ tɔɣɔ pa tɔɔsaa sɩ paa kɛɛsa - təɣɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa . Halɩ pa tɩɩ tɛma - ɩ pə tənaɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ lapʋ .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Pa təna mpa paa wɛ waatʋ wei Yesu yaa Lasaa kɛ pəlaaʋ taa na ɩ ́ feesi - ɩ tɔ , pa yɔɣɔtaɣa pə təna mpi pa nawa tɔ .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ samaa səŋa - ɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pa nɩɩwaɣa sɩ ɩ lapa piti təmlɛ tənɛ .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Falisanaa tɔma sɩ : Ɩ ́ nawaa , tə wɩɩ ɩ tɔm ntɛ ́ . Samaa təna pəsəna ɩ tɔɔ kɛlɛ fa .

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Kəlɛɛkɩ nyə ́ ma napəlɩ paa wɛ mpa pa kɔma acima tɔɔ sɩ pa sɛɛ Ɩsɔ tɔ pa taa .

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kpətəna Filipʋ wei ɩ kɛ ́ Kalilee Pɛtɛsaita ɩcatɛ tʋ tɔ , na pá tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , tə caa tə ́ ná Yesu .

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Tənaɣa Filipʋ polaa na ɩ ́ heeli Antəlɩɩ , na pa naalɛ pá polo pá heeli - təɣɩ Yesu .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Pə tala Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma teeli taa sʋʋ ntɛ ́ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ , ye tɔɣɔnaɣa pile nte pa tuuwa tɔ tə ta tasa , kʋfatɛ ɩɩ laɣasəɣɩ . Ama ye tə tasaa , pə lʋləɣɩ teu kɛ ́ təyʋʋ .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Ye wei ɩ sɔɔla ɩ weesuɣu , pʋntʋ ká le . Ama wei ɩ ́ lapa ɩ weesuɣu kɛ awusa kɛ atɛ cənɛ , kɩɩ wɛɛ tamm kʋ kaa tɛ , paa pəlee .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Ye wei ɩ caakɩ ma təmlɛ lapʋ , ɩsɩɩ pʋntʋ təŋa - m , na timpi maa wɛɛ tɔ ɩ ka wɛɛ təna tɔtɔ . Ye wei ɩ lakɩ ma təmlɛ ma Caa ká samɩ - ɩ .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Pənɛntɛ pə pɛkəla - m ma hʋwɛɛ taa kɛ ́ , pə tɩɩ fɛɩ . Ɩlɛ ntiɣi maa yɔɣɔtɩ ? Maa yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ : Ma Caa ya - m mpi pə kɔŋ ɩsəntɔ tɔ pə niŋ taa ? Ama kʋnyɔŋ kʋnɛ kʋ maɣamaɣa kʋ tɔɣɔʋ kɛ ma tɩɩ kɔma .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: Ma Caa , ma caa kɛ ́ sɩ , ń yele na nyá hətɛ yaa . Tənaɣa pə yɔɣɔtəna ɩsɔtaa sɩ : Ma yelaa na ma hətɛ yaa , na maa yele na tə tasa yaaʋ .

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Samaa wei ɩ ka wɛ təna na ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ tɔ , ɩ yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Tɛʋ hola kɛ ́ . Lɛlaa sɩ ɩsɔtaa tillu yɔɣɔtənana - ɩ .

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Pə taɣa ma tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə yɔɣɔtaa yoo , ama mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Pənɛntɛɣɛlɛ paa kʋ antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ tɔm . Pənɛntɛɣɛ paa tɔɣɔnɩ wei ɩ tɔkɩ kawulaɣa kɛ antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ taa tɔ .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Na waatʋ wei paa tɛ maɣa kpaasʋɣʋ na ɩsɔ tɔ , maa hɔ yəlaa tənaɣa ma kiŋ . (

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Ɩsəna pɩɩ la na Yesu sɩ tɔɣɔ ɩ kɛɛsa mpʋ . )

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ samaa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tuu ta kʋsəsɩɩtʋ takəlasɩ taa tə nɩɩwa sɩ : Mesii ká caɣa tam . Ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣa nyá tɔŋ sɩ pə wɛɛ sɩ paa kpaasɩ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa ? Aweɣelɛ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa ŋkɛ ɩlɛ ?

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Kɔkɔ ŋka ka naa - mɛ tɔ pə kaasa - kɛɣɛ wɛɛ naalɛ tike kɛ mə hɛkʋ kɛ ́ . Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ kaasɩ mə təɣɩ waatʋ wei ka tɔŋna - mɛɣɛ naʋ tɔ . Pə ́ taa kɔɔ na səkpɛtʋɣʋ tuti - mɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , wei ɩ tɔŋna səkpɛtʋɣʋ , ɩ ta nyɩ timpi ɩ puki tɔ .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ kɔkɔ kʋnanaɣa ŋkɛɣɛ waatʋ wei ka wɛ mə cɔlɔ tɔ , na ɩ ́ ká pəsɩ kɔkɔ ŋkɛ ka nyə ́ ma . Yesu tɛma - təɣɩ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo pooluŋ na ɩ ́ ŋmɛlɩ - wɛ .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Paa na ɩ ka lapa piti təma kɛ sɔsɔm kɛ pa ɩsɛntaa tɔ , pa ta mʋ - ɩ .

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: Pə lapa mpʋ sɩ pə la teitei na tɔm nti Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Ɩsayii ka yɔɣɔtaa tɔ sɩ : Haɩ , Tacaa , pa taa kʋlʋm tɩɩ mʋ tá tɔm ntɔ ? Pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ tɩɩ hika Ɩsɔ toŋ ntɔ ?

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Pa ta tɩɩ pəsʋ na pá mʋ ɩ tɔm tɔtɔ . Halɩ Ɩsayii tasa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ :

text: He hath blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart ; that they should not see with their eyes , nor understand with their heart , and be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Ɩsɔ yʋlʋsa pa ɩsɛ , na ɩ ́ kʋ pa ləmaɣasɛɛ , sɩ pa ɩsɛ ɩ ́ taa ná , na pá taa cɛkəna pə yaasi . Pa taa kɔɔ na pá pəsəna ma tɔɔ sɩ má la na pə ́ waa - wɛ .

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsayii yɔɣɔta mpʋ , ɩ nawa Yesu teeli , na ɩ kɛɛsaɣaa Yesu ɩnɩ ɩ tɔm tɔɣɔ .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Waatʋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa Yuta nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma maɣamaɣa taa paɣalɛ mʋ ɩ tɔm . Ama Falisanaa tɔɔ pa ta hɛtɩ pa tɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pa nəɣəsaɣa sɩ pə ́ taa kɔɔ pá tɔɣɔnɩ - wɛɣɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa taa .

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: Paa sɔɔla yəlaa ɩsantɛ na pə ́ kəlɩ Ɩsɔ nyəntɛ tɔɣɔ .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Yesu yɔɣɔtəna nɔɣɔ sɔsaɣa sɩ : Wei ɩ ́ mʋ ma tɔm pə taɣa ma tike ma nyəntʋ kɛ pʋntʋ mʋwa . Ama na wei ɩ tila - m tɔ ɩ nyəntʋ tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Na wei ɩ ́ na - m , ɩ na wei ɩ tila - m tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Ma kɔma antulinya taa kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ kɔkɔ ŋka ka naa yəlaa tɔ , sɩ ye wei ɩ təŋa - m , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ taa saalɩ səkpɛtʋɣʋ tɛɛ .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: Ye wei ɩ nɩɩkɩ ma tɔm na ɩɩ tɔkəɣɩ - tɩ , pə taɣa maa kʋna pʋntʋ tɔm . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma ta kɔɔ yəlaa tɔm kʋɣʋ tɔɔ , ama pa yapʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Wei ɩ ́ kisa - m na ɩ ́ lɔɔ ma kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ pʋntʋ tɔm kʋlʋ wɛ ɩ tɛɛ tənaɣa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , tɔm nti ma kpaalaa tɔ , ntɩ ɩnɩ tɩɩ kʋna pʋntʋ tɔm kɛ kʋyakʋ kantəkaɣa nyəŋkʋ wule .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Pə taɣa ma maɣamaɣa ma kaŋkantɛ nyəntʋ kɛ ma yɔɣɔtaa . Ama Tacaa wei ɩ tila - m tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ kɛɛsəna - m nti maa yɔɣɔtɩ na má hʋ ́ lɩ ́ yəlaa tɔ .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Ma nyəmá sɩ ɩ kʋtʋtʋtʋ yekina na tə lataa hikiɣi weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ . Ye mpʋ tə təna nti ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔ tə wɛ teitei kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ nti Tacaa heela - m sɩ má yɔɣɔtɩ tɔ .

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ pə tala kʋyakʋ ŋku kʋ yakaɣa sɩ pə fe Tɛɛʋ acima tɔɣɔlɛ . Yesu nyəmá sɩ ɩ waatʋ talaa sɩ ɩ ́ kʋlɩ atɛ cənɛ na ɩ ́ kpa Tacaa kiŋ . Ɩ ka sɔɔla ɩ nyə ́ ma mpa pa wɛ atɛ cənɛ tɔɣɔ tam kɛ ́ , na mpʋ ɩnɩ tɔtɔɣɔ ɩ tɩɩ sɔɔla - wɛ haləna tənaɣa .

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa caɣa tɔɣɔʋ . Ɩlɔɣɔʋ ka tɛma hɔkʋɣʋ sɩ Simɔŋ Ɩsəkaleeu pəyalʋ Yutaasɩ ká lana - ɩ kɔlɔmɔtɔ .

text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that he was come from God , and went to God ;
text2: Yesu nyəmá sɩ Tacaa tʋ pə tənaɣa ɩ niŋ taa , na ɩ nyəmá tɔtɔ sɩ , ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ lɩɩna Ɩsɔ kiŋ , na Ɩsɔ kiŋ tənaɣa ɩ ká məlɩ .

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu kʋla tətɔɣɔlɛ na ɩ ́ hɔɣɔsɩ ɩ wontu pə tɔɔ nyəntʋ , na ɩ ́ kɛlɩ papaʋ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔlɩ .

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ cosi lʋm kɛ nyanaɣa taa , na ɩ ́ sʋʋ ɩ ɩfalaa nɔɔhɛɛ kɛ kɔʋ , na ɩ ́ hɩɩsɩ - yɛ na papaʋ wei ɩ ka tɔɣɔlaa tɔ .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: Ɩ kɔma ɩ tala Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ kiŋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Nyaɣa Tacaa na ń kɔɔ ma nɔɔhɛɛ na ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : N ta cɛkənta nti ma lakɩ tɔ . Ama n ká tɛ na ń cɛkəna - tɩ .

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Aaɩ , pə fɛɩ sɩ ń kɔ ma nɔɔhɛɛ kɛ paa pəcɔ . Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ye ma ta kɔ - ŋ , pə faɣa ma na - ŋ kɛlɛ mpʋ .

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: Tənaɣa Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ tɔma sɩ : Tacaa , ye mpʋ pə taa wɛɛ ma nɔɔhɛɛ tike . Ama na ma niŋ na ma nyʋɣʋ tɔtɔ .

text: Jesus saith to him , He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet , but is clean every whit : and ye are clean , but not all .
text2: Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Wei ɩ tɛma sɔʋ tɔ ɩɩ lɛləɣɩ sɔʋ . Ama ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ kɛ ɩ kɔɔ kʋkɔʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ tɔnʋɣʋ təna wɛ tənaŋŋ tɔ se . Mɛ mə wɛ tənaŋŋ tɔtɔ , ɩlɛ pə taɣa mə təna . (

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: Yesu tɛma nyəm kɛ wei ɩ ká lapɩ - ɩ kɔlɔmɔtɔ tɔ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ cuɣusaa sɩ : Pə taɣa mə təna . )

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: Yesu tɛma pa nɔɔhɛɛ kɔʋ na ɩ ́ suu ɩ wontu , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ taɣanɩ tətɔɣɔlɛ kɛ məlʋɣʋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ cɛkəna nti ma lapa - mɛ tɔ ?

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ ́ yaakʋɣʋ - m mə Caa mə Caa na mə Sɔsɔ tɔ , ɩ ́ wɛna tampana . Ma kɛ ́ mə Caa na mə Sɔsɔ kɛ ́ .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: Tɔʋ , ye maɣa mə Sɔsɔ na mə Caa na má kɔ mə nɔɔhɛɛ , ɩlɛ mɛ tɔtɔ ɩ ́ kɔɔkɩ mə təmaɣa mpʋ .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Ma lapaɣa sɩ ɩ ́ ná na ɩ ́ lá ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ teitei ɩsɩɩ ma lapʋ - mɛ tɔ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ . Təmlɛ tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ fɛɩ wei ɩ kəla ɩ caa tɔ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ tillu nɔɣɔlʋ ná fɛɩ wei ɩ kəla ɩ sɔsɔ tɔ .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: Tɔʋ , pənɛntɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ nyəm tənɛ ɩnɩ tɔ , ye ɩ ́ tɔka - tɩ , ɩ ́ kaa laŋ leleŋ nɩɩʋ .

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: Ɩlɛ pə taɣa mə tənaɣa ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ yoo , ma nyəmá mpa ma ləsaa tɔ . Ama pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ pɩɩ la teitei na nti paa ŋmaaʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ sɩ : Wei ɩ tɔkɩ ma tɔɣɔnaɣa tɔ ɩ pəsa ma kolontu .

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: Ma laalaa na má heeli - mɛɣɛ - təɣɩ nɔɔnɔɔ na tə ́ ta lata , sɩ ye pə tɩɩ kɔma na pə ́ la ɩlɛ ɩ ́ ká tisi sɩ ma wɛɛ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ . Ye wei ɩ mʋ wei ma tilaa tɔ , maɣa pʋntʋ mʋwa . Na wei ɩ ́ mʋ má , pʋntʋ mʋ wei ɩ tila má tɔɣɔ .

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Yesu tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna pə ́ pɛkəlɩ - ɩ ɩ hʋwɛɛ taa kɛ ́ sɔsɔm . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ . Mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ ká lana - m kɔlɔmɔtɔ .

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ɩfalaa caa təma ɩsɛntaa . Mpi tɔ , pa ta cɛkəna wei ɩ tɔm ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔɣɔ paa pəcɔ .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: Yesu ɩfalaa taa lɛlʋ wei ɩ ka sɔɔlaa tɔ , ɩ caɣa ɩ kɔŋkɔŋ taa .

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ cəpəla - ɩ ɩsɛ sɩ ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ Yesu sɩ awe tɔm kɛ ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ .

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Tənaɣa ɩfalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ wɛɛla Yesu laŋlɛ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , aweɣe ye ?

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ ɩfalʋ ɩnɩ sɩ : Maa lii potopoto hɔɣɔlaɣa ye ma cɛla - kɛɣɛ wei , ɩnəɣəlɛ . Ɩ tɛma - kɛɣɛ liiu , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ cɛla - kɛɣɛ Simɔŋ Ɩsəkaleeu pəyalʋ Yutaasɩ .

text: And after the sop Satan entered into him . Then said Jesus unto him , That thou doest , do quickly .
text2: Tuu ɩsɩɩ Yutaasɩ mʋɣʋ potopoto hɔɣɔlaɣa ŋkɛ tɔ , Satanɩ tɔka - ɩ kɛlɛ kpakpaa ɩnɩ . Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Nti n caa lapʋ tɔ , la - təɣɩ lɔŋ .

text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
text2: ( Ama pa təna mpa pa caɣa tətɔɣɔlɛ tɔ , pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ta nyɩ mpi pə tɔɔ ɩ yɔɣɔta Yutaasɩ kɛ mpʋ tɔ .

text: For some of them thought , because Judas had the bag , that Jesus had said unto him , Buy those things that we have need of against the feast ; or , that he should give something to the poor .
text2: Halɩ pa taa lɛlaa hʋʋkaɣa sɩ , ntanyɩ , Yutaasɩ tɔkaɣa huluɣu tɔ , Yesu caa kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ ya pʋlʋ na pá tɔɣɔna acima tɔɣɔ ɩ yɔɣɔta - ɩ mpʋ . Yaa ɩ heela - ɩ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ ha pʋlʋɣʋ kʋnyɔntʋnaa . )

text: He then having received the sop went immediately out : and it was night .
text2: Yutaasɩ mʋ potopoto hɔɣɔlaɣa ŋkɛ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lɩɩ kpakpaa . Waatʋ ɩnɩ tɔ ahoo tɛma yuɣu .

text: Therefore , when he was gone out , Jesus said , Now is the Son of man glorified , and God is glorified in him .
text2: Waatʋ wei Yutaasɩ lɩɩwa , ɩlɛna Yesu yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ : Pənɛntɛɣɛlɛ Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa má ma teeli ká ná te . Ɩsɔ teeli ká tɩɩ na teu kɛ ma kiŋ .

text: If God be glorified in him , God shall also glorify him in himself , and shall straightway glorify him .
text2: Ye pə kɔma na Ɩsɔ teeli na ma kiŋ ɩlɛ , Ɩsɔ ká yele na ma teeli na ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ kiŋ , na ɩ ká la nɔɔnɔɔ .

text: Little children , yet a little while I am with you . Ye shall seek me : and as I said unto the Jews , Whither I go , ye cannot come ; so now I say to you .
text2: Ma piya mɛ , wɛɛ naalɛ tike kɛ pə kaasa - m mə hɛkʋ . Pə waalɩ ɩ ́ ká pɛɛkɩ - m . Ama ɩ ́ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ polo timpi ma puki tɔ . Halɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ maa tɩɩ heela Yuta nyə ́ ma , na ntɩ ɩnəɣɩ ma lɛləɣɩ - mɛɣɛ heeluɣu tɔtɔ .

text: A new commandment I give unto you , That ye love one another ; as I have loved you , that ye also love one another .
text2: Ma tʋɣɩ - mɛɣɛ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kʋfatʋ natəlɩ tɔtɔ , sɩ ɩ ́ sɔɔləɣɩ mə təma . Ɩsɩɩ ma sɔɔlʋɣʋ - mɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ mɛ tɔtɔ mɩɩ sɔɔlɩ mə təmaɣa mpʋ .

text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples , if ye have love one to another .
text2: Ye ɩ ́ tɔka mə təma sɔɔlʋɣʋ ɩlɛ , ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yəlaa təna ká nyɩ sɩ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ ma ɩfalaa .

text: Simon Peter said unto him , Lord , whither goest thou ? Jesus answered him , Whither I go , thou canst not follow me now ; but thou shalt follow me afterwards .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ cɔwa Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , leɣe n puki ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔwa sɩ : N kaa pəsɩ na ń təŋɩ - m nɔɔnɔɔ kɛ ́ timpi ma puki tɔ . Ama n ká tɛ na ń təŋɩ - m .

text: Peter said unto him , Lord , why cannot I follow thee now ? I will lay down my life for thy sake .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ cɔ Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma kaa pəsɩ má təŋɩ - ŋ nɔɔnɔɔ ? Halɩ ma sɔɔlʋ nyá pɩɩwaɣa sɩ paa nyá səm má sɩ yaa .

text: Jesus answered him , Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake ? Verily , verily , I say unto thee , The cock shall not crow , till thou hast denied me thrice .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔwa sɩ : Nyá sɔɔlʋ pɩɩwa sɩ ń sɩ ma səm na ? Ama tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - ŋ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ . Mpi pɩɩ takɩ kampaaʋ koou kɛ saŋa tɔ , n tɛma - m tɔm tooso kɛ kpɛɛsʋɣʋ sɩ n ta nyɩ - m kɛ ́ n ta nyɩ - m .

text: Let not your heart be troubled : ye believe in God , believe also in me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Pə taa pɛkəlɩ - mɛɣɛ mpʋ . Ɩ ́ tɛna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ mə taa , na ɩ ́ tɛna má tɔtɔ .

text: In my Father ' s house are many mansions : if it were not so , I would have told you . I go to prepare a place for you .
text2: Ma Caa təyaɣa taa lona tɔɔwaɣa . Ɩlɛ ma puki na má taɣanɩ - mɛɣɛ mə nyəna . Ama ye pə taa wɛɛ mpʋ , ma taa nɔkɩ - mɛɣɛ pə tɔm heeluɣu .

text: And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will come again , and receive you unto myself ; that where I am , there ye may be also .
text2: Ye ma polaa na má tɛma mə lona anəɣɩ taɣanʋɣʋ , ɩlɛ maa məlɩ na má kpaɣa - mɛ , na má sɩɩ - mɛɣɛ ma kiŋ na ɩ ́ wɛɛ timpi ma wɛɛ tɔ .

text: And whither I go ye know , and the way ye know .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyəma timpi ma puki tɔ pə mpaaʋ .

text: Thomas saith unto him , Lord , we know not whither thou goest ; and how can we know the way ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Tomaa cɔ Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , tə ta nyɩ nyá təpote , ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣa tə lapa na tə ́ nyɩ mpaaʋ ?

text: Jesus saith unto him , I am the way , the truth , and the life : no man cometh unto the Father , but by me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Maɣalɛ mpaaʋ , ma kiŋ kɛ tampana wɛɛ , má haana weesuɣu . Nɔɣɔlʋ kaa tala Tacaa na ɩ ́ tá təŋna ma kiŋ .

text: If ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also : and from henceforth ye know him , and have seen him .
text2: Ye ɩ nyəma - m ɩ ́ nyəmá ma Caa tɔtɔɣɔ . Na pə kpaɣaʋ pənɛntɛ tɔ ɩ ́ nyəma - ɩ na ɩ ́ na - ɩ .

text: Philip saith unto him , Lord , shew us the Father , and it sufficeth us .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Filipʋ cɔ Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , ye n hʋla - tʋɣʋ Tacaa Ɩsɔ pə maɣana - tʋ .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Have I been so long time with you , and yet hast thou not known me , Philip ? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father ; and how sayest thou then , Shew us the Father ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ Filipʋ sɩ : Filipʋ tuu má na - mɛ tə wɛʋ tɔ n ta nyənta - m kɛlɛ ? Wei ɩ ́ na - m ɩ na Caa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ . Ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣa nyá tɔŋ sɩ má hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ Tacaa Ɩsɔ ?

text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father , and the Father in me ? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself : but the Father that dwelleth in me , he doeth the works .
text2: N ta nyɩ taa sɩ má na Tacaa Ɩsɔ tə wɛ kʋlʋm ? Tɔm nti ma heeliɣi - mɛ tɔ tə ta kɛ ma maɣamaɣa ma kʋluputu . Tacaa Ɩsɔ wei ɩ wɛ ma kiŋ kɛ tam tɔ , ɩnɩ ɩ lakəna ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ təma .

text: Believe me that I am in the Father , and the Father in me : or else believe me for the very works ' sake .
text2: Nti ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ sɩ má na Tacaa Ɩsɔ tə wɛ kʋlʋm tɔ , ɩ ́ nɩɩ ntɩ . Paa pə kəlɩ we , təma anɛ a maɣamaɣa a tɔɔ ɩ ́ mʋ - tɩ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me , the works that I do shall he do also ; and greater works than these shall he do ; because I go unto my Father .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ . Ye wei ɩ ́ mʋ ma tɔm , pʋntʋ ká la tɔtɔɣɔ təma nna ma lakɩ tɔ , halɩ ɩ ká la a kʋkəlɛɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma puki Tacaa kiŋ tɔ se .

text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name , that will I do , that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
text2: Na pə təna mpi ɩ ́ ká sələmɩ ma tɔɔ tɔ , maa la - wɩ na Tacaa teeli na pəyaɣa ma ma kiŋ .

text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name , I will do it .
text2: Ye ɩ ́ yaana ma hətɛ na ɩ ́ sələmɩ mpi , maa la - wɩ .

text: If ye love me , keep my commandments .
text2: Ye ɩ ́ sɔɔləɣɩ - m ɩ ́ ká tɔkəɣɩ ma kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kɛ ́ .

text: And I will pray the Father , and he shall give you another Comforter , that he may abide with you for ever ;
text2: Na má maa sələmɩ Tacaa na ɩ ́ ha - mɛɣɛ lɛlʋ wei ɩ ká səŋna - mɛ tɔ . Lɛlʋ ɩnəɣəlɛ Feesuɣu ŋku kʋ kɛ tampana tʋ tɔ , na kʋ caɣa mə kiŋ kɛ tam .

text: Even the Spirit of truth ; whom the world cannot receive , because it seeth him not , neither knoweth him : but ye know him ; for he dwelleth with you , and shall be in you .
text2: Antulinya kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ hiki tampana tʋ ɩnɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩɩ naakɩ - ɩ pəyele ɩ taa nyəmɩ - ɩ tɔ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ . Ama mɛ mə nyəma - ɩ , mpi tɔ , ɩ wɛ mə kiŋ kɛ tam , na ɩ caɣa mə taa maɣamaɣa .

text: I will not leave you comfortless : I will come to you .
text2: Maa yeki - mɛɣɛ suluwaa se . Ama maa məlɩ mə kiŋ .

text: Yet a little while , and the world seeth me no more ; but ye see me : because I live , ye shall live also .
text2: Pə kaasa pəcɔ antulinya kaa tasa - m naʋ , ama mɛ mɩɩ na - m . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma wɛna weesuɣu na mɛ mɩɩ wɛɛna weesiŋ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father , and ye in me , and I in you .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnəɣəlɛ ɩ ́ ká cɛkəna sɩ ma na Tacaa tə wɛ kʋlʋm , na ɩ ́ ká cɛkəna tɔtɔ sɩ ma na - mɛ tə kpɛntaa .

text: He that hath my commandments , and keepeth them , he it is that loveth me : and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father , and I will love him , and will manifest myself to him .
text2: Ye wei ɩ tisa ma kʋsəsɩɩtʋ na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ - tɩ , pʋntʋ sɔɔləna - m . Na wei ɩ sɔɔla - m mpʋ tɔ ma Caa ká sɔɔlɩ - ɩ , na maa sɔɔlɩ - ɩ tɔtɔ . Maa yele na pʋntʋ nyɩ - m .

text: Judas saith unto him , not Iscariot , Lord , how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us , and not unto the world ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yuti pɔɔsa Yesu sɩ : ( Yuti wei ɩ pɔɔsa - ɩ mpʋ tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ na ɩ mpaa na Ɩsəkaleeu pəyalʋ Yutaasɩ . ) Ɩ pɔɔsa - ɩ kɛ ́ sɩ : Tacaa , ɩsənaɣa pɩɩ la na ń yele na táá nyɩ - ŋ na antulinya ná kaa nyɩ - ŋ ?

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , If a man love me , he will keep my words : and my Father will love him , and we will come unto him , and make our abode with him .
text2: Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Wei ɩ ́ sɔɔla - m ɩ tɔkəɣɩ ma tɔm kɛ ́ . Na ma Caa ká sɔɔlɩ - ɩ tɔtɔ , na má na ma Caa tɩɩ kɔɔ pʋntʋ kiŋ na tə ́ caɣa tənaɣa tam .

text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings : and the word which ye hear is not mine , but the Father ' s which sent me .
text2: Wei ɩɩ sɔɔləɣɩ - m ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩɩ tɔkəɣɩ ma kʋheelitu . Tɔm nti ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔ , tə ta kɛ ma maɣamaɣa ma kʋluputu . Ama ma Caa wei ɩ tila - m tɔ ɩ nyəntʋ kɛ ́ .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , being yet present with you .
text2: Tɔʋ , ma heela - mɛɣɛ - təɣəlɛ na tə ta yata təma .

text: But the Comforter , which is the Holy Ghost , whom the Father will send in my name , he shall teach you all things , and bring all things to your remembrance , whatsoever I have said unto you .
text2: Wei ɩnɩ ɩ ká səna - mɛɣɛ mpʋ tɔ , ɩnəɣəlɛ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ wei Tacaa ka kɔna - mɛ na ma hətɛ tɔ . Ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ká hʋləna - mɛɣɛ tə təna , na ɩ ká tɔɔsɩ - mɛɣɛ tə təna nti maa heela - mɛ tɔ .

text: Peace I leave with you , my peace I give unto you : not as the world giveth , give I unto you . Let not your heart be troubled , neither let it be afraid .
text2: Ma yekina - mɛɣɛ hɛɛsʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ . Ɩlɛ hɛɛsʋɣʋ ŋku kʋ wɛ ma maɣamaɣa ma kiŋ tɔɣɔ maa tɛləsɩ - mɛɣɛ mpʋ . Ɩlɛ pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ antulinya haakʋɣʋ ɩ nyəŋkʋ tɔɣɔ maa tɛləsɩ - mɛ . Pə tɔɔ tɔ pə ́ taa pɛkəlɩ - mɛ , pəyele ɩ ́ taa nyá .

text: Ye have heard how I said unto you , I go away , and come again unto you . If ye loved me , ye would rejoice , because I said , I go unto the Father : for my Father is greater than I .
text2: Tɔʋ , ɩ ́ tɛma nɩɩʋ kɛ nti maa heela - mɛ tɔ sɩ ma tɛɛkɩ , ɩlɛ maa taɣanɩ mə kiŋ kɛ məlʋɣʋ tɔ . Ye ɩ ́ sɔɔla - m mə laŋa ká hʋlʋməna Tacaa kiŋ pote ńtɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Tacaa kəla - m tɔ se .

text: And now I have told you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye might believe .
text2: Ma laalaa na má heeli - mɛɣɛ pə tənaɣa pənɛntɛ na pə ́ ta lata . Sɩ ye waatʋ wei pə kɔma na pə la ɩ ́ mʋ - tɩ .

text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you : for the prince of this world cometh , and hath nothing in me .
text2: Nɔɔnɔɔ maa pəsəɣɩ na má tasa - mɛɣɛ yɔɣɔtənaʋ kɛ sɔsɔm . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , wei ɩ tɔkɩ kawulaɣa kɛ antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ tɔɔ tɔ , ɩ kɔŋna ntɛ ́ . Ɩlɛ ɩ kaa tɩɩ kpaɣa pʋlʋɣʋ ma tɔɔ .

text: But that the world may know that I love the Father ; and as the Father gave me commandment , even so I do . Arise , let us go hence .
text2: Ama pə wɛɛ sɩ antulinya ɩ ́ nyɩ sɩ ma sɔɔla Tacaa , na pə maɣamaɣa pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma lakɩ pə təna mpi ɩ heeliɣi - m tɔ . Ɩlɛ ɩ ́ kʋlɩ tə tɛɛ .

text: I am the true vine , and my Father is the husbandman .
text2: Ma kɛna tʋɣʋ ŋku pa yaa sɩ lɛsɛŋ tɔ kʋ kʋpaŋkʋ maɣamaɣa , na ma Caa kɛlɛ kʋ tʋ .

text: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away : and every branch that beareth fruit , he purgeth it , that it may bring forth more fruit .
text2: Pəliŋasɩ təna nsi sɩ hɛla ma tɔɔ na sɩɩ lʋləɣɩ tɔ ɩ sɛtəɣɩ - səɣɩ . Na pəliŋasɩ təna nsi sɩ lʋləɣɩ tɔ , ɩ pasəɣɩ - səɣɩ kɔʋ kɛ ́ sɩ sɩ te , na sɩ sɔɔsɩ lʋlʋɣʋ kɛ sɔsɔm tɔtɔ .

text: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you .
text2: Kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ nti ma sɛɣɛsa - mɛ tɔ , ntɩ tə lapəna na mə maɣamaɣa mɩɩ te teu kɛ mpʋ tɔtɔ .

text: Abide in me , and I in you . As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself , except it abide in the vine ; no more can ye , except ye abide in me .
text2: Ɩ ́ kpɛntəna - m teu na máá kpɛntəna - mɛɣɛ teu tɔtɔ . Na tə wɛɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ ye pəliŋa ta tamsəna tʋɣʋ , kaa pəsəɣɩ na ká lʋlɩ pee kɛ yem . Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ na mɛ , ɩ ́ ta kpɛntəna - m tam ɩ ́ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ la pʋlʋ .

text: I am the vine , ye are the branches : He that abideth in me , and I in him , the same bringeth forth much fruit : for without me ye can do nothing .
text2: Maɣalɛ tʋɣʋ , na mɛɣɛlɛ pəliŋasɩ . Ye wei ɩ tamsəna - m na maa tamsəna - ɩ , na tə wɛ tam kɛ mpʋ , pʋntʋ lʋləɣɩ pee kɛ sɔsɔm kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye ma fɛɩ , mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ lá pʋlʋɣʋ ɩ tike .

text: If a man abide not in me , he is cast forth as a branch , and is withered ; and men gather them , and cast them into the fire , and they are burned .
text2: Ye wei ɩ ́ ta kpɛntəna - m tam , pa lɔɔ - ɩ taalɛ na waalɩ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ pəliŋa na ɩ ́ wʋlɩ . Pəliŋasɩ nsi sɩ wʋlaa tɔ , pa kpeɣeliɣi - səɣɩ , na pá sɔ kɔkɔ na sɩ nyaɣa .

text: If ye abide in me , and my words abide in you , ye shall ask what ye will , and it shall be done unto you .
text2: Ye ɩ ́ kpɛntəna - m tam na ɩ ́ tɔka ma tɔm kɛ teu , ɩ ́ sələmɩ mpi ɩ caa tɔ , na ɩ ́ ká hiki - wɩ .

text: Herein is my Father glorified , that ye bear much fruit ; so shall ye be my disciples .
text2: Ye ɩ lʋləɣɩ pee kɛ sɔsɔm pə hʋləɣɩ sɩ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ ma ɩfalaa , na mpʋ pə tʋɣʋna ma Caa kɛ teeli .

text: As the Father hath loved me , so have I loved you : continue ye in my love .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ Tacaa sɔɔlʋɣʋ - m tɔ , ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ma maɣamaɣa ma sɔɔla - mɛ . Ɩlɛ pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ tə sɔɔləɣɩ təmaɣa tam kɛ ́ mpʋ .

text: If ye keep my commandments , ye shall abide in my love ; even as I have kept my Father ' s commandments , and abide in his love .
text2: Ye ɩ tɔka ma kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ɩ ́ kaa lɩɩ - m luɣu kɛ paa pəlee . Na pɩɩ la teitei ɩsɩɩ ma tɔka ma Caa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ na má ta lɩɩ - ɩ luɣu kɛ paa pəcɔ tɔ .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that my joy might remain in you , and that your joy might be full .
text2: Ma heela - mɛɣɛ tɔm tənɛɣɛ sɩ ma laŋhʋlʋmlɛ ɩ ́ tɛləsɩ - mɛ , na ɩ ́ wɛɛ laŋhʋlʋmlɛ taa tike .

text: This is my commandment , That ye love one another , as I have loved you .
text2: Ma kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔɔləɣɩ mə təma ɩsɩɩ ma sɔɔlʋɣʋ - mɛ tɔ .

text: Greater love hath no man than this , that a man lay down his life for his friends .
text2: Sɔɔlʋɣʋ nakʋlɩ kʋ ta kəlɩ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ sɔɔlʋɣʋ ɩ taapalaa haləna ɩ ́ sɩ pa səm tɔ .

text: Ye are my friends , if ye do whatsoever I command you .
text2: Ye ɩ təŋəɣɩ mpi ma tʋ - mɛ tɔ na ɩ ́ lakɩ - wɩ , mɛɣɛlɛ ma taapalaa .

text: Henceforth I call you not servants ; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth : but I have called you friends ; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you .
text2: Ɩlɛ pənɛntɛ ma kaa tasa - mɛɣɛ nyənʋɣʋ ɩsɩɩ ma təmlɛ nyə ́ ma . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , təmlɛ tʋ kaa nyɩ ɩ caa kʋlapəlɛ . Maa nyənɩ - mɛɣɛ ma taapalaa kɛ ́ . Mpi tɔ , ma tɛləsa - mɛɣɛ pə təna mpi ma hika ma Caa kiŋ tɔ .

text: Ye have not chosen me , but I have chosen you , and ordained you , that ye should go and bring forth fruit , and that your fruit should remain : that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name , he may give it you .
text2: Pə taɣa mə ləsəna - m , ama má ləsəna - mɛ , na má tʋ - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ lʋlɩ pee nna a ka wɛɛ tam tɔ . Ye ɩ lakɩ mpʋ , ma Caa ka ha - mɛɣɛ pə təna mpi ɩ ́ ká yaana ma hətɛ na ɩ ́ sələmɩ - ɩ tɔ .

text: These things I command you , that ye love one another .
text2: Ɩlɛ nti ma tɩɩ tʋ - mɛ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔɔləɣɩ mə təma .

text: If the world hate you , ye know that it hated me before it hated you .
text2: Ye antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ yəlaa taa kpana - mɛ , ɩ ́ nyɩ sɩ maɣa pa taa ka kpanaa na pə ́ cɔ ́ pə takɩ - mɛ .

text: If ye were of the world , the world would love his own : but because ye are not of the world , but I have chosen you out of the world , therefore the world hateth you .
text2: Ye ɩ ́ ká kɛ antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ nyə ́ ma , ɩ taa yəlaa mpɛ pa taa taa kpana - mɛ . Mpi tɔ , mə na - wɛ ɩ ́ pəsa kʋlʋm tɔ pə tɔɔ . Ama ɩ ́ ta tɩɩ kɛʋ ɩ nyə ́ ma , pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma ləsa - mɛɣɛ pa taa tɔ se . Pə tɔɔ maɣamaɣa kɛ pa taa kpaana - mɛ .

text: Remember the word that I said unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord . If they have persecuted me , they will also persecute you ; if they have kept my saying , they will keep yours also .
text2: Ɩ ́ tɔɔsɩ tɔm nti maa heela - mɛ sɩ ɩfalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ fɛɩ wei ɩ kəla ɩ caa tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩsəna pa tʋ maɣa kʋnyɔŋ tɔ , mpʋ ɩnɩ tɔtɔɣɔ paa tʋ - mɛ . Ye paa mʋ ma kʋsəsɩɩtʋ , paa mʋ mə nyəntʋ tɔtɔ .

text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name ' s sake , because they know not him that sent me .
text2: Paa la - mɛɣɛ pə tənaɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ma tɔɔ , ɩlɛ pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa ta nyɩ wei ɩ tila - m tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: If I had not come and spoken unto them , they had not had sin : but now they have no cloke for their sin .
text2: Ye ma taa kɔɔ na má yɔɣɔtəna - wɛ , pa taa yaa - wɛɣɛ ɩsaɣalataa . Ɩlɛ pənɛntɛ pa fɛɩna nti paa yɔɣɔtɩ pa ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɔ tɔ .

text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also .
text2: Ye wei ɩ taa kpaana - m , pʋntʋ taa kpaana ma Caa tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did , they had not had sin : but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father .
text2: Ye ma taa la pa hɛkʋ taa kɛ ́ təma nna nɔɣɔlʋ ta lata tɔ , ɩsəntɔ pa taa yaa - wɛɣɛ asaɣaa . Ama pənɛntɛ pa na - yɛ , pə na pə mpʋ pa kisa má na ma Caa .

text: But this cometh to pass , that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law , They hated me without a cause .
text2: Ama pə lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pə la ɩsɩɩ pa ŋmaaʋ pa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ takəlaɣa taa tɔ sɩ : Pa kisa - m yem təfaa .

text: But when the Comforter is come , whom I will send unto you from the Father , even the Spirit of truth , which proceedeth from the Father , he shall testify of me :
text2: Wei ɩnɩ ɩ ká səna - mɛɣɛ mpʋ tɔ , ɩ ká kɔɔ . Ɩnəɣəlɛ Feesuɣu ŋku kʋ kɛ tampana tʋ na kʋ lɩɩna Tacaa kiŋ tɔ . Tacaa ká cɛlɛ - mɩ - ɩ na má tisi - mɛɣɛ - ɩ . Ye ɩ kɔma ɩ ká yɔɣɔtɩ ma tɔm .

text: And ye also shall bear witness , because ye have been with me from the beginning .
text2: Na mɛ tɔtɔ ɩ ́ ká yɔɣɔtɩ ma tɔm . Mpi tɔ ma na - mɛ tɩɩ wɛnna hatoo kancaalaɣa .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that ye should not be offended .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Ma laalaa kɛ ́ na má heeli - mɛɣɛ ɩsəntɔ sɩ pə ́ taa kɔɔ na pʋlʋpʋ la - mɛ na ɩ ́ kpisi Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ .

text: They shall put you out of the synagogues : yea , the time cometh , that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service .
text2: Paa tɔɣɔnɩ - mɛɣɛ pa təkotilenaa səkpena taa . Halɩ pɩɩ kɔɔ na wei ɩ pɛɛkəɣɩ mə kʋɣʋ tɔ , ɩ ka hʋʋ sɩ Ɩsɔ təmlɛ kɛ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔŋa lapʋ .

text: And these things will they do unto you , because they have not known the Father , nor me .
text2: Pa pəsəɣɩ pa lá mpʋ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa ta nyɩ má na ma Caa tá taa nɔɣɔlʋ tɔ se .

text: But these things have I told you , that when the time shall come , ye may remember that I told you of them . And these things I said not unto you at the beginning , because I was with you .
text2: Ɩlɛ ma heela - mɛɣɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pə ́ kɔma na pə ́ tala pə waatɩ , ɩ ́ ká tɔɔsɩ sɩ maa tɛma - mɛɣɛ - təɣɩ heeluɣu . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Má na - mɛ tɩɩ wɛ təma kiŋ tɔɣɔ ma taa hulina - mɛɣɛ - təɣɩ heeluɣu .

text: But now I go my way to him that sent me ; and none of you asketh me , Whither goest thou ?
text2: Ama pənɛntɛ ma mələɣɩ wei ɩ tila - m tɔ ɩ kiŋ . Mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ kaa pɔɔsɩ - m sɩ : Leɣe n puki ?

text: But because I have said these things unto you , sorrow hath filled your heart .
text2: Ama ma heeluɣu - mɛɣɛ - tɩ tɔ , pə wakəla mə laŋa kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth ; It is expedient for you that I go away : for if I go not away , the Comforter will not come unto you ; but if I depart , I will send him unto you .
text2: Paa na mpʋ tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , pə kəla teu sɩ má tɛɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye ma ta tɛɛ , wei ɩnɩ ɩ ká səna - mɛɣɛ mpʋ tɔ ɩ kaa kɔɔ . Ɩlɛ ye ma tɛɛwa , maa yele na ɩ ́ kɔɔ - mɛ .

text: And when he is come , he will reprove the world of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment :
text2: Na waatʋ wei ɩ ká kɔɔ tɔ , ɩ ká hʋ ́ lɩ ́ antulinya samaa kɛ ɩsəna pa liɣitaa na pá tá cɛkəna ɩsaɣatʋ na tampana təŋʋɣʋ na Ɩsɔ hʋʋlɛ pə tɔm tɔ .

text: Of sin , because they believe not on me ;
text2: Pa ta mʋ ma tɔm tɔɣɔ pa liɣita ɩsaɣatʋ tɔm .

text: Of righteousness , because I go to my Father , and ye see me no more ;
text2: Na ma mələɣɩ ma Caa kiŋ na ɩ ́ kaa tasa - m naʋ tɔɣɔ pa liɣita tampana təŋʋɣʋ tɔm .

text: Of judgment , because the prince of this world is judged .
text2: Pə ́ cɔ ́ pa tɛma antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ wulaʋ tɔm kɛ kʋɣʋ tɔɣɔ pa liɣita hʋʋlɛ tɔm .

text: I have yet many things to say unto you , but ye cannot bear them now .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Tɔmnaa mpa pə kaasa - m sɩ má heeli - mɛ tɔ , tə tɔɔ paɣalɛ . Ama tə mʋɣʋ kɛ ɩ ́ kaa pəsɩ nɔɔnɔɔ .

text: Howbeit when he , the Spirit of truth , is come , he will guide you into all truth : for he shall not speak of himself ; but whatsoever he shall hear , that shall he speak : and he will shew you things to come .
text2: Feesuɣu ŋku kʋ kɛ ́ tampana tʋ tɔ kʋ kɔma na kʋ kɔɔ ɩlɛ , kɩɩ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ tampana təna təcɛɩcɛɩ . Pə taɣa kʋ maɣamaɣa kʋ kaŋkantɛ nyəntʋ kɛ kɩɩ yɔɣɔtɩ . Ama nti kʋ nɩɩwa tɔɣɔ . Pəyele kɩɩ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ nti tɩɩ kɔɔ tɔ .

text: He shall glorify me : for he shall receive of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Kɩɩ tʋ - m teeli , ɩlɛ pə taɣa pʋlʋɣʋ ma tɔŋ mpʋ , nti ma kaɣa ma heeli - mɛ tɔ , ntɩ tə maɣamaɣa kɛ kɩɩ kpaɣa na kʋ tɛləsɩ - mɛ .

text: All things that the Father hath are mine : therefore said I , that he shall take of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Ma Caa nyəm təna kɛ ma nyəm kɛ ́ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma yɔɣɔtaa sɩ , nti ma kaɣa - mɛɣɛ heeluɣu tɔ tə maɣamaɣa kɛ kɩɩ kpaɣa na kʋ tɛləsɩ - mɛ .

text: A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me , because I go to the Father .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Pə kaasa wɛɛ naalɛ , na ɩ ́ kaa tasa - m naʋ , pə ́ cɔ ́ pə kaa la wɛɛ naalɛ na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ - m naʋ .

text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves , What is this that he saith unto us , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me : and , Because I go to the Father ?
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ ɩfalaa taa napəlɩ pa pɔɔsa təma sɩ : Wentiɣilɛ ɩ yɔɣɔta mpʋ sɩ pə kaasa wɛɛ naalɛ na tə kaa tasa - ɩ naʋ , pə ́ cɔ ́ pə kaa la wɛɛ naalɛ na tə taɣanɩ - ɩ naʋ ? Sɩ ɩnɩ ɩ puki Tacaa kiŋ tɔ pə tɔɔ ?

text: They said therefore , What is this that he saith , A little while ? we cannot tell what he saith .
text2: Pepeɣelɛ ɩ yaakɩ wɛɛ naalɛ kɛ cənɛ ? Tə ta cɛkəna nti ɩ yɔɣɔta mpʋ tɔ .

text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him , and said unto them , Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me ?
text2: Yesu cɛkənaa sɩ ɩ tɔm ntɩ tə lapa - wɛɣɛ piti na pa caakaɣa - ɩ tə pɔɔsʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ pɔɔsəɣɩ təmaɣa nti ma yɔɣɔtaa sɩ , pə kaasa wɛɛ naalɛ na ɩ ́ kaa tasa - m naʋ na pə kaa la wɛɛ naalɛ na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ - m naʋ tɔɣɔ ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , That ye shall weep and lament , but the world shall rejoice : and ye shall be sorrowful , but your sorrow shall be turned into joy .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ , ɩ ́ ká wii na ɩ ́ sɩ , na yəlaa ká woŋ teu . Ɩ ́ ká wɛɛ laŋwakəllɛ taa , ama mə laŋwakəllɛ ká pəsɩ laŋhʋlʋmlɛ .

text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow , because her hour is come : but as soon as she is delivered of the child , she remembereth no more the anguish , for joy that a man is born into the world .
text2: Saa wei alʋ nɩɩkɩ lʋlʋɣʋ wʋsasɩ tɔ , ɩ wɛ piti taa kɛ ́ sɔsɔm . Ama pə ́ kɔma na pə ́ tɔ - ɩ , ɩ sɔɔkɩ ɩ wʋsasɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ laŋlɛ hɛɛkɩ sɔsɔm sɩ ɩ kɔna mʋʋlʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: And ye now therefore have sorrow : but I will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no man taketh from you .
text2: Teitei kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ na mɛ , ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ wɛʋ laŋwakəllɛ taa kɛ ́ ɩsəntɔ tɔ . Pə taɣa ɩ ́ ká saalɩ mpʋ se , ama mə laŋa ká tɛ na a hʋlʋmɩ , haləna nɔɣɔlʋ kaa tasa mə laŋa kɛ wakəlʋɣʋ . Maa tasa - mɛɣɛ naʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing . Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name , he will give it you .
text2: Yesu sɩ : Pə wule ntɛ ́ ɩ ́ kaa tasa - m natələɣɩ pɔɔsʋɣʋ tɔtɔ . Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ . Pə təna mpi ɩ ́ ká sələmɩ ma Caa na ɩ ́ yaakɩ ma hətɛ tɔ , ɩ ́ ká hiki - wɩ .

text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name : ask , and ye shall receive , that your joy may be full .
text2: Haləna saŋa ɩ ́ ta yaata ma hətɛ na ɩ ́ sələmɩ pʋlʋ . Ɩ ́ sələmɩ ɩ ́ ká hiki , na pɩɩ la na mə laŋa hʋlʋmɩ sɔsɔm kɛ tam tɔɔ .

text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs : but the time cometh , when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs , but I shall shew you plainly of the Father .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma sɩ : Atuwa kɛ ma tukiɣi - mɛɣɛ kʋtuku kɛ tɔm tənɛ tə təna . Pɩɩ kɔɔ na ma kaa tasa - mɛɣɛ atuwa tukuɣu kɛ mpʋ . Ama maa tʋləsɩ - mɛɣɛ Tacaa tɔm kɛ kpakpaa təfoo .

text: At that day ye shall ask in my name : and I say not unto you , that I will pray the Father for you :
text2: Pə wule ɩ ́ talaa , ɩ ́ ká yaa ma hətɛ na ɩ ́ sələmɩ ma Caa , ma kaa heeli - mɛ sɩ maa sələməna - mɛɣɛ - ɩ .

text: For the Father himself loveth you , because ye have loved me , and have believed that I came out from God .
text2: Ɩlɛ pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ma Caa maɣamaɣa sɔɔla - mɛɣɛ . Ɩlɛ mə sɔɔla - m na ɩ ́ tʋɣʋna sɩ ɩ cɔlɔɣɔ ma lɩɩnaa tɔɣɔ ɩ sɔɔla - mɛ .

text: I came forth from the Father , and am come into the world : again , I leave the world , and go to the Father .
text2: Ma Caa cɔlɔɣɔ ma lɩɩnaa na má tii atɛ cənɛ . Pənɛntɛ maa kʋlɩ atɛ cənɛ na má məlɩ ma Caa kiŋ .

text: His disciples said unto him , Lo , now speakest thou plainly , and speakest no proverb .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu ɩfalaa tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Aŋha , pənɛntɛ n yela atuwa tɔm , na ń tʋləsɩ - tʋɣʋ kpakpaa təfoo .

text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things , and needest not that any man should ask thee : by this we believe that thou camest forth from God .
text2: Nɔɔnɔɔ tə nawa sɩ n nyəmá pə təna , na n cɛkəɣəna nti yʋlʋ caa - ŋ pɔɔsʋɣʋ tɔ na ɩ ́ ta tɩɩ pɔɔsəta - ŋ - tɩ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə tɛma ta taa sɩ n lɩɩna Ɩsɔ kiŋ .

text: Jesus answered them , Do ye now believe ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔwa sɩ : Mɛ sɩ pənɛntɛ ɩ ́ tɛma - m na mə taa yaa ?

text: Behold , the hour cometh , yea , is now come , that ye shall be scattered , every man to his own , and shall leave me alone : and yet I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
text2: Ɩ ́ yele ma heeli - mɛ , pə wɛɛ pɩɩ kɔɔ , halɩ pə tɩɩ tɛma kɔntɛ te . Ɩ ́ ká ya mə təna na ɩ ́ məlɩ mə tɛɛsɩ taa , na ɩ ́ lɔ - m ma tike . Pə na pə mpʋ tɔ , n wiila teu n ká na sɩ pə ta yele - m ma tike . Ama má na ma Caa tə wɛnna .

text: These things I have spoken unto you , that in me ye might have peace . In the world ye shall have tribulation : but be of good cheer ; I have overcome the world .
text2: Tɔʋ , ma heela - mɛɣɛ pə tənaɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ má na - mɛ tá təma kpɛntənaʋ ɩ ́ la na mə laŋa hʋlʋmɩ . Ɩ ́ ká ná kʋnyɔməŋ kɛ antulinya taa cənɛ te . Ama paa na mpʋ ɩ ́ tɔkɩ tɔnəŋ , ma kəla antulinya .

text: These words spake Jesus , and lifted up his eyes to heaven , and said , Father , the hour is come ; glorify thy Son , that thy Son also may glorify thee :
text2: Yesu tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtaɣa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ teki ɩ ɩsɛ na ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ma Caa , wʋlɛ pʋwaɣalɛ pənɛ . Kʋsɩ nyá Pəyaɣa má ma nyʋɣʋ , na nyá Pəyaɣa má maa kʋsɩ nyá nyʋɣʋ tɔtɔ .

text: As thou hast given him power over all flesh , that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , n sɩɩ - m yəlaa təna sɔsɔ sɩ má ha pa təna mpa n cɛla - m tɔɣɔ weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔɣɔ .

text: And this is life eternal , that they might know thee the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom thou hast sent .
text2: Na weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ mpʋ tɔ kʋ nyʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ , pá nyɩ sɩ nyá tike təkoŋ ntɛ ́ tampana Ɩsɔ , na pá nyɩ nyá tillu Yesu Kilisiti má ma tɔɔ tɔtɔ .

text: I have glorified thee on the earth : I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do .
text2: Ma kʋsa nyá nyʋɣʋ kɛ yəlaa taa . Ma tɛma təmlɛ nte n tʋ - m sɩ má la tɔ .

text: And now , O Father , glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was .
text2: Ma Caa , pənɛntɛ kʋsɩ ma nyʋɣʋ kɛ nyá kiŋ ɩsɩɩ maa wɛʋ hatoo lɔŋ kɛ nyá kiŋ na pə ́ cɔ ́ pá lá antulinya tɔ pə taka .

text: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world : thine they were , and thou gavest them me ; and they have kept thy word .
text2: Ma lapa na yəlaa mpa n ləsa lɛlaa hɛkʋ na ń cɛlɛ - m tɔ pá nyɩ - ŋ . Nyaa tənna - wɛ , ɩlɛna ń məŋna - wɛ na ń cɛlɛ - m , na pá nɩɩna nyá tɔm .

text: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee .
text2: Pənɛntɛ pa cɛkənaa sɩ pə təna mpi n cɛla - m tɔ pə lɩɩna nyá kiŋ .

text: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me ; and they have received them , and have known surely that I came out from thee , and they have believed that thou didst send me .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tɔm nti n heela - m tɔ , ma heela - wɛɣɛ - tɩ na pá mʋ . Pa nawa sɩ tampana nyá kiŋ kɛ ma lɩɩnaa , na pa tɛma pa taa sɩ nyá tilina - m .

text: I pray for them : I pray not for the world , but for them which thou hast given me ; for they are thine .
text2: Mpɛ pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma sələməɣɩ - ŋ . Maa sələməɣəna yəlaa tənaɣa yem . Ama mpa n cɛla - m tɔ mpɛɣɛ ma sələməɣəna , pa kɛ ́ nyá nyə ́ ma tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: And all mine are thine , and thine are mine ; and I am glorified in them .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pə təna mpi ma tɩ tɔ , nyá tənna , na pə təna mpi n tɩ tɔ má tənna . Ma nyʋɣʋ ká kʋləna pa kiŋ .

text: And now I am no more in the world , but these are in the world , and I come to thee . Holy Father , keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me , that they may be one , as we are .
text2: Ma kʋləɣɩ atɛ cənɛ , na má məlɩ nyá kiŋ , ama mpɛɣɛ pə yeki . Ma Caa kʋpaŋ , tɔkɩ - wɛ na nyá hətɛ toŋ wei n ha - m tɔ . Pá pəsɩ kʋlʋm ɩsɩɩ ma na - ŋ tə wɛʋ kʋlʋm tɔ .

text: While I was with them in the world , I kept them in thy name : those that thou gavest me I have kept , and none of them is lost , but the son of perdition ; that the scripture might be fulfilled .
text2: Má na - wɛ tɩɩ wɛʋ tɔ , nyá toŋ wei n ha - m tɔ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma tɔka - wɛ . Ma kenta pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ teu , pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ta la asaala . Ye pə taɣa wei pɩɩ wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ká le yem tɔ ɩ tike təkoŋ . Tuu lɔŋ paa ŋmaa - təɣɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ .

text: And now come I to thee ; and these things I speak in the world , that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves .
text2: Pənɛntɛ ma mələɣɩ nyá kiŋ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma tɩɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ - tɩ na má ta kʋləta atɛ cənɛ , sɩ má tɛləsɩ - wɛɣɛ ma laŋhʋlʋmlɛ na pa laŋa hʋlʋmɩ teu .

text: I have given them thy word ; and the world hath hated them , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Ma heela - wɛɣɛ nyá tɔm na antulinya yəlaa kisi - wɛ təpʋlʋpʋlʋ . Pa ta kɛ antulinya nyə ́ ma , ɩsɩɩ má tá kɛ ́ antulinya tʋ tɔ .

text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world , but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil .
text2: Maa sələməɣɩ - ŋ sɩ ń ləsɩ - wɛɣɛ antulinya taa . Ama hatələna - wɛ na ɩsaɣaʋ kɛ ́ .

text: They are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ ma ta kɛ antulinya tʋ tɔ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ pɛlɛ pa ta kɛ antulinya nyə ́ ma .

text: Sanctify them through thy truth : thy word is truth .
text2: Nyá tɔm kɛna tampana , ɩlɛ yele na tampana anɩ a pəsɩ - wɛɣɛ nyá nyə ́ ma təkpataa .

text: As thou hast sent me into the world , even so have I also sent them into the world .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ n tila - m antulinya taa tɔ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ ma tiliɣi - wɛɣɛ antulinya yəlaa taa .

text: And for their sakes I sanctify myself , that they also might be sanctified through the truth .
text2: Ma kpaɣa ma tɩ təkpataa na má tʋ nyá niŋ taa kɛ ́ pa tɔɔ , sɩ pá pəsɩ nyá nyə ́ ma təsiɣisiɣi .

text: Neither pray I for these alone , but for them also which shall believe on me through their word ;
text2: Pə taɣa pa tike pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma sələməɣɩ . Ama ma sələməɣəna tɔtɔɣɔ mpa paa kɔɔ na pá nɩɩ pɛlɛ pa waasʋ na pá mʋ ma tɔm tɔ .

text: That they all may be one ; as thou , Father , art in me , and I in thee , that they also may be one in us : that the world may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Ma sələmʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ , pa təna pá kpɛntɩ nɔɣɔ kʋlʋmaɣa . Haɩ , Tacaa , tá na - wɛ tə ́ kpɛntɩ kʋlʋm ɩsɩɩ ma na - ŋ tə kpɛntʋɣʋ təmammam tɔ . Pá kpɛntɩ kʋlʋm , ɩlɛna antulinya ná sɩ nyá tilina - m .

text: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them ; that they may be one , even as we are one :
text2: Ma kʋsa pa nyɔɔŋ ɩsɩɩ nyaa kʋsa ma nyəŋkʋ tɔ , sɩ pá kpɛntɩ kʋlʋm ɩsɩɩ má na - ŋ tə kpɛntʋɣʋ kʋlʋm tɔ .

text: I in them , and thou in me , that they may be made perfect in one ; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me , and hast loved them , as thou hast loved me .
text2: Ma na - ŋ tə kpɛnta ɩsəna tɔ , má na - wɛ tə ́ kpɛntɩ mpʋ . Ɩlɛna mpɛ pá kpɛntɩ kʋlʋm təkpataa , na yəlaa təna ná sɩ nyá tilina - m , na n sɔɔla - wɛ ɩsɩɩ n sɔɔlʋɣʋ - m tɔ .

text: Father , I will that they also , whom thou hast given me , be with me where I am ; that they may behold my glory , which thou hast given me : for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world .
text2: Ma Caa , ma luɣu wɛɛ sɩ má na mpa n cɛla - m tɔ tə ́ wɛɛ təntəmlɛ kɛ timpi ma wɛɛ tɔ , na pá ná ma teeli wei n tʋ - m tɔ . Teeli ɩnɩ , n sɔɔla - m tuu lɔŋ na pə ́ cɔ ́ pá lá antulinya tɔɣɔ n tʋ - mɩ - ɩ .

text: O righteous Father , the world hath not known thee : but I have known thee , and these have known that thou hast sent me .
text2: Ma Caa , tampana təŋlʋ , antulinya yəlaa ta nyɩ - ŋ . Ama má má nyəma - ŋ , na panɛ ɩnɩ pɛlɛ pa nyəmá sɩ nyá tilina - m .

text: And I have declared unto them thy name , and will declare it : that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them , and I in them .
text2: Ma lapa na pá nyɩ - ŋ , na maa la na pá tasa - ŋ nyəm . Ɩlɛna sɔɔlʋɣʋ ŋku n sɔɔla - m tɔ ń yele na kʋ wɛɛ pa hɛkʋ tɔtɔ , na ma maɣamaɣa ma na - wɛ tə ́ kpɛntɩ kʋlʋm .

text: When Jesus had spoken these words , he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron , where was a garden , into the which he entered , and his disciples .
text2: Yesu tɛma tɔm tənɛ tə tənaɣa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ na ɩ ɩfalaa pá kʋlɩ na pá tɛɛ , na pá tɛsɩ Setəlɔŋ lɔɔʋ waalɩ . Ɩlɛna pá sʋʋ tɩɩŋ taalɛ natəlɩ nte tɩɩ wɛ təna tɔ tə taa .

text: And Judas also , which betrayed him , knew the place : for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples .
text2: Ɩ kɔlɔmɔtɔ tʋ Yutaasɩ nyəmá tənɛ ɩnɩ . Mpi tɔ , tənaɣa Yesu na ɩ ɩfalaa pa kotaɣa tam tam .

text: Judas then , having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees , cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons .
text2: Yutaasɩ kpaɣa yoolaa na Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taŋlaa kɛ caŋa , mpa kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na Falisanaa pa tilaa tɔ , na pá polo təna na pá tɔka yoou wontu na fətəlanaa na kahulasɩ .

text: Jesus therefore , knowing all things that should come upon him , went forth , and said unto them , Whom seek ye ?
text2: Yesu nyəmá pə təna mpi pɩɩ maɣana - ɩ tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpətəna - wɛ na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Aweɣe ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ ?

text: They answered him , Jesus of Nazareth . Jesus saith unto them , I am he . And Judas also , which betrayed him , stood with them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taŋlaa mpɛ pa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Nasalɛtɩ Yesu . Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Maɣalɔ . Yesu kɔlɔmɔtɔ tʋ Yutaasɩ ka wɛ pa hɛkʋ taa təna .

text: As soon then as he had said unto them , I am he , they went backward , and fell to the ground .
text2: Tuu ɩsɩɩ Yesu heeluɣu - wɛ sɩ : Maɣalɔ tɔ , pa sʋʋ tapəŋ tuluɣu ntɛ ́ na pá hoti atɛ .

text: Then asked he them again , Whom seek ye ? And they said , Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ pɔɔsʋɣʋ sɩ : Aweɣe ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ ye ? Ɩlɛna taŋlaa mpɛ pá cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Nasalɛtɩ Yesu .

text: Jesus answered , I have told you that I am he : if therefore ye seek me , let these go their way :
text2: Yesu cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma tɛma - mɛɣɛ heeluɣu sɩ maɣalɔ . Ye maɣa ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ , ɩlɛ ɩ ́ yele panɛ na pá tɛɛ .

text: That the saying might be fulfilled , which he spake , Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none .
text2: Yesu yɔɣɔta mpʋ , sɩ pə ́ la teitei na nti ɩ ka yɔɣɔtaa tɔ sɩ : Mpa n ha - m tɔ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ta la asaala .

text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it , and smote the high priest ' s servant , and cut off his right ear . The servant ' s name was Malchus .
text2: Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ ka wɛna laɣatɛ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kpɛɛ - tɛ na ɩ ́ sɛtɩ kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ təmlɛ tʋ ŋkpaŋʋɣʋ ntɔɣɔŋ nyəŋkʋ . ( Pa yaa təmlɛ tʋ ɩnɩ sɩ Maləkusi . )

text: Then said Jesus unto Peter , Put up thy sword into the sheath : the cup which my Father hath given me , shall I not drink it ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma Piyɛɛ sɩ : Məŋna nyá laɣatɛ kɛ tə suɣute taa . N hʋʋ sɩ ma kaa tɔɣɔ wahala sɔsɔ wei ma Caa tʋ - m sɩ má tɔɣɔ tɔ ?

text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus , and bound him ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yoolaa caŋa təna , na pa sɔsɔ , na Yuta nyə ́ ma filisinaa pa kpa Yesu na pá hɔkɔ - ɩ .

text: And led him away to Annas first ; for he was father in law to Caiaphas , which was the high priest that same year .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá laaləna - ɩ Ana tɛɣɛ ponaʋ , na Ana ɩnɩ ɩ ka kɛ Kayifi wei pa kpa pənaɣa ŋkɛ ka taa kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ tɔ ɩ yətɩ .

text: Now Caiaphas was he , which gave counsel to the Jews , that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
text2: Na Kayifi ɩnɩ ɩ ka sɛɣɛsəna Yuta nyə ́ ma sɩ : Pə kəla teu sɩ yʋlʋ kʋlʋm ɩ ́ sɩ yəlaa təna səm .

text: And Simon Peter followed Jesus , and so did another disciple : that disciple was known unto the high priest , and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest .
text2: Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ na Yesu ɩfalʋ lɛlʋ pa təŋaɣa ɩ waalɩ . Kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ ɩsəm kɛ ɩfalʋ ɩnɩ tɔɣɔ ɩ pəsaa na ɩ ́ təŋ Yesu na ɩ ́ sʋʋ ɩ taɣa tɔɔ .

text: But Peter stood at the door without . Then went out that other disciple , which was known unto the high priest , and spake unto her that kept the door , and brought in Peter .
text2: Ama Piyɛɛ ná maləna nɔnɔkeelasɩ na awalɩ tɔɔ . Ɩfalʋ wei na kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ pa wɛ ɩsəmlɛ kɛ mpʋ tɔ , ɩ lɩɩwa na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəna alʋ wei ɩ taŋa nɔnɔɣɔ tɔ , na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ yele na Piyɛɛ sʋʋ .

text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter , Art not thou also one of this man ' s disciples ? He saith , I am not .
text2: Tənaɣa təmlɛ tʋ alʋ nyəŋ nɔnɔɣɔ taŋlʋ ɩnɩ ɩ pɔɔsa Piyɛɛ sɩ : Ɩsɩɩ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ɩfalaa mə taa wɛɣɛlɛ ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ cɔwa sɩ : Aaɩ , ma fɛɩ pa taa yoo .

text: And the servants and officers stood there , who had made a fire of coals ; for it was cold : and they warmed themselves : and Peter stood with them , and warmed himself .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma na taŋlaa mpa paa wɛ təna tɔ pa taɣana kɔkɔ na pá holiɣi , watʋ ka wɛɛ tɔ pə tɔɔ . Na Piyɛɛ ka səŋa pa hɛkʋ na ɩ ́ holiɣi tɔtɔ .

text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples , and of his doctrine .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ pɔɔsa Yesu kɛ ́ ɩ ɩfalaa na ɩ kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ pə tɔɔ .

text: Jesus answered him , I spake openly to the world ; I ever taught in the synagogue , and in the temple , whither the Jews always resort ; and in secret have I said nothing .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ma yɔɣɔta samaa taa təfoo , na tam ma sɛɣɛsaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa taa na Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa , timpi Yuta nyə ́ ma kotiɣi tɔ , ma ta ŋmɛsɩ natəlɩ .

text: Why askest thou me ? ask them which heard me , what I have said unto them : behold , they know what I said .
text2: Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ n pɔɔsəɣɩ - m mpʋ ? Pɔɔsɩ mpa pa nɩɩ ma tɔm tɔɣɔ nti ma heela - wɛ tɔ . Pɛlɛ pa nyəmá teu kɛ nti ma heela - wɛ tɔ .

text: And when he had thus spoken , one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand , saying , Answerest thou the high priest so ?
text2: Yesu cɔ mpʋ , ɩlɛna taŋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ wei ɩ ka səŋa təna tɔ ɩ ́ casa - ɩ kataŋa , na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ kɛ n cɔ mpʋ ?

text: Jesus answered him , If I have spoken evil , bear witness of the evil : but if well , why smitest thou me ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Ma yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ mpʋ tɔ , ye ma lapa taalɩ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - tʋɣʋ timpi ma lapəna taalɩ tɔ . Na ye taalɩ fɛɩ nti ma yɔɣɔtaa tɔ tə taa , ɩlɛ pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ n mapa - m ?

text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ana kpaɣa Yesu na ɩ ́ pona - ɩ kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ Kayifi na ɩ hɔkətʋ kɛ mpʋ .

text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself . They said therefore unto him , Art not thou also one of his disciples ? He denied it , and said , I am not .
text2: Pə ́ na pə lapʋ tənaɣa mpʋ tɔ , Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ wɛɛ na ɩ ́ holiɣi kɔkɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Hei nyá tɔ , pə taɣa apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ɩfalaa mə taa wɛɣɛlɛ ? Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ kpɛɛsaa sɩ : Ma fɛɩ pa taa yoo .

text: One of the servants of the high priest , being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off , saith , Did not I see thee in the garden with him ?
text2: Kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma taa nɔɣɔlʋ , wei ɩ lʋlʋɣʋ tʋ ŋkpaŋʋɣʋ Piyɛɛ ka sɛtaa tɔ , ɩ pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Pə taɣa nyá na - ɩ kɛ ́ ma ná tɩɩŋ taalɛ ńtɛ ́ tə taa təna ?

text: Peter then denied again : and immediately the cock crew .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ tasa kpɛɛsʋɣʋ sɩ : Aaɩ . Ɩlɛna kampaaʋ koo kpakpaa .

text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment : and it was early ; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall , lest they should be defiled ; but that they might eat the passover .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ pa kpaɣa Yesu kɛ ́ Kayifi tɛɣɛ tanaŋ ahula tɛɛ na pá pona - ɩ kʋfənɛɛ tɛ . Ama pa maɣamaɣa pa ta sʋʋ təhʋʋlɛ taa , sɩ pə ́ taa kɔɔ na pá taa pa təɣɩ asilima na pá yele Tɛɛʋ acima tɔɣɔʋ .

text: Pilate then went out unto them , and said , What accusation bring ye against this man ?
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ kʋfənɛɛ Pilatɩ lɩɩwa na ɩ ́ səŋ - wɛɣɛ kʋsəŋ na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Suweɣe mə na apalʋ ɩnɩ ?

text: They answered and said unto him , If he were not a malefactor , we would not have delivered him up unto thee .
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma cɔ Pilatɩ sɩ : N nyəmá sɩ ɩ ́ taa kɛ ́ ɩsaɣaʋ ɩlɛ tɩɩ kɔna - ŋɩ - ɩ kɛ ?

text: Then said Pilate unto them , Take ye him , and judge him according to your law . The Jews therefore said unto him , It is not lawful for us to put any man to death :
text2: Ɩlɛna Pilatɩ tɔ Yuta nyə ́ ma sɩ : Ɩ ́ kpaɣa Yesu kɛ mə maɣamaɣa na ɩ ́ təŋ ɩsəna mə seliya wɛɛ tɔ na ɩ ́ hʋʋna - ɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔma Pilatɩ sɩ : Tə fɛɩna mpaaʋ sɩ tə ́ kʋ nɔɣɔlʋ .

text: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled , which he spake , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Pə lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pə la teitei na tɔm nti Yesu ka yɔɣɔta saa wei ɩ kɛɛsaɣaa səm mpi ɩ ka sɩ tɔ .

text: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again , and called Jesus , and said unto him , Art thou the King of the Jews ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pilatɩ məla təyaɣa na ɩ ́ yaa Yesu na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Nyaɣalɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma wulaʋ sɔsɔ na ?

text: Jesus answered him , Sayest thou this thing of thyself , or did others tell it thee of me ?
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔwa Pilatɩ sɩ : Nyá hʋʋna - təɣɩ nyá maɣamaɣa yaa nɔɣɔlʋ heelina - ŋ ma tɔm kɛ kʋheelu ?

text: Pilate answered , Am I a Jew ? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me : what hast thou done ?
text2: Ɩlɛna Pilatɩ cɔ Yesu sɩ : Ha , nyá Yuta tʋ ntɛ ́ ma na ? Nyá piitim nyə ́ ma maɣamaɣa na kɔtəlaa sɔsaa kɔnna - ŋ ma kiŋ . N wakəla we ?
