text: Jesus answered , My kingdom is not of this world : if my kingdom were of this world , then would my servants fight , that I should not be delivered to the Jews : but now is my kingdom not from hence .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔwa sɩ : Ma kawulaɣa ta kɛ atɛ cənɛ nyəŋka . Ye ma kawulaɣa ka kɛ ́ cənɛ nyəŋka , ma ɩfalaa ka yoo ma yoou , sɩ má taa sʋʋ Yuta nyə ́ ma niŋ taa . Ama , pə taɣa atɛ cənɛ kawulaɣa kɛ ma tɔkɩ .

text: Pilate therefore said unto him , Art thou a king then ? Jesus answered , Thou sayest that I am a king . To this end was I born , and for this cause came I into the world , that I should bear witness unto the truth . Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice .
text2: Tənaɣa Pilatɩ tɔma Yesu sɩ : Sɛsɛ n kɛ ́ wulaʋ kɛ ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu cɔ Pilatɩ sɩ : Ntəɣəlɛ n yɔɣɔta mpʋ , ma kɛ ́ wulaʋ sɔsɔ . Tampana yɔtɔtʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa lʋla - m , na pə maɣamaɣa pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma tɩɩ tii atɛ cənɛ . Mpa pa təŋəɣɩ tampana tɔ pa nɩɩkɩ ma tɔm .

text: Pilate saith unto him , What is truth ? And when he had said this , he went out again unto the Jews , and saith unto them , I find in him no fault at all .
text2: Tənaɣa Pilatɩ nɔɣɔ təkpaʋ sɩ : Pepeɣe nyá tɩɩ yaa tampana ye ? Ɩ tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtaɣa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tasa lɩɩʋ kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔɔ na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Ma ta na ɩsaɣatiya ŋka ɩ lapa na ɩ ́ mʋna səm tɔ .

text: But ye have a custom , that I should release unto you one at the passover : will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Pə wɛɛ sɩ paa Tɛɛʋ acima nna ma cɛ - mɛɣɛ saləka tʋ tɔ , ɩlɛ ɩ ́ caa sɩ má cɛ - mɛɣɛ mə Yuta nyə ́ ma wulaʋ sɔsɔ na ?

text: Then cried they all again , saying , Not this man , but Barabbas . Now Barabbas was a robber .
text2: Tənaɣa pa tasa kokoole sɩ : Tɩɩ caa ɩnɩ . Ama Palapaasɩ kɛ tə caa n cɛ . Pəyele Palapaasɩ ka kɛ ́ ŋmɩɩlʋ kpitikpiti kɛ ́ .

text: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus , and scourged him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pilatɩ tɔma Yuta nyə ́ ma sɩ pá pona Yesu na pá casa - ɩ akpatɛɛ .

text: And the soldiers platted a crown of thorns , and put it on his head , and they put on him a purple robe ,
text2: Ɩlɛna yoolaa lʋʋ sɔwa kɛ ntenuɣu na pá te ɩ nyʋɣʋ , na pá suu - ɩ kpaɩ kʋsɛɛm .

text: And said , Hail , King of the Jews ! and they smote him with their hands .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá sʋʋ ɩ tɛɛ na pá sɛɛkɩ - ɩ sɩ : Yuta nyə ́ ma wulaʋ , fɔɔ . Na pá makɩ - ɩ kataasɩ .

text: Pilate therefore went forth again , and saith unto them , Behold , I bring him forth to you , that ye may know that I find no fault in him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pilatɩ taɣana samaa tɔɔ kɛ ́ lɩɩnaʋ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ nɩɩ yee . Maa ləsɩ apalʋ ɩnəɣɩ awalɩ cənɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ cɛkəna teu sɩ ma ta na ɩsaɣatiya ŋka ɩ lapa na ɩ ́ mʋna səm tɔ .

text: Then came Jesus forth , wearing the crown of thorns , and the purple robe . And Pilate saith unto them , Behold the man !
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu lɩɩwa na ɩ sɔwa ntenuɣu na ɩ kpaɩ kʋsɛɛm ɩnɩ . Ɩlɛna Pilatɩ heeli samaa sɩ : Mə yʋlʋ ntɔ .

text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him , they cried out , saying , Crucify him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Take ye him , and crucify him : for I find no fault in him .
text2: Waatʋ wei kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na taŋlaa pa na - ɩ tɔ , pa naala kakiisasɩ sɩ : Ɩsɩɩ pa kama - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ . Ɩsɩɩ pa kama - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pilatɩ cɔ samaa sɩ : Ye mpʋ ɩ ́ pona - ɩ na ɩ ́ kamɩ - ɩ tesika tɔɔ kɛ ́ mə maɣamaɣa . Tɔfɔ ye má , ma ta na ɩsaɣatʋ nti ɩ lapa na ɩ ́ mʋna səm tɔ .

text: The Jews answered him , We have a law , and by our law he ought to die , because he made himself the Son of God .
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma cɔwa sɩ : Ta kiiu nakʋlɩ kʋ wɛɛ , na kʋ tɔɔ , ɩsɩɩ tə kʋ - ɩ . Kʋŋkʋɣʋlɛ sɩ ɩ yaa ɩ tɩ sɩ Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he was the more afraid ;
text2: Waatʋ wei Pilatɩ nɩɩ tɔm tənɛ tɔ , sɔɣɔntʋ sɔɔsa - ɩ kpaʋ .

text: And went again into the judgment hall , and saith unto Jesus , Whence art thou ? But Jesus gave him no answer .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ məlɩ kpaaŋ taa na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ Yesu sɩ : Leɣe nyá tɛ ? Ama Yesu tá cɔ - ɩ paa fəŋ .

text: Then saith Pilate unto him , Speakest thou not unto me ? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee , and have power to release thee ?
text2: Tənaɣa Pilatɩ pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Má pɔɔsəɣəna - ŋ na nn cɔɔkɩ ? N ta nyɩ taa sɩ ye ma nɔkaa ma kaŋɩ - ŋ , pə ́ cɔ ́ ye ma nɔkaa ma yele - ŋ na ń tɛɛ ?

text: Jesus answered , Thou couldest have no power at all against me , except it were given thee from above : therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ Pilatɩ sɩ : N fɛɩna nyá təɣɩ ma tɔɔ , ye pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ hana - ŋ pə toma . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ wei ɩ kpa - m na ɩ ́ cɛlɛ - ŋ tɔ , pʋntʋ ntɛ ́ ɩsaɣaʋ na pə ́ kəlɩ nyá .

text: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him : but the Jews cried out , saying , If thou let this man go , thou art not Caesar ' s friend : whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar .
text2: Tuu ɩsɩɩ Pilatɩ nɩɩʋ tɔm ntɩ tɔ ɩ sɔɔsa ɩsəlɛ ntɛ ́ sɛɛsʋɣʋ kɛ ɩsəna ɩ ká la na ɩ ́ yele - ɩ tɔ . Ama Yuta nyə ́ ma nika kiisuɣu sɩ : Ye n yela - ɩ , pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ nyaa təŋəɣɩ Lom wulaʋ sɔsɔ ɩkpatɛ ntɛ ́ . Yʋlʋ ɩ ́ cɔɔkɩ na ɩ ́ heeliɣi sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ wulaʋ , pʋntʋ na Lom wulaʋ sɔsɔ pa wɛ koloŋa kɛ ́ mɛɛ .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he brought Jesus forth , and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement , but in the Hebrew , Gabbatha .
text2: Pilatɩ nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lɩɩna Yesu kɛ ́ awalɩ taɣa tɔɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ kpa hʋʋlɛ kumte tɔɔ na ɩ ́ caɣa . ( Alaamee nyə ́ ma ná yaa - tɛ sɩ Kapata na pa tɛ taa . )

text: And it was the preparation of the passover , and about the sixth hour : and he saith unto the Jews , Behold your King !
text2: Pə pamna kʋyakʋ ŋku kʋ yakaɣa sɩ pə fe Tɛɛʋ acima tɔ kʋ wule , na waatʋ ɩnɩ tɔ , ilim puki sikuɣu . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pilatɩ tɔma Yuta nyə ́ ma sɩ : Mə wulaʋ ntɔ .

text: But they cried out , Away with him , away with him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Shall I crucify your King ? The chief priest answered , We have no king but Caesar .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yuta nyə ́ ma naalɩ kakiisasɩ sɩ : N ká kʋ - ɩ kɛ ́ . N ká kʋ - ɩ kɛ ́ . Ɩsɩɩ n kama - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pilatɩ pɔɔsa - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ tɛŋ mə taa sɩ má ka mə wulaʋ na ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa cɔwa Pilatɩ sɩ : Lom wulaʋ sɔsɔ tike kɛ tə nyənəɣɩ ta wulaʋ , nɔɣɔlʋ fɛɩ tɔtɔ .

text: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified . And they took Jesus , and led him away .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pilatɩ cɛla - wɛɣɛ Yesu sɩ pá kamɩ - ɩ tesika tɔɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kpa Yesu na pá tɛɛna - ɩ .

text: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull , which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha :
text2: Yesu lɩɩ ɩcatɛ taa na ɩ ́ səɣəla ɩ səm tesika sɩ ɩ pukina timpi pa yaa sɩ nyʋmpɔɣɔlaɣa tɛ tɔ . ( Alaamee nyə ́ ma yaa tənɛ ɩnɩ sɩ Kɔləkɔta na pa tɛ taa . )

text: Where they crucified him , and two other with him , on either side one , and Jesus in the midst .
text2: Tənaɣa yoolaa kama - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ , na pá ka yəlaa kɛ naalɛ kɛ pɛlɛ pa nyəŋsɩ tɔɔ tɔtɔ . Ɩnɛ na cənɛ , ɩnɛ na cənɛ , na pá tʋ Yesu kɛ ́ hɛkʋ .

text: And Pilate wrote a title , and put it on the cross . And the writing was , JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pilatɩ yɔɣɔtaa sɩ pá ŋmaa tɔm na pá matɩ Yesu tesika tɔɔ sɩ : Yuta nyə ́ ma wulaʋ sɔsɔ Nasalɛtɩ Yesu kɔlɔ .

text: This title then read many of the Jews : for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city : and it was written in Hebrew , and Greek , and Latin .
text2: Yuta nyə ́ ma paɣalɛ kalaɣa tɔm tənɛ . Mpi tɔ , ɩcatɛ nɔɣɔ kɛ paa kama Yesu . Pə ́ cɔ ́ paa ŋmaa - tɩ na Alaamee taa , na Lom taa , na Kəlɛɛkɩ taa .

text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate , Write not , The King of the Jews ; but that he said , I am King of the Jews .
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma kɔtəlaa sɔsaa polaa na pá yɔɣɔtɩ Pilatɩ sɩ : Pə fɛɩ sɩ ń tʋ mpʋ sɩ Yuta nyə ́ ma wulaʋ sɔsɔ . Ama n ká ŋmaa kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ yɔɣɔtəna sɩ ɩnəɣəlɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma wulaʋ sɔsɔ .

text: Pilate answered , What I have written I have written .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pilatɩ tɔma Yuta nyə ́ ma sɩ : Nti ma ŋmaawa mpʋ tɔ , ntɩ tə caɣana .

text: Then the soldiers , when they had crucified Jesus , took his garments , and made four parts , to every soldier a part ; and also his coat : now the coat was without seam , woven from the top throughout .
text2: Yoolaa tɛma Yesu kɛ ́ kam kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá kpaɣa ɩ wontu na pá tala - təɣɩ tɔm liɣiti na paa wei ɩ ́ kuu . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kpaɣa ɩ capa tɔtɔ . Ɩlɛ capa ɩnɩ pa ta nyala - ɩ kʋnyalʋ . Ama pa lʋʋ - ɩ kʋlʋʋ kɛ ɩtamsaʋ kɛ yem kɛ ́ pə kpaɣaʋ ɩ luɣu na pə tii ɩ atɛ tɔɣɔ .

text: They said therefore among themselves , Let us not rend it , but cast lots for it , whose it shall be : that the scripture might be fulfilled , which saith , They parted my raiment among them , and for my vesture they did cast lots . These things therefore the soldiers did .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá tɔ təma sɩ : Tə ́ taa cəlɩ - ɩ . Ama tə ́ tɔ tɛtɛ na tə ́ ná sɩ awe ká tɔɣɔ - ɩ . Pa lapa mpʋ sɩ pə la teitei na nti paa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ sɩ : Pa tala ma wontu , pa tɔ ́ tɛtɛ kɛ ́ ma capa tɔɔ . Mpi yoolaa pɛlɛ pa lapa tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother , and his mother ' s sister , Mary the wife of Cleophas , and Mary Magdalene .
text2: Yesu too na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ neu , na Kolopasɩ alʋ Malɩ , na Makətala Malɩ , pa təna pa səŋa Yesu tesika kiŋ təna .

text: When Jesus therefore saw his mother , and the disciple standing by , whom he loved , he saith unto his mother , Woman , behold thy son !
text2: Yesu nawa ɩ too səŋa təna , na ɩ ɩfalʋ wei ɩ ka sɔɔlaa tɔɣɔ ɩ too kɔŋkɔŋ taa təna . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ heeli ɩ too sɩ : Alʋ nyá , nyá pəyalʋ kɛlɛ .

text: Then saith he to the disciple , Behold thy mother ! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home .
text2: Na ɩ ́ heeli ɩ ɩfalʋ sɩ : Nyá too kɛlɛ . Pə wule ntɛɣɛ ɩ ɩfalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kpeena - ɩ ɩ tɛ .

text: After this , Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished , that the scripture might be fulfilled , saith , I thirst .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ , waatʋ wei Yesu nawa sɩ pə təna pə maɣaa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ : Lʋkɔtʋ wɛna - m . Ɩ yɔɣɔta mpʋ sɩ pə ́ la teitei ɩsɩɩ paa ŋmaaʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ .

text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar : and they filled a spunge with vinegar , and put it upon hyssop , and put it to his mouth .
text2: Lʋm kʋnyəŋəm napəlɩ pɩɩ su fulaɣa nakələɣɩ təna təpam . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yoolaa caa saŋ na pá ŋmilisi lʋm mpɩ pə taa na pá tʋʋ tʋɣʋ ŋku pa yaa hisɔpʋ tɔ kʋ piliŋa tɔɔ na pá hʋləna ɩ nɔɣɔ .

text: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar , he said , It is finished : and he bowed his head , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Yesu mʋsa lʋm mpɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Pə təna pə maɣaa kɛlɛ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ká ɩ nyʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ hɛɛ .

text: The Jews therefore , because it was the preparation , that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day , ( for that sabbath day was an high day , ) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken , and that they might be taken away .
text2: Pə pamna kʋyakʋ ŋku kʋ yakaɣa sɩ pə fe na pá sʋʋ Tɛɛʋ acima tɔɣɔʋ taa tɔ kʋ wule . Yuta nyə ́ ma luɣu fɛɩ sɩ pə fe pa kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ na yəlaa mpɛ pa wɛ pa tesikasɩ tɔɔ kɛ mpʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ kɛ pa kʋyakʋ sɔsɔɔŋkʋ kɛ ́ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa sələma Pilatɩ sɩ ɩ ́ yele na pá pɛlɩ mpa pa kama mpʋ tɔ pa nɔɔhɛɛ na pá tisi - wɛ .

text: Then came the soldiers , and brake the legs of the first , and of the other which was crucified with him .
text2: Ɩlɛna yoolaa polo na pá pɛlɩ Yesu na mpa paa kama tɔ pa taa lɛlʋ nɔɔhɛɛ . Ɩlɛna pá tɛɛsɩ lɛlʋ nyəna .

text: But when they came to Jesus , and saw that he was dead already , they brake not his legs :
text2: Pa kɔma pa polo Yesu nyəna tɛɛsʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna pá maɣana ɩ tɛma səpʋ , ɩlɛna pá yele - yɛ .

text: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side , and forthwith came there out blood and water .
text2: Ɩlɛna yoolaa taa nɔɣɔlʋ sɔ ɩ kɔŋkɔŋ taa kɛ ́ ŋmantaaɣa , na caləm na lʋm pə lɩɩ təyaa .

text: And he that saw it bare record , and his record is true : and he knoweth that he saith true , that ye might believe .
text2: Yʋlʋ wei ɩ na tɔm tənɛ na ɩ ɩsəpəle tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ heelina - mɛɣɛ pə tampana . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ tampana heeluɣu pənɛ pə maɣaa . Ɩ heela - mɛɣɛ tampana kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ mʋ - tɩ .

text: For these things were done , that the scripture should be fulfilled , A bone of him shall not be broken .
text2: Pə ta lɩɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yem , pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ tɔm taa kɛ ́ tuu lɔŋ kɛ ́ sɩ : Pa kaa pɛlɩ Yesu mʋɣʋlɛ natəlɩ .

text: And again another scripture saith , They shall look on him whom they pierced .
text2: Na Ɩsɔ Tɔm ntɩ tə taa kɛ ́ tiili tɔtɔ sɩ : Paa tɛ na pá ná wei paa tʋlaa tɔ .

text: And after this Joseph of Arimathaea , being a disciple of Jesus , but secretly for fear of the Jews , besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus : and Pilate gave him leave . He came therefore , and took the body of Jesus .
text2: Pa tɛma mpʋ , ɩlɛna Alimatee Yosɛɛfʋ polo na ɩ ́ sələmɩ Pilatɩ sɩ ɩ kpakəɣɩ Yesu . ( Yosɛɛfʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ka kɛ ́ Yesu təŋlʋ kɛ ́ . Ama ɩ nyaŋaɣana Yuta nyə ́ ma , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ŋmɛsəɣɩ ɩ tɩ . ) Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pilatɩ tisaa , ɩlɛna Yosɛɛfʋ polo ɩ ́ kpaɣa Yesu .

text: And there came also Nicodemus , which at the first came to Jesus by night , and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about an hundred pound weight .
text2: Tənaɣa Nikotɛm wei ɩ ka pola Yesu kiŋ kɛ ahoo taa tɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kɔna tulaalʋ miili na alʋwɛɛ na pə sitaa na pə wɛ kiloonaa ɩsɩɩ hiu na naanʋwa .

text: Then took they the body of Jesus , and wound it in linen clothes with the spices , as the manner of the Jews is to bury .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa naalɛ pa kpaɣa sətʋ na pá mɛɛlɩ - ɩ kpoŋkpontu toŋ nyəntʋ pʋŋkahʋlʋŋa saalasɩ na pá yɔɣɔləɣɩ tulaalʋnaa . Yuta nyə ́ ma ɩ ́ piŋ yʋlʋ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa lakɩ .

text: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden ; and in the garden a new sepulchre , wherein was never man yet laid .
text2: Timpi paa kama Yesu kɛ ́ səm tesika tɔɔ kɛ ́ mpʋ tɔ haləm napəlɩ pɩɩ wɛ təna , na pə taa ka wɛ pəlaaʋ kʋfalʋɣʋ ŋku kʋ taa pa ta pinta nɔɣɔlʋ tɔ .

text: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews ' preparation day ; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa pona - ɩ na pá pimi - ɩ kʋ taa kɛ ́ kʋ ta hatələna təna tɔ pə tɔɔ . Pəyele pə tɩɩ feŋaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma kʋyakʋ kʋhɛɛsʋɣʋ kɛ ́ .

text: The first day of the week cometh Mary Magdalene early , when it was yet dark , unto the sepulchre , and seeth the stone taken away from the sepulchre .
text2: Makətala Malɩ kʋla lɔŋ kɛ cimaasɩ tanaŋ ahula tɛɛ , na ɩ ́ polo pəlaaʋ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ maɣana sɩ pɩɩʋ fɛɩ pʋ ́ ʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ nɔɣɔ .

text: Then she runneth , and cometh to Simon Peter , and to the other disciple , whom Jesus loved , and saith unto them , They have taken away the Lord out of the sepulchre , and we know not where they have laid him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kpaɣa asewa na ɩ ́ polo Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ na ɩfalʋ lɛlʋ wei Yesu sɔɔlaa tɔ pa kiŋ , na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Pa ləsa Tacaa kɛ pəlaaʋ taa tə ta nyɩ timpi pa sɩɩ - ɩ tɔ .

text: Peter therefore went forth , and that other disciple , and came to the sepulchre .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ na ɩfalʋ lɛlʋ pa lɩɩwa na pá polo pəlaaʋ tɔɔ .

text: So they ran both together : and the other disciple did outrun Peter , and came first to the sepulchre .
text2: Pa naalɛ pa seekaɣa . Ama ɩfalʋ lɛlʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kəla Piyɛɛ kɛ sewa , na ɩ ́ laalɩ - ɩ pəlaaʋ kiŋ kɛ tatɛ .

text: And he stooping down , and looking in , saw the linen clothes lying ; yet went he not in .
text2: Ɩ luŋaa na ɩ ́ wiili , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ná kponkpontu toŋ nyəntʋ saalasɩ kɛ atɛ . Ama ɩ ta tii pə taa .

text: Then cometh Simon Peter following him , and went into the sepulchre , and seeth the linen clothes lie ,
text2: Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ kɔma na ɩ ́ tala , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tii pəlaaʋ taa kɛ ́ kpakpaa na ɩ ́ ná saalasɩ nsəɣɩ atɛ .

text: And the napkin , that was about his head , not lying with the linen clothes , but wrapped together in a place by itself .
text2: Na saalaɣa ŋka paa taka Yesu nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔ . Saalaɣa ŋkɛ ka fɛɩ saalasɩ lɛŋsɩ kiŋ . Ama pa kpila - kɛ na pá sɩɩ - kɛ na ka mpaa .

text: Then went in also that other disciple , which came first to the sepulchre , and he saw , and believed .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩfalʋ wei ɩ ka laala pəlaaʋ kiŋ kɛ tatɛ tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ tɛɛsa tiiu na ɩ ́ ná na ɩ ́ tisi . (

text: For as yet they knew not the scripture , that he must rise again from the dead .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , tuu tɔ pa ta cɛkənta nti pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ Yesu ká sɩ na ɩ ́ fe tɔ tə tɔm . )

text: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ ɩfalaa mpɛ pa məla pa tɛɣɛ pa naalɛ .

text: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping : and as she wept , she stooped down , and looked into the sepulchre ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Malɩ ná saala pəlaaʋ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ wiiki . Ɩ wiikaɣa mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ luŋ na ɩ ́ wiili pəlaaʋ taa .

text: And seeth two angels in white sitting , the one at the head , and the other at the feet , where the body of Jesus had lain .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ná ɩsɔtaa tillaa kɛ naalɛ na pá suu wontu kʋhʋlʋmtʋ na pá caɣa timpi paa hɩɩsa Yesu tɔ , lɛlʋ kɛ ɩ nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ , na lɛlʋ na ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ kiŋ .

text: And they say unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? She saith unto them , Because they have taken away my Lord , and I know not where they have laid him .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩsɔtaa tillaa mpɛ pa pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Alʋ nyá , pepe lapa - ŋ na ń wiiki ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ alʋ cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma Caa kɛ pa ləsa pəlaaʋ taa , ma ta nyɩ timpi pa sɩɩ - ɩ tɔ .

text: And when she had thus said , she turned herself back , and saw Jesus standing , and knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Ɩ yɔɣɔtaɣa mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pəsɩ ɩ waalɩ na ɩ ́ na Yesu səŋaa . Ama ɩ ta nyɩ sɩ ɩnɩ .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? whom seekest thou ? She , supposing him to be the gardener , saith unto him , Sir , if thou have borne him hence , tell me where thou hast laid him , and I will take him away .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Alʋ nyá , pepe lapa - ŋ na ń wiiki mpʋ ? Aweɣe n pɛɛkəɣɩ ? Alʋ hʋʋkaɣa sɩ haləm tʋ kɛ ́ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ye nyá kpaɣana - ɩ , heeli - m timpi n sɩɩ - ɩ tɔ na má polo má kpaɣa - ɩ .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Mary . She turned herself , and saith unto him , Rabboni ; which is to say , Master .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu yaa - ɩ sɩ : Malɩ . Ɩlɛna Malɩ pəsəna Yesu tɔɔ na ɩ ́ yaa - ɩ na Hepəla taa sɩ : Laponi , Tacaa kɛ pa yaa mpʋ na Hepəla taa .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Touch me not ; for I am not yet ascended to my Father : but go to my brethren , and say unto them , I ascend unto my Father , and your Father ; and to my God , and your God .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Yele - m , taa tɔkɩ - m mpʋ . Ma ta kpata ma Caa kiŋ na pə ́ cɔ ́ . Ama polo na ń heeli ma taapalaa sɩ ma kpaa ma Caa na ma Ɩsɔ wei ɩ kɛ ́ mə Caa na mə Ɩsɔ tɔtɔ tɔ ɩ kiŋ .

text: Mary Magdalene came and told the disciples that she had seen the Lord , and that he had spoken these things unto her .
text2: Tənaɣa Makətala Malɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ heeli ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ma nawa Tacaa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ - wɛɣɛ nti Yesu ka heela - ɩ tɔ .

text: Then the same day at evening , being the first day of the week , when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled for fear of the Jews , came Jesus and stood in the midst , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Cimaasɩ ɩnɩ ɩ taanaɣa tɔɔ ɩ ɩfalaa ka kota kutuluɣu nakʋlɩ kʋ taa , na pá kaləsɩ pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa nyaŋaɣana Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ pə tɔɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu lɩɩ pa hɛkʋ taa təsɛlɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ hɛɛsɩ laŋa .

text: And when he had so said , he shewed unto them his hands and his side . Then were the disciples glad , when they saw the Lord .
text2: Ɩ tɛma - wɛɣɛ sɛɛʋ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ hʋlɩ - wɛɣɛ ɩ ntantakəŋ na ɩ kɔŋkɔŋ . Ɩ ɩfalaa na - ɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pa laŋa hʋlʋmɩ teu .

text: Then said Jesus to them again , Peace be unto you : as my Father hath sent me , even so send I you .
text2: Na Yesu tasa - wɛɣɛ sɛɛʋ na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ hɛɛsɩ mə laŋa . Ɩsɩɩ ma Caa tila - m tɔ , ma maɣamaɣa ma tiliɣi - mɛɣɛ mpʋ tɔtɔ .

text: And when he had said this , he breathed on them , and saith unto them , Receive ye the Holy Ghost :
text2: Ɩ tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtaɣa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ woso heelim kɛ pa tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ ɩ ́ tii mə tɔɔ .

text: Whose soever sins ye remit , they are remitted unto them ; and whose soever sins ye retain , they are retained .
text2: Mpa mpa paa la ɩsaɣatʋ na ɩ ́ hʋlɩ - wɛɣɛ suulu tɔ , paa na suulu . Ama mpa mpa ɩ ́ kaa hʋlɩ suulu tɔ pɛlɛ pa kaa na suulu .

text: But Thomas , one of the twelve , called Didymus , was not with them when Jesus came .
text2: Yesu kɔm pa naanʋwa na naalɛ kiŋ tɔ , pa taa lɛlʋ Tomaa ( wei ɩ kɛ ́ tompu tɔ , ) ɩ fɛɩ pa hɛkʋ .

text: The other disciples therefore said unto him , We have seen the Lord . But he said unto them , Except I shall see in his hands the print of the nails , and put my finger into the print of the nails , and thrust my hand into his side , I will not believe .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩfalaa lɛlaa heela Tomaa sɩ : Tə nawa Tacaa . Tənaɣa Tomaa tɔma sɩ : Ye ma ta na ɩ ntantakəŋ taa kɛ ́ nyəma lona , na má tʋ ma mpəle kɛ lona anɩ a taa , na má takɩ ɩ kɔŋkɔŋ taa , ma kaa mʋ - təɣɩ paa pəcɔ .

text: And after eight days again his disciples were within , and Thomas with them : then came Jesus , the doors being shut , and stood in the midst , and said , Peace be unto you .
text2: Cimaasɩ sikaa , ɩlɛna Yesu ɩfalaa tasa kotuɣu kɛ təyaɣa taa na Tomaa wɛ pa hɛkʋ . Na Yesu lɩɩ pa hɛkʋ təsɛlɩ na ɩ ́ səŋ , na nɔnɔɔsɩ kaləsa mpʋ . Na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ hɛɛsɩ laŋa .

text: Then saith he to Thomas , reach hither thy finger , and behold my hands ; and reach hither thy hand , and thrust it into my side : and be not faithless , but believing .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ Tomaa sɩ : Tʋ nyá mpəle kɛ cənɛ , na ń ná ma niŋ taa . Na ń kɔna nyá niŋ na ń takɩ ma kɔŋkɔŋ taa . Taa la sika tɔtɔ , ama tisi .

text: And Thomas answered and said unto him , My Lord and my God .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Tomaa tɔma sɩ : Haɩ ma Caa na ma Ɩsɔ .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thomas , because thou hast seen me , thou hast believed : blessed are they that have not seen , and yet have believed .
text2: Na Yesu pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : N na - m tɔɣɔlɛ n tisaa ? Mpa pa ta na - m pə ́ cɔ ́ pa tisaa tɔ , pa nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ .

text: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples , which are not written in this book :
text2: Yesu lapa ɩ ɩfalaa ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ piti təma paɣalɛ tɔtɔ , nna pa ta ŋmaa takəlaɣa kanɛ ka taa tɔ .

text: But these are written , that ye might believe that Jesus is the Christ , the Son of God ; and that believing ye might have life through his name .
text2: Ama pa ŋmaa tənɛ təlɛɣɛ sɩ , pə la na ɩ ́ tisi sɩ Yesu kɛlɛ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa Mesii . Na ɩ ́ tisa mpʋ ɩ ́ hiki weesuɣu kɛ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: After these things Jesus shewed himself again to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias ; and on this wise shewed he himself .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ Yesu tasa lɩɩʋ kɛ ɩ ɩfalaa tɔɔ kɛ ́ Tipeliyatɩ teŋku nɔɣɔ . Ɩsəna ɩ lɩɩ pa tɔɔ tɔɣɔlɔ .

text: There were together Simon Peter , and Thomas called Didymus , and Nathanael of Cana in Galilee , and the sons of Zebedee , and two other of his disciples .
text2: Kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ , na ( tompu ) Tomaa , na ( Kalilee Kana tʋ ) Natanayɛɛ , na Sepetee pəyalaa , na Yesu ɩfalaa taa napələɣɩ naalɛ pa kotaa na pá caɣaa .

text: Simon Peter saith unto them , I go a fishing . They say unto him , We also go with thee . They went forth , and entered into a ship immediately ; and that night they caught nothing .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Maa polo tiina kpaʋ . Tənaɣa ɩ ɩfalaa pɛlɛ sɩ : Tɩɩ təŋɩ - ŋ . Ɩlɛna pá kʋlɩ na pá polo pá kpa kpiiliya taa , na ahoo anɩ pa ta hiki paa pʋlʋ cəcəka .

text: But when the morning was now come , Jesus stood on the shore : but the disciples knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Pə kɔma sɩ pə nyaaləɣɩ , ɩlɛna Yesu kɔɔ na ɩ ́ səŋ kʋteŋ tɔɔ . Ama ɩ ɩfalaa ta nyɩ sɩ ɩnɩ .

text: Then Jesus saith unto them , Children , have ye any meat ? They answered him , No .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu kpɛɛsa - wɛ sɩ : Ma pəyalaa mɛ , ɩ ́ ta hiki pʋlʋ taa ? Ɩlɛna pɛlɛ pa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Aaɩ yoo .

text: And he said unto them , Cast the net on the right side of the ship , and ye shall find . They cast therefore , and now they were not able to draw it for the multitude of fishes .
text2: Ɩlɛna Yesu tɔ ɩ ɩfalaa sɩ : Ɩ ́ pɛtɩ puluɣu na kpiiliya ntɔɣɔŋ tɔɔ , ɩ ́ ká hiki tiina . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa pɛta - kʋ na pá kpisi kʋ ləsʋɣʋ kɛ lʋm taa . Tiina su katatəlaɣa tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter , It is the Lord . Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord , he girt his fisher ' s coat unto him , ( for he was naked , ) and did cast himself into the sea .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩfalʋ wei Yesu sɔɔlaa tɔ ɩ tɔma Piyɛɛ sɩ : Tacaa kɛ ́ . Tuu ɩsɩɩ Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ nɩɩʋ mpʋ sɩ Tacaa tɔ , tənaɣa ɩ copa ɩ wontu na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔlɩ na ɩ ́ ŋmaa lʋm taa . ( Mpi tɔ , pɩɩ pamna ɩ ka caɣa kpɛtɛ kɛ ́ . )

text: And the other disciples came in a little ship ; ( for they were not far from land , but as it were two hundred cubits , ) dragging the net with fishes .
text2: Yesu ɩfalaa lɛlaa kɔmna kpiiliya na pá hɔŋ puluɣu na kʋ suna tiina . Pa taa hatələna kʋteŋ , pɩɩ wɛ ɩsɩɩ mɛɛtələnaa nɩɩnʋwa ( 100 ) .

text: As soon then as they were come to land , they saw a fire of coals there , and fish laid thereon , and bread .
text2: Pa tala kʋteŋ tɔɔ , ɩlɛna pá maɣana mamala na a tɔɔ kɛ ́ tiina na potopotonaa sɩ pə haŋ .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Bring of the fish which ye have now caught .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Tiina nna ɩ ́ kpawa nɔɔnɔɔ tɔ , ɩ ́ ləsɩ a taa naalɩ na ɩ ́ kɔna .

text: Simon Peter went up , and drew the net to land full of great fishes , and hundred and fifty and three : and for all there were so many , yet was not the net broken .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ kpa kpiiliya taa na ɩ ́ tuu puluɣu na ɩ ́ ləsɩ tɛtʋ tɔɔ , na kʋ suna tiina kʋyasəlɛɛ , na a nyʋɣʋ wɛ nɩɩnʋwa na nɩɩlɛ na naanʋwa na tooso ( 153 ) . Paa na a tɔɔʋ kɛ mpʋ tɔ , puluɣu ta cəlɩ .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Come and dine . And none of the disciples durst ask him , Who art thou ? knowing that it was the Lord .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ ləsɩ sɔntɔ . Ama Yesu ɩfalaa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ta nɔkɩ - ɩ pɔɔsʋɣʋ sɩ : Aweɣe - ɩ ? Pa nyəma - ɩ sɩ Tacaa tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: Jesus then cometh , and taketh bread , and giveth them , and fish likewise .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tuusaa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa potopotonaa na ɩ ́ cɛlɛ - wɛ , na ɩ lapa tiina kɛ mpʋ tɔtɔ .

text: This is now the third time that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples , after that he was risen from the dead .
text2: Ɩ fem waalɩ , tɔm tooso nyəm ntɔ ɩ lɩɩkʋɣʋ ɩ ɩfalaa tɔɔ tɔ .

text: So when they had dined , Jesus saith to Simon Peter , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me more than these ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my lambs .
text2: Yesu ɩfalaa tɛma tɔɣɔʋ , ɩlɛna Yesu pɔɔsɩ Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ sɩ : Yohaanɩ pəyalʋ Simɔŋ , n sɔɔla - m na pə ́ kəlɩ panɛ ? Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Nn Tacaa , nyá maɣamaɣa n nyəmá sɩ ma luɣu wɛ - ŋ . Tənaɣa Yesu tɔma Piyɛɛ sɩ : Paasəna ma ɩwɛɛsɩ .

text: He saith to him again the second time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa Piyɛɛ kɛ pɔɔsʋɣʋ sɩ : Yohaanɩ pəyalʋ Simɔŋ , n sɔɔla - m ? Ɩlɛna Piyɛɛ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Nn Tacaa , nyá maɣamaɣa n nyəmá sɩ ma luɣu wɛ - ŋ . Ɩlɛna Yesu tɔ Piyɛɛ sɩ : Paasəna ma heeŋ .

text: He saith unto him the third time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time , Lovest thou me ? And he said unto him , Lord , thou knowest all things ; thou knowest that I love thee . Jesus saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu tasa - ɩ pɔɔsʋɣʋ kɛ tɔm tooso nyəm sɩ : Yohaanɩ pəyalʋ Simɔŋ , nyá luɣu wɛ - m ? Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ laŋlɛ wakəlaa , ɩsɩɩ Yesu tasʋɣʋ - ɩ pɔɔsʋɣʋ kɛ tɔm tooso nyəm sɩ : Nyá luɣu wɛ - m tɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , n nyəmá pə təna . N nyəmá sɩ ma luɣu wɛ - ŋ . Ɩlɛna Yesu cɔ Piyɛɛ sɩ : Tɔʋ , paasəna ma heeŋ ɩlɛ .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , When thou wast young , thou girdedst thyself , and walkedst whither thou wouldest : but when thou shalt be old , thou shalt stretch forth thy hands , and another shall gird thee , and carry thee whither thou wouldest not .
text2: Tampana kɛ ma heeliɣi - ŋ yoo , maa cɛsəɣɩ . Waatʋ wei n ka kɛ ́ ɩfepu tɔ , n ləlaɣa nyá təɣɩ nyá tampala na ń tɛɛkɩ timpi n sɔɔlaa tɔ . Ama ń kɔma ń kpatəlɩ , n ká kpaasɩ nyá niŋ na lɛlʋ ká ləlɩ - ŋ nyá tampala na ɩ ́ pona - ŋ timpi n ta sɔɔlɩ tɔ .

text: This spake he , signifying by what death he should glorify God . And when he had spoken this , he saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: ( Yesu yɔɣɔta mpʋ sɩ ɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ səm mpi Piyɛɛ ká sɩ na pə kʋsɩ Ɩsɔ nyʋɣʋ tɔ . ) Yesu tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtaɣa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ heeli Piyɛɛ sɩ : Təŋɩ - m .

text: Then Peter , turning about , seeth the disciple whom Jesus loved following ; which also leaned on his breast at supper , and said , Lord , which is he that betrayeth thee ?
text2: Piyɛɛ pəsaa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ná ɩfalʋ wei Yesu sɔɔlaa tɔ na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ pa waalɩ . ( Ɩfalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ka wɛɛləna Yesu laŋlɛ tɔɔ kɛ ́ tətɔɣɔlɛ taa na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa awe ká lana - ŋ kɔlɔmɔtɔ ? )

text: Peter seeing him saith to Jesus , Lord , and what shall this man do ?
text2: Piyɛɛ nawa Yesu ɩfalʋ ɩnɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ Yesu sɩ : Tacaa , na ɩnɛ se , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ká tɛna we ?

text: Jesus saith unto him , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ? follow thou me .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ Piyɛɛ sɩ : Ye ma nɔkaa sɩ ɩ ́ caɣa mpʋ haləna ma kɔntɛ , nyá nyəntʋ suweɣe pə taa ? Nyaa təŋɩ - m te .

text: Then went this saying abroad among the brethren , that that disciple should not die : yet Jesus said not unto him , He shall not die ; but , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ?
text2: Tənaɣa ta taapalaa tɛɛna - tɩ sɩ Yesu ɩfalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kaa sɩ . Pəyele Yesu ná tá heeli Piyɛɛ sɩ ɩ kaa sɩ . Ama ɩ tɔmaɣa sɩ : Ye ma nɔkaa sɩ ɩ ́ caɣa mpʋ haləna ma kɔntɛ , nyá nyəntʋ suweɣe pə taa ?

text: This is the disciple which testifieth of these things , and wrote these things : and we know that his testimony is true .
text2: Yesu ɩfalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ kɛɛsəna tɔm tənɛ na ɩ ́ tʋ - təɣɩ takəlaɣa taa . Na tə nyəmá sɩ pə təna mpi ɩ tɔma sɩ pə lapa tɔ , tampana ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa .

text: And there are also many other things which Jesus did , the which , if they should be written every one , I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written . Amen .
text2: Yesu lapa təma paɣalɛ paɣalɛ lɛnna , na ye paa tɔma sɩ pá ŋmaa a təna təcɛɩcɛɩ kɛ takəlasɩ taa , ma ta hʋʋ sɩ sɩɩ maɣa antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ təna ɩ taa .

text: The former treatise have I made , O Theophilus , of all that Jesus began both to do and teach ,
text2: Ma yʋlʋ Teufiili , ma takəlaɣa kancaalaɣa nyəŋka taa ma kɛɛsa mpi mpi Yesu caala lapʋ tɔ , na nti nti ɩ sɛɣɛsa pə kpaɣaʋ kancaalaɣa ,

text: Until the day in which he was taken up , after that he through the Holy Ghost had given commandments unto the apostles whom he had chosen :
text2: na pə ́ sɩɩna kʋyaŋku ɩ kpa ɩsɔ tɔ . Na pə ́ cɔ ́ Yesu kpa ɩsɔ tɔ , ɩ ka heelina Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toŋ kɛ mpi ɩ caa sɩ yəlaa mpa ɩ ləsaa sɩ ɩ tillaa tɔ pá la tɔ .

text: To whom also he shewed himself alive after his passion by many infallible proofs , being seen of them forty days , and speaking of the things pertaining to the kingdom of God :
text2: Yesu səm waalɩ ɩ lɩɩkaɣa ɩ tillaa tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣə ́ na - wɛɣɛ yaasinaa paɣalɛ taa sɩ ɩ fema . Halɩ kʋyɛɛŋ nɩɩlɛ taa təcu kɛ ́ Yesu lɩɩkaɣa ɩ tillaa tɔɔ na ɩ ́ lakɩ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa waasʋ .

text: And , being assembled together with them , commanded them that they should not depart from Jerusalem , but wait for the promise of the Father , which , saith he , ye have heard of me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ Yesu na ɩ tillaa pa caɣaa na pá tɔŋna tɔɣɔʋ . Tənaɣa ɩ heela - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ taa hatələna Yosalɛm . Ama ɩ ́ keŋna mpi Tacaa ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha tɔ , kʋcɔɔʋ ŋku kʋ tɔm maa heela - mɛ tɔ .

text: For John truly baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost not many days hence .
text2: Mpi pə tɔɔ tɔ , lʋm maɣamaɣa kɛ Yohaanɩ naa sɔna yəlaa kɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm . Ama ye mɛ ɩlɛ , pɩɩ la wɛɛ naalɛ tɔ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ maɣamaɣa kɛ paa kɛlɩ na pá sɔ - mɛ .

text: When they therefore were come together , they asked of him , saying , Lord , wilt thou at this time restore again the kingdom to Israel ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu na mpa paa kota mpʋ tɔ pa pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , ye mpʋ pənɛɣɛlɛ n ká taɣanɩ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ kawulaɣa ŋkɛɣɛ kʋsʋɣʋ na ?

text: And he said unto them , It is not for you to know the times or the seasons , which the Father hath put in his own power .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu cɔ ɩ na mpa paa kota mpʋ tɔ sɩ : Pə taɣa sɩ mɩɩ nyəna kʋyɛɛŋ yaa waatʋnaa mpa Tacaa maɣamaɣa sɩɩna ɩ toŋ tɔ se .

text: But ye shall receive power , after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you : and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem , and in all Judaea , and in Samaria , and unto the uttermost part of the earth .
text2: Ama kʋyaŋku Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ ka tii mə tɔɔ tɔ , ɩ ́ ká hiki toma na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ pə təna mpi ɩ ́ nana mə ɩsəpee tɔ pə tampana kɛ Yosalɛm , na Yuta , na Samalii pə tɛtʋnaa təna taa . Haləna pə ́ polo pə tala antulinya tənasɩ təna təpaɩ .

text: And when he had spoken these things , while they beheld , he was taken up ; and a cloud received him out of their sight .
text2: Yesu tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna pə ́ kpaasɩ - ɩ ɩsɔ na pá nyənəɣɩ - ɩ mpʋ . Haləna pʋlʋpʋ ɩsɩɩ ŋmʋntʋɣʋ kɔɔ pə takɩ ɩ tɔɔ , pa ta tasa - ɩ naʋ .

text: And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up , behold , two men stood by them in white apparel ;
text2: Yesu kpa ɩsɔ na ɩ tillaa wɛɛ na pá tɔŋna nyənʋɣʋ təpiŋŋ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛ pa tuta apalaa naalɛɣɛ pa cɔlɔɣɔlɛ na pá suu wontu kʋhʋlʋmtʋ .

text: Which also said , Ye men of Galilee , why stand ye gazing up into heaven ? this same Jesus , which is taken up from you into heaven , shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven .
text2: Na apalaa mpɛ pá pɔɔsɩ tillaa sɩ : Kalilee nyə ́ ma mɛ , pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ səŋaa na ɩ ́ nyənəɣɩ ɩsɔ kɛ ́ mpʋ ? Yesu wei pə ləsa mə hɛkʋ na pə ́ kpaasɩ - ɩ ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , ɩ ká tɛ na ɩ ́ məlɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ teitei ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ na - ɩ na ɩ ́ kpaakɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ .

text: Then returned they unto Jerusalem from the mount called Olivet , which is from Jerusalem a sabbath day ' s journey .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tillaa kʋla tɩɩŋ wei pa yaa sɩ Olifinaa tɔ ɩ pʋɣʋ ŋku kʋ kiŋ paa wɛɛ tɔ na pá məlɩ Yosalɛm . Pʋɣʋ ŋkʋ na Yosalɛm pə fɛɩ pooluŋ . Pə ta kəlɩ kilomɛɛtəlɩ kʋlʋm .

text: And when they were come in , they went up into an upper room , where abode both Peter , and James , and John , and Andrew , Philip , and Thomas , Bartholomew , and Matthew , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon Zelotes , and Judas the brother of James .
text2: Pa talaa , ɩlɛna pá kpa pa ɩsɔtaa kutuluɣu ŋku kʋ taa paa sʋʋkaɣa tɔ . Mpa pa sʋʋkaɣa təna tɔɣɔlɛ Piyɛɛ , na Yohaanɩ , na Saakɩ , na Antəlɩɩ , na Filipʋ , na Tomaa , na Paatelemii , na Matiyee , na Aləfe pəyalʋ Saakɩ , na Simɔŋ wei ɩ kɛ ́ mpa pa lʋkaɣa sɩ pa mʋɣɩ pa tɛtʋ tɔ pa taa lɛlʋ tɔ , na Saakɩ pəyalʋ Yuti .

text: These all continued with one accord in prayer and supplication , with the women , and Mary the mother of Jesus , and with his brethren .
text2: Pa təna pa kotaɣa təntəmlɛ kɛ tam na pá sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ . Pa taa ka wɛ alaa napəlɩ , na Yesu too , na Yesu newaa .

text: And in those days Peter stood up in the midst of the disciples , and said , ( the number of names together were about an hundred and twenty , )
text2: Kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa , kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ yəlaa kotaa , halɩ pa tala ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋnyɔɔŋ nɩɩnʋwa na hiu ( 120 ) . Ɩlɛna Piyɛɛ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ səŋ ɩ taapalaa mpɛ pa hɛkʋ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ :

text: Men and brethren , this scripture must needs have been fulfilled , which the Holy Ghost by the mouth of David spake before concerning Judas , which was guide to them that took Jesus .
text2: Ma taapalaa mɛ , tɔm nti Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ ka tʋ Tafiiti nɔɣɔ taa na ɩ ́ yɔtɔtɩ , na tə ́ wɛ Ɩsɔ Tɔm takəlaɣa taa kɛ ́ Yutaasɩ wei ɩ tɛɛ Yesu kpalaa kɛ nɔɣɔ tɔ ɩ tɔm tɔ , pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ tɩɩ la .

text: For he was numbered with us , and had obtained part of this ministry .
text2: Yutaasɩ ɩnɩ ɩ ka kɛ ́ ta taa lɛlʋ , na tá na - ɩ tɩɩ kpɛnta təmlɛ tənɛ tə taa .

text: Now this man purchased a field with the reward of iniquity ; and falling headlong , he burst asunder in the midst , and all his bowels gushed out .
text2: Apalʋ ɩnɩ , waatʋ wei ɩ tɛma tɛtʋ yapʋ na ɩ tulum liɣitee anɩ tɔ , ɩ polaa na ɩ ́ hoti tə taa kɛ ́ ɩ nɔɣɔ tɔɔ , na ɩ lotu tʋlɩ , na ɩ taa lotu ya na tə ́ ŋmaa .

text: And it was known unto all the dwellers at Jerusalem ; insomuch as that field is called in their proper tongue , Aceldama , that is to say , The field of blood .
text2: Tɔm tənɛ tə yɛka Yosalɛm nyə ́ ma təna kiŋ , haləna pá ha tɛtʋ ntəɣɩ hətɛ na pa tɛ taa sɩ : Akeletama . Caləm tɛtʋ kɛ pa yaa mpʋ na pa tɛ taa .

text: For it is written in the book of Psalms , Let his habitation be desolate , and let no man dwell therein : and his bishoprick let another take .
text2: Pa ŋmaa Yontu takəlaɣa taa sɩ : Ɩ təyaɣa ɩ ́ təkɩ kaaʋ . Nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa kʋsɩ - kɛ . Na lɛntɩ tɔtɔ sɩ : Nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ lɛɛtɩ ɩ lonte .

text: Wherefore of these men which have companied with us all the time that the Lord Jesus went in and out among us ,
text2: Ye mpʋ pə wɛɛ sɩ mpa pa təŋaɣa - tʋɣʋ waatʋ wei tá na Tacaa Yesu tə cɔɔkaɣa tɛtʋnaa tɔ , pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ sɔɔsɩ tá tɔɔ , na tá na - ɩ tə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ Tacaa Yesu səpʋ na ɩ ́ fe tɔ pə tampana . Pʋntʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ká wɛɛ wei kʋyɛɛŋ təna ɩ ka wɛ tá waalɩ kɛ ́ pə kpaɣaʋ Yohaanɩ sɔʋ Yesu kɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm tɔ , haləna kʋyaŋku pə ləsa - ɩ tá hɛkʋ na pə ́ kpaasɩ - ɩ ɩsɔ tɔ .

text: And they appointed two , Joseph called Barsabas , who was surnamed Justus , and Matthias .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa ləsa yəlaa naalɛ , Yosɛɛfʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Paasapasɩ na pá cuɣusi - ɩ sɩ Yutusi tɔ , na Matiyasɩ .

text: And they prayed , and said , Thou , Lord , which knowest the hearts of all men , shew whether of these two thou hast chosen ,
text2: Ɩlɛna pá sələmɩ sɩ : Tacaa , nyá nyəmna yəlaa lotunaa , hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - tʋɣʋ yəlaa panɛ pa naalɛ pa taa wei n ləsaa sɩ ɩ ́ la tillu ,

text: That he may take part of this ministry and apostleship , from which Judas by transgression fell , that he might go to his own place .
text2: na ɩ ́ paasəna təmlɛ nte Yutaasɩ yelaa na ɩ ́ tɛɛ ɩ nyəŋkʋ tɔ .

text: And they gave forth their lots ; and the lot fell upon Matthias ; and he was numbered with the eleven apostles .
text2: Tənaɣa pa tɔ tɛtɛ na pə ́ kpa Matiyasɩ , na ɩ ́ sɔɔsɩ tillaa naanʋwa na kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: And when the day of Pentecost was fully come , they were all with one accord in one place .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə tala Pɛntakɔnta acima wule , ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa koti pa tənaɣa təntəmlɛ .

text: And suddenly there came a sound from heaven as of a rushing mighty wind , and it filled all the house where they were sitting .
text2: Pə tasaa ɩlɛ , kɔkɔtɛ natəlɩ , ɩsɩɩ heelim sɔsɔɔm makʋɣʋ tɔ , lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa kɛlɛ , na tə ́ nyaləna təyaɣa ŋka ka taa paa wɛ mpʋ tɔ .

text: And there appeared unto them cloven tongues like as of fire , and it sat upon each of them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pʋlʋpʋnaa lɩɩ pa tɔɔ na pə ́ nəɣəsəna ɩsɩɩ kɔkɔ nsəma . Ɩlɛna pʋlʋpʋnaa mpɛ pá ya na pá caɣa paa wei ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ kʋlʋm kʋlʋm .

text: And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and began to speak with other tongues , as the Spirit gave them utterance .
text2: Tənaɣa Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ haɣa pa təna pa taa təmammam , na pá sʋʋ piitim lɛmpɩ tɔm yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ , na nti Feesuɣu tʋ pa taa tɔ ntəɣɩ pa yɔɣɔtaɣa .

text: And there were dwelling at Jerusalem Jews , devout men , out of every nation under heaven .
text2: Pə pamna mpa pa təŋəɣɩ Ɩsɔ mpaaʋ kɛ teu tɔ pa lɩɩna antulinya təna taa na pá wɛ Yosalɛm kɛ waatʋ ɩnɩ .

text: Now when this was noised abroad , the multitude came together , and were confounded , because that every man heard them speak in his own language .
text2: Yəlaa mpɛ pa nɩɩ kɔkɔtɛ ńtɛ ́ tə taŋ , ɩlɛna pá koti sɔsɔm . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa - wɛɣɛ ha , pə taɣa pʋlʋ , paa wei ɩ nɩɩkaɣa Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa yɔɣɔtəɣəna ɩ tɛ taa .

text: And they were all amazed and marvelled , saying one to another , Behold , are not all these which speak Galilaeans ?
text2: Tənaɣa pa kpa nɔɔsɩ na pə ́ la - wɛɣɛ piti , na pá tɔ sɩ : Ɩsɩɩ Kalilee nyə ́ ma tike yɔɣɔtəɣəna ɩsəntɔ .

text: And how hear we every man in our own tongue , wherein we were born ?
text2: Ɩlɛ pə lapa ɩsəna na paa tá taa wei ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ pa yɔɣɔtəɣəna ɩ tɛ taa ?

text: Parthians , and Medes , and Elamites , and the dwellers in Mesopotamia , and in Judaea , and Cappadocia , in Pontus , and Asia ,
text2: Anɩ tá taa cənɛ mpa pa lɩɩna Paatɩ tɛtʋ tɔ pa wɛɛ , Metii na Ɩlam pə nyə ́ ma ná wɛɛ , Mesopotami nyə ́ ma ná wɛɛ , na Yuta na Kapatɔɔsɩ pə nyə ́ ma , na Pɔŋ nyə ́ ma na Asii tɛtʋ nyə ́ ma ,

text: Phrygia , and Pamphylia , in Egypt , and in the parts of Libya about Cyrene , and strangers of Rome , Jews and proselytes ,
text2: Filicii na Pamfili pə nyə ́ ma , na Icipiti nyə ́ ma na Silɛɛnɩ cɔlɔ Lipii tɛtʋ hɔɣɔlʋɣʋ lɛŋkʋ nyə ́ ma , na pə kaasa lɛlaa mpa pa lɩɩna Lom tɔ .

text: Cretes and Arabians , we do hear them speak in our tongues the wonderful works of God .
text2: Yuta nyə ́ ma siɣisiɣi wɛɛ , na pə kaasɩ mpa pa sʋʋ Yuta nyə ́ ma Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ kɛ kʋsʋʋ tɔ , na Kəlɛɛtɩ nyə ́ ma na Alapʋ nyə ́ ma . Paa na mpʋ pa tɩɩ kɛɛsəɣɩ Ɩsɔ təma sɔsɔɔna tɔm na tá tɔmnaa waanɩ waanɩ taa , na tə nɩɩkɩ tá təna .

text: And they were all amazed , and were in doubt , saying one to another , What meaneth this ?
text2: Pə təmsa pa təna , pa ta nyɩ nti paa yɔɣɔtɩ tɔ . Ɩlɛna pá pɔɔsəɣɩ təma sɩ , tɔm tənɛ ntiɣilɛ mpʋ ?

text: Others mocking said , These men are full of new wine .
text2: Ama lɛlaa ná woŋa - wɛ , na pá tɔ sɩ sʋlʋm pɩɩna - wɛ .

text: But Peter , standing up with the eleven , lifted up his voice , and said unto them , Ye men of Judaea , and all ye that dwell at Jerusalem , be this known unto you , and hearken to my words :
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ na tillaa lɛlaa naanʋwa na kʋlʋm ɩnɩ pa kʋlaa na pá səŋ ɩsɔ . Ɩlɛna Piyɛɛ yɔɣɔtəna samaa na nɔɣɔ sɔsaɣa sɩ : Ma Yuta nyə ́ ma mɛ , na mpa mɛ mə kɔma Yosalɛm kɛ kʋkɔm tɔ , ɩ ́ tʋ ŋkpaŋŋ na ɩ ́ cɛkəna teu kɛ nti ma heeliɣi - mɛ tɔ .

text: For these are not drunken , as ye suppose , seeing it is but the third hour of the day .
text2: Pə taɣa sʋlʋm kʋɣʋna yəlaa panɛ ɩnɩ ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ hʋʋkɩ tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pə kəla tanaŋ .

text: But this is that which was spoken by the prophet Joel ;
text2: Ama nti Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Sowɛɛlɩ ka yɔɣɔtaa tɔ , ntɩ tə maɣamaɣa tə lakəna saŋa .

text: And it shall come to pass in the last days , saith God , I will pour out of my Spirit upon all flesh : and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy , and your young men shall see visions , and your old men shall dream dreams :
text2: Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Nti maa la kʋyɛɛŋ kantəkaɣa nyəŋ taa tɔɣɔlɔ . Maa tisi ma Feesuɣu kɛ yəlaa təna tɔɔ . Mə pəyalaa na mə pɛɛlaa ká na nti tɩɩ la cele tɔ na pá yɔɣɔtɩ . Pɩɩ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ mə ɩfepiya kɛ tɔmnaa na pá nana pa ɩsəpee . Na mə kʋkpatəlaa ká toosi toosee .

text: And on my servants and on my handmaidens I will pour out in those days of my Spirit ; and they shall prophesy :
text2: Tampana tɔɔ , maa tisi ma Feesuɣu kɛ ma təmlɛ nyə ́ ma , apalaa na alaa nyə ́ ma , pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa . Paa ná nti tɩɩ la cele tɔ na pá yɔɣɔtɩ - tɩ .

text: And I will shew wonders in heaven above , and signs in the earth beneath ; blood , and fire , and vapour of smoke :
text2: Maa la kɔkɔlɔ nyəmnaa kɛ hatoo ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ taa , na piti təma kɛ atɛ . Caləm na kɔkɔ na nyɔɔsɩ sɔsɔɔnsɩ ká nyala .

text: The sun shall be turned into darkness , and the moon into blood , before that great and notable day of the Lord come :
text2: Ilim ká sɩ təkpitii . Ɩsɔtʋ ká sɛɛ ɩsɩɩ caləm . Pə təna pɩɩ la mpʋ na pə ́ cɔ ́ pə ́ tala Tacaa kʋyakʋ sɔsɔɔŋkʋ teeli nyəŋkʋ ŋkʋ .

text: And it shall come to pass , that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Pə ́ na pə mpʋ tɔ yəlaa təna mpa paa yaa Tacaa hətɛ tɔ paa tʋlɩ - tɩ .

text: Ye men of Israel , hear these words ; Jesus of Nazareth , a man approved of God among you by miracles and wonders and signs , which God did by him in the midst of you , as ye yourselves also know :
text2: Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma mɛ , ɩ ́ nɩɩ nti ma heeliɣi - mɛ tɔ . Nasalɛtɩ Yesu kɛ ́ yʋlʋ wei ɩ sɔsɔɔntʋ Ɩsɔ hʋ ́ lá - mɛ tɔɣɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Yesu niŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ lapəna piti təma na sɔɣɔntʋ təma na Ɩsɔ kɔkɔlɔ nyəmnaa mpa ɩ hʋ ́ lá mə hɛkʋ taa tɔ . Ɩsɩɩ mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ nyəm pə təna tɔ .

text: Him , being delivered by the determinate counsel and foreknowledge of God , ye have taken , and by wicked hands have crucified and slain :
text2: Na yʋlʋ ɩnəɣɩ Ɩsɔ kpaɣaa na ɩ ́ cɛlɛ - mɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩ ka hʋʋ ɩ taa na ɩ ́ tʋ pə pəlɛ sɩ ɩ ká la tɔ . Ama mə kʋ - ɩ , mə yelina na yəlaa asaɣaa kamɩ - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ .

text: Whom God hath raised up , having loosed the pains of death : because it was not possible that he should be holden of it .
text2: Ama Ɩsɔ yɔka səm toma na ɩ ́ feesi - ɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pə fɛɩ sɩ səm ɩ ́ lapɩ - ɩ pʋlʋ cəcəka .

text: For David speaketh concerning him , I foresaw the Lord always before my face , for he is on my right hand , that I should not be moved :
text2: Tampana , Tafiiti yɔɣɔta Yesu ɩnɩ ɩ tɔm kɛ mpʋ sɩ : Ma naakaɣa Tacaa kɛ tam kɛ ́ ma cɔlɔɣɔ . Ɩ ka səŋa ma waalɩ kɛ ́ sɩ má taa selina pʋlʋ .

text: Therefore did my heart rejoice , and my tongue was glad ; moreover also my flesh shall rest in hope :
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma laakalɩ caɣa təntəmlɛ kɛ teu , na laŋhɛɛlɛ kʋɣʋ - m ma yɔɣɔtaɣa taa . Paa ma kɛ ́ yʋlʋ na maa sɩ tɔ , ma caɣana tɛɛlʋɣʋ .

text: Because thou wilt not leave my soul in hell , neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ nyá n kaa lɔ - m yem kɛ ́ atɛtəlɛ taa . N kaa yele sɩ nyá yʋlʋ má má tɩɩ sɔŋ paa pəcɔ maɣamaɣa .

text: Thou hast made known to me the ways of life ; thou shalt make me full of joy with thy countenance .
text2: N hʋla - m weesuɣu mpaaŋ . N ká wɛɛ ma kiŋ na ń hʋləsəɣɩ ma laŋlɛ kɛ teu .

text: Men and brethren , let me freely speak unto you of the patriarch David , that he is both dead and buried , and his sepulchre is with us unto this day .
text2: Apalaa mɛ , ɩ ́ yele má tʋləsɩ - mɛɣɛ tá lɔŋcɛ Tafiiti tɔm təcɛɩcɛɩ sɩ , ɩ səpa na pá pimi - ɩ , na ɩ pəlaaʋ wɛ tá hɛkʋ kɛ haləna saŋa .

text: Therefore being a prophet , and knowing that God had sworn with an oath to him , that of the fruit of his loins , according to the flesh , he would raise up Christ to sit on his throne ;
text2: Tafiiti ɩnɩ ɩ ka kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ nyəmá teu sɩ , Ɩsɔ ka tɔma nti na tuunaʋ sɩ ɩ ká lapɩ - ɩ tɔ pɩɩ la . Səsɩ Tafiiti lʋlʋɣʋ taa tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ká tɔɣɔna kawulaɣa ŋka Tafiiti ɩnɩ ɩ ka tɔɣaa tɔ .

text: He seeing this before spake of the resurrection of Christ , that his soul was not left in hell , neither his flesh did see corruption .
text2: Hatoo lɔŋ Tafiiti nawa mpi pɩɩ tɛ na pə ́ la tɔ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ yɔɣɔta Mesii səpʋ na ɩ ́ fe tɔ pə tɔm sɩ : Pa ta lɔ - ɩ yem kɛ ́ atɛtəlɛ taa . Ɩ ta tɩɩ sɔŋ paa pəcɔ maɣamaɣa .

text: This Jesus hath God raised up , whereof we all are witnesses .
text2: Yesu wei ɩnɩ ɩ tɔm ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , Ɩsɔ feesa - ɩ , na tá təna tə nana tá ɩsəpee təkelekele .

text: Therefore being by the right hand of God exalted , and having received of the Father the promise of the Holy Ghost , he hath shed forth this , which ye now see and hear .
text2: Ɩsɔ kʋsa ɩ nyʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ caɣasɩ - ɩ ɩ kɔŋkɔŋ taa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpaɣa Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ , wei ɩ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha tɔ , na ɩ ́ cɛlɛ - ɩ . Na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ ɩnəɣɩ Yesu tisa tá təna tá tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ tɔŋna naʋ na nɩɩʋ kɛ ɩsəntɔ .

text: For David is not ascended into the heavens : but he saith himself , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ Tafiiti maɣamaɣa ná kpa ɩsɔ se . Ama paa na mpʋ ɩ yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Tacaa Ɩsɔ heela ma Sɔsɔ sɩ : Caɣa ma kɔŋkɔŋ taa .

text: Until I make thy foes thy footstool .
text2: Haləna má kɔna nyá kolontunaa , na ń loosi nyá nɔɔhɛɛ kɛ pa tɔɔ .

text: Therefore let all the house of Israel know assuredly , that God hath made that same Jesus , whom ye have crucified , both Lord and Christ .
text2: Pə wɛɛ sɩ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ yəlaa təna ká nyɩ teu təkpataa sɩ , Yesu wei ɩ ́ kama səm tesika tɔɔ tɔ , ɩnəɣɩ Ɩsɔ lapa Sɔsɔ na Mesii .

text: Now when they heard this , they were pricked in their heart , and said unto Peter and to the rest of the apostles , Men and brethren , what shall we do ?
text2: Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma nɩɩ tɔm tənɛ ɩlɛna pa laŋa pəsɩ sɔsɔm , na pá pɔɔsɩ Piyɛɛ na tillaa lɛlaa sɩ : Ta taapalaa mɛ , ɩsənaɣa pə wɛɛ sɩ tə ́ la ɩlɛ ?

text: Then Peter said unto them , Repent , and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins , and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ lɔ mə ɩsaɣatʋ na ɩ ́ laɣasɩ hʋwɛɛ , na pá yaa Yesu Kilisiti hətɛ na pá sɔna paa mə taa wei kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ lʋm , na pə ́ hɩɩsɩ mə ɩsaɣatʋ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ hiki Ɩsɔ kʋcɔɔʋ sɔsɔɔʋ ŋku kʋ kɛ ́ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ tɔ .

text: For the promise is unto you , and to your children , and to all that are afar off , even as many as the Lord our God shall call .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mə na mə piya na hatəlaɣa nyə ́ ma kɛ Ɩsɔ tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha , ɩ ́ tɩɩ laalaa na ɩ ́ yaa wei te , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ hikaa kɛ ́ .

text: And with many other words did he testify and exhort , saying , Save yourselves from this untoward generation .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ tasa Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma kɛ tɔm paɣalɛ kɛ heeluɣu tɔtɔ , nti tɩɩ səna - wɛ na tə sɔɔsɩ - wɛɣɛ apalʋtʋ tɔ . Səsɩ , ɩ ́ ləsɩ mə təɣɩ yəlaa letaa panɛ pa taa na ɩ ́ tʋlɩ - tɩ .

text: Then they that gladly received his word were baptized : and the same day there were added unto them about three thousand souls .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma taa yəlaa tuutuuma mʋ Piyɛɛ tɔm na pá sɔ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm . Kʋyaŋku , mpa pa sʋʋ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ tɔ , pa nyɔɔŋ tala ɩsɩɩ iyisi tooso ( 3000 ) .

text: And they continued stedfastly in the apostles ' doctrine and fellowship , and in breaking of bread , and in prayers .
text2: Pa ɩsəlɛ ka sɛɛna tillaa kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ kɛ nɩɩʋ , na pa təŋaɣa təma na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ kɛ sɔsɔm . Pa tɔkaɣa təntəmlɛ kɛ tam , na pá puki Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ pɩɩ sɔɔ nɔɣɔlʋ .

text: And fear came upon every soul : and many wonders and signs were done by the apostles .
text2: Tillaa lakaɣa piti təma na Ɩsɔ kɔkɔlɔ nyəmnaa , na pə ́ kpaa paa wei kɛ ́ sɔɣɔntʋ .

text: And all that believed were together , and had all things common ;
text2: Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa təna ka wɛna nɔɣɔ kʋlʋmaɣa , na pa kpɛntaɣa mpi mpi pa wɛna tɔ .

text: And sold their possessions and goods , and parted them to all men , as every man had need .
text2: Pa pɛɛtaɣa pa tɛtʋnaa na pa wontunaa na pá kotiɣi pə liɣitee kɛ təntəmlɛ , na pə ́ caala pa taa wei pa waasəna - ɩ .

text: And they , continuing daily with one accord in the temple , and breaking bread from house to house , did eat their meat with gladness and singleness of heart ,
text2: Pa təna paa kotaɣa paa ɩfemle nteɣe Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ kɛ Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ pɩɩ sɔɔ yʋlʋ . Ye pa saa - wɛɣɛ pa tɛɛsɩ taa , təntəmlɛ kɛ pa kotiɣi na pá tɔkɩ . Laŋhʋlʋmlɛ kɛ pa tɔkaɣana pa tɔɣɔnasɩ , na pa taa hɛtəna təma .

text: Praising God , and having favour with all the people . And the Lord added to the church daily such as should be saved .
text2: Na pá saŋ Ɩsɔ , na yəlaa təna laŋa hɛɛna - wɛ . Paa kʋyaŋku Tacaa sɔɔsaɣa pa kpekəle tɔɔ kɛ ́ mpa mpa pa nyɔɔŋ pə yapa tɔ .

text: Now Peter and John went up together into the temple at the hour of prayer , being the ninth hour .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ Piyɛɛ na Yohaanɩ pa pukaɣa Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ kɛ ilim kpiluɣu sələmʋɣʋ .

text: And a certain man lame from his mother ' s womb was carried , whom they laid daily at the gate of the temple which is called Beautiful , to ask alms of them that entered into the temple ;
text2: Apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ pa lʋləna kaakalətʋ , na pá pukina - ɩ na pá sɩɩkɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ nɔnɔɣɔ ŋka pa yaa sɩ Caŋəm Nɔnɔɣɔ tɔɣɔ paa kʋyakʋ ŋku sɩ ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa sʋʋlaa kɛ liɣitee .

text: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms .
text2: Ɩ nawa Piyɛɛ na Yohaanɩ pa sʋʋkɩ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sələmɩ - wɛ sɩ pá ha - ɩ pʋlʋ .

text: And Peter , fastening his eyes upon him with John , said , Look on us .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ na Yohaanɩ pa nyəna - ɩ təpiŋŋ . Ɩlɛna Piyɛɛ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Paasəna cənɛ .

text: And he gave heed unto them , expecting to receive something of them .
text2: Tənaɣa kaakalaɣa paasəna - wɛɣɛ teu , na ka tɛɛlaɣaa sɩ paa ha - kɛɣɛ pʋlʋ .

text: Then Peter said , Silver and gold have I none ; but such as I have give I thee : In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ tɔma - kɛ sɩ : Ma fɛɩna liɣitee sɩ maa ha - ŋ . Ama maa ha - ŋ mpi ma wɛna tɔ . Na Nasalɛtɩ Yesu Kilisiti toŋ taa kʋlɩ na ń tɔ .

text: And he took him by the right hand , and lifted him up : and immediately his feet and ancle bones received strength .
text2: Ɩlɛna Piyɛɛ siisi na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ kaakalaɣa na niŋ ntɔɣɔŋ , na ɩ ́ kʋsɩ . Tənaɣa kaakalaɣa nɔɔhɛɛ na ka nɔɔcʋwasɩ kpa toŋ kɛ kpakpaa .

text: And he leaping up stood , and walked , and entered with them into the temple , walking , and leaping , and praising God .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ka kʋlaa təhapa na ká tii ka nɔɔhɛɛ tɔɔ , na ká səŋ təye na ká niki tɔntɛ , na ká na tillaa sɔsaa pá kpɛntɩ na pá sʋʋ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa . Na ká tɔŋ na ká ŋmaaləɣɩ na ká saŋ Ɩsɔ .

text: And all the people saw him walking and praising God :
text2: Samaa təna ná ka tɔntɛ na ka Ɩsɔ sam .

text: And they knew that it was he which sat for alms at the Beautiful gate of the temple : and they were filled with wonder and amazement at that which had happened unto him .
text2: Pa kɔma na pá cɛkəna sɩ ŋkɛ ka cakaɣana Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ Caŋəm Nɔnɔɣɔ kiŋ na ká sələməɣɩ liɣitee , ɩlɛna sɔɣɔntʋ na piti la - wɛ na ɩsəna ka hika nɔɔhɛɛ tɔ .

text: And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John , all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon ' s , greatly wondering .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kaakalaɣa ŋkɛ ka nyɔɔna Piyɛɛ na Yohaanɩ kɛ tam . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ piti kpa samaa kɛ sɔsɔm , ɩlɛna pá watɩ Piyɛɛ - wɛ pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ sakaɣa sɔsɔɣa ŋka pa yaakaɣa sɩ Salʋmɔŋ sakaɣa tɔ ka tɛɛ .

text: And when Peter saw it , he answered unto the people , Ye men of Israel , why marvel ye at this ? or why look ye so earnestly on us , as though by our own power or holiness we had made this man to walk ?
text2: Piyɛɛ ná mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ samaa sɩ : Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ yəlaa mɛ , pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ kʋlʋɣʋ tɔ pə cɛkɩ mə laŋa ? Na pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ nyənəɣɩ - tʋ ɩsɩɩ tá maɣamaɣa tá toŋ yaa tá Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ teu napəlɩ pə yelina na apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ ́ tɔŋ ?

text: The God of Abraham , and of Isaac , and of Jacob , the God of our fathers , hath glorified his Son Jesus ; whom ye delivered up , and denied him in the presence of Pilate , when he was determined to let him go .
text2: Apəlaham na Ɩsaaka na Yakɔpʋ pa Ɩsɔ , wei ɩ kɛ ́ ta caanaa caanaa Ɩsɔ tɔ , ɩ kʋsa ɩ təmlɛ tʋ Yesu nyʋɣʋ . Ama mɛ mə tʋ - ɩ toŋtʋnaa niŋ taa . Pəlɛ pə waalɩ Pilatɩ luɣu lapa sɩ ɩ yeki - ɩ tɔ , mə taɣanna kisuɣu .

text: But ye denied the Holy One and the Just , and desired a murderer to be granted unto you ;
text2: Ɩ ́ kisa yʋlʋ kʋpaŋ tampana təŋlʋ ɩnɩ , na ɩsaɣaʋ kpitikpiti kɛ ́ ɩ ́ sɔɔlaa na ɩ ́ sələmɩ Pilatɩ sɩ ɩ ́ tʋlɩ - mɛɣɛ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ .

text: And killed the Prince of life , whom God hath raised from the dead ; whereof we are witnesses .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa na ɩ ́ yele na pá kʋ weesuɣu halʋ . Ama Ɩsɔ ná feesa - ɩ na tə ́ nana tá ɩsəpee .

text: And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong , whom ye see and know : yea , the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all .
text2: Yesu ɩnɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ toŋ taa na táá tɛmnaʋ kɛ - ɩ yelina apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ kʋlaa . Ɩ ́ nyəma - ɩ na ɩnɩ ɩ səŋna mə ɩsɛntaa ɩsəntɔ . Táá tɛmnaʋ kɛ Yesu yelina apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ wɛna ɩ tɩ təmammam na mə təna ɩ ́ naakɩ mpʋ .

text: And now , brethren , I wot that through ignorance ye did it , as did also your rulers .
text2: Tɔʋ , ma nyə ́ ma mɛ , ma nyəmá teu sɩ mə na mə sɔsaa ɩ ́ taa cɛkəna tɔɣɔ ɩ ́ lapa Yesu ɩnəɣɩ mpʋ .

text: But those things , which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets , that Christ should suffer , he hath so fulfilled .
text2: Ɩlɛ tɔm nti Ɩsɔ yelaa na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa təna kpaalɩ hatoo lɔŋ taa , sɩ ɩ Mesii ká tɔɣɔ kʋnyɔŋ tɔ , ntɩ ɩnɩ tə maɣamaɣa kɛ ɩ yelaa na tə ́ lá .

text: Repent ye therefore , and be converted , that your sins may be blotted out , when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord ;
text2: Pə tɔɔ tɔ , ɩ ́ lɔ mə ɩsaɣatʋ na ɩ ́ laɣasɩ hʋwɛɛ , na ɩ ́ pəsəna Ɩsɔ tɔɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ taɣanɩ mə təwakəllɛnaa .

text: And he shall send Jesus Christ , which before was preached unto you :
text2: Ɩlɛ Tacaa ká ha - mɛɣɛ kʋyɛɛŋ wei ɩ taa pɩɩ waasɩ - mɛ tɔ , na ɩ ́ kɔna Mesii wei ɩ ka ləsa hatoo lɔŋ na ɩ ́ sɩɩ - mɛ tɔ . Mesii ɩnəɣəlɛ Yesu .

text: Whom the heaven must receive until the times of restitution of all things , which God hath spoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets since the world began .
text2: Ama pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ Yesu Kilisiti ɩ ́ caɣa ɩsɔtaa , haləna pə ́ tala waatʋ wei paa taɣanɩ pə tənaɣa kʋfam pəsʋɣʋ , ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ ka tɛm yeluɣu kɛ hatoo lɔŋ na ɩ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa kʋpama yɔɣɔtɩ tɔ .

text: For Moses truly said unto the fathers , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you .
text2: Halɩ Moisi maɣamaɣa ná yɔɣɔta ɩ tɔm kɛ mpʋ sɩ : Tacaa mə Ɩsɔ ká kɔna - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɩɩ má , na ɩ ká wɛɛ mə maɣamaɣa mə piitim tʋ , na ɩ ́ ká təŋ tə təna nti ɩ ká heeli - mɛ tɔ .

text: And it shall come to pass , that every soul , which will not hear that prophet , shall be destroyed from among the people .
text2: Ye wei ɩ ta nɩɩna Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ ɩnɩ , paa ləsɩ pʋntʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ yəlaa taa na pá kʋ - ɩ .

text: Yea , and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after , as many as have spoken , have likewise foretold of these days .
text2: Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa mpa pa təna pa yɔɣɔta pə kpaɣaʋ Samiyɛɛlɩ na ɩ waalɩ nyə ́ ma pa looŋa ŋkɛ ka tənaɣa mpʋ tɔ , pa yɔɣɔta kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɛ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔm .

text: Ye are the children of the prophets , and of the covenant which God made with our fathers , saying unto Abraham , And in thy seed shall all the kindreds of the earth be blessed .
text2: Mpi Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa ŋmaa pə tɔm tɔ , mɛɣɛ ɩ tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la . Halɩ mə tɔm kɛ Ɩsɔ ka yɔɣɔta saa wei ɩ ́ na mə caanaa caanaa paa sɩɩ təmaɣa nɔɔsɩ tɔ . Waatʋ ɩnəɣɩ Ɩsɔ tɔma Apəlaham sɩ : Nyá piya tɔɔ kɛ ́ maa la atɛ yəlaa tənaɣa kʋpantʋ .

text: Unto you first God , having raised up his Son Jesus , sent him to bless you , in turning away every one of you from his iniquities .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ ləsa ɩ təmlɛ tʋ tɔ , mə cɔlɔɣɔ ɩ laaləna - ɩ kɔnaʋ . Ɩ kɔna - mɛɣɛ - ɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ la - mɛɣɛ kʋpantʋ , sɩ ɩ ́ laɣasɩ - mɛ na paa wei ɩ ́ yele ɩ yaasi ɩsaɣaʋ .

text: And as they spake unto the people , the priests , and the captain of the temple , and the Sadducees , came upon them ,
text2: Piyɛɛ na Yohaanɩ pa tɔŋna samaa kɛ yɔɣɔtənaʋ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna kɔtəlaa na Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taŋlaa nyʋɣʋ tʋ na Satusee nyə ́ ma pa tala .

text: Being grieved that they taught the people , and preached through Jesus the resurrection from the dead .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə sala - wɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , tillaa sɔsaa naalɛ ná sɛɣɛsaɣa samaa sɩ Yesu fema . Mpʋ tɔ sətaa ka tɛ na pá fe .

text: And they laid hands on them , and put them in hold unto the next day : for it was now eventide .
text2: Tənaɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma kpa - wɛ na pá təkɩ - wɛɣɛ saləka , sɩ pə ́ fema ɩlɛ paa cɛkəna . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , saa ɩnɩ tɔ pɩɩ tɛma taanʋɣʋ .

text: Howbeit many of them which heard the word believed ; and the number of the men was about five thousand .
text2: Paa na mpʋ mpa pa nɩɩwa Piyɛɛ faaci tɔ , pa paɣalɛ mʋwa . Haləna mʋlaa mpɛ pa taa apalaa tapa ɩsɩɩ iyisi kakpasɩ ( 5000 ) kɛ mpʋ .

text: And it came to pass on the morrow , that their rulers , and elders , and scribes ,
text2: Tɛʋ fema , ɩlɛna Yuta nyə ́ ma sɔsaa na nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa sɔsaa , pa koti Yosalɛm .

text: And Annas the high priest , and Caiaphas , and John , and Alexander , and as many as were of the kindred of the high priest , were gathered together at Jerusalem .
text2: Pə kpaɣaʋ ɩsɩɩ kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ Ana , na Kayifi , na Yohaanɩ , na Alɛkəsantəlɩ - wɛɣɛ mpʋ na kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ lʋlʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma təna .

text: And when they had set them in the midst , they asked , By what power , or by what name , have ye done this ?
text2: Ɩlɛna pá ləsɩ tillaa sɔsaa na pá kɔna - wɛɣɛ pa hɛkʋ taa , na pá pɔɔsɩ - wɛ sɩ : Mpi ɩnɩ ɩ ́ lapa ɩsəntɔ tɔ , awe heela - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ la mpʋ ? Na awe toŋ taa kɛ ́ ɩ tɩɩ lapəna mpʋ ?

text: Then Peter , filled with the Holy Ghost , said unto them , Ye rulers of the people , and elders of Israel ,
text2: Tənaɣa Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toŋ kʋləna Piyɛɛ na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Tɔʋ , tɛtʋ sɔsaa na nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma mɛ ,

text: If we this day be examined of the good deed done to the impotent man , by what means he is made whole ;
text2: saŋa pa pɔɔsəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ kʋpantʋ nti tə lapa kaakalaɣa tɔ tə tɔm , na ɩsəna tə lapa na ká kʋlɩ tɔ .

text: Be it known unto you all , and to all the people of Israel , that by the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth , whom ye crucified , whom God raised from the dead , even by him doth this man stand here before you whole .
text2: Ɩlɛ pə wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ́ nyɩ tɔm ntəɣɩ mə təna . Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ yəlaa təna ɩ ́ nyɩ - tɩ tɔtɔ sɩ , Nasalɛtɩ Yesu Kilisiti wei ɩ ́ kama səm tesika tɔɔ na Ɩsɔ feesi - ɩ tɔ , ɩ toŋ taa kɛ ́ yʋlʋ ɩnɛ ɩ hika ɩ tɩ na ɩ ́ naa - ɩ mə hɛkʋ taa kɛ ́ ɩsəntɔ .

text: This is the stone which was set at nought of you builders , which is become the head of the corner .
text2: Na Yesu ɩnɩ ɩ tɔm kɛ pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Nmalaa mɛ , ɩ ́ ka lɔwa pəlɛ nte tɔ , ńtɛ ́ tə pəsəna ntɛɣɛ kite tɛɛ pəlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ .

text: Neither is there salvation in any other : for there is none other name under heaven given among men , whereby we must be saved .
text2: Ɩ tike təkoŋ ɩ yakəna yəlaa nyɔɔŋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , hətɛ tənɛ tə paasi , lɛntɛ fɛɩ antulinya təna taa nte Ɩsɔ hʋla yəlaa sɩ tə ́ yaa - tɛ na pə ́ ya tá nyɔɔŋ tɔ .

text: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John , and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men , they marvelled ; and they took knowledge of them , that they had been with Jesus .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kotuɣu sɔsaa mpɛ pa nawa ɩsəna Piyɛɛ na Yohaanɩ pa yɔɣɔtəna apalʋtʋ tɔ , ɩlɛna piti kpa - wɛɣɛ sɔsɔm . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa maɣamaɣa pa nyəmá sɩ Piyɛɛ na Yohaanɩ pa kɛ ́ yəlaa kɛ yem kɛ ́ , pa ta la ceu nɔɣɔlʋ . Ɩlɛna pá tɔɔsɩ sɩ paa kɛ ́ Yesu təŋlaa .

text: And beholding the man which was healed standing with them , they could say nothing against it .
text2: Pə ́ cɔ ́ yʋlʋ wei ɩ ka hika ɩ tɩ tɔ , ɩ səŋa pa ɩsɛntaa təna . Ɩlɛ pa ta nyɩ nti paa yɔɣɔtɩ tɔ .

text: But when they had commanded them to go aside out of the council , they conferred among themselves ,
text2: Ɩlɛna kotuɣu sɔsaa tɔ Piyɛɛ na Yohaanɩ sɩ pá lɩɩ təhʋʋlɛ taa . Pə kaasa mpɛ ɩlɛna pa niki tə saawala .

text: Saying , What shall we do to these men ? for that indeed a notable miracle hath been done by them is manifest to all them that dwell in Jerusalem ; and we cannot deny it .
text2: Sɩ : Ɩsənaɣa tii lana yəlaa panɛ ɩnɩ ? Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Yosalɛm yəlaa təna tɛma nyəm sɩ mpɛ pa lapəna piti təmlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ tənɛ , pə ́ cɔ ́ pə fɛɩ tɩɩ kpɛɛsɩ .

text: But that it spread no further among the people , let us straitly threaten them , that they speak henceforth to no man in this name .
text2: Ɩlɛ tii kisina - wɛɣɛ təpʋlʋpʋlʋ sɩ ye pa tasa nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ Yesu hətɛ tənɛ tə tɔm heeluɣu paa na . Pə taa kɔɔ na tə tɔm sɔɔsɩ yaʋ kɛ yəlaa taa .

text: And they called them , and commanded them not to speak at all nor teach in the name of Jesus .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kotuɣu sɔsaa yaa Piyɛɛ - wɛ , na pá kisina - wɛ təpʋlʋpʋlʋ sɩ pá taa tasa Yesu hətɛ ńtɛ ́ tə tɔm yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ yaa sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ kɛ paa fəŋ maɣamaɣa .

text: But Peter and John answered and said unto them , Whether it be right in the sight of God to hearken unto you more than unto God , judge ye .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ na Yohaanɩ pa cɔ kotuɣu sɔsaa mpɛ sɩ : Mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ maɣasɩ - təɣɩ mə taa na ɩ ́ na . Pepe kəla teu kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa ? Mɛɣɛ tə se yaa Ɩsɔ ?

text: For we cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard .
text2: Ama nti nti tá nɩɩwa na tə nana ta ɩsɛ tɔ , ta kaa pəsɩ na tə ́ su tə yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ .

text: So when they had further threatened them , they let them go , finding nothing how they might punish them , because of the people : for all men glorified God for that which was done .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Kotuɣu sɔsaa mpɛ pa ta nyɩ ɩsəna mpi paa la Piyɛɛ - wɛ tɔ . Ɩlɛna pá tasa - wɛɣɛ kpaalʋɣʋ kɛ teu na pá yele - wɛ . Pa ta hiki mpi pə tɔɔ paa hɔ pa ŋkpaŋʋɣʋ tɔ . Mpi pə tɔɔ tɔ , yəlaa təna saŋaɣa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ pə təna mpi pə lapa mpʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: For the man was above forty years old , on whom this miracle of healing was shewed .
text2: Apalʋ wei ɩnɩ piti təmlɛ lapa na ɩ ́ hiki alaafəya kɛ mpʋ tɔ , ɩ lʋlʋɣʋ pɩɩsɩ ka kəla nɩɩlɛ .

text: And being let go , they went to their own company , and reported all that the chief priests and elders had said unto them .
text2: Kotuɣu sɔsaa yela Piyɛɛ na Yohaanɩ ɩlɛna pá tɛɛ kpakpaa kɛ pa taapalaa kiŋ , na pá kɛɛsɩ - wɛɣɛ tə təna nti kɔtəlaa sɔsaa na nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma pa yɔɣɔtaa tɔ .

text: And when they heard that , they lifted up their voice to God with one accord , and said , Lord , thou art God , which hast made heaven , and earth , and the sea , and all that in them is :
text2: Pɛlɛ pa nɩɩ - təɣɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pa təna pá sələmɩ Ɩsɔ sɩ : Haɩ , Tacaa , nyá lapəna ɩsɔtaa na atɛ na teŋku na pə təna mpi pə wɛ pə taa tɔ .

text: Who by the mouth of thy servant David hast said , Why did the heathen rage , and the people imagine vain things ?
text2: Nyá yelina na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ tʋ nyá təmlɛ tʋ ta lɔŋcɛ Tafiiti nɔɣɔ taa kɛ ́ tɔm na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ : Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ piitimnaa cʋka pə taa na kalampaanɩ kɛ ́ mpʋ ? Pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ yəlaa ná paasəna nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ kuuu kɛ yem kɛ ́ mpʋ ?

text: The kings of the earth stood up , and the rulers were gathered together against the Lord , and against his Christ .
text2: Atɛ awulaa sɔsaa kɛla tɔɔŋ . Tɛtʋ tɔkəlaa ná pɛɛla nɔɣɔ na pá kʋlɩ Tacaa na ɩ Mesii pa tɔɔ .

text: For of a truth against thy holy child Jesus , whom thou hast anointed , both Herod , and Pontius Pilate , with the Gentiles , and the people of Israel , were gathered together ,
text2: Tampana tɔɔ , Helɔtɩ , na Pɔŋsɩ Pilatɩ , na mʋʋlaa , na Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ piitim nyə ́ ma pa pɛɛla nɔɣɔ kɛ nyá təmlɛ tʋ naŋŋ tʋ , wei n ləsaa sɩ ɩ ́ la Mesii tɔ , ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩcatɛ tənɛ tə taa .

text: For to do whatsoever thy hand and thy counsel determined before to be done .
text2: Mpi tuu lɔŋ nyá toma taa n nɔkaa na ń maɣasɩ na ń sɩɩ tɔ , pə maɣamaɣa kɛ pa lapa təkɛlɛ .

text: And now , Lord , behold their threatenings : and grant unto thy servants , that with all boldness they may speak thy word ,
text2: Tacaa , pənɛntɛ nyənɩ kpaalʋɣʋ mpi pa kpaala - tʋ na ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ tɔ , na ń yele na nyá təmlɛ nyə ́ ma tá tə heeli nyá tɔm na tɩɩ nyaŋna pʋlʋɣʋ paa pəcɔ .

text: By stretching forth thine hand to heal ; and that signs and wonders may be done by the name of thy holy child Jesus .
text2: Tʋ nyá niŋ na kʋtɔntʋnaa hikiɣi alaafəya , na ń yele na yəlaa naakɩ nyá kɔkɔlɔ nyəm na nyá piti təma kɛ nyá təmlɛ tʋ naŋŋtʋ Yesu toŋ taa .

text: And when they had prayed , the place was shaken where they were assembled together ; and they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and they spake the word of God with boldness .
text2: Tillaa tɛma sələmʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna lonte nte tə taa paa kotaa tɔ tə ́ sele . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toŋ kʋləna pa təna . Ɩlɛna pá sʋʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm heeluɣu na paa nyaŋna pʋlʋ .

text: And the multitude of them that believed were of one heart and of one soul : neither said any of them that ought of the things which he possessed was his own ; but they had all things common .
text2: Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa kpekəle təna ka kaa lotu na ləmaɣasəlɛ kʋlʋmtəlɛ kɛ ́ təkpataa . Pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ taa faɣasəɣɩ na ɩ ́ nyənəɣɩ ɩ kʋwɛnam ɩsɩɩ ɩ tike ɩ nyəm . Ama pa nyənaɣa pə təna mpi paa wɛna tɔɣɔ ɩsɩɩ pa təna pa nyəm .

text: And with great power gave the apostles witness of the resurrection of the Lord Jesus : and great grace was upon them all .
text2: Tillaa kɛɛsaɣaa Tacaa Yesu fem tɔm na apalʋtʋ kɛ ́ , na Ɩsɔ ká wɛ pa təna pa waalɩ kɛ ́ teu .

text: Neither was there any among them that lacked : for as many as were possessors of lands or houses sold them , and brought the prices of the things that were sold ,
text2: Pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ taa laŋ pʋlʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mpa paa wɛna tɛtʋnaa yaa tɛɛsɩ tɔ pa pɛɛtaɣaa kɛ ́ na pá kɔŋna pə liɣitee ,

text: And laid them down at the apostles ' feet : and distribution was made unto every man according as he had need .
text2: na pá cɛləɣɩ tillaa . Ye pə caala wei pa waasəna - ɩ .

text: And Joses , who by the apostles was surnamed Barnabas , ( which is , being interpreted , The son of consolation , ) a Levite , and of the country of Cyprus ,
text2: Mpʋ ɩnɩ pə yelina Lefii tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ , wei pa yaakaɣa sɩ Yosɛɛfʋ na pá lʋla - ɩ Sipili tɔ , ɩ pɛɛta ɩ tɛtʋ natəlɩ na ɩ ́ məŋna pə liɣitee na ɩ ́ cɛla tillaa . Ɩnəɣɩ tillaa ka cuɣusaa sɩ Paanapasɩ . ( Apalʋtʋ halʋ kɛ pa yaa mpʋ na pa tɛ taa . )

text: But a certain man named Ananias , with Sapphira his wife , sold a possession ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ , pa yaa - ɩ sɩ Ananiyasɩ , na ɩ alʋ sɩ Safila . Ɩ pɛɛta pa tɛtʋ natəlɩ na ɩ alʋ wɛna pə nyəm .

text: And kept back part of the price , his wife also being privy to it , and brought a certain part , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: Ɩ tɛma pɛɛtʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ faɣa liɣitee taa na ɩ ́ sɩɩ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pona wena a kaasaa tɔ , na ɩ ́ cɛla tillaa na ɩ alʋ wɛna pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə nyəm .

text: But Peter said , Ananias , why hath Satan filled thine heart to lie to the Holy Ghost , and to keep back part of the price of the land ?
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Ananiyasɩ pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ Satanɩ hika - ŋ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ katatəlaɣa , na ń kaasɩ nyá təɣɩ tɛtʋ nti n pɛɛtaa tɔ tə liɣitee , na ń puɣusi Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ ?

text: Whiles it remained , was it not thine own ? and after it was sold , was it not in thine own power ? why hast thou conceived this thing in thine heart ? thou hast not lied unto men , but unto God .
text2: N taa pɛɛtəta - tɩ tɔ , nyá tɛtʋ kɛ ́ mɛɛ . Na n tɩɩ tɛma - təɣɩ pɛɛtʋɣʋ tɔ , awe tɩ liɣitee , pə taɣa nyá ? Ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣa pə lapa na ń paasɩ na ń maɣasɩ nyá taa na ń la yaasi ɩsaɣaʋ ɩnɛ ɩ taka ? Ɩsɔ kɛ ń puɣusaa pə taɣa yəlaa se .

text: And Ananias hearing these words fell down , and gave up the ghost : and great fear came on all them that heard these things .
text2: Ananiyasɩ nɩɩ tɔm tənɛ ɩnɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ hoti na ɩ ́ sɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa pa təna mpa pa nɩɩ tɔm tənɛ ɩnɩ tɔɣɔ keniŋa nakəlɩ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: And the young men arose , wound him up , and carried him out , and buried him .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩfepiya kʋlɩ na pá takɩ - ɩ pʋʋɣʋ na pá pona - ɩ pim .

text: And it was about the space of three hours after , when his wife , not knowing what was done , came in .
text2: Pə lapa laasaɣa ɩsɩɩ kaləfunaa tooso , ɩlɛ Ananiyasɩ ɩnɩ ɩ alʋ sʋʋwaɣalɛ . Ama ɩ ta nɩɩta nti tə tɛma lapʋ tɔ .

text: And Peter answered unto her , Tell me whether ye sold the land for so much ? And she said , Yea , for so much .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ pɔɔsa - ɩ sɩ : Ɩ ́ pɛɛta mə tɛtʋ ntɩ tɔ tə liɣitee tənaɣalɔ ? Heeli - m . Ɩlɛna Ananiyasɩ alʋ cɔ sɩ : Anəɣəlɛ mpʋ .

text: Then Peter said unto her , How is it that ye have agreed together to tempt the Spirit of the Lord ? behold , the feet of them which have buried thy husband are at the door , and shall carry thee out .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ yɔɣɔta - ɩ sɩ : Ɩsənaɣa mə lapa na ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ na ɩ ́ paasɩ na ɩ ́ hʋʋ sɩ ɩ ́ maɣasəɣɩ Tacaa Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ sɩ ɩ ́ naa ɩ waalɩ ? Nyənɩ , mpa pa pima nyá paalʋ tɔ pa tɛma kɔntɛ , mpɛɣɛlɛ nɔnɔɣɔ tɛɛ . Paa tɛɛsɩ nyaɣa tɛɛnaʋ .

text: Then fell she down straightway at his feet , and yielded up the ghost : and the young men came in , and found her dead , and , carrying her forth , buried her by her husband .
text2: Tənaɣa Ananiyasɩ alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ hota Piyɛɛ nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ kɛ ́ kpakpaa na ɩ ́ sɩ ́ . Ɩfepiya sʋʋwa , ɩlɛna pá maɣana ɩ səpa . Ɩlɛna pɛlɛ pá kpaɣa - ɩ na pá polo pá pimi - ɩ ɩ paalʋ kɔŋkɔŋ taa .

text: And great fear came upon all the church , and upon as many as heard these things .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɔm ntɩ tə lapa Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle təna na mpa pa nɩɩ - tɩ tɔ pa tənaɣa keniŋa nakəlɩ pə fɛɩna .

text: And by the hands of the apostles were many signs and wonders wrought among the people ; ( and they were all with one accord in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Tillaa lapa Ɩsɔ kɔkɔlɔ nyəm , na piti təma paɣalɛ kɛ yəlaa hɛkʋ taa . Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa təna kotaɣa Salʋmɔŋ sakaɣa sɔsaɣa tɛɛ .

text: And of the rest durst no man join himself to them : but the people magnified them .
text2: Samaa pʋɣʋlaɣa - wɛɣɛ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ , paa na mpʋ yʋlʋ kpaɩ tʋ kɛ yem nyaŋaɣana pa taa sʋʋʋ .

text: And believers were the more added to the Lord , multitudes both of men and women . )
text2: Ama apalaa na alaa samaa mpa pa mʋkaɣa Tacaa tɔm na pá sɔɔsəɣɩ ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa kpekəle tɔɔ tɔ , pa nyɔɔŋ tɔŋna hukuɣu kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: Insomuch that they brought forth the sick into the streets , and laid them on beds and couches , that at the least the shadow of Peter passing by might overshadow some of them .
text2: Ɩlɛna yəlaa náá sʋʋ kʋtɔntʋnaa kɛ lɩɩnaʋ , na pá hɩɩsɩ - wɛɣɛ katonaa na nyaaləŋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ hapɛɛ nɔɔsɩ , sɩ ye Piyɛɛ tɛɛkəna təna , ɩ ɩlɛɛmʋɣʋ maɣamaɣa tɩɩ tokina kʋtokinaʋ kɛ pa taa lɛlaa .

text: There came also a multitude out of the cities round about unto Jerusalem , bringing sick folks , and them which were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed every one .
text2: Yəlaa samaa lɩɩkaɣana Yosalɛm cɔlɔ acalɛɛ taa na pá kɔŋna kʋtɔntʋnaa na mpa alɔɣaa cɔɔsaɣa tɔ , na pa təna pa hikiɣi alaafəya .

text: Then the high priest rose up , and all they that were with him , ( which is the sect of the Sadducees , ) and were filled with indignation ,
text2: Tənaɣa ɩsəsɛɛmlɛ kpa kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ kɛ sɔsɔm kɛ tillaa tɔɔ , na ɩ kiŋ caɣalaa təna mpa pa kɛ ́ Satusee kpekəle nyə ́ ma tɔ . Haləna pá hʋʋ sɩ paa kʋlɩ pa tɔɔ .

text: And laid their hands on the apostles , and put them in the common prison .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kpa tillaa na pá təkɩ - wɛɣɛ timpi pa təkəɣɩ samaa təna tɔ .

text: But the angel of the Lord by night opened the prison doors , and brought them forth , and said ,
text2: Ama Tacaa ɩsɔtaa tillu nɔɣɔlʋ kɔma ahoo taa na ɩ ́ tʋlɩ saləka nɔnɔɔsɩ , na ɩ ́ ləsɩ tillaa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ :

text: Go , stand and speak in the temple to the people all the words of this life .
text2: Ɩ ́ polo Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa təkaa na ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ samaa kɛ laɣasʋɣʋ mpaaʋ kʋnɛ kʋ tɔm .

text: And when they heard that , they entered into the temple early in the morning , and taught . But the high priest came , and they that were with him , and called the council together , and all the senate of the children of Israel and sent to the prison to have them brought .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tillaa lapa nti ɩsɔtaa tillu heela - wɛ tɔ . Pa kʋla tanaŋ ahula tɛɛ na pá polo Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa na pá niki waasʋ lapʋ . Tənaɣa kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ na ɩ kiŋ caɣalaa təna pa kota Yuta Kotuɣu sɔsɔɔʋ nyə ́ ma . Ɩlɛna pá tili sɩ pá ləsɩ tillaa kɛ saləka taa na pá kɔna .

text: But when the officers came , and found them not in the prison , they returned , and told ,
text2: Waatʋ wei filisinaa ná tala saləka taa tɔ , pa ta maɣana - wɛ . Ɩlɛna pɛlɛ pa məlɩ kpakpaa na pá heeli hʋʋlɛ sɔsaa mpɛ sɩ :

text: Saying , The prison truly found we shut with all safety , and the keepers standing without before the doors : but when we had opened , we found no man within .
text2: Tə talaa na tə ́ maɣana saləka nɔnɔɔsɩ kaləsa mpʋ təkeŋkeŋ , na taŋlaa náá səŋa pa təsəŋlɛnaa kɛ nɔnɔɔsɩ təna . Ama tə tʋla nɔnɔɔsɩ , ɩlɛ nɔɣɔlʋ fɛɩ pə taa .

text: Now when the high priest and the captain of the temple and the chief priests heard these things , they doubted of them whereunto this would grow .
text2: Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taŋlaa nyʋɣʋ tʋ na kɔtəlaa sɔsaa pa nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna tillaa mʋkʋɣʋ mpɩ pə tʋ - wɛɣɛ piti kɛ teu . Haləna pa ta nyɩ mpi tɔm tənɛ tii tɛna tɔ .

text: Then came one and told them , saying , Behold , the men whom ye put in prison are standing in the temple , and teaching the people .
text2: Tənaɣa nɔɣɔlʋ ná lɩɩ yem na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ nawaa , mpa ɩnɩ ɩ ́ ka tʋ saləka tɔ , pa wɛnna ntɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa na pá lakɩ yəlaa kɛ waasʋ .

text: Then went the captain with the officers , and brought them without violence : for they feared the people , lest they should have been stoned .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ taŋlaa nyʋɣʋ tʋ ɩnɩ na ɩ yəlaa pa polaa na pá kɔna tillaa təhɛɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , paa wɛna yəlaa sɔɣɔntʋ sɩ pá taa kɔɔ pá yoo mpɛɣɛ pɛɛ .

text: And when they had brought them , they set them before the council : and the high priest asked them ,
text2: Taŋlaa nyʋɣʋ tʋ tana tillaa , ɩlɛna pá səŋsɩ - wɛɣɛ təhʋʋlɛ taa , na kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ sʋʋ - wɛɣɛ tɔm pɔɔsʋɣʋ .

text: Saying , Did not we straitly command you that ye should not teach in this name ? and , behold , ye have filled Jerusalem with your doctrine , and intend to bring this man ' s blood upon us .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ tɔma - wɛ sɩ : Ɩsɩɩ tə kisina - mɛ təsaɣasaɣa sɩ ɩ ́ taa tasa apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔm kɛ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ ya ? Na pepeɣelɛ ɩ ́ lapa ɩsəntɔ ? Ɩ ́ yasa mə sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ Yosalɛm ɩcatɛ təna təmam , na ɩ ́ caa ɩ ́ məŋna ɩ səm tɔm ntɛ ́ ta nyɔɔŋ taa .

text: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said , We ought to obey God rather than men .
text2: Ntɛna Piyɛɛ na tillaa lɛlaa pa cɔ kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ sɩ : Pə wɛɛ sɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tə se , pə taɣa yəlaa .

text: The God of our fathers raised up Jesus , whom ye slew and hanged on a tree .
text2: Ta caanaa caanaa Ɩsɔ feesa Yesu wei ɩnɩ mə kama tesika tɔɔ na ɩ ́ sɩ ́ tɔ .

text: Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour , for to give repentance to Israel , and forgiveness of sins .
text2: Ɩsɔ kʋsa ɩ nyʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ caɣasɩ - ɩ ɩ kɔŋkɔŋ taa , na ɩ ́ lapɩ - ɩ wulaʋ na waasʋlʋ sɔsɔ , sɩ pə ́ la na Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma laɣasɩ tɔntɛ na Ɩsɔ hɩɩsɩ pa ɩsaɣatʋ .

text: And we are his witnesses of these things ; and so is also the Holy Ghost , whom God hath given to them that obey him .
text2: Tə kɛ ́ pə təna mpi pə lapa mpʋ tɔ pə aseeta nyə ́ ma . Pə taɣa tá tike . Ama tá na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ wei Ɩsɔ ha mpa mpa pa nɩɩkəna - ɩ tɔɣɔ .

text: When they heard that , they were cut to the heart , and took counsel to slay them .
text2: Kotuɣu sɔsɔɔʋ kotilaa mpɛ pa nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pa pááná huu sɔsɔm , haləna pa caakaɣa pa kʋ tillaa sɔsaa .

text: Then stood there up one in the council , a Pharisee , named Gamaliel , a doctor of the law , had in reputation among all the people , and commanded to put the apostles forth a little space ;
text2: Ama pa taa ka wɛ Falisa nɔɣɔlʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Kamaliyɛɛ tɔ , ɩ kɛ ́ pa Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlʋ sɔsɔ , na yəlaa seekaɣa - ɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ səŋ hʋʋlɛ taa , na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ pá ləsɩ tillaa na awalɩ tɔɔ na pə ́ cɔ ́ .

text: And said unto them , Ye men of Israel , take heed to yourselves what ye intend to do as touching these men .
