text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ heeli kotilaa sɩ : Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma mɛ , ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na mpi ɩ ́ caa ɩ ́ la yəlaa panɛ tɔ .

text: For before these days rose up Theudas , boasting himself to be somebody ; to whom a number of men , about four hundred , joined themselves : who was slain ; and all , as many as obeyed him , were scattered , and brought to nought .
text2: Matɔŋ wulenaa taa kɛ ́ Teutasɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ nyənɩ ɩ tɩ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ , na yəlaa ɩsɩɩ nasəlɛ ( 400 ) təŋ ɩ waalɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kʋ - ɩ , na mpa pɛlɛ pa təŋaɣa ɩ waalɩ tɔ pá ya ŋkaŋka , na pə təna pə saalɩ yem .

text: After this man rose up Judas of Galilee in the days of the taxing , and drew away much people after him : he also perished ; and all , even as many as obeyed him , were dispersed .
text2: Ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ Kalilee tʋ Yutaasɩ ná kʋla kʋkalʋɣʋ waatʋ , na ɩ ́ təŋsɩ yəlaa kʋpiŋ kɛ ɩ waalɩ . Ama pa kʋ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ tɔtɔ , na pə ́ yasɩ pa təna mpa pa təŋaɣa - ɩ tɔ .

text: And now I say unto you , Refrain from these men , and let them alone : for if this counsel or this work be of men , it will come to nought :
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pənɛntɛ ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ , ɩ ́ taa paasəna yəlaa panɛ ɩnɩ pa tɔm tɔtɔ . Ɩ ́ yele - wɛ na pá tɛɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ye yəlaa kiŋ kɛ pa kookalɩ na pa təma lɩɩnaa , pɩɩ saalɩ kɛ ́ .

text: But if it be of God , ye cannot overthrow it ; lest haply ye be found even to fight against God .
text2: Ama ye tampana Ɩsɔ kiŋ kɛ pə lɩɩnaa , ɩ ́ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ la - wɛɣɛ pʋlʋ . Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ , pə ́ taa kɔɔ na ɩ ́ yoona Ɩsɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kotilaa mʋ Kamaliyɛɛ tɔm .

text: And to him they agreed : and when they had called the apostles , and beaten them , they commanded that they should not speak in the name of Jesus , and let them go .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá yaa tillaa na pá hɔɔkɩ - wɛ , na pá heeli - wɛ sɩ : Yesu tɔm ɩ ́ taa tasa mə nɔɔsɩ taa kɛ ́ lɩɩʋ . Ɩlɛna pá yele - wɛ sɩ pá tɛɛ .

text: And they departed from the presence of the council , rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tillaa lɩɩ kotuɣu taa na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ kʋɣʋ - wɛ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ tʋna - wɛ na ɩ ́ yele na pá ná kʋnyɔŋ kɛ Yesu tɔɔ tɔ .

text: And daily in the temple , and in every house , they ceased not to teach and preach Jesus Christ .
text2: Paa ɩfemle nte , pa ta hɛɛsɩ Yesu wei ɩ kɛ ́ Mesii tɔ ɩ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ heeluɣu , na waasʋ lapʋ kɛ tɛɛsɩ taa na Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa .

text: And in those days , when the number of the disciples was multiplied , there arose a murmuring of the Grecians against the Hebrews , because their widows were neglected in the daily ministration .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa Tacaa təŋlaa tɔŋna sɔɔsʋɣʋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa tɔmaɣa kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma mpa pa yɔɣɔtaɣa Kəlɛɛkɩ tɔm tɔ na tɛtʋ Yuta nyə ́ ma pa hɛkʋ , sɩ tɛtʋ Yuta nyə ́ ma ɩɩ paasəɣəna mpɛ pa leelaa kɛ teu kɛ paa ɩfemle nte tə tɔɣɔnaɣa talʋɣʋ taa .

text: Then the twelve called the multitude of the disciples unto them , and said , It is not reason that we should leave the word of God , and serve tables .
text2: Tənaɣa tillaa naanʋwa na naalɛ ɩnɩ ɩ kota Tacaa təŋlaa kpekəle təna na pá tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Pə ta mʋna sɩ tə ́ yele Ɩsɔ Tɔm paasənaʋ na tə ́ lakɩ kʋtɔɣɔŋ tɔm .

text: Wherefore , brethren , look ye out among you seven men of honest report , full of the Holy Ghost and wisdom , whom we may appoint over this business .
text2: Pə tɔɔ tɔ , apalaa mɛ , ɩ ́ nyənɩ na ɩ ́ ləsɩ mə taa kɛ ́ yəlaa naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa , mpa yəlaa sama na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toŋ tɔɔ pa kiŋ na pá wɛna ləmaɣasɛɛ kɛ sɔsɔm tɔ , na tə ́ tʋ - wɛɣɛ təmlɛ tənɛ .

text: But we will give ourselves continually to prayer , and to the ministry of the word .
text2: Ɩlɛ saa ɩnɩ táá hiki caɣalɛ na tə ́ paasəɣəna Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ na waasʋ lapʋ kɛ tam .

text: And the saying pleased the whole multitude : and they chose Stephen , a man full of faith and of the Holy Ghost , and Philip , and Prochorus , and Nicanor , and Timon , and Parmenas , and Nicolas a proselyte of Antioch :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kpekəle təna laŋlɛ hɛɛna tɔm ntɩ , ɩlɛna pá ləsɩ Ɩtiyɛɛnɩ . Yʋlʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tisa ɩ yuŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ tɔɔ kɛ ́ teu , na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toŋ tɔɔ ɩ kiŋ . Pa ləsa tɔtɔɣɔ Filipʋ , na Pʋlʋkʋlʋ , na Nikanɔɔ , na Timɔŋ , na Paləmenasɩ , na Antiyɔka Nikolaa , wei ɩ ka sʋʋ Yuta nyə ́ ma mpaaʋ taa kɛ ́ kʋsʋʋ kɛ hatoo lɔŋ tɔ .

text: Whom they set before the apostles : and when they had prayed , they laid their hands on them .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá pona - wɛɣɛ tillaa kiŋ , na pɛlɛ pá sələməna - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ na pá tənɩ pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ niŋ .

text: And the word of God increased ; and the number of the disciples multiplied in Jerusalem greatly ; and a great company of the priests were obedient to the faith .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm tɔŋna yɛkʋɣʋ na tə puki , na Tacaa təŋlaa nyɔɔŋ tɔŋna sɔɔsʋɣʋ kɛ sɔsɔm kɛ Yosalɛm taa . Haləna kɔtəlaa paɣaʋ tisi na pá mʋ Yesu tɔm kɛ teu . 3

text: And Stephen , full of faith and power , did great wonders and miracles among the people .
text2: Ɩsɔ wɛ Ɩtiyɛɛnɩ waalɩ na ɩ ́ hikiɣi toma kɛ sɔsɔm , na ɩ ́ lakɩ piti təma na Ɩsɔ kɔkɔlɔ nyəm kɛ yəlaa hɛkʋ taa .

text: Then there arose certain of the synagogue , which is called the synagogue of the Libertines , and Cyrenians , and Alexandrians , and of them of Cilicia and of Asia , disputing with Stephen .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotile nte pa yaa sɩ Yomaa Kʋhɛtaa təkotile tɔ , tə taa yəlaa napəlɩ mpa pa kɛ ́ Silɛɛnɩ na Alɛkəsantilii nyə ́ ma tɔ , pá na Silisii na Asii tɛtʋ pə Yuta nyə ́ ma napəlɩ pa kʋla Ɩtiyɛɛnɩ tɔɔ , na pá na - ɩ pá sʋʋ tɔm hɔm taa .

text: And they were not able to resist the wisdom and the spirit by which he spake .
text2: Ama Ɩtiyɛɛnɩ kəla - wɛ na tɔm . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ hana - ɩ ləmaɣasɛɛ na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəɣəna .

text: Then they suborned men , which said , We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Moses , and against God .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yəlaa mpɛ pa ha yəlaa kɛ liɣitee sɩ pá yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ : Tə nɩɩwa ɩ saɣata Moisi na Ɩsɔ .

text: And they stirred up the people , and the elders , and the scribes , and came upon him , and caught him , and brought him to the council ,
text2: Na pa sɔsa yəlaa na nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma na Ɩsɔ tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa sɔsaa , na pɛlɛ pá kʋlɩ Ɩtiyɛɛnɩ tɔɔ , na pá kpa - ɩ na pá pona - ɩ təhʋʋlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa .

text: And set up false witnesses , which said , This man ceaseth not to speak blasphemous words against this holy place , and the law :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa caa yəlaa napəlɩ sɩ pɛlɛ pá suu Ɩtiyɛɛnɩ kɛ tɔm sɩ : Apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ saɣatəɣɩ tá Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ kʋpantɛ tənɛ na Ɩsɔ Tɔm kɛ tam kɛ ́ .

text: For we have heard him say , that this Jesus of Nazareth shall destroy this place , and shall change the customs which Moses delivered us .
text2: Halɩ tə nɩɩ ɩ yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Nasalɛtɩ Yesu ɩnɩ ɩ ká yɔkɩ tá Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ tənɛ , na ɩ ́ laɣasɩ kɔtasɩ nsi Moisi naa hʋla - tʋ tɔ .

text: And all that sat in the council , looking stedfastly on him , saw his face as it had been the face of an angel .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ təhʋʋlɛ taa caɣalaa təna pama Ɩtiyɛɛnɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩsɛ , na pá ná sɩ ɩ ɩsɛntaa mʋ ɩsɔtaa tillu wɛɛtʋ .

text: Then said the high priest , Are these things so ?
text2: Tənaɣa kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ pɔɔsa Ɩtiyɛɛnɩ sɩ : Tampana pə lapa mpʋ ?

text: And he said , Men , brethren , and fathers , hearken ; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham , when he was in Mesopotamia , before he dwelt in Charran ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩtiyɛɛnɩ cɔwa sɩ : Ma tɛɛtʋnaa na ma caanaa mɛ , ɩ ́ tʋ ŋkpaŋŋ na ɩ ́ nɩɩ . Teeli Ɩsɔ lɩɩ ta caanaa caanaa caa sɔsɔ Apəlaham tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ka wɛʋ Mesopotami na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ kʋləɣɩ na ɩ ́ puki Halaŋ kɛ caɣaʋ tɔ .

text: And said unto him , Get thee out of thy country , and from thy kindred , and come into the land which I shall shew thee .
text2: Na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Kʋlɩ na ń yele nyá tɛtʋ na nyá nyə ́ ma . Maa hʋlɩ - ŋ tɛtʋ nti tə taa n ká polo ń caɣa tɔ .

text: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans , and dwelt in Charran : and from thence , when his father was dead , he removed him into this land , wherein ye now dwell .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Apəlaham kʋla Kalətee tɛtʋ taa na ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ caɣa Halaŋ . Apəlaham caa səpa , ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ ləsɩ - ɩ Halaŋ təna na ɩ ́ kɔna - ɩ timpi mə wɛ kaɣana ɩsəntɔ tɔ .

text: And he gave him none inheritance in it , no , not so much as to set his foot on : yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession , and to his seed after him , when as yet he had no child .
text2: Ɩsɔ tá ha - ɩ tɛtʋ ntɩ tə taa kɛ ́ pʋlʋ maɣamaɣa . Paa tɛɛliya sɩ ɩ ́ sopi sopuɣu maɣamaɣa . Ama Ɩsɔ tɔma - ɩ kʋtɔm kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ká ha - ɩ tɛtʋ ntɩ . Ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ piya ká tɛna na pá tɩ - tɩ tɔtɔɣɔ ɩ səm waalɩ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ waatʋ ɩnɩ Apəlaham fɛɩna pəyaɣa .

text: And God spake on this wise , That his seed should sojourn in a strange land ; and that they should bring them into bondage , and entreat them evil four hundred years .
text2: Ɩlɛ nti Ɩsɔ heela - ɩ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Nyá piya ká caɣa caɣalətʋ kɛ lɛlaa tɛtʋ taa , na pɛlɛ paa la - wɛɣɛ yomaa . Paa tʋ - wɛɣɛ wahala kɛ pɩɩsɩ nasəlɛ ( 400 ) təcu kɛ ́ təna .

text: And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge , said God : and after that shall they come forth , and serve me in this place .
text2: Ama Ɩsɔ tɔma sɩ ɩ ká pɔɔsɩ piitim mpi pɩɩ tʋ - wɛɣɛ yomle kɛ mpʋ tɔ . Pəlɛ pə waalɩ ɩlɛ paa lɩɩ təna na pá kɔɔ tɛtʋ tənɛ ɩnɩ tə taa na pá paasəna Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ .

text: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision : and so Abraham begat Isaac , and circumcised him the eighth day ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat the twelve patriarchs .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ lapa na pɛlʋɣʋ pəsɩ Apəlaham kɛ kɔtaɣa ŋka kaa tɔɔsəɣɩ - ɩ nti ɩ ́ na Ɩsɔ paa yɔɣɔtaa na pá sɩɩ tɔ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Apəlaham kɔma ɩ ́ lʋlɩ Ɩsaaka tɔ , ɩ pɛla - ɩ ɩ kʋyɛɛŋ pəlefɛi naanʋwa wule . Ɩlɛna Ɩsaaka náá pɛlɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yakɔpʋ , na Yakɔpʋ ná pɛla ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ piya naanʋwa na naalɛ mpa pa kɛ ta kpeka caanaa caanaa sɔsaa tɔ .

text: And the patriarchs , moved with envy , sold Joseph into Egypt : but God was with him ,
text2: Ta caanaa caanaa mpɛ pa lapa Yosɛɛfʋ kɛ ɩsəsɛɛmlɛ na pá pɛɛtɩ - ɩ , na pá pona - ɩ Icipiti kɛ yomle . Ama Ɩsɔ ka wɛ Yosɛɛfʋ waalɩ ,

text: And delivered him out of all his afflictions , and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt ; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house .
text2: na ɩ ́ yapa - ɩ ɩ wahalanaa təna taa . Pə kɔma na Yosɛɛfʋ tala Icipiti wulaʋ sɔsɔ kiŋ tɔ , Ɩsɔ lapa na wulaʋ laŋlɛ hɛɛna ɩ yaasi na ɩ laɣatʋ . Haləna Icipiti wulaʋ nana - ɩ kʋfənɛɛ kpaʋ , sɩ ɩ ́ nyənəɣɩ Icipiti tɛtʋ təna na ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ təyaɣa pə tɔɔ .

text: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan , and great affliction : and our fathers found no sustenance .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ nyɔɣɔsɩ anaam lɩɩ Icipiti na Kanaaŋ pə tɛtʋ təna taa . Pɩɩ haŋa teu kɛ ́ təkoŋkoŋ haləna ta caanaa caanaa mpɛ pá pɛɛkɩ mpi paa tɔɣɔ tɔ na pá kpisi .

text: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt , he sent out our fathers first .
text2: Pə kɔma na Yakɔpʋ nɩɩ sɩ tɔɣɔnaɣa pee wɛ Icipiti , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋsɩ tá caanaa caanaa mpɛɣɛ tɔm kancaalaɣa nyəm na ɩ ́ tili .

text: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren ; and Joseph ' s kindred was made known unto Pharaoh .
text2: Pa kɔma na pá məlɩ tɔm naalɛ nyəm , ɩlɛna Yosɛɛfʋ lá na ɩ taalʋnaa nyəmɩ - ɩ . Na pə lapa tɔtɔ na Icipiti wulaʋ sɔsɔ maɣamaɣa náá cɛkəna ɩ piitim .

text: Then sent Joseph , and called his father Jacob to him , and all his kindred , threescore and fifteen souls .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yosɛɛfʋ tila ɩ caa Yakɔpʋ na ɩ nyə ́ ma təna waalɩ na pá kɔɔ . Pa wɛ yʋlʋnyɔɔŋ nɩɩtoso na naanʋwa na kakpasɩ .

text: So Jacob went down into Egypt , and died , he , and our fathers ,
text2: Mpʋ pə lapəna Yakɔpʋ nana Icipiti pote , na ɩ ́ caŋ ɩ ́ sɩ təna . Ta caanaa caanaa ná səpa təna tɔtɔ .

text: And were carried over into Sychem , and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought for a sum of money of the sons of Emmor the father of Sychem .
text2: Pa kpakaɣaa - wɛɣɛ na pá mələɣəna Sikɛm , na pá piŋ - wɛɣɛ pəlaaʋ ŋku Apəlaham ka yapa Hemɔɔ nyə ́ ma kiŋ na liɣitee tɔ kʋ taa .

text: But when the time of the promise drew nigh , which God had sworn to Abraham , the people grew and multiplied in Egypt ,
text2: Pə kɔma na pə ́ tala nti Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la Apəlaham tɔ tə lapʋ tɔ , tá piitim nyə ́ ma huka sɔsɔm , pa paɣaʋ kɛ Icipiti wɛ sɔɣɔntʋ .

text: Till another king arose , which knew not Joseph .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ wulaʋ sɔsɔ kʋfalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ná caɣaa , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ taa nyɩ Yosɛɛfʋ .

text: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred , and evil entreated our fathers , so that they cast out their young children , to the end they might not live .
text2: Wulaʋ ɩnɩ ɩ lapa tá piitim kɛ acilaɣatʋ . Ɩ tʋ ta caanaa caanaa kɛ wahala kɛ teu na kʋcaalʋɣʋ , sɩ pá lɔ pa ahʋlʋmnaa na pá sɩ .

text: In which time Moses was born , and was exceeding fair , and nourished up in his father ' s house three months :
text2: Waatʋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa kɛ ́ pa lʋla Moisi . Ɩ ka kɛ ́ pəyaɣa kʋpaŋka ŋka ka te Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teu tɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Moisi nyə ́ ma tɔɔ - ɩ ɩsɔtʋnaa tooso kɛ ́ pa tɛ .

text: And when he was cast out , Pharaoh ' s daughter took him up , and nourished him for her own son .
text2: Pə kɔma na pá lɔ - ɩ tɔ , Icipiti wulaʋ sɔsɔ pɛɛlɔ hiina - ɩ na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ - ɩ ɩsɩɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ kʋlʋlʋ .

text: And Moses was learned in all the wisdom of the Egyptians , and was mighty in words and in deeds .
text2: Mpʋ pə lapəna Moisi nyəmá Icipiti nyə ́ ma nyəm təna . Haləna ɩ ́ lá yʋlʋ wei ɩ ́ yɔɣɔta nti tɩɩ hotiɣi atɛ tɔ , na ɩ ́ pəsa təma .

text: And when he was full forty years old , it came into his heart to visit his brethren the children of Israel .
text2: Pə kɔma na Moisi pɩɩsɩ tala nɩɩlɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ hʋʋ sɩ ɩ ká polo na ɩ ́ wiili ɩ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma lɛlaa .

text: And seeing one of them suffer wrong , he defended him , and avenged him that was oppressed , and smote the Egyptian :
text2: Moisi polaa ɩlɛna ɩ maɣana Icipiti tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ lakɩ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ mʋsʋŋ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ mʋ wei pa lakɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mʋsʋŋ tɔ ɩ tɔm na ɩ ́ sɩɩna ɩ tɩ , na ɩ ́ lɛɛtɩ Icipiti tʋ , na ɩ ́ caŋ ɩ ́ kʋ - ɩ .

text: For he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them : but they understood not .
text2: Moisi ka nyəmaɣa sɩ ɩ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma ká nyɩ sɩ ɩnəɣɩ Ɩsɔ ləsaa sɩ ɩ ́ waasɩ - wɛ . Ama pɛlɛ pa ta nyɩ mpʋ .

text: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove , and would have set them at one again , saying , Sirs , ye are brethren ; why do ye wrong one to another ?
text2: Kʋ fema ɩlɛna ɩ ́ maɣana Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma naalɛ na pá makɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ polo pa loluɣu . Na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Apalaa mɛ , mə kʋlʋm kɛ ́ , ɩlɛ pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ lakɩ təmaɣa mʋsʋŋ ?

text: But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us ?
text2: Ama mʋsʋŋtʋ wei ɩ lakaɣa ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ kɛ mʋsʋŋ tɔ ɩ nyasa - ɩ tɔm sɩ : Ma na - ŋ , tá wulaʋ na tá tɔm hʋʋlʋ .

text: Wilt thou kill me , as thou diddest the Egyptian yesterday ?
text2: Tete n tɛma Icipiti tʋ kɛ kʋɣʋ tɔɣɔlɛ saŋa n nyəmá sɩ n ká tɛɛsɩ ma na ?

text: Then fled Moses at this saying , and was a stranger in the land of Madian , where he begat two sons .
text2: Moisi nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ se kpakpaa na ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ caɣa Matiyaŋ tɛtʋ taa . Matiyaŋ tənaɣa ɩ lʋla apalʋ piya naalɛ .

text: And when forty years were expired , there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush .
text2: Pə kɔma na pɩɩsɩ nɩɩlɛ cɔɔ , ɩlɛ kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ ɩ wɛ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa kɛ ́ pʋɣʋ Sinayi kiŋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ hotiya nakəlɩ ka sʋʋ kɔkɔ mʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩsɔtaa tillu lɩɩ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ hotiya ŋkɛ ka kɔkɔ taa .

text: When Moses saw it , he wondered at the sight : and as he drew near to behold it , the voice of the Lord came unto him ,
text2: Moisi nawa mpʋ , ɩlɛna pə ́ lapɩ - ɩ piti . Tənaɣa ɩ tuusaa sɩ ɩ wiiliɣi teu , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ nɩɩ Tacaa nɔɣɔ sɩ :

text: Saying , I am the God of thy fathers , the God of Abrham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob . Then Moses trembled , and durst not behold .
text2: Maɣalɛ nyá caanaa caanaa Ɩsɔ , Apəlaham na Ɩsaaka na Yakɔpʋ pa Ɩsɔ . Tənaɣa sɔɣɔntʋ kpa Moisi kɛ sɔsɔm na ɩ ́ seliɣi , haləna ɩ ́ kpisi nyənʋɣʋ .

text: Then said the Lord to him , Put off thy shoes from thy feet : for the place where thou standest is holy ground .
text2: Ɩlɛna Tacaa tɔ Moisi sɩ : Wɔɣɔsɩ nyá ntaŋkpala , timpi taa n səŋa mpʋ tɔ pə kɛ ́ tɛtʋ katɛ nyəntʋ kɛ ́ .

text: I have seen , I have seen the affliction of my people which is in Egypt , and I have heard their groaning , and am come down to deliver them . And now come , I will send thee into Egypt .
text2: Ma nawa ma yəlaa mpa pa wɛ Icipiti tɔ pa wahala , ma nɩɩ pa wula . Ɩlɛna má tii sɩ ma yakɩ - wɛ . Tɔʋ , kʋlɩ , ma tiliɣi - ŋ Icipiti .

text: This Moses whom they refused , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge ? the same did God send to be a ruler and a deliverer by the hand of the angel which appeared to him in the bush .
text2: Moisi wei ɩnɩ ɩ tɔm Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma ka kisaa təkpatakpata na pá tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tə na - ŋ , tá wulaʋ na tá tɔm hʋʋlʋ tɔ , kʋlʋm ɩnəɣɩ Ɩsɔ taɣana kʋsʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ tili pa kiŋ , sɩ ɩ ́ la pa wulaʋ na ɩ ́ waasɩ - wɛ na ɩsɔtaa tillu wei ɩ ka lɩɩ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ hotiya kiŋ tɔ ɩ toŋ taa .

text: He brought them out , after that he had shewed wonders and signs in the land of Egypt , and in the Red sea , and in the wilderness forty years .
text2: Ɩnɩ ɩ lapəna piti təma na Ɩsɔ kɔkɔlɔ nyəm na ɩ ́ ləsɩ - wɛɣɛ Icipiti tɛtʋ taa . Ɩ lapa mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ səsəncaasɩ teŋku taa na wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa , halɩ pɩɩsɩ nɩɩlɛ .

text: This is that Moses , which said unto the children of Israel , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear .
text2: Moisi ɩnɩ ɩ heelina Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma sɩ : Ɩsɔ ká kɔna - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɩɩ má , na ɩ ká wɛɛ mə maɣamaɣa mə piitim tʋ tɔ .

text: This is he , that was in the church in the wilderness with the angel which spake to him in the mount Sina , and with our fathers : who received the lively oracles to give unto us :
text2: Kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ ka wɛnna Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma mpa paa kota wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa tɔ pa kiŋ . Ɩ ́ na ɩsɔtaa tillu wei ɩ ka yɔɣɔtəna - ɩ pʋɣʋ Sinayi tɔɔ tɔ pa wɛnna tá caanaa caanaa kiŋ kɛ tənɛ ɩnɩ . Moisi ɩnɩ ɩ mʋna Ɩsɔ Tɔm nti tə lakɩ təmlɛ kɛ sɔsɔm tɔ sɩ ɩ tɛləsəɣɩ - tʋ .

text: To whom our fathers would not obey , but thrust him from them , and in their hearts turned back again into Egypt ,
text2: Ama tá caanaa caanaa ta nɩɩna - ɩ . Pa kisa - ɩ na pá kpaɣa pa laakalənaa na pá məŋna Icipiti .

text: Saying unto Aaron , Make us gods to go before us : for as for this Moses , which brought us out of the land of Egypt , we wot not what is become of him .
text2: Haləna pá yɔɣɔtɩ Alɔŋ sɩ : Lu - tʋɣʋ tʋɣʋ na tə ́ nyənəɣɩ - kʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , tə ta nyɩ mpi tá Icipiti taa ləsəlʋ Moisi tɛmnaa tɔ .

text: And they made a calf in those days , and offered sacrifice unto the idol , and rejoiced in the works of their own hands .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa lupa naule na pá pəsɩ - tɛɣɛ pa tʋɣʋ na pá laa - tɛ . Haləna pá yɔɔləna pa niŋ kʋlupum mpəɣɩ teu .

text: Then God turned , and gave them up to worship the host of heaven ; as it is written in the book of the prophets , O ye house of Israel , have ye offered to me slain beasts and sacrifices by the space of forty years in the wilderness ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ lapa - wɛɣɛ awusa na ɩ ́ yele - wɛ sɩ pá nyənəɣɩ ɩsɔtʋlʋŋasɩ kɛ pa tɩɩŋ , ɩsɩɩ paa ŋmaaʋ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa takəlasɩ taa tɔ sɩ : Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma mɛ , maɣa ɩ ́ lapa kɔtasɩ na ɩ ́ fɛɛnɩ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa kɛ ́ pɩɩsɩ nɩɩlɛ taa ?

text: Yea , ye took up the tabernacle of Moloch , and the star of your god Remphan , figures which ye made to worship them : and I will carry you away beyond Babylon .
text2: Aaɩ , tʋɣʋ Molɔkɩ cokəle na mə tʋɣʋ Lefaŋ ɩsɔtʋlʋŋa lɛɛsʋɣʋ kɛ ɩ ́ kpaɣaa na ɩ ́ paasəɣəna . Ɩ tənaɣa mpʋ , pə taɣa wei ɩ ́ lupa sɩ ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ tɔɣɔlɛ ? Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ maa yele na pá pona - mɛɣɛ Papiloni , haləna ɩ ́ tɛɛ pə waalɩ .

text: Our fathers had the tabernacle of witness in the wilderness , as he had appointed , speaking unto Moses , that he should make it according to the fashion that he had seen .
text2: Wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa tənɛ ɩnɩ tá caanaa caanaa ka wɛna cokəle , na tə taa na seliya kpaatanaa . Paa sika - tɛɣɛ teitei kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ ka heeluɣu Moisi tɔ . Teitei ɩsɩɩ nte tə taka Moisi ka nawa tɔ .

text: Which also our fathers that came after brought in with Jesus into the possession of the Gentiles , whom God drave out before the face of our fathers , unto the days of David ;
text2: Tá caanaa caanaa cɛla - tɛɣɛ pɛlɛ pa waalɩ nyə ́ ma . Ɩlɛna pɛlɛ pá kpɛnna - tɛɣɛ timpi Yosuwee tɛɛ - wɛɣɛ nɔɣɔ na Ɩsɔ yasɩ piitimnaa kɛ pa ɩsɛntaa na pá tɔɣɔ tɛtʋ tɔ . Na tə ́ wɛɛ tənaɣa mpʋ , haləna Tafiiti waatʋ .

text: Who found favour before God , and desired to find a tabernacle for the God of Jacob .
text2: Ɩsɔ laŋlɛ hɛɛna - ɩ teu , ɩlɛna Tafiiti náá sələmɩ - ɩ nɔɣɔ , sɩ ɩ lakɩ ɩnɩ wei ɩ kɛ ́ Yakɔpʋ Ɩsɔ tɔɣɔ təcaɣalɛ .

text: But Solomon built him an house .
text2: Pə na pə mpʋ tɔ , Salʋmɔŋ ŋmana - ɩ kutuluɣu ŋkʋ .

text: Howbeit the most High dwelleth not in temples made with hands ; as saith the prophet ,
text2: Ama pə taɣa ɩsɔtaa Ɩsɔ Sɔsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ cakɩ kutuluŋ wei yəlaa niŋ ŋmawa tɔ ɩ taa se . Halɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ maɣamaɣa yɔɣɔta mpʋ sɩ :

text: Heaven is my throne , and earth is my footstool : what house will ye build me ? saith the Lord : or what is the place of my rest ?
text2: Tacaa yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ ma kumte . Atɛɣɛlɛ ma nɔɔhɛɛ təsɩɩlɛ . Ɩlɛ kutuluɣu ŋku kʋ taka kɛ ́ ɩ ́ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ ŋma - m ? Na leɣelɛ ma təhɛɛsəlɛ ?

text: Hath not my hand made all these things ?
text2: Pə taɣa má lapəna pə tənaɣa mpʋ na ma niŋ ?

text: Ye stiffnecked and uncircumcised in heart and ears , ye do always resist the Holy Ghost : as your fathers did , so do ye .
text2: Tɔʋ , yəlaa mpa mɛ ɩ ́ tɛma keeluɣu tɔ , mə laŋa lapa kpɩɩsəŋ na mə ŋkpaŋŋ tɛɛlɩ na ɩ ́ kisi Ɩsɔ Tɔm . Ɩ ́ kpɛɛsəɣəna Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kɛ tam , mə caanaa katɛ kɛ ɩ ́ kpaɣaa .

text: Which of the prophets have not your fathers persecuted ? and they have slain them which shewed before of the coming of the Just One ; of whom ye have been now the betrayers and murderers :
text2: Mə caanaa naasa Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa mpɛ pa təna na pá sɔɔ kʋlʋm kɛ ? Pa kʋ mpa pa heelaɣa sɩ tampana təŋlʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ká kɔɔ tɔ . Kʋlʋm ɩnəɣəlɛ mə lapa kɔlɔmɔtɔ kɛ nɔɔnɔɔ na ɩ ́ kʋ .

text: Who have received the law by the disposition of angels , and have not kept it .
text2: Halɩ mɛɣɛ ɩsɔtaa tillaa tɛləsa Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ . Pəyele ɩɩ caakɩ tə tɔkʋɣʋ .

text: When they heard these things , they were cut to the heart , and they gnashed on him with their teeth .
text2: Yuta nyə ́ ma nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pááná huu pa taa , na pá sala pa niŋ kɛ Ɩtiyɛɛnɩ tɔɔ na pá taŋaa .

text: But he , being full of the Holy Ghost , looked up stedfastly into heaven , and saw the glory of God , and Jesus standing on the right hand of God ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toma kʋləna Ɩtiyɛɛnɩ kɛ teu . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ teki ɩ ɩsɛ na ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ na Ɩsɔ teu sɔsɔɔm na Yesu səŋa ɩ ntɔɣɔŋ tɔɔ .

text: And said , Behold , I see the heavens opened , and the Son of man standing on the right hand of God .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ tɔma sɩ : Ɩɩ naa , ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ tʋlaa , na má naa Yʋlʋ Pəyaɣa na ká səŋa Ɩsɔ ntɔɣɔŋ tɔɔ .

text: Then they cried out with a loud voice , and stopped their ears , and ran upon him with one accord ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma mapa kapusi kɛ teu , na pá təkɩ pa ŋkpaŋŋ na pá huli Ɩtiyɛɛnɩ .

text: And cast him out of the city , and stoned him : and the witnesses laid down their clothes at a young man ' s feet , whose name was Saul .
text2: Na pá tuli - ɩ na pá lɩɩna ɩcatɛ waalɩ , na pá sʋʋ - ɩ pɛɛ yaɣaʋ sɩ pá kʋ - ɩ . Mpa paa kɛ ́ pə aseeta nyə ́ ma tɔ , pɛlɛ pa sɩɩna ɩfepu wei pa yaa sɩ Sɔɔlɩ tɔɣɔ pa wontu .

text: And they stoned Stephen , calling upon God , and saying , Lord Jesus , receive my spirit .
text2: Pa tɔŋna Ɩtiyɛɛnɩ kɛ pɛɛ yaɣaʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sələmɩ sɩ : Tacaa Yesu kɛlɩ - m .

text: And he kneeled down , and cried with a loud voice , Lord , lay not this sin to their charge . And when he had said this , he fell asleep .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ luŋ akula na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəna nɔɣɔ sɔsɔɔŋka sɩ : Tacaa , taa nyənɩ pa ɩsaɣatʋ tənɛ . Ɩtiyɛɛnɩ yɔɣɔta mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ hɛɛ .

text: And Saul was consenting unto his death . And at that time there was a great persecution against the church which was at Jerusalem ; and they were all scattered abroad throughout the regions of Judaea and Samaria , except the apostles .
text2: Sɔɔlɩ laŋlɛ ka hɛɛna Ɩtiyɛɛnɩ kʋɣʋ . Kʋyakʋ ŋkʋ kʋ maɣamaɣa kɛ pa sʋʋ Yosalɛm Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle kɛ kʋnyɔŋ tʋɣʋ kɛ teu . Ɩlɛna pa təna pá ya Yuta na Samalii taa , na pə yele tillaa tike .

text: And devout men carried Stephen to his burial , and made great lamentation over him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yəlaa mpa pa təŋəɣɩ Ɩsɔ mpaaʋ kɛ teu tɔ pa pima Ɩtiyɛɛnɩ , na pá wii - ɩ sɔsɔm .

text: As for Saul , he made havock of the church , entering into every house , and haling men and women committed them to prison .
text2: Ama pə yela Sɔɔlɩ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ tɔ , Yesu sɛɛlaa kɛ ɩ tɔŋna lʋpʋ sɩ ɩ lakɩ sakasaka . Tɛɛsɩ taa kɛ ́ ɩ sʋʋkaɣa na ɩ ́ kpaakɩ apalaa na alaa na ɩ ́ təkəɣɩ .

text: Therefore they that were scattered abroad went every where preaching the word .
text2: Mpa mpa pa ya mpʋ tɔ pa cɔɔkaɣa paa le na pá heeliɣi Ɩsɔ Tɔm Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ .

text: Then Philip went down to the city of Samaria , and preached Christ unto them .
text2: Samalii ɩcatɛ kɛ Filipʋ ná polaa na ɩ ́ heeliɣi təna nyə ́ ma kɛ Mesii tɔm .

text: And the people with one accord gave heed unto those things which Philip spake , hearing and seeing the miracles which he did .
text2: Piti təma nna Filipʋ lakaɣa tɔ samaa nɩɩ a tɔm na pá nana pa ɩsɛ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ waatʋ wei ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ , pa təna təpaɩ pa tʋɣɩ ŋkpaŋʋɣʋ kɛ teu .

text: For unclean spirits , crying with loud voice , came out of many that were possessed with them : and many taken with palsies , and that were lame , were healed .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , alɔɣaa kiisaɣa na pá seeki alɔɣɔhilaa paɣalɛ kiŋ na acamaa na kaakalasɩ paɣalɛ hika alaafəya .

text: And there was great joy in that city .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yəlaa laŋa hʋlʋma katatəlaɣa , haləna pə ́ la ɩcatɛ ntɛɣɛ yuŋ .

text: But there was a certain man , called Simon , which beforetime in the same city used sorcery , and bewitched the people of Samaria , giving out that himself was some great one :
text2: Apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ naa wɛ ɩcatɛ ńtɛ ́ tə taa kɛ ́ hatoo lɔŋ , pa yaakɩ - ɩ sɩ Simɔŋ . Apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ lakaɣa topotopo təma kɛ ́ , na pə lakɩ Samalii nyə ́ ma tənaɣa piti . Ɩ nyənaɣa ɩ təɣɩ sɔsɔ kɛ ́ pə tii fɛɩ .

text: To whom they all gave heed , from the least to the greatest , saying , This man is the great power of God .
text2: Pə kpaɣaʋ piya na pə ́ polo sɔsaa tɔ pa təna pa wutaɣa - ɩ kɛ ́ . Haləna yəlaa tɔŋaɣa sɩ : Ɩsɔ toma nna pa yaa toma sɔsɔɔna tɔ a tʋ ntɔ .

text: And to him they had regard , because that of long time he had bewitched them with sorceries .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá wutiɣi Simɔŋ ɩnɩ ɩ waalɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ topotopo təma ka tɛmna - wɛɣɛ piti lapʋ kɛ hatoo lɔŋ .

text: But when they believed Philip preaching the things concerning the kingdom of God , and the name of Jesus Christ , they were baptized , both men and women .
text2: Ama Filipʋ kɔma na ɩ ́ heeliɣi - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa na Yesu Kilisiti pə Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔ pa mʋ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ ɩnəɣɩ teu , haləna pá sɔ apalaa na alaa kɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm .

text: Then Simon himself believed also : and when he was baptized , he continued with Philip , and wondered , beholding the miracles and signs which were done .
text2: Simɔŋ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ mʋwa na pá sɔ - ɩ Ɩsɔ lʋm . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sʋʋ Filipʋ kɛ təŋʋɣʋ na ɩ nyənaɣa Ɩsɔ kɔkɔlɔnaa sɔsaa na piti təma nna a lakaɣa tɔ na pə wɛ - ɩ piti .

text: Now when the apostles which were at Jerusalem heard that Samaria had received the word of God , they sent unto them Peter and John :
text2: Tillaa mpa paa wɛ Yosalɛm tɔ pa nɩɩwa sɩ Samalii nyə ́ ma mʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm , ɩlɛna pá kʋsɩ Piyɛɛ na Yohaanɩ na pá tili sɩ pá polo na pá ná .

text: Who , when they were come down , prayed for them , that they might receive the Holy Ghost :
text2: Piyɛɛ pa tala təna , ɩlɛna pá sələməna Samalii nyə ́ ma mpɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ sɩ pá hiki Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ .

text: ( For as yet he was fallen upon none of them : only they were baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus . )
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Tacaa Yesu hətɛ tike kɛ paa yaawa na pá sɔna - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm . Ɩlɛ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ ta tiita pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: Then laid they their hands on them , and they received the Holy Ghost .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ na Yohaanɩ pa təna niŋ kɛ pa tɔɔ . Ɩlɛna pá hiki Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ .

text: And when Simon saw that through laying on of the apostles ' hands the Holy Ghost was given , he offered them money ,
text2: Waatʋ wei Simɔŋ nawa sɩ tillaa təna - wɛɣɛ niŋ na pá hiki Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ tɔ , ɩ cɛla - wɛɣɛ liɣitee ,

text: Saying , Give me also this power , that on whomsoever I lay hands , he may receive the Holy Ghost .
text2: na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ cɛlɛ maɣa mpʋ ɩnɩ pə lapʋ tɔtɔ , na má təna wei kɛ ́ niŋ , pʋntʋ hiki Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kɛ mpʋ .

text: But Peter said unto him , Thy money perish with thee , because thou hast thought that the gift of God may be purchased with money .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ tɔma sɩ : Ɩsəna mpi n hʋʋʋ sɩ pa pəsəɣɩ pá ya Ɩsɔ hatɛ na liɣitee tɔ , nyá na nyá liɣitee ɩ ́ la yem .

text: Thou hast neither part nor lot in this matter : for thy heart is not right in the sight of God .
text2: N kaa na pʋlʋ cəcəka . Pəyele nyá paa maɣamaɣa tɩɩ fɛɩ tənɛ ɩnɩ tə taa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa nyá lotu ta te .

text: Repent therefore of this thy wickedness , and pray God , if perhaps the thought of thine heart may be forgiven thee .
text2: Ɩlɛ lɔ nyá hʋwɛɛ asaɣɛɛ anɩ , na ń wiina Tacaa na ɩ ́ hʋlɩ - ŋ suulu na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ - ŋ nyá hʋwɛɛ asaɣɛɛ anɩ .

text: For I perceive that thou art in the gall of bitterness , and in the bond of iniquity .
text2: Pə taɣa mpʋ , ma naakʋɣʋ - ŋ tɔ , nyá na nyaŋ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ kakaɣa . Ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ tɔkəna - ŋ təkem .

text: Then answered Simon , and said , Pray ye to the Lord for me , that none of these things which ye have spoken come upon me .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Simɔŋ cɔ - wɛ sɩ : Mɩɩ wiina - m na Tacaa , na nti ɩ ́ yɔɣɔta mpʋ tɔ tə taa natəlɩ ɩ ́ taa la - m .

text: And they , when they had testified and preached the word of the Lord , returned to Jerusalem , and preached the gospel in many villages of the Samaritans .
text2: Tillaa mpɛ pa naalɛ pa tɛma nti nti pa nawa tɔɣɔ kɛɛsʋɣʋ na waasʋ lapʋ . Ɩlɛna pá kʋlɩ na pá məlɩ Yosalɛm . Pa məlaɣa mpʋ tɔ , pa heelaɣa Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ Samalii acalɛɛ paɣalɛ taa kɛ ́ na pá tɔŋna pote .

text: And the angel of the Lord spake unto Philip , saying , Arise , and go toward the south unto the way that goeth down from Jerusalem unto Gaza , which is desert .
text2: Tacaa ɩsɔtaa tillu nɔɣɔlʋ heela Filipʋ sɩ : Kʋlɩ na ń təŋ ilim mpətəŋ tɔɔ , na ń katɩ hapəlɛ nte tə lɩɩkɩ Yosalɛm na tə puki Kasa tɔ . Wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa kɛ ́ hapəlɛ ńtɛ ́ tə faɣanaa .

text: And he arose and went : and , behold , a man of Ethiopia , an eunuch of great authority under Candace queen of the Ethiopians , who had the charge of all her treasure , and had come to Jerusalem for to worship ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Filipʋ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ tʋ mpaaʋ . Ɩ tɔŋna pote , ɩlɛ ɩ nawa yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋɣʋlɛ . Sɛsɛ Ɩtiyopii yʋlʋ kataŋa ntɛ ́ . Ɩnɩ ɩ ka kɛna Ɩtiyopii wulaʋ sɔsɔ alʋ nyəŋ wei pa yaa sɩ Kantasɩ tɔ ɩ akewe sɔsɔ , wei ɩ nyənaɣa ɩ kpancoou təna tɔɔ tɔ . Apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ka lɩɩna Yosalɛm kɛlɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ .

text: Was returning , and sitting in his chariot read Esaias the prophet .
text2: Ɩ caɣa ɩ kɛɛkɛ taa , na ɩ ́ kaləɣɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Ɩsayii takəlaɣa taa na ɩ ́ tɔŋna kpente .

text: Then the Spirit said unto Philip , Go near , and join thyself to this chariot .
text2: Tənaɣa Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ heela Filipʋ sɩ : Tɔ na ń kpətəna kɛɛkɛ ɩnɩ .

text: And Philip ran thither to him , and heard him read the prophet Esaias , and said , Understandest thou what thou readest ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Filipʋ kpaɣa asewa na ɩ ́ tala ɩ kiŋ , na ɩ ́ nɩɩ ɩ tɔŋna Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Ɩsayii takəlaɣa taa kɛ ́ kalʋɣʋ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : N cɛkəna nti n kaləɣɩ tɔɣɔlɛ ?

text: And he said , How can I , except some man should guide me ? And he desired Philip that he would come up and sit with him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yʋlʋ kataŋa cɔ Filipʋ sɩ : Ye nɔɣɔlʋ ta sɛɣɛsɩ - m , ɩsənaɣa maa la na má cɛkəna ? Ɩlɛna yʋlʋ kataŋa tɔ Filipʋ sɩ : Kpa na ń caɣa ma kiŋ .

text: The place of the scripture which he read was this , He was led as a sheep to the slaughter ; and like a lamb dumb before his shearer , so opened he not his mouth :
text2: Tɔm nti ɩ kalaɣa takəlaɣa ŋkɛ ka taa tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Pa tɛɛna - ɩ ɩsɩɩ pa tɛɛkʋɣʋna heu kɛ nampaɣatəlɛ tɔ . Ɩ lapaɣa ɩsɩɩ ɩwəyaɣa ŋka ka hʋntʋ pa kɔɔkɩ na ká suma tɔ . Ɩ suma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ta cɔ natəlɩ .

text: In his humiliation his judgment was taken away : and who shall declare his generation ? for his life is taken from the earth .
text2: Pa tʋ - ɩ taaləm na pá kʋ ɩ tɔm kɛ pətɔɔtəlɛ kɛ yem . Awe ká pəsɩ na ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ ɩ piitim tɔm ? Pa tama ɩ weesuɣu tomle kɛ atɛ cənɛ .

text: And the eunuch answered Philip , and said , I pray thee , of whom speaketh the prophet this ? of himself , or of some other man ?
text2: Tənaɣa akewe ɩnɩ ɩ tɔma Filipʋ sɩ : La suulu na ń heeli - m , awe tɔm kɛ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ kɛɛsəɣɩ mpʋ ? Ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ tɔm yaa nɔɣɔlʋ nyəntʋ ?

text: Then Philip opened his mouth , and began at the same scripture , and preached unto him Jesus .
text2: Ɩlɛna Filipʋ sʋʋ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ , na ɩ ́ kpaɣa tɔm nti ɩnɩ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kalaɣa mpʋ tɔ , na ɩ sɛɣɛsəna - ɩ Yesu Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ .

text: And as they went on their way , they came unto a certain water : and the eunuch said , See , here is water ; what doth hinder me to be baptized ?
text2: Pa tɔŋna tɔntɛ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá tala tiili ɩsəntɔ , lʋm ka wɛ tənaɣa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ akewe ɩnɩ ɩ tɔma sɩ : Nyənɩ lʋm yee , n kaa sɔ - m Ɩsɔ lʋm kɛ cənɛɣɛ kpakpaa ? Yaa pə kaasa - m pʋlʋ ?

text: And Philip said , If thou believest with all thine heart , thou mayest . And he answered and said , I believe that Jesus Christ is the Son of God .
text2: Ɩlɛna Filipʋ cɔ yʋlʋ kataŋa sɩ : Ye n tɛma nyá taa təkpataa te , má sɔɔ - ŋ kɛ ́ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yʋlʋ kataŋa cɔwa sɩ : Ma tɛma ma taa sɩ Yesu Kilisiti kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa kɛ ́ .

text: And he commanded the chariot to stand still : and they went down both into the water , both Philip and the eunuch ; and he baptized him .
text2: Tənaɣa yʋlʋ kataŋa səŋsa kɛɛkɛ na Filipʋ na akewe ɩnɩ pá tii pa naalɛɣɛ lʋm taa , na Filipʋ sɔ - ɩ Ɩsɔ lʋm .

text: And when they were come up out of the water , the Spirit of the Lord caught away Philip , that the eunuch saw him no more : and he went on his way rejoicing .
text2: Pa lɩɩna lʋm taa , ɩlɛna Tacaa Feesuɣu kɛlɩ Filipʋ , akewe ɩnɩ ɩ ta tasa - ɩ keesuɣu . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ tʋ ɩ mpaaʋ na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ kʋɣɩ - ɩ .

text: But Philip was found at Azotus : and passing through he preached in all the cities , till he came to Caesarea .
text2: Ama Filipʋ ná tuta ɩ təɣɩ Asoto , na ɩ ́ lakɩ waasʋ kɛ acalɛɛ nna nna a taa ɩ təŋnaa tɔ , haləna ɩ ́ tala Sesalee .

text: And Saul , yet breathing out threatenings and slaughter against the disciples of the Lord , went unto the high priest ,
text2: Ama Sɔɔlɩ ná tɔŋna Tacaa təŋlaa kʋɣʋ kpɛɛsʋɣʋ na ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ polo kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ kiŋ ,

text: And desired of him letters to Damascus to the synagogues , that if he found any of this way , whether they were men or women , he might bring them bound unto Jerusalem .
text2: na ɩ ́ sələmɩ - ɩ sɩ : La - m takəlaɣa , na má pola Tamasɩ , na má maɣana Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa taa kɛ ́ mpa pa təŋəɣɩ Tacaa mpaaʋ tɔ , paa apalaa paa alaa , ma kpa - wɛ na má hɔkɔ na má pona Yosalɛm .

text: And as he journeyed , he came near Damascus : and suddenly there shined round about him a light from heaven :
text2: Waatʋ wei Sɔɔlɩ wɛ mpaaʋ taa na ɩ ́ kpətəna Tamasɩ , ɩlɛ pə lɩɩna ɩsɔ kɛlɛ na pə ́ la ɩ ɩsɛntɔɔ tənyalulu ɩsɩɩ kɔkɔ kɛ tɔm kʋlʋm tɔɔ na pə ná na pə ́ cɔɔna - ɩ .

text: And he fell to the earth , and heard a voice saying unto him , Saul , Saul , why persecutest thou me ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ hota atɛ na ɩ ́ nɩɩ pə pɔɔsəɣɩ - ɩ sɩ : Sɔɔlɩ Sɔɔlɩ pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ n tʋɣʋ - m kʋnyɔŋ kɛ mpʋ ?

text: And he said , Who art thou , Lord ? And the Lord said , I am Jesus whom thou persecutest : it is hard for thee to kick against the pricks .
text2: Tənaɣa Sɔɔlɩ pɔɔsaa sɩ : Tacaa nyaɣa aweɣe ye ? Ɩlɛna pə ́ cɔ Sɔɔlɩ sɩ : Maɣa Yesu wei n tʋɣɩ kʋnyɔŋ tɔ .

text: And he trembling and astonished said , Lord , what wilt thou have me to do ? And the Lord said unto him , Arise , and go into the city , and it shall be told thee what thou must do .
text2: Kʋlɩ na ń polo ɩcatɛ taa , paa heeli - ŋ nti n ka la tɔ .

text: And the men which journeyed with him stood speechless , hearing a voice , but seeing no man .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə tənmsa mpa pa təŋaɣa Sɔɔlɩ tɔ na pá səŋa yem . Pa nɩɩkaɣa pə yɔɣɔtəɣɩ , ama paa naakɩ nɔɣɔlʋ .

text: And Saul arose from the earth ; and when his eyes were opened , he saw no man : but they led him by the hand , and brought him into Damascus .
text2: Tənaɣa sɔɔlɩ kʋla atɛ na ɩ ́ nyənəɣɩ yem ɩɩ naakɩ . Ɩlɛna pá tɔkɩ ɩ niŋ taa na pá hɔmɩ - ɩ na pá pona Tamasɩ .

text: And he was three days without sight , and neither did eat nor drink .
text2: Na ɩ ́ caɣa kʋyɛɛŋ toosoɣo yʋlʋmlɛ tɛɛ , ɩ ta tɔɣɔ , ɩ ta nyɔɔ .

text: And there was a certain disciple at Damascus , named Ananias ; and to him said the Lord in a vision , Ananias . And he said , Behold , I am here , Lord .
text2: Tacaa təŋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛ Tamasɩ na pá yaa - ɩ sɩ Ananiyasɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa - ɩ ɩsɩɩ toosee taka , na ɩ ́ ná Tacaa , na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ yaa - ɩ sɩ : Ananiyasɩ . Na ɩ ́ tisi sɩ : Tacaa maɣalɔ .

text: And the Lord said unto him , Arise , and go into the street which is called Straight , and inquire in the house of Judas for one called Saul , of Tarsus : for , behold , he prayeth ,
text2: Ɩlɛna Tacaa tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Kʋlɩ təwaka na ń təŋ hapəlɛ nte pa yaa sɩ Kʋsiɣisile tɔ , na ń sʋʋ Yutaasɩ təyaɣa , na ń pɔɔsɩ Taasɩ ɩcatɛ apalʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Sɔɔlɩ tɔ ɩ tɔɔ . Ɩ wɛ təna na ɩ ́ tɔŋna Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ .

text: And hath seen in a vision a man named Ananias coming in , and putting his hand on him , that he might receive his sight .
text2: Pə lapa - ɩ ɩsɩɩ toosee taka , na ɩ ́ ná nyá wei pa yaa sɩ Ananiyasɩ tɔ , na ń sʋʋ sɩ n tənəɣɩ - ɩ niŋ na ɩ ɩsɛ kuli .

text: Then Ananias answered , Lord , I have heard by many of this man , how much evil he hath done to thy saints at Jerusalem :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ananiyasɩ tɔma sɩ : Tacaa , ma nɩɩ təŋlaa paɣalɛ kiŋ kɛ apalʋ ɩnɛ ɩ tɔm , na ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ nti tə təna ɩ lapa nyá yəlaa kɛ Yosalɛm tɔ pə tɔm tɔtɔ .

text: And here he hath authority from the chief priests to bind all that call on thy name .
text2: Kɔtəlaa sɔsaa ha - ɩ nɔɣɔ sɩ ɩ ́ kɔɔ cənɛ tɔtɔ na ɩ ́ hɔkɔ mpa pa tɔka nyá tɔm tɔ .

text: But the Lord said unto him , Go thy way : for he is a chosen vessel unto me , to bear my name before the Gentiles , and kings , and the children of Israel :
text2: Tənaɣa Tacaa cɔ Ananiyasɩ sɩ : Polo , ma ləsa apalʋ ɩnəɣɩ sɩ ma lakɩ - ɩ na ɩ ́ heeliɣi ma tɔm kɛ piitimnaa na awulaa sɔsaa na Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma .

text: For I will shew him how great things he must suffer for my name ' s sake .
text2: Ma maɣamaɣa maa hʋləna - ɩ kʋnyɔməŋ wei ɩ ká tɔɣɔ ma nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔ .

text: And Ananias went his way , and entered into the house ; and putting his hands on him said , Brother Saul , the Lord , even Jesus , that appeared unto thee in the way as thou camest , hath sent me , that thou mightest receive thy sight , and be filled with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ananiyasɩ tɛɛwa . Ɩ kɔma ɩ tala təyaɣa ŋkɛ ka taa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tənɩ ɩ niŋ kɛ Sɔɔlɩ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ma taapalʋ Sɔɔlɩ , Tacaa Yesu wei n kɔŋaɣa na ń ná mpaaʋ taa tɔ , ɩnɩ ɩ tilina - m sɩ nyá ɩsɛ ɩ ́ kuli na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toma haɣa nyá taa kɛ ́ sɔsɔm .

text: And immediately there fell from his eyes as it had been scales : and he received sight forthwith , and arose , and was baptized .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pʋlʋpʋnaa ɩsɩɩ hutu taka kɔɔla Sɔɔlɩ ɩsɛntɔɔ kɛ ́ kpakpaa na pə ́ hoti atɛ na ɩ ́ sʋʋ naʋ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na pá sɔ - ɩ Ɩsɔ lʋm .

text: And when he had received meat , he was strengthened . Then was Saul certain days with the disciples which were at Damascus .
text2: Na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ kʋtɔɣɔʋ na ɩ ́ hiki toma . Sɔɔlɩ caɣa Tacaa təŋlaa mpa pa wɛ Tamasɩ tɔ pa cɔlɔɣɔ wɛɛ naalɛ .

text: And straightway he preached Christ in the synagogues , that he is the Son of God .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Sɔɔlɩ sʋʋ waasʋ lapʋ taa kɛ ́ kpakpaa kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa taa . Ɩ heelaɣa təfoo kɛ ́ sɩ Yesu kɛlɛ Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ .

text: But all that heard him were amazed , and said ; Is not this he that destroyed them which called on this name in Jerusalem , and came hither for that intent , that he might bring them bound unto the chief priests ?
text2: Na pa təna mpa pa nɩɩ ɩ waasʋ ɩnɩ tɔ , piti kpa - wɛ na pá tɔŋ sɩ : Pə taɣa ɩnɩ ɩ ka sɛɛsəna ɩsəlɛ na mpa pa tɔka Yesu tɔm tənɛɣɛ Yosalɛm tɔɣɔ kʋnyɔŋ tʋɣʋ ? Ɩsɩɩ ɩ ka kɔma cənɛ sɩ ɩ kpaa - wɛ na ɩ ́ hɔkɔ na ɩ ́ pona kɔtəlaa sɔsaa ya ?

text: But Saul increased the more in strength , and confounded the Jews which dwelt at Damascus , proving that this is very Christ .
text2: Paa na mpʋ Sɔɔlɩ ná tɔŋna waasʋ lapʋ na ɩ toŋ sɔɔsəɣɩ tam na pə ́ puki . Ɩ hʋlaɣaa Tamasɩ Yuta nyə ́ ma sɩ Yesu kɛlɛ Mesii . Ɩlɛna pə ́ məlɩ pɛlɛɣɛ liɣituɣu , paa nyəŋ nti pá cɔ - ɩ tɔ .

text: And after that many days were fulfilled , the Jews took counsel to kill him :
text2: Wɛɛ lapa naalɛ , ɩlɛna Yuta nyə ́ ma caɣa na pá taɣanɩ sɩ pá kʋ - ɩ .

text: But their laying await was known of Saul . And they watched the gates day and night to kill him .
text2: Ama Sɔɔlɩ nɩɩ nti pa hɔkaa na pá sɩɩ tɔ . Na ɩcatɛ koluŋa nɔnɔɔsɩ taŋa ilim na ahoo sɩ pá hiki - ɩ na pá kʋ - ɩ .

text: Then the disciples took him by night , and let him down by the wall in a basket .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ahoo naalɩ Sɔɔlɩ ɩfalaa tʋ - ɩ sɔɔtɔkʋ sɔsɔɔʋ taa na pá tisi - ɩ na ɩcatɛ koluŋa na ɩ ́ tɛɛ .

text: And when Saul was come to Jerusalem , he assayed to join himself to the disciples : but they were all afraid of him , and believed not that he was a disciple .
text2: Waatʋ wei Sɔɔlɩ tala Yosalɛm tɔ ɩ lʋpa sɩ ɩ sʋʋkɩ Tacaa təŋlaa hɛkʋ . Ama pɛlɛ pa nyamna - ɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa taa tɛ pa taa sɩ ɩ pəsa Tacaa təŋlʋ kɛ kʋpam .

text: But Barnabas took him , and brought him to the apostles , and declared unto them how he had seen the Lord in the way , and that he had spoken to him , and how he had preached boldly at Damascus in the name of Jesus .
text2: Tənaɣa Paanapasɩ kpaɣa Sɔɔlɩ na ɩ ́ na - ɩ pá polo tillaa kiŋ na ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ - wɛɣɛ ɩsəna Sɔɔlɩ ɩnɩ ɩ nawa Tacaa kɛ mpaaʋ taa , na ɩsəna Tacaa ná yɔɣɔtəna - ɩ tɔ . Na ɩ kɛɛsa - wɛ tɔtɔɣɔ ɩsəna ɩ sɛɣɛsa Yesu tɔm kɛ Tamasɩ ɩ ta nyana pʋlʋ tɔ .

text: And he was with them coming in and going out at Jerusalem .
text2: Pə kpaɣa hatoo kʋyaŋku tɔ , ɩ ́ na Tacaa təŋlaa kɛ tam kɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ cɔɔkɩ Yosalɛm taa kɛ ́ ɩsəna mpi ɩ sɔɔlaa tɔ , na ɩ ́ lakɩ Tacaa waasʋ , ɩɩ nyaŋna pʋlʋ .

text: And he spake boldly in the name of the Lord Jesus , and disputed against the Grecians : but they went about to slay him .
text2: Ɩ yɔɣɔtaɣana Yuta nyə ́ ma mpa pa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ Kəlɛɛkɩ tɔm tɔ tɔtɔ , na ɩ ́ na - wɛ pa hɔŋaɣa tɔmnaa haləna pɛlɛ pá pɛɛkəɣɩ sɩ pá kʋ - ɩ .

text: Which when the brethren knew , they brought him down to Caesarea , and sent him forth to Tarsus .
text2: Pə kɔma na ta taapalaa cɛkəna mpʋ , ɩlɛna pɛlɛ pá kpaɣa - ɩ na pá pona - ɩ Sesalee sɩ ɩ ́ tɛɛ Taasɩ .

text: Then had the churches rest throughout all Judaea and Galilee and Samaria , and were edified ; and walking in the fear of the Lord , and in the comfort of the Holy Ghost , were multiplied .
text2: Saa ɩnɩ Yuta tɛtʋ təna taa Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka hɛɛsaa , na Kalilee na Samalii pa tɛtʋnaa taa nyə ́ ma ná hɛɛsaa tɔtɔ , na pá yooki toŋ , na pá seeki Tacaa kɛ pə təna pə taa , na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ səŋna - wɛ na pá hukiɣi .

text: And it came to pass , as Peter passed throughout all quarters , he came down also to the saints which dwelt at Lydda .
text2: Piyɛɛ cɔɔkaɣa paa timpi , ɩlɛna kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ ɩ ́ tala Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa mpa pa wɛ Lita tɔ pa tɛ .

text: And there he found a certain man named Aeneas , which had kept his bed eight years , and was sick of the palsy .
text2: Na ɩ ́ maɣana apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ təna pa yaa - ɩ sɩ Ɩnee . Apalʋ ɩnɩ pə tʋʋla - ɩ kɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ həntɩ pɩɩsɩ pəlefɛɩ naanʋwa .

text: And Peter said unto him , Aeneas , Jesus Christ maketh thee whole : arise , and make thy bed . And he arose immediately .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Ɩnee , Yesu Kilisiti waakɩ - ŋ , kʋlɩ na ń kpili nyá kʋhəntʋɣʋ . Tənaɣa Ɩnee kʋla kpakpaa .

text: And all that dwelt at Lydda and Saron saw him , and turned to the Lord .
text2: Lita nyə ́ ma na Salɔŋ tɛtɛkəlɛ nyə ́ ma na - ɩ , ɩlɛna pá laɣasɩ na pá mʋ Tacaa tɔm .

text: Now there was at Joppa a certain disciple named Tabitha , which by interpretation is called Dorcas : this woman was full of good works and almsdeeds which she did .
text2: Alʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka kɛna Ɩsɔ sɛɛlʋ na ɩ ́ wɛ Sopee na pá yaa - ɩ sɩ Tapita . ( Hətɛ ntɛɣɛ Kəlɛɛkɩ nyə ́ ma ná yaa sɩ Tʋlʋkasɩ . Pə hʋwɛɛ wɛɛ sɩ nasɛm na pa tɛ taa . ) Tam alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ɩsəlɛ ka sɛɛna kʋpantʋ lapʋ kɛ ́ , na ɩ teŋaɣa kʋnyɔntʋnaa .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that she was sick , and died : whom when they had washed , they laid her in an upper chamber .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ wʋsasɩ kpa - ɩ waatʋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa na ɩ ́ sɩ . Ɩlɛna pá sɔ - ɩ lʋm na pá hɩɩsɩ - ɩ ɩsɔtaa naŋ taa .

text: And forasmuch as Lydda was nigh to Joppa , and the disciples had heard that Peter was there , they sent unto him two men , desiring him that he would not delay to come to them .
text2: Tacaa təŋlaa mpa pa wɛ Sopee tɔ pa nɩɩwa sɩ Piyɛɛ wɛ Lita . Pə ́ cɔ ́ Sopee na Lita pə fɛɩ təma na pooluŋ . Ɩlɛna pá kʋsɩ apalaa naalɛ sɩ pá polo pá wiina - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ la suulu na ɩ ́ kɔɔ pa tɛɣɛ lɔŋ , pə taa leeli .

text: Then Peter arose and went with them . When he was come , they brought him into the upper chamber : and all the widows stood by him weeping , and shewing the coats and garments which Dorcas made , while she was with them .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ təŋ apalaa mpɛɣɛ kpakpaa . Ɩ talaa , ɩlɛna pá kpaɣa - ɩ na pá kpaana - ɩ ɩsɔtaa naŋ ŋkʋ kʋ taa . Na leelaa tʋ - ɩ hɛkʋ na pá wiliɣi na pá hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ pa tokonaa na pa wontunaa mpa ɩ ka nyala - wɛɣɛ waatʋ wei ɩ wɛna ɩ ɩsɛ tɔ .

text: But Peter put them all forth , and kneeled down , and prayed ; and turning him to the body said , Tabitha , arise . And she opened her eyes : and when she saw Peter , she sat up .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ ləsa yəlaa təna , na ɩ ́ luŋ akula na ɩ ́ sələmɩ Ɩsɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pəsəna sətʋ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Tapita kʋlɩ . Tənaɣa Tapita kula ɩ ɩsɛ . Ɩ nawa Piyɛɛ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ caɣa ɩ tapʋɣʋ tɔɔ .

text: And he gave her his hand , and lifted her up , and when he had called the saints and widows , presented her alive .
text2: Ɩlɛna Piyɛɛ siisi na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ ɩ niŋ na ɩ ́ hɔmɩ - ɩ na ɩ ́ kʋsɩ - ɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ yaa Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa na leelaa mpɛ na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - wɛɣɛ - ɩ na ɩ ɩsɛ .

text: And it was known throughout all Joppa ; and many believed in the Lord .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɔm tənɛ tə yawa Sopee ɩcatɛ təna taa na yəlaa paɣalɛ mʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm .

text: And it came to pass , that he tarried many days in Joppa with one Simon a tanner .
text2: Piyɛɛ caɣa Sopee tənaɣa wɛɛ naalɛɣɛ tɔnəŋ nyallʋ nɔɣɔlʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Simɔŋ tɔ ɩ tɛ .

text: There was a certain man in Caesarea called Cornelius , a centurion of the band called the Italian band ,
text2: Apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ka wɛ Sesalee wei pa yaa sɩ Kɔɔnɛɛ tɔ . Ɩ kɛ ́ Lom yoolaa tintiɣile sɔsɔ . Pa yaa ɩ tintiɣile ńtɛ ́ sɩ Ɩtalii nyəntɛ .

text: A devout man , and one that feared God with all his house , which gave much alms to the people , and prayed to God alway .
text2: Apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ təŋaɣa Ɩsɔ mpaaʋ kɛ teu , na ɩ ́ na ɩ təyaɣa nyə ́ ma təna pa pukaɣa Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ kɛ tam . Ɩ səŋaɣana Yuta kʋnyɔntʋnaa kɛ sɔsɔm , na ɩ sələmaɣa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tam .

text: He saw in a vision evidently about the ninth hour of the day an angel of God coming in to him , and saying unto him , Cornelius .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ ilim kpiluɣu waatʋ ɩsɩɩ waaci makʋɣʋ tooso tɔ , pə lapa - ɩ ɩsɩɩ toosee taka na ɩ ́ ná ɩsɔtaa tillu nɔɣɔlʋ təkelekele , na ɩ ́ sʋʋ ɩ kiŋ na ɩ ́ yaa - ɩ sɩ : Kɔɔnɛɛ .

text: And when he looked on him , he was afraid , and said , What is it , Lord ? And he said unto him , Thy prayers and thine alms are come up for a memorial before God .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ nyəna ɩsɔtaa tillu na sɔɣɔntʋ sɔsɔɔntʋ na ɩ ́ pɔɔsɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tacaa , susuwe ? Tənaɣa ɩsɔtaa tillu cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ɩsɔ mʋ nyá sələməŋ , na ɩ sama sənaʋ mpi n səŋna kʋnyɔntʋnaa tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔɔsɩ nyá tɔɔ .

text: And now send men to Joppa , and call for one Simon , whose surname is Peter :
text2: Pə tɔɔ tɔ tili yəlaa kɛ Sopee na pá yaa nɔɣɔlʋ . Ɩ hətɛ ntɛ ́ Simɔŋ , na pá cuɣusa - ɩ sɩ Piyɛɛ .

text: He lodgeth with one Simon a tanner , whose house is by the sea side : he shall tell thee what thou oughtest to do .
text2: Ɩ wɛ tɔnəŋ nyallʋ Simɔŋ wei ɩ təyaɣa wɛ lʋm nɔɣɔ tɔ ɩ tɛ .

text: And when the angel which spake unto Cornelius was departed , he called two of his household servants , and a devout soldier of them that waited on him continually ;
text2: Waatʋ wei ɩsɔtaa tillu yɔɣɔta mpʋ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ tɔ , Kɔɔnɛɛ yaa ɩ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma taa kɛ ́ yəlaa naalɛ , na ɩ yoolaa mpa pa wɛ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ kiŋ tɔ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ wei ɩ təŋaɣa Ɩsɔ mpaaʋ kɛ teu tɔ .

text: And when he had declared all these things unto them , he sent them to Joppa .
text2: Na ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ - wɛɣɛ pə təna mpi pə lapa tɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tili - wɛɣɛ Sopee .

text: On the morrow , as they went on their journey , and drew nigh unto the city , Peter went up upon the housetop to pray about the sixth hour :
text2: Pə tɛʋ kʋfemuɣu , waatʋ wei pa wɛ mpaaʋ taa na pá nyəkəna ɩcatɛ tɔ , Piyɛɛ kpa kutuluɣu pata tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ kɛ ilim sikuɣu .

text: And he became very hungry , and would have eaten : but while they made ready , he fell into a trance ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ nyɔɣɔsɩ kpa - ɩ na ɩ ́ nyɩɩləɣɩ tɔɣɔʋ , saa wei pa tɔŋna - ɩ saaʋ tɔ pə lapa - ɩ toosee taka .

text: And saw heaven opened , and a certain vessel descending unto him , as it had been a great sheet knit at the four corners , and let down to the earth :
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ na ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ hɛtaa , na pʋlʋpʋ lɩɩ na pə ́ tiiki na pə ́ nəɣəsəna ɩsɩɩ saalaɣa anaam taka , na pə ́ tɔka ka ntompee liɣiti na ká susaa , na pə tiiki atɛ .

text: Wherein were all manner of fourfooted beasts of the earth , and wild beasts , and creeping things , and fowls of the air .
text2: Na ka taa wɛ wontu ntɩ tə tənaɣa waanɩ waanɩ . Nɔɔhɛɛ liɣiti nyəntʋ na tɛtɛ nyəntʋ na keŋ nyəm .

text: And there came a voice to him , Rise , Peter ; kill , and eat .
text2: Na ɩ ́ nɩɩ pə tɔma - ɩ sɩ : Piyɛɛ , kʋlɩ na ń kʋ na ń tɔɣɔ .

text: But Peter said , Not so , Lord ; for I have never eaten any thing that is common or unclean .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ tɔma sɩ : Aaɩ Tacaa , ma kaa la mpʋ . Tuu tɔ , ma ta tɔɣɔta pʋlʋpʋ mpi tə nyənəɣɩ kʋsɔɣɔtʋ yaa asilima tɔ .

text: And the voice spake unto him again the second time , What God hath cleansed , that call not thou common .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə tasa - ɩ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ : Taa nyənɩ Ɩsɔ kʋtaɣanəm ɩsɩɩ asilima nyəm .

text: This was done thrice : and the vessel was received up again into heaven .
text2: Pə lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ laasasɩ tooso , ɩlɛna mpʋ ɩnɩ pə ́ taɣanɩ ɩsɔtaa kɛ ́ kpaʋ .

text: Now while Peter doubted in himself what this vision which he had seen should mean , behold , the men which were sent from Cornelius had made inquiry for Simon ' s house , and stood before the gate ,
text2: Piyɛɛ ná tɔŋna mpi ɩ nawa mpʋ tɔ pə tɔm kɛ piti lapʋ . Ɩlɛ Kɔɔnɛɛ tillaa mpɛ pa tala kpakpaa kɛlɛ . Halɩ pa tɛma - wɛɣɛ hʋ ́ lʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɛ Simɔŋ təyaɣa , na pá səŋa ka nɔnɔkeelasɩ .

text: And called , and asked whether Simon , which was surnamed Peter , were lodged there .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá yaa na pá pɔɔsɩ sɩ Simɔŋ wei pa yaa tɔtɔ sɩ Piyɛɛ tɔ ɩ wɛ cənɛ ?

text: While Peter thought on the vision , the Spirit said unto him , Behold , three men seek thee .
text2: Piyɛɛ wɛɛ na ɩ ́ tɔŋna mpi ɩ nawa mpʋ tɔ pə tɔm kɛ maɣasʋɣʋ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu heeli - ɩ sɩ : Apalaa napəlɩ pa pɛɛkəɣəna - ŋ ntɛ ́ , pa wɛ tooso .

text: Arise therefore , and get thee down , and go with them , doubting nothing : for I have sent them .
text2: Kʋlɩ na ń tii na ń təŋ - wɛɣɛ kpakpaa . Taa la sika , má tilina - wɛɣɛ nyá waalɩ .

text: Then Peter went down to the men which were sent unto him from Cornelius ; and said , Behold , I am he whom ye seek : what is the cause wherefore ye are come ?
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ tiiwa na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Maɣalɛ wei ɩ waalɩ ɩ ́ kɔma tɔ . Alaafəya kɛlɛ ɩ ́ kɔma ?

text: And they said , Cornelius the centurion , a just man , and one that feareth God , and of good report among all the nation of the Jews , was warned from God by an holy angel to send for thee into his house , and to hear words of thee .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɛlɛ pa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Yoolaa sɔsɔ Kɔɔnɛɛ tilina - tʋ . Apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kɛ ́ yʋlʋ kʋpaŋ na ɩ sɛɛkɩ Ɩsɔ . Yuta nyə ́ ma caa ɩ tɔm kɛ teu kɛ ́ . Ɩsɔ ɩsɔtaa tillu nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ heelina - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ yaa - ŋ ɩ tɛ na ɩ ́ nɩɩ tɔm nti n ka heeli - ɩ tɔ .

text: Then called he them in , and lodged them . And on the morrow Peter went away with them , and certain brethren from Joppa accompanied him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ sʋʋna - wɛɣɛ təyaɣa , na ɩ ́ ha - wɛɣɛ kutuluɣu na pá sʋʋ . Kʋ fema , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ na - wɛ pá təŋ təma na pá tɛɛ . Ta taapalaa taa napəlɩ mpa pa kɛ ́ Sopee nyə ́ ma tɔ pa təŋa - ɩ .

text: And the morrow after they entered into Caesarea . And Cornelius waited for them , and had called together his kinsmen and near friends .
text2: Kʋlɛ kʋ femna , ɩlɛna pá tala Sesalee , na Kɔɔnɛɛ tɛma ɩ nyə ́ ma na ɩ taapalaa kʋpama təna kotuɣu na pá taŋa - ɩ .

text: And as Peter was coming in , Cornelius met him , and fell down at his feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Piyɛɛ talaa sɩ ɩ sʋʋ , ɩlɛna Kɔɔnɛɛ kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ səŋɩ - ɩ , na ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ həntɩ - ɩ atɛ tənɛnɛnɛ kɛ teu pə tii fɛɩ .

text: But Peter took him up , saying , Stand up ; I myself also am a man .
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ kʋsa - ɩ , na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Kʋlɩ , ma maɣamaɣa ma kɛ ́ yʋlʋ kɛ ́ .

text: And as he talked with him , he went in , and found many that were come together .
text2: Ɩlɛna Piyɛɛ na Kɔɔnɛɛ pá yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ na pá sʋʋkɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ maɣana samaa kota sɔsɔm kɛ təyaɣa taa .

text: And he said unto them , Ye know how that it is an unlawful thing for a man that is a Jew to keep company , or come unto one of another nation ; but God hath shewed me that I should not call any man common or unclean .
text2: Ntɛna ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ : Mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ nyəmá teu sɩ , Yuta tʋ kʋkiiu ntɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ na piitim lɛmpɩ tʋ pá taa tɔ . Pəyele ɩ nɔɔhəlɛ ɩ ́ taa fɛlɩ ɩ tɛ . Ama Ɩsɔ heela - m sɩ ma kaa nyənɩ yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ kʋsɔɣɔtʋ tʋ yaa asilima tʋ .

text: Therefore came I unto you without gainsaying , as soon as I was sent for : I ask therefore for what intent ye have sent for me ?
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ waatʋ wei ɩ ́ yaa - m tɔ pə ta la - m katɛ na kɔntɛ . Ɩlɛ ma pɔɔsəɣɩ - mɛ sɩ alaafəya kɛlɛ ?

text: And Cornelius said , Four days ago I was fasting until this hour ; and at the ninth hour I prayed in my house , and , behold , a man stood before me in bright clothing ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Kɔɔnɛɛ tɔma sɩ : Saŋa taa kʋyɛɛŋ tooso kɔlɔ , ma sələmaɣa ilim hʋʋ sələmʋɣʋ ɩsɩɩ ɩsəntɔ ɩnɩ ɩ taka teitei kɛ ́ ma təyaɣa taa . Tənaɣa apalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ lɩɩ ma tɔɔ təsɛlɩ , na ɩ ́ suu wontu nti tə tee kɔkɔ tɔ .

text: And said , Cornelius , thy prayer is heard , and thine alms are had in remembrance in the sight of God .
text2: Na ɩ ́ heeli - m sɩ : Kɔɔnɛɛ , Ɩsɔ nɩɩ nyá sələməŋ , na ɩ nyəmá nyá kʋnyɔntʋnaa tem tɔɔ .

text: Send therefore to Joppa , and call hither Simon , whose surname is Peter ; he is lodged in the house of one Simon a tanner by the sea side : who , when he cometh , shall speak unto thee .
text2: Pə tɔɔ tɔ , tili yəlaa kɛ Sopee na pá yaa - ŋ Simɔŋ wei pa cuɣusaa sɩ Piyɛɛ tɔ . Ɩ wɛ tɔnəŋ nyallʋ Simɔŋ wei ɩ təyaɣa wɛ lʋm nɔɣɔ tɔ ɩ tɛ .

text: Immediately therefore I sent to thee ; and thou hast well done that thou art come . Now therefore are we all here present before God , to hear all things that are commanded thee of God .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma tila kpakpaa kɛ nyá waalɩ , na n kɔma tɔ pə lapa teu . Tɔʋ , nɔɔnɔɔ tá təna tə kota Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ cənɛ sɩ tə nɩɩkɩ pə təna mpi Tacaa heela - ŋ sɩ ń tɛləsɩ - tʋ tɔ .

text: Then Peter opened his mouth , and said , Of a truth I perceive that God is no respecter of persons :
text2: Tənaɣa Piyɛɛ kpaɣa tɔm sɩ : Pənɛntaa kɛlɛ ma cɛkəna teu sɩ Ɩsɔ ɩɩ faɣasəɣɩ yəlaa .

text: But in every nation he that feareth him , and worketh righteousness , is accepted with him .
text2: Ama piitim təna taa wei ɩ wɛɛ na ɩ ́ seeki - ɩ na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ tampana , pʋntʋ ntɛ ́ Ɩsɔ yʋlʋ .

text: The word which God sent unto the children of Israel , preaching peace by Jesus Christ : ( he is Lord of all : )
text2: Ɩ ́ nyəmá tɔm nti Ɩsɔ tilinaa na pá heeli Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma tɔ . Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ wei ɩ tillaa mpɛ pa heelaa tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Yesu Kilisiti kɔŋna alaafəya . Yesu ɩnɩ ɩ kɛnna yəlaa təna Sɔsɔ .

text: That word , I say , ye know , which was published throughout all Judaea , and began from Galilee , after the baptism which John preached ;
text2: Ɩ ́ nyəmá pə təna mpi pə caala lapʋ kɛ Kalilee na pə ́ yɛkɩ Yuta tɛtʋ təna taa kɛ ́ Yohaanɩ Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔʋ tɔm kpaalʋɣʋ waalɩ tɔ .

text: How God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power : who went about doing good , and healing all that were oppressed of the devil ; for God was with him .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyəmá tɔtɔɣɔ ɩsəna Ɩsɔ haɣasa Nasalɛtɩ Yesu kɛ ́ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toŋ tɔ , na ɩsəna ɩ cɔɔkaɣa tɛtʋ taa na ɩ ́ lakɩ kʋpantʋ , na ɩ ́ hɛtəɣɩ ɩlɔɣɔʋ ka kpa mpa mpa tɔ , Ɩsɔ wɛ ɩ waalɩ tɔɣɔ ɩ pəsa mpʋ .

text: And we are witnesses of all things which he did both in the land of the Jews , and in Jerusalem ; whom they slew and hanged on a tree :
text2: Tə nana tá ɩsəlɛ kɛ pə təna mpi ɩ lapa Yuta tɛtʋ taa na Yosalɛm tɔ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kama - ɩ tesika tɔɔ na pá kʋ - ɩ .

text: Him God raised up the third day , and shewed him openly ;
text2: Ama Ɩsɔ feesa - ɩ kʋyɛɛŋ tooso wule na ɩ yelaa na yəlaa na - ɩ .

text: Not to all the people , but unto witnesses chosen before of God , even to us , who did eat and drink with him after he rose from the dead .
text2: Ɩlɛ pə taɣa yəlaa tənaɣa yem . Ta mpa Ɩsɔ ka ləsa tuu tanaŋ tɛɛ sɩ tə ́ ná na tə ́ yɔɣɔtɩ pə tɔm tɔɣɔ . Yesu ɩnɩ ɩ səpa na Ɩsɔ feesi - ɩ tɔ tá na - ɩ tə ́ tɔɣɔna na tə ́ nyɔɔ .

text: And he commanded us to preach unto the people , and to testify that it is he which was ordained of God to be the Judge of quick and dead .
text2: Ɩnɩ ɩ tʋna - tʋ sɩ tə ́ lakɩ yəlaa kɛ waasʋ , na tə ́ heeliɣi təfoo sɩ ɩnəɣəlɛ Ɩsɔ sɩɩwa sɩ ɩ ká hʋʋna weesiŋ nyə ́ ma na sətaa kɛ tɔm .

text: To him give all the prophets witness , that through his name whosoever believeth in him shall receive remission of sins .
text2: Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa təna yɔɣɔta ɩ tɔm , sɩ ye wei ɩ mʋ ɩ tɔm ɩ ká hɩɩsɩ pʋntʋ ɩsaɣatʋ na ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ toŋ .

text: While Peter yet spake these words , the Holy Ghost fell on all them which heard the word .
text2: Piyɛɛ tɔŋna ɩ faaci ɩnəɣɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ tii pa təna mpa pa nɩɩkaɣa - ɩ tɔ pa tɔɔ .

text: And they of the circumcision which believed were astonished , as many as came with Peter , because that on the Gentiles also was poured out the gift of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ piti kpa Yuta nyə ́ ma mpa paa mʋ Yesu na pá təŋa Piyɛɛ tɔ . Mpi tɔ , Ɩsɔ ha ɩ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ na ɩ ́ tɔŋna yaʋ kɛ mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ pɛlɛ pa tɔɔ tɔtɔ .

text: For they heard them speak with tongues , and magnify God . Then answered Peter ,
text2: Mpi pə tɔɔ tɔ , pa nɩɩkaɣa pa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔmnaa mpa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩɩ nɩɩkɩ tɔ , na pá pʋɣʋləɣɩ Ɩsɔ sɔsɔɔntʋ .

text: Can any man forbid water , that these should not be baptized , which have received the Holy Ghost as well as we ?
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ tɔma sɩ : Yəlaa panɛ pə ta kisi - wɛɣɛ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kɛ haʋ kɛ teitei ɩsɩɩ ta , kacaŋfana Ɩsɔ lʋm maɣamaɣa sɔʋ na ?

text: And he commanded them to be baptized in the name of the Lord . Then prayed they him to tarry certain days .
text2: Tənaɣa ɩ yelaa na pá yaana Yesu Kilisiti hətɛ na pá sɔ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa wiina - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ caɣa wɛɛ naalɛɣɛ pa kiŋ .

text: And the apostles and brethren that were in Judaea heard that the Gentiles had also received the word of God .
text2: Tillaa na tá taapalaa lɛlaa mpa paa wɛ Yuta tɔ , pa nɩɩwa sɩ mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ pɛlɛ pa mʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm tɔtɔ .

text: And when Peter was come up to Jerusalem , they that were of the circumcision contended with him ,
text2: Piyɛɛ kɔma na ɩ ́ məlɩ Yosalɛm , ɩlɛna Yuta nyə ́ ma mpa pa mʋ Yesu tɔ pá tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ :

text: Saying , Thou wentest in to men uncircumcised , and didst eat with them .
text2: N kʋlaa kɛlɛ na ń polo kʋtapɛləŋ tɛ , na halɩ nyá na - wɛ ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ tətɔɣɔlɛ .

text: But Peter rehearsed the matter from the beginning , and expounded it by order unto them , saying ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ kpaɣa pə təna mpi pə lapa tɔ na ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ - wɛ təcʋŋŋ sɩ :

text: I was in the city of Joppa praying : and in a trance I saw a vision , A certain vessel descend , as it had been a great sheet , let down from heaven by four corners ; and it came even to me :
text2: Sopee ɩcatɛ taa kɛ ́ maa wɛɛ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ma sələmaɣa Ɩsɔ , ɩlɛna pə la - m ɩsɩɩ toosee taka , na má ná pʋlʋ na pə ́ lɩɩna ɩsɔ na pə tiikina ma tɔɔ . Pə nəɣəsəna ɩsɩɩ saalaɣa anaam taka , na pə ́ tɔka ka ntompee liɣiti , na ká susaa , na ká tii hatoo ma tɛɛ .

text: Upon the which when I had fastened mine eyes , I considered , and saw fourfooted beasts of the earth , and wild beasts , and creeping things , and fowls of the air .
text2: Ma nyəna teu təpiŋŋ kɛ saalaɣa ŋkɛ ka taa , ɩlɛna má ná nɔɔhɛɛ liɣiti wontu , na taalɛ nyəntʋ , na tɛtɛ nyəntʋ , na keŋ nyəm .

text: And I heard a voice saying unto me , Arise , Peter ; slay and eat .
text2: Tənaɣa ma nɩɩ pə tɔma - m sɩ : Piyɛɛ kʋlɩ na ń kʋ na ń tɔɣɔ .

text: But I said , Not so , Lord : for nothing common or unclean hath at any time entered into my mouth .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ma cɔwa sɩ : Aaɩ , Tacaa , ma kaa la mpʋ . Tuu tɔ pʋlʋ mpi tə nyənəɣɩ kʋsɔɣɔtʋ yaa asilima tɔ pə ta sʋʋta ma nɔɣɔ taa kɛ ́ paa pəcɔ maɣamaɣa .

text: But the voice answered me again from heaven , What God hath cleansed , that call not thou common .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə tasa - m yɔɣɔtənaʋ na ɩsɔtaa sɩ : Taa nyənɩ Ɩsɔ kʋtaɣanəm ɩsɩɩ asilima .

text: And this was done three times : and all were drawn up again into heaven .
text2: Pə lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ laasasɩ tooso , ɩlɛna pə təna pə ́ taɣanɩ ɩsɔtaa kɛ ́ kpaʋ .

text: And , behold , immediately there were three men already come unto the house where I was , sent from Caesarea unto me .
text2: Waatɩ ɩnɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa teitei kɛ ́ apalaa napələɣɩ tooso lɩɩna Sesalee na pá tala təyaɣa ŋka ka taa maa wɛɛ tɔ , sɩ pa tila - wɛɣɛ ma waalɩ .

text: And the spirit bade me go with them , nothing doubting . Moreover these six brethren accompanied me , and we entered into the man ' s house :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu heela - m sɩ má təŋ - wɛ , má taa la sika . Má na tá taapalaa naatoso ɩnɛ tə poləna Sesalee na tə ́ sʋʋ Kɔɔnɛɛ təyaɣa kɛ tá təna .

text: And he shewed us how he had seen an angel in his house , which stood and said unto him , Send men to Joppa , and call for Simon , whose surname is Peter ;
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kɛɛsa - tʋɣʋ ɩsəna ɩ nawa ɩsɔtaa tillu səŋa ɩ təyaɣa taa na ɩ ́ heeli - ɩ sɩ : Tili yəlaa kɛ Sopee na pá yaa Simɔŋ wei pa cuɣusaa sɩ Piyɛɛ tɔ .

text: Who shall tell thee words , whereby thou and all thy house shall be saved .
text2: Ɩnɩ ɩ ká heelina - ŋ tɔm nti tɩɩ ya nyá na nyá təyaɣa təna mə nyʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: And as I began to speak , the Holy Ghost fell on them , as on us at the beginning .
text2: Ma maɣasa ma tɔm kɛ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ tii pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ teitei ɩsɩɩ ɩ ka tiiu tá tɔɔ kɛ ́ lɔŋ tɔ .

text: Then remembered I the word of the Lord , how that he said , John indeed baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ɩlɛna má tɔɔsɩ tɔm nti Tacaa ka yɔɣɔtaa tɔ sɩ : Lʋm maɣamaɣa kɛ Yohaanɩ ná sɔna yəlaa kɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm . Ama mɛ ɩlɛ , Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kɛ paa sɔ - mɛ .

text: Forasmuch then as God gave them the like gift as he did unto us , who believed on the Lord Jesus Christ ; what was I , that I could withstand God ?
text2: Ye Ɩsɔ ná lapa - wɛɣɛ kʋcɔɔʋ kʋlʋmʋɣʋ ŋku ɩ ka lapa taɣa waatʋ wei tə mʋ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti tɔm tɔ , ɩlɛ maɣalɛ awe na maa kpɛɛsəɣəna Ɩsɔ ?

text: When they heard these things , they held their peace , and glorified God , saying , Then hath God also to the Gentiles granted repentance unto life .
text2: Pa nɩɩ tɔm tənɛ , ɩlɛna pa pááná məlɩ hɛɛʋ , na pá saŋ Ɩsɔ na pá tɔŋ sɩ : Ye mpʋ Ɩsɔ hʋla piitim lɛmpɩ nyə ́ ma ntɛ ́ laɣasʋɣʋ tɔm sɩ pə ́ ya pa nyɔɔŋ .

text: Now they which were scattered abroad upon the persecution that arose about Stephen travelled as far as Phenice , and Cyprus , and Antioch , preaching the word to none but unto the Jews only .
text2: Kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛ nte tə taa pa caŋaa na pá kʋ Ɩtiyɛɛnɩ tɔ , tə yasa Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa . Haləna pa taa lɛlaa yɛlɩ na pá tala Fenisii na Sipili na Antiyɔka , na Yuta nyə ́ ma tike kɛ pa lakaɣa waasʋ .

text: And some of them were men of Cyprus and Cyrene , which , when they were come to Antioch , spake unto the Grecians , preaching the Lord Jesus .
text2: Paa na mpʋ Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa napəlɩ mpa pa lɩɩna Sipili na Silɛŋ tɔ pa pola Antiyɔka na pá heeliɣi mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔɣɔ Tacaa Yesu Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ .

text: And the hand of the Lord was with them : and a great number believed , and turned unto the Lord .
text2: Tacaa Ɩsɔ tʋ - wɛɣɛ niŋ , na yəlaa paɣalɛ mʋ na pá laɣasɩ na pá təŋ Yesu .

text: Then tidings of these things came unto the ears of the church which was in Jerusalem : and they sent forth Barnabas , that he should go as far as Antioch .
text2: Yosalɛm Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle nɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá tili Paanapasɩ kɛ Antiyɔka .

text: Who , when he came , and had seen the grace of God , was glad , and exhorted them all , that with purpose of heart they would cleave unto the Lord .
text2: Ɩ talaa na ɩ ́ ná kʋpantʋ nti Ɩsɔ lapa Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa mpɛ tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ laŋlɛ hʋlʋmɩ sɔsɔm , na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsɩ pa təna sɩ pá tɔɣɔ apalʋtʋ na pá nɩɩna Tacaa kɛ teitei .

text: For he was a good man , and full of the Holy Ghost and of faith : and much people was added unto the Lord .
text2: Tampana tɔɔ ɩsəntɔ , Paanapasɩ ɩnɩ ɩ ka kɛɛsa yʋlʋ kɛ ́ , na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toŋ tɔɔ ɩ kiŋ , na ɩ tɛma Ɩsɔ na ɩ taa pə tii fɛɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yəlaa samaa sɔɔsa Tacaa təŋʋɣʋ taa .

text: Then departed Barnabas to Tarsus , for to seek Saul :
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ Paanapasɩ pola Taasɩ kɛ Sɔɔlɩ pɛɛkʋɣʋ .

text: And when he had found him , he brought him unto Antioch . And it came to pass , that a whole year they assembled themselves with the church , and taught much people . And the disciples were called Christians first in Antioch .
text2: Ɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ na - ɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kɔna - ɩ Antiyɔka . Ɩlɛna pa naalɛ pá caɣa təna Yesu sɛɛlaa kiŋ kɛ pənaɣa təcu , na pa sɛɣɛsa yəlaa paɣalɛ . Antiyɔka tənaɣa pa caala Tacaa təŋlaa kɛ yaaʋ təcəcɩ sɩ Kilisiti nyə ́ ma .

text: And in these days came prophets from Jerusalem unto Antioch .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa napəlɩ pa lɩɩna Yosalɛm na pá polo Antiyɔka kɛ waatʋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa .

text: And there stood up one of them named Agabus , and signified by the spirit that there should be great dearth throughout all the world : which came to pass in the days of Claudius Caesar .
text2: Tənaɣa pa taa lɛlʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Akapusi tɔ , ɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəna Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toma sɩ : Nyɔɣɔsɩ anaam nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ká lɩɩ keteŋa təna taa kɛ ́ nɔɔnɔɔ . Na tampana pə lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Kʋfənɛɛ Koloti pɔɔlɛ taa .

text: Then the disciples , every man according to his ability , determined to send relief unto the brethren which dwelt in Judaea :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Tacaa təŋlaa luɣu lapa sɩ paa wei ɩ ká caa ɩsəna ɩ pəsaa tɔ na pá tena pa taapalaa mpa pa wɛ Yuta tɔ .

text: Which also they did , and sent it to the elders by the hands of Barnabas and Saul .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa caa kʋsənam mpɩ , na pá tilina Paanapasɩ na Sɔɔlɩ , sɩ pá cɛla təna Yesu sɛɛlaa nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma .

text: Now about that time Herod the king stretched forth his hands to vex certain of the church .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa kɛ ́ wulaʋ Sɔsɔ Helɔtɩ nika Yesu sɛɛlaa taa napələɣɩ naasʋɣʋ .

text: And he killed James the brother of John with the sword .
text2: Ɩ kʋwa Yohaanɩ taalʋ Saakɩ na laɣatɛ .

text: And because he saw it pleased the Jews , he proceeded further to take Peter also . ( Then were the days of unleavened bread . )
text2: Helɔtɩ nawa sɩ ɩ lapʋ mpʋ tɔ pə maɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tasa Piyɛɛ kɛ kpaʋ . ( Saa ɩnɩ pə pamna kʋkʋsʋm fɛɩ potopotonaa acima kʋyɛɛŋ taa . )

text: And when he had apprehended him , he put him in prison , and delivered him to four quaternions of soldiers to keep him ; intending after Easter to bring him forth to the people .
text2: Helɔtɩ tɛma Piyɛɛ kɛ kpaʋ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ təkɩ - ɩ saləka . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ caa yoolaa kɛ naanʋwa na naatoso sɩ pá taŋəɣɩ - ɩ yəlaa liɣiti liɣiti na pá kaasəɣɩ təma . Na ɩ ́ hʋʋkɩ ɩ taa kɛlɛ sɩ Tɛɛʋ acima ɩ ́ tɛɛwa ɩlɛ ɩ ká ləsɩ - ɩ yəlaa ɩsɛntaa na ɩ ́ kʋ - ɩ .

text: Peter therefore was kept in prison : but prayer was made without ceasing of the church unto God for him .
text2: Piyɛɛ wɛ saləka taa kɛ ́ mpʋ tɔ , na Yesu sɛɛlaa náá tɔŋna ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ na ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ .

text: And when Herod would have brought him forth , the same night Peter was sleeping between two soldiers , bound with two chains : and the keepers before the door kept the prison .
text2: Pə kɔma na pə tala kʋyakʋ ŋku kʋ feŋaɣa sɩ Helɔtɩ ləsəɣɩ Piyɛɛ kɛ yəlaa ɩsɛntaa tɔ , Piyɛɛ tɔŋna tom kɛ pə ahoo kɛ yoolaa naalɛ hɛkʋ taa . Alukpala naalɛɣɛ paa tʋ - ɩ , na taŋlaa náá səŋa saləka kutuluɣu nɔnɔɣɔ na awalɩ tɔɔ .

text: And , behold , the angel of the Lord came upon him , and a light shined in the prison : and he smote Peter on the side , and raised him up , saying , Arise up quickly . And his chains fell off from his hands .
text2: Tənaɣa Tacaa ɩsɔtaa tillu kɔma na ɩ ́ sʋʋ Piyɛɛ pa tɔɔ təkpʋʋ , na kɔkɔ nyaləməlɛ na teu tənyalulu kɛ naŋiya ŋka ka taa paa wɛɛ tɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩsɔtaa tillu ma Piyɛɛ kɔŋkɔŋ taa na ɩ ́ feesi - ɩ , na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Kʋlɩ təwaka . Tənaɣa alukpala lɩɩ Piyɛɛ niŋ taa na a hoti .

text: And the angel said unto him , Gird thyself , and bind on thy sandals . And so he did . And he saith unto him , Cast thy garment about thee , and follow me .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩsɔtaa tillu heeli - ɩ sɩ : Ləlɩ nyá tampala na ń lɛɛ nyá ntaŋkpala . Piyɛɛ lapa mpʋ , ɩlɛna ɩsɔtaa tillu heeli - ɩ sɩ : Suu nyá toko na ń təŋɩ - m .

text: And he went out , and followed him ; and wist not that it was true which was done by the angel ; but thought he saw a vision .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ lɩɩ saləka taa na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ ɩsɔtaa tillu . Ɩlɛ ɩ taa tisi ɩ yuŋ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩsɔtaa tillu kʋlapʋtʋ ntɩ tampana tɔm . Pə lapa - ɩ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ toosee taka .

text: When they were past the first and the second ward , they came unto the iron gate that leadeth unto the city ; which opened to them of his own accord : and they went out , and passed on through one street ; and forthwith the angel departed from him .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa tɛɛ tətaŋlɛ kancaalaɣa nyəntɛ na naalɛ nyəntɛ . Ɩlɛna pá tala təyaɣa təna nɔnɔɣɔ ŋka ka kʋtəkəŋ kɛ nyəɣətʋ na ká wɛnna ɩcatɛ tɔɔ tɔ . Ɩlɛna kɛlɛ ká tʋlɩ ka təɣɩ yem na pá lɩɩ . Pa lɩɩ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá tʋ hapəlɛ . Tənaɣa ɩsɔtaa tillu yela Piyɛɛ kɛ kpakpaa .

text: And when Peter was come to himself , he said , Now I know of a surety , that the Lord hath sent his angel , and hath delivered me out of the hand of Herod , and from all the expectation of the people of the Jews .
text2: Mpʋɣʋlɛ pə cɛpa Piyɛɛ ɩsɛntɔɔ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Pənɛntɛ ma tɛma ma taa sɩ Tacaa tilina ɩ ɩsɔtaa tillu na ɩ ́ ya - m Helɔtɩ niŋ taa , na tə təna nti Yuta nyə ́ ma tɛɛlaɣaa sɩ paa la - m tɔ tə taa .

text: And when he had considered the thing , he came to the house of Mary the mother of John , whose surname was Mark ; where many were gathered together praying .
text2: Piyɛɛ cɛkəna ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩsəna taa ɩ wɛɛ tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ mələna Yohaanɩ wei pa cuɣusaa sɩ Maləkɩ tɔ ɩ too Malɩ təyaɣa tɔɔ . Yəlaa paɣalɛ ka kota təna na pá sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ .

text: And as Peter knocked at the door of the gate , a damsel came to hearken , named Rhoda .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Piyɛɛ mapa nɔnɔkeelasɩ , na pɛɛlɔ təmlɛ tʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Lote tɔ ɩ ́ polo tʋlʋɣʋ .

text: And when she knew Peter ' s voice , she opened not the gate for gladness , but ran in , and told how Peter stood before the gate .
text2: Ɩ nyəmá Piyɛɛ nɔɣɔ , ɩlɛna laŋhʋlʋmlɛ katatəlaɣa tɔɔ ɩ ́ yele nɔnɔɣɔ tʋlʋɣʋ , na ɩ ́ məlɩ kpakpaa na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Piyɛɛ kɔma .

text: And they said unto her , Thou art mad . But she constantly affirmed that it was even so . Then said they , It is his angel .
text2: Ɩlɛna pá tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : N sʋʋ kpaŋʋɣʋ kɛ ́ . Ama pɛɛlɔ ɩsəlɛ ná sɛɛwa sɩ : Tampana kɛ ́ . Ɩlɛna pá tɔ sɩ : Ye mpʋ ɩsɔtaa tillu wei ɩ wɛ ɩ waalɩ tɔɣɔ .

text: But Peter continued knocking : and when they had opened the door , and saw him , they were astonished .
text2: Pa tɔŋna mpʋ tɔ na Piyɛɛ náá tɔŋna mapʋ kɛ ́ sɩ pá tʋlɩ - ɩ . Pa kɔma na pá tʋlɩ nɔnɔɣɔ na pá ná Piyɛɛ , ɩlɛna pə la - wɛɣɛ piti kɛ ́ sɔsɔm .

text: But he , beckoning unto them with the hand to hold their peace , declared unto them how the Lord had brought him out of the prison . And he said , Go shew these things unto James , and to the brethren . And he departed , and went into another place .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ nyəka - wɛɣɛ niŋ sɩ pá su . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ - wɛɣɛ ɩsəna Tacaa ləsa - ɩ saləka taa tɔ . Na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛ tɔtɔ sɩ : Ɩ ́ heeli - təɣɩ Saakɩ na ma taapalaa lɛlaa . Ɩlɛna Piyɛɛ lɩɩ na ɩ ́ tɛɛna tiili .

text: Now as soon as it was day , there was no small stir among the soldiers , what was become of Peter .
text2: Tɛʋ fema ɩlɛ , yoolaa sʋʋ yələtʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ pa ta nyɩ ɩsəna Piyɛɛ tɛmnaa tɔ .

text: And when Herod had sought for him , and found him not , he examined the keepers , and commanded that they should be put to death . And he went down from Judaea to Caesarea , and there abode .
text2: Helɔtɩ sɩ pá pɛɛkɩ - ɩ kɛ ́ pá pɛɛkɩ - ɩ , pa ta na - ɩ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ lana taŋlaa kɛ tɔm na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ pá kʋ pɛlɛ . Tənaɣa Helɔtɩ lɩɩ Yuta na ɩ ́ tɛɛna Sesalee , na ɩ ́ caɣa tənaɣa wɛɛ naalɛ .

text: And Herod was highly displeased with them of Tyre and Sidon : but they came with one accord to him , and , having made Blastus the king ' s chamberlain their friend , desired peace ; because their country was nourished by the king ' s country .
text2: Helɔtɩ pááná ka huuna Tiii na Sitɔŋ pə nyə ́ ma kɛ teu . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɛlɛ pa pɛɛla nɔɣɔ na pá polo na pá ná wulaʋ təyaɣa tɔɔ nyənlʋ Pəlasətusi , na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ tɛɛ - wɛɣɛ nɔɣɔ na pá polo na pá ŋmiŋ wulaʋ sɩ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - wɛɣɛ suulu . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Helɔtɩ ɩcatɛ ka kɛna pa kp + oú .

text: And upon a set day Herod , arrayed in royal apparel , sat upon his throne , and made an oration unto them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa sɩɩ kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ . Kʋlɛ kʋ talaa , ɩlɛna Helɔtɩ suu ɩ kawulaɣa wontu na ɩ ́ kpa ɩ kumte tɔɔ na ɩ ́ caɣa , na ɩ ́ kpa - wɛɣɛ faaci lapʋ .

text: And the people gave a shout , saying , It is the voice of a god , and not of a man .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yəlaa mapa kapusi sɩ : Pʋwɛ , Yʋlʋ maɣamaɣa yɔɣɔtaɣa ntɛ ? Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ .

text: And immediately the angel of the Lord smote him , because he gave not God the glory : and he was eaten of worms , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Tənaɣa Tacaa ɩsɔtaa tillu nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ tɛ Helɔtɩ tɔm kɛ kpakpaa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ sɩɩna ɩ təɣɩ samtʋ nti tə kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ tike nyəntʋ tɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tʋ sonsompee , haləna ɩ ́ caŋ na ɩ ́ sɩ .

text: But the word of God grew and multiplied .
text2: Saa ɩnɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm ná tɔŋna yɛkʋɣʋ kɛ ́ na tə ́ puki .

text: And Barnabas and Saul returned from Jerusalem , when they had fulfilled their ministry , and took with them John , whose surname was Mark .
text2: Pə kɔma na Paanapasɩ pá tɛ pa tiluɣu tɔm kɛ Yosalɛm , ɩlɛna pá kpɛŋna Yohaanɩ wei pa cuɣusaa sɩ Maləkɩ tɔ na pá məlɩ Antiyɔka .

text: Now there were in the church that was at Antioch certain prophets and teachers ; as Barnabas , and Simeon that was called Niger , and Lucius of Cyrene , and Manaen , which had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch , and Saul .
text2: Antiyɔka Yesu sɛɛlaa taa ka wɛ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa , na sɛɣɛsəlaa . Pa həla ntɔ . Paanapasɩ , na Simiyɔŋ ( wei pa cuɣusaa sɩ Apalʋkpɛtʋ tɔ ) , na ( Silɛɛnɩ tʋ ) Lusiyusi , na Manaheŋ ( wei na Kʋfənɛɛ Helɔtɩ paa pɩɩ təntəmlɛ tɔ ) , na Sɔɔlɩ .

text: As they ministered to the Lord , and fasted , the Holy Ghost said , Separate me Barnabas and Saul for the work whereunto I have called them .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ pa tɔŋna Tacaa təmlɛ lapʋ na nɔhɔkʋtʋ . Ɩlɛna Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ heeli - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ faɣa Paanapasɩ , na Sɔɔlɩ na pa mpaa na pá la təmlɛ nte tə tɔɔ ma ləsa - wɛ tɔ .

text: And when they had fasted and prayed , and laid their hands on them , they sent them away .
text2: Tənaɣa pa hɔka nɔɔsɩ na pá sələmɩ Ɩsɔ , na pá tənɩ niŋ kɛ pa tɔɔ na pá tɔ - wɛ sɩ pá tɛɛ .

text: So they , being sent forth by the Holy Ghost , departed unto Seleucia ; and from thence they sailed to Cyprus .
text2: Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ tila Paanapasɩ na sɔɔlɩ kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna pá polo Selusii , na pá sʋʋ tənaɣa kpɩɩlʋɣʋ na pá tɛɛ tɛtʋ nti lʋm cɔɔnaa na pá yaakɩ - tɩ sɩ Sipili tɔ .

text: And when they were at Salamis , they preached the word of God in the synagogues of the Jews : and they had also John to their minister .
text2: Pa tala Salamini , ɩlɛna pá sʋʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma təkotilenaa mpa pa wɛ təna tɔ pa taa . Na Yohaanɩ Maləkɩ ka wɛ pa kiŋ na ɩ ́ səŋna - wɛ .

text: And when they had gone through the isle unto Paphos , they found a certain sorcerer , a false prophet , a Jew , whose name was Bar - jesus :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa faɣana tɛtʋ nti lʋm cɔɔna mpʋ tɔ tə taa , halɩ Pafɔɔsɩ ɩcatɛ . Tənaɣa pa sula Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ pɔpɔtʋ topotopo latʋ nɔɣɔlʋ na pá yaa - ɩ sɩ Palɩ - Yesu . Ɩ kɛ ́ Yuta tʋ na ɩ hɔŋaɣa ɩ tɩ sɩ ɩnəɣəlɛ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ .

text: Which was with the deputy of the country , Sergius Paulus , a prudent man ; who called for Barnabas and Saul , and desired to hear the word of God .
text2: Ɩ ́ na tɛtʋ ntɩ tə kʋfənɛɛ Seluyu Pɔɔlusi pa cakaɣana . Na kʋfənɛɛ ɩnɩ ɩ paasaa kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ wɛna laɣatʋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ yaa Paanapasɩ na Sɔɔlɩ sɩ pá polo ɩ tɛ na pá heeli - ɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm .

text: But Elymas the sorcerer ( for so is his name by interpretation ) withstood them , seeking to turn away the deputy from the faith .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩlimasɩ kaɣata - wɛ haləna ɩ ́ lʋ sɩ ɩ ləsəɣɩ kʋfənɛɛ kʋnyɩɩlʋɣʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ mpaaʋ tɔɔ . ( Topotopo tʋ kɛ Kəlɛɛkɩ nyə ́ ma ná yaa sɩ Ɩlimasɩ . )

text: Then Saul , ( who also is called Paul , ) filled with the Holy Ghost , set his eyes on him ,
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toma kʋləna Sɔɔlɩ wei pa cuɣusaa sɩ Pɔɔlɩ tɔɣɔ sɔsɔm , na ɩ ́ nyənɩ apalʋ ɩnɛ təpiŋŋ , na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ :

text: And said , O full of all subtilty and all mischief , thou child of the devil , thou enemy of all righteousness , wilt thou not cease to pervert the right ways of the Lord ?
text2: Apalʋ nyá , nyá aciitu na nyá nyəməŋ tɔɔwa yoo . N kɛ ́ Ɩlɔɣɔʋ sɔsɔ yʋlʋ kɛ ́ , na n kɛ ́ kʋpam təna wakəllʋ . N kaa yele mpi mpi Tacaa sɩɩwa sɩ ɩ ká la tɔɣɔ wakəlʋɣʋ kɛ mpʋ ?

text: And now , behold , the hand of the Lord is upon thee , and thou shalt be blind , not seeing the sun for a season . And immediately there fell on him a mist and a darkness ; and he went about seeking some to lead him by the hand .
