text: Howbeit they looked when he should have swollen , or fallen down dead suddenly : but after they had looked a great while , and saw no harm come to him , they changed their minds , and said that he was a god .
text2: Yəlaa mpɛ pɛlɛ pa hʋʋkaɣa sɩ nɔɔnɔɔ tɔ ɩ mʋlaa , yaa ɩ ká hoti na ɩ ́ sɩ kpakpaa . Ama pə leelaa pa ta na pʋlʋ lapa - ɩ , ɩlɛna pá pəsəna sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ ɩkɔntɛ kɛ ́ .

text: In the same quarters were possessions of the chief man of the island , whose name was Publius ; who received us , and lodged us three days courteously .
text2: Tɛtʋ ntɩ tə wulaʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Pipiliyusi tɔ ɩ təyaɣa ka wɛ pəcɔlɔ tənɛ ɩnɩ . Wulaʋ ɩnɩ ɩ pona - tʋɣʋ ɩ tɛ na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ - tʋɣʋ teu , halɩ kʋyɛɛŋ tooso .

text: And it came to pass , that the father of Publius lay sick of a fever and of a bloody flux : to whom Paul entered in , and prayed , and laid his hands on him , and healed him .
text2: Pə pamna watʋ na anɩɩsa ka wɛna Pipiliyusi caa na ɩ ́ həntaa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pɔɔlɩ polaa na ɩ ́ sələmɩ na ɩ ́ tənɩ niŋ kɛ ɩ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ hiki alaafəya .

text: So when this was done , others also , which had diseases in the island , came , and were healed :
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ mpa pa kɛ ́ kʋtɔntʋnaa kɛ tɛtʋ ntɩ tə taa tɔ pa kɔma na pə ́ waa - wɛ .

text: Who also honoured us with many honours ; and when we departed , they laded us with such things as were necessary .
text2: Pa tʋna - tʋɣʋ tənaɣa na pá wɛna tá sɔɣɔntʋ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ . Tə kɔma sɩ tə kʋləɣɩ ɩlɛna pá ha - tʋɣʋ mpi mpi tɩɩ nyɩɩlɩ mpaaʋ taa tɔ .

text: And after three months we departed in a ship of Alexandria , which had wintered in the isle , whose sign was Castor and Pollux .
text2: Pə lapa ɩsɔtʋnaa tooso , ɩlɛna tə ́ ná Alɛkəsantilii kpɩɩlʋɣʋ nakʋlɩ ŋku pa yaa sɩ Tɩɩŋ Tompiya tɔ na tə ́ tɛɛ . Kpɩɩlʋɣʋ ŋkʋ , kʋlɛ kɩɩ caɣa hilimatɛ waatʋ tənaɣa tɛtʋ ntɩ tə taa kɛ ́ .

text: And landing at Syracuse , we tarried there three days .
text2: Tə tala Silakusi , ɩlɛna tə caɣa tənaɣa wɛɛ tooso .

text: And from thence we fetched a compass , and came to Rhegium : and after one day the south wind blew , and we came the next day to Puteoli :
text2: Tə kʋla təna , ɩlɛna tə ́ malɩ kʋteŋ na tə ́ polo tə ́ lɩɩ Lesiyo . Kʋ fema na heelim lɩɩna ilim mpətəŋ tɔɔ , ɩlɛna tə ́ tɔ kʋyɛɛŋ naalɛ na tə ́ tala Pusɔɔlɩ .

text: Where we found brethren , and were desired to tarry with them seven days : and so we went toward Rome .
text2: Tə maɣana ta taapalaa napələɣɩ təna , na pɛlɛ pá wiina - tʋ sɩ tə ́ caɣa pa cɔlɔɣɔ kʋyakʋ na kʋ ɩsikile . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tə tɔma haləna tə ́ tala Lom .

text: And from thence , when the brethren heard of us , they came to meet us as far as Appiiforum , and The three taverns : whom when Paul saw , he thanked God , and took courage .
text2: Ta taapalaa kɛ Lom ka nyəmá ta tɔɔ , ɩlɛna pá polo pá səŋ - tʋɣʋ hatoo Apiyusi kʋyakʋ taa kɛ ́ Sʋlʋmpɔɔŋ tooso taa . Pɔɔlɩ na - wɛ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sa Ɩsɔ na ɩ apalʋtʋ kpa .

text: And when we came to Rome , the centurion delivered the prisoners to the captain of the guard : but Paul was suffered to dwell by himself with a soldier that kept him .
text2: Tə tala Lom ɩlɛna pa ha Pɔɔlɩ kɛ nɔɣɔ sɩ ɩ ́ caɣana ɩ tike , na pá faɣasɩ y + o + olú nɔɣɔlʋ na ɩ ́ nyənəɣɩ - ɩ .

text: And it came to pass , that after three days Paul called the chief of the Jews together : and when they were come together , he said unto them , Men and brethren , though I have committed nothing against the people , or customs of our fathers , yet was I delivered prisoner from Jerusalem into the hands of the Romans .
text2: Wɛɛ lapa tooso , ɩlɛna Pɔɔlɩ yaa Lom Yuta nyə ́ ma sɔsaa na pá koti . Na ɩ ́ tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ma taapalaa ma ta lata yəlaa kɛ taalɩ nɔɣɔlʋ . Pəyele ma ta wakəlɩ tá caanaa caanaa kɔtaɣa . Ama pa kpa - m tulum kɛ yem kɛ ́ Yosalɛm na pá tʋ - m Lom nyə ́ ma niŋ taa .

text: Who , when they had examined me , would have let me go , because there was no cause of death in me .
text2: Pɛlɛ pa wiila ma tɔm taa na pá ná sɩ natəlɩ tə fɛɩ ma kiŋ na tə ́ nəɣəsəna sɩ pá kʋ - m , ɩlɛna pɛlɛ pa tɔ sɩ pa tʋləɣɩ - m .

text: But when the Jews spake against it , I was constrained to appeal unto Caesar ; not that I had ought to accuse my nation of .
text2: Ama Yuta nyə ́ ma ná kʋlaa na pá kisi təsaɣasaɣa . Tənaɣa pə caala - m na má tɔ sɩ : Tɩɩ tɛna Lom wulaʋ sɔsɔ kiŋ kɛ ́ . Anɩ ma fɛɩna nti maa tɔ sɩ tənɛɣɛ ma yəlaa lapa - m tɔ .

text: For this cause therefore have I called for you , to see you , and to speak with you : because that for the hope of Israel I am bound with this chain .
text2: Mpi pə tɔɔ ma yaa - mɛ sɩ ma na - mɛ tə ́ ná tɔɣɔlɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , wei Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ yəlaa tekiɣi tɔ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa tʋ - m alukpala anɛ ɩsəntɔ .

text: And they said unto him , We neither received letters out of Judaea concerning thee , neither any of the brethren that came shewed or spake any harm of thee .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɛlɛ pa cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Yuta tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ta tilina - tʋɣʋ takəlaɣa nakələɣɩ nyá tɔm taa . Pəyele tá taapalaa mpa pa wɛ təna tɔ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ta lɩɩ na ɩ ́ kɔɔ cənɛ sɩ ɩ kɛɛsəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ nyá tɔm , yaa ɩ lakɩ nyá kɔlɔmɔtɔ .

text: But we desire to hear of thee what thou thinkest : for as concerning this sect , we know that every where it is spoken against .
text2: Ama tə caa tə nyɩ nti nyá maɣamaɣa n hʋʋkɩ tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , paa timpi paa caa kpekəle nte tə taa n wɛ mpʋ tɔ tə tɔm .

text: And when they had appointed him a day , there came many to him into his lodging ; to whom he expounded and testified the kingdom of God , persuading them concerning Jesus , both out of the law of Moses , and out of the prophets , from morning till evening .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa na Pɔɔlɩ pa sɩɩ kʋyakʋ . Pə wule talaa , ɩlɛna pá koti sɔsɔm kɛ timpi Pɔɔlɩ sʋʋkaɣa tɔ . Pə kpaɣaʋ tanaŋ haləna ilim polo na pə ́ tɛ tɔ , Pɔɔlɩ paasəna - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa waasʋ , na ɩ ́ lʋkɩ teu sɩ ɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ - wɛɣɛ pə tampana na pá cɛkəna Yesu tɔm na pá tisi . Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa takəlasɩ taa kɛ ́ ɩ hʋlaɣaana - wɛɣɛ pə tampana .

text: And some believed the things which were spoken , and some believed not .
text2: Lɛlaa ná cɛkənaa na pá tisi . Ama lɛlaa ná kisa - təɣɩ mʋɣʋ .

text: And when they agreed not among themselves , they departed , after that Paul had spoken one word , Well spake the Holy Ghost by Esaias the prophet unto our fathers ,
text2: Pa kʋlaa na pá tɛɛkɩ na pá tɔŋna təmaɣa kpɛɛsənaʋ ɩlɛna Pɔɔlɩ heeli - wɛɣɛ kʋlʋmaɣa sɩ : Tampana kɛ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ ka yɔɣɔta waatʋ wei ɩ yelaa na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ Ɩsayii yɔɣɔtəna mə caanaa sɩ :

text: Saying , Go unto this people , and say , Hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and not perceive :
text2: Polo yəlaa panɛ pa kiŋ na ń tɔ - wɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ ká nɩɩ teu yaa , ama ɩ ́ kaa cɛkəna . Ɩ ́ ká nyənɩ teu yaa , ama ɩ ́ kaa ná .

text: For the heart of this people is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes have they closed ; lest they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , yəlaa panɛ pa ləmaɣasɛɛ səpa . Pa təka pa ŋkpaŋŋ . Pa wiisa pa ɩsɛ , sɩ pa ɩsɛ ɩ ́ taa na , na pa ŋkpaŋŋ ɩ ́ taa nɩɩ . Sɩ pá taa cɛkəna pə yaasi . Pə taa kɔɔ pá pəsəna ma tɔɔ , na má lá na pə ́ waa - wɛ . Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔtəna mpʋ yoo .

text: Be it known therefore unto you , that the salvation of God is sent unto the Gentiles , and that they will hear it .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Pɔɔlɩ tɔma - wɛ tɔtɔ sɩ : Ye mpʋ ɩ ́ nyɩ teu sɩ pa pona ɩsəna Ɩsɔ yakɩ yəlaa tɔ pə tɔm na pá heeli mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ na pɛlɛ pá mʋ - tɩ .

text: And when he had said these words , the Jews departed , and had great reasoning among themselves .
text2: Waatʋ wei Pɔɔlɩ tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtaɣa tɔ , Yuta nyə ́ ma tɛɛwa na pá kpɛɛsəɣəna təmaɣa teu .

text: And Paul dwelt two whole years in his own hired house , and received all that came in unto him ,
text2: Pɔɔlɩ lapa kutuluɣu kɛ haya na ɩ ́ caɣa kʋ taa kɛ ́ pɩɩsɩ naalɛ təcu . Na mpa pa caakaɣa - ɩ tɔ pá puki təna na pá makəna - ɩ .

text: Preaching the kingdom of God , and teaching those things which concern the Lord Jesus Christ , with all confidence , no man forbidding him .
text2: Na ɩ ́ lakɩ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa waasʋ na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti tɔm təyelele na ɩɩ nyaŋna pʋlʋ .

text: Paul , a servant of Jesus Christ , called to be an apostle , separated unto the gospel of God ,
text2: Maɣa Pɔɔlɩ , Yesu Kilisiti yom . Maɣa Ɩsɔ kpa tillu na ɩ ́ ləsɩ - m na ma mpaa kɛ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kpaalʋɣʋ tɔɔ . Má ŋmaana - mɛɣɛ takəlaɣa kanɛ .

text: ( Which he had promised afore by his prophets in the holy scriptures , )
text2: Hatuu lɔŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká kɔna Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ ɩnɩ . Halɩ Ɩsɔ yelaa na ɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa ŋmaa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ takəlasɩ taa .

text: Concerning his Son Jesus Christ our Lord , which was made of the seed of David according to the flesh ;
text2: Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ ɩnəɣəlɛ ɩ Pəyaɣa Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti tɔm . Ye Yesu yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ tɔm ɩlɛ , wulaʋ Tafiiti lʋlʋɣʋ taa tʋ kɛ ́ .

text: And declared to be the Son of God with power , according to the spirit of holiness , by the resurrection from the dead :
text2: Ama Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kiŋ ɩlɛ , Ɩsɔ hʋləna toma sɩ Yesu kɛ ́ ɩ Pəyaɣa kɛ waatʋ wei Yesu səpa na ɩ ́ feesi - ɩ tɔ .

text: By whom we have received grace and apostleship , for obedience to the faith among all nations , for his name :
text2: Kilisiti ɩnɩ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ hʋla - m pɛɛlɛɛ na má la tillu sɔsɔ kɛ kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ tɔɔ , sɩ má la na kateŋasɩ təna yəlaa mʋ ɩ tɔm na pá nɩɩna - ɩ .

text: Among whom are ye also the called of Jesus Christ :
text2: Mɛ tɔtɔ ɩ ́ wɛ pa taa , mɛ mpa Ɩsɔ ləsa Lom sɩ ɩ ́ pəsɩ Yesu Kilisiti nyə ́ ma tɔ .

text: To all that be in Rome , beloved of God , called to be saints : Grace to you and peace from God our Father , and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Mə təna mpa mɛ ɩ ́ wɛ Lom na Ɩsɔ sɔɔlaa na ɩ ́ yaa sɩ ɩ ́ pəsɩ ɩ nyə ́ ma tɔ , mə takəlaɣa ntɔ . Tacaa Ɩsɔ , na Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti pá hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ na pá la na mə laŋa hʋlʋmɩ .

text: First , I thank my God through Jesus Christ for you all , that your faith is spoken of throughout the whole world .
text2: Kancaalaɣa ɩlɛ , Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ ma sɛɛ ma Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ mə təna mə tɔɔ . Mpi pə tɔɔ tɔ , pa pʋɣʋləɣɩ antulinya təna taa kɛ ́ ɩsəna ɩ ́ nɩɩkəna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teu tɔ .

text: For God is my witness , whom I serve with my spirit in the gospel of his Son , that without ceasing I make mention of you always in my prayers ;
text2: Ɩsɔ wei ɩ Pəyaɣa Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kpaalʋɣʋ təmlɛ ma lakəna luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ tɔ , ɩ nyəmá sɩ maa looliɣi . Ɩsɔ nyəmá mpʋ sɩ tam ma tɔɔsəɣɩ mə tɔm

text: Making request , if by any means now at length I might have a prosperous journey by the will of God to come unto you .
text2: kɛ paa waatʋ wei ma sələməɣɩ tɔ . Ma wiikina - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ la luɣu na má hiki mpaa kɛ pənɛntɛ na má polo mə kiŋ .

text: For I long to see you , that I may impart unto you some spiritual gift , to the end ye may be established ;
text2: Ma nyɩɩləɣɩ teu sɩ má ná - mɛ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ hiki kʋcɔɔʋ kɛ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kiŋ , na ɩ ́ la toma .

text: That is , that I may be comforted together with you by the mutual faith both of you and me .
text2: Nti ma tɩɩ kələɣɩ nyɩɩlʋɣʋ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ má wɛɛ mə hɛkʋ , na tə ́ nyənəɣəna təma naani tʋɣʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ tɔɔ , na pə sɔɔsəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ apalʋtʋ .

text: Now I would not have you ignorant , brethren , that oftentimes I purposed to come unto you , ( but was let hitherto , ) that I might have some fruit among you also , even as among other Gentiles .
text2: Ma taapalaa mɛ , ɩ ́ nyɩ teu sɩ tam ma hʋʋkaɣa sɩ ma puki mə kiŋ , ɩlɛ pə tuu - m , haləna saŋa . Ma nyɩɩləɣɩ sɩ ma təmlɛ ɩ ́ lʋlɩ pʋlʋpʋɣʋ mə tɛ , ɩsɩɩ tə lʋla piitim lɛmpɩ nyə ́ ma kiŋ tɔ .

text: I am debtor both to the Greeks , and to the Barbarians ; both to the wise , and to the unwise .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pə caala - m kɛ ́ sɩ má polo yəlaa təna kiŋ . Paa acalɛɛ sɔsɔɔna taa , paa cacakəŋ tɛɛ , paa ɩsəkullaa cɔlɔ , paa ɩsəkpɛɛtɛɛ nyə ́ ma cɔlɔ .

text: So , as much as in me is , I am ready to preach the gospel to you that are at Rome also .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma nyɩɩləɣɩ teu sɩ má pona mɛ mpa ɩ ́ wɛ Lom tɔɣɔ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔtɔ .

text: For I am not ashamed of the gospel of Christ : for it is the power of God unto salvation to every one that believeth ; to the Jew first , and also to the Greek .
text2: Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kpaalʋɣʋ tɔm fɛɩ - m fɛɛlɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ toma ntɛ ́ təna . Ɩ waasəɣɩ pa təna mpa pa tɛŋɩ - ɩ na pa taa tɔ . Yuta nyə ́ ma kɛ kancaalaɣa , pa waalɩ kɛ ́ mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ .

text: For therein is the righteousness of God revealed from faith to faith : as it is written , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Kʋpam Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə nyəŋ ɩsəna Ɩsɔ lakɩ na yəlaa pəsəɣɩ kʋpama kɛ ɩ ɩsɛntaa tɔ . Pə kpaɣaʋ hatuu kancaalaɣa haləna pə tɛm tɔ , yʋlʋ tɛŋ ɩ taa na Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ la , pə ta kaasɩ pʋlʋ tɔtɔ . Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa maɣamaɣa kilisa mpʋ təcɛɩcɛɩ sɩ : Ye Ɩsɔ nyəna wei kɛ ́ yʋlʋpaŋ sɩ ɩ tɛma ɩ taa tɔ pə tɔɔ , pʋntʋ tike tʋləɣəna - tɩ .

text: For the wrath of God is revealed from heaven against all ungodliness and unrighteousness of men , who hold the truth in unrighteousness ;
text2: Ɩsɔ mʋɣɩ pááná kɛ hatuu ɩsɔtaa kɛ ́ yəlaa kʋpəntəŋ na pa ɩsaɣatʋnaa təna tɔɔ na pə ́ naa mpʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , yəlaa tɛtɛlakasɩ nyəkəɣɩ tampana na a mələɣɩ yem .

text: Because that which may be known of God is manifest in them ; for God hath shewed it unto them .
text2: Mpʋ pə yelina na Ɩsɔ tʋɣɩ - wɛɣɛ naʋya . Mpi tɔ pa nyəmá timpiwɛ pə wɛɛ sɩ pá nyaŋna Ɩsɔ tɔ , ɩ tɛma - wɛɣɛ - wəɣɩ hʋ ́ lʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɛ teu tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: For the invisible things of him from the creation of the world are clearly seen , being understood by the things that are made , even his eternal power and Godhead ; so that they are without excuse :
text2: Kʋpam hatuu Ɩsɔ lapa antulinya tɔ , ɩ mukaɣa tɛɛ wɛɛtʋ , ɩsɩɩ ɩ toma tamm nyəna na ɩsəna ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ wɛɛ tɔ , pə naakɩ ɩ kʋlapəm mpɩ pə kiŋ kɛ ́ . Tənaɣa pə wɛɛ sɩ yəlaa ɩ ́ nyəna ɩ toma na ɩ wɛɛtʋ , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa fɛɩna tampana .

text: Because that , when they knew God , they glorified him not as God , neither were thankful ; but became vain in their imaginations , and their foolish heart was darkened .
text2: Pa nyəmá Ɩsɔ , ama paa see - ɩ , pəyele paa sɛɛ - ɩ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ ɩsɩɩ pə nəɣəsəna yəlaa ɩ ́ la Ɩsɔ tɔ . Pa hʋwɛɛ liɣita yem , paa laɣatiya ka fɛɩ .

text: Professing themselves to be wise , they became fools ,
text2: Pa tɔŋ sɩ pa nyəm tɔɔwa , ama ɩwɛɛŋ kɛ ́ .

text: And changed the glory of the uncorruptible God into an image made like to corruptible man , and to birds , and fourfooted beasts , and creeping things .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ paa tʋ Ɩsɔ wei ɩɩ səkɩ tɔɣɔ teeli tɔ , yʋlʋ wei ɩ səkɩ tɔ ɩ lɛɛsəŋ na sumasɩ na nɔɔhɛɛ liɣiti wontu na nti tə tuuki atɛ tɔɣɔ pa seeki .

text: Wherefore God also gave them up to uncleanness through the lusts of their own hearts , to dishonour their own bodies between themselves :
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ yela - wɛɣɛ pa tɛtɛlakasɩ ɩsaɣasɩ nsi pa luuŋ sʋʋwa tɔ sɩ taa , na pá lakɩ təmaɣa mpi pə wɛ fɛɛlɛ tɔ .

text: Who changed the truth of God into a lie , and worshipped and served the creature more than the Creator , who is blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: Mpɛ pa məlaa kɛ ́ na pá kpaɣa Ɩsɔ tɔɔ tampana na pá pəsəna pɔpɔtʋ . Pa sɛɛkɩ na pá təŋəɣɩ mpi mpi Ɩsɔ lapa tɔ , na pá yele Ɩsɔ wei ɩ lapa - wɩ tɔ ɩ maɣamaɣa . Pəyele pɩɩ mʋna ɩsɩɩ ɩnəɣɩ pá saŋ tam .

text: For this cause God gave them up unto vile affections : for even their women did change the natural use into that which is against nature :
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ ná yela - wɛɣɛ pa taaləntʋtʋ taa . Na pa alaa maɣamaɣa náá yeki apalaa na pá sʋʋkəna təma .

text: And likewise also the men , leaving the natural use of the woman , burned in their lust one toward another ; men with men working that which is unseemly , and receiving in themselves that recompence of their error which was meet .
text2: Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ na pa apalaa , pɛlɛ pa yeki alaa tɔm , na pa kʋnyɩɩləŋ ɩ ́ kpa pa nyɔɔŋ taa pa ketitiɣi təma . Apalaa lakəna təmaɣa fɛɛlɛ fɛɩ nyəntʋ . Na pa taaləntʋtʋ ntɩ tə naasʋɣʋ makəna pa nyɔɔŋ taa .

text: And even as they did not like to retain God in their knowledge , God gave them over to a reprobate mind , to do those things which are not convenient ;
text2: Ɩsɩɩ pa kisa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ nyəm təkelekele tɔ , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ ná yela - wɛɣɛ pa kʋmɛləlaɣatʋ taa na pá lakɩ acaalətʋ .

text: Being filled with all unrighteousness , fornication , wickedness , covetousness , maliciousness ; full of envy , murder , debate , deceit , malignity ; whisperers ,
text2: Pa kəla kawalasɩ , na ɩsaɣatʋ , na kʋnyɩɩləŋ , na nyaŋ , na ɩsɛsɛɛmlɛ , na yʋlʋkʋlɛ , na yoou , na puɣusuɣu , na muɣuluɣu tike kɛ pa nyəmá . Pa kɛ ́ yɔɣɔtəlaa .

text: Backbiters , haters of God , despiteful , proud , boasters , inventors of evil things , disobedient to parents ,
text2: Pa cakəna təma . Pa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kolontunaa , na kalampaanɩ nyə ́ ma na ɩsəcaʋ nyə ́ ma na təhɔntaa . Pa lʋləsəɣɩ ɩsaɣatʋ kʋfatʋ , paa see pa caanaa .

text: Without understanding , covenantbreakers , without natural affection , implacable , unmerciful :
text2: Pa fɛɩna laakalɩ , paa tɔkəɣɩ nti pa tɔŋ sɩ paa la tɔ . Pa lakɩ təkatɩɩ , pa fɛɩna lɛlaa pətɔɔtəlɛ .

text: Who knowing the judgment of God , that they which commit such things are worthy of death , not only do the same , but have pleasure in them that do them .
text2: Pa nyəmá Ɩsɔ tɔɔ sɩ mpa pa lakɩ mpʋ tɔ pa kɛ ́ sɔlʋnaa . Paa na mpʋ pa tɔŋna lapʋ , haləna pá saŋ pə lataa tɔtɔ .

text: Therefore thou art inexcusable , O man , whosoever thou art that judgest : for wherein thou judgest another , thou condemnest thyself ; for thou that judgest doest the same things .
text2: Ɩlɛ nyá wei n footiɣi nyá lɛlʋ tɔ , paa n kɛ ́ we te , n fɛɩna tampana . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , nyá footiɣi lɛlʋ pəyele ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ nyá maɣamaɣa nyá lakɩ tɔ , n kʋɣɩ nyá tɩ tɔm kɛ ́ .

text: But we are sure that the judgment of God is according to truth against them which commit such things .
text2: Tə nyəmá sɩ tampana kɛ Ɩsɔ təŋəɣɩ na ɩ ́ hʋʋkəna pa təna mpa pa lakɩ mpʋ ɩnɩ pə taka tɔ te .

text: And thinkest thou this , O man , that judgest them which do such things , and doest the same , that thou shalt escape the judgment of God ?
text2: Ɩlɛ apaŋnya , ɩsɩɩ nyá footuɣuu mpa pa lakɩ mpʋ , pəcɔ nyá maɣamaɣa nyá lakɩ teitei ɩsɩɩ pɛlɛ tɔ , n hʋʋ sɩ Ɩsɔ kaa pɔɔsɩ - ŋ ?

text: Or despisest thou the riches of his goodness and forbearance and longsuffering ; not knowing that the goodness of God leadeth thee to repentance ?
text2: Ɩsɔ kʋcɔɔʋ ntɛ ́ n məla ń kpaləɣɩ na ń kisiɣi ɩ suulu sɩ ɩ ́ taa wii nyá pətɔɔtəlɛ ? N ta nyɩ sɩ Ɩsɔ lakɩ - ŋ kʋpantʋ kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ ɩsɔwɛɛ n ká laɣasɩ tɔntɛ ?

text: But after thy hardness and impenitent heart treasurest up unto thyself wrath against the day of wrath and revelation of the righteous judgment of God ;
text2: Nyá laŋkpɩɩsəŋ ɩnɛ . Ama nn caa laɣasʋɣʋ se . N lakʋɣʋ mpʋ tɔ , saləka kʋkəlʋ kɛ n caakɩ na ń kɔŋna nyá nyʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ kʋyaŋku Ɩsɔ ká caɣa na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ ɩ pááná na ɩsəna ɩ təŋəɣɩ siɣisuɣu na ɩ ́ hʋʋkəna tɔ .

text: Who will render to every man according to his deeds :
text2: Kʋyakʋ ŋkʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ ká fɛlɩ paa wei kɛ ́ ɩ kʋlapʋtʋ .

text: To them who by patient continuance in well doing seek for glory and honour and immortality , eternal life :
text2: Mpa pa sɔɔla kʋpantʋ lapʋ kɛ tam , na pá pɛɛkəɣɩ Ɩsɔ kiŋ teeli , na sam na tam wɛɛtʋ tɔ , mpɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ ká ha weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ .

text: But unto them that are contentious , and do not obey the truth , but obey unrighteousness , indignation and wrath ,
text2: Ama mpa pa sɔpa nyʋɣʋ na pa nyəntʋ tɛləsʋɣʋ kɛ lɔlɔ , na paa təŋəɣɩ tampana , na pá lakɩ pə təna mpi pə fɛɩ teu tɔ , Ɩsɔ ká hʋ ́ lɩ ́ pɛlɛɣɛ ɩsəna ɩ taa kpaana - wɛ na pa tɔm ta maɣa - ɩ tɔ .

text: Tribulation and anguish , upon every soul of man that doeth evil , of the Jew first , and also of the Gentile ;
text2: Wahala na laŋwakəllɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ ká kpa pa təna mpa pa lakɩ ɩsaɣatʋ tɔ . Yuta nyə ́ ma kɛ kancaalaɣa , pə waalɩ kɛ ́ mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ .

text: But glory , honour , and peace , to every man that worketh good , to the Jew first , and also to the Gentile :
text2: Ama mpa pa lakɩ kʋpantʋ tɔ , Ɩsɔ ká kʋsɩ pɛlɛ pa nyʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ sa - wɛ na ɩ ́ hʋləsɩ pa laŋa . Yuta nyə ́ ma kɛ kancaalaɣa , pa waalɩ kɛ ́ mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ .

text: For there is no respect of persons with God .
text2: Mpi tɔ Ɩsɔ ɩɩ faɣasəɣɩ yəlaa tɔ se .

text: For as many as have sinned without law shall also perish without law : and as many as have sinned in the law shall be judged by the law ;
text2: Mpa pa ta nyɩ Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ na pá pəntəɣɩ tɔ , paa le na kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɩ tə tɔm ta na - wɛ . Ama mpa pɛlɛ pa nyəmá Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ na pá tɔŋna pəntʋɣʋ tɔ , kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntəɣɩ paa kɛɛsəna na pá hʋʋna - wɛɣɛ tɔm .

text: ( For not the hearers of the law are just before God , but the doers of the law shall be justified .
text2: Mpi tɔ pə taɣa yəlaa mpa pa nɩɩkɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔm kɛ kʋnɩɩ tɔ mpɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ nyənəɣɩ kʋpama se . Ama mpa pa tɔka - tɩ tɔɣɔ .

text: For when the Gentiles , which have not the law , do by nature the things contained in the law , these , having not the law , are a law unto themselves :
text2: Ye piitim lɛmpɩ nyə ́ ma nɔkaa na pá təŋəɣɩ mpi Yuta nyə ́ ma kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kɛɛsəɣɩ tɔ , pəyele nɔɣɔlʋ ta hʋlɩ - wɛ , ɩlɛ pa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ wɛ pa maɣamaɣa pa taa kɛlɛ , paa na pa taa fɛɩna - tɩ tɔ .

text: Which shew the work of the law written in their hearts , their conscience also bearing witness , and their thoughts the mean while accusing or else excusing one another ; )
text2: Pa lakʋɣʋ mpʋ tɔ , pa hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ kɛlɛ sɩ , paa pa taa fɛɩna kʋsəsɩɩtʋ , pə tʋ Moisi nyəntʋ ntɛ ́ pa lotunaa taa . Na pə naakɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa laakalənaa taa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , wutee wutee pa pətəɣɩ pa kʋlapʋtʋ taa kɛ ́ , na wutee wutee pa wɛna naani .

text: In the day when God shall judge the secrets of men by Jesus Christ according to my gospel .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɩɩ lɩɩ teitei kɛ ́ kʋyaŋku Ɩsɔ ká yele sɩ Yesu Kilisiti ɩ ́ hʋʋna yəlaa kɛ pa mukaɣa tɛɛ kʋlapʋtʋ tɔɔ tɔ . Na pə maɣamaɣa kɛ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ wei ma kpaaləɣɩ tɔ ɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ .

text: Behold , thou art called a Jew , and restest in the law , and makest thy boast of God ,
text2: Ama nyá , n yaa nyá təɣɩ Yuta tʋ Yuta tʋ , na Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntəɣəlɛ Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ , na ń mʋɣʋləɣəna nyá Ɩsɔ .

text: And knowest his will , and approvest the things that are more excellent , being instructed out of the law ;
text2: Pə ́ cɔ ́ n nyəmá mpi Ɩsɔ caa sɩ ń la tɔ , na kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɩ tə kula nyá ɩsɛ kɛ teu sɩ ń cɛkəna kʋpantʋ .

text: And art confident that thou thyself art a guide of the blind , a light of them which are in darkness ,
text2: N nyənəɣɩ nyá təɣɩ yʋlʋmaa hɔntʋ na səkpɛtʋɣʋ tɛɛ nyə ́ ma ɩsɛntɔɔ cɛtʋ ,

text: An instructor of the foolish , a teacher of babes , which hast the form of knowledge and of the truth in the law .
text2: na ɩsəkpɛɛtɛɛ nyə ́ ma ɩsəkullu , na piya sɛɣɛsəlʋ . Mpi pə tɔɔ n nyənəɣɩ nyá təɣɩ mpʋ tɔ , n tɛɛləɣɩ kɛ ́ sɩ nyá nana pə tənaɣa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɩ tə taa , paa nyəm , paa tampana .

text: Thou therefore which teachest another , teachest thou not thyself ? thou that preachest a man should not steal , dost thou steal ?
text2: Aŋha , nyá wei n sɛɣɛsəɣɩ lɛlaa tɔ , nn sɛɣɛsəɣɩ nyá tɩ suwe ? Nyá wei n lakɩ waasʋ sɩ pá taa ŋmɩɩlɩ tɔ , pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ nyá ŋmɩɩləɣɩ ?

text: Thou that sayest a man should not commit adultery , dost thou commit adultery ? thou that abhorrest idols , dost thou commit sacrilege ?
text2: Nyá wei n tɔŋ sɩ pá taa la wasaŋkalətʋ tɔ , pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ nyá lakɩ ? Nyá wei nn caa tɩɩŋ tɔm kɛ paa pəcɔ tɔ , pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ n naɣaləɣɩ ɩ tɛɛ kʋpampam ?

text: Thou that makest thy boast of the law , through breaking the law dishonourest thou God ?
text2: Pə taɣa nyá mʋɣʋləɣəna sɩ n wɛna Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ? Ɩlɛ pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ n pəntəɣɩ - tɩ na pə ́ kʋɣɩ Ɩsɔ nyʋɣʋ ?

text: For the name of God is blasphemed among the Gentiles through you , as it is written .
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa pa ŋmaawa təkelekele sɩ : Yuta nyə ́ ma mɛ mə yelina na piitim lɛmpɩ nyə ́ ma tʋʋkɩ Ɩsɔ .

text: For circumcision verily profiteth , if thou keep the law : but if thou be a breaker of the law , thy circumcision is made uncircumcision .
text2: Ye n tɔkəɣɩ Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kɛ pɛlʋɣʋ waasəɣɩ - ŋ . Ama ye nn tɔkəɣɩ - tɩ , pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ pa ta pɛlɩ - ŋ kɛlɛ , paa n pɛlaa .

text: Therefore if the uncircumcision keep the righteousness of the law , shall not his uncircumcision be counted for circumcision ?
text2: Ye yʋlʋ ɩ ́ ta pɛlɩ , pəyele ɩ təŋəɣɩ teu kɛ Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kɛɛsa nti tɔ , Ɩsɔ kaa nyənɩ pʋntʋ ɩsɩɩ pɛllʋ ?

text: And shall not uncircumcision which is by nature , if it fulfil the law , judge thee , who by the letter and circumcision dost transgress the law ?
text2: Wei ɩ ta pɛlɩ pəyele ɩ tɔka kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɩ tɔ , ɩ ká kʋ Yuta tʋ nyá nyá tɔm . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , nyá wɛna kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɩ tə takəlasɩ , na n pɛlaa pəyele nn təŋəɣɩ - tɩ .

text: For he is not a Jew , which is one outwardly ; neither is that circumcision , which is outward in the flesh :
text2: Tɔʋ , ɩsənaɣa Yuta tʋ siɣisiɣi ná wɛɛ ? Pə taɣa ɩsɛntɔɔ na ɩ pɛlʋɣʋ kiŋ kɛ pa nyəŋna - ɩ sɩ Yuta tʋ .

text: But he is a Jew , which is one inwardly ; and circumcision is that of the heart , in the spirit , and not in the letter ; whose praise is not of men , but of God .
text2: Ama Yuta tʋ siɣisiɣi ɩlɛ , pa nyəŋna - ɩ na ɩ taa kɛ ́ , na hatuu ɩ lotu taa kɛ ́ pa pɛla - ɩ . Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu pɛləna - ɩ , pə taɣa Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ nti pa ŋmaa kʋŋmaa tɔ tə tɔm tɔkʋɣʋ tɔɔ . Yuta tʋ siɣisiɣi kɛ mpʋ , Ɩsɔ saŋna - ɩ , pə taɣa yəlaa .

text: What advantage then hath the Jew ? or what profit is there of circumcision ?
text2: Kawaaɣa wɛ Yutaɩtʋ taa kɛ ? Pɛlʋɣʋ ná wɛna kasəyaɣa na ?

text: Much every way : chiefly , because that unto them were committed the oracles of God .
text2: Kawaaɣa wɛ pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə taa kɛ ́ sɔsɔm mɛɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , kancaalaɣa ɩlɛ , Yuta nyə ́ ma mpɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ yelina ɩ tɔm nti ɩ kaɣa ɩ heeli yəlaa tɔ .

text: For what if some did not believe ? shall their unbelief make the faith of God without effect ?
text2: Ɩlɛ ye pa taa lɛlaa kisa tə mʋɣʋ , pɩɩ la na Ɩsɔ náá kɛɛ nti ɩ ka yɔɣɔtaa tɔ ?

text: God forbid : yea , let God be true , but every man a liar ; as it is written , That thou mightest be justified in thy sayings , and mightest overcome when thou art judged .
text2: Aaɩ , pə kaa la mpʋ se , paa pəcɔ . Paa yəlaa təna ká la kaloolutʋnaa , ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ lapa tampana tʋ kɛ tam . Pa ŋmaawa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Ɩsɩɩ yəlaa təna nyəmá sɩ tampana kɛ n yɔɣɔtəɣɩ . Na ye pa tɩɩ yaa - ŋ hʋʋlɛ , nyá tɔm teena .

text: But if our unrighteousness commend the righteousness of God , what shall we say ? Is God unrighteous who taketh vengeance ? ( I speak as a man )
text2: Ama ye ɩsaɣatʋ nti tə lakɩ tɔ tə kʋsa Ɩsɔ nyʋɣʋ , haləna pá sa ɩ tampana təŋʋɣʋ , ɩlɛ tɩɩ tasa suweɣe yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ tɔtɔ ? Yaa tɩɩ tɔ sɩ timpi ɩ tʋkʋɣʋ - tʋɣʋ cɛɣɛcɛɣɛ kɛ ́ tá ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɔ tɔ ɩ yʋwaɣalɛ ? Aaɩ . ( Ama nti yəlaa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔɣɔ ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ cənɛ . )

text: God forbid : for then how shall God judge the world ?
text2: Tɔfɔ ye pɩɩ wɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣa Ɩsɔ ká tɛ na ɩ ́ la na ɩ ́ hʋʋna yəlaa təna təpaɩ kɛ ́ tɔm ?

text: For if the truth of God hath more abounded through my lie unto his glory ; why yet am I also judged as a sinner ?
text2: Ye ma pɔpɔtʋ lakəna na pə ́ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ Ɩsɔ tampana təkelekele na ɩ ́ hikiɣi teeli , ɩlɛ pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa nyənəɣɩ - m ɩsaɣaʋ tɔtɔ ?

text: And not rather , ( as we be slanderously reported , and as some affirm that we say , ) Let us do evil , that good may come ? whose damnation is just .
text2: Yaa pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə kaa tɔ sɩ tə ́ la ɩsaɣatʋ na pə ́ kɔna kʋpantʋ ɩlɛ ? Haləna lɛmpa caakaɣa ma nyʋɣʋ kʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna pá waana sɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ma tɔŋna sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ . Paa kʋ yəlaa mpa pa waana - m mpʋ tɔ pa tɔm , na pa tɔm kʋɣʋ maɣaa .

text: What then ? are we better than they ? No , in no wise : for we have before proved both Jews and Gentiles , that they are all under sin ;
text2: Ɩlɛ ɩsəna tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə wɛɛ ? Yuta nyə ́ ma tá tə tɛɛ piitim lɛmpɩ nyə ́ ma yaa ɩsəna ? Aaɩ , pə taɣa mpʋ . Ma tɛma hʋ ́ lʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ ɩsaɣatʋ tɔka yəlaa tənaɣa təkem , paa Yuta nyə ́ ma , paa yəlaa mpa te .

text: As it is written , There is none righteous , no , not one :
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa pa ŋmaawa mpʋ sɩ : Yʋlʋ fɛɩ wei ɩ siɣisaa tɔ , paa kʋlʋm kʋŋ .

text: There is none that understandeth , there is none that seeketh after God .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ ta cɛkəna pʋlʋpʋɣʋ paa pəcɔ . Pəyele nɔɣɔlʋ ɩɩ pɛɛkəɣɩ Ɩsɔ .

text: They are all gone out of the way , they are together become unprofitable ; there is none that doeth good , no , not one .
text2: Pa təna pa toolaa na pá hatələna Ɩsɔ , pa kpɛnta pa təna na pá la yem . Pa taa kʋlʋm maɣamaɣa ɩɩ lakɩ kʋpantʋ .

text: Their throat is an open sepulchre ; with their tongues they have used deceit ; the poison of asps is under their lips :
text2: Pa nɔɣɔ taa wɛ ɩsɩɩ pəlaaʋ ŋku kʋ kulaa tɔ . Pa puɣusiɣi lɛlaa na pa nɔɔleleŋ . Pa ntompee ɩ ́ nyəpətaa , pə wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ akala sɔtʋ .

text: Whose mouth is full of cursing and bitterness :
text2: Mpusi koolee na tɔm ɩsaɣatʋ wɛnna pa nɔɔsɩ taa .

text: Their feet are swift to shed blood :
text2: Pa niŋ wɛ lɔŋ kɛ yəlaa təkʋlɛ .

text: Destruction and misery are in their ways :
text2: Pá kʋla timpi , wakəlʋɣʋ na ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ n makəna .

text: And the way of peace have they not known :
text2: Pa ta nyɩ ɩsəna paa la na pá lɩɩ pə taa na pá hɛɛsɩ tɔ .

text: There is no fear of God before their eyes .
text2: Pa fɛɩna Ɩsɔ sɔɣɔntʋ kɛ pʋlʋ taa .

text: Now we know that what things soever the law saith , it saith to them who are under the law : that every mouth may be stopped , and all the world may become guilty before God .
text2: Tɔʋ , tə nyəmá sɩ Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ pə təna mpi tɔ , pa təna mpa pa təŋəɣɩ - tɩ tɔɣɔ pə nawa . Ɩlɛna pə ́ təkɩ samaa təna nɔɔsɩ , na pá taa hiki təwaanlɛ kɛ tiili , yaa nɔɣɔlʋ fiti Ɩsɔ hʋʋnaʋ taa .

text: Therefore by the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in his sight : for by the law is the knowledge of sin .
text2: Pə taɣa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ lakəna na Ɩsɔ nyənəɣɩ yʋlʋ kɛ yʋlʋpaŋ , paa pʋntʋ kɛ ́ awe . Ama kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təmlɛ ntɛ ́ sɩ pə ́ hʋlɩ - ŋ nyá təpəntəlɛ , pə təna ntɛ ́ .

text: But now the righteousness of God without the law is manifested , being witnessed by the law and the prophets ;
text2: Ama pənɛntɛ Ɩsɔ hʋla - tʋɣʋ ɩsəna ɩ lakɩ na tə ́ pəsəɣɩ yʋlʋpama kɛ ɩ ɩsɛntaa na pə tá lɩɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təŋʋɣʋ tɔm tɔ . Halɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ takəlasɩ na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa nyənsɩ taa kɛ ́ pa yɔɣɔta pə tɔm kɛ mpʋ sɩ :

text: Even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe : for there is no difference :
text2: Ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ tɛŋʋɣʋ ɩ taa na Yesu Kilisiti tɔ , mpʋ pə yekina na ɩ ́ pəsɩ kʋpaŋ . Wei ɩ ́ tɩɩ laalaa na ɩ ́ tɛmɩ - ɩ na ɩ taa te , ɩ lakɩ na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ pəsɩ kʋpaŋ kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ . Ɩsɔ naa faɣasəɣɩ yəlaa .

text: For all have sinned , and come short of the glory of God ;
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , yəlaa təna lapəna ɩsaɣatʋ , ɩlɛna pə ́ pɛ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ teeli .

text: Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus :
text2: Ama Ɩsɔ kʋpantʋ tɔɔ ɩ yelaa na Yesu Kilisiti wei ɩ waasəɣɩ - wɛ tɔ ɩ ́ la na pá pəsɩ yʋlʋpama kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa kɛ faalaa .

text: Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood , to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past , through the forbearance of God ;
text2: Səm mpi ɩ səpa tɔ , Ɩsɔ lapəna - ɩ kɔtaɣa sɩ ɩ ́ pəsɩ wei ɩ kiŋ yəlaa mpa pa nɩɩkəna - ɩ tɔ paa hikina suulu kɛ pa ɩsaɣatʋ tɔm taa na pə ́ hɩɩsɩ - wɛɣɛ - tɩ tɔ . Ɩsɔ lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ ɩ siɣisaa . Hatuu lɔŋ Ɩsɔ hʋla suulu na ɩ ́ yele yəlaa kɛ pa ɩsaɣatʋ pɔɔsʋɣʋ .

text: To declare , I say , at this time his righteousness : that he might be just , and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus .
text2: Ama kaɣana ɩlɛ ɩ paasəna ɩsaɣatʋ ntɩ ɩnɩ , na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ ɩsəna ɩ lakɩ na yəlaa pəsəɣɩ kʋpama kɛ ɩ ɩsɛntaa tɔ . Mpʋ ɩnɩ pə taa kɛ ́ ɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ sɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ kɛ ́ kʋpaŋ , pəyele ɩ lapa na mpa pɛlɛ pa nɩɩkəna Yesu tɔ pá pəsɩ kʋpama tɔtɔ .

text: Where is boasting then ? It is excluded . By what law ? of works ? Nay : but by the law of faith .
text2: Ye mpʋ pʋlʋ kaasaa mpi yʋlʋ ká hɔŋna ɩ tɩ tɔ ? Paa pəcɔ pʋlʋ fɛɩ . Ɩlɛ pepe tɔɔ ? Pa təŋəɣɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ yaa ? Aaɩ , taa tɛmnaʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: Therefore we conclude that a man is justified by faith without the deeds of the law .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , tə nawa sɩ taa tɛm tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ lakɩ na yʋlʋ pəsəɣɩ yʋlʋpaŋ kɛ ɩ ɩsɛntaa , pə taɣa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təŋʋɣʋ tɔɔ .

text: Is he the God of the Jews only ? is he not also of the Gentiles ? Yes , of the Gentiles also :
text2: Yaa Ɩsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ kɛ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma tike nyəŋ , na piitim lɛmpɩ nyə ́ ma nyəŋ na ɩlɛ ? Aaɩ pə taɣa mpʋ . Kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ kɛna pa təna pa Ɩsɔ .

text: Seeing it is one God , which shall justify the circumcision by faith , and uncircumcision through faith .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ wɛnna na ɩ ́ lakɩ , na Yuta nyə ́ ma pəsəɣɩ kʋpama kɛ ɩ ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ pa tɛmna - ɩ na pa taa tɔ pə tɔɔ . Taa tɛmnaʋ kʋlʋməm mpɩ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ká la na mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ pɛlɛ pá pəsɩ kʋpama kɛ mpʋ tɔtɔ .

text: Do we then make void the law through faith ? God forbid : yea , we establish the law .
text2: Ye mpʋ pə məlaa kɛlɛ sɩ tə lɔɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ na tə ́ paasəna Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ tɔm yaa ɩsəna ? Paa pəcɔ . Halɩ tə tɩɩ kʋsəɣɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɩ tə nyʋɣʋ kɛ kʋkʋsʋ kɛ ́ .

text: What shall we say then that Abraham our father , as pertaining to the flesh , hath found ?
text2: Tɔʋ , tə ́ nyənna tá caanaa caa sɔsɔ Apəlaham kiŋ na tə ́ ná . Pepeɣe ɩ hikaa ?

text: For if Abraham were justified by works , he hath whereof to glory ; but not before God .
text2: Ye təma kʋlapɛɛ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ ka nyəna - ɩ yʋlʋpaŋ ɩlɛ ɩ taa laŋ mpi ɩ ká sana ɩ tɩ tɔ . Ama ɩ kaa tɩɩ pəsɩ na ɩ ́ sa ɩ təɣɩ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa mɛɛ .

text: For what saith the scripture ? Abraham believed God , and it was counted unto him for righteousness .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa yɔɣɔta Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ sɩ , Apəlaham tɛma Ɩsɔ na ɩ taa , na ɩ taa tɛm mpəɣɩ Ɩsɔ ná nawa na ɩ ́ yaa - ɩ yʋlʋpaŋ na ɩ ́ mʋ - ɩ .

text: Now to him that worketh is the reward not reckoned of grace , but of debt .
text2: Yʋlʋ ɩ ́ lakɩ təmlɛ , pa fɛləɣɩ - ɩ kɛ ́ mɛɛ . Ɩlɛ pa kaa yaa ɩ kʋfɛlʋɣʋ ŋkʋ sɩ kʋhaʋ , ɩ ɩwɩɩlɛ lonte kɛ pa fɛla - ɩ .

text: But to him that worketh not , but believeth on him that justifieth the ungodly , his faith is counted for righteousness .
text2: Ɩlɛ paa yʋlʋ ta la təmlɛ na ɩ ́ tɛ Ɩsɔ wei ɩ wiiki asaɣaa kʋnyɔŋ tɔ na ɩ taa kɛ ́ kʋtɛm , Ɩsɔ nyənəɣɩ pʋntʋ taa tɛm tɔtɔɣɔ , na ɩ ́ mʋ - ɩ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ kʋpaŋ .

text: Even as David also describeth the blessedness of the man , unto whom God imputeth righteousness without works ,
text2: Pə tɔɔ maɣamaɣa kɛ Tafiiti yɔɣɔtəɣɩ wei Ɩsɔ mʋwa sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ yʋlʋpaŋ na ɩ ́ tá kɛɛsəna ɩ təma tɔ ɩ laŋhʋlʋmlɛ tɔm sɩ :

text: Saying , Blessed are they whose iniquities are forgiven , and whose sins are covered .
text2: Leleŋ nɩɩlaa ntɛ ́ mpa pa pəntaa na Ɩsɔ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - wɛɣɛ suulu tɔ . Pəyele ɩ hɩɩsa pa ɩsaɣatʋ .

text: Blessed is the man to whom the Lord will not impute sin .
text2: Leleŋ nɩɩlʋ ntɛ ́ wei ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ Ɩsɔ lɔwa tɔ .

text: Cometh this blessedness then upon the circumcision only , or upon the uncircumcision also ? for we say that faith was reckoned to Abraham for righteousness .
text2: Pɛllaa tike nɩɩkəna leleŋ ɩnɛ ? Kʋtapɛləŋ naa nɩɩkɩ - ɩ ? Tə tɛma yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ kɛ nɔɔnɔɔ sɩ Apəlaham tɛma Ɩsɔ na ɩ taa , na ɩ taa tɛm mpəɣɩ Ɩsɔ ná nawa na ɩ ́ yaa - ɩ yʋlʋpaŋ na ɩ ́ mʋ - ɩ .

text: How was it then reckoned ? when he was in circumcision , or in uncircumcision ? Not in circumcision , but in uncircumcision .
text2: Ɩlɛ waatʋ wei kɛ ́ pə lapa mpʋ ? Waatʋ wei ɩ pɛlaa tɔ , yaa na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ pɛləɣɩ ? Aaɩ na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ pɛləɣɩ kɛ ́ .

text: And he received the sign of circumcision , a seal of the righteousness of the faith which he had yet being uncircumcised : that he might be the father of all them that believe , though they be not circumcised ; that righteousness might be imputed unto them also :
text2: Waalɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ pa pɛla - ɩ , na ɩ pɛlʋɣʋ mpɩ pə hʋlaa kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ laalaa na ɩ ́ tɛ Ɩsɔ na ɩ taa tɔɣɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ mʋ - ɩ sɩ yʋlʋpaŋ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ waatʋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa pɛləta . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa na Apəlaham pəsɩ pa təna mpa pa tɛŋna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ pa taa kɛ ́ mpʋ na ɩ ́ mʋɣɩ - wɛ sɩ kʋpama tɔ pa caa , paa pa ta pɛlɩ .

text: And the father of circumcision to them who are not of the circumcision only , but who also walk in the steps of that faith of our father Abraham , which he had being yet uncircumcised .
text2: Ɩ pəsa pɛllaa caa tɔtɔ . Ɩlɛ pə taɣa mpa pa mʋɣʋləɣəna pɛlʋɣʋ tɔm tike tɔɣɔ ma tɔŋ . Ama mpa pa təŋa tá caa Apəlaham ɩkpatɛ na pá tɛ Ɩsɔ na pa taa ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ka tɛmnaʋ Ɩsɔ na ɩ taa na pə ́ cɔ ́ pá pɛləɣɩ - ɩ tɔɣɔ .

text: For the promise , that he should be the heir of the world , was not to Abraham , or to his seed , through the law , but through the righteousness of faith .
text2: Ɩsɔ ka heela Apəlaham na ɩ piya sɩ kateŋa kanɛ ka təna kaa tɛ na ká pəsɩ pa nyəm təkpataa . Ɩlɛ pə taɣa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təŋʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa heela Apəlaham kɛ mpʋ . Ama ɩ tɛmna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ taa na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ mʋ - ɩ sɩ yʋlʋpaŋ tɔɣɔ .

text: For if they which are of the law be heirs , faith is made void , and the promise made of none effect :
text2: Ye kateŋa ŋkɛ kaa tɛ na ká pəsɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təŋlaa tike nyəŋka , ɩlɛ taa tɛmnaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩɩ waasəɣɩ pʋlʋɣʋlɛ , na mpi Ɩsɔ tɔŋ sɩ ɩ ká la tɔ pəlɛ pə məla yem .

text: Because the law worketh wrath : for where no law is , there is no transgression .
text2: Kʋsəsɩɩtʋ yekina na Ɩsɔ pááná kɔŋ , na kʋsəsɩɩtʋ wɛnna na tə pəntʋɣʋ wɛɛ tɔtɔ .

text: Therefore it is of faith , that it might be by grace ; to the end the promise might be sure to all the seed ; not to that only which is of the law , but to that also which is of the faith of Abraham ; who is the father of us all ,
text2: Mpi Ɩsɔ ka sɩɩwa sɩ ɩ ká la tɔ , taa tɛmnaʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ , ɩlɛna pə ́ pəsɩ pʋlʋ mpi Ɩsɔ haa faalaa tɔ , pə taa wɛɛ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təŋlaa tike nyəm . Ama na pa təna mpa pa tɛŋ pa taa na Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teitei ɩsɩɩ Apəlaham lapʋ tɔ pa nyəm tɔtɔɣɔ . Apəlaham kɛ ́ tá təna tá caa kɛ ́ .

text: ( As it is written , I have made thee a father of many nations , ) before him whom he believed , even God , who quickeneth the dead , and calleth those things which be not as though they were .
text2: Halɩ pa ŋmaawa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Ma lapa na ń pəsɩ piitimnaa paɣalɛ caa . Ɩsɔ wei Apəlaham tɛmna ɩ taa kɛ ́ mpʋ tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ɩsɛntaa Apəlaham ɩnəɣəlɛ tá caa . Ɩsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ feesiɣina sətaa na ɩ ́ lakɩ na mpi pə taa wɛɛ tɔ pə ́ wɛɛ .

text: Who against hope believed in hope , that he might become the father of many nations ; according to that which was spoken , So shall thy seed be .
text2: Na paa na pɩɩ tɛɛ pə tɔɔ tɔ , Apəlaham tɛma - tɩ na ɩ taa na ɩ ́ tɛɛləɣɩ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ pəsa piitim paɣalɛ caa , ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ ka yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ tɔ sɩ : Nyá piya nyʋɣʋ ká wɛɛ mpʋ .

text: And being not weak in faith , he considered not his own body now dead , when he was about an hundred years old , neither yet the deadness of Sara ' s womb :
text2: Paa na ɩ pɩɩsɩ ka wʋsəna ɩsɩɩ nɩɩnʋwa ( 100 ) na ɩ ́ kpatəla təkuŋkuŋku , na Saala ná taa fɛɩ lʋlʋɣʋ tɔm taa tɔ , ɩ ta nyənna təna . Ama ɩ tisa ɩ yuŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ tɔɔ kɛ ́ tam .

text: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief ; but was strong in faith , giving glory to God ;
text2: Ɩ taa tɛm mpɩ pə ta pasa . Pəyele ɩ ta la sika na mpi Ɩsɔ tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la tɔ . Halɩ ɩ naani sɔɔsa kʋsɔɔsʋ kɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ nyɔɔ toŋ , na ɩ ́ tɔŋna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sam .

text: And being fully persuaded that , what he had promised , he was able also to perform .
text2: Ɩ ka tɛma ɩ taa təkpataa sɩ Ɩsɔ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ la pə təna mpi ɩ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la tɔ .

text: And therefore it was imputed to him for righteousness .
text2: Mpi pə tɔɔ Ɩsɔ mʋ - ɩ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ yʋlʋ kʋpaŋ kɛ ɩ taa tɛm tɔɔ tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: Now it was not written for his sake alone , that it was imputed to him ;
text2: Ɩlɛ pə taɣa ɩ nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ tike kɛ pa ŋmaa mpʋ sɩ : Pa mʋ - ɩ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ yʋlʋ kʋpaŋ .

text: But for us also , to whom it shall be imputed , if we believe on him that raised up Jesus our Lord from the dead ;
text2: Ama na tá mpa tá taa tɛmna wei ɩ kʋsa Tacaa Yesu kɛ sətaa taa na paa mʋ - tʋ sɩ kʋpama kɛ mpʋ tɔtɔ tɔ , tá tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa ŋmaawa tɔtɔ .

text: Who was delivered for our offences , and was raised again for our justification .
text2: Tá ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa kʋ - ɩ , na pa feesa - ɩ sətaa taa kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ la na tə ́ pəsɩ kʋpama kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa .

text: Therefore being justified by faith , we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Tɔʋ , ɩsɩɩ kaɣana pa tɛm lapʋ na tə ́ pəsɩ yʋlʋpama kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ tá taa tɛmnaʋ tɔɔ tɔ , tá na - ɩ tə wɛna təma na leleŋ kɛ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ .

text: By whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand , and rejoice in hope of the glory of God .
text2: Tə tɛmna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tá taa tɔɣɔ tə kpətəna Ɩsɔ kʋpantʋ təhikile kɛ Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ kɛ ́ timpi tə wɛ kaɣana kɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ . Na tə yɔɔləɣɩ kɛ ́ . Mpi tɔ , tə nyəmá sɩ tɩɩ pəsɩ Ɩsɔ teeli nyə ́ ma .

text: And not only so , but we glory in tribulations also : knowing that tribulation worketh patience ;
text2: Halɩ tá məlaa kɛ ́ na tə ́ yɔɔləɣɩ , paa tə wɛʋ wahala taa tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , wahala kɔŋna na suulu .

text: And patience , experience ; and experience , hope :
text2: Na suulu yekina na yʋlʋ kantələɣɩ wahala taa , na kantəlʋɣʋ yekina na tɛɛlʋɣʋ kɔɔ .

text: And hope maketh not ashamed ; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us .
text2: Tə tɛɛlʋɣʋ mpʋ tɔ pə ta puɣusi - tʋ se . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ wei Ɩsɔ ha - tʋ tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ lapəna na tá təna tə ́ nyɩ teu sɩ Ɩsɔ sɔɔla - tʋ .

text: For when we were yet without strength , in due time Christ died for the ungodly .
text2: Tə taa pəsəɣɩ pʋlʋ tɔ Kilisiti səpəna asaɣaa tá , tá tɔɔ kɛ ́ saa wei pə maɣa Ɩsɔ tɔ .

text: For scarcely for a righteous man will one die : yet peradventure for a good man some would even dare to die .
text2: Ama sɩ yʋlʋ ɩ ́ tisi na ɩ ́ sɩ siɣisulu tɔɔ tɔ , təcatətəyaʋ kɛ ́ . Ń ta tɩɩ nyəm nɔɣɔlʋ ná wɛɛ wei ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ sɩ yʋlʋ kʋpaŋ tɔɔ tɔ .

text: But God commendeth his love toward us , in that , while we were yet sinners , Christ died for us .
text2: Paa na mpʋ Ɩsɔ ná hʋla - tʋɣʋ ɩsəna tənaɣa ɩ sɔɔla - tʋ tɔ . Kilisiti səpa tá tɔɔ paa na tə kɛ ́ asaɣaa tɔ .

text: Much more then , being now justified by his blood , we shall be saved from wrath through him .
text2: Ɩ səm tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə pəsa yʋlʋpama kɛ kaɣanaɣa Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa , ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣa pɩɩ kpisi - tʋɣʋ yapʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ pááná niŋ taa ?

text: For if , when we were enemies , we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son , much more , being reconciled , we shall be saved by his life .
text2: Tá na Ɩsɔ tɩɩ wɛ koloŋa kɛ ́ . Ama ɩ Pəyaɣa səm taa kɛ ́ ɩ lapa na tá na - ɩ tə ́ ciiki . Tɔʋ , kaɣana tá na Ɩsɔ tə wɛ leleŋ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ Pəyaɣa ná wɛna weesuɣu tɔtɔ , ɩlɛ kaa waasɩ - tʋ na pə ́ kəlɩ mpʋ .

text: And not only so , but we also joy in God through our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom we have now received the atonement .
text2: Na pə ta tɩɩ kɛʋ pə tənaɣalɛ , tə tɔŋna Ɩsɔ ɩlɛɣɛ yɔɔlənaʋ kɛ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti wei ɩ lapa na kaɣana tá na Ɩsɔ tə ́ ciiki tɔ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: Wherefore , as by one man sin entered into the world , and death by sin ; and so death passed upon all men , for that all have sinned :
text2: Yʋlʋ kʋlʋm tənna ɩsaɣatʋ sʋʋ yəlaa təna . Ɩlɛna ɩsaɣatʋ náá kɔna səm . Na səm náá ya yəlaa təna tɔɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa təna pa lapəna ɩsaɣatʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: ( For until the law sin was in the world : but sin is not imputed when there is no law .
text2: Ɩsaɣatʋ ka tɛma antulinya taa kɛ ́ wɛɛʋ na pə ́ cɔ ́ Ɩsɔ tʋ Moisi kɛ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ . Ama ɩsɩɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa fɛɩ ɩlɛ , Ɩsɔ taa nyənɩ - tɩ ɩsɩɩ pʋlʋ .

text: Nevertheless death reigned from Adam to Moses , even over them that had not sinned after the similitude of Adam ' s transgression , who is the figure of him that was to come .
text2: Paa na mpʋ səm naa tɔɣɔ kawulaɣa kɛ pə kpaɣaʋ Atam na pə ́ polo Moisi , haləna pə ́ caŋ pə ́ kpɛŋna mpa pa taa la ɩsaɣatʋ nti Atam lapa tɔ . Ɩsɔ kʋheelitu kɛ Atam ná kpɛɛsənaa na ɩ ́ pəsɩ ɩsaɣaʋ . Atam ɩnɛ ɩnɩ ɩ nəɣəsəna wei ɩ kaa ɩ kɔɔ tɔɣɔ .

text: But not as the offence , so also is the free gift . For if through the offence of one many be dead , much more the grace of God , and the gift by grace , which is by one man , Jesus Christ , hath abounded unto many .
text2: Ama pa ta lɩɩ kʋlʋm . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mpi Ɩsɔ hawa faalaa tɔ pə faɣana ɩsaɣatʋ nti Atam lapa tɔɣɔ . Mpi tɔ , yʋlʋ kʋlʋm ɩnɛ ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɔ yəlaa paɣalɛ səpa . Ama Ɩsɔ pɛɛlɛɛ ná tema paɣalɛ na pə ́ tɛɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɔsɔm , na pə kaasɩ kʋcɔɔʋ ŋku ɩ lapa faalaa na yʋlʋ kʋlʋm Yesu Kilisiti kiŋ tɔ kʋlɛ kʋ tɔɔwa sɔsɔm tɔtɔ .

text: And not as it was by one that sinned , so is the gift : for the judgment was by one to condemnation , but the free gift is of many offences unto justification .
text2: Ama yʋlʋ kaa kpaɣa mpi Ɩsɔ kʋcɔɔʋ lakɩ tɔ na ɩ ́ maɣasəna mpi yʋlʋ kʋlʋm ɩsaɣatʋ lakɩ tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩsaɣatʋ kʋlʋmtʋ lapəna na pá hʋʋna yəlaa na pa tɔm sɩ . Ama Ɩsɔ faalaa kʋcɔɔʋ ná taɣana ɩsaɣatʋ paɣalɛ na pə ́ la teu .

text: For if by one man ' s offence death reigned by one ; much more they which receive abundance of grace and of the gift of righteousness shall reign in life by one , Jesus Christ . )
text2: Kʋlʋm ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ səm tɔɣɔ kawulaɣa mɛɛ , nn kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ tike ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ . Ama nti Yesu Kilisiti tike kɔna - tʋ tɔ təlɛ tə kəla ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɔɔʋ təcaɣacaɣa . Pə wɛɛ sɩ pa təna mpa pa hika Ɩsɔ pɛɛlɛɛ kɛ sɔsɔm sɔsɔm na ɩ ́ la na pá pəsɩ kʋpama kɛ faalaa tɔ , Kilisiti tɔɔ paa hiki weesuɣu na pá tɔɣɔ kawulaɣa .

text: Therefore as by the offence of one judgment came upon all men to condemnation ; even so by the righteousness of one the free gift came upon all men unto justification of life .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ kʋlʋm ɩsaɣatʋ sʋsa yəlaa tənaɣa tasəkəlɛ taa tɔ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ yʋlʋ kʋlʋm təmlɛ kʋpantɛ ká fiti yəlaa tənaɣa hʋʋlɛ pɔɔlɛ taa na pá tʋlɩ - tɩ .

text: For as by one man ' s disobedience many were made sinners , so by the obedience of one shall many be made righteous .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ yəlaa təna lapʋ asaɣaa kɛ yʋlʋ kʋlʋm kpɛɛsʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ yəlaa paɣalɛ ká la kʋpama kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ yʋlʋ kʋlʋm nɩɩnaʋ tɔɔ .

text: Moreover the law entered , that the offence might abound . But where sin abounded , grace did much more abound :
text2: Kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kɔmaɣa sɩ ɩsaɣatʋ ɩ ́ huki . Ama timpi ɩsaɣatʋ hukaa tɔ , Ɩsɔ pɛɛlɛɛ ná tɛɛ - təɣɩ tɔɔʋ kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: That as sin hath reigned unto death , even so might grace reign through righteousness unto eternal life by Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Na ɩsɩɩ ɩsaɣatʋ lɛɛ səm kɛ yəlaa təna tɔ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ pɛɛlɛɛ ná lɛɛ - tʋɣʋ siɣisuɣu sɩ pə ́ pona - tʋɣʋ weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ kʋ taa kɛ ́ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ .

text: What shall we say then ? Shall we continue in sin , that grace may abound ?
text2: Ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣa pə wɛɛ ɩlɛ ? Tɩɩ lakɩ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam sɩ Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ sɔɔsɩ - tʋɣʋ ɩ pɛɛlɛɛ yaa ɩsəna ?

text: God forbid . How shall we , that are dead to sin , live any longer therein ?
text2: Aaɩ , pə taɣa mpʋ se , paa pəcɔ . Tá mpa səm cɛpa - tʋ na ɩsaɣatʋ tɔ , ɩsənaɣa tɩɩ wɛɛ na tə ́ tɔŋna ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ tɔtɔ ?

text: Know ye not , that so many of us as were baptized into Jesus Christ were baptized into his death ?
text2: Ɩ ́ tá nyɩ sɩ tá təna mpa pa sɔ Ɩsɔ lʋm sɩ tá na Yesu Kilisiti tə kpɛntaa tɔ , ɩ təsətɛ kɛ pa kpɛnta - tʋ na pá sɔ - tʋ ?

text: Therefore we are buried with him by baptism into death : that like as Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father , even so we also should walk in newness of life .
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩlɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔʋ taa kɛ ́ pa pima tá na - ɩ sɩ tá na - ɩ tə səpəna . Na ɩsɩɩ Kilisiti səpa na Tacaa toma sɔsɔɔna feesi - ɩ tɔ , tá tɔtɔ tə laɣasa tɔntɛ təkpataa kɛ ́ .

text: For if we have been planted together in the likeness of his death , we shall be also in the likeness of his resurrection :
text2: Ye tá na - ɩ tə kpɛntaa na tə ́ sɩ ɩsɩɩ ɩ səpʋ tɔ , paa kpɛntɩ tá na - ɩ na pá feesi - tʋɣʋ səm taa ɩsɩɩ pa feesa ɩnɩ tɔ .

text: Knowing this , that our old man is crucified with him , that the body of sin might be destroyed , that henceforth we should not serve sin .
text2: Tə nyəmá teu sɩ kʋyaŋku Kilisiti səpa səm tesika tɔɔ tɔ , pə kpɛnna tá yaasi kʋpəŋ na pə ́ kʋ tətɔtɔtɔ . Ɩlɛna timpi tɩɩ kɛ asaɣaa na tá tɛɣɛlɛ mpʋ tɔ , pə ́ la yem na ɩ ́ hɛtɩ - tʋ , na tə taa tasa ɩsaɣatʋ yomle taa kɛ ́ wɛɛʋ .

text: For he that is dead is freed from sin .
text2: Yʋlʋ wei ɩ tɛma səpʋ tɔ pə ləsa ɩlɛɣɛ ɩsaɣatʋ yomle taa kɛ ́ .

text: Now if we be dead with Christ , we believe that we shall also live with him :
text2: Ye tá na Kilisiti tə səpa , tə nyəmá sɩ tá na - ɩ tɩɩ wɛɛna weesiŋ tɔtɔ .

text: Knowing that Christ being raised from the dead dieth no more ; death hath no more dominion over him .
text2: Tə nyəmá teu sɩ ɩsɩɩ Kilisiti fem tɔ səm ɩɩ tasəɣɩ - ɩ nyaasʋɣʋ . Pəyele ɩ kaa tɩɩ səpʋ tɔtɔ .

text: For in that he died , he died unto sin once : but in that he liveth , he liveth unto God .
text2: Tɔm kʋlʋm kɛ ɩ səpa na pə ́ cɛ ɩ ́ na ɩsaɣatʋ . Ɩ wɛʋ kaɣana na ɩ weesuɣu tɔ Ɩsɔ tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin , but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mɛ tɔtɔ ɩ ́ ká nyənɩ mə tɩ ɩsɩɩ mpa pa səpa na pə ́ cɛ pá na ɩsaɣatʋ tɔ , na ɩsɩɩ mpa pa fema sətaa taa na kaɣana pa wɛ Ɩsɔ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pá na Yesu Kilisiti pa kpɛntʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔ .

text: Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body , that ye should obey it in the lusts thereof .
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩlɛ , ɩsaɣatʋ ɩ ́ taa tasa mə tɔnəŋ kʋsəpəŋ ɩnɛɣɛ ŋmakəlʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ nɩɩna mə tɔnəŋ kʋnyɩɩləŋ .

text: Neither yield ye your members as instruments of unrighteousness unto sin : but yield yourselves unto God , as those that are alive from the dead , and your members as instruments of righteousness unto God .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa yele na ɩsaɣatʋ tasa mpaaʋ hikuɣu kɛ mə tɔnəŋ taa kɛ ́ tiili na ɩ ́ la ɩsaɣatʋ . Ama ɩ ́ ha mə təɣɩ Ɩsɔ ɩsɩɩ mpa pa fema sətaa taa tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpaɣa mə tɩ na ɩ ́ pɛtɩ Ɩsɔ təmlɛ taa na ɩ ́ lana - mɛɣɛ kʋpam .

text: For sin shall not have dominion over you : for ye are not under the law , but under grace .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pə fɛɩ ɩsɩɩ ɩsaɣatʋ ɩ ́ ŋmakəlɩ - mɛ . Mpi tɔ , pə taɣa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ wɛɛ . Ama Ɩsɔ pɛɛlɛɛ tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: What then ? shall we sin , because we are not under the law , but under grace ? God forbid .
text2: Mpʋ tɔ , tɩɩ tɔŋna ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ sɩ Ɩsɔ pɛɛlɛɛ tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə wɛɛ pə taɣa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔɔ ? Aaɩ pə taɣa mpʋ se , paa pəcɔ .

text: Know ye not , that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey , his servants ye are to whom ye obey ; whether of sin unto death , or of obedience unto righteousness ?
text2: Ɩ ́ nyəmá teu sɩ , ye ɩ ́ ha mə təɣɩ wei na ɩ ́ nɩɩkəna - ɩ , ɩ ́ pəsa wei ɩ ́ nɩɩkəna mpʋ tɔ ɩ yom kɛ ́ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ na ɩsaɣatʋ , ye n nɩɩkəna - təɣɩ tam n tɛŋna səm kɛ ́ . Na mpʋ ɩnɩ tɔtɔɣɔ pə wɛɛ na Ɩsɔ , ye n nɩɩkəna ɩlɛɣɛ tam , pə laɣasəɣɩ - ŋ tɔntɛ nte tə kɛɛsəna - ɩ tɔɣɔ .

text: But God be thanked , that ye were the servants of sin , but ye have obeyed from the heart that form of doctrine which was delivered you .
text2: Aaa , Ɩsɔ fɔɔ , mɛ mpa tuu ɩsaɣatʋ ka kpa yomle tɔ pənɛntɛ ɩ ́ nɩɩna nti pa sɛɣɛsa - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ kɛɛsəna tɔ təkpataa .

text: Being then made free from sin , ye became the servants of righteousness .
text2: Pə ləsa - mɛɣɛ ɩsaɣatʋ yomle taa , na nɔɔnɔɔ siɣisuɣu yomaa kɛ ɩ ́ pəsaa .

text: I speak after the manner of men because of the infirmity of your flesh : for as ye have yielded your members servants to uncleanness and to iniquity unto iniquity ; even so now yield your members servants to righteousness unto holiness .
text2: Mə ɩcantʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma huɣi təlɛɣɛ kʋhuɣu sɩ ɩ ́ cɛkəna . Pɩɩ wɛʋ tɔ , tɛtɛlakasɩ na ɩsaɣatʋ taa kɛ ́ ɩ ́ pɛta mə tɩ , na pəlɛ pə ́ kpa - mɛɣɛ yomle na pə ́ lakɩ - mɛɣɛ yɛlɛyɛlɛ nyə ́ ma . Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ pənɛntɛ , ɩ ́ pɛtɩ mə təɣɩ siɣisuɣu təma lapʋ taa na pəlɛ pə ́ kpa - mɛɣɛ yomle na mə tɔntɛ kɛɛsɩ teu .

text: For when ye were the servants of sin , ye were free from righteousness .
text2: Waatʋ wei ɩsaɣatʋ ka kpa - mɛɣɛ yomle tɔ , kʋpantʋ lapʋ tɔm ta na - mɛ .

text: What fruit had ye then in those things whereof ye are now ashamed ? for the end of those things is death .
text2: Na ɩ ́ lakaɣa lakasɩ nsi sɩ wɛ - mɛɣɛ fɛɛlɛ kɛ kaɣana tɔ , pepeɣe ɩ ́ waa sɩ taa ? Sɩ tɛɛsaɣana - mɛɣɛ kʋɣʋ kɛ ́ .

text: But now being made free from sin , and become servants to God , ye have your fruit unto holiness , and the end everlasting life .
text2: Ama kaɣana pə ləsa - mɛɣɛ ɩsaɣatʋ yomle taa na ɩ ́ lakɩ Ɩsɔ təmlɛ . Na mpi ɩ ́ waakɩ tɔɣɔlɛ pa tɔŋna - mɛɣɛ kɛɛsʋɣʋ sɩ mə tɔntɛ ɩ ́ te na cele ɩ ́ ká hiki weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ .

text: For the wages of sin is death ; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Ɩsaɣatʋ fɔɔtɔ kɛlɛ səm . Ama weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ ná haa faalaa kɛ mpa na Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti pa kpɛntaa tɔ .

text: Know ye not , brethren , ( for I speak to them that know the law , ) how that the law hath dominion over a man as long as he liveth ?
text2: Ma taapalaa , ntɔŋ ɩ ́ nyəmá Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kɛ teu yaa . Tɔʋ , tə maɣamaɣa tə tɔm kɛ maa kɛɛsɩ - mɛɣɛ pənɛ . Yʋlʋ weesuɣu tʋ tike niŋ kɛ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɩ tə pɛləɣɩ .

text: For the woman which hath an husband is bound by the law to her husband so long as he liveth ; but if the husband be dead , she is loosed from the law of her husband .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyənna alʋ , ɩ paalʋ ɩ ́ wɛna ɩ weesuɣu , kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɩ tɩɩ haa - ɩ mpaa sɩ ɩ ́ kʋlɩ . Ama ɩ paalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ səpa , tə ha - ɩ mpaa kɛ ́ , ɩ ́ saakɩ ɩ saa .

text: So then if , while her husband liveth , she be married to another man , she shall be called an adulteress : but if her husband be dead , she is free from that law ; so that she is no adulteress , though she be married to another man .
text2: Ɩ ́ kʋla kʋkʋlʋ na ɩ ́ saa , paa yaa - ɩ wasaŋkalɩ . Ama səm ɩ ́ kɛla ɩ paalʋ , kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ta tasa ɩ niŋ pɛlʋɣʋ tɔtɔ , tə ha - ɩ mpaa kɛ ́ . Pəlɛ tɔ , ye ɩ saa kʋfalʋ ɩ ta kɛ wasaŋkalɩ .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , ye also are become dead to the law by the body of Christ ; that ye should be married to another , even to him who is raised from the dead , that we should bring forth fruit unto God .
text2: Ma taapalaa mɛ , ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ na - mɛ tɔtɔ . Ye kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔm taa , ɩ ́ pəsa sətaa kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mə na Kilisiti ɩ ́ kpɛnta tɔnʋɣʋ , na pənɛntɛ ɩ ́ pəsa kʋfalʋ wei ɩ fema sətaa taa tɔ ɩ nyə ́ ma , na pə wɛɛ sɩ tə ́ la Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ təma nna a nəɣəsənaa tɔ .

text: For when we were in the flesh , the motions of sins , which were by the law , did work in our members to bring forth fruit unto death .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , waatʋ wei tɩɩ wɛ tá kʋpəntʋ taa tɔ , kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kpaasaɣa tá nantʋ təna taa kʋnyɩɩləŋ ɩsaɣaŋ apalʋtʋ , na pə ́ sʋsəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ səm təma lapʋ taa .

text: But now we are delivered from the law , that being dead wherein we were held ; that we should serve in newness of spirit , and not in the oldness of the letter .
text2: Ama pənɛntɛ tə lɩɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ yomle taa na səm lapəna na tə ́ lɩɩ mpi pɩɩ kpa - tʋɣʋ yomle kɛ mpʋ tɔ pə taa təkpataa . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɩɩ təŋ ɩsəna kaɣana pə laɣasaa tɔ , na tə ́ lá Ɩsɔ təmlɛ kɛ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu toŋ taa . Pə ́ taa wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ tə təŋaɣa takəlasɩ taa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ na tə ́ lakɩ tɔ .

text: What shall we say then ? Is the law sin ? God forbid . Nay , I had not known sin , but by the law : for I had not known lust , except the law had said , Thou shalt not covet .
text2: Ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣa pə wɛɛ ɩlɛ ? Kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kɛ ́ ɩsaɣam yaa ? Aaɩ pə taɣa mpʋ se , paa pəcɔ . Kʋsəsɩɩtʋ yelina na má nyɩ ɩsaɣatʋ tɔm . Kʋpam ye kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ɩ ́ taa tɔ sɩ n kaa nyɩɩlɩ , ma taa nyɩ kʋnyɩɩlʋɣʋ tɔm .

text: But sin , taking occasion by the commandment , wrought in me all manner of concupiscence . For without the law sin was dead .
text2: Kʋheelitu ntɩ tə yelina na ɩsaɣatʋ hiki mpaaʋ na tə ́ kʋ kʋnyɩɩləŋ ɩnɩ ɩ tənaɣa ma taa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye pə taa kɛ ́ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔɔ , ɩsaɣatʋ taa hiki tə tɩ .

text: For I was alive without the law once : but when the commandment came , sin revived , and I died .
text2: Ma kiŋ ɩlɛ , kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa kɔnta tɔ , ma wɛna ma tɩ . Ama kʋheelitu ntɩ tə kɔma , ɩlɛna ɩsaɣatʋ ntɩ tə ́ nyəkɩ na tə ́ kʋlɩ .

text: And the commandment , which was ordained to life , I found to be unto death .
text2: Ɩlɛna má məlɩ sətʋ . Pɩɩ wɛɛ sɩ kʋheelitu ntɩ tə ́ waasɩ . Ama ma kiŋ ɩlɛ tə məla maɣa kʋɣʋ kɛ ́ .

text: For sin , taking occasion by the commandment , deceived me , and by it slew me .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩsaɣatʋ hika mpaaʋ na tə ́ puɣusɩ - m na kʋheelitu ntɩ , na tə ́ kʋ - m na kʋheelitu ntɩ .

text: Wherefore the law is holy , and the commandment holy , and just , and good .
text2: Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ wɛ tənaŋŋ , na kʋheelitu ná wɛ tənaŋŋ tɔtɔ na tə ́ siɣisaa na tə ́ tewa .

text: Was then that which is good made death unto me ? God forbid . But sin , that it might appear sin , working death in me by that which is good ; that sin by the commandment might become exceeding sinful .
text2: Teu nyəm mpɩ pə mələna ntɛ ́ na pə ́ kɔna maɣa səm na ? Aaɩ , pə taɣa mpʋ se , paa pəcɔ . Ɩsaɣatʋ lapəna kɔkɔlɔ ɩnɩ . Tənaɣa tə kulina tə tɩ waalɩ sɩ ntəɣəlɛ ntɩ . Tə kpaɣa mpi pə wɛ teu tɔɣɔ na tə ́ kʋna - m . Tənaɣa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ yelaa na ɩsaɣatʋ tɔm la sɔɣɔntʋ na pə ́ tɛɛ caasa .

text: For we know that the law is spiritual : but I am carnal , sold under sin .
text2: Tə nyəmá mpʋ sɩ Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔkʋɣʋ wɛ lotu taa tɔm kɛ ́ . Ama maɣa yʋlʋ kɛ yʋlʋ kɛ ́ na ɩcantʋ təlɔ , na pə pɛɛta - m na ɩsaɣatʋ na má pəsɩ tə yom .

text: For that which I do I allow not : for what I would , that do I not ; but what I hate , that do I .
text2: Ma ta cɛkəna mpi ma lakɩ tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , maa lakɩ mpi ma sɔɔla lapʋ tɔ . Ama mpi ma kisaa tɔ mpəɣɩ ma lakɩ .

text: If then I do that which I would not , I consent unto the law that it is good .
text2: Ma ta sɔɔlɩ mpi na má lakɩ - wɩ tɔɣɔ ma nyəmnaa sɩ Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ wɛ teu .

text: Now then it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Ye mpʋ pə taɣa má lakəna mpʋ . Ama ɩsaɣatʋ nti tə wɛ ma taa tɔ təlɛ tə lakəna .

text: For I know that in me ( that is , in my flesh , ) dwelleth no good thing : for to will is present with me ; but how to perform that which is good I find not .
text2: Ma nyəmá teu sɩ kʋpantʋ natəlɩ tə fɛɩ ma kiŋ , ma pilimile tənɛ tə tɔm kɛ ma tɔŋ . Kʋpam paa ma luɣu wɛ teu sɩ má la kʋpantʋ , maa pəsəɣɩ tə lapʋ .

text: For the good that I would I do not : but the evil which I would not , that I do .
text2: Maa lakɩ kʋpantʋ nti ma sɔɔlaa tɔ . Ama ɩsaɣatʋ nti ma kisaa tɔ ntəɣɩ ma məlaa na má lakɩ .

text: Now if I do that I would not , it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Ma lakɩ nti maa caa tɔ , pə taɣa má nɔkəna . Ama ɩsaɣatʋ nti tə kanta ma taa tɔ ntɩ tə tənna mpʋ .

text: I find then a law , that , when I would do good , evil is present with me .
text2: Ma cɛkəna yaasi ɩnɛ sɩ ye ma caakɩ kʋpantʋ lapʋ ɩsaɣatʋ tɛɛna nɔɣɔ .

text: For I delight in the law of God after the inward man :
text2: Hatuu ma lotu taa ma sɔɔla Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ mɛɛ .

text: But I see another law in my members , warring against the law of my mind , and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members .
text2: Ama ma maɣana yaasi nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ ma tɔnʋɣʋ taa , na tam ɩ pɛkələɣɩ na ɩ ́ yoona yaasi wei ɩ tɔɔ ma laɣatʋ nyəmá tɔ , na ɩ ́ la - m ɩsaɣatʋ tiipile nte tə kanta ma taa tɔ tə saləka tʋ .

text: O wretched man that I am ! who shall deliver me from the body of this death ?
text2: Ama ma tɔm wɛ kʋnyɔŋ yoo , tɔnʋɣʋ kʋnɛ kʋ tɔŋna - m kʋɣʋ kɛ ́ . A yakɩ - m ?

text: I thank God through Jesus Christ our Lord . So then with the mind I myself serve the law of God ; but with the flesh the law of sin .
text2: Ama Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ Ɩsɔ fɔɔ . Mpʋ tɔ , hatuu ma hʋwɛɛ taa Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kɛ ma təŋəɣɩ . Pə kaasa ma yʋlʋtʋ pilimile tənɛ tɔ , ɩsaɣatʋ yaasi kɛ təlɛ tə təŋəɣɩ .

text: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Ye mpʋ mpa na Yesu Kilisiti pa kpɛntaa tɔ pa kaa tasa pa tɔm kɛ kʋɣʋ .

text: For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu lakɩ ɩsəna na ɩ ́ haa weesuɣu kɛ mpa na Yesu Kilisiti pa kpɛntaa tɔ , ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa na pə ́ ləsɩ - m ɩsaɣatʋ na səm pə yaasi ɩnɩ ɩ taa .

text: For what the law could not do , in that it was weak through the flesh , God sending his own Son in the likeness of sinful flesh , and for sin , condemned sin in the flesh :
text2: Ɩsɔ lapa mpi Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa pəsɩ na tə ́ la yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ tɔɔ tɔ . Ɩ hʋla yəlaa tasəkəlɛ kɛ timpi pa lakɩ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ tam tɔ , mpi tɔ ɩ tila ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ pu . Na wɛɛtʋ nti tə nəɣəsəna yəlaa asaɣaa nyəntʋ tɔɣɔ ɩ kɔmnaa sɩ ɩ ́ hɩɩsɩ ɩsaɣatʋ .

text: That the righteousness of the law might be fulfilled in us , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Ɩsɔ lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ nti kʋsəsɩɩtʋ caalaɣaa - tʋ sɩ tə ́ la tɔ , tə la pə tənaɣa teitei . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , kaɣana tə yela tá wɛɛtʋ kʋpəntʋ təŋʋɣʋ na tə ́ təŋəɣɩ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu .

text: For they that are after the flesh do mind the things of the flesh ; but they that are after the Spirit the things of the Spirit .
text2: Mpa pa tɔŋna tɔntɛ kɛ yʋlʋ wɛɛtʋ kʋpəntʋ taa tɔ tə tike tə tɔm kɛ pa nyəmá . Na mpa pa təŋəɣɩ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu tɔ kʋlɛ kʋ nyəntʋ tike kɛ pa lakɩ .

text: For to be carnally minded is death ; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace .
text2: Ye n təŋəɣɩ yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ kʋpəntʋ kɛ tam , n tɛɛsəɣəna səm kɛ ́ . Ama ye Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu nyəntʋ kɛ n lakɩ tam , n hikiɣi weesuɣu na laŋhɛɛlɛ kɛ ́ .

text: Because the carnal mind is enmity against God : for it is not subject to the law of God , neither indeed can be .
text2: Mpa pa sɛɛsa ɩsəlɛ na yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ kʋpəntʋ təŋʋɣʋ tɔ , pa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kolontunaa kɛ ́ . Paa təŋəɣɩ Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ , paa tɩɩ pəsəɣɩ - tɩ tɔ se .

text: So then they that are in the flesh cannot please God .
text2: Mpa pa tɔŋna pa yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ kʋpəntʋ təŋʋɣʋ tɔ , paa pɩɩ la ɩsəna , pa kaa te Ɩsɔ .

text: But ye are not in the flesh , but in the Spirit , if so be that the Spirit of God dwell in you . Now if any man have not the Spirit of Christ , he is none of his .
text2: Ama mɛ ɩlɛ mə fɛɩ yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ kʋpəntʋ taa tɔtɔ . Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu nyəntʋ taa kɛ ́ ɩ ́ wɛɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu caɣa mə taa tɔ se . Wei ɩ taa Kilisiti Feesuɣu fɛɩ tɔ ɩ ta kɛ ɩ nyəŋ .

text: And if Christ be in you , the body is dead because of sin ; but the Spirit is life because of righteousness .
text2: Ye Kilisiti wɛ mə kiŋ paa na mə ɩsaɣatʋ ka kʋ mə tɔnəŋ tɔ , Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu wɛ mə taa na toma . Mpi tɔ pə pəsa - mɛɣɛ kʋpama kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ .

text: But if the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you , he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you .
text2: Ye Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu ŋku kʋ feesa Yesu kɛ ́ sətaa taa tɔ kʋ caɣa mə taa , wei ɩnɩ ɩ ka feesa Kilisiti kɛ sətaa hɛkʋ tɔ , kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ ká ha mə tɔnəŋ kʋsəpəŋ ɩnɛɣɛ toma na ɩ Feesuɣu ŋku kʋ caɣa mə taa tɔ kʋ toŋ taa .

text: Therefore , brethren , we are debtors , not to the flesh , to live after the flesh .
text2: Ma taapalaa , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə nyəka - tʋ , na pə taɣa sɩ tə ́ təŋ tá yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ kʋpəntʋ na tə ́ lakɩ nti tə nyɩɩləɣɩ tɔ .

text: For if ye live after the flesh , ye shall die : but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body , ye shall live .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ mə yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ kʋpəntʋ , ɩ ́ ká sɩ . Ama ye ɩ ́ kisa mə yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ kʋpəntʋ yaasi sɩ tə ́ saalɩ na Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toŋ , ɩlɛ ɩ ́ tʋla - tɩ .

text: For as many as are led by the Spirit of God , they are the sons of God .
text2: Pa təna mpa Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu tiikiɣi tɔ pa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ piya kɛ ́ .

text: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear ; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption , whereby we cry , Abba , Father .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu ŋku pa ha - mɛ tɔ kʋ ta kɛ Feesuɣu ŋku kʋ lakɩ - mɛɣɛ yomaa na kʋ ́ tasəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ sɔɣɔntʋ tʋɣʋ tɔ . Ama kʋ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu ŋku kʋ lakɩ - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ pəyalaa na kʋ lakɩ na ɩ ́ yaakɩ Ɩsɔ sɩ ma Caa , Paapa tɔ .

text: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit , that we are the children of God :
text2: Tə kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ piya , na Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu maɣamaɣa hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ hatuu tá taa .

text: And if children , then heirs ; heirs of God , and joint - heirs with Christ ; if so be that we suffer with him , that we may be also glorified together .
text2: Tə kɛ ́ ɩ piya , na kʋpantʋ nti Ɩsɔ tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha ɩ yəlaa ɩsɩɩ kpancoou tɔ , tɩɩ hiki - tɩ tɔtɔ . Tá na Kilisiti tɩɩ kpɛntəna - təɣɩ hikuɣu . Ye tá na - ɩ tə kpɛnta wahala hikuɣu tá na - ɩ tɩɩ kpɛntɩ ɩ teeli taa tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us .
text2: Ye ma kiŋ pə fɛɩ ɩsɩɩ paa kpaɣa tá kaɣana kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛ na pá kɛɛsəna teeli wei cele Ɩsɔ ká tʋ - tʋ tɔ .

text: For the earnest expectation of the creature waiteth for the manifestation of the sons of God .
text2: Kʋŋmaŋmam təna taŋaa tətɛɣɛtɛɣɛ sɩ Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ ləsɩ ɩ pəyalaa na pə ́ ná .

text: For the creature was made subject to vanity , not willingly , but by reason of him who hath subjected the same in hope ,
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , taaləm nyəm taa kɛ ́ pə sʋsa kʋŋmaŋmam mpɩ , na pə taɣa sɩ pə nɔkaa . Ɩsɔ tʋna - wəɣɩ mpʋ . Paa na mpʋ tɔ na tɛɛlʋɣʋ wɛɛ kɛ ́ .

text: Because the creature itself also shall be delivered from the bondage of corruption into the glorious liberty of the children of God .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , kʋyakʋ nakʋlɩ pɩɩ tɛ na Ɩsɔ kʋŋmaŋmam təna hɛɛsɩ wakəlʋɣʋ yomle na pə te təkpataa kɛ ́ teitei ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ piya ka te waatʋ wei paa tɛ kasaɣampiya pəsʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: For we know that the whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now .
text2: Tə nyəmá sɩ haləna saŋa kʋŋmaŋmam təna tɔŋna mɔla na pə ́ saləməɣɩ ɩsɩɩ alʋllʋ saləmʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: And not only they , but ourselves also , which have the firstfruits of the Spirit , even we ourselves groan within ourselves , waiting for the adoption , to wit , the redemption of our body .
text2: Pə taɣa kʋŋmaŋmam tike mɔləɣəna . Ama na tá mpa tə wɛna Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu ɩsɩɩ kancaalaɣa kʋcɔɔʋ ŋku Ɩsɔ lapa - tʋ tɔ , tá mɔləɣɩ tá taa tɔtɔ , na tə ́ taŋa kʋyaŋku Ɩsɔ ká pəsɩ - tʋɣʋ ɩ piya na ɩ ́ tɛɛsɩ tá tɔnəŋ ɩnɛɣɛ yapʋ təkpataa tɔ .

text: For we are saved by hope : but hope that is seen is not hope : for what a man seeth , why doth he yet hope for ?
text2: Tə nawa sɩ tə hika tá yapʋ yaa , ɩlɛ pə wɛ tɛɛlʋɣʋ taa tɔm na pə ́ cɔ ́ . Ye mpi yʋlʋ naa tɔ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ tɛɛləɣɩ , ɩlɛ pə taɣa tɛɛlʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ təna . Awe ká tasa tɛɛlʋɣʋ kɛ mpi ɩ tɛma naʋ tɔ ?

text: But if we hope for that we see not , then do we with patience wait for it .
text2: Ye mpi tə ta nata tɔ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə tɛɛləɣɩ ɩlɛ tə caɣana suulu kɛ ́ na tə ́ taŋa - wɩ .

text: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities : for we know not what we should pray for as we ought : but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered .
text2: Pə kaasa Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu ná kɔŋ tɔtɔ na kʋ ́ səŋna tá mpa tə kɛ ́ acamaa tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , tə ta nyɩ ɩsəna tɩɩ sələmɩ na pə ́ té tɔ . Ama Feesuɣu ŋkʋ kʋ sələməɣənana - tʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ , na miituɣu mpi yʋlʋ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ nɔɣɔ taa tɔ .

text: And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit , because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God .
text2: Ɩsɔ wei ɩ naa lotu taa tɔ ɩ nyəmá kpakpaa kɛ mpi Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ caa ɩ sələmɩ tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , mpa pa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ nyə ́ ma tɔ mpɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ sələməɣəna teitei ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ caakɩ tɔ .

text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God , to them who are the called according to his purpose .
text2: Tə nyəmá sɩ kʋpantʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ lakɩ pə təna pə taa kɛ ́ mpa pa sɔɔla - ɩ na pá kɛ ́ mpa ɩ yaawa ɩsɩɩ ɩ nɔkʋɣʋ wɛɛ tɔ .

text: For whom he did foreknow , he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son , that he might be the firstborn among many brethren .
text2: Mpa Ɩsɔ ka ləsa hatuu lɔŋ tɔ , ɩ laalaa kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ faɣasɩ - wɛ na pa mpaa sɩ pá nəɣəsəna ɩ Pəyaɣa , na kɛlɛ ká hiki newaa paɣalɛ .

text: Moreover whom he did predestinate , them he also called : and whom he called , them he also justified : and whom he justified , them he also glorified .
text2: Mpa Ɩsɔ ka laalaa na ɩ ́ faɣasɩ mpʋ tɔ ɩ ləsa - wɛɣɛ , na mpa ɩnɩ ɩ ləsa mpʋ tɔɣɔ ɩ lapa na pá pəsɩ yʋlʋpama kɛ ɩ ɩsɛntaa . Mpa ɩ lapa na pá pəsɩ yʋlʋpama kɛ mpʋ ɩnɩ tɔɣɔ ɩ yelaa na pá hiki pa paa nyəm kɛ ɩ teeli taa tɔtɔ .

text: What shall we then say to these things ? If God be for us , who can be against us ?
text2: Ye mpʋ suweɣe tɩɩ tasa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ tɔtɔ ? Ye pə wɛɛ sɩ Ɩsɔ wɛ tá tɔɔ , ɩlɛ awe ká lɩɩ - tʋɣʋ koloŋa ?

text: He that spared not his own Son , but delivered him up for us all , how shall he not with him also freely give us all things ?
text2: Ɩ ta kisina ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ Pəyaɣa tɔɔ . Ama ɩ ha - kɛ təkpem kɛ ́ tá təna tá tɔɔ . Tɔʋ , ɩ ta kisi ɩ Pəyaɣa haʋ , kacaŋfana pə təna mpi pə kaasaa tɔ ?

text: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God ' s elect ? It is God that justifieth .
text2: Ye mpʋ awe ká tʋ taalɩ kɛ ́ mpa Ɩsɔ ləsaa tɔ ? Pə tʋ fɛɩ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ maɣamaɣa hʋləna sɩ pa tɔm ta sɩ tiili .

text: Who is he that condemneth ? It is Christ that died , yea rather , that is risen again , who is even at the right hand of God , who also maketh intercession for us .
text2: Na awe ká maɣasɩ pa tɔm kʋɣʋ tɔtɔ ? Pə tʋ fɛɩ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Yesu Kilisiti tɩɩ səpəna , na ɩ ́ tɩɩ fem na ɩ ́ wɛ Ɩsɔ kɔŋkɔŋ taa na ɩ ́ sələməɣəna - tʋ .

text: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ ? shall tribulation , or distress , or persecution , or famine , or nakedness , or peril , or sword ?
text2: Ɩlɛ pepe ká ləsɩ Kilisiti sɔɔlʋɣʋ kɛ tá tɔɔ ? Wahala ká pəsɩ ? Laŋpəsəlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ na ? Yaa kʋnyɔŋ ŋku paa tʋ - tʋ tɔ ? Nyɔɣɔsɩ na ? Yaa hʋlʋməŋ ? Asola taa wɛɛʋ na ? Yaa səm ?

text: As it is written , For thy sake we are killed all the day long ; we are accounted as sheep for the slaughter .
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa pa ŋmaawa mpʋ sɩ : Nyá tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə wɛ səm nɔɣɔ taa kɛ ́ ilim na pə tɛm . Na pá lakɩ - tʋ ɩsɩɩ heeŋ wei pa tɛɛna alʋkisam tɔ .

text: Nay , in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us .
text2: Ama pə təna pə taa kɛ ́ mpʋ ɩlɛ , tá wɔpəna təcaɣacaɣa kɛ wei ɩ sɔɔla - tʋ tɔ ɩ toŋ tɔɔ .

text: For I am persuaded , that neither death , nor life , nor angels , nor principalities , nor powers , nor things present , nor things to come ,
text2: Ma tɛma ma taa təkpataa sɩ pʋlʋpʋ fɛɩ mpi pɩɩ ləsɩ Ɩsɔ sɔɔlʋɣʋ kɛ tá tɔɔ tɔ , paa səm paa weesuɣu , paa ɩsɔtaa tillaa , paa ɩsɔtaa alɔɣaa nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma yaa pa toma sɔsɔɔna . Paa saŋa nyəm , paa mpi pɩɩ kɔɔ cele tɔ .

text: Nor height , nor depth , nor any other creature , shall be able to separate us from the love of God , which is in Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: Paa tɛtʋ tɔɔ cənɛ kɔkɔlɔnaa , paa tɛtʋ tɛɛ nyə ́ ma . Paa kʋŋmaŋmam mpi pə kaasaa tɔ pə taa pʋlʋ kaɩ fɛɩ mpi pɩɩ kaɣatɩ sɔɔlʋɣʋ ŋku Ɩsɔ sɔɔləna - tʋɣʋ Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ tɔ na kʋ ́ sɛkɩ tá kiŋ kɛ tatɛ kɛ paa waatʋ wei .

text: I say the truth in Christ , I lie not , my conscience also bearing me witness in the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Tampana kɛ ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ , maa looliɣi , ma kɛ ́ Kilisiti yʋlʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ . Ma laŋlɛ ɩɩ tɔɔ paa pəcɔ maɣamaɣa sɩ yaa ma looliɣi . Mpi tɔ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ - m mpiɣi ma taa tɔɣɔ ma təŋəɣɩ .

text: That I have great heaviness and continual sorrow in my heart .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ma laŋlɛ wakəla sɔsɔm na pə ́ cɔɔsəɣɩ - m tam .

text: For I could wish that myself were accursed from Christ for my brethren , my kinsmen according to the flesh :
text2: Halɩ pə caɣa - m ɩsɩɩ pɩɩ kisaɣa , Ɩsɔ ka kisa - m na pə ́ yasɩ má na Kilisiti , na pə ́ kpaɣa ma tɛɛtʋnaa na pə ́ məŋna ma lonte . Ma piitim maɣamaɣa nyə ́ ma tɔm kɛ ma tɔŋ .

text: Who are Israelites ; to whom pertaineth the adoption , and the glory , and the covenants , and the giving of the law , and the service of God , and the promises ;
text2: Pa kɛ ́ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma , na Ɩsɔ lapa - wɛɣɛ ɩ pəyalaa , na ɩ yelaa na pá naakɩ ɩ teeli . Ɩ ́ na - wɛ pa pɛɛla nɔɣɔ , na ɩ ́ cɛlɛ - wɛɣɛ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ . Na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛtʋ , na ɩ ́ heeli - wɛɣɛ mpi mpi ɩ ká la - wɛ tɔ .

text: Whose are the fathers , and of whom as concerning the flesh Christ came , who is over all , God blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: Pa kɛ ́ tá kite caanaa kʋlʋlaa . Ye yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ tɔm taa ɩlɛ , Kilisiti kɛ ́ pa piitim tʋ . Ɩnɩ ɩ ŋmakələna pə təna , ɩnɩ ɩ kɛna Ɩsɔ wei paa saŋ tam tɔ . Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ yele na pə ́ la mpʋ .

text: Not as though the word of God hath taken none effect . For they are not all Israel , which are of Israel :
text2: Pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ sɩ mpi Ɩsɔ tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la tɔ pə cotaa . Pə taɣa Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma təna kɛna Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma .

text: Neither , because they are the seed of Abraham , are they all children : but , In Isaac shall thy seed be called .
text2: Pəyele Apəlaham kʋlʋlaa ta kɛ Apəlaham piya maɣamaɣa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ ka heela - ɩ kɛ ́ sɩ : Mpa paa lɩɩna Ɩsaaka tapʋɣʋ tɛɛ tɔ mpɛ pa tike təkoŋ kɛna nyá piya təsiɣisiɣi .

text: That is , They which are the children of the flesh , these are not the children of God : but the children of the promise are counted for the seed .
text2: Pə nyʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ , pə taɣa mpa pa mɔlaa na pá lʋlɩ təfolo kɛ yem tɔ mpɛ pa kɛna Ɩsɔ piya . Ama mpa Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ka ha - ɩ na pá lʋlɩ - wɛ tɔ mpɛɣɛ pa nyənəɣɩ ɩ kʋlʋlaa təsiɣisiɣi .

text: For this is the word of promise , At this time will I come , and Sara shall have a son .
text2: Waatʋ wei ɩ heelaɣa - ɩ mpi ɩ ka lapɩ - ɩ tɔ ɩ tɔmaɣa sɩ : Ye pə kɔma na pə ́ talaa , maa məlɩ na Saala ká hiki apalʋ pəyaɣa .

text: And not only this ; but when Rebecca also had conceived by one , even by our father Isaac ;
text2: Pə taɣa pə tənaɣalɛ . Lɛpɛka piya nsɩ sɩ naalɛ sɩ kaa caa kɛ ́ . Ɩnəɣəlɛ tá piitim caa sɔsɔ Ɩsaaka .

text: ( For the children being not yet born , neither having done any good or evil , that the purpose of God according to election might stand , not of works , but of him that calleth ; )
text2: Ɩsɔ ləsʋɣʋʋ yəlaa tɔ , pə taɣa sɩ ɩ nyənəɣəna mpi pa lakɩ tɔ , ama ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ nɔkʋɣʋ kiŋ kɛ pə wɛɛ .

text: It was said unto her , The elder shall serve the younger .
text2: Ɩsɔ heela Lɛpɛka na ɩ ́ ta tɩɩ lʋləta ɩ piya sɩ : Waalɩ nyəŋka ká tɔɣɔna sɔsɔɔntʋ . Piya nsɩ sɩ ta nyənta kʋpantʋ na ɩsaɣatʋ . Ɩsɔ lapa mpʋ sɩ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ mpi ɩ sɩɩwa tɔ , mpəɣɩ ɩ təŋəɣɩ .

text: As it is written , Jacob have I loved , but Esau have I hated .
text2: Halɩ pa ŋmaawa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Ma luɣu lapa Yakɔpʋ na má kisi Ɩsaʋ .

text: What shall we say then ? Is there unrighteousness with God ? God forbid .
text2: Suweɣelɛ tɩɩ yɔɣɔtɩ ɩlɛ , Ɩsɔ ɩɩ təŋəɣɩ tampana yaa ɩsəna ? Aaɩ , pə taɣa mpʋ se , paa pəcɔ .

text: For he saith to Moses , I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy , and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion .
text2: Ɩsɔ ka heela Moisi sɩ : Má nɔka wei ɩ pətɔɔtəlɛ wiiu ma wii , má nɔka wei kɛ ́ suulu hʋ ́ lʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ma hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - ɩ .

text: So then it is not of him that willeth , nor of him that runneth , but of God that sheweth mercy .
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩlɛ pə taɣa yʋlʋ nɔkʋɣʋ yaa ɩ lʋpʋ tɔɔ . Ama Ɩsɔ wei ɩ wiiki pətɔɔtəlɛ tɔ ɩ kiŋ tike kɛ ́ təkoŋ .

text: For the scripture saith unto Pharaoh , Even for this same purpose have I raised thee up , that I might shew my power in thee , and that my name might be declared throughout all the earth .
text2: Pa tɔma Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ Ɩsɔ tɔma Icipiti wulaʋ sɔsɔ təfoo sɩ : Mpi pə maɣamaɣa pə nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ ma tʋ - ŋ kawulaɣa tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ yəlaa ɩ ́ nana ma toma kɛ nyá kiŋ , na ma hətɛ yaa antulinya təna taa .

text: Therefore hath he mercy on whom he will have mercy , and whom he will he hardeneth .
text2: Mpʋ tɔ , wei Ɩsɔ nɔkaa tɔ pʋntʋ pətɔɔtəlɛ kɛ ɩ wiiki . Ye ɩ nɔka wei kɛ ́ kaŋkantɛ tʋɣʋ ɩ tʋ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ .

text: Thou wilt say then unto me , Why doth he yet find fault ? For who hath resisted his will ?
text2: Ntanyɩ mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ ná tɔŋ sɩ : Ye pə wɛ mpʋ ɩlɛ , pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ tasəɣɩ sɩ yəlaa lapa taalɩ ? Awe pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ kaɣatɩ - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ taa la ɩ luɣu nyəntʋ ?

text: Nay but , O man , who art thou that repliest against God ? Shall the thing formed say to him that formed it , Why hast thou made me thus ?
text2: Yʋlʋ nyá , awe kɛ - ŋ na ń kpɛɛsəna Ɩsɔ ? Cʋɣʋ nyənaɣa pəsəɣɩ na ká pɔɔsɩ ka ŋmalʋ sɩ pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ n ŋma - m na má wɛ ɩsəntɔ ?

text: Hath not the potter power over the clay , of the same lump to make one vessel unto honour , and another unto dishonour ?
text2: Tiisi ŋmalʋ ɩ ́ sɔɔləna cʋɣʋ kɛ ɩsəna ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ lakɩ - kʋ . Ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ cosi cʋɣʋ ŋkʋ , na ɩ ́ sɔɔlaa ɩ ŋmana puluku , na pə ́ kaasɩ na ɩ ́ ŋmana ntoole .

text: What if God , willing to shew his wrath , and to make his power known , endured with much longsuffering the vessels of wrath fitted to destruction :
text2: Ɩsɔ kʋlapʋtʋ wɛ yɔɣɔtaɣa tɔtɔ ? Ɩ sɔɔlaa kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ ɩ pááná na yəlaa nyɩ ɩ toma . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ tɔkəna suulu kɛ mpa pa nəɣəsəna ɩ ́ mʋna pááná na ɩ ́ wakəlɩ tɔ .

text: And that he might make known the riches of his glory on the vessels of mercy , which he had afore prepared unto glory ,
text2: Ɩsɔ sɔɔlaa sɩ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ ɩsəna ɩ teeli tɔɔwa tá mpa ɩ hʋla suulu na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ sɩ ɩ ́ tʋ ɩ teeli ɩnɩ tɔ tá kiŋ .

text: Even us , whom he hath called , not of the Jews only , but also of the Gentiles ?
text2: Taɣalɛ mpa ɩ ləsaa tɔ , ɩlɛ pə taɣa Yuta nyə ́ ma tá tá tike kɛ ɩ ləsaa . Ama na piitim lɛmpɩ nyə ́ ma taa tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: As he saith also in Osee , I will call them my people , which were not my people ; and her beloved , which was not beloved .
text2: Ntəɣɩ ɩ yɔɣɔta Osee takəlaɣa taa sɩ : Yəlaa mpa pa taa kɛ ́ ma nyə ́ ma tɔ , maa yaa - wɛɣɛ ma yəlaa . Na piitim mpi ma taa sɔɔlɩ tɔ , maa yaa - wɩ sɩ ma luɣu tɛɛ nyəm .

text: And it shall come to pass , that in the place where it was said unto them , Ye are not my people ; there shall they be called the children of the living God .
text2: Timpi paa tɔŋaɣa sɩ ɩ ́ tá kɛ ́ ma yəlaa tɔ , tənɛ ɩnɩ maɣamaɣa kɛ paa yaa - mɛ sɩ Ɩsɔ weesuɣu tʋ piya .

text: Esaias also crieth concerning Israel , Though the number of the children of Israel be as the sand of the sea , a remnant shall be saved :
text2: Ɩsayii ná yɔɣɔta Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ piitim tɔɔ tɔtɔ sɩ : Paa Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ piitim yəlaa paɣalɛ ká tala ɩsɩɩ teŋku nɔɣɔ kanyəŋa pee , pa taa yəlaa picinciim nyɔɔŋ kɛ paa ya .

text: For he will finish the work , and cut it short in righteousness : because a short work will the Lord make upon the earth .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Tacaa ká tɛɛsɩ lapʋ təkpataa kɛ ́ lɔŋ kɛ yəlaa təna kiŋ kɛ mpi ɩ ka yɔɣɔtaa tɔ .

text: And as Esaias said before , Except the Lord of Sabaoth had left us a seed , we had been as Sodoma , and been made like unto Gomorrha .
text2: Na Ɩsayii kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ ka tɛma yɔɣɔtaɣa kɛ mpʋ sɩ : Ye Tacaa pə təna pə tʋ ɩ ́ taa kaasɩ - tʋɣʋ piitim kɛ pəcɔɣɔ mpʋ , tɩɩ tɛɛsəna lapʋ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ Sɔtɔm nyə ́ ma , tɩɩ nəɣəsəna Kɔmɔɔ nyə ́ ma .

text: What shall we say then ? That the Gentiles , which followed not after righteousness , have attained to righteousness , even the righteousness which is of faith .
text2: Tə yɔɣɔtɩ suwe tɔtɔ yee ? Yəlaa mpa pɛlɛ pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma na pa taa pɛɛkəɣɩ sɩ pá te Ɩsɔ tɔ pa taa tɛmnaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ tɔɔ pa pəsa kʋpama kɛ ɩ ɩsɛntaa .

text: But Israel , which followed after the law of righteousness , hath not attained to the law of righteousness .
text2: Ama Yuta piitim yəlaa mpa paa paasaɣana kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təŋʋɣʋ , sɩ ntɩ tɩɩ yelina na pá la kʋpama kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa tɔ , pa wɩɩ pə tɔm .
