text: Wherefore ? Because they sought it not by faith , but as it were by the works of the law . For they stumbled at that stumblingstone ;
text2: Pepe tɔɔ kɛlɛ mpʋ ? Mpi pə tɔɔ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ pa ta pɛɛkɩ sɩ pa taa tɛm tɔɔ kɛ ́ paa te Ɩsɔ . Ama pa hʋʋkaɣa sɩ pa kʋlapʋtʋ ká yelina na pá te - ɩ . Mpʋ pə lapəna na pá yoona pəlɛ kʋcopəle .

text: As it is written , Behold , I lay in Sion a stumblingstone and rock of offence : and whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ pəlɛ ntɛ ́ tə tɔm sɩ : Ɩ nyənɩ , ma sɩɩ pəlɛ kʋcopəle kɛ Siyɔŋ . Kʋkpamʋɣʋ ŋku kʋ huɣi tɔ . Ama wei ɩ ́ tɛma - ɩ na ɩ taa ɩ kaa kɔɔ ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ maa nyəmá .

text: Brethren , my heart ' s desire and prayer to God for Israel is , that they might be saved .
text2: Ma taapalaa , nti ma luɣu sʋʋ katatəlaɣa na má sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tə tɔɔ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ , pə ́ ya Yuta nyə ́ ma nyʋɣʋ .

text: For I bear them record that they have a zeal of God , but not according to knowledge .
text2: Ama pɔpɔtʋ fɛɩ , ma pəsəɣɩ má ləsɩ pa nyɩɩlʋɣʋ sɩ pa sɛɛsa ɩsəlɛ na Ɩsɔ Tɔm kɛ teu yaa , ɩlɛ nyəm laŋna - wɛ .

text: For they being ignorant of God ' s righteousness , and going about to establish their own righteousness , have not submitted themselves unto the righteousness of God .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pa ta cɛkəna ɩsəna Ɩsɔ lakɩ na yəlaa pəsəɣɩ kʋpama kɛ ɩ ɩsɛntaa tɔ . Ɩlɛna pá luna pa maɣamaɣa pa laɣatʋ kɛ mpaaʋ ŋku paa təŋ na pá lá kʋpama tɔ . Na pá kisi sɩ pa kaa pasa pa tɩ na pá təŋ ɩsəna Ɩsɔ lakɩ na yəlaa pəsəɣɩ kʋpama tɔ .

text: For Christ is the end of the law for righteousness to every one that believeth .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Kilisiti sɩɩna Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tənaɣa sɩ pa təna mpa paa tɛmɩ - ɩ na pa taa tɔ pá pəsɩ kʋpama kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa .

text: For Moses describeth the righteousness which is of the law , That the man which doeth those things shall live by them .
text2: Moisi kɛɛsa takəlasɩ taa kɛ ́ ɩsəna pə siɣisuɣu yʋlʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təŋʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔ sɩ : Yʋlʋ wei ɩ təŋa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔ , tə tɔɔ ɩ ká tʋlɩ - tɩ .

text: But the righteousness which is of faith speaketh on this wise , Say not in thine heart , Who shall ascend into heaven ? ( that is , to bring Christ down from above : )
text2: Ama pa tasa lɛntɩ kɛ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ kɛ ɩsəna pə siɣisuɣu yʋlʋ kɛ ɩ tɛmna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ taa tɔ pə tɔɔ sɩ : Taa hʋʋ nyá taa sɩ na awe náá kpana ntɛɣɛ ɩsɔtaa ɩlɛ ? Pə hʋwɛɛ wɛɛ sɩ , awe ká tisi - tʋɣʋ Kilisiti ?

text: Or , Who shall descend into the deep ? ( that is , to bring up Christ again from the dead . )
text2: Pəyele taa tɩɩ hʋʋ tɔtɔ sɩ : Na awe ká sʋʋna ntɛɣɛ tɛtʋ tɛɛ nyə ́ ma kiŋ ? Na təlɛ tə hʋwɛɛ wɛɛ sɩ , awe ká feesi - tʋɣʋ Kilisiti kɛ səm taa ?

text: But what saith it ? The word is nigh thee , even in thy mouth , and in thy heart : that is , the word of faith , which we preach ;
text2: Ɩlɛ pə tɩɩ yɔɣɔtaa suwe təkpem ? Pə yɔɣɔtaa kɛ ́ sɩ : Pə tɔm wɛ nyá tɛɛ nyá tɛɛ tənɛ ɩnəɣɩ , haləna tə wɛ nyá nɔɣɔ taa na nyá lotu taa kɛ ́ . Na tə maɣamaɣa kɛlɛ sɩ tə ́ tɛ tá taa na Ɩsɔ , ɩsɩɩ tə lakʋɣʋ waasʋ tɔ .

text: That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus , and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead , thou shalt be saved .
text2: Ye n tisina nyá nɔɣɔ kɛ yəlaa təna ɩsɛntaa sɩ Yesu kɛlɛ Tacaa , na ń tɛ nyá taa kɛ ́ kʋpam sɩ Ɩsɔ feesa - ɩ waatʋ wei ɩ səpa tɔ , pɩɩ ya nyá nyʋɣʋ .

text: For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness ; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , yʋlʋ tɛŋ ɩ taa kɛ ́ ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ la na ɩ ́ pəsɩ yʋlʋpaŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa . Ɩ ́ tisina ɩ nɔɣɔ , aaɩ , pə yapa ɩ nyʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ mpʋ .

text: For the scripture saith , Whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Kʋpam Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa pa yɔɣɔta mpʋ sɩ : Yʋlʋ wei ɩ ́ tɛma ɩ taa na Ɩsɔ , ɩ kaa kɔɔ ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ maa nyəmá .

text: For there is no difference between the Jew and the Greek : for the same Lord over all is rich unto all that call upon him .
text2: Mpʋ tɔ pə fɛɩ sɩ Yuta tʋ ntɔ , aaɩ , pə taɣa Yuta tʋ ntɔ . Pa təna pa Sɔsɔ ntɛ ́ kʋlʋm ɩnɩ , na ɩ ́ lakɩ kʋpantʋ kɛ pa təna mpa pa wiikina - ɩ tɔ .

text: For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ : Wei ɩ wiina Tacaa tɔ , pʋntʋ nyʋɣʋ kɛ pə yakɩ .

text: How then shall they call on him in whom they have not believed ? and how shall they believe in him of whom they have not heard ? and how shall they hear without a preacher ?
text2: Pə wɛ mpʋ te , ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣa paa wiina wei pa ta tɛna pa taa tɔ ? Na ɩsənaɣa paa tɛna pa taa kɛ ́ wei ɩ tɔm pa ta tɩɩ nɩɩta tɔ ? Na ɩsənaɣa paa nɩɩ na nɔɣɔlʋ ta kpaalɩ - tɩ ?

text: And how shall they preach , except they be sent ? as it is written , How beautiful are the feet of them that preach the gospel of peace , and bring glad tidings of good things !
text2: Ye pa ta tili kpaallaa , awe ká kpaaləna yem ? Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa pa yɔɣɔta mpʋ sɩ : Mpa pa kɔŋna tɔm kʋpantʋ tɔ , pa nyənʋɣʋ tewaɣa .

text: But they have not all obeyed the gospel . For Esaias saith , Lord , who hath believed our report ?
text2: Ama pa təna pa ta mʋ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsayii tɔma sɩ : Haɩ , Tacaa , pa taa kʋlʋm tɩɩ mʋwa tá tɔm ntɔ ?

text: So then faith cometh by hearing , and hearing by the word of God .
text2: Yʋlʋ nɩɩkɩ tɔm kʋkpaalətʋ kɛ ́ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ mʋ - tɩ na ɩ ́ tɛ ɩ taa . Tɔm kʋkpaalətʋ ntəɣəlɛ Kilisiti tɔm .

text: But I say , Have they not heard ? Yes verily , their sound went into all the earth , and their words unto the ends of the world .
text2: Ɩlɛ ma pɔɔsəɣɩ təkpem sɩ , pa ta nɩɩ tɔm ntɩ yaa ɩsəna ? Pɔpɔtʋ fɛɩ pa nɩɩ - tɩ mɛɛ . Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa pa yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Pa nɔɔsɩ nɩɩ tɛtʋ təna taa , pa tɔm tala hatuu antulinya tənasɩ tɔɔ .

text: But I say , Did not Israel know ? First Moses saith , I will provoke you to jealousy by them that are no people , and by a foolish nation I will anger you .
text2: Ma pɔɔsəɣɩ tɔtɔ sɩ , Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma ta cɛkəna yaa ɩsəna ? Kancaalaɣa ɩlɛ ntəɣəlɛ Moisi ná yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Maa yele na ɩsəsɛɛmlɛ kpa - mɛɣɛ mpa pa ta kɛ piitim kʋpam napəlɩ tɔ pa tɔɔ . Maa la na mə pááná huuna piitim mpi pə fɛɩna laɣatʋ tɔ .

text: But Esaias is very bold , and saith , I was found of them that sought me not ; I was made manifest unto them that asked not after me .
text2: Ɩsayii nyaɣa apalʋtʋ na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ nti tə kəla mpʋ tɔ sɩ : Mpa pa taa pɛɛkəɣɩ - m tɔ , mpɛ pa mələna na pá na - m . Mpa pa taa pɔɔsəɣɩ ma tɔɔ tɔ , pɛlɛɣɛ ma məlaa na má hʋ ́ lɩ ́ ma tɩ .

text: But to Israel he saith , All day long I have stretched forth my hands unto a disobedient and gainsaying people .
text2: Ama ɩ məlaa na ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma tɔm sɩ : Ma hʋla kaanɩɩtʋnaa na katɛ nyə ́ ma mpɛɣɛ niŋ kɛ ilim na pə tɛm , kpɛtɛ .

text: I say then , Hath God cast away his people ? God forbid . For I also am an Israelite , of the seed of Abraham , of the tribe of Benjamin .
text2: Ɩlɛ ma pɔɔsəɣɩ sɩ pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ lɔ ɩ yəlaa ntɛ ? Aaɩ , pə fɛɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ paa pəcɔ . Ma maɣamaɣa ma kɛ ́ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ tʋ mɛɛ , na ma kɛ ́ Apəlaham lʋlʋɣʋ taa tʋ . Pɛncamɛɛ kpekəle taa kɛ ́ ma lɩɩwa .

text: God hath not cast away his people which he foreknew . Wot ye not what the scripture saith of Elias ? how he maketh intercession to God against Israel , saying ,
text2: Aaɩ , Ɩsɔ tá lɔ ɩ yəlaa mpa ɩ ləsa hatuu lɔŋ sɩ ɩ nyə ́ ma tɔ se . Mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ nyəmá Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa timpi Ɩlii sʋʋ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma kɛ Ɩsɔ tɔ sɩ :

text: Lord , they have killed thy prophets , and digged down thine altars ; and I am left alone , and they seek my life .
text2: Tacaa , pa kʋ ́ nyá kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa , pa yɔka nyá kɔtasɩ təlatɛ . Ma tike təkoŋ kɛ ́ pə sɔɔwa , na pa tɩɩ tɔŋna kɛ ́ sɩ paa kʋ - m .

text: But what saith the answer of God unto him ? I have reserved to myself seven thousand men , who have not bowed the knee to the image of Baal .
text2: Ɩsɔ cɔ - ɩ suwee ? Ɩ cɔ - ɩ sɩ : Ma sɩɩ yəlaa iyisi naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa ( 7000 ) kɛ ma tɩ tɔɔ . Pɛlɛ pa ta luŋ tʋɣʋ Paalɩ .

text: Even so then at this present time also there is a remnant according to the election of grace .
text2: Paa kaɣana taa tɔtɔ , yəlaa pəcɔ kaasaa mpa Ɩsɔ ləsa ɩ pɛɛlɛɛ tɔɔ tɔ .

text: And if by grace , then is it no more of works : otherwise grace is no more grace . But if it be of works , then is it no more grace : otherwise work is no more work .
text2: Pə taɣa pa lapa kʋpantʋ natəlɩ tɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ ləsa - wɛ . Ama pɛɛlɛɛ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ləsa - wɛ . Ye pə taa wɛɛ mpʋ Ɩsɔ pɛɛlɛɛ taa kɛ ́ pɛɛlɛɛ naalɩ tɔtɔ .

text: What then ? Israel hath not obtained that which he seeketh for ; but the election hath obtained it , and the rest were blinded
text2: Ɩlɛ pə lɩɩwa suwe ? Pə lɩɩwa sɩ mpi Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma pɛɛkaɣa tɔ , pa ta hiki - wɩ . Ama mpa Ɩsɔ ləsaa tɔ pa tike pa hikina . Na mpa pɛlɛ pa kaasaa tɔ , pɛlɛ pa ta pəsɩ na pá cɛkəna .

text: ( According as it is written , God hath given them the spirit of slumber , eyes that they should not see , and ears that they should not hear ; ) unto this day .
text2: Pa ŋmaawa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Ɩsɔ yelaa na pə ́ mɛləmɩ - wɛ , ɩ yelaa paa naana pa ɩsɛ , paa nɩɩkəna pa ŋkpaŋŋ haləna saŋa .

text: And David saith , Let their table be made a snare , and a trap , and a stumbling block , and a recompence unto them :
text2: Tafiiti ná yɔɣɔtaa tɔtɔ sɩ : Pa kʋtɔɣɔʋ ɩ ́ pəsɩ - wɛ ɩsɩɩ katɔka , yaa puluɣu , yaa mpi pɩɩ pɛtɩ - wɛ tɔ . Pə ́ tʋsɩ - wɛ na pə ́ sɛɣɛsɩ - wɛ na pá ná .

text: Let their eyes be darkened , that they may not see , and bow down their back alway .
text2: Pa ɩsɛntɔɔ ɩ ́ nyala təkpam , pá taa tasa naʋ . Pá saləməɣəna wahala kɛ tam .

text: I say then , Have they stumbled that they should fall ? God forbid : but rather through their fall salvation is come unto the Gentiles , for to provoke them to jealousy .
text2: Ɩlɛ ma tɩɩ pɔɔsəɣɩ sɩ : Yuta nyə ́ ma mpɛ pə tuuluɣu - wɛ na pá hoti mpʋ tɔ pə tɛmaɣalɛ ? Aaɩ , pə taɣa mpʋ se , paa pəcɔ . Pa hotuɣu yelina na pə ́ ya piitim lɛmpɩ nyə ́ ma nyʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna ɩsəsɛɛmlɛ kpa - wɛɣɛ pɛlɛ pa tɔɔ .

text: Now if the fall of them be the riches of the world , and the diminishing of them the riches of the Gentiles ; how much more their fulness ?
text2: Ye Yuta nyə ́ ma hotuɣu yelaa na yəlaa təna hiki Ɩsɔ kʋpantʋ kɛ sɔsɔm , na ye pa pasʋɣʋ waasa piitim lɛmpɩ na pá hiki Ɩsɔ kʋpantʋ kɛ sɔsɔm , na pə ́ kɔma na Yuta nyə ́ ma mpɛ pa təna təpaɩ pá taɣanɩ , ɩlɛ awe ká pəsɩ kɛɛsʋɣʋ kɛ kʋpantʋ nti pəlɛ pɩɩ kɔna tɔ ?

text: For I speak to you Gentiles , inasmuch as I am the apostle of the Gentiles , I magnify mine office :
text2: Pənɛntɛ mpa mɛ ɩ ́ tá kɛ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ , mɛɣɛ ma yɔɣɔtəɣəna . Maɣalɛ tillu kɛ mə kiŋ . Na ɩsɩɩ ma kɛʋ mpʋ tɔ , ma laŋlɛ hʋlʋma sɔsɔm na ma təmlɛ ntɛɣɛ .

text: If by any means I may provoke to emulation them which are my flesh , and might save some of them .
text2: Ma caa sɩ ma sʋsɩ ma piitim yəlaa kɛ ɩsəsɛɛmlɛ taa , ɩlɛna pə ́ ya pa taa lɛlaa .

text: For if the casting away of them be the reconciling of the world , what shall the receiving of them be , but life from the dead ?
text2: Pə kɛɛlʋɣʋ - wɛ na pə ́ sɩɩ kpeeŋa tɔ , pə kaasa yəlaa mpa tɔ pɛlɛ na Ɩsɔ pa ciikaa kɛ ́ . Pɩɩ kɔɔ na pá taɣanɩ məlʋɣʋ tɔ , pepe ká lana ? Pəlɛɣɛlɛ sətaa ká hiki weesuɣu te .

text: For if the firstfruit be holy , the lump is also holy : and if the root be holy , so are the branches .
text2: Ye pa faɣa potopoto na pá cɛlɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ nɔɣɔ tɔɔ , pə kaasa mpi tɔ , ɩnɩ ɩ tənna pə təna tɔtɔ . Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ na tʋɣʋ , ye pa hʋla Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ kite sɩ ɩnɩ ɩ tənna , pə kpaɣaʋ pəliŋasɩ təna tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ tənna pə təna .

text: And if some of the branches be broken off , and thou , being a wild olive tree , wert graffed in among them , and with them partakest of the root and fatness of the olive tree ;
text2: Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ piitim wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ olifi tʋɣʋ ŋku pa tuuwa na pá kɔ kʋ pəliŋasɩ lɛnsɩ tɔ . Na nyá wei n ta kɛ Yuta tʋ tɔ nyá wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ taalɛ olifi tʋɣʋ pəliŋa ŋka pa sɛtaa na pá kɔna na pá nyɔsɩ olifi tʋɣʋ maɣamaɣa pəliŋasɩ kʋsɛtasɩ lona tɔ . Ɩsɩɩ n lapʋ pənɛntɛ tɔ təyaɣa olifi tʋɣʋ lite kɛ n sɛɛkɩ .

text: Boast not against the branches . But if thou boast , thou bearest not the root , but the root thee .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ n kaa nyənɩ yem kɛ ́ mpa pa wɛ ɩsɩɩ pəliŋasɩ kʋsɛtasɩ tɔ . Ɩlɛ timpi n ka sana nyá tɩ tɔ pə fɛɩ . Pə taɣa kite nyɔna nyá tɔɔ se . Ama nyá nyɔna kite tɔɔ .

text: Thou wilt say then , The branches were broken off , that I might be graffed in .
text2: Ntanyɩ n ká tɔ - m sɩ pəliŋasɩ nsɩ , pa sɛta - səɣɩ sɩ pá lɛɛtɩ nyaɣa sɩ lona .

text: Well ; because of unbelief they were broken off , and thou standest by faith . Be not highminded , but fear :
text2: Tampana mɛɛ sɩ ta tɛ Ɩsɔ na sɩ taa tɔɣɔ pa sɛta - sɩ , na nyá tɛma Ɩsɔ na nyá taa tɔɣɔ n wɛ sɩ lona taa . Mpʋ tɔ la laakalɩ na nyá tɩ hɔm . Ama caɣana nyamnaʋ .

text: For if God spared not the natural branches , take heed lest he also spare not thee .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ tá yele Yuta nyə ́ ma , pəyele pɛlɛ pa kɛna tʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ maɣamaɣa kʋ pəliŋasɩ , kacaŋfana nyá na ?

text: Behold therefore the goodness and severity of God : on them which fell , severity ; but toward thee , goodness , if thou continue in his goodness : otherwise thou also shalt be cut off .
text2: Maɣasɩ teu na ń ná ɩsəna Ɩsɔ lakɩ lɛmpa kɛ kʋpantʋ na ɩ ́ kpɩɩləɣɩ lɛmpa tɔ . Mpa pa hotaa tɔ ɩ kpɩɩləɣɩ - wɛ , na ɩ ́ lakɩ nyaɣa kʋpantʋ . Ama wɛɛ ɩ niŋ taa kɛ ́ tam . Tɔfɔ paa sɛtɩ - ŋ ɩsɩɩ pa sɛtʋɣʋʋ pəliŋa tɔ .

text: And they also , if they abide not still in unbelief , shall be graffed in : for God is able to graff them in again .
text2: Na ye pə kɔma na Yuta nyə ́ ma yele pa laŋkpɩɩsəŋ ɩnɩ , paa məŋna - wɛ na pá nyɔsɩ - wɛɣɛ pa lona kʋpənɛɛ taa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ kpaɣa - wɛ na ɩ ́ tasa - wɛɣɛ nyɔsʋɣʋ tɔtɔ .

text: For if thou wert cut out of the olive tree which is wild by nature , and wert graffed contrary to nature into a good olive tree : how much more shall these , which be the natural branches , be graffed into their own olive tree ?
text2: Nyá wei n ta kɛ Yuta tʋ tɔ n wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ taalɛ olifi tʋɣʋ pəliŋa ŋka pa sɛtaa na pá pona na pá nyɔsɩ kʋnyɔsʋ kɛ olifi tʋɣʋ ŋku pa tuuwa tɔ kʋ tɔɔ tɔ . Ama pə taɣa kʋ maɣamaɣa kʋ pəliŋa . Yuta nyə ́ ma ná wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ olifi tʋɣʋ ŋku pa tuuwa mpʋ tɔ kʋ pəliŋasɩ maɣamaɣa . Ye pa kɔma na pá taɣanəɣɩ - wɛɣɛ nyɔsʋɣʋ kɛ tʋɣʋ ŋku kʋ tɔɔ paa sɛta - wɛ tɔ , pə kaa la katɛ kɛ paa pəcɔ .

text: For I would not , brethren , that ye should be ignorant of this mystery , lest ye should be wise in your own conceits ; that blindness in part is happened to Israel , until the fulness of the Gentiles be come in .
text2: Ma taapalaa mɛ ɩ ́ taa kɔɔ na ɩ ́ nyənɩ mə təɣɩ nyəntaa kɛ yem , ɩ ́ yele na má kɛɛsɩ - mɛɣɛ tampana naalɩ wena a ŋmɛlaa tɔ na ɩ ́ ná . Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ taa yəlaa lɛlaa kpisa cɛkənaʋ . Ama pə kaa wɛɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam . Waatʋ wei pɩɩ ya piitim lɛmpɩ nyə ́ ma nyɔɔŋ na pə tɛ ɩlɛ , pɩɩ cɛ pa ɩsɛntɔɔ .

text: And so all Israel shall be saved : as it is written , There shall come out of Sion the Deliverer , and shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob :
text2: Ɩɩ naa ɩsəna Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma təna ká hikina pa yapʋ tɔɣɔlɔ . Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa maɣamaɣa pa ŋmaawa mpʋ sɩ : Siyɔŋ kɛ waasʋlʋ ká lɩɩna . Ɩ ká kpiisi Yakɔpʋ kʋlʋlaa təna ɩsaɣatʋ təpaɩ .

text: For this is my covenant unto them , when I shall take away their sins .
text2: Nɔɣɔ ŋka ma na - wɛ tɩɩ kpɛntɩ na tə ́ pɛɛlɩ tɔɣɔlɛ . Waatʋ wei maa tɛ pa kʋpəntəŋ kpiisuɣu tɔ .

text: As concerning the gospel , they are enemies for your sakes : but as touching the election , they are beloved for the fathers ' sakes .
text2: Yuta nyə ́ ma tɩɩ kisuɣu Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ ɩsəna tɔ , pa pəsa Ɩsɔ kolontunaa kɛ ́ na pə ́ waasɩ - mɛ . Ama ye n nyənna ɩsəna Ɩsɔ ləsʋɣʋʋ yəlaa tɔ ɩlɛ pa kɛ ́ mpa ɩsɔ luɣu wɛ tam kɛ ́ pa caanaa caanaa tɔɔ tɔɣɔ .

text: For the gifts and calling of God are without repentance .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ ha mpi , ɩɩ lɛɛkəɣɩ - wɩ . Pəyele ye ɩ yaa mpa , ɩ taa ɩɩ cʋkəɣəna - wɛ .

text: For as ye in times past have not believed God , yet have now obtained mercy through their unbelief :
text2: Tuu lɔŋ ɩ ́ taa nɩɩkəna Ɩsɔ . Ama kaɣana Ɩsɔ hʋla - mɛɣɛ suulu kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma ta nɩɩna - ɩ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: Even so have these also now not believed , that through your mercy they also may obtain mercy .
text2: Mpʋ pə lapəna kaɣana pa ta nɩɩna - ɩ tɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ hʋla - mɛɣɛ suulu . Pə lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ tasa pɛlɛɣɛ ɩ suulu kʋlʋm ɩnəɣɩ hʋ ́ lʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɛ pənɛntɛ tɔtɔ .

text: For God hath concluded them all in unbelief , that he might have mercy upon all .
text2: Ɩsɔ yelaa kɛ ́ sɩ kaanɩɩtʋ ɩ ́ hɔkɔ yəlaa təna na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ pa tənaɣa suulu tɔtɔ .

text: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God ! how unsearchable are his judgments , and his ways past finding out !
text2: Aaa , Ɩsɔ kʋpantʋ tɔɔwaɣalɛ yaa , ɩ laɣatʋ na ɩ nyəm fɛɩ kɛɛsʋɣʋ . Awe ká pəsɩ na ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ sɩ pənɛ na pənɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ caa ɩ la ? Yaa awe ká cɛkəna ɩsəna ɩ sɩɩwa na ɩ ́ təŋ na ɩ ́ lakɩ tɔ ?

text: For who hath known the mind of the Lord ? or who hath been his counseller ?
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa pa yɔɣɔta mpʋ sɩ : Awe nyəmá Tacaa hʋwɛɛ ? Yaa awe ká pəsɩ na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsɩ - ɩ sɩ la pənɛ , yele pənɛ ?

text: Or who hath first given to him , and it shall be recompensed unto him again ?
text2: Yaa awe tɩɩ pəsaa na ɩ ́ caalɩ - ɩ pʋlʋpʋ haʋ na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ lɛɛtəɣɩ pʋntʋ kɛ kʋlɛɛtʋ ?

text: For of him , and through him , and to him , are all things : to whom be glory for ever . Amen .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ kiŋ kɛ pə təna pə lɩɩnaa , na ɩ toŋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə təna pə wɛɛkɩ , na ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə wɛɛ . Tə ́ tʋ ́ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teeli kɛ tamm . Ami .

text: I beseech you therefore , brethren , by the mercies of God , that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice , holy , acceptable unto God , which is your reasonable service .
text2: Ma taapalaa mɛ , paa ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ hʋlʋɣʋ - tʋɣʋ suulu kɛ mpʋ tɔ , pə tɔɔ maɣamaɣa ma wiikina - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ kpaɣa mə tɩ na mə ɩsɛ kɛ mpʋ , na ɩ ́ lá Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ kɔtaɣa ŋka Ɩsɔ tike tɩ na ká wɛ - ɩ teu tɔ . Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ maɣamaɣa mpi pə wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ́ sɛɛ - ɩ tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: And be not conformed to this world : but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind , that ye may prove what is that good , and acceptable , and perfect , will of God .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa kɛɛna antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ yaasinaa . Ama ɩ ́ yele na Ɩsɔ laɣasɩ - mɛɣɛ hʋwɛɛ təkpataa na ɩ ́ pəsɩ kʋpama . Ɩlɛ ɩ ́ ká cɛkəna mpi Ɩsɔ luɣu wɛɛ tɔ , paa mpi pə kɔŋna kʋpantʋ tɔ , paa mpi pə hɛɛsəɣɩ ɩ laŋlɛ tɔ , paa mpi pə teu wɛ caasa tɔ .

text: For I say , through the grace given unto me , to every man that is among you , not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think ; but to think soberly , according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith .
text2: Ɩsɔ lapa - m pɛɛlɛɛ na mpi pə lapʋ saa - m tɔ , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma heeliɣi mə təna sɩ mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa nyənɩ ɩ tɩ na pə ́ tɛɛ seliya sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ pʋlʋ . Ama ɩ ́ pasa mə təɣɩ mə hʋwɛɛ taa , na paa mə taa wei ɩ ́ maɣasəɣɩ ɩ ́ maɣasɩ na pə ́ kɛɛsəna ɩsəna Ɩsɔ səna - ɩ na ɩ ́ tisi ɩ yuŋ na pə ́ kɛ ́ ɩ paa nyəm tɔ .

text: For as we have many members in one body , and all members have not the same office :
text2: Yʋlʋ tɔnʋɣʋ kɛ ́ pilimile kʋlʋmtəlɛ te , paa na mpʋ kʋ faɣa titilee titilee , na paa titite nte na tə təmlɛ .

text: So we , being many , are one body in Christ , and every one members one of another .
text2: Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ na tá , paa tə wɛʋ paɣalɛ tɔ , tá təna na Kilisiti tá kpɛntʋɣʋ tɔɔ tə pəsa ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ tɔnʋɣʋ pilimile kɛ ́ , na tə tamsəna təma təkeŋkeŋ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋtɔnʋɣʋ wɛʋ tɔ .

text: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us , whether prophecy , let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith ;
text2: Mpi pə lapʋ saa - tʋ tɔ pə wɛ ŋkaŋka kɛ ́ . Na pə wɛɛ sɩ tə ́ la - wəɣɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ hana paa tá taa wei kɛ ́ faalaa . Ɩsɔ kʋheelitu kpaalʋɣʋ ɩ ́ saa wei , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ heeliɣi na pə ́ kɛɛsəna naani wei ɩ wɛna tɔ .

text: Or ministry , let us wait on our ministering : or he that teacheth , on teaching ;
text2: Ye lɛlaa paasənaʋ ɩ ́ saa wei , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ paasəna - wɛ . Wei sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ saawa tɔ , ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ .

text: Or he that exhorteth , on exhortation : he that giveth , let him do it with simplicity ; he that ruleth , with diligence ; he that sheweth mercy , with cheerfulness .
text2: Wei pə saawa sɩ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ kpaasəɣɩ lɛlaa apalʋtʋ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ kpaasəɣɩ . Pə ́ tʋ ́ wei sɩ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ ha , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ hana luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ . Pə ́ tʋ ́ wei sɩ ɩ ́ la nyʋɣʋ tʋ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ la ɩ təmlɛ kɛ teu na laakalɩ kʋlʋm . Pə ́ tʋ ́ wei sɩ ɩ ́ teŋ acamaa , ɩ ́ teŋ - wɛ na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ .

text: Let love be without dissimulation . Abhor that which is evil ; cleave to that which is good .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɔɔlɩ təma na tampana . Ɩ ́ kpiisi ŋkpaŋŋ na ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ , na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ kʋpantʋ təkpaŋkpaŋkpa na ɩ ́ lakɩ - tɩ .

text: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love ; in honour preferring one another ;
text2: Ɩ ́ la təmaɣa yəllɛ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ na ɩ neu mpa pa sɔɔla təma tɔ , ɩ ́ see təmaɣa teu .

text: Not slothful in business ; fervent in spirit ; serving the Lord ;
text2: Ɩ ́ la kpelikpeka nyə ́ ma na ɩ ́ yele təniinɔɔ kʋlapʋtʋ . Ɩ ́ la Tacaa təmlɛ kɛ teu na lotu kʋlʋmtʋ .

text: Rejoicing in hope ; patient in tribulation ; continuing instant in prayer ;
text2: Tɛɛlʋɣʋ ŋku ɩ ́ tɛɛləɣɩ tɔ kʋ tɔɔ ɩ ́ yɔɔləɣɩ . Paa wahala kɔma , ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ suulu na ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tam .

text: Distributing to the necessity of saints ; given to hospitality .
text2: Mpi pə caala mə taapalaa ɩ ́ waasɩ - wɛ . Na mpa pa kɔŋ mə tɛ tɔ , ɩ ́ lakɩ - wɛɣɛ mʋʋllɛ .

text: Bless them which persecute you : bless , and curse not .
text2: Ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ sɩ ɩ ́ təŋsəɣɩ nɔɔsɩ kʋpaŋsɩ kɛ mə kʋnyɔntʋlaa , sɩ ɩ ́ təŋsɩ - wɛɣɛ kʋpantʋ , ɩ ́ taa təŋsɩ - wɛɣɛ mpusi .

text: Rejoice with them that do rejoice , and weep with them that weep .
text2: Mə na mpa pa wɛ laŋhʋlʋmlɛ taa tɔ ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ yɔɔlʋɣʋ , na mə na mpa pɛlɛ pa wiiki tɔ ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ wula tɔtɔ .

text: Be of the same mind one toward another . Mind not high things , but condescend to men of low estate . Be not wise in your own conceits .
text2: Ɩ ́ tɔkɩ təma na suulu . Ɩ ́ taa hɔŋ mə təɣɩ yem . Ama paa taaləm təmlɛ kɛ pa hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ - mɛ ɩ ́ mʋ na ɩ ́ lakɩ . Ɩ ́ taa hɔŋ mə tɩ sɩ ɩ ́ nyəmá pə təna .

text: Recompense to no man evil for evil . Provide things honest in the sight of all men .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa lɛɛtɩ nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ . Ama mə kʋpantʋ ɩ ́ lɩɩ təcɛɩcɛɩ kɛ ́ yəlaa təna kiŋ .

text: If it be possible , as much as lieth in you , live peaceably with all men .
text2: Mɛɣɛ pə kaasənaa sɩ mɩɩ lʋ teu , na ye pə wɛ pəsʋɣʋ mə na yəlaa təna ɩ ́ wɛɛ leleŋ .

text: Dearly beloved , avenge not yourselves , but rather give place unto wrath : for it is written , Vengeance is mine ; I will repay , saith the Lord .
text2: Ma taapalaa mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa paasəna ɩsaɣatʋ lɛɛtʋɣʋ , ɩ ́ yelina - təɣɩ Ɩsɔ . Mpi tɔ , Ɩsɔ wɛna pááná kɛ ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɔ , haləna pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ mpʋ sɩ : Maa tɛ na má lɛɛtɩ - wɛ , na kʋlʋm má ɩnɩ maa fɛləna . Tacaa yɔɣɔtəna mpʋ .

text: Therefore if thine enemy hunger , feed him ; if he thirst , give him drink : for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire on his head .
text2: Na Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tasa yɔɣɔtaɣa tɔtɔ sɩ : Nyɔɣɔsɩ ɩ ́ kpa nyá kolontu , ha - ɩ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ . Lʋkɔtʋ ɩ ́ tɔka - ɩ , ha - ɩ lʋm na ɩ ́ nyɔɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , n lakʋɣʋ - ɩ mpʋ tɔ , pə wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ mamala kɛ n pələɣɩ ɩ nyʋɣʋ taa .

text: Be not overcome of evil , but overcome evil with good .
text2: Taa yele na ɩsaɣatʋ kpili - ŋ . Ama sɛɛsɩ ɩsəlɛ na kʋpantʋ , ɩlɛ n ká kpiliki ɩsaɣatʋ .

text: Let every soul be subject unto the higher powers . For there is no power but of God : the powers that be are ordained of God .
text2: Paa yʋlʋ wei ɩ ́ tʋna tɛtʋ tɔkəlaa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ye pə taɣa Ɩsɔ nɔkʋɣʋ tɔɔ , tɛtʋ tɔkʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ taa wɛɛ . Na mpa pa tɩɩ wɛɛ tɔ , Ɩsɔ kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ sɩɩna - wɛ .

text: Whosoever therefore resisteth the power , resisteth the ordinance of God : and they that resist shall receive to themselves damnation .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ wei ɩ ́ ta se tɛtʋ tɔkəlaa , Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kɛ ɩ kisiɣi . Na mpa paa see - wɛ tɔ , pʋntʋnaa kɔŋna pa maɣamaɣa pa nyɔɔŋ taa kɛ ́ pulaɣa kɛ ́ .

text: For rulers are not a terror to good works , but to the evil . Wilt thou then not be afraid of the power ? do that which is good , and thou shalt have praise of the same :
text2: Kʋpantʋ lataa kaa seliɣina tɛtʋ tɔkəlaa . Ama ɩsaɣalataa tike ká seliɣinana - wɛ . Ntɔŋ nyá luɣu fɛɩ sɩ nyá laŋlɛ ɩ ́ pɛləɣəna tɛtʋ tɔkəlaa ? Ye mpʋ la kʋpantʋ , ɩlɛ halɩ pəlɛɣɛ paa tɩɩ pʋɣʋlɩ - ŋ .

text: For he is the minister of God to thee for good . But if thou do that which is evil , be afraid ; for he beareth not the sword in vain : for he is the minister of God , a revenger to execute wrath upon him that doeth evil .
text2: Mpi tɔ Ɩsɔ təmlɛ kɛ pɛlɛ pa lakɩ mpʋ sɩ pə ́ pona nyaɣa kʋpantʋ lapʋ taa . Ama ye n lakɩ ɩsaɣatʋ nyá laŋlɛ ká pɛləɣəna - wɛɣɛ . Mpi tɔ pə taɣa yem tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa wɛna pəsʋɣʋ sɩ pá tʋ - ŋ saləka . Pa tʋkʋɣʋ asaɣaa kɛ saləka tɔ , Ɩsɔ təmlɛ kɛ pɛlɛ pa lakɩ sɩ pá hʋ ́ lɩ ́ ɩ pááná .

text: Wherefore ye must needs be subject , not only for wrath , but also for conscience sake .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə wɛɛ sɩ ń tʋna tɛtʋ tɔkəlaa , ɩlɛ pə taɣa sɩ Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ taa kɔɔ ɩ ́ mʋna - ŋ pááná tɔ pə tɔɔ tike , ama sɩ nyá laakalɩ ɩ ́ caɣa ɩ təcaɣalɛ tɔ pə tɔɔ tɔtɔ .

text: For for this cause pay ye tribute also : for they are God ' s ministers , attending continually upon this very thing .
text2: Pə tɔɔ tɔtɔɣɔ ɩ ́ fɛləɣɩ lampuu , na mpa pɛlɛ pa tʋ lampuu mʋɣʋ kɛ mpʋ tɔ pá paasəna - tɛɣɛ teu təcʋŋŋ , Ɩsɔ təmlɛ kɛ pɛlɛ pa lakɩ tɔtɔ .

text: Render therefore to all their dues : tribute to whom tribute is due ; custom to whom custom ; fear to whom fear ; honour to whom honour .
text2: Ɩ ́ cɛla paa wei kɛ ́ ɩ nyəm , ɩ ́ fɛlɩ lampuu mʋlaa kɛ pa lampuu , na ɩ ́ fɛlɩ patantɩ nyə ́ ma kɛ pa patantɩ . Ye pə wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ́ se wei ɩ ́ se - ɩ , na pə ́ wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ́ tʋ wei kɛ ́ teeli ɩ ́ tʋ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ .

text: Owe no man any thing , but to love one another : for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa tɔɣɔ nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ kəmlɛ . Ama ye mə təma sɔɔlʋɣʋ tɔm ɩlɛ , təlɛ tə caala - mɛɣɛ tam kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ kəmlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ nte ɩ ́ kaa tɛ fɛlʋɣʋ tɔ . Wei ɩ sɔɔləɣɩ lɛlaa tɔ ɩ tɔka kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tənaɣa təpaɩ .

text: For this , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not kill , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness , Thou shalt not covet ; and if there be any other commandment , it is briefly comprehended in this saying , namely , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ kʋheelitu wɛɛ sɩ : Taa la wasaŋkalətʋ , taa kʋ yʋlʋ , taa ŋmɩɩlɩ , taa ləsɩ pɔpɔtʋ aseeta , taa nyɩɩlɩ , na lɛntənaa tɔtɔ . Ama tə tənaɣa mpʋ tə nyʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ : Sɔɔlɩ nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ ɩsɩɩ n ka sɔɔlɩ nyá tɩ tɔ .

text: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour : therefore love is the fulfilling of the law .
text2: Wei ɩ sɔɔləɣɩ ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ tɔ ɩɩ lakɩ - ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ natəlɩ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ , ye n sɔɔləɣɩ yəlaa , n tɛma Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tənaɣa tɔkʋɣʋ kɛ ́ .

text: And that , knowing the time , that now it is high time to awake out of sleep : for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed .
text2: Ɩ ́ tɛma nyəm kɛ kʋyɛɛŋ wei ɩ taa tə wɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , ɩlɛ ɩ ́ tɔkɩ tənɛ ɩnəɣɩ mpʋ yoo . Kaɣana pə tala ɩ ́ fena mə tom tɔɔ kɛ ́ mpʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pə kpaɣaʋ kʋyaŋku tə caala Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ta taa tɛmnaʋ na pə ́ sɩɩna saŋa tɔ , tá nyʋɣʋ yapʋ kʋyakʋ tɔŋna - tʋɣʋ kpətənaʋ kɛ ́ .

text: The night is far spent , the day is at hand : let us therefore cast off the works of darkness , and let us put on the armour of light .
text2: Tʋlʋmalʋɣʋ kpawa , pə caa fem . Ye mpʋ tə ́ yele səkpɛtʋɣʋ tɛɛ təma asaɣɛɛ , na tə ́ kpaɣa yoou wontu nti ye pə nyaalaa , tɩɩ yoona tɔ .

text: Let us walk honestly , as in the day ; not in rioting and drunkenness , not in chambering and wantonness , not in strife and envying .
text2: Tə ́ təŋ siɣisuɣu kɛ pə təna pə lapʋ taa , ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋpaŋ lakʋɣʋ pə təna təyɛkɛɛ tɔ . Tə ́ yele tɔɣɔʋ katatəlaɣa , na sʋlʋnyɔɔlɛ , na asilima , na fɛɛlɛ fɛɩ , na yooŋ , na ɩsɛsɛɛmɛɛ pə tɔm .

text: But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ , and make not provision for the flesh , to fulfil the lusts thereof .
text2: Ama tə ́ sɛɛsɩ ɩsəlɛ na tɔntɛ kʋfatɛ nte Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti kɔnaa tɔ , tə ́ taa paasəna tá tɔnəŋ nyəntʋ na ɩ ́ tusi - tʋɣʋ ɩ kʋsɔɔləm lapʋ taa .

text: Him that is weak in the faith receive ye , but not to doubtful disputations .
text2: Paa yʋlʋ toma ta tɔɔ Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ mpaaʋ taa ɩ ́ mʋ - ɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mə hɛkʋ , ɩ ́ taa yəpəlɩ - ɩ tə tɔɔ .

text: For one believeth that he may eat all things : another , who is weak , eateth herbs .
text2: Ntanyɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ná tɔkɩ kʋtɔɣɔŋ , na lɛlʋ wei ɩ wɛ ɩcantʋ kɛ Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ mpaaʋ taa tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kii nantʋ təna .

text: Let not him that eateth despise him that eateth not ; and let not him which eateth not judge him that eateth : for God hath received him .
text2: Wei ɩɩ tɔkɩ pə tənaɣa mpʋ tɔ , pə fɛɩ ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ tʋʋ wei ɩ kiiki tɔɣɔnasɩ lɛnsɩ tɔ . Na wei ɩ kii tɔɣɔnasɩ lɛnsɩ kɛ mpʋ tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ taa caɣana wei ɩɩ kii tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ mʋ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ tɔ se .

text: Who art thou that judgest another man ' s servant ? to his own master he standeth or falleth . Yea , he shall be holden up : for God is able to make him stand .
text2: Ɩlɛ nyaɣa awe na ń footiɣi lɛlʋ təmlɛ tʋ ? Ye ɩ ká pəsɩ ɩ təmlɛ lapʋ , yaa ɩ kaa pəsɩ , pə na - ŋ ? Pə kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na ɩ caa pa tɔm kɛ ́ . Ɩ kaa kpisi - tɛ se . Tacaa wɛna toma sɩ ɩ ́ səna - ɩ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: One man esteemeth one day above another : another esteemeth every day alike . Let every man be fully persuaded in his own mind .
text2: Ntanyɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ná faɣasəɣɩ kʋyɛɛŋ sɩ kʋnɛ kʋ kəla kʋnɛ . Na nɔɣɔlʋ náá nyənəɣɩ kʋyɛɛŋ tənaɣa teitei . Paa wei ɩ ́ ləsɩ nti ɩ ká tɛna ɩ taa tɔ na ɩ ́ təŋ - tɩ .

text: He that regardeth the day , regardeth it unto the Lord ; and he that regardeth not the day , to the Lord he doth not regard it . He that eateth , eateth to the Lord , for he giveth God thanks ; and he that eateth not , to the Lord he eateth not , and giveth God thanks .
text2: Wei ɩ faɣasəɣɩ kʋyakʋ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ kʋnɛ kʋ kəla kʋnɛ tɔ , Tacaa tɔɔ kɛ ́ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ na wei ɩ tɔkɩ pə təna tɔ . Tacaa tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ lakɩ mpʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ pə tɔɔ tɔ se . Na wei ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kiiki tɔ , Tacaa kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ lakɩ mpʋ , na ɩ sɛɛkɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ pə tɔɔ tɔɣɔɣɔ .

text: For none of us liveth to himself , and no man dieth to himself .
text2: Kʋpam , ta taa nɔɣɔlʋ fɛɩ wei ɩ tɩ ɩ tɩ , na ɩ ́ nɔkaa ɩ wɛɛ , ɩ ́ nɔkaa ɩ sɩ tɔ . Ye tə tɩɩ wɛɛ , Tacaa tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: For whether we live , we live unto the Lord ; and whether we die , we die unto the Lord : whether we live therefore , or die , we are the Lord ' s .
text2: Paa tə tɩɩ fɛɩ , Tacaa kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ . Pə tɔɔ ɩnəɣɩ , paa tə wɛɛ , paa tə fɛɩ , Tacaa tənna - tʋ .

text: For to this end Christ both died , and rose , and revived , that he might be Lord both of the dead and living .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Kilisiti səpa na ɩ ́ fe tɔ , ɩ pəsa weesuɣu nyə ́ ma na sətaa pa Sɔsɔ kɛ ́ .

text: But why dost thou judge thy brother ? or why dost thou set at nought thy brother ? for we shall all stand before the judgment seat of Christ .
text2: Ɩlɛ nyá , pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ n footiɣi nyá lɛlʋ kɛ mpʋ ? Na pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ n nyənəɣɩ - ɩ yem ? Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ tá təna tɩɩ səŋ na ɩ ́ hʋʋna - tʋ .

text: For it is written , As I live , saith the Lord , every knee shall bow to me , and every tongue shall confess to God .
text2: Kʋpam , pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ mpʋ sɩ : Yəlaa təna ká luŋ ma tɛɛ kɛ ́ akula . Paa wei ɩ ká tisina nɔɣɔ sɔsaɣa sɩ maɣalɛ Ɩsɔ . Tacaa yɔɣɔtəna mpʋ na tuunaʋ .

text: So then every one of us shall give account of himself to God .
text2: Tá taa paa wei ɩ ká heeli Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ nti ɩ ka lapa tɔɣɔ ɩ maɣamaɣa .

text: Let us not therefore judge one another any more : but judge this rather , that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother ' s way .
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩlɛ , tə yele təma footuɣu kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ta taa . Ama hʋwɛɛ nna a kəla teu sɩ ɩ ́ maɣasəɣɩ mə taa tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ , pə taa kɔɔ na ɩ ́ la natəlɩ nti tɩɩ hu mə lɛlaa , yaa tɩɩ pona - wɛɣɛ ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ taa tɔ .

text: I know , and am persuaded by the Lord Jesus , that there is nothing unclean of itself : but to him that esteemeth any thing to be unclean , to him it is unclean .
text2: Kaɣana má na Tacaa Yesu tə kpɛntaa tɔɣɔ ma nyəmá teu sɩ pʋlʋ ta kɛ asilima kɛ pə maɣamaɣa se . Ama ye wei ɩ hʋʋkɩ sɩ pʋlʋ kɛ ́ asilima , pə pəsəɣɩ asilima kɛ ɩ kiŋ kɛ ́ .

text: But if thy brother be grieved with thy meat , now walkest thou not charitably . Destroy not him with thy meat , for whom Christ died .
text2: Ye n tɔkɩ pʋlʋ na pə ́ wɩɩkɩ nyá lɛlʋ kɛ pə tɔɣɔʋ taa , pə ta kɛ sɔɔlʋɣʋ kɛ təna se . Pə tɔɔ tɔ taa la na wei ɩ tɔɔ Kilisiti səpa tɔ ɩ ́ nana lepu kɛ nyá kpaɩ tɔɣɔnaɣa ŋkɛ ka tɔɔ .

text: Let not then your good be evil spoken of :
text2: Pə fɛɩ ɩsɩɩ mə təpantɛ ká pəsɩ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ lɛlaa nɔɔsɩ taa .

text: For the kingdom of God is not meat and drink ; but righteousness , and peace , and joy in the Holy Ghost .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa ta kɛ tɔɣɔʋ na nyɔɔʋ tɔm . Ama siɣisuɣu təŋʋɣʋ na hɛɛsʋɣʋ na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ pə tɔm kɛ ́ . Na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kɔŋnana pə tənaɣa mpʋ .

text: For he that in these things serveth Christ is acceptable to God , and approved of men .
text2: Ye wei ɩ lakɩ Kilisiti təmlɛ ɩsɩɩ ma kɛɛsʋɣʋ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , pʋntʋ te Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ na yəlaa maɣamaɣa saŋɩ - ɩ .

text: Let us therefore follow after the things which make for peace , and things wherewith one may edify another .
text2: Ye mpʋ tə ́ siɣisina mpi pə kɔŋna - tʋɣʋ alaafəya , na pɩɩ səna - tʋɣʋ təma apalʋtʋ sɔɔsʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ mpaaʋ taa tɔ .

text: For meat destroy not the work of God . All things indeed are pure ; but it is evil for that man who eateth with offence .
text2: Taa wakəlɩ Ɩsɔ təmlɛ na nyá kʋtɔɣɔm . Kʋpam yaa , tɔɣɔnasɩ təna wɛ tɔɣɔʋ mɛɛ . Ama pə fɛɩ teu sɩ ń tɔɣɔ mpi pɩɩ tusi nyá lɛlʋ kɛ ɩsaɣatʋ taa tɔ .

text: It is good neither to eat flesh , nor to drink wine , nor any thing whereby thy brother stumbleth , or is offended , or is made weak .
text2: Nti tə wɛ teu tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ , ye nantʋ tɔɣɔʋ na sʋlʋm nyɔɔʋ yaa paa mpi pɩɩ tusi nyá lɛlʋ , taa tɔɣɔ , taa nyɔɔ .

text: Hast thou faith ? have it to thyself before God . Happy is he that condemneth not himself in that thing which he alloweth .
text2: Ye nyá maɣamaɣa n hʋʋ ntiɣi tənɛ ɩnɩ tə tɔɔ , sɩɩ - təɣɩ nyá taa na pə ́ wɛɛ nyá na Ɩsɔ mə naalɛ mə tɔm tike . Ye yʋlʋ tʋ mpi pə pəlɛ sɩ ɩ lakɩ , na ɩ laŋlɛ ɩɩ pɛləɣɩ sɩ pə kɛ ́ ɩsaɣatʋ , leleŋ nɩɩlʋ ntɛ ́ .

text: And he that doubteth is damned if he eat , because he eateth not of faith : for whatsoever is not of faith is sin .
text2: Ama ye ɩ pətəɣɩ tɔɣɔnaɣa nakəlɩ ka tɔɔ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ - kɛ , Ɩsɔ kʋ ɩ tɔm . Mpi tɔ , ɩ ta la Ɩsɔ tɔɔ tɔ pə tɔɔ . Pə təna mpi yʋlʋ lakɩ na pə ́ tá kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ lakɩ tɔ , pə kɛ ́ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ ́ .

text: We then that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak , and not to please ourselves .
text2: Ta mpa tə wɛna toma kɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ taa tɔ , pə wɛɛ sɩ tə ́ teŋ acamaa kɛ pa təkpisilenaa taa . Tə ́ taa təŋəɣɩ mpi mpi pə wɛ taɣa teu tɔ pə tike na tə ́ lakɩ .

text: Let every one of us please his neighbour for his good to edification .
text2: Ama pə wɛɛ sɩ paa tá taa wei ɩ ́ pɛɛkɩ kʋpantʋ nti ɩ ká la na ɩ lɛlʋ laŋlɛ hɛɛna - ɩ , na pə ́ waasɩ - ɩ na pə ́ sɔɔsɩ - ɩ toma kɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ taa tɔ .

text: For even Christ pleased not himself ; but , as it is written , The reproaches of them that reproached thee fell on me .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Kilisiti ná taa təŋəɣɩ mpi pə wɛ ɩlɛɣɛ teu tɔ se , paa pəcɔ . Halɩ pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ mpʋ sɩ : Kʋtʋɣʋ ŋku pa tʋʋkaɣa - ŋ tɔ , kʋ məla ma nyʋɣʋ taa .

text: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning , that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope .
text2: Tə təna nti paa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ hatuu lɔŋ tɔ , pa ŋmaa - təɣɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pə ́ kuli tá ɩsɛ na tə ́ tɔɣɔ suulu na tə ́ kantəlɩ , ɩsɩɩ pa kɛɛsʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ , na tə ́ nyɩ ɩsəna tɩɩ tɛɛlɩ Ɩsɔ kiŋ tɔ .

text: Now the God of patience and consolation grant you to be likeminded one toward another according to Christ Jesus :
text2: Ɩsɔ wei ɩ kiŋ suulu na kantəlʋɣʋ lɩɩkəna tɔ , ɩ ́ səna - mɛ na ɩ ́ la ɩsɩɩ Yesu Kilisiti lapa tɔ , na ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ hʋwɛɛ kɛ teu .

text: That ye may with one mind and one mouth glorify God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Na mə təna təpaɩ ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ nɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ sa Ɩsɔ wei ɩ kɛ ́ tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti Caa tɔ .

text: Wherefore receive ye one another , as Christ also received us to the glory of God .
text2: Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ , ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ teu na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ təma ɩsɩɩ Kilisiti lapʋ - mɛ tɔ , na Ɩsɔ náá hiki teeli kɛ pə taa .

text: Now I say that Jesus Christ was a minister of the circumcision for the truth of God , to confirm the promises made unto the fathers :
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ma heeliɣi - mɛ təfoo sɩ Kilisiti pəsa Yuta nyə ́ ma təmlɛ tʋ kɛ ́ , sɩ ɩ lakɩ mpi mpi Ɩsɔ ka tɔma pa caanaa caanaa sɩ ɩ ká la - wɛ tɔ . Ɩlɛna pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ ɩɩ saaləɣɩ .

text: And that the Gentiles might glorify God for his mercy ; as it is written , For this cause I will confess to thee among the Gentiles , and sing unto thy name .
text2: Ɩ kɔma tɔtɔ sɩ mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ , pɛlɛ pá sa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ suulu tɔɔ . Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ mpʋ sɩ : Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ maa sa - ŋ piitimnaa hɛkʋ . Maa tala - ŋ yontu taa .

text: And again he saith , Rejoice , ye Gentiles , with his people .
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tasaa tɔtɔ sɩ : Piitimnaa mɛ , mə na Ɩsɔ yəlaa kʋləsaa ɩ ́ yɔɔlɩ .

text: And again , Praise the Lord , all ye Gentiles ; and laud him , all ye people .
text2: Na tɔtɔ sɩ : Piitimnaa mɛ mə təna ɩ ́ sa Tacaa . Yəlaa təna ɩ ́ samɩ - ɩ .

text: And again , Esaias saith , There shall be a root of Jesse , and he that shall rise to reign over the Gentiles ; in him shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Pa tasa Ɩsayii takəlaɣa ŋkɛ ka taa tɔtɔ sɩ : Sesee pəyaɣa ká tɛ na ká kɔɔ . Ɩ ká kʋlɩ na ɩ ́ kpiliki piitimnaa , na pá tɛɛləɣɩ ɩ kiŋ .

text: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing , that ye may abound in hope , through the power of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Ɩsɔ wei ɩ ́ lakɩ na yəlaa nyəŋ tɛɛlʋɣʋ tɔ , ɩ ́ kɔna - mɛɣɛ laŋhʋlʋmlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ , na hɛɛsʋɣʋ kʋpaŋkʋ , na pə tɔɔ - mɛɣɛ teu kɛ taa tɛm mpi ɩ ́ tɛmna - ɩ mə taa tɔ pə tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ pəsɩ tɛɛllaa sɔsaa kɛ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toma taa .

text: And I myself also am persuaded of you , my brethren , that ye also are full of goodness , filled with all knowledge , able also to admonish one another .
text2: Ma taapalaa , ma maɣamaɣa ma nyəmá sɩ kʋpantʋ tɔɔ mə taa kɛ ́ sɔsɔm , na ɩ ́ pəsəɣɩ mə təmaɣa laɣatʋ tasʋɣʋ mɛɛ .

text: Nevertheless , brethren , I have written the more boldly unto you in some sort , as putting you in mind , because of the grace that is given to me of God ,
text2: Paa na mpʋ tɔ , tiili tiili wɛɣɛ ma takəlaɣa taa , ma tɔm wɛ toŋ kɛ pəcɔ . Ɩlɛ sɩ má tɔɔsɩ - mɛɣɛ kʋtɔɔsʋ kɛ nti ɩ ́ tɛma nyəm tɔɣɔ . Na ma ŋmaaʋ mpʋ tɔ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ , maɣa Ɩsɔ hʋla suulu na má hiki pəsʋɣʋ ,

text: That I should be the minister of Jesus Christ to the Gentiles , ministering the gospel of God , that the offering up of the Gentiles might be acceptable , being sanctified by the Holy Ghost .
text2: sɩ má la Yesu Kilisiti təmlɛ latʋ kɛ mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ pa kiŋ . Ma Laapaalɩ kʋpaŋ kpaalʋɣʋ lapaɣa ɩsɩɩ kɔtʋlʋ lakʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ təmlɛ tɔ , sɩ mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ pá pəsɩ Ɩsɔ ɩsɩɩ kɔtaɣa kʋpaŋka ŋka Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ taɣanaa na ká nəɣəsəna Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ mʋ tɔ .

text: I have therefore whereof I may glory through Jesus Christ in those things which pertain to God .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ ma kpɛntəna Yesu Kilisiti tɔ pə tɔɔ ma pəsəɣɩ má mʋɣʋləna mpi ma lakɩ Ɩsɔ tɔɔ tɔ .

text: For I will not dare to speak of any of those things which Christ hath not wrought by me , to make the Gentiles obedient , by word and deed ,
text2: Maa caa ma yɔɣɔtɩ natələɣɩ yem . Ye pə taɣa təma nna Kilisiti yelaa na má la na mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ pá nɩɩna Ɩsɔ tɔ a tɔm . Ma nɔɣɔ taa tɔm pee na ma niŋ kʋlapʋtʋ kɛ Kilisiti kpaɣaa na ɩ ́ lana .

text: Through mighty signs and wonders , by the power of the Spirit of God ; so that from Jerusalem , and round about unto Illyricum , I have fully preached the gospel of Christ .
text2: Na ma lapa mpʋ tɔ , Ɩsɔ kɔkɔlɔ nyəm na piti təma na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ pə toma kɛ ma hikaa na má lana . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ma kpaaləna Kilisiti Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ təfoo na má cɔɔkɩ paa le . Kpaɣa Yosalɛm haləna ń polo ń kaləsəna Ɩlili tɛtʋ .

text: Yea , so have I strived to preach the gospel , not where Christ was named , lest I should build upon another man ' s foundation :
text2: Ama timpi wɛ pa ta nɩɩta Kilisiti tɔm tɔ , təna tike kɛ ma lakaɣa Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kpaalʋɣʋ , sɩ pə ́ taa kɔɔ na má tənɩ kite nte lɛlʋ ná tɛma sɩɩʋ tɔ tə tɔɔ .

text: But as it is written , To whom he was not spoken of , they shall see : and they that have not heard shall understand .
text2: Pa ŋmaawa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Pa ta heeli mpaɣa ɩ tɔm tɔ paa na . Mpa pa taa nɩɩ ɩ tɔm tɔ paa cɛkəna .

text: For which cause also I have been much hindered from coming to you .
text2: Tənɛ ɩnɩ tə laɣasəna - m tɔm paɣalɛ na má ta kɔnta mə tɛ .

text: But now having no more place in these parts , and having a great desire these many years to come unto you ;
text2: Ama kaɣana ma təmlɛ tɛma cənɛ tɔɔ acalɛɛ taa . Saŋa taa ma nyɩɩlaa sɩ má polo má na - mɛ tɔ pɩɩsɩ lapa paɣalɛ .

text: Whensoever I take my journey into Spain , I will come to you : for I trust to see you in my journey , and to be brought on my way thitherward by you , if first I be somewhat filled with your company .
text2: Pənɛntɛ ma hʋʋwa sɩ ye ma puki Ɩsəpanyɩ tɛtʋ kɛ maa təŋna mə tɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma lakɩ tamaa sɩ maa hɛlɩ na má wiili - mɛ na má na - mɛ tə ́ caɣa wɛɛ naalɛ , na mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ səna - m na má tʋ mpaaʋ .

text: But now I go unto Jerusalem to minister unto the saints .
text2: Ama maa polo Yosalɛm kɛ nɔɔnɔɔ na má la Ɩsɔ yəlaa mpa pa wɛ təna tɔɣɔ təmlɛ na pə ́ cɔ ́ .

text: For it hath pleased them of Macedonia and Achaia to make a certain contribution for the poor saints which are at Jerusalem .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka wena a wɛ Masetoni na Akayi pa tɛtʋ taa tɔ , a luɣu lapa sɩ á koti liɣitee na á ha Ɩsɔ yəlaa kʋnyɔntʋnaa mpa pa wɛ Yosalɛm taa tɔ .

text: It hath pleased them verily ; and their debtors they are . For if the Gentiles have been made partakers of their spiritual things , their duty is also to minister unto them in carnal things .
text2: Mpɛ pa hʋʋna - təɣɩ pa maɣamaɣa , ama tampana pə tɩɩ wɛɛ sɩ pá la ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kʋnyɔntʋnaa mpɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Yosalɛm Yuta nyə ́ ma mpa pa mʋ Tacaa tɔm tɔ , paa yelaa na mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ pá hiki pa Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ kʋpantʋ tɔ , pə wɛɛ sɩ pənɛntɛ pɛlɛ pá cosi pa wɛnaʋ taa maɣamaɣa na pá lɛɛtɩ - wɛ .

text: When therefore I have performed this , and have sealed to them this fruit , I will come by you into Spain .
text2: Ye ma tɛma tənɛɛnɩ , na má tɛ - wɛɣɛ liɣitee anɩ a tənaɣa cɛlʋɣʋ , ɩlɛ maa tʋ Ɩsəpanyɩ tɛtʋ mpaaʋ , na mə tɛ tɔɔ kɛ ́ maa təŋna na má tɛɛ .

text: And I am sure that , when I come unto you , I shall come in the fulness of the blessing of the gospel of Christ .
text2: Ma nyəmá sɩ maa tala mə kiŋ na Kilisiti koolee kʋpana kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , for the Lord Jesus Christ ' s sake , and for the love of the Spirit , that ye strive together with me in your prayers to God for me ;
text2: Ma taapalaa , ɩ ́ tá ná nti ma wiikəna - mɛɣɛ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ na sɔɔlʋɣʋ ŋku Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ tʋɣɩ mə taa tɔ kʋ tɔɔ tɔɣɔlɛ , sɩ ɩ ́ səna - m lʋpʋ kɛ mə sələməŋ taa .

text: That I may be delivered from them that do not believe in Judaea ; and that my service which I have for Jerusalem may be accepted of the saints ;
text2: Ɩ ́ sələmɩ , ɩlɛna pə ́ ləsɩ - m Yuta nyə ́ ma mpa pa ta mʋ Tacaa tɔm tɔ pa niŋ taa . Ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ yəlaa mpa pa wɛ Yosalɛm tɔ , pá mʋ sənaʋ ŋku ma pukina - wɛ tɔɣɔ teu təkpa .

text: That I may come unto you with joy by the will of God , and may with you be refreshed .
text2: Ye pə lapa mpʋ na Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ tisaa , maa tala - mɛ na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ kɛ sɔsɔm , na maa hɛɛsɩ mə kiŋ .

text: Now the God of peace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Ɩsɔ wei ɩ haa alaafəya tɔ ɩ ́ wɛɛ mə təna mə waalɩ . Ami .

text: I commend unto you Phebe our sister , which is a servant of the church which is at Cenchrea :
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ tɔkɩ tá kɔɣɔ Fepee kɛ teu . Ɩ kɛ ́ alʋ kʋpaŋ na ɩ ́ lakɩ təmlɛ kɛ Saŋkəlee Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle taa .

text: That ye receive her in the Lord , as becometh saints , and that ye assist her in whatsoever business she hath need of you : for she hath been a succourer of many , and of myself also .
text2: Ɩ ́ tɔkɩ - ɩ teu kɛ Tacaa tɔɔ . Pə tɩɩ wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ Ɩsɔ yəlaa ɩ ́ tɔkəɣɩ təmaɣa mpʋ . Ɩ ́ nyɩɩla sənaʋ ŋkuɣu mə kiŋ , ɩ ́ səna - ɩ . Ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ tema paɣalɛ , na pə ́ tɩɩ kələna má .

text: Greet Priscilla and Aquila my helpers in Christ Jesus :
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ - m Pilisila na Akilaasɩ , mpa pa kɛ ́ ma taapalaa kɛ Yesu Kilisiti təmlɛ taa tɔ .

text: Who have for my life laid down their own necks : unto whom not only I give thanks , but also all the churches of the Gentiles .
text2: Pa lapa pa weesiŋ kɛ awusa kɛ ma nyəŋkʋ yapʋ tɔɔ . Pə taɣa ma tike ma sɛɛkəna - wɛɣɛ pá na təmlɛ . Ama pə kpɛŋna mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ , pa Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka tənaɣa təpaɩpaɩ .

text: Likewise greet the church that is in their house . Salute my wellbeloved Epaenetus , who is the firstfruits of Achaia unto Christ .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ - m tɔtɔɣɔ mpa pa kotiɣi Yesu sɛɛʋ kɛ pa təyaɣa taa tɔ . Ɩ ́ sɛɛ - m ma yʋlʋ kʋpaŋ Ɩpayinɛtɩ wei ɩ mʋ Kilisiti tɔm kɛ kancaalaɣa təcəcɩ kɛ ́ Asii tɛtʋ təna taa tɔ .

text: Greet Mary , who bestowed much labour on us .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ - m Malɩ wei ɩ lapa - mɛɣɛ kookalɩ kɛ teu tɔ .

text: Salute Andronicus and Junia , my kinsmen , and my fellowprisoners , who are of note among the apostles , who also were in Christ before me .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ - m Antəlonikusi na Yuniyasɩ mpa pa kɛ ́ ma tɛɛtʋnaa tɔ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ má na - wɛɣɛ pa tɩɩ təkaa . Ɩsəna tillaa sɔɔla - wɛ tɔ pə fɛɩ kɛɛsʋɣʋ . Halɩ pa laala - m Kilisiti tɔm taa kɛ ́ sʋʋʋ .

text: Greet Amplias my beloved in the Lord .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ - m Ampəliyatusi , ma na wei tə kpɛnta teu kɛ Tacaa təŋʋɣʋ taa tɔ .

text: Salute Urbane , our helper in Christ , and Stachys my beloved .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ - m Ɩlipɛɛ , wei ɩ kɛ ́ tá taapalʋ kɛ Kilisiti təmlɛ taa tɔ , na ma yʋlʋ kʋpaŋ Sətasi .

text: Salute Apelles approved in Christ . Salute them which are of Aristobulus ' household .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ - m Apɛlɛsɩ , pá yaawa sɩ Kilisiti təŋlaa , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ lɩɩkəna . Ɩ ́ sɛɛ - m Alisitɔpiili təyaɣa nyə ́ ma .

text: Salute Herodion my kinsman . Greet them that be of the household of Narcissus , which are in the Lord .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ - m ma lʋlʋɣʋ tʋ Helɔtiyɔŋ . Ɩ ́ sɛɛ - m Naasisi təyaɣa nyə ́ ma mpa pa təŋəɣɩ Tacaa tɔ .

text: Salute Tryphena and Tryphosa , who labour in the Lord . Salute the beloved Persis , which laboured much in the Lord .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ - m Tilifɛɛnɩ na Tilifoosi mpa pa lakɩ Tacaa təmlɛ tɔ , na tá kɔɣɔ kʋpaŋ Pɛɛsiiti . Ɩ lapa Tacaa təmlɛ kɛ teu kɛ ́ .

text: Salute Rufus chosen in the Lord , and his mother and mine .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ - m Tacaa təmlɛ taa acɛpa Lufusi , na ɩ too tɔtɔ . Ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ wɛ ɩsɩɩ ma too tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: Salute Asyncritus , Phlegon , Hermas , Patrobas , Hermes , and the brethren which are with them .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ - m Asɛŋkiliti na Fəlekɔŋ na Helemɛsɩ na Patəlɔpasɩ na Hɛɛmasɩ na tá taapalaa təna mpa pa wɛ pa cɔlɔ tɔ .

text: Salute Philologus , and Julia , Nereus , and his sister , and Olympas , and all the saints which are with them .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ - m Filolɔkɩ na Sulii na Nelee na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kɔɣɔ , na Olɛmpasɩ na Ɩsɔ yəlaa mpa pa wɛ pa cɔlɔ tɔ .

text: Salute one another with an holy kiss . The churches of Christ salute you .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ təmaɣa teu na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ na ɩ ́ lɛlɩ . Kilisiti sɛɛlaa kpeka təna sɩ pá sɛɛ - mɛɣɛ teu .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , mark them which cause divisions and offences contrary to the doctrine which ye have learned ; and avoid them .
text2: Ma taapalaa mɛ , ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na mpa pa kɔŋna faɣasʋɣʋ kɛ mə hɛkʋ na pá tolisiɣi Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa tɔ . Mpɛ ɩnɩ pa sɔɔla sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ ŋku pa sɛɣɛsa - mɛ tɔ kʋ wakəlʋɣʋ kɛ ́ . Ɩ ́ taa kpətəna - wɛ .

text: For they that are such serve not our Lord Jesus Christ , but their own belly ; and by good words and fair speeches deceive the hearts of the simple .
text2: Pə taɣa Tacaa Kilisiti təmlɛ kɛ yəlaa mpɛ pa takanaa lakɩ se . Ama pa maɣamaɣa pa kʋnyɩɩləŋ nyəntʋ kɛ pa təŋəɣɩ təna . Pa nɔɔleleŋ taka . Pá kpa yʋlʋ kɛ pa nɔɣɔ taa cənɛ , hei . Pa wakələɣɩ mpa pa ta cɛkəna tɔ pa hʋwɛɛ .

text: For your obedience is come abroad unto all men . I am glad therefore on your behalf : but yet I would have you wise unto that which is good , and simple concerning evil .
text2: Yəlaa təna nyəmá ɩsəna ɩ ́ nɩɩkəna Tacaa kɛ pə təna pə taa tɔ . Pə tɔɔ ma yɔɔləɣɩ mə tɔɔ . Ama ma nyɩɩləɣɩ sɩ ɩ ́ wɛɛ lɔŋ kɛ ́ kʋpantʋ lapʋ kiŋ na ɩ ́ wɛɛ tənaŋŋ . Ɩsaɣatʋ ɩ ́ taa tokina - mɛɣɛ paa pəcɔ .

text: And the God of peace shall bruise Satan under your feet shortly . The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: Ɩsɔ wei ɩ kɔŋna hɛɛsʋɣʋ tɔ ɩ ká tɔtəlɩ Satanɩ kɛ mə nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ kɛ ́ nɔɔnɔɔ . Tacaa Yesu ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ kɛ tam tɔɔ .

text: Timotheus my workfellow , and Lucius , and Jason , and Sosipater , my kinsmen , salute you .
text2: Ma təmlɛ taa taapalʋ Timotee sɛɛ - mɛ . Ma lʋlʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma Lusiyusi na Yasɔŋ na Sɔsəpatɛɛ pɛlɛ sɩ pá sɛɛ - mɛ tɔtɔ .

text: I Tertius , who wrote this epistle , salute you in the Lord .
text2: Nmaalʋ Tɛlətiyusi má , ma sɛɛ - mɛ tɔtɔ , tá təna tə kpɛnta Tacaa təŋʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ .

text: Gaius mine host , and of the whole church , saluteth you . Erastus the chamberlain of the city saluteth you , and Quartus a brother .
text2: Ma mʋʋlʋtəyaɣa tʋ Kayusi wei ɩ tɛ pa kotiɣi Yesu sɛɛʋ tɔ , ɩ sɛɛ - mɛ . Ɩlasətɩ wei ɩ nyənəɣɩ ɩcatɛ liɣitee tɔɔ tɔ , na tá taapalʋ Kaatusi pa sɛɛ - mɛ .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti ɩ ́ la mə tənaɣa pɛɛlɛɛ . Ami .

text: Now to him that is of power to stablish you according to my gospel , and the preaching of Jesus Christ , according to the revelation of the mystery , which was kept secret since the world began ,
text2: Tə sa Ɩsɔ . Ɩnɩ ɩ pəsəɣəna na ɩ ́ la na ɩ ́ nyɔɔ toŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ taa təkeŋkeŋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ wei ma kpaaləɣɩ tɔ ɩ wɛɛ . Na ntɩ ɩnəɣɩ ma tɩɩ lakəna waasʋ kɛ Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ . Na kʋlʋmtʋ ntəɣəlɛ na Ɩsɔ sɩɩ ɩsəna mpi na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ - wɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ tɔ . Mukaɣa tɛɛ kɛ ́ pɩɩ wɛɛ na kaɣana tə ́ cɛkəna . Pɩɩ taaŋa ɩ taa kɛ ́ , ɩ ta hʋlɩ nɔɣɔlʋ .

text: But now is made manifest , and by the scriptures of the prophets , according to the commandment of the everlasting God , made known to all nations for the obedience of faith :
text2: Ama kaɣana pə naakɩ teu kɛ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa takəlasɩ taa , na paa wei ɩ ́ cɛkəɣəna . Teitei ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ wei ɩ wɛ tam tɔ ɩ ka sɩɩʋ sɩ piitimnaa ɩ ́ cɛkəna na pá tisi na pá təŋ tɔ .

text: To God only wise , be glory through Jesus Christ for ever . Amen .
text2: Ɩsɔ wei ɩ tike ntɛ ́ laɣatʋ tɔ , ɩ ́ hiki teeli kɛ tam . Pə la ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ . Ami .

text: Paul , called to be an apostle of Jesus Christ through the will of God , and Sosthenes our brother ,
text2: Maɣa Pɔɔlɩ , Ɩsɔ luɣu lapəna na má la Yesu Kilisiti tillu . Má na tá taapalʋ Sɔsətɛɛnɩ tə ŋmaakəna takəlaɣa kanɛ .

text: Unto the church of God which is at Corinth , to them that are sanctified in Christ Jesus , called to be saints , with all that in every place call upon the name of Jesus Christ our Lord , both theirs and ours :
text2: Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa kpekəle nyə ́ ma mpa mɛ ɩ ́ wɛ Kɔlɛntɩ taa tɔɣɔ tə ŋmaa - kɛ . Mɛ mpa Ɩsɔ yaawa sɩ ɩ ́ la ɩ nyə ́ ma , na mə na Yesu Kilisiti mə kpɛntʋɣʋ tɔɔ ɩ ́ tɩ - mɛ tɔ . Mə na pa təna mpa pa wɛ paa timpi na pá yaakɩ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti wei ɩ kɛ ́ tá na - wɛ tá Sɔsɔ tɔ ɩ hətɛ tɔ .

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Tacaa Ɩsɔ na tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti pá la - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ na pá ha - mɛɣɛ alaafəya .

text: I thank my God always on your behalf , for the grace of God which is given you by Jesus Christ ;
text2: Ma sɛɛ ma Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tam sɩ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pɛɛlɛɛ nna ɩ lapa - mɛɣɛ Yesu Kilisiti kiŋ tɔ a tɔɔ .

text: That in every thing ye are enriched by him , in all utterance , and in all knowledge ;
text2: Kʋpam mə na Kilisiti mə kpɛntʋɣʋ tɔɔ pə saa - mɛɣɛ təcam . Ɩlɛna pə ́ tɩɩ kələna yɔɣɔtaɣa na nyəm pə saaʋ .

text: Even as the testimony of Christ was confirmed in you :
text2: Tampana nna pa yɔɣɔta Kilisiti tɔɔ tɔ a səŋa mə hɛkʋ kɛ teu təca .

text: So that ye come behind in no gift ; waiting for the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Na pə wɛ mpʋ tɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ yelaa na pə təna pə ́ saa - mɛ . Mɛ mpa ɩ ́ taŋa wʋlɛ nte Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti ká hʋ ́ lɩ ́ ɩ tɩ tɔ .

text: Who shall also confirm you unto the end , that ye may be blameless in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti ɩnɩ ɩ ka tɔkəna - mɛɣɛ teu haləna tənaɣa . Ɩlɛna kʋyaŋku ɩ kʋyakʋ ká tala tɔ pá taa na kawalaɣa nakələɣɩ mə kiŋ .

text: God is faithful , by whom ye were called unto the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Ɩsɔ wei ɩ yaa - mɛ sɩ mə na ɩ Pəyaɣa Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ tɔ , mpi mpi ɩ tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la tɔ , ɩ tɔka - wəɣɩ , ɩɩ yeki .

text: Now I beseech you , brethren , by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye all speak the same thing , and that there be no divisions among you ; but that ye be perfectly joined together in the same mind and in the same judgment .
text2: Tɔʋ , ma taapalaa ma wiikəna - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ nyənna Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti na ɩ ́ lá nɔɣɔ kʋlʋmaɣa , na faɣasʋɣʋ ɩ ́ taa wɛɛ mə hɛkʋ . Ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ teu , ɩ ́ maɣasəɣɩ ləmaɣasɛɛ kʋlʋmɛɛ , ɩ ́ hʋʋkɩ hʋwɛɛ kʋlʋmɛɛ .

text: For it hath been declared unto me of you , my brethren , by them which are of the house of Chloe , that there are contentions among you .
text2: Ma taapalaa , pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Kolowee təyaɣa nyə ́ ma heela - m sɩ ɩ ́ yooki kɛ ́ .

text: Now this I say , that every one of you saith , I am of Paul ; and I of Apollos ; and I of Cephas ; and I of Christ .
text2: Nti ma caa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ mə taa paa wei na ɩ nyəntʋ kɛ ́ na tə mpaa . Lɛlʋ tɔŋ sɩ : Pɔɔlɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma wɛɛ . Na ɩnɛ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ sɩ Apɔlɔɔsɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma wɛɛ . Ɩnɛ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ sɩ Piyɛɛ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma wɛɛ . Na ɩnɛ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ sɩ Kilisiti tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma wɛɛ .

text: Is Christ divided ? was Paul crucified for you ? or were ye baptized in the name of Paul ?
text2: Ɩ ́ hʋʋkɩ sɩ Kilisiti faɣa ɩ taa təyəpəlɛɛ kɛ ́ ? Pɔɔlɩ səpəna səm tesika tɔɔ kɛ ́ mə tɔɔ ? Pɔɔlɩ hətɛ kɛ pa yaanaa na pá sɔ - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm na ?

text: I thank God that I baptized none of you , but Crispus and Gaius ;
text2: Ma sama Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ timpi ma ta sɔ mə taa nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ lʋm tɔ , ye pə taɣa Kəlisipusi na Kayusi pa paasi .

text: Lest any should say that I had baptized in mine own name .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ nɔɣɔlʋ kaa yɔɣɔtɩ təfoo sɩ Pɔɔlɩ hətɛ kɛ pa yaanaa na pá sɔna - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm .

text: And I baptized also the household of Stephanas : besides , I know not whether I baptized any other .
text2: Ɛɛhɛɛ ma sɔɔwa , ma sɔ Sətefanasɩ təyaɣa nyə ́ ma tɔtɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ lʋm . Ye pə kaasa lɛlaa ma ta tɔɔsɩ pa tɔɔ .

text: For Christ sent me not to baptize , but to preach the gospel : not with wisdom of words , lest the cross of Christ should be made of none effect .
text2: Pə taɣa Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Kilisiti tila - m . Ama ɩ tila - m kɛ ́ sɩ má kpaalɩ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ . Na ye ma kpaaləɣɩ - ɩ , má taa kpaaləna yʋlʋ ləmaɣasɛɛ nɔɔleleŋ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ pə ́ taa kɔɔ na Kilisiti tesika tɔɔ səm tɔm məlɩ yem .

text: For the preaching of the cross is to them that perish foolishness ; but unto us which are saved it is the power of God .
text2: Letaa ɩsɛntaa , Yesu tesika tɔɔ səm tɔm kɛ ́ kʋmɛlɛntʋ tɔm kɛ ́ . Ama tá mpa pə tɔŋna tá nyɔɔŋ yapʋ tɔ Ɩsɔ toma ntɛ ́ taɣa təna .

text: For it is written , I will destroy the wisdom of the wise , and will bring to nothing the understanding of the prudent .
text2: Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Maa wakəlɩ ləmaɣasɛɛ nyə ́ ma ləmaɣasɛɛ , maa lɔ nyəntaa nyəm .

text: Where is the wise ? where is the scribe ? where is the disputer of this world ? hath not God made foolish the wisdom of this world ?
text2: Ləmaɣasɛɛ tʋ tasəɣɩ ntiɣi yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ tɔtɔ ? Na ntiɣi akewe ká tasa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ ? Yaa ntiɣi antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ taa ləmaɣasɛɛ tʋ ká maɣasɩ tɔtɔ ? Ɩsɔ hʋlaa sɩ antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ taa , mpi pa yaa ləmaɣasɛɛ tɔ , pə kɛ ́ kʋmɛlɛntʋ kɛ ́ .

text: For after that in the wisdom of God the world by wisdom knew not God , it pleased God by the foolishness of preaching to save them that believe .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , antulinya taa yəlaa na pa ləmaɣasɛɛ pa kpisa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ nyəm kɛ timpi Ɩsɔ ná lapəna ɩ ləmaɣasɛɛ sɩ pá nyəna - ɩ tɔ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ hʋʋ teu sɩ , ɩ ká ya mpa pa tɛŋna - ɩ pa taa tɔ , na Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ wei tə kpaaləɣɩ tɔ . Laapaalɩ kʋpaŋ ɩnəɣɩ wei ɩ ta na tɔ ɩ yaa sɩ kʋmɛlətɔm .

text: For the Jews require a sign , and the Greeks seek after wisdom :
text2: Yuta nyə ́ ma ná caa pá ná piti təma na pə ́ cɔ ́ . Ama ləmaɣasɛɛ kɛ Kəlɛɛkɩ nyə ́ ma ná pɛɛkəɣɩ .

text: But we preach Christ crucified , unto the Jews a stumblingblock , and unto the Greeks foolishness ;
text2: Ama tá ɩlɛ , Kilisiti wei pa kama səm tesika tɔɔ tɔ ɩ tɔm kɛ tə kpaaləɣɩ . Tɔm tənɛ tə huɣi Yuta nyə ́ ma , na mpa pɛlɛ pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ pa nyənəɣɩ - təɣɩ kʋmɛlətɔm kɛ ́ .

text: But unto them which are called , both Jews and Greeks , Christ the power of God , and the wisdom of God .
text2: Ama mpa Ɩsɔ yaawa tɔ , paa Yuta nyə ́ ma taa , paa mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ pa taa tɔ , Kilisiti kɛna - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ toma na Ɩsɔ ləmaɣasɛɛ .

text: Because the foolishness of God is wiser than men ; and the weakness of God is stronger than men .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , yʋlʋ pəyaɣa ləmaɣasɛɛ təna ta tala Ɩsɔ kʋmɛlɛntʋ , na pa toma təna ta tala Ɩsɔ ɩcantʋ tete .

text: For ye see your calling , brethren , how that not many wise men after the flesh , not many mighty , not many noble , are called :
text2: Kʋpam , ma taapalaa , ɩ ́ nyənɩ na ɩ ́ ná sɩ Ɩsɔ yaaʋ - mɛ na ɩ ́ la kpekəle tɔ , antulinya taa cənɛ mpa pa yaa ləmaɣasɛɛ nyə ́ ma tɔ pa fɛɩ paɣalɛ kɛ mə hɛkʋ , na toŋtʋnaa fɛɩ paɣalɛ , na awulumpiya fɛɩ paɣalɛ .

text: But God hath chosen the foolish things of the world to confound the wise ; and God hath chosen the weak things of the world to confound the things which are mighty ;
text2: Ɩsɔ ləsəna mpi antulinya yəlaa yaa sɩ kʋmɛlənyəm tɔ sɩ pə ́ tʋ ləmaɣasɛɛ nyə ́ ma kɛ fɛɛlɛ . Na ɩ ləsa mpi antulinya yəlaa yaa sɩ ɩcantʋ tɔ sɩ pə ́ tʋ akpala nyə ́ ma kɛ fɛɛlɛ .

text: And base things of the world , and things which are despised , hath God chosen , yea , and things which are not , to bring to nought things that are :
text2: Na ɩ ləsa mpi antulinya yəlaa nyənəɣɩ taaləm na pá footiɣi na paa nyənəɣɩ - wəɣɩ pʋlʋ maɣamaɣa tɔ , sɩ pə ́ wakəlɩ mpi pa tʋɣʋna nyʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: That no flesh should glory in his presence .
text2: Ɩlɛ yʋlʋ pəyaɣa nakəlɩ ka kaa sa ka təɣɩ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa .

text: But of him are ye in Christ Jesus , who of God is made unto us wisdom , and righteousness , and sanctification , and redemption :
text2: Ama Ɩsɔ kpɛnta mə na Yesu Kilisiti kɛ ́ , na ɩ lapa na Kilisiti pəsɩ tá ləmaɣasɛɛ . Kilisiti tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ nyənəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ yʋlʋpama . Ɩnɩ ɩ lapəna na tə ́ pəsɩ Ɩsɔ nyə ́ ma , na kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ yapəna tá nyɔɔŋ .

text: That , according as it is written , He that glorieth , let him glory in the Lord .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Ye wei ɩ ́ caa ɩ sa , ɩ ́ sa nti Tacaa lapa tɔ , ɩ ́ taa sa ɩ tɩ .

text: And I , brethren , when I came to you , came not with excellency of speech or of wisdom , declaring unto you the testimony of God .
text2: Ma taapalaa , waatʋ wei ma kɔma mə tɛ sɩ ma heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ tampana nna a ŋmɛlaa tɔ a tɔm tɔ , pə taɣa nɔɔleleŋ wawawa nɩɩlɩ , yaa nyəmtʋ natələɣɩ ma lapənaa .

text: For I determined not to know any thing among you , save Jesus Christ , and him crucified .
text2: Ma caɣalɛ tənaɣa mə kiŋ ma ta caa sɩ má la natələɣɩ mə hɛkʋ kɛ yem na pə ́ tá kɛ ́ Yesu Kilisiti tɔm . Ɩsɩɩ pa kama - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ tɔ pə tɔm maɣamaɣa kɛ ma siɣisinaa .

text: And I was with you in weakness , and in fear , and in much trembling .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma poluɣu mə tɛ tɔ ɩcantʋ taa kɛ ́ , na ma selaɣana sɔɣɔntʋ kɛ ́ .

text: And my speech and my preaching was not with enticing words of man ' s wisdom , but in demonstration of the Spirit and of power :
text2: Pə taɣa yʋlʋ ləmaɣasɛɛ yekuɣu na pá yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔmnaa na caŋəm kɛ ɩsəna mpi tɔɣɔ ma sɛɣɛsəna ma sɛɣɛsəŋ na má lana ma waasʋ . Ama Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu toma kɛ ma lapənaa , na a naa mpʋ təkeelee .

text: That your faith should not stand in the wisdom of men , but in the power of God .
text2: Ɩlɛna mə Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ səŋ Ɩsɔ toma tɔɔ , pə ́ taa səŋ yəlaa ləmaɣasɛɛ tɔɔ .

text: Howbeit we speak wisdom among them that are perfect : yet not the wisdom of this world , nor of the princes of this world , that come to nought :
text2: Paa na mpʋ tɔ , mpa pa pɩɩ Ɩsɔ nyəm taa tɔ ləmaɣasɛɛ mpaaʋ kɛ ma hʋləɣɩ - wɛ . Ama pə taɣa ləmaɣasɛɛ nna antulinya ɩnɛ na mpa pa kɛ ́ ɩ toŋtʋnaa na paa tɛ na pá kpiisi - wɛ tɔ pa yaa ləmaɣasɛɛ tɔ .

text: But we speak the wisdom of God in a mystery , even the hidden wisdom , which God ordained before the world unto our glory :
text2: Ama Ɩsɔ ləmaɣasɛɛ mukaɣa tɛɛ nyəna nna a ŋmɛla yəlaa tɔ a tɔm kɛ ma kpaaləɣɩ . Ɩsɔ ka ləsəna - yɛ na ɩ ́ sɩɩ tá teeli tɔɔ na pəcɔ pá la antulinya .

text: Which none of the princes of this world knew : for had they known it , they would not have crucified the Lord of glory .
text2: Antulinya taa cənɛ toŋtʋnaa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ta cɛkəna Ɩsɔ ləmaɣasɛɛ anɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye paa cɛkənaa pa taa ká Tacaa teeli tʋ kɛ səm tesika tɔɔ .

text: But as it is written , Eye hath not seen , nor ear heard , neither have entered into the heart of man , the things which God hath prepared for them that love him .
text2: Pə lapaɣa ɩsɩɩ pa ŋmaaʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ sɩ : Mpi yʋlʋ ta tɩɩ naʋ na ɩ ta nɩɩ pə tɔm tɔ . Mpi pə tɔɔ yʋlʋ ta tɩɩ hʋʋ tɔ , Ɩsɔ taɣana - wəɣɩ mpa pa sɔɔla - ɩ tɔ pa tɔɔ .

text: But God hath revealed them unto us by his Spirit : for the Spirit searcheth all things , yea , the deep things of God .
text2: Tá tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kula kʋŋmɛlətʋ tənɛ na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kiŋ . Mmm Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ wiiliɣi pə təna pə taa kɛ ́ sɩ kʋ naa . Paa nti tə pəlɛ Ɩsɔ tʋɣɩ na tə ́ ŋmɛlaa təkulukulu tɔ maɣamaɣa .

text: For what man knoweth the things of a man , save the spirit of man which is in him ? even so the things of God knoweth no man , but the Spirit of God .
text2: Pə wɛʋ yəlaa taa tɔ awe nyəŋ lɛlʋ taa tɔm ? Ye pə taɣa yʋlʋ ləmaɣasəlɛ nte tə wɛ ɩ taa tɔ ńtɛ ́ tɩɩ nyəna ɩ tɔm . Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ na Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu , ŋkʋ kʋ nyəmna Ɩsɔ nyəntʋ təna .

text: Now we have received , not the spirit of the world , but the spirit which is of God ; that we might know the things that are freely given to us of God .
text2: Pə taɣa antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ ləmaɣasəlɛ kɛ pə tʋ - tʋ . Ama Feesuɣu ŋku kʋ lɩɩna Ɩsɔ kiŋ tɔɣɔ , sɩ tə ́ cɛkəna pə təna mpi Ɩsɔ ha - tʋ tɔ pə tɔm .

text: Which things also we speak , not in the words which man ' s wisdom teacheth , but which the Holy Ghost teacheth ; comparing spiritual things with spiritual .
text2: Pə taɣa yʋlʋ ləmaɣasɛɛ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ nɔɔleleŋ wei tɔɣɔ tə yɔɣɔtəɣəna pə tɔm . Ama nti Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu sɛɣɛsəɣɩ tɔɣɔ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ mpa pa wɛna Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu tɔ tə kɛɛsəɣɩ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ nyəm tampana .

text: But the natural man receiveth not the things of the Spirit of God : for they are foolishness unto him : neither can he know them , because they are spiritually discerned .
text2: Wei ɩ fɛɩna Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu tɔ ɩɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ mʋ Feesuɣu kʋnɛ kʋ tampana . Ɩ yaa - təɣɩ kʋmɛlətɔm kɛ ́ , na ɩɩ tɩɩ pəsəɣɩ tə cɛkənaʋ maɣamaɣa . Mpi pə tɔɔ tɔ , wei ɩ wɛna Feesuɣu tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ paasi ɩ cɛkəɣənana - tɩ .

text: But he that is spiritual judgeth all things , yet he himself is judged of no man .
text2: Yʋlʋ wei ɩ wɛna Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ cɛkəɣənana tə təna . Nɔɣɔlʋ fɛɩ wei ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ cɛkəna Feesuɣu ŋkʋ kʋ tɔm tɔ .

text: For who hath known the mind of the Lord , that he may instruct him ? But we have the mind of Christ .
text2: Pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Awe nyəmna Tacaa hʋwɛɛ ? Awe pəsəɣəna na ɩ ́ tasa - ɩ tɔm ? Ama tá ɩlɛ , Kilisiti hʋwɛɛ kɛ tá wɛna .

text: And I , brethren , could not speak unto you as unto spiritual , but as unto carnal , even as unto babes in Christ .
text2: Ma taapalaa , tampana tɔɔ ɩsəntɔ , ma ɩlɛ ma ta pəsɩ na má yɔɣɔtəna - mɛ ɩsɩɩ pa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋna mpa pa wɛna Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu tɔ . Ama ma yɔɣɔtəna - mɛɣɛ ɩsɩɩ pa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋna mpa pa təŋəɣɩ antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ hʋwɛɛ tɔ , ɩsɩɩ piya kɔsəkɔsənaa kɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ taa .

text: I have fed you with milk , and not with meat : for hitherto ye were not able to bear it , neither yet now are ye able .
text2: Pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ kafa kɛ ma suukaɣa - mɛ , pə taɣa mʋtʋ . Ɩ ́ taa nyənta tɔɣɔʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ , na haləna saŋa ɩ ́ ta nyənta tɔɣɔʋ .

text: For ye are yet carnal : for whereas there is among you envying , and strife , and divisions , are ye not carnal , and walk as men ?
text2: Mpi tɔ , ɩ ́ tɔŋna antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ hʋwɛɛ kɛ təŋʋɣʋ kɛ ́ . Ɩsəsɛɛmlɛ na yoou pə wɛʋ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mə hɛkʋ tɔ , mpʋ ɩnɩ pɩɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ sɩ antulinya hʋwɛɛ kɛ ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ ? Pɩɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ tɔtɔ sɩ ɩ ́ lakɩ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ yəlaa kɛ yem , pə taɣa Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa ?

text: For while one saith , I am of Paul ; and another , I am of Apollos ; are ye not carnal ?
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , lɛlʋ tɔŋʋɣʋ sɩ Pɔɔlɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma wɛɛ , na ɩnɛ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ sɩ Apɔlɔɔsɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma wɛɛ tɔ , pə taɣa ma ta nyɩ ɩsɔnaa kʋlapʋtʋ kɛ ɩ ́ lakɩ mpʋ ?

text: Who then is Paul , and who is Apollos , but ministers by whom ye believed , even as the Lord gave to every man ?
text2: Aweɣe pa yaa Apɔlɔɔsɩ ? Na aweɣe Pɔɔlɩ ye ? Ta naalɛ tə kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma mpa pa lapa - mɛ na ɩ ́ tɛ Ɩsɔ na mə taa tɔɣɔ . Paa tá taa wei ɩ lapa na ɩ ́ yoosi nti Tacaa tʋ - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ la tɔɣɔ .

text: I have planted , Apollos watered ; but God gave the increase .
text2: Maɣalɛ tʋɣʋ sɔlʋ na Apɔlɔɔsɩ pələna lʋm kɛ kʋ tɔɔ . Ama Ɩsɔ lapəna na kʋ tɛɛ .

text: So then neither is he that planteth any thing , neither he that watereth ; but God that giveth the increase .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tʋɣʋ sɔlʋ na lʋm pəllʋ pa ta kɛ pʋlʋ . Ama Ɩsɔ kɛlɛ tɔm tʋ , ɩnɩ ɩ lapəna na tʋɣʋ tɛɛ .

text: Now he that planteth and he that watereth are one : and every man shall receive his own reward according to his own labour .
text2: Tʋɣʋ sɔlʋ na kʋ tɔɔ lʋm pəllʋ pa teitei kɛ ́ . Ɩsɔ ká kɛɛsəna paa wei ɩ təmlɛ na ɩ ́ fɛlɩ - ɩ .

text: For we are labourers together with God : ye are God ' s husbandry , ye are God ' s building .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tá təmlɛ taa tə kɛ ́ təma taapalaa kɛ ́ , na Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tə lakɩ təmlɛ , na mə kɛna Ɩsɔ təmlɛ . Ɩ ́ wɛɛ tɔtɔɣɔ ɩsɩɩ kutuluɣu ŋku Ɩsɔ ŋmaakɩ tɔ .

text: According to the grace of God which is given unto me , as a wise masterbuilder , I have laid the foundation , and another buildeth thereon . But let every man take heed how he buildeth thereupon .
text2: Ɩsɔ yelina na pə saa - m , na ma tɩɩ paasaa kɛ ́ na má sɩɩ kite ɩsɩɩ ŋmalʋ kʋpaŋ sɩɩkʋɣʋ tɔ . Ama pənɛntɛ lɛlʋ tənəɣəna pə tɔɔ . Paa wei ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na ɩ ́ kena ɩsəna ɩ tənəɣɩ tɔ yoo .

text: For other foundation can no man lay than that is laid , which is Jesus Christ .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Yesu Kilisiti maɣamaɣa kɛna kite , na pə fɛɩ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ tasa kʋfatɛ natələɣɩ sɩɩʋ .

text: Now if any man build upon this foundation gold , silver , precious stones , wood , hay , stubble ;
text2: Lɛlaa wɛɛ na wʋlanaa na nyəɣəlʋɣʋ kʋhʋlʋmʋɣʋ na liɣitee pɛɛ kɛ pa tənəɣɩ pə tɔɔ . Ama lɛlaa ɩlɛ taasɩ na nyɩɩtʋ na kiisi kɛ pɛlɛ pa tənəɣɩ .

text: Every man ' s work shall be made manifest : for the day shall declare it , because it shall be revealed by fire ; and the fire shall try every man ' s work of what sort it is .
text2: Ama hʋʋlɛ wule pɩɩ kuli paa wei ɩ təmlɛ tɔɔ na pá ná tə cakəlɛ . Kʋyakʋ kʋhʋʋnaʋ ŋkʋ kʋ wule tɔ kɔkɔ kɛ ́ . Kɔkɔ ká maɣasəna paa wei ɩ təmlɛ sɩ ka naa mpi tə kɛnaa tɔ .

text: If any man ' s work abide which he hath built thereupon , he shall receive a reward .
text2: Ye wei ɩ təna kite tɔɔ kɛ ́ təmlɛ nte kɔkɔ kaa nyaɣa tɔ , ɩ ká hiki ɩ kʋfɛlʋɣʋ .

text: If any man ' s work shall be burned , he shall suffer loss : but he himself shall be saved ; yet so as by fire .
text2: Ama wei ɩ nyəntɛ ɩ ́ mʋwa , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kʋfɛlʋɣʋ lepa - ɩ kɛ ́ . Ama paa ya ɩ maɣamaɣa na pə ́ maɣana ɩsɩɩ kɔkɔ mpee pɔɔŋ kɛ ɩ lɩɩnaa .

text: Know ye not that ye are the temple of God , and that the Spirit of God dwelleth in you ?
text2: Ɩ ́ nyɩ teu sɩ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ təcaɣalɛ , na Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu cakəna mə taa .

text: If any man defile the temple of God , him shall God destroy ; for the temple of God is holy , which temple ye are .
text2: Ye pə cəpa wei na ɩ ́ wakəlɩ Ɩsɔ təcaɣalɛ , Ɩsɔ ká wakəlɩ pʋntʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ təcaɣalɛ wɛ kɛ ́ tənaŋŋ na mə kiŋ kɛ ɩ cakɩ .

text: Let no man deceive himself . If any man among you seemeth to be wise in this world , let him become a fool , that he may be wise .
text2: Mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa puɣusi ɩ tɩ . Ye mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ hʋʋ sɩ antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ taa pʋntʋ ntɛ ́ ləmaɣasɛɛ tʋ ɩ ́ pəsɩ kʋmɛlɛŋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ wɛɛna ləmaɣasɛɛ kɛ tampana .

text: For the wisdom of this world is foolishness with God . For it is written , He taketh the wise in their own craftiness .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ ná nyənəɣɩ antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ taa ləmaɣasɛɛ kɛ kʋmɛlɛntʋ kɛ ́ . Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ mpʋ sɩ : Ləmaɣasɛɛ nyə ́ ma ləmaɣasɛɛ kɛ Ɩsɔ nyəkəna - wɛɣɛ katɔsɩ na ɩ ́ kpaa - wɛ .

text: And again , The Lord knoweth the thoughts of the wise , that they are vain .
text2: Pa tasa ŋmaaʋ tɔtɔ sɩ : Tacaa nyə ́ ma sɩ ləmaɣasɛɛ nyə ́ ma hʋwɛɛ ta kɛ pʋlʋ .

text: Therefore let no man glory in men . For all things are yours ;
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ yʋlʋ kaa yɔɔləna yəlaa lɛlaa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mə tənna pə təna .

text: Whether Paul , or Apollos , or Cephas , or the world , or life , or death , or things present , or things to come ; all are yours ;
text2: Paa Pɔɔlɩ , paa Apɔlɔɔsɩ , paa Piyɛɛ , paa antulinya , paa weesuɣu , paa səm paa saŋa nyəm , paa cele nyəm , mə tənna pə təna .

text: And ye are Christ ' s ; and Christ is God ' s .
text2: Ama Kilisiti tənna - mɛ , na Ɩsɔ tənna Kilisiti ɩ ́ lɛ ́ .

text: Let a man so account of us , as of the ministers of Christ , and stewards of the mysteries of God .
text2: Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ , ɩ ́ nyənəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ Kilisiti təmlɛ lataa mpa pa niŋ taa pə tʋ Ɩsɔ tampana nna a ŋmɛlaa tɔ .

text: Moreover it is required in stewards , that a man be found faithful .
text2: Ye pa tʋ pʋlʋ lapʋ kɛ yʋlʋ niŋ taa , tampana kɛ ɩ ká təŋ na ɩ ́ lakəna - wɩ .

text: But with me it is a very small thing that I should be judged of you , or of man ' s judgment : yea , I judge not mine own self .
text2: Ye ma kiŋ ɩlɛ , paa mɛ yaa yəlaa ka caɣana sɩ pa pɛɛkəɣɩ ma tɔm taa na pá na , pəlɛ pə ta na má . Ma maɣamaɣa maa pɛɛkəɣɩ ma kiŋ sɩ má ná sɩ ma tewa yaa ma ta te tɔ .

text: For I know nothing by myself ; yet am I not hereby justified : but he that judgeth me is the Lord .
text2: Tampana tɔɔ ɩsəntɔ , ma maɣamaɣa ma kiŋ ma ta na taalɩ nɔɣɔlʋ se . Paa na mpʋ təlɛ tɩɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ sɩ ma tewa təkpataa se . Ama Tacaa ká pɛɛkəna na ɩ ́ ná sɩ ma tewa yaa ma ta te tɔ .

text: Therefore judge nothing before the time , until the Lord come , who both will bring to light the hidden things of darkness , and will make manifest the counsels of the hearts : and then shall every man have praise of God .
text2: Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ , ɩ ́ taa hulina nɔɣɔlʋ tɔm tampana pɛɛkʋɣʋ na pə waatʋ ta tata . Ɩ ́ yele na halɩ Tacaa kɔɔ . Ɩnɩ ɩ ka kulina mpi pə ŋmɛla səkpɛtʋɣʋ tɛɛ tɔ pə tɔɔ təyelele . Na ɩ ká kuli yəlaa lotu taa hʋwɛɛ . Pəlɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ ká sa paa wei ɩsɩɩ pə mʋna ɩ ́ samɩ - ɩ tɔ .

text: And these things , brethren , I have in a figure transferred to myself and to Apollos for your sakes ; that ye might learn in us not to think of men above that which is written , that no one of you be puffed up for one against another .
text2: Ma taapalaa , ma kpaɣa má na Apɔlɔɔsɩ tá tɔm na má kɛɛsəna mpʋ sɩ ɩ ́ cɛkəna ɩtuule nte pa tukaa sɩ : Nti pa ŋmaawa tɔ , taa sɔɔsɩ tə tɔɔ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa yɔɔləna lɛlʋ na ɩ ́ footiɣi lɛlʋ .

text: For who maketh thee to differ from another ? and what hast thou that thou didst not receive ? now if thou didst receive it , why dost thou glory , as if thou hadst not received it ?
text2: Awe yelaa na ń hiki na ń kəlɩ lɛlaa ? Pə təna mpi n wɛna tɔ pə taɣa Ɩsɔ hana - ŋ ? Ye pa ha - ŋ kʋhaʋ ɩlɛ pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ n hɔŋ nyá tɩ ɩsɩɩ nyá lʋpʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ n hikaa ?

text: Now ye are full , now ye are rich , ye have reigned as kings without us : and I would to God ye did reign , that we also might reign with you .
text2: Pʋwɛ , ɩ tɛma hikuɣu kɛ pə təna mpi ɩ ́ nyɩɩləɣɩ tɔ , ɩ ́ tɛma piluɣu . Ɩ ́ tɛma awulaa kɛ pəsʋɣʋ kɛ ́ , na taa wɛ tá kʋnyɔntʋtʋ taa . Ye pɩɩ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ awulaa təsiɣisiɣi kɔlɔ pɩɩ lapa - m leleŋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , saa ɩnɩ tá na - mɛ tɩɩ kpɛnta kawulaɣa tɔɣɔʋ .

text: For I think that God hath set forth us the apostles last , as it were appointed to death : for we are made a spectacle unto the world , and to angels , and to men .
text2: Pə caɣa ɩsɩɩ tillaa taɣa Ɩsɔ pəsəna waalɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , tə wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ yəlaa mpa pa sɩɩwa sɩ paa kʋ patəma taa tɔ . Tə kɛ ́ mpa pa təna pa nyənəɣɩ təcooo tɔ , paa ɩsɔtaa tillaa paa yəlaa .

text: We are fools for Christ ' s sake , but ye are wise in Christ ; we are weak , but ye are strong ; ye are honourable , but we are despised .
text2: Ta pəsa kʋmɛlɛməŋ , na mɩɩ kɛ ́ ləmaɣasɛɛ nyə ́ ma kɛ Kilisiti kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ tɔɔ . Tá kɛ ́ acamaa , na mɛɣɛ toŋtʋnaa . Pa tʋɣʋna - mɛ , ama yem kɛ ́ pa nyənəɣɩ tá .

text: Even unto this present hour we both hunger , and thirst , and are naked , and are buffeted , and have no certain dwellingplace ;
text2: Haləna saŋa wʋlɛ tənɛ , nyɔɣɔsɩ na lʋkɔtʋ kʋɣəna - tʋ , na tə fɛɩna pəcɛkəlɛ . Pa makɩ - tʋɣʋ na tə cɔɔkɩ yem , tə fɛɩna tapasopile .

text: And labour , working with our own hands : being reviled , we bless ; being persecuted , we suffer it :
text2: Tá maɣamaɣa tá kookalɩ kɛ ́ tə lakɩ na tə ́ tɔkəna . Pa tʋʋkɩ - tʋ , na taa sɛɛkɩ - wɛ . Pa tʋɣɩ - tʋɣʋ kʋnyɔŋ , tá sumaɣa sɩ pá tʋ - tʋ .

text: Being defamed , we intreat : we are made as the filth of the world , and are the offscouring of all things unto this day .
text2: Pá kʋɣɩ ta nyɔɔŋ , tɩɩ lɛɛtəɣɩ - wɛɣɛ pa ɩsaɣatʋ . Haləna saŋa paa nyənəɣɩ - tʋ sɩ tə kɛ ́ pʋlʋpʋɣʋ antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ taa . Pa nyənəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ ɩsɩɩ hute yaa pʋntʋ maɣamaɣa .

text: I write not these things to shame you , but as my beloved sons I warn you .
text2: Pə taɣa ma caa sɩ má tʋ - mɛɣɛ fɛɛlɛ tɔɣɔ ma ŋmaawa na má kɛɛsɩ - mɛɣɛ mpʋ . Ama ma luɣu wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ má sɛɣɛsɩ - mɛ ɩsɩɩ ma piya nsi ma luɣu wɛɛ tɔ .

text: For though ye have ten thousand instructors in Christ , yet have ye not many fathers : for in Christ Jesus I have begotten you through the gospel .
text2: Paa ɩ ́ ká hiki sɛɣɛsəlaa kɛ iyisi naanʋwa ( 10000 ) kɛ ́ Kilisiti mpaaʋ tɔm taa mə caa kɛlɛ kʋlʋm . Maɣalɛ mə caa kɛ Kilisiti təŋʋɣʋ tɔm taa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , má kɔnna - mɛɣɛ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ .

text: Wherefore I beseech you , be ye followers of me .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ təŋ ma yaasi .

text: For this cause have I sent unto you Timotheus , who is my beloved son , and faithful in the Lord , who shall bring you into remembrance of my ways which be in Christ , as I teach every where in every church .
text2: Na pə maɣamaɣa pə nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma kʋsa Timotee sɩ ɩ ́ polo mə tɛ . Ɩnɩ ɩ kɛna ma pəyalʋ wei ma sɔɔlaa tɔ . Tacaa tɔm taa ɩ kɛ ́ yʋlʋ wei paa lana naani tɔɣɔ . Ɩ ká kɛɛsɩ - mɛɣɛ yaasi wei ma tɔkaa na má tɔŋna Kilisiti tɔm taa na má hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ paa leɣe Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka taa sɩ pá təŋ tɔ .

text: Now some are puffed up , as though I would not come to you .
text2: Mə taa lɛlaa hʋʋwa sɩ ma kaa kɔɔ , ɩlɛna pá sʋʋ kalampaanɩ lapʋ .

text: But I will come to you shortly , if the Lord will , and will know , not the speech of them which are puffed up , but the power .
text2: Ye Tacaa tisaa maa kɔɔ mə tɛɣɛ nɔɔnɔɔ . Waatʋ ɩnəɣɩ maa ná sɩ kalampaanɩ nyə ́ ma mpɛ , nɔɣɔ taa tike kɛ pa lakɩ , yaa pa waasəɣɩ kʋlɩ .

text: For the kingdom of God is not in word , but in power .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa tɔm ta kɛ nɔɣɔ taa tɔm tike . Ama sɩ ń pəsɩ na ń lakɩ kɛ ́ .

text: What will ye ? shall I come unto you with a rod , or in love , and in the spirit of meekness ?
text2: Ɩ ́ ləsɩ mpi ɩ ́ caa tɔ ɩlɛ . Ɩ ́ caa sɩ má kɔnna kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ , yaa ma kɔɔ təpammm na sɔɔlʋɣʋ ?

text: It is reported commonly that there is fornication among you , and such fornication as is not so much as named among the Gentiles , that one should have his father ' s wife .
text2: Pa tɔŋna mə tɔm kɛ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ kɛ teu kɛ ́ sɩ mə kʋlapʋtʋ wɛ asilima kɛ sɔsɔm . Paa ma ta nyɩ ɩsɔnaa maɣamaɣa kiŋ pa kaa na asilima anɩ a taka . Pa yɔɣɔtaa sɩ mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ ná kpaɣa ɩ caa alʋ .

text: And ye are puffed up , and have not rather mourned , that he that hath done this deed might be taken away from among you .
text2: Paa na mpʋ mɩɩ tɔŋna mə təɣɩ sam pə tɩɩ fɛɩ . Pɩɩ nəɣəsəna kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ kʋlapʋtʋ ntɩ tə ́ wakəlɩ mə laŋa kɛ sɔsɔm , na ɩ ́ ləsɩ mə hɛkʋ kɛ wei ɩnɩ ɩ lapa mpʋ tɔ .

text: For I verily , as absent in body , but present in spirit , have judged already , as though I were present , concerning him that hath so done this deed ,
text2: Paa ma na - mɛ tə wɛ təma na pooluŋ tɔ , ma ləsaɣa wɛ mə kiŋ kɛ tam kɛ ́ . Ye ma , na Tacaa Yesu toma taa ma tɛma apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔm kʋɣʋ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ye maa wɛ mə kiŋ maa lapa tɔ . Waatʋ wei ɩ ́ ká koti na ma ləsaɣa ká wɛɛ mə hɛkʋ tɔ , Tacaa toma ká wɛɛ tá təna tá hɛkʋ taa təna .

text: To deliver such an one unto Satan for the destruction of the flesh , that the spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Ɩ ́ kpaɣa apalʋ ɩnɩ na ɩ ́ pɛtɩ Satanɩ niŋ taa na pə ́ naasɩ - ɩ na ɩ ɩsɛ , ɩlɛna pə ́ waasɩ - ɩ kʋyaŋku Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti ká kɔɔ tɔ .

text: Your glorying is not good . Know ye not that a little leaven leaveneth the whole lump ?
text2: Kʋkʋsʋm pəciimaɣa kpaasəɣəna somtu təna təfʋʋ .

text: Purge out therefore the old leaven , that ye may be a new lump , as ye are unleavened . For even Christ our passover is sacrificed for us :
text2: Ɩ ́ ləsɩ mə hɛkʋ taa kɛ ́ mpi pə lapa - mɛɣɛ asaɣaa tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pəsɩ kʋpama təkpataa . Waatʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ ká nəɣəsəna somtu kʋfatʋ nti tə taa kʋkʋsʋm fɛɩ tɔ . Mpʋ pə maɣamaɣa kɛ ɩ ́ tɩɩ wɛɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tə nika tá Tɛɛʋ acima tɔɣɔʋ kɛ ́ . Mpi tɔ pa tɛma tá Tɛɛʋ acima ɩwəyaɣa kʋɣʋ tɔ se , ŋkɛɣɛlɛ Kilisiti .

text: Therefore let us keep the feast , not with old leaven , neither with the leaven of malice and wickedness ; but with the unleavened bread of sincerity and truth .
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩlɛ tə ́ tɔɣɔ ta acima . Ye tə tɔkɩ - yɛ , tə ́ taa tɔɣɔ - yɛ na potopoto wei ɩ taa kʋkʋsʋm kʋpəm wɛɛ tɔ . Ɩsaɣatʋ na asilima pə lite ntɛ ́ . Ama tə ́ tɔɣɔ tá acima na potopoto wei ɩ taa kʋkʋsʋm fɛɩ tɔ . Ɩnɩ ɩ kɛna potopoto kʋpaŋ na tampana nyəŋ .

text: I wrote unto you in an epistle not to company with fornicators :
text2: Takəlaɣa ŋka maa ŋmaa - mɛ tɔ ka taa ma heela - mɛ sɩ mə na yəlaa mpa pa lakɩ asilima tɔ ɩ ́ taa kpɛntɩ .

text: Yet not altogether with the fornicators of this world , or with the covetous , or extortioners , or with idolaters ; for then must ye needs go out of the world .
text2: Pə taɣa yəlaa tənaɣa yem kɛ ́ ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ . Mpi tɔ , antulinya taa cənɛ mə na asilima nyə ́ ma na nyɩɩllaa na ŋmɩɩlaa na tɩɩŋ laalaa ɩ ́ sitina . Ye ɩ ́ tɔma sɩ ɩ ́ cɔləɣɩ - wɛ , pə wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ́ ká lɩɩ antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ taa kɛlɛ .

text: But now I have written unto you not to keep company , if any man that is called a brother be a fornicator , or covetous , or an idolater , or a railer , or a drunkard , or an extortioner ; with such an one no not to eat .
