text: All flesh is not the same flesh : but there is one kind of flesh of men , another flesh of beasts , another of fishes , and another of birds .
text2: Weesiŋ nyəm təna tɔnəŋ fɛɩ kʋlʋməŋ , yəlaa tɔnəŋ wɛna ɩ mpaa na wontu nyəŋ ná wɛna ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ mpaa tɔtɔ . Sumasɩ tɔnəŋ wɛna ɩ mpaa kɛ ́ na tiina tɔnəŋ náá wɛnna ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ mpaa tɔtɔ .

text: There are also celestial bodies , and bodies terrestrial : but the glory of the celestial is one , and the glory of the terrestrial is another .
text2: Ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ taa nyəm wɛɛtʋ wɛɛ kɛ ́ na atɛ nyəm wɛɛtʋ náá wɛɛ , na ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ taa nyəm wɛɛtʋ teu faɣana atɛ nyəm wɛɛtʋ teu .

text: There is one glory of the sun , and another glory of the moon , and another glory of the stars : for one star differeth from another star in glory .
text2: Ilim wɛna pə maɣamaɣa pə teu kɛ ́ , na ɩsɔtʋ náá wɛna ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ nyəm , na ɩsɔtʋlʋŋasɩ náá wɛna səlɛ sɩ nyəm na sɩ mpaa , na ɩsɔtʋlʋŋasɩ maɣamaɣa teu tɛɛ təma .

text: So also is the resurrection of the dead . It is sown in corruption ; it is raised in incorruption :
text2: Sətaa ká tɛ na pá fe tɔ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ paa wɛɛ . Pa piŋuɣu yʋlʋ tɔ , ɩ səpaɣa . Ama pɩɩ kɔɔ na yʋlʋ fe səm taa tɔ ɩɩ tasəɣɩ səpʋ .

text: It is sown in dishonour ; it is raised in glory : it is sown in weakness ; it is raised in power :
text2: Pa piŋuɣu yʋlʋ tɔ ɩ fɛɩ teu se . Pəyele ɩ kɛ ́ ɩcam kɛ ́ , ama pɩɩ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ fe səm taa tɔ ɩ teu na ɩ toma pə taka .

text: It is sown a natural body ; it is raised a spiritual body . There is a natural body , and there is a spiritual body .
text2: Pa piŋuɣu yʋlʋ tɔ , tɔnʋɣʋ kʋnɛɣɛ pa piŋ . Ama pɩɩ kɔɔ na yʋlʋ fe səm taa tɔ tɔnʋɣʋ ŋku ɩ ká lɩɩna tɔ kʋ kɛ ́ ŋku Feesuɣu tɩ tɔɣɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , tɔnʋɣʋ kʋnɛ kʋ wɛɛtʋ wɛɛ kɛ ́ na tɔnʋɣʋ ŋku Feesuɣu tɩ tɔ kʋlɛ kʋ wɛɛtʋ náá wɛɛ .

text: And so it is written , The first man Adam was made a living soul ; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit .
text2: Kʋpam kɛ ́ , Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ sɩ : Kancaalaɣa yʋlʋ ntɛ ́ Atam na pə ŋma - ɩ tɔ pə tʋ - ɩ weesuɣu kɛ ́ . Ama waalɩ waalɩ Atam ná kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu ŋku kʋ haa weesuɣu tɔɣɔ .

text: Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual , but that which is natural ; and afterward that which is spiritual .
text2: Pə taɣa wei Feesuɣu tɩ tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ caaləna lɩɩʋ . Ama tɔnʋɣʋ kʋnɛɣɛ , pə waalɩ kɛ ́ wei Feesuɣu tɩ tɔ ɩ lɩɩwa .

text: The first man is of the earth , earthy : the second man is the Lord from heaven .
text2: Atɛ tɛtʋ kɛ pa ŋmana kancaalaɣa Atam . Ama waalɩ waalɩ Atam ná lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa kɛ ́ .

text: As is the earthy , such are they also that are earthy : and as is the heavenly , such are they also that are heavenly .
text2: Mpa pa kɛ ́ tɛtʋ tɔɔ nyə ́ ma tɔ pa nəɣəsəna wei pa ŋmana tɛtʋ tɔɣɔ , na mpa pa kɛ ́ ɩsɔtaa nyə ́ ma tɔ pa nəɣəsəna wei ɩ lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa tɔɣɔ .

text: And as we have borne the image of the earthy , we shall also bear the image of the heavenly .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ tə nəɣəsənaʋ yʋlʋ wei pa ŋmana tɛtʋ tɔ , ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɩɩ tɛ na tə ́ nəɣəsəna wei ɩ lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa tɔ .

text: Now this I say , brethren , that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God ; neither doth corruption inherit incorruption .
text2: Ma taapalaa nti ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ , yʋlʋ tɔnʋɣʋ ŋku pə ŋmawa na kʋ taa na caləm tɔ kɩɩ pəsəɣɩ na kʋ tɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa kɛ paa pəcɔ . Pəyele kʋsəpəm ná kaa pəsɩ na pə ́ caɣa tam na pə ́ kaa sɩ .

text: Behold , I shew you a mystery ; We shall not all sleep , but we shall all be changed ,
text2: Natəlɩ tə wɛnna na tə ́ ŋmɛlaa , maa kuli - tɩ na ɩ ́ ná . Ntəɣəlɛ sɩ tá təna tə kaa sɩ . Ama tá təna pɩɩ tɛ na pə ́ laɣasɩ - tʋɣʋ wɛɛtʋ kɛ

text: In a moment , in the twinkling of an eye , at the last trump : for the trumpet shall sound , and the dead shall be raised incorruptible , and we shall be changed .
text2: tɔm kʋlʋm tɔɔ kɛ ́ kpakpaa ɩsɩɩ ɩsɛ cəpəlʋɣʋ kɛ waatʋ wei paa hʋlɩ akantəlɛ sɩ pə təna pə ́ sɩɩ tənaɣa tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pá kɔma na pá hʋlɩ - tɛ , sətaa feŋ kɛ ́ , pa kaa tasa səpʋ , na pɩɩ laɣasɩ taɣa wɛɛtʋ kɛ kʋlaɣasʋ .

text: For this corruptible must put on incorruption , and this mortal must put on immortality .
text2: Tampana tɔɔ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mɛɛ , ɩsɩɩ mpi pɩɩ cakɩ tam tɔ pə kpaɣa mpi pə cakɩ tam tɔ na pə tʋ pə tɔɔ , na mpi pə səkɩ tɔ ɩsɩɩ pə kpaɣa mpi pɩɩ səkɩ tɔ na pə ́ tʋ pə tɔɔ .

text: So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption , and this mortal shall have put on immortality , then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written , Death is swallowed up in victory .
text2: Pə ́ kɔma na mpi pɩɩ cakɩ tam tɔ pə ́ kpaɣa mpi pə cakɩ tam tɔ na pə ́ tʋ pə tɔɔ , na mpi pə səkɩ tɔ pə ́ kpaɣa mpi pɩɩ səkɩ tɔ , ɩlɛ nti pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ pa naŋta səm tənaŋnaŋ tɔ tə lapa tampana ntɛ ́ .

text: O death , where is thy sting ? O grave , where is thy victory ?
text2: Səm leɣe nyá akaɩtʋ wɛɛ ? Səm leɣe nyá toma wɛɛ sɩ ń kʋ ́ ?

text: The sting of death is sin ; and the strength of sin is the law .
text2: Ɩsaɣatʋ haana səm kɛ toma sɩ pə ́ kʋ , na kʋsəsɩɩtʋ sɔsəɣəna ɩsaɣatʋ .

text: But thanks be to God , which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Ama Ɩsɔ fɔɔ . Ɩnɩ ɩ yelina na Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti lakɩ na tə ́ kələɣɩ .

text: Therefore , my beloved brethren , be ye stedfast , unmoveable , always abounding in the work of the Lord , forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord .
text2: Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ ma taapalaa kʋpama , ɩ ́ tɔkɩ mə təɣɩ teu na pʋlʋ ɩ ́ taa ciɣiti - mɛ . Paa kʋyaŋku ɩ ́ sɛɛsɩ ɩsəlɛ na Tacaa təmlɛ lapʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ ́ nyə ́ má sɩ mə ́ na Tacaa ɩ ́ kpɛntaa na ɩ ́ lakɩ təmlɛ nte tɔ pə kaa saalɩ yem .

text: Now concerning the collection for the saints , as I have given order to the churches of Galatia , even so do ye .
text2: Ma tasəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ lɛntɩ , ntəɣəlɛ Ɩsɔ yəlaa mpa pa wɛ Yosalɛm tɔ pa sənaʋ tɔm . Ɩ ́ la teitei ɩsɩɩ maa kɛɛsʋɣʋ Kalatɩ Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka tɔ .

text: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store , as God hath prospered him , that there be no gatherings when I come .
text2: Paa mə taa wei ɩ ́ ləsəɣɩ liɣitee kɛ cimaasɩ cimaasɩ na pə ́ kɛɛsəna ɩsəna mpi ɩ hikaa tɔ na ɩ ́ sɩɩkəna a mpaa . Ye ma kɔma má tala , pə ́ taa wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ́ kɔna mə kʋhaʋ mə kʋhaʋ .

text: And when I come , whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters , them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem .
text2: Má kɔma ma kɔɔ maa tili yəlaa mpa ɩ ́ ká ləsɩ tɔ na má la - wɛɣɛ takəlaɣa na pá kpɛntəna mə kʋcɔɔʋ na pá pona Yosalɛm .

text: And if it be meet that I go also , they shall go with me .
text2: Na ye pə tɩɩ wɛɛ sɩ máá pona , paa sɩɩ - m na má na - wɛ tə ́ polo .

text: Now I will come unto you , when I shall pass through Macedonia : for I do pass through Macedonia .
text2: Maa kɔɔ mə tɛ te , ama Masetoni tɛtʋ taa kɛ ́ maa təŋna na pə ́ cɔ ́ má kɔɔ . Ɩsɩɩ ma təŋna Masetoni na pə ́ cɔ ́ .

text: And it may be that I will abide , yea , and winter with you , that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go .
text2: Ntanyɩ maa caɣa wɛɛ naalɛɣɛ mə tɛ . Pə ta tɩɩ səŋ təca , hilimatɛ waatʋ təna maa wɛɛ , na má tɩɩ kɔma sɩ ma puki paa timpi , ɩ ́ ká səna - m kɛ ́ na má polo .

text: For I will not see you now by the way ; but I trust to tarry a while with you , if the Lord permit .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , maa caa sɩ pə ́ wɛɛ sɩ tɛɛʋ taa kɛ ́ ma təŋaa na má na - mɛɣɛ kʋnaʋ . Ma taa wɛɛ sɩ ye Tacaa luɣu ɩ ́ lapa , má talaa maa caɣa mə tɛɣɛ wɛɛ naalɛ .

text: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost .
text2: Paa na mpʋ ma hʋʋ sɩ Ɩfeesu taa cənɛɣɛ Pɛntakɔnta ká maɣana - m .

text: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me , and there are many adversaries .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , paa na kolontunaa tɔɔ cənɛ tɔ , pə ha - m mpaaʋ kɛ teu kɛ ́ sɩ má la təmlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ .

text: Now if Timotheus come , see that he may be with you without fear : for he worketh the work of the Lord , as I also do .
text2: Timotee ɩ ́ kɔma ɩ tala , ɩ ́ mʋ - ɩ teu na ɩ laŋlɛ hɛɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ lakɩ Tacaa təmlɛ kɛ teu kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ma lakʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: Let no man therefore despise him : but conduct him forth in peace , that he may come unto me : for I look for him with the brethren .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa kpɛɛna - ɩ . Ɩ ́ səna - ɩ na pə səna - ɩ ɩ mpaaʋ taa na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ na ɩ ́ məlɩ ma cɔlɔ , má na tá taapalaa tə taŋa - ɩ kɛ ́ .

text: As touching our brother Apollos , I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren : but his will was not at all to come at this time ; but he will come when he shall have convenient time .
text2: Ye tá taapalʋ Apɔlɔɔsɩ tɔm ɩlɛ , tam kɛ ́ ma kaana - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ na tá taapalaa lɛlaa pa kɔɔ mə tɛ . Ama ɩ luɣu fɛɩ paa pəcɔ sɩ ɩ ́ kɔɔ nɔɔnɔɔ . Ama ɩ ́ hika pə kʋyakʋ ɩ tɛŋ ɩ ́ kɔɔ .

text: Watch ye , stand fast in the faith , quit you like men , be strong .
text2: Ɩ ́ feŋ na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ mpaaʋ kɛ teu . Ɩ ́ nyaɣa apalʋtʋ , ɩ ́ nyɔɔ toŋ .

text: Let all your things be done with charity .
text2: Paa mpiɣi ɩ ́ lakɩ ɩ ́ la təma sɔɔlʋɣʋ tɔɔ .

text: I beseech you , brethren , ( ye know the house of Stephanas , that it is the firstfruits of Achaia , and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints , )
text2: Ntɔŋ ɩ ́ nyəmá Sətefanasɩ na ɩ nyə ́ ma na ? Ɩ ́ nyəmá sɩ Akayi tɛtʋ taa mpɛ pa caaləna Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ mʋɣʋ , na pa lapa Ɩsɔ yəlaa paɣalɛ kɛ kookalɩ . Ma taapalaa ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ,

text: That ye submit yourselves unto such , and to every one that helpeth with us , and laboureth .
text2: yəlaa ɩsɩɩ mpɛ na pa təna mpa pá na - wɛ pa ɩsəlɛ sɛɛna təmlɛ lapʋ tɔ , ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ nti pa heeliɣi - mɛ tɔ .

text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus : for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied .
text2: Ma laŋlɛ hɛɛna Sətefanasɩ na Fɔɔtunatusi na Akaikusi pa kɔntɛ kɛ ́ . Ye mɩɩ wɛnna ma kiŋ timpi ɩ ́ kaa ɩ ́ səna - m tɔ mpɛ pa kɔma ɩlɛ pa səna - m yoo .

text: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours : therefore acknowledge ye them that are such .
text2: Pa kpaasa ma apalʋtʋ ɩsɩɩ pa kpaasʋɣʋ mə nyəntʋ tɔ . Yəlaa ɩsɩɩ mpʋ pə taka kɛ ́ pə mʋna ɩ ́ saŋ teu .

text: The churches of Asia salute you . Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord , with the church that is in their house .
text2: Asii tɛtʋ taa Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka sɛɛ - mɛ . Akilaasɩ na Pilisila na Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa mpa pa kotiɣi pa təyaɣa tɔ pa ha - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa sɛɛtʋ kʋpantʋ .

text: All the brethren greet you . Greet ye one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Ta taapalaa təna mpa pa wɛ cənɛ tɔ pa sɛɛ - mɛ . Ɩ ́ sɛɛ təmaɣa teu na ɩ ́ lɛlɩ .

text: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand .
text2: Pɔɔlɩ má ma maɣamaɣa ma niŋ kɛ ma ŋmaana tɔm tənɛ sɩ ma sɛɛ - mɛ .

text: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ , let him be Anathema Maranatha .
text2: Ye wei ɩɩ caa Tacaa , mpusi ɩ ́ təŋɩ - ɩ . Malanata , Tacaa kɔɔ mpʋ .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
text2: Tacaa Yesu ɩ ́ la - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ .

text: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Yesu Kilisiti tɔm taa ma sɔɔla mə tənaɣa .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timothy our brother , unto the church of God which is at Corinth , with all the saints which are in all Achaia :
text2: Maɣa Pɔɔlɩ , Ɩsɔ luɣu lapəna na má la Yesu Kilisiti tillu . Má na tá taapalʋ Timotee tə ŋmaakəna takəlaɣa kanɛ . Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa kpekəle nte tə wɛ Kɔlɛntɩ tɔ tə nyə ́ ma mɛɣɛ tə ŋmaa - kɛ . Na Ɩsɔ yəlaa təna mpa pa wɛ Akayi tɛtʋ təna taa tɔ sɩ tə sɛɛkɩ - mɛ .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Tacaa Ɩsɔ na tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti pá la - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ na pá ha - mɛɣɛ alaafəya .

text: Blessed be God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of mercies , and the God of all comfort ;
text2: Tə sa Ɩsɔ tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti Caa . Ɩnɩ ɩ kɛna Caa wei ɩ kʋpantʋ tɔɔwa pə tɩɩ fɛɩ tɔ . Ɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ wei ɩ sɔɔsəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ apalʋtʋ kɛ pə təna pə taa tɔɣɔ .

text: Who comforteth us in all our tribulation , that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble , by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God .
text2: Ɩnɩ ɩ sɔɔsəɣəna - tʋɣʋ apalʋtʋ kɛ tá wahalanaa təna taa sɩ tá maɣamaɣa tə ́ səna mpa wahalanaa lɛlaa kaɣatəɣɩ mpʋ tɔ , na tə ́ pona - wɛɣɛ sənaʋ ŋku tə hika Ɩsɔ kiŋ tɔ .

text: For as the sufferings of Christ abound in us , so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , tə tɔkʋɣʋ Kilisiti kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛ kɛ ɩsəna mpiɣi sɔsɔm tɔ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ Kilisiti sɔɔsəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ apalʋtʋ kɛ sɔsɔm tɔtɔ .

text: And whether we be afflicted , it is for your consolation and salvation , which is effectual in the enduring of the same sufferings which we also suffer : or whether we be comforted , it is for your consolation and salvation .
text2: Tə tɔkɩ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ ́ sɩ pə ́ sɔɔsɩ - mɛɣɛ apalʋtʋ na pə ́ ya mə nyʋɣʋ tɔtɔ . Pə sɔɔsəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ apalʋtʋ kɛ ́ sɩ taa sɔɔsɩ - mɛ na ɩ ́ nyɔɔ toŋ na ɩ ́ pəsɩ na ɩ ́ tɔɣɔna suulu kɛ kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛnaa mpa pa maɣamaɣa tá tɔŋna tɔɣɔʋ tɔ .

text: And our hope of you is stedfast , knowing , that as ye are partakers of the sufferings , so shall ye be also of the consolation .
text2: Tə wɛna naani kɛ ́ teu kɛ mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tə nyəmá sɩ ɩsɩɩ tá na - mɛ tə kpɛnta kʋnyɔŋ tɔɣɔʋ tɔ , pɩɩ kpɛntɩ - tʋɣʋ apalʋtʋ sɔɔsʋɣʋ tɔtɔ .

text: For we would not , brethren , have you ignorant of our trouble which came to us in Asia , that we were pressed out of measure , above strength , insomuch that we despaired even of life :
text2: Ta taapalaa , tə caa sɩ ɩ ́ nyɩ sɩ ɩsəna mpi tə tɔɣɔ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ Asii tɛtʋ taa tɔ pɩɩ nɩɩ - tʋɣʋ sɔsɔm na pə ́ kəlɩ - tʋ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ , haləna tə tɛma tá taa sɩ tá tɔm tɛmaɣa .

text: But we had the sentence of death in ourselves , that we should not trust in ourselves , but in God which raiseth the dead :
text2: Pɩɩ caɣa - tʋɣʋ ɩsɩɩ nɔɣɔlʋ tɔmna sɩ pá kʋ - tʋɣʋ kʋkʋɣʋ . Ama pə lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - tʋ sɩ Ɩsɔ wei ɩ feesiɣi sətaa tɔ ɩ paasi tə taa tʋ tá təɣɩ naani .

text: Who delivered us from so great a death , and doth deliver : in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us ;
text2: Waatʋ wei tɩɩ wɛ səm nɔɣɔ tɔɔ təcomlaa kɛ mpʋ tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ yapəna - tʋ , na ɩnɩ ɩ ká yana - tʋ tɔtɔ . Tampana tə tɛɛləɣɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ teu sɩ ɩ ́ ká tasa - tʋɣʋ yapʋ tɔtɔ .

text: Ye also helping together by prayer for us , that for the gift bestowed upon us by the means of many persons thanks may be given by many on our behalf .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ ká te - tʋ na mə sələməŋ . Na sələməŋ wei yəlaa samaa mɛ ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ ta tɔɔ tɔ , Ɩsɔ ká mʋ - ɩ na ɩ ́ la - tʋɣʋ kʋpantʋ tənɛ ɩnɩ , na yəlaa paɣalɛ sɛɛ - ɩ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ tá tɔɔ .

text: For our rejoicing is this , the testimony of our conscience , that in simplicity and godly sincerity , not with fleshly wisdom , but by the grace of God , we have had our conversation in the world , and more abundantly to you - ward .
text2: Mpi pə tɔɔ tə pəsəɣɩ na tə ́ sa tá tɩ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ tə nyəmá teu kɛ hatuu tá taanaa sɩ Ɩsɔ yaasi kʋpaŋ na tampana nyəŋ kɛ tə tɔkaa na tə ́ lana yəlaa taa , ɩlɛna pə ́ tɩɩ kələna mə kiŋ . Ɩsɔ pɛɛlɛɛ tiikaɣana - tʋ , pə taɣa yʋlʋlaɣatʋ natəlɩ .

text: For we write none other things unto you , than what ye read or acknowledge ; and I trust ye shall acknowledge even to the end ;
text2: Nti ɩ ́ kaləɣɩ tá takəlasɩ taa na ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ tɔ ntəɣəlɛ , pə taɣa natəlɩ tə kaasaa tɔtɔ se . Na ma hʋʋkɩ teu sɩ ɩ ́ ká tɛ na ɩ ́ cɛkəna tɔm tənɛ sɩ ,

text: As also ye have acknowledged us in part , that we are your rejoicing , even as ye also are ours in the day of the Lord Jesus .
text2: ɩ ́ ká yɔɔləɣəna - tʋɣʋ Tacaa Yesu kʋyakʋ wule kɛ ́ na taa yɔɔləɣəna - mɛ . Kaɣana ɩ ́ tá cɛkənta ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ teu se .

text: And in this confidence I was minded to come unto you before , that ye might have a second benefit ;
text2: Maa wɛna naani kɛ tənɛɛnɩ tə tɔɔ tɔɣɔ maa hʋʋwa sɩ maa caaləna mə tɛɣɛ pote na ɩ ́ hiki kʋpantʋ kɛ tɔm naalɛ .

text: And to pass by you into Macedonia , and to come again out of Macedonia unto you , and of you to be brought on my way toward Judaea .
text2: Pɩɩ wɛɛ sɩ ye ma puki Masetoni kɛ maa hɛləna mə tɛ , na ye ma kɔma məlʋɣʋ ma təŋna mə tɛ tɔtɔ . Na ɩ ́ ká səna - m na ye ma puki Yuta pə ́ taa la - m katɛ .

text: When I therefore was thus minded , did I use lightness ? or the things that I purpose , do I purpose according to the flesh , that with me there should be yea yea , and nay nay ?
text2: Waatʋ wei maa hʋʋwa mpaaʋ ŋkʋ kʋ tɔm tɔ faawɩɩ kɛ ma lapa kʋlapʋ na ? Saa wei ma cakɩ na ma sɩɩ mpi ma təŋəɣɩ na má lakɩ tɔ yəlaa hʋwɛɛ kɛ ma təŋəɣɩ ? Ye maa təŋaɣa yəlaa hʋwɛɛ nn na aaɩ pɩɩ wɛnna təntəmlɛ .

text: But as God is true , our word toward you was not yea and nay .
text2: Ɩsɔ tampana tɔɔ ɩsəntɔ , nti ma heela - mɛ tɔ pə taɣa nn na aaɩ pə tisuɣu kɛ təntəmlɛ .

text: For the Son of God , Jesus Christ , who was preached among you by us , even by me and Silvanus and Timotheus , was not yea and nay , but in him was yea .
text2: Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ Yesu Kilisiti wei ɩ tɔm má na Silaasɩ na Timotee tə heela - mɛ tɔ ɩ ta kɛ nn na aaɩ tɔm . Ama ɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ tisuɣu nn wei tɔɣɔ .

text: For all the promises of God in him are yea , and in him Amen , unto the glory of God by us .
text2: Nn ɩnɩ ɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kʋtisitu kɛ ́ . Ɩnɩ ɩ hʋləɣəna sɩ Ɩsɔ lakɩ kʋpantʋ təna nti ɩ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la tɔ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə tisiɣi sɩ : Ami , kɛ Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ sɩ pə ́ kʋsɩ Ɩsɔ teeli .

text: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ , and hath anointed us , is God ;
text2: Ɩsɔ maɣamaɣa yekina na tá na - mɛ tə ́ nyɔɔkɩ toŋ kɛ Kilisiti mpaaʋ taa , na ɩnɩ ɩ faɣana - tʋ na tá mpaa .

text: Who hath also sealed us , and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts .
text2: Ɩnɩ ɩ yʋsəna - tʋ na ɩ kʋyʋsʋm sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ tə kɛ ́ ɩ nyə ́ ma . Na ɩ sɩɩ tá taanaa kɛ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kɛ tɔlʋma sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - tʋ sɩ ɩ sɩɩ - tʋɣʋ kʋpantʋnaa .

text: Moreover I call God for a record upon my soul , that to spare you I came not as yet unto Corinth .
text2: Na Ɩsɔ , mə waalɩ takʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma kisa Kɔlɛntɩ kɛ məlʋɣʋ . Na ye ma tɩɩ looliɣi kɛ ́ , Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ kʋ - m .

text: Not for that we have dominion over your faith , but are helpers of your joy : for by faith ye stand .
text2: Tɩɩ pɛɛkəɣɩ sɩ tə ́ caalɩ - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ təŋ pənɛ na ɩ ́ yele pənɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tə nawa sɩ ɩ ́ tɔka Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ mpaaʋ kɛ teu . Ama tá luɣu wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ tə ́ tʋ - mɛɣɛ niŋ kɛ mə təmlɛ taa na pə ́ waasɩ - mɛ .

text: But I determined this with myself , that I would not come again to you in heaviness .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma tʋwa ma taa sɩ ma kaa kɔɔ mə tɛ , pə ́ cɔ ́ má taa kɔɔ má tasa mə laŋa wakəlʋɣʋ .

text: For if I make you sorry , who is he then that maketh me glad , but the same which is made sorry by me ?
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ye ma wakəla mə laŋa , awe ká hɛɛsəna ma nyəntɛ tɔtɔ ? Ye pə taɣa mpa pa nyəna ma wakələɣɩ tɔ pa tike ?

text: And I wrote this same unto you , lest , when I came , I should have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice ; having confidence in you all , that my joy is the joy of you all .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ maa ŋmaa - mɛɣɛ mpʋ . Ma taa caa sɩ ye ma kɔma na má tala mə tɛ , mpa pə mʋna pá ha - m laŋhʋlʋmlɛ tɔ pá məlɩ - m laŋwakəllɛ haʋ . Ma nyəmá teu sɩ ye ma wɛna laŋhʋlʋmlɛ , mə təna təpaɩ mə nyəna ná hʋlʋmaa tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: For out of much affliction and anguish of heart I wrote unto you with many tears ; not that ye should be grieved , but that ye might know the love which I have more abundantly unto you .
text2: Pɔpɔtʋ fɛɩ , piti sɔsɔ na laŋwakəllɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ na ɩsəlʋm pə taa kɛ ́ ma ŋmaana - mɛɣɛ takəlaɣa ŋkɛ , na pə taɣa sɩ má taɣanɩ mə laŋa wakəlʋɣʋ . Ama sɩ ɩ ́ nyɩ kɛ ́ sɩ ma sɔɔla - mɛ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: But if any have caused grief , he hath not grieved me , but in part : that I may not overcharge you all .
text2: Wei ɩ yelaa na piti kɔɔ mə hɛkʋ tɔ pə taɣa ma laŋlɛ kɛ ɩ wakəlaa , ama mə təna mə laŋa kɛ ɩ wakəlaa . Na paa pə ta tɩɩ kɛʋ mə təna , mə taa paɣalɛ laŋa kɛ ɩ wakəlaa .

text: Sufficient to such a man is this punishment , which was inflicted of many .
text2: Mə taa paɣalɛ tisaa sɩ pá hɔ yʋlʋ ɩnɛ ɩ ŋkpaŋʋɣʋ tɔ , pə maɣaa kɛ ́ .

text: So that contrariwise ye ought rather to forgive him , and comfort him , lest perhaps such a one should be swallowed up with overmuch sorrow .
text2: Ama pənɛntɛ ɩ ́ cɛpɩ - ɩ mpʋ , na ɩ ́ sɔɔsɩ - ɩ apalʋtʋ , pə ́ cɔ ́ pə ́ taa kɔɔ na ɩ laŋlɛ wakəlɩ sɔsɔm na ɩ ́ lɔ tɔ ́ ɔ ́ ŋ .

text: Wherefore I beseech you that ye would confirm your love toward him .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma sɛɣɛsəɣɩ - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ lana yaasinaa mpa paa hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔɔla - ɩ tɔ .

text: For to this end also did I write , that I might know the proof of you , whether ye be obedient in all things .
text2: Ma caakaɣa kɛ ́ sɩ má maɣasɩ - mɛ na má na mə waalɩ , sɩ mə luɣu wɛ tam kɛ ́ ma kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ təŋʋɣʋ yaa mə luɣu fɛɩ . Pə maɣamaɣa pə nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ maa ŋmaa - mɛ .

text: To whom ye forgive any thing , I forgive also : for if I forgave any thing , to whom I forgave it , for your sakes forgave I it in the person of Christ ;
text2: Ye nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ pənta natəlɩ na mɩɩ cɛpɩ - ɩ ma maɣamaɣa ma cɛkɩ - ɩ tɔtɔɣɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye yʋlʋ pənta natəlɩ na má cɛpɩ - ɩ ɩsɩɩ ma cɛpʋ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma lakɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Kilisiti ɩsɛntaa ,

text: Lest Satan should get an advantage of us : for we are not ignorant of his devices .
text2: pəcɔ Satanɩ ɩ ́ taa kɔɔ na ɩ ́ kəlɩ - tʋ . Anɩ tə nyəmá ɩsəna ɩ kʋlapʋtʋ wɛɛ tɔ .

text: Furthermore , when I came to Troas to preach Christ ' s gospel , and a door was opened unto me of the Lord ,
text2: Waatʋ wei ma tala Tʋlʋwasɩ sɩ ma kpaaləɣɩ Kilisiti tɔɔ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔ , Tacaa tɔɔ ma maɣanaa sɩ mpaaʋ wɛɛ faa sɩ má la təmlɛ kɛ teu .

text: I had no rest in my spirit , because I found not Titus my brother : but taking my leave of them , I went from thence into Macedonia .
text2: Paa na mpʋ tɔ , ɩsɩɩ ma ta maɣana tá taapalʋ Titʋ tɔ ma laakalɩ kʋla sɔsɔm kɛ ́ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma yela Tʋlʋwasɩ nyə ́ ma na má tɛɛ Masetoni .

text: Now thanks be unto God , which always causeth us to triumph in Christ , and maketh manifest the savour of his knowledge by us in every place .
text2: Ɩsɔ fɔɔ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tá na Kilisiti tá kpɛntʋɣʋ tɔɔ ɩ tʋ - tʋɣʋ ɩ akaɩtʋ looŋa taa kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ tɛɛna - tʋɣʋ tam . Kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ yekina sɩ tə ́ la na pá nyɩ Kilisiti kɛ paa timpi ɩsɩɩ tulaalʋ sɔɔsʋŋ nɩɩkʋɣʋ paa le tɔ .

text: For we are unto God a sweet savour of Christ , in them that are saved , and in them that perish :
text2: Mpa pa wɛ mpaaʋ kʋwaasʋɣʋ taa na mpa pɛlɛ pa tɔŋna lepu tɔ , tə wɛ pa təna pa kiŋ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ tulaalʋ kʋpaŋ wei Kilisiti hawa Ɩsɔ tɔ ɩ sɔɔsʋŋ .

text: To the one we are the savour of death unto death ; and to the other the savour of life unto life . And who is sufficient for these things ?
text2: Mpa pa tɔŋna lepu tɔ tə wɛ pɛlɛ pa kiŋ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ səm sɔŋ wei ɩ kɔŋna səm tɔ . Ama mpa pa wɛ mpaaʋ kʋwaasʋɣʋ taa tɔ tə wɛ pɛlɛ pa kiŋ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ weesuɣu sɔɔsʋŋ , wei ɩ haakɩ weesuɣu tɔ . Awe pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ la təmlɛ tənɛ tə taka ?

text: For we are not as many , which corrupt the word of God : but as of sincerity , but as of God , in the sight of God speak we in Christ .
text2: Tá fɛɩ ɩsɩɩ lɛlaa paɣalɛ kpakʋɣʋʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm na pá kɛɛkɩ sɩ pə ́ lana - wɛ tɔ . Ama tampana kɛ tá yɔɣɔtəɣɩ na Ɩsɔ naa mpʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩnɩ ɩ tilina - tʋ , na Kilisiti təmlɛ kɛ tə lakɩ .

text: Do we begin again to commend ourselves ? or need we , as some others , epistles of commendation to you , or letters of commendation from you ?
text2: Tɔmnaa panɛ pa hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ sɩ tə caa tə sʋʋ tá tɩ sam taa ? Yaa tɩɩ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ takəlasɩ nsi sɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ sɩ tá kʋlapʋtʋ tewa tɔ ? Yaa tɩɩ sələmɩ - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ ha - tʋɣʋ - səɣɩ mə maɣamaɣa ɩsɩɩ lɛlaa lakʋɣʋ tɔ ?

text: Ye are our epistle written in our hearts , known and read of all men :
text2: Mə maɣamaɣa mə pilima kɛna tá takəlaɣa , na tá lotu taa kɛ ́ pa ŋmaa - kɛ , na yəlaa təna pəsəɣɩ na pá ná na pá kala .

text: Forasmuch as ye are manifestly declared to be the epistle of Christ ministered by us , written not with ink , but with the Spirit of the living God ; not in tables of stone , but in fleshy tables of the heart .
text2: Nn , pə wɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ təkpataa sɩ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ Kilisiti takəlaɣa ŋka ɩ ŋmaawa tɔɣɔ , na taɣa ɩ ŋmaana takəlaɣa kanɛ . Pa ta ŋmaa takəlaɣa kanɛ na ŋmaalaɣa . Ama weesuɣu tʋ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu kɛ pa ŋmaana - kɛ , na pə taɣa pɛɛ kpaatanaa tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa ŋmaawa , ama yəlaa lotu taa maɣamaɣa kɛ pa ŋmaawa .

text: And such trust have we through Christ to God - ward :
text2: Naani wei tə wɛna Ɩsɔ kiŋ kɛ Kilisiti tɔɔ tɔ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ .

text: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves ; but our sufficiency is of God ;
text2: Pɔpɔtʋ fɛɩ , tə kaa pəsɩ na tə tɔ paa pəcɔ sɩ tá maɣamaɣa tá toma kɛ tə lapəna təmlɛ tənɛ . Ɩsɔ yelina na tə ́ pəsəɣɩ na tə ́ lakɩ mpi tə lakɩ tɔ .

text: Who also hath made us able ministers of the new testament ; not of the letter , but of the spirit : for the letter killeth , but the spirit giveth life .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ yelina na tə ́ pəsɩ nɔɣɔ pɛɛlʋɣʋ kʋfam təmlɛ lataa . Na ka ta kɛ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ nti pa ŋmaawa tɔ tə nyəŋka , ama Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu nyəŋka kɛ ́ . Kʋsəsɩɩtʋ nti tə wɛ takəlaɣa taa tɔ tə kʋɣɩ kɛ ́ . Ama Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu ná haa weesuɣu kɛ ́ .

text: But if the ministration of death , written and engraven in stones , was glorious , so that the children of Israel could not stedfastly behold the face of Moses for the glory of his countenance ; which glory was to be done away :
text2: Nmaatʋ pee kɛ pa ŋmaana kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kɛ pɛɛ kpaatanaa tɔɔ . Paa na mpʋ pə hʋla Ɩsɔ teeli kɛ tə təcɛllɛ , na Moisi ɩsɛntaa teekaɣa kɔkɔ nakəlɩ te , nn . Haləna Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma ta pəsɩ na pá nyənɩ ɩ ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ tɔm naalɛ , pəyele ɩ ɩsɛntaa teu mpɩ pɩɩ kɛ ́ mpi pɩɩ tɛ na pə ́ saalɩ yem tɔɣɔ . Ye kʋsəsɩɩtʋ nti təlɛ tə kʋɣɩ tɔ tə ta kisi teeli kɛ hikuɣu ,

text: How shall not the ministration of the spirit be rather glorious ?
text2: kacaŋfana təmlɛ nte Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu ná lakɩ tɔ ?

text: For if the ministration of condemnation be glory , much more doth the ministration of righteousness exceed in glory .
text2: Ye təmlɛ nte tə lapa na yəlaa pəsɩ tasəkəlɛ nyə ́ ma tɔ təlɛ tə ta kisi teeli kɛ hikuɣu , ɩlɛ kacaŋfana nte təlɛ tə lakɩ na yəlaa pəsəɣɩ yʋlʋpama kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa tɔ ?

text: For even that which was made glorious had no glory in this respect , by reason of the glory that excelleth .
text2: Tə tɩɩ pəsəɣɩ na tə ́ yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ tuu lɔŋ teeli ná məla yem kɛ ́ kaɣana nyəŋ tɔɔʋ tɔɔ . Kaɣana nyəŋ tɛɛ - ɩ kɛ ́ təpʋlʋpʋlʋ .

text: For if that which is done away was glorious , much more that which remaineth is glorious .
text2: Mpi pə taaŋa pəcɔ tɔ pəlɛ pə ta kisi teeli kɛ hikuɣu , kacaŋfana mpi pə cakɩ tam tɔɔ tɔ ?

text: Seeing then that we have such hope , we use great plainness of speech :
text2: Tə tɛɛləɣɩ mpʋ tɔɣɔ tá naani tɔɔ sɔsɔm .

text: And not as Moses , which put a vail over his face , that the children of Israel could not stedfastly look to the end of that which is abolished :
text2: Tá fɛɩ ɩsɩɩ Moisi wei ɩ ka taka ɩ ɩsɛntɔɔ kɛ ́ saalaɣa sɩ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma ɩ ́ taa kɔɔ na pá ná ɩ teu mpi pɩɩ tɛ na pə ́ sɩ tɔ pə saalʋɣʋ .

text: But their minds were blinded : for until this day remaineth the same vail untaken away in the reading of the old testament ; which vail is done away in Christ .
text2: Ama pɛlɛ pa ta pəsɩ na pá cɛkəna , na haləna saŋa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə tɩɩ wɛɛ . Ye pa sʋʋ nɔɣɔ pɛɛlʋɣʋ kʋpəm takəlaɣa kɛ kalʋɣʋ kɛ ɩsəntɔ , pa laɣatʋ tɔɔ taka saalaaɣa ŋkɛɣɛ . Yʋlʋ wei na Kilisiti pa kpɛnta kʋlʋm tɔ pʋntʋ tike tɔɔ kɛ ́ saalaɣa kanɛ ka ta kenti .

text: But even unto this day , when Moses is read , the vail is upon their heart .
text2: Na haləna saŋa ɩsəntɔ , ye pa kʋla Moisi takəlasɩ kalʋɣʋ , saalaɣa ŋkɛ ka təka pa laɣatʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: Nevertheless when it shall turn to the Lord , the vail shall be taken away .
text2: Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ mpʋ sɩ : Yʋlʋ kɛɛsəɣəna Tacaa tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩlɛna saalaɣa ŋkɛ ká kɔɔlɩ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: Now the Lord is that Spirit : and where the Spirit of the Lord is , there is liberty .
text2: Tacaa wei ɩ tɔm pa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa cənɛ ɩnɩ tɔ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu kɛ ́ . Ye Tacaa Feesuɣu ɩ ́ wɛ timpi , hɛɛsʋɣʋ wɛnna .

text: But we all , with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord , are changed into the same image from glory to glory , even as by the Spirit of the Lord .
text2: Tá təna mpa tá saalaɣa kɛɛla tá ɩsɛntɔɔ tɔ , Tacaa teu naakɩ tá tɔɔ kɛ ́ tənyənənyənɩ . Na pə laɣasa - tʋɣʋ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ tə ́ nəɣəsəna Tacaa . Tə lɩɩ teu taa kɛ ́ na tə ́ sʋʋ teu kʋkələm lɛmpɩ taa tɔtɔ . Tacaa Feesuɣu lapəna təmlɛ tənɛ tə taka .

text: Therefore seeing we have this ministry , as we have received mercy , we faint not ;
text2: Ɩsɔ kʋpantʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ tʋ - tʋɣʋ təmlɛ tənɛ tə lapʋ , na pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɩɩ lɔɔkɩ tá apalʋtʋ .

text: But have renounced the hidden things of dishonesty , not walking in craftiness , nor handling the word of God deceitfully ; but by manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man ' s conscience in the sight of God .
text2: Tá lɔwa mukaɣa kʋlapʋtʋ fɛɛlɛ fɛɩ nyəntʋ . Tɩɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ təkpaalətʋ . Tɩɩ kɛɛ Ɩsɔ Tɔm , ama tampana kɛ tə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ təcɛɩcɛɩ , na tə ́ lakɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ sɩ yəlaa ɩ ́ tʋ pa laakalɩ kɛ tá tɔɔ na pá ná .

text: But if our gospel be hid , it is hid to them that are lost :
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ wei tə kpaaləɣɩ tɔ ɩ ta kɛ muku tɔm . Ama mpa pa lepa tɔɣɔ ɩ kɛ ́ muku tɔm .

text: In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not , lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ , who is the image of God , should shine unto them .
text2: Antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ taa ɩlɔɣɔʋ mɛləməna - wɛ na paa tɛŋ pa taa na Ɩsɔ . Antulinya taa ɩlɔɣɔʋ ɩnɩ ɩ kentina - wɛ sɩ pá taa na Kilisiti teeli Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ yelaa na pə ́ ná tənyaɩɩ kɛ ɩsəna mpi tɔ . Kilisiti ɩnɩ ɩ kɛləna Ɩsɔ tətɛŋɛlɛŋ .

text: For we preach not ourselves , but Christ Jesus the Lord ; and ourselves your servants for Jesus ' sake .
text2: Pə taɣa tá maɣamaɣa tá tɔm kɛ tə lakɩ waasʋ . Ama Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ nyəntʋ kɛ tə kpaaləɣɩ sɩ Tacaa kɛlɛ . Na Yesu tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə yaakɩ tá təɣɩ mə təmlɛ nyə ́ ma .

text: For God , who commanded the light to shine out of darkness , hath shined in our hearts , to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ .
text2: Ɩsɔ wei ɩ yɔɣɔtaa sɩ pə ́ ná na səkpɛtʋɣʋ cɛ tɔ , kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ lapəna na pə ná tá lotu taa sɩ tə nyɩ təcɛɩcɛɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ teeli wei ɩ ná Kilisiti ɩsɛntaa tənyənənyənɩ tɔ .

text: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels , that the excellency of the power may be of God , and not of us .
text2: Ama tá mpa tə tɔka Ɩsɔ kʋpampam pənɛ tɔ tə wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ cʋɣʋ wontu . Pə lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pá ná teu sɩ Ɩsɔ hana - tʋɣʋ toma sɔsɔɔna anɛɣɛ kʋhaʋ , pə taɣa tá maɣamaɣa tá nyəna .

text: We are troubled on every side , yet not distressed ; we are perplexed , but not in despair ;
text2: Kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛnaa kɛ waanɩ waanɩ pɩɩna - tʋ , ama tə ta kpisi . Nəɣəsɛɛ ná kʋɣɩ - tʋ , paa na mpʋ tɩɩ yeki tɛɛlʋɣʋ .

text: Persecuted , but not forsaken ; cast down , but not destroyed ;
text2: Pa tʋɣɩ - tʋɣʋ kʋnyɔŋ , ama Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ta lɔ - tʋ . Pa huɣi - tʋɣʋ atɛ , ama paa na mpʋ pa ta kʋ - tʋ .

text: Always bearing about in the body the dying of the Lord Jesus , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our body .
text2: Tam tə səkɩ Kilisiti səm kɛ tá tɔnəŋ taa kɛ ́ sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ tá tɔnəŋ kʋlʋməŋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa kɛ ́ ɩ weesuɣu .

text: For we which live are alway delivered unto death for Jesus ' sake , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our mortal flesh .
text2: Tə wɛʋ na tá ɩsɛ kɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ , tam kɛ ́ tə wɛ səm nɔɔsɩ taa kɛ ́ Yesu tɔɔ , sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ ɩ weesuɣu wɛnna tá tɔnəŋ kʋsəpəŋ ɩnɛ ɩ taa .

text: So then death worketh in us , but life in you .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ , səm wɛnna tá taa na pə ́ lakɩ na weesuɣu náá wɛɛ mə taa na kʋ ́ lakɩ .

text: We having the same spirit of faith , according as it is written , I believed , and therefore have I spoken ; we also believe , and therefore speak ;
text2: Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Ma tɛma ma taa na Ɩsɔ tɔɣɔ ma yɔɣɔtaa . Tá tɔtɔ tá hʋwɛɛ wɛ taa tɛmnaʋ mpɩ pə tɔm taa tɔɣɔ tə tɛma ta taa na Ɩsɔ na pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tá nɔɔsɩ tɔɔ ɩɩ suŋ .

text: Knowing that he which raised up the Lord Jesus shall raise up us also by Jesus , and shall present us with you .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , tə nyəmá sɩ Yesu səpa na Ɩsɔ feesi - ɩ tɔ ɩ ká tɛ na ɩ ́ feesi - tʋ na Yesu , na ɩ ́ lá na tá na - mɛ tə ́ səŋ ɩ ɩsɛntaa .

text: For all things are for your sakes , that the abundant grace might through the thanksgiving of many redound to the glory of God .
text2: Mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə lakɩ , Ɩsɔ tɔŋna ɩ pɛɛlɛɛ hʋ ́ lʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɛ yəlaa paɣalɛ kɛ tam kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ la na yəlaa mpɛ pa samaa paɣalɛ sɛɛ - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ , na pə ́ kʋsɩ ɩ teeli .

text: For which cause we faint not ; but though our outward man perish , yet the inward man is renewed day by day .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɩɩ lɔɔ tá apalʋtʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ . Paa pə wɛɛ sɩ tá tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔŋna caamʋɣʋ kɛ pəcɔ tɔ , tá taa ná tɔŋna toŋ sɔɔsʋɣʋ kɛ paa kʋyaŋkuɣu .

text: For our light affliction , which is but for a moment , worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory ;
text2: Kʋnyɔmisi nsi sɩ makʋɣʋna - tʋɣʋ waatʋ waatʋ tɔ sɩ taɣanəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ teeli taa teeli wei ɩ kaa tɛ tɔɣɔ , na teeli ɩnɩ ɩ kəla kʋnyɔməŋ ɩnɩ təcaɣacaɣa .

text: While we look not at the things which are seen , but at the things which are not seen : for the things which are seen are temporal ; but the things which are not seen are eternal .
text2: Pə taɣa mpi pə nyənəɣɩ təkeelee tɔ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə tʋ tá laakalɩ , ama mpi pɩɩ naakɩ tɔ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ . Mpi pə naa təkeelee tɔ pəlɛ pɩɩ leeliɣi . Ama mpi pɩɩ naa tɔ pəlɛ pə wɛ tam tɔɔ .

text: For we know that if our earthly house of this tabernacle were dissolved , we have a building of God , an house not made with hands , eternal in the heavens .
text2: Tá tɔnʋɣʋ kʋnɛ , kʋ wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ cokəle nte tə taa tə sʋʋkɩ tɔ . Na tə nyəmá sɩ saŋa ye pa yɔka cokəle ńtɛ ́ , tə wɛna təsʋʋlɛ kɛ ɩsɔtaa nte Ɩsɔ taŋna - tʋ tɔ . Na lonte ńtɛ ́ Ɩsɔ maɣamaɣa taɣanna - tɛ , na tɩɩ wɛɛ tam tɔɔ .

text: For in this we groan , earnestly desiring to be clothed upon with our house which is from heaven :
text2: Ama pənɛntɛ tə tɔŋna mɔla kɛ ́ na tə ́ taŋaa tətɛɣɛtɛɣɛ sɩ pə ́ tʋ - tʋɣʋ tá ɩsɔtaa wɛɛtʋ .

text: If so be that being clothed we shall not be found naked .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ye pə tʋ - tʋɣʋ tá ɩsɔtaa wɛɛtʋ tə fɛɩ yem se , pəlɛ pə tɔnəŋ wɛɛ tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: For we that are in this tabernacle do groan , being burdened : not for that we would be unclothed , but clothed upon , that mortality might be swallowed up of life .
text2: Kʋpam ye tə wɛ tam kɛ ́ tá atɛ coka anɛ a taa tə mɔləɣɩ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ səɣəla nɩɩ - tʋ . Pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ tə caa sɩ tə ́ lɩɩ tá atɛ tɔnəŋ ɩnɛ ɩ tɔm taa təkpataa se . Ama tə kooliɣi kɛ ́ sɩ pə ́ tʋ - tʋɣʋ ɩsɔtaa nyəŋ tɔtɔ , ɩlɛna weesuɣu nyəm li mpi pə səkɩ tɔ .

text: Now he that hath wrought us for the selfsame thing is God , who also hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit .
text2: Ɩsɔ maɣamaɣa taɣanna - tʋ na ɩ ́ yele sɩ pə ́ laɣasɩ - tʋɣʋ mpʋ na ɩ ́ sɩɩ - tʋɣʋ ɩ Feesuɣu kɛ tɔlʋma sɩ tə ́ nyəna sɩ ɩ sɩɩ - tʋɣʋ kʋpam .

text: Therefore we are always confident , knowing that , whilst we are at home in the body , we are absent from the Lord :
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə nyakɩ apalʋtʋ kɛ tam . Na tə ́ nyəmá sɩ ye tə wɛna tɔnəŋ ɩnɛɣɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam , tə hatələna timpi Tacaa wɛɛ tɔɣɔ .

text: ( For we walk by faith , not by sight : )
text2: Tə tɛma Ɩsɔ na tá taa tɔɣɔ tə tɔŋ , ama tə ta nata na tá ɩsɛ se .

text: We are confident , I say , and willing rather to be absent from the body , and to be present with the Lord .
text2: Tə nyakɩ apalʋtʋ kɛ teu kɛ ́ na tə ́ sɔɔla teu sɩ tə ́ lɩɩ tɔnʋɣʋ kʋnɛ kʋ taa na tə ́ polo tə ́ caɣa Tacaa cɔlɔ .

text: Wherefore we labour , that , whether present or absent , we may be accepted of him .
text2: Mpi tə nyɩɩləɣɩ sɔsɔm tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ paa tə wɛna tá ɩsɛ paa tə fɛɩ , ɩ ́ la - tʋɣʋ luɣu .

text: For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ ; that every one may receive the things done in his body , according to that he hath done , whether it be good or bad .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , paa pə kpa na pə ́ tii pə wɛɛ sɩ tá təna təpaɩ tɩɩ səŋ Kilisiti ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ hʋʋna - tʋ , na pə ́ cɔ ́ pə ́ lɛɛtɩ paa wei kɛ mpi ɩ ka wɛna ɩ ɩsɛ na ɩ ́ la tɔ , ye kʋpantʋ kɛ ɩ ka lapa , pə lɛɛtɩ - ɩ kʋpantʋ , ye ɩsaɣatʋ pə lɛɛtɩ - ɩ təlɛ .

text: Knowing therefore the terror of the Lord , we persuade men ; but we are made manifest unto God ; and I trust also are made manifest in your consciences .
text2: Tə nyəmá mpi pa yaa Tacaa sɔɣɔntʋ tɔ mɛɛ , na tə caa tə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ yəlaa kɛ ́ na pá cɛkəna na pá tisi . Ɩsɔ nyəma - tʋɣʋ teu , na ma hʋʋ sɩ mə nyəma - m mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ hatuu mə taa .

text: For we commend not ourselves again unto you , but give you occasion to glory on our behalf , that ye may have somewhat to answer them which glory in appearance , and not in heart .
text2: Pə taɣa tə tasəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ tá maɣamaɣa kɛ hʋ ́ lʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ ná tá teu . Ama tə pɛɛkəɣɩ kɛ ́ sɩ tə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ tampana nna a tɔɔ ɩ ́ ká yɔɔləna - tʋ , na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ pəsɩ na ɩ ́ cɔ mpa pa yɔɔləɣəna tɔnəŋ tɔɔ kʋlapəm na pa paa fɛɩna taa nyəm tɔ .

text: For whether we be beside ourselves , it is to God : or whether we be sober , it is for your cause .
text2: Ye tampana sɩ tə kɛ ́ kpaŋtʋnaa ɩlɛ Ɩsɔ tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə kɛ ́ kpaŋtʋnaa . Ama ye tə wɛna tá ɩsɛ , mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə wɛna tá ɩsɛ .

text: For the love of Christ constraineth us ; because we thus judge , that if one died for all , then were all dead :
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Kilisiti sɔɔlʋɣʋ caaləɣəna tá mpa tə tɛma tá taa sɩ yʋlʋ kʋlʋm səpa yəlaa təna tɔɔ tɔ , na mpʋ ɩnɩ pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ na paa wei pa kpɛntəna səm .

text: And that he died for all , that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves , but unto him which died for them , and rose again .
text2: Yəlaa təna tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ səpa sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ mpa pa wɛna pa ɩsɛ tɔ pá nyɩ sɩ pə taɣa pa maɣamaɣa pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa wɛɛ . Ama wei ɩ səpa na ɩ ́ fe pa tɔɔ tɔ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: Wherefore henceforth know we no man after the flesh : yea , though we have known Christ after the flesh , yet now henceforth know we him no more .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɩɩ tasəɣɩ yʋlʋhʋwɛɛ təŋʋɣʋ kɛ yem na pə ́ cɔ ́ tə ́ nyɩ yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ , paa ɩsɩɩ tuu ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɩɩ lakaɣa na tə ́ hʋʋkɩ hʋwɛɛ kɛ Kilisiti tɔɔ tɔ , kaɣana tɩɩ lakɩ mpʋ tɔtɔ .

text: Therefore if any man be in Christ , he is a new creature : old things are passed away ; behold , all things are become new .
text2: Ye yʋlʋ na Kilisiti pá kpɛntaa te , pə laɣasa - ɩ wɛɛtʋ kʋfatʋ kɛ ́ . Wɛɛtʋ kʋpəntʋ mʋka yem , wɛɛtʋ kʋfatʋ laɣasəna .

text: And all things are of God , who hath reconciled us to himself by Jesus Christ , and hath given to us the ministry of reconciliation ;
text2: Pə tənaɣa mpʋ Ɩsɔ kiŋ kɛ pə lɩɩnaa , na Kilisiti tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ciika tá na - ɩ na ɩ ́ tʋ - tʋɣʋ təmlɛ sɩ tə ́ la na ɩ ́ na yəlaa lɛlaa pá ciiki .

text: To wit , that God was in Christ , reconciling the world unto himself , not imputing their trespasses unto them ; and hath committed unto us the word of reconciliation .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Kilisiti kiŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ lapənaa na ɩ ́ na ɩ yəlaa təna pá ciiki , ɩ ta hʋʋ pa ɩsaɣatʋ tɔm tɔɔ . Na taɣa ɩ tʋwa sɩ tə ́ kpaaləɣɩ ciikuɣu tɔm tənɛ .

text: Now then we are ambassadors for Christ , as though God did beseech you by us : we pray you in Christ ' s stead , be ye reconciled to God .
text2: Tə kɛ ́ Kilisiti təmlɛ nyə ́ ma sɔsaa kɛ ́ , na pə caɣa kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ yaa - mɛ na tá nɔɔsɩ . Haɩ tə wiikəna - mɛ , Kilisiti tɔɔ ɩ ́ yele na mə na Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ ciiki .

text: For he hath made him to be sin for us , who knew no sin ; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him .
text2: Ɩsaɣatʋ taa wɛɛ Kilisiti kiŋ se , ama Ɩsɔ pəsəna - ɩ ɩsaɣaʋ kɛ tá tɔɔ . Mpʋ pə yelina tá na Kilisiti tá kpɛntʋɣʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ lapa na tə ́ pəsɩ yʋlʋpama .

text: We then , as workers together with him , beseech you also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tá mpa na Ɩsɔ tə lakɩ təmlɛ tɔ , tə wiina - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ taa yele na Ɩsɔ hʋla - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ nna tɔ á pəsɩ yem .

text: ( For he saith , I have heard thee in a time accepted , and in the day of salvation have I succoured thee : behold , now is the accepted time ; behold , now is the day of salvation . )
text2: Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔta ɩ tɔm taa sɩ : Waatʋ wei ma lakaɣa ma kʋpantʋ tɔ ma nɩɩna - ŋ . Yapʋ kʋyakʋ wule ma səna - ŋ . Tɔʋ , pənɛntɛɣɛ pə mʋna Ɩsɔ kʋpantʋ hikuɣu . Saŋa kɛ pə pəsəɣɩ na pə ́ ya yʋlʋ nyʋɣʋ .

text: Giving no offence in any thing , that the ministry be not blamed :
text2: Tɩɩ caa sɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ footi tá təmlɛ , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɩɩ caa tə ́ tusi nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ paa mpi pə taa .

text: But in all things approving ourselves as the ministers of God , in much patience , in afflictions , in necessities , in distresses ,
text2: Ama tə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ pə təna pə taa kɛ ́ sɩ tə kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə caɣana suulu kɛ sɔsɔm na tə ́ tɔkɩ kʋnyɔməŋ na tə ́ wɛ ɩsənyəŋlɛ na laŋwakəllɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa .

text: In stripes , in imprisonments , in tumults , in labours , in watchings , in fastings ;
text2: Pa mapa - tʋ , pa tʋ - tʋɣʋ saləka , pa lapa na yəlaa təna yoona - tʋɣʋ yem yem . Tə lapa kaŋkaŋsi təma , tə keela tá tom , tə səpa nyɔɣɔsɩ .

text: By pureness , by knowledge , by longsuffering , by kindness , by the Holy Ghost , by love unfeigned ,
text2: Tə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ kɛ ́ sɩ tə kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma , na tá yaasi kʋpaŋ taa na tá nyəm taa na tá suulu taa na tá kʋpantʋ lapʋ taa . Na tə lapa mpʋ tɔ na Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toŋ kɛ ́ na tá tampana sɔɔlʋɣʋ .

text: By the word of truth , by the power of God , by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left ,
text2: Na tá waasʋ tampana taa kɛ ́ na Ɩsɔ toma taa . Tampana təŋʋɣʋ kɛna - tʋɣʋ yoou wontu nti tə yoona na tə ́ kentiɣina tá tɔɔ tɔ .

text: By honour and dishonour , by evil report and good report : as deceivers , and yet true ;
text2: Pa tʋɣʋna - tʋɣʋ pəyele pa tʋɣɩ - tʋɣʋ fɛɛlɛ tɔtɔ . Pa tʋʋkɩ - tʋɣʋ , pəyele pa saŋ - tʋ tɔtɔ . Pa nyənəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ pɔpɔtʋnaa kɛ ́ , pəyele taɣalɛ tampana yɔɣɔtəlaa .

text: As unknown , and yet well known ; as dying , and , behold , we live ; as chastened , and not killed ;
text2: Pa nyənəɣɩ - tʋ ɩsɩɩ mpa pa ta nyɩ tɔ pəyele taɣa pa təna pa nyəmá . Pa nyənəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ sətaa , pəyele tá na tá ɩsɛ , na ɩ ́ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ ná mpʋ . Pa tʋɣɩ - tʋɣʋ saləka , paa na mpʋ paa kʋɣɩ - tʋ .

text: As sorrowful , yet alway rejoicing ; as poor , yet making many rich ; as having nothing , and yet possessing all things .
text2: Pa nyəŋsəɣɩ tá ɩsɛ , paa na mpʋ laŋhʋlʋmlɛ taa kɛ ́ tə wɛ tam . Tə wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ kʋnyɔntʋnaa , ama tə sʋsəɣɩ yəlaa paɣalɛ kɛ apititu . Tə wɛ ɩsɩɩ mpa pa fɛɩna pʋlʋ tɔ , pəyele tampana tɔɔ tá wɛnna pə təna .

text: O ye Corinthians , our mouth is open unto you , our heart is enlarged .
text2: Tá taapalaa kʋpama kɛ Kɔlɛntɩ , tampana kɛ tə heeliɣi - mɛ , ye pa faɣa tá taa mɛɣɛ pa makəna .

text: Ye are not straitened in us , but ye are straitened in your own bowels .
text2: Tə sɔɔla - mɛɣɛ , ama mə ́ tá sɔɔləna tá .

text: Now for a recompence in the same , ( I speak as unto my children , ) be ye also enlarged .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma yɔɣɔtəna - mɛ ɩsɩɩ piya . Nti tá hʋʋ mə tɔɔ tɔ mɩ ́ ɩ ́ hʋʋ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tá tɔɔ , ɩ ́ sɔɔlɩ - tʋɣʋ mpʋ tɔtɔ .

text: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers : for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness ? and what communion hath light with darkness ?
text2: Ɩ ́ taa yele na mə na mpa paa tɛŋ pa taa na Ɩsɔ tɔ ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ . Pə taɣa mpa pə ́ mʋna pə ́ kpɛntɩ mə na - wɛ tɔɣɔlɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩsənaɣalɛ kʋpam na ɩsaɣam pɩɩ siti ? Na ɩsənaɣa ilim na ahoo ká siti ?

text: And what concord hath Christ with Belial ? or what part hath he that believeth with an infidel ?
text2: Ɩsənaɣa Kilisiti na Ɩlɔɣɔʋ paa nɩɩna təma ? Wei ɩ tɛŋ ɩ taa na Ɩsɔ na wei ɩɩ tɛŋ ɩ taa na Ɩsɔ tɔ pa kaa we ?

text: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols ? for ye are the temple of the living God ; as God hath said , I will dwell in them , and walk in them ; and I will be their God , and they shall be my people .
text2: Yaa ɩsənaɣa Ɩsɔ təcaɣalɛ na ma ta nyɩ ɩsɔnaa tɩɩŋ pɩɩ kaa ? Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , tá kɛna Ɩsɔ weesuɣu tʋ təcaɣalɛ . Ɩsɔ maɣamaɣa yɔɣɔtəna mpʋ sɩ : Maa caɣa pa kiŋ na maa wɛɛ pa hɛkʋ . Maa pəsɩ pa Ɩsɔ na paa pəsɩ ma yəlaa .

text: Wherefore come out from among them , and be ye separate , saith the Lord , and touch not the unclean thing ; and I will receive you ,
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Tacaa yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Pə wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ́ ká lɩɩ pa hɛkʋ na pə ́ yasɩ mə na - wɛ . Ɩ ́ taa yele na asilima nyəm napəlɩ tokina - mɛ . Ɩlɛ má , maa mʋ - mɛ .

text: And will be a Father unto you , and ye shall be my sons and daughters , saith the Lord Almighty .
text2: Maa pəsɩ mə Caa , na mɩ ́ ɩ ́ pəsɩ ma pəyalaa na ma pɛɛlaa . Tacaa toma təna tʋ yɔɣɔtəna mpʋ .

text: Having therefore these promises , dearly beloved , let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit , perfecting holiness in the fear of God .
text2: Ma taapalaa , taɣa pa yɔɣɔta pə təna mpi pa yɔɣɔta ɩsəntɔ tɔ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɩɩ ləsɩ tá təɣɩ mpi pɩɩ pilisi tɔnʋɣʋ yaa ləsaɣa tɔ pə taa . Tə ́ cáálɩ ́ tá tɩ na tə ́ pəsɩ Ɩsɔ nyə ́ ma təkpataa , na tə ́ wɛɛ ɩ nyamnaʋ taa kɛ ́ tam .

text: Receive us ; we have wronged no man , we have corrupted no man , we have defrauded no man .
text2: Mə ləsasɩ ɩ ́ wɛɛ tá tɔɔ . Tə ta la nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ kawalaɣa nakəlɩ , tə ta hʋlʋsɩ nɔɣɔlʋ , tə ta tɔɣɔ nɔɣɔlʋ tɔɔ .

text: I speak not this to condemn you : for I have said before , that ye are in our hearts to die and live with you .
text2: Pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ ma caa má kʋ ́ mə tɔm tɔɣɔ ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ . Ama pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ma tɛm yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ tɔ sɩ tə sɔɔla - mɛɣɛ sɔsɔm tɔɣɔ pə kpɛnta - tʋɣʋ tam , paa weesuɣu taa paa səm taa .

text: Great is my boldness of speech toward you , great is my glorying of you : I am filled with comfort , I am exceeding joyful in all our tribulation .
text2: Ma wɛna naani kɛ ́ mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ sɔsɔm kɛ ́ , ma yɔɔləɣəna - mɛɣɛ . Tá kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛ təna taa ma wɛna apalʋtʋ kɛ sɔsɔm , na ma laŋhʋlʋmlɛ tɔɔʋ taka .

text: For , when we were come into Macedonia , our flesh had no rest , but we were troubled on every side ; without were fightings , within were fears .
text2: Tə talʋɣʋ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Masetoni tɔ tapasopile fɛɩ paa pəcɔ . Tə maɣana kʋkaɣatəm kɛ pə təna pə taa kɛ ́ , tá na lɛlaa tə sʋʋ lʋpʋ taa kɛ ́ , na nyamnaʋ wɛ tá taa .

text: Nevertheless God , that comforteth those that are cast down , comforted us by the coming of Titus ;
text2: Ama Ɩsɔ wei ɩ haa apalʋtʋ kɛ mpa pa apalʋtʋ lepa tɔ , ɩ ha - tʋɣʋ apalʋtʋ na Titʋ kɔntɛ .

text: And not by his coming only , but by the consolation wherewith he was comforted in you , when he told us your earnest desire , your mourning , your fervent mind toward me ; so that I rejoiced the more .
text2: Na pə taɣa ɩ kɔntɛ tike sɔɔsəna - tʋɣʋ apalʋtʋ . Ama na ɩsəna ɩ kɛɛsa - tʋ sɩ mə sɔɔsa ɩnɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa kɛ apʋlʋtʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ tɔtɔ . Ɩ kɛɛsa - tʋɣʋ ɩsəna ɩ ́ nyɩɩləɣɩ sɩ ɩ ́ na - m tɔ , na ɩsəna mə ɩsɛ nyəŋaa tɔ , na ɩsəna ɩ ́ taŋaa tətɛɣɛtɛɣɛ sɩ ye sɛɛnaʋ ɩ ́ sɛɛna ma tɔɔ tɔ . Pə tɔɔ tɔtɔɣɔ pənɛntɛ ma laŋlɛ hʋlʋma sɔsɔm tɔtɔ .

text: For though I made you sorry with a letter , I do not repent , though I did repent : for I perceive that the same epistle hath made you sorry , though it were but for a season .
text2: Paa maa ŋmaaʋ - mɛɣɛ takəlaɣa na ká pəsɩ mə laŋa tɔ , maa tɔŋ nɔɔnɔɔ sɩ ye maa nyəmá . Mpi tɔ ma nawa sɩ takəlaɣa ŋkɛ ka pəsa mə laŋa kɛ pəcɔ .

text: Now I rejoice , not that ye were made sorry , but that ye sorrowed to repentance : for ye were made sorry after a godly manner , that ye might receive damage by us in nothing .
text2: Ama pənɛntɛ ma laŋlɛ hɛɛwa , pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ ma pəsa mə laŋa tɔ pə tɔɔ . Ama mə laŋpəsəlɛ yeluɣu na ɩ ́ laɣasɩ yaasi tɔ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ . Pə ha Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ mpaaʋ kɛ laŋpəsəlɛ ńtɛ ́ tə taa kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ la ɩ nyəntʋ , haləna mpi tɩɩ lapa - mɛ tɔ pə ta kɛ ɩsaɣatʋ tɔtɔ .

text: For godly sorrow worketh repentance to salvation not to be repented of : but the sorrow of the world worketh death .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , laŋpəsəlɛ nte tə haa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ mpaaʋ na ɩ ́ lakɩ ɩ nyəntʋ tɔ , tə kɔŋna laɣasʋɣʋ kɛ ́ . Na laɣasʋɣʋ kɔŋna nyʋɣʋ yapʋ pə fɛɩ sɩ yʋlʋ ká tɔ sɩ ye maa nyəmá . Ama səm kɛ antulinya nyə ́ ma laŋpəsəlɛ ná kɔŋna .

text: For behold this selfsame thing , that ye sorrowed after a godly sort , what carefulness it wrought in you , yea , what clearing of yourselves , yea , what indignation , yea , what fear , yea , what vehement desire , yea , what zeal , yea , what revenge ! In all things ye have approved yourselves to be clear in this matter .
text2: Laŋpəsəlɛ nte tə maɣana - mɛ tɔ ńtɛ ́ tə hana Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ mpaaʋ na ɩ ́ la ɩ nyəntʋ , na pənɛntɛ ɩ ́ tá na mpi pə tɛmnaa tɔ taa ? Ɩ ́ tá ná ɩsəna mpi laŋpəsəlɛ yelaa na ɩ ́ paasəna mpi pə taa ɩ ́ wɛɛ tɔ pə tɔm kɛ teu , na ɩ ́ pəsɩ na ɩ ́ lá apalaa na ɩ ́ kɛɛlɩ tɔm kɛ mə nyɔɔŋ tɔɔ . Pʋwɛ , paa yaa mpʋ sɩ tɔm tənɛ tə ta maɣa - mɛ . Paa yaa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ nyamnaʋ . Paa yaa mpʋ sɩ ɩ ́ nyɩɩləɣɩ sɩ ɩ ́ na - m . Paa yaa mpʋ sɩ ɩ ́ sɛɛsa ɩsəlɛ . Paa yaa mpʋ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔpa nyʋɣʋ sɩ ɩ ́ hɔŋ ɩsaɣatʋ latʋ ŋkpaŋʋɣʋ . Pə təna pə taa ɩ ́ hʋlaa kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ táá ná tɔm tənɛ tə taa .

text: Wherefore , though I wrote unto you , I did it not for his cause that had done the wrong , nor for his cause that suffered wrong , but that our care for you in the sight of God might appear unto you .
text2: Maa ŋmaa - mɛɣɛ takəlaɣa tɔ , pə taɣa wei ɩ lapa ɩsaɣatʋ ntɩ yaa wei pa lapa - tɩ tɔ pa tɔɔ . Ama sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa təkelekele kɛ ́ lʋpʋ mpi ɩ ́ lʋpa tá tɔɔ tɔ .

text: Therefore we were comforted in your comfort : yea , and exceedingly the more joyed we for the joy of Titus , because his spirit was refreshed by you all .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ mpi ɩ ́ lapa tɔ pə sɔɔsa - taɣa apalʋtʋ tɔtɔ . Pə taɣa apalʋtʋ tike kɛ pə sɔɔsa - tʋ , ama waatʋ wei tə nawa ɩsəna mə təna ɩ ́ sɔɔsa Titʋ kɛ apalʋtʋ na ɩ laŋlɛ hʋlʋmɩ tɔ , tá laŋhʋlʋmlɛ tɔɔ sɔsɔm .

text: For if I have boasted any thing to him of you , I am not ashamed ; but as we spake all things to you in truth , even so our boasting , which I made before Titus , is found a truth .
text2: Ma sam - mɛɣɛ ɩsəna mpiɣi ɩ kiŋ tɔ pə ta la - m fɛɛlɛ . Ɩsəna tə heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ tampana kɛ tam tɔ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ tə pʋɣʋla - mɛɣɛ Titʋ kiŋ , na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ maɣanaa sɩ tampana kɛ ́ .

text: And his inward affection is more abundant toward you , whilst he remembereth the obedience of you all , how with fear and trembling ye received him .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ sɔɔlʋɣʋ kɛ - mɛ tɔɔ sɔsɔm kɛ waatʋ wei ɩ tɔɔsəɣɩ ɩsəna mə təna ɩ ́ see yəlaa , na ɩsəna ɩ ́ mʋ - ɩ na ɩ ́ seliɣina sɔɣɔntʋ tɔ .

text: I rejoice therefore that I have confidence in you in all things .
text2: Ma laŋlɛ hʋlʋma sɔsɔm , pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma tɛɛləɣɩ mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ paa mpi pə taa kɛ ́ .

text: Moreover , brethren , we do you to wit of the grace of God bestowed on the churches of Macedonia ;
text2: Tɔʋ , pənɛntɛ tá taapalaa tə caakɩ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ nyɩ ɩsəna Ɩsɔ pɛɛlɛɛ tɔm lapa Masetoni Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka taa tɔ .

text: How that in a great trial of affliction the abundance of their joy and their deep poverty abounded unto the riches of their liberality .
text2: Kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛnaa mpa pa maɣana Masetoni Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa mpɛ tɔ pa maɣasa - wɛɣɛ teu kɛ ́ . Paa na mpʋ pa laŋhʋlʋmlɛ tɔɔ sɔsɔm , haləna pa kʋpantʋ lapʋ fɛɩ taka , pəyele pa tɩɩ kɛ ́ kʋnyɔntʋnaa kutukutunaa kɛ ́ .

text: For to their power , I bear record , yea , and beyond their power they were willing of themselves ;
text2: Maa looliɣi , ɩsəna mpi pa pəsaa tɔɣɔ pa hawa . Haləna pa tɩɩ hawa na pə ́ tɛɛ ɩsɩɩ pa pəsʋɣʋ wɛɛ tɔ mɛɛ . Pa maɣamaɣa pa nɔkəna

text: Praying us with much intreaty that we would receive the gift , and take upon us the fellowship of the ministering to the saints .
text2: na pá kaana - tʋɣʋ teu sɩ tə ́ la suulu na tə ́ yele na mpɛ pá səna tɔtɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ yəlaa mpa pa wɛ Yuta tɔ .

text: And this they did , not as we hoped , but first gave their own selves to the Lord , and unto us by the will of God .
text2: Na tə taa hʋʋ sɩ pɩɩ tala ɩsəna mpi tɔ pə ́ tɛɛ mpʋ . Kancaalaɣa ɩlɛ Tacaa kɛ pa ha pa tɩ . Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ luɣu lapa na pá ha pa təɣɩ tá tɔtɔ .

text: Insomuch that we desired Titus , that as he had begun , so he would also finish in you the same grace also .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə wiina Titʋ sɩ ɩ ́ polo mə tɛ , na ɩ ́ lakɩ təmlɛ nte ɩ ka caalaa tɔ . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ la na mɩɩ tɛɛsɩ təmlɛ kʋpantɛ tənɛ .

text: Therefore , as ye abound in every thing , in faith , and utterance , and knowledge , and in all diligence , and in your love to us , see that ye abound in this grace also .
text2: Ɩ ́ tɩɩ wɛ toma kɛ pə təna pə taa kɛ ́ , paa taa tɛmnaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ , paa yɔɣɔtaɣa , paa nyəm taa . Mə ɩsəlɛ sɛɛsʋɣʋ tɔm fɛɩ kɛɛsʋɣʋ . Na ɩ ́ tɩɩ sɔɔla - tʋɣʋ , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə sɔɔlaa sɩ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ mə toŋ kɛ təmlɛ kʋpantɛ tənɛ tə taa tɔtɔ .

text: I speak not by commandment , but by occasion of the forwardness of others , and to prove the sincerity of your love .
text2: Nti ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ pə taɣa kʋcaalʋɣʋ nyəntʋ , ama ɩsəna mpi lɛlaa ná sɛɛsa ɩsəlɛ tɔɣɔ ma heeliɣi - mɛ , sɩ ma naa mə sɔɔlʋɣʋ tampana .

text: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ , that , though he was rich , yet for your sakes he became poor , that ye through his poverty might be rich .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ ́ nyəmá Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti pɛɛlɛɛ tɔm mɛɛ . Ɩ ka kɛ ́ toŋ tʋ kɛ ́ . Ama mə tɔɔ ɩ pəsa ɩ təɣɩ kʋnyɔntʋ , sɩ ɩ ́ sʋsɩ - mɛɣɛ toŋ na ɩ kʋnyɔŋ ŋkʋ .

text: And herein I give my advice : for this is expedient for you , who have begun before , not only to do , but also to be forward a year ago .
text2: Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ maa kɛɛsɩ - mɛɣɛ ma hʋwɛɛ kɛ tɔm tənɛ tə taa na ɩ ́ ná . Pə wɛ teu sɩ mpi ɩ ́ ka caala lapʋ kɛ tuu pənte tɔ ɩ ́ lakɩ mpʋ . Mɛɣɛlɛ kancaalaɣa nyə ́ ma mpa pa lapa tɔ . Na mə tɩɩ sɔɔləna hatuu lɔŋ sɩ ɩ ́ lakɩ .

text: Now therefore perform the doing of it ; that as there was a readiness to will , so there may be a performance also out of that which ye have .
text2: Pənɛntɛ ɩ ́ lakɩ mpʋ haləna ɩ ́ tɛɛsɩ təmlɛ tənɛ . Ɩ ́ tɛɛsɩ - tɛ na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ , ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ ka tʋ pə pəlɛ na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ tɔ . Ɩ ́ lana mpi ɩ wɛna tɔ .

text: For if there be first a willing mind , it is accepted according to that a man hath , and not according to that he hath not .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ye yʋlʋ ɩ ́ hana luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ , Ɩsɔ kɛɛsəɣəna mpi pʋntʋ wɛna na ɩ ́ la tɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ mʋ ɩ kʋcɔɔʋ , Ɩsɔ kaa kɛɛsəɣəna mpi pʋntʋ fɛɩna tɔ .

text: For I mean not that other men be eased , and ye burdened :
text2: Pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ pə ́ kpiisi - mɛɣɛ ɩlɛna pə ́ kʋsɩ lɛlaa . Ama pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ paa mpa pá wɛɛna pəcɔ pəcɔ .

text: But by an equality , that now at this time your abundance may be a supply for their want , that their abundance also may be a supply for your want : that there may be equality :
text2: Pə tɔlənaʋ - mɛɣɛ waatʋ ɩnɛ tɔ , ɩ ́ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ səna mpa pɛlɛ pa laŋaa tɔ . Na ye kʋyaŋku mɩɩ laŋaa na pə ́ tɔləna pɛlɛ ɩlɛ , pa pəsɩ na pá səna - mɛ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ́ ká lakɩ na mə təna ɩ ́ wɛɛna teitei .

text: As it is written , He that had gathered much had nothing over ; and he that had gathered little had no lack .
text2: Pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ : Wei ɩ ka tɔɔsa sɔsɔm tɔ pə ta kələna - ɩ . Na wei ɩ ka tɔɔsa pəcɔ tɔ pə ta laŋna - ɩ .

text: But thanks be to God , which put the same earnest care into the heart of Titus for you .
text2: Ɩsɔ fɔɔ , ɩnɩ ɩ yelina na Titʋ lʋkɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mə tɔɔ ɩsɩɩ tá lʋkʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: For indeed he accepted the exhortation ; but being more forward , of his own accord he went unto you .
text2: Ɩ lapa nti tə sələma - ɩ tɔ na pə tɩɩ kəla mpʋ te . Ɩ sɛɛsa ɩsəlɛ kɛ sɔsɔm , haləna ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ tʋ mə tɛ pote pəlɛ .

text: And we have sent with him the brother , whose praise is in the gospel throughout all the churches ;
text2: Tə təŋsa ɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ tá taapalʋ wei Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka təna pʋɣʋləɣɩ ɩ təmlɛ kɛ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔm taa tɔ .

text: And not that only , but who was also chosen of the churches to travel with us with this grace , which is administered by us to the glory of the same Lord , and declaration of your ready mind :
text2: Pəlɛ pə paasi Yesu sɛɛlaa ka ləsəna - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ sɩɩkɩ - tʋɣʋ tá yɛla taa kɛ ́ timpi timpi tə lakɩ təmlɛ kʋpantɛ tənɛɣɛ Tacaa teeli tɔɔ tɔ . Na pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ tɔtɔɣɔ ɩsəna mpi tá luuŋ ná wɛɛ sɩ tə səŋna lɛlaa tɔ .

text: Avoiding this , that no man should blame us in this abundance which is administered by us :
text2: Tə pɛɛkəɣɩ na tə ́ cɔləɣɩ sɩ tə paasʋɣʋna liɣitee sɔsɔɔna anɛ a tɔm tɔ , nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa kɔɔ na ɩ ́ caɣana - tʋ .

text: Providing for honest things , not only in the sight of the Lord , but also in the sight of men .
text2: Paa Tacaa ɩsɛntaa paa yəlaa kiŋ tə pɛɛkəɣɩ sɩ tá kʋpantʋ ɩ ́ lɩɩ təcɛɩcɛɩ .

text: And we have sent with them our brother , whom we have oftentimes proved diligent in many things , but now much more diligent , upon the great confidence which I have in you .
text2: Tə tiliɣi pá na tá taapalʋ lɛlʋ . Tə maɣasa ɩlɛɣɛ tɔm paɣalɛ sɩ tə naa ɩ waalɩ , na tam tə nawa sɩ ɩ sɛɛsa ɩsəlɛ kɛ ́ . Ama pənɛntɛ ɩ tʋ - mɛɣɛ naani kɛ teu , ɩlɛ ɩ sɛɛsa ɩsəlɛ na pə ́ kəlɩ mpʋ .

text: Whether any do inquire of Titus , he is my partner and fellowhelper concerning you : or our brethren be inquired of , they are the messengers of the churches , and the glory of Christ .
text2: Ye Titʋ ɩlɛ ma waalɩ tʋ ntɛ ́ ɩlɛ , má na - ɩ tə lakəna təmlɛ kɛ mə tɔɔ . Tá taapalaa lɛlaa mpa pa sɩɩ - ɩ tɔ , Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka tilina pɛlɛ , na pɛlɛ pa lakɩ kɛ ́ sɩ pá ha Kilisiti kɛ teeli .

text: Wherefore shew ye to them , and before the churches , the proof of your love , and of our boasting on your behalf .
text2: Ɩ ́ la na pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔɔla - wɛ na tampam , ɩlɛna Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka tɛ a taa na á nyɩ sɩ tə sama - mɛ tɔ , pə taɣa yem tɔɔ se .

text: For as touching the ministering to the saints , it is superfluous for me to write to you :
text2: Pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ maa nɔkɩ na ma ŋmaa - mɛɣɛ takəlaɣa na má heeli - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ yəlaa mpa pa wɛ Yuta tɔ pa sənaʋ tɔm ntəɣɩ kʋheelu .

text: For I know the forwardness of your mind , for which I boast of you to them of Macedonia , that Achaia was ready a year ago ; and your zeal hath provoked very many .
text2: Ma nyəmá ɩsəna ɩ ́ lakəna luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ tɔ mɛɛ , haləna ma sama - mɛɣɛ Masetoni nyə ́ ma kiŋ , sɩ tá taapalaa kɛ Akayi tɛtʋ taa nyɔɔsa pa təɣɩ sənaʋ tɔm taa kɛ ́ tuu pənte . Ɩ ́ sɛɛsʋɣʋ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩsəlɛ tɔ pə nyɔmtəɣɩ pa taa paɣalɛ kɛ ́ .

text: Yet have I sent the brethren , lest our boasting of you should be in vain in this behalf ; that , as I said , ye may be ready :
text2: Paa na mpʋ ma tiliɣi tá taapalaa panɛɣɛ mə tɛ , pə ́ cɔ ́ pʋɣʋlʋɣʋ mpi tə pʋɣʋla - mɛɣɛ tɔm tənɛ tə taa tɔ , pá nana pa ɩsɛ . Ma caa kɛ ́ sɩ tampana pá maɣana ɩ ́ nyɔɔsa mə təɣɩ teu na pə ́ la teitei na nti maa heelaɣa - wɛ tɔ .

text: Lest haply if they of Macedonia come with me , and find you unprepared , we ( that we say not , ye ) should be ashamed in this same confident boasting .
text2: Ye pə taɣa mpʋ , ma na Masetoni nyə ́ ma tə ́ kɔma na tə ́ maɣana ɩ ́ ta nyɔɔsɩ mə tɩ , taɣa pə tʋ fɛɛlɛ . Mpi tɔ ɩ ́ yelaa na tə ́ tɛ - mɛ na tá taa kɛ ́ teu . Na ye mə nyəntɛ tɔm ɩlɛ paa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ təlɛ .

text: Therefore I thought it necessary to exhort the brethren , that they would go before unto you , and make up beforehand your bounty , whereof ye had notice before , that the same might be ready , as a matter of bounty , and not as of covetousness .
text2: Ma maɣasaa na ma ná sɩ pə kəla teu sɩ má wiina tá taapalaa panɛ na pá tɛɛ nɔɣɔ na pá polo mə tɛ , na pá taɣanəɣɩ kʋcɔɔʋ kʋpaŋkʋ ŋku ɩ ́ tɔma sɩ ɩ ́ ká la tɔ . Maa kɔɔ na má kɔŋ tɔ , pə təna pə nyɔɔsaa təkeŋkeŋ na pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ kɛ ɩ ́ lapənaa , pə taɣa kʋcaalʋɣʋ nakʋlɩ .

text: But this I say , He which soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly ; and he which soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully .
text2: Ɩ ́ tɔɔsɩ teu sɩ ye wei ɩ tuu pəcɔ , pəcɔɣɔ ɩ ká kʋ , na wei ɩ ́ tuu sɔsɔm , sɔsɔm kɛ ɩ kɔŋ kʋm .

text: Every man according as he purposeth in his heart , so let him give ; not grudgingly , or of necessity : for God loveth a cheerful giver .
text2: Ye mpʋ paa wei ɩ ́ ha ɩsəna pə ha - ɩ tɔ , ɩ ́ taa hana wula yaa kʋcaalʋɣʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , wei ɩ haana laŋhʋlʋmlɛ tɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ sɔɔlaa .

text: And God is able to make all grace abound toward you ; that ye , always having all sufficiency in all things , may abound to every good work :
text2: Na Ɩsɔ wɛna pəsʋɣʋ sɩ ɩ ́ ha - mɛɣɛ kʋpantʋ kɛ sɔsɔm , pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ taa laŋ mpi mpi ɩ ́ nyɩɩləɣɩ tɔ . Ama ɩ ́ hiki , na haləna pə ́ kaasɩ na ɩ ́ lana təma kʋpana .

text: ( As it is written , He hath dispersed abroad ; he hath given to the poor : his righteousness remaineth for ever .
text2: Pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Ɩ haa kʋnyɔntʋnaa na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ . Ɩ kʋpantʋ ɩɩ tɛŋ .

text: Now he that ministereth seed to the sower both minister bread for your food , and multiply your seed sown , and increase the fruits of your righteousness ; )
text2: Ɩsɔ wei ɩ haa tuulu kɛ kʋtutuum na ɩ ́ haa - ɩ tɔɣɔnaɣa sɩ ɩ ́ tɔɔna ɩ tɩ tɔ , Ɩsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ ká ha - mɛɣɛ kʋtutuum təna mpi ɩ ́ nyɩɩləɣɩ tɔ . Ɩsɔ ɩnɩ , ɩ ká la na pə pɩɩ , na mə kʋpantʋ huki sɔsɔm .

text: Being enriched in every thing to all bountifulness , which causeth through us thanksgiving to God .
text2: Ɩsɔ ká tʋ mə niŋ taa kɛ ́ ɩsəna mpi pə wɛɛ tɔɣɔ tam na pə ́ cɔ ́ mɩɩ pəsɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ kʋpantʋ kɛ tam . Ɩlɛ paɣalɛ ká sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ kʋcɔɔŋ wei ɩ ́ lakɩ na tə ́ pukina tɔ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: For the administration of this service not only supplieth the want of the saints , but is abundant also by many thanksgivings unto God ;
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , kookalɩ wei ɩ ́ lakɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ pə taɣa Ɩsɔ yəlaa sənaʋ tɔɔ tike . Ama pə yeki tɔtɔɣɔ na yəlaa sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ .

text: Whiles by the experiment of this ministration they glorify God for your professed subjection unto the gospel of Christ , and for your liberal distribution unto them , and unto all men ;
text2: Kookalɩ ɩnɛ ɩ lapʋ taa kɛ ́ pɩɩ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ mpi ɩ ́ kɛwa tɔ , na yəlaa paɣalɛ ká sana Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩsəna mpi ɩ ́ nɩɩnaa na ɩ ́ lakɩ sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ tɛma mə taa na Kilisiti Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔ . Na paa sa Ɩsɔ tɔtɔɣɔ ɩsəna mpi mə na - wɛ na lɛlaa ɩ ́ talʋɣʋ mə kʋpam na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: And by their prayer for you , which long after you for the exceeding grace of God in you .
text2: Na paa sələməɣəna - mɛ na Ɩsɔ , na paa sɔɔlɩ - mɛɣɛ sɔsɔm kɛ pɛɛlɛɛ taa pɛɛlɛɛ nna Ɩsɔ lapa - mɛ tɔ a tɔɔ .

text: Thanks be unto God for his unspeakable gift .
text2: Ɩsɔ fɔɔ , nyá kʋcɔɔʋ fɛɩ kɛɛsʋɣʋ .

text: Now I Paul myself beseech you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ , who in presence am base among you , but being absent am bold toward you :
text2: Pɔɔlɩ má , ma maɣamaɣa təkpem ma wiikənna - mɛ . Ma wei yəlaa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ sɩ ye ma wɛ mə kiŋ ɩlɛ ma wɛ təhɛɛ . Ama ye ma fɛɩ mə kiŋ ɩlɛ ma apalʋtʋ kpawaɣalɛ . Ma tɛɛkəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ Kilisiti kʋpantʋ na ɩ leleŋ tɔɔ sɩ ,

text: But I beseech you , that I may not be bold when I am present with that confidence , wherewith I think to be bold against some , which think of us as if we walked according to the flesh .
text2: ɩ ́ taa yele na waatʋ wei ma kɔŋ mə tɛ tɔ má hʋ ́ lɩ ́ ma apalʋtʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ma hʋʋ teu sɩ maa hʋlɩ ma apalʋtʋ kɛ mpa pa hʋʋ sɩ tə təŋəɣɩ yʋlʋhʋwɛɛ kɛ yem tɔ .

text: For though we walk in the flesh , we do not war after the flesh :
text2: Kʋpam tə wɛ tá yʋlʋ tɔnʋɣʋ taa yaa , ɩlɛ pə taɣa yʋlʋhʋwɛɛ kɛ yem kɛ ́ tə təŋəɣɩ na tə ́ yookina .

text: ( For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal , but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds ; )
text2: Ama yoou wontu nti tá yoona tɔ tə ta kɛ nti antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ yəlaa yoona tɔ . Ɩsɔ yoou wontu nti tə pəsəɣɩ na tə ́ wakəlɩ təcɔɔsəlɛ toŋ nyəntɛ tɔɣɔ tə yoona . Tə wakələɣɩ pɔpɔtʋ ləmaɣasɛɛ .

text: Casting down imaginations , and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God , and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ ;
text2: Tə kpɛɛsəɣəna pa təna mpa pa lakɩ kalampaanɩ na pá kaɣatəɣɩ sɩ pá taa nyɩ Ɩsɔ tɔ pa hʋwɛɛ . Tə kɛɛ yəlaa hʋwɛɛ təna na toŋ na tə ́ tʋɣɩ Kilisiti tɔɔ sɩ pá nɩɩna - ɩ .

text: And having in a readiness to revenge all disobedience , when your obedience is fulfilled .
text2: Ye mɩɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ la na pə ná sɩ ɩ ́ nɩɩnaa təkpataa , ɩlɛ pə kaasa mpa pa təna na paa caakɩ nɩɩnaʋ tɔ tá sɔɔlʋ pɩɩwa sɩ tə ́ hɔ pa ŋkpaŋŋ .

text: Do ye look on things after the outward appearance ? If any man trust to himself that he is Christ ' s , let him of himself think this again , that , as he is Christ ' s , even so are we Christ ' s .
text2: Paa mpi , pə tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ mə nyənəɣəna . Ye yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ tɛŋ ɩ taa sɩ Kilisiti tənna - ɩ , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ maɣasɩ teu na ɩ ́ ná sɩ Kilisiti tɩ tá tɔtɔɣɔ , ɩsɩɩ ɩ tɩ ɩnɩ tɔ .

text: For though I should boast somewhat more of our authority , which the Lord hath given us for edification , and not for your destruction , I should not be ashamed :
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , paa ma sama ma tɩ na sɔsɔɔntʋ nti Tacaa ha - tʋ tɔ , fɛɛlɛ ɩɩ kpaa - m se . Pə ha - tʋɣʋ sɔsɔɔntʋ ntəɣɩ sɩ pə ́ la na ɩ ́ tɛ mə taa na Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sɔsɔm . Ama pə taɣa sɩ pə ́ wakəlɩ - mɛ .

text: That I may not seem as if I would terrify you by letters .
text2: Ma ŋmaakʋɣʋ ma takəlasɩ tɔ , maa pɛɛkəɣɩ sɩ má kpɛɛtɩ mə pʋntʋ se .

text: For his letters , say they , are weighty and powerful ; but his bodily presence is weak , and his speech contemptible .
text2: Nti yəlaa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Pɔɔlɩ takəlasɩ taa tɔm wɛ toŋ na apalʋtʋ kɛ ́ . Ama waatʋ wei ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ wɛ tá hɛkʋ tɔ ɩ wɛɛ kɛ ́ təhɛɛ na ɩ yɔɣɔtaɣa wɛ kʋnyɔŋ .

text: Let such an one think this , that , such as we are in word by letters when we are absent , such will we be also in deed when we are present .
text2: Ye wei ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ pʋntʋ ɩ ́ nyɩ teu sɩ nti tə ŋmaa tá takəlasɩ taa kɛ ́ waatʋ wei tə fɛɩ mə kiŋ na nti tɩɩ la waatʋ wei tɩɩ wɛɛ mə kiŋ tɔ , pə kaa wɛɛ ŋkaŋka se .

text: For we dare not make ourselves of the number , or compare ourselves with some that commend themselves : but they measuring themselves by themselves , and comparing themselves among themselves , are not wise .
text2: Tə kaa nɔkɩ na tə ́ kɛɛna yaa tə ́ maɣasɩ tá tɩ na lɛlaa mpa pa makɩ pa laŋa taa sɩ pa kɛ ́ pʋlʋ tɔ . Pa kɛ ́ ɩwɛɛŋ kɛ ́ , na pa maɣamaɣa pa caana pa kʋmaɣasʋɣʋ ŋku paa maɣasəna pa tɩ tɔ , na pa taa pa tike kɛ pa kpɛɛsəɣəna təma .

text: But we will not boast of things without our measure , but according to the measure of the rule which God hath distributed to us , a measure to reach even unto you .
text2: Ye tá , tá kaa pəsɩ na tə ́ sa tá tɩ na pə ́ tɛɛ caasa . Ama tə saŋ tá tɩ na pə ́ kɛɛsəna təmlɛ nte Ɩsɔ tʋ - tʋ tɔ tə tənaɣa . Ɩsɔ hana - tʋɣʋ mpaaʋ sɩ tə ́ tala mə tɛ .

text: For we stretch not ourselves beyond our measure , as though we reached not unto you : for we are come as far as to you also in preaching the gospel of Christ :
text2: Ɩsəna pa sɩɩna - tʋ tɔ tɩɩ ŋmaana pə tɔɔ , ye tə taa kɔɔ mə tɛ ɩlɛ mpʋɣʋlɛ . Ama tə tala mə tɛɣɛ teu na tə ́ heeli - mɛɣɛ Kilisiti tɔm Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ .

text: Not boasting of things without our measure , that is , of other men ' s labours ; but having hope , when your faith is increased , that we shall be enlarged by you according to our rule abundantly ,
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɩɩ ŋmaana ɩsəna pa sɩɩna - tʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ . Tɩɩ saŋ tá tɩ na lɛlaa lapa təma nna tɔ . Ama tə caa kɛ ́ sɩ mə taa tɛmnaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ sɔɔsɩ , ɩlɛna tə ́ pəsɩ na tə ́ la təmlɛ nte tə kəla lɔŋ nyəntɛ təcaɣacaɣa tɔɣɔ mə hɛkʋ , na tə taa ŋmaana ɩsəna Ɩsɔ sɩɩ - tʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: To preach the gospel in the regions beyond you , and not to boast in another man ' s line of things made ready to our hand .
text2: Pə waalɩ ɩlɛ tə pəsəɣɩ tə ́ yɛləna Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ tɛtʋnaa mpa pa wɛ mə tɛ lɔlɔ tɔ pa taa , na tə ́ taa sa tá tɩ na nti lɛlaa tɛma lapʋ kɛ pa təma taa tɔ .

text: But he that glorieth , let him glory in the Lord .
text2: Pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Ye wei ɩ ́ caa ɩ sa ɩ tɩ , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ sa ɩ tɩ na nti Tacaa lapa tɔ .

text: For not he that commendeth himself is approved , but whom the Lord commendeth .
text2: Kʋpam , pə taɣa yʋlʋ wei ɩ nyənəɣɩ ɩ tɩ ɩsɩɩ ɩ kɛ ́ pʋlʋ tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ sam yana . Ama wei ɩ tɔɔ Tacaa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ kʋpantʋ tɔɣɔ .

text: Would to God ye could bear with me a little in my folly : and indeed bear with me .
text2: Ma kooliɣi kɛ ́ sɩ ɩsɔwɛɛ ɩ ́ tɩɩ nyənɩ - m pəcɔɣɔ kpaŋtʋ . Pə wɛ mpʋ mɛɛ , ɩ ́ nyənəɣɩ - m mpʋ .

text: For I am jealous over you with godly jealousy : for I have espoused you to one husband , that I may present you as a chaste virgin to Christ .
text2: Ma wɛna ɩsɛsɛɛmlɛ kɛ mə tɔm taa kɛ ́ , ɩlɛ Ɩsɔ tʋna - m ɩsɛsɛɛmlɛ ńtɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ ́ wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ pɛɛlɔ wei ɩ ta nyənta apalʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ na má tɔ sɩ apalʋ kʋlʋm koŋ kɛ maa ha - ɩ tɔ , apalʋ ɩnəɣəlɛ Kilisiti .

text: But I fear , lest by any means , as the serpent beguiled Eve through his subtilty , so your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ .
text2: Ama ma nyaŋ kɛ ́ sɩ pə ́ taa kɔɔ na mə laɣatʋ saalɩ na ɩ ́ lɔ mə na Kilisiti ɩ ́ kpɛntʋɣʋ tam na pə wɛ teu kɛ ɩsəna mpi tɔ . Na pə ́ kɔɔ pə ́ lá ɩsɩɩ Ɩfa ka yeluɣu na tʋm mapɩ - ɩ pɔpɔtʋ tɔm kɛ ɩ nɔɣɔ taa na ɩ ́ tolisi - ɩ tɔ .

text: For if he that cometh preacheth another Jesus , whom we have not preached , or if ye receive another spirit , which ye have not received , or another gospel , which ye have not accepted , ye might well bear with him .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ ́ tɛma mə taa sɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ kɔɔ ɩ ́ kpaalɩ - mɛɣɛ nyɛntɛ Yesu nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ tɔm na pə ́ tá kɛna Yesu wei ɩ tɔm tá kpaala - mɛ tɔ . Na ɩ ́ taŋaa tətɛɣɛtɛɣɛ sɩ ɩ ́ mʋɣɩ nyɛntɛ feesuɣu nakʋlɩ kʋ tɔm na pə ́ tá kɛna Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu ŋku kʋ tɔm tə heela - mɛ tɔ , na nyɛntɛ Laapaalɩ nɔɣɔlʋ na pə ́ tá kɛna Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ wei tə heela - mɛ tɔ .

text: For I suppose I was not a whit behind the very chiefest apostles .
text2: Ma ta hʋʋ sɩ mə nyɛntɛ tillaa taa sɔsaa mpɛ pa tɛɛ - m pʋlʋ taa se .

text: But though I be rude in speech , yet not in knowledge ; but we have been throughly made manifest among you in all things .
text2: Ama pə pəsəɣɩ pə wɛɛ yɔɣɔtaɣa wawawa wei ma ta nyɩ tɔ . Tɔfɔ pa ta kəlɩ - m nyəm . Tə hʋla - mɛɣɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ təcɛɩcɛɩ kɛ ́ paa mpi pə taa kɛ ́ na paa timpi .

text: Have I committed an offence in abasing myself that ye might be exalted , because I have preached to you the gospel of God freely ?
text2: Waatʋ wei ma kpaalaɣa - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔ , faalaa kɛ ma kpaalaɣa . Ma pasa ma təɣɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pə ́ kʋsɩ - mɛ . Yaa ma lapa mpʋ tɔ kawalaɣa ntɛ ́ ?

text: I robbed other churches , taking wages of them , to do you service .
text2: Ma tisaa sɩ Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka lɛnna ɩ ́ fɛləɣɩ - m , ɩlɛ pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ ma hʋlʋsa alɛɣɛlɛ na má səna - mɛ .

text: And when I was present with you , and wanted , I was chargeable to no man : for that which was lacking to me the brethren which came from Macedonia supplied : and in all things I have kept myself from being burdensome unto you , and so will I keep myself .
text2: Waatʋ wei maa wɛ mə tɛ na kʋnyɔŋ wɛna - m tɔ ma ta sʋkɩ mə taa nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ səɣəla . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , tá taapalaa mpa pa lɩɩna Masetoni tɔ pa kɔna - m pə təna mpi pə laŋa - m tɔ . Ma tɔka ma təɣɩ sɩ pə ́ taa kɔɔ na má sʋkɩ mə taa nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ səɣəla . Na mpʋ ɩnəɣɩ maa tɔkəɣɩ ma təɣɩ tam .

text: As the truth of Christ is in me , no man shall stop me of this boasting in the regions of Achaia .
text2: Na Kilisiti tampana nna ma tɔka ɩsəntɔ tɔ ma kaa yele mpi ma yɔɔləɣəna ɩsəntɔ tɔɣɔ yɔɔlənaʋ kɛ Akayi tɛtʋ təna taa .

text: Wherefore ? because I love you not ? God knoweth .
text2: Pepe yelina na ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ ? Ma ta sɔɔlɩ - mɛ tɔ pə tɔɔ yaa ? Ɩsɔ nyəmá teu sɩ ma sɔɔla - mɛ .

text: But what I do , that I will do , that I may cut off occasion from them which desire occasion ; that wherein they glory , they may be found even as we .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ ma lakʋɣʋ pənɛntɛ tɔ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ maa lakɩ , ɩlɛna má ləsɩ mpa pa hɔŋ pa tɩ na pá tɔŋ sɩ tá na - wɛ tə kaa təmlɛ tɔɣɔ pə taa .

text: For such are false apostles , deceitful workers , transforming themselves into the apostles of Christ .
text2: Yəlaa mpɛ pá kɛ ́ tillaa pɔpɔtʋnaa kɛ ́ . Pa looliɣi nti pa lakɩ tɔ tə taa na pá cɛsəɣəna pa tɩ ɩsɩɩ Kilisiti tillaa .

text: And no marvel ; for Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light .
text2: Na təlɛ tə fɛɩ piti mɛɛ , ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Satanɩ maɣamaɣa ná cɛsəɣəna ɩ tɩ ɩsɩɩ ɩsɔtaa tillu kʋpaŋ nɔɣɔlʋ .

text: Therefore it is no great thing if his ministers also be transformed as the ministers of righteousness ; whose end shall be according to their works .
text2: Ye mpʋ pə fɛɩ piti sɩ ɩ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma ɩ ́ cɛsəna pa tɩ ɩsɩɩ siɣisuɣu lataa . Ama te , pɩɩ tɛ na pə ́ fɛlɩ - wɛɣɛ mpi pa lakɩ tɔ .

text: I say again , Let no man think me a fool ; if otherwise , yet as a fool receive me , that I may boast myself a little .
text2: Ma tasəɣɩ - təɣɩ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ kɛ ́ , nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa nyənɩ - m ɩsɩɩ ma kɛ ́ kpaŋtʋ . Yaa ye ɩ ́ tɩɩ nyənəɣɩ - m kpaŋtʋ ntɔ , ɩ ́ yaa - m kpaŋtʋ , ɩlɛna pə ́ cɔ ́ má pəsɩ na má sa ma təɣɩ pəcɔ tɔtɔ .

text: That which I speak , I speak it not after the Lord , but as it were foolishly , in this confidence of boasting .
text2: Nti ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ pə taɣa ntəɣɩ Tacaa luɣu wɛɛ sɩ má sa ma tɩ ɩnɩ . Ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ kpaŋtʋ .

text: Seeing that many glory after the flesh , I will glory also .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , timpi yəlaa lɛlaa saŋ pa tɩ na yʋlʋhʋwɛɛ kɛ yem tɔ , ɩsɩɩ ma sama ma tɩ tɔtɔ mɛɛ .

text: For ye suffer fools gladly , seeing ye yourselves are wise .
text2: Mɛ mpa mɛ mə na mə ɩsɛ tɔ , paa pa ta tɩɩ sələmɩ - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ mʋ kpaŋtʋnaa , ɩ ́ mʋɣɩ - wɛɣɛ .

text: For ye suffer , if a man bring you into bondage , if a man devour you , if a man take of you , if a man exalt himself , if a man smite you on the face .
text2: Ɩ ́ yelaa kɛ ́ sɩ pá pəsɩ - mɛɣɛ yomaa , sɩ pá tɔkəna - mɛ , sɩ pá puɣusiɣi - mɛ , sɩ pá kpaakɩ mə tɔɔ na pá fɛləɣɩ , sɩ pá makɩ mə nɔɔsɩ .

text: I speak as concerning reproach , as though we had been weak . Howbeit whereinsoever any is bold , ( I speak foolishly , ) I am bold also .
text2: Tá ɩcantʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ tá taa la mpʋ . Pə wɛ fɛɛlɛ sɩ má yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ . Paa na mpʋ tɔ , ye nɔɣɔlʋ makɩ kaŋkantɛ sɩ ɩ wɛna mpi ɩ ká saŋna ɩ tɩ tɔ , ma pəsəɣɩ na maa má kaŋkantɛ tɔtɔ mɛɛ . Ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ma sʋʋ kpaŋʋɣʋ .

text: Are they Hebrews ? so am I . Are they Israelites ? so am I . Are they the seed of Abraham ? so am I .
text2: Ntɔŋ pa kɛ ́ Hepəla nyə ́ ma yaa ? Na má tɔtɔɣɔ te . Ntɔŋ pa kɛ ́ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma yaa ? Na má tɔtɔɣɔ te . Ntɔŋ pa kɛ ́ Apəlaham piya yaa ? Na má tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: Are they ministers of Christ ? ( I speak as a fool ) I am more ; in labours more abundant , in stripes above measure , in prisons more frequent , in deaths oft .
text2: Ntɔŋ pa kɛ ́ Kilisiti təmlɛ nyə ́ ma yaa ? Má kɛ ́ Kilisiti təmlɛ tʋ na pə ́ kəlɩ - wɛ . Ma lapa təmlɛ na pə ́ kəlɩ - wɛ . Pa təka - m tɔm paɣalɛ na pə ́ kəlɩ - wɛ . Pa mapa - m na pə ́ kəlɩ - wɛ , səm nɔɣɔ taa kɛ ́ ma wɛ tam .

text: Of the Jews five times received I forty stripes save one .
text2: Tɔm kakpasɩ kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma mapa - m akpatɛɛ pɔɣɔlaɣafɛɩ nɩɩlɛ nɩɩlɛ .

text: Thrice was I beaten with rods , once was I stoned , thrice I suffered shipwreck , a night and a day I have been in the deep ;
text2: Lom nyə ́ ma ná mapa - m tɔm tooso , pa yaɣa - m pɛɛ kɛ tɔm kʋlʋm sɩ pa kʋɣʋ - m . Tɔm tooso kɛ ́ lʋm lipa kpɩɩləŋ wei ɩ taa ma wɛɛ tɔ , ma caɣa ilim kʋlʋməm na ahoo kʋlʋmɛɛ kɛ teŋku taa .

text: In journeyings often , in perils of waters , in perils of robbers , in perils by mine own countrymen , in perils by the heathen , in perils in the city , in perils in the wilderness , in perils in the sea , in perils among false brethren ;
text2: Ma cɔɔʋ katatəlaɣa taa , pusi na ŋmɩɩlaa niŋ taa kɛ ́ ma wɛɛ . Səm nɔɣɔ taa kɛ ́ ma wɛ ma Yuta nyə ́ ma maɣamaɣa hɛkʋ taa , na səm nɔɣɔ taa kɛ ́ ma wɛ kpaɩ nyə ́ ma tɛ . Na səm nɔɣɔ taa kɛ ́ ma wɛ acalɛɛ taa , na səm nɔɣɔ taa kɛ ́ ma wɛ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa . Na səm nɔɣɔ taa kɛ ́ ma wɛ teŋku taa . Na səm nɔɣɔ taa kɛ ́ ma wɛ tá taapalaa kʋcɛsaa kiŋ .

text: In weariness and painfulness , in watchings often , in hunger and thirst , in fastings often , in cold and nakedness .
text2: Pa yaa sɩ kaŋkaŋsi təma na wahalanaa sɔsaa tɔ , má nana . Tɔm paɣalɛ kɛ maa kpətəɣɩ ɩsəlɛ . Nyɔɣɔsɩ na lʋkɔtʋ tɔ , paa pɔɔsəɣɩ . Ma kpisa kʋtɔɣɔʋ tɔɣɔʋ kɛ wulee wulee . Ma tɔɣɔ wahala na watʋ , paa wontuɣu kʋtakʋɣʋ ma fɛɩna .

text: Beside those things that are without , that which cometh upon me daily , the care of all the churches .
text2: Na pə tɩɩ kaasa mpi tɔ , maa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ pə tɔm . Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka təna tɔm nəɣəsɛɛ ná kʋɣʋ - m paa kʋyaŋkuɣu .

text: Who is weak , and I am not weak ? who is offended , and I burn not ?
text2: Ye yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ lapa ɩcam , má lakɩ ɩcam tɔtɔɣɔ . Ye pə tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ kɛ ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ , pə wɩɩkɩ - m kɛ ́ təsəŋŋ .

text: If I must needs glory , I will glory of the things which concern mine infirmities .
text2: Ye pə wɛɛ sɩ má sa ma təɣəlɔ , ma ɩcantʋ ma ɩcantʋ cɔlɔɣɔ maa saŋna ma tɩ .

text: The God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which is blessed for evermore , knoweth that I lie not .
text2: Tacaa Yesu Caa Ɩsɔ nyəmá sɩ maa looliɣi . Ɩnəɣɩ paa saŋ tam .

text: In Damascus the governor under Aretas the king kept the city of the Damascenes with a garrison , desirous to apprehend me :
text2: Maa wɛ Tamasɩ tɔ , wulaʋ sɔsɔ Aletasɩ sɩɩ kʋfənɛɛ wei kɛ təna tɔ ɩ sɩɩ taŋlaa kɛ koluŋa ŋka ka cɔɔna ɩcatɛ tɔ ka nɔɣɔ sɩ pá kpa - m .

text: And through a window in a basket was I let down by the wall , and escaped his hands .
text2: Ama pa tʋ - m sɔɔtɔkʋ sɔsɔɔʋ taa na pá tisi - m na ɩcatɛ koluŋa ŋkɛ ka pətote . Mpʋ pə yelina na má fiti ɩ niŋ taa .

text: It is not expedient for me doubtless to glory . I will come to visions and revelations of the Lord .
text2: Paa tɩ sam fɛɩ teu tɔ , ɩsɩɩ ma sama ma tɩ . Pə lapa - m ɩsɩɩ toosee taka na má ná mpi mpi na mpi Tacaa kulaa na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - m tɔ , maa yɔɣɔtɩ pə tɔm kɛ pənɛntɛ .

text: I knew a man in Christ above fourteen years ago , ( whether in the body , I cannot tell ; or whether out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; ) such an one caught up to the third heaven .
text2: Ma nyəmá Ɩsɔ sɛɛlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ , pɩɩsɩ lapa naanʋwa na liɣiti kɔlɔ pə kpaasʋɣʋ - ɩ hatuu ɩsɔtaa tɔ . Ma ta nyɩ sɩ pə kpaasa - ɩ tampana yaa pə lapa - ɩ ɩsɩɩ toosee taka kɛ ́ kʋlapʋ tɔ . Ama Ɩsɔ tike nyəmna .

text: And I knew such a man , ( whether in the body , or out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; )
text2: Ma nyəmá sɩ kʋpam pə kpaasa yʋlʋ ɩnəɣɩ hatuu aləsanna taa . Ma tasəɣɩ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ ma ta nyɩ sɩ tampana pə kpaasa - ɩ yaa pə lapa - ɩ toosee taka kɛ ́ kʋlapʋ tɔ . Ama Ɩsɔ tike nyəmna .

text: How that he was caught up into paradise , and heard unspeakable words , which it is not lawful for a man to utter .
text2: Na ɩ ́ nɩɩ pa yɔɣɔtaɣa tənaɣa tɔmnaa mpa yʋlʋ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ tɔ , na pə ta tɩɩ haʋ yʋlʋ pəyaɣa sɩ ká yɔɣɔtɩ tɔ .

text: Of such an one will I glory : yet of myself I will not glory , but in mine infirmities .
text2: Yʋlʋ ɩnɛ maa samɩ - ɩ , ɩlɛ ma maɣamaɣa ma kaa sa ma tɩ se . Ye pə wɛ sam , ma ɩcantʋ kiŋ kɛ maa sana ma tɩ .

text: For though I would desire to glory , I shall not be a fool ; for I will say the truth : but now I forbear , lest any man should think of me above that which he seeth me to be , or that he heareth of me .
text2: Ye ma tɩ sam kɛ maa pɛɛkaɣa ma taa la kpaŋtʋ se . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tampana kɛ maa heelaɣa tɔ se . Ama ma kpa ma təɣɩ na ma tɩ sam , maa caa sɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ nyənɩ - m sɩ ma kɛ ́ pʋlʋ na pə ́ kəlɩ ɩsəna mpi ɩ ́ naakɩ na ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ sɩ ma lakɩ tɔ .

text: And lest I should be exalted above measure through the abundance of the revelations , there was given to me a thorn in the flesh , the messenger of Satan to buffet me , lest I should be exalted above measure .
text2: Pə tʋ - m ma tɔnʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ kʋtɔŋ kʋwəwɩɩʋ sɩ ma taa saŋ ma tɩ sɩ maɣa pə kula sɔsɔɔntʋ na pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ . Ɩlɛ kʋtɔŋ ŋkʋ kʋ wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ Satanɩ tillu wei ɩ tilaa tɔ sɩ ɩ ́ kaɣatɩ - m na má taa sa ma tɩ tɔ .
