text: For this thing I besought the Lord thrice , that it might depart from me .
text2: Tɔm tooso kɛ ́ ma sələma Tacaa kɛ kʋtɔŋ kʋnɛ kʋ tɔɔ sɩ ɩ ́ waasɩ - m - kʋ .

text: And he said unto me , My grace is sufficient for thee : for my strength is made perfect in weakness . Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities , that the power of Christ may rest upon me .
text2: Ama ɩ cɔ - m sɩ ɩ pɛɛlɛɛ paasi , pʋlʋ ta kaasɩ sɩ ɩ ́ tasa - m lapʋ , sɩ pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ma ɩcantʋ taa kɛ ́ ɩnɩ ɩ toma ná naa teu . Ye mpʋ ma ɩcantʋ kɛ maa sana ma tɩ na Kilisiti toma kenti ma tɔɔ .

text: Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities , in reproaches , in necessities , in persecutions , in distresses for Christ ' s sake : for when I am weak , then am I strong .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩcantʋ na kʋtʋʋŋ na ɩsənyəŋlɛ na wahalanaa na laŋwakəllɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ , pə təna mpi ma naa ɩsəntɔɣɔ Kilisiti tɔɔ tɔ ma mʋɣələɣəna - wəɣɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ma kɛ ́ ɩcam ɩlɛ ma toŋ taa toŋ ntɛ ́ təna .

text: I am become a fool in glorying ; ye have compelled me : for I ought to have been commended of you : for in nothing am I behind the very chiefest apostles , though I be nothing .
text2: Ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ma sʋʋ kpaŋʋɣʋ , ɩlɛ mə yelina na má yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ . Pɩɩ mʋna ɩsɩɩ mɩɩ sɛɛnna ma tɔɔ . Mpi tɔ , paa ma ta kɛ pʋlʋ tɔ mə nyɛntɛ tillaa sɔsaa mpɛ pa ta tɛɛ - m pʋlʋ .

text: Truly the signs of an apostle were wrought among you in all patience , in signs , and wonders , and mighty deeds .
text2: Pə lapa təma wena a hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ sɩ ma kɛ ́ tillu tɔɣɔ mə hɛkʋ taa na suulu sɔsɔ mɛɛ . Sɔɣɔntʋ təma na Ɩsɔ kɔkɔlɔ nyəm na piti təma kɛ a lapənaa .

text: For what is it wherein ye were inferior to other churches , except it be that I myself was not burdensome to you ? forgive me this wrong .
text2: Nti tə taa kɛ ́ pa ta la - mɛ ɩsɩɩ pa lakʋɣʋ Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka lɛnna tɔ ye pə taɣa tɔkʋɣʋ mpi mə ta tɔkɩ - m tɔ pə paasi ? Ma tɔm səpəna - mɛɣɛ tənɛ ɩnɩ tə taa .

text: Behold , the third time I am ready to come to you ; and I will not be burdensome to you : for I seek not yours , but you : for the children ought not to lay up for the parents , but the parents for the children .
text2: Ma nyɔɔsəɣɩ ma tɩ sɩ ma kɔŋ mə tɛɣɛ tɔm tooso nyəm , ɩlɛ maa caa sɩ ɩ ́ tɔkɩ - m se . Mə maɣamaɣa kɛ ma caa pə taɣa mə liɣitee . Pə taɣa piya caləsəɣəna liɣitee sɩ sɩ tɔɔ sɩ caanaa . Ama caanaa caləsəɣəna liɣitee sɩ pa tɔɔna pa piya .

text: And I will very gladly spend and be spent for you ; though the more abundantly I love you , the less I be loved .
text2: Ye ma ma laŋhʋlʋmlɛ ntɛ ́ sɩ má tɔɣɔ mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə təna mpi ma wɛna tɔ , paa ma tɩ má kʋ na pə ́ səna - mɛ . Ye máá sɔɔla - mɛɣɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ teu ɩlɛ , mɩɩ məŋna maɣa sɔɔlʋɣʋ kɛ pəcɔ ?

text: But be it so , I did not burden you : nevertheless , being crafty , I caught you with guile .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyəmá teu sɩ ma ta mɩɩsəna - mɛ . Ama lɛlaa ná tɛɛna - tɩ sɩ acilaɣatʋ kɛ ma lapənaa na má nyɩ - mɛɣɛ katɔsɩ na pɔpɔtʋnaa na má kpa - mɛ .

text: Did I make a gain of you by any of them whom I sent unto you ?
text2: Mpa ma tila mə kiŋ tɔ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ lapa na má tɔɣɔ mə tɔɔ ?

text: I desired Titus , and with him I sent a brother . Did Titus make a gain of you ? walked we not in the same spirit ? walked we not in the same steps ?
text2: Ma wiina Titʋ sɩ ɩ ́ polo mə tɛ na ma təŋsa ɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ tá taapalʋ ɩlɛ . Yaa ɩ ́ caa ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ Titʋ tɔɣɔna mə tɔɔ kɛ ? Pə taɣa ma yaasi na ma ɩkpatɛ kɛ Titʋ təŋaa ?

text: Again , think ye that we excuse ourselves unto you ? we speak before God in Christ : but we do all things , dearly beloved , for your edifying .
text2: Ntanyɩ pə kpaɣaʋ waatʋ nɔɣɔlʋ tɔ ɩ hʋʋ kɛlɛ sɩ tə pɛɛkəɣɩ sɩ tə ́ kɛɛlɩ tá nyɔ ́ ɔ ́ ŋ tɔɔ . Aaɩ pə taɣa mpʋ . Ɩsəna Kilisiti caakɩ tɔ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tə yɔɣɔtəɣɩ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa . Tá taapalaa kʋpama tə heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ pə tənaɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ polo lɔlɔ .

text: For I fear , lest , when I come , I shall not find you such as I would , and that I shall be found unto you such as ye would not : lest there be debates , envyings , wraths , strifes , backbitings , whisperings , swellings , tumults :
text2: Ma nyaŋ sɩ ye ma kɔma na má tala mə tɛ má taa maɣana - mɛɣɛ nti maa caa tɔ tə taa , na mɩɩ taa na nti mɩɩ caa tɔɣɔ ma kiŋ . Ma nyaŋ kɛ ́ sɩ pə ́ taa kɔɔ na yoou , na ɩsəsɛɛmlɛ , na pááná , na kəlʋɣʋ pɛɛkʋɣʋ , na kʋtʋʋŋ , na yɔɣɔtaɣa kpaɩ nyəŋka , na ɩsəcaʋ , na liɣituɣu pə ́ wɛɛ .

text: And lest , when I come again , my God will humble me among you , and that I shall bewail many which have sinned already , and have not repented of the uncleanness and fornication and lasciviousness which they have committed .
text2: Ma nyaŋ kɛ ́ sɩ má tala mə kiŋ ma Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ taa pasa - m mə ɩsɛntaa na má kɔɔ na má wii yəlaa paɣalɛ mpa pa lapa ɩsaɣatʋnaa kɛ tuu lɔŋ , na pá tá yele tɛtɛlakasɩ , na asilima , na yaasi ɩsaɣaʋ wei paa tɔkaa tɔ pa tɔɔ .

text: This is the third time I am coming to you . In the mouth of two or three witnesses shall every word be established .
text2: Tɔm tooso nyəm ntɛ ́ ma caa kɔntɛ kɛ mə tɛ tɔ . Aseeta nyə ́ ma naalɛ yaa tooso ká hʋləna tɔmnaa təna mpa pa wɛɛ tɔ pa tampana na pə ́ cɔ ́ . Pa ŋmaa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ .

text: I told you before , and foretell you , as if I were present , the second time ; and being absent now I write to them which heretofore have sinned , and to all other , that , if I come again , I will not spare :
text2: Ma kpaaləɣɩ tuu mpa paa lapa ɩsaɣatʋ tɔ na lɛlaa sɩ ye ma kɔma na má kɔɔ sɩ ma naa - mɛ , ma kaa wii nɔɣɔlʋ pətɔɔtəlɛ . Maa kɔma tɔm naalɛ nyəm tɔ ma tɛma - mɛɣɛ kpaalʋɣʋ kɛ mpʋ . Pənɛntɛ ma fɛɩ mə kiŋ ɩlɛ ma tasəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ kpaalʋɣʋ .

text: Since ye seek a proof of Christ speaking in me , which to you - ward is not weak , but is mighty in you .
text2: Ntɔŋ ɩ ́ caa ɩ ́ ná sɩ Kilisiti toŋ kɛ ma yɔɣɔtəɣəna yaa pə taɣa Kilisiti toŋ yaa ? Ɩ ́ ká ná mɛɛ . Kilisiti ɩɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ ɩcantʋ natələɣɩ mə tɔm taa se . Ama toma kɛ ɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ mə hɛkʋ .

text: For though he was crucified through weakness , yet he liveth by the power of God . For we also are weak in him , but we shall live with him by the power of God toward you .
text2: Paa na mpʋ ɩ ɩcantʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa kama - ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ . Ama ɩ wɛna ɩ weesuɣu kɛ Ɩsɔ toma taa . Tá na - ɩ tə kpɛntaa kɛ ́ , na tə kɛ ́ acamaa tɔtɔɣɔ . Ama yaasi wei tə lakəna mə kiŋ tɔ pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ kɛ ́ sɩ tá na - ɩ tə wɛna weesuɣu kɛ Ɩsɔ toma tɔɔ .

text: Examine yourselves , whether ye be in the faith ; prove your own selves . Know ye not your own selves , how that Jesus Christ is in you , except ye be reprobates ?
text2: Ɩ ́ maɣasɩ mə maɣamaɣa mə tɩ na ɩ ́ feŋ mə tɩ na ɩ ́ ná sɩ ɩ ́ tɔka Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ mpaaʋ yaa ɩ ́ tá tɔkɩ . Ntɔŋ ɩ ́ nyəmá teu sɩ Kilisiti wɛ mə kiŋ na ? Tɔʋ , ɩ ́ tɛmna Ɩsɔ na mə taa tɔ , ye ɩ ́ pəsaa na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ tampana kɛ mpʋ ɩlɛ , mpʋɣʋlɛ .

text: But I trust that ye shall know that we are not reprobates .
text2: Ma hʋʋ sɩ ɩ ́ nyəmá teu sɩ tá kiŋ , tə pəsəɣɩ na tə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ mpʋ mɛɛ .

text: Now I pray to God that ye do no evil ; not that we should appear approved , but that ye should do that which is honest , though we be as reprobates .
text2: Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tə sələməɣɩ sɩ ɩ ́ yele na ɩ ́ taa la kawalaɣa nakəlɩ . Tɩɩ caa sɩ tə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ tənɛ tə taa kɛ ́ mpi tə pəsəɣɩ tɔ , paa pɩɩ lɩɩ sɩ pəsʋɣʋ kɛ tɩɩ pəsəɣɩ , kʋpantʋ kɛ tə caa mɩɩ lakɩ .

text: For we can do nothing against the truth , but for the truth .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tə kaa pəsɩ na tə ́ lɩɩ Ɩsɔ tampana waalɩ . Ɩsɔ tampana anəɣɩ tɩɩ lana .

text: For we are glad , when we are weak , and ye are strong : and this also we wish , even your perfection .
text2: Tá kɛʋ acamaa na mɩɩ kɛ ́ toŋtʋnaa tɔ , tá laŋa hʋlʋmaa kɛ ́ . Pə tɔɔ tɔtɔɣɔ tə sələməɣɩ sɩ ɩ ́ la kʋpantʋ kɛ teu .

text: Therefore I write these things being absent , lest being present I should use sharpness , according to the power which the Lord hath given me to edification , and not to destruction .
text2: Mpi pə tɔɔ ma wɛ - mɛ na pooluŋ na ma ŋmaa - mɛɣɛ takəlaɣa tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ waatʋ wei maa kɔɔ mə kiŋ tɔ ma taa lana - mɛ na toŋ kɛ toma nna Tacaa ha - m tɔ . Pə ha - m toma anəɣɩ sɩ pə ́ la na ɩ ́ polo lɔlɔ , pə ta ha - m - yɛ sɩ pə wakəlɩ - mɛ .

text: Finally , brethren , farewell . Be perfect , be of good comfort , be of one mind , live in peace ; and the God of love and peace shall be with you .
text2: Pənɛntɛ ma taapalaa pə lapa wulee . Ɩ ́ lʋ sɩ ɩ ́ té teu . Ɩ ́ sɔɔsəɣɩ təmaɣa apalʋtʋ . Ɩ ́ wɛɛ nɔɣɔ kʋlʋmaɣa , na ɩ ́ wɛɛ təma na leleŋ . Ɩsɔ wei ɩ sɔɔləɣɩ na ɩ ́ haa alaafəya tɔ ɩ ́ wɛɛ mə kiŋ .

text: Greet one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ təmaɣa teu na ɩ ́ lɛlɩ . Ɩsɔ yəlaa təna sɛɛ - mɛ .

text: All the saints salute you .
text2: Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti pɛɛlɛɛ na Ɩsɔ sɔɔlʋɣʋ na kpɛntʋɣʋ ŋku Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kɔŋna tɔ pə ́ wɛɛ mə təna mə kiŋ .

text: Paul , an apostle , ( not of men , neither by man , but by Jesus Christ , and God the Father , who raised him from the dead ; )
text2: Maɣa tillu Pɔɔlɩ , ɩlɛ pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ yəlaa tʋna - m tiluɣu . Pəyele pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ tɛləsəna - m tiluɣu mpɩ . Ama Yesu Kilisiti na Caa Ɩsɔ wei ɩ ka feesa - ɩ waatʋ wei ɩ səpa tɔ mpɛ pa maɣamaɣa pa tʋna - m - wɩ .

text: And all the brethren which are with me , unto the churches of Galatia :
text2: Má na ma taapalaa mpa pa təna pa wɛ cənɛ tɔ tə tamsəna na tə ́ ŋmaa takəlaɣa kanɛɣɛ Kalatɩ Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka mɛ sɩ tə sɛɛkɩ - mɛ .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father , and from our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Tacaa Ɩsɔ na tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti pá hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ na pá ha - mɛɣɛ alaafəya .

text: Who gave himself for our sins , that he might deliver us from this present evil world , according to the will of God and our Father :
text2: Kilisiti ɩnɩ ɩ hana ɩ tɩ sɩ ɩ ́ ya - tʋɣʋ tá ɩsaɣatʋ taa na ɩ ́ ləsɩ - tʋɣʋ kʋyɛɛŋ kʋtakɛɛsəŋ ɩnɛ ɩ taa , na mpʋ ɩnɩ pə kɛ ́ Tacaa luɣu nyəntʋ kɛ ́ .

text: To whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Tə ́ tʋ ́ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teeli kɛ tam tɔɔ . Ami .

text: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel :
text2: Ma ta hʋʋ sɩ ɩ ́ ká ha siɣile kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ lɔŋ kɛ wei ɩ yaa - mɛɣɛ Kilisiti pɛɛlɛɛ tɔɔ tɔ na ɩ ́ təŋ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ lɛlʋ , ma tutaa kɛ ́ .

text: Which is not another ; but there be some that trouble you , and would pervert the gospel of Christ .
text2: Ma yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ mpʋ tɔ pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ Laapaalənaa Kʋpama wɛ naalɛ se . Ama ma nawaɣa sɩ yəlaa wɛɛ na pá lakɩ - mɛɣɛ yɛlɛyɛlɛ na pá caa pa kɛɛ Kilisiti Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ ɩnɩ .

text: But though we , or an angel from heaven , preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you , let him be accursed .
text2: Ye nɔɣɔlʋ kɔma na ɩ ́ heeli - mɛɣɛ Laapaalɩ kʋfalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ na pə ́ tá kɛ ́ wei tə tɛma - mɛɣɛ heeluɣu tɔ , Ɩsɔ ká nana pʋntʋ paa ɩ kɛ ́ awe . Paa tá taa yʋlʋ maɣamaɣa , paa ɩsɔtaa tillu nɔɣɔlʋ maɣamaɣa .

text: As we said before , so say I now again , If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received , let him be accursed .
text2: Tɩɩ tɛma - mɛɣɛ heeluɣu na ma tasəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ heeluɣu kɛ mpʋ , sɩ ye nɔɣɔlʋ kɔma na ɩ ́ heeli - mɛɣɛ Laapaalɩ kʋfalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ na pə ́ tá kɛ ́ wei ɩ ́ tɛma mʋɣʋ tɔ , Ɩsɔ ká náná pʋntʋ .

text: For do I now persuade men , or God ? or do I seek to please men ? for if I yet pleased men , I should not be the servant of Christ .
text2: Ɩlɛ pə lɩɩwa sɩ yəlaa ɩsantɛ ntɛ ́ ma caa yaa we ? Aaɩ , ama Ɩsɔ ɩsantɛ kɛ ma pɛɛkəɣɩ . Ma caa sɩ yəlaa laŋa ɩ ́ hɛɛna - m ? Ye maa caakaɣa sɩ yəlaa laŋa ɩ ́ hɛɛna - m ma taa la Kilisiti təmlɛ tʋ .

text: But I certify you , brethren , that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man .
text2: Ma taapalaa ma heeliɣi - mɛ təfoo sɩ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ wei ma heela - mɛ tɔ ɩ ta kɛ wei yʋlʋ lupa kʋlupu tɔ .

text: For I neither received it of man , neither was I taught it , but by the revelation of Jesus Christ .
text2: Ma ta nɩɩ - təɣɩ yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kiŋ . Pə taɣa yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ sɛɣɛsəna - m , ama Yesu Kilisiti maɣamaɣa kulina tə tɔɔ na má nyɩ - tɩ .

text: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews ' religion , how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God , and wasted it :
text2: Ɩ ́ nɩɩ ɩsəna ma yaasi ka wɛ waatʋ wei maa sɛɛsa ɩsəlɛ na Yuta nyə ́ ma Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ tɔ . Na ɩ ́ nyə ́ má ɩsəna maa naasaɣa Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa kpeka təkaŋkaŋ na má sɛɛsa ɩsəlɛ sɩ ma wakələɣɩ - wɛ təkpataa tɔ .

text: And profited in the Jews ' religion above many my equals in mine own nation , being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers .
text2: Mpa paa kɛ ́ ma piitim nyə ́ ma na pá kɛ ́ ma saalanaa tɔ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ta haŋna - m pʋlʋɣʋ tá Yuta Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ taa . Ɩsəna maa təŋaɣa tá caanaa kɔtasɩ tɔ pə fɛɩ kɛɛsʋɣʋ .

text: But when it pleased God , who separated me from my mother ' s womb , and called me by his grace ,
text2: Ama Ɩsɔ suulu tɔɔ ɩ ləsa - m na ma mpaa kɛ waatʋ wei pa ta tɩɩ lʋləta - m tɔ , na ɩ ́ yaa - m sɩ má la ɩ təmlɛ .

text: To reveal his Son in me , that I might preach him among the heathen ; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood :
text2: Pə kɔma na pə ́ maɣa Ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ kuli ɩ Pəyalʋ tɔɔ sɩ má nyəmɩ - ɩ təcɛɩcɛɩ , na má sɛɣɛsɩ mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔɣɔ ɩ tɔm Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔ ma ta polo nɔɣɔlʋ cɔlɔɣɔ saawala lapʋ .

text: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me ; but I went into Arabia , and returned again unto Damascus .
text2: Pəyele ma ta polo Yosalɛm sɩ ma naa mpa pa lapa tillaa na ma tɔɔ tɔ . Ama ma tɛɛ Alapʋ kɛ kpakpaa , pəlɛ pə waalɩ ɩlɛna má məlɩ Tamasɩ .

text: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter , and abode with him fifteen days .
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ pə lapa pɩɩsɩ tooso tɔɣɔ ma pola Yosalɛm sɩ ma nyəŋ Piyɛɛ . Ɩlɛna má na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ tə ́ caɣa wɛɛ naanʋwa na kakpasɩ .

text: But other of the apostles saw I none , save James the Lord ' s brother .
text2: Ma na tillaa taa nɔɣɔlʋ tə ta na ye pə taɣa Tacaa neu Saakɩ .

text: Now the things which I write unto you , behold , before God , I lie not .
text2: Tampana tɔm kɛ ma kɛɛsəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ takəlaɣa taa cənɛ , na Ɩsɔ maa looliɣi .

text: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia ;
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ ma cɔɔ Silii na Silisii pa tɛtʋnaa taa .

text: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ :
text2: Pə na pə mpʋ tɔ Yuta tɛtʋ taa Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka ta keesita - m .

text: But they had heard only , That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed .
text2: Ama pa yɔɣɔta ma tɔm kɛ ́ na mpɛ pá nɩɩ kʋnɩɩ , sɩ wei ɩnɩ ɩ ka naasaɣa - tʋ tɔ kaɣana ɩ tɔŋna Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ mpi ɩ ka sɛɛsa ɩsəlɛ sɩ ɩ ́ wakəlɩ təkpataa tɔ pə waasʋ lapʋ .

text: And they glorified God in me .
text2: Na pá saŋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ma tɔɔ .

text: Then fourteen years after I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas , and took Titus with me also .
text2: Pə lapa pɩɩsɩ naanʋwa na liɣiti ɩlɛna má məlɩ Yosalɛm , na Panapaasɩ sɩɩ - m , na má kpɛnna Titʋ tɔtɔ .

text: And I went up by revelation , and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles , but privately to them which were of reputation , lest by any means I should run , or had run , in vain .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma pola Yosalɛm , Ɩsɔ hʋləna - m sɩ pə wɛɛ sɩ təlasɩ má polo kɛ ́ . Ma na təna nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma tə kota tá tike , ɩlɛna má kpaɣa Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ wei ma lakɩ mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ ɩ tɔm na má kɛɛsɩ - wɛ təcɛɩcɛɩ . Ma luɣu taa fɛɩ sɩ mpi ma tɛma lapʋ na mpi ma tɔŋna lapʋ tɔ pə ́ pəsɩ yem .

text: But neither Titus , who was with me , being a Greek , was compelled to be circumcised :
text2: Na Titʋ wei ɩ təŋa - m mpʋ na ɩ ́ kɛ ́ Kəlɛɛkɩ tʋ tɔ pa ta caalɩ - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ pɛlɩ .

text: And that because of false brethren unawares brought in , who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus , that they might bring us into bondage :
text2: Ama acɛsaacɛsaa nyə ́ ma mpa pa sita tá hɛkʋ tɔ pɛlɛ pa lʋpəna sɩ ɩ ́ pɛlɩ . Acɛsaacɛsaa nyə ́ ma mpɛ , pa lɔɔlaa kɛ ́ təkɛʋ na pá sʋʋ tá hɛkʋ , sɩ pa feŋiɣi na pá ná tá na Yesu Kilisiti tə kpɛntaa na tə wɛ kasaɣampiitu nti tə taa tɔ . Pa caakaɣa kɛ ́ sɩ pá pəsɩ - tʋɣʋ yomaa .

text: To whom we gave place by subjection , no , not for an hour ; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you .
text2: Ama tá tá ha - wɛɣɛ pə mpaaʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ maɣamaɣa . Tá sɔɔlaa kɛ ́ sɩ mə tɔɔ ɩlɛ tə ́ tɔkɩ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tampana təkpaŋkpaŋkpa .

text: But of these who seemed to be somewhat , ( whatsoever they were , it maketh no matter to me : God accepteth no man ' s person : ) for they who seemed to be somewhat in conference added nothing to me :
text2: Mpa ma tɔŋ sɩ nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma kɛ mpʋ tɔ , tɔʋ , ma ta nyɩ sɩ tampana mpɛɣɛlɛ nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma yaa we tɔ . Ɩlɛ paa pa tɩɩ kɛ ́ mpa te , pə kʋlʋm . Ɩsɔ ɩlɛ ɩɩ nyənəɣɩ tɔɔ tɔ se . Mpɛ ɩnɩ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ ta tasa - m tɔm kʋfatʋ natələɣɩ sɔɔsʋɣʋ sɩ má la .

text: But contrariwise , when they saw that the gospel of the uncircumcision was committed unto me , as the gospel of the circumcision was unto Peter ;
text2: Ama pa nawaɣa təkelekele sɩ Ɩsɔ tʋ - m təmlɛ sɩ má heeli Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔɣɔ teitei ɩsɩɩ ɩ tʋ Piyɛɛ ɩlɛ sɩ ɩ ́ heeli Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ .

text: ( For he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision , the same was mighty in me toward the Gentiles : )
text2: Ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ kpaʋ Piyɛɛ kɛ tillu sɩ ɩ ́ paasəna Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ ɩ kpa maɣa tillu sɩ má paasəna mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ .

text: And when James , Cephas , and John , who seemed to be pillars , perceived the grace that was given unto me , they gave to me and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship ; that we should go unto the heathen , and they unto the circumcision .
text2: Saakɩ na Piyɛɛ na Yohaanɩ , mpa mpɛ pa nyənəɣɩ mpʋ sɩ pa nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma tɔ , pɛlɛ pa nawa sɩ Ɩsɔ paasaa kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ tʋ təmlɛ ntɛɣɛ ma niŋ taa na tə mpaa . Ɩlɛna pá kpa má na Panapaasɩ tá niŋ taa na pá ciɣiti . Tə lapa nɔɣɔ kʋlʋmaɣa kɛ mpʋ , ɩlɛna tá təna tə ́ yɔɣɔtɩ na tə ́ tisi təma sɩ táá mələna mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ pa kiŋ na mpɛ pá polo Yuta nyə ́ ma kiŋ .

text: Only they would that we should remember the poor ; the same which I also was forward to do .
text2: Ama nti pa wiina - tʋ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ , tə ́ tɔɔsɩ pa kʋnyɔntʋnaa mpɛ pa tɔɔ , na ma lapa teu kɛ nti pa yɔɣɔta mpʋ sɩ tə ́ la tɔ .

text: But when Peter was come to Antioch , I withstood him to the face , because he was to be blamed .
text2: Waatʋ wei Piyɛɛ kɔma Antiyɔka tɔ ma yoona - ɩ yəlaa taa kɛ ́ ɩ toola mpaaʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: For before that certain came from James , he did eat with the Gentiles : but when they were come , he withdrew and separated himself , fearing them which were of the circumcision .
text2: Nti tə taa ɩ toolaa tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ , Saakɩ ka tila napəlɩ , na waatʋ wei pɛlɛ pa ta tata tɔ , Piyɛɛ na tá taapalaa mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ pa tɔkaɣana . Ama pɛlɛ pa kɔma na pá tala , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ se mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ pa cɔlɔɣɔ tɔɣɔʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ nyaŋaɣana mpa pa sɔɔla pɛlʋɣʋ tɔm tɔ .

text: And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him ; insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation .
text2: Tá taapalaa Yuta nyə ́ ma mpa pə kaasaa tɔ pɛlɛ pa təŋa Piyɛɛ ɩkpatɛ tɔtɔ , haləna pə ́ kpɛŋna Panapaasɩ na pá tɛləsɩ ɩlɛɣɛ pa ɩcantʋ ntɩ .

text: But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the truth of the gospel , I said unto Peter before them all , If thou , being a Jew , livest after the manner of Gentiles , and not as do the Jews , why compellest thou the Gentiles to live as do the Jews ?
text2: Saa wei ma nawa sɩ pa tɔntɛ ta maɣa na pa ta təŋ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tampana kɛ teitei tɔ , ma tɔma Piyɛɛ kɛ yəlaa təna ɩsɛntaa sɩ : N kɛ ́ Yuta tʋ pəyele n lapa cənɛɣɛ ɩsɩɩ wei ɩ ta kɛ Yuta tʋ tɔ , n ta la ɩsɩɩ Yuta tʋ ka la tɔ . Ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣa n nyəmá sɩ nɔɔnɔɔ n ká la na ń caalɩ mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ sɩ pá la ɩsɩɩ Yuta nyə ́ ma ?

text: We who are Jews by nature , and not sinners of the Gentiles ,
text2: Tá maɣamaɣa tə kɛ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma kɛ ́ təsiɣisiɣi , tə ta kɛ asaɣaa ɩsɩɩ piitim lɛmpɩ nyə ́ ma .

text: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law , but by the faith of Jesus Christ , even we have believed in Jesus Christ , that we might be justified by the faith of Christ , and not by the works of the law : for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified .
text2: Paa na mpʋ tə nyəmá sɩ pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ təŋʋɣʋ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ nyənəɣɩ - ɩ yʋlʋpaŋ . Ama ɩ tɛŋʋɣʋ ɩ taa na Yesu Kilisiti tɔɣɔ . Tá maɣamaɣa ɩsəntɔ , tá tɛmna Yesu Kilisiti ɩnəɣɩ tá taa kɛna Ɩsɔ nyənəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ yʋlʋpama . Tə tɛma tá taa na Yesu Kilisiti tɔɣɔ yoo , pə taɣa kʋsəsɩɩɩtʋ təŋʋɣʋ tɔɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ kaa nyənɩ nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ yʋlʋpaŋ kɛ ɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təŋʋɣʋ tɔɔ .

text: But if , while we seek to be justified by Christ , we ourselves also are found sinners , is therefore Christ the minister of sin ? God forbid .
text2: Ye tə lʋkɩ sɩ Kilisiti tɔɔ pa nyənəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ yʋlʋpama tɔɣɔ pə naa sɩ tə kɛ ́ asaɣaa ɩsɩɩ mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ , ɩlɛ pə wɛɛ sɩ Kilisiti kɛlɛ ɩsaɣatʋ caa yaa ɩsəna ? Aaɩ , pə taɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ paa pəcɔ .

text: For if I build again the things which I destroyed , I make myself a transgressor .
text2: Ye ma kʋlaa na má taɣanəɣɩ ŋmaʋ kɛ mpi ma tɛma yɔkʋɣʋ tɔ , pəlɛ pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ kɛ ́ sɩ ma ta kɛ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təŋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ .

text: For I through the law am dead to the law , that I might live unto God .
text2: Ye kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔm taa , ma səpaɣa tənaŋnaŋ , na kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɩ tə maɣamaɣa tə kʋna - m mpʋ . Na pə lapa - m ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ má wɛɛ Ɩsɔ tike tɔɔ . Pa kʋ má na Kilisiti kɛ səm tesika tɔɔ .

text: I am crucified with Christ : nevertheless I live ; yet not I , but Christ liveth in me : and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God , who loved me , and gave himself for me .
text2: Na ma wɛʋ ɩsəntɔɣɔ kaɣana tɔ pə taɣa ma maɣamaɣa ma wɛnna . Ama Kilisiti wɛnna ma taa . Weesuɣu ŋku ma wɛna saŋa taa ɩsəntɔ tɔ ma tɛŋ ma taa na Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ tɔɣɔ ma wɛna - kʋ . Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ sɔɔləna - m na ɩ ́ sɩ ma səm .

text: I do not frustrate the grace of God : for if righteousness come by the law , then Christ is dead in vain .
text2: Maa kpaləɣɩ Ɩsɔ kʋcɔɔʋ se . Ye kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ka yekaɣana na yʋlʋ pəsəɣɩ kʋpaŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa , ɩlɛ pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ Kilisiti səpa yem kɛlɛ .

text: O foolish Galatians , who hath bewitched you , that ye should not obey the truth , before whose eyes Jesus Christ hath been evidently set forth , crucified among you ?
text2: Aaa , Kalatɩ kʋmɛlɛməŋ mɛ , ɩlɛ nɔɣɔlʋ nyala - mɛɣɛ kʋnyalʋ yaa ɩsəna ? Anɩ mɛɣɛ pa tɛma kɛɛsʋɣʋ kɛ Kilisiti tesika tɔɔ səm tɔm təkelekele kɛ teu .

text: This only would I learn of you , Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Ɩlɛ tɔm kʋlʋmtʋ təkoŋ kɛ ́ ma pɔɔsəɣɩ - mɛ , sɩ ɩ ́ təŋʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔɣɔ ɩ ́ hika Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu yaa ɩ ́ nɩɩʋ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ na ɩ ́ mʋ - ɩ tɔɣɔ ɩ ́ hikaa ? Ɩ ́ cɔ - m na má nɩɩ .

text: Are ye so foolish ? having begun in the Spirit , are ye now made perfect by the flesh ?
text2: Mə kʋmɛlɛntʋ tɔɔ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ? Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu toŋ kɛ ɩ ́ hikina mə təɣɩ kancaalaɣa , ɩlɛna nɔɔnɔɔ ɩ ́ caa ɩ ́ tɛɛsəna mə maɣamaɣa mə toŋ na ?

text: Have ye suffered so many things in vain ? if it be yet in vain .
text2: Pə lapa pə lapa mə hɛkʋ na ɩ ́ hii laɣatʋnaa mpa tɔ pɛlɛ pa pəsa yem kɛlɛ yaa ? Aaɩ , pə kaa pəsɩ yem kɛ ́ mpʋ mɛɛ .

text: He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit , and worketh miracles among you , doeth he it by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ cɛlʋɣʋʋ - mɛɣɛ ɩ Feesuɣu na ɩ ́ lakɩ piti təma kɛ mə hɛkʋ kɛ mpʋ tɔ , mə kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təŋʋɣʋ tɔɔ , yaa mə Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ nɩɩʋ na ɩ mʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə lakɩ mpʋ ?

text: Even as Abraham believed God , and it was accounted to him for righteousness .
text2: Mpʋ ɩnɩ pə yelina na pá ŋmaa Apəlaham tɔm kɛ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Ɩ tɛma Ɩsɔ na ɩ taa , na ɩ taa tɛm mpəɣɩ Ɩsɔ ná nawa na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ yaa - ɩ yʋlʋpaŋ na ɩ ́ mʋ - ɩ .

text: Know ye therefore that they which are of faith , the same are the children of Abraham .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ ká nyɩ teu sɩ , mpa pa tɛma pa taa na Ɩsɔ tɔɣɔlɛ Apəlaham piya təsiɣisiɣi .

text: And the scripture , foreseeing that God would justify the heathen through faith , preached before the gospel unto Abraham , saying , In thee shall all nations be blessed .
text2: Pə maɣamaɣa pə tɩɩ wɛ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ mpʋ sɩ : Mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ paa kɔɔ na pá tɛ pa taa na Ɩsɔ , ɩlɛna pá pəsɩ yʋlʋpama . Na pə tɔɔ ɩnəɣɩ hatuu lɔŋ Ɩsɔ heela Apəlaham kɛ tɔm kʋpantʋ tənɛ na tə ́ wɛ ŋmaatʋ taa sɩ : Nyá tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ ká la atɛ yəlaa tənaɣa kʋpantʋ .

text: So then they which be of faith are blessed with faithful Abraham .
text2: Apəlaham tɛma Ɩsɔ na ɩ taa na Ɩsɔ lapɩ - ɩ kʋpantʋ . Na mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ pa təna mpa pa tɛŋ pa taa na Ɩsɔ tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ lakɩ - wɛɣɛ kʋpantʋ kɛ mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse : for it is written , Cursed is every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them .
text2: Mpa pa wɛɛ na pá tɛɛləɣɩ sɩ pa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təŋʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa hikiɣi kʋpantʋ tɔ pá na mpusi kɛlɛ . Tə maɣamaɣa kɛ pa yɔɣɔta Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Mpusi tʋ ntɛ wei ɩɩ təŋəɣɩ pə təna mpi pa ŋmaawa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ takəlaɣa taa tɔɣɔ tam tɔ .

text: But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God , it is evident : for , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Pə tɩɩ naakɩ mpʋ təkelekele sɩ nɔɣɔlʋ kaa pəsɩ yʋlʋpaŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təŋʋɣʋ tɔɔ . Ama pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa təkpataa sɩ : Wei ɩ kɛ ́ yʋlʋpaŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa sɩ ɩ tɛma ɩ taa tɔ pə tɔɔ tɔ , pʋntʋ tike tʋləɣəna - tɩ .

text: And the law is not of faith : but , The man that doeth them shall live in them .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təŋʋɣʋ na táá tɛmnaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ tá kaa pʋlʋ . Ama pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ pa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ sɩ : Wei ɩ tɔka kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔmnaa təna tɔ , pʋntʋ ká tʋlɩ - təɣɩ tə tɔɔ .

text: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law , being made a curse for us : for it is written , Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree :
text2: Ɩsəna Kilisiti lapa na ɩ ́ səɣəlɩ tá mpusi kɛ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ nyʋɣʋ taa tɔ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ pəsaa na ɩ ́ ləsɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ mpusi ɩnəɣɩ tá tɔɔ . Tə maɣamaɣa kɛ pa yɔɣɔta Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Ye pa laalaa na pá pusi wei na tʋɣʋ , mpusi tʋ kɛ ́ .

text: That the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Jesus Christ ; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith .
text2: Pə lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ kʋpantʋ nti Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ lakɩ Apəlaham tɔ , ɩ ́ la - təɣɩ mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔɣɔ Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ . Na tá táá tɛmnaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ yelina na tə ́ hiki Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ wei Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha - tʋ tɔ .

text: Brethren , I speak after the manner of men ; Though it be but a man ' s covenant , yet if it be confirmed , no man disannulleth , or addeth thereto .
text2: Ma taapalaa ma kɛɛsəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ yəlaa tá ta kʋlapʋtʋ na ɩ ́ cɛkəna . Ye yʋlʋ caɣaa na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ pə təna təmamam kɛ ́ ɩsəna ɩ caa pá lana ɩ wɛnaʋ kɛ ɩ səm waalɩ , na ɩ ́ tʋ takəlaɣa taa na ɩ ́ sɩɩ , nɔɣɔlʋ ɩɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ kʋ - tɩ yaa ɩ ́ sɔɔsɩ ɩ nyəntʋ kɛ tə tɔɔ .

text: Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made . He saith not , And to seeds , as of many ; but as of one , And to thy seed , which is Christ .
text2: Aŋha , ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ na nti Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la Apəlaham na ɩ pəyaɣa tɔ . Pa ta ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ ɩ piya , sɩ pə taa kɔɔ na pə ́ lá ɩsɩɩ yəlaa paɣalɛ . Ama pa tɔmaɣa sɩ : Nyá pəyaɣa , sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ yʋlʋ kʋlʋm kɛ pa paasənaa , na yʋlʋ ɩnəɣəlɛ Kilisiti .

text: And this I say , that the covenant , that was confirmed before of God in Christ , the law , which was four hundred and thirty years after , cannot disannul , that it should make the promise of none effect .
text2: Nti ma caa ma hʋ ́ lɩ ́ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Ɩsɔ ka taɣana nti ɩ caa ɩ ́ na ɩ yəlaa pá la tɔ , haləna ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ ɩ ká tɔkɩ ɩ nɔɣɔ sɩɩʋ . Pə kɔma na pɩɩsɩ la nasəlɛ na hiu na naanʋwa ( 430 ) kɛ ́ , ɩlɛna kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔm lɩɩ . Kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔm lɩɩʋ mpʋ tɔ , pə fɛɩ sɩ təlɛ tə ́ kʋ nti Ɩsɔ tɛma taɣanʋɣʋ tɔ , na mpi mpi ɩ tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la yəlaa tɔ təlɛ tə saalɩ yem .

text: For if the inheritance be of the law , it is no more of promise : but God gave it to Abraham by promise .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye ɩsɩɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔkəlaa kɛ Ɩsɔ təŋəɣɩ na ɩ ́ haa ɩ kʋcɔɔŋ wei ɩ ka sɩɩwa ɩ yəlaa tɔɔ tɔ , ɩlɛ pə taɣa nɔɣɔ sɩɩʋ ntɛ ́ . Ama cənɛ ɩlɛ Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la Apəlaham kɛ kʋpantʋ tɔɣɔ ɩ lapa - ɩ - təɣɩ faalaa .

text: Wherefore then serveth the law ? It was added because of transgressions , till the seed should come to whom the promise was made ; and it was ordained by angels in the hand of a mediator .
text2: Pepe nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa sɩɩ kiiŋ ɩlɛ ? Pa sɔɔsa ɩlɛɣɛ sɩɩʋ kɛ ́ sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ yəlaa kɛ pa kʋlapʋtʋ nti Ɩsɔ ɩɩ caa tɔ . Pə wɛɛ sɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɩ tə ́ caɣa mpʋ , haləna Apəlaham pəyaɣa ŋka ka tɔɔ Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la kʋpantʋ ntɩ tɔ ká kɔɔ . Na ɩsɔtaa tillaa kɛ Ɩsɔ tilina kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɩ , na yʋlʋ kɛ pɛlɛ pa cɛlaa sɩ ɩ ́ tɛləsɩ ɩ lɛlaa .

text: Now a mediator is not a mediator of one , but God is one .
text2: Ama ye timpi pə kɛ ́ sɩ yʋlʋ kʋlʋm tɔm kɛ pə paasənaa , ɩlɛ tɛləsəlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kaa wɛɛ pə taa tɔtɔ . Na mpʋ ɩnəɣɩ pə tɩɩ wɛɛ , Ɩsɔ wɛ kʋlʋm kɛ ́ .

text: Is the law then against the promises of God ? God forbid : for if there had been a law given which could have given life , verily righteousness should have been by the law .
text2: Ɩlɛ pə lɩɩwa sɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ na mpi mpi Ɩsɔ tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la tɔ pɩɩ kpɛntəɣɩ kɛlɛ ? Aaɩ , pə taɣa mpʋ se , paa pəcɔ . Ye paa tʋ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ natəlɩ nti tə pəsəɣɩ na tə ́ lá na yəlaa hiki weesuɣu , aŋhaa , ɩlɛ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təŋʋɣʋ ka yekaɣana ntɛ ́ na yʋlʋ pəsəɣɩ kʋpaŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa .

text: But the scripture hath concluded all under sin , that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe .
text2: Ama pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ ɩsaɣatʋ ŋmakəla yəlaa təna təpaɩ . Na pə wɛ mpʋ , sɩ mpa pa tɛma pa taa na Yesu Kilisiti tɔ , pá hiki kʋcɔɔŋ wei Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha tɔɣɔ pa taa tɛmnaʋ tɔɔ .

text: But before faith came , we were kept under the law , shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed .
text2: Táá tɛmnaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ taa kɔnta ɩlɛ , kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ka tɔkəna - tʋ ɩsɩɩ saləkatʋnaa , na pə ́ taŋaa sɩ pə ́ kɔɔ pə ́ kuli - tʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ táá tɛmnaʋ tɔm ntɩ tə tɔɔ .

text: Wherefore the law was our schoolmaster to bring us unto Christ , that we might be justified by faith .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa na kʋsəsɩɩtʋ wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ tá tɔɔ nyənlʋ haləna Kilisiti kɔɔ , sɩ tə tɛ ́ tá táá na Ɩsɔ na pə ́ lá na tə ́ pəsɩ kʋpama kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa .

text: But after that faith is come , we are no longer under a schoolmaster .
text2: Pənɛntɛ Ɩsɔ táá tɛmnaʋ tɔm ntɩ təlɛ tə kɔma ɩlɛ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ná fɛɩ ɩsɩɩ tá tɔɔ nyənlʋ tɔtɔ .

text: For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus .
text2: Tɔʋ , mɛ mə tɛma mə taa na Ɩsɔ tɔɣɔ ɩ ́ pəsa ɩ piya kɛ mə na Yesu Kilisiti mə kpɛntʋɣʋ tɔɔ .

text: For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , mə təna təpaɩ pa sɔ - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm sɩ mə na Kilisiti ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ na ɩ ́ kpaɣa Kilisiti kiŋ kɛ yaasi kʋfalʋ na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ .

text: There is neither Jew nor Greek , there is neither bond nor free , there is neither male nor female : for ye are all one in Christ Jesus .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnɩ , pə fɛɩ sɩ Yuta tʋ ntɔ , ɩnɛ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ta kɛ Yuta tʋ . Yaa yom ntɔ , kasaɣampu ntɔ . Yaa apalʋ ntɔ , alʋ ntɔ . Ama mə na Yesu Kilisiti ɩ ́ kpɛnta mə tənaɣa kʋlʋm kɛ ́ , faɣaʋ fɛɩ .

text: And if ye be Christ ' s , then are ye Abraham ' s seed , and heirs according to the promise .
text2: Ye Kilisiti tənna - mɛ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ Apəlaham piya kɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ ká hiki kʋpantʋnaa mpa Ɩsɔ tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha - mɛ na pə ́ pəsɩ mə nyəm təkpataa tɔ .

text: Now I say , That the heir , as long as he is a child , differeth nothing from a servant , though he be lord of all ;
text2: Nti ma wɛna na má caa ma tasəna - mɛɣɛ kilisinaʋ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ , pəyaɣa ŋka ka wɛɛ na káá tɛ na ká tɔɣɔ ka caa wɛnaʋ təna tɔ , ka pəcaatʋ ka wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ yom wɛʋ tɔ . Pəyele ŋkɛ kaa tɛna na ká tɩ pə təna .

text: But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father .
text2: Ka pəcaatʋ təna taa ka wɛ paasənlaa niŋ taa , na pɛlɛ pa lakəna - kɛɣɛ pə təna haləna ká kɔɔ ká tala pɩɩsɩ ɩsəna ka caa ka sɩɩwa tɔ .

text: Even so we , when we were children , were in bondage under the elements of the world :
text2: Tá tɔtɔ waatʋ wei tɩɩ wɛ ɩsɩɩ piya tɔ , tɩɩ wɛ antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ pə təna pə kancaalaɣa nyəm taa kɛ ́ na pə ́ kpa - tʋɣʋ yomaa .

text: But when the fulness of the time was come , God sent forth his Son , made of a woman , made under the law ,
text2: Ama pə kɔma pə tala saa wei Ɩsɔ ka sɩɩwa tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tili ɩ pəyaɣa , na alʋ lʋləna - kɛ , na ká təŋ Yuta nyə ́ ma kʋlapʋtʋ .

text: To redeem them that were under the law , that we might receive the adoption of sons .
text2: Ka kɔma mpʋ sɩ ka cɛkɩ mpa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ka tɔkaa tɔ na tə hiki mpaaʋ na tə ́ pəsɩ Ɩsɔ piya .

text: And because ye are sons , God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts , crying , Abba , Father .
text2: Ɩsɔ tʋ ɩ Pəyaɣa Feesuɣu kɛ tá taa sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ teu sɩ tə kɛ ́ ɩ piya maɣamaɣa , na Feesuɣu ŋkʋ kʋ yelina na tə ́ yaa Ɩsɔ sɩ ma Caa Paapa .

text: Wherefore thou art no more a servant , but a son ; and if a son , then an heir of God through Christ .
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩlɛ n ta kɛ yom tɔtɔ , ama n pəsa pəyalʋ kɛ . Na ɩsɩɩ n kɛʋ ɩ pəyalʋ kɛ mpʋ tɔ , Ɩsɔ ká ha - ŋ kʋpantʋnaa mpa ɩ sɩɩ ɩ piya tɔɔ tɔ .

text: Howbeit then , when ye knew not God , ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods .
text2: Tuu lɔŋ ɩ ́ taa nyɩ Ɩsɔ , na ɩ ́ təŋaɣa mpi pə ta kɛ Ɩsɔ maɣamaɣa tɔ na ɩ ́ pəsɩ pəlɛ pə yomaa .

text: But now , after that ye have known God , or rather are known of God , how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements , whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage ?
text2: Ama pənɛntɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ nyəmá Ɩsɔ , yaa ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ nyəma - mɛ tɔ , pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ caa ɩ ́ məlɩ pə təna pə kancaalaɣa nyəm mpi pə taa fɛɩ waaʋ na pə ́ wɛ yem kɛ ́ mpʋ tɔ pə taa ? Na pə kɔma suwe tɔtɔ na ɩ ́ caa ɩ ́ tasa pə yomaa lapʋ ?

text: Ye observe days , and months , and times , and years .
text2: Mə ɩsɛ sɛɛna mə kʋyɛɛŋ kʋpampaŋ faɣasʋɣʋ na mə ɩsɔtʋnaa kʋpama na mə waatʋnaa kʋpama na mə pɩɩsɩ kʋpaŋsɩ faɣasʋɣʋ kɛ teitei .

text: I am afraid of you , lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain .
text2: Mə tɔm cɛpa ma laŋlɛ kɛ teu kɛ ́ . Ɩsɩɩ ma ɩwɩɩlɛ ntɛ ́ tə tənaɣa mə tɔɔ kʋla hʋntʋ ntɛ ́ yaa ?

text: Brethren , I beseech you , be as I am ; for I am as ye are : ye have not injured me at all .
text2: Ma taapalaa , ma wiikina - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ təŋ ma ɩkpatɛ ɩsɩɩ ma maɣamaɣa ma təŋa mə ɩkpatɛ tɔ . Ɩ ́ ta la - m ɩsaɣatʋ natələɣɩ tiili se .

text: Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first .
text2: Na ɩ ́ nyəmá teu sɩ ma kʋtɔŋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma heela - mɛɣɛ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ tɔm kancaalaɣa nyəm .

text: And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not , nor rejected ; but received me as an angel of God , even as Christ Jesus .
text2: Na ɩ ́ ná cɔɔsɛɛ kɛ sɔsɔm kɛ ma wʋsasɩ nsɩ sɩ taa , paa na mpʋ ɩ ́ tá cʋtɩ sɩ ma tɔm ntɩ tə nɩɩ - mɛ . Pəyele ɩ ́ ta lɔ - m , ama ɩ ́ tɔka - m teu kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ɩsɔtaa tillu nɔɣɔlʋ , yaa ɩsɩɩ Yesu Kilisiti maɣamaɣa .

text: Where is then the blessedness ye spake of ? for I bear you record , that , if it had been possible , ye would have plucked out your own eyes , and have given them to me .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnɩ mə laŋhʋlʋmlɛ tɔ paa pɔɔsəɣɩ . Ɩlɛ kaɣana ɩ ́ na - we tɔtɔ ? Halɩ ma pəsəɣɩ má ləsɩ mə nyɩɩlʋɣʋ sɩ waatʋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa , pɩɩ lakaɣa mpʋ , paa mə ɩsɛ maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ ka ləsaa na ɩ ́ tʋ - m .

text: Am I therefore become your enemy , because I tell you the truth ?
text2: Ɩsɩɩ ma heeluɣu - mɛɣɛ tampana tɔɣɔlɛ ma pəsa mə kolontu yaa ?

text: They zealously affect you , but not well ; yea , they would exclude you , that ye might affect them .
text2: Yəlaa panɛ pa lakɩ kɛ ́ na n nawa n tɔ sɩ pa sɔɔla - mɛɣɛ teu . Aaɩ , pə taɣa mpʋ se , paa pəcɔ . Pa caakɩ kɛ ́ sɩ má na - mɛ tə ́ wakəlɩ , na ɩ ́ mələna mpɛ pa tɔɔ na ɩ ́ nyənəɣɩ pa tike .

text: But it is good to be zealously affected always in a good thing , and not only when I am present with you .
text2: Pə wɛ teu sɩ yʋlʋ ɩ ́ sɔɔləɣɩ ɩ lɛlʋ kɛ mpʋ yaa . Ama kʋpantʋ lapʋ taa kɛ ́ ɩ ́ ká sɔɔləɣɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam , pə ́ taa wɛɛ waatʋ wei ma wɛ mə kiŋ tɔ tike .

text: My little children , of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you ,
text2: Ma piya kʋpama , ma taɣana wʋsasɩ taa kɛ ́ sʋʋʋ kɛ mə tɔɔ . Na wʋsasɩ nsɩ sɩ nəɣəsəna ɩsɩɩ lʋlʋɣʋ wʋsasɩ takʋɣʋ alʋ tɔ , sɩ pə ́ la na ɩ ́ kpaɣa Kilisiti yaasi na mə na - ɩ ́ ɩ ́ nəɣəsəna təmaɣa teu .

text: I desire to be present with you now , and to change my voice ; for I stand in doubt of you .
text2: Pepe pukina - m mə hɛkʋ kɛ nɔɔnɔɔ ɩsəntɔ na má heeli - mɛɣɛ kʋfatʋnaa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mə tɔm caala - m sɔsɔm kɛ cənɛɣɛ .

text: Tell me , ye that desire to be under the law , do ye not hear the law ?
text2: Mɛ mpa ɩ ́ caa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ɩ ́ tɔkɩ - mɛ tɔ , ma pɔɔsəɣɩ - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ nɩɩwa nti pa ŋmaawa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɩ tə takəlasɩ taa tɔ , yaa ɩ ́ tá nɩɩ ?

text: For it is written , that Abraham had two sons , the one by a bondmaid , the other by a freewoman .
text2: Pa ŋmaawa sɩ Apəlaham ka wɛna piya naalɛɣɛ , kasaɣampu ná lʋla - ɩ lɛŋka na yom náá lʋlɩ - ɩ lɛŋka .

text: But he who was of the bondwoman was born after the flesh ; but he of the freewoman was by promise .
text2: Ɩsɔ ka tɔmna sɩ kasaɣampu ká lʋlɩ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kasaɣampu kɔma na ɩ ́ lʋlɩ na pə mʋ Ɩsɔ nɔɣɔ taa tɔm təkɛlɛ . Ama yom ná lʋla ɩ nyəŋka kɛ yem kɛ ́ pʋlʋ fɛɩ .

text: Which things are an allegory : for these are the two covenants ; the one from the mount Sinai , which gendereth to bondage , which is Agar .
text2: Tɔm tənɛ tə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ - tʋɣʋ yaasi nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ . Alaa mpɛ pa wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ nɔɔsɩ nsi ɩ ́ na ɩ yəlaa pa kpɛntaa na pá pɛɛlɩ tɔm naalɛ tɔ . Kancaalaɣa nɔɣɔ ntɛ ́ Akaa , na ŋkɛ ka kɛna Sinayi pʋɣʋ nyəŋka , na ká lʋləɣɩ yomaa .

text: For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia , and answereth to Jerusalem which now is , and is in bondage with her children .
text2: Akaa ɩnɩ ɩ kɛna ɩsɩɩ Alapʋ Sinayi pʋɣʋ , na ɩ nəɣəsəna Yosalɛm ɩcatɛ nte tə wɛ saŋa ɩsəntɔ tɔ , na tə na tə yəlaa təna mpa pa kɛ ́ yomaa tɔ .

text: But Jerusalem which is above is free , which is the mother of us all .
text2: Yosalɛm wei ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ wɛ ɩsɔtaa na ɩ ́ kɛ ́ tá təna tá too tɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kɛ ́ kasaɣampu kɛ ́ .

text: For it is written , Rejoice , thou barren that bearest not ; break forth and cry , thou that travailest not : for the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband .
text2: Tə maɣamaɣa kɛ pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Alʋ kaalʋlaɣa nyá nyá laŋlɛ ɩ ́ hʋlʋmɩ . Nyá wei n ta tɩɩ mɔlɩ paa tɔm kʋlʋm tɔ , wiliti teu . Alʋ wei pa lɔ yem tɔ ɩ ká kəlɩ piya kɛ alʋ wei ɩ wɛna paalʋ tɔ .

text: Now we , brethren , as Isaac was , are the children of promise .
text2: Ma taapalaa , ye mɛ ɩlɛ Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ paa lʋlɩ - mɛ tɔɣɔ pa lʋla - mɛ . Na pə lapa teitei ɩsɩɩ ɩ ka tɔma sɩ paa lʋlɩ Ɩsaaka na tampana pá lʋlɩ - ɩ tɔ .

text: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the Spirit , even so it is now .
text2: Pəyaɣa ŋka paa lʋla yem kɛ ́ mpʋ tɔ ka tʋkaɣa ŋka pa lʋləna Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu toŋ tɔɣɔ kʋnyɔŋ . Na mpʋ ɩnəɣɩ pə wɛ saŋa wʋlɛ tənɛ tɔtɔ .

text: Nevertheless what saith the scripture ? Cast out the bondwoman and her son : for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman .
text2: Na ntiɣi pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa yee ? Pa ŋmaawaɣa sɩ : Tɔɣɔnɩ alʋ yom ɩnɩ na ɩ pəyaɣa na pá tɛɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , yom pəyaɣa na kasaɣampu pəyaɣa pa kaa kpɛntɩ na pá tala pa caa wontu .

text: So then , brethren , we are not children of the bondwoman , but of the free .
text2: Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ ma taapalaa , tə ta kɛ yom piya se , ama tə kɛ ́ kasaɣampu piya kɛ ́ .

text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free , and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage .
text2: Kilisiti cɛpa - tʋɣʋ tá yomle taa kɛ ́ sɩ tə ́ pəsɩ kasaɣampiya təkpem . Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ səŋ təca , na ɩ ́ taa yele na cɛpʋ pənɛ pə tɔm liɣiti - mɛ na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ yomaa kɛ pəsʋɣʋ tɔtɔ .

text: Behold , I Paul say unto you , that if ye be circumcised , Christ shall profit you nothing .
text2: Ɩ ́ tʋ ŋkpaŋŋ kɛ teu , Pɔɔlɩ má ma tʋləɣɩ - mɛɣɛ təfoo sɩ , ye ɩ ́ tɛma mə taa na ɩ ́ pɛlɩ , pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ Kilisiti kɔntɛ lapa mə kiŋ ntɛ ́ yem .

text: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised , that he is a debtor to do the whole law .
text2: Ma tasəɣɩ yəlaa tənaɣa kpaalʋɣʋ sɩ , wei ɩ ́ pɛlaa , təlasɩ ɩsɩɩ ɩ tɔka kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təna təpaɩ , ɩ kaa sɛkɩ pʋlʋ .

text: Christ is become of no effect unto you , whosoever of you are justified by the law ; ye are fallen from grace .
text2: Mɛ mpa ɩ ́ caa sɩ Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ nyənɩ - mɛɣɛ kʋpama kɛ mə kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təŋʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔ , mə na Kilisiti ɩ ́ yaa kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ pɛŋ mə təɣɩ Ɩsɔ pɛɛlɛɛ .

text: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith .
text2: Ye ta ɩlɛ tə nyəmá sɩ Ɩsɔ ká pəsɩ - tʋɣʋ yʋlʋpama na tə taŋa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ na Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu toŋ wei ɩ lakɩ tá kiŋ kɛ tá tɛm Ɩsɔ na tá táá tɔ pə tɔɔ tɔ .

text: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision ; but faith which worketh by love .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ye tá na Yesu Kilisiti tə laalaa na tə ́ kpɛntɩ , paa tə pɛlaa paa tə ta pɛlɩ pə lɩɩ kʋlʋm kɛ ́ . Ama mpi pa caa tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ tə ́ tɛ Ɩsɔ na tá táá na táá tɛm mpɩ pə taa kɛ ́ sɔɔlʋɣʋ ná wɛɛ na kʋlɛ kʋ tɔŋa .

text: Ye did run well ; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth ?
text2: Ɩ ́ ka lakaɣa teu ɩlɛ nɔɔnɔɔ awe lapa na ɩ ́ məlɩ hɛɛʋ kɛ tampana təŋʋɣʋ taa ?

text: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you .
text2: Nti pa heela - mɛ na ɩ ́ tɛ mə taa na ɩ ́ tisi tɔ tə ta lɩɩna Ɩsɔ wei ɩ yaa - mɛ tɔ ɩ kiŋ .

text: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump .
text2: Pa tuka ɩtuule sɩ : Kʋkʋsʋm kɛ pəciimaɣa kpaasəɣəna somtu təfʋʋʋ .

text: I have confidence in you through the Lord , that ye will be none otherwise minded : but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment , whosoever he be .
text2: Paa na mpʋ Tacaa yelaa na má wɛɛna naani kɛ mə tɔɔ təkpataa sɩ ɩ ́ kaa kpaɣa hʋwɛɛ nna a faɣana ma nyəna tɔ . Ama wei ɩ lakɩ - mɛɣɛ yɛlɛyɛlɛ tɔ paa ɩ kɛ ́ wei te Ɩsɔ ká nana pʋntʋ .

text: And I , brethren , if I yet preach circumcision , why do I yet suffer persecution ? then is the offence of the cross ceased .
text2: Ma taapalaa ye pɛlʋɣʋ tɔm waasʋ kɛ ma tɔŋna lapʋ tɔtɔ , paa tʋkaɣa - m kʋnyɔŋ suwe tɔtɔ ? Ye pɩɩ wɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tampana , Kilisiti wei pa kama tesika tɔɔ na maa kpaaləɣɩ ɩ tɔm tɔ ɩ tɔm ntɩ tə taa wɩɩ nɔɣɔlʋ .

text: I would they were even cut off which trouble you .
text2: Ama ma kooliɣi kɛ ́ sɩ mpa pa lakɩ - mɛɣɛ yɛlɛyɛlɛ kɛ ́ mpʋ tɔ pɛlɛ pá lakɩ mpʋ na pá puki te , haləna pá pəsɩ kataasɩ kɛ pa maɣamaɣa .

text: For , brethren , ye have been called unto liberty ; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh , but by love serve one another .
text2: Ma taapalaa ye mɛ ɩlɛ pa ləsa - mɛɣɛ sɩ ɩ ́ pəsɩ kasaɣampiya . Ama kʋlʋmtʋ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ taa hʋʋ sɩ ye ɩ ́ pəsa kasaɣampiya kɛ mpʋ ɩ ́ hika mə təɣəlɛ sɩ ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ mə yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ kʋnyɩɩləŋ . Aaɩ pə fɛɩ mpʋ se . Ama nti tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔɔləɣɩ təma , na ɩ ́ teŋ təma , na mpʋ ɩnɩ pə lapʋ sʋʋna - mɛɣɛ teu .

text: For all the law is fulfilled in one word , even in this ; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təna nyʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ : Sɔɔlɩ nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ ɩsɩɩ n ká sɔɔlɩ nyá tɩ tɔ .

text: But if ye bite and devour one another , take heed that ye be not consumed one of another .
text2: Ama ye ɩ ́ lakɩ ɩsɩɩ taalɛ wontu na ɩ ́ cələɣɩ təmaɣa səkpaŋ na kela na ɩ ́ wakələɣɩ təmaɣa mpʋ , ɩ ́ la laakalɩ , tɔfɔ ɩ ́ ká kɔɔ na ɩ ́ kʋ təma təkpataa kɛ ́ atɛ cənɛ .

text: This I say then , Walk in the Spirit , and ye shall not fulful the lust of the flesh .
text2: Nti ma wɛna sɩ ma heeliɣi - mɛ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ nti Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ - mɛ tɔɣɔ tam , ɩ ́ taa nɩɩna mə yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ kʋnyɩɩləŋ .

text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit , and the Spirit against the flesh : and these are contrary the one to the other : so that ye cannot do the things that ye would .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ kʋnyɩɩləm na Feesuɣu kʋnyɩɩləm pə ta kaa pʋlʋ , haləna pɩɩ tɩɩ caa pə ́ nɩɩ təma sɔŋ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lá ɩsɩɩ mə maɣamaɣa ɩ caa tɔ .

text: But if ye be led of the Spirit , ye are not under the law .
text2: Ye nti Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ - mɛ tɔɣɔ ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ ta kɛ ́ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ yomaa tɔtɔ .

text: Now the works of the flesh are manifest , which are these ; Adultery , fornication , uncleanness , lasciviousness ,
text2: Paa wei ɩ nyəmá teu kɛ ɩsəna yəlaa mpa pa təŋəɣɩ pa yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ tɔ pa kʋlapʋtʋ wɛɛ tɔ . Asilima na tɛtɛlakasɩ ɩsaɣasɩ na yaasi ɩsaɣaʋ .

text: Idolatry , witchcraft , hatred , variance , emulations , wrath , strife , seditions , heresies ,
text2: Pa paasəɣəna tɩɩŋ laaʋ na topotopo təmanaa . Pa lɩɩkɩ təmaɣa koloŋa na pá yookina təmaɣa tam na ɩsɛsɛɛmɛɛ haŋa pa hɛkʋ , pa kəla pááná na ɩkəllɛ pɛɛkʋɣʋ , n ká ná pa faɣaa na pá tala kpeka kpeka na pá sʋʋ təmaɣa yoonaʋ .

text: Envyings , murders , drunkenness , revellings , and such like : of the which I tell you before , as I have also told you in time past , that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God .
text2: Ye ɩ nawa ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ pʋlʋ ɩ taa haŋ , pa kɛ ́ sʋlʋnyɔɔlaa , pa fɛɩ pa tɩ kpaʋ kɛ leleŋ nɩɩlɩ ɩ taa , na pá lakɩ ɩsaɣatʋ lɛntənaa kɛ mpʋ tɔtɔ . Ma tasəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ heeluɣu ɩsɩɩ ma tɛm - mɛɣɛ heeluɣu tɔ , pa təna mpa pa lakɩ mpʋ tɔ pa kaa fɛlɩ nɔɔhəlɛ kɛ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa taa .

text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , longsuffering , gentleness , goodness , faith ,
text2: Ama Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu ná lakɩ na yəlaa sɔɔləɣɩ təma na pá hikiɣi laŋhʋlʋmlɛ , na pʋlʋ ɩɩ pɛkələɣɩ - wɛ , na pá wɛna təma na suulu , na pa wɛna pɛɛlɛɛ na pa lakɩ təmaɣa kʋpantʋ na pá təŋəɣɩ tampana .

text: Meekness , temperance : against such there is no law .
text2: Na pa wɛ təpamm na pá tɔkəɣɩ pa təɣɩ teu . Kiiu fɛɩ ŋku kʋ kʋɣɩ tənɛ ɩnɩ tə taa natəlɩ tɔ .

text: And they that are Christ ' s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts .
text2: Mpa pa pəsa Yesu Kilisiti nyə ́ ma tɔ pʋntʋnaa kpɛŋna pa yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ na tə kʋnyɩɩləŋ na tə kɔtɔɩnaa kɛ ́ na pá kʋ ́ tənaŋnaŋ .

text: If we live in the Spirit , let us also walk in the Spirit .
text2: Feesuɣu lapəna na tə ́ hiki weesuɣu pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɩɩ yele na tə ́ təŋ mpi kʋ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ - tʋ tɔ .

text: Let us not be desirous of vain glory , provoking one another , envying one another .
text2: Tə ́ taa hɔŋ tá tɩ na tə ́ kpaasəɣɩ , tə ́ taa kʋsəɣɩ tá təma pááná na tə ́ lakɩ təmaɣa ɩsɛsɛɛmɛɛ .

text: Brethren , if a man be overtaken in a fault , ye which are spiritual , restore such an one in the spirit of meekness ; considering thyself , lest thou also be tempted .
text2: Ma taapalaa , ye nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ pənta natəlɩ , mɛ mpa ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu kɛ teu tɔ ɩ ́ məŋna pʋntʋ kɛ mpaaʋ kʋpaŋkʋ taa na ɩ ́ lapɩ - ɩ təpamm . Ma tasəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ sɩ paa mə taa wei ɩ ́ feŋ ɩ tɩ na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ taa kɔɔ na ɩ ́ tasa maɣasʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ hotuɣu tɔtɔ .

text: Bear ye one another ' s burdens , and so fulfil the law of Christ .
text2: Ɩ ́ səŋna təmaɣa mə kʋpɛkələmnaa taa . Ye ɩ ́ lapa mpʋ ɩ yoosa Kilisiti kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təna ntɛ ́ .

text: For if a man think himself to be something , when he is nothing , he deceiveth himself .
text2: Ye yʋlʋ hɔŋ ɩ tɩ , pəyele ɩ ta tala pʋlʋ , pʋntʋ puɣusiɣi ɩ təɣɩ .

text: But let every man prove his own work , and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone , and not in another .
text2: Ye wei ɩ caa ɩ ́ yɔɔləna ɩ yaasi teu nyəŋ pʋntʋ ɩ ́ taa tʋʋ lɛlaa na ɩ ́ sa ɩ təɣɩ yem . Ama ɩ ́ wiili ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ yaasi taa na ye pə nəɣəsəna yɔɔlʋɣʋ ɩlɛ ɩ yɔɔlɩ .

text: For every man shall bear his own burden .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , paa wei ɩ kʋlapʋtʋ mələɣɩ ɩ nyʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ .

text: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things .
text2: Ye nɔɣɔlʋ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ wei kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm pʋntʋ ɩ ́ cosiɣi ɩ wɛnaʋ təna taa na ɩ ́ haakɩ ɩ sɛɣɛsəlʋ ɩnɩ .

text: Be not deceived ; God is not mocked : for whatsoever a man soweth , that shall he also reap .
text2: Hei ɩ taa puɣusi mə tɩ yoo , paa nyənəɣɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ yem fa . Yʋlʋ ɩ ́ tuu mpi mpəɣɩ ɩ kʋŋ .

text: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption ; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting .
text2: Ye yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ kʋnyɩɩləm kɛ ɩ təŋaa na ɩ ́ tuu , yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ ntɩ tɩɩ yelina na ɩ ́ kɔɔ ɩ ́ kʋ səm . Ama ye mpi Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu caakɩ tɔɣɔ ɩ təŋaa na ɩ ́ tuu , kʋlɛ kɩɩ yelina na ɩ ́ kɔɔ ɩ ́ kʋ weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ .

text: And let us not be weary in well doing : for in due season we shall reap , if we faint not .
text2: Tə ́ taa la felentu na kʋpantʋ lapʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ye tə ta lɔ tá apalʋtʋ haləna pə ́ tala pə waatʋ mpi tɩɩ kʋ tɔ pɩɩ tɔɔ sɔsɔm .

text: As we have therefore opportunity , let us do good unto all men , especially unto them who are of the household of faith .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ye tə hika mpaa kɛ timpi tə ́ la yəlaa tənaɣa kʋpantʋ . Ɩlɛ pə ́ kələna tá na mpa tə kaa Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ tɔ .

text: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand .
text2: Tɔʋ , ɩ ́ ná ɩsəna ma ŋmaakɩ - mɛ na ma maɣamaɣa ma niŋ kɛ cənɛ na ŋmaatʋ pee kʋyasəlɛɛ tɔ .

text: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh , they constrain you to be circumcised ; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ .
text2: Mpa pa yɔɔləɣəna tɔɔ nyəm na pá caa yəlaa ɩ ́ sa - wɛ tɔ mpɛ pa caana sɩ pá caalɩ - mɛ na ɩ ́ pɛlɩ . Ɩlɛ paa caa sɩ pá tʋ - wɛɣɛ kʋnyɔməŋ kɛ Kilisiti səm tesika tɔm tɔɔ tɔɣɔ .

text: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law ; but desire to have you circumcised , that they may glory in your flesh .
text2: Yəlaa mpa ɩnɩ pa pɛləɣɩ mpʋ tɔ paa təŋəɣɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ se . Ama pa caa kɛ ́ sɩ ye mɩɩ nɩɩna - wɛ na ɩ ́ pɛlɩ ɩlɛ pa sa pa tɩ sɩ mpɛ pa yelina ɩ ́ kɔta mə tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ kʋkɔtəm pənɛ .

text: But God forbid that I should glory , save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom the world is crucified unto me , and I unto the world .
text2: Ma ɩlɛ ye pə taɣa Yesu Kilisiti səm tesika ma kaa yɔɔləna pʋlʋ . Tesika ŋkɛ ka tɔɔ kɛ ́ má na antulinya tə faɣana təma təkpatakpata na lɛlʋ ta nyɩ sɩ lɛlʋ wɛɛ .

text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision , but a new creature .
text2: Paa n pɛlaa paa n ta pɛlɩ pə lɩɩ kʋlʋm kɛ ́ . Ama nti tə wɛɛ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ ń laɣasɩ na ń pəsɩ yʋlʋ kʋfalʋ .

text: And as many as walk according to this rule , peace be on them , and mercy , and upon the Israel of God .
text2: Mpa paa tɛləsəɣɩ pɛlʋɣʋ tɔm kɛ lɔlɔ kɛ pa weesuɣu taa tɔ ma kooliɣi kɛ ́ sɩ Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ ha pa tənaɣa alaafəya na ɩ ́ la - wɛɣɛ kʋpantʋ na ɩ ́ kpɛnna ɩ yəlaa samaa təna təpaɩ na ɩ ́ la mpʋ .

text: From henceforth let no man trouble me : for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Pə kaasʋɣʋ tɔ , nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa tasa - m wahala tʋɣʋ tɔtɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tɔntɔɔləŋ wei ɩ wɛ ma tɔɔ ɩsəntɔ tɔ ɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ kpakpaa kɛ ́ sɩ ma kɛ ́ Yesu yom .

text: Brethren , the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Ma taapalaa mɛ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ mə tənaɣa pɛɛlɛɛ . Ami .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , to the saints which are at Ephesus , and to the faithful in Christ Jesus :
text2: Maɣa Pɔɔlɩ , Ɩsɔ luɣu lapəna na má lá Yesu Kilisiti tillu , má ŋmaakəna takəlaɣa kanɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ yəlaa mpa pa wɛ Ɩfeesu na pá na Yesu Kilisiti pa kpɛntaa na pá nɩɩkəna - ɩ tɔ .

text: Grace be to you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Tacaa Ɩsɔ na tá sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti pá hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ na pá ha - mɛɣɛ alaafəya .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ :
text2: Tə sa Ɩsɔ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti Caa kɛ teu . Tá na Kilisiti tá kpɛntʋɣʋ tɔɔ Ɩsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ kpaɣana Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ kʋpantʋnaa na ɩ ́ la - tʋɣʋ sɔsɔm kɛ hatuu ɩsɔtaa .

text: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world , that we should be holy and without blame before him in love :
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , faɩɩ na pə ́ cɔ ́ Ɩsɔ lakɩ antulinya tɔɣɔ ɩ ka tɛma ləsʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ sɩɩ sɩ tá na Kilisiti tə ́ kpɛntɩ na tə ́ pəsɩ ɩ nyə ́ ma na tá tɔntɛ kɛɛsɩ teu kɛ ɩ ɩsɛntaa na kʋwakələm napəlɩ pə fɛɩ tá kiŋ .

text: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself , according to the good pleasure of his will ,
text2: Ɩ ka tɛma sɩɩʋ kɛ hatuu lɔŋ kɛ ɩ sɔɔlʋɣʋ tɔɔ sɩ ɩ ká pəsɩ - tʋɣʋ ɩ piya maɣamaɣa kɛ Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ , ɩlɛ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ luɣu lapəna mpʋ pə ́ cɔ ́ pə lapʋ tɩɩ wɛ - ɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ .

text: To the praise of the glory of his grace , wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved .
text2: Ye mpʋ tɩɩ sa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teu kɛ ɩ hʋlʋɣʋ - tʋɣʋ ɩ pɛɛlɛɛ taa pɛɛlɛɛ kʋpana na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ na ɩ luɣu tɛɛ Pəyaɣa kiŋ tɔ .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , the forgiveness of sins , according to the riches of his grace ;
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Kilisiti weesuɣu lɩɩ tá tɔɔ tɔɣɔ pə yapa - tʋ na pə ́ hɩɩsɩ tá ɩsaɣatʋnaa . Tənaɣa Ɩsɔ lapa na tə ́ ná ɩ pɛɛlɛɛ sɔsɔɔna

text: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence ;
text2: nna ɩ hʋla - tʋ tɔ a tɔɔʋ katatəlaɣa , kɛ waatʋ wei ɩ ha - tʋɣʋ ləmaɣasɛɛ sɔsɔɔna na nyəm sɔsɔɔm tɔ .

text: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will , according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself :
text2: Na ɩ lapa na tə ́ nyɩ mpi ɩ sɩɩwa na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ na pə ́ wɛ ɩŋmɛlaʋ tɔ . Na hatuu lɔŋ kɛ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ka hʋʋ ɩ taa na ɩ ́ sɩɩ sɩ ɩ ká yoosi - wɩ na Kilisiti kiŋ .

text: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ , both which are in heaven , and which are on earth ; even in him :
text2: Pə kɔŋ na pə ́ tala kʋyɛɛŋ kʋtɛɛsəŋ taa na Ɩsɔ koti ɩsɔtaa nyəm na atɛ nyəm na ɩ ́ mələna - wəɣɩ Kilisiti tike tɛɛ na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ tɔɣɔ pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ kawulaɣa , ɩlɛ Ɩsɔ tʋ mpi ɩ sɩɩwa na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ tɔ pə nyʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ .

text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance , being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will :
text2: Ɩsɔ təŋa ɩsəna ɩ sɩɩwa na ɩ ́ lakɩ tɔɣɔ ɩ ləsa - tʋɣʋ hatuu lɔŋ sɩ tá na Kilisiti tá kpɛntʋɣʋ tɔɔ tə ́ hiki tá paa tete kɛ nyʋɣʋ yapʋ tɔm taa . Ɩsɔ ɩɩ lakɩ pʋlʋ na pə ́ coti nti ɩ sɩɩwa na ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ luɣu la sɩ ɩ ́ la tɔ .

text: That we should be to the praise of his glory , who first trusted in Christ .
text2: Ye mpʋ tá mpa tə laala Kilisiti tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɛɛlʋɣʋ tɔ , tə ́ sa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ sɔsɔɔntʋ tɔɔ .

text: In whom ye also trusted , after that ye heard the word of truth , the gospel of your salvation : in whom also after that ye believed , ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise ,
text2: Mə maɣamaɣa waatʋ wei ɩ ́ nɩɩ tampana tɔm , Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ wei ɩ yapa mə nyɔɔŋ tɔ , ɩ ́ tɛma Kilisiti na mə taa kɛ ́ ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ náá yʋsɩ - mɛ sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ ɩ nyə ́ ma na ɩ kʋyʋsʋm mpəɣəlɛ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ wei ɩ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha - mɛ tɔ .

text: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession , unto the praise of his glory .
text2: Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ ɩnəɣɩ Ɩsɔ sɩɩ - tʋɣʋ tɔlʋma sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ nyʋɣʋ yapʋ mpi pə tɔm ɩ ka heela ɩ yəlaa sɩ ɩ ká kɔna na pə ́ wɛɛ - wɛ ɩsɩɩ pa pʋlʋ tɔ pə ́ kɔma na pə ́ ya - tʋ təkpataa ɩlɛ tɩɩ tɩ tá pʋlʋ ɩnɩ . Ye mpʋ tə ́ sa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ sɔsɔɔntʋ tɔɔ .

text: Wherefore I also , after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus , and love unto all the saints ,
text2: Pə təna ɩsəntɔ pə tɔɔ na ma tɩɩ nɩɩʋ pənɛntɛ tɔtɔ sɩ ɩ ́ tɛma Tacaa Yesu na mə taa na ɩ ́ sɔɔla Ɩsɔ yəlaa təna tɔ ,

text: Cease not to give thanks for you , making mention of you in my prayers ;
text2: maa hɛɛsəɣɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sɛɛtʋ sɩ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ mə tɔɔ se . Na ma tɔɔsəɣɩ mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma Ɩsɔ sələməŋ taa kɛ ́ na má sələməɣɩ mə tɔɔ .

text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :
text2: Nti ma sələməɣɩ tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti Ɩsɔ , Tacaa teeli təna tʋ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ ɩ ́ ha - mɛɣɛ ɩ Feesuɣu , kʋlɛ kɩɩ yelina na ɩ ́ cɛkəna , na kɩɩ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ nyəmɩ - ɩ teu .

text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,
text2: Ma sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sɩ pə ́ tʋ - mɛɣɛ laɣatʋ kɛ hatuu mə taa na ɩ ́ nyɩ mpi pə tɔɔ Ɩsɔ yaa - mɛ na ɩ ́ tɛɛləɣɩ tɔ , na ɩ ́ nyɩ kʋpantʋ sɔsɔɔntʋ teu teu nyəntʋ nti ɩ sɩɩ mpa ɩ tɩ tɔ pa tɔɔ tɔ .

text: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to usward who believe , according to the working of his mighty power ,
text2: Na ɩ ́ nyɩ ɩ toma sɔsɔɔna taa sɔsɔɔna nna ɩ wɛna na ɩ ́ lakəna Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa tá tá kiŋ tɔ . Toma sɔsɔɔna anəɣəlɛ mpʋ na nna ɩ hʋləna toŋ na toŋ

text: Which he wrought in Christ , when he raised him from the dead , and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places ,
text2: kɛ waatʋ wei ɩ feesa Kilisiti na ɩ ́ kpaasɩ - ɩ ɩsɔtaa na ɩ ́ caɣasɩ - ɩ ɩ kɔŋkɔŋ taa tɔ .

text: Far above all principality , and power , and might , and dominion , and every name that is named , not only in this world , but also in that which is to come :
text2: Kilisiti wɛʋ təna tɔ ɩ kəla pə təna təpaɩ kɛ ́ , paa toŋtʋnaa , paa pəsʋɣʋ ŋku , paa toma nna , paa kawulasɩ nsi , na həla təna nna pa yaa tɔ , na pə taɣa antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ taa tike , ama pə kpɛntəna wei ɩ ka kɔɔ tɔ ɩ kəla ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ taa tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: And hath put all things under his feet , and gave him to be the head over all things to the church ,
text2: Ɩsɔ mələna pə təna təpaɩ kɛ ́ Kilisiti nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ na ɩnəɣɩ ɩ hʋlaa sɩ Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka ɩ ́ nyənəɣɩ a wulaʋ sɔsɔ .

text: Which is his body , the fulness of him that filleth all in all .
text2: Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka wɛʋ mpʋ tɔ a kɛ ́ Kilisiti tɔnʋɣʋ kɛ ́ , na a kiŋ kɛ ɩ wɛɛ təkpataa , ɩnɩ wei ɩ maɣala paa timpi tɔ .

text: And you hath he quickened , who were dead in trespasses and sins ;
text2: Tuu lɔŋ mə kʋpəntəŋ na mə ɩsaɣatʋ ka yelaa kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ wɛ ɩsɩɩ sətaa kɛ Ɩsɔ nyəntʋ taa .

text: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world , according to the prince of the power of the air , the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience :
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ mpaaʋ ɩsaɣaʋ kɛ ɩ ́ ka təŋaɣa na ɩ ́ nɩɩkaɣana alɔɣaa toŋ nyə ́ ma mpa pa wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ pa sɔsɔ . Alɔɣaa sɔsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ wɛnna na ɩ ́ lakɩ ɩ nyəntʋ kɛ yəlaa mpa pa kisa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ nɩɩnaʋ tɔ pa taa .

text: Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh , fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind ; and were by nature the children of wrath , even as others .
text2: Tá təna ɩsəntɔ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɩɩ wɛɛ , tə təŋaɣa tá yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ kʋpəntʋ kʋnyɩɩləŋ kɛ yem kɛ ́ . Na mpi tá tɔnəŋ na tá hʋwɛɛ caakaɣa tɔ mpʋ teitei kɛ ́ tə lakaɣa . Pə lʋla - tʋ na tə ́ wɛ ɩsəna tɔ pə wɛɛ sɩ Ɩsɔ pááná ká huu tá tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ a ka huu lɛlaa tɔɔ tɔ .

text: But God , who is rich in mercy , for his great love wherewith he loved us ,
text2: Ama Ɩsɔ hʋla - tʋɣʋ suulu kɛ sɔsɔm , na ɩsəna ɩ sɔɔla - tʋ tɔ pə fɛɩ nyənʋɣʋ .

text: Even when we were dead in sins , hath quickened us together with Christ , ( by grace ye are saved ; )
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɩɩ wɛʋ ɩsɩɩ sətaa kɛ Ɩsɔ nyəntʋ taa kɛ ́ tá kʋpəntəŋ tɔɔ tɔ , ɩ kpɛnta tá na Kilisiti kɛ weesuɣu haʋ . Ɩsɔ suulu tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə yapa mə nyɔɔŋ .

text: And hath raised us up together , and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus :
text2: Tá na Yesu Kilisiti tá kpɛntʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ feesa tá na - ɩ sɩ tə ́ tɔɣɔ kawulaɣa kɛ hatuu ɩsɔtaa .

text: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus .
text2: Ɩ lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ tam tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩsəna ɩ suulu tɔɔ katatəlaɣa na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - tʋɣʋ suulu na Yesu Kilisiti kiŋ tɔ .

text: For by grace are ye saved through faith ; and that not of yourselves : it is the gift of God :
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ Ɩsɔ pɛɛlɛɛ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə yapa mə nyɔɔŋ na ɩ ́ tɛmna - ɩ na mə taa tɔɣɔ pə lapa mpʋ . Na mpʋ ɩnɩ pə lapa tɔ pə ta lɩɩna mə maɣamaɣa mə kiŋ , ama Ɩsɔ hatɛ kɛ ́ .

text: Not of works , lest any man should boast .
text2: Pə taɣa mə ɩwɩɩlɛ tɔɔ , pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa kɔɔ na ɩ ́ sa tɩ .

text: For we are his workmanship , created in Christ Jesus unto good works , which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ Ɩsɔ ŋmana - tʋ , na tá na Yesu Kilisiti tə kpɛntaa tɔɣɔ ɩ ŋma - tʋɣʋ mpʋ sɩ tə ́ lakɩ təma kʋpana nna ɩ ka taɣanaa na ɩ ́ sɩɩ tɔɣɔ sɔsɔm .

text: Wherefore remember , that ye being in time past Gentiles in the flesh , who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands ;
text2: Mɛ mpa ɩ ́ ká kɛ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma təsiɣisiɣi na Yuta nyə ́ ma yaakaɣa - mɛɣɛ kʋtapɛləŋ na mpɛ pa yaakɩ pa təɣɩ pɛllaa tɔ , pəyele yʋlʋ niŋ pɛləna - wɛɣɛ kʋpɛlʋ sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ kɔtaɣa kɛ ́ . Ɩ ́ tɔɔsɩ ɩsəna ɩ ́ ka wɛɛ tɔ na ɩ ́ ná .

text: That at that time ye were without Christ , being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel , and strangers from the covenants of promise , having no hope , and without God in the world :
text2: Pɩɩ wɛɛ tɔ ɩ ́ ka hatələna Kilisiti kɛ ́ , ɩ ́ ká kɛ ́ kpaɩ nyə ́ ma kɛ ́ , ɩ ́ fɛɩ mpa Ɩsɔ ləsaa sɩ ɩ yəlaa tɔ pa taa . Na pə təna mpi Ɩsɔ ka tɔma ɩ yəlaa sɩ ɩ ká la - wɛ , haləna ɩ ́ na - wɛ pá caŋ pá sɩɩ təmaɣa nɔɔsɩ kɛ pə tɔm taa tɔ , mə taa fɛɩ pa taa se . Ɩ ́ ka wɛ yem kɛ ́ atɛ cənɛɣɛ , ɩ fɛɩna mpi pə tɔɔ ɩ ́ tɛɛləɣɩ tɔ pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ taa nyɩ Ɩsɔ .

text: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ .
text2: Ama pənɛntɛ mə na Yesu Kilisiti mə kpɛntʋɣʋ tɔɔ ɩ weesuɣu lɩɩʋ yelaa kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ ka hatələnaʋ pə təna tɔ ɩ ́ taɣanɩ - wəɣɩ kpətənaʋ .

text: For he is our peace , who hath made both one , and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us ;
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Kilisiti maɣamaɣa kpaɣana Yuta nyə ́ ma na mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ na ɩ ́ lá na tə ́ pəsɩ piitim kʋlʋməm na hɛɛsʋɣʋ kɔɔ . Ɩ tɔnʋɣʋ kɛ ɩ kpaɣaa na ɩ ́ yasəna koloŋa ŋka kaa kaɣa pa hɛkʋ taa ɩsɩɩ koluŋa tɔ .

text: Having abolished in his flesh the enmity , even the law of commandments contained in ordinances ; for to make in himself of twain one new man , so making peace ;
text2: Na ɩ kʋwa Yuta nyə ́ ma kʋsəsɩɩtʋ na tə kʋheelitu na tə kʋkʋkiim sɩ ɩ kpakəɣɩ Yuta nyə ́ ma na mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ , piitim mpɩ pə naalɛ na ɩ ́ kpɛntəna ɩ tɩ na pá pəsɩ piitim kʋlʋməm kɛ kʋfam na hɛɛsʋɣʋ kɔɔ .

text: And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross , having slain the enmity thereby :
text2: Kilisiti səm kɛ tesika tɔɔ lapəna na taa kpanaʋ kɛ təma saalɩ , na tesika tɔɔ tənɛɣɛ ɩ kpɛnta piitim mpɩ pə tɔm naalɛ na pə ́ pəsɩ piitim kʋlʋməm na ɩ ́ ciiki pə na Ɩsɔ .

text: And came and preached peace to you which were afar off , and to them that were nigh .
text2: Kilisiti kɔmna na ɩ ́ kpaalɩ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ wei ɩ hɛɛsəɣɩ yəlaa laŋa tɔ paa mpa mɛ ɩ ́ tá kɛ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma na ɩ ́ ka hatələna Ɩsɔ tɔ , paa Yuta nyə ́ ma mpa paa kpətəna - ɩ tɔ .

text: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father .
text2: Kilisiti ɩnɩ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ tá təna tə pəsəɣɩ na tə ́ səŋ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ toŋ taa .

text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;
text2: Ye mpʋ mɛ mpa ɩ ́ tá kɛ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ ɩ ́ tá kɛ ́ kpaɩ nyə ́ ma yaa caɣalaa . Ama pənɛntɛ mə na Ɩsɔ yəlaa ɩ ́ kaa ɩcatɛ , na ɩ ́ pəsa Ɩsɔ təyaɣa nyə ́ ma maɣamaɣa təkpem .

text: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets , Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone ;
text2: Ɩ ́ pəsa ɩsɩɩ pa ŋmaakʋɣʋ kutuluɣu tɔɣɔ . Yesu kɛlɛ kancaalaɣa cɛɛɣa , na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ tillaa na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa , na pə ́ kaasɩ - mɛɣɛ ɩsɔtaa .

text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord :
text2: Ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ kutuluɣu ŋmatʋ təna səŋa teu , na tə ́ tɔŋna pɩɩʋ sɩ timpi tá na Tacaa tə kpɛnta mpʋ tɔ tə ́ pəsɩ Ɩsɔ təcaɣalɛ naŋŋ nyəntɛ .

text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit .
text2: Ɩ ́ kpɛntʋɣʋna - ɩ tɔ pa təna - mɛ tɔtɔɣɔ kutuluɣu tɔɔ kɛ ́ sɩ mə na lɛlaa ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ na ɩ ́ pəsɩ kutuluɣu ŋku kʋ taa Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu ká caɣa na pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ Ɩsɔ wɛnna kʋ taa tɔ .

text: For this cause I Paul , the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles ,
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Pɔɔlɩ má wei ma kɛ ́ saləka tʋ kɛ Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ sɩ pə ́ waasɩ mpa mɛ ɩ ́ tá kɛ ́ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ , ma sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ .

text: If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to youward :
text2: Ma hʋʋ teu sɩ ɩsəntɔ ɩ ́ nɩɩwa ɩsəna Ɩsɔ lapa - m suulu na ɩ ́ tʋ - m sɩ má la təmlɛ kɛ mə kiŋ tɔ .

text: How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery ; ( as I wrote afore in few words ,
text2: Ɩsɔ sɩɩ ɩsəna mpi na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ na pə ́ ŋmɛlaa tɔɣɔ ɩ kulaa na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - m na má nyɩ . Halɩ ma tɛma - mɛɣɛ pə tɔm kɛɛsʋɣʋ kɛ cənɛ ɩnəɣɩ pəcɔ .

text: Whereby , when ye read , ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ )
text2: Na ye ɩ ́ kalaa ɩ ́ ká ná ɩsəna mpi ma nyəmá Kilisiti tɔm nti ɩnɩ nɔɣɔlʋ taa cɛkəna mpʋ tɔ .

text: Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men , as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ;
text2: Ɩsɔ táá hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - təɣɩ sɔsaa taa yəlaa ɩsɩɩ kaɣana ɩ lapa na ɩ Feesuɣu kuli - tɩ na kʋ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ tillaa na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa mpa pa kɛ ́ ɩ yəlaa kʋpama tɔ .

text: That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs , and of the same body , and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel :
text2: Na tɔm kʋŋmɛlətʋ ntəɣəlɛ sɩ : Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ lapa na mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ na Yuta nyə ́ ma pa təna pá hiki pa paa tete kɛ kʋpantʋ nti Ɩsɔ sɩɩ ɩ yəlaa tɔ tə taa , na pá pəsɩ kʋlʋm təkpataa , na Ɩsɔ tɔma sɩ ɩ lakɩ mpi na Yesu Kilisiti kiŋ tɔ piitim lɛmpɩ nyə ́ ma ná wɛ pə taa tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: Whereof I was made a minister , according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power .
text2: Suulu kɛ Ɩsɔ hʋlaa na ɩ ́ tʋna - m na ɩ ́ paasɩ na ɩ ́ ha - m toma sɩ má la Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ ɩnɛ ɩ təmlɛ .

text: Unto me , who am less than the least of all saints , is this grace given , that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ ;
text2: Maɣalɛ Ɩsɔ yəlaa səkpema taa səkpelu , paa na mpʋ ma ɩnəɣɩ Ɩsɔ tʋnaa na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ suulu ɩnɛ sɩ má cɔɔ na má heeli mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔɣɔ Kilisiti teu sɔsɔɔm mpi pə fɛɩna akpele tɔ pə Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ .

text: And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery , which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God , who created all things by Jesus Christ :
text2: Na má la na yəlaa təna cɛkəna Ɩsɔ sɩɩ ɩsəna mpi na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ na pə ́ ŋmɛlaa tɔ , ɩsəna pə wɛɛ sɩ pə ́ la tɔ . Ɩsɔ wei ɩ lapa pə təna na pə ́ wɛɛ tɔ ɩ ŋmɛsa hatuu lɔŋtaa kɛ ́ ɩsəna mpi ɩ sɩɩwa na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ mpʋ tɔɣɔ .

text: To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God ,
text2: Sɩ pə ́ kɔma na pə ́ tala waatʋ ɩnɛ ɩlɛ ɩ yele na ɩsɔtaa kawulaɣa nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma na ka toŋtʋnaa nana Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka kiŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ nyəm yaasi təna .

text: According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord :
text2: Ɩ ka hʋʋkaɣa ntiɣi tam tɔ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti kiŋ kɛ ɩ lapa - tɩ . Na pə nɔɣɔ taa təkʋlʋŋkʋlʋ kɛ ́ ɩ lapa .

text: In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him .
text2: Na tá na - ɩ tə kpɛntaa na tə ́ tɛmɩ - ɩ na tá taa tɔɣɔ tə hika mpaaʋ na tə ́ səŋ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa na naani kɛ teu .

text: Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you , which is your glory .
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩlɛ ma wiikəna - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ taa lɔ tɔɔŋ kɛ kʋnyɔŋ ŋku ma tɔkɩ mə tɔɔ tɔ kʋ tɔɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ pɩɩ tɛ na pə ́ kʋsɩ mə nyʋɣʋ .

text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma luŋa akula kɛ Tacaa

text: Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named ,
text2: wei ɩ haakɩ atɛ na ɩsɔtaa piitimnaa tənaɣa pə həla tɔ ,

text: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;
text2: sɩ ɩ teeli sɔsɔ tɔɔ ɩ ́ yele na ɩ Feesuɣu la na mɩɩ hiki pəsʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ nyɔɔ toŋ kɛ hatuu mə ləmaɣasɛɛ taa ,

text: That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith ; that ye , being rooted and grounded in love ,
text2: na ɩ ́ tɛ Ɩsɔ na mə ́ taa kɛ ́ teu , na Kilisiti wɛɛ mə waalɩ kɛ ́ tam . Na ma sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔɔləɣɩ təma na ɩ ́ səŋ pə taa kɛ ́ teu təkeŋkeŋ .

text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;
text2: Na mə na Ɩsɔ yəlaa təna ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ na ɩ ́ hiki pəsʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ cɛkəna ɩsəna Kilisiti sɔɔlʋɣʋ tɔɔwa tɔ haləna kʋ fɛɩ tənaɣa . Nwaaŋ na mpəlɛ , ɩsɔtaa na atɛ .

text: And to know the love of Christ , which passeth knowledge , that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God .
text2: Na paa Kilisiti sɔɔlʋɣʋ fɛɩ sɩ nɔɣɔlʋ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ cɛkəna kʋ təna tɔ , mɩɩ cɛkəna - kʋ , na ɩ ́ hiki Ɩsɔ nyəm təna na pə ́ maɣalɩ mə taanaa təpampam .

text: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think , according to the power that worketh in us ,
text2: Tɔʋ , toma nna a wɛ tá taa na á waasəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ tam tɔ anəɣɩ Ɩsɔ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lana - tʋɣʋ kʋpantʋ na pə ́ tɛɛ tá sələmʋɣʋ tɔɔ təcaɣacaɣa , haləna pə ́ tɩɩ tɛɛ mpi mpi tə pəsəɣɩ na tə ́ hʋʋ tá taa tɔ .

text: Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages , world without end . Amen .
text2: Ɩsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ sɛɛlaa təna təpaɩ , na Yesu Kilisiti pá tʋɣɩ - ɩ teeli na pə ́ polo ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam haləna tam . Ami .

text: I therefore , the prisoner of the Lord , beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called ,
text2: Ye mpʋ ma wei ma kɛ ́ saləka tʋ kɛ Tacaa təmlɛ lapʋ tɔɔ tɔ , ma tɛɛkəɣɩ - mɛ na wiinaʋ sɩ ɩ ́ yele na mə tɔntɛ te teu , na pə ́ kɛɛsəna tɔntɛ nte Ɩsɔ caa na ɩ ́ yaa - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ tɔ tɔ .

text: With all lowliness and meekness , with longsuffering , forbearing one another in love ;
text2: Ɩ ́ pasəɣɩ mə tɩ , ɩ ́ lakɩ təhɛɛ , ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ təmaɣa suulu , ɩ ́ səŋna təma na sɔɔlʋɣʋ .

text: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace .
text2: Ɩsəna Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu yelaa na ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ tɔ ɩ ́ sɛɛsɩ ɩsəlɛ na mə kpɛntʋɣʋ ŋkʋɣʋ tɔkʋɣʋ , na nɔɣɔ kʋlʋmaɣa ŋka ɩ ́ wɛna tɔ ká yele na ɩ ́ lá mpʋ .

text: There is one body , and one Spirit , even as ye are called in one hope of your calling ;
text2: Tɔnʋɣʋ kʋlʋmʋɣʋ tike təkoŋ wɛnna , na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kʋlʋm tike təkoŋ wɛnna , na tətɛɛllɛ nte tə tɔɔ Ɩsɔ ləsa - mɛ tɔ təlɛ tə wɛ kʋlʋm tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: One Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
text2: Tacaa wɛ kʋlʋm kɛ ́ təkoŋ , na ɩ mpaaʋ wɛ kʋlʋmʋɣʋ kɛ ́ təkoŋ , na Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔʋ wɛ kʋlʋməm kɛ ́ təkoŋ .

text: One God and Father of all , who is above all , and through all , and in you all .
text2: Kʋlʋm tike təkoŋ kɛna yəlaa təna Ɩsɔ na pa Caa . Ɩnəɣəlɛ pa təna təpaɩ pa wulaʋ , na kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ lakəna pə tənaɣa ɩsəna ɩ nɔkaa tɔ , na kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ wɛna pa təna pa waalɩ .

text: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ .
text2: Ɩsɔ yelaa kɛ ́ na pʋlʋ lapʋ saa paa tá taa wei kɛ ́ ŋkaŋka na pə ́ kɛɛsəna ɩsəna mpi Kilisiti yelaa sɩ pə lapʋ ɩ ́ saa yʋlʋ tɔ .

text: Wherefore he saith , When he ascended up on high , he led captivity captive , and gave gifts unto men .
text2: Haləna Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa pa ŋmaa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ : Waatʋ wei ɩ kpawa hatuu ɩsɔtaa tɔ , ɩ kpɛnna ɩ kʋkpakpama paɣalɛ na ɩ ́ kpaana , na ɩ lapa yəlaa kɛ kʋcɔɔŋ .

text: ( Now that he ascended , what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth ?
text2: Tɔʋ , pa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ mpʋ sɩ ɩ kpawa tɔ wentiɣilɛ mpʋ ? Ntəɣəlɛ sɩ ɩ tiiwa katatəlaɣa , haləna ɩ ́ tala tɛtʋ tɛɛ maɣamaɣa kɛ ́ na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ kpaakɩ .

text: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens , that he might fill all things . )
text2: Wei ɩnɩ ɩ tii mpʋ tɔ kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ kpana haləna ɩ ́ tɛɛ ɩsɔtaa təyamyam sɩ ɩ ́ wɛɛ na ɩ ́ maɣalɩ paa timpi .

text: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;
text2: Na kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ yelina na kʋlapəlɛnaa saa yəlaa kɛ ŋka ŋka . Ɩ tʋ lɛlaa sɩ pá la tillaa sɔsaa , lɛlaa kɛ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa , na lɛlaa sɩ pɛlɛ pá cɔɔna Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ , na lɛlaa sɩ pɛlɛ pá la paasənlaa na Ɩsɔ Tɔm sɛɣɛsəlaa .

text: For the perfecting of the saints , for the work of the ministry , for the edifying of the body of Christ :
text2: Ɩ lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pa hʋ ́ lɩ ́ Ɩsɔ yəlaa kɛ ɩsəna paa la ɩ təmlɛ na kilisiti tɔnʋɣʋ tuusi lɔlɔ kɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ taa tɔ .

text: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :
text2: Ye pə taɣa mpʋ tá təna təpaɩ tá taa tɛmnaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ ká la kʋlʋməm , na tá nyəm kɛ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa ká la kʋlʋməm tɔtɔ . Na tɩɩ la sɔsaa kɛ ɩ tɔm taa haləna tá teu tala Kilisiti teu sɔsɔɔm .

text: That we henceforth be no more children , tossed to and fro , and carried about with every wind of doctrine , by the sleight of men , and cunning craftiness , whereby they lie in wait to deceive ;
text2: Tə kaa tasa pəcaatʋ taa kɛ ́ wɛɛʋ na paa puɣusulu wei ɩ ́ laŋtəɣɩ - tʋ na ɩ kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ , tə məŋna cənɛ tə məŋna cənɛ , ɩsɩɩ heelim lakʋɣʋ tɔ . Puɣusulaa mpɛ pa lukəna - tɩ na pa acilaɣatʋ , na pá tʋsəɣəna lɛlaa .

text: But speaking the truth in love , may grow up into him in all things , which is the head , even Christ :
text2: Ama ye tə heeliɣi təmaɣa tampana na sɔɔlʋɣʋ ɩlɛ tɩɩ sɔɔsəɣɩ pɩɩʋ kɛ pə təna pə taa na tə ́ tala Kilisiti wei ɩ kɛ ́ tá tɔnʋɣʋ nyʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth , according to the effectual working in the measure of every part , maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love .
text2: Ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ niŋ na nɔɔhɛɛ na pə təna pə wɛʋ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ waanɩ waanɩ kɛ tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔ pə tɔkəna təmaɣa teu , na tɔnʋɣʋ atama atama tamsəna təmaɣa teu tɔɣɔ pə kpɛnta pilimile . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə təna mpi pə wɛ tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔ pə lakɩ pə təmlɛ kɛ teu , tɔnʋɣʋ təna pɩɩkɩ kɛ ́ , na kʋ sɔɔlʋɣʋ tɔŋna sɔɔsʋɣʋ .

text: This I say therefore , and testify in the Lord , that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk , in the vanity of their mind ,
text2: Ye pə wɛ mpʋ , na Tacaa ma heeliɣi - mɛ təfoo sɩ ɩ ́ taa tasa tɔntɛ ɩsɩɩ cefelinaa . Pɛlɛ pa təŋəɣɩ pa kpaɩ hʋwɛɛ kɛ yem kɛ ́ .

text: Having the understanding darkened , being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them , because of the blindness of their heart :
text2: Pa laɣatʋ ta tʋlɩ . Pa ɩsəkpɛɛtɛɛ na pa laŋkpɩɩsəŋ katatəlaɣa tɔɔ pa paa fɛɩ weesuɣu ŋku Ɩsɔ haa tɔ kʋ taa .

text: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness , to work all uncleanness with greediness .
text2: Pa kɛ ́ fɛɛlɛ fɛɩ nyə ́ ma kɛ ́ , yaasi ɩsaɣaʋ taa kɛ ́ pa ha pa tɩ təkpataa , na pá huliɣi asilima təlatɛnaa .

text: But ye have not so learned Christ ;
text2: Ama Kilisiti tɔm nti mɛ ɩ ́ nyəmá tɔ pə taɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tə wɛɛ .

text: If so be that ye have heard him , and have been taught by him , as the truth is in Jesus :
text2: Ntɔŋ ɩ ́ tɛma ɩ tɔm nɩɩʋ na ? Haləna ɩ ́ kɛʋ Kilisiti nyə ́ ma tɔ pa sɛɣɛsa - mɛɣɛ ɩ tɔm təna tampana mɛɛ .

text: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man , which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts ;
text2: Ye mpʋ pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ wɔɣɔsɩ mə yaasi kʋpəŋ wei ɩ ́ tɔka hatuu lɔŋ tɔ . Yaasi kʋpəŋ ɩnɩ ɩ kʋnyɩɩləŋ kʋpuɣusiŋ pukina təlete taa kɛ ́ .

text: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind ;
text2: Pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ laɣasɩ mə lotunaa taa na mə ləmaɣasɛɛ taa təkpataa .

text: And that ye put on the new man , which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness .
text2: Na ɩ ́ kɛlɩ yaasi kʋfalʋ wei Ɩsɔ ləsaa na ɩ ́ kɛ ́ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ nyəŋ tɔ . Mə tɔntɛ ɩ ́ kɛɛsaa na tə teu ɩsɩɩ tampana hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ tɔ ɩlɛ pɩɩ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ kpaɣa yaasi ɩnɩ .

text: Wherefore putting away lying , speak every man truth with his neighbour : for we are members one of another .
text2: Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ yele təmaɣa pɔpɔtʋ pɛlʋɣʋ təkpataa , na paa mə taa wei ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tampana kɛ ɩ lɛlaa kiŋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , tá təna tə wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ niŋ na nɔɔhɛɛ wɛʋ tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔ .

text: Be ye angry , and sin not : let not the sun go down upon your wrath :
text2: Na ye pááná kpa - mɛ ɩ ́ taa yele na á pona - mɛɣɛ wakəlʋɣʋ taa . Na pááná ɩ ́ taa leeli na á wɛ mə taa .

text: Neither give place to the devil .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa ha mə təɣɩ ɩlɔɣɔʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ maɣamaɣa .

text: Let him that stole steal no more : but rather let him labour , working with his hands the thing which is good , that he may have to give to him that needeth .
text2: Ye wei ɩ ́ ka ŋmɩɩlaɣa pʋntʋ ɩ ́ taa tasa ŋmɩɩlʋɣʋ . Ama ɩ ́ sɛɛsɩ ɩsəlɛ na təmlɛ lapʋ na ɩ ́ hiki ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ niŋ nyəm mpi pə tɔɔ ɩ wɩɩ teu tɔ , na ɩ ́ pəsɩ na ɩ ́ səna mpa pa fɛɩna pʋlʋ tɔ .

text: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth , but that which is good to the use of edifying , that it may minister grace unto the hearers .
text2: Kawalaɣa tɔm natəlɩ tə ́ taa lɩɩkəna mə nɔɔsɩ . Ama ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔmnaa kʋpama mpa pa waasəɣɩ yəlaa na pá yeki na tə ́ tuusiɣi lɔlɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ taa tɔ , ɩlɛ tɩɩ waasɩ tə nɩɩlaa təna .

text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God , whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa wakələɣɩ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ laŋlɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩnəɣəlɛ Ɩsɔ kʋyʋsʋm mpi ɩ yʋsəna - mɛ tɔ . Na ɩnəɣɩ Ɩsɔ sɩɩ - mɛɣɛ tɔlʋma sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ kʋyakʋ wɛɛ kʋ kɔŋ , ŋku kʋ wule Ɩsɔ ká ya - mɛ təkpataa tɔ .

text: Let all bitterness , and wrath , and anger , and clamour , and evil speaking , be put away from you , with all malice :
text2: Ɩ ́ yele hʋwɛɛ nyaŋ nyəna təna na təma tɔkənaʋ kɛ táá na pááná mʋɣʋ . Ɩ ́ yele hola na kʋtʋɣʋ . Ɩ ́ yele ɩsaɣatʋ tənaɣa lapʋ , paa tə kɛ ́ nti .

text: And be ye kind one to another , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , even as God for Christ ' s sake hath forgiven you .
text2: Ɩ ́ lakɩ təmaɣa yəllɛ na ɩ ́ wii təma pətɔɔtɛɛ . Ye ɩ ́ pəntəna təma ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ təmaɣa suulu ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ ná hʋlʋɣʋ - mɛɣɛ suulu kɛ Kilisiti tɔɔ tɔ .

text: Be ye therefore followers of God , as dear children ;
text2: Ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ kɛʋ ɩsəntɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ piya nsi ɩ sɔɔlaa tɔ ɩ ́ sɛɛsɩ ɩsəlɛ na ɩ ́ kpaɣa ɩ yaasi təna ɩlɛ .

text: And walk in love , as Christ also hath loved us , and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour .
text2: Ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ təmaɣa sɔɔlʋɣʋ kɛ mə lakasɩ təna taa ɩsɩɩ Kilisiti ná sɔɔlʋɣʋ - tʋ haləna ɩ ́ pəsɩ ɩ təɣɩ kʋhaham kʋpam , na ɩ ́ kpaɣa ɩ tɩ na ɩ ́ la kɔtaɣa kɛ tá tɔɔ sɩ pə ́ la Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teu na sɔɔsʋŋ kʋpaŋ tɔ .

text: But fornication , and all uncleanness , or covetousness , let it not be once named among you , as becometh saints ;
text2: Asilima na tɛtɛlakasɩ ɩsaɣasɩ na kʋnyɩɩlʋɣʋ , pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə tɔm maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ taa lɩɩ mə nɔɔsɩ taa , pə taɣa pʋlʋ , lakasɩ nsɩ sɩ taka tá mʋna Ɩsɔ yəlaa .

text: Neither filthiness , nor foolish talking , nor jesting , which are not convenient : but rather giving of thanks .
text2: Na pə ta mʋna tɔtɔ sɩ ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ fɛɛlɛ fɛɩ tɔm , yaa tɔm kpaɩ nyəntʋ , yaa kɛɛsəlaɣa tɔm natəlɩ . Ama ɩ ́ paasəna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sɛɛʋ sɩ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ .
