text: For this ye know , that no whoremonger , nor unclean person , nor covetous man , who is an idolater , hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyɩ teu sɩ asilima latʋ , na tɛtɛlakasɩ ɩsaɣasɩ latʋ , yaa liɣitee kɔtɔɩ tʋ , pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ kaa fɛlɩ nɔɔhəlɛ kɛ Kilisiti na Ɩsɔ pa kawulaɣa taa . Halɩ liɣitee kɔtɔɩ tʋ na tɩɩŋ laalʋ pa ɩsaɣatʋ lɩɩ kʋlʋm kɛ ́ .

text: Let no man deceive you with vain words : for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience .
text2: Ɩ ́ paasəna teu na nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa tolisi - mɛ na ɩ kʋmɛlətɔm , halɩ ntɩ ɩnɩ tə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ ká lana mpa paa caa ɩ luɣu nyəntʋ lapʋ tɔ na pááná .

text: Be not ye therefore partakers with them .
text2: Mə na pə yəlaa ɩ ́ taa kaa pʋlʋɣʋ paa hoolaɣa .

text: For ye were sometimes darkness , but now are ye light in the Lord : walk as children of light :
text2: Lɔŋ ɩ ́ ka wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ tɔŋʋɣʋ ahoo kɛ səkpɛtʋɣʋ taa tɔ . Ama kaɣana mə na Tacaa ɩ ́ kpɛntaa , ɩlɛ pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ ilim lɩɩ mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ . Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ mə lakasɩ ɩ ́ te ɩsɩɩ kʋpama mpa pa wɛ ilim taa tɔ pa nyəŋsɩ .

text: ( For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth ; )
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ timpi pə nyaalaa tɔ kʋpantʋnaa lapʋ na siɣisiŋ təŋʋɣʋ na tɔm tampana yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ kɛ pə kɔŋna .

text: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛsɩ ɩsəlɛ na ɩ ́ cɛkəna mpi pə wɛ Tacaa kɛ teu tɔ .

text: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness , but rather reprove them .
text2: Mə na mpa pa lakɩ səkpɛtʋɣʋ tɛɛ təma kpaɩ nyəna tɔ ɩ ́ taa kaa pʋlʋ paa hoolaɣa . Ama ɩ ́ la na pə ́ kuli a tɔɔ na paa wei ɩ ́ ná .

text: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret .
text2: Yəlaa mpɛ , mpi pa ŋmɛləɣɩ na pá lakɩ tɔ sɩ pə tɔm ɩ ́ tɩɩ lɩɩ yʋlʋ nɔɣɔ taa tɔ pə wɛ fɛɛlɛ kɛ ́ .

text: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light : for whatsoever doth make manifest is light .
text2: Ye pa lakasɩ nsɩ sɩ tɔɔ ɩ ́ kulaa na pə ́ ná , ɩlɛ paa wei ɩ ká ná pa wɛɛtʋ cakəlɛ təkelekele .

text: Wherefore he saith , Awake thou that sleepest , and arise from the dead , and Christ shall give thee light .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə tɩɩ wɛɛ , ye pə kula pʋlʋ tɔɔ na pə ́ naakɩ təcɛɩcɛɩ , pəlɛ pə pəsəɣɩ fətəla kɛ ́ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ sɩ : Nyá wei n tooki tɔ fe mpʋ . Kʋlɩ na ń lɩɩ sətaa taa , Kilisiti ká cɛ nyá səkpɛtʋɣʋ .

text: See then that ye walk circumspectly , not as fools , but as wise ,
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na mə tɔntɛ kɛ teu , ɩ ́ taa tɔ ɩsɩɩ kʋmɛlɛməŋ , ama ɩ ́ tɔ ɩsɩɩ ləmaɣasɛɛ nyə ́ ma .

text: Redeeming the time , because the days are evil .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa yele na aləsɛkɛ kʋyɛɛŋ fiti - mɛɣɛ yem . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ ɩsaɣatʋ hukina tá kaɣana kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɛ ɩ taa .

text: Wherefore be ye not unwise , but understanding what the will of the Lord is .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa la ɩsɩɩ kʋmɛlɛməŋ lakʋɣʋ tɔ . Ama ɩ ́ sɛɛsɩ ɩsəlɛ na ɩ ́ nyɩ mpi Tacaa luɣu wɛɛ sɩ mɛ ɩ ́ la tɔ .

text: And be not drunk with wine , wherein is excess ; but be filled with the Spirit ;
text2: Ɩ ́ taa yele na sʋlʋm kʋ - mɛ . Sʋlʋm kʋɣʋ ká tʋ - mɛɣɛ yem yem lakasɩ . Ama ɩ ́ yele na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ haɣa mə taa təmamam .

text: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord ;
text2: Ye ɩ ́ caɣa təma kiŋ mə nɔɔsɩ taa ɩ ́ wɛɛ Ɩsɔ Tɔm yontu na apalʋtʋ nyəntʋ na Ɩsɔ samtʋ nyəntʋ . Ɩ ́ sa Tacaa na samtʋ yontu na Ɩsɔ Tɔm nyəntʋ na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ .

text: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛkɩ Tacaa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ paa waatʋ wei kɛ ́ paa mpi pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ .

text: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God .
text2: Ɩ ́ nɩɩkəna təmaɣa teu kɛ Kilisiti sɔɣɔntʋ tɔɔ .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as unto the Lord .
text2: Alaa - mɛ ɩ ́ seeki mə paalaa ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ seekuɣu Tacaa tɔ .

text: For the husband is the head of the wife , even as Christ is the head of the church : and he is the saviour of the body .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩsəna mpi Kilisiti ná kəla Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle tɔ mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ apalʋ ná kəla alʋ . Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle kɛna Kilisiti tɔnʋɣʋ pilimile , na Kilisiti maɣamaɣa kɛna pa nyʋɣʋ yatʋ .

text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ , so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing .
text2: Na ɩsɩɩ Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka seekuɣu Kilisiti tɔ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ alaa ká seeki pa paalaa kɛ pə təna pə taa .

text: Husbands , love your wives , even as Christ also loved the church , and gave himself for it ;
text2: Apalaa mɩɩ sɔɔlɩ mə alaa ɩsɩɩ Kilisiti sɔɔlʋɣʋ Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka na ɩ ́ sɩ a səm tɔ .

text: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word ,
text2: Ɩ lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ nyaalɩ - wɛ na lʋm na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ - wɛ na ɩ tɔm na pá te teu na pá mʋna Ɩsɔ yəlaa .

text: That he might present it to himself a glorious church , not having spot , or wrinkle , or any such thing ; but that it should be holy and without blemish .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ ɩ caakaɣa kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ kpaɣa Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka na a teu təkpataa na ɩ ́ sɩɩna ɩ tɩ , na á wɛɛ tənaŋŋ , a tiili tá wakəlɩ , na paa asilima a fɛɩna , na á tá caamɩ . Pəyele kʋwakələm napəlɩ fɛɩ a kiŋ .

text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies . He that loveth his wife loveth himself .
text2: Ye mpʋ pə wɛɛ sɩ apalaa ɩ ́ sɔɔləɣɩ pa alaa kɛ teitei kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ pa sɔɔlʋɣʋ pa tɩ tɔ . Ye yʋlʋ sɔɔləɣɩ ɩ alʋ pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa kɛ ɩ sɔɔləɣɩ .

text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh ; but nourisheth and cherisheth it , even as the Lord the church :
text2: Ama tampana tɔɔ nɔɣɔlʋ fɛɩ wei ɩ taa kpana ɩ maɣamaɣa tɔ , halɩ paa wei ɩ paasəɣəna ɩ tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ teu kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ taɣanəɣɩ ɩ tɩ tətetete ɩsɩɩ Kilisiti paasʋɣʋnaʋ Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka tɔ .

text: For we are members of his body , of his flesh , and of his bones .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , tá kɛna ɩ tɔnʋɣʋ pilimile tɔɔ niŋ na nɔɔhɛɛ na pə tənaɣa mpʋ .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and shall be joined unto his wife , and they two shall be one flesh .
text2: Halɩ pa ŋmaa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ yʋlʋ ká cɛ ɩ caa na ɩ too sɩ ɩ ́ na ɩ alʋ pá caɣa . Na pa naalɛ pá kpɛntɩ na pá pəsɩ yʋlʋ kʋlʋm .

text: This is a great mystery : but I speak concerning Christ and the church .
text2: Ama tampana sɔsɔɔna kɛ pə kula looŋa kanɛ ka tɔɔ cənɛ . Kilisiti na Yesu sɛɛlaa pa tɔm lapa ɩsəna tɔɣɔ ma naa ka taa .

text: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself ; and the wife see that she reverence her husband .
text2: Paa na mpʋ mɛɣɛ pə heeliɣi sɩ paa wei ɩ ́ sɔɔləɣɩ ɩ alʋ ɩsɩɩ ɩ sɔɔlʋɣʋ ɩ tɩ tɔ . Na paa alʋ wei ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ seeki ɩ paalʋ tɔtɔ .

text: Children , obey your parents in the Lord : for this is right .
text2: Piya mɛ , Tacaa ɩsɛntaa mə nyəntʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ nɩɩna mə nyə ́ ma . Mpi tɔ , ntɩ ɩnɩ tə wɛnna teu .

text: Honour thy father and mother ; ( which is the first commandment with promise ; )
text2: Kʋsəsɩɩtʋ nti pə sɩɩwa tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Seeki nyá caa na nyá too . Tə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə caala kʋpantʋ təna kasəyaɣa kɛ sɛɛʋ sɩ :

text: That it may be well with thee , and thou mayest live long on the earth .
text2: N ká nɩɩ leleŋ na nyá weesuɣu ká taɣalɩ atɛ cənɛ .

text: And , ye fathers , provoke not your children to wrath : but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord .
text2: Cɛcɛnaa mɛ , mɩɩ taa la na pááná kpa mə piya . Ama ɩ ́ tɔkɩ - sɩ na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ - səɣɩ kʋpantʋ , na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ - səɣɩ lɔŋ ɩsɩɩ Tacaa luɣu wɛɛ tɔ .

text: Servants , be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh , with fear and trembling , in singleness of your heart , as unto Christ ;
text2: Yomaa mɩɩ nɩɩkəna mə caanaa mpa pa tɔka - mɛɣɛ antulinya taa cənɛ tɔ na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ . Ɩ ́ wɛɛna pa sɔɣɔntʋ na ɩ ́ nyana - wɛɣɛ teitei ɩsɩɩ ye pɩɩ kɛ Kilisiti ɩ ka lapa tɔ .

text: Not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but as the servants of Christ , doing the will of God from the heart ;
text2: Ɩ ́ taa seeki - wɛɣɛ waatʋ wei pa wɛɛkɩ tɔ tike sɩ pə ́ la - wɛɣɛ leleŋ . Ama ɩ ́ la Ɩsɔ luɣu nyəntʋ na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ ɩsɩɩ Kilisiti yomaa .

text: With good will doing service , as to the Lord , and not to men :
text2: Yomle təmlɛ nte pa tʋɣɩ - mɛ tɔ ɩ ́ la - tɛ na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ na pə ́ wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ Tacaa təmlɛ kɛ ɩ ́ lakɩ , pə taɣa yəlaa tike nyəntɛ .

text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth , the same shall he receive of the Lord , whether he be bond or free .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyɩ teu sɩ paa yom paa kasaɣampu Tacaa ká tɛ na ɩ ́ fɛlɩ paa wei kɛ ́ kʋpantʋ nti ɩ lapa tɔ .

text: And , ye masters , do the same things unto them , forbearing threatening : knowing that your Master also is in heaven ; neither is there respect of persons with him .
text2: Na mpa mɛ ɩ ́ kɛ yomaa caanaa tɔ mɩɩ la - wɛɣɛ mpʋ tɔtɔ , ɩ ́ kpa mə tɩ na pa nyaasʋɣʋ . Na ɩ ́ tɔɔsɩ sɩ mə na wɛ ɩ ́ kaa caa kʋlʋm kɛ ɩsɔtaa na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩɩ faɣasəɣɩ nɔɣɔlʋ se .

text: Finally , my brethren , be strong in the Lord , and in the power of his might .
text2: Nti tə kaasaa tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ mɩɩ pɛɛkəɣɩ sɩ ɩ ́ nyɔɔ toŋ kɛ mə na Tacaa mə kpɛntʋɣʋ taa na ɩ toŋ sɔsɔɔŋ taa .

text: Put on the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil .
text2: Ɩ ́ tʋ mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ yoou wontu təna nti Ɩsɔ haakɩ - mɛ tɔ , na ɩ ́ səŋ təca na ɩ ́ taŋ Ɩlɔɣɔʋ na ɩ acilaɣatʋ təna .

text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood , but against principalities , against powers , against the rulers of the darkness of this world , against spiritual wickedness in high places .
text2: Pə taɣa yəlaa kɛ tə yoona , ama mpa tə yoona tɔɣɔlɛ alɔɣaa toŋtʋnaa asaɣaa mpa pa wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ , na səkpɛtʋɣʋ taa cənɛ awulaa na toŋtʋnaa na sɔsaa .

text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day , and having done all , to stand .
text2: Pə tɔɔ tɔ ɩ ́ co Ɩsɔ yoou wontu ntɩ tə tənaɣa kpakpaa , na pə kɔma na pə ́ tala kʋyɛɛŋ ɩsaɣaŋ taa na mə kolontu kʋləɣɩ mə tɔɔ , ɩ ́ pəsɩ na ɩ ́ taŋɩ - ɩ teu . Na ye ɩ ́ tɔka mə təɣɩ teu na ɩ ́ yoo haləna ɩ ́ tʋ yoou ŋkʋ kʋ nyʋɣʋ , ɩlɛ ɩ ́ ká nyɔɔ toŋ kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam .

text: Stand therefore , having your loins girt about with truth , and having on the breastplate of righteousness ;
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩ ́ tantɩ na ɩ ́ taŋaa , na ɩ ́ təŋ tampana kɛ teu na pə ́ wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ pa ləlʋɣʋ tampala kɛ tənaɣa taa tɔ . Na ɩ ́ təŋ siɣisuɣu kɛ pə təna pə taa na pə ́ wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ nyəɣətʋ toko kɛ ɩ ́ suuwa .

text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace ;
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛsɩ ɩsəlɛ na Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ wei ɩ kɔŋna hɛɛsʋɣʋ tɔɣɔ kpaalʋɣʋ na pə ́ wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ ntaŋkpala kʋpana kɛ ɩ ́ lɛɛwa .

text: Above all , taking the shield of faith , wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked .
text2: Ɩ ́ tɛ mə taa na Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tam na pə ́ wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ kpálʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ŋku ɩ ́ ká kentiɣina ɩsaɣatʋ tʋ nyə ́ má sɔtʋ nyəna tɔ .

text: And take the helmet of salvation , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God :
text2: Ɩ ́ nyənɩ yapʋ mpi Ɩsɔ yakɩ - mɛ tɔ ɩsɩɩ yoou kahuka , na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm ɩsɩɩ laɣatɛ nte ɩ Feesuɣu cɛla - mɛ tɔ .

text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit , and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints ;
text2: Ɩ ́ lakɩ pə tənaɣa mpʋ na Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ , na ɩ ́ wiikina - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ səna - mɛ . Ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ paa mpi pə taa , na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ ɩsəna ɩ ́ ká sələmɩ tɔ . Ɩ ́ la kpelikpeka nyə ́ ma na ɩ ́ sɛɛsɩ ɩsəlɛ kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam . Ɩ ́ sələməɣəna Ɩsɔ yəlaa təna .

text: And for me , that utterance may be given unto me , that I may open my mouth boldly , to make known the mystery of the gospel ,
text2: Na ɩ ́ sələməna ma tɔtɔ , na waatʋ wei má caakɩ ma nɔɣɔ tɔɔ kɛ ́ kuluɣu , Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ tʋ ma taa kɛ ́ tɔm nti tə təŋa teu tɔ , na má hʋ ́ lɩ ́ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔm nti tɩɩ ŋmɛlaa tɔ na apalʋtʋ .

text: For which I am an ambassador in bonds : that therein I may speak boldly , as I ought to speak .
text2: Paa na pa təka - m saləka taa tɔ má kɛna Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ ɩnɛ ɩ təmlɛ tʋ sɔsɔ . Pə tɔɔ tɔ ɩ ́ sələməna - m na má yɔɣɔtɩ ɩ tɔm na apalʋtʋ kɛ ɩsəna mpi pə nəɣəsənaa tɔ .

text: But that ye also may know my affairs , and how I do , Tychicus , a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord , shall make known to you all things :
text2: Ta taapalʋ Tisikɩ wei ɩ lakɩ Tacaa təmlɛ na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ tɔ ɩ ká kɛɛsɩ - mɛɣɛ ma tɔm na ɩ ́ nyɩ ɩsəna taa ma wɛɛ tɔ .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that ye might know our affairs , and that he might comfort your hearts .
text2: Pə tɔɔ maɣamaɣa kɛ ma tiliɣi - ɩ mə kiŋ , sɩ mɛ ɩ ́ nyɩ ɩsəna taa tə wɛ cənɛ tɔ , na pə ́ sɔɔsɩ - mɛɣɛ apalʋtʋ .

text: Peace be to the brethren , and love with faith , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Tacaa Ɩsɔ na tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti pá ha tá taapalaa tənaɣa alaafəya na pa təma sɔɔlʋɣʋ na táá tɛmnaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ .

text: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity . Amen .
text2: Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ pɛɛlɛɛ kɛ pa təna mpa pa sɔɔla Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti kɛ tam tɔ .

text: Paul and Timotheus , the servants of Jesus Christ , to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi , with the bishops and deacons :
text2: Taɣa Yesu Kilisiti təmlɛ nyə ́ ma Pɔɔlɩ na Timotee . Tá ŋmaakəna takəlaɣa kanɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ yəlaa mpa pa wɛ Filipʋ na pá tɛma Yesu Kilisiti na pa taa tɔ , na Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsaa na tə taa təma lataa .

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Tá Caa Ɩsɔ na tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti pá hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ na pá lá na mə laŋa hʋlʋmɩ .

text: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you ,
text2: Paa waatʋ wei kɛ ́ ma tɔɔsa mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩsəntɔ , ma sɛɛkɩ ma Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ mə təna təpaɩ mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy ,
text2: Na paa waatʋ wei kɛ ́ ma sələməɣəna - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ , laŋhʋlʋmlɛ kɛ ma sələməɣəna .

text: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now ;
text2: Mpi tɔ , ɩ ́ səna - m kʋyakʋ kancaalaɣa nyəŋkʋ wule na haləna saŋa na má yasəɣɩ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ .

text: Being confident of this very thing , that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ :
text2: Ma nyəmá teu təkpataa sɩ Ɩsɔ wei ɩ caala təmlɛ kʋpantɛ tənɛɣɛ mə kiŋ tɔ , ɩ ká la - tɛɣɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ haləna tə ́ kɔɔ na tə ́ yoosi Yesu Kilisiti kʋyakʋ wule .

text: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all , because I have you in my heart ; inasmuch as both in my bonds , and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel , ye all are partakers of my grace .
text2: Pə mʋna teu kɛ ́ sɩ má hʋʋ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mə təna təpaɩ mə tɔɔ . Ma luɣu sʋʋ - mɛɣɛ sɔsɔm sɔsɔm kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mə təna təpaɩ ɩ ́ hika mə paa nyəm kɛ pɛɛlɛɛ nna Ɩsɔ lapa ma tɔ a taa kɛ ́ . Ɩlɛ paa pənɛntɛ ma wɛʋ saləka taa ɩsəntɔ yaa tuu ma tɩɩ wɛʋ na ma tɩ , sɩ má taa yele na Laapaalɩ kʋpaŋ pəsɩ tɛtɛpʋlʋ , ama sɩ má sɩɩ - ɩ teu kɛ ́ təka .

text: For God is my record , how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ .
text2: Ma yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ ma sɔɔla mə təna təpaɩ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ɩsəna mpi Yesu Kilisiti sɔɔlʋɣʋ - tʋɣʋ sɔsɔm tɔ , Ɩsɔ maɣamaɣa nyəmá sɩ tampana ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ .

text: And this I pray , that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment ;
text2: Nti ma sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ mə tɔɔ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ mə sɔɔlʋɣʋ ɩ ́ sɔɔsəɣɩ tam , na nyəm kʋpampam sɔsɔɔm na pə təna pə cɛkənaʋ ɩ ́ wɛɛ mə sɔɔlʋɣʋ taa .

text: That ye may approve things that are excellent ; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ ;
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pəsɩ na ɩ ́ ləsɩ mpi pə wɛ teu tɔ . Ye pə lapa mpʋ ɩ ́ ká la kʋpama na pa kaa na mə kiŋ kɛ taalɩ nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ Kilisiti kʋyakʋ wule .

text: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness , which are by Jesus Christ , unto the glory and praise of God .
text2: Na ɩ ́ ka la təma kʋpana nna Yesu Kilisiti kɔŋna tɔɣɔ sɔsɔm , na pə ́ tʋ ́ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teeli na samtʋ .

text: But I would ye should understand , brethren , that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel ;
text2: Ma taapalaa ma caa sɩ ɩ ́ nyɩ sɩ tampana tɔɔ ɩsəntɔ , mpi pə maɣana - m tɔ pə waasaa kɛ ́ , pə yelaa kɛ ́ na Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ sɔɔsəɣɩ yaʋ .

text: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace , and in all other places ;
text2: Pə yelaa na wulaʋ təyaɣa taŋlaa təna na yəlaa lɛlaa təna nyɩ sɩ Kilisiti təmlɛ lapʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa tʋ - m saləka .

text: And many of the brethren in the Lord , waxing confident by my bonds , are much more bold to speak the word without fear .
text2: Tá taapalaa taa paɣalɛ nawa ma wɛ saləka taa , ɩlɛna pá tɔkɩ tɔnəŋ na Tacaa tɔm , haləna pá nyaɣa apalʋtʋ na pá heeliɣi Ɩsɔ Tɔm na sɔɣɔntʋ fɛɩ - wɛ .

text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife ; and some also of good will :
text2: Paa na ma ɩsəsɛɛmlɛ tɔɔ kɛ ́ lɛlaa lakɩ Kilisiti waasʋ na sɔsɔɔntʋ hɔm hʋwɛɛ tɔ , lɛlaa ná lakɩ - ɩ na hʋwɛɛ kʋpana kɛ ́ .

text: The one preach Christ of contention , not sincerely , supposing to add affliction to my bonds :
text2: Panɛ ɩnɩ pɛlɛ pa lakʋɣʋ na sɔɔlʋɣʋ wɛ pə taa tɔ , pa nyəmá sɩ Ɩsɔ tʋ - m sɩ má taa yele na Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ pəsɩ tɛtɛpʋlʋ tɔɣɔ .

text: But the other of love , knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel .
text2: Ama lɛlaa ɩlɛ kəlʋɣʋ pɛɛkʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ , paa paasəɣɩ na pá heeli Kilisiti tɔm kɛ ɩsəna mpi pə mʋnaa tɔ se , pa hʋʋ kɛ ́ sɩ ma wɛʋ saləka taa tɔ paa sɔɔsɩ - m kʋnyɔŋ na má ná .

text: What then ? notwithstanding , every way , whether in pretence , or in truth , Christ is preached ; and I therein do rejoice , yea , and will rejoice .
text2: Kpaɩ kɛ ́ . Ye kʋpantʋ yaa ɩsaɣatʋ kʋlʋkʋ kɛ pa lʋkɩ , ma laŋlɛ tɩɩ hɛɛwa . Mpi tɔ pa tɩɩ heela Kilisiti tɔm . Na ma laŋlɛ ká hɛɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ na pə ́ puki .

text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer , and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ma nyəmá sɩ mə sələməŋ na Yesu Kilisiti Feesuɣu sənaʋ tɔɔ pə tənaɣa mpʋ pɩɩ məlɩ ma nyʋɣʋ yapʋ .

text: According to my earnest expectation and my hope , that in nothing I shall be ashamed , but that with all boldness , as always , so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body , whether it be by life , or by death .
text2: Ma taŋaa na má tɛɛləɣɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ teu kɛ ́ sɩ ma kaa tɔɣɔ fɛɛlɛ natəlɩ . Ama pənɛntɛ naani kɛ ́ maa la teu ɩsɩɩ ma lakʋɣʋ tam tɔ , ɩlɛna má hʋ ́ lɩ ́ Kilisiti sɔsɔɔntʋ kɛ ma tɔnʋɣʋ təna taa , paa ma na ma ɩsɛ , paa ma səkɩ .

text: For to me to live is Christ , and to die is gain .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , paa maa wɛɛ , Kilisiti kɛlɛ ma pə təna . Na má tɩɩ səpa , ɩlɛ pə kəlaa kɛlɛ .

text: But if I live in the flesh , this is the fruit of my labour : yet what I shall choose I wot not .
text2: Ntanyɩ ye ma wɛna ma ɩsɛ , maa tasa waasaɣa nakələɣɩ lapʋ . Tɔʋ , maa nyəŋ nti má ləsɩ tɔ se .

text: For I am in a strait betwixt two , having a desire to depart , and to be with Christ ; which is far better :
text2: Pə kpəpa - m kɛ ́ , ma nyɩɩləɣɩ kɛ ́ sɩ má kpe na má wɛɛ Kilisiti kiŋ . Nti tə kəla - m teu tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you .
text2: Ama mə tɔɔ ɩlɛ , pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ má wɛɛna ma ɩsɛ .

text: And having this confidence , I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith ;
text2: Ma tɛma ma taa kɛ ́ teu na təlɛ , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma nyəmá sɩ ma kaa kpe . Na ma nyəmá sɩ má na mə təna təpaɩ tɩɩ wɛɛ , na maa səna - mɛ na ɩ ́ polo lɔlɔ kɛ ́ mə Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ mpaaʋ taa , na ɩ ́ hiki laŋhʋlʋmlɛ kɛ pə taa .

text: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ye ma kɔma na má məlɩ mə tɛ ɩ ́ ká hiki ma kiŋ kɛ mpi ɩ ́ ká yɔɔləna mə Yesu Kilisiti mpaaʋ taa tɔ .

text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ : that whether I come and see you , or else be absent , I may hear of your affairs , that ye stand fast in one spirit , with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel ;
text2: Kʋlʋmtʋ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ tɔkɩ yaasi wei ɩ kɛɛsəna Kilisiti Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔ . Ɩlɛ paa maa kɔɔ mə naʋ yaa ma ta tɩɩ kɔm , má nɩɩ sɩ ɩ ́ nyɔɔ toŋ te , na ɩ ́ kpɛnta hʋwɛɛ , na ɩ ́ yoo taa tɛm mpi Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tʋɣʋ - mɛ tɔ pə yoou na lotu kʋlʋmtʋ kɛ mə təna .

text: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries : which is to them an evident token of perdition , but to you of salvation , and that of God .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa yele na mə kolontunaa nyaasəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ pʋlʋ taa . Mpi pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ pɛlɛ sɩ pa tɔm ká tɛ tənaŋnaŋ tɔɣɔlɛ . Na pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ - mɛ sɩ pɩɩ tɛ na pə ́ ya mə nyɔɔŋ , na Ɩsɔ lakəna mpʋ .

text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ , not only to believe on him , but also to suffer for his sake ;
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ hana - mɛɣɛ mpaaʋ sɩ ɩ ́ la Kilisiti təmlɛ . Ɩlɛ pə taɣa ɩ tɔɔ yuŋ tisuɣu tike tɔm , ama na ɩ tɔɔ kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛ tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me , and now hear to be in me .
text2: Mə sɛɛwa ma tɔɔ kɛ ́ pənɛntɛɣɛ na tə ́ yoo yoou . Yoou ŋku ɩ ́ ná ma yoo hatuu lɔŋ na ɩ ́ tɩɩ nyəmá tɔtɔ sɩ ma tɩɩ tɔŋna - kʋɣʋ yoou tɔ , ŋkʋɣʋlɛ mpʋ na ŋku ɩ ́ yookuɣu tɔ .

text: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
text2: Mə na Kilisiti ɩ ́ kpɛntʋɣʋ mpʋ tɔ pə sɔɔsəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ toŋ ntɛ ? Ɩ sɔɔlʋɣʋ sɔɔsəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ apalʋtʋ ntɛ ? Mə na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ ɩ ́ kpɛnta kʋlʋm na ? Ɩ ́ lakɩ təmaɣa yəllɛ na kʋpantʋ na ?

text: Fulfil ye my joy , that ye be likeminded , having the same love , being of one accord , of one mind .
text2: Tɔʋ , ye pə wɛ mpʋ ɩlɛ , ma wiina - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ teu , na ɩ ́ sɔɔləɣɩ mə təma , na ɩ ́ wɛna lotu kʋlʋmtʋ na hʋwɛɛ kʋlʋmɛɛ , na pə ́ hʋlʋsɩ ma laŋlɛ kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa la pʋlʋɣʋ təma kəlʋɣʋ tɔɔ , yaa teeli yem tɔɔ . Ama ɩ ́ pasa mə tɩ , na paa wei ɩ ́ nyənɩ ɩ lɛlʋ ɩsɩɩ wei ɩ kəla - ɩ tɔ .

text: Look not every man on his own things , but every man also on the things of others .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa pɛɛkɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ nyʋɣʋ nyəntʋ tike , ama ɩ ́ tɔɔsəɣɩ ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛnaa tɔɔ .

text: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :
text2: Ɩ ́ wɛɛna hʋwɛɛ nna Yesu Kilisiti ka hʋʋkaɣa tɔɣɔ mə taa .

text: Who , being in the form of God , thought it not robbery to be equal with God :
text2: Hatuu tɔ ɩ ka tɩɩ wɛna Ɩsɔ wɛɛtʋ kɛ ́ . Pə na pə mpʋ tɔ , pə ta tʋ - ɩ sɩ ɩ pɛɛkəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lana toŋ na ɩ ́ kpa Ɩsɔ tɔɔ sɩ ɩ saala .

text: But made himself of no reputation , and took upon him the form of a servant , and was made in the likeness of men :
text2: Ama ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ yelina pə təna mpi ɩ ka wɛna tɔ na ɩ ́ kpaɣa yom wɛɛtʋ . Ɩ kpaɣa yəlaa wɛɛtʋ kɛ ́ tətɛŋɛlɛŋ , na ɩ kɔmaɣa ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ wɛʋ tɔ .

text: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .
text2: Ɩ tisaa na ɩ ́ pasa ɩ tɩ na ɩ ́ nɩɩna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ , haləna ɩ səm , səm mpi ɩ səpa tesika tɔɔ tɔ .

text: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him , and given him a name which is above every name :
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kʋsa ɩ nyʋɣʋ kɛ teu kɛ sɔsɔm , na ɩ ́ ha - ɩ hətɛ nte tə kəla həla təna təpaɩpaɩ tɔ .

text: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow , of things in heaven , and things in earth , and things under the earth ;
text2: Pə təna mpi pə wɛna weesuɣu na pə wɛ ɩsɔtaa na tɛtʋ tɔɔ na tɛtʋ tɛɛ tɔ pə ́ həntɩ - ɩ atɛ .

text: And that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
text2: Na pə təna pə ́ tisi sɩ Yesu kɛlɛ Sɔsɔ , na pə ́ ha Tacaa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teeli .

text: Wherefore , my beloved , as ye have always obeyed , not as in my presence only , but now much more in my absence , work out your own salvation with fear and trembling .
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩlɛ ma taapalaa , waatʋ wei maa wɛ mə cɔlɔ tɔ ɩ ́ nɩɩna - m pə təna pə taa kɛ ́ . Na paa pənɛntɛ ma fɛɩ mə cɔlɔ , pə kəla teu sɩ ɩ ́ nɩɩna - m mpʋ tɔtɔ . Ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ mə nyɔɔŋ yapʋ tɔm na sɔɣɔntʋ na seluɣu .

text: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ wɛɛ kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ lakɩ mə taa kɛ ́ tam , sɩ mɛ mɩɩ pəsɩ na ɩ ́ sɔɔlɩ na ɩ ́ lá mpi ɩ ka sɩɩwa na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ tɔ .

text: Do all things without murmurings and disputings :
text2: Kʋntʋɣʋ na ntɔŋkpɛɛsaɣa ɩ ́ taa wɛɛ pə təna mpi ɩ ́ lakɩ tɔ pə taa .

text: That ye may be blameless and harmless , the sons of God , without rebuke , in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation , among whom ye shine as lights in the world ;
text2: Ɩlɛ ɩ ́ ká pəsɩ yəlaa mpa pa fɛɩna taalɩ na pá wɛ tənaŋŋ tɔ , na ɩ ́ pəsɩ Ɩsɔ piya nsi sɩ fɛɩna kawalaɣa nakələɣɩ antulinya yəlaa kʋtakɛɛsəŋ na asaɣaa pa hɛkʋ taa tɔ . Pə ́ cɔ ́ pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ mɩɩ mʋɣʋna kɔkɔ kɛ pa hɛkʋ taa kɛ ́ nyənənyənɩ ɩsɩɩ ɩsɔtʋlʋŋasɩ kɛ ɩsɔtaa

text: Holding forth the word of life ; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ , that I have not run in vain , neither laboured in vain .
text2: na ɩ ́ heeliɣina - wɛɣɛ weesuɣu tɔm . Ye ɩ ́ lakɩ mpʋ , maa pəsɩ na má yɔɔləna - mɛɣɛ Kilisiti kʋyakʋ wule kɛ teu . Tampana tɔɔ ɩsəntɔ , mpʋ pɩɩ hʋləna sɩ ma təma təna na ma lʋpʋ təna ta məlɩ yem .

text: Yea , and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith , I joy , and rejoice with you all .
text2: Ntanyɩ ma caləm ká lɩɩ , ma səm tɔm kɛ ma wɛna mpʋ . Na ye pɩɩ tɩɩ lapa mpʋ , pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ kɔtaɣa ŋka mə Ɩsɔ sɛɛtʋ tasa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ lapʋ tɔɣɔlɛ . Ye pɩɩ la mpʋ , ma laŋlɛ hɛɛwaɣa . Na má na mə təna tá laŋa hɛɛna .

text: For the same cause also do ye joy , and rejoice with me .
text2: Na mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ na mɛ , pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ mə laŋa ɩ ́ hɛɛ , pə wɛɛ sɩ má na mɛ tá laŋa ɩ ́ hɛɛna .

text: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you , that I also may be of good comfort , when I know your state .
text2: Ma hʋʋ sɩ , na Ɩsɔ toŋ taa ye pə wɛ ɩsəna , maa tili Timotee kɛ mə tɛɣɛ nɔɔnɔɔ na má nɩɩ mə cakəlɛ tɔm , na pə ́ sɔɔsɩ ma maɣamaɣa kɛ apalʋtʋ .

text: For I have no man likeminded , who will naturally care for your state .
text2: Ɩ tike ɩ wɛnna , na ɩ səna - m mpi ma sɔpəna nyʋɣʋ tɔ pə taa , na ɩ paasəɣəna mə tɔm kɛ na tampana .

text: For all seek their own , not the things which are Jesus Christ ' s .
text2: Lɛlaa ɩlɛ , pɛlɛ pa maɣamaɣa pa niŋ nyəm tike tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa nəɣəsəɣɩ , pə taɣa Yesu Kilisiti nyəm tɔɔ .

text: But ye know the proof of him , that , as a son with the father , he hath served with me in the gospel .
text2: Mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ nyəmá ɩsəna Timotee ɩnɩ ɩ hʋlaa sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ yʋlʋpaŋ tɔ , na ɩsəna má na - ɩ tə lapa təmlɛ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ na ɩ pəyaɣa kɛ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔm taa tɔ .

text: Him therefore I hope to send presently , so soon as I shall see how it will go with me .
text2: Ma hʋʋ sɩ ye ma kɔma na má cɛkəna teu kɛ nti tə taa ma wɛɛ tɔ , ɩlɛ maa tili - ɩ mə cɔlɔ .

text: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly .
text2: Na ma wɛna naani kɛ ́ teu kɛ Tacaa toŋ tɔɔ sɩ ma maɣamaɣa maa polo mə tɛɣɛ nɔɔnɔɔ na má ná - mɛ .

text: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother , and companion in labour , and fellowsoldier , but your messenger , and he that ministered to my wants .
text2: Ma maɣasaa na má ná sɩ pə kəla teu sɩ tá taapalʋ Ɩpafəlotitɩ , wei mɛ ɩ ́ ka ha - m mpi maa laŋaa na ɩ ́ tilina - m sɩ ɩ ́ kɔna - m , na má na - ɩ tə lakəna təmlɛ na tə ́ yooki yoou tɔ , ɩnəɣɩ maa yele na ɩ ́ məlɩ mə kiŋ .

text: For he longed after you all , and was full of heaviness , because that ye had heard that he had been sick .
text2: Ɩ nyɩɩləɣɩ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ ná mə təna , haləna pə pɛkəla - ɩ . Mpi tɔ , mɛ ɩ ́ ka nɩɩʋ ɩ wʋsasɩ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death : but God had mercy on him ; and not on him only , but on me also , lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow .
text2: Tampana tɔɔ ɩsəntɔ , pə wɩɩ - ɩ teu kɛ ́ , haləna ɩ caakaɣa səm . Ama Ɩsɔ wii ɩ pətɔɔtəlɛ . Na pə taɣa ɩ tike ɩ nyəntɛ , na ma nyəntɛ tɔtɔɣɔ , sɩ pə ́ taa kɔɔ pə ́ sɔɔsɩ - m laŋwakəllɛ kɛ lɛntɛ tɔɔ .

text: I sent him therefore the more carefully , that , when ye see him again , ye may rejoice , and that I may be the less sorrowful .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma hʋʋ sɩ maa kʋsɩ - ɩ lɔŋ təcaʋ na ɩ ́ məlɩ mə tɛ , na mɩɩ na - ɩ na mə laŋa tasa hʋlʋmʋɣʋ , na ma maɣamaɣa ma laŋwakəllɛ tɛ mpʋ .

text: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness ; and hold such in reputation :
text2: Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ mʋ - ɩ niŋ naalɛ na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ , ɩsɩɩ pa mʋkʋɣʋ taapalʋ kɛ Tacaa tɔm taa tɔ . Yəlaa ɩsɩɩ panɛ ɩnɩ wɛɣɛ pə wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ́ seeki .

text: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death , not regarding his life , to supply your lack of service toward me .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Kilisiti təmlɛ nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ səm cɛɛ - ɩ . Ɩ lapa ɩ weesuɣu kɛ awusa kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ kɔna - m kʋsənam mpi mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ taa pəsəɣɩ sɩ ɩ ́ kɔna - m tɔ .

text: Finally , my brethren , rejoice in the Lord . To write the same things to you , to me indeed is not grievous , but for you it is safe .
text2: Ma taapalaa , pənɛntaa ɩ ́ yɔɔləɣɩ Tacaa tɔm taa ɩlɛ . Kʋlʋmtʋ tənɛ tə ŋmaaʋ kɛ tam ɩɩ kʋɣʋ ma , na ntɩ ɩnɩ tə tɩɩ kələɣəna - mɛɣɛ tampana hʋlʋɣʋ .

text: Beware of dogs , beware of evil workers , beware of the concision .
text2: Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na ɩsaɣalataa , hasɩ nsɩ , yəlaa mpa pa kama nyʋɣʋ sɩ pɛlʋɣʋ kɛ pɛlʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .
text2: Mpɛ pa pɛlʋɣʋ kɛ mpi ? Taɣalɛ pɛllaa na tampana . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu wɛnna tá kiŋ na táá lakɩ Ɩsɔ təmlɛ . Na Yesu Kilisiti kɛ ta lakɩ na taa taakɩ , na pə taɣa yʋlʋ kʋlapəlɛ haana taɣa naani .

text: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :
text2: Ye maa nɔkaa kɔlɔ , ma pəsəɣɩ na má tʋ kʋlapəlɛnaa panɛɣɛ naani . Na ye nɔɣɔlʋ wɛɛ na ɩ ́ hʋʋkɩ sɩ yʋlʋ kʋlapəlɛ ká yelina na ɩ ́ tʋlɩ - tɩ ɩlɛ , ma tɛɛ pʋntʋ kɛ kʋlapəlɛnaa kɛ ́ təpaɩpaɩ .

text: Circumcised the eighth day , of the stock of Israel , of the tribe of Benjamin , an Hebrew of the Hebrews ; as touching the law , a Pharisee ;
text2: Nyənɩ , ma lʋlʋɣʋ kʋyɛɛŋ pəlefɛɩ wule kɛ pa pɛla - m , na ma kɛ ́ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ tʋ kɛ ́ təsiɣisiɣi . Na ma kpekəle ntɛ ́ Pɛnsamɛɛ nyəntɛ , na ma kɛ ́ Hepəla tʋ kɛ ́ təsiɣisiɣi . Na taɣalɛ Falisanaa kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ təŋʋɣʋ taa .

text: Concerning zeal , persecuting the church ; touching the righteousness which is in the law , blameless .
text2: Na maa sɛɛsa ɩsəlɛ kɛ ́ pə taa kɛ ́ pə fɛɩna , haləna má tʋkaɣana Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka kɛ kʋnyɔŋ . Na ye pa tɔma sɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa tɔm təŋʋɣʋ sɩ yʋlʋ ɩ ́ təŋ na pə ́ lapɩ - ɩ kʋpaŋ tɔ tá təŋaɣana , taalɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ taa wɛɛ ma kiŋ .

text: But what things were gain to me , those I counted loss for Christ .
text2: Pənɛntɛ Kilisiti tɔɔ ɩlɛ , ma nyənəɣɩ kʋpantʋnaa mpa ma mʋɣʋlaɣana tɔɣɔ mpi pɩɩ waasəɣɩ pʋlʋ tɔɣɔ .

text: Yea doubtless , and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord : for whom I have suffered the loss of all things , and do count them but dung , that I may win Christ ,
text2: Na pə taɣa kʋpantʋnaa panɛ pa tike kɛ ma nyənəɣɩ mpʋ , na kawaasɩ nsɩ sɩ tənaɣa ma nyənəɣɩ mpi pɩɩ waasəɣɩ pʋlʋ tɔɣɔ ma nyəm ma Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti tɔ pə tɔɔ . Təpantɛ taa təpantɛ ntɛ ́ tənɛ ɩnɩ . Ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma kɛɛla pə təna mpi pə kʋsəɣɩ ma nyʋɣʋ tɔ na má sɩɩna kpeeŋa , na ma nyənəɣɩ pə təna ɩsɩɩ hute sɩ pə ́ yele na má hiki Yesu Kilisiti ,

text: And be found in him , not having mine own righteousness , which is of the law , but that which is through the faith of Christ , the righteousness which is of God by faith :
text2: na má na - ɩ tə ́ kpɛntɩ teu kɛ kʋlʋm . Maa yɔɔləɣɩ sɩ ma kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔkʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pá yaa - m kʋpaŋ . Ama ma tɛma ma taa na Kilisiti tɔɣɔ ma lapa kʋpaŋ . Tənaɣa Ɩsɔ hana pəsʋɣʋ sɩ yəlaa ɩ ́ la kʋpama , na ye wei ɩ ́ mʋwa tá Sɔsɔ tɔm , pʋntʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ haa pə pəsʋɣʋ .

text: That I may know him , and the power of his resurrection , and the fellowship of his sufferings , being made conformable unto his death ;
text2: Mpi ma nyɩɩləɣɩ teu tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ má nyɩ Kilisiti na ɩ səm taa fem toma , sɩ maa hiki ɩ wahalanaa taa kɛ ́ ma nyə ́ ma na máá tɔɣɔ , na má sɩ ɩsɩɩ ɩ səpʋ tɔ .

text: If by any means I might attain unto the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Na má tɛɛləɣɩ sɩ paa feesi maɣa mpʋ tɔtɔ .

text: Not as though I had already attained , either were already perfect : but I follow after , if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus .
text2: Maa yɔɔləɣɩ sɩ ma tɛma hikuɣu kɛ mpi ma pɛɛkaɣa tɔ se , yaa ma tɛma teu təkpataa . Ama ma tɔŋna lʋpʋ kɛ ́ na má kaasəɣɩ ma tɩ sɩ má hiki ma asewa fɔɔtɔ . Mpi pə tɔɔ tɔ , Yesu Kilisiti tɛma - m hikuɣu na ɩ ́ kpa - m ɩ kpa - m kɛ ́ .

text: Brethren , I count not myself to have apprehended : but this one thing I do , forgetting those things which are behind , and reaching forth unto those things which are before ,
text2: Ma taapalaa , maa hʋʋkɩ sɩ ma tɛma pə fɔɔtɔ hikuɣu se . Ama kʋlʋmtʋ nti ma nyəmá tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ , ma yela ma waalɩ nyəntʋ kɛ ́ , na má kaasəɣɩ ma tɩ sɩ má hiki mpi pə wɛ ma nɔɣɔ tɔɔ tɔ .

text: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma see na má pukina mpi pə sɩɩwa tɔ pə tɔɔ , sɩ má hiki pə fɔɔtɔ wei Ɩsɔ yaa - tʋ sɩ tə ́ hiki ɩsɔtaa kɛ Yesu Kilisiti kiŋ tɔ .

text: Let us therefore , as many as be perfect , be thus minded : and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded , God shall reveal even this unto you .
text2: Tá təna mpa tá tə kɛ ́ yʋlʋkpasaa kɛ Ɩsɔ nyəntʋ taa tɔ , tə ́ hʋʋ hʋwɛɛ kʋlʋmɛɛ anɛ . Na ye mə taa lɛlaa ɩɩ hʋʋ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ hʋwɛɛ anɛ a tɔɔ , ɩlɛ Ɩsɔ ká kilisi - mɛɣɛ - tɩ .

text: Nevertheless , whereto we have already attained , let us walk by the same rule , let us mind the same thing .
text2: Mpaaʋ ŋku tə təŋəɣɩ haləna saŋa tɔ , paa pə la ɩsəna tə ́ təŋəɣɩ - kʋɣʋ mpʋ .

text: Brethren , be followers together of me , and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample .
text2: Ma taapalaa , ɩ ́ kɛɛsəna - m mə təna . Tə tɛma hʋ ́ lʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɛ ɩsəna ɩ ́ ká la tɔ , ɩlɛ ɩ ́ nyənəɣəna mpa pa lakɩ ɩsɩɩ tə hʋlʋɣʋ sɩ pá lakɩ tɔ .

text: ( For many walk , of whom I have told you often , and now tell you even weeping , that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ :
text2: Tam kɛ ́ ma heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ - tɩ , na pənɛntaa ɩsəlʋm kɛ ma tasəɣəna - mɛɣɛ - təɣɩ heeluɣu kɛ ɩsəntɔ . Paɣalɛ wɛnna na pá wakələɣɩ mpi Kilisiti lapa ɩ səm tesika tɔɔ tɔ na pa yaasinaa asaɣaa .

text: Whose end is destruction , whose God is their belly , and whose glory is in their shame , who mind earthly things . )
text2: Pa tɔm ka tɛ tənaŋnaŋ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pa hiliŋ kɛ pa təŋəɣɩ , pə taɣa Ɩsɔ . Na mpi pə nəɣəsəna pə ́ la - wɛɣɛ fɛɛlɛ tɔɣɔ pa yɔɔləɣəna . Na atɛ cənɛ nyəm tike tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa laakalənaa wɛɛ .

text: For our conversation is in heaven ; from whence also we look for the Saviour , the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Pə kaasa tá tɔ tá tɛɣɛlɛ ɩsɔtaa , na tə taŋa teu tətɛɣɛtɛɣɛ sɩ tá Yatʋ tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti ɩ ́ lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa na ɩ ́ tii .

text: Who shall change our vile body , that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body , according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself .
text2: Ɩ toma nna ɩ hʋlaa na ɩ ́ məŋna pə tənaɣa ɩ tɛɛ tɔ , anəɣɩ ɩ ká hʋ ́ lɩ ́ na ɩ ́ laɣasɩ tá atɛ tɔnəŋ pətɔɔtəlɛ nyəŋ ɩnɛ , na tə ́ nəɣəsəna tɔnʋɣʋ teeli nyəŋkʋ .

text: Therefore , my brethren dearly beloved and longed for , my joy and crown , so stand fast in the Lord , my dearly beloved .
text2: Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ ma taapalaa mpa mɛ ma nyɩɩləɣɩ teu sɩ má tasa naʋ tɔ , mə hɛɛsəɣəna ma laŋlɛ kɛ sɔsɔm , na mɛɣɛ ma yɔɔləɣəna . Ma yəlaa mɛ , ɩsəna pə wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ́ tɔ teu kɛ Ɩsɔ mpaaʋ taa tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: I beseech Euodias , and beseech Syntyche , that they be of the same mind in the Lord .
text2: Haɩ , ma wiikina Ɩfoti na Sɛntisi , ma hənta - wɛɣɛ atɛɣɛ cənɛ , sɩ pá ciiki ɩsɩɩ Tacaa tɔm taa tɛɛtʋnaa lakʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: And I intreat thee also , true yokefellow , help those women which laboured with me in the gospel , with Clement also , and with other my fellowlabourers , whose names are in the book of life .
text2: Na ma təmlɛ taa akpele kʋpaŋ nyá , ma wiikina - ŋ sɩ ń səna alaa mpɛ tɔtɔ . Ma na - wɛ tə yoona yoou na tə ́ yasɩ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ paa timpi , na tá na Kəlemaŋ na tá təmlɛ taa taapalaa lɛlaa təna mpa pa həla pa ŋmaa weesuɣu takəlaɣa taa tɔ .

text: Rejoice in the Lord alway : and again I say , Rejoice .
text2: Ɩ ́ yɔɔləɣɩ Tacaa mpaaʋ taa kɛ ́ tam . Ma tasəɣɩ - təɣɩ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ ɩ ́ yɔɔləɣɩ .

text: Let your moderation be known unto all men . The Lord is at hand .
text2: Ɩ ́ wɛɛ təpamm kɛ yəlaa təna kiŋ . Tacaa kɔŋ nɔɔnɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: Be careful for nothing ; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa nəɣəsəɣɩ natəlɩ , paa nti tə maɣana - mɛ ɩ ́ heeli Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sələmʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ mpi ɩ ́ nyɩɩləɣɩ tɔ , na ɩ ́ sɛɛ - ɩ nyana təmlɛ .

text: And the peace of God , which passeth all understanding , shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus .
text2: Ye pə lapa mpʋ ɩlɛ laŋhʋlʋmlɛ nte Ɩsɔ haa na yʋlʋ ɩɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ cɛkəna tə tənaɣa tɔ tɩɩ wɛɛ mə lotunaa taa na mə ləmaɣasɛɛ taa kɛ ́ Yesu Kilisiti tɔm taa , na pʋlʋ kaa pɛkəlɩ - mɛ .

text: Finally , brethren , whatsoever things are true , whatsoever things are honest , whatsoever things are just , whatsoever things are pure , whatsoever things are lovely , whatsoever things are of good report ; if there be any virtue , and if there be any praise , think on these things .
text2: Tɔʋ , ma taapalaa , mpi pə kɛ ́ kʋpam na pə nəɣəsəna samtʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ ká pona laakalɩ . Mpəɣəlɛ mpi pə kɛ ́ tampana nyəm , na mpi pə nəɣəsəna pa tʋna - wɩ , na mpi pə kɛɛsaa tɔ , na mpi pə fɛɩ asilima , na mpi pə wɛ teu , na mpi pə kʋsəɣɩ nyʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: Those things , which ye have both learned , and received , and heard , and seen in me , do : and the God of peace shall be with you .
text2: Ma hʋla - mɛɣɛ na má kɛɛsɩ - mɛ , ɩ ́ lakɩ nti ɩ ́ nɩɩ ma yɔɣɔtaa na ɩ ́ nawa ma lapa tɔ . Ɩsɔ wei ɩ haa - tʋɣʋ alaafəya tɔ ɩ ká wɛɛ mə waalɩ .

text: But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly , that now at the last your care of me hath flourished again ; wherein ye were also careful , but ye lacked opportunity .
text2: Ma laŋlɛ hʋlʋma Tacaa tɔm taa kɛ ́ ɩsəna mpi ɩ ́ hika pəsʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ tasa - m hʋ ́ lʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ tɔɔsəɣɩ ma tɔm tɔ . Ɩlɛ pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ sɩ ɩ ́ ka yela ma tɔm kɛ hʋʋʋ . Ama pə mpaaʋ kɛ ɩ ́ taa hikita sɩ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - m sɩ ɩ ́ hʋʋkɩ ma tɔm .

text: Not that I speak in respect of want : for I have learned , in whatsoever state I am , therewith to be content .
text2: Na pə taɣa pə caala - m tɔɣɔ ma yɔɣɔta ɩsəntɔ . Ye ma wɛ ɩsəna , ma tɛma pəlɛ pə taa caɣalɛ laɣatʋ hiiu kɛ ́ .

text: I know both how to be abased , and I know how to abound : every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry , both to abound and to suffer need .
text2: Ye ma wɛ kʋnyɔŋ taa , ma nyəmá ma kʋnyɔntʋlɛ tɔntɛ . Na ye ma wɛ haɣanaɣa taa , ma nyəmá pəlɛ pə taa tɔntɛ . Paa le na pə təna pə taa , ma tɛma ɩsəna maa caɣa na pə ́ kɛɛsəna - m tɔ pə laɣatʋ hiiu kɛ ́ . Ye ma wɛna tɔɣɔnaɣa kɛ sɔsɔm , ma nyəmá təlɛ . Na ye ma wɛ nyɔɣɔsɩ taa , ma nyəmá təlɛ . Ye pə tɔɔləna - m ma nyəmá . Ye pəcɔɣɔ ma wɛna , ma nyəmá .

text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me .
text2: Ma pəsəɣɩ pə tənaɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Kilisiti wei ɩ haa - m toma tɔ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: Notwithstanding ye have well done , that ye did communicate with my affliction .
text2: Paa na mpʋ , ɩ ́ tɔɣɔʋ ma kʋnyɔŋ tɔ ɩ ́ lapa teu kɛ ́ .

text: Now ye Philippians know also , that in the beginning of the gospel , when I departed from Macedonia , no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving , but ye only .
text2: Filipʋ nyə ́ ma mɛ , mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ nyəmá sɩ ma lɩɩnaʋ Masetoni kɛ waatʋ wei na Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ heeluɣu tɔm caalaɣa kɔntɛ tɔ , mə Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle tike sənna - m . Mə tike ɩ ́ tʋna - m niŋ kɛ ma kawaaɣa na ma asalaʋnaa pə taa .

text: For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity .
text2: Ɩ ́ ka tɛma - m mə kʋsənamnaa tilinaʋ kɛ maa wɛʋ Tɛsalonikɩ tɔ na pə tema - m teu .

text: Not because I desire a gift : but I desire fruit that may abound to your account .
text2: Pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ kʋcɔɔŋ ɩsəlɛ taa maɣamaɣa kɛ ma nyənəɣɩ se , ama ma caa kɛ ́ sɩ pə ́ məŋna - mɛɣɛ mə tələsəlɛnaa .

text: But I have all , and abound : I am full , having received of Epaphroditus the things which were sent from you , an odour of a sweet smell , a sacrifice acceptable , wellpleasing to God .
text2: Ma nawa pə təna mpi ɩ ́ tilinaa tɔ , na pə tɔɔʋ fɛɩna taka . Ɩpafəlotitɩ kɔna - m mə kʋcɔɔŋ tɔ , pənɛntaa pə təna pə tɔləna - m yem kɛ ́ . Mə kʋcɔɔŋ wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ kɔtaɣa wɛʋ sɔɔsʋŋ kɛ teu , na Ɩsɔ mʋɣɩ - kɛ na ká wɛ - ɩ teu pə tɩɩ fɛɩ tɔ .

text: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus .
text2: Ma Ɩsɔ ká kpaɣa ɩ apititu kʋpantʋ nti tə wɛ Yesu Kilisiti kiŋ tɔ tə taa na ɩ ́ ha - mɛɣɛ mpi mpi ɩ ́ laŋaa tɔ .

text: Now unto God and our Father be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Tá Caa Ɩsɔ ɩnəɣəlɛ teeli tʋ kɛ tam tɔɔ . Ami .

text: Salute every saint in Christ Jesus . The brethren which are with me greet you .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ yəlaa təna mpa pa wɛ Yesu Kilisiti mpaaʋ taa tɔ . Tá taapalaa mpa pa wɛ ma kiŋ cənɛ tɔ pa sɛɛ - mɛ .

text: All the saints salute you , chiefly they that are of Caesar ' s household .
text2: Ɩsɔ yəlaa təna mpa pa wɛ cənɛ tɔ pa sɛɛ - mɛ , ɩlɛna pə tɩɩ kələna Ɩsɔ yəlaa mpa pa wɛ Lom wulaʋ təyaɣa taa tɔ .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ mə tənaɣa ɩ pɛɛlɛɛ .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timotheus our brother ,
text2: Maɣa Pɔɔlɩ , Ɩsɔ luɣu lapəna na má lá Yesu Kilisiti tillu . Má na tá taapalʋ Timotee tə ŋmaakəna takəlaɣa kanɛɣɛ .

text: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Ɩsɔ yəlaa mpa mɛ ɩ ́ wɛ kolosi na ɩ ́ kɛ ́ tá taapalaa kʋpama kɛ Kilisiti təŋʋɣʋ taa tɔ . Tacaa Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ na ɩ ́ ha - mɛɣɛ alaafəya .

text: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , praying always for you ,
text2: Ye tə kʋla mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ sʋlʋmʋɣʋ , sɛɛtʋ kɛ tə sɛɛkɩ tam kɛ ́ tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti Caa Ɩsɔ .

text: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus , and of the love which ye have to all the saints ,
text2: Pa heela - tʋɣʋ ɩsəna ɩ ́ tɛma mə taa na Yesu Kilisiti , na ɩsəna ɩ ́ sɔɔla Ɩsɔ yəlaa təna tɔ .

text: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven , whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel ;
text2: Waatʋ wei tampana tɔm Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ caala mə tɛɣɛ tatɛ tɔ pa hʋla - mɛɣɛ tɛɛlʋɣʋ ŋku kʋ wɛ tampana tɔm ntɩ tə taa tɔ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ mə taa tɛmnaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ na mə sɔɔlʋɣʋ teesina mpi pa sɩɩ - mɛɣɛ hatuu ɩsɔtaa na ɩ ́ tɛɛləɣɩ - wɩ tɔ .

text: Which is come unto you , as it is in all the world ; and bringeth forth fruit , as it doth also in you , since the day ye heard of it , and knew the grace of God in truth :
text2: Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ yɛkəɣɩ kɛ ́ , na paa ɩ tala timpiɣi antulinya təna taa ɩ lakɩ kʋpantʋ kɛ ́ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ lapa mə hɛkʋ kɛ kʋyaŋku ɩ ́ taala Ɩsɔ pɛɛlɛɛ tɔm kɛ nɩɩʋ tɔ , ɩ ́ hii lɔŋ na ɩ ́ nyɩ pɛɛlɛɛ anɩ a tampana .

text: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant , who is for you a faithful minister of Christ ;
text2: Ta təmlɛ taa taapalʋ kʋpaŋ Ɩpafəlasɩ sɛɣɛsəna - mɛɣɛ mpʋ . Tá nɔɣɔ kɛ ɩ lakəna təmlɛ ɩsɩɩ Kilisiti təmlɛ tʋ kʋpaŋ .

text: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit .
text2: Ɩ heela - tʋɣʋ təma sɔɔlʋɣʋ ŋku Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu tʋ - mɛ tɔ kʋ tɔm .

text: For this cause we also , since the day we heard it , do not cease to pray for you , and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding ;
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɩɩ hɛɛsəɣɩ Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ kɛ mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tuu kʋyaŋku pa heela - tʋɣʋ mə tɔm tɔ . Tə sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ ha - mɛɣɛ ɩ Feesuɣu haakɩ nyəm na laɣatʋ nti tɔ tə təna na pə ́ yele na ɩ ́ nyɩ ɩ luɣu nyəntʋ kɛ teu .

text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing , being fruitful in every good work , and increasing in the knowledge of God ;
text2: Mpʋ pɩɩ yelina na mə tɔntɛ maɣa Tacaa na mə kʋlapʋtʋ lapɩ - ɩ teu kɛ tam . Na pɩɩ yele na ɩ ́ lakɩ təma kʋpana anɩ a təna , a nɔɣɔ na a suka , na ɩ ́ ká sɔɔsəɣɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ nyəm .

text: Strengthened with all might , according to his glorious power , unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness ;
text2: Tə sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ la - mɛ na ɩ ́ nyɔɔ toŋ kɛ teu na ɩ pəsʋɣʋ teeli nyəŋkʋ toŋ taa , na ɩ ́ pəsɩ na ɩ ́ kantəlɩ pə təna mpi pɩɩ maɣana - mɛ tɔ pə taa na suulu .

text: Giving thanks unto the Father , which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light :
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ Tacaa kɛ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ , ɩnɩ ɩ yelina na mɛ ɩ ́ mʋna sɩ ɩ ́ hiki mə paa nyəm kɛ kʋpantʋnaa mpa Ɩsɔ sɩɩ ɩ yəlaa kɛ tənaŋŋ taa tɔ pa taa .

text: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness , and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son :
text2: Ɩnɩ ɩ lɛɛkəna - tʋɣʋ ahoo səkpɛtʋɣʋ tɛɛ asaɣaa sɔsaa niŋ taa na ɩ ́ sʋsɩ - tʋɣʋ ɩ luɣu tɛɛ Pəyaɣa kawulaɣa taa .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , even the forgiveness of sins :
text2: Na ɩ pəyaɣa ŋkɛ ka tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə yapa - tʋ na pə ́ hɩɩsɩ tá ɩsaɣatʋ .

text: Who is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn of every creature :
text2: Kilisiti kɛləna Ɩsɔ wei paa naakɩ tɔ tətɛŋɛlɛŋ . Ɩnəɣəlɛ Ɩsɔ kancaalaɣa kʋlʋlʋ wei ɩ kəla pə təna mpi Ɩsɔ lapa tɔ .

text: For by him were all things created , that are in heaven , and that are in earth , visible and invisible , whether they be thrones , or dominions , or principalities , or powers : all things were created by him , and for him :
text2: Ɩnəɣɩ Ɩsɔ lapəna pə təna , paa ɩsɔtaa na atɛ pə nyəm mpi pa naa na mpi paa naa tɔ . Pə kpaɣaʋ pəsəlaa na sɔsaa na awulaa na toŋtʋnaa pə loosi təna tɔ ɩ niŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ lapəna pə təna , na ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ lapa - wɩ .

text: And he is before all things , and by him all things consist .
text2: Pə təna pə lɩɩwaɣa na pə ́ maɣana - ɩ , na pə təna mpi pə lapa tɔ pə tamsəna - ɩ tɔɣɔ pə wɛ pə lona taa .

text: And he is the head of the body , the church : who is the beginning , the firstborn from the dead ; that in all things he might have the preeminence .
text2: Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka kɛna tɔnʋɣʋ na ɩnəɣəlɛ nyʋɣʋ . Ɩnɩ ɩ yelina na a təna a wɛɛ . Ɩnɩ ɩ kɛna Ɩsɔ kancaalaɣa kʋlʋlʋ wei ɩ səpa na pə ́ taaləna - ɩ feesuɣu sɩ ɩ ́ la pə təna təpaɩpaɩ pə nɔɣɔ tʋ tɔ .

text: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell ;
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ luɣu lapəna sɩ ɩ wɛɛtʋ təna ɩ ́ maɣalɩ ɩ Pəyaɣa taa .

text: And , having made peace through the blood of his cross , by him to reconcile all things unto himself ; by him , I say , whether they be things in earth , or things in heaven .
text2: Na ɩ luɣu lapa tɔtɔ sɩ ɩ Pəyaɣa ká yelina na ɩ na kʋŋmaŋmam təna pá ciiki . Na Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa caləm lɩ ́ ɩ ́ səm tesika tɔɔ tɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ yelaa na pə ́ lá hɛɛsʋɣʋ tɔm . Mpʋ pə yelina na Ɩsɔ na pə təna təpaɩpaɩ pa ciiki , paa ɩsɔtaa nyəm paa atɛ nyəm .

text: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled
text2: Mɛ tɔtɔ tuu lɔŋ mɩɩ hatələna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ , na mə hʋwɛɛ asaɣɛɛ na mə ɩsaɣakʋlapʋtʋ ka lapəna - mɛɣɛ ɩ kolontunaa .

text: In the body of his flesh through death , to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight :
text2: Ama ɩ Pəyaɣa səpʋ ka tɔnʋɣʋ kʋnɛ kʋ səm tɔ pənɛntɛ Ɩsɔ ciika mə na - ɩ kɛ ́ , sɩ pə ́ yele na ɩ ́ ləsɩ - mɛɣɛ ɩ ɩsɛntaa na ɩ ́ wɛ tənaŋŋ na ɩ ́ kɛ ́ kʋpama na paa kawaliya ka fɛɩ mə kiŋ .

text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled , and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel , which ye have heard , and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven ; whereof I Paul am made a minister ;
text2: Ama kʋlʋmtʋ kɛ ́ sɩ mɩɩ tɔkɩ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam , na ɩ ́ səŋ təca kɛ teu kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam , pʋlʋpʋ ɩ ́ taa ciɣiti - mɛ , na ɩ ́ taa yele na pə ́ kʋ ́ mə tɛɛlʋɣʋ ŋku ɩ ́ tɛɛləɣɩ tuu kʋyaŋku ɩ ́ nɩɩ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔ . Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ ɩnəɣɩ pa heela antulinya taa yəlaa təna , na Pɔɔlɩ má ma pəsəna ɩ heellu .

text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you , and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body ' s sake , which is the church :
text2: Kaɣana kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛnaa mpa ma tɔkɩ mə tɔɔ tɔ pa hʋləsəɣɩ ma laŋlɛ kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle kɛna Kilisiti tɔnʋɣʋ , na ɩ tɔɣa kʋnyɔŋ kɛ pa tɔɔ na mpi pə ́ kaasɩ tɔ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma saləməɣəna kʋnyɔŋ kɛ ma tɔnʋɣʋ taa , sɩ má səna na pə ́ yoosi - wɩ .

text: Whereof I am made a minister , according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you , to fulfil the word of God ;
text2: Ɩsɔ tʋ - m təmlɛ nte sɩ má yoosi - tɛɣɛ mə cɔlɔ tɔ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ pə tʋ - m sɩ má la Ɩsɔ yəlaa kpekəle təmlɛ tʋ , na ɩ tʋ - m kɛ ́ sɩ má heeli ɩ tɔm təfoo , má taa ŋmɛsɩ .

text: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations , but now is made manifest to his saints :
text2: Ɩ ŋmɛsa ɩ tɔm kʋŋmɛsətʋ tənɛɣɛ yəlaa tənaɣa təkulakula kɛ hatuu lɔŋ , na pənɛntɛɣɛ ɩ kula tə tɔɔ na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ mpi ɩ tɩ tɔ .

text: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles ; which is Christ in you , the hope of glory :
text2: Mpi pə tɔɔ tɔ , Ɩsɔ sɔɔlaa kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ la na pá nyɩ ɩsəna ɩ sɩɩwa na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ na pə ́ wɛ ɩŋmɛlaʋ tɔ pə tɔɔʋ na pə teu sɔsɔɔm . Ɩ sɩɩ mpɩ ɩnəɣɩ sɩ ɩ ká la yəlaa təna . Kʋŋmɛsətʋ ntəɣəlɛ sɩ Kilisiti wɛ mə waalɩ na ɩnɩ ɩ yekina na mɩɩ taakɩ sɩ ɩ ́ ká hiki Ɩsɔ teeli taa kɛ ́ mə paa tete .

text: Whom we preach , warning every man , and teaching every man in all wisdom ; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus :
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə heeliɣi yəlaa tənaɣa Kilisiti tɔm . Na tə ́ lakəna tá laɣatʋ təna , na tə ́ kpaaləɣɩ paa wei kɛ ́ pə tɔm taa , na tə ́ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ sɩ pə ́ táná paa wei kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa na ɩ ́ tɛma pɩɩʋ kɛ ɩ ́ na Kilisiti pa kpɛntʋɣʋ tɔm taa .

text: Whereunto I also labour , striving according to his working , which worketh in me mightily .
text2: Təmlɛ tənɛ tə yoosuɣu tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma lakɩ na má lʋkəna toma taa toma nna Kilisiti haakɩ tɔ , toma anɛ a wɛnna ma taa .

text: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you , and for them at Laodicea , and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh ;
text2: Ma caa ɩ ́ nyɩ sɩ , mə na Layotisee nyə ́ ma na pa təna mpa pa nɩɩ ma hətɛ kɛ kʋnɩɩ na pá tá nyɩ ma maɣamaɣa tɔ , mə kʋlʋkʋ kɛ ma wɛɛ na má lʋkɩ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: That their hearts might be comforted , being knit together in love , and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding , to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God , and of the Father , and of Christ ;
text2: Ma lʋkɩ kɛ ́ sɩ pə ́ kpaasɩ pa apalʋtʋ sɩ pá la nɔɣɔ kʋlʋmaɣa kɛ sɔɔlʋɣʋ tɔm taa , na pá hiki naani wei yʋlʋ ɩ ́ nyəmá teu ɩ hikiɣi tɔɣɔ teu təmammam . Ye pə lapa mpʋ paa nyɩ Ɩsɔ kʋŋmɛsəm . Mpəɣəlɛ Kilisiti maɣamaɣa .

text: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
text2: Kilisiti ɩnɩ ɩ kiŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ haa nyəm na laɣatʋ nti tɔ pə kiŋkinte wɛɛ na pə ́ ŋmɛlaa .

text: And this I say , lest any man should beguile you with enticing words .
text2: Ma yɔɣɔtaa tɔ ɩ ́ nɩɩwaɣalɛ , ɩ ́ taa yele na nɔɣɔlʋ tolisi - mɛ na laɣatʋ tɔmnaa .

text: For though I be absent in the flesh , yet am I with you in the spirit , joying and beholding your order , and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ .
text2: Paa ma na - mɛ tə wɛʋ təma na pooluŋ tɔ , ma ləsaɣa wɛ mə kiŋ kɛ ́ , na ma laŋlɛ hʋlʋmaa ɩsɩɩ ma naʋ mə təna ɩ ́ tɛma mə taa na Kilisiti , na ɩ ́ kpɛntaa na ɩ ́ səŋa təca kɛ ́ pə taa tɔ .

text: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord , so walk ye in him :
text2: Tɔʋ , ɩ ́ tisuɣu sɩ Yesu Kilisiti ɩ ́ la mə Sɔsɔ tɔ , ɩ ́ yele na mə na - ɩ ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ mə tɔntɛ taa .

text: Rooted and built up in him , and stablished in the faith , as ye have been taught , abounding therein with thanksgiving .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyɔɔna - ɩ teu ɩsɩɩ tʋɣʋ nyɔɔkʋɣʋna tɛtʋ tɔ . Kilisiti ɩ ́ wɛɛ mə kʋlapʋtʋ təna kite . Paa kʋyaŋku ɩ ́ nyɔɔkɩ toŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ taa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa sɛɣɛsa - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ lakɩ . Ɩ ́ sɛɛkɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ teu .

text: Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit , after the tradition of men , after the rudiments of the world , and not after Christ .
text2: Ɩ ́ feŋ teu , ɩ ́ taa yele na nɔɣɔlʋ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ hii - mɛ na ɩ yʋlʋlaɣatʋ nyəm tɔm kʋpuɣusutu kpaɩ nyəntʋ nti yəlaa sɛɣɛsaa na pá tɛləsɩ təma tɔ . Tɔmnaa mpɛ pa kɛ ́ pə təna pə kancaalaɣa nyəm kɛ antulinya taa , pa ta kɛ Kilisiti nyəntʋ .

text: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ wɛɛtʋ tənaɣa Kilisiti kpaɣa ɩ tɔnʋɣʋ taa na pə ́ maɣalɩ ɩ taa .

text: And ye are complete in him , which is the head of all principality and power :
text2: Na mə na - ɩ ɩ ́ kpɛntʋɣʋ kʋlʋm tɔ ɩ ́ hika pə tənaɣa , ɩnɩ ɩ kələna kawulasɩ təna na toŋtʋnaa təna .

text: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands , in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ :
text2: Mə na - ɩ ɩ ́ kpɛnta kʋlʋm kɛ mpʋ tɔ pə pɛla - mɛɣɛ , na pɛlʋɣʋ mpɩ pə fɛɩ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ pɛlʋɣʋʋ tɔ . Ama pə kɛ ́ Kilisiti pɛlʋɣʋ kɛ ́ . Mpəɣəlɛ pə ləsʋɣʋʋ yʋlʋ tɔnʋɣʋ ɩsaɣatʋ toma kɛ yʋlʋ taa tɔ .

text: Buried with him in baptism , wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God , who hath raised him from the dead .
text2: Pa sɔ - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ lʋm tɔ pə hʋlaa kɛ ́ sɩ pa pima mə na Kilisiti na mə na - ɩ ɩ ́ taɣanɩ fem . Na ɩ ́ tisaa sɩ Ɩsɔ wei ɩ feesa Yesu kɛ ́ sətaa taa tɔ ɩ wɛna toma tɔ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə lapa mpʋ .

text: And you , being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh , hath he quickened together with him , having forgiven you all trespasses ;
text2: Tuu lɔŋ ɩsɩɩ ɩ taa nyɩ Ɩsɔ tɔ mə ɩsaɣatʋ ka yelaa kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ sətaa kɛ Ɩsɔ nyəntʋ taa . Ama pənɛntɛ Ɩsɔ kpɛnta mə na Kilisiti kɛ weesuɣu haʋ . Na Ɩsɔ hɩɩsa mə ɩsaɣatʋ təna .

text: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us , which was contrary to us , and took it out of the way , nailing it to his cross ;
text2: Tá kəma nna a fɛɩ nyʋɣʋ na pə ́ pɛləɣɩ tá niŋ tɔ Ɩsɔ yela a nyʋɣʋ mapʋ na pə ́ saalɩ yem . Kəma anɛ a nyʋɣʋ mapʋ ka wɛʋ təlasɩ tɔ pə caala - tʋɣʋ . Kəma anɛɣɛ ɩ kama səm tesika tɔɔ na ɩ ́ lɔ a tɔm .

text: And having spoiled principalities and powers , he made a shew of them openly , triumphing over them in it .
text2: Kilisiti tesika kɛ Ɩsɔ kpana awulaa na toŋtʋnaa pa nyəm . Ɩsɔ tʋ - wɛɣɛ Pəyaɣa akaɩtʋ looŋa taa kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ saləkatʋnaa na ɩ ́ tɛɛkəna na pá nyənəɣɩ - wɛ təcoo .

text: Let no man therefore judge you in meat , or in drink , or in respect of an holyday , or of the new moon , or of the sabbath days :
text2: Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ taa yele na nɔɣɔlʋ footi - mɛɣɛ mə tɔɣɔnaɣa na mə kʋnyɔnyɔɔm na acima kʋyɛɛŋ na ɩsɔtʋ kʋfalʋ na kʋyɛɛŋ kʋhɛɛsəŋ pə tɔɔ .

text: Which are a shadow of things to come ; but the body is of Christ .
text2: Kʋpantʋ nti tɩɩ kɔɔ tɔ tə nyaləməlɛ ntɛ ́ pə tənaɣa ɩsəntɔ , na Kilisiti kɛna pə kiŋkinte .

text: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels , intruding into those things which he hath not seen , vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind ,
text2: Ɩ ́ taa tisi na nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ yem wei ɩ ́ sɔɔlaa ɩ pasa ɩ təɣɩ yəlaa ɩsɛntaa na ɩ ́ sɛɛkɩ ɩsɔtaa tillaa tɔ pʋntʋ kʋ mə tɔm . Yʋlʋ ɩ ́ lakɩ mpʋ , ɩ toosee nna ɩ toosaa tɔɣɔ ɩ təŋəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ . Na wei ɩ wɛ mpʋ tɔ yʋlʋhʋwɛɛ kalampaanɩ kʋɣʋna - ɩ na ɩ fɛɩna tampana .

text: And not holding the Head , from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered , and knit together , increaseth with the increase of God .
text2: Ɩɩ caa ɩ ́ matəna Kilisiti wei ɩ kɛ ́ nyʋɣʋ tɔ , pəyele Kilisiti ɩnɩ ɩ yelina na tɔnʋɣʋ hikiɣi kʋ tɔɣɔnaɣa na kʋ atama na kʋ nantʋ pə kpɛntaa na pə ́ tɔka teu na kʋ pɩɩkɩ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ caa tɔ .

text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world , why , as though living in the world , are ye subject to ordinances ,
text2: Mə na Kilisiti ɩ ́ səpʋ tɔ pə ləsa - mɛɣɛ antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ pə təna pə kancaalaɣa nyəm taa kɛ ́ . Ɩlɛ pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ tasəɣɩ tɔntɛ ɩsɩɩ antulinya tənna - mɛ ? Ɩlɛ pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ tisiɣi na pá tʋɣʋ - mɛɣɛ kiiŋ

text: ( Touch not ; taste not ; handle not ;
text2: sɩ : Taa kpaɣa pənɛ , taa təŋ pənɛ , taa tokina pənɛ ?

text: Which all are to perish with the using ; ) after the commandments and doctrines of men ?
text2: Mpi pə ləsaa sɩ yʋlʋ ɩ ́ lana - wɩ na pə ́ tɛ ́ tɔ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa sɩɩ kiiŋ ɩnɛ . Yəlaa təkelekele sɩɩna kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ na kiiŋ ɩnɛ .

text: Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship , and humility , and neglecting of the body ; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh .
text2: Kiiŋ ɩnɛ ɩ nəɣəsəna ləmaɣasɛɛ kʋpana kɛ ́ , mpi tɔ , ɩ yelaa na yʋlʋ cɛsəɣəna Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ , na ɩ yelaa na yʋlʋ pasəɣɩ ɩ tɩ , na ɩ caala yʋlʋ sɩ ɩ ́ tʋ ɩ tɔnʋɣʋ kɛ wahala . Ama pəsʋɣʋ kɛ kiiŋ ɩnɛ ɩ fɛɩna sɩ ɩ ́ kpa yʋlʋ tɔnʋɣʋ kɛ kʋ kʋnyɩɩləŋ təlatɛ .

text: If ye then be risen with Christ , seek those things which are above , where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God .
text2: Mə na kilisiti kɛ pa feesaa . Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ timpi Kilisiti caɣa ɩsɔtaa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kɔŋkɔŋ taa tɔ təna nyəm ɩkpatɛ kɛ ɩ ́ ká huli .

text: Set your affection on things above , not on things on the earth .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛsɩ ɩsəlɛ na ɩsɔtaa nyəm tɔm , ɩ ́ taa sɛɛsɩ ɩsəlɛ na atɛ nyəm pɛɛkʋɣʋ .

text: For ye are dead , and your life is hid with Christ in God .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ səpʋ tɔ pə ŋmɛsa mə weesiŋ kɛ Kilisiti kiŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ cɔlɔɣɔ .

text: When Christ , who is our life , shall appear , then shall ye also appear with him in glory .
text2: Mə weesiŋ maɣamaɣa ntɛ ́ Kilisiti , ɩ kɔŋ ɩ ́ lɩɩkɩ tɔ mə na - ɩ ɩ ́ lɩɩkəna , na ɩ ́ ka hiki ɩ teeli taa kɛ ́ mə paa nyəm .

text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth ; fornication , uncleanness , inordinate affection , evil concupiscence , and covetousness , which is idolatry :
text2: Ye mpʋ atɛ cənɛ nyəntʋ təna nti ɩ ́ ka tɔkaa tɔ ɩ ́ kʋ - təɣɩ mə kiŋ . Ntəɣəlɛ asilima , tɛtɛlakasɩ , wasaŋkalətʋ , na kʋnyɩɩləŋ ɩsaɣaŋ , na liɣitee kɔtɔɩ , halɩ liɣitee kɔtɔɩ tʋ na tɩɩŋ laalʋ pa ɩsaɣatʋ lɩɩ kʋlʋm kɛ ́ .

text: For which things ' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience :
text2: Ɩsaɣatʋ tənɛwɛ tə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ ká mʋ pááná na ɩ ́ má mpa paa nɩɩkəna - ɩ tɔ .

text: In the which ye also walked some time , when ye lived in them .
text2: Ɩsaɣatʋ tənɛ tɩɩ ŋmakəlʋɣʋ - mɛɣɛ lɔŋ tɔ , ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ́ təŋaɣa teitei .

text: But now ye also put off all these ; anger , wrath , malice , blasphemy , filthy communication out of your mouth .
text2: Ama pənɛntɛ ɩ ́ lɔ pə təna mpi pə wɛ mpʋ tɔ , pááná mʋɣʋ na kakalaɣa kɛkɛkɛ na nyaŋ . Kʋtʋɣʋ yaa kɛɛsəlaɣa tɔm natəlɩ tə ́ taa lɩɩna mə nɔɔsɩ taa .

text: Lie not one to another , seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds ;
text2: Ɩ ́ taa pɛləɣɩ təmaɣa pɔpɔtʋ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ ́ hɔɣɔsa mə yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ kʋpəntʋ na tə yaasinaa tənaɣa na ɩ ́ lɔ .

text: And have put on the new man , which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him :
text2: Na yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ kʋfatʋ kɛ ɩ ́ kpaɣaa na ɩ ́ suu . Yʋlʋ kʋfalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔŋna ɩ ŋmalʋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ kɛlʋɣʋ tətɛŋɛlɛŋ kɛ ́ sɩ pə ́ yele na ɩ ́ nyɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teu təkpəsəkpəsɩ .

text: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew , circumcision nor uncircumcision , Barbarian , Scythian , bond nor free : but Christ is all , and in all .
text2: Pə lapa mpʋ tɔ , pə fɛɩ sɩ pə tasəɣɩ tɔtɔ sɩ panɛ pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma , Yuta nyə ́ ma ntɔ , na pɛllaa ntɔ kʋtapɛləŋ ntɔ , ɩsəkpɛɛtɛɛ nyə ́ ma ntɔ sɔsaa taa nyə ́ ma ntɔ , yomaa yaa kasaɣampiya ntɔ . Aaɩ , Kilisiti kɛna pə təna , na ɩ ́ wɛ pa təna pa waalɩ .

text: Put on therefore , as the elect of God , holy and beloved , bowels of mercies , kindness , humbleness of mind , meekness , longsuffering ;
text2: Ɩ ́ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ yəlaa kɛ ́ . Ɩsɔ sɔɔləna - mɛ na ɩ ́ ləsɩ - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ la ɩ nyə ́ ma . Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ tɔkɩ kʋpantʋ taa kʋpantʋ na ɩ ́ lakɩ . Ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ yʋlʋtʋ , na ɩ ́ pasəɣɩ mə tɩ , na ɩ ́ wɛɛ təpamm , na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ suulu .

text: Forbearing one another , and forgiving one another , if any man have a quarrel against any : even as Christ forgave you , so also do ye .
text2: Ɩ ́ tɔkɩ təma , mə taa lɛlʋ ɩ ́ pənta lɛlʋ na nti ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ təmaɣa suulu . Ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ təmaɣa suulu , Tacaa ná hʋla - mɛɣɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ .

text: And above all these things put on charity , which is the bond of perfectness .
text2: Pə tənaɣa mpʋ təpaɩ ɩlɛ təma sɔɔlʋɣʋ kɛ ɩ ́ ká tɔkɩ teu . Təma sɔɔlʋɣʋ mpɩ pɩɩ yelina na ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ yʋlʋ kʋlʋm .

text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts , to the which also ye are called in one body ; and be ye thankful .
text2: Ɩ ́ yele na Kilisiti sɔɔlʋɣʋ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ mə lotu taa kɛ ́ mpi ɩ ́ ká lakɩ tɔ . Hɛɛsʋɣʋ kʋnɛ kʋ maɣamaɣa kʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kpɛnta - mɛ na ɩ ́ yaa , na ɩ ́ wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ niŋ na nɔɔhɛɛ na pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə wɛʋ na pə ́ kpɛntaa tɔ . Ɩ ́ sɛɛkɩ Ɩsɔ sɩ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ .

text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom ; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord .
text2: Kilisiti tɔm na tə tɔɔʋ təna ɩ ́ wɛɛ mə kiŋ kɛ teu . Ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ təma , ɩ ́ kpaaləɣɩ təma na laɣatʋ sɔsɔɔntʋ . Ɩ ́ yoona luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ yontu na Ɩsɔ Tɔm yontu na Ɩsɔ sam nyəntʋ na yontu nti tə sɔɔsəɣɩ apalʋtʋ tɔ , na ɩ ́ sɛɛna - ɩ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ .

text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed , do all in the name of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks to God and the Father by him .
text2: Paa mpiɣi ɩ ́ lakɩ , yaa paa ntiɣi ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ , ɩ ́ yaana tá Sɔsɔ Yesu hətɛ , na ɩ ́ sɛɛkɩ Tacaa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as it is fit in the Lord .
text2: Alaa mɛ ́ ɩ ́ seeki mə paalaa , Tacaa ɩsɛntaa , nti pə mʋna ɩ ́ la tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: Husbands , love your wives , and be not bitter against them .
text2: Apalaa mɩɩ sɔɔlɩ mə alaa na ɩ ́ taa la - wɛɣɛ nyaŋ kɛ paa pəcɔ .

text: Children , obey your parents in all things : for this is well pleasing unto the Lord .
text2: Piya mɛ Tacaa ɩsɛntaa mə nyəntʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ nɩɩna mə nyə ́ ma kɛ pə təna pə taa . Ye ɩ ́ nɩɩkəna mə nyə ́ ma pə lakɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teu kɛ ́ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: Fathers , provoke not your children to anger , lest they be discouraged .
text2: Cɛcɛnaa mɛ ɩ ́ taa la na pááná kpa mə piya na sɩ kɔɔ sɩ lɔ apalʋtʋ .

text: Servants , obey in all things your masters according to the flesh ; not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but in singleness of heart , fearing God :
text2: Yomaa , mɩɩ nɩɩkəna mə caanaa mpa pa tɔka - mɛɣɛ antulinya taa cənɛ tɔɣɔ pə təna pə taa . Ɩ ́ taa seeki - wɛɣɛ waatʋ wei pa wɛɛkɩ tɔ tike sɩ pə ́ la - wɛɣɛ leleŋ . Ama ɩ ́ nɩɩna - wɛ na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ kɛ seu mpi ɩ ́ seeki Tacaa tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: And whatsoever ye do , do it heartily , as to the Lord , and not unto men ;
text2: Paa təmlɛ nteɣe pa tʋ - mɛ te , ɩ ́ la - tɛ na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ , na pə ́ wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ Tacaa təmlɛ kɛ ɩ ́ lakɩ , pə taɣa yəlaa nyəntɛ .

text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance : for ye serve the Lord Christ .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyɩ teu sɩ ɩ ́ lakʋɣʋ tɔ Tacaa ká tɛna na ɩ ́ fɛlɩ - mɛɣɛ mə kʋfɛlʋɣʋ . Ɩ ́ ká hiki kʋpantʋ nti ɩ sɩɩ ɩ nyə ́ ma tɔɔ tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Kilisiti kɛna mə Caa maɣamaɣa wei ɩ təmlɛ ɩ ́ lakɩ tɔ .

text: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done : and there is no respect of persons .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ye wei ɩ lakɩ ɩsaɣatʋ , pɩɩ tɛ na pə ́ fɛlɩ - ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ nti ɩ lapa tɔ . Ɩsɔ ɩɩ faɣasəɣɩ nɔɣɔlʋ se .

text: Masters , give unto your servants that which is just and equal ; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven .
text2: Yomaa caanaa mɛ , ɩ ́ tɔkɩ mə yomaa kɛ ɩsəna mpi pə kɛɛsaa na pə siɣisa teu tɔ . Ɩ ́ nyɩ teu sɩ mɛ ́ tɔtɔ mə wɛna Caa kɛ ɩsɔtaa .

text: Continue in prayer , and watch in the same with thanksgiving ;
text2: Ɩ ́ sələmɣɩ Ɩsɔ , ɩ ́ taa yele . Ɩ ́ feŋiɣi na ɩ ́ sɛɛkɩ - ɩ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ mə Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ taa .

text: Withal praying also for us , that God would open unto us a door of utterance , to speak the mystery of Christ , for which I am also in bonds :
text2: Ɩ ́ kpɛntəna tá na ɩ ́ sələməɣəna Ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ ha - tʋɣʋ ɩkpatɛ na tə ́ la ɩ waasʋ na tə ́ kpaalɩ Kilisiti tɔm kʋŋmɛsətʋ . Tɔm kʋŋmɛsətʋ tənɛ tə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma wɛ saləka taa kɛ ́ ɩsəntɔ .

text: That I may make it manifest , as I ought to speak .
text2: Ɩ ́ sələmɩ Ɩsɔ na má , ɩlɛna má yasɩ ɩ tɔm təcɛɩcɛɩ na pá nyəmɩ - ɩ teu , mpi pə tʋ má sɩ má la tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without , redeeming the time .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyɩ mə tɔntɛ kɛ mpa pa ta kɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa tɔ pa kiŋ , na ɩ ́ taa yele na aləsɛkɛ kʋyɛɛŋ fiti - mɛɣɛ yem .

text: Let your speech be alway with grace , seasoned with salt , that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man .
text2: Paa kʋyaŋku ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ kʋpantʋ , na kawaaɣa nyəntʋ ɩ ́ lɩɩkəna mə nɔɔsɩ taa . Ɩ ́ nyɩ ɩsəna pə mʋna ɩ ́ cɔ tɔm tɔ na ɩ ́ cɔɔkɩ paa wei .

text: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you , who is a beloved brother , and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord :
text2: Tá taapalʋ kʋpaŋ Tisikɩ ká heelina - mɛɣɛ ma tɔm təna təpaɩpaɩ . Ma na - ɩ tə lakəna Tacaa təmlɛ na ɩ kɛ təmlɛ latʋ kʋpaŋ kɛ ́ .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that he might know your estate , and comfort your hearts ;
text2: Pə maɣamaɣa pə nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma kʋsa - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ polo ɩ ́ na - mɛ na ɩ ́ heeli - mɛɣɛ tá alaafəya tɔm na pə ́ hɛɛsɩ mə laŋa .

text: With Onesimus , a faithful and beloved brother , who is one of you . They shall make known unto you all things which are done here .
text2: Tá taapalʋ kʋpampaŋ Honesim wei ɩ kɛ ́ mə taa lɛlʋ tɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ sɩɩna - ɩ . Ɩ ká kɛɛsɩ - mɛɣɛ tə təna nti tə lakɩ cənɛ tɔ .

text: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you , and Marcus , sister ' s son to Barnabas , ( touching whom ye received commandments : if he come unto you , receive him ; )
text2: Ma saləka taa akpele Alisitaakɩ na Paanapasɩ kɔɣɔ pəyaɣa Maləkɩ sɩ pá sɛɛ - mɛ yoo . Pa tɛma - mɛɣɛ Maləkɩ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔm heeluɣu , ɩlɛ ye ɩ tala mə tɛ ɩ ́ tɔkɩ - ɩ teu .

text: And Jesus , which is called Justus , who are of the circumcision . These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God , which have been a comfort unto me .
text2: Yesu wei pa yaa sɩ Yutusi tɔ ɩ sɛɛ - mɛ tɔtɔ . Yəlaa tooso ɩnɛ ɩ tike ɩ lɩɩna Yuta nyə ́ ma mpa pa laɣasaa tɔ pa taa , na má na - wɛ tə lakəna Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa təmlɛ , na pa paasaa kɛ ́ na pá sɔɔsɩ - m apalʋtʋ .

text: Epaphras , who is one of you , a servant of Christ , saluteth you , always labouring fervently for you in prayers , that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God .
text2: Ɩpafəlasɩ wei ɩ kɛ ́ mə taa lɛlʋ tɔ ɩ sɛɛ - mɛ . Ɩ kɛ ́ Yesu Kilisiti təmlɛ tʋ kɛ ́ na ɩ sɛɛsa ɩsəlɛ na Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ kɛ mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ teu sɩ ɩ ́ səŋ təca na pʋlʋ ɩ ́ taa ciɣiti - mɛ , na ɩ ́ pɩɩ Ɩsɔ nyəntʋ taa , na ɩ ́ taŋaa tətɛɣɛtɛɣɛ sɩ ɩ ́ la pə təna mpi Ɩsɔ caa tɔ .

text: For I bear him record , that he hath a great zeal for you , and them that are in Laodicea , and them in Hierapolis .
text2: Ma ləsəɣɩ ɩ nyɩɩlʋɣʋ , ye n na ɩsəna ɩ kʋɣɩ ɩ təɣɩ mə na Layotisee na Hiyelapolisi nyə ́ ma mə tɔɔ tɔ pə fɛɩ kɛɛsʋɣʋ .

text: Luke , the beloved physician , and Demas , greet you .
text2: Tá lokotulo kʋpaŋ Luku na Temasɩ sɩ pá sɛɛ - mɛ .

text: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea , and Nymphas , and the church which is in his house .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ tá taapalaa mpa pa wɛ Layotisee tɔ , na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Nɛmfa na Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle nte tə kotiɣi ɩ təyaɣa kɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ tɔ .

text: And when this epistle is read among you , cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans ; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea .
text2: Ye mɩɩ tɛma takəlaɣa kanɛɣɛ kalʋɣʋ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ tɛləsɩ Layotisee Yesu sɛɛlaa na pɛlɛ pá kala - kɛ tɔtɔ . Mɛ tɔtɔ mɩɩ mʋ Layotisee nyə ́ ma nyəŋka na ɩ ́ kala .

text: And say to Archippus , Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord , that thou fulfil it .
text2: Ɩ ́ heeli Aasipi sɩ ɩ ́ paasəna Tacaa təmlɛ nte pa tʋ - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ la tɔɣɔ teu .

text: The salutation by the hand of me Paul . Remember my bonds . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Ma maɣamaɣa ma niŋ ŋmaatʋ ntɛ ́ cənɛ . Pɔɔlɩ má ma sɛɛ - mɛ . Ɩ ́ taa sɔɔ sɩ ma wɛ saləka taa yoo . Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Taɣa Pɔɔlɩ na Silaasɩ na Timotee . Tá ŋmaakəna takəlaɣa kanɛɣɛ Tɛsalonikɩ Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle nyə ́ ma mɛ mpa ɩ ́ kɛ ́ Tacaa Ɩsɔ na tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti pa nyə ́ ma tɔ . Ɩsɔ na Yesu Kilisiti pá hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ na pá ha - mɛɣɛ alaafəya .

text: We give thanks to God always for you all , making mention of you in our prayers ;
text2: Tam tə sɛɛkɩ Ɩsɔ sɩ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ mə təna mə tɔɔ , na tə ́ sələməɣəna - mɛɣɛ tam tɔtɔ .

text: Remembering without ceasing your work of faith , and labour of love , and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ , in the sight of God and our Father ;
text2: Na tam ye tə səŋa Tacaa Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa tə tɔɔsəɣɩ ɩsəna ɩ ́ lapa təma kɛ mə Ɩsɔ mpaaʋ taa tɔ , na ɩsəna mə təma sɔɔlʋɣʋ sʋsa - mɛɣɛ lʋpʋ sɔsɔɔm taa tɔ , na ɩsəna mə tɛɛlʋɣʋ kɛ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti kiŋ ta pasa paa pəcɔ tɔ .

text: Knowing , brethren beloved , your election of God .
text2: Tá taapalaa mɛ , tə nyəmá sɩ Ɩsɔ sɔɔla - mɛ na ɩ ́ ləsɩ - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ pəsɩ ɩ nyə ́ ma .

text: For our gospel came not unto you in word only , but also in power , and in the Holy Ghost , and in much assurance ; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tə ta heeli - mɛɣɛ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ na nɔɣɔ taa tɔm tike . Ama na toma na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ toŋ taa kɛ ́ tə heelina - mɛɣɛ - ɩ . Na tə tɛma tá taa kɛ ́ teu sɩ tɔm tənɛ tə kɛ ́ tampana nyəntʋ . Mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ nyəmá ɩsəna tə tɔma mə hɛkʋ sɩ pə ́ səna - mɛ tɔ .

text: And ye became followers of us , and of the Lord , having received the word in much affliction , with joy of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Ɩ ́ təŋa tá na Tacaa tá ɩkpatɛ , na ɩ ́ ná kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ , paa na mpʋ ɩ ́ mʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ nte Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kɔŋna tɔ .

text: So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia .
text2: Haləna mə yaasi hʋla Masetoni na Akayi Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa tənaɣa ɩsəna paa la na pá te tɔ .

text: For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia , but also in every place your faith to God - ward is spread abroad ; so that we need not to speak any thing .
text2: Na pə taɣa Masetoni na Akayi pa tɛtʋnaa taa tike kɛ Tacaa tɔm nɩɩ mə tɔɔ . Ama paa timpi pə nɩɩwa ɩsəna ɩ ́ mʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm tɔ na pá yɔɣɔtəɣɩ pə tɔm . Halɩ pə fɛɩ sɩ tɩɩ nɔkɩ na tə ́ tasa nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ mə tɔm heeluɣu .

text: For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you , and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God ;
text2: Paa wei ɩ kɛɛsəɣɩ ɩsəna tɩɩ pola mə tɛ na ɩ ́ mʋ - tʋ tɔ , na ɩsəna ɩ ́ lɔ tɩɩŋ tɔm na ɩ ́ mələna Ɩsɔ tɔɔ sɩ ɩ ́ lakɩ tampana Ɩsɔ weesuɣu tʋ təmlɛ ,

text: And to wait for his Son from heaven , whom he raised from the dead , even Jesus , which delivered us from the wrath to come .
text2: na ɩ ́ taŋ sɩ ɩ Pəyaɣa Yesu wei ɩ ka feesa sətaa taa tɔ ɩ ́ lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa na ɩ ́ kɔɔ . Ɩ Pəyaɣa ŋkɛ kaa yana - tʋɣʋ cele kɛ Ɩsɔ pááná taa .

text: For yourselves , brethren , know our entrance in unto you , that it was not in vain :
text2: Tá taapalaa mɛ , mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ nyəmá sɩ waatʋ wei tə kɔma mə kiŋ tɔ tə ta lɩɩ yem .

text: But even after that we had suffered before , and were shamefully entreated , as ye know , at Philippi , we were bold in our God to speak unto you the gospel of God with much contention .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ tɛma nyəm tɔ pa tɛma - tʋɣʋ nyaŋ lapʋ na kʋtʋɣʋ kɛ Filipʋ kɛ ́ na pə ́ cɔ ́ tə ́ takɩ mə tɛ Tɛsalonikɩ . Ama Ɩsɔ ha - tʋɣʋ apalʋtʋ sɩ tə ́ heeli - mɛɣɛ ɩ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ , paa kaɣatʋɣʋ tɔɔ ɩsəna .

text: For our exhortation was not of deceit , nor of uncleanness , nor in guile :
text2: Pə təna mpi tə sɛɣɛsəɣɩ yəlaa sɩ pá la tɔ pəntʋɣʋ fɛɩ pə taa yaa hʋwɛɛ asaɣɛɛ naalɩ , na tɩɩ pɛɛkəɣɩ sɩ tə ́ puɣusi nɔɣɔlʋ .

text: But as we were allowed of God to be put in trust with the gospel , even so we speak ; not as pleasing men , but God , which trieth our hearts .
text2: Ama tə yɔɣɔtəɣɩ pə tənaɣa teitei kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ caakɩ tɔ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ sama - tʋ na ɩ ́ cɛla - tʋɣʋ ɩ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ sɩ tə ́ heeli . Ɩlɛ pə taɣa yəlaa laŋhɛɛlɛ kɛ tə ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ na tə ́ lakɩ mpʋ . Ama Ɩsɔ wei ɩ wiiliɣi tá lotunaa taa na ɩ ́ naa tá taa hʋwɛɛ tɔ ɩ laŋhɛɛlɛ kɛ tə pɛɛkəɣɩ .

text: For neither at any time used we flattering words , as ye know , nor a cloke of covetousness ; God is witness :
text2: Mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ nyəmá teu sɩ tə ta ma - mɛɣɛ nɔɣɔ taa kɛ ́ tiiliɣi paa pəcɔ maɣamaɣa , na tə ta la liɣitee kɔtɔɩ kɛ tiili na tə ́ puɣusi - mɛ . Na Ɩsɔ maɣamaɣa ná ná pə tənaɣa mpʋ .

text: Nor of men sought we glory , neither of you , nor yet of others , when we might have been burdensome , as the apostles of Christ .
text2: Tə ta pɛɛkɩ yəlaa ɩsantɛ , paa mə maɣamaɣa mə kiŋ yaa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ kiŋ .

text: But we were gentle among you , even as a nurse cherisheth her children :
text2: Pəcɔ tə kɛʋ Kilisiti tillaa ɩsəntɔ tɔ , ye tɩɩ nɔkaa tɩɩ ŋmakəla - mɛ na ɩ ́ lá ɩsəna tə caa tɔ . Ama tə caɣa mə hɛkʋ na suulu na tə ́ lakɩ - mɛ təpamm ɩsɩɩ asɔnʋɣʋ lakʋɣʋ kʋ pəyaɣa tɔ .

text: So being affectionately desirous of you , we were willing to have imparted unto you , not the gospel of God only , but also our own souls , because ye were dear unto us .
text2: Tə sɔɔla - mɛɣɛ katatəlaɣa kɛ ́ , haləna tə tɛm - mɛɣɛ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ heeluɣu tɔ , ye paa tɔma sɩ tə ́ ləsɩ tá weesiŋ maɣamaɣa na tə ́ tʋ - mɛ , tɩɩ ləsaa . Pɔpɔtʋ fɛɩ , tá luuŋ sʋʋ - mɛɣɛ teu kɛ ́ .

text: For ye remember , brethren , our labour and travail : for labouring night and day , because we would not be chargeable unto any of you , we preached unto you the gospel of God .
text2: Tá taapalaa , ntɔŋ ɩ ́ tɔɔsa ɩsəna tə lapa təma na tə ́ konti haŋaɣa tɔ ? Ɩsəna tə lapa təmlɛ na ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ kɛ teu sɩ tə ́ taa sʋkɩ mə taa nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ səɣəla kɛ saa wei tɩɩ wɛ mə hɛkʋ na tə heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔ .

text: Ye are witnesses , and God also , how holily and justly and unblameably we behaved ourselves among you that believe :
text2: Ɩ ́ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ ləsɩ tá nyɩɩlʋɣʋ kɛ ɩsəna tá tɔntɛ tewa Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa mɛ mə kiŋ , na tə ́ kɛɛsaa na tə ́ tá liɣiti tiili tɔ , Ɩsɔ maɣamaɣa ná ná mpʋ tɔtɔ .

text: As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you , as a father doth his children ,
text2: Pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ nyəmá tɔtɔɣɔ ɩsəna tə lapa paa mə taa wei ɩsɩɩ cɛcɛ lakʋɣʋ ɩ pəyaɣa tɔ .

text: That ye would walk worthy of God , who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory .
text2: Tə lapa na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ tɔnəŋ kɛ teu na tə sɔɔsa - mɛɣɛ apalʋtʋ , na tə ́ sɛɛsɩ - mɛ na ɩsəlɛ sɩ ɩ ́ tɔ na pə ́ kɛɛsəna teitei ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ caakɩ tɔ . Ɩsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ yaana - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ hiki mə paa tete kɛ ɩ kawulaɣa na ɩ teeli taa .

text: For this cause also thank we God without ceasing , because , when ye received the word of God which ye heard of us , ye received it not as the word of men , but as it is in truth , the word of God , which effectually worketh also in you that believe .
text2: Tə sɛɛkɩ Ɩsɔ sɩ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ tam tɔtɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , waatʋ wei tə heela - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ Tɔm tɔ ɩ ́ tá mʋ - tɩ ɩsɩɩ yəlaa nyəntʋ . Ama ɩ ́ nɩɩwa tɔ ɩ ́ mʋwaɣa sɩ tə kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm , na tampana tə maɣamaɣa kɛ ́ . Ntɩ ɩnɩ tə lakəna təmlɛ kɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa mɛ mə taanaa .

text: For ye , brethren , became followers of the churches of God which in Judaea are in Christ Jesus : for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen , even as they have of the Jews :
text2: Tá taapalaa - mɛ , mpi pə lapa Kilisiti nyə ́ ma hɛkʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa kpeka wena a wɛ Yuta tɔ a taa tɔ , pə akpele lapəna ntɛɣɛ mə kiŋ tɔtɔ . Naasʋɣʋ mpi Yuta nyə ́ ma naasa pɛlɛɣɛ təna tɔ pə taka kɛ ́ mə ɩcatɛ nyə ́ ma ná naasa - mɛ tɔtɔ .

text: Who both killed the Lord Jesus , and their own prophets , and have persecuted us ; and they please not God , and are contrary to all men :
text2: Yuta nyə ́ ma mpɛ pa kʋna Tacaa Yesu , na mpɛ ɩnɩ pa kʋna Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa . Kʋlʋmaa mpɛ ɩnɩ pa naasəna - tʋ tɔtɔ . Pa fɛɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teu , na pa kɛ ́ yəlaa təna kolontunaa .

text: Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved , to fill up their sins alway : for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost .
text2: Paa yeki sɩ tə sɛɣɛsɩ mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ na pə ́ ya pɛlɛ pa nyɔɔŋ . Ɩsaɣatʋnaa mpa tuu lɔŋ paa lapa tɔ mpɛ pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa tɔŋna lɛntənaa kɛ kaaʋ na pə ́ kpaa huɣule . Ama pənɛntɛɣɛlɛ Ɩsɔ tɛma pa tɔm .

text: But we , brethren , being taken from you for a short time in presence , not in heart , endeavoured the more abundantly to see your face with great desire .
text2: Tá taapalaa - mɛ , tuu ɩsɩɩ tə yeluɣu təmaɣa wɛɛ naalɛɣɛ mpʋ tɔ , tə nyɩɩla sɔsɔm sɩ tə ́ na - mɛ , haləna pɩɩ tɩɩ lakɩ - tʋɣʋ lɔŋ . Ama paa tɩɩ naa təmaɣa mpʋ tɔ tá laakalənaa wɛ təma kiŋ kɛ ́ .

text: Wherefore we would have come unto you , even I Paul , once and again ; but Satan hindered us .
text2: Tə nyɩɩla teu sɩ tə ́ məlɩ mə kiŋ , haləna Pɔɔlɩ má , tɔm paɣalɛ kɛ ma tʋ mə tɛ pote pəlɛ na Satanɩ tá tisi sɩ tə ́ hiki mpaaʋ .

text: For what is our hope , or joy , or crown of rejoicing ? Are not even ye in the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ at his coming ?
text2: Mə tike təkoŋ kɛ ́ tə tɛɛləɣɩ na tə ́ hʋləsəɣəna laŋa , na mɛɣɛ tɩɩ mʋɣʋləna Tacaa Yesu kɔntɛ wule kɛ ɩ ɩsɛntaa sɩ tə yoowa yoou na tə ́ lá akanaa .

text: For ye are our glory and joy .
text2: Nn , mɛɣɛ tɩɩ yɔɔləna , na mɛɣɛ tɩɩ hʋləsəna laŋa mɛɛ .

text: Wherefore when we could no longer forbear , we thought it good to be left at Athens alone ;
text2: Tə tʋ mə tɛ pote pəlɛ kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam na pə ́ kɔɔ pə ́ nɩɩ - tʋ ɩlɛna tə ́ hiki hʋwɛɛ sɩ taa caɣa Atɛɛnɩ kɛ tá tike ,

text: And sent Timotheus , our brother , and minister of God , and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ , to establish you , and to comfort you concerning your faith :
text2: na pə ́ kaasɩ na tə ́ tili tá taapalʋ Timotee wei tá na - ɩ tə lakɩ Ɩsɔ təmlɛ kɛ Kilisiti Laapaalɩ kʋpaŋ heeluɣu taa tɔ . Tə kʋsa - ɩ na tə ́ tili - ɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔɔsɩ - mɛɣɛ toma na apalʋtʋ kɛ mə Ɩsɔ mpaaʋ taa ,

text: That no man should be moved by these afflictions : for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto .
text2: na pə ́ taa kɔɔ na kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛ nte tə taa tə wɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ tə ́ kɔɔ tə ́ kəlɩ mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ na ɩ ́ lɔ tɔɔŋ . Mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ nyəmá mpʋ , sɩ kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛnaa mpɛ pa kɛ ́ mpi mpi Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ pɩɩ maɣana - tʋ tɔ pə taa lɛmpənaa kɛ ́ .

text: For verily , when we were with you , we told you before that we should suffer tribulation ; even as it came to pass , and ye know .
text2: Haləna pə maɣamaɣa kɛ tə heela - mɛɣɛ waatʋ wei tá na - mɛ tə wɛɛ tɔ , sɩ paa tʋ - tʋɣʋ kʋnyɔŋ . Mpʋ ɩnɩ pə maɣamaɣa kɛ ɩ ́ naa pə kɔma ɩsəntɔ .

text: For this cause , when I could no longer forbear , I sent to know your faith , lest by some means the tempter have tempted you , and our labour be in vain .
