text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə tʋɣʋ mə tɛ pote pəlɛ kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam na pə ́ nɩɩ - tʋ tɔ , ma kʋsa Timotee sɩ ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ na ɩsəna mə Ɩsɔ mpaa təŋʋɣʋ yaasi wɛɛ tɔ . Ma nyaŋ sɩ pə ́ taa kɔɔ sɩ Ɩlɔɣɔʋ maɣasa - mɛ na tá təmlɛ saalɩ yem kɛ ́ mə kiŋ .

text: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us , and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity , and that ye have good remembrance of us always , desiring greatly to see us , as we also to see you :
text2: Ama Timotee kɔmna mə tɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ ɩ kɛɛsa - tʋɣʋ ɩsəna ɩ ́ səŋa Ɩsɔ mpaaʋ taa kɛ ́ teu na ɩ ́ tɔka təma sɔɔlʋɣʋ tɔm tɔ . Na ɩ heela - tʋ sɩ ɩ ́ tɔɔsəɣɩ tá tɔm kɛ tam na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ . Haləna ɩ ́ nyɩɩləɣɩ sɩ ɩ ́ na - tʋɣʋ teitei ɩsɩɩ tá nyɩɩləɣɩ sɩ tə ́ na - mɛ tɔ .

text: Therefore , brethren , we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith :
text2: Tá taapalaa mɛ , waatʋ wei tə nɩɩ mə tɔm tɔ pə hɛɛsa tá laŋa kɛ teu kɛ sɔsɔm kɛ ́ tá wahalanaa na ta kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛnaa panɛ pa təna pa taa kɛ ́ . Ɩsɔ mpaaʋ ŋku ɩ ́ tɔka teu tɔ ŋkʋ kʋ hɛɛsəna tá laŋa kɛ mpʋ .

text: For now we live , if ye stand fast in the Lord .
text2: Na ɩ ́ səŋʋɣʋ təca kɛ Tacaa tɔm taa tɔ tə feesaa kɛ ́ təfʋʋ .

text: For what thanks can we render to God again for you , for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God ;
text2: Sɛɛtʋ ntiɣi tɩɩ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ na pə ́ tala ɩsɩɩ laŋhʋlʋmlɛ nte tə hika mə ́ kiŋ kɛ ɩ ɩsɛntaa tɔ ?

text: Night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face , and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith ?
text2: Ta ɩsəlɛ sɛɛna Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ kɛ tam sɩ ɩ ́ yele na tá na - mɛ tə ́ ná təma na tá ɩsəpee na tə ́ tɛɛsɩ - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ mpaaʋ tɔm kɛ hʋ ́ lʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ .

text: Now God himself and our Father , and our Lord Jesus Christ , direct our way unto you .
text2: Tacaa Ɩsɔ maɣamaɣa na tá Sɔsɔ Yesu pá la na tə ́ hiki mpaaʋ na tə ́ polo na tə ́ na - mɛ .

text: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another , and toward all men , even as we do toward you :
text2: Tá Sɔsɔ ɩ ́ la na mə sɔɔlʋɣʋ sɔɔsəɣɩ tam kɛ ́ təma kiŋ na yəlaa təna kiŋ , haləna kʋ tala ɩsɩɩ tá maɣamaɣa tə sɔɔlʋɣʋ - mɛ tɔ .

text: To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God , even our Father , at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints .
text2: Ye tá Sɔsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ lapa mpʋ , mɛ ɩ ́ ká hiki toma kɛ hatuu mə hʋwɛɛ taa na ɩ ́ pəsɩ Ɩsɔ nyə ́ ma , na ɩ ́ te təkpataa kɛ ́ Tacaa Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ kʋyaŋku tá Sɔsɔ Yesu na ɩ nyə ́ ma paa kɔɔ tɔ .

text: Furthermore then we beseech you , brethren , and exhort you by the Lord Jesus , that as ye have received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God , so ye would abound more and more .
text2: Pə tənaɣa mpʋ ɩlɛ tá taapalaa mɛ ɩ ́ ná tá kiŋ kɛ ɩsəna pə wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ́ ká tɔ na pə ́ maɣa Ɩsɔ tɔ , halɩ ɩ ́ tɔŋna ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ lapʋ mɛɛ . Ama nti nɔɔnɔɔ ma wiikina - mɛ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ , haɩ , Tacaa Yesu tɔɔ ɩ ́ sɔɔsɩ lʋpʋ kɛ pə taa .

text: For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus .
text2: Anɩ ɩ ́ nyəmá Tacaa Yesu kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ nti tə sɛɣɛsa - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ təŋ tɔ .

text: For this is the will of God , even your sanctification , that ye should abstain from fornication :
text2: Mpi Ɩsɔ caakɩ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ ɩ ́ pəsɩ ɩ nyə ́ ma na ɩ ́ yele asilima kʋlapʋtʋ təkpataa .

text: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour ;
text2: Paa mə taa wei ɩ ́ nyɩ ɩsəna ɩ ká kpaɣa alʋ na pə ́ wɛ tənaŋŋ na pə ́ wɛna nyʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: Not in the lust of concupiscence , even as the Gentiles which know not God :
text2: Pə ́ taa wɛɛ kɔtɔɩnaa tike tɔm ɩsɩɩ yəlaa mpa pa ta nyɩ Ɩsɔ tɔ pɛlɛ pa lakʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: That no man go beyond and defraud his brother in any matter : because that the Lord is the avenger of all such , as we also have forewarned you and testified .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa pəntəna ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ kɛ tɔm tənɛ tə taa na ɩ ́ taa wakəlɩ - ɩ pʋlʋ . Tə tɛma - mɛɣɛ tɔm tənɛɣɛ heeluɣu na tə kpaala - mɛɣɛ teu sɩ Tacaa ká tʋ saləka kɛ mpa pa lakɩ ɩsaɣatʋ ntənaa tɔ .

text: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness , but unto holiness .
text2: Ɩsɔ tá yaa - tʋɣʋ ɩ mpaaʋ taa sɩ tə ́ lakɩ asilima kʋlapʋtʋ , ama sɩ tə ́ la tá tɩ tənaŋŋ kɛ ́ .

text: He therefore that despiseth , despiseth not man , but God , who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ye wei ɩ kpaɣa tɔm tənɛ na ɩ ́ lɔɣɔna lumaɣa waalɩ , pə taɣa yʋlʋ kʋheelitu kɛ pʋntʋ lɔwa . Ama Ɩsɔ wei ɩ ha - tʋɣʋ ɩ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ tɔ ɩ nyəntʋ kɛ ɩ lɔwa .

text: But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you : for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another .
text2: Ye mə taa mə tike təma sɔɔlʋɣʋ tɔm ɩlɛ , paa ŋmaa - mɛ na pá sɔɔsɩ - mɛɣɛ nti tɔtɔ ? Ɩsɔ maɣamaɣa tɔŋna - mɛɣɛ pə tənaɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ ɩlɛ .

text: And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia : but we beseech you , brethren , that ye increase more and more ;
text2: Halɩ ntɩ ɩnɩ tə maɣamaɣa kɛ ɩ ́ tɔŋna mə taapalaa mpa pa təna pa wɛ Masetoni təna taa tɔɣɔ lapʋ . Ama tá taapalaa mɛ , tə tasəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ wiinaʋ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔɔsɩ lʋpʋ kɛ pə taa .

text: And that ye study to be quiet , and to do your own business , and to work with your own hands , as we commanded you ;
text2: Paa mə taa wei ɩ ́ lʋ sɩ ɩ ́ na ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ pá wɛɛna təma na leleŋ , na paa wei ɩ ́ paasəna ɩ nyəntɛ na ɩ ́ hiki ɩ maɣamaɣa kɛ mpi ɩ ká suu ɩ nɔɣɔ tɔ . Ntɩ ɩnəɣɩ tɩɩ tɛma - mɛɣɛ heeluɣu .

text: That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without , and that ye may have lack of nothing .
text2: Mpʋ ɩnɩ pɩɩ yelina na ma ta nyɩ ɩsɔnaa tʋna - mɛ , na ɩ ́ kaa caɣa na ɩ ́ tɛɛlɩ nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ pʋlʋ taa .

text: But I would not have you to be ignorant , brethren , concerning them which are asleep , that ye sorrow not , even as others which have no hope .
text2: Ta taapalaa tə caa sɩ ɩ ́ cɛkəna mpa pa səpa tɔ pa tɔm na ɩ ́ taa wɛɛ piti taa ɩsɩɩ mpa pa fɛɩna tɛɛlʋɣʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ kiŋ tɔ .

text: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again , even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ tə tɛma tá taa sɩ Yesu səpa na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ fem tɔ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ tə tɛma tá taa tɔtɔ sɩ Ɩsɔ ká kpɛnna Yesu na mpa pa səpa Yesu mpaaʋ taa tɔ na ɩ ́ məŋna .

text: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord , that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep .
text2: Tacaa kʋheelitu maɣamaɣa kɛ tə caa - mɛɣɛ sɔɔsʋɣʋ kɛ cənɛ , sɩ tá mpa tɩɩ wɛɛna tá ɩsɛ kɛ Tacaa kʋyakʋ kʋkɔmʋɣʋ wule tɔ tə kaa tɛɛ nɔɣɔ kɛ mpa pa tɛma səpʋ tɔ .

text: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trump of God : and the dead in Christ shall rise first :
text2: Pə kɔŋ pə ́ kɛɛsɩ na pə ́ holi na pá nɩɩ ɩsɔtaa tillu sɔsɔ taŋ na Ɩsɔ akantəlɛ , ɩlɛna Tacaa maɣamaɣa lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa na ɩ ́ tiiki . Mpa pa səpa Kilisiti mpaaʋ taa tɔ pɛlɛ paa fe kancaalaɣa .

text: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds , to meet the Lord in the air : and so shall we ever be with the Lord .
text2: Pə waalɩ kɛ ́ pɩɩ kɛlɩ ɩsɛ nyə ́ ma tá , na tá na - wɛ tə ́ kpɛntɩ na tə ́ sʋʋ ŋmʋntʋ tɛɛ na tə ́ suli Tacaa kɛ ɩsɔtaa . Na tá na - ɩ tɩɩ caɣa tam .

text: Wherefore comfort one another with these words .
text2: Ɩ ́ hɛɛsəɣɩ təma laŋa na tɔm tənɛ .

text: But of the times and the seasons , brethren , ye have no need that I write unto you .
text2: Tá taapalaa , pə fɛɩ ɩsɩɩ paa nɔkɩ - mɛɣɛ takəlaɣa ŋmaaʋ na pá kɛɛsɩ - mɛɣɛ waatʋ yaa wɛɛ nna a taa mpʋ ɩnɩ pɩɩ la tɔ pə tɔm .

text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ tɛma nyəm kɛ teu tɔ , Tacaa kʋyakʋ ká la kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ŋmɩɩlʋ kɛɛsʋɣʋʋ na ɩ ́ kɔɔ ahoo tɔ .

text: For when they shall say , Peace and safety ; then sudden destruction cometh upon them , as travail upon a woman with child ; and they shall not escape .
text2: Waatʋ wei yəlaa ká kɔɔ na pá tɔŋ sɩ : Nhnn , pənɛntɛɣɛlɛ antulinya caɣa ɩ tete , na pənɛntɛɣɛlɛ tə hɛɛsaa tɔ . Waatʋ ɩnəɣɩ pɩɩ tii pa tɔɔ təkpili kɛ tɔm kʋlʋm tɔɔ , na pə ́ la - wɛɣɛ sakasaka pa kaa fiti . Pɩɩ la kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ lʋlʋɣʋ wʋsasɩ takʋɣʋ ahonto tɔ .

text: But ye , brethren , are not in darkness , that that day should overtake you as a thief .
text2: Ama tá taapalaa , kaɣana ɩ ́ tá kɛ ́ səkpɛtʋɣʋ tɛɛ nyə ́ ma , na pə fɛɩ sɩ kʋyakʋ kʋnɛ kʋ tuti - mɛɣɛ kʋtutu ɩsɩɩ ŋmɩɩlʋ tutuɣuu tɔ .

text: Ye are all the children of light , and the children of the day : we are not of the night , nor of darkness .
text2: Nɔɔnɔɔ taa ɩsəntɔ pə nyaala mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ pəsa ilim taa nyə ́ ma kɛ ́ . Tə ta kɛ mpa pa wɛ ahoo taa na səkpɛtʋɣʋ tɛɛ tɔ .

text: Therefore let us not sleep , as do others ; but let us watch and be sober .
text2: Mpʋ tɔ tə ́ taa paasəna tom ɩsɩɩ lɛlaa lakʋɣʋ tɔ . Ama tə ́ caɣana tá ɩsɛ na tə ́ feŋ na tə ́ lakɩ pə təna na laakalɩ .

text: For they that sleep sleep in the night ; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night .
text2: Ahoo kɛ toolaa tooki , na ahoo kɛ sʋlʋm kʋɣɩ pə nyɔɔlaa .

text: But let us , who are of the day , be sober , putting on the breastplate of faith and love ; and for an helmet , the hope of salvation .
text2: Ama tá mpa pə nyaala tá tɔɔ na tə ́ pəsɩ ilim taa nyə ́ ma tɔ tɩɩ lakɩ pə təna na laakalɩ kɛ ́ . Tə ́ yele na tá Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ na tá təma sɔɔlʋɣʋ pəsɩ - tʋ ɩsɩɩ nyəɣəlʋɣʋ toko . Tə ́ caɣana naani sɩ pɩɩ ya - tʋ , na pəlɛ pɩɩ wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ tə paŋʋɣʋ yoou kahuka tɔ .

text: For God hath not appointed us to wrath , but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Tə ta kɛ mpa Ɩsɔ sɩɩwa sɩ cele pɩɩ fɛlɩ nyaŋ tɔ se . Ama sɩ pə ́ ya tá nyɔɔŋ kɛ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: Who died for us , that , whether we wake or sleep , we should live together with him .
text2: Kilisiti ɩnɩ ɩ səpa tá tɔɔ kɛ ́ sɩ ye pə tala ɩ kɔntɛ wule na ɩ ́ maɣana tá na tá ɩsɛ , yaa paa tə tɛma səpʋ , tá na - ɩ tə ́ kpɛntɩ na tə kaa təcaɣalɛ kɛ tam tɔɔ .

text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together , and edify one another , even as also ye do .
text2: Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ sɔɔsəɣɩ təmaɣa apalʋtʋ , na ɩ ́ tuliɣi təmaɣa teitei ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ tɔŋna lapʋ tɔ .

text: And we beseech you , brethren , to know them which labour among you , and are over you in the Lord , and admonish you ;
text2: Tá taapalaa , tə heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ tʋna mpa pa lakɩ təmlɛ kɛ mə hɛkʋ tɔ , mpa Tacaa kpawa sɩ pá tiikiɣi - mɛ na pá sɛɣɛsɩ - mɛ tɔ .

text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work ' s sake . And be at peace among yourselves .
text2: Mə luuŋ ɩ ́ la - wɛ , na ɩ ́ sɔɔlɩ - wɛɣɛ teu kɛ təmlɛ nte pa tɔŋna lapʋ tɔ tə tɔɔ . Ɩ ́ wɛɛna təma na leleŋ .

text: Now we exhort you , brethren , warn them that are unruly , comfort the feebleminded , support the weak , be patient toward all men .
text2: Tá taapalaa , haɩ , ɩ ́ kaləna mpa paa caa pʋlʋ lapʋ tɔ . Ɩ ́ la na mpa pa kəla fɛɛlɛ tɔ pa fɛɛlɛ ya , ɩ ́ teŋ acamaa , ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ yəlaa tənaɣa suulu .

text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man ; but ever follow that which is good , both among yourselves , and to all men .
text2: Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa lɛɛtɩ lɛlʋ kɛ ɩsaɣatʋ . Ama ɩ ́ lʋ sɩ ɩ ́ lakɩ təmaɣa kʋpantʋ kɛ tam , paa mə maɣamaɣa mə təma , paa kpaɩ nyə ́ ma .

text: Rejoice evermore .
text2: Mə laŋa ɩ ́ hʋlʋmɩ tam .

text: Pray without ceasing .
text2: Ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tam , ɩ ́ taa yele .

text: In every thing give thanks : for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ sɩ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ paa mpi pə taa . Ɩsəna Ɩsɔ caa sɩ ye ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ Yesu Kilisiti ɩ ́ lakɩ tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: Quench not the Spirit .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa kaɣatɩ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ , ɩ ́ yele - ɩ na ɩ ́ la ɩ təmlɛ .

text: Despise not prophesyings .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa nyənɩ Ɩsɔ kʋheelitu kpaalʋɣʋ kɛ yem .

text: Prove all things ; hold fast that which is good .
text2: Ɩ ́ wɛsɩ paa mpi pə taa kɛ ́ teu na ɩ ́ ná nti nti tə wɛ teu tɔ na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ təlɛ .

text: Abstain from all appearance of evil .
text2: Na ɩ ́ lɔ nti tə fɛɩ teu tɔ paa tə kɛ ́ nti .

text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly ; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Ɩsɔ wei ɩ lakɩ na tə ́ nɩɩkɩ leleŋ tɔ ɩ ́ yele na ɩ ́ pəsɩ ɩ nyə ́ ma təkpataa . Ɩsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ paasəna mə ləmaɣasɛɛ na mə tɔnəŋ , na mə wɛɛtʋ ntɩ tə təna tə ́ wɛɛ tənaŋŋ kɛ ́ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti kɔntɛ wule .

text: Faithful is he that calleth you , who also will do it .
text2: Wei ɩ yaa - mɛ tɔ ɩ kɛ ́ kʋpaŋ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ kaa yele - mɛɣɛ taɣanʋɣʋ kɛ mpʋ .

text: Brethren , pray for us .
text2: Tá taapalaa ɩ ́ sələməna - tʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ tɔtɔ .

text: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ tá taapalaa tənaɣa teu na ɩ ́ lɛlɩ .

text: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren .
text2: Haɩ , ma wiikina - mɛɣɛ , Tacaa tɔɔ sɩ ɩ ́ kala takəlaɣa kanɛ na yəlaa təna nɩɩ .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti ɩ ́ la - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Taɣa Pɔɔlɩ na Silaasɩ na Timotee . Tá ŋmaakəna takəlaɣa kanɛɣɛ Tɛsalonikɩ Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle nyə ́ ma mɛ mpa ɩ ́ kɛ ́ Tacaa Ɩsɔ na tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti pa nyə ́ ma tɔ .

text: Grace unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Tacaa Ɩsɔ na tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti pá hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ na pá ha - mɛɣɛ alaafəya .

text: We are bound to thank God always for you , brethren , as it is meet , because that your faith groweth exceedingly , and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth ;
text2: Tá taapalaa , pə wɛɛ sɩ tam tə sɛɛkɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ mə tɔɔ , na pə tɩɩ mʋna mpʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ ́ tɔŋna toŋ nyɔɔʋ kɛ mə Ɩsɔ mpaaʋ təŋʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ tam kɛ ́ , na mə təma sɔɔlʋɣʋ ná tɔŋna sɔɔsʋɣʋ kɛ teu tɔtɔ .

text: So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure :
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə yɔɔləɣəna - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa lɛlaa taa kɛ ́ ɩsəna mpi ɩ ́ pəsaa na ɩ ́ kantəlɩ na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ Ɩsɔ mpaaʋ kɛ kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛ na wahalanaa mpa pa tʋɣɩ - mɛ tɔ pa taa tɔ .

text: Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God , that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God , for which ye also suffer :
text2: Na pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ ɩsəna Ɩsɔ təŋəɣɩ siɣisuɣu kɛ ɩ hʋʋlɛ taa tɔɣɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mpʋ ɩnɩ pɩɩ yele na ɩ ́ mʋna Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa ŋka ka tɔɔ ɩ ́ naa wahalanaa mpɛ tɔ ka hikuɣu .

text: Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you ;
text2: Ɩsɔ ká təŋ tampana na ɩ ́ lɛɛtɩ mpa pa tʋɣɩ - mɛɣɛ wahala tɔɣɔ wahala .

text: And to you who are troubled rest with us , when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels ,
text2: Na ɩ ́ ha tá na mpa mɛ ɩ ́ tɔkɩ kʋnyɔŋ tɔɣɔ hɛɛsʋɣʋ . Ɩ ká la ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ wʋlɛ nte Tacaa Yesu ká lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa na ɩsɔtaa tillaa toŋ nyə ́ ma

text: In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God , and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: na kɔkɔ ŋka ka mʋɣɩ kemkem tɔ , sɩ ɩ tʋɣɩ saləka kɛ mpa pa ta nyɩ Ɩsɔ na mpa pa kisa Tacaa Yesu Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ mʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord , and from the glory of his power ;
text2: Saləka wei ɩ ká tʋ - wɛ tɔɣɔlɛ wakəlʋɣʋ mpi ɩ ka wakəlɩ - wɛ tənaŋnaŋ kɛ tam tɔɔ , na paa hatələna Tacaa na ɩ toma nna a tewa sɔsɔm tɔ .

text: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints , and to be admired in all them that believe ( because our testimony among you was believed ) in that day .
text2: Pɩɩ la ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ wʋlɛ nte ɩnɩ ɩ ka kɔɔ sɩ ɩ nyə ́ ma ɩ ́ tʋ - ɩ teeli na mpa pɛlɛ paa mʋ ɩ tɔm tɔ pá samɩ - ɩ tɔ . Na mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ ká wɛɛ pə taa . Mpi tɔ , ɩ ́ mʋ tɔm nti tə heela - mɛ tɔ se .

text: Wherefore also we pray always for you , that our God would count you worthy of this calling , and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness , and the work of faith with power :
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə sələməɣəna - mɛɣɛ tam sɩ tá Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ la na ɩ ́ mʋna weesuɣu ŋku kʋ tɔɔ ɩ yaa - mɛ tɔ kʋ hikuɣu . Tə kooliɣi kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ ɩ toma na ɩ ́ la na kʋpantʋ nti ɩɩ hʋʋkɩ mə taanaa tɔ ɩ ́ pəsɩ na ɩ ́ la - tɩ , na mə Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ təma te teu .

text: That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you , and ye in him , according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Waatʋ ɩnəɣɩ ɩ ́ ká la na Tacaa Yesu hətɛ hiki teeli , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ la na mɩɩ hiki teeli tɔtɔɣɔ tá Ɩsɔ na Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti pa pɛɛlɛɛ tɔɔ .

text: Now we beseech you , brethren , by the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , and by our gathering together unto him ,
text2: Tá taapalaa , ye Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti kɔntɛ na tá kotuɣu kɛ ɩ kiŋ tɔm ɩlɛ ,

text: That ye be not soon shaken in mind , or be troubled , neither by spirit , nor by word , nor by letter as from us , as that the day of Christ is at hand .
text2: ɩ ́ taa yele na pə ́ liɣiti - mɛɣɛ mpʋ təhɛɛ na pə ́ cɛ mə laŋa sɩ Tacaa kʋyakʋ tɛma tatɛ . Ntanyɩ cele nyəntʋ nalʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ yɔɣɔtəna mpʋ , yaa nɔɣɔlʋ lapəna waasʋ kɛ kʋlapʋ kɛ mpʋ , yaa ntanyɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ná loolina sɩ tá takəlaɣa nakəlɩ ka taa kɛ ́ pa ŋmaa mpʋ .

text: Let no man deceive you by any means : for that day shall not come , except there come a falling away first , and that man of sin be revealed , the son of perdition ;
text2: Na paa pa tɩɩ heela - mɛ sɩ nti te , ɩ ́ taa nɩɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , yəlaa ká kʋlɩ na pá tɛɛsɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ kisuɣu təsaɣasaɣa . Na Ɩsaɣatʋ Yʋlʋ wei ɩnɩ paa wakəlɩ tənaŋnaŋ tɔ ɩ ká lɩɩ na pə ́ cɔ ́ wʋlɛ ńtɛ ́ tə ́ kɔɔ .

text: Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God , or that is worshipped ; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God , shewing himself that he is God .
text2: Pə təna mpi yəlaa sɛɛkɩ na pá nyənəɣɩ sɩ Ɩsɔ nyəm tɔ ɩ ká kisi - wɩ təkpatakpata . Ɩ ká kʋlɩ pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə tɔɔ , halɩ ɩ ká sʋʋ na ɩ ́ caɣa Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa maɣamaɣa na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ ɩnəɣəlɛ Ɩsɔ .

text: Remember ye not , that , when I was yet with you , I told you these things ?
text2: Ɩ ́ tá tɔɔsɩ sɩ maa tɛma - mɛɣɛ pə tɔm kɛ heeluɣu kɛ waatʋ wei maa wɛ mə kiŋ tɔ ?

text: And now ye know what withholdeth that he might be revealed in his time .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyəmá mpi pə tɔɔ mpʋ ɩnɩ pɩɩ hikiɣi mpaa sɩ pə ́ la nɔɔnɔɔ tɔ . Pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ pɩɩ tala pə waatʋ kɛ ́ na pə ́ cɔ ́ Ɩsaɣatʋ Yʋlʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ lɩɩ .

text: For the mystery of iniquity doth already work : only he who now letteth will let , until he be taken out of the way .
text2: Ɩsaɣatʋ ntɩ tə toma tɔŋna kookalɩ kɛ ́ lapʋ kɛ mukaɣa tɛɛ . Ama wei ɩnɩ ɩ səŋsəɣɩ - tɩ tɔ , ɩ ́ kɔma na ɩ ́ tɛɛ kɛ tɩɩ la .

text: And then shall that Wicked be revealed , whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth , and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming :
text2: Saa ɩnəɣɩ Ɩsaɣatʋ Yʋlʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ka lɩɩ . Tacaa Yesu ká woso - i heelim kɛ kʋwosu kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ sɩ , na Yesu ɩnɩ ɩ kɔntɛ teeli ká lana na ɩ ́ saalɩ yem təkpataa .

text: Even him , whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders ,
text2: Satanɩ toŋ kɛ Ɩsaɣatʋ Yʋlʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ká kɔna na ɩ ́ lá piti təma na kɔkɔlɔ nyəmnaa na sɔɣɔntʋ təmanaa , kʋpuɣusumnaa mpɩ pə təna .

text: And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish ; because they received not the love of the truth , that they might be saved .
text2: Ɩ ká la ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ mpaa mpaa na ɩ ́ puɣusina mpa pa kɛ ́ kʋlepaa tɔ . Mpɛ ɩnɩ paa le . Mpi tɔ , pa kisaa , pa ta sɔɔlɩ tampana nna a ká waasɩ - wɛ tɔɣɔ təŋʋɣʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion , that they should believe a lie :
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ lakɩ sɩ tolusuɣu təma sɔsɔɔna naalɩ á tɛɛna - wɛɣɛ kpakpaa na pá təŋəɣɩ pɔpɔtʋ .

text: That they all might be damned who believed not the truth , but had pleasure in unrighteousness .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pɩɩ la na pá tʋ pa təna mpa ɩsaɣatʋ lapa leleŋ na pá kisi tampana təŋʋɣʋ tɔɣɔ saləka .

text: But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you , brethren beloved of the Lord , because God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth :
text2: Pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ tə ́ sɛɛkɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ tá taapalaa mɛ mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tam , mɛ mpa Tacaa sɔɔlaa tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ ləsa - mɛɣɛ sɩ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ wei ɩ yeki na ɩ ́ pəsəɣɩ Ɩsɔ yəlaa tɔ ɩ tɔɔ na mə tampana mʋɣʋ tɔɔ pə ́ caaləna - mɛ mə nyɔɔŋ kɛ yapʋ .

text: Whereunto he called you by our gospel , to the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ wei tə heela - mɛ tɔ ɩ nɩɩʋ taa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ yaa - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ hiki mə paa tete kɛ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti teeli taa .

text: Therefore , brethren , stand fast , and hold the traditions which ye have been taught , whether by word , or our epistle .
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩlɛ tá taapalaa , ɩ ́ səŋ təca na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ sɛɣɛsəŋ wei tə sɛɣɛsa - mɛ tɔ , paa wei tə yɔɣɔtəna tá nɔɔsɩ tɔ , paa takəlasɩ taa nyəŋ .

text: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself , and God , even our Father , which hath loved us , and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace ,
text2: Tɔʋ , tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti maɣamaɣa , na Tacaa Ɩsɔ wei ɩ sɔɔla - tʋ na ɩ ́ hʋləɣɩ - tʋɣʋ pɛɛlɛɛ na ɩ ́ hɛɛsɩ tá laŋa kɛ tam tɔɔ na ɩ ́ tʋ - tʋɣʋ tɛɛlʋɣʋ kʋpaŋkʋ tɔ ,

text: Comfort your hearts , and stablish you in every good word and work .
text2: pa naalɛɣɛ mpʋ pá sɔɔsɩ - mɛɣɛ toŋ na pá səna - mɛ na ɩ ́ pəsɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ kʋpantʋ tike .

text: Finally , brethren , pray for us , that the word of the Lord may have free course , and be glorified , even as it is with you :
text2: Tá taapalaa , nti tə kaasaa tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ , ɩ ́ sələməna - tʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ na Tacaa Tɔm ya lɔŋ na tə ́ hiki teeli ɩsɩɩ pə lapʋ mə kiŋ tɔ .

text: And that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men : for all men have not faith .
text2: Ɩ ́ sələməna - tʋ tɔtɔ na pə ́ ləsɩ - tʋɣʋ yəlaa asaɣaa mpa pa ta kɛɛsɩ tɔ pa niŋ taa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , yəlaa wɛɛ mpa paa caa pá mʋ Ɩsɔ mpaaʋ tɔm tɔ .

text: But the Lord is faithful , who shall stablish you , and keep you from evil .
text2: Paa na mpʋ tɔ Tacaa kɛ ́ yʋlʋpaŋ . Ɩ ká yele na ɩ ́ nyɔɔ toŋ na ɩ ́ kenti mə tɔɔ na Ɩsaɣaʋ kaa hiki - mɛ .

text: And we have confidence in the Lord touching you , that ye both do and will do the things which we command you .
text2: Tacaa lapa na tə ́ wɛna naani kɛ ́ mə tɔɔ təkpataa sɩ ɩ ́ ká təŋəɣɩ tam ɩ kaa yele tɔmnaa mpa tə sɛɣɛsa - mɛ tɔ .

text: And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God , and into the patient waiting for Christ .
text2: Tacaa ɩ ́ kpaɣa mə ləsasɩ na ɩ ́ tʋ ́ Ɩsɔ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ sɔɔlɩ - ɩ , na ɩ ́ yele na Kilisiti tʋ - mɛɣɛ suulu kɛ teu tɔtɔ .

text: Now we command you , brethren , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly , and not after the tradition which he received of us .
text2: Tá taapalaa , Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ tə heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ hatələna mə taa mpa paa caa pʋlʋ lapʋ na paa təŋəɣɩ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ ŋku tá tɛləsa - mɛ tɔ .

text: For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us : for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you ;
text2: Mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ nyəmá ɩsəna ɩ ́ ká la na ɩ ́ təŋ tá ɩkpatɛ tɔ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ , waatʋ wei tɩɩ wɛ mə hɛkʋ tɔ tə ta kɛ yəlaa mpa paa caa pʋlʋ lapʋ tɔ .

text: Neither did we eat any man ' s bread for nought ; but wrought with labour and travail night and day , that we might not be chargeable to any of you :
text2: Tə ta caɣa sɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ calɩ - tʋɣʋ faalaa . Ama tə lapa təma kɛ ́ na tə ́ konti haŋaɣa . Tə lapa təma na ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ kɛ teu sɩ tə ́ taa sʋkɩ mə taa nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ səɣəla .

text: Not because we have not power , but to make ourselves an ensample unto you to follow us .
text2: Tɩɩ wɛna mpaaʋ sɩ tə ́ tɔɣɔ mə kʋtɔɣɔʋ kɛ faalaa . Ama tə kisa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ nana - tʋ na ɩ ́ təŋ tá ɩkpatɛ .

text: For even when we were with you , this we commanded you , that if any would not work , neither should he eat .
text2: Haləna waatʋ wei tɩɩ wɛ mə hɛkʋ tɔ tə heela - mɛ təkelekele sɩ : Ye wei ɩɩ caa pʋlʋpʋ lapʋ pʋntʋ ɩ ́ taa tɔɣɔ .

text: For we hear that there are some which walk among you disorderly , working not at all , but are busybodies .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tə nɩɩwa sɩ lɛlaa wɛ mə hɛkʋ taa mpa paa caa pʋlʋ lapʋ tɔ , ye pə taɣa tɔm faʋ tike .

text: Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ , that with quietness they work , and eat their own bread .
text2: Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ tə heeliɣi yəlaa ɩsɩɩ mpʋ sɩ paa wei ɩ ɩsəlɛ ɩ ́ sɛɛna təmlɛ lapʋ , na ɩ ́ hiki ɩ maɣamaɣa kɛ mpi ɩ ka suu ɩ nɔɣɔ tɔ .

text: But ye , brethren , be not weary in well doing .
text2: Tá taapalaa , ye mɛ ɩlɛ kʋpantʋ lapʋ ɩ ́ taa la - mɛɣɛ felentu .

text: And if any man obey not our word by this epistle , note that man , and have no company with him , that he may be ashamed .
text2: Ye nɔɣɔlʋ wɛɛ na ɩɩ saŋ nti tə ŋmaa takəlaɣa kanɛ ka taa cənɛ tɔɣɔ təŋʋɣʋ , ɩ ́ nyɩ pʋntʋ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ faɣana - ɩ təkpataa , na fɛɛlɛ kpa - ɩ .

text: Yet count him not as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother .
text2: Ɩlɛ ɩ ́ taa nyənɩ - ɩ ɩsɩɩ kolontu . Ama ɩ ́ lana - ɩ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ ɩ ́ caa ɩ taɣanɩ ɩ taapalʋ ɩ lakɩ tɔ .

text: Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means . The Lord be with you all .
text2: Tacaa wei ɩ kɛ ́ alaafəya halʋ tɔ ɩ ́ ha - mɛɣɛ alaafəya kɛ tam kɛ ́ pə təna pə taa . Tacaa ɩ ́ wɛɛ mə təna mə waalɩ .

text: The salutation of Paul with mine own hand , which is the token in every epistle : so I write .
text2: Pɔɔlɩ má , ma sɛɛ - mɛ na ma maɣamaɣa ma niŋ ŋmaatʋ kɛ cənɛ . Ɩsəna ma tʋɣɩ ma hətɛ kɛ ma takəlasɩ təna taa tɔɣɔlɛ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ma ŋmaakɩ .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ mə tənaɣa pɛɛlɛɛ .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour , and Lord Jesus Christ , which is our hope ;
text2: Maɣa Pɔɔlɩ , Yesu Kilisiti tillu . Tá Yatʋ Ɩsɔ na Yesu Kilisiti wei tə tɛɛləɣɩ tɔ mpɛ pa kpana - m sɩ má la tillu .

text: Unto Timothy , my own son in the faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Má ŋmaakəna takəlaɣa kanɛɣɛ Timotee . Nyá kɛna ma pəyaɣa təsiɣisiɣi kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ taa . Tacaa Ɩsɔ na tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti pá hʋlɩ - ŋ pɛɛlɛɛ na suulu na pá ha - ŋ alaafəya .

text: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus , when I went into Macedonia , that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine ,
text2: Ma tɛɛkaɣa Masetoni na má heeli - ŋ sɩ ń saalɩ Ɩfeesu tɔ , saalɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ təna , na ń heeli pa taa mpa ɩnɩ tɔ sɩ pá taa sɛɣɛsɩ pa pɔpɔtʋ sɛɣɛsəŋ .

text: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies , which minister questions , rather than godly edifying which is in faith : so do .
text2: Heeli - wɛ sɩ pá yele lɔŋ taa tɔmnaa mpa pa tɔkaa tɔ , na hatuu lɔŋ taa lʋlʋɣʋ loosi nsi pa tamsəɣɩ tɔ . Təlɛ tə kɔŋna ntɔŋkpɛɛsaɣa kɛ yem kɛ ́ , tɩɩ kʋsəɣɩ yapʋ tɔm nti Ɩsɔ sɩɩwa na ɩ ́ lakɩ tɔ . Yʋlʋ tɛŋ ɩ taa na Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ nyɩ pəlɛ pə tɔm .

text: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart , and of a good conscience , and of faith unfeigned :
text2: Ma tʋ - wɛɣɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pá wɛɛna lotu kʋlʋmtʋ , na pá təŋəɣɩ siɣisuɣu , na pá tɛ ́ Ɩsɔ na pa taa kɛ ́ teu , na pá lá na pá wɛɛna sɔɔlʋɣʋ .

text: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling ;
text2: Lɛlaa yela yaasi kʋpaŋ ɩnɛɣɛ tɔkʋɣʋ , na pá tooli na pá sʋʋ kʋmɛləntɔŋkpɛɛsaɣa taa kɛ ́ yem .

text: Desiring to be teachers of the law ; understanding neither what they say , nor whereof they affirm .
text2: Pa lʋkɩ yem sɩ mpɛɣɛlɛ Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ sɛɣɛsəlaa , pəyele paa cɛkəɣəna pa maɣamaɣa pa kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ . Pa ta cɛkəna mpi mpi pə tɔm pa tɩɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ na apalʋtʋ tɔ .

text: But we know that the law is good , if a man use it lawfully ;
text2: Tə nyəmá sɩ ye n təŋa Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kɛ teitei ɩsɩɩ tə wɛʋ tɔ , tə wɛ teu kɛ ́ .

text: Knowing this , that the law is not made for a righteous man , but for the lawless and disobedient , for the ungodly and for sinners , for unholy and profane , for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers , for manslayers ,
text2: Na pɩɩ tɔɔsɩ - ŋ sɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ fɛɩ nti pə paasaa na pə ́ sɩɩ kʋpantʋ lataa tɔɔ tɔ . Ama ɩsaɣalataa , na kaanɩɩtʋnaa , na nyaŋ nyə ́ ma , na kawalaɣa nyə ́ ma , na mpa paa seeki Ɩsɔ na paa seeki ɩ nyəm tɔ , na mpa pa kʋɣɩ pa caanaa yaa pa toonaa tɔ , na yʋlʋkʋlaa ,

text: For whoremongers , for them that defile themselves with mankind , for menstealers , for liars , for perjured persons , and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine ;
text2: na apalaa mpa pa sʋʋkəna apalaa lɛlaa tɔ , na yʋlʋpɛɛtəlaa , na pɔpɔtʋnaa , na mpa pa sɩɩkɩ pa nɔɔsɩ kɛ yem tɔ , yaa mpa pa takəɣɩ ntiwɛ tə ta təŋ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ kʋpaŋkʋ ŋku kʋ waasəɣɩ yəlaa tɔ , pa tɔɔnaa kɛ pa sɩɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ .

text: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God , which was committed to my trust .
text2: Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ wei pə yelina - m tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ sɛɣɛsəɣəna sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ kʋnɛ . Teeli Ɩsɔ na kʋpantʋ tʋ tɔɔ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ ntɛ ́ .

text: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord , who hath enabled me , for that he counted me faithful , putting me into the ministry ;
text2: Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti wei ɩ ha - m toma kɛ sɔsɔm na má lakəna ma təmlɛ tɔɣɔ ma sɛɛ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ . Ɩ tʋnaʋ má sɩ ma nəɣəsəna pá tɛ - m na taa , na ɩ ́ kpa - m sɩ má la təmlɛ tɔ , ma sɛɛ - ɩ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ .

text: Who was before a blasphemer , and a persecutor , and injurious : but I obtained mercy , because I did it ignorantly in unbelief .
text2: Tuu lɔŋ má yɔɣɔtaɣana ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ ɩ tɔɔ , na má tʋna - ɩ kʋnyɔŋ , na má tʋʋ - ɩ . Ama Ɩsɔ wii ma pətɔɔtəlɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma taa tɛ ́ ma taa na Ɩsɔ tɔɣɔ ma ta nyɩ ma kʋlapʋtʋ ntɩ .

text: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Tacaa hʋla - m ɩ pɛɛlɛɛ kɛ sɔsɔm , na ɩ lapa na má tɛŋ ma taa na Ɩsɔ na má sɔɔləɣɩ yəlaa ɩsɩɩ tə kpɛntənaʋ Yesu Kilisiti na tə wɛna tɔ .

text: This is a faithful saying , and worthy of all acceptation , that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners ; of whom I am chief .
text2: Tɔm nti tə kɛ ́ tampana nyəntʋ təkelekele na tə ́ mʋna pá mʋ - tɩ təkpem na pá tɛ - tɩ na taa tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Yesu Kilisiti kɔma antulinya taa sɩ ɩ yakɩ ɩsaɣalataa nyɔɔŋ , na maɣalɛ pa taa acɛpa .

text: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy , that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering , for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ wii ma pətɔɔtəlɛ , ɩnɩ ɩ sɔɔləna sɩ Yesu Kilisiti ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ ɩsaɣalataa taa acɛpa maɣa ɩ suulu təna , na pɩɩ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ waalɩ nyə ́ ma mpa paa tɛ na pá mʋ ɩ tɔm na pá hiki weesuɣu kɛ tam tɔɔ tɔ sɩ pá nyənəɣəna - m na pá ná .

text: Now unto the King eternal , immortal , invisible , the only wise God , be honour and glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Aaa , Kawulaɣa tʋ , ɩnɩ ɩ wɛnna tam tɔɔ , ɩɩ səkɩ , paa naa - ɩ , ɩ tike təkoŋ ntɛ ́ Ɩsɔ . Yəlaa təna ɩ ́ samɩ - ɩ na pá tʋɣʋ - ɩ teeli kɛ tam tɔɔ . Ami .

text: This charge I commit unto thee , son Timothy , according to the prophecies which went before on thee , that thou by them mightest war a good warfare ;
text2: Tɔʋ , ma pu Timotee , Ɩsɔ ka lapa hatuu lɔŋ na pá ná nyá tɔm nti na pá yɔɣɔtɩ tɔɣɔ ma tɔkaa na má kpaaləɣɩ - ŋ ɩsəntɔ , sɩ ń tɔkɩ tɔmnaa mpɛɣɛ teu , na ń paasɩ na ń yoo yoou kɛ teu .

text: Holding faith , and a good conscience ; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck :
text2: N tɛma Ɩsɔ na nyá taa tɔ tɔkɩ mpʋ na ń wɛɛna lotu kʋlʋmtʋ . Lɛlaa tá tɔkɩ lotu kʋlʋmtʋ ɩlɛna pa Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ pəsɩ yem .

text: Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander ; whom I have delivered unto Satan , that they may learn not to blaspheme .
text2: Pa taa mpɛɣɛlɛ na Himenee na Alɛkəsantəlɩ . Satanɩ kɛ ma yilina - wɛ sɩ ɩ ́ la - wɛ na pə ́ cɔ ́ pá nyɩ sɩ pa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ tɔɔ tɔ pə fɛɩ teu .

text: I exhort therefore , that , first of all , supplications , prayers , intercessions , and giving of thanks , be made for all men ;
text2: Tɔʋ , kancaalaɣa ɩlɛ , nti ma tʋɣɩ - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ la tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ ɩ ́ tɛkəɣɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ niŋ kɛ yəlaa təna tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ - ɩ pa tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ wiikina - ɩ pa tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ sɛɛkɩ - ɩ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ pa tɔɔ .

text: For kings , and for all that are in authority ; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty .
text2: Ɩ ́ sələmɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ awulaa sɔsaa na toŋtʋnaa təna tɔɔ , ɩlɛna tə ́ pəsɩ na tə ́ caɣa təpamm na alaafəya na tə ́ paasəna Ɩsɔ nyəntʋ kɛ teu , na tə ́ tɔka tá yaasi kʋpaŋ .

text: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour ;
text2: Nti tə maɣamaɣa tə kɛ ́ tá Yatʋ Ɩsɔ luɣu tɛɛ nyəntʋ na tə wɛ - ɩ teu tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: Who will have all men to be saved , and to come unto the knowledge of the truth .
text2: Ɩnɩ ɩ caana sɩ pə ́ ya yəlaa təna nyɔɔŋ , na pə ́ lá na pá nyɩ tampana .

text: For there is one God , and one mediator between God and men , the man Christ Jesus ;
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ kʋlʋm tike təkoŋ wɛnna , na Ɩsɔ na yəlaa pa hɛkʋ taa sənlʋ kɛ kʋlʋm kɛ ́ , ɩnəɣəlɛ yʋlʋ wei pa yaa sɩ Yesu Kilisiti tɔ .

text: Who gave himself a ransom for all , to be testified in due time .
text2: Ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ hana ɩ tɩ na ɩ ́ fɛlɩ na pə ́ cɛ yəlaa kɛ pa yomle . Waatʋ wei paa tʋwa tɔɣɔ ɩ kɔma , na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ tampana Ɩsɔ caa kɛ ́ sɩ pə ́ ya yəlaa təna nyɔɔŋ .

text: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher , and an apostle , ( I speak the truth in Christ , and lie not ; ) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity .
text2: Pə maɣamaɣa pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə kpa - m pə tɔm heellu na tillu , na pə ́ tʋ - m sɩ má sɛɣɛsəɣɩ mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ mpaaʋ na tampana pə tɔm . Tampana kɛ ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ , maa looliɣi .

text: I will therefore that men pray every where , lifting up holy hands , without wrath and doubting .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma caa sɩ paa timpiɣi apalaa sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ , pá tiɣisi Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ niŋ , na pá sələməna lotu kʋlʋmtʋ , na pááná yaa yoou ɩ ́ taa wɛɛ .

text: In like manner also , that women adorn themselves in modest apparel , with shamefacedness and sobriety ; not with broided hair , or gold , or pearls , or costly array ;
text2: Ma caa tɔtɔ sɩ alaa ɩ ́ tɔɣɔləɣɩ pa wontu kɛ ɩsəna pə mʋna pá tɔɣɔləɣɩ tɔ , pá taa la ɩsəcaʋ na pá suli mpəle tɛləsʋɣʋ . Pá taa tiɣiliɣina nyɔɔsɩ taɣanʋɣʋ katatəlaɣa , yaa wʋlanaa na lɩɩtʋ pə tʋɣʋ , yaa liɣitee pɔɔŋ tɔɣɔlʋɣʋ sɩ pá te .

text: But ( which becometh women professing godliness ) with good works .
text2: Ama lakasɩ kʋpaŋsɩ kɛ paa tiɣilina ɩsɩɩ lakasɩ nsiwɛ sɩ mʋŋna alaa mpa pa tɔŋ sɩ pa seeki Ɩsɔ tɔ .

text: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection .
text2: Ye pa sɛɣɛsəɣɩ , pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ alʋ ɩ ́ su na ɩ ́ pasa ɩ təɣɩ teu na ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ .

text: But I suffer not a woman to teach , nor to usurp authority over the man , but to be in silence .
text2: Ma ta ha alʋ kɛ nɔɣɔ sɩ ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsɩ yaa ɩ ́ kpiliki apalʋ kɛ pʋlʋpʋ taa . Ama pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ su .

text: For Adam was first formed , then Eve .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Atam kɛ pə caaləna ŋmaʋ , pə waalɩ kɛ ́ pə ŋma Ɩfa .

text: And Adam was not deceived , but the woman being deceived was in the transgression .
text2: Pə taɣa Atam kɛ pə puɣusaa . Ama alʋ kɛ pə puɣusaa na ɩ ́ kisi Ɩsɔ nɔɣɔ taa nyəntʋ kɛ nɩɩnaʋ .

text: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing , if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety .
text2: Ye pa tɛŋ pa taa na Ɩsɔ na pá sɔɔləɣɩ yəlaa na pa yaasi máɣá Ɩsɔ , na paa lakɩ ɩsəcaʋ na pá tɔka ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam , ɩlɛ pɩɩ ya pa nyɔɔŋ na pa piya lʋlʋɣʋ taa .

text: This is a true saying , If a man desire the office of a bishop , he desireth a good work .
text2: Tɔm nti tə kɛ ́ tampana nyəntʋ təkelekele tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ , ye yʋlʋ caa ɩ ́ la Ɩsɔ yəlaa kpekəle sɔsɔ pə kɛ ́ təmlɛ kʋpantɛ kɛ ́ .

text: A bishop then must be blameless , the husband of one wife , vigilant , sober , of good behaviour , given to hospitality , apt to teach ;
text2: Wei ɩ kiŋ pa kaa na kawaliya nakəlɩ tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ ká tɔɣɔna Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔntʋ . Na alʋ kʋlʋm kɛ pʋntʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ká wɛɛna . Ɩ ká kpaakɩ ɩ təɣɩ paa mpi pə taa , na ɩ ́ wɛɛ ləmaɣasɛɛ tʋ na wei ɩ nyəmá pə təna pə taɣanʋɣʋ kɛ teu tɔ . Ɩ ká wɛɛ wei ɩ nyəmá mʋʋllɛ lapʋ tɔ , na ɩ pəsəɣɩ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ .

text: Not given to wine , no striker , not greedy of filthy lucre ; but patient , not a brawler , not covetous ;
text2: Ɩ kaa wɛɛ sʋlʋnyɔɔlʋ yaa mʋsʋŋ tʋ . Ama ɩ ká wɛɛ təpamm kɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ wɛna yəllɛ . Ɩ kaa wɛɛ pɔɣɔlaɣa nyənlʋ .

text: One that ruleth well his own house , having his children in subjection with all gravity ;
text2: Ɩ ká wɛɛ wei ɩ paasaa na ɩ ́ pəsa ɩ təyaɣa kɛ teu teu , na ɩ ́ məŋna ɩ piya kɛ ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ na sɩ nɩɩkəna - ɩ na sɩ nyaŋna - ɩ teu tɔ .

text: ( For if a man know not how to rule his own house , how shall he take care of the church of God ? )
text2: Mpi tɔ , ye yʋlʋ ta pəsɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ təyaɣa , ɩsənaɣa ɩ ká pəsɩ na ɩ ́ paasəna Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa kpekəle ?

text: Not a novice , lest being lifted up with pride he fall into the condemnation of the devil .
text2: Ye pʋntʋ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ sɛɛlʋ kʋfalʋ pə kaa la . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ ká kɔɔ kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ saŋ ɩ tɩ na ɩ tɔm nana səpʋ ɩsɩɩ Ɩlɔɣɔʋ nyəntʋ ka lapʋ tɔ .

text: Moreover he must have a good report of them which are without ; lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil .
text2: Ɩ ká wɛɛ wei ɩ kʋpantʋ ma ta nyɩ ɩsɔnaa maɣamaɣa sama tɔ , pə ́ cɔ ́ pə ́ taa kɔɔ na pá footiɣi - ɩ , na ɩ ́ kɔɔ ɩ ́ nana Ɩlɔɣɔʋ nyəpətʋ taa kɛ ́ tiiu .

text: Likewise must the deacons be grave , not doubletongued , not given to much wine , not greedy of filthy lucre ;
text2: Mpa mpa pa lakɩ təma kɛ Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka taa tɔ paa wɛɛna yaasi kʋpaŋ kɛ mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ . Pa kaa wɛɛ ataa na a waalɩ nyə ́ ma , pa kaa wɛɛ sʋlʋnyɔɔlaa , yaa mpa pa muɣuliɣi sɩ pá hiki liɣitee tɔ .

text: Holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience .
text2: Paa wɛɛ mpa pa təŋəɣəna laakalɩ kʋpaŋ kɛ Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ mpaaʋ tampana nna a tɔɔ Ɩsɔ kulaa tɔ .

text: And let these also first be proved ; then let them use the office of a deacon , being found blameless .
text2: Pá maɣasɩ - wɛ na pə ́ cɔ ́ , ye pa ta na ɩsaɣatiya nakələɣɩ pa kiŋ ɩlɛ pa sʋʋ Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle təmlɛ lapʋ taa .

text: Even so must their wives be grave , not slanderers , sober , faithful in all things .
text2: Pa alaa tɔtɔ ká wɛɛna yaasi kʋpaŋ , pa kaa cakəna yəlaa . Paa kpaakɩ pa tɩ na pá wɛɛ kʋpama kɛ pə təna pə taa .

text: Let the deacons be the husbands of one wife , ruling their children and their own houses well .
text2: Wei ɩ lakɩ Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle təmlɛ tɔ ɩ ká wɛɛna alʋ kʋlʋm kɛ ́ , na ɩ ká wɛɛ wei ɩ paasaa na ɩ ́ pəsa ɩ piya na ɩ təyaɣa kɛ teu teu tɔ .

text: For they that have used the office of a deacon well purchase to themselves a good degree , and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle təmlɛ lataa mpa pa lapa pa təma kɛ teu tɔ , pa nyɔɔŋ kʋləɣɩ kɛ ́ . Na pa pəsəɣɩ na pá yɔɣɔtɩ tá na Yesu Kilisiti tá kpɛntʋɣʋ lapa na tə ́ wɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ mpi pə taa tɔ pə tɔm na paa nyaŋna pʋlʋ .

text: These things write I unto thee , hoping to come unto thee shortly :
text2: Ma ŋmaakɩ - ŋ takəlaɣa kanɛ na má tɛɛləɣɩ kɛ ́ sɩ maa kɔɔ nɔɔnɔɔ na má na - ŋ .

text: But if I tarry long , that thou mayest know how thou oughtest to behave thyself in the house of God , which is the church of the living God , the pillar and ground of the truth .
text2: Ama ye pə kɔma na n ta nɩɩ ma taŋ , ɩlɛ takəlaɣa kanɛ kaa kɛɛsəna - ŋ yaasinaa mpa n ka tɔkɩ Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa kpeka taa tɔ . Weesuɣu Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa mpa pa kɛ ́ kite nte tə tɔɔ tampana səŋaa na pə ́ tɔka - yɛɣɛ teu təkpa tɔɣɔ ma tɔŋ .

text: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness : God was manifest in the flesh , justified in the Spirit , seen of angels , preached unto the Gentiles , believed on in the world , received up into glory .
text2: Ama tampana tɔɔ ɩsəntɔ tá Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ mpaaʋ tɔm kʋŋmɛsətʋ wɛ piti kɛ ́ teu kɛ ́ , yʋlʋ ɩɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ kpɛɛsɩ təlɛ . Ɩ kɔma tɔ yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ kɛ ɩ wɛna . Feesuɣu ná hʋləna sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ tampana təŋlʋ . Ɩsɔtaa tillaa maɣamaɣa ná na - ɩ . Ɩ waasʋ kɛ pa lapa kateŋasɩ təna taa . Pa mʋ ɩ tɔm kɛ antulinya təna taa . Pə kpaasa - ɩ na ɩ ́ sʋʋ ɩ teeli taa .

text: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly , that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith , giving heed to seducing spirits , and doctrines of devils ;
text2: Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu yɔɣɔtəɣɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ təcɛɩcɛɩ sɩ , pɩɩ kɔɔ na pə ́ tala kantəkaɣa kʋyɛɛŋ taa tɔ , yəlaa lɛlaa ká lɩɩ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ na pá paasəna ɩlɔɣɔhilu təma kʋpuɣusɛɛ , na alɔɣaa kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ kɛ paa mʋ .

text: Speaking lies in hypocrisy ; having their conscience seared with a hot iron ;
text2: Na paa yele na yəlaa cɛsəlaa na pɔpɔtʋnaa mpa pa ləmaɣasɛɛ taa səpa ɩsɩɩ pa tɩɩla - yɛɣɛ kɔkɔ na paa tasəɣɩ kʋpantʋ natələɣɩ cɛkənaʋ tɔ pɛlɛ pa tolisi - wɛ .

text: Forbidding to marry , and commanding to abstain from meats , which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of them which believe and know the truth .
text2: Yəlaa panɛ - wɛ , pa sɛɣɛsəɣəna sɩ alʋ kpaɣaʋ fɛɩ teu , na tɔɣɔnasɩ lɛnsənaa tɔɣɔʋ fɛɩ teu . Anɩ Ɩsɔ ná lapa kʋtɔɣɔŋ ɩnəɣɩ sɩ Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa nyəmá tampana tɔ pá sɛɛ Ɩsɔ na pá tɔɣɔ .

text: For every creature of God is good , and nothing to be refused , if it be received with thanksgiving :
text2: Pə təna mpi Ɩsɔ lapa tɔ pə tewaɣa , pə taa pʋlʋ fɛɩ lɔʋ . Ama pə wɛɛ sɩ pá tɔɣɔ pə təna kɛ ́ na pá sɛɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ kɛ pə tɔɔ .

text: For it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ Tɔm na ɩ sələmʋɣʋ taɣanəɣɩ pə tənaɣa na pə wɛɛ - ɩ teu .

text: If thou put the brethren in remembrance of these things , thou shalt be a good minister of Jesus Christ , nourished up in the words of faith and of good doctrine , whereunto thou hast attained .
text2: Ye n wɛɛ na ń sɛɣɛsəɣɩ tá taapalaa kɛ tɔmnaa panɛ , n tɛŋ na ń lá Yesu Kilisiti təmlɛ tʋ kʋpaŋ kɛ ́ . Na pɩɩ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ mpaaʋ tɔmnaa na tampana sɛɣɛsəŋ wei n təŋaa tɔɣɔ n pɩɩsəɣəna nyá ləsaɣa .

text: But refuse profane and old wives ' fables , and exercise thyself rather unto godliness .
text2: Kisi sɔsaa taa kpaɩ kpaɩ tɔmnaa mpɛ , tɩɩ lakɩ na yʋlʋ tɛ ɩ taa na Ɩsɔ se . Faləsəɣɩ nyá tɩ sɩ ń sɔɔsɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ nyɔɔnaʋ kɛ teu .

text: For bodily exercise profiteth little : but godliness is profitable unto all things , having promise of the life that now is , and of that which is to come .
text2: Yʋlʋ faləsʋɣʋ ɩ tɔnʋɣʋ tɔ pə waasəɣɩ te , ɩlɛ pə waasʋɣʋ ta tɔɔ kɛ ́ . Ama ye yʋlʋ faləsa ɩ tɩ sɩ ɩ ́ nyɔɔna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teu , ɩlɛ pəlɛ pə kələna waasʋɣʋ kɛ paa mpi pə taa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩnɩ ɩ tɔmna sɩ ɩ ká ha - tʋɣʋ weesiŋ kɛ saŋa na cele tɔtɔ .

text: This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation .
text2: Tɔm ntɩ tə kɛ ́ tampana nyəntʋ kɛ ́ təkelekele , na tə mʋna pá mʋ - tɩ təkpem na pá tɛ - tɩ na taa .

text: For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach , because we trust in the living God , who is the Saviour of all men , specially of those that believe .
text2: Mpi pə tɔɔ tá wɛɛ na tə ́ tɔŋna təmlɛ lapʋ na tə ́ lʋkɩ tɔɣɔlɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , weesuɣu tʋ Ɩsɔ wei ɩ yakɩ yəlaa təna nyɔɔŋ ɩlɛna pə ́ tɩɩ kələna mpa pa tɛŋɩ - ɩ na pa taa tɔɣɔ tá tɛɛləɣɩ .

text: These things command and teach .
text2: Hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - wɛ sɩ pá lakɩ pə təna ɩsəntɔ na ń sɛɣɛsəɣɩ - wɛ .

text: Let no man despise thy youth ; but be thou an example of the believers , in word , in conversation , in charity , in spirit , in faith , in purity .
text2: Taa yele na nɔɣɔlʋ kpɛɛna - ŋ sɩ n kɛ ́ pəyaɣa . Ama wɛɛ wei Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa lɛlaa ká kɛɛsəɣəna na pá lakɩ tɔɣɔ nyá yɔɣɔtaɣa taa , na nyá tɔntɛ na nyá sɔɔlʋɣʋ kɛ lɛlaa taa , na ɩsəna n tɛmna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ nyá taa na nyá tənaŋŋ wɛɛtʋ pə taa .

text: Till I come , give attendance to reading , to exhortation , to doctrine .
text2: Kaləɣɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm takəlasɩ kɛ yəlaa taa na ń lakɩ waasʋ na ń sɛɣɛsəɣɩ pə hʋwɛɛ na má kɔŋ .

text: Neglect not the gift that is in thee , which was given thee by prophecy , with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery .
text2: Taa liɣilina mpi Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu yelaa na pə lapʋ saa - ŋ tɔ , mpi paa nawa na pá yɔɣɔtɩ na Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsaa tənɩ nyá tɔɔ kɛ ́ niŋ tɔ .

text: Meditate upon these things ; give thyself wholly to them ; that thy profiting may appear to all .
text2: Paasəna teu na ń la təmlɛ tənɛ na ń yoosi - tɛ . Há nyá təɣɩ tə taa təkpataa na pa təna pá na ɩsəna n tɔŋna toŋ nyɔɔʋ tɔ .

text: Take heed unto thyself , and unto the doctrine ; continue in them : for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself , and them that hear thee .
text2: Feŋiɣi nyá tɩ na nyá kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ tɔɔ tɔtɔ . Tɔkɩ pə tənaɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ teu . Tɔm tampana tɔɔ , ye n lakɩ mpʋ , n ká ya nyá tɩ nyʋɣʋ na nyá nɩɩntaa nyəŋ tɔtɔ .

text: Rebuke not an elder , but intreat him as a father ; and the younger men as brethren ;
text2: Taa kaləɣəna kʋkpatəlaa , ama yɔɣɔtəna - wɛ ɩsɩɩ n ka yɔɣɔtəna nyá caa tɔ . Ye ɩfepiya ɩlɛ tɛɛkɩ pɛlɛ ɩsɩɩ nyá tɛɛtʋnaa .

text: The elder women as mothers ; the younger as sisters , with all purity .
text2: La alaa sɔsaa ɩsɩɩ nyá toonaa . Na ń la alaa səkpema ɩsɩɩ nyá tɛɛtʋnaa tɔtɔ , na ń lá laakalɩ na tɛtɛlakasɩ .

text: Honour widows that are widows indeed .
text2: Paasəna leelaa sɔsaa kɛ teu .

text: But if any widow have children or nephews , let them learn first to shew piety at home , and to requite their parents : for that is good and acceptable before God .
text2: Ama leelu wei ɩ wɛna piya yaa saalənaa tɔ , pə wɛɛ sɩ səlɛ sɩɩ kpɛləməna sɩ nyə ́ ma kɛ tɔkʋɣʋ na pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛ pa Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ mpaaʋ taa . Na pɩɩ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ tɔtɔ sɩ pa caanaa na pa cɔsɔnaa ka wɩɩwa mpɛ pa tɔɔ ɩlɛ kʋpantʋ ntəɣɩ mpɛ pa lɛɛtəɣɩ pa nyə ́ ma . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , mpʋ ɩnɩ pə lapʋ wɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teu kɛ ́ .

text: Now she that is a widow indeed , and desolate , trusteth in God , and continueth in supplications and prayers night and day .
text2: Ama leelu wei ɩ kpatəlaa na ɩ ́ fɛɩna paasənlʋ tɔ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ tɛɛləɣɩ . Na ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ - ɩ tam , na ɩ ́ wiikina - ɩ na ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ sɩ ɩ ́ temi - ɩ .

text: But she that liveth in pleasure is dead while she liveth .
text2: Ama leelu wei ɩ wɛna təkpaalətʋ tɔ , paa ɩ wɛna ɩ ɩsɛ tɔ ɩ səpaɣa na ɩ ́ caɣaa .

text: And these things give in charge , that they may be blameless .
text2: Nti tə wɛɛ sɩ n ká tɔɔsɩ - wɛ tɔɣɔlɛ yoo , ɩlɛ pa kaa na ɩsaɣatʋ natələɣɩ pa kiŋ .

text: But if any provide not for his own , and specially for those of his own house , he hath denied the faith , and is worse than an infidel .
text2: Yʋlʋ wei ɩɩ paasəɣəna ɩ lʋlʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma na pə ́ tɩɩ kələna ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ təyaɣa tɔ pʋntʋ kisa Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ kɛ ́ , na ma ta nyɩ Ɩsɔ lapa - ɩ na sana .

text: Let not a widow be taken into the number under threescore years old , having been the wife of one man ,
text2: Leelu wei ɩ lʋlʋɣʋ pɩɩsɩ tɛɛ nɩɩtoso tɔ ɩ tike ɩ hətɛ kɛ n ká tʋ leelaa həla taa . Ama ɩ ká wɛɛ wei ɩ laɣana apalʋ kʋlʋm kɛ hatuu ɩ kʋlʋɣʋ tɔɣɔ .

text: Well reported of for good works ; if she have brought up children , if she have lodged strangers , if she have washed the saints ' feet , if she have relieved the afflicted , if she have diligently followed every good work .
text2: Na pá nyəma - ɩ na təma kʋpana ɩsɩɩ ɩ piya tɔkʋɣʋ na mʋʋlaa tɔkʋɣʋ na Ɩsɔ yəlaa nɔɔhɛɛ kɔʋ na kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlaa sənaʋ na təma kʋpana təna lapʋ .

text: But the younger widows refuse : for when they have begun to wax wanton against Christ , they will marry ;
text2: Pə kpaɣaʋ leelaa səkpema tɔ , taa ŋmaa pa həla kɛ takəlaɣa taa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pa kʋnyɩɩləŋ kɔŋ ɩ ́ kpa pa nyɔɔŋ taa tɔ pə tʋɣɩ - wɛɣɛ saaʋ kɛ ́ . Na mpʋ tɔ , pa haa Kilisiti kɛlɛ siɣile ,

text: Having damnation , because they have cast off their first faith .
text2: ɩlɛna pə ́ pəsəɣɩ - wɛɣɛ tasəkəlɛ nyə ́ ma . Mpi tɔ , pa ta tɔkɩ nɔɣɔ ŋka paa sɩɩwa kancaalaɣa tɔ .

text: And withal they learn to be idle , wandering about from house to house ; and not only idle , but tattlers also and busybodies , speaking things which they ought not .
text2: Na təlɛ tə paasi paa cɔɔkɩ tɛɛsɩ taa kɛ ́ na felentu caŋ na tə ́ tɛɛləna - wɛ təkpətɩɩ . Na kʋkələtʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ pa lakɩ yɔɣɔtəlaa kɛ ́ na kataɣasətʋnaa , na pá faakɩ tɔmnaa kɛ yem .

text: I will therefore that the younger women marry , bear children , guide the house , give none occasion to the adversary to speak reproachfully .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma caa sɩ leelaa səkpema ɩ ́ saa , na pá lʋlɩ piya na pá paasəna pa tɛɛsɩ . Pəlɛ ɩlɛ tá kolontunaa kaa hikina timpi paa footiɣi - tʋ tɔ .

text: For some are already turned aside after Satan .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , leelaa lɛlaa tɛma mpaaʋ kʋpaŋkʋ kɛ siɣile haʋ , na pá sʋʋ Satanɩ kɛ təŋʋɣʋ .

text: If any man or woman that believeth have widows , let them relieve them , and let not the church be charged ; that it may relieve them that are widows indeed .
text2: Ama ye Ɩsɔ sɛɛlʋ wei ɩ lʋlʋɣʋ taa wɛ leelaa , pʋntʋ ká mʋ Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle kɛ səɣəla kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ səŋna ɩ leelaa , ɩlɛna pə ́ hɛtɩ Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle na pɛlɛ pá səŋna mpa pa kɛ ́ leelaa təkpem tɔ .

text: Let the elders that rule well be counted worthy of double honour , especially they who labour in the word and doctrine .
text2: Yesu sɛɛlaa nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma mpa pa feŋiɣi Yesu sɛɛlaa tɔɔ kɛ ́ teu tɔ pə mʋna pɛlɛ pa kʋfɛlʋɣʋ ɩ ́ tɛɛ lɛlaa nyəŋkʋ kɛ tɔm naalɛɣɛ . Ɩlɛna pə ́ tɩɩ kələna mpa pa sɔpa nyʋɣʋ na waasʋ lapʋ na sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: For the scripture saith , Thou shalt not muzzle the ox that treadeth out the corn . And , The labourer is worthy of his reward .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mɛɛ , pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ sɩ : Ye naʋ ɩ ́ makɩ nyá tɔɣɔnaɣa pee , n kaa hɔkɔ ɩ nɔɣɔ . Na tɔtɔ sɩ : Təmlɛ latʋ na ɩ kʋfɛlʋɣʋ kɛ ́ .

text: Against an elder receive not an accusation , but before two or three witnesses .
text2: Ye pa tɔma sɩ Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle nyʋɣʋ tʋ lapa taalɩ nɔɣɔlʋ , na pə aseeta nyə ́ ma ta lɩɩ yəlaa naalɛ yaa tooso , taa mʋ - tɩ .

text: Them that sin rebuke before all , that others also may fear .
text2: Ye mpa pa lapa ɩsaɣatʋ , kaləna - wɛɣɛ samaa taa , na lɛlaa náá ná na sɔɣɔntʋ kpa - wɛ .

text: I charge thee before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , and the elect angels , that thou observe these things without preferring one before another , doing nothing by partiality .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - ŋ na ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ kɛ Ɩsɔ na Yesu Kilisiti na ɩsɔtaa tillaa naŋŋ nyə ́ ma pa ɩsɛntaa sɩ ń tɔkɩ tɔmnaa panɛ ɩnɩ . Taa ləsɩ tə taa lɛntɩ na ń yele lɛntɩ , pə ́ cɔ ́ taa faɣasɩ nɔɣɔlʋ kɛ mpi n lakɩ tɔ pə taa .

text: Lay hands suddenly on no man , neither be partaker of other men ' s sins : keep thyself pure .
text2: Taa hulina niŋ tənʋɣʋ kɛ nɔɣɔlʋ tɔɔ sɩ ɩ ́ sʋʋ Yesu sɛɛlaa təmlɛ lapʋ . Taa fa lɛlaa ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ yem . La yʋlʋpaŋ . Taa hɛlɩ asilima taa .

text: Drink no longer water , but use a little wine for thy stomach ' s sake and thine often infirmities .
text2: Taa nyɔɔkɩ sasala tike , ama təŋəɣɩ sʋlʋm kɛ nyá lotu ntɩ tə tɔɔ . Nn naa pə wɩɩkʋɣʋ - ŋ tam .

text: Some men ' s sins are open beforehand , going before to judgment ; and some men they follow after .
text2: Yəlaa lɛlaa ɩsaɣatʋ naa kpakpaa kɛ ́ təkeelee na pá ta tɩɩ hʋʋnta - wɛɣɛ tɔm . Ama pə yela lɛlaa nyəntʋ tɔ , hʋʋlɛ waalɩ kɛ ́ pɩɩ kuli tə tɔɔ .

text: Likewise also the good works of some are manifest beforehand ; and they that are otherwise cannot be hid .
text2: Təma kʋpana ná naa mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ təkeelee , na nna a maɣamaɣa a fɛɩ naʋ kɛ ɩsɛntɔɔ kɛ kpakpaa kpakpaa tɔ , a kaa pəsɩ na á saalɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam .

text: Let as many servants as are under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honour , that the name of God and his doctrine be not blasphemed .
text2: Pa təna mpa pa kɛ ́ yomaa tɔ pá tʋna pa caanaa na pá seeki - wɛɣɛ pə təna pə taa , na pə taa kɔɔ na yəlaa tʋʋ Ɩsɔ na ta kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ .

text: And they that have believing masters , let them not despise them , because they are brethren ; but rather do them service , because they are faithful and beloved , partakers of the benefit . These things teach and exhort .
text2: Yomaa mpa pa caanaa ná kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa tɔtɔ tɔ , pá taa nyənɩ pa caanaa mpɛɣɛ yem , na pá waana sɩ : Kaɣana tə kɛ ́ kʋlʋm kɛ ́ . Aaɩ , pənɛntɛɣɛ pə wɛɛ sɩ pá wʋsɩ ɩsəlɛ na pa caanaa təma . Mpi tɔ mpa pa waakəna ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa təma tɔ pɛlɛ pa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa tɔtɔɣɔ , na mpɛɣɛ yomaa pa sɔɔla - wɛ tɔ se . Tɔʋ , n ta na ntiwɛ n ká sɛɣɛsəɣɩ na ń lakɩ waasʋ kɛ tə tɔɔ tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: If any man teach otherwise , and consent not to wholesome words , even the words of our Lord Jesus Christ , and to the doctrine which is according to godliness ;
text2: Ye nɔɣɔlʋ ná ləsa ɩ nyəntʋ natəlɩ na tə mpaa , na ɩ ́ tá təŋ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti nɔɣɔ taa sɛɣɛsəŋ kʋpaŋ wei ɩ waasəɣɩ yəlaa tɔ , pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ta təŋ tá Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ ,

text: He is proud , knowing nothing , but doting about questions and strifes of words , whereof cometh envy , strife , railings , evil surmisings ,
text2: pʋntʋ kəla kalampaanɩ , na ɩ ta tɩɩ nyəm pʋlʋ . Kʋmɛlətɔmnaa tɔɔ hɔm na tə tɔɔ yooŋ tɔka - ɩ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ kʋtɔŋ . Mpʋ ɩnɩ pə kɔŋna na ɩsɛsɛɛmɛɛ na yooŋ na kʋtʋʋŋ na tɔmnaa tʋɣʋ

text: Perverse disputings of men of corrupt minds , and destitute of the truth , supposing that gain is godliness : from such withdraw thyself .
text2: na ntɔŋkpɛɛsasɩ nsi sɩ fɛɩ tənaɣa tɔɣɔ mpa pa ləmaɣasɛɛ səpa na paa tasəɣɩ tampana nyəm tɔ pa hɛkʋ . Na pa hʋʋ kɛ ́ sɩ Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ kɛ ́ mpi yʋlʋ ka pilina tɔ .

text: But godliness with contentment is great gain .
text2: Tampana yaa , ye ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ laŋlɛ hɛɛna ɩ kʋwɛnam , apititu sɔsɔɔntʋ wɛnna Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ taa .

text: For we brought nothing into this world , and it is certain we can carry nothing out .
text2: Aaɩ , pə lʋla - tʋ tɔ , tə ta tɔkɩ pʋlʋ na tə ́ kɔna antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ taa se . Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ ye tə kpeŋ tə kaa pəsɩ na tə ́ kpɛntəna pʋlʋ na tə ́ kpeena .

text: And having food and raiment let us be therewith content .
text2: Ɩlɛ ye pə yelaa na tə ́ hiki tá nɔɣɔ pʋʋɣʋ nyəm na tá tɔɔ kʋkentim , pə tɔɔ - tʋ mɛɛ .

text: But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare , and into many foolish and hurtful lusts , which drown men in destruction and perdition .
text2: Ama mpa pɛlɛ pa caa pa pili tɔ pə tʋɣɩ - wɛɣɛ maɣasəŋ taa kɛ ́ na kʋmɛləkʋnyɩɩləŋ ɩsaɣaŋ paɣalɛ nyəpətʋ taa kɛ ́ pa tiiki . Kʋnyɩɩləŋ ɩnɛ ɩ tusiɣina yəlaa na ɩ ́ kaakɩ timpi paa le na pə ́ wakəlɩ - wɛ tənaŋnaŋ tɔ .

text: For the love of money is the root of all evil : which while some coveted after , they have erred from the faith , and pierced themselves through with many sorrows .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , liɣitee pulaɣa tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩsaɣatʋ təna caaləɣɩ . Lɛlaa ná nyəna pɔɣɔlaɣa caaʋ kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ na pə ́ caŋ pə ́ ləsɩ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ taa , na pá kʋɣɩ pa təɣɩ sɔsɔm na laŋwakəlɛɛ paɣalɛ .

text: But thou , O man of God , flee these things ; and follow after righteousness , godliness , faith , love , patience , meekness .
text2: Ama nyá kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ yʋlʋ ɩlɛ cɔləɣɩ pə tənaɣa mpʋ . Lʋkɩ tam sɩ ń təŋəɣɩ siɣisuɣu na ń nyɔɔna Ɩsɔ , na ń tɛŋɩ - ɩ na nyá taa , na ń sɔɔləɣɩ nyá lɛlaa , na ń kantələɣɩ , na ń tɔkɩ suulu .

text: Fight the good fight of faith , lay hold on eternal life , whereunto thou art also called , and hast professed a good profession before many witnesses .
text2: Yoo Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ taa yoou kɛ teu . Tɔkɩ weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔɣɔ niŋ naalɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , weesuɣu tam nyəŋkʋ ŋkʋ kʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ yaa - ŋ waatʋ wei ŋ kaala nyá kaalɛɛ kʋpana kɛ aseeta nyə ́ ma paɣalɛ ɩsɛntaa sɩ n tɛma - ɩ na nyá taa tɔ .

text: I give thee charge in the sight of God , who quickeneth all things , and before Christ Jesus , who before Pontius Pilate witnessed a good confession ;
text2: Ma tʋɣʋ - ŋ təmlɛ tənɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ wei ɩ haa pə tənaɣa weesiŋ tɔ ɩsɛntaa , na Yesu Kilisiti wei ɩ ləsa aseeta na ɩ kaalɛɛ kʋpana kɛ Pɔŋsɩ Pilatɩ kiŋ tɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ɩsɛntaa sɩ :

text: That thou keep this commandment without spot , unrebukeable , until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Təŋ tɔm tənɛ tə təna , na ń tɔkɩ - təɣɩ teu təcʋŋŋ , tə ́ taa wakəlɩ tiili , haləna kʋyaŋku Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti ká kɔɔ tɔ .

text: Which in his times he shall shew , who is the blessed and only Potentate , the King of kings , and Lord of lords ;
text2: Ye pə kɔma na pə ́ tala kʋyakʋ ŋku pə sɩɩwa tɔ , Ɩsɔ ká yele na ɩ ́ kɔɔ . Aaa , Ɩsɔ tike təkoŋ ntɛ ́ kawulaɣa tʋ na kʋpantʋ tʋ . Ɩnəɣəlɛ awulaa təna wulaʋ , sɔsaa Sɔsɔ .

text: Who only hath immortality , dwelling in the light which no man can approach unto ; whom no man hath seen , nor can see : to whom be honour and power everlasting . Amen .
text2: Ɩ tike ɩɩ səkəna . Ɩ təcaɣalɛ kɔkɔ teu wɛ caasa , yʋlʋ fɛɩ wei ɩ kpətəɣəna təna tɔ . Tuu tɔ nɔɣɔlʋ ta keesita - ɩ , pəyele nɔɣɔlʋ kaa tɩɩ keesi - ɩ . Yəlaa təna ɩ ́ saŋɩ - ɩ . Ɩ pəsʋɣʋ kʋnɛ kʋ wɛɛ tam . Ami .

text: Charge them that are rich in this world , that they be not highminded , nor trust in uncertain riches , but in the living God , who giveth us richly all things to enjoy ;
text2: Kpaalɩ mpa pa kɛ ́ apila kɛ antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ taa tɔ sɩ pá taa la kalampaanɩ . Heeli - wɛ sɩ pá taa tɛɛləɣɩ apititu nti tɩɩ tɛ na tə ́ saalɩ tɔ . Ama pá tɛɛləɣɩ Ɩsɔ wei ɩ kaa pə tənaɣa sɔsɔm sɩ tə ́ yɔɔləɣəna tɔ .

text: That they do good , that they be rich in good works , ready to distribute , willing to communicate ;
text2: Kpaalɩ - wɛ sɩ pá lakɩ kʋpantʋ , na pa lakasɩ kʋpaŋsɩ ɩ ́ tɔɔ sɔsɔm . Na pá nyɩ haʋ tɔm , na pa na lɛlaa pá taləɣɩ pa nyəm na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ .

text: Laying up in store for themselves a good foundation against the time to come , that they may lay hold on eternal life .
text2: Ye pa lakɩ mpʋ , cele kpancoou kʋpaŋkʋ ŋku kʋ kaa wakəlɩ tɔɣɔ pa sɩɩkɩ , na pɩɩ yele na pá hiki weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ .

text: O Timothy , keep that which is committed to thy trust , avoiding profane and vain babblings , and oppositions of science falsely so called :
text2: Haɩ , Timotee , tɔkɩ teu kɛ mpi pa tʋ nyá niŋ taa sɩ ń paasəna tɔ . Kisiɣi kpaɩ faacinaa mpa paa lakɩ na yʋlʋ tɛ ɩ taa na Ɩsɔ tɔ , na ntɔŋkpɛɛsasɩ nsi pa ta nyɩ ɩlɛna pá yaakɩ sɩ nyəm tɔ .

text: Which some professing have erred concerning the faith . Grace be with thee . Amen .
text2: Lɛlaa hɔŋaɣa pa tɩ sɩ pá yelina - wɛ sɩ mpɛɣɛlɛ nyəm pənɛ pə nyə ́ ma , ɩlɛna pə ́ caŋ pə ́ ləsɩ - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ taa . Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ ɩ pɛɛlɛɛ .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , according to the promise of life which is in Christ Jesus ,
text2: Maɣa Pɔɔlɩ , Ɩsɔ luɣu lapəna na má la Yesu Kilisiti tillu sɩ ma kpaaləɣɩ weesuɣu ŋku Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha mpa na Yesu Kilisiti pa kpɛntaa tɔ kʋ tɔm .

text: To Timothy , my dearly beloved son : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: Má ŋmaakəna takəlaɣa kanɛɣɛ ma pu kʋpaŋ Timotee . Tacaa Ɩsɔ na tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti pá hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - ŋ pɛɛlɛɛ na suulu na pá ha - ŋ alaafəya .

text: I thank God , whom I serve from my forefathers with pure conscience , that without ceasing I have remembrance of thee in my prayers night and day ;
text2: Ɩsɔ wei ɩ təmlɛ ma lakəna lotu kʋlʋmtʋ ɩsɩɩ ma caanaa lakaɣa tɔɣɔ ma sɛɛkɩ . Maa hɔsəɣɩ nyá tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɔɔsʋɣʋ kɛ ma sələməŋ təna taa kɛ ́ ilim na ahoo , na má sɛɛkɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ .

text: Greatly desiring to see thee , being mindful of thy tears , that I may be filled with joy ;
text2: Ma tɔɔsa nyá wula , na má nyɩɩləɣɩ sɔsɔm sɩ má na - ŋ tə ́ ná na ma laŋlɛ hʋlʋmɩ teu .

text: When I call to remembrance the unfeigned faith that is in thee , which dwelt first in thy grandmother Lois , and thy mother Eunice ; and I am persuaded that in thee also .
text2: Ma tɔɔsəɣɩ ɩsəna n tɛma nyá taa na Ɩsɔ na tampana tɔ . Nyá neese Loisi na nyá too Iniisi pɛlɛ paa tɛma pa taa na Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ na pə ́ cɔ ́ pə ́ takɩ nyá . Ma nyəmá teu təkpataa sɩ nyá maɣamaɣa n tɛma nyá taa na Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ .

text: Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God , which is in thee by the putting on of my hands .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma tɔɔsəɣɩ - ŋ sɩ maa təna ma niŋ kɛ nyá tɔɔ na Ɩsɔ yele na mpi pə lapʋ saa - ŋ tɔ taa yele na pə ́ sɩ paa pəcɔ .

text: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear ; but of power , and of love , and of a sound mind .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ tá ha - tʋɣʋ ɩ Feesuɣu sɩ kʋ ́ la - tʋɣʋ sɔɣɔntʋnaa . Ama sɩ kʋ ́ la - tʋɣʋ kpelikpeka nyə ́ ma na təma sɔɔllaa na ləmaɣasɛɛ nyə ́ ma kɛ ́ .

text: Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord , nor of me his prisoner : but be thou partaker of the afflictions of the gospel according to the power of God ;
text2: Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ taa sɩ fɛɛlɛ na Tacaa tɔm heeluɣu . Taa sɩ fɛɛlɛ na má wei ma kɛ ́ saləka tʋ kɛ Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ tɔ ma tɔm . Ama nyaa tɔɣɔ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ ɩsəna Ɩsɔ ha - ŋ pə toma tɔ .

text: Who hath saved us , and called us with an holy calling , not according to our works , but according to his own purpose and grace , which was given us in Christ Jesus before the world began ,
text2: Ɩnɩ ɩ yapəna tá nyɔɔŋ na ɩ ́ yaa - tʋ sɩ tə ́ la ɩ yəlaa . Pə taɣa tá lakasɩ kʋpaŋsɩ nasəlɩ sɩ tɔɔ . Ama ɩsəna mpi ɩ sɩɩwa na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ tɔ , na ɩ pɛɛlɛɛ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ lapa mpʋ . Hatuu yem taa kɛ ́ ɩ taɣana ɩ pɛɛlɛɛ anɩ sɩ ɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ - tʋɣʋ - yɛ na Yesu Kilisiti kiŋ .

text: But is now made manifest by the appearing of our Saviour Jesus Christ , who hath abolished death , and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel :
text2: Ama kaɣana Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti kɔma tɔɣɔ ɩ hʋla - tʋɣʋ - yɛ na tə ́ ná . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Yesu Kilisiti kʋna səm apalʋtʋ , na ɩ ́ kuli weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ kʋ tɔɔ na Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ .

text: Whereunto I am appointed a preacher , and an apostle , and a teacher of the Gentiles .
text2: Ɩsɔ lapa na má pəsɩ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ ɩnɛ ɩ kpaallʋ na ɩ tillu na ɩ sɛɣɛsəlʋ .

text: For the which cause I also suffer these things : nevertheless I am not ashamed : for I know whom I have believed , and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma tɔkɩ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ ɩsəntɔ . Paa na mpʋ ma ta lɔ tɔɔŋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ma nyəmá wei ma lakɩ na má tɛɛləɣɩ tɔ , na ma nyəmá teu təkpataa sɩ ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ mpi ma yelina - ɩ tɔ haləna kʋyakʋ ŋkʋ ɩnɩ kʋ wule .

text: Hold fast the form of sound words , which thou hast heard of me , in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Kɛɛsəɣəna sɛɣɛsəŋ kʋpaŋ wei ma kɛɛsa - ŋ na ɩ ́ waasəɣɩ yəlaa tɔ , na ń tɔkɩ teu kɛ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ na təma sɔɔlʋɣʋ mpi tə hika tá na Yesu Kilisiti tá kpɛntʋɣʋ taa tɔ .

text: That good thing which was committed unto thee keep by the Holy Ghost which dwelleth in us .
text2: Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ wei ɩ ́ cakɩ tá taa tɔ ɩ ́ səna - ŋ na ń tɔkɩ teu kɛ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ kʋpaŋkʋ ŋku pa sɛɣɛsa - ŋ tɔ .

text: This thou knowest , that all they which are in Asia be turned away from me ; of whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes .
text2: Asii tɛtʋ nyə ́ ma təna lɔ - m tɔ n nyəmá mpʋ . Mpa pa ha - m siɣile kɛ mpʋ tɔ pa taa mpɛɣɛlɛ Fisɛɛlɩ na Hɛɛmɔsɛɛnɩwɛ .

text: The Lord give mercy unto the house of Onesiphorus ; for he oft refreshed me , and was not ashamed of my chain :
text2: Honesifɔɔ temna - m tɔm paɣalɛ . Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ fɛlɩ ɩ ́ na ɩ nyə ́ ma kɛ kʋpantʋ . Ma saləka təkʋɣʋ ta lapɩ - ɩ fɛɛlɛ ,

text: But , when he was in Rome , he sought me out very diligently , and found me .
text2: ɩ tala Lom tɔ , ɩ pɛɛka - m kɛ ́ na ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ na haləna ɩ ́ na - m .

text: The Lord grant unto him that he may find mercy of the Lord in that day : and in how many things he ministered unto me at Ephesus , thou knowest very well .
text2: Tacaa ɩ ́ yele na ɩ ́ hiki kʋpantʋ kɛ kʋyakʋ ŋkʋ ɩnɩ kʋ wule . Nyá maɣamaɣa n nana nyá ɩsəlɛ kɛ kookalənaa mpa ɩ lapa - m Ɩfeesu tɔ .

text: Thou therefore , my son , be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Ma pu , ye nyá ɩlɛ tɔkɩ pɛɛlɛɛ nna pə hʋla - tʋɣʋ tá na Yesu Kilisiti tá kpɛntʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔ na ń nyɔɔ toŋ .

text: And the things that thou hast heard of me among many witnesses , the same commit thou to faithful men , who shall be able to teach others also .
text2: Tuu n wɛ ma kiŋ na má sɛɣɛsəɣɩ nti nti tɔ n nɩɩ - tɩ , na yəlaa paɣalɛ ná mpʋ . Ɩlɛ kɛlɩ tə təna na ń hʋ ́ lɩ ́ apalaa mpa n wɛna naani na paa pəsɩ na pá tɛləsɩ - təɣɩ pa lɛlaa tɔ .

text: Thou therefore endure hardness , as a good soldier of Jesus Christ .
text2: Nyaa tɔɣɔ nyá kʋnyɔŋ ɩsɩɩ Yesu Kilisiti yoolu kʋpaŋ .

text: No man that warreth entangleth himself with the affairs of this life ; that he may please him who hath chosen him to be a soldier .
text2: Yʋlʋ wei ɩ wɛ yoou taa tɔ , kʋ tɔm kɛ ɩ paasəɣəna sɩ ɩ sɔsɔ wei ɩ kpaɣa - ɩ tɔ ɩ laŋlɛ ɩ ́ hɛɛna - ɩ , ɩ kaa caɣa na ɩ ́ paasəɣəna kpaɩ nyəntʋ kɛ yem .

text: And if a man also strive for masteries , yet is he not crowned , except he strive lawfully .
text2: Na yʋlʋ lʋtʋ ɩ ́ suuwa na ɩ ́ lʋkɩ na ɩ ́ ta təŋ ɩsəna mpi pə wɛɛ sɩ pá lʋ tɔ , paa ɩ huwa , nɔɣɔlʋ ná kaa samɩ - ɩ .

text: The husbandman that laboureth must be first partaker of the fruits .
text2: Na wei ɩ konta haŋasɩ kɛ təhatɛ na ɩ ́ lɔ tɔ , ɩnɩ ɩ laaləɣəna ɩ hatəmʋtʋ təŋʋɣʋ .

text: Consider what I say ; and the Lord give thee understanding in all things .
text2: Maɣasəɣɩ tɔm nti ma yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔɣɔ nyá taa , Tacaa ká ha - ŋ tə nyəm na ń cɛkəna .

text: Remember that Jesus Christ of the seed of David was raised from the dead according to my gospel :
text2: Tɔɔsəɣɩ Tafiiti lʋlʋɣʋ taa tʋ Yesu Kilisiti wei ɩ fema sətaa taa tɔ ɩ tɔm . Ntəɣɩ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ wei ma kpaaləɣɩ tɔ ɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ .

text: Wherein I suffer trouble , as an evil doer , even unto bonds ; but the word of God is not bound .
text2: Na Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ ɩnɩ ɩ kpaalʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma tɔkɩ kʋnyɔŋ , haləna pá caŋ na pá hɔkɔ - m ɩsɩɩ ɩsaɣalatʋ sɔsɔ nɔɣɔlʋ . Paa na mpʋ tɔ pə taɣa Ɩsɔ Tɔm kɛ pa hɔkaa .

text: Therefore I endure all things for the elect ' s sakes , that they may also obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa tʋɣʋ - m kʋnyɔməŋ na má suma , sɩ pə ́ waasɩ mpa Ɩsɔ ləsaa tɔ na pə ́ ya pa nyʋɣʋ , na pá hiki teeli wei ɩɩ tɛŋ tɔɣɔ Yesu Kilisiti kiŋ .

text: It is a faithful saying : For if we be dead with him , we shall also live with him :
text2: Tɔm nti tə kɛ ́ tampana tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Ye tá na - ɩ tə kaa səm , tá na - ɩ tɩɩ kaa weesuɣu tɔtɔ .

text: If we suffer , we shall also reign with him : if we deny him , he also will deny us :
text2: Ye tə nyaɣa apalʋtʋ , tá na - ɩ tɩɩ tɔɣɔ kawulaɣa . Ye tə kisa - ɩ , ɩnɩ ɩ ká kisi - tʋ tɔtɔ .

text: If we believe not , yet he abideth faithful : he cannot deny himself .
text2: Ye tə lɩɩ ɩ waalɩ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ta kɛ pə tʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ kpɛɛsəɣəna ɩ tɩ .

text: Of these things put them in remembrance , charging them before the Lord that they strive not about words to no profit , but to the subverting of the hearers .
text2: N ta na nti n ká tɔɔsəɣɩ - wɛ tɔɣɔlɛ . Heeli - wɛ na ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa sɩ pá yele tɔmnaa tɔɔ yoou kɛ pa hɛkʋ . Mpi tɔ yooŋ ɩnɩ ɩɩ waasəɣɩ nɔɣɔlʋ . Ama wakəlʋɣʋ tike kɛ ɩ kɔŋna mpa pa caɣaa na pá nɩɩkɩ tɔ .

text: Study to shew thyself approved unto God , a workman that needeth not to be ashamed , rightly dividing the word of truth .
text2: Kaasɩ nyá tɩ sɩ ń la na Ɩsɔ tike sa - ŋ . La ɩsɩɩ təmlɛ latʋ wei ɩ fɛɩ fɛɛlɛ na ɩ təmlɛ , na ɩ ́ heeliɣi Ɩsɔ tampana tɔm kɛ teitei kɛ ́ tə lona taa tɔ .

text: But shun profane and vain babblings : for they will increase unto more ungodliness .
text2: Kisiɣi kpaɩ faacinaa mpa paa lakɩ na yʋlʋ tɛ ɩ taa na Ɩsɔ tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , mpa pa sɔpa nyʋɣʋ na faacinaa mpɛ tɔ pa na Ɩsɔ pa tɔŋna hatəlʋɣʋ kɛ ́ na pá puki .

text: And their word will eat as doth a canker : of whom is Hymenaeus and Philetus ;
text2: Nti nti pa sɛɣɛsəɣɩ tɔ tə wakələɣɩ yəlaa kɛ teitei kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ sʋʋlʋ sʋʋkʋɣʋ səmote taa tɔ . Faacinaa mpɛ pa lataa taa wɛɣɛlɛ na Himenee na Filɛɛtɩ .

text: Who concerning the truth have erred , saying that the resurrection is past already ; and overthrow the faith of some .
text2: Yəlaa panɛ pa lɔɣɔ tampana tɔm na lumaɣa waalɩ kɛ ́ , haləna pá sɛɣɛsəɣɩ sɩ tá sətaa fem tɔm tɛma tɛɛʋ . Na pa sɛɣɛsəŋ ɩnɛ ɩ tʋsa lɛlaa na pá yele Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ .

text: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure , having this seal , The Lord knoweth them that are his . And , Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity .
text2: Paa na mpʋ Ɩsɔ sɩɩ kite nte tɔ tə səŋa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam kɛ ́ teu kɛ ́ təca . Na pə ŋmaa tə tɔɔ sɩ : Tacaa nyəmá mpa pa kɛ ́ ɩ yəlaa tɔ . Na tɔtɔ sɩ : Pa təna mpa pa yaa pa təɣɩ Tacaa yəlaa tɔ pə wɛɛ sɩ paa kisi ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ kɛ ́ .

text: But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver , but also of wood and of earth ; and some to honour , and some to dishonour .
text2: Toŋtʋ təyaɣa wɛʋ mpʋ tɔ , pə taɣa wontu nti pa lupəna wʋla yaa liɣitee nyəɣətʋ tɔ tə tike kɛ pa lakəna ka taa . Ama tʋɣʋ nyəntʋ na cʋɣʋ nyəntʋ wɛɛ tɔtɔɣɔ na pá lakəna pə təna . Pa sɩɩkɩ lɛntɩ kɛ ́ na pá lakəna fɛɛlɛ kʋyakʋ kʋyakʋ , ɩlɛna pə ́ kaasɩ na pá lakəna lɛntɩ kɛ paa ɩfemle nte .

text: If a man therefore purge himself from these , he shall be a vessel unto honour , sanctified , and meet for the master ' s use , and prepared unto every good work .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ na yʋlʋ , ye n kisa ɩsaɣatʋ nti tə tɔm ma yɔɣɔtaa tɔɣɔ lapʋ , n wɛ teitei ɩsɩɩ wontu nti pa sɩɩwa na pá ləsəɣɩ fɛɛlɛ kʋyakʋ tɔɣɔ . Mpi tɔ nyá caa tənna - ŋ , na n waasəɣɩ - ɩ kɛ ́ . Na n mʋna pa lana - ŋ paa təmlɛ kʋpantɛ nte .

text: Flee also youthful lusts : but follow righteousness , faith , charity , peace , with them that call on the Lord out of a pure heart .
text2: Se ɩfeputu kʋnyɩɩləŋ ɩsaɣaŋ . Lʋkɩ tam sɩ ń təŋ siɣisuɣu , na ń tɛ Ɩsɔ na nyá taa , na ń sɔɔləɣɩ nyá yəlaa lɛlaa , na nyá na mpa pa təŋəɣɩ Tacaa na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ tɔ ɩ ́ maɣa teu , pʋlʋ ɩ ́ taa yasɩ - mɛ .

text: But foolish and unlearned questions avoid , knowing that they do gender strifes .
text2: Yele hɔm kɛ kʋmɛlətɔmnaa na kpaɩ nyəntʋ pə tɔɔ . Nyá maɣamaɣa n nyəmá sɩ yoou kɛ tɔm ɩsɩɩ mpʋ tɛɛsəɣəna .

text: And the servant of the Lord must not strive ; but be gentle unto all men , apt to teach , patient ,
text2: Pəyele Tacaa təmlɛ tʋ ná wɛɛ tɔ pə fɛɩ sɩ ɩ ká wɛɛ yoolu . Ama ɩ ká wɛɛ wei ɩ tɔm yəlaa təna caakɩ tɔɣɔ , na ɩ ká wɛɛ wei ɩ pəsa lɛlaa kɛ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ na suulu hʋ ́ lʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɔ .

text: In meekness instructing those that oppose themselves ; if God peradventure will give them repentance to the acknowledging of the truth ;
text2: Na ɩ ká sɛɣɛsəɣɩ mpa paa nɩɩkəna - ɩ tɔ təpamm təpamm . Ntanyɩ Ɩsɔ ká yele na pá laɣasɩ na pá tisi tampana .

text: And that they may recover themselves out of the snare of the devil , who are taken captive by him at his will .
text2: Pəlɛɣɛ paa məlɩ yaasi kʋpaŋ taa , na pá kpɛɛ pa təɣɩ Ɩlɔɣɔʋ nyəpa nyəpətʋ nti na ɩ ́ kpa - wɛ na ɩ ́ ŋmakələɣɩ - wɛ na pá lakɩ ɩ luɣu nyəntʋ tɔ tə taa .

text: This know also , that in the last days perilous times shall come .
text2: Tɔɔsɩ teu sɩ pə təna pɩɩ la katɛ kɛ sɔsɔm kɛ kʋyɛɛŋ kantəkaɣa nyəŋ taa .

text: For men shall be lovers of their own selves , covetous , boasters , proud , blasphemers , disobedient to parents , unthankful , unholy ,
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , yəlaa ka wɛɛ mpa paa ka nyɔɔŋ na pa maɣamaɣa pa leleŋ pɛɛkʋɣʋ tɔ , liɣitee ɩsəlɛ taa kɛ ́ paa nyənəɣɩ . Paa hɔ pa tɩ , na paa la ɩsəcaʋ . Paa yɔɣɔtɩ Ɩsɔ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩsaɣatʋ , pa kaa seeki pa caanaa . Paa la fɔɔfɛɩnaa , pa kaa seeki Ɩsɔ .

text: Without natural affection , trucebreakers , false accusers , incontinent , fierce , despisers of those that are good ,
text2: Paa la təkatɩɩ , pa kaa wɛɛna lɛlaa pətɔɔtəlɛ . Paa la nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ kuulaa na mpəle tɛləsəlaa na nyaŋ nyə ́ ma . Pa kaa sɔɔlɩ kʋpantʋ .

text: Traitors , heady , highminded , lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God ;
text2: Paa la kɔlɔmɔtɔ nyə ́ ma na pááná nyə ́ ma . Paa saŋ pa tɩ , na paa yele Ɩsɔ na pá paasəna mpi pə hɛɛsəɣɩ pa laŋa tɔ tike .

text: Having a form of godliness , but denying the power thereof : from such turn away .
text2: Paa cɛsɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩsɔ ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sɩ pa təŋəɣɩ Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ mpaaʋ pəyele pa kʋ pə toma kɛ pa taa . Yele yəlaa ɩsɩɩ mpʋ pə takanaa .

text: For of this sort are they which creep into houses , and lead captive silly women laden with sins , led away with divers lusts ,
text2: Pa taa lɛlaa cɛŋəɣəna tɛɛsɩ taa na pá puɣusiɣi alaa mpa pɩɩ kantələɣɩ na pá teela ɩsaɣatʋ na kʋnyɩɩləŋ ɩnɩ ɩ təna ɩ kʋɣɩ - wɛ tɔ .

text: Ever learning , and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth .
text2: Pə alaa pɛɛkəɣɩ tam kɛ ́ sɩ pá sɛɣɛsəɣɩ - wɛ , pə ́ cɔ ́ paa pa sɛɣɛsa - wɛ , paa pəsəɣɩ na pá cɛkəna tampana naalɩ .

text: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses , so do these also resist the truth : men of corrupt minds , reprobate concerning the faith .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ Yanɛɛsɩ na Yampəlɛɛ paa kpɛɛsəna Moisi tɔ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ yəlaa panɛ pa kpɛɛsəɣəna tampana . Pa ləmaɣasɛɛ səpaɣa pa Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ ta təŋ .

text: But they shall proceed no further : for their folly shall be manifest unto all men , as theirs also was .
text2: Pa nyʋɣʋ kaa tasa kʋlʋɣʋ , mpi tɔ pɩɩ kuli pa waalɩ kɛ ́ na yəlaa təna cɛkəna sɩ pa kɛ ́ kʋmɛlɛməŋ . Yanɛɛsɩ na Yampəlɛɛ pa nyəntʋ ka lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ teitei kɛ ́ .

text: But thou hast fully known my doctrine , manner of life , purpose , faith , longsuffering , charity , patience ,
text2: Ye nyá ɩlɛ n təŋa ma sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ təna , na ma yaasinaa , na mpi pə lapʋ maa tʋ ma lotu taa tɔ , na ɩsəna ma tɛma ma taa na Ɩsɔ tɔ , na ma suulu , na ɩsəna ma sɔɔləɣɩ lɛlaa tɔ , na ma ɩsəlɛ sɛɛsʋɣʋ

text: Persecutions , afflictions , which came unto me at Antioch , at Iconium , at Lystra ; what persecutions I endured : but out of them all the Lord delivered me .
text2: kɛ ma kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛnaa na ma wahalanaa taa . Pɔpɔtʋ fɛɩ leleŋ , ma paasaa kɛ ́ na má tɔɣɔ kʋnyɔməŋ kɛ Antiyɔka na Ɩkʋniyɔm na Lisitəla , na nyá maɣamaɣa n nyəmá mpʋ . Ama Tacaa yapa - m pə təna pə taa .

text: Yea , and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution .
text2: Aaɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə tɩɩ wɛɛ , mpa pa sɔɔlaa sɩ pá na Yesu Kilisiti pá kpɛntɩ na pá nɩɩna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ pa tɔntɛ təna taa tɔ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ paa tʋɣʋ - wɛɣɛ kʋnyɔŋ .

text: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse , deceiving , and being deceived .
text2: Ama pə kaasa asaɣaa na puɣusilaa tɔ pɛlɛ pa ɩsaɣatʋ kaa wɛɛ tənaɣa . Paa puɣusiɣi lɛlaa kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ na pá kpɛŋna pa maɣamaɣa tɔtɔ na pá puɣusiɣi .

text: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of , knowing of whom thou hast learned them ;
text2: Ama nyá ɩlɛ , nyaa tɔkɩ teu kɛ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ ŋku pa sɛɣɛsa - ŋ na ń mʋ - kʋ na n tɛma - kʋ na nyá taa tɔ . Tɔɔsɩ mpa paa sɛɣɛsa - ŋ sɛɣɛsəŋ ɩnɩ tɔ pa tɔɔ .

text: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures , which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Na ń tɔɔsɩ tɔtɔ sɩ hatuu nyá pəcaatʋ kɛ n nyəmá Ɩsɔ Tɔm naŋŋ nyəntʋ , na ntɩ tə pəsəɣəna na tə ́ ha - ŋ laɣatʋ nti n ká lana na ń tɛ ́ nyá taa na Yesu Kilisiti na pə ya nyá nyʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: All scripture is given by inspiration of God , and is profitable for doctrine , for reproof , for correction , for instruction in righteousness :
text2: Ɩsɔ yelina na pá ŋmaa ɩ tɔm kɛ takəlasɩ taa . Na tə waasəɣɩ yəlaa , pə taɣa pʋlʋ , tə sɛɣɛsəɣɩ - wɛ na tə ́ kisiɣina - wɛɣɛ pɔpɔtʋ , na tə ́ taɣanəɣɩ - wɛɣɛ timpi timpi pa pəntəɣɩ tɔ , na tə ́ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ - wɛɣɛ ɩsəna paa təŋ tampana mammam kɛ pa kʋlapʋtʋ taa tɔ .

text: That the man of God may be perfect , throughly furnished unto all good works .
text2: Tə lakɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ tə taɣanəɣɩ Ɩsɔ yəlaa na pá te teu , na pá taa laŋ mpi paa lana pa təma kʋpana tɔ .

text: I charge thee therefore before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom ;
text2: Ma heeliɣi - ŋ na ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ kɛ Ɩsɔ na Yesu Kilisiti wei ɩ ká hʋʋna weesuɣu nyə ́ ma na sətaa kɛ tɔm tɔ pa ɩsɛntaa , na Yesu Kilisiti ɩnɩ ɩ kɔntɛ na ɩ kawulaɣa pə tɔɔ sɩ ,

text: Preach the word ; be instant in season , out of season ; reprove , rebuke , exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine .
text2: ń lakɩ Ɩsɔ waasʋ , nyaa sɛɛsɩ ɩsəlɛ te , paa pə maɣa - ŋ paa pə ta maɣa - ŋ . Kaana - wɛ na ń la na pá mʋ - tɩ . Kaləɣəna - wɛɣɛ timpi timpi pa pəntəɣɩ tɔ . Sɛɣɛsəɣɩ - wɛ na suulu sɔsɔ na pə ́ sɔɔsɩ - wɛɣɛ apalʋtʋ .

text: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine ; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers , having itching ears ;
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pɩɩ kɔɔ na pə ́ kɛɛsɩ waatʋ nɔɣɔlʋ tɔ , yəlaa kaa caa sɩ pá tasa sɛɣɛsəŋ kʋpaŋ wei ɩ waasəɣɩ yəlaa tɔɣɔ mʋɣʋ tɔtɔ . Ama pa maɣamaɣa pa kʋnyɩɩləŋ kɛ paa təŋəɣɩ , na pá koti sɛɣɛsəlaa paɣalɛ na pɛlɛ pá sɛɣɛsɩ - wɛɣɛ ntiwɛ ntiwɛ pa caa pá nɩɩkɩ tɔ .

text: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth , and shall be turned unto fables .
text2: Paa kisi tɔm tampana nyəntʋ , na pá paasəna sɔsaa taa kpaɩ tɔmnaa .

text: But watch thou in all things , endure afflictions , do the work of an evangelist , make full proof of thy ministry .
text2: Ama nyá ɩlɛ , kpa nyá təɣɩ pə təna pə taa . Kantələɣɩ kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛnaa taa . La Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kpaallʋ təmlɛ . Paasəna nyá təmlɛ tənaɣa teu tətetete ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ təmlɛ tʋ lakɩ tɔ .

text: For I am now ready to be offered , and the time of my departure is at hand .
text2: Tɔʋ , ye ma ɩlɛ wule nte paa lana - m kɔtaɣa tɔ tə talaa kɛ ́ , ma kʋyakʋ kʋkpemuɣu talaa .

text: I have fought a good fight , I have finished my course , I have kept the faith :
text2: Ma yoowa təcam . Ma sewa na má tala ma tənaɣa . Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ma tɛmna ma taa kɛ ́ tam .

text: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness , which the Lord , the righteous judge , shall give me at that day : and not to me only , but unto all them also that love his appearing .
text2: Na pənɛntɛ tampana təŋlaa teeli ntenuɣu taŋna - m , ŋkʋɣʋ Tacaa wei ɩ təŋəɣɩ tampana na ɩ ́ hʋʋkəna tɔ ɩ ká ha - m kʋyakʋ ŋkʋ kʋ wule . Na pə taɣa ma tike kɛ ɩ ká ha , ama na pa təna mpa pa caɣaa na pá nyɩɩləɣɩ ɩ kɔntɛ wule tɔ .

text: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me :
text2: La kookalɩ na ń kɔɔ ma kiŋ kɛ lɔŋ .

text: For Demas hath forsaken me , having loved this present world , and is departed unto Thessalonica ; Crescens to Galatia , Titus unto Dalmatia .
text2: Mpi tɔ Temasɩ sɔɔla kaɣana antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ nyəntʋ kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ lɔ - m na ɩ ́ tɛɛna Tɛsalonikɩ . Kəlɛɛsaŋ ná tɛɛna Kalatɩ na Titʋ ɩlɛɣɛ Talamatii .

text: Only Luke is with me . Take Mark , and bring him with thee : for he is profitable to me for the ministry .
text2: Luku tike kɛ pə yelina - m . Ye n kɔŋ kpɛŋna Maləkɩ na nyá na - ɩ ɩ ́ kɔɔ , ɩ ka səŋna - m ma təmlɛ .

text: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus .
text2: Ma tila Tisikɩ ɩlɛɣɛ Ɩfeesu .

text: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus , when thou comest , bring with thee , and the books , but especially the parchments .
text2: Ma yela ma kpaɩ kɛ Kaləpusɩ tɛɣɛ Tʋlʋwasɩ , ye n kɔŋ ɩlɛ n kpɛŋna na ń kɔna . Kpɛŋna tɔtɔɣɔ ma takəlasɩ , na nsi ma tɩɩ kəla nyɩɩlʋɣʋ tɔɣɔlɛ tɔnəŋ nyənsɩ .

text: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil : the Lord reward him according to his works :
text2: Koolu Alɛkəsantəlɩ lapa - m ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ sɔsɔm , ɩlɛ Tacaa ká lɛɛtəna - ɩ mpi mpi ɩ lapa tɔ .

text: Of whom be thou ware also ; for he hath greatly withstood our words .
text2: Nyá maɣamaɣa lana - ɩ laakalɩ . Mpi tɔ ɩ sula nti tɩɩ yɔɣɔtaa tɔɣɔ kpɛɛsənaʋ .

text: At my first answer no man stood with me , but all men forsook me : I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge .
text2: Waatʋ wei pa hʋʋkaɣana - m tɔm kancaalaɣa nyəm tɔ nɔɣɔlʋ ta təŋ ma waalɩ , pa təna pa lɔ - m kɛ ́ . Ɩlɛ Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ taa pɔɔsɩ - wɛɣɛ - tɩ .

text: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me , and strengthened me ; that by me the preaching might be fully known , and that all the Gentiles might hear : and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion .
text2: Pə na pə mpʋ tɔ Tacaa səŋa ma waalɩ na ɩ ́ ha - m apalʋtʋ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma pəsaa na má lá waasʋ kɛ teu , na mpa pa ta kɛ Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ pa təna pá nɩɩ - ɩ teu . Na pə yapa - m tɔtɔɣɔ tɔɣɔlaɣa nɔɣɔ taa .

text: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work , and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom : to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
