text2: Na ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Tacaa ká yakɩ - m paa ɩsaɣatʋ nti tə taa , haləna ɩ ́ tana - m ɩ ɩsɔtaa kawulaɣa taa na ma alaafəya . Aaa , tə tʋ - ɩ teeli kɛ tam tɔɔ . Ami .

text: Salute Prisca and Aquila , and the household of Onesiphorus .
text2: Sɛɛ Pilisila na Akilaasɩ , na ń sɛɛ Honesifɔɔ təyaɣa nyə ́ ma .

text: Erastus abode at Corinth : but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick .
text2: Ɩlasətɩ ná saala Kɔlɛntɩ . Tʋlʋfim fɛɩna alaafəya , ɩlɛ ma yela ɩlɛɣɛ Mile .

text: Do thy diligence to come before winter . Eubulus greeteth thee , and Pudens , and Linus , and Claudia , and all the brethren .
text2: La kookalɩ na ń kɔɔ na pə ́ cɔ ́ hilimatɛ tʋlɩ . Yupulusi na Putɛŋ na Linusi na Kolotiya na tá taapalaa təna sɩ má sɛɛ - ŋ .

text: The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Tacaa ɩ ́ səna - ŋ . Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ mə tənaɣa pɛɛlɛɛ .

text: Paul , a servant of God , and an apostle of Jesus Christ , according to the faith of God ' s elect , and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness ;
text2: Maɣa Ɩsɔ təmlɛ tʋ Pɔɔlɩ , Yesu Kilisiti tillu . Pa tʋ - m kɛ ́ sɩ má la na mpa Ɩsɔ ləsaa tɔ pá mʋ Ɩsɔ , na má hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - wɛɣɛ tampana nna tá Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ mpaaʋ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ tɔ ,

text: In hope of eternal life , which God , that cannot lie , promised before the world began ;
text2: na pá tɛ pa taa sɩ paa hiki weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ . Ɩsɔ ka tɔmna hatuu lɔŋ kɛ yem taa sɩ ɩ ká ha - tʋɣʋ weesuɣu ŋkʋ , Ɩsɔ tá kɛ ́ kaloolaɣa tʋ .

text: But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching , which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour ;
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə kɔma na pə ́ tala waatʋ wei ɩ ka sɩɩwa tɔ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yele na ɩ ́ tɔm kuli weesuɣu ŋkʋ kʋ tɔɔ na pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ . Tá Yatʋ Tacaa Ɩsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ tʋ - m sɩ má kpaalɩ ɩ tɔm na má tɔŋna - təɣɩ kpaalʋɣʋ tɔ , ntɩ tə kuliɣina mpʋ na tə ́ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ .

text: To Titus , mine own son after the common faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour .
text2: Titʋ , má ŋmaakəna - ŋ takəlaɣa kanɛ . Nyá kɛna ma pəyalʋ na tampana kɛ Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ mpaaʋ ŋku tá təna tə təŋəɣɩ tɔ kʋ taa . Tacaa Ɩsɔ na tá Yatʋ Yesu Kilisiti pá hʋlɩ - ŋ pɛɛlɛɛ na pá ha - ŋ alaafəya .

text: For this cause left I thee in Crete , that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting , and ordain elders in every city , as I had appointed thee :
text2: Maa yela - ŋ Kəlɛɛtɩ kɛ ́ sɩ ń taɣanɩ mpi pə kaasa taɣanʋɣʋ tɔ tətetete , na ń kpa paa ɩcatɛ nte tə Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsaa . Tɔɔsɩ nti ma kɛɛsa - ŋ tɔ sɩ :

text: If any be blameless , the husband of one wife , having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly .
text2: Wei ɩ kiŋ pa kaa na kawaliya nakəlɩ tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ ká tɔɣɔna Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔɔntʋ . Alʋ kʋlʋm kɛ pʋntʋ ɩnɩ ɩ ká wɛɛna . Na ɩ piya ká la Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa , sɩ taa wɛɛ piya nsi yəlaa tɔŋ sɩ sɩ kɛ yem yem lataa sɩɩ nɩɩkəna yəlaa tɔ .

text: For a bishop must be blameless , as the steward of God ; not selfwilled , not soon angry , not given to wine , no striker , not given to filthy lucre ;
text2: Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔ wɛɛkʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa tɔ Ɩsɔ təma kɛ pə tʋ - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ paasəɣəna . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə fɛɩ sɩ pá ná kawaliya nakələɣɩ ɩ kiŋ . Ɩ kaa wɛɛ kalampaanɩ tʋ yaa wei ɩɩ laa pááná mʋɣʋ tɔ , yaa sʋlʋnyɔɔlʋ yaa mʋsʋŋ tʋ , yaa wei ɩ muɣuliɣi sɩ ɩ ́ hiki liɣitee tɔ .

text: But a lover of hospitality , a lover of good men , sober , just , holy , temperate ;
text2: Ɩ ká wɛɛ wei yəlaa ɩ ́ kɔma ɩ tɛ ɩ nyəmá mʋʋllɛ lapʋ , na ɩ ́ sɔɔla mpi pə wɛ teu , na ɩ ́ wɛna ləmaɣasɛɛ tɔ . Ɩ ká wɛɛ wei ɩ təŋəɣɩ tampana , na ɩ ́ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ yʋlʋ , na ɩ ́ nyəmá ɩ tɩ tɔkʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught , that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers .
text2: Ɩ ká wɛɛ wei ɩ nyɔɔna Ɩsɔ Tɔm maɣamaɣa təkpaŋkpaŋkpa kɛ teitei ɩsɩɩ paa sɛɣɛsa - ɩ tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pəsɩ na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsɩ lɛlaa kɛ sɛɣɛsəŋ kʋpaŋ wei ɩ waasəɣɩ yəlaa tɔ na ɩ ́ tasa - wɛɣɛ tɔm . Pə kaasa kpɛɛsəlaa pɔpɔtʋnaa mpa pɛlɛ tɔ , ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - wɛɣɛ ɩsəna mpi pa toolaa tɔ .

text: For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers , specially they of the circumcision :
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , yəlaa wɛ paɣalɛ na pə ́ tɩɩ kələna Yuta nyə ́ ma mpa pa mʋ Yesu na pá kɛ ́ kaanɩɩtʋnaa tɔ . Kpaɩ tɔmnaa kɛ pa sɛɣɛsəɣɩ na pá puɣusiɣina lɛlaa .

text: Whose mouths must be stopped , who subvert whole houses , teaching things which they ought not , for filthy lucre ' s sake .
text2: Təkɩ - wɛ sɩ pá su mpʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa kɛ ́ tɛɛsɩ yɔkəlaa kɛ ́ , na nti tə fɛɩ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ tɔ ntəɣɩ pa sɛɣɛsəɣɩ na pá mʋɣɩ liɣitee kɛ tulum .

text: One of themselves , even a prophet of their own , said , The Cretians are alway liars , evil beasts , slow bellies .
text2: Kəlɛɛtɩ nyə ́ ma Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa taa nɔɣɔlʋ wei ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ kɛ ́ Kəlɛɛtɩ tʋ tɔ ɩ ka yɔɣɔta ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ : Kəlɛɛtɩ nyə ́ ma nyəntʋ ntɛ ́ cɛsʋɣʋ . Pa kɛ ́ nyəməŋtʋnaa kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ taalɛ wontu . Hilikpaakʋnaa kɛ ́ , pəcɔ paa caa lapʋ .

text: This witness is true . Wherefore rebuke them sharply , that they may be sound in the faith ;
text2: Nti ɩ yɔɣɔta mpʋ tɔ ɩ na - təɣɩ . Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ kpɩɩlɩ - wɛɣɛ teu na pə ́ la na pá tɛ Ɩsɔ na pa taa kɛ ́ teu .

text: Not giving heed to Jewish fables , and commandments of men , that turn from the truth .
text2: Na pá yele Yuta nyə ́ ma sɔsaa taa tɔmnaa kpaɩ nyəntʋ na kʋsəsɩɩtʋ nti yəlaa mpa pa kisa tampana təŋʋɣʋ na pá lu tɔ tə təŋʋɣʋ .

text: Unto the pure all things are pure : but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure ; but even their mind and conscience is defiled .
text2: Mpa pa taa tewa tɔ pə təna pə te pɛlɛɣɛ . Ama mpa pa taa tá te pəyele paa tɛŋ Ɩsɔ na pa taa tɔ pə təna pə kɛ ́ ɩsaɣam kɛ pɛlɛ pa kiŋ kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa laɣatʋ na pa laakalənaa laɣalaa .

text: They profess that they know God ; but in works they deny him , being abominable , and disobedient , and unto every good work reprobate .
text2: Pá caɣaa ɩlɛ sɩ pa nyəmá Ɩsɔ . Ama ń nyənna pa lakasɩ pɩɩ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ sɩ pa nyəmá Ɩsɔ se . Pa lɩɩ yəlaa kɛ sɔŋ kɛ ́ , na pa kɛ ́ kaanɩɩtʋnaa , paa pəsəɣɩ təmlɛ kʋpantɛ natələɣɩ lapʋ na ń ná .

text: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine :
text2: Ye nyá ɩlɛ sɛɣɛsɩ - wɛɣɛ sɛɣɛsəŋ kʋpaŋ wei ɩ waasəɣɩ yəlaa tɔ .

text: That the aged men be sober , grave , temperate , sound in faith , in charity , in patience .
text2: Heeli apalaa kʋkpatəlaa sɩ pá kpa pa tɩ , na pá wɛɛna yaasi kʋpaŋ , na pá kpakəɣɩ ləmaɣasɛɛ . Pá tɔkɩ Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ mpaaʋ na lɛlaa sɔɔlʋɣʋ na suulu hʋ ́ lʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ kɛ teu .

text: The aged women likewise , that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness , not false accusers , not given to much wine , teachers of good things ;
text2: Heeli alaa kʋkpatəlaa sɩ pɛlɛ pá tɔkɩ yaasi kʋpaŋ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ yəlaa wɛɛkʋɣʋ tɔ . Pá taa cakəna yəlaa , na pá taa yele na sʋlʋm hɔkɔ - wɛ . Ama pá wɛɛ mpa pa tasəɣɩ alaa səkpema kɛ tɔm

text: That they may teach the young women to be sober , to love their husbands , to love their children ,
text2: kɛ ɩsəna pɛlɛ paa sɔɔlɩ pa paalaa na pa piya tɔ ,

text: To be discreet , chaste , keepers at home , good , obedient to their own husbands , that the word of God be not blasphemed .
text2: na ɩsəna paa kpaɣa ləmaɣasɛɛ na pá hatələna wasaŋkalətʋ tɔ , na ɩsəna paa lakɩ pa taasɩ təma kɛ teu tɔ , na ɩsəna mpi paa lakɩ kʋpantʋ na pá seeki pa paalaa tɔ . Ɩlɛ nɔɣɔlʋ kaa kʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm nyʋɣʋ kɛ pa tɔɔ .

text: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded .
text2: Sɛɣɛsɩ ɩfepiya kɛ teu tɔtɔ sɩ pá kpaɣa ləmaɣasɛɛ kɛ teu .

text: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works : in doctrine shewing uncorruptness , gravity , sincerity ,
text2: Nyá maɣamaɣa lakɩ təma kʋpana na pá nyənəɣəna - ŋ na pá lakɩ . Paasɩ na ń sɛɣɛsəna tampana na ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ .

text: Sound speech , that cannot be condemned ; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed , having no evil thing to say of you .
text2: Taɣanəɣɩ nyá tɔm , taa yele na ń kɔɔ na ń pəntəɣɩ nyá yɔɣɔtaɣa taa na pá footuɣu - ŋ na - kɛ . Ye n taɣana - kɛɣɛ teu ɩlɛ pɩɩ tʋ tá kolontunaa kɛ fɛɛlɛ . Mpi tɔ pa kaa na ɩsaɣatʋ nti paa yɔɣɔtɩ tá tɔɔ tɔ .

text: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters , and to please them well in all things ; not answering again ;
text2: Yomaa ká nɩɩna pa caanaa na pá lá na pɛlɛ pa laŋa hɛɛna - wɛɣɛ pa kʋlapəlɛ təna taa , na pá taa kɛɛsəɣɩ - wɛɣɛ natəlɩ .

text: Not purloining , but shewing all good fidelity ; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things .
text2: Pá taa ŋmɩɩlɩ paa pʋlʋ cəcəka . Ama pá lakɩ tam na pa caanaa naakɩ sɩ pa yomaa kɛ kʋpama na pá nɩɩkəna - wɛ , na pɩɩ la na tá Yatʋ Ɩsɔ tɔɔ tɔm nti tə sɛɣɛsəɣɩ tɔ tə nyʋɣʋ kʋlɩ pə təna pə taa .

text: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men ,
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ kulina ɩ pɛɛlɛɛ tɔɔ na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ pə ya paa wei ɩ nyʋɣʋ .

text: Teaching us that , denying ungodliness and worldly lusts , we should live soberly , righteously , and godly , in this present world ;
text2: Pɛɛlɛɛ anɩ a sɛɣɛsəna - tʋ sɩ tə ́ yele ɩsaɣatʋ taa kɛ ́ tɔntɛ na atɛ cənɛ kʋnyɩɩləŋ kɛ mpʋ , na tə ́ kpaɣa ləmaɣasɛɛ na tə ́ təŋ siɣisuɣu , na tə ́ nɩɩkəna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tam kɛ ́ tá tɔntɛ taa kɛ ́ antulinya taa cənɛ .

text: Looking for that blessed hope , and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ ;
text2: Pɛɛlɛɛ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ sɩ tə ́ caɣa mpʋ na tə ́ taŋa leleŋ nɩɩʋ kʋyakʋ ŋku tə wɛɛ na tə ́ tɛɛləɣɩ tɔ . Kʋ wule kɛ tá Yatʋ Yesu Kilisiti Ɩsɔ Sɔsɔ teeli ká kɔɔ .

text: Who gave himself for us , that he might redeem us from all iniquity , and purify unto himself a peculiar people , zealous of good works .
text2: Yesu Kilisiti ɩnɩ ɩ hana ɩ təɣɩ tá tɔɔ na ɩ ́ ya - tʋɣʋ ɩsaɣatʋ təna taa , na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ - tʋɣʋ teu na tə ́ pəsɩ yəlaa mpa ɩ tike ɩ tɩ tɔ , na tá ɩsəlɛ sɛɛna təma kʋpana lapʋ .

text: These things speak , and exhort , and rebuke with all authority . Let no man despise thee .
text2: Tənɛ ɩnəɣɩ n ka heeliɣi - wɛ . Lakəna sɔsɔɔntʋ nti pa tʋ - ŋ tɔ tə toma təna , na ń sɔɔsəɣɩ nyá yəlaa kɛ apalʋtʋ , yaa ye kalənaʋ kaləna - wɛ . Taa yele na nɔɣɔlʋ kpɛɛna - ŋ .

text: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers , to obey magistrates , to be ready to every good work ,
text2: Tɔɔsɩ pa təna sɩ pə wɛɛ sɩ pá seeki tɛtʋ tɔkəlaa . Pə wɛɛ sɩ pá nɩɩkəna - wɛɣɛ . Na pa sɔɔlʋ ɩ ́ pɩɩ təma kʋpana lapʋ tɔɔ .

text: To speak evil of no man , to be no brawlers , but gentle , shewing all meekness unto all men .
text2: Pá taa tʋʋkɩ nɔɣɔlʋ , ama pá wɛɛ təpamm , na pá wɛna yəllɛ , na pa na yəlaa təna pa wɛna təma na leleŋ .

text: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish , disobedient , deceived , serving divers lusts and pleasures , living in malice and envy , hateful , and hating one another .
text2: Tá maɣamaɣa ɩsəntɔ tɩɩ kɛ ́ tuutuu lataa tɔtɔɣɔ hatuu lɔŋ kɛ ́ , na kaanɩɩtʋnaa , na tɩɩ toolaa kɛ ́ . Na kʋnyɩɩləŋ na mpi pə hɛɛsəɣɩ tá laŋa tɔ pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə nɔɣɔ na pə suka ka kpana - tʋɣʋ yomle , na ɩsaɣatʋ na kʋnyɩɩləŋ pə taa kɛ ́ tɩɩ wɛɛ . Tə taa caakɩ tá təmaɣa paa pəcɔ maɣamaɣa .

text: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared ,
text2: Ama pə kɔma na Ɩsɔ tá Yatʋ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ yəlaa kɛ ɩ kʋpantʋ na ɩ pɛɛlɛɛ ,

text: Not by works of righteousness which we have done , but according to his mercy he saved us , by the washing of regeneration , and renewing of the Holy Ghost ;
text2: ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ya - tʋ . Ɩlɛ pə taɣa tá təma kʋsiɣisee tɔɔ . Ama tá pətɔɔtəlɛ kɛ ɩ wiiwa na ɩ ́ la mpʋ . Ɩsɔ lʋm mpi pa sɔ - tʋ na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ náá wɛ pə taa na ɩ ́ laɣasəɣɩ - tʋ na tə ́ pəsəɣɩ kʋfama na tə ́ tɔŋ tɔntɛ kʋfatɛ tɔ mpəɣɩ ɩ yapəna - tʋ .

text: Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour ;
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ yelina tá Yatʋ Yesu Kilisiti kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ tisi Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kɛ tá tɔɔ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ ,

text: That being justified by his grace , we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life .
text2: sɩ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ - tʋɣʋ ɩ pɛɛlɛɛ na tə ́ pəsɩ kʋpama kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa , na tə ́ hiki weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ na tə ́ wɛɛ na tə ́ tɛɛləɣɩ - kʋ tɔ .

text: This is a faithful saying , and these things I will that thou affirm constantly , that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works . These things are good and profitable unto men .
text2: Tɔm tənɛ tampana tɔm tike təkelekele kɛ ́ . Ma caa kɛ ́ sɩ ń sɛɛsɩ ɩsəlɛ na tɔm tənɛ tə sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ , na mpa pa tɛma Ɩsɔ na pa taa tɔ pá ha pa təɣɩ təma kʋpana lapʋ taa kɛ ́ tam . Mpi pə tewa na pə waasəɣɩ tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: But avoid foolish questions , and genealogies , and contentions , and strivings about the law ; for they are unprofitable and vain .
text2: Ama cɔləɣɩ kʋmɛlətɔmnaa tɔɔ hɔm na lʋləŋ loosi təŋʋɣʋ . Cɔləɣɩ yooŋ na ntɔŋkpɛɛsasɩ kɛ Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔɔ . Ntɩ ɩnɩ tə kʋɣɩ təma kɛ teu kɛ ́ , pəcɔ tɩɩ waasəɣɩ pʋlʋ .

text: A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject ;
text2: Mpa pa yeki na faɣaʋ kɔŋ yəlaa taa tɔ , ye n kpaala - wɛɣɛ tɔm naalɛ na pá tá nɩɩ n tɔɣɔnɩ - wɛ .

text: Knowing that he that is such is subverted , and sinneth , being condemned of himself .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , n nyəmá teu sɩ yʋlʋ ɩ ́ wɛ mpʋ pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ yela mpaaʋ kʋsiɣisuɣu təŋʋɣʋ kɛ ́ . Na ɩsaɣatʋnaa mpa ɩ lakɩ tɔ pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ toolaa .

text: When I shall send Artemas unto thee , or Tychicus , be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis : for I have determined there to winter .
text2: Ye ma kɔma na má tili Aatema yaa Tisikɩ kɛ nyá kiŋ , ɩlɛ n nyəkɩ lɔŋ na ń kɔɔ na ń maɣana - m Nikopoli . Mpi tɔ ma tʋwa sɩ tənaɣa maa caɣa hilimatɛ waatʋ .

text: Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently , that nothing be wanting unto them .
text2: Paasəna tɔm hʋʋlʋ Senasɩ na Apɔlɔɔsɩ kɛ teu na pá taa laŋ pʋlʋɣʋ waatʋ wei paa tʋɣɩ pa mpaaʋ tɔ .

text: And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses , that they be not unfruitful .
text2: Pə wɛɛ sɩ tá yəlaa tɔtɔ ká nyɩ ɩsəna paa paasəna təma kʋpana lapʋ kɛ tam tɔ , na ye pə caala wei kɛ ́ teu , pa waasəna - ɩ , na pá taa caɣa yem təkpasa .

text: All that are with me salute thee . Greet them that love us in the faith . Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Pa təna mpa pa wɛ ma kiŋ cənɛ tɔ pa sɛɛkɩ - ŋ . Sɛɛ tá Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ taa taapalaa kʋpama . Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ mə tənaɣa ɩ pɛɛlɛɛ .

text: Paul , a prisoner of Jesus Christ , and Timothy our brother , unto Philemon our dearly beloved , and fellowlabourer ,
text2: Maɣa Pɔɔlɩ wei má ma kɛ ́ saləka tʋ kɛ Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ tɔ , má na tá taapalʋ Timotee . Tá ŋmaana takəlaɣa kanɛɣɛ tá taapalʋ kʋpaŋ Filemɔŋ , nyá wei tá na - ŋ tə kaa təmlɛ tɔ ,

text: And to our beloved Apphia , and Archippus our fellowsoldier , and to the church in thy house :
text2: na tá kɔɣɔ Apiya na ta na Aasipi wei tə yooki yoou tɔ , na mpa pa kotiɣi Yesu sɛɛʋ kɛ nyá təyaɣa taa tɔ , pa tənaɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tə ŋmaa - kɛ .

text: Grace to you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Tacaa Ɩsɔ na tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti pá hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ na pá ha - mɛɣɛ alaafəya .

text: I thank my God , making mention of thee always in my prayers ,
text2: Tam ma sələməŋ taa ma tɔɔsəɣɩ nyá tɔɔ na má sɛɛkɩ ma Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ .

text: Hearing of thy love and faith , which thou hast toward the Lord Jesus , and toward all saints ;
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ma nɩɩ ɩsəna n sɔɔla Ɩsɔ yəlaa təna , na ɩsəna n tɔka Tacaa Yesu mpaaʋ tɔm tɔ .

text: That the communication of thy faith may become effectual by the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in Christ Jesus .
text2: Na ma sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ sɩ ɩsəna tá na - ŋ tə kpɛnta ɩsəntɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ mpaaʋ tɔɔ tɔ pə ́ yele na ń cɛkəna teu təkpataa kɛ ́ kʋpantʋnaa mpa pa təna tə hikiɣi tá na Kilisiti tá kpɛntʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔ .

text: For we have great joy and consolation in thy love , because the bowels of the saints are refreshed by thee , brother .
text2: Ma taapalʋ , pɔpɔtʋ fɛɩ , ɩsəna n sɔɔlʋɣʋ yʋlʋ tɔ pə lapa - m leleŋ , na pə tasa - m apalʋtʋ kɛ teu . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , nyá yaasi ɩnɩ ɩ ́ hɛɛsa Ɩsɔ yəlaa paɣalɛ laŋa .

text: Wherefore , though I might be much bold in Christ to enjoin thee that which is convenient ,
text2: Tɔʋ , tɔm natələɣɩ ma caa - ŋ naʋ , na paa ma wɛna mpaa kɛ Kilisiti tɔɔ sɩ má caalɩ - ŋ pə taa ,

text: Yet for love ' s sake I rather beseech thee , being such an one as Paul the aged , and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ .
text2: ma luɣu lapa sɩ má na - ŋ - tɩ na tə ́ wii kʋnyɔŋ kɛ kʋwii . Nyənɩ , saŋa ɩsəntɔ Pɔɔlɩ má ma kpatəlaa kɛlɛ , pə ́ cɔ ́ ma kɛ ́ saləka tʋ kɛ Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ .

text: I beseech thee for my son Onesimus , whom I have begotten in my bonds :
text2: Ma pəyaɣa Onesim tɔm kɛ ma caa ma na - ŋ , ma pəsa ɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa caa kɛ saləka taa cənɛ .

text: Which in time past was to thee unprofitable , but now profitable to thee and to me :
text2: Ɩ ka kɛ ́ kaawaasaɣa kɛ waatʋ wei ɩ wɛ nyá kiŋ tɔ . Ama kaɣana ɩ waasəɣɩ má na - ŋ .

text: Whom I have sent again : thou therefore receive him , that is , mine own bowels :
text2: Tɔʋ , nɔɔnɔɔ ma mələɣənaŋ - ɩ na ma ləsaɣa kɛ ́ .

text: Whom I would have retained with me , that in thy stead he might have ministered unto me in the bonds of the gospel :
text2: Ma nyɩɩla teu sɩ ɩ ́ saalɩ ma kiŋ cənɛ na ɩ ́ səna - m na nyá nɔɣɔ kɛ saləka wei ma tɔkɩ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔɔ tɔ ɩ taa .

text: But without thy mind would I do nothing ; that thy benefit should not be as it were of necessity , but willingly .
text2: Ama ma ta sɔɔlɩ sɩ má lá pʋlʋpʋ na nyá waalɩ kɛ ́ mpʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ma luɣu fɛɩ sɩ ń la - m kʋpantʋ natəlɩ na təlasɩ . Ama ma caa kɛ ́ sɩ ń la ɩsəna n nɔkaa tɔ .

text: For perhaps he therefore departed for a season , that thou shouldest receive him for ever ;
text2: Ntanyɩ pə yasa nyá na - ɩ kɛ ́ wɛɛ naalɛɣɛ sɩ pə ́ taɣanɩ - mɛɣɛ kpɛntʋɣʋ kɛ tam tɔɔ .

text: Not now as a servant , but above a servant , a brother beloved , specially to me , but how much more unto thee , both in the flesh , and in the Lord ?
text2: Pənɛntaa pə kaa wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ na ɩ yom kɛ yem , ɩ tɛɛ mpʋ . Ɩ pəsa tá taapalʋ kʋpampaŋ kɛ Kilisiti mpaaʋ taa . Ɩ tɛma ma nyəŋ kɛ pəsʋɣʋ təkpataa , ɩlɛ nyaɣa pə kaasənaa sɩ ɩ ́ pəsɩ nyá nyəŋ na pə ́ kəlɩ mpʋ , paa ɩsɩɩ nyá yom , paa ɩsɩɩ nyá taapalʋ kɛ Tacaa təŋʋɣʋ taa .

text: If thou count me therefore a partner , receive him as myself .
text2: Mpʋ tɔ ye n nyənəɣɩ - m ɩsɩɩ nyá taapalʋ , mʋ - ɩ ɩsɩɩ ye má n ka mʋ - m tɔ .

text: If he hath wronged thee , or oweth thee ought , put that on mine account ;
text2: Ye ɩ ka wakəla - ŋ pʋlʋ , yaa ɩ wɛna - ŋ kəmlɛ natəlɩ , pɔɔsɩ má .

text: I Paul have written it with mine own hand , I will repay it : albeit I do not say to thee how thou owest unto me even thine own self besides .
text2: Maa fɛlɩ - ŋ pə təna . Pɔɔlɩ má ma maɣamaɣa ma ŋmaana na ma niŋ kɛ mpʋ . Ɩlɛ maa nɔkəɣɩ na má heeli - ŋ sɩ nyá maɣamaɣa n wɛna - m kəmlɛ , haləna nyá niŋ na nyá nɔɔhɛɛ , ma tənna .

text: Yea , brother , let me have joy of thee in the Lord : refresh my bowels in the Lord .
text2: Haɩ hɛɛsɩ ma laŋlɛ kɛ tə kɛ ́ Kilisiti nyə ́ ma tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: Having confidence in thy obedience I wrote unto thee , knowing that thou wilt also do more than I say .
text2: Ma tɔŋna takəlaɣa kanɛɣɛ ŋmaaʋ kɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ na má tʋ - ŋ naani kɛ ́ sɩ n ká la pə təna , haləna pə ́ tɛləsɩ mpʋ .

text: But withal prepare me also a lodging : for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given unto you .
text2: Na pə kaasa - m lɛntɩ sɩ ń caa - m kutuluɣu , pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ma tʋ tɛɛlʋɣʋ sɩ mə Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ ká yele na pá tʋlɩ - m na má kɔɔ mə tɛ .

text: There salute thee Epaphras , my fellowprisoner in Christ Jesus ;
text2: Ma taapalʋ Ɩpafəlasɩ wei pa təka ma na - ɩ kɛ ́ saləka taa cənɛɣɛ Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ tɔ ɩ sɛɛkɩ - ŋ .

text: Marcus , Aristarchus , Demas , Lucas , my fellowlabourers .
text2: Maləkɩ na Alisitaakɩ na Temasɩ na Luku mpa ma na - wɛ tə lakɩ təmlɛ kɛ cənɛ tɔ pɛlɛ pa sɛɛ - ŋ tɔtɔ .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ .

text: God , who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets ,
text2: Lɔŋ Ɩsɔ ka wɛ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa kiŋ kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəna tá caanaa caanaa kɛ tɔm paɣalɛ taa na yaasinaa paɣalɛ taa .

text: Hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son , whom he hath appointed heir of all things , by whom also he made the worlds ;
text2: Ama pə tala kaɣana kʋyɛɛŋ kʋtɛɛsəŋ ɩnɛ ɩ taa tɔ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ Pəyaɣa kiŋ kɛ ɩ wɛɛ na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəna - tʋ . Na ɩ Pəyaɣa ŋkɛ ka niŋ kɛ ɩ lapəna ɩsɔtaa na atɛ , na ŋkɛɣɛ ɩ ləsaa sɩ ká tɩ pə təna təpaɩ .

text: Who being the brightness of his glory , and the express image of his person , and upholding all things by the word of his power , when he had by himself purged our sins , sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high ;
text2: Nkɛ ka kiŋ kɛ Ɩsɔ teeli naakɩ na pə ́ tee ɩsɩɩ kɔkɔ . Na ka kiŋ tɔtɔɣɔ pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ teitei kɛ ́ ɩsəna Ɩsɔ wɛɛtʋ maɣamaɣa wɛɛ tɔ . Ɩ nɔɣɔ taa tɔm toma kɛ ɩ tɔkəna ɩsɔtaa na atɛ na pə ́ səŋaa . Ɩ tɛma yəlaa ɩsaɣatʋ kpiisuɣu təkpatakpata ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpa na ɩ ́ caɣa Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa tʋ kɔŋkɔŋ taa .

text: Being made so much better than the angels , as he hath by inheritance obtained a more excellent name than they .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa ŋkɛ ka kəla ɩsɔtaa tillaa təcaɣacaɣa tɔ , ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ ha - kɛɣɛ hətɛ nte tə kəla ɩsɔtaa tillaa nyəna tɔ .

text: For unto which of the angels said he at any time , Thou art my Son , this day have I begotten thee ? And again , I will be to him a Father , and he shall be to me a Son ?
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ ta yɔɣɔtəta ɩsɔtaa tillu nɔɣɔlʋ sɩ : Nyaɣalɛ ma Pəyaɣa , saŋa kɛ ma pəsa nyá Caa . Ɩ ta yɔɣɔtəta ɩsɔtaa tillu nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ tɔm tɔtɔ sɩ : Maa la nyá Caa na nyaa pəsɩ ma Pəyaɣa .

text: And again , when he bringeth in the firstbegotten into the world , he saith , And let all the angels of God worship him .
text2: Ama waatʋ wei Ɩsɔ kɔŋaɣana ɩ Pəyaɣa kancaalaɣa nyəŋka kɛ antulinya taa tɔ ɩ tɔma sɩ : Ɩsɔ ɩsɔtaa tillaa təna ká sɛɛ - ɩ kɛ ́ .

text: And of the angels he saith , Who maketh his angels spirits , and his ministers a flame of fire .
text2: Mpi Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔta ɩsɔtaa tillaa tɔɔ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Ɩsɔ kpaɣa ɩsɔtaa tillaa na ɩ ́ lana - wɛ na pá pəsɩ heelim . Ɩ lapa na ɩ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma náá pəsɩ kɔkɔsɩ nsi sɩ mʋɣɩ kemkem tɔ .

text: But unto the Son he saith , Thy throne , O God , is for ever and ever : a sceptre of righteousness is the sceptre of thy kingdom .
text2: Ama pə tala ɩ Pəyaɣa ɩlɛna ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ təfoo sɩ : Ɩsɔ , aa , nyá kumte wɛ tam kɛ ́ . Tampana taa kɛ ́ n tɔkɩ nyá kawulaɣa .

text: Thou hast loved righteousness , and hated iniquity ; therefore God , even thy God , hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows .
text2: N sɔɔla kʋpantʋ na ń kisi ɩsaɣatʋ təcaɣacaɣa . Ɩsɔ , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ nyá Ɩsɔ ləsa - ŋ na nyá mpaa . Ɩ sɩɩ - ŋ teeli təcaɣalɛ taa sɩ nyá laŋlɛ ɩ ́ hʋlʋmɩ sɔsɔm . Təcaɣalɛ nte tə taa ɩ sɩɩ - ŋ mpʋ tɔ , tə kəla nte tə taa ɩ sɩɩ nyá taapalaa lɛlaa tɔ təcaɣacaɣa .

text: And , Thou , Lord , in the beginning hast laid the foundation of the earth ; and the heavens are the works of thine hands :
text2: Ɩ yɔɣɔtaa tɔtɔ sɩ : Tacaa , nyá lapəna tɛtʋ tənaɣa kancaalaɣa . Nyá maɣamaɣa nya niŋ lapəna ɩsɔtaa .

text: They shall perish ; but thou remainest ; and they all shall wax old as doth a garment ;
text2: Pə tənaɣa mpʋ pɩɩ saalɩ yem . Ama nyaa caɣa tam . Pə tənaɣa mpʋ pɩɩ cɛɣɛtɩ ɩsɩɩ wontu kususuutu cɛɣɛtʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: And as a vesture shalt thou fold them up , and they shall be changed : but thou art the same , and thy years shall not fail .
text2: N ká kpili - wɩ ɩsɩɩ pa kpiluɣu kpaɩ tɔ . Paa laɣasɩ - wɩ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ laɣasʋɣʋ ɩ tɔɔ wontu kʋsusuutu tɔ . Ama nyá , nyaa wɛɛ tam kɛ ́ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ , n kaa kpatəlɩ .

text: But to which of the angels said he at any time , Sit on my right hand , until I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: Tuu tɔ Ɩsɔ ta yɔɣɔtəta ɩ ɩsɔtaa tillaa taa nɔɣɔlʋ sɩ : Caɣa ma kɔŋkɔŋ taa haləna má kɔna nyá kolontunaa na ń loosi nyá nɔɔhɛɛ kɛ pa tɔɔ .

text: Are they not all ministering spirits , sent forth to minister for them who shall be heirs of salvation ?
text2: Mpʋ tɔ , ɩsɔtaa tillaa ná kɛ ́ weɣelɔ ? Pa təna pa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ təmlɛ nyə ́ ma kɛ ́ , na paa naa ɩsɛntɔɔ . Mpɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ tiliɣi sɩ pá teŋ mpa pə kɛ ́ sɩ pɩɩ ya pa nyɔɔŋ tɔ .

text: Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed to the things which we have heard , lest at any time we should let them slip .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɩɩ tɔkɩ teu kɛ tampana tɔmnaa mpa pa heela - tʋ tɔ na pə ́ cɔ ́ pə taa kɔɔ na pə ́ pona - tʋɣʋ təlete taa kɛ ́ yem .

text: For if the word spoken by angels was stedfast , and every transgression and disobedience received a just recompence of reward ;
text2: Ɩsɔtaa tillaa kpaala tɔm nti tɔ təlɛ tə hika nyʋɣʋ kɛ ́ , haləna ye wei ɩ pənta - tɩ yaa ɩ kisa - tɩ pa tʋɣɩ pʋntʋ kɛ saləka wei pə nəɣəsənaa sɩ pá tʋ - ɩ tɔɣɔ .

text: How shall we escape , if we neglect so great salvation ; which at the first began to be spoken by the Lord , and was confirmed unto us by them that heard him ;
text2: Tɔʋ , pa ta kisi saləka tʋɣʋ kɛ mpa pa kisa ɩsɔtaa tillaa nyəntʋ tɔ , kacaŋfana ta mpa tɩɩ la awusa kɛ nyʋɣʋ yapʋ sɔsɔɔm pənɛ pə taka tɔ ? Tacaa ka caaləna nyʋɣʋ yapʋ pənɛ pə tɔm heeluɣu kɛ ɩ maɣamaɣa . Ɩlɛna mpa pɛlɛ pa nɩɩ - tɩ tɔ pɛlɛ pá tɛləsɩ taɣa pə tampana .

text: God also bearing them witness , both with signs and wonders , and with divers miracles , and gifts of the Holy Ghost , according to his own will ?
text2: Na Ɩsɔ kʋsa pa tɔm nyʋɣʋ na ɩ kɔkɔlɔ nyəm na sɔɣɔntʋ təma na piti təma təna lapʋ taa . Ɩ yelaa na ɩ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ lá na pʋlʋ lapʋ saa yəlaa ɩsɩɩ ɩ nɔkaa tɔ .

text: For unto the angels hath he not put in subjection the world to come , whereof we speak .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ , mpi tɔ pə taɣa ɩsɔtaa tillaa nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ məŋna antulinya wei ɩ kɔŋ na tə ́ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ ɩ tɔm tɔ .

text: But one in a certain place testified , saying , What is man , that thou art mindful of him ? or the son of man , that thou visitest him ?
text2: Ama nɔɣɔlʋ yɔɣɔta Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ tiili sɩ : Haɩ Ɩsɔ , yʋlʋ kɛ ́ we na ń tɔɔsəɣɩ ɩ tɔm ? Yʋlʋ wɛʋ mpʋ təkpem tɔ ɩ kɛ ́ we na ń paasəɣəna - ɩ ?

text: Thou madest him a little lower than the angels ; thou crownedst him with glory and honour , and didst set him over the works of thy hands :
text2: N yelaa sɩ ɩ ́ sɛkɩ ɩsɔtaa tillaa kɛ pəcɔ . N tʋ - ɩ teeli na ń kʋsɩ ɩ nyʋɣʋ ɩsɩɩ wulaʋ .

text: Thou hast put all things in subjection under his feet . For in that he put all in subjection under him , he left nothing that is not put under him . But now we see not yet all things put under him .
text2: N məŋna pə təna təpaɩ kɛ ́ ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ . Pa yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ mpʋ sɩ Ɩsɔ məŋna pə tənaɣa ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ tɔ , pə nyʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ ɩ kpaɣa pə təna təpaɩ kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ tʋ ́ yʋlʋ niŋ taa , pə ta kaasɩ pʋlʋ cəcəka . Paa na mpʋ tə naa kaɣana sɩ pə təna pə ta məlɩ yʋlʋ nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ .

text: But we see Jesus , who was made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death , crowned with glory and honour ; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man .
text2: Ama mpi tə naa tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ pə lapa Yesu na ɩ ́ sɛkɩ ɩsɔtaa tillaa kɛ pəcɔ sɩ ɩ ́ sɩ yəlaa təna səm kɛ Ɩsɔ pɛɛlɛɛ tɔɔ . Wahala wei ɩ tɔɣaa na ɩ ́ caŋ ɩ ́ sɩ tɔ ɩ tɔɔ , nɔɔnɔɔ tə naa pa tʋ - ɩ teeli na pá kʋsɩ ɩ nyʋɣʋ ɩsɩɩ wulaʋ .

text: For it became him , for whom are all things , and by whom are all things , in bringing many sons unto glory , to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings .
text2: Kʋpam pɩɩ mʋna mpʋ sɩ Ɩsɔ wei ɩ lapa pə təna na ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ paa mpi pə wɛɛ tɔ ɩ ́ la na Yesu te təkpataa kɛ ́ ɩ kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛnaa taa , na pə ́ cɔ ́ ɩ ́ pona pəyalaa paɣalɛ kɛ ɩ teeli taa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Yesu yekina na pə ́ yakɩ pa nyɔɔŋ .

text: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one : for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren ,
text2: Yesu kpiisiɣina yəlaa ɩsaɣatʋ . Pa təna mpa pa ɩsaɣatʋ kpiisa mpʋ tɔ , ɩ ́ na - wɛ pa kpɛnta Caa kʋlʋm kɛ ́ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə fɛɩ Yesu kɛ ́ fɛɛlɛ sɩ ɩ ́ yaa - wɛ sɩ ɩ newaa

text: Saying , I will declare thy name unto my brethren , in the midst of the church will I sing praise unto thee .
text2: kɛ waatʋ wei ɩ tɔŋ sɩ : Haɩ Ɩsɔ , maa heeli ma newaa kɛ nyá tɔm . Maa yoo yontu na má tala - ŋ samaa təna taa .

text: And again , I will put my trust in him . And again , Behold I and the children which God hath given me .
text2: Ɩ tɔma tɔtɔ sɩ : Maa tʋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ naani . Ɩ tasa yɔɣɔtaɣa tɔtɔ sɩ : Má na piya mpa Ɩsɔ ha - m tɔɣɔlɔ .

text: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood , he also himself likewise took part of the same ; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death , that is , the devil ;
text2: Ɩsɩɩ mpa ɩ yaa mpʋ sɩ piya tɔ pa kɛ ́ tɔnʋɣʋ na caləm kʋlʋməm tɔ , Yesu maɣamaɣa pəsa teitei ɩsɩɩ mpɛ , na ɩ ́ na - wɛ pá kpɛntɩ kʋlʋm . Ɩ lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ yɔkɩ ɩlɔɣɔʋ wei ɩ kiŋ səm toŋ wɛɛ tɔ sɩ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ toma ɩ ́ yɔkɩ təkpataa tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩnɩ ɩ lapa mpʋ na ɩ ́ sɩ ɩlɛna

text: And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage .
text2: ɩ ́ waasɩ mpa səm sɔɣɔntʋ tɔɔ pa pəsa ɩsɩɩ yomaa kɛ pa weesiŋ təna taa tɔ .

text: For verily he took not on him the nature of angels ; but he took on him the seed of Abraham .
text2: Mpi tɔ pə taɣa ɩsɔtaa tillaa kɛ ɩ waasəɣɩ . Ama Apəlaham piya kɛ ɩ waasəɣɩ ɩsɩɩ pa ŋmaaʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ .

text: Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren , that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God , to make reconciliation for the sins of the people .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ́ nəɣəsəna ɩ newaa təkpataa , na ɩ ́ pəsɩ pa kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ kʋpaŋ wei ɩ hʋləɣɩ yəlaa kɛ suulu kɛ sɔsɔm kɛ ɩ təmlɛ taa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa tɔ , pə ́ cɔ ́ pə ́ hɩɩsɩ samaa ɩsaɣatʋ .

text: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted , he is able to succour them that are tempted .
text2: Na ɩsɩɩ pə maɣasʋɣʋ ɩnɩ na ɩ ́ ná kʋnyɔŋ tɔ , pənɛntɛ ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ waasɩ mpa pa wɛ maɣasʋɣʋ taa tɔ .

text: Wherefore , holy brethren , partakers of the heavenly calling , consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession , Christ Jesus ;
text2: Ma taapalaa Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa mɛ mpa Ɩsɔ yaawa tɔ , ɩ ́ paasəna Yesu wei Ɩsɔ tilaa na ɩ ́ kɛ ́ ta Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ mpi pə tɔm tə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ ɩsəntɔ tɔ pə kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ na ɩ ́ ná .

text: Who was faithful to him that appointed him , as also Moses was faithful in all his house .
text2: Ɩsɔ ka ləsəna - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ la təmlɛ tənɛ , na ɩ ́ nɩɩna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teu ɩsɩɩ Moisi ka nɩɩna Ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ la ɩ təmlɛ kɛ Ɩsɔ təyaɣa təna taa tɔ .

text: For this man was counted worthy of more glory than Moses , inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house .
text2: Kutuluɣu ŋmalʋ wɛnna sam na pə ́ kəlɩ kutuluɣu maɣamaɣa . Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ Yesu mʋna sam na pə ́ kəlɩ Moisi təcaɣacaɣa .

text: For every house is builded by some man ; but he that built all things is God .
text2: N kaa na kutuluɣu kɛ yem na kʋ fɛɩna kʋ ŋmalʋ , na Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kɛna wei ɩ lapa pə təna tɔ .

text: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house , as a servant , for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after ;
text2: Ye Moisi ɩlɛ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ nɩɩna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teu kɛ Ɩsɔ təyaɣa təna taa . Ɩnəɣɩ pa tʋ təmlɛ sɩ ye Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ yɔɣɔta nti ɩlɛ ɩnɩ ɩ heeli .

text: But Christ as a son over his own house ; whose house are we , if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end .
text2: Ama Kilisiti wei ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ kɛ ́ Pəyalʋ maɣamaɣa na pa sɩɩ - ɩ Ɩsɔ təyaɣa sɔsɔ tɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ nɩɩna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teu tɔtɔ . Ye tə tɔka tá tɛɛlʋɣʋ na naani na pə ́ tá ciɣiti - tʋ ɩlɛ tə kɛ ́ ɩ təyaɣa nyə ́ ma ntɛ ́ .

text: Wherefore ( as the Holy Ghost saith , To day if ye will hear his voice ,
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ maɣamaɣa ka yɔɣɔta mpʋ sɩ : Ye ɩ ́ nɩɩ Ɩsɔ nɔɣɔ kɛ saŋa ,

text: Harden not your hearts , as in the provocation , in the day of temptation in the wilderness :
text2: ɩ ́ taa tasa ŋkpantɛɛləŋ lapʋ , ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ ka lapʋ waatʋ wei ɩ ́ kpɛɛsəna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ kʋyaŋku ɩ ́ maɣasa - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ naa ɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa tɔ . Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔtaa sɩ :

text: When your fathers tempted me , proved me , and saw my works forty years .
text2: Mə caanaa caanaa maɣasa - m təna , na pá lá sɩ pa naa ma waalɩ . Pəyele pa ná pə təna mpi mpi ma lapa pɩɩsɩ nɩɩlɛ taa tɔ .

text: Wherefore I was grieved with that generation , and said , They do alway err in their heart ; and they have not known my ways .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ yəlaa panɛ pa tɔm kpa - m pááná na má tɔ sɩ : Tam ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa liɣitiɣi pa hʋwɛɛ taa . Pa ta tɩɩ cɛkəna ma yaasi kɛ ́ paa pəcɔ .

text: So I sware in my wrath , They shall not enter into my rest . )
text2: Pááná kpa - m mpʋ ɩlɛna má tuu sɩ : Pa kaa sʋʋ ma hɛɛsʋɣʋ tete kɛ paa pəcɔ .

text: Take heed , brethren , lest there be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief , in departing from the living God .
text2: Ma taapalaa ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa kɔɔ na ɩ ́ lá ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ ɩ lotu taa na ɩ ́ la laŋkpɩɩsəŋ na ɩ ́ ha weesuɣu Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ siɣile .

text: But exhort one another daily , while it is called To day ; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin .
text2: Ama ɩ ́ tasəɣɩ təmaɣa apalʋtʋ kɛ paa ɩfemle nte , haləna mpi pa yaa sɩ saŋa kɛ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ pə ́ sɩɩ tənaɣa . Nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa yele na ɩsaɣatʋ puɣusi - ɩ na ɩ ́ lá laŋkpɩɩsəŋ .

text: For we are made partakers of Christ , if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end ;
text2: Pə wɛ mpʋ sɩ ye tə tɔka ta kancaalaaɣa naani wei tɩɩ wɛna tɔɣɔ teu haləna pə tənaɣa , tá na Kilisiti tɩɩ pəsɩ taapallɛ .

text: While it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts , as in the provocation .
text2: Nti pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Ye ɩ ́ nɩɩ Ɩsɔ nɔɣɔ kɛ saŋa , ɩ ́ taa tasa ŋkpantɛɛləŋ lapʋ , ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ ka lapʋ waatʋ wei ɩ ́ kpɛɛsəna Ɩsɔ tɔ .

text: For some , when they had heard , did provoke : howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses .
text2: Mpa pa taa nɩɩna Ɩsɔ nɔɣɔ na pá kʋ ́ lɩ ́ na pá kpɛɛsəna - ɩ ? Mpa pa təna Moisi ləsa Icipiti taa tɔɣɔ mɛɛ .

text: But with whom was he grieved forty years ? was it not with them that had sinned , whose carcases fell in the wilderness ?
text2: Na mpa pa tɔm kpana Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ pááná kɛ pɩɩsɩ nɩɩlɛ taa ? Mpa pa lapa ɩsaɣatʋ na pá sɩ ́ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa tɔɣɔ .

text: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest , but to them that believed not ?
text2: Mpaɣa Ɩsɔ ka tuunaa sɩ pa kaa sʋʋ ɩ hɛɛsʋɣʋ tete kɛ paa pəcɔ ? Mpa paa kpɛɛsəna - ɩ tɔɣɔ .

text: So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief .
text2: Tə nawa mpʋ sɩ pa ta tɛ Ɩsɔ na pa taa tɔɣɔ pa ta sʋʋ .

text: Let us therefore fear , lest , a promise being left us of entering into his rest , any of you should seem to come short of it .
text2: Ɩsɔ tɛma - tʋɣʋ heeluɣu təkpataa sɩ tə pəsəɣɩ na tə ́ sʋʋ timpi tá na - ɩ tɩɩ caɣa na tə ́ hɛɛsɩ tɔ . Mpʋ tɔ tə ́ la laakalɩ na pə ́ taa kɔɔ na mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ wɩɩna hɛɛsʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ taa kɛ ́ sʋʋʋ .

text: For unto us was the gospel preached , as well as unto them : but the word preached did not profit them , not being mixed with faith in them that heard it .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tə nɩɩ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ ɩnəɣɩ teitei kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa nyə ́ ma mpɛ . Pa nɩɩ tɔm ntɩ tɔ tə ta waasɩ - wɛɣɛ pʋlʋ . Mpi tɔ , pa nɩɩʋ - tɩ tɔ pa ta mʋ - tɩ na pá tɛ ́ Ɩsɔ na pa taa .

text: For we which have believed do enter into rest , as he said , As I have sworn in my wrath , if they shall enter into my rest : although the works were finished from the foundation of the world .
text2: Ta mpa tə tɛmna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tá taa tɔ tɩɩ sʋʋ hɛɛsʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ taa . Hɛɛsʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ tɔm kɛ Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Pááná kpa - m na má tuu sɩ , pa kaa sʋʋ ma hɛɛsʋɣʋ tete kɛ paa pəcɔ . Ɩ yɔɣɔta mpʋ , pəyele ɩ təmlɛ tɛma tɛm kɛ hatuu waatʋ wei ɩ lapa antulinya tɔ .

text: For he spake in a certain place of the seventh day on this wise , And God did rest the seventh day from all his works .
text2: Pa yɔɣɔta kʋyakʋ naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa nyəŋkʋ tɔm kɛ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ tiili sɩ : Ɩsɔ yela ɩ təmlɛ təna na ɩ ́ hɛɛsɩ kʋyakʋ naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa nyəŋkʋ wule .

text: And in this place again , If they shall enter into my rest .
text2: Na pá tasa tiiliɣi yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ : Pa kaa sʋʋ ma hɛɛsʋɣʋ tete kɛ paa pəcɔ .

text: Seeing therefore it remaineth that some must enter therein , and they to whom it was first preached entered not in because of unbelief :
text2: Mpa pa caala Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ ɩnəɣɩ nɩɩʋ tɔ pa ta sʋʋ hɛɛsʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ taa , mpi tɔ pa ta tɛ Ɩsɔ na pa taa . Pə na pə mpʋ tɔ pə wɛ pəsʋɣʋ sɩ lɛlaa ɩ ́ sʋʋ .

text: Again , he limiteth a certain day , saying in David , To day , after so long a time ; as it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ tasa kʋyakʋ kʋfalʋɣʋ kɛ sɩɩʋ na ɩ ́ yaa - kʋ sɩ Saŋa . Tə maɣamaɣa tə tɔm kɛ pɩɩsɩ kɔma na sɩ ́ siki sɔsɔm ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ yele na Tafiiti yɔɣɔtɩ tɔm nti tə tɛma nɩɩʋ tɔ sɩ : Ye ɩ ́ nɩɩ Ɩsɔ nɔɣɔ kɛ saŋa , ɩ ́ taa tasa ŋkpantɛɛləŋ lapʋ .

text: For if Jesus had given them rest , then would he not afterward have spoken of another day .
text2: Ye Yosuwee ka sʋsa yəlaa mpɛɣɛ hɛɛsʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ taa , Ɩsɔ taa tasa kʋyakʋ lɛŋkʋ tɔm kɛ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ .

text: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God .
text2: Ama hɛɛsʋɣʋ nakʋlɩ kʋ wɛɛ na pa hʋla - kʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ yəlaa , na kʋ nəɣəsəna Ɩsɔ kʋyakʋ naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa wule nyəŋkʋ .

text: For he that is entered into his rest , he also hath ceased from his own works , as God did from his .
text2: Pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ ye wei ɩ sʋʋ Ɩsɔ hɛɛsʋɣʋ tete ntɛ ́ tə taa pʋntʋ ká yele ɩ təma na ɩ ́ hɛɛsɩ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ maɣamaɣa yepu ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ nyəna na ɩ ́ hɛɛsɩ tɔ .

text: Let us labour therefore to enter into that rest , lest any man fall after the same example of unbelief .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tɩɩ la kookalɩ na tə ́ sʋʋ hɛɛsʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ taa . Tə ́ taa yele na tá taa nɔɣɔlʋ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ la kpɛɛsʋlʋ ɩsɩɩ lɛlaa lapʋ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa tɔ na ɩ ́ laŋ hɛɛsʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ taa sʋʋʋ .

text: For the word of God is quick , and powerful , and sharper than any twoedged sword , piercing even to the dividing asunder of soul and spirit , and of the joints and marrow , and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart .
text2: Ɩsɔ Tɔm wɛna toma na tə lakɩ təmlɛ . Tə kəla laɣatɛ nte tə sɛtəɣɩ taa na waalɩ tɔɣɔ lɔŋ . Ɩsɔ Tɔm ntɩ tə sʋʋkɩ na halɩ tə takɩ timpi ləsaɣa na ləmaɣasəlɛ pə nyəm suliɣi tɔ . Tə fakɩ atama na mʋɣʋlɛ taa pɛɛləm , na tə faɣasəɣɩ nti yʋlʋ nyɩɩləɣɩ na nti ɩ hʋʋkɩ ɩ lotu taa tɔ .

text: Neither is there any creature that is not manifest in his sight : but all things are naked and opened unto the eyes of him with whom we have to do .
text2: Kʋŋmaŋmam napəlɩ pə fɛɩ mpi Ɩsɔ ɩɩ naakɩ tɔ . Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ naa pə tənaɣa təyaɩɩ , pʋlʋ ta ŋmɛlɩ - ɩ . Ɩ kiŋ kɛ tá təna tɩɩ polo na tə ́ kɛɛsɩ ta kʋlapʋtʋ təna .

text: Seeing then that we have a great high priest , that is passed into the heavens , Jesus the Son of God , let us hold fast our profession .
text2: Ye mpʋ tə ́ tɔkɩ tá Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ ŋku kʋ tɔm tə hʋləɣɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔɣɔ teu . Mpi tɔ , tə wɛna kɔtəlaa sɔsaa taa sɔsɔ wei ɩ tɔma na ɩ ́ tala Ɩsɔ cɔlɔ maɣamaɣa tɔ , ɩnəɣəlɛ Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ Yesu .

text: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities ; but was in all points tempted like as we are , yet without sin .
text2: Ta kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ kɛ ́ wei ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ cɛkəna ta ɩcantʋ tete tɔ . Pə maɣasa ɩ maɣamaɣa kɛ pə təna pə taa ɩsɩɩ ta , ɩ ta la ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ .

text: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace , that we may obtain mercy , and find grace to help in time of need .
text2: Ye mpʋ tə ́ kpətəna Ɩsɔ pɛɛlɛɛ kumte na naani , tɩɩ hiki suulu na pɛɛlɛɛ na pə ́ waasɩ - tʋɣʋ waatʋ wei pə nəɣəsənaa tɔ .

text: For every high priest taken from among men is ordained for men in things pertaining to God , that he may offer both gifts and sacrifices for sins :
text2: Pə ləsʋɣʋ yəlaa hɛkʋ kɛ kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ na pə sɩɩ tɔ , pə sɩɩ - ɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ la Ɩsɔ təmlɛ na pə ́ waasɩ samaa . Ɩ pukina kʋhaham na ɩ ́ lakɩ kɔtaɣa kɛ yəlaa ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɔ .

text: Who can have compassion on the ignorant , and on them that are out of the way ; for that he himself also is compassed with infirmity .
text2: Kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ ná takaa na ɩ ́ ná ɩsəna ɩcantʋ wɛɛ tɔ , ɩlɛ ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ suulu kɛ pəcɔɣɔ ɩsɛ kʋkpɛɛtɛɛ nyə ́ ma na mpa pa pəntəɣɩ kʋpəntʋ tɔ .

text: And by reason hereof he ought , as for the people , so also for himself , to offer for sins .
text2: Na ɩsɩɩ kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ maɣamaɣa wɛna ɩcantʋ tɔ ɩ lakɩ kɔtasɩ kɛ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ tɔɔ na samaa tɔɔ tɔtɔ .

text: And no man taketh this honour unto himself , but he that is called of God , as was Aaron .
text2: Pə fɛɩ sɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ká tʋ ɩ təɣɩ teeli na ɩ ́ sʋsɩ ɩ təɣɩ kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔɔntʋ taa . Ɩsɔ kpaana kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ , na mpʋ ɩnɩ pə maɣamaɣa kɛ pə lapa Alɔŋ kiŋ .

text: So also Christ glorified not himself to be made an high priest ; but he that said unto him , Thou art my Son , to day have I begotten thee .
text2: Mpʋ ɩnəɣɩ na Kilisiti , ɩ ta tʋ ɩ təɣɩ teeli na ɩ ́ kpa ɩ təɣɩ kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ . Ama Ɩsɔ maɣamaɣa tɔmna - ɩ təkelekele sɩ : Nyaɣalɛ ma Pəyaɣa , saŋa kɛ ma pəsa nyá Caa .

text: As he saith also in another place , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Ɩ tɔma tiili tɔtɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : N ka pəsɩ kɔtʋlʋ kɛ tam tɔɔ ɩsɩɩ Mɛləcisetɛɛkɩ .

text: Who in the days of his flesh , when he had offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death , and was heard in that he feared ;
text2: Saa wei Yesu ka wɛ atɛ cənɛ tɔ ɩ sələmaɣa Ɩsɔ wei ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ ləsɩ - ɩ səm taa tɔɣɔ , na ɩ ́ wiikina - ɩ na kapusi sɔsɔɔnsɩ na ɩsəlʋm . Ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ mʋ ɩ sələmʋɣʋ kɛ ɩ seekaɣa Ɩsɔ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: Though he were a Son , yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered ;
text2: Paa na ɩ ka kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa tɔ , kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛnaa taa kɛ ́ ɩ nyəmá nɩɩnaʋ tɔm .

text: And being made perfect , he became the author of eternal salvation unto all them that obey him ;
text2: Pa kɔma na pá tɛmɩ - ɩ lapʋ na ɩ ́ te təkpataa , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pəsɩ wei ɩ kiŋ mpa pa təna pa nɩɩkəna - ɩ tɔ pə yakəna pa nyɔɔŋ kɛ tam tɔɔ tɔ .

text: Called of God an high priest after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ tɔ sɩ ɩnɩ ɩ kɛna kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ ɩsɩɩ Mɛləcisetɛɛkɩ .

text: Of whom we have many things to say , and hard to be uttered , seeing ye are dull of hearing .
text2: Tə wɛna kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ kɛ sɔsɔm kɛ tɔm tənɛ tə tɔɔ , na pə wɛ katɛ sɩ tə kilisi - mɛɣɛ pə təna təcɛɩcɛɩ kɛ ́ ɩɩ cɛkəɣəna lɔŋ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: For when for the time ye ought to be teachers , ye have need that one teach you again which be the first principles of the oracles of God ; and are become such as have need of milk , and not of strong meat .
text2: Hatuu tɔ pə nəɣəsəna ɩsɩɩ ɩsəntɔ mə sɛɣɛsəɣəna lɛlaa , ɩlɛna mɩɩ məlɩ na ɩ ́ pəsɩ ɩsɩɩ mpa paa hʋ ́ lɩ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm ɩsɩɩ kpɛləməlaa tɔ . Pə tala mə mʋtʋ tɔɣɔʋ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ məlɩ na ɩ ́ nyɔɔkɩ kafa kɛ tam .

text: For every one that useth milk is unskilful in the word of righteousness : for he is a babe .
text2: Wei ɩ paasəɣəna kafa nyɔɔʋ tɔ ɩ kɛ ́ ahʋlʋm kɛ ́ . Ɩ ta nyɩ sɩ pənɛ pə tewa , aaɩ pənɛ pə ta te .

text: But strong meat belongeth to them that are of full age , even those who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern both good and evil .
text2: Ama sɔsaa mpa tam lapʋ tɔɔ pa nyəmá tampam na ɩsaɣam pə faɣaʋ tɔ mʋtʋ kɛ pɛlɛ pa tɔkɩ .

text: Therefore leaving the principles of the doctrine of Christ , let us go on unto perfection ; not laying again the foundation of repentance from dead works , and of faith toward God ,
text2: Pə tɔɔ tɔ tə lɩɩ Kilisiti tɔm nti pa caaləɣəna sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ tɔ tə taa na tə sʋʋ mpa pa pɩɩ pə taa tɔ pa nyəntʋ taa . Tə ́ taa taɣanɩ kite tɛɛ nyəntʋ taa kɛ ́ məlʋɣʋ , ɩsɩɩ kpaɩ təma yeluɣu na taa tɛmnaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ ,

text: Of the doctrine of baptisms , and of laying on of hands , and of resurrection of the dead , and of eternal judgment .
text2: na lʋm sɔʋnaa na niŋ tənʋɣʋ pə tɔmnaa , na sətaa feesuɣu na tam hʋʋlɛ pə tɔmnaa .

text: And this will we do , if God permit .
text2: Tə ́ pukina pə ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ tam . Mpʋ pə maɣamaɣa kɛ tɩɩ la ye Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ tisaa .

text: For it is impossible for those who were once enlightened , and have tasted of the heavenly gift , and were made partakers of the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Na mpa pɛlɛ pa taɣanəɣɩ ɩsaɣatʋ taa kɛ ́ hotuɣu tɔ pɛlɛ pa tɔm ká tɛna weɣelɛ ɩlɛ ? Tɔʋ , Ɩsɔ tɛma pa ɩsɛ kuluɣu na pá təŋ ɩsɔtaa kʋcɔɔʋ leleŋ na pá hiki pa paa nyəm kɛ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ kiŋ .

text: And have tasted the good word of God , and the powers of the world to come ,
text2: Pəlɛ pə waalɩ pa nawa sɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm wɛ teu na pa cɛkəna ɩsəna antulinya wei ɩ kɔŋ tɔ ɩ toma wɛɛ tɔ .

text: If they shall fall away , to renew them again unto repentance ; seeing they crucify to themselves the Son of God afresh , and put him to an open shame .
text2: Pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə waalɩ kɛ ́ pa lɩɩwa na pá taɣanɩ ɩsaɣatʋ taa kɛ ́ hotuɣu . Yəlaa ɩsɩɩ mpʋ pə taka pə fɛɩ pəsʋɣʋ sɩ pá hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - wɛ sɩ pá taɣanɩ tɔntɛ kʋfatɛ kɛ laɣasʋɣʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa kɛ pa lɛləɣɩ kam kɛ səm tesika tɔɔ na pá tʋɣɩ - kɛɣɛ fɛɛlɛ kɛ samaa taa .

text: For the earth which drinketh in the rain that cometh oft upon it , and bringeth forth herbs meet for them by whom it is dressed , receiveth blessing from God :
text2: Ye pa hala haləm na tɛʋ nɩɩkɩ pə taa kɛ ́ tam na pə ta laŋ nikaɣa , na kʋtɔɣɔʋ la pə taa kɛ ́ teu na pə ́ waasɩ hallaa , ɩlɛ haləm mpɩ Ɩsɔ koola - wəɣɩ kʋpantʋ kɛ ́ .

text: But that which beareth thorns and briers is rejected , and is nigh unto cursing ; whose end is to be burned .
text2: Ama ye sɔwa kɛ yem na kpaɩ nyɩɩtʋ tike lakəna pə taa , haləm mpɩ pə pəsa yem kɛlɛ , na Ɩsɔ naa kpalɩ - wɩ na pá tɛɛsəna - wəɣɩ kɔkɔ sɔpʋ .

text: But , beloved , we are persuaded better things of you , and things that accompany salvation , though we thus speak .
text2: Ma taapalaa mɛ , paa tə yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ tɔ tə tɛma tá taa təkpataa sɩ ɩ ́ tá tooli , ɩ wɛ waasʋɣʋ mpaaʋ taa kɛ ́ .

text: For God is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love , which ye have shewed toward his name , in that ye have ministered to the saints , and do minister .
text2: Ɩsɔ tá kɛ ́ wei ɩɩ təŋəɣɩ tampana tɔ , na ɩ kaa sɔɔ mə təma tɔɔ . Pəyele ɩ kaa sɔɔ ɩsəna ɩ ́ paasaa na ɩ ́ sɔɔlɩ - ɩ na ɩ ́ waasɩ mə Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa lɛlaa , na ɩ ́ tɩɩ tɔŋna - wɛɣɛ waasʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: And we desire that every one of you do shew the same diligence to the full assurance of hope unto the end :
text2: Ta luuŋ wɛɛ sɩ paa mə taa wei ɩ ́ tasa ɩsəlɛ sɛɛsʋɣʋ kɛ mpʋ haləna pə tənaɣa , pəcɔ pə ́ lá teitei ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ tɛɛlʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: That ye be not slothful , but followers of them who through faith and patience inherit the promises .
text2: Tá luuŋ fɛɩ sɩ ɩ ́ loosi nɔɔhɛɛ . Ama tə caa kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ təŋ mpa pa tɛŋ Ɩsɔ na pa taa na pá wɛna suulu na paa hiki mpi Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha tɔ pa akpaa .

text: For when God made promise to Abraham , because he could swear by no greater , he sware by himself ,
text2: Waatʋ wei Ɩsɔ heelaɣa Apəlaham sɩ ɩ ká lapɩ - ɩ pənɛ na pənɛ tɔ , na tuunaʋ kɛ ́ . Na ɩsɩɩ nɔɣɔlʋ fɛɩ wei ɩ kəla - ɩ na ɩ ́ ká tuuna ɩlɛ tɔ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tuuna ɩ tɩ ,

text: Saying , Surely blessing I will bless thee , and multiplying I will multiply thee .
text2: na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Ma heeliɣi - ŋ təkpataa sɩ maa la - ŋ kʋpantʋ , na maa la na ń hiki piya kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: And so , after he had patiently endured , he obtained the promise .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Apəlaham caɣana suulu , haləna ɩ ́ kɔɔ na ɩ ́ hiki mpi Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká lapɩ - ɩ mpʋ tɔ .

text: For men verily swear by the greater : and an oath for confirmation is to them an end of all strife .
text2: Ye yəlaa ɩ ́ caa tuunaʋ , wei ɩ kəla - wɛ tɔ ɩ hətɛ kɛ pa yaakɩ na pá tuuna . Tuunaʋ kɛ ́ pʋlʋ mpi pə loliɣi yəlaa kɛ waatʋ wei pa lakɩ ntɔŋkpɛɛsaɣa tɔɣɔ .

text: Wherein God , willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel , confirmed it by an oath :
text2: Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ caakaɣa kɛ ́ sɩ mpa ɩ tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la kʋpantʋnaa mpɛ tɔ , pá nyɩ təkelekele sɩ ɩ ́ yɔɣɔta nti , ɩ yɔɣɔtaa kɛ ́ tə kaa laɣasɩ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ yɔɣɔtaa na ɩ tuu .

text: That by two immutable things , in which it was impossible for God to lie , we might have a strong consolation , who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us :
text2: Tɔm naalɛ ɩnɛ ɩ fɛɩ laɣasʋɣʋ , na pə fɛɩ pəsʋɣʋ sɩ Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ looli - tɩ . Pə tɔɔ maɣamaɣa kɛ pə sɔɔsa ta mpa tə hika təŋmɛllɛ kɛ ɩ kiŋ tɔɣɔ apalʋtʋ , sɩ tə ́ tɔkɩ tɛɛlʋɣʋ ŋku kʋ tɔm pa kɛɛsa - tʋ tɔɣɔ teu təkeŋkeŋ .

text: Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul , both sure and stedfast , and which entereth into that within the veil ;
text2: Tɛɛlʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ta ləsasɩ kaŋkanʋɣʋ kʋtəlʋɣʋ ŋku tə wɛna naani na kʋ kiiwa tɔ . Tə nyəmá sɩ ta maɣamaɣa tə pəsəɣɩ na tə ́ sʋʋ na tə ́ polo na tə ́ lɩɩ ɩsɔtaa Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ taa pʋʋɣʋ kʋkakaɣaʋ waalɩ haləna tə ́ tala pə taa naŋ taa .

text: Whither the forerunner is for us entered , even Jesus , made an high priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Tənaɣa Yesu tɛɛ - tʋɣʋ nɔɣɔ , na ɩ ́ pəsɩ kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ ɩsɩɩ Mɛləcisetɛɛkɩ kɛ tam tɔɔ .

text: For this Melchisedec , king of Salem , priest of the most high God , who met Abraham returning from the slaughter of the kings , and blessed him ;
text2: Mɛləcisetɛɛkɩ ɩnɩ ɩ ka kɛ ́ Salɛm wulaʋ , na ɩ kɛ ́ ɩsɔtaa Ɩsɔ Sɔsɔ kɔtʋlʋ . Mɛləcisetɛɛkɩ ɩnɩ ɩ səŋna Apəlaham kɛ waatʋ wei ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ tɛma awulaa kɛ kəlʋɣʋ kɛ yoou taa na ɩ ́ mələɣɩ kpente tɔ , na ɩ ́ kooli - ɩ kʋpantʋ .

text: To whom also Abraham gave a tenth part of all ; first being by interpretation King of righteousness , and after that also King of Salem , which is , King of peace ;
text2: Tənaɣa Apəlaham tala pə təna mpi ɩ ka wɛna tɔɣɔ tɔm naanʋwa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa hɔɣɔlʋɣʋ kʋlʋmʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ ha - ɩ . Mɛləcisetɛɛkɩ hətɛ nyʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ tampana tʋ . Pəlɛ pə waalɩ ɩ kɛ ́ Salɛm wulaʋ , na pəlɛ pə nyʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ hɛɛsʋɣʋ tʋ .

text: Without father , without mother , without descent , having neither beginning of days , nor end of life ; but made like unto the Son of God ; abideth a priest continually .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ ta nyɩ Mɛləcisetɛɛkɩ caa , pa ta nyɩ ɩ too . Nɔɣɔlʋ ta nyɩ sɩ akele lʋləna na pə ́ lʋlɩ na pə ́ tala - ɩ . Pa ta yɔɣɔtɩ ɩ lʋlʋɣʋ tɔm kɛ tiili , yaa ɩ səm tɔm . Ɩ nəɣəsəna Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa , na ɩ kɛ ́ kɔtʋlʋ kɛ tam tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: Now consider how great this man was , unto whom even the patriarch Abraham gave the tenth of the spoils .
text2: Ɩ ́ paasɩ na ɩ ́ ná apalʋ ɩnɩ ɩ sɔsɔɔntʋ yee . Halɩ ta caanaa caanaa caa sɔsɔ Apəlaham ná faɣa pə təna mpi ɩ hika yoou taa tɔɣɔ tɔm naanʋwa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa hɔɣɔlʋɣʋ kʋlʋmʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ ha - ɩ .

text: And verily they that are of the sons of Levi , who receive the office of the priesthood , have a commandment to take tithes of the people according to the law , that is , of their brethren , though they come out of the loins of Abraham :
text2: Lefii nyə ́ ma mpa pa kɛ ́ kɔtəlaa tɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ha - wɛɣɛ mpaa kɛ ́ sɩ pá pɔɔsəɣɩ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma sɩ pá cɛləɣɩ - wɛɣɛ pa kʋhikim təna hɔɣɔləŋ naanʋwa taa kʋlʋmʋɣʋ . Pəyele paa kɛ ́ yəlaa kʋlʋmaa kɛ ́ , na pa təna pa kɛ ́ Apəlaham piya .

text: But he whose descent is not counted from them received tithes of Abraham , and blessed him that had the promises .
text2: Mɛləcisetɛɛkɩ na taa kɛ ́ Lefii tʋ , paa na mpʋ ɩ mʋ mpi Apəlaham wɛna tɔ pə hɔɣɔləŋ naanʋwa taa kʋlʋmʋɣʋ . Pəlɛ pə paasi ɩ koola koolee kʋpana kɛ wei ɩ hika kʋpantʋ nti Ɩsɔ tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la tɔ .

text: And without all contradiction the less is blessed of the better .
text2: Na ɩsəna pə wɛɛ tɔ , sɔsɔ kooliɣina səkpelu kɛ kʋpantʋ .

text: And here men that die receive tithes ; but there he receiveth them , of whom it is witnessed that he liveth .
text2: Ama kɔtəlaa kiŋ ɩlɛ , mpa pa mʋɣɩ mpi yəlaa wɛna tɔ pə hɔɣɔləŋ naanʋwa taa kʋlʋmʋɣʋ tɔ , pa kɛ ́ yəlaa mpa saŋa pa wɛɛ cele pa fɛɩ tɔɣɔ . Ama ye Mɛləcisetɛɛkɩ kiŋ ɩlɛ wei ɩ wɛ tam ɩsɩɩ pa ŋmaaʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ mʋna hɔɣɔləŋ naanʋwa taa kʋlʋmʋɣʋ ŋkʋ .

text: And as I may so say , Levi also , who receiveth tithes , payed tithes in Abraham .
text2: Ye pə lapa mpʋ tə pəsəɣɩ na tə ́ tɔ sɩ waatʋ wei Apəlaham faɣa ɩ wɛnaʋ taa kɛ ́ tɔm naanʋwa na ɩ ́ ha mpʋ tɔ , Lefii maɣamaɣa nyá fɛlaa kɛ ́ . Pəyele Lefii nyə ́ ma mpɛɣɛ pa taɣanəɣɩ faɣaʋ naanʋwa ɩnɩ ɩ wontu cɛlʋɣʋ .

text: For he was yet in the loins of his father , when Melchisedec met him .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , waatʋ ɩnɩ paa pa ta lʋləta Lefii tɔ ɩ ka wɛ ɩ cɔsɔ Apəlaham taa kɛ ́ saa wei Mɛləcisetɛɛkɩ səŋaɣa - ɩ tɔɣɔ .

text: If therefore perfection were by the Levitical priesthood , ( for under it the people received the law , ) what further need was there that another priest should rise after the order of Melchisedec , and not be called after the order of Aaron ?
text2: Lefii nyə ́ ma kɔtʋɣʋ lɩɩna kʋsəsɩɩtʋ nti pa tʋ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma sɩ pá təŋ tɔ tə kiŋ . Pə na pə mpʋ tɔ Lefii nyə ́ ma kɔtəlaa mpɛ pa ta la təmlɛ nte tə tewa təkpataa tɔ . Tɔfɔ pə taa yele Alɔŋ looŋa taa na pə tasa kɔtʋlʋ kʋfalʋ sɩɩʋ ɩsɩɩ Mɛləcisetɛɛkɩ .

text: For the priesthood being changed , there is made of necessity a change also of the law .
text2: Mpi tɔ , pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ ye kɔtəlaa ɩ ́ laɣasaa , kʋsəsɩɩtʋ náá laɣasɩ tɔtɔ .

text: For he of whom these things are spoken pertaineth to another tribe , of which no man gave attendance at the altar .
text2: Tɔʋ , Tacaa wei ɩ tɔm pa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ ɩsəntɔ tɔ ɩ kɛ ́ kpekəle lɛntɛ tʋ kɛ ́ . Na pa kpekəle taa tʋ nɔɣɔlʋ taa lata kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ təmlɛ kɛ kɔtaɣa təlatɛ taa .

text: For it is evident that our Lord sprang out of Juda ; of which tribe Moses spake nothing concerning priesthood .
text2: Tə nyəmá teu təkpataa sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ Yuta kpekəle tʋ . Moisi yɔɣɔtaɣa kɔtəlaa tɔm tɔ ɩ ta yaa kpekəle ntɛ ́ tə hətɛ .

text: And it is yet far more evident : for that after the similitude of Melchisedec there ariseth another priest ,
text2: Mpi pə tɛɛsəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ pə tampana kilisuɣu tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Kɔtʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ná lɩɩwa na ɩ ́ nəɣəsəna Mɛləcisetɛɛkɩ .

text: Who is made , not after the law of a carnal commandment , but after the power of an endless life .
text2: Pə taɣa yəlaa kʋkɛɛsətʋ kɛ pə təŋaa na pə ́ kpa - ɩ kɔtʋlʋ . Ama weesuɣu ŋku kʋ fɛɩ wakəlʋɣʋ tɔ kʋ toŋ taa kɛ ́ pə kpana - ɩ kɔtʋlʋ .

text: For he testifieth , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Pa ŋmaa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : N ka pəsɩ kɔtʋlʋ kɛ tam tɔɔ ɩsɩɩ Mɛləcisetɛɛkɩ .

text: For there is verily a disannulling of the commandment going before for the weakness and unprofitableness thereof .
text2: Nti pa sɩɩ lɔŋ na pá təŋəɣɩ - tɩ tɔ təlɛ tə taa fɛɩna toma , na tɩɩ waasəɣɩ pʋlʋ , ɩlɛna pá kʋ ́ təlɛ .

text: For the law made nothing perfect , but the bringing in of a better hope did ; by the which we draw nigh unto God .
text2: Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ná taa la nɔɣɔlʋ na ɩ ́ té təkpataa , tə ná mpʋ . Ama pə kɔna - tʋɣʋ tɛɛlʋɣʋ kʋfalʋɣʋ kʋpampaŋkʋ ŋku kʋ yeki na tə kpətəna Ɩsɔ tɔ .

text: And inasmuch as not without an oath he was made priest :
text2: Mpi pə tɔɔ nɔɔnɔɔ nyəŋ ɩnɛ ɩ kəlaa tɔ , pa kpa - ɩ kɔtʋlʋ na Ɩsɔ tuunaʋ kɛ ́ . Ama pa kpa lɛlaa kɛ kɔtəlaa kɛ yem kɛ ́ .

text: ( For those priests were made without an oath ; but this with an oath by him that said unto him , The Lord sware and will not repent , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec : )
text2: Pa kpa Yesu kɛ ́ kɔtʋlʋ na tuunaʋ , halɩ Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔtɩ təfoo sɩ : Tacaa yɔɣɔtaa na ɩ ́ tuu sɩ , n ká pəsɩ kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ kɛ tam tɔɔ . Ɩ kaa tuli tapəŋ kɛ nti ɩ yɔɣɔta mpʋ tɔ tə taa .

text: By so much was Jesus made a surety of a better testament .
text2: Pə tɔɔ maɣamaɣa kɛ Yesu ná kɔna - tʋɣʋ nɔɣɔ pɛɛlʋɣʋ kʋpampam mpi paa pɩɩ kpa na pə tii pə kaa saalɩ tɔ .

text: And they truly were many priests , because they were not suffered to continue by reason of death :
text2: Pə kaasa lɛntɩ tɔtɔ sɩ kɔtəlaa kpaɩ nyə ́ ma mpɛ paa wɛ paɣalɛ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , lɛlaa səkaɣa kɛ ́ na lɛlaa lɛɛtəɣɩ pa lona taa .

text: But this man , because he continueth ever , hath an unchangeable priesthood .
text2: Ama Yesu ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ wɛna ɩ weesuɣu kɛ tam na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ ɩ kɔtʋlʋtʋ kɛ tam , na nɔɣɔlʋ kaa lɛɛtɩ ɩ lonte .

text: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him , seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ paa pəlee ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ waasɩ pa təna mpa pa kpətəɣəna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔɔ tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ wɛna weesuɣu kɛ tam kɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ sələməɣəna - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ .

text: For such an high priest became us , who is holy , harmless , undefiled , separate from sinners , and made higher than the heavens ;
text2: Yesu kɛ ́ pə tɩɩ mʋna mpʋ sɩ pá kpa - tʋɣʋ kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ wɛ tənaŋŋ , ɩ fɛɩna taalɩ nɔɣɔlʋ . Pəcɔ ɩsaɣatʋ fɛɩ ɩ kiŋ tɔ se . Pa faɣa ɩ ́ na asaɣaa na halɩ pá kpaasɩ - ɩ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ .

text: Who needeth not daily , as those high priests , to offer up sacrifice , first for his own sins , and then for the people ' s : for this he did once , when he offered up himself .
text2: Pə fɛɩ sɩ ɩ ká lakɩ kɔtasɩ kɛ tam kɛ ́ ɩnɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɔ , na pə ́ kaasɩ na ɩ ́ lá samaa ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɔ , ɩsɩɩ kɔtəlaa sɔsaa lɛlaa lakʋɣʋ tɔ . Ama waatʋ wei ɩ ha ɩ tɩ na ɩ ́ sɩ tɔ pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩ lapa kɔtaɣa kɛ tɔm kʋlʋm kɛ kpakpaa kɛ tam tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: For the law maketh men high priests which have infirmity ; but the word of the oath , which was since the law , maketh the Son , who is consecrated for evermore .
text2: Mpa Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kpaakɩ kɔtəlaa tɔ pa teu ta tʋlɩ . Ama Ɩsɔ ná kɔma na ɩ ́ nyɔsɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ nɔɣɔ taa , na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəna tuunaʋ na ɩ Pəyaɣa pəsɩ kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ , na ɩ teu tʋla kpakpaa kɛ tam tɔɔ .

text: Now of the things which we have spoken this is the sum : We have such an high priest , who is set on the right hand of the throne of the Majesty in the heavens ;
text2: Tɔm nti tə tɔŋna yɔɣɔtaɣa kɛ mpʋ tɔ tə kite ntɛ ́ sɩ , tə wɛna kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ kɛ mpʋ wei ɩ kpawa na ɩ ́ caɣa Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa tʋ kumte kɔŋkɔŋ taa kɛ ́ ɩsɔtaa tɔ .

text: A minister of the sanctuary , and of the true tabernacle , which the Lord pitched , and not man .
text2: Ɩ lakɩ kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ kʋlapəlɛ kɛ kɔtaɣa təlatɛ cokəle nte yʋlʋ ta siki , ama Tacaa maɣamaɣa sikina - tɛ tɔ tə taa .

text: For every high priest is ordained to offer gifts and sacrifices : wherefore it is of necessity that this man have somewhat also to offer .
text2: Pa kpaa kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ tɔ sɩ ɩ ́ pona Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ kʋhaham na ɩ ́ la kɔtasɩ kɛ ́ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə wɛɛ sɩ tá kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ ɩ ́ wɛɛna mpi ɩ ká polo na ɩ ́ lapɩ - ɩ kɔtaɣa tɔ .

text: For if he were on earth , he should not be a priest , seeing that there are priests that offer gifts according to the law :
text2: Ye atɛ cənɛɣɛ Yesu ka wɛɛ ɩ taa tɩɩ lapʋ kɔtʋlʋ . Mpi tɔ kɔtəlaa ka wɛɛ na pá tɔŋna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ kʋhaham ponaʋ ɩsɩɩ pa kɛɛsa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa tɔ .

text: Who serve unto the example and shadow of heavenly things , as Moses was admonished of God when he was about to make the tabernacle : for , See , saith he , that thou make all things according to the pattern shewed to thee in the mount .
text2: Mpi mpi kɔtəlaa mpɛ pa lakɩ mpʋ tɔ , pa kɛɛsəna mpi pə wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔɣɔ na pá lakɩ . Ɩlɛ pə nəɣəsəlɛ kɛ ́ pə taɣa pə maɣamaɣa . Pə lapa kʋlʋm na nti tɩɩ tɛm Moisi kiŋ kɛ lapʋ tɔ . Saa wei ɩ lapa sɔɔlʋ sɩ ɩ sikiɣi cokəle tɔ Ɩsɔ heela - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ siki - tɛɣɛ teitei ɩsɩɩ paa kɛɛsa - ɩ pʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔ , ɩ ́ taa coti .

text: But now hath he obtained a more excellent ministry , by how much also he is the mediator of a better covenant , which was established upon better promises .
text2: Ama təmlɛ nte pa tʋ Yesu tɔ tə kəla mpɛ pa nyəna təcaɣacaɣa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩnɩ ɩ tɛləsəna - tʋɣʋ nɔɣɔ pɛɛlʋɣʋ kʋpampam mpi pə lɩɩna kʋpantʋ kʋkələtʋ nti Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la tɔ tə kiŋ tɔ .

text: For if that first covenant had been faultless , then should no place have been sought for the second .
text2: Ye kancaalaɣa nɔɣɔ pɛɛlʋɣʋ ka tewa təkpataa pa taa tasa nɔɣɔ kʋfalaɣa kɛ pɛɛlʋɣʋ tɔtɔɣɔ kʋpənaɣa lonte .

text: For finding fault with them , he saith , Behold , the days come , saith the Lord , when I will make a new covenant with the house of Israel and with the house of Judah :
text2: Ama Ɩsɔ yəlaa lapa taalɩ na Ɩsɔ kaləɣəna - wɛ sɩ : Pə ́ kɔma na pə ́ kɔɔ maa yele na má na Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma tə ́ tasa nɔɔsɩ kʋfasɩ pɛɛlʋɣʋ , na pə ́ kpɛnna Yuta kpekəle nyə ́ ma tɔtɔ . Tacaa má ma yɔɣɔtəna mpʋ .

text: Not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day when I took them by the hand to lead them out of the land of Egypt ; because they continued not in my covenant , and I regarded them not , saith the Lord .
text2: Nɔɣɔ ŋka ma na - wɛ tɩɩ pɛɛlɩ tɔ ka kaa wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ má na pa caanaa caanaa tɩɩ pɛɛlʋɣʋ ŋkaɣa waatʋ wei ma hɔma - wɛ na má ləsɩ Icipiti taa tɔ . Pa ta tɔkɩ nɔɣɔ ŋka má na - wɛ tɩɩ pɛɛla mpʋ tɔ . Mpʋ pə lapəna na máá lɔ pa tɔm kɛ luɣu . Tacaa má ma yɔɣɔtəna mpʋ .

text: For this is the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel after those days , saith the Lord ; I will put my laws into their mind , and write them in their hearts : and I will be to them a God , and they shall be to me a people :
text2: Nn , Tacaa má ma yɔɣɔta mpʋ sɩ : Nɔɣɔ ŋka kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɩ ɩ waalɩ maa yele na má na Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma tə ́ pɛɛlɩ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Maa kpaɣa ma kʋsəsɩɩtʋ na má tʋ hatuu pa ləmaɣasɛɛ taa . Maa ŋmaa - təɣɩ pa lotu taa . Maa pəsɩ pa Ɩsɔ na mpɛ paa pəsɩ ma yəlaa .

text: And they shall not teach every man his neighbour , and every man his brother , saying , Know the Lord : for all shall know me , from the least to the greatest .
text2: Saa ɩnɩ nɔɣɔlʋ kaa nɔkɩ ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ kɛ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ . Nɔɣɔlʋ kaa tɔ ɩ taapalʋ sɩ : Nyɩ Tacaa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pa təna paa nyɩ - m . Pə kpaɣaʋ pəyaɣa na pə polo sɔsɔ tɔ .

text: For I will be merciful to their unrighteousness , and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Maa hɩɩsɩ pa kʋpəntəŋ . Ma kaa tɔɔsɩ pa ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ paa pəcɔ .

text: In that he saith , A new covenant , he hath made the first old . Now that which decayeth and waxeth old is ready to vanish away .
text2: Ɩlɛ timpi Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ nɔɣɔ kʋfalaɣa pɛɛlʋɣʋ tɔm tɔ pə wɛɛ sɩ kancaalaɣa nyəŋka pənaa kɛ ́ . Na pʋlʋ ɩ ́ pənaa na pə ́ cɛɣɛtəɣɩ , pə caa tɛm kɛ ́ .

text: Then verily the first covenant had also ordinances of divine service , and a worldly sanctuary .
text2: Kancaalaɣa nɔɣɔ ŋka paa pɛɛlaa tɔ kɛlɛ kaa wɛna nti pa sɩɩwa na pa təŋəɣɩ na pá sɛɛkɩ Ɩsɔ tɔɣɔ , na Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ ka wɛ atɛ cənɛ .

text: For there was a tabernacle made ; the first , wherein was the candlestick , and the table , and the shewbread ; which is called the sanctuary .
text2: Paa sika cokəle kɛ ́ , na ntɛ ́ tə kɛna pə tɔɔ pə tɔɔ nyəntɛ , na pa yaa - tɛ sɩ katɛ taa . Na tənaɣa pa sɩɩkaɣa fətəla na taapəlɩ na potopotonaa mpa pa ha Ɩsɔ tɔ .

text: And after the second veil , the tabernacle which is called the Holiest of all ;
text2: Pʋʋɣʋ kʋkakaɣaʋ naalɛ nyəŋkʋ waalɩ kɛna cokəle nte pa yaa sɩ katɛ taa katɛ tɔ .

text: Which had the golden censer , and the ark of the covenant overlaid round about with gold , wherein was the golden pot that had manna , and Aaron ' s rod that budded , and the tables of the covenant ;
text2: Na tənaɣa wʋla cofolo ka wɛɛ na pá wɔkɩ tulaalʋnaa kɛ ɩ taa , na Ɩsɔ nɔɣɔ pɛɛlʋɣʋ atakaa na pá waasa ɩ tənaɣa wʋla təpaɩ . Atakaa ɩnɩ ɩ taa ka wɛ wʋla nyənaɣa na ka taa na mana , na Alɔŋ kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ŋku kɩɩ tʋwa hɛtʋ tɔ na pɛɛ kpaatanaa mpa pa tɔɔ pa ŋmaa nɔɣɔ pɛɛlʋɣʋ tɔm tɔ .

text: And over it the cherubims of glory shadowing the mercyseat ; of which we cannot now speak particularly .
text2: Atakaa ɩnɩ ɩ tɔɔ ka wɛ teeli nyə ́ ma napəlɩ mpa pa hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ sɩ Ɩsɔ wɛ təna tɔ , na pa keŋ lɔpa timpi pa lakaɣa kɔtaɣa kɛ yəlaa ɩsaɣatʋ hɩɩsʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔ . Pə taɣa sɩ cənɛɣɛ tɩɩ yasɩ - mɛɣɛ pə kantəlasɩ təna təcɛɩcɛɩ .

text: Now when these things were thus ordained , the priests went always into the first tabernacle , accomplishing the service of God .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə təna pɩɩ wɛɛ , paa mpiɣi pə lonte taa , na kɔtəlaa ná sʋʋkaɣa tam kɛ ́ pə tɔɔ pə tɔɔ cokəle taa na pá lakɩ pa təmlɛ .

text: But into the second went the high priest alone once every year , not without blood , which he offered for himself , and for the errors of the people :
text2: Ama hatuu pə taa nyəntɛ taa ɩlɛ kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ tike sʋʋkaɣana təna , na pənaɣa taa tɔm kʋlʋm təkoŋ kɛ ́ ɩ sʋʋkaɣa . Caləm kɛ ɩ pukaɣana tənaɣa fɛɛnʋɣʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ kʋpəntəŋ na kʋpəntəŋ wei ɩlɛ samaa ná pənta kʋpəntʋ tɔ ɩ tɔɔ tɔtɔ .

text: The Holy Ghost this signifying , that the way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest , while as the first tabernacle was yet standing :
text2: Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ təna sɩ pə tɔɔ pə tɔɔ cokəle waatʋ təna taa , mpaaʋ fɛɩ sɩ yʋlʋ ɩ ́ tala timpi pa yaa sɩ katɛ taa katɛ taa tɔ .

text: Which was a figure for the time then present , in which were offered both gifts and sacrifices , that could not make him that did the service perfect , as pertaining to the conscience ;
text2: Mpʋ ɩnɩ pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ ɩsəna tə wɛ kaɣana ɩsəntɔ tɔ . Pə nyʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ ɩsɩɩ pa kpakʋɣʋʋ kʋhaham na pa kpakʋɣʋʋ wontu na pá lakɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ kɔtasɩ tɔ , mpʋ ɩnɩ pɩɩ pəsəɣɩ na pə ́ taɣanɩ teu təkpataa kɛ ́ wei ɩ lakɩ mpʋ tɔ ɩ lotu taa .

text: Which stood only in meats and drinks , and divers washings , and carnal ordinances , imposed on them until the time of reformation .
text2: Kʋtɔɣɔʋ na kʋnyɔnyɔɔm na nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ asilima kɛɛlʋɣʋ tɔm tike kɛ pə paasənaa . Pə kɛ ́ yʋlʋ tɔnʋɣʋ nyəm mpi pa sɩɩwa sɩ pa təŋəɣɩ , haləna kʋyaŋku Ɩsɔ ká taɣanɩ pə tənaɣa kʋfam tɔ .

text: But Christ being come an high priest of good things to come , by a greater and more perfect tabernacle , not made with hands , that is to say , not of this building ;
text2: Ama Kilisiti ná lapa kʋpantʋnaa mpa pa tɛma kɔntɛ tɔ pa kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ . Na cokəle nte tə taa ɩ lakɩ təmlɛ tɔ tə kəlaa , na tə tewa təkpataa . Pə taɣa yəlaa sikina - tɛ , na tə ta tɩɩ kɛʋ antulinya wei pa lapa kʋlapʋ kɛ ɩsəntɔ tɔ ɩ nyəntɛ .

text: Neither by the blood of goats and calves , but by his own blood he entered in once into the holy place , having obtained eternal redemption for us .
text2: Kilisiti sʋʋʋ tɔm kʋlʋm kɛ ɩ kpakpaa sʋʋʋ kɛ katɛ taa katɛ taa tɔ pə taɣa acɔɔnaa na nawee caləm kɛ ɩ lapəna kɔtaɣa . Ama ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ caləm kɛ ́ , ɩlɛna pə ́ kɔna - tʋɣʋ tá nyɔɔŋ yapʋ kɛ tam tɔɔ .

text: For if the blood of bulls and of goats , and the ashes of an heifer sprinkling the unclean , sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh :
text2: Ye acɔɔnaa na latəcɛnaa pə caləm na naaŋ alʋ nyəŋ wei pa nyaɣasa ɩ təna na pá ŋmɩɩsəɣɩ ɩ tɔlʋma kɛ yəlaa asilima nyə ́ ma tɔɔ tɔ ta kpisi pa asilima kɛ kpiisuɣu ,

text: How much more shall the blood of Christ , who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without spot to God , purge your conscience from dead works to serve the living God ?
text2: kacaŋfana Kilisiti caləm na ? Feesuɣu tam nyəŋkʋ toŋ taa kɛ ́ ɩ lapəna ɩ təɣɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ kɔtaɣa ŋka ka tewa təkpataa tɔ . Ɩ caləm ká ləsɩ ta lotu taa kɛ ́ kpaɩ təmanaa ləmaɣasɛɛ na tə ́ pəsɩ na tə ́ la Ɩsɔ weesuɣu tʋ təmlɛ .

text: And for this cause he is the mediator of the new testament , that by means of death , for the redemption of the transgressions that were under the first testament , they which are called might receive the promise of eternal inheritance .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Kilisiti kɛ wei ɩ tɛləsəɣɩ nɔɣɔ pɛɛlʋɣʋ kʋfam kɛ lɛlaa tɔ sɩ mpa Ɩsɔ yaawa tɔ pá hiki kʋpantʋ tam nyəntʋ nti Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha na pə ́ wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ pa kpancoou tɔ . Pa pəsəɣɩ na pá hiki - tɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , səm lapa pə taa , na səm mpɩ pə yekina na mpa paa wɛ nɔɣɔ pɛɛlʋɣʋ kʋpəm taa na pá pəntəɣɩ tɔ , pá lɩɩ kʋpəntəŋ ɩnɩ ɩ taa .

text: For where a testament is , there must also of necessity be the death of the testator .
text2: Ye yʋlʋ caɣaa na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ ɩsəna ɩ caa pá lana ɩ wɛnaʋ kɛ ɩ səm waalɩ tɔ na pá tʋ takəlaɣa taa na pá sɩɩ , ɩsɩɩ ɩ səpa na pə ́ cɔ ́ .

text: For a testament is of force after men are dead : otherwise it is of no strength at all while the testator liveth .
text2: Ye ɩ wɛna ɩ ɩsɛ , takəlaɣa ɩsɩɩ mpʋ kaa la təmlɛ . Ama ye ɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ sɩ kɛ paa lana - kɛɣɛ təmlɛ .

text: Whereupon neither the first testament was dedicated without blood .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa tʋla kancaalaɣa nɔɣɔ pɛɛlʋɣʋ tɔɔ na caləm .

text: For when Moses had spoken every precept to all the people according to the law , he took the blood of calves and of goats , with water , and scarlet wool , and hyssop , and sprinkled both the book , and all the people ,
text2: Kancaalaɣa ɩlɛ Moisi kpaɣa Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa heeliɣi mpi pə təna tɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ samaa təna . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpaɣa hisɔpʋ kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ na heeŋ hʋntʋ kʋsɛɛmtʋ na ɩ ́ lii nawee caləm na lʋm pə taa , na ɩ ́ kpɛntəna Ɩsɔ Tɔm takəlaɣa na yəlaa pa tɔɔ na ɩ ́ ŋmɩɩsɩ .

text: Saying , This is the blood of the testament which God hath enjoined unto you .
text2: Na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ : Pənɛ ɩnɩ pə kɛna caləm mpi pə lakɩ na nɔɣɔ ŋka Ɩsɔ pɛɛlaa na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ ɩ ́ tɔkɩ təkeŋkeŋ tɔ ká la tampana .

text: Moreover he sprinkled with blood both the tabernacle , and all the vessels of the ministry .
text2: Ɩlɛna Moisi tasa caləm kɛ kpaɣaʋ na ɩ ́ ŋmɩɩsɩ cokəle tɔɔ na Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ wontu təna tɔɔ .

text: And almost all things are by the law purged with blood ; and without shedding of blood is no remission .
text2: Na ɩsɩɩ pa kɛɛsa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa tɔ , caləm mpɩ , pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ pə tənaɣa pə taɣanaa , na ye caləm ɩ ta ti , pa kaa hɩɩsɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ .

text: It was therefore necessary that the patterns of things in the heavens should be purified with these ; but the heavenly things themselves with better sacrifices than these .
text2: Na ɩsɩɩ pa taɣana mpi pə wɛ ɩsɔtaa tɔ pə nəɣəsəlɛ kɛ mpʋ tɔ , pə wɛɛ sɩ pá la ɩsɔtaa nyəm maɣamaɣa kɛ kɔtasɩ kʋpaŋsɩ nsi sɩ kəla ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ teu tɔ .

text: For Christ is not entered into the holy places made with hands , which are the figures of the true ; but into heaven itself , now to appear in the presence of God for us :
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , katɛ tete nte tə taa Kilisiti sʋʋwa tɔ tə ta kɛ nte yəlaa lapa na tə nəɣəsəna ɩsɔtaa nyəntɛ kɛ kʋnəɣəsʋ tɔ . Ama ɩsɔtaa maɣamaɣa kɛ ɩ kpawa sɩ ɩ puki ɩ ́ səŋ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa na ɩ ́ wiiki ta kʋnyɔŋ .

text: Nor yet that he should offer himself often , as the high priest entereth into the holy place every year with blood of others ;
text2: Paa pənaɣa ŋka Yuta nyə ́ ma kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ pukina wontu caləm kɛ katɛ tete kɛ ́ . Ama Kilisiti ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ta sʋʋ sɩ ɩ lakɩ ɩ təɣɩ kɔtaɣa na ɩ ́ lɛləɣɩ .

text: For then must he often have suffered since the foundation of the world : but now once in the end of the world hath he appeared to put away sin by the sacrifice of himself .
text2: Ye pɩɩ wɛ mpʋ ɩ ka tɔɣɔ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ tɔm paɣalɛ kɛ hatuu antulinya lapʋ waatʋ . Ama ɩ kɔma kaɣanaɣa tɔm kʋlʋm kɛ ɩ kpakpaa kɔntɛ kɛ tənaɣa kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɛ ɩ taa sɩ ɩ ́ la ɩ təɣɩ kɔtaɣa na ɩ ́ kʋ ́ ɩsaɣatʋ tənaŋnaŋ .

text: And as it is appointed unto men once to die , but after this the judgment :
text2: Pə tɛma sɩɩʋ sɩ paa yʋlʋ wei ɩ ká sɩ tɔm kʋlʋm kɛ ́ , na pəlɛ pə waalɩ ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ hʋʋna - ɩ tɔm .

text: So Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many ; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation .
text2: Mpʋ ɩnɩ tɔtɔɣɔ pa lapa Kilisiti kɛ kɔtaɣa kɛ tɔm kʋlʋm sɩ pə ́ ləsɩ yəlaa samaa ɩsaɣatʋ . Ɩ ká tasa məlʋɣʋ , ɩlɛ pə taɣa ɩsaɣatʋ tɔm tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ká kɔɔ pəlɛ . Ama mpa pa taŋa - ɩ tɔ pa nyɔɔŋ yapʋ kɛ ́ .

text: For the law having a shadow of good things to come , and not the very image of the things , can never with those sacrifices which they offered year by year continually make the comers thereunto perfect .
text2: Kʋsəsɩɩtʋ nti paa tʋwa Yuta nyə ́ ma tɔ tə ta hʋlɩ kʋpantʋnaa mpa paa kɔɔ cele tɔ pa maɣamaɣa kɛ teitei . Ama pə nəɣəsəlɛ kɛ pə hʋlaa . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ntɩ tə ta pəsɩ na tə ́ lá na mpa pa kpətəɣəna Ɩsɔ tɔ pá te təkpataa , na kɔtasɩ kʋlʋmasɩ nsi pa lakɩ paa pənaɣa ŋkaɣa tam tɔ .

text: For then would they not have ceased to be offered ? because that the worshippers once purged should have had no more conscience of sins .
text2: Ye pɩɩ kpiisa mpa pa sɛɛkaɣa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ mpʋ pə taka tɔ pa ɩsaɣatʋ təkpataa kɛ tɔm kʋlʋm tɔɔ , pɛlɛ pa taa tasəɣɩ pa ɩsaɣatʋ tɔm tɔɔsʋɣʋ , pəcɔ pa taa nɔkɩ kɔtasɩ nasələɣɩ lapʋ tɔtɔ .

text: But in those sacrifices there is a remembrance again made of sins every year .
text2: Mpi tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ pa lakʋɣʋ kɔtasɩ nsəɣɩ paa pənaɣa ŋka tɔ pə tɔɔsəɣɩ yəlaa kɛ pa ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: For it is not possible that the blood of bulls and of goats should take away sins .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , latəcɛnaa na acɔɔnaa pa caləm kaa pəsɩ na pə ́ ləsɩ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ .

text: Wherefore when he cometh into the world , he saith , Sacrifice and offering thou wouldest not , but a body hast thou prepared me :
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ waatʋ wei Kilisiti kɔŋaɣa antulinya taa tɔ ɩ tɔma Ɩsɔ sɩ : Nn caa kɔtasɩ pəyele nn caa kʋhaham . Ama n ŋma - m tɔnʋɣʋ .

text: In burnt offerings and sacrifices for sin thou hast had no pleasure .
text2: Kɔtasɩ nsi kɔkɔ lusa sɩ təna tɔ sɩ ta kɛ - ŋ pʋlʋ . Na ɩsaɣatʋ hɩɩsʋɣʋ kɔtasɩ wɛ - ŋ yem tɔtɔ .

text: Then said I , Lo , I come ( in the volume of the book it is written of me , ) to do thy will , O God .
text2: Tənaɣa ma tɔma sɩ : Haɩ Ɩsɔ , maɣalɔ . Ma kɔŋ sɩ má la nyá luɣu nyəntʋ ɩsɩɩ pa kɛɛsa ma tɔm kɛ Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ takəlaɣa taa tɔ .

text: Above when he said , Sacrifice and offering and burnt offerings and offering for sin thou wouldest not , neither hadst pleasure therein ; which are offered by the law ;
text2: Ɩ caala yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ kɛ sɩ : Nn caa kɔtasɩ na kʋhaham na kɔtasɩ nsi kɔkɔ nyaɣa sɩ təna tɔ na ɩsaɣatʋ hɩɩsʋɣʋ kɔtasɩ . Pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə ta kɛ - ŋ pʋlʋ . Pəyele pə wɛ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ taa sɩ pá la kɔtasɩ nsəɣɩ mpʋ .

text: Then said he , Lo , I come to do thy will , O God . He taketh away the first , that he may establish the second .
text2: Ɩ tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ tɔɣɔ ɩ tɔma sɩ : Haɩ Ɩsɔ , maɣalɔ . Ma kɔŋ sɩ má la nyá luɣu nyəntʋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa na Ɩsɔ kʋ ́ kɔtasɩ nsi pa lakaɣa tɔ , ɩlɛna Kilisiti kɔtasɩ lapʋ náá mʋ kʋpəm lonte .

text: By the which will we are sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all .
text2: Yesu Kilisiti lapa Ɩsɔ luɣu nyəntʋ na ɩ ́ lá ɩ təɣɩ kɔtaɣa na pə ́ kpiisi ta ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ tam tɔɔ .

text: And every priest standeth daily ministering and offering oftentimes the same sacrifices , which can never take away sins :
text2: Paa kɔtʋlʋ wei ɩ səŋʋɣʋ ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ lakɩ kɔtasɩ kɛ paa ɩfemle nte tɔ , kʋlʋmasɩ nsəɣɩ ɩ lakɩ tam . Pəyele sɩ kaa pəsɩ na sɩ hɩɩsɩ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ .

text: But this man , after he had offered one sacrifice for sins for ever , sat down on the right hand of God ;
text2: Ama Kilisiti ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ lapa ɩsaɣatʋ hɩɩsʋɣʋ kɔtaɣa kɛ tɔm kʋlʋm təkoŋ , na kɔtaɣa ŋkɛ ka lakɩ təmlɛ kɛ tam . Kilisiti tɛma mpʋ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ kpa na ɩ ́ caɣa Ɩsɔ kɔŋkɔŋ taa .

text: From henceforth expecting till his enemies be made his footstool .
text2: Kaɣana tənaɣa ɩ wɛɛ na ɩ ́ caɣaa na ɩ ́ taŋaa sɩ Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ kɔna ɩ kolontunaa na ɩ ́ loosi nɔɔhɛɛ kɛ pa tɔɔ .

text: For by one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified .
text2: Tɔm kʋlʋm təkoŋ kɛ ́ ɩ ha ɩ tɩ sɩ pa təna mpa pa ɩsaɣatʋ kpiisaa tɔ pá té təkpataa .

text: Whereof the Holy Ghost also is a witness to us : for after that he had said before ,
text2: Na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ hʋləɣɩ - tʋɣʋ pə tampana . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ caala yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ :

text: This is the covenant that I will make with them after those days , saith the Lord , I will put my laws into their hearts , and in their minds will I write them ;
text2: Nn , Tacaa yɔɣɔta mpʋ sɩ , nɔɣɔ ŋka kʋyɛɛŋ ɩnɩ ɩ waalɩ maa yele na má na - wɛ tə ́ pɛɛlɩ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ , maa kpaɣa ma kʋsəsɩɩtʋ na má tʋ pa lotunaa taa . Maa ŋmaa - təɣɩ pa ləmaɣasɛɛ taa .

text: And their sins and iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tasa sɩ : Ma kaa tasa tɔɔsʋɣʋ kɛ pa ɩsaɣatʋ na pa kʋpəntəŋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ paa pəcɔ .

text: Now where remission of these is , there is no more offering for sin .
text2: Ye pa tɛma yʋlʋ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ hɩɩsʋɣʋ ɩɩ nɔkəɣɩ na ɩ ́ tasa kɔtaɣa kɛ lapʋ sɩ pə ́ hɩɩsɩ ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ tɔtɔ .

text: Having therefore , brethren , boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus ,
text2: Tɔʋ , ma taapalaa , ɩsɩɩ Yesu weesuɣu lɩɩʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ tə pəsəɣɩ na tə ́ sʋʋ katɛ taa katɛ taa təkaa .

text: By a new and living way , which he hath consecrated for us , through the veil , that is to say , his flesh ;
text2: Pənɛntɛ ɩ tʋla - tʋɣʋ weesuɣu mpaaʋ kʋfalʋɣʋ , kʋ lɩɩna pʋʋɣʋ kʋkakaɣaʋ na waalɩ . Pʋʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ kɛna ɩsɩɩ ɩ tɔnʋɣʋ maɣamaɣa .

text: And having an high priest over the house of God ;
text2: Tə wɛna kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ wei pa sɩɩwa sɩ ɩ ́ nyənəɣɩ Ɩsɔ təyaɣa tɔɔ tɔ .

text: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith , having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience , and our bodies washed with pure water .
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩlɛ tə ́ kpətəna Ɩsɔ na lotu kʋlʋmtʋ na naani kʋpampaŋ na tɔnəŋ wei pa sɔwa lʋm kʋpam tɔ . Tə taa nɩɩ ɩsaɣatiya taŋ kɛ ta lotu taa .

text: Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering ; ( for he is faithful that promised ; )
text2: Tə ́ tɔkɩ tá tɛɛlʋɣʋ ŋku kʋ tɔm tə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ ɩsəntɔ tɔɣɔ teu . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tə pəsəɣɩ na tə ́ caɣana naani sɩ mpi mpi Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la - tʋ tɔ ɩ ká la - wɩ .

text: And let us consider one another to provoke unto love and to good works :
text2: Tə ́ nyənəɣɩ ta təma tɔɔ na tə ́ lá na tə sɔɔsɩ təmaɣa sɔɔlʋɣʋ na tə ́ kʋsɩ ta kʋnyɩɩləŋ kɛ kʋpantʋ lapʋ tɔɔ .

text: Not forsaking the assembling of ourselves together , as the manner of some is ; but exhorting one another : and so much the more , as ye see the day approaching .
text2: Tə ́ taa yele timpi pə kɛ ́ sɩ tá təna tə ́ koti tɔɣɔ pote ɩsɩɩ lɛlaa ná kisuɣu pote tɔ . Ama tə ́ teŋ təmaɣa tam na pə tɩɩ kələna waatʋ ɩnɛ wei ɩ taa tə loosiɣi Tacaa kʋyakʋ na kʋ ́ kɔŋ tɔ .

text: For if we sin wilfully after that we have received the knowledge of the truth , there remaineth no more sacrifice for sins ,
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye tə tɔŋna ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ təfaa pəyele tə tɛma tampana nyəm , pə ta kaasɩ ɩsaɣatʋ hɩɩsʋɣʋ kɔtaɣa nakəlɩ tɔtɔ .

text: But a certain fearful looking for of judgment and fiery indignation , which shall devour the adversaries .
text2: Ama tə ́ caɣana tapahoii sɩ Ɩsɔ hʋʋlɛ ná taŋa - tʋɣʋ cele .

text: He that despised Moses ' law died without mercy under two or three witnesses :
text2: Pa sɩɩwa sɩ ye nɔɣɔlʋ pənta Moisi kʋsəsɩɩtʋ na yəlaa naalɛ yaa tooso na - ɩ na pa ɩsəpee na pá tisi sɩ yɛɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ , pá kʋ - ɩ , pá taa nyənɩ ɩ pətɔɔtəlɛ .

text: Of how much sorer punishment , suppose ye , shall he be thought worthy , who hath trodden under foot the Son of God , and hath counted the blood of the covenant , wherewith he was sanctified , an unholy thing , and hath done despite unto the Spirit of grace ?
text2: Tɔʋ ye pə wɛ mpʋ ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣa paa lana wei ɩ fɛla Ɩsɔ pəyaɣa kɛ ɩ nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ na ɩ ́ nyənɩ nɔɣɔ pɛɛlʋɣʋ caləm mpi pə taɣana - ɩ tɔɣɔ yem na ɩ ́ kʋ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ nyʋɣʋ tɔ ? Ɩ ́ nyɩ teu sɩ ɩ saləka kaa wɛɛ kɛɛsʋɣʋ .

text: For we know him that hath said , Vengeance belongeth unto me , I will recompense , saith the Lord . And again , The Lord shall judge his people .
text2: Tə nyəmá wei ɩ yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Máá lɛɛtəna paa wei kɛ ́ ɩ ɩsaɣatʋ na máá fɛləna paa wei kɛ ́ mpi ɩ lapa tɔ . Na kʋlʋm ɩnɩ ɩ tasəna yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ sɩ : Tacaa ká hʋʋna ɩ yəlaa kɛ tɔm .

text: It is a fearful thing to fall into the hands of the living God .
text2: Sɩ ń tuti nyá təɣɩ Ɩsɔ weesuɣu tʋ niŋ taa tɔ pə wɛ sɔɣɔntʋ kɛ sɔsɔm yoo .

text: But call to remembrance the former days , in which , after ye were illuminated , ye endured a great fight of afflictions ;
text2: Ɩ ́ tɔɔsɩ ɩsəna pə tɛma - mɛɣɛ lapʋ kɛ waatʋ wei Ɩsɔ lapa na mə ɩsɛntɔɔ cɛ tɔ . Pɩɩ sʋsʋɣʋ - mɛɣɛ kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ taa kɛ ́ kpakpaa na ɩ ́ səŋ təca kɛ wahala ɩnɩ ɩ taa tɔ .

text: Partly , whilst ye were made a gazingstock both by reproaches and afflictions ; and partly , whilst ye became companions of them that were so used .
