text2: Kʋlʋmaa mɛɣɛ pa tɔŋna tʋʋʋ na pá lakɩ mpi pə fɛɩ teu tɔɣɔ samaa taa . Pəyele kʋlʋmaa mɛ mə sɔɔlʋ ná pɩɩna sɩ ɩ ́ te mpa pa tɔŋna wahala tʋɣʋ ɩsɩɩ mɛ tɔ .

text: For ye had compassion of me in my bonds , and took joyfully the spoiling of your goods , knowing in yourselves that ye have in heaven a better and an enduring substance .
text2: Ɩ ́ tá cɔɔlɩ mə tɩ na saləkatʋnaa kʋnyɔŋ tɔɣɔʋ . Waatʋ wei pa lɛɛkaɣa mə wɛnaʋ tɔ ɩ ́ tá kɛɛ nyʋɣʋ maɣamaɣa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ ́ ka nyəmá teu sɩ ɩ ́ wɛna wɛnaʋ mpi pə kəla ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ teu na pə taaŋəɣɩ tam tɔ .

text: Cast not away therefore your confidence , which hath great recompence of reward .
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩlɛ mə naani ɩ ́ taa sɩ . Mpi tɔ ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa sɩɩ - mɛɣɛ kasəyaɣa sɔsɔɣa .

text: For ye have need of patience , that , after ye have done the will of God , ye might receive the promise .
text2: Ye ɩ fɛɩna suulu ɩ ́ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ la Ɩsɔ luɣu nyəntʋ na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ha - mɛɣɛ mpi ɩ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha - mɛ tɔ .

text: For yet a little while , and he that shall come will come , and will not tarry .
text2: Pə maɣamaɣa kɛ pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Pə kaasa pəcɔ maɣamaɣa kɛ ́ sɩ wei ɩ kaɣa ɩ kɔɔ tɔ ɩ ́ kɔɔ . Ɩ kaa taaŋɩ se .

text: Now the just shall live by faith : but if any man draw back , my soul shall have no pleasure in him .
text2: Na wei ma yaa ma yʋlʋpaŋ tɔ ɩ ká tɛ - m na ɩ taa kɛ ́ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tʋlɩ - tɩ . Ama ye ɩ tula tapəŋ ma kaa lapɩ - ɩ luɣu tɔtɔ .

text: But we are not of them who draw back unto perdition ; but of them that believe to the saving of the soul .
text2: Tá ta kɛ ́ mpa pa tuliɣi tapəŋ na pá leki yem tɔ . Ama tə kɛ ́ mpa pa tɛma Ɩsɔ na pa taa na pɩɩ ya pa nyɔɔŋ tɔɣɔ .

text: Now faith is the substance of things hoped for , the evidence of things not seen .
text2: Timpi pa tɔŋ sɩ yʋlʋ tɛma ɩ taa na Ɩsɔ tɔɣɔlɛ waatʋ wei ɩ taŋa pʋlʋ na sika fɛɩ tɔ , na ɩ ́ tʋɣɩ pʋlʋpʋ naani pəyele pəlɛ pɩɩ naa tɔ .

text: For by it the elders obtained a good report .
text2: Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ mpɩ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ sama lɔŋtaa nyə ́ ma .

text: Through faith we understand that the worlds were framed by the word of God , so that things which are seen were not made of things which do appear .
text2: Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ mpɩ pə yelina na tə ́ cɛkəna sɩ Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔta kʋyɔɣɔtʋ na ɩsɔtaa na atɛ pə ́ lá , haləna mpi pɩɩ naa tɔ pə lɩɩna mpi pə naa tɔ pə taa .

text: By faith Abel offered unto God a more excellent sacrifice than Cain , by which he obtained witness that he was righteous , God testifying of his gifts : and by it he being dead yet speaketh .
text2: Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ mpɩ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Apɛɛlɩ lapa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ kɔtaɣa ŋka ka kəla Kayini nyəŋka kɛ teu tɔ . Ɩ tɛmna Ɩsɔ na ɩ taa tɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ ná yaa - ɩ yʋlʋpaŋ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ Ɩsɔ sama ɩ kʋhaʋ . Apɛɛlɩ tɛmna Ɩsɔ na ɩ taa tɔɣɔ paa na ɩ səpʋ tɔ ɩ tɔŋna yɔɣɔtaɣa .

text: By faith Enoch was translated that he should not see death ; and was not found , because God had translated him : for before his translation he had this testimony , that he pleased God .
text2: Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ mpɩ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə ta yele sɩ Henɔkɩ ɩ ́ sɩ kʋsəpʋ . Ama pə kpaɣa - ɩ na ɩ ɩsɛ na pə ́ kpaasɩ - ɩ Ɩsɔ cɔlɔ , na nɔɣɔlʋ ta tasa - ɩ keesuɣu , Ɩsɔ kpaasa - ɩ ɩ cɔlɔ tɔ pə tɔɔ . Pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Henɔkɩ te Ɩsɔ tɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ kpaasa - ɩ .

text: But without faith it is impossible to please him : for he that cometh to God must believe that he is , and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him .
text2: Na ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ , ye pə taɣa Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ tɔɔ yʋlʋ kaa te Ɩsɔ . Mpi tɔ , ye yʋlʋ caa ɩ ́ kpətəna Ɩsɔ , pʋntʋ ká tɛ ɩ taa kɛ ́ təkpataa sɩ Ɩsɔ wɛɛ na ɩ fɛləɣɩ mpa pa pɛɛkəɣɩ - ɩ tɔ .

text: By faith Noah , being warned of God of things not seen as yet , moved with fear , prepared an ark to the saving of his house ; by the which he condemned the world , and became heir of the righteousness which is by faith .
text2: Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ mpɩ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Nowee nɩɩ Ɩsɔ kpaalʋɣʋ kɛ waatʋ wei ɩ heelaɣa - ɩ sɩ pʋlʋ ká kɔɔ tɔ . Paa na ɩ ta nata - wɩ na ɩ ɩsəpəle tɔ ɩ nɩɩ Ɩsɔ nɔɣɔ taa tɔm , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ saakɩ atakaa pɔɣɔlʋɣʋ sɔsɔɔʋ na pə ́ yá ɩ ́ na ɩ təyaɣa nyə ́ ma pa nyɔɔŋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa na ɩ ́ kʋ antulinya tɔm na Ɩsɔ náá yaa - ɩ yʋlʋpaŋ kɛ ɩ tɛm ɩ taa na Ɩsɔ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: By faith Abraham , when he was called to go out into a place which he should after receive for an inheritance , obeyed ; and he went out , not knowing whither he went .
text2: Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ mpɩ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Apəlaham lapa mpi Ɩsɔ yaa - ɩ na ɩ ́ heeli - ɩ sɩ ɩ ́ la tɔ . Ɩ kʋlaa na ɩ ́ tɛɛ tɛtʋ nti Ɩsɔ caa sɩ tə ́ la ɩ ́ na ɩ piya pa nyəntʋ təkpataa tɔ . Ɩ yela ɩ tɛtʋ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ , ɩ ta tɩɩ nyəm timpi maɣamaɣa ɩ puki tɔ .

text: By faith he sojourned in the land of promise , as in a strange country , dwelling in tabernacles with Isaac and Jacob , the heirs with him of the same promise :
text2: Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ tɛmna ɩ taa na pə ́ lá ɩ caɣa tɛtʋ nti Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká cɛlɛ - ɩ tɔ tə taa , na n nawa n tɔ sɩ ɩ ka kɛ ́ mʋʋlʋ . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ sʋʋ coka tɛɛ , na Ɩsaaka na Yakɔpʋ - wɛ . Ɩsɔ ka heela pɛlɛ pa maɣamaɣa sɩ ɩ ká la - wɛɣɛ mpʋ .

text: For he looked for a city which hath foundations , whose builder and maker is God .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Apəlaham caakaɣa ɩcatɛ nte tə kutuluŋ kila kii teu tɔɣɔ , nte Ɩsɔ maɣamaɣa pɩɩwa na ɩ ́ ŋma tɔ .

text: Through faith also Sara herself received strength to conceive seed , and was delivered of a child when she was past age , because she judged him faithful who had promised .
text2: Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə yelaa na Apəlaham pəsɩ na ɩ ́ hiki pəyaɣa na ɩ ́ tɛma kpatəlʋɣʋ , na Saala ná táá fɛɩ lʋlʋɣʋ tɔm taa tɔtɔ . Ɩ tʋ naani kɛ ́ teu təkpataa sɩ nti Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔtaa sɩ ɩ ká lapɩ - ɩ tɔ tə kaa saalɩ .

text: Therefore sprang there even of one , and him as good as dead , so many as the stars of the sky in multitude , and as the sand which is by the sea shore innumerable .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə lapa na yʋlʋ kʋlʋm wei ɩ tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ səpʋ tɔ ɩ ́ lʋlɩ na pə ́ lʋlɩ təyomyom ɩsɩɩ ɩsɔtʋlʋŋasɩ kɛ ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ taa , na ɩsɩɩ teŋku nɔɣɔ kanyəŋa pee .

text: These all died in faith , not having received the promises , but having seen them afar off , and were persuaded of them , and embraced them , and confessed that they were strangers and pilgrims on the earth .
text2: Panɛ ɩnɩ pa təna pa tɛma Ɩsɔ na pa taa , haləna pá polo pá sɩ , pa ta hiki mpi Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha - wɛ tɔ . Ama pa loosa - wəɣɩ kʋloosu kɛ hatuu pooluŋ kɛ ́ , na pá mʋɣʋlɩ na pá tɔ sɩ mpɛ pa kɛ ́ mʋʋlaa na pa cɔɔsa kʋcɔɔsʋ kɛ atɛ cənɛɣɛ .

text: For they that say such things declare plainly that they seek a country .
text2: Mpa pa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ mpʋ tɔ pa hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ təkpataa kɛ ́ sɩ pa pɛɛkəɣɩ pa maɣamaɣa pa tɛtʋ .

text: And truly , if they had been mindful of that country from whence they came out , they might have had opportunity to have returned .
text2: Ye pa ləsasɩ ka wɛ timpi pa lɩɩwa tɔ , pa taa laŋ mpaaʋ na pá məlɩ .

text: But now they desire a better country , that is , an heavenly : wherefore God is not ashamed to be called their God : for he hath prepared for them a city .
text2: Ama tampana tɔɔ pa pɛɛkaɣa tɛtʋ nti tə kəla teu tɔɣɔ . Ntəɣəlɛ ɩsɔtaa nyəntʋ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə fɛɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ fɛɛlɛ sɩ pá yaa - ɩ pa Ɩsɔ , ɩ tɛma - wɛɣɛ ɩcatɛ kʋpantɛ taɣanʋɣʋ tɔ se .

text: By faith Abraham , when he was tried , offered up Isaac : and he that had received the promises offered up his only begotten son ,
text2: Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ yelina Apəlaham kpa ɩ pəyaɣa Ɩsaaka sɩ ɩ kʋɣɩ - kɛ na ɩ ́ lá Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ kɔtaɣa kɛ waatʋ wei Ɩsɔ ná tɛɛ ɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ kʋtɛɛ sɩ ɩ naa tɔ . Ɩsɔ ka tɛma Apəlaham kɛ nɔɔsɩ sɩɩʋ , paa na mpʋ ɩ kpaɣa ɩ pəyaɣa ŋka ka tike ɩ ka lʋla mpʋ tɔ sɩ ɩ kʋɣɩ .

text: Of whom it was said , That in Isaac shall thy seed be called :
text2: Ɩsɔ ka heela - ɩ sɩ Ɩsaaka kiŋ kɛ ɩ ká hikina piya .

text: Accounting that God was able to raise him up , even from the dead ; from whence also he received him in a figure .
text2: Apəlaham ka maɣasa ɩ taa sɩ Ɩsɔ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ Ɩsaaka kɛ feesuɣu . Na pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ mpʋɣʋlɛ pə tɩɩ lapa . Ɩ səpaɣa na pə ́ feesi - ɩ na pə ́ taɣanɩ - ɩ Apəlaham kɛ cɛlʋɣʋ .

text: By faith Isaac blessed Jacob and Esau concerning things to come .
text2: Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ mpɩ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsaaka koolaa sɩ Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ la kʋpantʋ kɛ Yakɔpʋ na Ɩsaʋ kɛ cele .

text: By faith Jacob , when he was a dying , blessed both the sons of Joseph ; and worshipped , leaning upon the top of his staff .
text2: Saa wei Yakɔpʋ wʋsa səm tɔ Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ mpɩ pə yelina na ɩ ́ kooli Yosɛɛfʋ piya təna tɔɔ kɛ ́ kʋpantʋ na ɩ ́ sɛɛ Ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ nyəka ɩ kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɔɔ .

text: By faith Joseph , when he died , made mention of the departing of the children of Israel ; and gave commandment concerning his bones .
text2: Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ mpɩ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ waatʋ wei Yosɛɛfʋ caakaɣa səm tɔ ɩ yɔɣɔta Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma Icipiti taa lɩɩʋ tɔm , na ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ - wɛɣɛ ɩsəna paa lana ɩ mʋwa tɔ .

text: By faith Moses , when he was born , was hid three months of his parents , because they saw he was a proper child ; and they were not afraid of the king ' s commandment .
text2: Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ mpɩ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Moisi caa na ɩ too pa ŋmɛsa - ɩ ɩsɔtʋnaa tooso kɛ ́ ɩ lʋlʋɣʋ waalɩ . Pa nawa sɩ ɩ tewa ɩlɛ pa ta nyana nti wulaʋ ka tɔma sɩ pá taa la tɔ tə lapʋ .

text: By faith Moses , when he was come to years , refused to be called the son of Pharaoh ' s daughter ;
text2: Waatʋ wei Moisi lapa sɔsɔ tɔ ɩ tɛma Ɩsɔ na ɩ taa tɔɣɔ ɩ kisaa sɩ pá taa yaa - ɩ Icipiti wulaʋ sɔsɔ pɛɛlɔ pəyaɣa .

text: Choosing rather to suffer affliction with the people of God , than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a season ;
text2: Pə kəla - ɩ leleŋ sɩ pá tʋ ́ ɩ ́ na Ɩsɔ yəlaa kɛ kʋnyɔŋ na mpi ɩ ká yɔɔləna ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ wɛɛ naalɛ tike tɔ .

text: Esteeming the reproach of Christ greater riches than the treasures in Egypt : for he had respect unto the recompence of the reward .
text2: Ɩ nawa sɩ ye yəlaa ɩ ́ kisa - ɩ ɩsɩɩ pa kisuɣu Mesii tɔ pə kəla - ɩ teu kɛ Icipiti apititu təna . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , cele kʋfɛlʋɣʋ kɛ ɩ pɛɛkəɣɩ .

text: By faith he forsook Egypt , not fearing the wrath of the king : for he endured , as seeing him who is invisible .
text2: Moisi tɛma Ɩsɔ na ɩ taa tɔɣɔ waatʋ wei ɩ ́ lɩɩ Icipiti na wulaʋ pááná huu ɩ tɔɔ tɔ pə ta tɔ ɩ laŋlɛ . Ɩ səŋa teu təca , mpi tɔ ɩ naakaɣa Ɩsɔ wei ɩ fɛɩ pá na - ɩ tɔ .

text: Through faith he kept the passover , and the sprinkling of blood , lest he that destroyed the firstborn should touch them .
text2: Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ sɩɩ Tɛɛʋ acima tɔɣɔʋ , na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ pá taa caləm kɛ naŋŋ nɔnɔɔsɩ na səm ɩsɔtaa tillu ɩ ́ taa kʋ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma kancaalaɣa kʋlʋlaa .

text: By faith they passed through the Red sea as by dry land : which the Egyptians assaying to do were drowned .
text2: Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ mpɩ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma tɛsa səsəncaasɩ teŋku kɛ puɣulaɣa ɩsɩɩ kacaŋa tɔɔ . Icipiti nyə ́ ma ná kɛɛna - wɛ ɩlɛna lʋm tɔɣɔ pɛlɛ .

text: By faith the walls of Jericho fell down , after they were compassed about seven days .
text2: Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ mpɩ pə yelina Yeliko koloŋa tima təmʋɣʋmʋɣʋ kɛ ́ waatʋ wei Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma tɔma na pá cɔɔna - kɛɣɛ kʋyɛɛŋ naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa tɔ .

text: By faith the harlot Rahab perished not with them that believed not , when she had received the spies with peace .
text2: Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ mpɩ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa ta kpɛntəna mpa pa kisa Ɩsɔ nyəntʋ tɔ na apalaa təna alʋ Lahapɩ na pá kʋ . Mpi tɔ alʋ ɩnɩ ɩ tɔka ɩcatɛ feŋlaa kɛ teu kɛ waatʋ wei pa tala ɩ tɛ tɔ .

text: And what shall I more say ? for the time would fail me to tell of Gedeon , and of Barak , and of Samson , and of Jephthae ; of David also , and Samuel , and of the prophets :
text2: Ntiɣi maa tasa yɔɣɔtaɣa ɩlɛ yee ? Tapacaɣalɛ fɛɩ - m sɩ má yɔɣɔtɩ Ketiyɔŋ , na Palakɩ , na Samsɔŋ , na Yɛfɛtɛ , na Tafiiti , na Samiyɛɛlɩ , na Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa pa tɔm .

text: Who through faith subdued kingdoms , wrought righteousness , obtained promises , stopped the mouths of lions ,
text2: Pa tɛma Ɩsɔ na pa taa tɔɣɔ pa tɔɣa lɛlaa tɛtʋ , na pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa təŋa tampana , ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ ha - wɛɣɛ mpi ɩ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha - wɛ tɔ . Pa tɛma Ɩsɔ na pa taa tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa təka tɔɣɔlasɩ nɔɔsɩ ,

text: Quenched the violence of fire , escaped the edge of the sword , out of weakness were made strong , waxed valiant in fight , turned to flight the armies of the aliens .
text2: na pá teesi kɔkɔsɩ nsi sɩ mʋɣɩ kemkem tɔ . Pa tɛma Ɩsɔ na pa taa tɔɣɔ pa lɩɩ laɣatɛ nɔɣɔ taa . Mpʋ pə yelina na paa kɛʋ acamaa tɔ pá pəsɩ tampana nyə ́ ma . Pa tɛma Ɩsɔ na pa taa tɔɣɔ pa lapa akanaa kɛ yooŋ taa na pá kəlɩ pa kolontunaa yoolaa loosi .

text: Women received their dead raised to life again : and others were tortured , not accepting deliverance ; that they might obtain a better resurrection :
text2: Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa feesa alaa kɛ pa sətaa na pá cɛla - wɛ . Lɛlaa ná nawa kaŋkaŋsi na haləna pá caŋ na pá sɩ , pa ta kisi wahala ɩnɩ ɩ tɔɣɔʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pa caakaɣa kɛ ́ sɩ pá feesi - wɛ na pá hiki weesuɣu kʋpampaŋkʋ .

text: And others had trial of cruel mockings and scourgings , yea , moreover of bonds and imprisonment :
text2: Pa foota lɛlaa na pá ma - wɛɣɛ akpatɛɛ , pa hɔka lɛlaa kɛ alukpala na pá tʋ - wɛɣɛ saləka .

text: They were stoned , they were sawn asunder , were tempted , were slain with the sword : they wandered about in sheepskins and goatskins ; being destitute , afflicted , tormented ;
text2: Pa yaɣa lɛlaa kɛ pɛɛ na pá sɩ , na pá naasɩ lɛlaa , na pá tala lɛlaa kɛ tilima naalɛ naalɛ na pa ɩsɛ . Pa laa lɛlaa kɛ kʋlaa na sɛɛsɩ . Heeŋ na pəŋ pə alema kɛ pa tɔɣɔlaɣa na pá yɛləɣɩ . Anɩ pa hʋlʋmaa təkoŋkoŋ pəyele pa tɔŋna - wɛɣɛ wahala tʋɣʋ na pá lakɩ - wɛɣɛ nyaŋ .

text: ( Of whom the world was not worthy : ) they wandered in deserts , and in mountains , and in dens and caves of the earth .
text2: Yəlaa panɛ pa tɛɛ antulinya taa cənɛ caɣaʋ . Pa cɔɔkaɣa yem kɛ ́ wʋlaɣa tɛtʋ taa na pɔɔŋ taa . Pa təsʋʋlɛnaa ntɛ ́ kʋkpaməŋ tɛɛ na tulukusi taa .

text: And these all , having obtained a good report through faith , received not the promise :
text2: Panɛ ɩnɩ pa təna pa tɛma pa taa na Ɩsɔ tɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ sama - wɛ . Paa na mpʋ pa ta hiki mpi Ɩsɔ ka tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha - wɛ tɔ .

text: God having provided some better thing for us , that they without us should not be made perfect .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ ka hʋʋwa sɩ ɩ ká la taɣa mpi pə kəla teu tɔ ɩlɛ ɩ ta tisi sɩ pá te təkpataa na taa fɛɩ .

text: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses , let us lay aside every weight , and the sin which doth so easily beset us , and let us run with patience the race that is set before us ,
text2: Tɔʋ , ɩsɩɩ yəlaa samaa tuutuuma ɩnɛ ɩ tama - tʋɣʋ kotaɣa na ɩ tɛma ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ lapʋ na tə nyəmá təkelekele tɔ , ta tɔtɔ tə ́ hɔɣɔsɩ na tə ́ pɛtɩ pə təna mpi pɩɩ kaɣatɩ - tʋ sɩ tə ́ taa polo lɔŋlɔŋ tɔ , na tə ́ lɔ ɩsaɣatʋ nti tə matəna - tʋɣʋ tam tɔ . Ɩlɛna tə ́ kpaɣa casəlɛ kɛ teu kɛ mpi pə wɛ tá nɔɣɔ tɔɔ tɔ pə waalɩ .

text: Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith ; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross , despising the shame , and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God .
text2: Tə ́ kpaɣa tá ɩsɛ na tə ́ pá Yesu tɔɔ , ɩnɩ ɩ kɛna ta Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ nyʋɣʋ na pə tapʋɣʋ . Ɩ ta nyənɩ tesika tɔɔ səm fɛɛlɛ , ɩ tisaa sɩ pá kamɩ - ɩ tesika tɔɔ na ɩ ́ sɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ tisa mpʋ , laŋhʋlʋmlɛ nte tə taŋa - ɩ cele tɔɣɔ ɩ nyənaɣa . Na kaɣana ɩ ́ caɣa Ɩsɔ kumte kɔŋkɔŋ taa .

text: For consider him that endured such contradiction of sinners against himself , lest ye be wearied and faint in your minds .
text2: Mɛ mɩɩ caɣa na ɩ ́ maɣasɩ mə taa na ɩ ́ na ɩsəna asaɣaa yoona - ɩ na ɩ ́ tá kpɛɛsɩ tɔ . Ɩ ́ nyənna təna , pəcɔ ɩ ́ taa kɔɔ na ɩ ́ kpisi na ɩ ́ lɔ tɔɔŋ .

text: Ye have not yet resisted unto blood , striving against sin .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tuu mə na asaɣaa ɩ ́ lʋkɩ tɔ ɩ ́ ta lʋta na halɩ ɩ ́ caŋ ɩ ́ sɩ mə təlʋtɛ taa .

text: And ye have forgotten the exhortation which speaketh unto you as unto children , My son , despise not thou the chastening of the Lord , nor faint when thou art rebuked of him :
text2: Ɩ ́ sɔɔwa apalʋtʋ sɔɔsʋɣʋ tɔm nti Ɩsɔ heeliɣi - mɛ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ ɩ piya tɔ yɛɛ ? Ɩ tɔma sɩ : Ma pəyalʋ , paasəna teu kɛ waatʋ wei Tacaa hɔŋ nyá ŋkpaŋʋɣʋ tɔ . Na ye ɩ kaləɣəna - ŋ taa lɔ nyá apalʋtʋ .

text: For whom the Lord loveth he chasteneth , and scourgeth every son whom he receiveth .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , wei Tacaa sɔɔlaa tɔ pʋntʋ ŋkpaŋʋɣʋ kɛ ɩ hɔŋ . Na wei ɩ nyənəɣɩ ɩ pəyaɣa tɔ pʋntʋ kɛ ɩ kɔtəɣɩ .

text: If ye endure chastening , God dealeth with you as with sons ; for what son is he whom the father chasteneth not ?
text2: Ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ mə kʋnyɔməŋ na suulu na ɩ ́ nyənɩ - ɩ ɩsɩɩ cɛcɛ hɔŋʋɣʋ ɩ pəyaɣa ŋkpaŋʋɣʋ tɔ . Kʋnyɔməŋ wei ɩ ́ tɔkʋɣʋ mpʋ tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ hʋləɣəna sɩ Ɩsɔ nyənəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ ɩ piya . Pəyaɣa ŋka ka ŋkpaŋʋɣʋ kɛ ka caa ɩɩ hɔŋ ?

text: But if ye be without chastisement , whereof all are partakers , then are ye bastards , and not sons .
text2: Ye ɩɩ hɔŋ mə ŋkpaŋŋ ɩsɩɩ ɩ lakɩ ɩ piya təna tɔ pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ tá kɛ ́ ɩ piya maɣamaɣa . Ama ɩ ́ kɛ ́ apalaa naalɛ piya kɛ ́ .

text: Furthermore we have had fathers of our flesh which corrected us , and we gave them reverence : shall we not much rather be in subjection unto the Father of spirits , and live ?
text2: Tə ́ nyənna ta caanaa maɣamaɣa kɛ atɛ cənɛ . Pa hɔŋ tá ŋkpaŋŋ na tə ́ seeki - wɛ . Ye tá caanaa hɔŋ tá ŋkpaŋŋ na tə ́ seeki - wɛ , pə wɛɛ sɩ tɩɩ nɩɩna tá ɩsɔtaa Caa na pə ́ kəlɩ mpʋ na tə ́ hiki weesiŋ .

text: For they verily for a few days chastened us after their own pleasure ; but he for our profit , that we might be partakers of his holiness .
text2: Ta caanaa maɣamaɣa ná hɔŋ tá ŋkpaŋŋ kɛ wɛɛ naalɛ kɛ ɩsəna pə maɣa - wɛ tɔ . Ama sɩ pə ́ waasɩ - tʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ ná hɔŋ tá ŋkpaŋŋ sɩ tə ́ kpaɣa ɩ tənaŋŋ wɛɛtʋ .

text: Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous , but grievous : nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby .
text2: Waatʋ wei pa hɔŋ tá ŋkpaŋŋ tɔ pə caɣa - tʋɣʋ ɩsɩɩ pa tʋɣɩ - tʋɣʋ wahala , pə fɛɩ laŋhʋlʋmlɛ se . Ama pə kɔŋ na pə leeli ɩlɛna mpa pa ŋkpaŋŋ pa hɔma mpʋ na pə sɛɣɛsɩ - wɛ tɔ , pá na kʋpantʋ kɛ pə taa . Pʋntʋnaa tɔntɛ teeki na pə ́ kɔna - wɛɣɛ hɛɛsʋɣʋ .

text: Wherefore lift up the hands which hang down , and the feeble knees ;
text2: Ɩ ́ la na mə niŋ kʋsəpəŋ na mə nɔɔhɛɛ acamaa pə nyɔɔ toŋ .

text: And make straight paths for your feet , lest that which is lame be turned out of the way ; but let it rather be healed .
text2: Na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam kɛ ́ mpaaŋ kʋsiɣisiŋ , pə ́ taa kɔɔ na sɛkəllʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ cɔləsɩ mpaaʋ , ama ɩ ́ hiki toma .

text: Follow peace with all men , and holiness , without which no man shall see the Lord :
text2: Ɩ ́ la kookalɩ na mə na yəlaa təna ɩ ́ wɛɛna təma na leleŋ na mə tɔntɛ kɛɛsɩ teu . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye yʋlʋ tɔntɛ ta kɛɛsɩ teu pʋntʋ kaa keesi Tacaa .

text: Looking diligently lest any man fail of the grace of God ; lest any root of bitterness springing up trouble you , and thereby many be defiled ;
text2: Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa kɔɔ na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ Ɩsɔ pɛɛlɛɛ kɛ laŋʋɣʋ . Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ tɔtɔ na pə ́ taa kɔɔ na mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ pəsɩ ɩsɩɩ tʋɣʋ ɩsaɣaʋ nyɔɔkʋɣʋ na kʋ nyaŋ wakələɣɩ yəlaa tɔ .

text: Lest there be any fornicator , or profane person , as Esau , who for one morsel of meat sold his birthright .
text2: Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ tɔtɔ na mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa la asilima yaa Ɩsɔ nyəm pəsɩ ɩ ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ yem , ɩsɩɩ pə lapʋ Ɩsaʋ na ɩ ́ kpaɣa ɩ sɔsɔɔntʋ lonte na ɩ ́ pɛɛtɩ tɔɣɔniya tɔɔ tɔ .

text: For ye know how that afterward , when he would have inherited the blessing , he was rejected : for he found no place of repentance , though he sought it carefully with tears .
text2: Mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ nawa ɩsəna pə kɔma waalɩ waalɩ na ɩ ́ nyɩɩlɩ sɩ ɩ caa ɩ ́ kooli - ɩ kʋpantʋ , ɩlɛna pá lɔ - ɩ tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pə fɛɩ pəsʋɣʋ sɩ ɩ ́ məlɩ waalɩ na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ mpi ɩ ka tɛma wakəlʋɣʋ tɔ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ wii yem .

text: For ye are not come unto the mount that might be touched , and that burned with fire , nor unto blackness , and darkness , and tempest ,
text2: Mɛ ɩ ́ tá kpətəna pʋɣʋ ŋku yʋlʋ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ tokina tɔ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma , ŋku kʋ tɔɔ kɔkɔ toŋ nyəŋka mʋkaɣa tɔ , na ɩsɔŋmʋntʋ na səkpɛtʋɣʋ na heelimuɣu pə nyalaa tɔ ,

text: And the sound of a trumpet , and the voice of words ; which voice they that heard intreated that the word should not be spoken to them any more :
text2: na pá nɩɩ akantəlɛ wula na pə ́ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔ . Saa wei Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ nyə ́ ma nɩɩ pə yɔɣɔtaɣa mpʋ tɔ , pa tɔma sɩ pə ́ yele mpʋ , pə ́ taa tasa - wɛɣɛ yɔɣɔtənaʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ maɣamaɣa .

text: ( For they could not endure that which was commanded , And if so much as a beast touch the mountain , it shall be stoned , or thrust through with a dart :
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tɔm nti paa heela - wɛ sɩ ye yʋlʋ yaa kpəntɛ maɣamaɣa tokina pʋɣʋ ŋkʋ , paa yaɣa - tɛɣɛ pɛɛ na pá kʋ tɔ , tə kəla - wɛɣɛ toŋ .

text: And so terrible was the sight , that Moses said , I exceedingly fear and quake : )
text2: Pə nyənʋɣʋ lapa sɔɣɔntʋ haləna Moisi maɣamaɣa tɔ ́ sɩ sɔɣɔntʋ kəla ɩnɩ na ɩ ́ seliɣi .

text: But ye are come unto mount Sion , and unto the city of the living God , the heavenly Jerusalem , and to an innumerable company of angels ,
text2: Ama mɛ mə kpətəna Siyɔŋ pʋɣʋ , na Ɩsɔ weesuɣu tʋ ɩcatɛ ɩsɔtaa Yosalɛm na tə ɩsɔtaa tillaa tuutuuma .

text: To the general assembly and church of the firstborn , which are written in heaven , and to God the Judge of all , and to the spirits of just men made perfect ,
text2: Ɩ ́ kpətəna Ɩsɔ kancaalaɣa kʋlʋlaa mpa pa həla pa ŋmaa ɩsɔtaa na pá kotina laŋhʋlʋmlɛ tɔ . Ɩ ́ kpətəna Ɩsɔ wei ɩ ká hʋʋna yəlaa tənaɣa tɔm tɔ , na ɩ ́ kpətəna ɩ yəlaa kʋpama mpa pa lapa na pá te təkpataa tɔ pa ləsasɩ .

text: And to Jesus the mediator of the new covenant , and to the blood of sprinkling , that speaketh better things than that of Abel .
text2: Ɩ ́ kpətəna Yesu wei ɩ kɛ ́ nɔɣɔ pɛɛlʋɣʋ kʋfam tɛləsʋlʋ tɔ . Ɩ ́ kpətəna ɩ caləm kʋŋmɩɩsəm mpi pə yɔɣɔtaɣa kəla Apɛɛlɩ nyəm nyəŋka təcaɣacaɣa tɔ .

text: See that ye refuse not him that speaketh . For if they escaped not who refused him that spake on earth , much more shall not we escape , if we turn away from him that speaketh from heaven :
text2: Ɩ ́ la laakalɩ , ɩ ́ taa kisi wei ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣəna - mɛ tɔ ɩ tɔm kɛ nɩɩʋ . Mpa pa kisa wei ɩ kpaalaɣa Ɩsɔ Tɔm kɛ atɛ cənɛ tɔ ɩ tɔm nɩɩʋ tɔ pa ta kpisi pɛlɛ pa ŋkpaŋʋɣʋ kɛ hɔm , kacaŋfana ta mpa tɩɩ ha lumaɣa kɛ wei ɩ wɛ hatuu ɩsɔtaa na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəna - tʋ tɔ ?

text: Whose voice then shook the earth : but now he hath promised , saying , Yet once more I shake not the earth only , but also heaven .
text2: Ɩ yɔɣɔtaa na ɩ yɔɣɔtaɣa ciɣiti tɛtʋ təna . Ama ɩ tasa - tʋɣʋ heeluɣu sɩ ɩ ká tasa atɛɣɛ ciɣituɣu , haləna ɩ ́ kpɛntəna ɩsɔtaa .

text: And this word , Yet once more , signifieth the removing of those things that are shaken , as of things that are made , that those things which cannot be shaken may remain .
text2: Timpi pa tɔŋ mpʋ sɩ paa tasa tɔ pə wɛɛ kɛlɛ sɩ mpi mpi pə lapa na pɩɩ ciɣiti - wɩ tɔ pɩɩ saalɩ yem ɩlɛna mpi pɩɩ caɣa tam tɔ pəlɛ pə lɛɛtɩ .

text: Wherefore we receiving a kingdom which cannot be moved , let us have grace , whereby we may serve God acceptably with reverence and godly fear :
text2: Tɩɩ hiki kawulaɣa ŋka kaa caɣa tam tɔ ɩlɛ tə ́ la Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ təmlɛ kɛ ɩsəna mpi pɩɩ maɣa - ɩ tɔ , na tə ́ see - ɩ na tə ́ nyaŋna - ɩ na tə ́ hʋlɩ sɩ ɩ nyana təmlɛ sɛɛʋ ntɛ ́ .

text: For our God is a consuming fire .
text2: Tá Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ kɔkɔ ŋka ka nyakɩ pə təna tɔɣɔ .

text: Let brotherly love continue .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɔɔləɣɩ təmaɣa tam ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ na ɩ neu .

text: Be not forgetful to entertain strangers : for thereby some have entertained angels unawares .
text2: Anɩ pə wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ́ tɔkəɣɩ mʋʋlaa mpa pa kɔŋ mə tɛ tɔɣɔ teu tɔ ɩ nɩɩwa . Lɛlaa lapa ɩsɔtaa tillaa kɛ mʋʋllɛ kɛ pə lapʋ taa , pa tɔŋna sɩ yəlaa kɛ yem .

text: Remember them that are in bonds , as bound with them ; and them which suffer adversity , as being yourselves also in the body .
text2: Ɩ ́ tɔɔsɩ saləkatʋnaa tɔɔ ɩsɩɩ ye mə na - wɛ ɩ ́ ka wɛnna saləka ɩnɩ ɩ taa ɩ ́ ka lapa tɔ . Na ɩ ́ tɔɔsɩ mpa pa lakɩ nyaŋ tɔ pa tɔm ɩsɩɩ mə maɣamaɣa kɛ pa lakɩ mpʋ .

text: Marriage is honourable in all , and the bed undefiled : but whoremongers and adulterers God will judge .
text2: Paa wei ɩ ́ nyənɩ alʋ kpaɣaʋ tɔm ɩsɩɩ pʋlʋ sɔsɔɔm . Na apalʋ na alʋ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ náá taa la yem yem tɔtɔ . Ɩsɔ ká hʋʋna tɔm kɛ mpa pa lakɩ asilima na mpa pa lakɩ wasaŋkalətʋ tɔ .

text: Let your conversation be without covetousness ; and be content with such things as ye have : for he hath said , I will never leave thee , nor forsake thee .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa nyənəɣɩ pɔɣɔlaɣa kɛ mə kʋlapʋtʋ taa . Ama mə laŋa ɩ ́ hɛɛna mpi ɩ wɛna tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔtaa sɩ : Ma kaa lɔ - ŋ paa pəcɔ , maa wɛɛ nyá waalɩ kɛ ́ tam .

text: So that we may boldly say , The Lord is my helper , and I will not fear what man shall do unto me .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə pəsəɣɩ na tə ́ yɔɣɔtəna naani sɩ : Tacaa kɛlɛ ma tentu , ma kaa nyana pʋlʋ . Yʋlʋ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ la - m we ?

text: Remember them which have the rule over you , who have spoken unto you the word of God : whose faith follow , considering the end of their conversation .
text2: Ɩ ́ tɔɔsɩ mə kancaalaɣa sɔsaa mpa pa caala - mɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ Tɔm heeluɣu tɔ pa tɔɔ . Ɩ ́ nyənna ɩsəna pa yaasi ka wɛɛ tɔ , na ɩsəna pɛlɛ pa səpa tɔ , na ɩ ́ kɛɛsəna ɩsəna pɛlɛ pa tɛma Ɩsɔ na pa taa tɔ na ɩ ́ lá mpʋ .

text: Jesus Christ the same yesterday , and to day , and for ever .
text2: Ɩsəna Yesu Kilisiti ka wɛɛ tɔ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ wɛ saŋa , na ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ká wɛɛ tam .

text: Be not carried about with divers and strange doctrines . For it is a good thing that the heart be established with grace ; not with meats , which have not profited them that have been occupied therein .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa yele na sɛɣɛsəŋ kʋfaŋ ɩnɩ ɩ təna , ɩ nɔɣɔ na ɩ suka , ɩ ́ tolisi - mɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mpi pə kəla teu tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ Ɩsɔ pɛɛlɛɛ ɩ ́ la na tə ́ hikiɣi toŋ kɛ ta hʋwɛɛ taa . Pə ́ taa wɛɛ kʋtɔɣɔʋ cɔlʋɣʋ kiŋ . Mpa pa paasəɣəna kʋtɔɣɔʋ cɔlʋɣʋ tɔ paa waakɩ pə taa kɛ ́ pʋlʋ .

text: We have an altar , whereof they have no right to eat which serve the tabernacle .
text2: Kɔtəlaa mpa pa lakɩ təmlɛ kɛ Yuta kɔtasɩ cokəle taa tɔ pa fɛɩna mpaa sɩ pá tɔɣɔ mpi pa kʋ tá kɔtaɣa təlatɛ taa tɔ .

text: For the bodies of those beasts , whose blood is brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sin , are burned without the camp .
text2: Yuta kɔtʋlʋ sɔsɔ kpakəɣɩ wontu ntɩ tə caləm kɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ pona cokəle taa na ɩ ́ fɛɛnɩ sɩ pə ́ hɩɩsɩ yəlaa ɩsaɣatʋ . Ɩlɛna pá kpaɣa wontu nti pa kʋwa mpʋ tɔ tə maɣamaɣa na pá pona təsikile waalɩ na pá tʋ kɔkɔ .

text: Wherefore Jesus also , that he might sanctify the people with his own blood , suffered without the gate .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Yesu səpa ɩcatɛ na waalɩ sɩ ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ caləm ɩ ́ taɣanɩ yəlaa samaa .

text: Let us go forth therefore unto him without the camp , bearing his reproach .
text2: Mpʋ tɔ , tə ́ polo ɩ kiŋ kɛ təsikile waalɩ na pá kisi - tʋ ɩsɩɩ pa kisuɣu ɩnɩ tɔ .

text: For here have we no continuing city , but we seek one to come .
text2: Mpi tɔ , tə fɛɩna ɩcatɛ tam nyəntɛ kɛ atɛ cənɛ . Ama cele nyəntɛ kɛ tə pɛɛkəɣɩ .

text: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually , that is , the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name .
text2: Tə saŋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tam na pə ́ lá teitei ɩsɩɩ tə lapa - ɩ kɔtaɣa na Yesu toŋ taa . Pə nyʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ ɩ hətɛ ɩ ́ yaakɩ tá nɔɔsɩ taa kɛ ́ tam .

text: But to do good and to communicate forget not : for with such sacrifices God is well pleased .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa sɔɔ kʋpantʋ lapʋ na təmaɣa tem kɛ tam , pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , kɔtaɣa ɩsɩɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ sɔɔlaa .

text: Obey them that have the rule over you , and submit yourselves : for they watch for your souls , as they that must give account , that they may do it with joy , and not with grief : for that is unprofitable for you .
text2: Ɩ ́ nɩɩkəna mə sɔsaa na ɩ ́ seeki - wɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , pa feniɣi mə ləsasɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ . Mpi tɔ , pa nyəmá sɩ cele Ɩsɔ ká pɔɔsɩ - wɛɣɛ sɩ tɔm . Ye ɩ ́ nɩɩkəna - wɛ , pa təmlɛ lapʋ kaa la - wɛɣɛ felentu . Ama ye ɩɩ nɩɩkəna - wɛ , pa təmlɛ ká pəsɩ - wɛɣɛ təlasɩ tɔm , na saa ɩnɩ pə kaa waasɩ - mɛɣɛ pʋlʋ .

text: Pray for us : for we trust we have a good conscience , in all things willing to live honestly .
text2: Ɩ ́ sələməna - tʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam . Tə nyəmá teu kɛ tá taa təkpataa sɩ tə wɛna lotu kʋlʋmtʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tə caa kɛ ́ sɩ paa mpi pə taa tá tɔntɛ ɩ ́ maɣa .

text: But I beseech you the rather to do this , that I may be restored to you the sooner .
text2: Nti ma wiikina - mɛ təsiɣisiɣi tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ ɩ ́ sələmɩ Ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ lá luɣu na má məlɩ mə kiŋ kɛ lɔŋ .

text: Now the God of peace , that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus , that great shepherd of the sheep , through the blood of the everlasting covenant ,
text2: Ɩsɔ feesa Tacaa Yesu kɛ səm taa , ɩnəɣəlɛ heeŋ tiikilu sɔsɔ kɛ ɩ səpʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ . Na ɩ səm mpɩ pə yelina na nɔɣɔ pɛɛlʋɣʋ tam nyəm la tampana .

text: Make you perfect in every good work to do his will , working in you that which is wellpleasing in his sight , through Jesus Christ ; to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Hɛɛsʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ la na mɩɩ pəsɩ na ɩ ́ lá kʋpantʋnaa na ɩ ́ lá ɩ luɣu nyəntʋ təmammam . Ɩsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ ́ yele na Yesu Kilisiti la tá kiŋ kɛ mpi pə wɛ - ɩ teu tɔ . Yesu ɩ ́ hiki teeli kɛ tam . Ami .

text: And I beseech you , brethren , suffer the word of exhortation : for I have written a letter unto you in few words .
text2: Ma taapalaa ma wiikina - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ nɩɩ apalʋtʋ sɔɔsʋɣʋ tɔm tənɛ na suulu . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tɔm nti ma ŋmaa - mɛɣɛ cənɛ tɔ tə ta tɔɔ .

text: Know ye that our brother Timothy is set at liberty ; with whom , if he come shortly , I will see you .
text2: Ma heeliɣi - mɛ sɩ pa tʋla ta taapalʋ Timotee . Ye ɩ tala lɔŋ kɛ cənɛ ma na - ɩ tɩɩ kɔnna mə tɛ .

text: Salute all them that have the rule over you , and all the saints . They of Italy salute you .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ mə sɔsaa təna na Ɩsɔ yəlaa təna təpaɩ . Ta taapalaa Ɩtalii nyə ́ ma sɛɛ - mɛ .

text: Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ la mə tənaɣa pɛɛlɛɛ .

text: James , a servant of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ , to the twelve tribes which are scattered abroad , greeting .
text2: Maɣa Saakɩ Ɩsɔ na Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti pa yom . Má ŋmaakəna takəlaɣa kanɛ . Ma sɛɛ Ɩsɔ yəlaa təna mpa pa ya antulinya təna taa tɔ .

text: My brethren , count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations ;
text2: Ma taapalaa , ye maɣasəŋ ɩ ́ kɔma na ɩ ́ maɣasəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ ŋka ŋka , ɩ ́ caɣana laŋhʋlʋmlɛ kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: Knowing this , that the trying of your faith worketh patience .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ ́ nyəmá sɩ ye ɩ ́ səŋa teu təca kɛ naani wei ɩ ́ tʋwa Ɩsɔ tɔ ɩ taa , ɩlɛ ɩ ́ pəsa kantəllaa ntɛ ́ .

text: But let patience have her perfect work , that ye may be perfect and entire , wanting nothing .
text2: Ama ɩ ́ yele na paa wei ɩ ́ ná sɩ ɩ ́ kantələna tampana . Saa ɩnɩ ɩ ́ ká la yəlaa mpa pa tewa təkpataa na pá wɛ təmammam na pá tá laŋ pʋlʋ tɔ .

text: If any of you lack wisdom , let him ask of God , that giveth to all men liberally , and upbraideth not ; and it shall be given him .
text2: Paa na mpʋ ye mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ laŋa nyəm , ɩ ́ sələmɩ Ɩsɔ na ɩ ká ha - ɩ - wɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ fɛɩ felentu kɛ paa pəcɔ . Pəyele ɩɩ kootiɣi nɔɣɔlʋ .

text: But let him ask in faith , nothing wavering . For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed .
text2: Ama ye pʋntʋ ɩ ́ sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ , ɩ ́ sələmɩ na ɩ ́ tɛ ɩ taa , ɩ ́ taa la sika . Ye yʋlʋ ɩ ́ sələməɣəna sika , pʋntʋ wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ teŋku lʋm hola nna heelim lakɩ na á laŋtəɣɩ yem tɔ .

text: For let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord .
text2: Yʋlʋ ɩsɩɩ mpʋ pə taka ɩ ́ taa tɛɛlɩ sɩ Tacaa ká ha - ɩ pʋlʋ cəcəka .

text: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways .
text2: Mpi tɔ , ɩ kɛ ́ yɛlɛyɛlɛ tʋ na tutulu kɛ ɩ yaasɩ təna taa kɛ ́ .

text: Let the brother of low degree rejoice in that he is exalted :
text2: Ye kʋnyɔntʋ ɩ ́ wɛ tá taa , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ mʋɣʋlɩ sɩ Ɩsɔ ká kʋsɩ ɩ nyʋɣʋ tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: But the rich , in that he is made low : because as the flower of the grass he shall pass away .
text2: Na ye apite ɩ ́ wɛ ta taa , təlɛ tə ́ mʋɣʋlɩ sɩ Ɩsɔ ká tisi - tɛ tɔ pə tɔɔ . Apite kɔŋ na tə ́ saalɩ yem kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ nyɩɩlʋɣʋ hɛtʋ kɛ taalɛ taa .

text: For the sun is no sooner risen with a burning heat , but it withereth the grass , and the flower thereof falleth , and the grace of the fashion of it perisheth : so also shall the rich man fade away in his ways .
text2: Ilim lɩɩkɩ na pə ́ kɔɔ pə ́ haŋ sɔsɔm , ɩlɛna pə ́ nyaɣa nyɩɩlʋɣʋ ŋkʋ na kʋ wʋlɩ , ɩlɛna hɛtʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ hoti , na kʋ kacɔka saalɩ yem . Mpʋ ɩnəɣɩ pɩɩ kɔɔ na apite na tə kʋlapʋtʋ təna saalɩ yem .

text: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation : for when he is tried , he shall receive the crown of life , which the Lord hath promised to them that love him .
text2: Maɣasəŋ ɩ ́ maɣana wei na pə ́ tá ciɣiti - ɩ , pʋntʋ nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , waatʋ wei pə tɛŋɩ - ɩ maɣasʋɣʋ na pə ́ tá ciɣiti - ɩ tɔ , Ɩsɔ haakɩ - ɩ weesuɣu teeli ntenuɣu ŋku kʋ kɛ ́ mpi Ɩsɔ tɔma sɩ ɩ haa mpa pa sɔɔləɣɩ - ɩ tɔɣɔ .

text: Let no man say when he is tempted , I am tempted of God : for God cannot be tempted with evil , neither tempteth he any man :
text2: Ye maɣasʋɣʋ ɩ ́ maɣana wei , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ taa tɔ sɩ : Ɩsɔ maɣasəɣəna - m . Mpi tɔ , pɩɩ maɣasəɣɩ Ɩsɔ sɩ ɩ ́ la ɩsaɣatʋ , pəyele Ɩsɔ maɣamaɣa naa maɣasəɣɩ nɔɣɔlʋ .

text: But every man is tempted , when he is drawn away of his own lust , and enticed .
text2: Pa tɔŋ sɩ pə maɣasəɣɩ yʋlʋ tɔ , ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ kʋnyɩɩlʋɣʋ ɩsaɣaʋ hɔŋna - ɩ na pə ́ kpa - ɩ ɩsɩɩ katɔka .

text: Then when lust hath conceived , it bringeth forth sin : and sin , when it is finished , bringeth forth death .
text2: Kʋnyɩɩlʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋlɛ kʋ wɛɛkɩ mpʋ ɩlɛna kʋ ́ kɔɔ kʋ ́ lʋlɩ ɩsaɣatʋ . Na ɩsaɣatʋ ná kɔŋ tə ́ pɩɩ təmammam ɩlɛna təlɛ tə ́ lʋlɩ səm .

text: Do not err , my beloved brethren .
text2: Ma taapalaa kʋpama , ɩ ́ taa puɣusi mə tɩ yoo .

text: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above , and cometh down from the Father of lights , with whom is no variableness , neither shadow of turning .
text2: Ɩsɔtaa kɛ ́ kʋpantʋnaa mpa tə hikiɣi faalaa tɔ na kʋcɔɔŋ kʋpampaŋ ɩnɩ ɩ təna ɩ lɩɩkəna . Ɩsɔ wei ɩ ŋma ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ taa kɔkɔsɩ tɔ ɩ niŋ taa kɛ ́ pə lɩɩna . Ɩsɔ naa laɣasəɣɩ ye ɩ səŋa nti tə taa , tə taa kɛ ́ ɩ səŋaa . Səkpɛtiya nakəlɩ ka fɛɩ ɩ kiŋ .

text: Of his own will begat he us with the word of truth , that we should be a kind of firstfruits of his creatures .
text2: Ɩnɩ ɩ nɔkəna na ɩ ́ ha - tʋɣʋ weesuɣu na ɩ tampana tɔm kiŋ . Ɩ lapa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ tə ́ mʋ kʋŋmaŋmam mpɩ pə tənaɣa nɔɣɔ .

text: Wherefore , my beloved brethren , let every man be swift to hear , slow to speak , slow to wrath :
text2: Ma taapalaa kʋpama , ɩ ́ tɔɔsɩ tɔm tənɛ ɩnɩ sɩ paa wei ɩ ́ wɛɛ lɔŋ kɛ nɩɩʋ taa . Ama ɩ ́ taa wɛɛ wei ɩ pəsəɣɩ yɔɣɔtaɣa tɔ . Pəyele ɩ ́ taa wɛɛ wei ɩɩ laɣasəɣɩ pááná mʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: For the wrath of man worketh not the righteousness of God .
text2: Ye yʋlʋ ɩ ́ mʋ pááná ɩɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ la mpi Ɩsɔ caa tɔ .

text: Wherefore lay apart all filthiness and superfluity of naughtiness , and receive with meekness the engrafted word , which is able to save your souls .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ ká kisi mpi pə lakɩ yʋlʋ kɛ ɩsaɣaʋ tɔ , na ɩ ́ lɔ kʋlapʋtʋ nti tə ta kɛɛsɩ tɔ . Ɩ ́ pasa mə tɩ na ɩ ́ mʋ tɔm nti Ɩsɔ sɔtəɣɩ mə taa tɔ , tɔm ntɩ tɩɩ yana mə nyɔɔŋ .

text: But be ye doers of the word , and not hearers only , deceiving your own selves .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa nɩɩkɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm kɛ kʋnɩɩ kɛ yem . Ye ɩ ́ lakɩ mpʋ ɩ ́ puɣusiɣi mə təɣɩ . Ama ɩ ́ təŋ teitei ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ tɔ .

text: For if any be a hearer of the word , and not a doer , he is like unto a man beholding his natural face in a glass :
text2: Wei ɩ nɩɩkɩ - təɣɩ kʋnɩɩ tɔ ɩ wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ nyənʋɣʋ ɩ təɣɩ tiŋ taa na ɩ ́ ná ɩsəna ɩ wɛɛ tɔ ,

text: For he beholdeth himself , and goeth his way , and straightway forgetteth what manner of man he was .
text2: na ɩ ́ tɛ ɩ təɣɩ nyənʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ tɛɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sɔɔ ɩsəna ɩ ka wɛɛ tɔɣɔ kpakpaa .

text: But whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty , and continueth therein , he being not a forgetful hearer , but a doer of the work , this man shall be blessed in his deed .
text2: Ama wei ɩ kɛləɣɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm nti tə tewa mpʋ na tə hɛtəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ tá yomle taa na ɩ ́ wiili tə taa kɛ ́ teu , na ɩ ́ nyɔɔna - tɩ təkpaŋkpaŋkpa tɔ . Pʋntʋ ɩɩ nɩɩkɩ - təɣɩ kʋnɩɩ kɛ yem na ɩ ́ tɛɛwa pə tɛma . Ama ɩ təŋəɣɩ - təɣɩ teu kɛ ́ , pʋntʋ ká ná sɩ Ɩsɔ wɛ ɩ ́ waalɩ kɛ ́ ɩ kʋlapʋtʋ taa .

text: If any man among you seem to be religious , and bridleth not his tongue , but deceiveth his own heart , this man ' s religion is vain .
text2: Ye yʋlʋ hʋʋkɩ sɩ ɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ sɛɛlʋ na ɩ ́ tá nyɩ ɩ nɔɣɔ tɔɔ suluɣu , pʋntʋ puɣusiɣi ɩ təɣɩ , na ɩ Ɩsɔ sɛɛtʋ wɛ yem .

text: Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this , To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction , and to keep himself unspotted from the world .
text2: Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ mpi pə te Tacaa Ɩsɔ na pə ́ maɣa - ɩ tɔɣɔlɛ suluwaa na alaa mpa pə səpa na pə ́ yele yem tɔ pa tɔkʋɣʋ kɛ pa wahalanaa taa . Pə kaasaa tɔtɔ sɩ yʋlʋ ɩ ́ taa yele na antulinya kʋlapʋtʋ asilima taana - ɩ paa pəcɔ .

text: My brethren , have not the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Lord of glory , with respect of persons .
text2: Ma taapalaa mɛ , ɩ ́ taa təŋəɣɩ Tacaa teeli tʋ Yesu Kilisiti mpaa na ɩ ́ tasəɣɩ yəlaa kɛ faɣasʋɣʋ .

text: For if there come unto your assembly a man with a gold ring , in goodly apparel , and there come in also a poor man in vile raiment ;
text2: Ye ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ kotaa na ɩ ́ caɣaa kɛlɛ , na nɔɣɔlʋ sʋʋ na ɩ ́ lɛɛ wʋla kukuule na ɩ ́ suu wontu kʋpantʋ , na kʋnyɔntʋ nɔɣɔlʋ náá sʋʋ tɔtɔ , na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ wontu cəla cələɣɩ cələɣɩ .

text: And ye have respect to him that weareth the gay clothing , and say unto him , Sit thou here in a good place ; and say to the poor , Stand thou there , or sit here under my footstool :
text2: Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ faɣasɩ wei ɩ suu wontu kʋpantʋ kɛ mpʋ tɔ na ɩ ́ se ɩ ́ lɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Kɔɔ na ń caɣa təcaɣalɛ kʋpantɛ tənɛ tə taa . Ɩlɛna ɩ ́ tɔ kʋnyɔntʋ sɩ : Nyaa səŋ mpʋ , yaa kɔɔ na ń sopi ma nɔɔhɛɛ tɛɛ cənɛɣɛ atɛ .

text: Are ye not then partial in yourselves , and are become judges of evil thoughts ?
text2: Ɩ ́ lakɩ mpʋ tɔ pə taɣa ɩ ́ faɣasəɣɩ mə təmaɣalɛ ? Na ɩsəna ɩ ́ maɣasəɣɩ mpʋ tɔ pə fɛɩ teu .

text: Hearken , my beloved brethren , Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith , and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him ?
text2: Ma taapalaa kʋpama mɛ , ɩ ́ nɩɩ ma tɔm tənɛ sɩ , Ɩsɔ nyəna antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ taa kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ ləsɩ kʋnyɔntʋnaa sɩ pá pəsɩ apila kɛ ɩ mpaaʋ taa , na pá hiki kawulaɣa ŋka ɩ tɔma sɩ ɩ ká cɛla mpa pa sɔɔla - ɩ tɔ .

text: But ye have despised the poor . Do not rich men oppress you , and draw you before the judgment seats ?
text2: Ɩlɛna mɛ mɩɩ məlɩ na ɩ ́ nyənəɣɩ kʋnyɔntʋnaa mpɛɣɛ yem suwe ? Pə taɣa apila anɩ aa caakəna mə tɔm na á hɔŋ - mɛ na á pukina tɔm təhʋʋlɛ taa ?

text: Do not they blaspheme that worthy name by the which ye are called ?
text2: Pə taɣa kʋlʋmaa mpɛ pa footiɣina hətɛ kʋpantɛ nte Ɩsɔ ha - mɛ tɔ ?

text: If ye fulfil the royal law according to the scripture , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself , ye do well :
text2: Ye ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ nti pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Sɔɔlɩ nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ ɩsɩɩ n ka sɔɔlɩ nyá tɩ tɔ , pə wɛ teu .

text: But if ye have respect to persons , ye commit sin , and are convinced of the law as transgressors .
text2: Ama ye ɩ ́ faɣasəɣɩ yəlaa , ɩ ́ lakɩ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ ́ . Na ye pa kɛɛsəna nti pa sɩɩwa tɔ mə tɔm səpaɣa , mpi tɔ ɩɩ təŋəɣɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ .

text: For whosoever shall keep the whole law , and yet offend in one point , he is guilty of all .
text2: Na ɩsəna pə wɛɛ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ ye nɔɣɔlʋ təŋa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kʋheelitu təna na ɩ ́ kɔɔ ɩ ́ kpisi tə taa kʋlʋmtʋ kɛ təŋʋɣʋ , pə tənaɣa ɩ kpisaa .

text: For he that said , Do not commit adultery , said also , Do not kill . Now if thou commit no adultery , yet if thou kill , thou art become a transgressor of the law .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , wei ɩnɩ ɩ tɔma sɩ : Taa la wasaŋkalətʋ tɔ , ɩnɩ ɩ tɔmna tɔtɔ sɩ : Taa kʋ yʋlʋ . Mpʋ tɔ , ye n ta la wasaŋkalətʋ na ń kʋ yʋlʋ , n kpisa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ təŋʋɣʋ kɛ ́ .

text: So speak ye , and so do , as they that shall be judged by the law of liberty .
text2: Ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ ɩsɩɩ yəlaa mpa paa kɛɛsəna Ɩsɔ Tɔm nti tə hɛtəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ ta yomle taa na pá hʋʋna tɔ .

text: For he shall have judgment without mercy , that hath shewed no mercy ; and mercy rejoiceth against judgment .
text2: Ɩsɔ kaa nyənɩ wei ɩ ta nyənɩ ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ pətɔɔtəlɛ tɔ ɩ pətɔɔtəlɛ kɛ hʋʋlɛ wule . Paa na mpʋ tɔ , ye wei ɩ nyəna lɛlaa pətɔɔtəlɛ , pʋntʋ tɔm ká səŋna hʋʋlɛ taa .

text: What doth it profit , my brethren , though a man say he hath faith , and have not works ? can faith save him ?
text2: Ma taapalaa mɛ , ye yʋlʋ yɔɣɔtaa sɩ ɩ tɛma Ɩsɔ na ɩ taa pəyele pɩɩ hʋləɣɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ təma taa , pə taɣa yem kɛlɛ ? Ɩ Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ mpɩ pɩɩ yapɩ - ɩ ?

text: If a brother or sister be naked , and destitute of daily food ,
text2: Ye ɩsɩɩ nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ apalʋ yaa alʋ laŋna ntɛɣɛ kʋtakʋɣʋ , na tɔɣɔnaɣa maɣamaɣa ta tala - ɩ .

text: And one of you say unto them , Depart in peace , be ye warmed and filled ; notwithstanding ye give them not those things which are needful to the body ; what doth it profit ?
text2: Ɩlɛna ń tɔmɩ - ɩ sɩ : Tɔʋ , pə lapa tasa , Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ ha - ŋ alaafəya , kʋ nyá watʋ , tɔɣɔ kʋtɔɣɔʋ kɛ teu . Pəyele n ta cɛlɛ - ɩ mpi ɩ laŋaa tɔ , ɩlɛ pepeɣe pɩɩ waasɩ - ɩ ?

text: Even so faith , if it hath not works , is dead , being alone .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ , ye yʋlʋ tɛma ɩ taa na Ɩsɔ na ɩɩ lakɩ pə təma , ɩ taa tɛm məla yem kɛ ́ .

text: Yea , a man may say , Thou hast faith , and I have works : shew me thy faith without thy works , and I will shew thee my faith by my works .
text2: Ntanyɩ nɔɣɔlʋ ká tɔ sɩ : Taa tɛm na Ɩsɔ tike kɛ lɛlʋ lakɩ , na lɛlʋ náá lakɩ təma tike . Ɩlɛ ma cɔɔ pʋntʋ sɩ : Hʋlɩ - m ɩsəna yʋlʋ ka tɛ ɩ taa na Ɩsɔ na ɩɩ lakɩ pə təma tɔ , na maa hʋlɩ - ŋ ́ lɛlʋ taa tɛm na ɩ təma taa .

text: Thou believest that there is one God ; thou doest well : the devils also believe , and tremble .
text2: N tɛma nyá taa sɩ Ɩsɔ kʋlʋm tike wɛnna , tampana kɛ ́ . Alɔɣaa maɣamaɣa ná tɛma pa taa kɛ ́ mpʋ , haləna pá seliɣina sɔɣɔntʋ .

text: But wilt thou know , O vain man , that faith without works is dead ?
text2: Yʋlʋ kʋmɛlɛŋ nyá , n caa ń cɛkəna sɩ taa tɛmnaʋ na Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ yem na təma fɛɩ , ɩɩ waasəɣɩ pʋlʋ ?

text: Was not Abraham our father justified by works , when he had offered Isaac his son upon the altar ?
text2: Tɔʋ , ɩsənaɣa pə lapa na Ɩsɔ nyənɩ ta caanaa caa sɔsɔ Apəlaham kɛ yʋlʋpaŋ ye ? Ɩ kʋlapʋtʋ kiŋ kɛ waatʋ wei ɩ laakaɣa ɩ pəyalʋ Ɩsaaka kɛ kɔtaɣa təlatɛ tɔɔ tɔɣɔ .

text: Seest thou how faith wrought with his works , and by works was faith made perfect ?
text2: N ta na mpʋ taa ? Ɩ tɛma Ɩsɔ na ɩ taa pəyele təma na wɛ pə taa tɔtɔ . Na pə təna pə kpɛnta mpʋ tɔɣɔ ɩ taa tɛmnaʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ tewa təkpataa .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled which saith , Abraham believed God , and it was imputed unto him for righteousness : and he was called the Friend of God .
text2: Ɩlɛna pə ́ lá teitei ɩsɩɩ pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm tɔ sɩ : Apəlaham tɛma Ɩsɔ na ɩ taa , na ɩ taa tɛm mpəɣɩ Ɩsɔ ná nawa na ɩ ́ yaa - ɩ yʋlʋpaŋ na ɩ ́ mʋ - ɩ . Na Ɩsɔ yaa - ɩ ɩ ceu .

text: Ye see then how that by works a man is justified , and not by faith only .
text2: Pənɛntɛ mə maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ nawaɣalɛ sɩ yʋlʋ təma kɛ Ɩsɔ nyənəɣəna - ɩ yʋlʋpaŋ , pə taɣa ɩ taa tɛm na Ɩsɔ pə tɔɔ tike .

text: Likewise also was not Rahab the harlot justified by works , when she had received the messengers , and had sent them out another way ?
text2: Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ pə lapa apalaa təna alʋ Lahapɩ kiŋ , Ɩsɔ nyəna - ɩ yʋlʋpaŋ kɛ ɩ təmlɛ tɔɔ kɛ ́ waatʋ wei ɩ mʋ tillaa kɛ ɩ tɛ ́ na ɩ ́ cɔɔləna - wɛɣɛ mpaaʋ tɔ .

text: For as the body without the spirit is dead , so faith without works is dead also .
text2: Ye ɩsɩɩ pʋlʋpʋ həntaa na pɩɩ feesiɣi pə səpaɣa . Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ kɛ yem ná kɛ ́ kʋsəpəm .

text: My brethren , be not many masters , knowing that we shall receive the greater condemnation .
text2: Ma taapalaa mɛ , ɩ ́ taa nyɩɩlɩ sɩ ɩ ́ la sɛɣɛsəlaa kɛ paɣalɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , anɩ ɩ ́ nyəmá sɩ ta mpa tə kɛ ́ sɛɣɛsəlaa tɔ tá hʋʋnaʋ ká lana toŋ na pə ́ kəlɩ kpaɩ nyə ́ ma .

text: For in many things we offend all . If any man offend not in word , the same is a perfect man , and able also to bridle the whole body .
text2: Yaasinaa paɣalɛ taa kɛ ́ tá təna tə pəntəɣɩ . Ye yʋlʋ wɛɛ na ɩɩ pəntəɣɩ ɩ yɔɣɔtaɣa taa , pʋntʋ kɛ ́ yʋlʋ wei ɩ tewa təkpataa tɔɣɔ , na ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ kpa ɩ təɣɩ pə təna pə taa kɛ ́ .

text: Behold , we put bits in the horses ' mouths , that they may obey us ; and we turn about their whole body .
text2: Tə tʋɣɩ kpaɣanʋkpasɩ kɛ kpaɣanəŋ nɔɔsɩ taa kɛ ́ sɩ tə ́ pəsɩ na tə ́ ŋmakəlɩ - ɩ na ɩ ́ nɩɩna - tʋ , paa na ɩ tɔɔʋ mpɩ pə təna .

text: Behold also the ships , which though they be so great , and are driven of fierce winds , yet are they turned about with a very small helm , whithersoever the governor listeth .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyənna kpɩɩləŋ sɔsɔɔŋ wei heelim sɔsɔɔm tuliɣi tɔ na ɩ ́ ná tɔtɔ . Kpátʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ səkpeluɣu nakʋləɣɩ saalʋ kɛɛsəɣəna - ɩ na ɩ ́ pukina - ɩ timpi tɔɔ ɩ sɔɔlaa tɔ .

text: Even so the tongue is a little member , and boasteth great things . Behold , how great a matter a little fire kindleth !
text2: Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ pə wɛɛ na yʋlʋ nsəmlɛ . Yʋlʋ nsəmlɛ kɛ ́ pʋlʋ səkpem kɛ ɩ tɔnʋɣʋ təna taa kɛ ́ . Ama tə pəsəɣɩ na tə ́ la kalampaanɩ kɛ ́ sɔsɔɔntʋnaa taa . Ɩ ́ nyənɩ na ɩ ́ ná ɩsəna kɔkɔiya pəsəɣɩ na ká naŋ hɔtʋɣʋ anaam nɔɣɔlʋ tɔ .

text: And the tongue is a fire , a world of iniquity : so is the tongue among our members , that it defileth the whole body , and setteth on fire the course of nature ; and it is set on fire of hell .
text2: Nsəmlɛ wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ kɔkɔ . Tə taa kɛ ́ ɩsaɣatʋ maɣalaa , na tə wɛ tá tɔnʋɣʋ taa na tə ́ wakələɣɩ tá tɔnʋɣʋ təna təpaɩ . Tənaasəlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ kɔkɔ kɛ tə heeki na tə ́ sɔkɩ mpʋ haləna ta səm .

text: For every kind of beasts , and of birds , and of serpents , and of things in the sea , is tamed , and hath been tamed of mankind :
text2: Yʋlʋ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ ŋmakəlɩ taalɛ wontu ntɩ tə təna , na sumasɩ təna , na wontu nti tə tuuki tə lotu tɔɔ tɔ tə looŋa təna , na lʋm taa nyəm . Halɩ yʋlʋ tɩɩ tɛma pə tənaɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ŋmakəlʋɣʋ mɛɛ .

text: But the tongue can no man tame ; it is an unruly evil , full of deadly poison .
text2: Ama tuu tɔ nɔɣɔlʋ ta tɛnta nsəmlɛ kɛ ŋmakəlʋɣʋ . Pə kɛ ́ ɩsaɣatʋ nti yʋlʋ ɩɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ kpa tɔɣɔ . Tə taa sɔtʋ toŋ fɛɩna taka .

text: Therewith bless we God , even the Father ; and therewith curse we men , which are made after the similitude of God .
text2: Ntɛɣɛ tə sɛɛkəna Tacaa Sɔsɔ kɛ ɩ ́ na təmlɛ , na ntɛɣɛ tə təŋsəɣəna mpusi kɛ ́ yəlaa mpa Ɩsɔ ŋmawa na pá nəɣəsəna - ɩ tɔ .

text: Out of the same mouth proceedeth blessing and cursing . My brethren , these things ought not so to be .
text2: Nɔɣɔ kʋlʋmaɣa ŋkɛ ka taa kɛ ́ fɔɔ wɛɛ . Pəyele ka taa kɛ ́ anyaŋka wɛɛ . Ma taapalaa , pə taa wɛɛ mpʋ .

text: Doth a fountain send forth at the same place sweet water and bitter ?
text2: Hite kʋlʋmtəlɛ taa lʋm kaa wɛɛ leleŋ nyəm kɛ saalʋɣʋ na təsalaʋ nyəm kɛ saalʋɣʋ .

text: Can the fig tree , my brethren , bear olive berries ? either a vine , figs ? so can no fountain both yield salt water and fresh .
text2: Ma taapalaa mɛ , tʋɣʋ ŋkʋ pa yaa sɩ fiki tɔ kʋ kaa pəsɩ na kʋ lʋlɩ tʋɣʋ ŋkʋ pa yaa sɩ olifi tɔ kʋ pee . Na tʋɣʋ ŋkʋ pa yaa sɩ lɛsɛŋ tɔ kʋ kaa lʋlɩ fiki tʋɣʋ pee . Na lʋm mpi pə wɛ tənyaŋŋ tɔ pə kaa pəsɩ na pə ́ lá leleŋ nyəm .

text: Who is a wise man and endued with knowledge among you ? let him shew out of a good conversation his works with meekness of wisdom .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ wɛ mə hɛkʋ na ɩ kɛ ́ ləmaɣasəlɛ tʋ na nyəntʋ tɔtɔ ? Pʋntʋ ɩ ́ yele na ɩ təma hʋlɩ mpʋ , na ɩ ́ lakɩ ɩ təma na tɩ pasʋɣʋ na ləmaɣasɛɛ .

text: But if ye have bitter envying and strife in your hearts , glory not , and lie not against the truth .
text2: Ama ye mə lotunaa taa wɛ haŋaɣa sɔsɔɣa na ɩkəllɛ pɛɛkʋɣʋ hʋwɛɛ , ɩlɛ ɩ ́ taa nɔkɩ mə təɣɩ hɔm na ɩ ́ pəsɩ pɔpɔtʋnaa na ɩ ́ kpɛɛsɩ tampana .

text: This wisdom descendeth not from above , but is earthly , sensual , devilish .
text2: Ləmaɣasɛɛ ɩsɩɩ mpʋ pə taka tá lɩɩna Ɩsɔ kiŋ se , pə kɛ ́ antulinya ɩnɛ ɩ nyəm kɛ ́ , na yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ hʋʋlɛ , na pə lɩɩna ɩlɔɣɔʋ kiŋ .

text: For where envying and strife is , there is confusion and every evil work .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , timpi taa haŋaɣa na ɩkəllɛ pɛɛkʋɣʋ pə wɛɛ tɔ tənaɣa liɣituɣu na ɩsaɣatʋ ntɩ tə təna tə wɛ tam .

text: But the wisdom that is from above is first pure , then peaceable , gentle , and easy to be intreated , full of mercy and good fruits , without partiality , and without hypocrisy .
text2: Ama ye wei ɩ hika Ɩsɔ nyəm pʋntʋ wɛɛ kɛ ́ təcɛɩcɛɩ . Pəlɛ pə paasi ɩ ta kɛ yoolu , ɩ kɛ ́ suulu tʋ , na pɛɛlɛɛ tʋ , na kʋpantʋ tike kɛ ɩ lakɩ , na ɩ təma tewa . Ɩɩ faɣasəɣɩ yəlaa sɩ ma nyəmá akele ma ta nyɩ akele , na cɛsʋɣʋ fɛɩ ɩ kiŋ .

text: And the fruit of righteousness is sown in peace of them that make peace .
text2: Mpa pa lakɩ na pa cɔlɔ nyə ́ ma wɛɛkəna leleŋ tɔ pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ leleŋ taa kɛ ́ pa tuuki pa kʋtutuum , na weesuɣu ŋku kʋ tewa tɔɣɔ pa kɔŋ hikuɣu .

text: From whence come wars and fightings among you ? come they not hence , even of your lusts that war in your members ?
text2: Leɣe yooŋ na ntɔŋkpɛɛsaɣa lɩɩna mə hɛkʋ kɛ mpʋ ? Mə kɔtɔɩnaa mpa pa caaləɣɩ - mɛɣɛ tam kɛ ́ mə tɔnəŋ taa tɔ mpɛ pa kɔŋna na yooŋ na ntɔŋkpɛɛsasɩ nsɩ .

text: Ye lust , and have not : ye kill , and desire to have , and cannot obtain : ye fight and war , yet ye have not , because ye ask not .
text2: Ntanyɩ ɩ ́ nyɩɩləɣɩ pʋlʋ pəyele ɩ ́ kaa hiki - wɩ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ sʋʋ yəlaa kʋɣʋ taa . Yaa mə luuŋ sʋʋ pʋlʋ pəyele ɩ ́ kaa hiki - wɩ , ɩlɛna ntɔŋkpɛɛsasɩ na yoou sʋʋ mə hɛkʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩɩ hikiɣi . Mpi ɩ ́ caakɩ tɔ ɩɩ sələməɣɩ sɩ Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ ha - mɛɣɛ - wɩ tɔɣɔ .

text: Ye ask , and receive not , because ye ask amiss , that ye may consume it upon your lusts .
text2: Yaa ɩ ́ tɩɩ sələməɣɩ ɩɩ hikiɣi - wəɣɩ mə ləmaɣasɛɛ fɛɩ teu tɔ pə tɔɔ . Ɩ ́ caa kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ hika - wɩ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ lana mpi mə maɣamaɣa ɩ nɔkaa tɔ .

text: Ye adulterers and adulteresses , know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God ? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God .
text2: Ama ɩ ́ kɛ ́ ma ta nyɩ ɩsɔnaa kɛ ́ yoo . Ɩ ́ tá nyɩ sɩ ye n sɔɔləɣɩ antulinya nyəm n kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ kolontu taa ? Wei ɩ caa ɩ ́ sɔɔlɩ antulinya nyəm tɔ pʋntʋ na Ɩsɔ pa lapa koloŋa kɛ ́ .

text: Do ye think that the scripture saith in vain , The spirit that dwelleth in us lusteth to envy ?
text2: Ɩ ́ taa hʋʋ sɩ yem tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Ɩsɔ pɔɔsəɣəna ɩsəsɛɛmlɛ kɛ weesuɣu ŋku ɩ tʋ tá taa tɔ .

text: But he giveth more grace . Wherefore he saith , God resisteth the proud , but giveth grace unto the humble .
text2: Pə na pə mpʋ tɔ ɩ lakɩ - tʋɣʋ kʋpantʋnaa mpa pa kəla mpʋ tɔ . Na pə tɔm kɛ pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Ɩsɔ yoona kalampaanɩ nyə ́ ma , na ɩ ́ lakɩ kʋpantʋ kɛ mpa pa pasəɣɩ pa tɩ tɔ .

text: Submit yourselves therefore to God . Resist the devil , and he will flee from you .
text2: Mpʋ tɔ , ɩ ́ pasa mə tɩ na ɩ ́ nɩɩna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teu , na ɩ ́ səŋ Ɩlɔɣɔʋ tɔɔ , ɩ ká se mə kiŋ na ɩ ́ polo pooluŋ .

text: Draw nigh to God , and he will draw nigh to you . Cleanse your hands , ye sinners ; and purify your hearts , ye double minded .
text2: Ɩ ́ kpətəna Ɩsɔ , na Ɩsɔ ká kpətəna - mɛ tɔtɔ . Asaɣaa mɛ ɩ ́ saŋ mə niŋ , yɛlɛyɛlɛ nyə ́ ma mɛ ɩ ́ taɣanɩ mə lotunaa .

text: Be afflicted , and mourn , and weep : let your laughter be turned to mourning , and your joy to heaviness .
text2: Mə laŋa ɩ ́ wakəlɩ , ɩ ́ tʋlɩ nɔɔsɩ na ɩ ́ wii sɔsɔm . Ɩ ́ yele na mə woŋa pəsɩ wula , na mə laŋhʋlʋmlɛ náá pəsɩ laŋwakəllɛ .

text: Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord , and he shall lift you up .
text2: Ɩ ́ pasa mə təɣɩ Tacaa ɩsɛntaa na ɩ ká kʋsɩ - mɛ .

text: Speak not evil one of another , brethren . He that speaketh evil of his brother , and judgeth his brother , speaketh evil of the law , and judgeth the law : but if thou judge the law , thou art not a doer of the law , but a judge .
text2: Ma taapalaa , ɩ ́ taa cakəna təma . Ye wei ɩ cakəna ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ yaa ɩ footiɣi - ɩ , Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kɛ pʋntʋ cakəna yaa ɩ footiɣi . Pəyele ye n footiɣi Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ n ta kɛ tə tɔkəlʋ tɔtɔ , n pəsa tə hʋʋnlʋ kɛ ́ .

text: There is one lawgiver , who is able to save and to destroy : who art thou that judgest another ?
text2: Ɩsɔ tike sɩɩkəna kʋsəsɩɩtʋ , na ɩnɩ ɩ tike ɩ kɛna tɔm hʋʋlʋ . Na ɩnɩ ɩ tike ɩ pəsəɣəna na ɩ ́ taɣanɩ yaa ɩ ́ wakəlɩ . Nyá n kɛ ́ we na ń footiɣi nyá tɔɣɔntəlɛ ?

text: Go to now , ye that say , To day or to morrow we will go into such a city , and continue there a year , and buy and sell , and get gain :
text2: Mɛ mpa mə tɔŋ sɩ saŋa yaa cele tɩɩ polo ɩcatɛ tənɛ na tənɛ na tə ́ caɣa tənaɣa pənaɣa na tə ́ taatɩ na tə ́ hiki liɣitee tɔ , pənɛntɛ mɩɩ nɩɩ ɩlɛ .

text: Whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow . For what is your life ? It is even a vapour , that appeareth for a little time , and then vanisheth away .
text2: Aaɩ , ɩ ́ tá nyɩ cele nyəntʋ . Ɩ ́ wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ɩhunte nte tə kpaa pəcɔ na pɩɩ lakɩ laasaɣa ɩlɛna tə ́ cɛ tɔ .

text: For that ye ought to say , If the Lord will , we shall live , and do this , or that .
text2: Pɩɩ wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ : Ye Tacaa ɩ ́ tana - tʋ , tɩɩ la pənɛ na pənɛ .

text: But now ye rejoice in your boastings : all such rejoicing is evil .
text2: Ama mə məlaa na ɩ ́ lakɩ kalampaanɩ na ɩ ́ hɔŋ mə tɩ . Kalampaanɩ ɩsɩɩ mpʋ pə taka fɛɩ teu .

text: Therefore to him that knoweth to do good , and doeth it not , to him it is sin .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ye wei ɩ ́ nyəmá kʋpantʋ lapʋ na ɩ ́ kisi tə lapʋ , pʋntʋ lapa ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ ́ .

text: Go to now , ye rich men , weep and howl for your miseries that shall come upon you .
text2: Tɔʋ pənɛntɛ apila mɛ , mɩɩ nɩɩ . Ɩ ́ wii na ɩ ́ mɔləɣɩ kpakpaa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , asalaʋ ká maɣana - mɛ .

text: Your riches are corrupted , and your garments are motheaten .
text2: Mə wɛnaʋ pʋɣʋta yem , pə mʋʋ mə tɔɔ wontu .

text: Your gold and silver is cankered ; and the rust of them shall be a witness against you , and shall eat your flesh as it were fire . Ye have heaped treasure together for the last days .
text2: Kakɔtaɣa sɛɛsa mə wʋlanaa na mə liɣitee . Kakɔtaɣa ŋkɛ kaa kulina mə waalɩ na ká nyaɣa mə tɔnəŋ ɩsɩɩ kɔkɔ . Ɩ ́ kaa wɛnaʋ kɛ yem kɛ ́ kʋyɛɛŋ kantəkaɣa nyəŋ ɩnɛ ɩ taa .

text: Behold , the hire of the labourers who have reaped down your fields , which is of you kept back by fraud , crieth : and the cries of them which have reaped are entered into the ears of the Lord of sabaoth .
text2: Ɩ ́ kisa mə təmlɛ nyə ́ ma mpa pa hala mə tawa tɔɣɔ fɛlʋɣʋ , ɩ ́ nɩɩ pɛlɛ pa tɔŋna wula tɔ . Mpa pa taɣanəɣɩ mə tawa kʋlʋlʋm tɔ pa kakiisasɩ tala Pə təna pə tʋ Tacaa Ɩsɔ ŋkpaŋŋ taa .

text: Ye have lived in pleasure on the earth , and been wanton ; ye have nourished your hearts , as in a day of slaughter .
text2: Ɩ ́ tɔɣa leleŋ na ɩ ́ lá ɩsəna ɩ ́ sɔɔlaa tɔɣɔ atɛ cənɛ . Ɩ ́ paɣalaa ɩsɩɩ pá kʋ - mɛ na pá tɔɣɔ .

text: Ye have condemned and killed the just ; and he doth not resist you .
text2: Ɩ ́ tʋ tasəkəlɛ kɛ wei ɩ fɛɩna taalɩ tɔ , na ɩ ́ yele na pá kʋ - ɩ na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ tɩɩ suma mpʋ .

text: Be patient therefore , brethren , unto the coming of the Lord . Behold , the husbandman waiteth for the precious fruit of the earth , and hath long patience for it , until he receive the early and latter rain .
text2: Ma taapalaa ɩ ́ caɣana suulu na haləna Tacaa kɔntɛ tala . Ɩ ́ nyənna ɩsəna hatʋ kantələɣɩ na ɩ ́ caɣana suulu na haləna ɩ haləm kʋtɔɣɔʋ kʋpaŋkʋ pɩɩ tɔ . Ɩ taŋəɣəna suulu kɛ toomaɣa tɛʋ na salaŋ nyəŋkʋ .

text: Be ye also patient ; stablish your hearts : for the coming of the Lord draweth nigh .
text2: Mɛ tɔtɔ mɩɩ caɣana suulu kɛ mpʋ . Ɩ ́ nyaɣa apalʋtʋ kɛ sɔsɔm , Tacaa kɔntɛ wʋsaa .

text: Grudge not one against another , brethren , lest ye be condemned : behold , the judge standeth before the door .
text2: Ma taapalaa , nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ taa pooli ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ , pə ́ taa kɔɔ na Ɩsɔ hʋʋna - mɛ . Tɔm hʋʋlʋ wʋsaa ɩnɩ ɩ caana ntɛɣɛ sʋʋʋ .

text: Take , my brethren , the prophets , who have spoken in the name of the Lord , for an example of suffering affliction , and of patience .
text2: Ma taapalaa mɛ ɩ ́ nyənna Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa mpa pa yɔɣɔta Tacaa tɔm tɔ na ɩ ́ təŋ pa akpaa na ɩ ́ kantəlɩ waatʋ wei wahala makəna - mɛ tɔ .

text: Behold , we count them happy which endure . Ye have heard of the patience of Job , and have seen the end of the Lord ; that the Lord is very pitiful , and of tender mercy .
text2: Pa kantəlʋɣʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə tɔŋna - wɛɣɛ yaaʋ sɩ leleŋ nɩɩlaa . Ɩ nɩɩwa Soopu tɔm kɛ ɩsəna ɩ kantələna suulu tɔ . Na ɩ ́ nyəmá pə kɔma na pə ́ tɛ ́ na Tacaa ha - ɩ mpi tɔ . Tacaa wɛna yʋlʋ pətɔɔtəlɛ kɛ sɔsɔm kɛ ́ , na ɩ kʋpantʋ fɛɩ kɛɛsʋɣʋ .

text: But above all things , my brethren , swear not , neither by heaven , neither by the earth , neither by any other oath : but let your yea be yea ; and your nay , nay ; lest ye fall into condemnation .
text2: Ma taapalaa mɛ ɩ ́ taa tuuna pʋlʋpʋɣʋ paa pəcɔ . Ɩ ́ taa tuuna ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ , pəyele ɩ ́ taa tuuna atɛ tɔtɔ , ɩ ́ taa tɩɩ tuuna pʋlʋpʋ te . Ye pə kɛ ́ n ká tisi , ɩlɛ n tisi sɩ : Nn . Na ye pə fɛɩ n ka tisi , ɩlɛ n tɔ ́ sɩ : Aaɩ . Tɔfɔ ɩ ́ kɔŋ na ɩ ́ caŋ ɩ ́ sʋʋ Ɩsɔ hʋʋnaʋ taa .

text: Is any among you afflicted ? let him pray . Is any merry ? let him sing psalms .
text2: Ye wahala maɣana mə taa wei , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ sələmɩ Ɩsɔ . Na ye wei ɩ nɩɩkɩ leleŋ , pʋntʋ náá yoo sam yontu .

text: Is any sick among you ? let him call for the elders of the church ; and let them pray over him , anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord :
text2: Ye pə wɩɩkɩ mə taa wei , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ yaa Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle nyʋɣʋ nyə ́ ma na pɛlɛ pá sələməna - ɩ Ɩsɔ , na pá yaa Tacaa hətɛ na pá pəlɩ nim kɛ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: And the prayer of faith shall save the sick , and the Lord shall raise him up ; and if he have committed sins , they shall be forgiven him .
text2: Sələmʋɣʋ ŋku pa sələma mpʋ na pá tɛma Tacaa na pa taa tɔ kɩɩ waasɩ kʋtɔntʋ . Tacaa ká ha - ɩ alaafəya na pá hɩɩsɩ ɩsaɣatʋnaa mpa ɩ ka lapa tɔ .

text: Confess your faults one to another , and pray one for another , that ye may be healed . The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much .
text2: Ye ɩ ́ wakələna təma , ɩ ́ həntɩ təmaɣa atɛ . Ɩ ́ sələməɣəna mə təmaɣa Ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ ká hiki alaafəya . Ye yʋlʋpaŋ ɩ ́ sələma Ɩsɔ na ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ pə lakɩ təmlɛ kɛ sɔsɔm kɛ ́ .

text: Elias was a man subject to like passions as we are , and he prayed earnestly that it might not rain : and it rained not on the earth by the space of three years and six months .
text2: Ilii ka kɛ ́ yʋlʋ ɩsɩɩ tá tɔtɔɣɔ . Ɩ sələma Ɩsɔ na ɩsəlɛ kʋsɛɛmlɛ sɩ tɛʋ ɩ ́ taa nɩɩ , na tɛʋ ta tosi atɛɣɛ halɩ pɩɩsɩ tooso na hɔɣɔlʋɣʋ .

text: And he prayed again , and the heaven gave rain , and the earth brought forth her fruit .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ kɔma na ɩ ́ tasa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sələmʋɣʋ , ɩlɛna tɛʋ lɩɩna ɩsɔtaa na kʋ nɩɩ na kʋtɔɣɔʋ lá .

text: Brethren , if any of you do err from the truth , and one convert him ;
text2: Ma taapalaa , ye mə taa nɔɣɔlʋ ha tampana kɛ siɣile na ɩ tɔɣɔntəlɛ kpa - ɩ na ɩ ́ məŋna ,

text: Let him know , that he which converteth the sinner from the error of his way shall save a soul from death , and shall hide a multitude of sins .
text2: mɩɩ nyɩ sɩ wei ɩnɩ ɩ kpa - ɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ tətoolle na ɩ ́ məŋna tɔ , pʋntʋ yapa ɩ ləsaɣa kɛ səm nɔɣɔ taa kɛ ́ , na ɩ lapʋ mpʋ tɔ pə hɩɩsa ɩsaɣatʋ tuutuuma kɛ ́ .

text: Peter , an apostle of Jesus Christ , to the strangers scattered throughout Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia ,
text2: Maɣa Piyɛɛ , Yesu Kilisiti tillu . Ma ŋmaakəna takəlaɣa kanɛɣɛ mɛ mpa Ɩsɔ ləsaa sɩ ɩ ́ nyə ́ ma , na pə ́ yasa - mɛ na ɩ ́ caɣa caɣalətʋ kɛ Pɔŋ na Kalatɩ na Kapatɔɔsɩ na Asii na Pitinii pa tɛtʋnaa taa tɔ .

text: Elect according to the foreknowledge of God the Father , through sanctification of the Spirit , unto obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ : Grace unto you , and peace , be multiplied .
text2: Tacaa Ɩsɔ ləsʋɣʋ - mɛ tɔ , pə kɛɛsəna teitei kɛ ́ ɩsəna mpi ɩ ka sɩɩwa hatuu lɔŋ na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ na ɩ ́ lakɩ tɔɣɔ . Na ɩ Feesuɣu yelina ɩ ́ pəsa ɩ nyə ́ ma sɩ ɩ ́ nɩɩna Yesu Kilisiti na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ caləm taɣanɩ - mɛ . Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ hʋlɩ - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ , na ɩ ́ ha - mɛɣɛ alaafəya kɛ sɔsɔm sɔsɔm .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which according to his abundant mercy hath begotten us again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead ,
text2: Tə ́ sa Ɩsɔ tá Sɔsɔ Yesu Kilisiti Caa . Ɩ feesa Yesu Kilisiti kɛ sətaa taa na pə ́ ha - tʋɣʋ weesuɣu kʋfalʋɣʋ kɛ ɩ suulu sɔsɔ tɔɔ . Na pə yelaa na tá tɛɛlʋɣʋ haŋa teu təkaɩɩ ,

text: To an inheritance incorruptible , and undefiled , and that fadeth not away , reserved in heaven for you ,
text2: sɩ tɩɩ hiki kʋpantʋnaa mpa Ɩsɔ sɩɩ ɩ nyə ́ ma tɔ . Kʋpantʋnaa panɛ paa wakələɣɩ , paa pilisiɣi , pəyele pa teu ɩɩ səkɩ . Ɩsɔtaa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ sɩɩ - mɛɣɛ - wɛ .

text: Who are kept by the power of God through faith unto salvation ready to be revealed in the last time .
text2: Mɛ , ɩ ́ tɛma Ɩsɔ na mə taa ɩlɛna Ɩsɔ toma náá tɔkɩ - mɛ , na pə ́ taŋa nyʋɣʋ yapʋ mpi pə taɣanaa sɩ pɩɩ kɔna na pə ́ kuli kʋyɛɛŋ kʋtɛɛsəŋ taa tɔ pə kɔntɛ .

text: Wherein ye greatly rejoice , though now for a season , if need be , ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations :
text2: Paa pə wɛɛ sɩ kaɣana maɣasəŋ ɩnɩ ɩ nɔɣɔ na ɩ suka ɩ ́ wakəlɩ mə laŋa kɛ wɛɛ naalɛ tɔ , mə laŋa ɩ ́ hʋlʋmɩ tɔm tənɛ tə tɔɔ .

text: That the trial of your faith , being much more precious than of gold that perisheth , though it be tried with fire , might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ :
text2: Pə lakɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ pə ́ ná mə Ɩsɔ taa tɛmnaʋ waalɩ . Wʋla kɛ pə lapa sɩ ɩ tɛŋ na ɩ ́ saalɩ yem , na kɔkɔ kɛ pa taɣanəɣəna - ɩ na ɩ ́ la teu . Na mə taa tɛmnaʋ na Ɩsɔ ná kəla wʋla kɛ nyʋɣʋ təcaɣacaɣa . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pə maɣasəɣɩ mə taa tɛmnaʋ mpɩ sɩ pə naa pə toma tənaɣa , na kʋyaŋku Yesu Kilisiti ká kɔɔ tɔ ɩ ́ hiki sam na teeli na nyʋɣʋ .

text: Whom having not seen , ye love ; in whom , though now ye see him not , yet believing , ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory :
text2: Paa ɩ ́ taa keesi - ɩ tɔ ɩ ́ sɔɔla - ɩ kɛ ́ , na kaɣana paa ɩɩ tɩɩ keesiɣi - ɩ tɔ , ɩ ́ tɔŋna - ɩ mə taa kɛ ́ tɛmnaʋ kɛ ́ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ mə laŋhʋlʋmlɛ wɛna teeli na tə tɔɔ sɔsɔm pə tɩɩ fɛɩ yɔɣɔtaɣa .

text: Receiving the end of your faith , even the salvation of your souls .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ ́ hika mpi pə tɔɔ ɩ ́ tɛma Ɩsɔ na mə taa tɔ , mpəɣəlɛ mə ləsasɩ nyɔ ́ ɔ ́ ŋ yapʋ .

text: Of which salvation the prophets have inquired and searched diligently , who prophesied of the grace that should come unto you :
text2: Nyʋɣʋ yapʋ pənɛ pə tɔm kɛ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa pɛɛkaa na pá taasɩ na pá wiili pə taa təcululu , na pá ná na pá kɛɛsɩ kʋcɔɔʋ ŋku Ɩsɔ ká tɛ na ɩ ́ la - mɛ tɔ kʋ tɔm .

text: Searching what , or what manner of time the Spirit of Christ which was in them did signify , when it testified beforehand the sufferings of Christ , and the glory that should follow .
text2: Mpi mpi Kilisiti Feesuɣu kɛɛsaa tɔ mpəɣɩ mpɛ pa kaasa pa tɩ na pá pɛɛkɩ sɩ pá nyɩ pə waatʋnaa na mpi pə lapʋ pɩɩ pana tɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Feesuɣu ŋkʋ kɩɩ wɛ pa taa kɛ ́ na kʋ heeli - wɛ na pə ́ taa kɔnta sɩ , Kilisiti ká tɔɣɔ kʋnyɔŋ , pə waalɩ kɛ ́ ɩ teeli kɔŋ .

text: Unto whom it was revealed , that not unto themselves , but unto us they did minister the things , which are now reported unto you by them that have preached the gospel unto you with the Holy Ghost sent down from heaven ; which things the angels desire to look into .
text2: Na Ɩsɔ heela ɩ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa sɩ tɔm wenti pa tʋ - wɛ sɩ pá heeli tɔ tə ta na - wɛ , mɛɣɛ pə nawa . Na ntəɣəlɛ nti ɩ ́ mʋ kaɣana tɔ . Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ tɔm waasʋ lataa kpaaləna - mɛɣɛ - tɩ , na Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ wei pə tisina ɩsɔtaa tɔ ɩ toma kɛ pɛlɛ pa yɔɣɔtənaa . Na ɩsɔtaa tillaa maɣamaɣa ná sɔɔlaa sɩ pá nyɩ - tɩ .

text: Wherefore gird up the loins of your mind , be sober , and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ ;
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ caɣa na mə hʋwɛɛ taŋaa tətɛɣɛtɛɣɛ kɛ ́ təmlɛ lapʋ . Ɩ ́ lakɩ pə təna na laakalɩ kɛ tam , na ɩ ́ tʋ mə tɛɛlʋɣʋ kɛ kʋcɔɔʋ ŋku ɩ ́ ká hiki kʋyaŋku Yesu Kilisiti ká kɔɔ tɔ .

text: As obedient children , not fashioning yourselves according to the former lusts in your ignorance :
text2: Ɩ ́ nɩɩna Ɩsɔ na ɩ ́ taa tasa wɛɛʋ ɩsɩɩ ɩ ka wɛʋ ɩsəkpɛɛtəlɛ taa kɛ ́ tuu lɔŋ na ɩ ́ təŋəɣɩ mə kʋnyɩɩləŋ tɔ .

text: But as he which hath called you is holy , so be ye holy in all manner of conversation ;
text2: Ama ɩ ́ wɛɛ tənaŋŋ nyə ́ ma kɛ mə yaasinaa təna taa , ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ wei ɩ yaa - mɛ tɔ ɩ wɛʋ tənaŋŋ tɔ .

text: Because it is written , Be ye holy ; for I am holy .
text2: Pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ : Ɩ ́ wɛɛ tənaŋŋ ɩsɩɩ ma wɛʋ tənaŋŋ tɔ .

text: And if ye call on the Father , who without respect of persons judgeth according to every man ' s work , pass the time of your sojourning here in fear :
text2: Ɩsɔ wei ɩ hʋʋkəna yəlaa tənaɣa teitei na ɩɩ faɣasəɣɩ nɔɣɔlʋ , na ye wei ɩ kʋlapʋtʋ wɛ ɩsəna ɩ hʋʋna ɩlɛɣɛ mpʋ tɔ , ɩnəɣɩ ɩ ́ yaa mə Caa mə Caa kɛ mə sələmʋɣʋ taa . Tɔʋ , ye mpʋ ɩ ́ hʋləna mə yaasinaa taa sɩ ɩ ́ seeki - ɩ wɛɛ nna pə kaasa - mɛɣɛ antulinya taa cənɛ tɔ a taa ɩlɛ .

text: Forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things , as silver and gold , from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers ;
text2: Ɩ ́ nyəmá liɣitihutaɣa ŋka pa yapəna - mɛɣɛ yaasi kpaɩ nyəŋ wei mə caanaa caanaa tɛləsa - mɛ tɔ ɩ niŋ taa tɔ . Na pə taɣa pʋlʋ yem nyəm mpi pə kʋyakʋ səkɩ tam ɩsɩɩ liɣitee wɛʋ tɔ .

text: But with the precious blood of Christ , as of a lamb without blemish and without spot :
text2: Aaɩ , pə taɣa mpʋ , Kilisiti wei ɩ wɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩwəyaɣa ŋka ka tiili tá caamɩ na ka fɛɩna taɣaŋmala tɔ ɩ caləm kʋpampam kɛ pa yapəna - mɛ .

text: Who verily was foreordained before the foundation of the world , but was manifest in these last times for you ,
text2: Kilisiti kɛ Ɩsɔ ka ləsaa na ɩ ́ sɩɩ na pəcɔ pá lakɩ antulinya . Ɩ ləsa - ɩ kʋyɛɛŋ kantəkaɣa nyəŋ ɩnɛ ɩ taa na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ kɛ ́ sɩ pə ́ waasɩ - mɛ .

text: Who by him do believe in God , that raised him up from the dead , and gave him glory ; that your faith and hope might be in God .
text2: Ɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ tɛmna Ɩsɔ wei ɩ ́ feesa - ɩ na ɩ ́ tʋ - ɩ teeli tɔ na mə taa , na pə lapa mpʋ tɔɣɔ ɩ ́ tʋ ́ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ naani na mə tɛɛlʋɣʋ məlɩ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren , see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently :
text2: Na ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ nɩɩna tampana na ɩ ́ paasɩ na ɩ ́ sɔɔlɩ mə Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ taa lɛlaa tɔ , ɩ ́ taɣana mə təɣɩ . Ɩ ́ sɔɔləɣɩ mə təmaɣa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ teu na lotu kʋlʋmtʋ .

text: Being born again , not of corruptible seed , but of incorruptible , by the word of God , which liveth and abideth for ever .
text2: Pə taɣana - mɛɣɛ lʋlʋɣʋ kɛ ́ , ɩlɛ pə taɣa mə caanaa mpa pa səkɩ tɔ mpɛ pa tasəna - mɛɣɛ lʋlʋɣʋ . Ama pə tuu mpiɣi mə taa na pɩɩ səkɩ tɔ mpɩ pə yelina na pə ́ lá mpʋ . Ɩsɔ Tɔm nti tə wɛna weesuɣu na tə wɛ tam tɔɔ tɔ ntɩ tə tənna pə lapa mpʋ .

text: For all flesh is as grass , and all the glory of man as the flower of grass . The grass withereth , and the flower thereof falleth away :
text2: Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Yəlaa təna wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ nyɩɩtʋ , na pa teeli təna wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ nyɩɩtʋ hɛtʋ . Nyɩɩtʋ wʋləɣɩ ɩlɛna hɛtʋ náá tɔ .

text: But the word of the Lord endureth for ever . And this is the word which by the gospel is preached unto you .
text2: Ama Tacaa tɔm ná cakɩ tam tɔɔ kɛ ́ . Na tɔm ntəɣəlɛ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɔna - mɛ .

text: Wherefore laying aside all malice , and all guile , and hypocrisies , and envies , and all evil speakings ,
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ yele paa ɩsaɣatʋ ntiɣi lapʋ , na pɔpɔtʋ , na cɛsʋɣʋ , na ɩsɛsɛɛmɛɛ , na caɣanaʋ .

text: As newborn babes , desire the sincere milk of the word , that ye may grow thereby :
text2: Ɩ ́ wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ piya ahʋlʋmnaa na ɩ ́ nyɩɩləɣɩ tam kɛ ́ hələm mpi pə kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ nyəm na pə ́ kɛ ́ kʋpam tɔ , na ɩ ́ mʋsɩ na ɩ ́ pɩɩ na pə ́ ya mə nyɔɔŋ .

text: If so be ye have tasted that the Lord is gracious .
text2: Pa ŋmaa ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ sɩ : Ɩ ́ təŋa Tacaa kʋpantʋ .

text: To whom coming , as unto a living stone , disallowed indeed of men , but chosen of God , and precious ,
text2: Ɩ ́ kpətəna Tacaa , ɩnəɣəlɛ pəlɛ nte yəlaa lɔwa na tə ́ wɛna weesuɣu tɔ . Pəyele tə kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ ɩlɛɣɛ kʋpampantɛ tɔɣɔ ɩ ləsa - tɛ .

text: Ye also , as lively stones , are built up a spiritual house , an holy priesthood , to offer up spiritual sacrifices , acceptable to God by Jesus Christ .
text2: Mɩɩ kpətəna - ɩ na ɩ ́ wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ pɛɛ nna a wɛna weesiŋ tɔ , na pá kpaɣa - mɛ na pá ŋmana Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ kutuluɣu . Na ɩ ́ ká la kʋ taa tənaɣa kɔtəlaa naŋŋ nyə ́ ma mpa pə tʋwa sɩ pá lakɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩ kɔtasɩ kɛ Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ na pə ́ lapɩ - ɩ teu tɔ pa kpekəle .

text: Wherefore also it is contained in the scripture , Behold , I lay in Sion a chief corner stone , elect , precious : and he that believeth on him shall not be confounded .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Pəlɛ kʋpantɛ taa kʋpantɛ kɛ ma ləsaa . Pənɛntɛ ma sɩɩ - tɛɣɛ Siyɔŋ , sɩ tə ́ wɛɛ kite tɛɛ pəlɛ . Na ye wei ɩ tɛma - tɛ na ɩ taa , pʋntʋ kaa kɔɔ na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ ye maa nyəmá .

text: Unto you therefore which believe he is precious : but unto them which be disobedient , the stone which the builders disallowed , the same is made the head of the corner ,
text2: Mɛ mpa ɩ ́ tɛma - tɛ na mə taa tɔ , tə kɛ - mɛɣɛ kʋpam taa kʋpam kɛ ́ . Pə yela mpa pɛlɛ na pá tá tɛ pa taa tɔ tə kɛ ́ pɛlɛɣɛ pəlɛ nte ŋmalaa lɔwa na tə ́ pəsɩ nte tə tɔɔ pə təna pə ́ səŋaa tɔɣɔ .

text: And a stone of stumbling , and a rock of offence , even to them which stumble at the word , being disobedient : whereunto also they were appointed .
text2: Pa tasa tiiliɣi ŋmaaʋ tɔtɔ sɩ : Pəlɛ nte tə coki yəlaa tɔɣɔlɔ . Kʋkpamʋɣʋ ŋku kʋ huɣi tɔ . Pa kisa Ɩsɔ Tɔm mʋɣʋ tɔɣɔ pə coki - wɛ , na ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tuu pɩɩ sɩɩwa sɩ pɩɩ la - wɛ .

text: But ye are a chosen generation , a royal priesthood , an holy nation , a peculiar people ; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light :
text2: Ama mɛ ɩlɛ mə kɛ ́ piitim mpi pa ləsaa tɔɣɔ , na Wulaʋ Sɔsɔ kɔtəlaa , na ɩ piitim naŋŋ nyəm , na Ɩsɔ yəlaa kɛ ́ . Na pə ləsa - mɛɣɛ sɩ ɩ ́ kpaaləɣɩ Ɩsɔ wei ɩ yaa - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ lɩɩ səkpɛtʋɣʋ taa na ɩ ́ sʋʋ ɩ tənaŋŋ tete tɔ ɩ təma sɔsɔɔna tɔm .

text: Which in time past were not a people , but are now the people of God : which had not obtained mercy , but now have obtained mercy .
text2: Lɔŋ ɩ ́ taa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ yəlaa , ama pənɛntɛ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ yəlaa . Lɔŋ ɩ ́ taa nyɩ sɩ Ɩsɔ wɛna pətɔɔtəlɛ yaa ɩ fɛɩna tɔ . Ama pənɛntɛ ɩ ́ nyəmá sɩ ɩ wɛna .

text: Dearly beloved , I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims , abstain from fleshly lusts , which war against the soul ;
text2: Ma taapalaa , ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ kɛʋ mʋʋlaa na cɔɔsəlaa kɛ atɛ cənɛ tɔ , ma wiikina - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na tɔnʋɣʋ kʋnyɩɩləŋ wei ɩ wakələɣɩ mə Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ tɔ .

text: Having your conversation honest among the Gentiles : that , whereas they speak against you as evildoers , they may by your good works , which they shall behold , glorify God in the day of visitation .
text2: Ɩ ́ tɔkɩ yaasi kʋpaŋ kɛ ma ta nyɩ ɩsɔnaa hɛkʋ , ɩlɛ paa ná mə təma kʋpana kɛ timpi pa tʋɣʋna - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ asaɣaa tɔ , na paa sa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ kʋyaŋku ɩ ká kɔɔ tɔ .

text: Submit yourselves to every ordinance of man for the Lord ' s sake : whether it be to the king , as supreme ;
text2: Ɩ ́ tʋɣʋna sɔsaa mpa yəlaa sɩɩwa tɔɣɔ Tacaa tɔɔ , paa Lom wulaʋ sɔsɔ wei ɩ tɩ pə təna tɔ .

text: Or unto governors , as unto them that are sent by him for the punishment of evildoers , and for the praise of them that do well .
text2: Paa kʋfənɛɛnaa mpa ɩ sɩɩwa tɛtʋ taa sɩ pá hɔŋ asaɣaa ŋkpaŋŋ na pá saŋ kʋpantʋ lataa tɔ .

text: For so is the will of God , that with well doing ye may put to silence the ignorance of foolish men :
text2: Tampana tɔɔ ɩsəntɔ , Ɩsɔ caa kɛ ́ sɩ mɩɩ tɔkɩ kʋpantʋ na ɩ ́ lakɩ - tɩ , na pə ́ mɔtɩ ɩsəkpɛɛtɛɛ nyəma na kʋmɛlɛməŋ pa nɔɔsɩ na pá taa na kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ .

text: As free , and not using your liberty for a cloke of maliciousness , but as the servants of God .
text2: Ɩ ́ tɔŋ ɩsɩɩ kasaɣampiya . Ama ɩ ́ taa nyənɩ mə kasaɣampiitu kɛ mpi ye ɩ ́ lapa ɩsaɣatʋ pɩɩ takɩ mə waalɩ tɔ . Ama ɩ ́ la ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ təmlɛ nyəma lakʋɣʋ tɔ .

text: Honour all men . Love the brotherhood . Fear God . Honour the king .
text2: Ɩ ́ seekɩ yəlaa təna , na ɩ ́ sɔɔləɣɩ mə Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ taa lɛlaa , na ɩ ́ nyaŋna Ɩsɔ , na ɩ ́ seeki Lom wulaʋ sɔsɔ .

text: Servants , be subject to your masters with all fear ; not only to the good and gentle , but also to the froward .
text2: Təma lataa , mɩɩ nɩɩna mə caanaa na ɩ ́ se - wɛɣɛ teu . Pə taɣa mpa pa kɛ ́ kʋpama na pá wɛna suulu tɔ pa tike kɛ ɩ ́ ká nɩɩkəna na ɩ ́ ká seeki , ama na mpa pa wɛna nyaŋ tɔtɔ tɔɣɔ .

text: For this is thankworthy , if a man for conscience toward God endure grief , suffering wrongfully .
text2: Pa tʋkʋɣʋ yʋlʋ kɛ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ yem na ɩ ́ suma sɩ Ɩsɔ tɔɔ tɔ pə wɛ teu kɛ ́ .

text: For what glory is it , if , when ye be buffeted for your faults , ye shall take it patiently ? but if , when ye do well , and suffer for it , ye take it patiently , this is acceptable with God .
text2: Ama ye yʋlʋ lapa ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ ́ na pá makɩ - ɩ tə tɔɔ , ɩlɛ ɩ ɩsantɛ ntɛ ́ ɩsəna tɔtɔ ? Yʋlʋ lakɩ kʋpantʋ kɛ ́ na pá tʋ - ɩ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ kʋpantʋ nti ɩ lapa mpʋ tɔ tə tɔɔ na ɩ ́ suma , ɩlɛna pə ́ lá Ɩsɔ ɩlɛɣɛ leleŋ .

text: For even hereunto were ye called : because Christ also suffered for us , leaving us an example , that ye should follow his steps :
text2: Pə tɔɔ maɣamaɣa kɛ Ɩsɔ yaa - mɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Kilisiti maɣamaɣa ná tɔɣɔ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ hʋlɩ - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ təŋ ɩ ɩkpatɛ .

text: Who did no sin , neither was guile found in his mouth :
text2: Ɩ ta la ɩsaɣatʋ natəlɩ , ɩ nɔɣɔ taa tá lɩɩ pɔpɔtʋ tɔm natəlɩ kɛ paa fəŋ .

text: Who , when he was reviled , reviled not again ; when he suffered , he threatened not ; but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously :
text2: Pa tʋʋ - ɩ tɔ , ɩ ta lɛɛtɩ . Pa tʋ - ɩ kʋnyɔŋ tɔ , ɩ ta nyaasɩ - wɛ . Ama ɩ yelina pə tənaɣa Ɩsɔ wei ɩ təŋəɣɩ tampana na ɩ ́ hʋʋkəna tɔɣɔ .

text: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree , that we , being dead to sins , should live unto righteousness : by whose stripes ye were healed .
text2: Na Kilisiti maɣamaɣa səɣələna tá ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ ɩ nyʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ səm tesika tɔɔ , sɩ tə ́ sɩ na pə ́ cɛ tá na ɩsaɣatʋ , na tə ́ fe na tə ́ təŋ siɣisuɣu . Pə kʋ ɩlɛɣɛ kʋɣʋ kʋɣʋ tɔɣɔ pə waa - mɛ .

text: For ye were as sheep going astray ; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ ́ ka wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ heeŋ kʋtooluŋ . Ama pənɛntɛ pa keeta - mɛ na pá məŋna wei ɩ kɛ ́ tiikulu na ləsasɩ tɔɔ feŋlu tɔ ɩ kiŋ .

text: Likewise , ye wives , be in subjection to your own husbands ; that , if any obey not the word , they also may without the word be won by the conversation of the wives ;
text2: Alaa mɛ tɔtɔ , ɩ ́ seeki mə paalaa kɛ mpʋ . Pɩɩ la na pa taa mpa pa ta mʋ Ɩsɔ Tɔm tɔ , pá ná mə yaasinaa na pə ́ hɔ - wɛ na pá sʋʋ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ taa . Pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ ká yɔɣɔtɩ natəlɩ na mə nɔɔsɩ na pəcɔ .

text: While they behold your chaste conversation coupled with fear .
text2: Aaɩ , paa ná ɩsəna mə yaasi maɣaa na ɩ ́ seeki mə paalaa tɔɣɔ pɩɩ hɔ - wɛ .

text: Whose adorning let it not be that outward adorning of plaiting the hair , and of wearing of gold , or of putting on of apparel ;
text2: Ɩ ́ taa pɛɛkəɣɩ sɩ ɩ ́ tʋɣɩ mə tɔɔnaa kɛ kacɔka nyəm , ɩsɩɩ nyɔɔsɩ taɣanʋɣʋ na wʋla nyəmnaa tʋɣʋ , yaa wontu kʋpantʋ suuu sɩ pə ́ la - mɛ na ɩ ́ te .

text: But let it be the hidden man of the heart , in that which is not corruptible , even the ornament of a meek and quiet spirit , which is in the sight of God of great price .
text2: Ama ɩ ́ pɛɛkəɣɩ sɩ hatuu mə lotu taa ɩ ́ tena . Na teu mpɩ , pə wɛɛ ləmaɣasəlɛ nte tə wɛ teu na tə wɛ təpamm tɔ tə teu , mpi pɩɩ saaləɣɩ yem tɔ . Tə kɛ ́ liɣitihutaɣa pʋlʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ .

text: For after this manner in the old time the holy women also , who trusted in God , adorned themselves , being in subjection unto their own husbands :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ lɔŋtaa alaa mpa pa təŋaɣa Ɩsɔ mpaaʋ kɛ teu na pa tɛɛlaɣaa ɩ kiŋ tɔ pa taɣanaɣana pa tɩ . Pa seekaɣa pa paalaa kɛ ́ .

text: Even as Sara obeyed Abraham , calling him lord : whose daughters ye are , as long as ye do well , and are not afraid with any amazement .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ Saala lapa , ɩ nɩɩna Apəlaham kɛ ́ , haləna ɩ ́ yaakɩ - ɩ sɩ : Ma cɛ . Ye mɩɩ lakɩ kʋpantʋ na ɩ ́ tá yele na pʋlʋ sɔɣɔntʋ kpaa - mɛ , ɩ ́ wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ɩ pɛɛlaa .

text: Likewise , ye husbands , dwell with them according to knowledge , giving honour unto the wife , as unto the weaker vessel , and as being heirs together of the grace of life ; that your prayers be not hindered .
text2: Apalaa mɛ tɔtɔ , ɩ ́ tɔkɩ mə alaa na ɩ ́ nyɩ pa tɔɔ sɩ pə ŋma - wɛ tɔ pa toma ta tala mə nyəna . Ɩ ́ seeki pa ɩsɛ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mə na - wɛɣɛ Ɩsɔ ká ha weesuɣu kɛ faalaa . Ɩ ́ lakɩ mpʋ , na pʋlʋ ɩ ́ taa kɔɔ na pə ́ kaɣatɩ - mɛɣɛ mə sələməŋ taa .

text: Finally , be ye all of one mind , having compassion one of another , love as brethren , be pitiful , be courteous :
text2: Pə tənaɣa mpʋ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ hʋʋkɩ hʋwɛɛ kʋlʋmɛɛ na kʋsɔɔləm kʋlʋməm . Ɩ ́ sɔɔlɩ təma ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ na ɩ neu . Ɩ ́ tɔkɩ təmaɣa teu . Ɩ ́ taa la təma na kalampaanɩ .

text: Not rendering evil for evil , or railing for railing : but contrariwise blessing ; knowing that ye are thereunto called , that ye should inherit a blessing .
text2: Ye yʋlʋ ɩ ́ lapa - mɛɣɛ ɩsaɣatʋ ɩ ́ taa fɛlɩ - ɩ , paa kʋtʋɣʋ , ɩ ́ taa lɛɛtɩ - ɩ . Ama ɩ ́ kooli pʋntʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ kʋpantʋ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ yaaʋ - mɛ tɔ , ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ kʋpantʋ kɛ ɩ tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha - mɛ .

text: For he that will love life , and see good days , let him refrain his tongue from evil , and his lips that they speak no guile :
text2: Pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa kɛ ́ mpʋ sɩ : Ye wei ɩ caa sɩ ɩ nɩɩ leleŋ na ɩ ́ ná kʋyɛɛŋ kʋpaŋ kɛ atɛ cənɛ , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ yele ɩsaɣatʋ yɔɣɔtaɣa , na ɩ ́ taa tasa pɔpɔtʋ pɛlʋɣʋ .

text: Let him eschew evil , and do good ; let him seek peace , and ensue it .
text2: Ɩ ́ ha ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ siɣile na ɩ ́ sʋʋ kʋpantʋ lapʋ taa . Ɩ ́ pɛɛkɩ lɛlaa na leleŋ na ɩ ́ huli pə ɩkpatɛ .

text: For the eyes of the Lord are over the righteous , and his ears are open unto their prayers : but the face of the Lord is against them that do evil .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Tacaa kama ɩsɛ kɛ yʋlʋpama tɔɔ kɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ pa sələməŋ . Ama ɩ haa siɣile kɛ mpa pa lakɩ ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɣɔ .

text: And who is he that will harm you , if ye be followers of that which is good ?
text2: Ye ɩ ́ sɛɛsa ɩsəlɛ na kʋpantʋ lapʋ , awe ká la - mɛɣɛ ɩsaɣatʋ ?

text: But and if ye suffer for righteousness ' sake , happy are ye : and be not afraid of their terror , neither be troubled ;
text2: Paa pə wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ́ lapa kʋpantʋ nti tɔ tə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa məla - mɛɣɛ kʋnyɔŋ tʋɣʋ , ɩ ́ nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ . Ɩ ́ taa nyana yəlaa kɛ paa pəcɔ , na ɩ ́ taa yele na pə ́ liɣiti - mɛ .

text: But sanctify the Lord God in your hearts : and be ready always to give an answer to every man that asketh you a reason of the hope that is in you with meekness and fear :
text2: Kilisiti kɛna mə Caa , ɩlɛ ɩ ́ samɩ - ɩ hatuu mə lotunaa taa kɛ ́ mpʋ . Ɩ ́ taŋ tətɛɣɛtɛɣɛ kɛ ́ tam , na ye mpa pa pɔɔsa - mɛɣɛ mpi ɩ tɛɛləɣɩ tɔ pə tɔm , ɩlɛ ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ - wɛ tətetete .

text: Having a good conscience ; that , whereas they speak evil of you , as of evildoers , they may be ashamed that falsely accuse your good conversation in Christ .
