text2: Ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ - wɛ təpamm na ɩ ́ se - wɛ . Ɩ ́ wɛɛna lotu kʋlʋmtʋ , ɩlɛ mpa pa tɔŋ sɩ ɩ ́ kɛ ́ taalɩ nyə ́ ma na pá tʋʋkɩ - mɛɣɛ mə yaasi kʋpaŋ wei Kilisiti ha - mɛ tɔ ɩ tɔɔ tɔ , fɛɛlɛ ká məlɩ - wɛɣɛ kpaʋ kɛ pa nɔɔsɩ taa tɔm pee tɔɔ .

text: For it is better , if the will of God be so , that ye suffer for well doing , than for evil doing .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye yʋlʋ tɔkɩ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ kʋpantʋ nti ɩ lapa tɔ tə tɔɔ , na pə ́ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ luɣu nyəntʋ sɩ ɩ ́ tɔɣɔ mpʋ , pəlɛ pə kəla teu na mpi ɩ ká tɔɣɔ - kʋɣʋ ɩsaɣatʋ nti ɩ lapa tɔ tə tɔɔ tɔ .

text: For Christ also hath once suffered for sins , the just for the unjust , that he might bring us to God , being put to death in the flesh , but quickened by the Spirit :
text2: Haləna mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ Kilisiti maɣamaɣa ná səpa , na yəlaa ɩsaɣatʋ tɔɔ kɛ ɩ səpa tɔm kʋlʋm kɛ ɩ kpakpaa səpʋ . Ɩnəɣəlɛ yʋlʋpaŋ wei ɩ səpa asaɣaa tɔɔ tɔ , sɩ ɩ ́ kpaɣa - mɛ na ɩ ́ pona Ɩsɔ kiŋ . Ɩ tɔnʋɣʋ kʋnɛɣɛ pa kʋwa , ama Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ ná feesa - ɩ .

text: By which also he went and preached unto the spirits in prison ;
text2: Feesuɣu kʋnɛɣɛ ɩ tɔkaa na ɩ ́ polo na ɩ ́ lana waasʋ kɛ ləsasɩ nsi sɩ wɛ saləka taa tɔ .

text: Which sometime were disobedient , when once the longsuffering of God waited in the days of Noah , while the ark was a preparing , wherein few , that is , eight souls were saved by water .
text2: Ləsasɩ nsi sɩ taa nɩɩna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tuu lɔŋ kɛ kʋyɛɛŋ wei ɩ taa Nowee tɔŋna ɩ atakaa pɔɣɔlʋɣʋ sɔsɔɔʋ saakʋɣʋ na Ɩsɔ taŋna suulu tɔɣɔ ma tɔŋ . Na yəlaa mpa pa sʋʋ kpɩɩlʋɣʋ ŋkʋ kʋ taa na lʋm ta tɔɣɔ - wɛ tɔ pa wɛ pəcɔ kɛ ́ , yəlaa pəlefɛɩ naanʋwa tike .

text: The like figure whereunto even baptism doth also now save us ( not the putting away of the filth of the flesh , but the answer of a good conscience toward God , ) by the resurrection of Jesus Christ :
text2: Lʋm pənɛ pə nəɣəsəna Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔʋ mpi pə yakɩ mə nyɔɔŋ kɛ kaɣana tɔɣɔ . Na Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔʋ pənɛ pə ta kɛ tɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ asilima ləsʋɣʋ . Ama pə kɛ ́ mpi pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ sɩ yʋlʋ wiikina Ɩsɔ sɩ ɩ ́ ha - ɩ lotu kʋlʋmtʋ tɔɣɔ . Yesu Kilisiti fema tɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ lʋm sɔʋ yakɩ mə nyɔɔŋ .

text: Who is gone into heaven , and is on the right hand of God ; angels and authorities and powers being made subject unto him .
text2: Ɩnɩ ɩ kpana ɩsɔtaa na ɩ ́ caɣa Ɩsɔ kɔŋkɔŋ taa , na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ kawulaɣa kɛ ɩsɔtaa tillaa na ɩsɔtaa kawulasɩ na pə toŋtʋnaa tɔɔ .

text: Forasmuch then as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh , arm yourselves likewise with the same mind : for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin ;
text2: Ɩsɩɩ Kilisiti tɔɣɔ kʋnyɔŋ na pə ́ wɩɩ ɩ nantʋ tɔ , mɛ tɔtɔ ɩ ́ caalɩ mə tɩ na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ pə ləmaɣasəlɛ kɛ mpʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , wei ɩ tɔkɩ kʋnyɔŋ haləna pə ́ wɩɩkɩ ɩ nantʋ tɔ , pʋntʋ lɩɩ ɩsaɣatʋ paa taa kɛ ́ .

text: That he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men , but to the will of God .
text2: Pə kpaɣaʋ kaɣana tɔ , ɩ ́ tɔ kʋyɛɛŋ wei pə kaasa - mɛɣɛ atɛ cənɛ tɔ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ caa tɔ , ɩ ́ taa tɔ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋkʋnyɩɩləŋ caakɩ tɔ .

text: For the time past of our life may suffice us to have wrought the will of the Gentiles , when we walked in lasciviousness , lusts , excess of wine , revellings , banquetings , and abominable idolatries :
text2: Ɩ ́ yele ɩsəna tuu lɔŋ ɩ ́ paasaa na ɩ ́ lá ɩsɩɩ ma ta nyɩ ɩsɔnaa tɔ , ɩ ́ taa tasa mpʋ . Yaasi ɩsaɣaʋ , na kʋnyɩɩləŋ ɩsaɣaŋ , na sʋlʋnyɔɔlɛ , na hiluɣu , na sʋlʋkʋlɛ , na tɩɩŋ laaʋ mpi pə fɛɩ lapʋ tɔ pə tənaɣa mpʋ pə taa kɛ ́ ɩ ́ ka wɛɛ .

text: Wherein they think it strange that ye run not with them to the same excess of riot , speaking evil of you :
text2: Ama pənɛntɛ mə tɔm lakɩ ma ta nyɩ ɩsɔnaa kɛ ha kɛ ́ timpi mə na - wɛ ɩ ́ yela kpɛntʋɣʋ kɛ yaasinaa asaɣaa sɔsaa taa tɔ , ɩlɛna pá mələɣɩ - mɛɣɛ kʋtʋɣʋ .

text: Who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the quick and the dead .
text2: Ama paa tɛ na pá kɛɛsɩ pa kʋlapəlɛ tənaɣa Ɩsɔ wei ɩ sɔɔlʋ pɩɩwa sɩ ɩ hʋʋkəna weesiŋ nyə ́ ma na sətaa kɛ tɔm tɔ .

text: For for this cause was the gospel preached also to them that are dead , that they might be judged according to men in the flesh , but live according to God in the spirit .
text2: Pə maɣamaɣa pə nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔtɔɣɔ pa kpaala sətaa kɛ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ sɩ pá hʋʋna - wɛ ɩsɩɩ yəlaa mpa pa wɛna pa weesiŋ tɔɣɔ teitei ɩsɩɩ pa lakɩ yəlaa təna tɔ , na pa kpaala - wɛɣɛ Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ ́ sɩ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu toŋ tɔɔ pá wɛɛ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ wɛʋ tɔ .

text: But the end of all things is at hand : be ye therefore sober , and watch unto prayer .
text2: Pə təna pə wʋlɛ pɩɩwaɣa , pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ kpaɣa ləmaɣasɛɛ kɛ teu , ɩ ́ taa caɣa yem təpoto na ɩ ́ sɔɔ Ɩsɔ sələmʋɣʋ tɔɔ .

text: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves : for charity shall cover the multitude of sins .
text2: Kancaalaɣa nyəntʋ nti tə wɛɛ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔɔlɩ təmaɣa sɔsɔm . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye sɔɔlʋɣʋ ɩ ́ wɛɛ ɩsaɣatʋ paɣalɛ puki pooluŋ kɛ ́ .

text: Use hospitality one to another without grudging .
text2: Ɩ ́ lakɩ təmaɣa mʋʋllɛ kɛ mə tɛɛsɩ taa na ɩ ́ taa kʋntəɣɩ .

text: As every man hath received the gift , even so minister the same one to another , as good stewards of the manifold grace of God .
text2: Paa mə taa wei ɩ ́ paasəna teu kɛ mpi Ɩsɔ yeki na pə lapʋ saakɩ - ɩ tɔ . Ye Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ yelaa na pʋlʋ lapʋ saa nɔɣɔlʋ tike , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ paasəna teu na lɛlaa waa pə taa .

text: If any man speak , let him speak as the oracles of God ; if any man minister , let him do it as of the ability which God giveth : that God in all things may be glorified through Jesus Christ , to whom be praise and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Ye waasʋ latʋ lakɩ ɩ waasʋ , pə wɛɛ sɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ kɛ ɩ tɛləsəɣɩ yəlaa . Ye wei ɩ lakɩ təmlɛ , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ lana toma nna Ɩsɔ ha - ɩ tɔ , na pə ́ tʋ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teeli kɛ Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ . Yesu ɩnəɣəlɛ teeli tʋ na pəsʋlʋ kɛ tam tɔɔ . Ami .

text: Beloved , think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you , as though some strange thing happened unto you :
text2: Ma taapalaa mə laŋa ɩ ́ taa tɔna ɩsəna pə maɣasʋɣʋ - mɛɣɛ toŋ na toŋ sɩ pə naa mə waalɩ tɔ ɩsɩɩ mpusi nɔɣɔlʋ .

text: But rejoice , inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ ' s sufferings ; that , when his glory shall be revealed , ye may be glad also with exceeding joy .
text2: Ama mə laŋa ɩ ́ hʋlʋmɩ sɩ mə hika mə paa nyəm kɛ Kilisiti wahalanaa taa na mɩɩ tɔɣɔ . Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ mə laŋa ká hʋlʋmɩ kʋyaŋku pɩɩ kuli ɩ teeli tɔɔ tɔ .

text: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ , happy are ye ; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you : on their part he is evil spoken of , but on your part he is glorified .
text2: Ye pa tʋʋkɩ - mɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ kɛʋ Kilisiti ɩfalaa tɔ pə tɔɔ , ɩ ́ nɩɩ leleŋ kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , teeli Feesuɣu ŋku kʋ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu tɔ kʋ wɛɛkɩ mə waalɩ kɛ ́ .

text: But let none of you suffer as a murderer , or as a thief , or as an evildoer , or as a busybody in other men ' s matters .
text2: Pá taa tʋ mə taa nɔɣɔlʋɣʋ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ yʋlʋkʋlɛ yaa ŋmɩɩləm yaa ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ yaa tɔm faʋ pə tɔɔ .

text: Yet if any man suffer as a Christian , let him not be ashamed ; but let him glorify God on this behalf .
text2: Ama ye wei ɩ tɔkɩ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ Kilisiti təŋʋɣʋ tɔɔ , fɛɛlɛ ɩ ́ taa kpa - ɩ . Ɩ ́ sa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ ɩsəna mpi pa tʋna - ɩ na Kilisiti tɔ .

text: For the time is come that judgment must begin at the house of God : and if it first begin at us , what shall the end be of them that obey not the gospel of God ?
text2: Hʋʋlɛ waatʋ talaa kɛ ́ , na Ɩsɔ yəlaa kɛ pa caaləɣəna tɔm hʋʋnaʋ . Tɔʋ , ye taɣa Ɩsɔ taaləɣəna hʋʋnaʋ , ɩlɛ ɩsənaɣalɛ hʋʋlɛ ntɛ ́ tɩɩ tɛɛsəna waatʋ wei pɩɩ tala mpa pa kisa Laapaalɩ Kʋpaŋ kɛ mʋɣʋ tɔ ?

text: And if the righteous scarcely be saved , where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear ?
text2: Pa ŋmaawa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ : Ye mɛʋmɛʋ kɛ ́ na pə ́ ya kʋpama nyɔɔŋ , ɩlɛ awe náá tɩɩ pɔɔsɩ nyaŋtʋnaa na asaɣaa pa tɔm ɩlɛ ?

text: Wherefore let them that suffer according to the will of God commit the keeping of their souls to him in well doing , as unto a faithful Creator .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ye Ɩsɔ luɣu lapa sɩ mpa pá tɔɣɔ kʋnyɔŋ , pʋntʋnaa ɩ ́ lakɩ kʋpantʋ kɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tam . Pá yelina pa təɣɩ Nmalʋ wei ɩ kaa yele lapʋ kɛ nti nti ɩ tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la tɔ .

text: The elders which are among you I exhort , who am also an elder , and a witness of the sufferings of Christ , and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed :
text2: Mə taa mpa mpa pa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsaa tɔɣɔ ma wɛna pənɛ . Ma maɣamaɣa ɩsəntɔ ma kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ təsɛɛlɛ sɔsɔ kɛ ́ . Na ma nana ma ɩsəpəle kɛ Kilisiti tɔɣɔ kʋnyɔməŋ wei tɔ . Kʋyaŋku paa kuli ɩ teeli tɔɔ tɔ maa hiki ma paa nyəm kɛ pə taa . Nti ma wiikina - mɛ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ :

text: Feed the flock of God which is among you , taking the oversight thereof , not by constraint , but willingly ; not for filthy lucre , but of a ready mind ;
text2: Ɩ ́ paasəna kaləkʋ ŋku Ɩsɔ yelina - mɛ tɔɣɔ teu , ɩsɩɩ tiikilaa lakʋɣʋ tɔ . Ɩ ́ feŋ kʋ tɔɔ na luɣu kʋlʋmʋɣʋ ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ caakɩ tɔ , pə ́ taa wɛɛ təlasɩ tɔm . Ɩ ́ lakɩ mə təma tətetete , pə ́ taa wɛɛ pɔɣɔlaɣa nyənʋɣʋ tɔɔ . Ama ɩ ́ ha mə tɩ təkpataa kɛ ́ pə lapʋ taa .

text: Neither as being lords over God ' s heritage , but being ensamples to the flock .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa pɛɛkɩ sɩ ɩ ́ ŋmakələɣɩ mpa pə cɛla - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ feŋiɣi pa tɔɔ tɔ . Ama ɩ ́ wɛɛ mpa kaləkʋ ka nyənəɣəna na kʋ lakɩ tɔ .

text: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear , ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away .
text2: Na tiikilaa Wulaʋ ɩ ́ kɔma na ɩ ́ kɔɔ , ɩlɛ ɩ ́ ká hiki mə teeli ntenuɣu ŋku kʋ ŋmaləm ká tee kɔkɔ kɛ tam tɔ .

text: Likewise , ye younger , submit yourselves unto the elder . Yea , all of you be subject one to another , and be clothed with humility : for God resisteth the proud , and giveth grace to the humble .
text2: Səkpema mɛ mə nyəntʋ ntɛ ́ sɩ mɩɩ seeki sɔsaa . Na mə təna təpaɩ ɩ ́ pasa mə tɩ na ɩ ́ səŋna təma , pə taɣa pʋlʋ , pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ Ɩsɔ yoona kalampaanɩ nyə ́ ma , na ɩ lakɩ kʋpantʋ kɛ mpa pa pasəɣɩ pa tɩ tɔ .

text: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God , that he may exalt you in due time :
text2: Ye mpʋ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ pasa mə təɣɩ Ɩsɔ niŋ toma nyəŋ taa , na pə ́ kɔma na pə ́ tala waatʋ wei ɩ ka sɩɩwa tɔ , ɩ ká kʋsɩ mə nyʋɣʋ .

text: Casting all your care upon him ; for he careth for you .
text2: Ɩ ́ pɛtɩ mə nəɣəsɛɛ tənaɣa Ɩsɔ , pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ paasəɣəna - mɛ tɔ se .

text: Be sober , be vigilant ; because your adversary the devil , as a roaring lion , walketh about , seeking whom he may devour :
text2: Ɩ ́ nyɔɔsɩ mə tɩ , ɩ ́ taa caɣa yem təpoto . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , mə kolontu ɩlɔɣɔʋ wɛɛ kɛ ́ , na ɩ ́ cɔɔkɩ ɩsɩɩ tɔɣɔlaɣa wiikuɣu na ka cɔɔkɩ na ká pɛɛkəɣɩ sɩ ká hika wei ka taɣamɩ tɔ .

text: Whom resist stedfast in the faith , knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world .
text2: Ɩ ́ paasɩ na ɩ ́ səŋ Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ mpaaʋ taa kɛ ́ teu na ɩ ́ taŋɩ - ɩ teu . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ ́ nyɩ sɩ mə taapalaa mpa pa yana antulinya tɔ , kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛnaa panɛ pa makəna pɛlɛɣɛ mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: But the God of all grace , who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus , after that ye have suffered a while , make you perfect , stablish , strengthen , settle you .
text2: Ɩ ́ tɔkɩ kʋnyɔŋ kɛ laasaɣa tɔɔ tɔ , pɛɛlɛɛ təna tʋ Ɩsɔ wei ɩ yaa - mɛ sɩ ɩ ́ hiki mə paa tete kɛ ɩ teeli wei ɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ ɩ taa kɛ ́ mə na Kilisiti mə kpɛntʋɣʋ tɔɔ tɔ , ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ ká taɣanəna - mɛɣɛ teu təmammam . Na ɩ ká la na ɩ ́ nyɔɔ toŋ , na ɩ ́ ha - mɛɣɛ apalʋtʋ , na ɩ ́ səŋsɩ - mɛɣɛ kite nte tə tɔɔ pə kaa ciɣiti - mɛ tɔ .

text: To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Ɩ pəsʋɣʋ kʋnɛ kʋ ́ wɛɛ tam . Ami .

text: By Silvanus , a faithful brother unto you , as I suppose , I have written briefly , exhorting , and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand .
text2: Silaasɩ wei ma nyənəɣɩ ɩsɩɩ ta taapalʋ kʋpaŋ tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ sənna - m na má ŋmaa - mɛɣɛ takəlaɣa kanɛ . Ma caa ma sɔɔsɩ - mɛɣɛ apalʋtʋ na má la na ɩ ́ tɛ mə taa sɩ Ɩsɔ tampana pɛɛlɛɛ tɔm wɛnna takəlaɣa kanɛ ka taa . Ɩ ́ tɔkɩ - yɛɣɛ niŋ naalɛ .

text: The church that is at Babylon , elected together with you , saluteth you ; and so doth Marcus my son .
text2: Papiloni Ɩsɔ sɛɛlaa mpa Ɩsɔ yaawa ɩsɩɩ ɩ yaaʋ - mɛ tɔ pa sɛɛ - mɛ , ma pəyalʋ Maləkɩ sɛɛ - mɛ tɔtɔ .

text: Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity . Peace be with you all that are in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Ɩ ́ sɛɛ təmaɣa teu na sɔɔlʋɣʋ kʋpaŋkʋ na ɩ ́ lɛlɩ . Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ ha mə təna mpa Kilisiti tɩ tɔɣɔ alaafəya .

text: Simon Peter , a servant and an apostle of Jesus Christ , to them that have obtained like precious faith with us through the righteousness of God and our Saviour Jesus Christ :
text2: Maɣa Simɔŋ Piyɛɛ , Yesu Kilisiti təmlɛ tʋ na ɩ tillu . Tá Ɩsɔ na tá Yatʋ Yesu Kilisiti pa təŋa siɣisuɣu na pə ́ yele na mpa pa tɛŋ pa taa na Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ teu kɛ teitei ɩsɩɩ ta tɔɣɔ ma ŋmaa takəlaɣa kanɛ .

text: Grace and peace be multiplied unto you through the knowledge of God , and of Jesus our Lord ,
text2: Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ na ɩ ́ ha - mɛɣɛ alaafəya kɛ sɔsɔm kɛ nyəm mpi ɩ ́ nyəmá ɩ ́ na Tacaa Yesu tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: According as his divine power hath given unto us all things that pertain unto life and godliness , through the knowledge of him that hath called us to glory and virtue :
text2: Ɩsɔ ɩnɩ ɩ ɩsɔɩtʋ toŋ hana - tʋɣʋ pə təna mpi pə yeki na tə ́ matəɣəna - ɩ tɔ . Ɩnɩ ɩ yekina na tə nyəŋ wei ɩ yaa - tʋ sɩ tə ́ hiki ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ teeli na ɩ kʋpantʋ taa kɛ ́ ta paa nyəm tɔ .

text: Whereby are given unto us exceeding great and precious promises : that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature , having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust .
text2: Na pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ mpi mpi ɩ sɩɩwa sɩ ɩ ká la - tʋ tɔ pə kɛ ́ kʋpampam na pə tɔɔwa sɔsɔm pə tɩɩ fɛɩ . Na ye ɩ ́ hika mpi Ɩsɔ sɩɩwa sɩ ɩ ká la tɔ , ɩlɛ ɩ ́ ká pəsɩ na ɩ ́ fiti kʋnyɩɩləŋ ɩsaɣaŋ wei ɩ ŋmakəla antulinya taa cənɛ tɔ ɩ niŋ taa na ɩ ́ kpaɣa Ɩsɔ wɛɛtʋ .

text: And beside this , giving all diligence , add to your faith virtue ; and to virtue knowledge ;
text2: Ɩ ́ tɛma mə taa na Ɩsɔ tɔ , tənɛ ɩnɩ tə nyʋɣʋ tɔɔ maɣamaɣa kɛ ɩ ́ ká huli teu na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ yaasi kʋpaŋ . Yaasi kʋpaŋ waalɩ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɛɛkɩ nyəm .

text: And to knowledge temperance ; and to temperance patience ; and to patience godliness ;
text2: Na nyəm waalɩ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɛɛkɩ tɩ tɔkʋɣʋ . Tɩ tɔkʋɣʋ waalɩ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɛɛkɩ suulu . Na suulu waalɩ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɛɛkɩ sɩ ɩ ́ matəɣəna Ɩsɔ .

text: And to godliness brotherly kindness ; and to brotherly kindness charity .
text2: Na Ɩsɔ matənaʋ waalɩ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɛɛkɩ sɩ ɩ ́ wɛɛ təma na leleŋ . Təma leleŋ waalɩ ɩlɛna ɩ ́ pɛɛkɩ sɩ ɩ ́ sɔɔləɣɩ təma .

text: For if these things be in you , and abound , they make you that ye shall neither be barren nor unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Yaasinaa kʋpama mpa pə mʋna ɩ ́ tɔkɩ tɔɣɔlɛ . Ye ɩ ́ wɛna - wɛ na pá tɔɔ sɔsɔm , paa la - mɛɣɛ kpelikpeka nyə ́ ma kɛ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti nyəm tɔm taa , na ɩ ́ kaa wɛɛ kaawaasasɩ .

text: But he that lacketh these things is blind , and cannot see afar off , and hath forgotten that he was purged from his old sins .
text2: Ama wei ɩ fɛɩna yaasinaa panɛ tɔ , ɩ tɛɛ ɩ tɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩ naakɩ , na ɩ wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋm . Na pə sɔɔna - ɩ təleŋŋ sɩ pa kpiisa ɩ lɔŋ ɩsaɣatʋ .

text: Wherefore the rather , brethren , give diligence to make your calling and election sure : for if ye do these things , ye shall never fall :
text2: Ma taapalaa , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ ká caalɩ mə tɩ na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ yaaʋ mpi Ɩsɔ yaa - mɛ na ləsʋɣʋ mpi ɩ ləsa - mɛ tɔɣɔ teu . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye ɩ ́ tɔka mpʋ , natəlɩ tə kaa hu - mɛɣɛ paa pəcɔ .

text: For so an entrance shall be ministered unto you abundantly into the everlasting kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ .
text2: Mpʋ pɩɩ yelina na pá tʋlɩ - mɛɣɛ Tacaa na tá Yatʋ Yesu Kilisiti Kawulaɣa tam nyəŋka nɔɣɔ təyelele .

text: Wherefore I will not be negligent to put you always in remembrance of these things , though ye know them , and be established in the present truth .
text2: Mpi pə tɔɔ ma wɛɛ na má tɔŋna - mɛɣɛ tɔm tənɛɣɛ tɔɔsʋɣʋ tɔɣɔlɛ . Ɩ ́ tɛma - təɣɩ nyəm , haləna tampana tɔm nti ɩ mʋwa tɔ ɩ ́ pɩɩ tə tɔm taa .

text: Yea , I think it meet , as long as I am in this tabernacle , to stir you up by putting you in remembrance ;
text2: Ye ma wɛna ma ɩsɛ , ma hʋʋ sɩ pə wɛ teu sɩ ma kʋtɔɔsʋtʋ tənɛɣɛ maa tɔɔsəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ tam na ɩ ́ taa hɛɛ .

text: Knowing that shortly I must put off this my tabernacle , even as our Lord Jesus Christ hath shewed me .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ma nyəmá teu sɩ nɔɔnɔɔ maa lɩɩ tɔnʋɣʋ kʋsəpʋɣʋ kʋnɛ kʋ taa na má tɛɛ , ɩsɩɩ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti hʋla - m tɔ .

text: Moreover I will endeavour that ye may be able after my decease to have these things always in remembrance .
text2: Maa paasəna na má yelina - mɛɣɛ mpi pɩɩ tɔɔsəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ tɔm tənɛɣɛ paa ma kɔma na ma fɛɩ tɔ .

text: For we have not followed cunningly devised fables , when we made known unto you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , but were eyewitnesses of his majesty .
text2: Tampana tɔɔ ɩsəntɔ , pə taɣa mʋla nna yʋlʋlaɣatʋ lʋləsaa tɔ anəɣɩ tə tɔkaa na tə ́ hʋləna - mɛɣɛ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti kɔntɛ toŋ na toŋ nyəntɛ tɔm . Ama tə ná ɩ sɔsɔɔntʋ na ta ɩsəpee maɣamaɣa kɛ ́ .

text: For he received from God the Father honour and glory , when there came such a voice to him from the excellent glory , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Tɩɩ wɛ timpi Tacaa Ɩsɔ kʋsa ɩ nyʋɣʋ na ɩ ́ ha - ɩ teeli kɛ waatʋ wei Teeli sɔsɔ tʋ ɩnɩ ɩ lapa na pə ́ yɔɣɔtɩ na ɩ ́ nɩɩ sɩ : Ma luɣu tɛɛ Pəyaɣa ntɛ ́ ɩnɛ ɩnɩ , ɩnəɣɩ ma laŋlɛ hʋlʋmənaa pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: And this voice which came from heaven we heard , when we were with him in the holy mount .
text2: Tá maɣamaɣa tə nɩɩna tá ŋkpaŋŋ kɛ waatʋ wei pə yɔɣɔta ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ hatuu ɩsɔtaa kɛ ́ tá na - ɩ tɩɩ wɛ pʋɣʋ katɛ nyəŋkʋ tɔɔ tɔ .

text: We have also a more sure word of prophecy ; whereunto ye do well that ye take heed , as unto a light that shineth in a dark place , until the day dawn , and the day star arise in your hearts :
text2: Mpʋ ɩnɩ pə yelina na tə ́ tɛ tá taa təkpataa na tɔm nti Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa ka kpaalaa tɔ . Na tə mʋna mɩɩ kena - təɣɩ teu . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tə wɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ fətəla wɛʋ səkpɛtʋɣʋ taa na ɩ ́ naakɩ na halɩ pə ́ kɔɔ pə ́ fe tɔ . Tʋlʋmalʋɣʋ ká la na pə ́ ná mə taa .

text: Knowing this first , that no prophecy of the scripture is of any private interpretation .
text2: Pə tənaɣa mpʋ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ tɔɔsɩ sɩ yʋlʋ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ lu ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ tɔm na ɩ ́ sɛɣɛsɩ nti pa ŋmaa Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa sɩ cele tɩɩ la tɔ tə tɔɔ .

text: For the prophecy came not in old time by the will of man : but holy men of God spake as they were moved by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , yʋlʋ nɔkʋɣʋ tike ɩɩ lʋləsəɣɩ cele tɔm natəlɩ . Ama Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ tʋkaɣana - təɣɩ yəlaa taa na pá yɔɣɔtəɣəna Ɩsɔ nɔɣɔ .

text: But there were false prophets also among the people , even as there shall be false teachers among you , who privily shall bring in damnable heresies , even denying the Lord that bought them , and bring upon themselves swift destruction .
text2: Hatuu lɔŋ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa pɔpɔtʋnaa ka lɩɩwa yəlaa hɛkʋ . Mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ sɛɣɛsəlaa pɔpɔtʋnaa ká lɩɩ mə hɛkʋ taa tɔtɔ . Pɔpɔtʋ sɛɣɛsəŋ na wei ɩ ́ kɔŋna wakəlʋɣʋ tɔɣɔ paa sʋʋ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ . Na paa kisi Tacaa wei ɩ ́ yapa - wɛ tɔ . Mpʋ ɩnɩ pɩɩ yelina na pá kɔna wakəlʋɣʋ kɛ kpakpaa kɛ pa maɣamaɣa pa nyɔɔŋ taa .

text: And many shall follow their pernicious ways ; by reason of whom the way of truth shall be evil spoken of .
text2: Paɣalɛ ká təŋna - wɛɣɛ pa tɛtɛlakasɩ mpaaʋ ŋkʋ kʋ taa , na paa tʋʋ tampana mpaaʋ kɛ pa yaasi wei pá tɔkaa na pá lakəna tɔ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: And through covetousness shall they with feigned words make merchandise of you : whose judgment now of a long time lingereth not , and their damnation slumbereth not .
text2: Sɛɣɛsəlaa pɔpɔtʋnaa mpɛ paa lu tɔmnaa na pá heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ pɔɣɔlaɣa nyənʋɣʋ tɔɔ sɩ pá tɔɣɔ mə tɔɔ . Ama pa Hʋʋnlʋ sɔɔlʋ tɛma pɩɩʋ kɛ hatuu lɔŋ sɩ ɩ ká la , na pa Wakəllʋ ná taŋaa tətɛɣɛtɛɣɛ .

text: For if God spared not the angels that sinned , but cast them down to hell , and delivered them into chains of darkness , to be reserved unto judgment ;
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , Ɩsɔ tá yele ɩsɔtaa tillaa mpa pa wakəlaa tɔɣɔ yem . Ama ɩ pɛta - wɛɣɛ saləka sɔsɔ taa kɛ ́ , na pá hɔka - wɛɣɛ alukpala kɛ səkpɛtʋɣʋ taa sɩ pá taŋ Hʋʋlɛ wule .

text: And spared not the old world , but saved Noah the eighth person , a preacher of righteousness , bringing in the flood upon the world of the ungodly ;
text2: Ɩsɔ tá yele antulinya kʋpəŋ kɛ yem . Ama ɩ lapa na lʋm sɔsɔɔm waasɩ antulinya ɩnɛ na ɩ yəlaa asaɣaa pa tɔɔ təwasawasa . Nowee wei ɩ lakaɣa tampana təŋʋɣʋ waasʋ tɔ na lɛlaa naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa tike nyɔɔŋ kɛ ɩ yapa .

text: And turning the cities of Sodom and Gomorrha into ashes condemned them with an overthrow , making them an ensample unto those that after should live ungodly ;
text2: Ɩsɔ kʋ ́ Sɔtɔm na Kɔmɔɔ pa acalɛɛ tɔm , na ɩ ́ wakəlɩ - yɛ na kɔkɔ . Na ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ hʋləna asaɣaa sɩ ɩsəna mpi pə wɛɛ sɩ ɩ ká la - wɛ tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: And delivered just Lot , vexed with the filthy conversation of the wicked :
text2: Ama ɩ yapa Lɔɔtɩ . Yʋlʋpaŋ ɩnɛ , yəlaa asaɣaa yaasi asilima nyəŋ ka tɔka - ɩ kɛ ́ na pə ́ cɔɔsəɣɩ .

text: ( For that righteous man dwelling among them , in seeing and hearing , vexed his righteous soul from day to day with their unlawful deeds ; )
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , yʋlʋpaŋ ɩnɛ ɩ ka wɛʋ pa hɛkʋ tɔ , paa kʋyaŋku ɩ naakaɣa kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ nɩɩkɩ yaasinaa asaɣaa panɛ , na lakasɩ ɩsaɣasɩ nsɩ sɩ pɛkəlaɣaa - ɩ kɛ ́ .

text: The Lord knoweth how to deliver the godly out of temptations , and to reserve the unjust unto the day of judgment to be punished :
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ mɛɛ , Tacaa nyəmna ɩsəna mpi ɩ ká ləsɩ mpa pa matəna - ɩ tɔɣɔ maɣasəŋ taa , na ɩsəna mpi ɩ ká sɩɩ asaɣaa sɩ Kʋyakʋ Kʋhʋʋnaʋ wule ɩlɛ ɩ ká tʋ - wɛɣɛ saləka tɔ .

text: But chiefly them that walk after the flesh in the lust of uncleanness , and despise government . Presumptuous are they , selfwilled , they are not afraid to speak evil of dignities .
text2: Pə tɩɩ kələna mpa pa təŋəɣɩ pa tɔnəŋ kʋnyɩɩləŋ ɩsaɣaŋ na pá footiɣi Ɩsɔ sɔsɔɔntʋ tɔ . Sɛɣɛsəlaa pɔpɔtʋnaa panɛ pa kɛ ́ apalaa taa apalaa kɛ ́ . Timpi pa ta tala tɔɣɔ pa kpaasəɣɩ pa tɩ . Paa tɩɩ see ɩsɔtaa teeli nyə ́ ma na ń ná , pa tʋʋkɩ - wɛɣɛ .

text: Whereas angels , which are greater in power and might , bring not railing accusation against them before the Lord .
text2: Ɩsɔtaa tillaa maɣamaɣa kələna sɛɣɛsəlaa panɛɣɛ toma na pəsʋɣʋ , paa cakəna teeli nyə ́ ma mpɛɣɛ Tacaa ɩsɛntaa .

text: But these , as natural brute beasts , made to be taken and destroyed , speak evil of the things that they understand not ; and shall utterly perish in their own corruption ;
text2: Yəlaa panɛ pa lakɩ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ləmaɣasɛɛ fɛɩnaa , pa wɛ yem kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ pə lʋlʋɣʋ taalɛ wontu sɩ pá kpa - tɩ na pá kʋ tɔ . Mpi mpi pa ta cɛkəna tɔɣɔ pa tʋʋkɩ . Pa kɔŋ saalʋɣʋ kɛ yem kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ taalɛ wontu .

text: And shall receive the reward of unrighteousness , as they that count it pleasure to riot in the day time . Spots they are and blemishes , sporting themselves with their own deceivings while they feast with you ;
text2: Kʋnyɔntɔɣɔlɛnaa mpa mpɛ pa kɔŋna tɔɣɔ pɩɩ tɛ na pə ́ lɛɛtɩ - wɛ . Ilim na pə ɩsəlɛ kɛ pa kʋnyɩɩləŋ ɩsaɣaŋ kʋləɣəna - wɛ na pá lakɩ - ɩ na pa laŋa hɛɛ pamm . Pa muɣuliɣina pa puɣusuɣu kɛ ́ na mə na - wɛ ɩ ́ tɔkɩ mə tɔɣɔnasɩ . Ye pa wɛ timpi , fɛɛlɛ na tusuɣu wɛnna .

text: Having eyes full of adultery , and that cannot cease from sin ; beguiling unstable souls : an heart they have exercised with covetous practices ; cursed children :
text2: Alaa yem yem nyə ́ ma kɛ pa pɛɛkəɣɩ tam . Paa nyəɣəsəɣɩ ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ , na pá tʋsəɣɩ acamaa acamaa . Pa pɔɣɔlaɣa nyənʋɣʋ fɛɩ yɔɣɔtʋɣʋ . Ɩsɔ təŋsa - wɛɣɛ mpusi kɛ ́ .

text: Which have forsaken the right way , and are gone astray , following the way of Balaam the son of Bosor , who loved the wages of unrighteousness ;
text2: Pa yela mpaaʋ kʋpaŋkʋ kɛ ́ na pá tooliɣi . Posɔɔ pəyalʋ Palaam ɩkpatɛ kɛ pa təŋaa . Ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ka sɔɔləna liɣitee na ɩ ́ nyɩ sɩ kawalaɣa lapʋ taa kɛ ́ ɩ ká hikina - yɛ .

text: But was rebuked for his iniquity : the dumb ass speaking with man ' s voice forbad the madness of the prophet .
text2: Ama pa kaləna - ɩ ɩ kaanɩɩtʋ tənɛ tə tɔɔ . Kʋpam , kpaŋaɣa alʋnyəŋka ŋka kaa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔ ka yɔɣɔtaa ɩsɩɩ yʋlʋ , na pə ́ kpa Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsʋlʋ kɛ ɩ kʋmɛləkʋlapʋtʋ ntɩ tə təlatɛ , na ɩ ́ yele lapʋ .

text: These are wells without water , clouds that are carried with a tempest ; to whom the mist of darkness is reserved for ever .
text2: Yəlaa panɛ pa wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ hila nna a nyɔɔwa tɔ , na ɩsɩɩ tɛʋ piluɣuu na heelimuɣu kʋsɩ - kʋ tɔ . Ɩsɔ tɛma - wɛɣɛ pa təcaɣalɛ caaʋ kɛ səkpɛtiile anaam taa .

text: For when they speak great swelling words of vanity , they allure through the lusts of the flesh , through much wantonness , those that were clean escaped from them who live in error .
text2: Kalampaanɩ tɔm na kʋmɛlənyəntʋ kɛ pa kpaaləɣɩ . Yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ kʋnyɩɩləŋ asilima nyəŋ kɛ pa tʋsəɣəna mpa pa lɩɩ nɔɔnɔɔ kɛ ́ yəlaa toollaa hɛkʋ tɔ .

text: While they promise them liberty , they themselves are the servants of corruption : for of whom a man is overcome , of the same is he brought in bondage .
text2: Na pá heeliɣi pɛlɛ sɩ paa waasɩ - wɛ na pá pəsɩ kasaɣampiya . Pəyele yaasi kʋwakəlʋ kpa mpɛ pa maɣamaɣa kɛ yomle kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye mpi pə maləna yʋlʋ , ɩ pəsa pə yom kɛ ́ .

text: For if after they have escaped the pollutions of the world through the knowledge of the Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ , they are again entangled therein , and overcome , the latter end is worse with them than the beginning .
text2: Tampana tɔɔ , ye yəlaa nyəmá Tacaa na tá Yatʋ Yesu Kilisiti na pə ́ ləsa - wɛɣɛ antulinya ɩsaɣaŋmakəlʋɣʋ taa , na pə ́ kɔɔ ɩlɛna antulinya tasa - wɛɣɛ ɩsaɣaŋmakəlʋɣʋ mpɩ na pə kpa - wɛɣɛ yomle , kancaalaɣa nyəm lapa sooci na waalɩ nyəntʋ .

text: For it had been better for them not to have known the way of righteousness , than , after they have known it , to turn from the holy commandment delivered unto them .
text2: Ye pa taa nyɩ tampana mpaaʋ , sana kɛlɛ na mpi pa tɛma - kʋɣʋ nyəm na pá ha kʋheelitu kʋpampantʋ nti pa tɛləsa - wɛ tɔɣɔ siɣile tɔ .

text: But it is happened unto them according to the true proverb , The dog is turned to his own vomit again ; and the sow that was washed to her wallowing in the mire .
text2: Nti tə maɣana - wɛ tɔ tə lapa teitei kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ pa tukuɣu ɩtuule tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Haɣa məlaa na ká tɔɣɔ ka tɔtʋ . Pa sɔ afa təpaɩpaɩ na ɩ ́ məlɩ afəla taa na ɩ ́ tasa həntʋɣʋ .

text: This second epistle , beloved , I now write unto you ; in both which I stir up your pure minds by way of remembrance :
text2: Ma taapalaa , ma takəlaɣa naalɛ nyəŋka ntɔ ma tʋ - mɛɣɛ ŋmaaʋ tɔ . Nti ma tɔɔsa - mɛɣɛ ma takəlasɩ nsɩ sɩ naalɛ sɩ taa tɔ ma caa kɛ ́ sɩ pə ́ tʋ - mɛɣɛ hʋwɛɛ kʋpana kɛ mə ləmaɣasɛɛ taa na ɩ ́ taa hɛɛ .

text: That ye may be mindful of the words which were spoken before by the holy prophets , and of the commandment of us the apostles of the Lord and Saviour :
text2: Ma caa kɛ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ tɔɔsɩ tɔm nti Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa naŋŋ nyə ́ ma ka yɔɣɔta hatuu lɔŋ tɔ , na Tacaa na tá Yatʋ kʋheelitu nti mə tillaa sɛɣɛsa - mɛ tɔ .

text: Knowing this first , that there shall come in the last days scoffers , walking after their own lusts ,
text2: Kancaalaɣa ɩlɛ ɩ ́ nyɩ teu sɩ yəlaa ká kʋlɩ kʋyɛɛŋ kantəkaɣa nyəŋ taa mpa paa təŋ pa maɣamaɣa pa kʋnyɩɩləŋ tɔ , na paa woŋ - mɛ .

text: And saying , Where is the promise of his coming ? for since the fathers fell asleep , all things continue as they were from the beginning of the creation .
text2: Haləna paa pɔɔsɩ - mɛ sɩ : Ɩ ́ taa tɔ sɩ ɩ ká məlɩ ya ? Na haləna saŋa ɩ wɛ le ? Ta caanaa ná kʋlaa kɛlɛ na pɛlɛ pá sɩ , na tuu pa ŋmaʋ antulinya tɔ ɩ tɛ ɩ tɛɣɛlɛ mpʋ , pʋlʋ ta laɣasɩ .

text: For this they willingly are ignorant of , that by the word of God the heavens were of old , and the earth standing out of the water and in the water :
text2: Ɩsɔ yɔɣɔtəna hatuu lɔŋ taa na pə ́ lá ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ na tɛtʋ . Ama tɔm tənɛɣɛ mpɛ pa sɔɔwa təfaa . Tɛtʋ faɣana lʋm , na lʋm kɛ pa lapəna - tɩ .

text: Whereby the world that then was , being overflowed with water , perished :
text2: Na pə kaasɩ lʋm mpɩ pə waasəna tuu lɔŋ antulinya təwasawasa na pə ́ wakəlɩ - ɩ .

text: But the heavens and the earth , which are now , by the same word are kept in store , reserved unto fire against the day of judgment and perdition of ungodly men .
text2: Kaɣana Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ kʋlʋmtʋ ntɩ tə sɩɩna ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ na tɛtʋ , sɩ pɩɩ tɛ na pə ́ wɔ - təɣɩ kɔkɔ kɛ kʋyaŋku paa hʋʋna asaɣaa na pá wakəlɩ - wɛ tɔ .

text: But , beloved , be not ignorant of this one thing , that one day is with the Lord as a thousand years , and a thousand years as one day .
text2: Ma taapalaa , natəlɩ tə wɛnna pə ta mʋna ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ ká sɔɔ tə tɔɔ . Ntəɣəlɛ sɩ kʋyakʋ kʋlʋmʋɣʋ wɛ Tacaa kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ pɩɩsɩ iyaɣa ( 1000 ) , na pɩɩsɩ iyaɣa ( 1000 ) náá wɛɛ - ɩ ɩsɩɩ kʋyakʋ kʋlʋmʋɣʋ .

text: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise , as some men count slackness ; but is longsuffering to us - ward , not willing that any should perish , but that all should come to repentance .
text2: Tacaa tɔma sɩ ɩ ká la nti tɔ , pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ ɩ wɛ kaninika na tə lapʋ ɩsɩɩ lɛlaa hʋʋkʋɣʋ tɔ . Ama suulu kɛ ɩ hʋləɣɩ - mɛ . Mpi tɔ , ɩɩ caa sɩ yʋlʋ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩ ́ le , paa pʋntʋ kɛ ́ awe . Ama ɩ caa kɛ ́ sɩ yəlaa təna ɩ ́ laɣasɩ tɔntɛ kʋpantɛ .

text: But the day of the Lord will come as a thief in the night ; in the which the heavens shall pass away with a great noise , and the elements shall melt with fervent heat , the earth also and the works that are therein shall be burned up .
text2: Paa na mpʋ tɔ , Tacaa kʋyakʋ kɔŋ kɔntɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ŋmɩɩlʋ kɔŋʋɣʋ tɔ . Ɩsɔ tɔnʋɣʋ ka mʋkɩ yem kɛ ́ kʋyaŋku , na pə kɔkɔlʋɣʋ ká la sɔɣɔntʋ . Kɔkɔ ká nyaɣa ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ tɔɔ nyəm təna , na pɩɩ nyaɣa atɛ na ɩ nyəm təna .

text: Seeing then that all these things shall be dissolved , what manner of persons ought ye to be in all holy conversation and godliness ,
text2: Pə kɔŋ pə tənaɣa wakəlʋɣʋ kɛ mpʋɣʋlɛ , ɩlɛ mɩɩ nyəna ntɛɣɛ mə cakəlɛ . Mə yaasi ká te na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ sɩ ɩ ́ matəna Ɩsɔ ,

text: Looking for and hasting unto the coming of the day of God , wherein the heavens being on fire shall be dissolved , and the elements shall melt with fervent heat ?
text2: na ɩ ́ taŋna Ɩsɔ kʋyakʋ , na ɩ ́ lʋ teu sɩ kʋyakʋ ŋkʋ kʋ ́ tala lɔŋ . Kʋyaŋkuɣu kɔkɔ ká nyaɣa ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ , na kʋ tɔɔ nyəm təna ká hoona ká haŋaɣa .

text: Nevertheless we , according to his promise , look for new heavens and a new earth , wherein dwelleth righteousness .
text2: Ama Ɩsɔ tɔma sɩ ɩ ká tɛ na ɩ ́ ləsɩ ɩsɔtɔnʋɣʋ kʋfalʋɣʋ na tɛtʋ kʋfatʋ , na tampana tike ká wɛnna pə taa . Nti tá taŋaa tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: Wherefore , beloved , seeing that ye look for such things , be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace , without spot , and blameless .
text2: Ma taapalaa , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ ká lʋ teu na ɩ ́ lá kʋpama kɛ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa na ɩ ́ taa na ɩsaɣatʋ natələɣɩ mə kiŋ , na mə na - ɩ ɩ ́ ciiki na ɩ ́ taŋ kʋyakʋ ŋkʋ .

text: And account that the longsuffering of our Lord is salvation ; even as our beloved brother Paul also according to the wisdom given unto him hath written unto you ;
text2: Ɩ ́ nyənna Tacaa suulu na ɩ ́ ná , ɩ suulu ɩnɩ ɩ yelina na pə ́ ya mə nyɔɔŋ . Ta taapalʋ kʋpaŋ Pɔɔlɩ ŋmaa - mɛ na ɩ ́ kɛɛsɩ - mɛɣɛ pə tɔm na ləmaɣasɛɛ nna Ɩsɔ ha - ɩ tɔ .

text: As also in all his epistles , speaking in them of these things ; in which are some things hard to be understood , which they that are unlearned and unstable wrest , as they do also the other scriptures , unto their own destruction .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ ɩ ŋmaakɩ ɩ takəlasɩ təna taa kɛ ́ timpi timpi ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ tɔm tənɛ tɔ . Ɩ takəlasɩ taa hʋwɛɛ cɛkənaʋ wɛ katɛ kɛ tiili tiili , ɩlɛna ɩsəkpɛɛtɛɛ nyə ́ ma na mpa pa fɛɩ toŋ tɔ pɛlɛ pa kɛɛkɩ pə hʋwɛɛ . Na ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa kɛɛkɩ Ɩsɔ Tɔm taa tɔmnaa lɛntɩ tɔtɔ . Pa maɣamaɣa pa lepu kɛ pa tɔŋna caaʋ kɛ mpʋ .

text: Ye therefore , beloved , seeing ye know these things before , beware lest ye also , being led away with the error of the wicked , fall from your own stedfastness .
text2: Ma taapalaa , pənɛntɛ mə ɩsɛ kulaa . Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ taa yele na yəlaa asaɣaa kʋpuɣusutu tolisi - mɛ , na pə ́ kɔɔ na timpi ɩ ́ səŋaa təca tɔ pə ́ laɣasɩ - mɛɣɛ lonte .

text: But grow in grace , and in the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ . To him be glory both now and for ever . Amen .
text2: Ama ɩ ́ wɛɛ na ɩ ́ puki lɔlɔ kɛ ́ Tacaa na tá Yatʋ Yesu Kilisiti pɛɛlɛɛ na ɩ nyəm tɔm taa . Pə kpaɣaʋ saŋa haləna tam tɔ , teeli tʋ ntɛ ́ ɩnɩ . Ami .

text: That which was from the beginning , which we have heard , which we have seen with our eyes , which we have looked upon , and our hands have handled , of the Word of life ;
text2: Weesuɣu Tɔm kɛ tə ŋmaa - mɛɣɛ takəlaɣa taa cənɛ . Tɔm ntɩ tɩɩ wɛ kancaalaɣa kɛ ́ , na tə ́ nɩɩ - tɩ , na tə ́ na - tɩ na ta ɩsəpee , na tə ́ nyənɩ - təɣɩ teu , na tá niŋ tokinaa .

text: ( For the life was manifested , and we have seen it , and bear witness , and shew unto you that eternal life , which was with the Father , and was manifested unto us ; )
text2: Waatʋ wei weesuɣu kʋnɛ kʋ kɔma tɔ tə na - kʋ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə heeliɣi - mɛ na tə ́ kpaaləɣɩ - mɛɣɛ weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ kʋ tɔm . Tacaa cɔlɔɣɔ kɩɩ wɛɛ na pə ́ kuli - kʋ na pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - tʋ .

text: That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you , that ye also may have fellowship with us : and truly our fellowship is with the Father , and with his Son Jesus Christ .
text2: Nti tə nawa na tə nɩɩwa tɔɣɔ tá heeliɣi - mɛ tɔtɔ , sɩ ɩ ́ kpɛntəna - tʋɣʋ tá na Tacaa na ɩ Pəyaɣa Yesu Kilisiti ta kpɛntʋɣʋ taa .

text: And these things write we unto you , that your joy may be full .
text2: Tə ŋmaa takəlaɣa sɩ tə ́ heeliɣi - mɛɣɛ tɔm tənɛɣɛ na tá laŋa hʋlʋmɩ teu .

text: This then is the message which we have heard of him , and declare unto you , that God is light , and in him is no darkness at all .
text2: Nti tə nɩɩ Yesu Kilisiti kiŋ na tə ́ heeliɣi - mɛ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ , Ɩsɔ wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ kɔkɔ sɔsɔɣa ŋka ka naa tɔ , na paa səkpɛtiya kaɩ fɛɩ ɩ kiŋ .

text: If we say that we have fellowship with him , and walk in darkness , we lie , and do not the truth :
text2: Ye tə yɔɣɔtəɣɩ sɩ tá na Ɩsɔ tə kpɛntaa na pəyele na tə ́ tɔŋna səkpɛtʋɣʋ taa kɛ ́ tɔntɛ , tə kɛ ́ pɔpɔtʋnaa kɛ tá yɔɣɔtaɣa na tá kʋlapəlɛ pə naalɛ pə taa kɛ ́ .

text: But if we walk in the light , as he is in the light , we have fellowship one with another , and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin .
text2: Ama ye tə tɔŋ tənaŋŋ taa ɩsɩɩ Ɩsɔ maɣamaɣa wɛʋ tənaŋŋ taa tɔ pə kpɛntəɣɩ - tʋɣʋ , na ɩ Pəyaɣa Yesu caləm kpiisiɣi - tʋɣʋ ta ɩsaɣatʋ təna .

text: If we say that we have no sin , we deceive ourselves , and the truth is not in us .
text2: Ye tə yɔɣɔtəɣɩ sɩ tə wɛʋ ɩsəntɔ tɔ tə fɛɩna ɩsaɣatʋ , ta maɣamaɣa kɛ tə puɣusiɣi , na tampana fɛɩ tá kiŋ kɛ paa pəcɔ .

text: If we confess our sins , he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins , and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness .
text2: Ama ye tə heela Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tá ɩsaɣatʋ , tə pəsəɣɩ na tə ́ tʋ - ɩ naani . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ təŋəɣɩ siɣisuɣu kɛ ́ , ɩlɛ ɩ ká hɩɩsɩ tá ɩsaɣatʋ na ɩ ́ kpiisi ta kawalasɩ təna təpaɩpaɩ .

text: If we say that we have not sinned , we make him a liar , and his word is not in us .
text2: Ye tə yɔɣɔtəɣɩ sɩ tə ta la ɩsaɣatʋ , Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ tə yaakɩ pɔpɔtʋ , na tɩɩ mʋɣɩ ɩ tɔm .

text: My little children , these things write I unto you , that ye sin not . And if any man sin , we have an advocate with the Father , Jesus Christ the righteous :
text2: Ma piya , ma ŋmaa - mɛɣɛ tənɛ ɩnəɣɩ sɩ pə ́ la na ɩ ́ taa la ɩsaɣatʋ . Ama ye pə tɩɩ yelaa na nɔɣɔlʋ la ɩsaɣatʋ , ɩlɛ tə wɛna ta tɔm taɣanlʋ kɛ Tacaa kiŋ . Ɩnəɣəlɛ Yesu Kilisiti wei ɩ kɛ ́ tampana təŋlʋ tɔ .

text: And he is the propitiation for our sins : and not for ours only , but also for the sins of the whole world .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Yesu Kilisiti ɩnəɣɩ pa lapa kɔtaɣa sɩ pə ́ taɣanɩ tá ɩsaɣatʋ , na pə taɣa tá tike tá ɩsaɣatʋ , ama na yəlaa təna təpaɩ ɩsaɣatʋ tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: And hereby we do know that we know him , if we keep his commandments .
text2: Ye tə təŋəɣɩ Ɩsɔ kʋheelitu ɩlɛ tɩɩ cɛkəna sɩ tampana tə nyəmá Ɩsɔ .

text: He that saith , I know him , and keepeth not his commandments , is a liar , and the truth is not in him .
text2: Ye nɔɣɔlʋ tɔma sɩ ɩ nyəmá Ɩsɔ , na pəyele pʋntʋ ɩɩ təŋəɣɩ ɩ kʋheelitu , pʋntʋ kɛ ́ pɔpɔtʋ kɛ ́ , na tampana fɛɩ ɩ kiŋ .

text: But whoso keepeth his word , in him verily is the love of God perfected : hereby know we that we are in him .
text2: Ama wei ɩ təŋəɣɩ Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɔ pʋntʋ sɔɔləna Ɩsɔ na tampana təkpataa . Mpi pə yeki na tə nyəŋ sɩ tá na Ɩsɔ tə kpɛntaa yaa tə ta kpɛntɩ tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk , even as he walked .
text2: Ye wei ɩ yɔɣɔtaa sɩ ɩ ́ na Ɩsɔ pa kpɛntaa , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ tɔ tɔntɛ nte Yesu ka tɔma tɔ .

text: Brethren , I write no new commandment unto you , but an old commandment which ye had from the beginning . The old commandment is the word which ye have heard from the beginning .
text2: Ma taapalaa , pə taɣa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kʋfatʋ natələɣɩ ma ŋmaa takəlaɣa sɩ ma heeliɣi - mɛ . Ama kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kʋpəntʋ nti pə heela - mɛɣɛ hatuu kancaalaɣa tɔɣɔ . Na kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kʋpəntʋ ntəɣəlɛ tɔm nti ɩ ́ tɛma nɩɩʋ tɔ .

text: Again , a new commandment I write unto you , which thing is true in him and in you : because the darkness is past , and the true light now shineth .
text2: Paa na mpʋ pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kʋfatʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma ŋmaa - mɛɣɛ takəlaɣa , pə hʋla tə tampana kɛ Kilisiti kiŋ na mə kiŋ tɔtɔ . Səkpɛtʋɣʋ kɛɛlaa na tampana kɔkɔ tɛma naʋ tənyaɩɩ .

text: He that saith he is in the light , and hateth his brother , is in darkness even until now .
text2: Ye wei ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ sɩ ɩ wɛ tənaŋŋ taa na pəyele ɩ taa kpaana ɩ yʋlʋtʋɣʋntəlɛ , səkpɛtʋɣʋ ta cɛta pʋntʋ tɔɔ se .

text: He that loveth his brother abideth in the light , and there is none occasion of stumbling in him .
text2: Ama ye wei ɩ sɔɔləɣɩ ɩ yʋlʋtɔɣɔntəlɛ , pʋntʋ wɛnna tənaŋŋ taa , na pʋlʋ mpi pɩɩ pəsɩ na pə ́ tusi lɛlʋ na ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ lá ɩsaɣatʋ tɔ pə fɛɩ ɩ kiŋ .

text: But he that hateth his brother is in darkness , and walketh in darkness , and knoweth not whither he goeth , because that darkness hath blinded his eyes .
text2: Ama səkpɛtʋɣʋ nyaləna wei ɩnɩ ɩ taa kpaana ɩ yʋlʋtɔɣɔntəlɛ tɔ ɩ tɔɔ . Kʋ taa kɛ ́ ɩ tɔŋ , ɩ ta cɛkəna ɩ təpote . Mpi tɔ , səkpɛtʋɣʋ yʋlʋsa ɩ ɩsɛ tɔ se .

text: I write unto you , little children , because your sins are forgiven you for his name ' s sake .
text2: Ma piya , pə hɩɩsa mə ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ Kilisiti tɔɔ tɔɣɔ ma ŋmaa takəlaɣa na má heeliɣi - mɛ .

text: I write unto you , fathers , because ye have known him that is from the beginning . I write unto you , young men , because ye have overcome the wicked one . I write unto you , little children , because ye have known the Father .
text2: Caanaa mɛ mə nyəmna wei ɩ ka wɛ hatuu kancaalaɣa tɔ , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma ŋmaa takəlaɣa sɩ má heeliɣi - mɛ . Ɩfepiya mɛ , mə kəla Ɩsaɣaʋ tɔɣɔ ma ŋmaa takəlaɣa sɩ má heeliɣi - mɛ .

text: I have written unto you , fathers , because ye have known him that is from the beginning . I have written unto you , young men , because ye are strong , and the word of God abideth in you , and ye have overcome the wicked one .
text2: Piya , mə nyəmá Tacaa tɔɣɔ ma ŋmaa takəlaɣa na má heeliɣi - mɛ . Caanaa mɛ , mə nyəmá wei ɩ ka wɛ hatuu pə kancaalaɣa tɔ , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma ŋmaa takəlaɣa na má heeliɣi - mɛ . Ɩfepiya , mə wɛnna toma , na Ɩsɔ Tɔm cakɩ mə taa , na ɩ ́ kəla Ɩsaɣaʋ , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma ŋmaa - mɛɣɛ takəlaɣa .

text: Love not the world , neither the things that are in the world . If any man love the world , the love of the Father is not in him .
text2: Ɩ ́ taa sɔɔlɩ antulinya , paa mpi pə tɩɩ kɛ ́ antulinya nyəm maɣamaɣa tɔ , ɩ ́ taa sɔɔlɩ . Ye nɔɣɔlʋ sɔɔla antulinya , pʋntʋ ta sɔɔlɩ Tacaa tɔtɔ .

text: For all that is in the world , the lust of the flesh , and the lust of the eyes , and the pride of life , is not of the Father , but is of the world .
text2: Pə təna mpi pə kɛ ́ antulinya nyəm tɔɣɔlɔ , yʋlʋ tɔnʋɣʋ kʋnyɩɩləŋ ɩsaɣaŋ , na yʋlʋ naakʋɣʋ pʋlʋ na pə ɩsəsɛɛmlɛ kpa - ɩ tɔ , pə taɣa Tacaa kiŋ kɛ pə lɩɩnaa .

text: And the world passeth away , and the lust thereof : but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever .
text2: Antulinya na pə təna mpi yəlaa naakɩ ɩ taa na pá nyɩɩləɣɩ tɔ pə tɔŋna tɛm kɛ ́ . Ama wei ɩ lakɩ Ɩsɔ luɣu nyəntʋ tɔ pʋntʋ cakəna tam .

text: Little children , it is the last time : and as ye have heard that antichrist shall come , even now are there many antichrists ; whereby we know that it is the last time .
text2: Ma piya , antulinya tɛm wʋsaa kɛ ́ . Ɩ ́ tɛma nɩɩʋ sɩ Kilisiti kolontu ka lɩɩ . Tɔʋ , kaɣana ɩ kolontunaa mpɛ pa lɩɩ paɣalɛ kɛ ́ tənyɔɔ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ tə nyəmnaa sɩ pə wʋsa tɛm kɛ ́ .

text: They went out from us , but they were not of us ; for if they had been of us , they would no doubt have continued with us : but they went out , that they might be made manifest that they were not all of us .
text2: Yəlaa panɛ pa taa kɛ ́ ta nyə ́ ma na tampana se , pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa lɩɩ tá taa . Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mɛɛ , ye paa kɛ ́ tá nyə ́ ma , pa taa lɩɩ tá taa se . Ama pa lɩɩ ta taa kɛ ́ sɩ pə ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ teu sɩ pa taa nɔɣɔlʋ taa kɛ ́ tá nyəŋ na tampana .

text: But ye have an unction from the Holy One , and ye know all things .
text2: Ye mɛ ɩlɛ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ wei Kilisiti tisa paa mə taa wei ɩ tɔɔ tɔ ɩnəɣɩ ɩ ́ hikaa , na mpʋ pə yelina mə təna ɩ ́ nyəmá tampana .

text: I have not written unto you because ye know not the truth , but because ye know it , and that no lie is of the truth .
text2: Ye mpʋ pə taɣa ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ tá nyɩ tampana tɔɣɔ ma ŋmaa - mɛ sɩ má heeliɣi - mɛ . Ama ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ nyəma - yɛ , na ɩ ́ nyəmá tɔtɔ sɩ pɔpɔtʋ natəlɩ tə fɛɩ tampana taa tɔ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: Who is a liar but he that denieth that Jesus is the Christ ? He is antichrist , that denieth the Father and the Son .
text2: Aweɣelɛ pɔpɔtʋ ɩlɛ ? Wei ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ təfoo sɩ Yesu tá kɛ ́ Kilisiti tɔ pʋntʋ ntɛ ́ pɔpɔtʋ . Na ɩnəɣəlɛ Kilisiti kolontu . Pʋntʋ kpɛŋna Tacaa na ɩ Pəyaɣa kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ kisi .

text: Whosoever denieth the Son , the same hath not the Father : ( but ) he that acknowledgeth the Son hath the Father also .
text2: Ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mɛɛ , ye wei ɩ ́ kisa Pəyaɣa , pʋntʋ kisa Tacaa tɔtɔɣɔ . Na ye wei ɩ ́ nyəmá Pəyaɣa , pʋntʋ nyəmá Tacaa tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: Let that therefore abide in you , which ye have heard from the beginning . If that which ye have heard from the beginning shall remain in you , ye also shall continue in the Son , and in the Father .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ́ ká la kookalɩ na ɩ ́ tɔkɩ tɔm nti ɩ nɩɩ hatuu kancaalaɣa tɔɣɔ mə taa kɛ ́ teu . Ye ɩ tɔka wenti ɩ ́ nɩɩ kancaalaɣa tɔɣɔ mə taa ɩlɛ mə na Pəyaɣa na Tacaa ɩ ́ ká kpɛntɩ na ɩ ́ caɣa mpʋ .

text: And this is the promise that he hath promised us , even eternal life .
text2: Kilisiti tɔma sɩ ɩ ká ha - tʋɣʋ mpi tɔɣɔlɛ weesuɣu ŋku kʋ kaa tɛ ́ tɔ .

text: These things have I written unto you concerning them that seduce you .
text2: Mpa pa pɛɛkəɣɩ sɩ pá puɣusi - mɛ tɔ , pa tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma ŋmaa - mɛɣɛ tənɛ ɩnɩ sɩ má heeliɣi - mɛ .

text: But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you , and ye need not that any man teach you : but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things , and is truth , and is no lie , and even as it hath taught you , ye shall abide in him .
text2: Ye mɛ ɩlɛ Kilisiti tisa ɩ Feesuɣu kɛ mə tɔɔ kɛ ́ . Na ɩ Feesuɣu wɛʋ mə kiŋ tɔ nɔɣɔlʋ ɩɩ nɔkəɣɩ - mɛɣɛ natələɣɩ hʋ ́ lʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tɔtɔ . Feesuɣu hʋləɣəna - mɛɣɛ pə təna na tampana kɛ kʋ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ , kɩɩ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ pɔpɔtʋ . Pə tɔɔ ɩlɛ ɩ ́ təŋ Feesuɣu kʋsɛɣɛsətʋ na mə na Kilisiti ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ mpʋ .

text: And now , little children , abide in him ; that , when he shall appear , we may have confidence , and not be ashamed before him at his coming .
text2: Nn ma piya , mə na Kilisiti ɩ ́ kpɛntɩ na ɩ ́ caɣa mpʋ , na tɩɩ tʋ - ɩ naani kɛ ́ waatʋ wei ɩ ka lɩɩ tɔ , tə kaa kuu fɛɛlɛ kɛ ɩ ɩsɛntaa kɛ ́ kʋyaŋku ɩ ká kɔɔ tɔ .

text: If ye know that he is righteous , ye know that every one that doeth righteousness is born of him .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyəmá teu sɩ siɣisuɣu kɛ Kilisiti ná təŋəɣɩ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ ɩ ́ ká nyɩ sɩ yəlaa təna mpa pa təŋəɣɩ siɣisuɣu tɔ pa kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ piya kɛ ́ .

text: Behold , what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us , that we should be called the sons of God : therefore the world knoweth us not , because it knew him not .
text2: Ɩ ́ nyənɩ ɩsəna mpi Tacaa sɔɔla - tʋ tɔ ɩ paasaa kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ sɔɔlɩ - tʋ na halɩ pá yaa - tʋ sɩ ɩ piya , na tə tɩɩ kɛ ́ ɩ piya nsəɣɩ . Ɩ ́ tá ná mpi pə tɔɔ antulinya nyə ́ ma ta nyɩ - tʋ tɔɣɔlɛ . Pa taa nyɩ Ɩsɔ tɔɣɔ pa ta nyɩ tá .

text: Beloved , now are we the sons of God , and it doth not yet appear what we shall be : but we know that , when he shall appear , we shall be like him ; for we shall see him as he is .
text2: Ma taapalaa , kaɣana tə kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ piya kɛ ́ , ɩlɛ pə ta kulita ɩsəna tɩɩ tɛ na tə ́ wɛɛ tɔ pə tɔɔ təkeelee na pə ́ cɔ ́ . Paa na mpʋ tə nyəmá sɩ Kilisiti kɔŋ na ɩ ́ lɩɩ tɔ tɩɩ nəɣəsəna - ɩ kɛ ́ , mpi tɔ tɩɩ ná ɩ wɛɛtʋ .

text: And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself , even as he is pure .
text2: Yəlaa təna mpa pa tɛɛləɣɩ Kilisiti kɛ mpʋ tɔ pá taɣanəɣɩ pa təɣɩ na pá lá kʋpama ɩsɩɩ Yesu Kilisiti kɛʋ kʋpaŋ tɔ .

text: Whosoever committeth sin transgresseth also the law : for sin is the transgression of the law .
text2: Yəlaa təna mpa pa lakɩ ɩsaɣatʋ tɔ Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kɛ pa kpɛɛsəɣəna . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ kɛna kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kpɛɛsənaʋ .

text: And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins ; and in him is no sin .
text2: Na ɩ ́ nyəmá teu sɩ Yesu Kilisiti kɔmaɣa sɩ ɩ ləsəɣɩ yəlaa ɩsaɣatʋ na ɩ ́ lɔ . Ɩ maɣamaɣa ɩ fɛɩna ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ paa pəcɔ .

text: Whosoever abideth in him sinneth not : whosoever sinneth hath not seen him , neither known him .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ye ɩ na wei pa kpɛntaa , pə cɛpa pʋntʋ na ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ kɛ ́ . Ama ye wei ɩ wɛɛ na ɩ ́ tɔŋna ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ , ɩ ta na Yesu na ɩ ta tɩɩ nyəmɩ - ɩ .

text: Little children , let no man deceive you : he that doeth righteousness is righteous , even as he is righteous .
text2: Ma piya ɩ ́ taa yele na nɔɣɔlʋ puɣusi - mɛ . Ye wei ɩ təŋəɣɩ tampana , pʋntʋ maɣamaɣa kɛ ́ tampana tʋ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ Yesu Kilisiti .

text: He that committeth sin is of the devil ; for the devil sinneth from the beginning . For this purpose the Son of God was manifested , that he might destroy the works of the devil .
text2: Ye wei ɩ wɛɛ na ɩ ́ tɔŋna ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ , ɩlɔɣɔʋ tənna pʋntʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ ɩlɔɣɔʋ lapəna ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ hatuu kancaalaɣa . Pə maɣamaɣa pə tɔɔ təkpem kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa kɔma sɩ ka wakələɣɩ ɩlɔɣɔʋ təma tənaŋnaŋ .

text: Whosoever is born of God doth not commit sin ; for his seed remaineth in him : and he cannot sin , because he is born of God .
text2: Wei ɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ pəyaɣa tɔ pə cɛpa - ɩ na ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩ ta kɛ sətʋ tɔtɔ , ɩ tɛma weesuɣu tʋ kɛ pəsʋɣʋ kɛ ́ . Na Ɩsɔ kɛlɛ ɩ Caa , ɩlɛ ɩ kaa pəsɩ na ɩ ́ tɔŋna ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ .

text: In this the children of God are manifest , and the children of the devil : whosoever doeth not righteousness is not of God , neither he that loveth not his brother .
text2: Ɩɩ naa mpi pə yeki na pá nyəŋ Ɩsɔ piya na ɩlɔɣɔʋ nyənsɩ tɔɣɔlɔ . Wei ɩɩ təŋəɣɩ tampana yaa ɩɩ sɔɔləɣɩ ɩ yʋlʋɣɔɣɔntəlɛ tɔ ɩ ta kɛ Ɩsɔ pəyaɣa .

text: For this is the message that ye heard from the beginning , that we should love one another .
text2: Nti ɩ ́ nɩɩwa hatuu kancaalaɣa tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ tə ́ sɔɔləɣɩ tá təma .

text: Not as Cain , who was of that wicked one , and slew his brother . And wherefore slew he him ? Because his own works were evil , and his brother ' s righteous .
text2: Pə fɛɩ sɩ tə ́ la ɩsɩɩ Kayini ka lapʋ tɔ , ɩ ka kɛ ́ Ɩsaɣaʋ nyəŋ kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ kʋ ́ ɩ neu . Na pepe tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ tɩɩ kʋ - ɩ tɔ ? Ɩ neu lakaɣa kʋsiɣisim na ɩnɩ ɩ lakaɣa ɩsaɣam tɔ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ .

text: Marvel not , my brethren , if the world hate you .
text2: Apalaa mɛ , ye antulinya yəlaa taa kpaana - mɛ , təlɛ tə taa la - mɛɣɛ piti .

text: We know that we have passed from death unto life , because we love the brethren . He that loveth not his brother abideth in death .
text2: Tə nyəmá sɩ tə lɩɩ təsətɛ kɛ ́ na tə ́ sʋʋ weesuɣu təhikile . Tə sɔɔla ta yʋlʋtɔɣɔntəlɛnaa tɔɣɔ tə nyəmá mpʋ . Wei ɩɩ sɔɔləɣɩ ɩ lɛlʋ tɔ ɩ wɛ səm taa kɛ ́ , ɩ ta lɩɩta .

text: Whosoever hateth his brother is a murderer : and ye know that no murderer hath eternal life abiding in him .
text2: Yʋlʋ wei ɩ taa kpaana ɩ yʋlʋtɔɣɔntəlɛ tɔ ɩ kɛ ́ yʋlʋkʋlʋ kɛ ́ , na mə nyəmá sɩ yʋlʋkʋlʋ fɛɩna weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ .

text: Hereby perceive we the love of God , because he laid down his life for us : and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren .
text2: Tá tɔɔ kɛ ́ Yesu Kilisiti lɔ ɩ weesuɣu . Mpi tá nyəmá sɩ yʋlʋ sɔɔla ɩ lɛlʋ tɔɣɔlɛ . Ye mpʋ pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ taa lɔ tá weesiŋ kɛ ta tɔɣɔntəlɛnaa tɔɔ .

text: But whoso hath this world ' s good , and seeth his brother have need , and shutteth up his bowels of compassion from him , how dwelleth the love of God in him ?
text2: Ye yʋlʋ wɛna kɛlɛ , ɩlɛna ɩ ́ ná pə caala ɩ yʋlʋtɔɣɔntəlɛ na ɩ ́ ta toosi ɩ tɔm sɩ pʋlʋ , wɛɛntʋ ɩnɩ ɩ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ tɔ sɩ ɩ sɔɔla Ɩsɔ kɛlɛ ?

text: My little children , let us not love in word , neither in tongue ; but in deed and in truth .
text2: Ma piya tə taa makɩ nɔɔsɩ taa kɛ ́ yem kɛ ́ tá təma sɔɔlʋɣʋ tɔm . Ama tá lakasɩ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ tɔtɔ sɩ tə sɔɔla təma na tampana .

text: And hereby we know that we are of the truth , and shall assure our hearts before him .
text2: Mpi pɩɩ yele na tə ́ nyɩ sɩ tampana kɛ tə təŋəɣɩ tɔɣɔlɛ . Pɩɩ yele na tə ́ wɛɛna naani kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa .

text: For if our heart condemn us , God is greater than our heart , and knoweth all things .
text2: Ye pə heeliɣi - tʋɣʋ hatuu tá lotu taa sɩ tə fɛɩ teu , tə nyəmá sɩ Ɩsɔ kəla tá lotu taa nyəntʋ tənaɣa tɔɔʋ na ɩ nyəmá pə təna təpaɩ .

text: Beloved , if our heart condemn us not , then have we confidence toward God .
text2: Ma taapalaa pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ye pə ta heeli - tʋɣʋ natələɣɩ hatuu tá lotu taa , tə kaa nya Ɩsɔ ɩsɛntaa kɛlɛ paa pəcɔ .

text: And whatsoever we ask , we receive of him , because we keep his commandments , and do those things that are pleasing in his sight .
text2: Tə təŋəɣɩ ɩ kʋheelitu na tə ́ lakɩ mpi ɩ caa tɔ pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ɩ ha - tʋɣʋ pə təna mpi tə sələməɣɩ - ɩ tɔ .

text: And this is his commandment , That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ , and love one another , as he gave us commandment .
text2: Nti ɩ tʋ - tʋ tɔɣɔlɛ ɩ Pəyaɣa Yesu Kilisiti tɔm mʋɣʋ na sɩ tə ́ sɔɔləɣɩ ta təma ɩsɩɩ Kilisiti tʋ - tʋ sɩ tə ́ lakɩ tɔ .

text: And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him , and he in him . And hereby we know that he abideth in us , by the Spirit which he hath given us .
text2: Ye wei ɩ təŋəɣɩ Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ pʋntʋ kpɛntəna Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ na Ɩsɔ wɛ pʋntʋ waalɩ . Ɩsɔ ha - tʋɣʋ ɩ Feesuɣu tɔɣɔ tə nyəmá sɩ Ɩsɔ wɛ tá waalɩ .

text: Beloved , believe not every spirit , but try the spirits whether they are of God : because many false prophets are gone out into the world .
text2: Ma taapalaa , nyɛntɛ yəlaa mpa sɩ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu tii mpɛ pa tɔɔ tɔ ɩ ́ taa mʋɣɩ pa təna pa tɔm kɛ yem . Ɩ ́ tɛɛ pa waalɩ na ɩ ́ ná sɩ feesuɣu ŋkʋ kʋ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ nyəŋkʋ yaa ŋku . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa pɔpɔtʋnaa kʋpiŋ yana na antulinya .

text: Hereby know ye the Spirit of God : Every spirit that confesseth that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God :
text2: Ɩsəna ɩ ́ ká nyəna sɩ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu nyə ́ ma tɔɣɔlɔ , ye wei ɩ tɔŋ sɩ Yesu Kilisiti pəsa yʋlʋ na tampana ɩlɛ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu tʋ ntɛ ́ .

text: And every spirit that confesseth not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God : and this is that spirit of antichrist , whereof ye have heard that it should come ; and even now already is it in the world .
text2: Ama wei ɩɩ tisiɣi sɩ Yesu pəsa yʋlʋ na tampana tɔ Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu fɛɩ ɩ kiŋ . Kilisiti kolontu nyəŋkʋ tʋ ntɛ ́ pʋntʋ . Ɩ ́ ká nɩɩwa sɩ ɩ ká kɔɔ tɔ , ɩ tɛma kɔntɛ kɛ antulinya taa .

text: Ye are of God , little children , and have overcome them : because greater is he that is in you , than he that is in the world .
text2: Ama ma piya mɛ mə kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ nyə ́ ma kɛ ́ na ɩ ́ kəla Ɩsɔ kʋyɔɣɔtʋtʋ tɛləsəlaa pɔpɔtʋnaa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Feesuɣu ŋku kʋ wɛ mə kiŋ tɔ kʋ kəla feesuɣu ŋku kʋ wɛ antulinya nyə ́ ma kiŋ tɔ .

text: They are of the world : therefore speak they of the world , and the world heareth them .
text2: Antulinya yɔɣɔtaɣa kɛ pa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ , na antulinya nyə ́ ma nɩɩkɩ pa tɔm kɛ pa kɛ ́ antulinya nyə ́ ma tɔ pə tɔɔ .

text: We are of God : he that knoweth God heareth us ; he that is not of God heareth not us . Hereby know we the spirit of truth , and the spirit of error .
text2: Ama tá ɩlɛ , Ɩsɔ tənna tá . Na wei ɩ nyəmá Ɩsɔ tɔ ɩnɩ ɩ nɩɩkəna tá tɔm , wei ɩ ta kɛ Ɩsɔ nyəŋ tɔ ɩɩ nɩɩkɩ tá tɔm . Mpi pɩɩ yele na tə ́ nyəŋ tampana Feesuɣu na feesuɣu ŋku kʋ tolisiɣi yəlaa tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: Beloved , let us love one another : for love is of God ; and every one that loveth is born of God , and knoweth God .
text2: Ma taapalaa , ɩ ́ yele na tə ́ sɔɔləɣɩ təma , pə taɣa pʋlʋ Ɩsɔ kiŋ kɛ sɔɔlʋɣʋ lɩɩnaa . Na wei ɩ sɔɔləɣɩ ɩ yʋlʋtɔɣɔntəlɛ tɔɣɔlɛ Ɩsɔ pəyaɣa na pʋntʋ nyəmá Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ .

text: He that loveth not knoweth not God ; for God is love .
text2: Ama wei ɩɩ sɔɔləɣɩ ɩ yʋlʋtɔɣɔntəlɛ tɔ , pʋntʋ ta nyɩ Ɩsɔ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ Ɩsɔ ná kɛ ́ sɔɔlʋɣʋ tɔ se .

text: In this was manifested the love of God toward us , because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world , that we might live through him .
text2: Ɩsɔ tilina ɩ Pəyaɣa ɩkpamlɛ kɛ antulinya taa sɩ tə ́ ná weesuɣu kɛ ka tɔɔ . Tɔʋ , mpi Ɩsɔ hʋlənaa sɩ ɩ sɔɔla - tʋ tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: Herein is love , not that we loved God , but that he loved us , and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins .
text2: Na ɩsəna pə hʋlaa sɩ sɔɔlʋɣʋ tɔm təkpem tɔɣɔlɛ timpi tá tá sɔɔlɩ Ɩsɔ na ɩnɩ ɩ sɔɔlɩ - tʋ na ɩ ́ tili ɩ Pəyaɣa sɩ pə ́ hɩɩsɩ tá ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ ka tɔɔ tɔ .

text: Beloved , if God so loved us , we ought also to love one another .
text2: Ma taapalaa , Ɩsɔ ná tá kisi - tʋɣʋ mpʋɣʋlɛ sɔɔlʋɣʋ , ɩlɛ pə wɛɛ kɛ ́ sɩ tá tɔtɔ taa sɔɔləɣɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tá təma .

text: No man hath seen God at any time . If we love one another , God dwelleth in us , and his love is perfected in us .
text2: Nɔɣɔlʋ ta keesita Ɩsɔ se . Ama ye tə sɔɔləɣɩ tá təma , Ɩsɔ wɛ tá waalɩ kɛ ́ na ɩ sɔɔlʋɣʋ naa tá kiŋ təkelekele .

text: Hereby know we that we dwell in him , and he in us , because he hath given us of his Spirit .
text2: Ɩsɔ ha - tʋɣʋ ɩ Feesuɣu tɔɣɔ tə nyəmá sɩ tə kpɛntəna - ɩ na ɩ wɛ tá waalɩ .

text: And we have seen and do testify that the Father sent the Son to be the Saviour of the world .
text2: Tə nana ta ɩsəlɛ kɛ ́ na tə ́ heeliɣi təfoo sɩ Tacaa tila ɩ Pəyaɣa sɩ ká la antulinya Yatʋ .

text: Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God , God dwelleth in him , and he in God .
text2: Ye wei ɩ yɔɣɔtəɣɩ sɩ Yesu kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ , Ɩsɔ wɛ ɩ waalɩ kɛ ́ na pʋntʋ kpɛntəna - ɩ .

text: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us . God is love ; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God , and God in him .
text2: Sɔɔlʋɣʋ mpi Ɩsɔ sɔɔla - tʋ tɔ tə nyəma - wɩ , na tə tɛma - wɩ na tá taa . Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ sɔɔlʋɣʋ tʋ kɛ ́ , ɩlɛ ye wei ɩ sɔɔləɣɩ ɩ lɛlʋ , pʋntʋ nyəmá Ɩsɔ na Ɩsɔ wɛ ɩ waalɩ .

text: Herein is our love made perfect , that we may have boldness in the day of judgment : because as he is , so are we in this world .
text2: Mpi pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ sɩ ta təma sɔɔlʋɣʋ tɩɩ fɛɩ pá yɔɣɔtɩ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ tə kaa nyana pʋlʋɣʋ paa pəcɔɣɔ Ɩsɔ hʋʋlɛ ńtɛ ́ tə wule . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ɩsəna Yesu Kilisiti tɔma antulinya taa tɔ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ tá tɔma .

text: There is no fear in love ; but perfect love casteth out fear : because fear hath torment . He that feareth is not made perfect in love .
text2: Sɔɣɔntʋ sɔɔlʋɣʋ ta kɛ sɔɔlʋɣʋ . Ama sɔɔlʋɣʋ mpi pə kɛ ́ tampana nyəm tɔ pə yasəɣɩ sɔɣɔntʋ kɛ ́ . Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ sɔɣɔntʋ sɔɔlʋɣʋ ta kɛ sɔɔlʋɣʋ kʋpaŋkʋ nakʋlɩ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , saləka kɔŋna na sɔɣɔntʋ .

text: We love him , because he first loved us .
text2: Ye tá , Ɩsɔ laaləna - tʋɣʋ sɔɔlʋɣʋ ɩlɛna taa sɔɔlɩ - ɩ .

text: If a man say , I love God , and hateth his brother , he is a liar : for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen , how can he love God whom he hath not seen ?
text2: Ye nɔɣɔlʋ nɔɣɔ taa lɩɩwa sɩ : Ma sɔɔla Ɩsɔ . Ama ye ɩ yʋlʋtɔɣɔntəlɛ , ɩɩ sɔɔləɣɩ ɩ ́ lɛ ́ , pʋntʋ kɛ ́ pɔpɔtʋ kɛ ́ . Ye ɩ ta sɔɔlɩ ɩ yʋlʋtɔɣɔntəlɛ wei ɩ naakɩ tɔ ɩsənaɣa ɩ ká sɔɔlɩ Ɩsɔ wei ɩɩ naakɩ tɔ ?

text: And this commandment have we from him , That he who loveth God love his brother also .
text2: Kʋsəsɩɩtʋ nti Kilisiti tʋ - tʋ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Pə wɛɛ sɩ ye wei ɩ sɔɔla Ɩsɔ , pʋntʋ ɩ ́ sɔɔlɩ ɩ yʋlʋtɔɣɔntəlɛ tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: Whosoever believeth that Jesus is the Christ is born of God : and every one that loveth him that begat loveth him also that is begotten of him .
text2: Yʋlʋ wei ɩ tɛma ɩ taa sɩ Yesu kɛlɛ Kilisiti tɔ , pʋntʋ kɛna Ɩsɔ pəyaɣa , na ye wei ɩ sɔɔla piya caa , pʋntʋ sɔɔla piya tɔtɔɣɔ .

text: By this we know that we love the children of God , when we love God , and keep his commandments .
text2: Tə sɔɔlʋɣʋ Ɩsɔ na tə ́ lakɩ ɩ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔɣɔ tə nyəmá sɩ tə sɔɔla ɩ piya .

text: For this is the love of God , that we keep his commandments : and his commandments are not grievous .
text2: Tə təŋəɣɩ Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔɣɔ pə hʋ ́ lə ́ ɣɩ ́ sɩ tə sɔɔla Ɩsɔ . Na Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ ta kəlɩ - tʋɣʋ katɛ .

text: For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world : and this is the victory that overcometh the world , even our faith .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ paa Ɩsɔ pəyaɣa ŋka ká pəsəɣɩ na ká kəlɩ antulinya kɛ ́ . Tə tɛma Ɩsɔ na ta taa tɔɣɔ tə kəla antulinya .

text: Who is he that overcometh the world , but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God ?
text2: Awe pəsəɣəna na ɩ ́ kəlɩ antulinya , ye pə taɣa wei ɩ ́ tɛŋ ɩ taa sɩ : Yesu kɛlɛ Ɩsɔ Pəyalʋ tɔ ɩ paasi ?

text: This is he that came by water and blood , even Jesus Christ ; not by water only , but by water and blood . And it is the Spirit that beareth witness , because the Spirit is truth .
text2: Yesu Kilisiti kɛlɛ wei ɩ kɔmna lʋm na caləm tɔ . Pə taɣa lʋm tike kɛ ɩ kɔmnaa , ama na caləm tɔtɔɣɔ . Na Feesuɣu ləsəɣəna seliya sɩ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ Feesuɣu kɛna tampana tʋ .

text: For there are three that bear record in heaven , the Father , the Word , and the Holy Ghost : and these three are one .
text2: Seliya nyəm wɛ tɔm tooso kɛ ́ .

text: And there are three that bear witness in earth , the spirit , and the water , and the blood : and these three agree in one .
text2: Feesuɣu na lʋm na caləm , na pə təna pə tooso ɩsəntɔ ɩɩ kpɛɛsəɣəna təma .

text: If we receive the witness of men , the witness of God is greater : for this is the witness of God which he hath testified of his Son .
text2: Ye yəlaa ləsəɣɩ seliya tə mʋɣɩ . Tɔʋ , Ɩsɔ nyəŋ ná kəla yəlaa nyə ́ ma təcaɣacaɣa . Ɩsɔ seliya kɛlɛ wei ɩ ləsa ɩ Pəyaɣa tɔɔ tɔ .

text: He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself : he that believeth not God hath made him a liar ; because he believeth not the record that God gave of his Son .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ wei ɩ tɛŋ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa na ɩ taa tɔ pʋntʋ cɛkənna seliya ɩnɛɣɛ hatuu ɩ taa . Ama ye wei ɩɩ tɛŋ ɩ taa na Ɩsɔ , pʋntʋ yaa Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ pɔpɔtʋ kɛ ́ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , ɩ ta mʋ seliya wei Ɩsɔ ləsa ɩ Pəyaɣa tɔɔ tɔ .

text: And this is the record , that God hath given to us eternal life , and this life is in his Son .
text2: Na seliya wei Ɩsɔ ləsəɣɩ tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ : Ɩ ha - tʋɣʋ weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ , na ɩ Pəyaɣa cɛləna - tʋɣʋ - kʋ .

text: He that hath the Son hath life ; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life .
text2: Ye wei ɩ kpɛntəna Pəyaɣa , ɩ hika weesuɣu kʋnɛ ɩnəɣɩ . Na wei ɩ ta kpɛntəna Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa tɔ pʋntʋ kaa na - kʋ .

text: These things have I written unto you that believe on the name of the Son of God ; that ye may know that ye have eternal life , and that ye may believe on the name of the Son of God .
text2: Ma ŋmaa takəlaɣa na má heeli - mɛɣɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ sɩ mɛ mpa ɩ ́ tɛma mə taa na Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa tɔ ɩ ́ hika weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔɣɔ .

text: And this is the confidence that we have in him , that , if we ask any thing according to his will , he heareth us :
text2: Tə nyəmá sɩ ye tə sələməɣɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ mpi pə kɛ ́ ɩ luɣu nyəm tɔ , ɩ nɩɩkɩ tɔɔ kɛ ́ tá naani tɔɔ sɔsɔm kɛ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: And if we know that he hear us , whatsoever we ask , we know that we have the petitions that we desired of him .
text2: Ɩsəna mpi tə nyəm sɩ ye tə sələməɣɩ - ɩ pʋlʋ ɩ nɩɩkɩ tɔ , mpʋ tɔtɔɣɔ tə nyəmá sɩ ɩ haa - tʋɣʋ mpi tə sələməɣɩ - ɩ tɔ .

text: If any man see his brother sin a sin which is not unto death , he shall ask , and he shall give him life for them that sin not unto death . There is a sin unto death : I do not say that he shall pray for it .
text2: Ye nɔɣɔlʋ nawa ɩ taapalʋ na ɩ ́ lakɩ ɩsaɣatʋ nti tɩɩ kɔŋna səm tɔ , pə wɛɛ sɩ pʋntʋ ɩ ́ sələməna ɩ taapalʋ na Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ , na Ɩsɔ ha - ɩ weesuɣu . Ɩsaɣatʋ nti tɩɩ kɔŋna səm tɔɣɔ ma tɔŋ . Ɩsaɣatʋ nti tə kɔŋna səm tɔ pə taɣa təlɛ tə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma tɔŋ sɩ ɩ ́ sələməna .

text: All unrighteousness is sin : and there is a sin not unto death .
text2: Pə təna mpi pə ta siɣisi tɔ pə kɛ ́ ɩsaɣatʋ kɛ ́ . Ama ɩsaɣatʋ lɛntənaa wɛɛ na tɩɩ kɔŋna səm .

text: We know that whosoever is born of God sinneth not ; but he that is begotten of God keepeth himself , and that wicked one toucheth him not .
text2: Tə nyəmá sɩ Ɩsɔ pəyaɣa nakəlɩ ka kaa wɛɛ na ká tɔŋna ɩsaɣatʋ lapʋ . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , Ɩsɔ pəyaɣa kentina ɩ tɔɔ , na Ɩsaɣaʋ kaa kpaɣa pʋlʋɣʋ ɩ tɔɔ .

text: And we know that we are of God , and the whole world lieth in wickedness .
text2: Tə nyəmá sɩ Ɩsɔ tənna - tʋ , na Ɩsaɣaʋ niŋ taa kɛ ́ antulinya təna ná wɛɛ .

text: And we know that the Son of God is come , and hath given us an understanding , that we may know him that is true , and we are in him that is true , even in his Son Jesus Christ . This is the true God , and eternal life .
text2: Tə nyəmá sɩ Ɩsɔ Pəyaɣa kɔma na ká lá na tə hii laɣatʋ sɩ tə nyɩ tampana Ɩsɔ . Na ta na - ɩ na ɩ Pəyaɣa Yesu Kilisiti tə kpɛntaa na tə ́ wɛɛ mpʋ . Ɩnəɣəlɛ tampana Ɩsɔ , ɩnəɣəlɛ weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔ .

text: Little children , keep yourselves from idols . Amen .
text2: Ma piya , ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na tɩɩŋ .

text: The elder unto the elect lady and her children , whom I love in the truth ; and not I only , but also all they that have known the truth ;
text2: Sɔsɔ ma , má ŋmaakəna takəlaɣa kanɛɣɛ alʋ wei nyá Ɩsɔ ləsaa tɔ , na nyá piya mpa ma sɔɔlaa na tampana tɔ . Pə taɣa ma tike ma sɔɔləna - mɛ , ama pa təna mpa pa nyəmá tampana tɔ pa sɔɔla - mɛɣɛ .

text: For the truth ' s sake , which dwelleth in us , and shall be with us for ever .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , tampana kɛ tə tɔkaa na anəɣɩ tɩɩ tɔkɩ tam .

text: Grace be with you , mercy , and peace , from God the Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ , the Son of the Father , in truth and love .
text2: Tacaa Ɩsɔ na Tacaa ɩnɩ ɩ Pəyalʋ Yesu Kilisiti pá hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - tʋɣʋ pɛɛlɛɛ na suulu na pá ha - tʋɣʋ alaafəya na pə ́ cɔ ́ tə ́ hiki kʋcɔɔŋ ɩnɛɣɛ tampana na sɔɔlʋɣʋ pə taa .

text: I rejoiced greatly that I found of thy children walking in truth , as we have received a commandment from the Father .
text2: Ma laŋlɛ hʋlʋma sɔsɔm kɛ timpi ma nawa nyá piya taa lɛnsɩ tɔka tampana ɩsɩɩ Tacaa tʋ - tʋ sɩ tə ́ tɔkɩ tɔ .

text: And now I beseech thee , lady , not as though I wrote a new commandment unto thee , but that which we had from the beginning , that we love one another .
text2: Ma wiikina - ŋ alʋ nyá , sɩ tə ́ sɔɔlɩ tá təmaɣa . Ɩlɛ pə taɣa kʋsəsɩɩtʋ kʋfatʋ natəlɩ tə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ma ŋmaakɩ . Ama nti pə sɩɩ - tʋɣʋ tuu kancaalaɣa tɔɣɔlɛ .

text: And this is love , that we walk after his commandments . This is the commandment , That , as ye have heard from the beginning , ye should walk in it .
text2: Ɩsɔ kʋsəsɩɩtʋ tɔkʋɣʋ ntɛ ́ sɔɔlʋɣʋ təŋʋɣʋ , na kʋsəsɩɩtʋ nti pə sɩɩ - mɛɣɛ hatuu kancaalaɣa tɔɣɔlɛ sɩ ɩ ́ wɛɛna sɔɔlʋɣʋ .

text: For many deceivers are entered into the world , who confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh . This is a deceiver and an antichrist .
text2: Pɔpɔtʋnaa paɣalɛ yana antulinya kɛ ́ , paa caa pá nɩɩ sɩ Yesu Kilisiti pəsa yʋlʋ tətɛŋɛlɛŋ kɛ tampana . Yʋlʋ wei ɩɩ caa ɩ ́ nɩɩ mpʋ tɔ pʋntʋ kɛ ́ pɔpɔtʋ kɛ ́ , na ɩnəɣəlɛ Kilisiti kolontu .

text: Look to yourselves , that we lose not those things which we have wrought , but that we receive a full reward .
text2: Mpʋ tɔ ɩ ́ la laakalɩ na mə tɩ , ɩ ́ taa yele na mə təmlɛ kawaaɣa le . Pɩɩ tɛ na pə ́ fɛlɩ - mɛɣɛ kʋpantʋ kɛ sɔsɔm .

text: Whosoever transgresseth , and abideth not in the doctrine of Christ , hath not God . He that abideth in the doctrine of Christ , he hath both the Father and the Son .
text2: Ye wei ɩ ́ ŋmaana Kilisiti sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ tɔɔ sɩ kʋ ta maɣa - ɩ , pʋntʋ na Ɩsɔ pa faɣaa kɛ ́ . Ama ye wei ɩ təŋa Kilisiti sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ , pʋntʋ kpɛntəna Tacaa na ɩ Pəyalʋ kɛ ́ .

text: If there come any unto you , and bring not this doctrine , receive him not into your house , neither bid him God speed :
text2: Ye nɔɣɔlʋ kɔma na pə ́ tá kɛ ́ sɛɣɛsʋɣʋ kʋnɛɣɛ ɩ sɛɣɛsəɣɩ , ɩ ́ taa tɛɛ pʋntʋ waalɩ sɩ ɩ ́ sʋʋ mə təyaɣa , na paa sɛɛtʋ maɣamaɣa ɩ ́ taa sɛɛ - ɩ .

text: For he that biddeth him God speed is partaker of his evil deeds .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , ye wei ɩ sɛɛ - ɩ pə wɛ ɩsɩɩ ɩ ́ na pʋntʋ pa pɛɛla nɔɣɔ kɛ ɩsaɣatʋ təma nna ɩ lakɩ tɔ a taa kɛ ́ .

text: Having many things to write unto you , I would not write with paper and ink : but I trust to come unto you , and speak face to face , that our joy may be full .
text2: Tɔm nti ma wɛna sɩ ma heeliɣi - mɛ tɔ tə tɔɔwa , ɩlɛ ma nyɩɩləɣɩ sɩ maa kɔɔ mə tɛɣɛ na má heeli - mɛɣɛ - tɩ na nɔɣɔ na pə ́ ha - tʋɣʋ laŋhʋlʋmlɛ sɔsɔɔlɛ . Ma kaa ŋmaa - təɣɩ kʋŋmaa kɛ takəlaɣa taa na ŋmaalaɣa .

text: The children of thy elect sister greet thee . Amen .
text2: Nyá kɔɣɔ wei Ɩsɔ ləsaa tɔtɔ tɔ , ɩ piya sɛɛkɩ - ŋ .

text: The elder unto the wellbeloved Gaius , whom I love in the truth .
text2: Sɔsɔ má , ma ŋmaakəna takəlaɣa kanɛɣɛ ma yʋlʋ kʋpaŋ Kayusi . Ma sɔɔla - ŋ sɔsɔm kɛ ́ .

text: Beloved , I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health , even as thy soul prospereth .
text2: Ma taapalʋ kʋpaŋ , ma koolee ntɛ ́ sɩ ń caɣana nyá tɩ , na pə ́ ha - ŋ tɔnʋɣʋ taa alaafəya ɩsɩɩ nyá ləsaɣa wɛʋ alaafəya tɔ .

text: For I rejoiced greatly , when the brethren came and testified of the truth that is in thee , even as thou walkest in the truth .
text2: Ta taapalaa tala cənɛ ɩlɛna pá heeli - m sɩ ń tɔka tampana kɛ ́ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ , ɩsɩɩ tuu lɔŋ n ka tɩɩ tɔkʋɣʋ - yɛ tɔ , ɩlɛna ma laŋlɛ hʋlʋmɩ sɔsɔm .

text: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children walk in truth .
text2: Ɩsɩɩ ma nɩɩkʋɣʋ sɩ ma piya təŋəɣɩ tampana tɔ pə wɛ - m leleŋ kɛ ́ pə tɩɩ fɛɩ .

text: Beloved , thou doest faithfully whatsoever thou doest to the brethren , and to strangers ;
text2: Ma taapalʋ kʋpaŋ , paasənaʋ mpi ń paasəna tá taapalaa haləna pə ́ kpɛŋna mʋʋlaa maɣamaɣa tɔ n kɛ ́ yʋlʋ kʋpaŋ kɛ ́ .

text: Which have borne witness of thy charity before the church : whom if thou bring forward on their journey after a godly sort , thou shalt do well :
text2: Yəlaa panɛ pa pʋɣʋla nyá sɔɔlʋɣʋ tɔm kɛ Yesu sɛɛlaa təna ɩsɛntaa . Haɩ , ma wiikina - ŋ sɩ ń nyənɩ Ɩsɔ na ń səna - wɛɣɛ pa mpaaʋ tɔm taa .

text: Because that for his name ' s sake they went forth , taking nothing of the Gentiles .
text2: Kilisiti təmlɛ lapʋ tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa tʋ mpaaʋ , pa ta tisi sɩ mpa pa ta nyɩ Ɩsɔ tɔ pá səna - wɛ .

text: We therefore ought to receive such , that we might be fellowhelpers to the truth .
text2: Pə mʋna Kilisiti təŋlaa ta taa tɔkəna yəlaa ɩsɩɩ panɛ ɩnɩ pa takanaa , na tə ́ tʋ - wɛɣɛ niŋ kɛ tampana təmlɛ nte pa lakɩ tɔ tə taa .

text: I wrote unto the church : but Diotrephes , who loveth to have the preeminence among them , receiveth us not .
text2: Ma ŋmaa Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle kɛ takiliya tənyəʋ , na Tiyotəlɛfɩ wei ɩ pɛɛkəɣɩ sɩ pa nyənəɣɩ - ɩ pa sɔsɔ tɔ ɩ ́ kisi sɩ ɩnɩ ɩ kaa mʋ ma tɔm .

text: Wherefore , if I come , I will remember his deeds which he doeth , prating against us with malicious words : and not content therewith , neither doth he himself receive the brethren , and forbiddeth them that would , and casteth them out of the church .
text2: Pə tɔɔ kɛ ́ ye ma kɔma na má kɔɔ maa kuli ɩsaɣatɔm na pɔpɔtʋ tɔm nti ɩ suu - tʋ tɔ tə tɔɔ na ɩ ́ nɩɩ . Ɩ ta yele ɩ nyəŋ ɩnɩ se . Ta taapalaa mpa pa kɔŋ təna tɔ ɩɩ mʋɣʋ - wɛ . Haləna ye mpa pa caakɩ sɩ pa mʋ - wɛ , ɩ kaləɣəna - wɛɣɛ na ɩ ́ nyaasɩ - wɛ na Yesu sɛɛlaa kpekəle taa tɔɣɔnʋɣʋ .

text: Beloved , follow not that which is evil , but that which is good . He that doeth good is of God : but he that doeth evil hath not seen God .
text2: Ma taapalʋ kʋpaŋ , taa kɛɛna ɩsaɣalatʋ . Ama kɛɛna kʋpantʋ latʋ na ń lakɩ . Ɩsɔ tənna kʋpantʋ latʋ . Ye wei ɩɩ lakɩ kʋpantʋ , pʋntʋ ta nyɩ Ɩsɔ kɛ ́ paa pəcɔɣɔ .

text: Demetrius hath good report of all men , and of the truth itself : yea , and we also bear record ; and ye know that our record is true .
text2: Yəlaa təna pʋɣʋləɣɩ Temetiyusi kʋpantʋ kɛ ́ , na ɩ tampana maɣamaɣa ná ləsəɣɩ ɩ nyɩɩlʋɣʋ tɔtɔ . Ɩnəɣɩ tá tɔtɔ tə kuliɣi kahuka kɛ ɩ kʋpantʋ tɔɔ , na n nyəmá teu sɩ taa yɔɣɔta nti , ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pə wɛɛ .

text: I had many things to write , but I will not with ink and pen write unto thee :
text2: Tɔm nti ma wɛna sɩ ma heeliɣi - ŋ tɔ tə tɔɔwaɣa , ɩlɛ ma kaa nɔkɩ na má ŋmaa - təɣɩ kʋŋmaa kɛ takəlaɣa taa na ŋmaalaɣa .

text: But I trust I shall shortly see thee , and we shall speak face to face . Peace be to thee . Our friends salute thee . Greet the friends by name .
text2: Ama ma nyɩɩləɣɩ sɩ maa kɔɔ na má na - ŋ nɔɔnɔɔ na tə ́ caɣa na tə ́ yɔɣɔtɩ .

text: Jude , the servant of Jesus Christ , and brother of James , to them that are sanctified by God the Father , and preserved in Jesus Christ , and called :
text2: Maɣa Saakɩ neu Yuti , Yesu Kilisiti təmlɛ tʋ . Má ŋmaana takəlaɣa kanɛɣɛ mpa Tacaa Ɩsɔ yaawa na ɩ ́ sɔɔlɩ - wɛ , na Yesu Kilisiti ná tɔka - wɛ tɔ .

text: Mercy unto you , and peace , and love , be multiplied .
text2: Ɩsɔ ɩ ́ hʋlɩ - mɛɣɛ suulu , na ɩ ́ ha - mɛɣɛ alaafəya , na ɩ ́ tʋ - mɛɣɛ təma sɔɔlʋɣʋ na pə ́ tɔɔ sɔsɔm .

text: Beloved , when I gave all diligence to write unto you of the common salvation , it was needful for me to write unto you , and exhort you that ye should earnestly contend for the faith which was once delivered unto the saints .
text2: Ma taapalaa , ma lʋpa teu sɩ nyʋɣʋ yapʋ tɔm nti tə kɛ ́ tá təna tá tɔm tɔ pə tɔm kɛ má ŋmaa - mɛ . Kɛna pə ́ caalɩ - m sɩ má ŋmaa - mɛɣɛ takəlaɣa kanɛ na má sɔɔsɩ - mɛɣɛ apalʋtʋ na ɩ ́ yoo Ɩsɔsɛɛlɛ nte Ɩsɔ ha tɔm kʋlʋm tɔɔ kɛ ́ kpakpaa kɛ mpa ɩ tɩ tɔ pə yoou .

text: For there are certain men crept in unawares , who were before of old ordained to this condemnation , ungodly men , turning the grace of our God into lasciviousness , and denying the only Lord God , and our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Pə taɣa pʋlʋ tɔɔ , yəlaa asaɣaa napəlɩ mpa pa sʋʋwa təkɛʋ kɛ ́ ta taa tɔ , mpɛ pa kɛɛna tá Ɩsɔ pɛɛlɛɛ tɔm na pá kʋsəɣəna pa asilima taa tɔntɛ tɔm nyʋɣʋ , na pá kisiɣi Yesu Kilisiti wei ɩ tike təkoŋ ɩ kɛ Tacaa na ta Sɔsɔ tɔ . Pa tɛma kpaalʋɣʋ kɛ Ɩsɔ Tɔm takəlaɣa taa kɛ ́ hatuu lɔŋ kɛ pa tɔm kʋɣʋ .

text: I will therefore put you in remembrance , though ye once knew this , how that the Lord , having saved the people out of the land of Egypt , afterward destroyed them that believed not .
text2: Paa na ɩ ́ ka tɛma - təɣɩ nyəm təkpataa tɔ , pə wɛɛ sɩ má tasa - mɛɣɛ lɛntɩ tɔɔsʋɣʋ kɛ ɩsəna Tacaa yapa Ɩsɛɣɛlɩ yəlaa kɛ Icipiti taa na pə waalɩ ɩ ́ kʋ mpa pa ta tɛmɩ - ɩ na pa taa tɔ .

text: And the angels which kept not their first estate , but left their own habitation , he hath reserved in everlasting chains under darkness unto the judgment of the great day .
text2: Ɩ ́ tɔɔsɩ sɩ ɩsɔtaa tillaa mpa pa laŋa ta hɛɛna pəsʋɣʋ ŋku pə ha - wɛ sɩ pa lakəna , na pá kʋlɩ na pá yele pa maɣamaɣa pa lona tɔ , Ɩsɔ hɔka - wɛɣɛ alukpala kɛ tam tɔɔ , na ɩ ́ sɩɩ - wɛɣɛ atɛ səkpɛtʋɣʋ taa , na ɩ ́ taŋna kʋyakʋ sɔsɔɔʋ . Kʋ wule kɛ ɩ ká tʋ - wɛɣɛ saləka .

text: Even as Sodom and Gomorrha , and the cities about them in like manner , giving themselves over to fornication , and going after strange flesh , are set forth for an example , suffering the vengeance of eternal fire .
text2: Ɩ ́ tɔɔsɩ sɩ Sɔtɔm na Kɔmɔɔ na acalɛɛ nna a cɔɔna - yɛ tɔ a yəlaa lakaɣa kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ɩsɔtaa tillaa panɛ . Pa lakaɣa asilima kʋlapʋtʋ kɛ ́ . Pa təŋaɣa pa tɔnəŋ kʋnyɩɩləŋ ɩsaɣaŋ wei ɩ fɛɩ lapʋ tɔ . Ɩlɛ kɔkɔ tam nyəŋka ntɛ ́ pa saləka , na mpi pə lapa - wɛɣɛ mpʋ tɔ pə kpaala paa wei kɛ ́ təkelekele .

text: Likewise also these filthy dreamers defile the flesh , despise dominion , and speak evil of dignities .
text2: Yəlaa mpa pa sʋʋwa təkɛʋ kɛ ́ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ mə hɛkʋ tɔ mpʋ pə maɣamaɣa kɛ pɛlɛ pa lakɩ . Pa toosee nna pa toosiɣi na pá təŋəɣɩ mpʋ na pá lakɩ tɔ anɩ a tʋsəɣəna - wɛ na pá wakələɣɩ pa tɩ , na pá footiɣi Ɩsɔ sɔsɔɔntʋ , na pá tʋʋkɩ ɩsɔtaa teeli nyə ́ ma .

text: Yet Michael the archangel , when contending with the devil he disputed about the body of Moses , durst not bring against him a railing accusation , but said , The Lord rebuke thee .
text2: Ɩsɔtaa tillu sɔsɔ Misɛɛlɩ ta la mpʋ . Moisi səpa na Misɛɛlɩ na ɩlɔɣɔʋ pá hɔŋɩ - ɩ na pá yooki tɔ , Misɛɛlɩ ta kuli nɔɣɔ na ɩ ́ kʋ ɩlɔɣɔʋ tɔm na kʋtʋɣʋ . Ama ɩ tɔma - ɩ kɛ ́ sɩ : Tacaa ká nana - ŋ .

text: But these speak evil of those things which they know not : but what they know naturally , as brute beasts , in those things they corrupt themselves .
text2: Yəlaa panɛ , mpi pa ta nyɩ tɔ mpəɣɩ pa tʋʋkɩ . Na mpi pa nyəmá yem kɛ ́ pa tɩ ɩsɩɩ taalɛ wontu maɣamaɣa nyəŋʋɣʋ tɔ , mpɩ pə kʋɣʋna - wɛ təkpataa .

text: Woe unto them ! for they have gone in the way of Cain , and ran greedily after the error of Balaam for reward , and perished in the gainsaying of Core .
text2: Pa tɔm wɛ waɩyo kɛ ́ . Kayini ɩkpatɛ kɛ pa təŋəɣɩ , na pɔɣɔlaɣa tɔɔ kɛ ́ pa tolisa pa tɩ ɩsɩɩ Palaam lapʋ tɔ . Ɩsəna mpi Kolee ná kpɛɛsəna Moisi tɔ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ pa lapa , ɩlɛna pá wakəlɩ tənaŋnaŋ .

text: These are spots in your feasts of charity , when they feast with you , feeding themselves without fear : clouds they are without water , carried about of winds ; trees whose fruit withereth , without fruit , twice dead , plucked up by the roots ;
text2: Ye pa wɛ mə tɔɣɔnasɩ tətɔɣɔlɛ , tusuɣu wɛnna , na tənaɣa pa pəsəɣəna pa acima na fɛɛlɛ tɩɩ fɛɩ - wɛ , hiliŋ haana . Pa wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ tɛʋ piluɣuu na heelim kʋsɩ - kʋ tɔ , na ɩsɩɩ tɩɩŋ wei paa pə tala ɩ lʋlʋɣʋ ɩɩ lʋləɣɩ tɔ , na ɩsɩɩ tɩɩŋ wei pa kpɛsəna ɩ lila na ɩ ́ wʋlɩ yem təwɔkɔkɔ tɔ .

text: Raging waves of the sea , foaming out their own shame ; wandering stars , to whom is reserved the blackness of darkness for ever .
text2: Pa kʋlapʋtʋ lʋləsəɣɩ fɛɛlɛ fɛɩ təma kɛ pa kiŋ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ teŋku hʋla pááná nyəna tɔɔkʋɣʋ kʋhulaŋ tɔ . Pa wɛɛ kɛ ́ ɩsɩɩ ɩsɔtʋlʋŋasɩ kʋkpɛsasɩ . Ɩsɔ tɛma - wɛɣɛ pa təcaɣalɛ caaʋ kɛ səkpɛtiile anaam taa kɛ ́ .

text: And Enoch also , the seventh from Adam , prophesied of these , saying , Behold , the Lord cometh with ten thousands of his saints ,
text2: Atam saalɩ kʋlɛlʋɣʋ naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa nyəŋ ntɛ ́ Henɔkɩ , na ɩnɩ ɩ ka nana yəlaa panɛ pa tɔm kɛ hatuu lɔŋ na ɩ ́ yɔɣɔtɩ sɩ : Ɩ ́ tʋ ŋkpaŋŋ na ɩ ́ nɩɩ . Tacaa ká kɔɔ na ɩ ká kpɛŋna ɩ ɩsɔtaa tillaa naŋŋ nyə ́ ma ɩsɩɩ iyisi naanʋwa ( 10000 ) ,

text: To execute judgment upon all , and to convince all that are ungodly among them of all their ungodly deeds which they have ungodly committed , and of all their hard speeches which ungodly sinners have spoken against him .
text2: sɩ ɩ hʋʋkəna yəlaa tənaɣa tɔm . Ɩ ká kʋ asaɣaa təna mpa pa kpɛɛsəna Ɩsɔ na pá lá təma asaɣɛɛ anɛ a təna tɔ , na ɩsaɣatɔm nti kawalasɩ nyə ́ ma mpa paa see nɔɣɔlʋ tɔ pa tʋ - ɩ tɔ pa tɔm .

text: These are murmurers , complainers , walking after their own lusts ; and their mouth speaketh great swelling words , having men ' s persons in admiration because of advantage .
text2: Yəlaa panɛ , tam kɛ ́ pa kʋntəɣɩ na pá kaləɣɩ . Pa maɣamaɣa pa kʋnyɩɩləŋ kɛ pa təŋəɣɩ . Kalampaanɩ tɔm kɛ pa yɔɣɔtəɣɩ , na mpa pa kiŋ kawaaɣa wɛɛ tɔɣɔ pa taləɣɩ .

text: But , beloved , remember ye the words which were spoken before of the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: Ama ma taapalaa mɛ , mɩɩ tɔɔsɩ nti Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti tillaa heela - mɛɣɛ tuu lɔŋ tɔ .

text: How that they told you there should be mockers in the last time , who should walk after their own ungodly lusts .
text2: Pa heela - mɛɣɛ sɩ : Tampana tɔɔ , kʋyɛɛŋ kʋtɛɛsəŋ taa , yəlaa ká lɩɩ mpa pa təŋəɣɩ pa kʋnyɩɩləŋ ɩsaɣaŋ tɔ , na paa woŋ - mɛ .

text: These be they who separate themselves , sensual , having not the Spirit .
text2: Mpɛ pa yelina na faɣaʋ kɔŋ , pa yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ ŋmakələna - wɛ , pə taɣa Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu .

text: But ye , beloved , building up yourselves on your most holy faith , praying in the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Ama ma taapalaa mɛ , mɩɩ sɔɔsɩ toŋ kɛ mə Ɩsɔ sɛɛʋ kʋpam naŋŋ nyəm taa kɛ ́ tam . Ɩ ́ sələməna Ɩsɔ Feesuɣu Naŋŋtʋ pəsʋɣʋ ,

text: Keep yourselves in the love of God , looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ unto eternal life .
text2: na ɩ ́ səŋ Ɩsɔ sɔɔlʋɣʋ tɔm taa kɛ ́ tam na ɩ ́ taŋaa sɩ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti ɩ ́ ha - mɛɣɛ weesuɣu ŋku kɩɩ tɛŋ tɔɣɔ ɩ kʋpantʋ tɔɔ .

text: And of some have compassion , making a difference :
text2: Sika nyə ́ ma tɔm ɩ ́ la - mɛɣɛ pətɔɔtɛɛ .

text: And others save with fear , pulling them out of the fire ; hating even the garment spotted by the flesh .
text2: Ɩ ́ hɔ - wɛ na ɩ ́ ləsɩ kɔkɔ taa na ɩ ́ ya pa nyɔɔŋ . Lɛlaa tɔm ɩ ́ la - mɛɣɛ pətɔɔtəlɛ tɔtɔ na sɔɣɔntʋ . Ama pə kpaɣaʋ pa wontu nti pa yʋlʋwɛɛtʋ asilima taanaa tɔ ɩ ́ taa tokina .

text: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling , and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy ,
text2: Ɩsɔ pəsəɣɩ na ɩ ́ te - mɛɣɛ təhotile təna taa , na ɩ ́ la na ɩ ́ səŋ ɩ ɩsɛntaa na ɩ ́ fɛɩna kawalaɣa , na laŋhʋlʋmlɛ kʋɣɩ - mɛ .

text: To the only wise God our Saviour , be glory and majesty , dominion and power , both now and ever . Amen .
text2: Ta Yatʋ Ɩsɔ wei ɩnɩ ɩ tike ɩ kɛ ́ Ɩsɔ tɔ ɩ teeli na ɩ sɔsɔɔntʋ na ɩ pəsʋɣʋ na ɩ toŋ ka wɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ , ɩlɛ pə ́ wɛɛ ḿpʋ ́ ɣʋ ́ saŋa taa na tam tɔɔ kɛ ́ Tacaa Yesu Kilisiti tɔɔ . Ami .

text: The Revelation of Jesus Christ , which God gave unto him , to shew unto his servants things which must shortly come to pass ; and he sent and signified it by his angel unto his servant John :
text2: Takəlaɣa kanɛ ka taa kɛɛsəɣəna Yesu Kilisiti kula mpi pə tɔɔ na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ tɔ . Ɩsɔ yelina sɩ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ ɩ pəyalaa kɛ mpi pə wɛɛ sɩ pə kɔŋ nɔɔnɔɔ tɔ . Kilisiti tilina ɩ ɩsɔtaa tillu na ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - təɣɩ ɩ pəyalʋ Yohaanɩ má .

text: Who bare record of the word of God , and of the testimony of Jesus Christ , and of all things that he saw .
text2: Na pə təna mpi Yohaanɩ má , ma nawa tɔɣɔ ma kɛɛsaa . Na Ɩsɔ kʋheelutu na tampana nna a tɔɔ Yesu Kilisiti kulaa tɔɣɔlɔ .

text: Blessed is he that readeth , and they that hear the words of this prophecy , and keep those things which are written therein : for the time is at hand .
text2: Wei ɩ kaləɣɩ tɔm tənɛ , na mpa pa tʋ ŋkpaŋŋ kɛ mpi pɩɩ la cele na pə yɔɣɔta pə tɔm tɔ , na pá tɔka nti pa ŋmaa cənɛ tɔ , pʋntʋnaa ntɛ ́ leleŋ nɩɩlaa . Pə taɣa pʋlʋ , mpi pə wɛɛ sɩ pɩɩ la mpʋ tɔ pə waatʋ wʋsaa kɛ ́ .

text: John to the seven churches which are in Asia : Grace be unto you , and peace , from him which is , and which was , and which is to come ; and from the seven Spirits which are before his throne ;
text2: Maɣa Yohaanɩ , má ŋmaakəna takəlaɣa kɛ Yesu sɛɛlaa kpeka naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa mpa mɛ ɩ ́ wɛ Asii tɛtʋ taa tɔ . Ɩsɔ wei ɩ wɛɛ , na ɩ ka wɛɛ , na ɩ ká kɔɔ tɔ , ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ na ɩ ́ ha - mɛɣɛ alaafəya . Na feesiŋ naatosompɔɣɔlaɣa wei ɩ wɛ Ɩsɔ Kawulaɣa kumte ɩsɛntaa tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ na ɩ ́ ha - mɛɣɛ alaafəya tɔtɔ .

text: And from Jesus Christ , who is the faithful witness , and the first begotten of the dead , and the prince of the kings of the earth . Unto him that loved us , and washed us from our sins in his own blood ,
text2: Yesu Kilisiti wei ɩ kɛ ́ seliya tʋ kʋpaŋ , na pə taaləna - ɩ sətaa taa kɛ ́ feesuɣu təcəcɩ na ɩ kɛ ́ tɛtʋ tɔɔ awulaa wulaʋ tɔ , ɩ ́ lɛ ́ ɩ ́ hʋ ́ lɩ ́ - mɛɣɛ pɛɛlɛɛ na ɩ ́ ha - mɛɣɛ alaafəya tɔtɔ . Ɩnɩ ɩ sɔɔləna - tʋ na ɩ ́ sɩ ́ sɩ pə ́ ləsɩ - tʋɣʋ tá ɩsaɣatʋ ,
